tataḥ kalau sampravṛtte sammohāya sura dviṣām buddhaḥ nāmnā añjana-sutaḥ kīkaṭeṣu bhaviṣyati
atha asau yuga-sandhyāyām dasyu prāyeṣu rājasu janitā viṣṇu yaśasaḥ nāmnā kalkiḥ jagat-patiḥ
avatārāḥ hi asaṅkhyeyāḥ hareḥ sattva-nidheḥ dvijāḥ yathā avidāsinaḥ kulyāḥ sarasaḥ syuḥ sahasraśaḥ
ṛṣayaḥ manavaḥ devāḥ manu-putrāḥ mahā-ojasaḥ kalāḥ sarve hareḥ eva sa-prajāpatayaḥ smṛtāḥ
ete ca aṁśa kalāḥ puṁsaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ tu bhagavān svayam indra-ari vyākulam lokam mṛḍayanti yuge yuge
janma guhyam bhagavataḥ yaḥ etat prayataḥ naraḥ sāyam prātaḥ gṛṇan bhaktyā duḥkha-grāmāt vimucyate
etat rūpam bhagavataḥ hi arūpasya cit-ātmanaḥ māyā guṇaiḥ viracitam mahat-ādibhiḥ ātmani
yathā nabhasi megha-oghaḥ reṇuḥ vā pārthivaḥ anile evam draṣṭari dṛśyatvam āropitam abuddhibhiḥ
ataḥ param yat avyaktam avyūḍha guṇa-bṛṁhitam adṛṣṭa aśruta vastutvāt saḥ jīvaḥ yat punaḥ-bhavaḥ
yatra ime sat-asat rūpe pratiṣiddhe sva-saṁvidā avidyayā ātmani kṛte iti tat brahma-darśanam
yadi eṣā uparatā devī māyā vaiśāradī matiḥ sampannaḥ eva iti viduḥ mahimni sve mahīyate
evam janmāni karmāṇi hi akartuḥ ajanasya ca varṇayanti sma kavayaḥ veda-guhyāni hṛt-pateḥ
saḥ vā idam viśvam amogha-līlaḥ sṛjati avati atti na sajjate asmin bhūteṣu ca antarhitaḥ ātma-tantraḥ ṣāṭ-vargikam jighrati ṣaṭ-guṇa-īśaḥ
na ca asya kaścit nipuṇena dhātuḥ avaiti jantuḥ kumanīṣaḥ ūtīḥ nāmāni rūpāṇi manaḥ-vacobhiḥ santanvataḥ naṭa-caryām iva ajñaḥ
saḥ veda dhātuḥ padavīm parasya duranta-vīryasya ratha-aṅga-pāṇeḥ yaḥ amāyayā santatayā anuvṛttyā bhajeta tat-pāda saroja-gandham
atha iha dhanyāḥ bhagavantaḥ ittham yat vāsudeve akhila loka-nāthe kurvanti sarva-ātmakam ātma bhāvam na yatra bhūyaḥ parivartaḥ ugraḥ
idam bhāgavatam nāma purāṇam brahma-sammitam uttama-śloka caritam cakāra bhagavān ṛṣiḥ niḥśreyasāya lokasya dhanyam svasti-ayanam mahat
tat idam grāhayām āsa sutam ātmavatām varam sarva veda itihāsānām sāram sāram samuddhṛtam
saḥ tu saṁśrāvayām āsa mahā-rājam parīkṣitam prāya-upaviṣṭam gaṅgāyām parītam parama-ṛṣibhiḥ
kṛṣṇe sva-dhāma upagate dharma jñāna ādibhiḥ saha kalau naṣṭa-dṛśām eṣaḥ purāṇa-arkaḥ adhunā uditaḥ
tatra kīrtayataḥ viprāḥ vipra-ṛṣeḥ bhūri tejasaḥ aham ca adhyagamam tatra niviṣṭaḥ tat-anugrahāt saḥ aham vaḥ śrāvayiṣyāmi yathā-adhītam yathā-mati
vyāsaḥ uvāca iti bruvāṇam saṁstūya munīnām dīrgha satriṇām vṛddhaḥ kula-patiḥ sūtam bahu-ṛcaḥ śaunakaḥ abravīt
śaunakaḥ uvāca sūta sūta mahā-bhāga vada naḥ vadatām vara kathām bhāgavatīm puṇyām yat āha bhagavān śukaḥ
kasmin yuge pravṛttā iyam sthāne vā kena hetunā kutaḥ sañcoditaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kṛtavān saṁhitām muniḥ
tasya putraḥ mahā-yogī sama-dṛk nirvikalpakaḥ ekānta-matiḥ unnidraḥ gūḍhaḥ mūḍhaḥ iva īyate
dṛṣṭvā anuyāntam ṛṣim ātmajam api anagnam devyaḥ hriyā paridadhuḥ na sutasya citram tat vīkṣya pṛcchati munau jagaduḥ tava asti strī-pum bhidā na tu sutasya vivikta dṛṣṭeḥ
katham ālakṣitaḥ pauraiḥ samprāptaḥ kuru-jāṅgalān unmatta mūka jaḍavat vicaran gaja-sāhvaye
katham vā pāṇḍaveyasya rājarṣeḥ muninā saha saṁvādaḥ samabhūt tāta yatra eṣā sātvatī śrutiḥ
saḥ go-dohana-mātram hi gṛheṣu gṛha-medhinām avekṣate mahā-bhāgaḥ tīrthī kurvan tat āśramam
abhimanyu-sutam sūta prāhuḥ bhāgavata-uttamam tasya janma mahā-āścaryam karmāṇi ca gṛṇīhi naḥ
saḥ samrāṭ kasya vā hetoḥ pāṇḍūnām māna-vardhanaḥ prāya-upaviṣṭaḥ gaṅgāyām anādṛtya adhirāṭ śriyam
namanti yat-pāda niketam ātmanaḥ śivāya hānīya dhanāni śatravaḥ katham saḥ vīraḥ śriyam aṅga dustyajām yuvā aiṣata utsraṣṭum aho saha asubhiḥ
śivāya lokasya bhavāya bhūtaye ye uttama-śloka-parāyaṇāḥ janāḥ jīvanti na ātma-artham asau para-āśrayam mumoca nirvidya kutaḥ kalevaram
tat sarvam naḥ samācakṣva pṛṣṭaḥ yat iha kiñcana manye tvām viṣaye vācām snātam anyatra chāndasāt
sūtaḥ uvāca dvāpare samanuprāpte tṛtīye yuga paryaye jātaḥ parāśarāt yogī vāsavyām kalayā hareḥ
saḥ kadācit sarasvatyāḥ upaspṛśya jalam śuciḥ vivikte ekaḥ āsīnaḥ udite ravi-maṇḍale
para-avara jñaḥ saḥ ṛṣiḥ kālena avyakta raṁhasā yuga-dharma vyatikaram prāptam bhuvi yuge yuge
bhautikānām ca bhāvānām śakti-hrāsam ca tat-kṛtam aśraddadhānān niḥsattvān durmedhān hrasita āyuṣaḥ durbhagān ca janān vīkṣya muniḥ divyena cakṣuṣā sarva varṇa-āśramāṇām yat dadhyau hitam amogha-dṛk
cātuḥ hotram karma śuddham prajānām vīkṣya vaidikam vyadadhāt yajña santatyai vedam ekam catuḥ-vidham
ṛg-yajuḥ-sāma-atharva-ākhyāḥ vedāḥ catvāraḥ uddhṛtāḥ itihāsa purāṇam ca pañcamaḥ vedaḥ ucyate
tatra ṛg-veda-dharaḥ pailaḥ sāma-gaḥ jaiminiḥ kaviḥ vaiśampāyanaḥ eva ekaḥ niṣṇātaḥ yajuṣām uta
atharva aṅgirasām āsīt sumantuḥ dāruṇaḥ muniḥ itihāsa-purāṇānām pitā me romaharṣaṇaḥ
te ete ṛṣayaḥ vedam svam svam vyasyan anekadhā śiṣyaiḥ praśiṣyaiḥ tat-śiṣyaiḥ vedāḥ te śākhinaḥ abhavan
te eva vedāḥ durmedhaiḥ dhāryante puruṣaiḥ yathā evam cakāra bhagavān vyāsaḥ kṛpaṇa-vatsalaḥ
strī śūdra dvija-bandhūnām trayī na śruti-gocarā karma-śreyasi mūḍhānām śreyaḥ evam bhavet iha iti bhāratam ākhyānam kṛpayā muninā kṛtam
evam pravṛttasya sadā bhūtānām śreyasi dvijāḥ sarvātmakena api yadā na atuṣyat hṛdayam tataḥ
na atiprasīdat hṛdayaḥ sarasvatyāḥ taṭe śucau vitarkayan vivikta-sthaḥ idam ca uvāca dharma-vit
dhṛta-vratena hi mayā chandāṁsi guravaḥ agnayaḥ mānitāḥ nirvyalīkena gṛhītam ca anuśāsanam bhārata vyapadeśena hi āmnāya-arthaḥ ca pradarśitaḥ dṛśyate yatra dharma-ādiḥ strī-śūdra-ādibhiḥ api uta
tathāpi bata me daihyaḥ hi ātmā ca eva ātmanā vibhuḥ asampannaḥ iva ābhāti brahma-varcasya sattamaḥ
kim vā bhāgavatāḥ dharmāḥ na prāyeṇa nirūpitāḥ priyāḥ paramahaṁsānām te eva hi acyuta priyāḥ
tasya evam khilam ātmānam manyamānasya khidyataḥ kṛṣṇasya nāradaḥ abhyāgāt āśramam prāk udāhṛtam
tam abhijñāya sahasā pratyutthāya āgatam muniḥ pūjayām āsa vidhi-vat nāradam sura-pūjitam
sūtaḥ uvāca atha tam sukham āsīnaḥ upāsīnam bṛhat-śravāḥ devarṣiḥ prāha viprarṣim vīṇā-pāṇiḥ smayan iva
nāradaḥ uvāca pārāśarya mahā-bhāga bhavataḥ kaccit ātmanā parituṣyati śārīraḥ ātmā mānasaḥ eva vā
jijñāsitam susampannam api te mahat-adbhutam kṛtavān bhāratam yaḥ tvam sarva-artha paribṛṁhitam
jijñāsitam adhītam ca brahma yat tat sanātanam tathāpi śocasi ātmānam akṛta-arthaḥ iva prabho
vyāsaḥ uvāca asti eva me sarvam idam tvayā uktam tathāpi na ātmā parituṣyate me tat mūlam avyaktam agādha-bodham pṛcchāmahe tvā ātma-bhava ātma-bhūtam
saḥ vai bhavān veda samasta guhyam upāsitaḥ yat puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ para-avara-īśaḥ manasā eva viśvam sṛjati avati atti guṇaiḥ asaṅgaḥ
tvam paryaṭan arkaḥ iva tri-lokīm antaḥ-caraḥ vāyuḥ iva ātma sākṣī para-avare brahmaṇi dharmataḥ vrataiḥ snātasya me nyūnam alam vicakṣva
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca bhavatā anudita-prāyam yaśaḥ bhagavataḥ amalam yena eva asau na tuṣyeta manye tat darśanam khilam
yathā dharma-ādayaḥ ca arthāḥ muni-varya anukīrtitāḥ na tathā vāsudevasya mahimā hi anuvarṇitaḥ
na yat vacaḥ citra-padam hareḥ yaśaḥ jagat pavitram pragṛṇīta karhicit tat vāyasam tīrtham uśanti mānasāḥ na yatra haṁsāḥ niramanti uśik-kṣayāḥ
tat vāk visargaḥ janatā agha viplavaḥ yasmin prati-ślokam abaddhavati api nāmāni anantasya yaśaḥ aṅkitāni yat śṛṇvanti gāyanti gṛṇanti sādhavaḥ
naiṣkarmyam api acyuta bhāva varjitam na śobhate jñānam alam nirañjanam kutaḥ punaḥ śaśvat abhadram īśvare na ca arpitam karma yat api akāraṇam
atho mahā-bhāga bhavān amogha-dṛk śuci śravāḥ satya-rataḥ dhṛta-vrataḥ urukramasya akhila bandha muktaye samādhinā anusmara tat-viceṣṭitam
tataḥ anyathā kiñcana yat vivakṣataḥ pṛthak dṛśaḥ tat-kṛta rūpa nāmabhiḥ na karhicit kvāpi ca duḥsthitā matiḥ labheta vāta-āhata nauḥ iva āspadam
jugupsitam dharma-kṛte anuśāsataḥ svabhāva-raktasya mahān vyatikramaḥ yat-vākyataḥ dharmaḥ iti itaraḥ sthitaḥ na manyate tasya nivāraṇam janaḥ
vicakṣaṇaḥ asya arhati veditum vibhoḥ ananta-pārasya nivṛttitaḥ sukham pravartamānasya guṇaiḥ anātmanaḥ tataḥ bhavān darśaya ceṣṭitam vibhoḥ
tyaktvā sva-dharmam caraṇa-ambujam hareḥ bhajan apakvaḥ atha patet tataḥ yadi yatra kva vā abhadram abhūt amuṣya kim kaḥ vā arthaḥ āptaḥ abhajatām sva-dharmataḥ
tasya eva hetoḥ prayateta kovidaḥ na labhyate yat bhramatām upari adhaḥ tat labhyate duḥkhavat anyataḥ sukham kālena sarvatra gabhīra raṁhasā
na vai janaḥ jātu kathañcana āvrajet mukunda-sevī anyavat aṅga saṁsṛtim smaran mukunda-aṅghri upagūhanam punaḥ vihātum icchet na rasa-grahaḥ janaḥ
idam hi viśvam bhagavān iva itaraḥ yataḥ jagat sthāna nirodha sambhavāḥ tat hi svayam veda bhavān tathā api te prādeśa-mātram bhavataḥ pradarśitam
tvam ātmanā ātmānam avehi amogha-dṛk parasya puṁsaḥ paramātmanaḥ kalām ajam prajātam jagataḥ śivāya tat mahā-anubhāva abhyudayaḥ adhigaṇya-tām
idam hi puṁsaḥ tapasaḥ śrutasya vā sviṣṭasya sūktasya ca buddhi dattayoḥ avicyutaḥ arthaḥ kavibhiḥ nirūpitaḥ yat uttamaśloka guṇa-anuvarṇanam
aham purā atīta-bhave abhavam mune dāsyāḥ tu kasyāścana veda-vādinām nirūpitaḥ bālakaḥ eva yoginām śuśrūṣaṇe prāvṛṣi nirvivikṣatām
te mayi apeta akhila cāpale arbhake dānte adhṛta-krīḍanake anuvartini cakruḥ kṛpām yadyapi tulya-darśanāḥ śuśrūṣamāṇe munayaḥ alpa-bhāṣiṇi
ucchiṣṭa-lepān anumoditaḥ dvijaiḥ sakṛt sma bhuñje tat apāsta kilbiṣaḥ evam pravṛttasya viśuddha-cetasaḥ tat dharmaḥ eva ātma-ruciḥ prajāyate
tatra anu aham kṛṣṇa-kathāḥ pragāyatām anugraheṇa aśṛṇavam manaḥ-harāḥ tāḥ śraddhayā me anupadam viśṛṇvataḥ priyaśravasi aṅga mama abhavat ruciḥ
tasmin tadā labdha ruceḥ mahā-mate priyaśravasi askhalitā matiḥ mama yayā aham etat sat-asat sva-māyayā paśye mayi brahmaṇi kalpitam pare
ittham śarat prāvṛṣikau ṛtū hareḥ viśṛṇvataḥ me anusavam yaśaḥ amalam saṅkīrtyamānam munibhiḥ mahā-ātmabhiḥ bhaktiḥ pravṛttā ātma rajaḥ tama upahā
tasya evam me anuraktasya praśritasya hata enasaḥ śraddadhānasya bālasya dāntasya anucarasya ca
jñānam guhyatamam yat tat sākṣāt bhagavatā uditam anvavocan gamiṣyantaḥ kṛpayā dīna-vatsalāḥ
yena eva aham bhagavataḥ vāsudevasya vedhasaḥ māyā anubhāvam avidam yena gacchanti tat-padam
etat saṁsūcitam brahman tāpa-traya cikitsitam yat īśvare bhagavati karma brahmaṇi bhāvitam
āmayaḥ yaḥ ca bhūtānām jāyate yena suvrata tat eva hi āmayam dravyam na punāti cikitsitam
evam nṛṇām kriyā-yogāḥ sarve saṁsṛti hetavaḥ te eva ātma vināśāya kalpante kalpitāḥ pare
yat atra kriyate karma bhagavat paritoṣaṇam jñānam yat tat adhīnam hi bhakti-yoga samanvitam
kurvāṇāḥ yatra karmāṇi bhagavat śikṣayā asakṛt gṛṇanti guṇa nāmāni kṛṣṇasya anusmaranti ca
oṁ namaḥ bhagavate tubhyam vāsudevāya dhīmahi pradyumnāya, aniruddhāya and saṅkarṣaṇāya namaḥ ca
iti mūrti abhidhānena mantra-mūrtim amūrtikam yajate yajña puruṣam saḥ samyak darśanaḥ pumān
imam sva-nigamam brahman avetya mat anuṣṭhitam adāt me jñānam aiśvaryam svasmin bhāvam ca keśavaḥ
tvam api adabhra śruta viśrutam vibhoḥ samāpyate yena vidām bubhutsitam prākhyāhi duḥkhaiḥ muhuḥ ardita-ātmanām saṅkleśa nirvāṇam uśanti na anyathā
sūtaḥ uvāca evam niśamya bhagavān devarṣeḥ janma karma ca bhūyaḥ papraccha tam brahman vyāsaḥ satyavatī-sutaḥ
vyāsaḥ uvāca bhikṣubhiḥ vipravasite vijñāna ādeṣṭṛbhiḥ tava vartamānaḥ vayasi ādye tataḥ kim akarot bhavān
svāyambhuva kayā vṛttyā vartitam te param vayaḥ katham ca idam udasrākṣīḥ kāle prāpte kalevaram
prāk kalpa viṣayām etām smṛtim te muni-sattama na hi eṣaḥ vyavadhāt kālaḥ eṣaḥ sarva nirākṛtiḥ
nāradaḥ uvāca bhikṣubhiḥ vipravasite vijñāna ādeṣṭṛbhiḥ mama vartamānaḥ vayasi ādye tataḥ etat akāraṣam
eka-ātmajā me jananī yoṣit mūḍhā ca kiṅkarī mayi ātmaje ananya-gatau cakre sneha-anubandhanam
sā asvatantrā na kalpā āsīt yoga-kṣemam mama icchatī īśasya hi vaśe lokaḥ yoṣā dāru-mayī yathā
aham ca tat brahma-kule ūṣivān tat upekṣayā dik-deśa kāla avyutpannaḥ bālakaḥ pañca hāyanaḥ
ekadā nirgatām gehāt duhantīm niśi gām pathi sarpaḥ adaśat padā spṛṣṭaḥ kṛpaṇām kāla-coditaḥ
tadā tat aham īśasya bhaktānām śam abhīpsataḥ anugraham manyamānaḥ prātiṣṭham diśam uttarām
sphītān jana-padān tatra pura grāma vraja ākarān kheṭa kharvaṭa vāṭīḥ ca vanāni upavanāni ca
citra-dhātu vicitra adrīn ibha-bhagna bhuja drumān jalāśayān śiva jalān nalinīḥ sura-sevitāḥ citra-svanaiḥ patra-rathaiḥ vibhramat bhramara-śriyaḥ
nala veṇu śaraḥ tanba kuśa kīcaka gahvaram ekaḥ eva atiyātaḥ aham adrākṣam vipinam mahat ghoram pratibhaya-ākāram vyāla ulūka śiva ajiram
pariśrānta indriya ātmā aham tṛṭ-parītaḥ bubhukṣitaḥ snātvā pītvā hrade nadyāḥ upaspṛṣṭaḥ gata śramaḥ
tasmin nirmanuje araṇye pippala upasthe āśritaḥ ātmanā ātmānam ātma-stham yathā-śrutam acintayam
dhyāyataḥ caraṇa-ambhojam bhāva-nirjita cetasā autkaṇṭhya aśru-kala akṣasya hṛdi āsīt me śanaiḥ hariḥ
premā atibhara nirbhinna pulaka aṅgaḥ ati-nirvṛtaḥ ānanda samplave līnaḥ na apaśyam ubhayam mune
rūpam bhagavataḥ yat tat manaḥ kāntam śucā-apaham apaśyan sahasā uttasthe vaiklavyāt durmanāḥ iva
didṛkṣuḥ tat aham bhūyaḥ praṇidhāya manaḥ hṛdi vīkṣamāṇaḥ api na apaśyam avitṛptaḥ iva āturaḥ
evam yatantam vijane mām āha agocaraḥ girām gambhīra ślakṣṇayā vācā śucaḥ praśamayan iva
hanta asmin janmani bhavān mā mām draṣṭum iha arhati avipakva kaṣāyāṇām durdarśaḥ aham kuyoginām
sakṛt yat darśitam rūpam etat kāmāya te anagha mat kāmaḥ śanakaiḥ sādhuḥ sarvān muñcati hṛt-śayān
sat-sevayā adīrghayā api jātā mayi dṛḍhā matiḥ hitvā avadyam imam lokam gantā mat-janatām asi
matiḥ mayi nibaddhā iyam na vipadyeta karhicit prajā sarga nirodhe api smṛtiḥ ca mat anugrahāt
etāvat uktvā upararāma tat mahat bhūtam nabhaḥ-liṅgam aliṅgam īśvaram aham ca tasmai mahatām mahīyase śīrṣṇā avanāmam vidadhe anukampitaḥ
nāmāni anantasya hata-trapaḥ paṭhan guhyāni bhadrāṇi kṛtāni ca smaran gām paryaṭan tuṣṭa-manāḥ gata-spṛhaḥ kālam pratīkṣan vimadaḥ vimatsaraḥ
evam kṛṣṇa-mateḥ brahman na āsaktasya amala-ātmanaḥ kālaḥ prādurabhūt kāle taḍit saudāmanī yathā
prayujyamāne mayi tām śuddhām bhāgavatīm tanum ārabdha karma nirvāṇaḥ nyapatat pāñca-bhautikaḥ
kalpa-ante idam ādāya śayāne ambhasi udanvataḥ śiśayiṣoḥ anuprāṇam viviśe antaḥ aham vibhoḥ
sahasra yuga paryante utthāya idam sisṛkṣataḥ marīci-miśrāḥ ṛṣayaḥ prāṇebhyaḥ aham ca jajñire
antaḥ bahiḥ ca lokān trīn paryemi askandita vrataḥ anugrahāt mahā-viṣṇoḥ avighāta gatiḥ kvacit
deva dattām imām vīṇām svara brahma vibhūṣitām mūrcchayitvā hari-kathām gāyamānaḥ carāmi aham
pragāyataḥ sva-vīryāṇi tīrtha-pādaḥ priya-śravāḥ āhūtaḥ iva me śīghram darśanam yāti cetasi
etat hi ātura-cittānām mātrā sparśa icchayā muhuḥ bhava-sindhu plavaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ hari-carya anuvarṇanam
yama-ādibhiḥ yoga-pathaiḥ kāma lobha hataḥ muhuḥ mukunda sevayā yadvat tathā ātmā addhā na śāmyati
sarvam tat idam ākhyātam yat pṛṣṭaḥ aham tvayā anagha janma karma rahasyam me bhavataḥ ca ātma toṣaṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca evam sambhāṣya bhagavān nāradaḥ vāsavī sutam āmantrya vīṇām raṇayan yayau yādṛcchikaḥ muniḥ
aho devarṣiḥ dhanyaḥ ayam yat kīrtim śārṅga-dhanvanaḥ gāyan mādyan idam tantryā ramayati āturam jagat
śaunakaḥ uvāca nirgate nārade sūta bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ śrutavān tat abhipretam tataḥ kim akarot vibhuḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca brahma-nadyām sarasvatyām āśramaḥ paścime taṭe śamyāprāsaḥ iti proktaḥ ṛṣīṇām satra-vardhanaḥ
tasmin sve āśrame vyāsaḥ badarī ṣaṇḍa maṇḍite āsīnaḥ apaḥ upaspṛśya praṇidadhyau manaḥ svayam
bhakti yogena manasi samyak praṇihite amale apaśyat puruṣam pūrṇam māyām ca tat apāśrayam
yayā sammohitaḥ jīvaḥ ātmānam tri-guṇa-ātmakam paraḥ api manute anartham tat kṛtam ca abhipadyate
anartha upaśamam sākṣāt bhakti-yogam adhokṣaje lokasya ajānataḥ vidvān cakre sātvata saṁhitām
yasyām vai śrūyamāṇāyām kṛṣṇe parama pūruṣe bhaktiḥ utpadyate puṁsaḥ śoka moha bhaya apahā
saḥ saṁhitām bhāgavatīm kṛtvā anukramya ca ātma-jam śukam adhyāpayām āsa nivṛtti niratam muniḥ
śaunakaḥ uvāca saḥ vai nivṛtti nirataḥ sarvatra upekṣakaḥ muniḥ kasya vā bṛhatīm etām ātma-ārāmaḥ samabhyasat
sūtaḥ uvāca ātmārāmāḥ ca munayaḥ nirgranthāḥ api urukrame kurvanti ahaitukīm bhaktim ittham-bhūta guṇaḥ hariḥ
hareḥ guṇa ākṣipta matiḥ bhagavān bādarāyaṇiḥ adhyagāt mahat ākhyānam nityam viṣṇu-jana priyaḥ
parīkṣitaḥ atha rājarṣeḥ janma karma vilāpanam saṁsthām ca pāṇḍu-putrāṇām vakṣye kṛṣṇa-kathā-udayam
yadā mṛdhe kaurava sṛñjayānām vīreṣu atho vīra-gatim gateṣu vṛkodara āviddha gadā abhimarśa bhagna uru-daṇḍe dhṛtarāṣṭra-putre bhartuḥ priyam drauṇiḥ iti sma paśyan kṛṣṇā sutānām svapatām śirāṁsi upāharat vipriyam eva tasya jugupsitam karma vigarhayanti
mātā śiśūnām nidhanam sutānām niśamya ghoram paritapyamānā tadā arudat vāṣpa-kala-ākula-akṣī tām sāntvayan āha kirīṭamālī
tadā śucaḥ te pramṛjāmi bhadre yat brahma-bandhoḥ śiraḥ ātatāyinaḥ gāṇḍīva-muktaiḥ viśikhaiḥ upāhare tvā ākramya yat snāsyasi dagdha-putrā
iti priyām valgu vicitra jalpaiḥ saḥ sāntvayitvā acyuta-mitra-sūtaḥ anvādravat daṁśitaḥ ugra-dhanvā kapi-dhvajaḥ guru-putram rathena
tam āpatantam saḥ vilakṣya dūrāt kumāra-hā udvigna-manāḥ rathena parādravat prāṇa parīpsuḥ urvyām yāvat-gamam rudra-bhayāt yathā kaḥ
yadā aśaraṇam ātmānam aikṣata śrānta-vājinam astram brahma-śiraḥ mene ātma-trāṇam dvija-ātma-jaḥ
atha upaspṛśya salilam sandadhe tat samāhitaḥ ajānan api saṁhāram prāṇa-kṛcchre upasthite
tataḥ prāduṣkṛtam tejaḥ pracaṇḍam sarvataḥ diśam prāṇa-āpadam abhiprekṣya viṣṇum jiṣṇuḥ uvāca ha
arjunaḥ uvāca kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahā-bāho bhaktānām abhayaṅkara tvam ekaḥ dahyamānānām apavargaḥ asi saṁsṛteḥ
tvam ādyaḥ puruṣaḥ sākṣāt īśvaraḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ māyām vyudasya cit-śaktyā kaivalye sthitaḥ ātmani
saḥ eva jīva-lokasya māyā-mohita cetasaḥ vidhatse svena vīryeṇa śreyaḥ dharma-ādi lakṣaṇam
tathā ayam ca avatāraḥ te bhuvaḥ bhāra jihīrṣayā svānām ca ananya-bhāvānām anudhyānāya ca asakṛt
kim idam svit kutaḥ vā iti deva-deva na vedmi aham sarvataḥ mukham āyāti tejaḥ parama dāruṇam
śrī-bhagavān uvāca vettha idam droṇa-putrasya brāhmam astram pradarśitam na eva asau veda saṁhāram prāṇa-bādhe upasthite
na hi asya anyatamam kiñcit astram prati avakarśanam jahi astra-tejaḥ unnaddham astra-jñaḥ hi astra-tejasā
sūtaḥ uvāca śrutvā bhagavatā proktam phālgunaḥ para-vīra-hā spṛṣṭvā āpaḥ tam parikramya brāhmam brāhma-astram sandadhe
saṁhatya anyonyam ubhayoḥ tejasī śara saṁvṛte āvṛtya rodasī kham ca vavṛdhāte arka vahni-vat
dṛṣṭvā astra tejaḥ tu tayoḥ trīn lokān pradahat mahat dahyamānāḥ prajāḥ sarvāḥ sāṁvartakam amaṁsata
prajā upadravam ālakṣya loka vyatikaram ca tam matam ca vāsudevasya sañjahāra arjunaḥ dvayam
tataḥ āsādya tarasā dāruṇam gautamī-sutam babandha amarṣa tāmra-akṣaḥ paśum raśanayā yathā
śibirāya ninīṣantam rajjvā baddhvā ripum balāt prāha arjunam prakupitaḥ bhagavān ambuja-īkṣaṇaḥ
mā enam pārtha arhasi trātum brahma-bandhum imam jahi yaḥ asau anāgasaḥ suptān avadhīt niśi bālakān
mattam pramattam unmattam suptam bālam striyam jaḍam prapannam viratham bhītam na ripum hanti dharma-vit
sva-prāṇān yaḥ para-prāṇaiḥ prapuṣṇāti aghṛṇaḥ khalaḥ tat-vadhaḥ tasya hi śreyaḥ yat doṣāt yāti adhaḥ pumān
pratiśrutam ca bhavatā pāñcālyai śṛṇvataḥ mama āhariṣye śiraḥ tasya yaḥ te mānini putra-hā
tat asau vadhyatām pāpaḥ ātatāyī ātma bandhu-hā bhartuḥ ca vipriyam vīra kṛtavān kula-pāṁsanaḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca evam parīkṣatā dharmam pārthaḥ kṛṣṇena coditaḥ na aicchat hantum guru-sutam yadyapi ātma-hanam mahān
atha upetya sva śibiram govinda priya sārathiḥ nyavedayat tam priyāyai śocantyai ātma-jān hatān
tathā āhṛtam paśu-vat pāśa-baddham avāk-mukham karma jugupsitena nirīkṣya kṛṣṇā apakṛtam guroḥ sutam vāma svabhāvā kṛpayā nanāma ca
uvāca ca asahantī asya bandhana ānayanam satī mucyatām mucyatām eṣaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ nitarām guruḥ
sa-rahasyaḥ dhanuḥ-vedaḥ sa-visarga upasaṁyamaḥ astra grāmaḥ ca bhavatā śikṣitaḥ yat anugrahāt
saḥ eṣaḥ bhagavān droṇaḥ prajā-rūpeṇa vartate tasya ātmanaḥ ardham patnī āste na anvagāt vīrasūḥ kṛpī
tat dharma-jña mahā-bhāga bhavadbhiḥ gauravam kulam vṛjinam na arhati prāptum pūjyam vandyam abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
mā rodīt asya jananī gautamī pati-devatā yathā aham mṛta-vatsā ārtā rodimi aśru-mukhī muhuḥ
yaiḥ kopitam brahma-kulam rājanyaiḥ ajita ātmabhiḥ tat kulam pradahati āśu sa-anubandham śucā-arpitam
sūtaḥ uvāca dharmyam nyāyyam sa-karuṇam nirvyalīkam samam mahat rājā dharma-sutaḥ rājñyāḥ pratyanandat vacaḥ dvijāḥ
nakulaḥ sahadevaḥ ca yuyudhānaḥ dhanañjayaḥ bhagavān devakī-putraḥ ye ca anye yāḥ ca yoṣitaḥ
tatra āha amarṣitaḥ bhīmaḥ tasya śreyān vadhaḥ smṛtaḥ na bhartuḥ na ātmanaḥ ca arthe yaḥ ahan suptān śiśūn vṛthā
niśamya bhīma gaditam draupadyāḥ ca catuḥ-bhujaḥ ālokya vadanam sakhyuḥ idam āha hasan iva
śrī-bhagavān uvāca brahma-bandhuḥ na hantavyaḥ ātatāyī vadha-arhaṇaḥ mayā eva ubhayam āmnātam paripāhi anuśāsanam kuru pratiśrutam satyam yat tat sāntvayatā priyām priyam ca bhīmasenasya pāñcālyāḥ mahyam eva ca
sūtaḥ uvāca arjunaḥ sahasā ājñāya hareḥ hārdam atha asinā maṇim jahāra mūrdhanyam dvijasya saha mūrdhajam
vimucya raśanā-baddham bāla-hatyā hata-prabham tejasā maṇinā hīnam śibirāt nirayāpayat
vapanam draviṇa adānam sthānāt niryāpaṇam tathā eṣaḥ hi brahma-bandhūnām vadhaḥ na anyaḥ asti daihikaḥ
putra śoka āturāḥ sarve pāṇḍavāḥ saha kṛṣṇayā svānām mṛtānām yat kṛtyam cakruḥ nirharaṇa-ādikam
sūtaḥ uvāca atha te samparetānām svānām udakam icchatām dātum sa-kṛṣṇāḥ gaṅgāyām puraskṛtya yayuḥ striyaḥ
te ninīya udakam sarve vilapya ca bhṛśam punaḥ āplutāḥ hari-pādābja rajaḥ pūta sarit jale
tatra āsīnam kuru-patim dhṛtarāṣṭram saha-anujam gāndhārīm putra śoka-artām pṛthām kṛṣṇām ca mādhavaḥ
sāntvayām āsa munibhiḥ hata-bandhūn śucārpitān bhūteṣu kālasya gatim darśayan na pratikriyām
sādhayitvā ajāta-śatroḥ svam rājyam kitavaiḥ hṛtam ghātayitvā asataḥ rājñaḥ kaca sparśa kṣata āyuṣaḥ
yājayitvā aśvamedhaiḥ tam tribhiḥ uttama kalpakaiḥ tat yaśaḥ pāvanam dikṣu śata-manyoḥ iva atanot
āmantrya pāṇḍu-putrān ca śaineya uddhava saṁyutaḥ dvaipāyana-ādibhiḥ vipraiḥ pūjitaiḥ pratipūjitaḥ
gantum kṛtamatiḥ brahman dvārakām ratham āsthitaḥ upalebhe abhidhāvantīm uttarām bhaya-vihvalām
uttarā uvāca pāhi pāhi mahā-yogin deva-deva jagat-pate na anyam tvat abhayam paśye yatra mṛtyuḥ parasparam
abhidravati mām īśa śaraḥ tapta ayasaḥ vibho kāmam dahatu mām nātha mā me garbhaḥ nipātyatām
sūtaḥ uvāca upadhārya vacaḥ tasyāḥ bhagavān bhakta-vatsalaḥ apāṇḍavam idam kartum drauṇeḥ astram abudhyata
tarhi eva atha muni-śreṣṭha pāṇḍavāḥ pañca sāyakān ātmanaḥ abhimukhān dīptān ālakṣya astrāṇi upādaduḥ
vyasanam vīkṣya tat teṣām ananya viṣaya ātmanām sudarśanena sva-astreṇa svānām rakṣām vyadhāt vibhuḥ
antaḥsthaḥ sarva bhūtānām ātmā yoga-īśvaraḥ hariḥ sva-māyayā āvṛṇot garbham vairāṭyāḥ kuru-tantave
yadyapi astram brahma-śiraḥ tu amogham ca apratikriyam vaiṣṇavam tejaḥ āsādya samaśāmyat bhṛgu-udvaha
mā maṁsthāḥ hi etat āścaryam sarva āścarya-maye acyute yaḥ idam māyayā devyā sṛjati avati hanti ajaḥ
brahma-tejaḥ vinirmuktaiḥ ātma-jaiḥ saha kṛṣṇayā prayāṇa abhimukham kṛṣṇam idam āha pṛthā satī
kuntī uvāca namasye puruṣam tvā ādyam īśvaram prakṛteḥ param alakṣyam sarva bhūtānām antaḥ bahiḥ avasthitam
māyā javanikā ācchannam ajñā adhokṣajam avyayam na lakṣyase mūḍha-dṛśā naṭaḥ nāṭya-dharaḥ yathā
tathā paramahaṁsānām munīnām amala-ātmanām bhakti-yoga vidhāna-artham katham paśyema hi striyaḥ
kṛṣṇāya vāsudevāya devakī-nandanāya ca nanda-gopa kumārāya govindāya namaḥ namaḥ
namaḥ paṅkaja-nābhāya namaḥ paṅkaja-māline namaḥ paṅkaja-netrāya namaḥ te paṅkaja-aṅghraye
yathā hṛṣīkeśa khalena devakī kaṁsena ruddhā ati-ciram śuca-arpitā vimocitā aham ca saha-ātma-jā vibho tvayā eva nāthena muhuḥ vipat-gaṇāt
viṣāt mahā-agneḥ puruṣa-ada darśanāt asat sabhāyāḥ vana-vāsa kṛcchrataḥ mṛdhe mṛdhe aneka mahā-ratha astrataḥ drauṇi astrataḥ ca āsma hare abhirakṣitāḥ
vipadaḥ santu tāḥ śaśvat tatra tatra jagat-guro bhavataḥ darśanam yat syāt apunaḥ bhava-darśanam
janma aiśvarya śruta śrībhiḥ edhamāna madaḥ pumān na eva arhati abhidhātum vai tvām akiñcana-gocaram
namaḥ akiñcana-vittāya nivṛtta guṇa vṛttaye ātma-ārāmāya śāntāya kaivalya-pataye namaḥ
manye tvām kālam īśānam anādi-nidhanam vibhum samam carantam sarvatra bhūtānām yat mithaḥ kaliḥ
na veda kaścit bhagavan cikīrṣitam tava īhamānasya nṛṇām viḍambanam na yasya kaścit dayitaḥ asti karhicit dveṣyaḥ ca yasmin viṣamā matiḥ nṛṇām
janma karma ca viśva-ātman ajasya akartuḥ ātmanaḥ tiryak nṛ ṛṣiṣu yādaḥsu tat atyanta viḍambanam
gopī ādade tvayi kṛtāgasi dāma tāvat yā te daśā aśru-kalila añjana sambhrama akṣam vaktram ninīya bhaya-bhāvanayā sthitasya sā mām vimohayati bhīḥ api yat bibheti
kecit āhuḥ ajam jātam puṇya-ślokasya kīrtaye yadoḥ priyasya anvavāye malayasya iva candanam
apare vasudevasya devakyām yācitaḥ abhyagāt ajaḥ tvam asya kṣemāya vadhāya ca sura-dviṣām
bhāra-avatāraṇāya anye bhuvaḥ nāvaḥ iva udadhau sīdantyāḥ bhūri bhāreṇa jātaḥ hi ātma-bhuvā arthitaḥ
bhave asmin kliśyamānānām avidyā kāma karmabhiḥ śravaṇa smaraṇa arhāṇi kariṣyan iti kecana
śṛṇvanti gāyanti gṛṇanti abhīkṣṇaśaḥ smaranti nandanti tava īhitam janāḥ te eva paśyanti acireṇa tāvakam bhava-pravāha uparamam pada-ambujam
api adya naḥ tvam sva-kṛta īhita prabho jihāsasi svit suhṛdaḥ anujīvinaḥ yeṣām na ca anyat bhavataḥ pada-ambujāt parāyaṇam rājasu yojita aṁhasām
ke vayam nāma-rūpābhyām yadubhiḥ saha pāṇḍavāḥ bhavataḥ adarśanam yarhi hṛṣīkāṇām iva īśituḥ
na iyam śobhiṣyate tatra yathā idānīm gadādhara tvat padaiḥ aṅkitā bhāti sva-lakṣaṇa vilakṣitaiḥ
ime jana-padāḥ svṛddhāḥ supakva auṣadhi vīrudhaḥ vana adri nadī udanvantaḥ hi edhante tava vīkṣitaiḥ
atha viśva-īśa viśva-ātman viśva-mūrte svakeṣu me sneha-pāśam imam chindhi dṛḍham pāṇḍuṣu vṛṣṇiṣu
tvayi me ananya-viṣayā matiḥ madhu-pate asakṛt ratim udvahatāt addhā gaṅgā iva ogham udanvati
śrī-kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa-sakha vṛṣṇi ṛṣabha avani dhruk rājanya-vaṁśa dahana anapavarga vīrya govinda go dvija sura arti-hara avatāra yoga-īśvara akhila guro bhagavan namaḥ te
sūtaḥ uvāca pṛthayā ittham kala-padaiḥ pariṇūta akhila udayaḥ mandam jahāsa vaikuṇṭhaḥ mohayan iva māyayā
tām bāḍham iti upāmantrya praviśya gajasāhvayam striyaḥ ca sva-puram yāsyan premṇā rājñā nivāritaḥ
vyāsa-ādyaiḥ īśvara īhā jñaiḥ kṛṣṇena adbhuta-karmaṇā prabodhitaḥ api itihāsaiḥ na abudhyata śucā arpitaḥ
āha rājā dharma-sutaḥ cintayan suhṛdām vadham prākṛtena ātmanā viprāḥ sneha moha vaśam gataḥ
aho me paśyata ajñānam hṛdi rūḍham durātmanaḥ pārakyasya eva dehasya bahvyaḥ me akṣauhiṇīḥ hatāḥ
bāla dvi-ja suhṛt mitra pitṛ bhrātṛ guru druhaḥ na me syāt nirayāt mokṣaḥ hi api varṣa ayuta āyutaiḥ
na enaḥ rājñaḥ prajā-bhartuḥ dharma yuddhe vadhaḥ dviṣām iti me na tu bodhāya kalpate śāsanam vacaḥ
strīṇām mat hata-bandhūnām drohaḥ yaḥ asau iha utthitaḥ karmabhiḥ gṛhamedhīyaiḥ na aham kalpaḥ vyapohitum
yathā paṅkena paṅka-ambhaḥ surayā vā surākṛtam bhūta-hatyām tathā eva ekām na yajñaiḥ mārṣṭum arhati
sūtaḥ uvāca iti bhītaḥ prajā-drohāt sarva dharma vivitsayā tataḥ vinaśanam prāgāt yatra deva-vrataḥ apatat
tadā te bhrātaraḥ sarve sat-aśvaiḥ svarṇa bhūṣitaiḥ anvagacchan rathaiḥ viprāḥ vyāsa dhaumya ādayaḥ tathā
bhagavān api vipra-ṛṣe rathena sa-dhanañjayaḥ saḥ taiḥ vyarocata nṛpaḥ kuvera iva guhyakaiḥ
dṛṣṭvā nipatitam bhūmau divaḥ cyutam iva amaram praṇemuḥ pāṇḍavāḥ bhīṣmam sa-anugāḥ saha cakriṇā
tatra brahma-ṛṣayaḥ sarve deva-ṛṣayaḥ ca sattama rāja-ṛṣayaḥ ca tatra āsan draṣṭum bharata puṅgavam
parvataḥ nāradaḥ dhaumyaḥ bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ bṛhadaśvaḥ bharadvājaḥ sa-śiṣyaḥ reṇukā-sutaḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ indrapramadaḥ tritaḥ gṛtsamadaḥ asitaḥ kakṣīvān gautamaḥ atriḥ ca kauśikaḥ atha sudarśanaḥ
anye ca munayaḥ brahman brahmarāta ādayaḥ amalāḥ śiṣyaiḥ upetāḥ ājagmuḥ kaśyapa āṅgirasa ādayaḥ
tān sametān mahā-bhāgān upalabhya vasu-uttamaḥ pūjayām āsa dharma-jñaḥ deśa kāla vibhāga-vit
kṛṣṇam ca tat prabhāva-jñaḥ āsīnam jagat-īśvaram hṛdi-stham pūjayām āsa māyayā upātta vigraham
pāṇḍu putrān upāsīnān praśraya prema saṅgatān abhyācaṣṭa anurāga aśraiḥ andhībhūtena cakṣuṣā
aho kaṣṭam aho anyāyyam yat yūyam dharma-nandanāḥ jīvitum na arhatha kliṣṭam vipra dharma acyuta āśrayāḥ
saṁsthite ati-rathe pāṇḍau pṛthā bāla-prajā vadhūḥ yuṣmat-kṛte bahūn kleśān prāptā toka-vatī muhuḥ
sarvam kāla-kṛtam manye bhavatām ca yat apriyam sa-pālaḥ yat-vaśe lokaḥ vāyoḥ iva ghana-āvaliḥ
yatra dharma-sutaḥ rājā gadā-pāṇiḥ vṛkodaraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ astrī gāṇḍivam cāpam suhṛt kṛṣṇaḥ tataḥ vipat
na hi asya karhicit rājan pumān veda vidhitsitam yat vijijñāsayā yuktāḥ muhyanti kavayaḥ api hi
tasmāt idam daiva-tantram vyavasya bharata-ṛṣabha tasya anuvihitaḥ anāthāḥ nātha pāhi prajāḥ prabho
eṣaḥ vai bhagavān sākṣāt ādyaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ pumān mohayan māyayā lokam gūḍhaḥ carati vṛṣṇiṣu
asya anubhāvam bhagavān veda guhya-tamam śivaḥ deva-ṛṣiḥ nāradaḥ sākṣāt bhagavān kapilaḥ nṛpa
yam manyase mātuleyam priyam mitram suhṛt-tamam akaroḥ sacivam dūtam sauhṛdāt atha sārathim
sarva-ātmanaḥ sama-dṛśaḥ hi advayasya anahaṅkṛteḥ tat-kṛtam mati vaiṣamyam niravadyasya na kvacit
tathāpi ekānta bhakteṣu paśya bhū-pa anukampitam yat me asūn tyajataḥ sākṣāt kṛṣṇaḥ darśanam āgataḥ
bhaktyā āveśya manaḥ yasmin vācā yat nāma kīrtayan tyajan kalevaram yogī mucyate kāma-karmabhiḥ
saḥ deva-devaḥ bhagavān pratīkṣatām kalevaram yāvat idam hinomi aham prasanna hāsa aruṇa-locana ullasat mukha-ambujaḥ dhyāna-pathaḥ catur-bhujaḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ tat ākarṇya śayānam śara-pañjare apṛcchat vividhān dharmān ṛṣīṇām ca anuśṛṇvatām
puruṣa sva-bhāva vihitān yathā varṇam yathā āśramam vairāgya rāga upādhibhyām āmnāta ubhaya lakṣaṇān
dāna-dharmān rāja-dharmān mokṣa-dharmān vibhāgaśaḥ strī-dharmān bhagavat-dharmān samāsa vyāsa yogataḥ
dharma artha kāma mokṣān ca saha upāyān yathā mune nānā ākhyāna itihāseṣu varṇayām āsa tattva-vit
dharmam pravadataḥ tasya saḥ kālaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ yaḥ yoginaḥ chanda-mṛtyoḥ vāñchitaḥ tu uttarāyaṇaḥ
tadā upasaṁhṛtya giraḥ sahasraṇīḥ vimukta-saṅgam manaḥ ādi-pūruṣe kṛṣṇe lasat-pīta-paṭe catur-bhuje puraḥ sthite amīlita dṛk vyadhārayat
viśuddhayā dhāraṇayā hata-aśubhaḥ tat īkṣayā eva āśu gatā yudha śramaḥ nivṛtta sarva indriya vṛtti vibhramaḥ tuṣṭāva janyam visṛjan janārdanam
śrī-bhīṣmaḥ uvāca iti matiḥ upakalpitā vitṛṣṇā bhagavati sātvata-puṅgave vibhūmni sva-sukham upagate kvacit vihartum prakṛtim upeyuṣi yat-bhava pravāhaḥ
tri-bhuvana kamanam tamāla-varṇam ravi-kara gaura varāmbaram dadhāne vapuḥ alaka-kula-āvṛta anana-abjam vijaya-sakhe ratiḥ astu me anavadyā
yudhi turaga rajaḥ vidhūmra viṣvak kaca lulita śramavāri alaṅkṛta āsye mama niśita śaraiḥ vibhidyamāna tvaci vilasat kavace astu kṛṣṇe ātmā
sapadi sakhi-vacaḥ niśamya madhye nija parayoḥ balayoḥ ratham niveśya sthitavati para-sainika āyuḥ akṣṇā hṛtavati pārtha sakhe ratiḥ mama astu
vyavahita pṛtanā mukham nirīkṣya sva-jana vadhāt vimukhasya doṣa-buddhyā kumatim aharat ātma-vidyayā yaḥ caraṇa ratiḥ paramasya tasya me astu
sva-nigamam apahāya mat-pratijñām ṛtam adhi kartum avaplutaḥ ratha-sthaḥ dhṛta ratha caraṇaḥ abhyayāt caladguḥ hariḥ iva hantum ibham gata uttarīyaḥ
śita viśikha hataḥ viśīrṇa-daṁśaḥ kṣataja pariplutaḥ ātatāyinaḥ me prasabham abhisasāra mat-vadha-artham saḥ bhavatu me bhagavān gatiḥ mukundaḥ
vijaya ratha kuṭumbe ātta-totre dhṛta-haya raśmini tat-śriyā īkṣaṇīye bhagavati ratiḥ astu me mumūrṣoḥ yam iha nirīkṣya hatāḥ gatāḥ sva-rūpam
lalita gati vilāsa valgu-hāsa praṇaya nirīkṣaṇa kalpita urumānāḥ kṛtam anukṛtavatyaḥ unmada-andhāḥ prakṛtim agan kila yasya gopa-vadhvaḥ
muni-gaṇa nṛpa-varya saṅkule antaḥ-sadasi yudhiṣṭhira rāja-sūye eṣām arhaṇam upapeda īkṣaṇīyaḥ mama dṛśi gocaraḥ eṣaḥ āviḥ ātmā
tam imam aham ajam śarīra-bhājām hṛdi hṛdi dhiṣṭhitam ātma kalpitānām pratidṛśam iva na ekadhā arkam ekam samadhigataḥ asmi vidhūta bheda-mohaḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca kṛṣṇe evam bhagavati manaḥ vāk dṛṣṭi vṛttibhiḥ ātmani ātmānam āveśya saḥ antaḥ-śvāsaḥ upāramat
sampadyamānam ājñāya bhīṣmam brahmaṇi niṣkale sarve babhūvuḥ te tūṣṇīm vayāṁsi iva dina-atyaye
tatra dundubhayaḥ neduḥ deva mānava vāditāḥ śaśaṁsuḥ sādhavaḥ rājñām khāt petuḥ puṣpa-vṛṣṭayaḥ
tasya nirharaṇa-ādīni samparetasya bhārgava yudhiṣṭhiraḥ kārayitvā muhūrtam duḥkhitaḥ abhavat
tuṣṭuvuḥ munayaḥ hṛṣṭāḥ kṛṣṇam tat guhya nāmabhiḥ tataḥ te kṛṣṇa-hṛdayāḥ sva-āśramān prayayuḥ punaḥ
tataḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ gatvā saha kṛṣṇaḥ gajāhvayam pitaram sāntvayām āsa gāndhārīm ca tapasvinīm
pitrā ca anumataḥ rājā vāsudeva-anumoditaḥ cakāra rājyam dharmeṇa pitṛ paitāmaham vibhuḥ
śaunakaḥ uvāca hatvā svariktha spṛdhaḥ ātatāyinaḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ dharma-bhṛtām variṣṭhaḥ saha-anujaiḥ pratyavaruddha bhojanaḥ katham pravṛttaḥ kim akāraṣīt tataḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca vaṁśam kuroḥ vaṁśa-dava-agni nirhṛtam saṁrohayitvā bhava-bhāvanaḥ hariḥ niveśayitvā nija-rājye īśvaraḥ yudhiṣṭhiram prīta-manāḥ babhūva ha
niśamya bhīṣma-uktam atha acyuta-uktam pravṛtta vijñāna vidhūta vibhramaḥ śaśāsa gām indra iva ajita-āśrayaḥ paridhi-upāntām anuja anuvartitaḥ
kāmam vavarṣa parjanyaḥ sarva kāma dughā mahī siṣicuḥ sma vrajān gāvaḥ payasā udhasvatīḥ mudā
nadyaḥ samudrāḥ girayaḥ savanaspati vīrudhaḥ phalanti oṣadhayaḥ sarvāḥ kāmam anvṛtu tasya vai
na ādhayaḥ vyādhayaḥ kleśāḥ daiva-bhūta-ātma hetavaḥ ajāta-śatrau abhavan jantūnām rājñi karhicit
uṣitvā hāstinapure māsān katipayān hariḥ suhṛdām ca viśokāya svasuḥ ca priya-kāmyayā
āmantrya ca abhyanujñātaḥ pariṣvajya abhivādya tam āruroha ratham kaiścit pariṣvaktaḥ abhivāditaḥ
subhadrā draupadī kuntī virāṭa-tanayā tathā gāndhārī dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ ca yuyutsuḥ gautamaḥ yamau vṛkodaraḥ ca dhaumyaḥ ca striyaḥ matsya-sutā-ādayaḥ na sehire vimuhyantaḥ viraham śārṅga-dhanvanaḥ
sat-saṅgāt mukta-duḥsaṅgaḥ hātum na utsahate budhaḥ kīrtyamānam yaśaḥ yasya sakṛt ākarṇya rocanam tasmin nyasta-dhiyaḥ pārthāḥ saheran viraham katham darśana sparśa saṁlāpa śayana āsana bhojanaiḥ
sarve te animiṣaiḥ akṣaiḥ tam anu druta-cetasaḥ vīkṣantaḥ sneha-sambaddhāḥ viceluḥ tatra tatra ha
nyarundhan udgalat bāṣpam autkaṇṭhyāt devakī-sute niryāti agārāt naḥ abhadram iti syāt bāndhava striyaḥ
mṛdaṅga śaṅkha bheryaḥ ca vīṇā paṇava gomukhāḥ dhundhurī ānaka ghaṇṭā ādyāḥ neduḥ dundubhayaḥ tathā
prāsāda śikhara ārūḍhāḥ kuru-nāryaḥ didṛkṣayā vavṛṣuḥ kusumaiḥ kṛṣṇam prema vrīḍā-smita-īkṣaṇāḥ
sita-ātapatram jagrāha muktā-dāma vibhūṣitam ratna-daṇḍam guḍākeśaḥ priyaḥ priyatamasya ha
uddhavaḥ sātyakiḥ ca eva vyajane parama-adbhute vikīryamāṇaḥ kusumaiḥ reje madhu-patiḥ pathi
aśrūyanta āśiṣaḥ satyāḥ tatra tatra dvija-īritāḥ na anurūpa anurūpāḥ ca nirguṇasya guṇa-ātmanaḥ
anyonyam āsīt sañjalpaḥ uttama-śloka cetasām kaurava-indra pura strīṇām sarva śruti manaḥ-haraḥ
saḥ vai kila ayam puruṣaḥ purātanaḥ yaḥ ekaḥ āsīt aviśeṣaḥ ātmani agre guṇebhyaḥ jagat-ātmani īśvare nimīlita ātman niśi supta śaktiṣu
saḥ eva bhūyaḥ nija vīrya coditām sva jīva māyām prakṛtim sisṛkṣatīm anāma rūpa-ātmani rūpa-nāmanī vidhitsamānaḥ anusasāra śāstra-kṛt
saḥ vai ayam yat padam atra sūrayaḥ jita-indriyāḥ nirjita mātariśvanaḥ paśyanti bhakti utkalita amala-ātmanā nanu eṣaḥ sattvam parimārṣṭum arhati
saḥ vai ayam sakhi anugīta sat-kathaḥ vedeṣu guhyeṣu ca guhya-vādibhiḥ yaḥ ekaḥ īśaḥ jagat ātma līlayā sṛjati avati atti na tatra sajjate
yadā hi adharmeṇa tamaḥ-dhiyaḥ nṛpāḥ jīvanti tatra eṣaḥ hi sattvataḥ kila dhatte bhagam satyam ṛtam dayām yaśaḥ bhavāya rūpāṇi dadhat yuge yuge
aho alam ślāghya-tamam yadoḥ kulam aho alam puṇya-tamam madhoḥ vanam yat eṣaḥ puṁsām ṛṣabhaḥ śriyaḥ patiḥ sva-janmanā caṅkramaṇena ca añcati
aho bata svaḥ-yaśasaḥ tiraskarī kuśasthalī puṇya yaśaskarī bhuvaḥ paśyanti nityam yat anugraha-iṣitam smita-avalokam sva-patim sma yat-prajāḥ
nūnam vrata snāna huta ādinā īśvaraḥ samarcitaḥ hi asya gṛhīta-pāṇibhiḥ pibanti yāḥ sakhi adhara-amṛtam muhuḥ vraja-striyaḥ sammumuhuḥ yat-āśayāḥ
yā vīrya śulkena hṛtāḥ svayaṁvare pramathya caidya pramukhān hi śuṣmiṇaḥ pradyumna sāmba amba suta-ādayaḥ aparāḥ yāḥ ca āhṛtāḥ bhauma-vadhe sahasraśaḥ
etāḥ param strītvam apāstapeśalam nirasta śaucam bata sādhu kurvate yāsām gṛhāt puṣkara-locanaḥ patiḥ na jātu apaiti āhṛtibhiḥ hṛdi spṛśan
evaṁvidhāḥ gadantīnām saḥ giraḥ pura-yoṣitām nirīkṣaṇena abhinandan sa-smitena yayau hariḥ
ajāta-śatruḥ pṛtanām gopīthāya madhu-dviṣaḥ parebhyaḥ śaṅkitaḥ snehāt prāyuṅkta catuḥ-aṅginīm
atha dūrāgatān śauriḥ kauravān virahāturān sannivartya dṛḍham snigdhān prāyāt sva-nagarīm priyaiḥ
kuru-jāṅgala pāñcālān śūrasenān sa yāmunān brahmāvartam kurukṣetram matsyān sārasvatān atha maru dhanvam ati-kramya sauvīra ābhīrayoḥ parān ānartān bhārgava upāgāt śrānta vāhaḥ manāk vibhuḥ
tatra tatra ha tatratyaiḥ hariḥ pratyudyata-arhaṇaḥ sāyam bheje diśam paścāt gaviṣthaḥ gām gataḥ tadā
sūtaḥ uvāca ānartān saḥ upavrajya svṛddhān jana-padān svakān dadhmau daravaram teṣām viṣādam śamayan iva
saḥ uccakāśe dhavala-udaraḥ daraḥ api urukramasya adharaśoṇa śoṇimā dādhmāyamānaḥ kara-kañja-sampuṭe yathā abja-khaṇḍe kala-haṁsaḥ utsvanaḥ
tam upaśrutya ninadam jagat-bhaya bhaya-āvaham prati udyayuḥ prajāḥ sarvāḥ bhartṛ darśana lālasāḥ
tatra upanīta balayaḥ raveḥ dīpam iva ādṛtāḥ ātma-ārāmam pūrṇa-kāmam nija-lābhena nitya-dā prīti utphulla-mukhāḥ procuḥ harṣa gadgadayā girā pitaram sarva suhṛdam avitāram iva arbhakāḥ
natāḥ sma te nātha sadā aṅghri-paṅkajam viriñca vairiñcya sura-indra vanditam parāyaṇam kṣemam iha icchatām param na yatra kālaḥ prabhavet paraḥ prabhuḥ
bhavāya naḥ tvam bhava viśva-bhāvana tvam eva mātā atha suhṛt patiḥ pitā tvam sat-guruḥ naḥ paramam ca daivatam yasya anuvṛttyā kṛtinaḥ babhūvima
aho sa-nāthāḥ bhavatā sma yat vayam traiviṣṭa-pānām api dūra-darśanam prema-smita snigdha nirīkṣaṇa-ānanam paśyema rūpam tava sarva saubhagam
yarhi ambuja-akṣa apasasāra bho bhavān kurūn madhūn vā atha suhṛt-didṛkṣayā tatra abda-koṭi pratimaḥ kṣaṇaḥ bhavet ravim vinā akṣṇoḥ iva naḥ tava acyuta
katham vayam nātha ciroṣite tvayi prasanna dṛṣṭyā akhila tāpa śoṣaṇam jīvema te sundara hāsa śobhitam apaśyamānāḥ vadanam manoharam iti ca udīritāḥ vācaḥ prajānām bhakta-vatsalaḥ śṛṇvānaḥ anugraham dṛṣṭyā vitanvan prāviśat puram
madhu bhoja daśārha arha kukura andhaka vṛṣṇibhiḥ ātma-tulya balaiḥ guptām nāgaiḥ bhogavatīm iva
sarva ṛtu sarva vibhava puṇya vṛkṣa latā āśramaiḥ udyāna upavana ārāmaiḥ vṛta padma-ākara śriyam
gopura dvāra mārgeṣu kṛta kautuka toraṇām citra dhvaja patākā-agraiḥ antaḥ pratihata ātapām
sammārjita mahā-mārga rathya āpaṇaka catvarām siktām gandha-jalaiḥ uptām phala puṣpa akṣata aṅkuraiḥ
dvāri dvāri gṛhāṇām ca dadhi akṣata phala ikṣubhiḥ alaṅkṛtām pūrṇa-kumbhaiḥ balibhiḥ dhūpa dīpakaiḥ
niśamya preṣṭham āyāntam vasudevaḥ mahā-manāḥ akrūraḥ ca ugrasenaḥ ca rāmaḥ ca adbhuta vikramaḥ pradyumnaḥ cārudeṣṇaḥ ca sāmbaḥ jāmbavatī-sutaḥ praharṣa vega ucchaśita śayana āsana bhojanāḥ
vāraṇa-indram puraskṛtya brāhmaṇaiḥ sa-sumaṅgalaiḥ śaṅkha tūrya ninādena brahma-ghoṣeṇa ca ādṛtāḥ prati ujjagmuḥ rathaiḥ hṛṣṭāḥ praṇayāgata sādhvasāḥ
vāramukhyāḥ ca śataśaḥ yānaiḥ tat-darśana utsukāḥ lasat kuṇḍala nirbhāta kapola vadana śriyaḥ
naṭa nartaka gandharvāḥ sūta māgadha vandinaḥ gāyanti ca uttamaśloka caritāni adbhutāni ca
bhagavān tatra bandhūnām paurāṇām anuvartinām yathā-vidhi upasaṅgamya sarveṣām mānam ādadhe
prahvā abhivādana āśleṣa kara-sparśa smita-īkṣaṇaiḥ āśvāsya ca āśvapākebhyaḥ varaiḥ ca abhimataiḥ vibhuḥ
svayam ca gurubhiḥ vipraiḥ sadāraiḥ sthaviraiḥ api āśīrbhiḥ yujyamānaḥ anyaiḥ vandibhiḥ ca aviśat puram
rāja-mārgam gate kṛṣṇe dvārakāyāḥ kula-striyaḥ harmyāṇi āruruhuḥ vipra tat-īkṣaṇa mahā-utsavāḥ
nityam nirīkṣamāṇānām yat api dvārakā-okasām na vitṛpyanti hi dṛśaḥ śriyaḥ dhāma-aṅgam acyutam
śriyaḥ nivāsaḥ yasya uraḥ pāna-pātram mukham dṛśām bāhavaḥ loka-pālānām sāraṅgāṇām pada-ambujam
sita-ātapatra vyajanaiḥ upaskṛtaḥ prasūna varṣaiḥ abhivarṣitaḥ pathi piśaṅga-vāsāḥ vana-mālayā babhau ghanaḥ yathā arka uḍupa cāpa vaidyutaiḥ
praviṣṭaḥ tu gṛham pitroḥ pariṣvaktaḥ sva-mātṛbhiḥ vavande śirasā sapta devakī pramukhā mudā
tāḥ putram aṅkam āropya sneha-snuta payodharāḥ harṣa vihvalita-ātmānaḥ siṣicuḥ netrajaiḥ jalaiḥ
atha aviśat sva-bhavanam sarva kāmam anuttamam prāsādāḥ yatra patnīnām sahasrāṇi ca ṣoḍaśa
patnyaḥ patim proṣya gṛha-anupāgatam vilokya sañjāta manaḥ-mahā-utsavāḥ uttasthuḥ ārāt sahasā āsanā āśayāt sākam vrataiḥ vrīḍita locana ānanāḥ
tam ātma-jaiḥ dṛṣṭibhiḥ antara-ātmanā duranta-bhāvāḥ parirebhire patim niruddham api āsravat ambu netrayoḥ vilajjatīnām bhṛgu-varya vaiklavāt
yadi api asau pārśva-gataḥ rahaḥ-gataḥ tathāpi tasya aṅghri-yugam navam navam pade pade kā virameta tat-padāt calāpi yat śrīḥ na jahāti karhicit
evam nṛpāṇām kṣiti-bhāra janmanām akṣauhiṇībhiḥ parivṛtta tejasām vidhāya vairam śvasanaḥ yathā analam mithaḥ vadhena uparataḥ nirāyudhaḥ
saḥ eṣaḥ nara-loke asmin avatīrṇaḥ sva māyayā reme strī-ratna kūṭasthaḥ bhagavān prākṛtaḥ yathā
uddāma bhāva piśuna amala valgu-hāsa vrīḍa avaloka nihataḥ madanaḥ api yāsām sammuhya cāpam ajahāt pramada uttamāḥ tā yasya indriyam vimathitum kuhakaiḥ na śekuḥ
tam ayam manyate lokaḥ hi asaṅgam api saṅginam ātma aupamyena manujam vyāpṛṇvānam yataḥ abudhaḥ
etat īśanam īśasya prakṛti-sthaḥ api tat-guṇaiḥ na yujyate sadā ātma-sthaiḥ yathā buddhiḥ tat āśrayā
tam menire abalāḥ mūḍhāḥ straiṇam ca anuvratam rahaḥ apramāṇa-vidaḥ bhartuḥ īśvaram matayaḥ yathā
śaunakaḥ uvāca aśvatthāmna upasṛṣṭena brahma-śīrṣṇā uru-tejasā uttarāyāḥ hataḥ garbhaḥ īśena ājīvitaḥ punaḥ
tasya janma mahā-buddheḥ karmāṇi ca mahā-ātmanaḥ nidhanam ca yathā eva āsīt saḥ pretya gatavān yathā
tat idam śrotum icchāmaḥ gaditum yadi manyase brūhi naḥ śraddadhānānām yasya jñānam adāt śukaḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca apīpalat dharma-rājaḥ pitṛ-vat rañjayan prajāḥ niḥspṛhaḥ sarva kāmebhyaḥ kṛṣṇa-pāda anusevayā
sampadaḥ kratavaḥ lokāḥ mahiṣī bhrātaraḥ mahī jambu-dvīpa ādhipatyam ca yaśaḥ ca tri-divam gatam
kim te kāmāḥ sura spārhāḥ mukunda-manasaḥ dvijāḥ adhijahruḥ mudam rājñaḥ kṣudhitasya yathā itare
mātuḥ garbha gataḥ vīraḥ saḥ tadā bhṛgu-nandana dadarśa puruṣam kañcit dahyamānaḥ astra tejasā
aṅguṣṭha mātram amalam sphurat puraṭa maulinam apīvya darśanam śyāmam taḍit vāsasam acyutam
śrīmat dīrgha catuḥ-bāhum tapta-kāñcana kuṇḍalam kṣataja-akṣam gadā-pāṇim ātmanaḥ sarvataḥ diśam paribhramantam ulkābhām bhrāmayantam gadām muhuḥ
astra-tejaḥ sva-gadayā nīhāram iva gopatiḥ vidhamantam sannikarṣe paryaikṣata kaḥ iti asau
vidhūya tat ameyātmā bhagavān dharma-gup vibhuḥ miṣataḥ daśamāsasya tatra eva antaḥ dadhe hariḥ
tataḥ sarva guṇa udarke sa-anukūla grahodaye jajñe vaṁśa-dharaḥ pāṇḍoḥ bhūyaḥ pāṇḍuḥ iva ojasā
tasya prīta-manāḥ rājā vipraiḥ dhaumya kṛpa ādibhiḥ jātakam kārayām āsa vācayitvā ca maṅgalam
hiraṇyam gām mahīm grāmān hasti aśvān nṛpatiḥ varān prādāt su-annam ca viprebhyaḥ prajā-tīrthe saḥ tīrtha-vit
tam ūcuḥ brāhmaṇāḥ tuṣṭāḥ rājānam praśraya-anvitam eṣaḥ hi asmin prajā-tantau purūṇām paurava-ṛṣabha
daivena apratighātena śukle saṁsthām upeyuṣi rātaḥ vaḥ anugraha-arthāya viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā
tasmāt nāmnā viṣṇu-rātaḥ iti loke bhaviṣyati na sandehaḥ mahā-bhāga mahā-bhāgavataḥ mahān
śrī-rājā uvāca api eṣaḥ vaṁśyān rāja-ṛṣīn puṇya-ślokān mahā-ātmanaḥ anuvartitā svit yaśasā sādhu-vādena sat-tamāḥ
brāhmaṇāḥ ūcuḥ pārtha prajā avitā sākṣāt ikṣvākuḥ iva mānavaḥ brahmaṇyaḥ satya-sandhaḥ ca rāmaḥ dāśarathiḥ yathā
eṣaḥ dātā śaraṇyaḥ ca yathā hi auśīnaraḥ śibiḥ yaśaḥ vitanitā svānām dauṣyantih iva yajvanām
dhanvinām agraṇīḥ eṣaḥ tulyaḥ ca arjunayoḥ dvayoḥ hutāśaḥ iva durdharṣaḥ samudraḥ iva dustaraḥ
mṛgendraḥ iva vikrāntaḥ niṣevyaḥ himavān iva titikṣuḥ vasudhā iva asau sahiṣṇuḥ pitarau iva
pitāmaha samaḥ sāmye prasāde giriśa upamaḥ āśrayaḥ sarva bhūtānām yathā devaḥ ramā-āśrayaḥ
sarva-sat-guṇa-māhātmye eṣaḥ kṛṣṇam anuvrataḥ rantidevaḥ iva udāraḥ yayātiḥ iva dhārmikaḥ
dhṛtyā bali-samaḥ kṛṣṇe prahrāda iva sat-grahaḥ āhartā eṣaḥ aśvamedhānām vṛddhānām paryupāsakaḥ
rāja-ṛṣīṇām janayitā śāstā ca utpatha-gāminām nigrahītā kaleḥ eṣaḥ bhuvaḥ dharmasya kāraṇāt
takṣakāt ātmanaḥ mṛtyum dvija-putra upasarjitāt prapatsyate upaśrutya mukta-saṅgaḥ padam hareḥ
jijñāsita ātma-yāthārthyaḥ muneḥ vyāsa-sutāt asau hitvā idam nṛpa gaṅgāyām yāsyati addhā akutaḥ-bhayam
iti rājñe upādiśya viprāḥ jātaka-kovidāḥ labdha-apacitayaḥ sarve pratijagmuḥ svakān gṛhān
saḥ eṣaḥ loke vikhyātaḥ parīkṣit iti yat prabhuḥ pūrvam dṛṣṭam anudhyāyan parīkṣeta nareṣu iha
saḥ rāja-putraḥ vavṛdhe āśu śukle iva uḍupaḥ āpūryamāṇaḥ pitṛbhiḥ kāṣṭhābhiḥ iva saḥ anvaham
yakṣyamāṇaḥ aśvamedhena jñāti-droha jihāsayā rājā labdha-dhanaḥ dadhyau na anyatra kara-daṇḍayoḥ
tat abhipretam ālakṣya bhrātaraḥ acyuta coditāḥ dhanam prahīṇam ājahruḥ udīcyām diśi bhūriśaḥ
tena sambhṛta sambhāraḥ dharma-putraḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ vājimedhaiḥ tribhiḥ bhītaḥ yajñaiḥ samayajat harim
āhūtaḥ bhagavān rājñā yājayitvā dvijaiḥ nṛpam uvāsa katicit māsān suhṛdām priya-kāmyayā
tataḥ rājñā abhyanujñātaḥ kṛṣṇayā saha bandhubhiḥ yayau dvāravatīm brahman sa-arjunaḥ yadubhiḥ vṛtaḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca viduraḥ tīrtha-yātrāyām maitreyāt ātmanaḥ gatim jñātvā āgāt hāstinapuram tayā avāpta vivitsitaḥ
yāvataḥ kṛtavān praśnān kṣattā kauṣārava agrataḥ jāta eka bhaktiḥ govinde tebhyaḥ ca upararāma ha
tam bandhum āgatam dṛṣṭvā dharma-putraḥ saha-anujaḥ dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ yuyutsuḥ ca sūtaḥ śāradvataḥ pṛthā gāndhārī draupadī brahman subhadrā ca uttarā kṛpī anyāḥ ca jāmayaḥ pāṇḍoḥ jñātayaḥ sa-sutāḥ striyaḥ
prati ujjagmuḥ praharṣeṇa prāṇam tanvaḥ iva āgatam abhisaṅgamya vidhi-vat pariṣvaṅga abhivādanaiḥ
mumucuḥ prema bāṣpa-ogham viraha autkaṇṭhya kātarāḥ rājā tam arhayām cakre kṛta āsana parigraham
tam bhuktavantam viśrāntam āsīnam sukham āsane praśraya-avanataḥ rājā prāha teṣām ca śṛṇvatām
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca api smaratha naḥ yuṣmat pakṣa chāyā samedhitān vipat-gaṇāt viṣa agni-ādeḥ mocitāḥ yat sa mātṛkāḥ
kayā vṛttyā vartitam vaḥ caradbhiḥ kṣiti-maṇḍalam tīrthāni kṣetra-mukhyāni sevitāni iha bhūtale
bhavat vidhāḥ bhāgavatāḥ tīrtha bhūtāḥ svayam vibho tīrthī-kurvanti tīrthāni sva-antaḥ-sthena gadā-bhṛtā
api naḥ suhṛdaḥ tāta bāndhavāḥ kṛṣṇa-devatāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ śrutāḥ vā yadavaḥ sva-puryām sukham āsate
iti uktaḥ dharma-rājena sarvam tat samavarṇayat yathā-anubhūtam kramaśaḥ vinā yadu-kula-kṣayam
nanu apriyam durviṣaham nṛṇām svayam upasthitam na āvedayat sakaruṇaḥ duḥkhitān draṣṭum akṣamaḥ
kañcit kālam atha avātsīt sat-kṛtaḥ deva-vat sukham bhrātuḥ jyeṣṭhasya śreyaḥ-kṛt sarveṣām sukham āvahan
abibhrat aryamā daṇḍam yathāvat agha-kāriṣu yāvat dadhāra śūdratvam śāpāt varṣa-śatam yamaḥ
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ labdha-rājyaḥ dṛṣṭvā pautram kulam-dharam bhrātṛbhiḥ loka-pālābhaiḥ mumude parayā śriyā
evam gṛheṣu saktānām pramattānām tat-īhayā atyakrāmat avijñātaḥ kālaḥ parama dustaraḥ
viduraḥ tat abhipretya dhṛtarāṣṭram abhāṣata rājan nirgamyatām śīghram paśya idam bhayam āgatam
pratikriyā na yasya iha kutaścit karhicit prabho saḥ eṣaḥ bhagavān kālaḥ sarveṣām naḥ samāgataḥ
yena ca eva abhipannaḥ ayam prāṇaiḥ priya-tamaiḥ api janaḥ sadyaḥ viyujyeta kim uta anyaiḥ dhana-ādibhiḥ
pitṛ bhrātṛ suhṛt putrāḥ hatāḥ te vigatam vayam ātmā ca jarayā grastaḥ para-geham upāsase
andhaḥ purā eva vadhiraḥ manda-prajñāḥ ca sāmpratam viśīrṇa dantaḥ manda-agniḥ sa-rāgaḥ kapham udvahan
aho mahīyasī jantoḥ jīvita-āśā yathā bhavān bhīma apavarjitam piṇḍam ādatte gṛha-pāla-vat
agniḥ nisṛṣṭaḥ dattaḥ ca garaḥ dārāḥ ca dūṣitāḥ hṛtam kṣetram dhanam yeṣām tat dattaiḥ asubhiḥ kiyat
tasya api tava dehaḥ ayam kṛpaṇasya jijīviṣoḥ paraiti anicchataḥ jīrṇaḥ jarayā vāsasī iva
gata-sva-artham imam deham viraktaḥ mukta bandhanaḥ avijñāta-gatiḥ jahyāt saḥ vai dhīraḥ udāhṛtaḥ
yaḥ svakāt parataḥ vā iha jāta nirvedaḥ ātmavān hṛdi kṛtvā harim gehāt pravrajet saḥ nara-uttamaḥ
atha udīcīm diśam yātu svaiḥ ajñāta gatiḥ bhavān itaḥ arvāk prāyaśaḥ kālaḥ puṁsām guṇa vikarṣaṇaḥ
evam rājā vidureṇa anujena prajñā cakṣuḥ bodhitaḥ ājamīḍhaḥ chittvā sveṣu sneha-pāśān draḍhimnaḥ niścakrāma bhrātṛ sandarśita adhvā
patim prayāntam subalasya putrī pati-vratā ca anujagāma sādhvī himālayam nyasta-daṇḍa praharṣam manasvinām iva sat samprahāraḥ
ajāta śatruḥ kṛta maitraḥ huta-agniḥ viprān natvā tila-go-bhūmi-rukmaiḥ gṛham praviṣṭaḥ guru-vandanāya na ca apaśyat pitarau saubalīm ca
tatra sañjayam āsīnam papraccha udvigna-mānasaḥ gāvalgaṇe kva naḥ tātaḥ vṛddhaḥ hīnaḥ ca netrayoḥ
ambā ca hata-putrā ārtā pitṛvyaḥ kva gataḥ suhṛt api mayi akṛta-prajñe hata-bandhuḥ saḥ bhāryayā āśaṁsamānaḥ śamalam gaṅgāyām duḥkhitaḥ apatat
pitari uparate pāṇḍau sarvān naḥ suhṛdaḥ śiśūn arakṣatām vyasanataḥ pitṛvyau kva gatau itaḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca kṛpayā sneha-vaiklavyāt sūtaḥ viraha-karśitaḥ ātma-īśvaram acakṣāṇaḥ na pratyāha ati-pīḍitaḥ
vimṛjya aśrūṇi pāṇibhyām viṣṭabhya ātmānam ātmanā ajāta-śatrum pratyūce prabhoḥ pādau anusmaran
sañjayaḥ uvāca na aham veda vyavasitam pitroḥ vaḥ kula-nandana gāndhāryāḥ vā mahā-bāho muṣitaḥ asmi mahā-ātmabhiḥ
atha ājagāma bhagavān nāradaḥ saha-tumburuḥ pratyutthāya abhivādya āha sa-anujaḥ abhyarcayan munim
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca na aham veda gatim pitroḥ bhagavan kva gatau itaḥ ambā vā hata-putrā ārtā kva gatā ca tapasvinī
karṇa-dhāraḥ iva apāre bhagavān pāra-darśakaḥ atha ābabhāṣe bhagavān nāradaḥ muni-sat-tamaḥ
nāradaḥ uvāca mā kañcana śucaḥ rājan yat īśvara-vaśam jagat lokāḥ sa-pālāḥ yasya ime vahanti balim īśituḥ saḥ saṁyunakti bhūtāni saḥ eva viyunakti ca
yathā gāvaḥ nasi protāḥ tantyām baddhāḥ ca dāmabhiḥ vāk-tantyām nāmabhiḥ baddhāḥ vahanti balim īśituḥ
yathā krīḍa-upaskarāṇām saṁyoga vigamau iha icchayā krīḍituḥ syātām tathā eva īśa icchayā nṛṇām
yat manyase dhruvam lokam adhruvam vā na ca ubhayam sarvathā na hi śocyāḥ te snehāt anyatra moha-jāt
tasmāt jahi aṅga vaiklavyam ajñāna kṛtam ātmanaḥ katham tu anāthāḥ kṛpaṇāḥ varteran te ca mām vinā
kāla karma guṇa adhīnaḥ dehaḥ ayam pāñca-bhautikaḥ katham anyān tu gopāyet sarpa-grastaḥ yathā param
ahastāni sa-hastānām apadāni catuḥ-padām phalgūni tatra mahatām jīvaḥ jīvasya jīvanam
tat idam bhagavān rājan ekaḥ ātmā ātmanām sva-dṛk antaraḥ anantaraḥ bhāti paśya tam māyayā urudhā
saḥ ayam adya mahārāja bhagavān bhūta-bhāvanaḥ kāla-rūpaḥ avatīrṇaḥ asyām abhāvāya sura-dviṣām
niṣpāditam deva-kṛtyam avaśeṣam pratīkṣate tāvat yūyam avekṣadhvam bhavet yāvat iha īśvaraḥ
dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ saha bhrātrā gāndhāryā ca sva-bhāryayā dakṣiṇena himavataḥ ṛṣīṇām āśramam gataḥ
srotobhiḥ saptabhiḥ yā vai svardhunī saptadhā vyadhāt saptānām prītaye nānā sapta-srotaḥ pracakṣate
snātvā anusavanam tasmin hutvā ca agnīn yathā-vidhi ap-bhakṣaḥ upaśānta ātmā saḥ āste vigata eṣaṇaḥ
jita-āsanaḥ jita-śvāsaḥ pratyāhṛta ṣaṭ indriyaḥ hari bhāvanayā dhvasta rajaḥ sattva tamaḥ malaḥ
vijñāna ātmani saṁyojya kṣetra-jñe pravilāpya tam brahmaṇi ātmānam ādhāre ghaṭa-ambaram iva ambare
dhvasta māyā-guṇa udarkaḥ niruddha karaṇa-āśayaḥ nivartita akhila āhāraḥ āste sthāṇuḥ iva acalaḥ tasya antarāyaḥ mā eva abhūḥ sannyasta akhila karmaṇaḥ
saḥ vā adya tanāt rājan parataḥ pañcame ahani kalevaram hāsyati svam tat ca bhasmī bhaviṣyati
dahyamāne agnibhiḥ dehe patyuḥ patnī saha-uṭaje bahiḥ sthitā patim sādhvī tam agnim anu vekṣyati
viduraḥ tu tat āścaryam niśāmya kuru-nandana harṣa śoka yutaḥ tasmāt gantā tīrtha niṣevakaḥ
iti uktvā atha āruhat svargam nāradaḥ saha tumburuḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ vacaḥ tasya hṛdi kṛtvā ajahāt śucaḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca samprasthite dvārakāyām jiṣṇau bandhu didṛkṣayā jñātum ca puṇya-ślokasya kṛṣṇasya ca viceṣṭitam
vyatītāḥ katicit māsāḥ tadā na āyāt tataḥ arjunaḥ dadarśa ghora rūpāṇi nimittāni kuru-udvahaḥ
kālasya ca gatim raudrām viparyasta ṛtu dharmiṇaḥ pāpīyasīm nṛṇām vārtām krodha lobha anṛta ātmanām
jihma-prāyam vyavahṛtam śāṭhya miśram ca sauhṛdam pitṛ mātṛ suhṛt bhrātṛ dam-patīnām ca kalkanam
nimittāni ati ariṣṭāni kāle tu anugate nṛṇām lobha-ādi adharma prakṛtim dṛṣṭvā uvāca anujam nṛpaḥ
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca sampreṣitaḥ dvārakāyām jiṣṇuḥ bandhu didṛkṣayā jñātum ca puṇya-ślokasya kṛṣṇasya ca viceṣṭitam
gatāḥ sapta adhunā māsāḥ bhīmasena tava anujaḥ na āyāti kasya vā hetoḥ na aham veda idam añjasā
api deva-ṛṣiṇā ādiṣṭaḥ saḥ kālaḥ ayam upasthitaḥ yadā ātmanaḥ aṅgam ākrīḍam bhagavān utsisṛkṣati
yasmāt naḥ sampadaḥ rājyam dārāḥ prāṇāḥ kulam prajāḥ āsan sapatna vijayaḥ lokāḥ ca yat anugrahāt
paśya utpātān nara-vyāghra divyān bhaumān sa-daihikān dāruṇān śaṁsataḥ adūrāt bhayam naḥ buddhi mohanam
ūru akṣi bāhavaḥ mahyam sphuranti aṅga punaḥ punaḥ vepathuḥ ca api hṛdaye ārāt dāsyanti vipriyam
śivā eṣā udyantam ādityam abhi rauti anala ānanā mām aṅga sārameyaḥ ayam abhirebhati abhīru-vat
śastāḥ kurvanti mām savyam dakṣiṇam paśavaḥ apare vāhān ca puruṣa-vyāghra lakṣaye rudataḥ mama
mṛtyu dūtaḥ kapotaḥ ayam ulūkaḥ kampayan manaḥ pratyulūkaḥ ca kuhvānaiḥ viśvam vai śūnyam icchataḥ
dhūmrāḥ diśaḥ paridhayaḥ kampate bhūḥ saha adribhiḥ nirghātaḥ ca mahān tāta sākam ca stanayitnubhiḥ
vāyuḥ vāti khara-sparśaḥ rajasā visṛjan tamaḥ asṛk varṣanti jaladāḥ bībhatsam iva sarvataḥ
sūryam hata-prabham paśya graha-mardam mithaḥ divi sa-saṅkulaiḥ bhūta-gaṇaiḥ jvalite iva rodasī
nadyaḥ nadāḥ ca kṣubhitāḥ sarāṁsi ca manāṁsi ca na jvalati agniḥ ājyena kālaḥ ayam kim vidhāsyati
na pibanti stanam vatsāḥ na duhyanti ca mātaraḥ rudanti aśru-mukhāḥ gāvaḥ na hṛṣyanti ṛṣabhāḥ vraje
daivatāni rudanti iva svidyanti hi uccalanti ca ime jana-padāḥ grāmāḥ pura udyāna ākara āśramāḥ bhraṣṭa śriyaḥ nirānandāḥ kim agham darśayanti naḥ
manye etaiḥ mahā utpātaiḥ nūnam bhagavataḥ padaiḥ ananya puruṣa śrībhiḥ hīnā bhūḥ hata-saubhagā
iti cintayataḥ tasya dṛṣṭā ariṣṭena cetasā rājñaḥ prati āgamat brahman yadu-puryāḥ kapi-dhvajaḥ
tam pādayoḥ nipatitam ayathā-pūrvam āturam adhaḥ-vadanam ap-bindūn sṛjantam nayana-abjayoḥ
vilokya udvigna hṛdayaḥ vicchāyam anujam nṛpaḥ pṛcchati sma suhṛt madhye saṁsmaran nārada īritam
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca kaccit ānarta-puryām naḥ sva-janāḥ sukham āsate madhu bhoja daśārha arha sātvata andhaka vṛṣṇayaḥ
śūraḥ mātāmahaḥ kaccit svasti āste vā atha māriṣaḥ mātulaḥ sa-anujaḥ kaccit kuśalī ānaka-dundubhiḥ
sapta sva-sāraḥ tat-patnyaḥ mātulānyaḥ saha ātma-jāḥ āsate sasnuṣāḥ kṣemam devakī pramukhāḥ svayam
kaccit rājā āhukaḥ jīvati asat putraḥ asya ca anujaḥ hṛdīkaḥ sa-sutaḥ akrūraḥ jayanta gada sāraṇāḥ āsate kuśalam kaccit ye ca śatrujit ādayaḥ kaccit āste sukham rāmaḥ bhagavān sātvatām prabhuḥ
pradyumnaḥ sarva vṛṣṇīnām sukham āste mahā-rathaḥ gambhīra rayaḥ aniruddhaḥ vardhate bhagavān uta
suṣeṇaḥ cārudeṣṇaḥ ca sāmbaḥ jāmbavatī-sutaḥ anye ca kārṣṇi pravarāḥ sa-putrāḥ ṛṣabha ādayaḥ
tathā eva anucarāḥ śaureḥ śrutadeva uddhava-ādayaḥ sunanda nanda śīrṣaṇyāḥ ye ca anye sātvata ṛṣabhāḥ api svasti āsate sarve rāma kṛṣṇa bhuja-āśrayāḥ api smaranti kuśalam asmākam baddha-sauhṛdāḥ
bhagavān api govindaḥ brahmaṇyaḥ bhakta-vatsalaḥ kaccit pure sudharmāyām sukham āste suhṛt-vṛtaḥ
maṅgalāya ca lokānām kṣemāya ca bhavāya ca āste yadu-kula-ambhodhau ādyaḥ ananta-sakhaḥ pumān yat bāhu-daṇḍa-guptāyām sva-puryām yadavaḥ arcitāḥ krīḍanti parama-ānandam mahā-pauruṣikāḥ iva
yat pāda śuśrūṣaṇa mukhya karmaṇā satya-ādayaḥ dvi-aṣṭa sahasra yoṣitaḥ nirjitya saṅkhye tri-daśān tat-āśiṣaḥ haranti vajra-āyudha-vallabhā ucitāḥ
yat bāhu-daṇḍa abhyudaya anujīvinaḥ yadu pravīrāḥ hi akutobhayāḥ muhuḥ adhikramanti aṅghribhiḥ āhṛtām balāt sabhām sudharmām sura-sat-tama ucitām
kaccit te anāmayam tāta bhraṣṭa tejāḥ vibhāsi me alabdha-mānaḥ avajñātaḥ kim vā tāta ciroṣitaḥ
kaccit na abhihataḥ abhāvaiḥ śabda-ādibhiḥ amaṅgalaiḥ na dattam uktam arthibhyaḥ āśayā yat pratiśrutam
kaccit tvam brāhmaṇam bālam gām vṛddham rogiṇam striyam śaraṇa-upasṛtam sattvam na atyākṣīḥ śaraṇa-pradaḥ
kaccit tvam na agamaḥ agamyām gamyām vā asat-kṛtām striyam parājitaḥ vā atha bhavān na uttamaiḥ na asamaiḥ pathi
api svit parya bhuṅkthāḥ tvam sambhojyān vṛddha bālakān jugupsitam karma kiñcit kṛtavān na yat akṣamam
kaccit preṣṭha-tamena atha hṛdayena ātma-bandhunā śūnyaḥ asmi rahitaḥ nityam manyase te anyathā na ruk
sūtaḥ uvāca evam kṛṣṇa-sakhaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ bhrātrā rājñā vikalpitaḥ nānā śaṅka-āspadam rūpam kṛṣṇa viśleṣa karśitaḥ
śokena śuṣyat-vadana hṛt-sarojaḥ hata prabhaḥ vibhum tam eva anusmaran na aśaknot pratibhāṣitum
kṛcchreṇa saṁstabhya śucaḥ pāṇinā āmṛjya netrayoḥ parokṣeṇa samunnaddha praṇaya-autkaṇṭhya kātaraḥ
sakhyam maitrīm sauhṛdam ca sārathya-ādiṣu saṁsmaran nṛpam agrajam iti āha bāṣpa gadgadayā girā
arjunaḥ uvāca vañcitaḥ aham mahā-rāja hariṇā bandhu-rūpiṇā yena me apahṛtam tejaḥ deva vismāpanam mahat
yasya kṣaṇa viyogena lokaḥ hi apriya-darśanaḥ ukthena rahitaḥ hi eṣaḥ mṛtakaḥ procyate yathā
yat saṁśrayāt drupada-geham upāgatānām rājñām svayaṁvara-mukhe smara-durmadānām tejaḥ hṛtam khalu mayā abhihataḥ ca matsyaḥ sajjī-kṛtena dhanuṣā adhigatā ca kṛṣṇā
yat sannidhau aham u khāṇḍavam agnaye adām indram ca sa amara-gaṇam tarasā vijitya labdhā sabhā maya-kṛtā adbhuta śilpa māyā digbhyaḥ aharan nṛpatayaḥ balim adhvare te
yat tejasā nṛpa-śiraḥ-aṅghrim ahan makha-artham āryaḥ anujaḥ tava gaja-ayuta sattva-vīryaḥ tena āhṛtāḥ pramatha-nātha makhāya bhūpāḥ yat-mocitāḥ tat-anayan balim adhvare te
patnyāḥ tava adhimakha kḷpta mahā-abhiṣeka ślāghiṣṭha cāru kabaram kitavaiḥ sabhāyām spṛṣṭam vikīrya padayoḥ patita-aśru-mukhyāḥ yaḥ tat striyaḥ akṛta hata-īśa vimukta-keśāḥ
yaḥ naḥ jugopa vane etya duranta kṛcchrāt durvāsasaḥ ari racitāt ayuta agra-bhuk yaḥ śāka-anna-śiṣṭam upayujya yataḥ tri-lokīm tṛptām amaṁsta salile vinimagna-saṅghaḥ
yat tejasā atha bhagavān yudhi śūla-pāṇiḥ vismāpitaḥ sa-girijaḥ astram adāt nijam me anye api ca aham amunā eva kalevareṇa prāptaḥ mahā-indra-bhavane mahat āsana-ardham
tatra eva me viharataḥ bhuja-daṇḍa-yugmam gāṇḍīva lakṣaṇam arāti vadhāya devāḥ sa indrāḥ śritāḥ yat anubhāvitam ājamīḍha tena aham adya muṣitaḥ puruṣeṇa bhūmnā
yat-bāndhavaḥ kuru-bala-abdhim ananta-pāram ekaḥ rathena tatare aham atīrya sattvam pratyāhṛtam bahu dhanam ca mayā pareṣām tejāḥ-padam maṇi-mayam ca hṛtam śirobhyaḥ
yaḥ bhīṣma karṇa guru śalya camūṣu adabhra rājanya-varya ratha-maṇḍala maṇḍitāsu agecaraḥ mama vibho ratha-yūtha-pānām āyuḥ manāṁsi ca dṛśā sahaḥ ojaḥ ārcchat
yat doḥṣu mā praṇihitam guru bhīṣma karṇa naptṛ trigarta śalya saindhava bāhlika ādyaiḥ astrāṇi amogha mahimāni nirūpitāni na upaspṛśuḥ nṛhari-dāsam iva asurāṇi
sautye vṛtaḥ kumatinā ātma-daḥ īśvaraḥ me yat pāda-padmam abhavāya bhajanti bhavyāḥ mām śrānta vāham arayaḥ rathinaḥ bhuvi-ṣṭham na prāharan yat anubhāva nirasta cittāḥ
narmāṇi udāra rucira smita-śobhitāni he pārtha he arjuna sakhe kuru-nandana iti sañjalpitāni nara-deva hṛdi spṛśāni smartuḥ luṭhanti hṛdayam mama mādhavasya
śayya āsana aṭana vikatthana bhojana ādiṣu aikyāt vayasya ṛtavān iti vipralabdhaḥ sakhyuḥ sakhā iva pitṛvat tanayasya sarvam sehe mahān mahitayā kumateḥ agham me
saḥ aham nṛpa-indra rahitaḥ puruṣa-uttamena sakhyā priyeṇa suhṛdā hṛdayena śūnyaḥ adhvani urukrama-parigraham aṅga rakṣan gopaiḥ asadbhiḥ abalā iva vinirjitaḥ asmi
tat vai dhanuḥ te iṣavaḥ saḥ rathaḥ hayāḥ te saḥ aham rathī nṛpatayaḥ yataḥ ānamanti sarvam kṣaṇena tat abhūt asat īśa riktam bhasman hutam kuhaka-rāddham iva uptam ūṣyām
rājan tvayā anupṛṣṭānām suhṛdām naḥ suhṛt-pure vipra śāpa vimūḍhānām nighnatām muṣṭibhiḥ mithaḥ vāruṇīm madirām pītvā mada-unmathita cetasām ajānatām iva anyonyam catuḥ pañca avaśeṣitāḥ
prāyeṇa etat bhagavataḥ īśvarasya viceṣṭitam mithaḥ nighnanti bhūtāni bhāvayanti ca yat mithaḥ
jalaukasām jale yadvat mahāntaḥ adanti aṇīyasaḥ durbalān balinaḥ rājan mahāntaḥ balinaḥ mithaḥ evam baliṣṭhaiḥ yadubhiḥ mahadbhiḥ itarān vibhuḥ yadūn yadubhiḥ anyonyam bhū-bhārān sañjahāra ha
deśa kāla artha yuktāni hṛt tāpa upaśamāni ca haranti smarataḥ cittam govinda abhihitāni me
sūtaḥ uvāca evam cintayataḥ jiṣṇoḥ kṛṣṇa-pāda saroruham sauhārdena ati-gāḍhena śāntā āsīt vimalā matiḥ
vāsudeva-aṅghri anudhyāna paribṛṁhita raṁhasā bhaktyā nirmathita aśeṣa kaṣāya dhiṣaṇaḥ arjunaḥ
gītam bhagavatā jñānam yat tat saṅgrāma-mūrdhani kāla-karma tamaḥ-ruddham punaḥ adhyagamat prabhuḥ
viśokaḥ brahma-sampattyā sañchinna dvaita-saṁśayaḥ līna prakṛti nairguṇyāt aliṅgatvāt asambhavaḥ
niśamya bhagavat mārgam saṁsthām yadu-kulasya ca svaḥ pathāya matim cakre nibhṛta-ātmā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
pṛthā api anuśrutya dhanañjaya uditam nāśam yadūnām bhagavat gatim ca tām eka-anta bhaktyā bhagavati adhokṣaje niveśita-ātmā upararāma saṁsṛteḥ
yayā aharat bhuvaḥ bhāram tām tanum vijahau ajaḥ kaṇṭakam kaṇṭakena iva dvayam ca api īśituḥ samam
yathā matsya-ādi rūpāṇi dhatte jahyāt yathā naṭaḥ bhū-bhāraḥ kṣapitaḥ yena jahau tat ca kalevaram
yadā mukundaḥ bhagavān imām mahīm jahau sva-tanvā śravaṇīya-sat-kathaḥ tadā ahaḥ eva aprati-buddha-cetasām abhadra-hetuh kaliḥ anvavartata
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ tat parisarpaṇam budhaḥ pure ca rāṣṭre ca gṛhe tathā ātmani vibhāvya lobha anṛta jihma hiṁsana-ādi adharma cakram gamanāya paryadhāt
sva-rāṭ pautram vinayinam ātmanaḥ su-samam guṇaiḥ toya-nīvyāḥ patim bhūmeḥ abhyaṣiñcat gajāhvaye
mathurāyām tathā vajram śūrasena-patim tataḥ prājāpatyām nirūpya iṣṭim agnīn apibat īśvaraḥ
visṛjya tatra tat sarvam dukūla valaya-ādikam nirmamaḥ nirahaṅkāraḥ sañchinna aśeṣa-bandhanaḥ
vācam juhāva manasi tat prāṇe itare ca tam mṛtyau apānam sa-utsargam tam pañcatve hi ajohavīt
tritve hutvā ca pañcatvam tat ca ekatve ajuhot muniḥ sarvam ātmani ajuhavīt brahmaṇi ātmānam avyaye
cīra-vāsāḥ nirāhāraḥ baddha-vāk mukta-mūrdhajaḥ darśayan ātmanaḥ rūpam jaḍa unmatta piśāca-vat anavekṣamāṇaḥ niragāt aśṛṇvan badhiraḥ yathā
udīcīm praviveśa-āśām gata-pūrvām mahā-ātmabhiḥ hṛdi brahma param dhyāyan na āvarteta yataḥ gataḥ
sarve tam anunirjagmuḥ bhrātaraḥ kṛta-niścayāḥ kalinā adharma mitreṇa dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭāḥ prajāḥ bhuvi
te sādhu-kṛta sarva-arthāḥ jñātvā ātyantikam ātmanaḥ manasā dhārayām āsuḥ vaikuṇṭha caraṇa-ambujam
tat dhyāna utriktayā bhaktyā viśuddha dhiṣaṇāḥ pare tasmin nārāyaṇa pade ekānta-matayaḥ gatim avāpuḥ duravāpām te asadbhiḥ viṣaya-ātmabhiḥ vidhūta kalmaṣāḥ sthānam virajena ātmanā eva hi
viduraḥ api parityajya prabhāse deham ātmanaḥ kṛṣṇa āveśena tat cittaḥ pitṛbhiḥ sva-kṣayam yayau
draupadī ca tadā ājñāya patīnām anapekṣatām vāsudeve bhagavati hi eka-anta matiḥ āpa tam
yaḥ śraddhayā etat bhagavat-priyāṇām pāṇḍoḥ sutānām iti samprayāṇam śṛṇoti alam svastyayanam pavitram labdhvā harau bhaktim upaiti siddhim
sūtaḥ uvāca tataḥ parīkṣit dvija-varya śikṣayā mahīm mahā-bhāgavataḥ śaśāsa ha yathā hi sūtyām abhijāta-kovidāḥ samādiśan vipra mahat-guṇaḥ tathā
saḥ uttarasya tanayām upayeme irāvatīm janamejaya-ādīn caturaḥ tasyām utpādayat sutān
ājahāra aśva-medhān trīn gaṅgāyām bhūri dakṣiṇān śāradvatam gurum kṛtvā devāḥ yatra akṣi gocarāḥ
nijagrāha ojasā vīraḥ kalim digvijaye kvacit nṛpa-liṅga-dharam śūdram ghnantam go-mithunam padā
śaunakaḥ uvāca kasya hetoḥ nijagrāha kalim digvijaye nṛpaḥ nṛ-deva cihna-dhṛk śūdrakaḥ asau gām yaḥ padā ahanat tat kathyatām mahā-bhāga yadi kṛṣṇa kathā-āśrayam
athavā asya pada-ambhoja makaranda-lihām satām kim anyaiḥ asat ālāpaiḥ āyuṣaḥ yat asat-vyayaḥ
kṣudra āyuṣām nṛṇām aṅga martyānām ṛtam icchatām iha upahūtaḥ bhagavān mṛtyuḥ śāmitra karmaṇi
na kaścit mriyate tāvat yāvat āste iha antakaḥ etat artham hi bhagavān āhūtaḥ parama-ṛṣibhiḥ aho nṛ-loke pīyeta hari-līlā amṛtam vacaḥ
mandasya manda prajñasya vayaḥ manda āyuṣaḥ ca vai nidrayā hriyate naktam divā ca vyartha karmabhiḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca yadā parīkṣit kuru-jāṅgale avasat kalim praviṣṭam nija-cakravartite niśamya vārtām anati-priyām tataḥ śarāsanam saṁyuga śauṇḍiḥ ādade
su-alaṅkṛtam śyāma turaṅga yojitam ratham mṛga-indra dhvajam āśritaḥ purāt vṛtaḥ ratha aśva dvipapatti yuktayā sva-senayā digvijayāya nirgataḥ
bhadrāśvam ketumālam ca bhāratam ca uttarān kurūn kimpuruṣa-ādīni varṣāṇi vijitya jagṛhe balim
tatra tatra upaśṛṇvānaḥ sva-pūrveṣām mahā-ātmanām pragīyamāṇam ca yaśaḥ kṛṣṇa māhātmya sūcakam ātmānam ca paritrātam aśvatthāmnaḥ astra tejasaḥ sneham ca vṛṣṇi-pārthānām teṣām bhaktim ca keśave tebhyaḥ parama santuṣṭaḥ prīti ujjṛmbhita locanaḥ mahā-dhanāni vāsāṁsi dadau hārān mahā-manāḥ
sārathya pāraṣada sevana sakhya dautya vīra-āsana anugamana stavana praṇāmān snigdheṣu pāṇḍuṣu jagat praṇatim ca viṣṇoḥ bhaktim karoti nṛ-patiḥ caraṇa-aravinde
tasya evam vartamānasya pūrveṣām vṛttim anvaham na ati-dūre kila āścaryam yat āsīt tat nibodha me
dharmaḥ padā ekena caran vicchāyām upalabhya gām pṛcchati sma aśru-vadanām vivatsām iva mātaram
dharmaḥ uvāca kaccit bhadre anāmayam ātmanaḥ te vicchāyā asi mlāyatā īṣat mukhena ālakṣaye bhavatīm antarādhim dūre bandhum śocasi kañcana amba
pādaiḥ nyūnam śocasi mā eka-pādam ātmānam vā vṛṣalaiḥ bhokṣyamāṇam āhoḥ sura-ādīn hṛta-yajña bhāgān prajāḥ uta svit maghavati avarṣati
arakṣyamāṇāḥ striyaḥ urvi bālān śocasi atho puruṣa-ādaiḥ iva ārtān vācam devīm brahma-kule kukarmaṇi abrahmaṇye rāja-kule kula-agryān
kim kṣatra-bandhūn kalinā upasṛṣṭān rāṣṭrāṇi vā taiḥ avaropitāni itaḥ tataḥ vā aśana pāna vāsaḥ snāna vyavāya unmukha jīva-lokam
yadvā amba te bhūri bhara avatāra kṛta avatārasya hareḥ dharitri antarhitasya smaratī visṛṣṭā karmāṇi nirvāṇa vilambitāni
idam mama ācakṣva tava ādhimūlam vasundhare yena vikarśitā asi kālena vā te balinām balīyasā sura-arcitam kim hṛtam amba saubhagam
dharaṇī uvāca bhavān hi veda tat sarvam yat mām dharma anupṛcchasi caturbhiḥ vartase yena pādaiḥ loka sukha-āvahaiḥ
satyam śaucam dayā kṣāntiḥ tyāgaḥ santoṣaḥ ārjavam śamaḥ damaḥ tapaḥ sāmyam titikṣā uparatiḥ śrutam jñānam viraktiḥ aiśvaryam śauryam tejaḥ balam smṛtiḥ svātantryam kauśalam kāntiḥ dhairyam mārdavam eva ca prāgalbhyam praśrayaḥ śīlam sahaḥ ojaḥ balam bhagaḥ gāmbhīryam sthairyam āstikyam kīrtiḥ mānaḥ anahaṅkṛtiḥ ete ca anye ca bhagavan nityāḥ yatra mahā-guṇāḥ prārthyāḥ mahattvam icchadbhiḥ na viyanti sma karhicit tena aham guṇa-pātreṇa śrī nivāsena sāmpratam śocāmi rahitam lokam pāpmanā kalinā īkṣitam
ātmānam ca anuśocāmi bhavantam ca amara-uttamam devān pitṝn ṛṣīn sādhūn sarvān varṇān tathā āśramān
brahma-ādayaḥ bahu-titham yat apāṅga-mokṣa kāmāḥ tapaḥ samacaran bhagavat prapannāḥ sā śrīḥ sva-vāsam aravinda-vanam vihāya yat pāda saubhagam alam bhajate anuraktā tasya aham abja kuliśa aṅkuśa ketu ketaiḥ śrīmat padaiḥ bhagavataḥ samalaṅkṛta-aṅgī trīn ati aroce upalabhya tataḥ vibhūtim lokān saḥ mām vyasṛjat utsmayatīm tat-ante
yaḥ vai mama ati-bharam āsura-vaṁśa rājñām akṣauhiṇī śatam apānudat ātma-tantraḥ tvām duḥstham ūna-padam ātmani pauruṣeṇa sampādayan yaduṣu ramyam abibhrat aṅgam
kā vā saheta viraham puruṣa-uttamasya prema avaloka rucira-smita valgu-jalpaiḥ sthairyam sa-mānam aharat madhu māninīnām roma-utsavaḥ mama yat aṅghri viṭaṅkitāyāḥ
tayoḥ evam kathayatoḥ pṛthivī dharmayoḥ tadā parīkṣit nāma rāja-ṛṣiḥ prāptaḥ prācīm sarasvatīm
sūtaḥ uvāca tatra go-mithunam rājā hanyamānam anātha-vat daṇḍa-hastam ca vṛṣalam dadṛśe nṛpa lāñchanam
vṛṣam mṛṇāla-dhavalam mehantam iva bibhyatam vepamānam padā ekena sīdantam śūdra-tāḍitam
gām ca dharma-dughām dīnām bhṛśam śūdra pada-āhatām vivatsām āśru-vadanām kṣāmām yavasam icchatīm
papraccha ratham ārūḍhaḥ kārtasvara paricchadam megha gambhīrayā vācā samāropita kārmukaḥ
kaḥ tvam mat śaraṇe loke balāt haṁsi abalān balī nara-devaḥ asi veṣeṇa naṭa-vat karmaṇā advi-jaḥ
yaḥ tvam kṛṣṇe gate dūram saha gāṇḍīva dhanvanā śocyaḥ asi aśocyān rahasi praharan vadham arhasi
tvam vā mṛṇāla-dhavalaḥ pādaiḥ nyūnaḥ padā caran vṛṣa rūpeṇa kim kaścit devaḥ naḥ parikhedayan
na jātu kaurava-indrāṇām dordaṇḍa parirambhite bhū-tale anupatanti asmin vinā te prāṇinām śucaḥ
mā saurabheya atra śucaḥ vyetu te vṛṣalāt bhayam mā rodīḥ amba bhadram te khalānām mayi śāstari
yasya rāṣṭre prajāḥ sarvāḥ trasyante sādhvi asādhubhiḥ tasya mattasya naśyanti kīrtiḥ āyuḥ bhagaḥ gatiḥ eṣaḥ rājñām paraḥ dharmaḥ hi ārtānām ārti nigrahaḥ ataḥ enam vadhiṣyāmi bhūta-druham asat-tamam
kaḥ avṛścat tava pādān trīn saurabheya catuḥ-pada mā bhūvan tvādṛśāḥ rāṣṭre rājñām kṛṣṇa-anuvartinām
ākhyāhi vṛṣa bhadram vaḥ sādhūnām akṛta-āgasām ātma-vairūpya kartāram pārthānām kīrti-dūṣaṇam
jane anāgasi agham yuñjan sarvataḥ asya ca mat-bhayam sādhūnām bhadram eva syāt asādhu damane kṛte
anāgaḥsu iha bhūteṣu yaḥ āgaḥ-kṛt niraṅkuśaḥ āhartā asmi bhujam sākṣāt amartyasya api sa-aṅgadam
rājñaḥ hi paramaḥ dharmaḥ sva-dharma-stha anupālanam śāsataḥ anyān yathā śāstram anāpadi utpathān iha
dharmaḥ uvāca etat vaḥ pāṇḍaveyānām yuktam ārta abhayam vacaḥ yeṣām guṇa-gaṇaiḥ kṛṣṇaḥ dautya-ādau bhagavān kṛtaḥ
na vayam kleśa-bījāni yataḥ syuḥ puruṣa-ṛṣabha puruṣam tam vijānīmaḥ vākya-bheda vimohitāḥ
kecit vikalpa-vasanāḥ āhuḥ ātmānam ātmanaḥ daivam anye apare karma svabhāvam apare prabhum
apratarkyāt anirdeśyāt iti keṣu api niścayaḥ atra anurūpam rāja-ṛṣe vimṛśa sva manīṣayā
sūtaḥ uvāca evam dharme pravadati saḥ samrāṭ dvija-sattamāḥ samāhitena manasā vikhedaḥ paryacaṣṭa tam
rājā uvāca dharmam bravīṣi dharma-jña dharmaḥ asi vṛṣa-rūpa-dhṛk yat adharma-kṛtaḥ sthānam sūcakasya api tat bhavet
athavā deva māyāyāḥ nūnam gatiḥ agocarā cetasaḥ vacasaḥ ca api bhūtānām iti niścayaḥ
tapaḥ śaucam dayā satyam iti pādāḥ kṛte kṛtāḥ adharma aṁśaiḥ trayaḥ bhagnāḥ smaya saṅga madaiḥ tava
idānīm dharma pādaḥ te satyam nirvartayet yataḥ tam jighṛkṣati adharmaḥ ayam anṛtena edhitaḥ kaliḥ
iyam ca bhūmiḥ bhagavatā nyāsita uru bharā satī śrīmadbhiḥ tat pada-nyāsaiḥ sarvataḥ kṛta kautukā
śocati aśru-kalā sādhvī durbhagā iva ujjhitā satī abrahmaṇyāḥ nṛpa-vyājāḥ śūdrāḥ bhokṣyanti mām iti
iti dharmam mahīm ca eva sāntvayitvā mahā-rathaḥ niśātam ādade khaḍgam kalaye adharma hetave
tam jighāṁsum abhipretya vihāya nṛpa-lāñchanam tat-pāda-mūlam śirasā samagāt bhaya-vihvalaḥ
patitam pādayoḥ vīraḥ kṛpayā dīna-vatsalaḥ śaraṇyaḥ na avadhīt ślokyaḥ āha ca idam hasan iva
rājā uvāca na te guḍākeśa yaśaḥ-dharāṇām baddha-añjaleḥ vai bhayam asti kiñcit na vartitavyam bhavatā kathañcana kṣetre madīye tvam adharma-bandhuḥ
tvām vartamānam nara-deva deheṣu anupravṛttaḥ ayam adharma pūgaḥ lobhaḥ anṛtam cauryam anāryam aṁhaḥ jyeṣṭhā ca māyā kalahaḥ ca dambhaḥ
na vartitavyam tat adharma bandho dharmeṇa satyena ca vartitavye brahma-āvarte yatra yajanti yajñaiḥ yajña-īśvaram yajña vitāna vijñāḥ
yasmin hariḥ bhagavān ijyamānaḥ ijya-ātma mūrtiḥ yajatām śam tanoti kāmān amoghān sthira-jaṅgamānām antaḥ bahiḥ vāyuḥ iva eṣaḥ ātmā
sūtaḥ uvāca parīkṣitā evam ādiṣṭaḥ saḥ kaliḥ jāta vepathuḥ tam udyata asim āha idam daṇḍa-pāṇim iva udyatam
kaliḥ uvāca yatra kva vā atha vatsyāmi sārva-bhauma tava ājñayā lakṣaye tatra tatra api tvām ātta iṣu śarāsanam
tat me dharma-bhṛtām śreṣṭha sthānam nirdeṣṭum arhasi yatra eva niyataḥ vatsye ātiṣṭhan te anuśāsanam
sūtaḥ uvāca abhyarthitaḥ tadā tasmai sthānāni kalaye dadau dyūtam pānam striyaḥ sūnā yatra adharmaḥ catuḥ-vidhaḥ
punaḥ ca yācamānāya jāta-rūpam adāt prabhuḥ tataḥ anṛtam madam kāmam rajaḥ vairam ca pañcamam
amūni pañca sthānāni hi adharma prabhavaḥ kaliḥ auttareyeṇa dattāni nyavasat tat nideśa-kṛt
atha etāni na seveta bubhūṣuḥ puruṣaḥ kvacit viśeṣataḥ dharma-śīlaḥ rājā loka-patiḥ guruḥ
vṛṣasya naṣṭān trīn pādān tapaḥ śaucam dayām iti pratisandadhe āśvāsya mahīm ca samavardhayat
saḥ eṣaḥ etarhi adhyāste āsanam pārthiva-ucitam pitāmahena upanyastam rājñā araṇyam vivikṣatā āste adhunā saḥ rāja-ṛṣiḥ kaurava-indra śriyā ullasan gajāhvaye mahā-bhāgaḥ cakravartī bṛhat-śravāḥ
ittham-bhūta anubhāvaḥ ayam abhimanyu-sutaḥ nṛpaḥ yasya pālayataḥ kṣauṇīm yūyam satrāya dīkṣitāḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca yaḥ vai drauṇi-astra vipluṣṭaḥ na mātuḥ udare mṛtaḥ anugrahāt bhagavataḥ kṛṣṇasya adbhuta-karmaṇaḥ
brahma-kopa utthitāt yaḥ tu takṣakāt prāṇa-viplavāt na sammumoha uru-bhayāt bhagavati arpita āśayaḥ
utsṛjya sarvataḥ saṅgam vijñāta ajita saṁsthitiḥ vaiyāsakeḥ jahau śiṣyaḥ gaṅgāyām svam kalevaram
na uttama-śloka vārtānām juṣatām tat kathā-amṛtam syāt sambhramaḥ anta kāle api smaratām tat pada-ambujam
tāvat kaliḥ na prabhavet praviṣṭaḥ api iha sarvataḥ yāvat īśaḥ mahān urvyām ābhimanyavaḥ eka-rāṭ
yasmin ahani yarhi eva bhagavān utsasarja gām tadā eva iha anuvṛttaḥ asau adharma prabhavaḥ kaliḥ
na anudveṣṭi kalim samrāṭ sāram-ga iva sāra-bhuk kuśalāni āśu siddhyanti na itarāṇi kṛtāni yat
kim nu bāleṣu śūreṇa kalinā dhīra bhīruṇā apramattaḥ pramatteṣu yaḥ vṛkaḥ nṛṣu vartate
upavarṇitam etat vaḥ puṇyam pārīkṣitam mayā vāsudeva kathā upetam ākhyānam yat apṛcchata
yāḥ yāḥ kathāḥ bhagavataḥ kathanīya uru-karmaṇaḥ guṇa karma āśrayāḥ pumbhiḥ saṁsevyāḥ tāḥ bubhūṣubhiḥ
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ sūta jīva samāḥ saumya śāśvatīḥ viśadam yaśaḥ yaḥ tvam śaṁsasi kṛṣṇasya martyānām amṛtam hi naḥ
karmaṇi asmin anāśvāse dhūma dhūmra-ātmanām bhavān āpāyayati govinda pāda padma-āsavam madhu
tulayāma lavena api na svargam na apunaḥ-bhavam bhagavat-saṅgi saṅgasya martyānām kim uta āśiṣaḥ
kaḥ nāma tṛpyet rasa-vit kathāyām mahat-tama ekānta parāyaṇasya na antam guṇānām aguṇasya jagmuḥ yoga-īśvarāḥ ye bhava pādma mukhyāḥ
tat naḥ bhavān vai bhagavat pradhānaḥ mahat-tama ekānta parāyaṇasya hareḥ udāram caritam viśuddham śuśrūṣatām naḥ vitanotu vidvan
saḥ vai mahā-bhāgavataḥ parīkṣit yena apavarga-ākhyam adabhra buddhiḥ jñānena vaiyāsaki śabditena bheje khaga-indra dhvaja pāda-mūlam
tat naḥ param puṇyam asaṁvṛta-artham ākhyānam ati adbhuta yoga-niṣṭham ākhyāhi ananta ācarita upapannam pārīkṣitam bhāgavata abhirāmam
sūtaḥ uvāca aho vayam janma-bhṛtaḥ adya ha āsma vṛddha-anuvṛttyā api viloma-jātāḥ dauṣkulyam ādhim vidhunoti śīghram mahat-tamānām abhidhāna yogaḥ
kutaḥ punaḥ gṛṇataḥ nāma tasya mahat-tama ekānta parāyaṇasya yaḥ ananta śaktiḥ bhagavān anantaḥ mahat guṇatvāt yam anantam āhuḥ
etāvatā alam nanu sūcitena guṇaiḥ asāmya anati-śāyanasya hitvā itarān prārthayataḥ vibhūtiḥ yasya aṅghri reṇum juṣate anabhīpsoḥ
atha api yat pāda-nakha avasṛṣṭam jagat viriñca upahṛta arhaṇa ambhaḥ sa īśam punāti anyatamaḥ mukundāt kaḥ nāma loke bhagavat pada arthaḥ
yatra anuraktāḥ sahasā eva dhīrāḥ vyapohya deha ādiṣu saṅgam ūḍham vrajanti tat pārama-haṁsyam antyam yasmin ahiṁsā upaśamaḥ sva-dharmaḥ
aham hi pṛṣṭaḥ aryamaṇaḥ bhavadbhiḥ ācakṣe ātma-avagamaḥ atra yāvān nabhaḥ patanti ātma-samam patattriṇaḥ tathā samam viṣṇu-gatim vipaścitaḥ
ekadā dhanuḥ udyamya vicaran mṛgayām vane mṛgān anugataḥ śrāntaḥ kṣudhitaḥ tṛṣitaḥ bhṛśam jala-āśayam acakṣāṇaḥ praviveśa tam āśramam dadarśa munim āsīnam śāntam mīlita locanam
pratiruddha indriya prāṇa manaḥ buddhim upāratam sthāna trayāt param prāptam brahma-bhūtam avikriyam
viprakīrṇa jaṭa-ācchannam rauraveṇa ajinena ca viśuṣyat tāluḥ udakam tathā-bhūtam ayācata
alabdha tṛṇa bhūmi ādiḥ asamprāpta arghya sūnṛtaḥ avajñātam iva ātmānam manyamānaḥ cukopa ha
abhūta-pūrvaḥ sahasā kṣut tṛḍbhyām ardita ātmanaḥ brāhmaṇam prati abhūt brahman matsaraḥ manyuḥ eva ca
saḥ tu brahma-ṛṣeḥ aṁse gata-asum uragam ruṣā vinirgacchan dhanuḥ-koṭyā nidhāya puram āgataḥ
eṣaḥ kim nibhṛta-aśeṣa karaṇaḥ mīlita īkṣaṇaḥ mṛṣā samādhiḥ āho svit kim nu syāt kṣatra-bandhubhiḥ
tasya putraḥ ati tejasvī viharan bālakaḥ arbhakaiḥ rājñā agham prāpitam tātam śrutvā tatra idam abravīt
aho adharmaḥ pālānām pīvnām bali-bhujām iva svāmini agham yat dāsānām dvāra-pānām śunām iva
brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatra-bandhuḥ hi gṛha-pālaḥ nirūpitaḥ saḥ katham tat-gṛhe dvāḥ-sthaḥ sa-bhāṇḍam bhoktum arhati
kṛṣṇe gate bhagavati śāstari utpatha-gāminām tat bhinna setūn adya aham śāsmi paśyata me balam
iti uktvā roṣa-tāmra-akṣaḥ vayasyān ṛṣi-bālakaḥ kauśikī āpaḥ upaspṛśya vāk vajram visasarja ha
iti laṅghita maryādam takṣakaḥ saptame ahani daṅkṣyati sma kula-aṅgāram coditaḥ me tata-druham
tataḥ abhyetya āśramam bālaḥ gale sarpa kalevaram pitaram vīkṣya duḥkha-ārtaḥ mukta-kaṇṭhaḥ ruroda ha
saḥ vai āṅgirasaḥ brahman śrutvā suta vilāpanam unmīlya śanakaiḥ netre dṛṣṭvā ca aṁse mṛta uragam
visṛjya tam ca papraccha vatsa kasmāt hi rodiṣi kena vā te apakṛtam iti uktaḥ saḥ nyavedayat
niśamya śaptam atat-arham nara-indram saḥ brāhmaṇaḥ na ātma-jam abhyanandat aho bata aṁhaḥ mahat adya te kṛtam alpīyasi drohe uruḥ damaḥ dhṛtaḥ
na vai nṛbhiḥ nara-devam para-ākhyam sammātum arhasi avipakva buddhe yat tejasā durviṣaheṇa guptāḥ vindanti bhadrāṇi akutaḥ-bhayāḥ prajāḥ
alakṣyamāṇe nara-deva nāmni ratha-aṅga-pāṇau ayam aṅga lokaḥ tadā hi caura pracuraḥ vinaṅkṣyati arakṣyamāṇaḥ avivarūtha-vat kṣaṇāt
tat adya naḥ pāpam upaiti ananvayam yat naṣṭa nāthasya vasoḥ vilumpakāt parasparam ghnanti śapanti vṛñjate paśūn striyaḥ arthān puru dasyavaḥ janāḥ
tadā ārya dharmaḥ pravilīyate nṛṇām varṇa āśrama ācāra-yutaḥ trayī-mayaḥ tataḥ artha kāma-abhiniveśita ātmanām śunām kapīnām iva varṇa-saṅkaraḥ
dharma-pālaḥ nara-patiḥ saḥ tu samrāṭ bṛhat śravāḥ sākṣāt mahā-bhāgavataḥ rāja-ṛṣiḥ haya-medhayāṭ kṣut tṛṭ śrama-yutaḥ dīnaḥ na eva asmat śāpam arhati
apāpeṣu sva-bhṛtyeṣu bālena apakva buddhinā pāpam kṛtam tat bhagavān sarva-ātmā kṣantum arhati
tiraḥ-kṛtāḥ vipralabdhāḥ śaptāḥ kṣiptāḥ hatāḥ api na asya tat pratikurvanti tat bhaktāḥ prabhavaḥ api hi
iti putra kṛta aghena saḥ anutaptaḥ mahā-muniḥ svayam viprakṛtaḥ rājñā na eva agham tat acintayat
prāyaśaḥ sādhavaḥ loke paraiḥ dvandveṣu yojitāḥ na vyathanti na hṛṣyanti yataḥ ātmā aguṇa-āśrayaḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca mahī-patiḥ tu atha tat karma garhyam vicintayan ātma-kṛtam su-durmanāḥ aho mayā nīcam anārya vat kṛtam nirāgasi brahmaṇi gūḍha tejasi
dhruvam tataḥ me kṛta-deva-helanāt duratyayam vyasanam na ati dīrghāt tat astu kāmam hi agha niṣkṛtāya me yathā na kuryām punaḥ evam addhā
adya eva rājyam balam ṛddha kośam prakopita brahma-kula analaḥ me dahatu abhadrasya punaḥ na me abhūt pāpīyasī dhīḥ dvija deva gobhyaḥ
saḥ cintayan ittham atha aśṛṇot yathā muneḥ suta-uktaḥ nirṛtiḥ takṣaka-ākhyaḥ saḥ sādhu mene na cireṇa takṣaka analam prasaktasya virakti kāraṇam
atho vihāya imam amum ca lokam vimarśitau heyatayā purastāt kṛṣṇa-aṅghri sevām adhimanyamānaḥ upāviśat prāyam amartya-nadyām
yā vai lasat śrī-tulasī vimiśra kṛṣṇa-aṅghri reṇu abhyadhika ambu netrī punāti lokān ubhayatra sa-īśān kaḥ tām na seveta mariṣyamāṇaḥ
iti vyavacchidya saḥ pāṇḍaveyaḥ prāya-upaveśam prati viṣṇu-padyām dadhau mukunda-aṅghrim ananya bhāvaḥ muni-vrataḥ mukta samasta saṅgaḥ
tatra upajagmuḥ bhuvanam punānāḥ mahā-anubhāvāḥ munayaḥ sa-śiṣyāḥ prāyeṇa tīrtha abhigama apadeśaiḥ svayam hi tīrthāni punanti santaḥ
atriḥ to nāradaḥ
anye ca devarṣi brahmarṣi varyāḥ rājarṣi-varyāḥ aruṇa-ādayaḥ ca nānā ārṣeya-pravarān sametān abhyarcya rājā śirasā vavande
sukha upaviṣṭeṣu atha teṣu bhūyaḥ kṛta-praṇāmaḥ sva cikīrṣitam yat vijñāpayām āsa vivikta-cetāḥ upasthitaḥ agre abhigṛhīta-pāṇiḥ
rājā uvāca aho vayam dhanya-tamāḥ nṛpāṇām mahat-tama anugrahaṇīya-śīlāḥ rājñām kulam brāhmaṇa-pāda śaucāt dūrāt visṛṣṭam bata garhya karma
tasya eva me aghasya parā avara īśaḥ vyāsakta cittasya gṛheṣu abhīkṣṇam nirveda-mūlaḥ dvija-śāpa rūpaḥ yatra prasaktaḥ bhayam āśu dhatte
tam mā upayātam pratiyantu viprāḥ gaṅgā ca devī dhṛta cittam īśe dvija-upasṛṣṭaḥ kuhakaḥ takṣakaḥ vā daśatu alam gāyata viṣṇu-gāthāḥ
punaḥ ca bhūyāt bhagavati anante ratiḥ prasaṅgaḥ ca tat āśrayeṣu mahatsu yām yām upayāmi sṛṣṭim maitrī astu sarvatra namaḥ dvijebhyaḥ
iti sma rājā adhyavasāya yuktaḥ prācīna mūleṣu kuśeṣu dhīraḥ udaṅ-mukhaḥ dakṣiṇa kūle āste samudra patnyāḥ sva suta nyasta bhāraḥ
evam ca tasmin nara-deva-deve prāya-upaviṣṭe divi deva saṅghāḥ praśasya bhūmau vyakiran prasūnaiḥ mudā muhuḥ dundubhayaḥ ca neduḥ
maharṣayaḥ vai samupāgatāḥ ye praśasya sādhu iti anumodamānāḥ ūcuḥ prajā-anugraha śīla-sārāḥ yat uttama-śloka guṇa-abhirūpam
na vā idam rājarṣi varya citram bhavatsu kṛṣṇam samanuvrateṣu ye adhyāsanam rāja-kirīṭa juṣṭam sadyaḥ jahuḥ bhagavat pārśva-kāmāḥ
sarve vayam tāvat iha āsmahe atha kalevaram yāvat asau vihāya lokam param virajaskam viśokam yāsyati ayam bhāgavata pradhānaḥ
āśrutya tat ṛṣi-gaṇa vacaḥ parīkṣit samam madhu-cyut guru ca avyalīkam ābhāṣata enān abhinandya yuktān śuśrūṣamāṇaḥ caritāni viṣṇoḥ
samāgatāḥ sarvataḥ eva sarve vedāḥ yathā mūrti-dharāḥ tri-pṛṣṭhe na iha atha na amutra ca kaścana arthaḥ ṛte para anugraham ātma-śīlam
tataḥ ca vaḥ pṛcchyam imam vipṛcche viśrabhya viprāḥ iti kṛtyatāyām sarva-ātmanā mriyamāṇaiḥ ca kṛtyam śuddham ca tatra āmṛśata abhiyuktāḥ
tatra abhavat bhagavān vyāsa-putraḥ yadṛcchayā gām aṭamānaḥ anapekṣaḥ alakṣya liṅgaḥ nija-lābha tuṣṭaḥ vṛtaḥ ca bālaiḥ avadhūta veṣaḥ
tam dvi-aṣṭa varṣam su-kumāra pāda kara ūru bāhu aṁsa kapola gātram cāru āyata akṣa unnasa tulya karṇa subhru ānanam kambu sujāta kaṇṭham
nigūḍha jatrum pṛthu tuṅga vakṣasam āvarta nābhim vali-valgu udaram ca dik-ambaram vaktra vikīrṇa keśam pralamba bāhum su-amara-uttama ābham
śyāmam sadā apīvya vayaḥ aṅga lakṣmyā strīṇām manaḥ-jñam rucira smitena pratyutthitāḥ te munayaḥ sva āsanebhyaḥ tat lakṣaṇa-jñāḥ api gūḍha-varcasam
saḥ viṣṇu-rātaḥ atithaye āgatāya tasmai saparyām śirasā ājahāra tataḥ nivṛttāḥ hi abudhāḥ striyaḥ arbhakāḥ mahā-āsane sa upaviveśa pūjitaḥ
saḥ saṁvṛtaḥ tatra mahān mahīyasām brahmarṣi rājarṣi devarṣi saṅghaiḥ vyarocata alam bhagavān yathā induḥ graha ṛkṣa tārā nikaraiḥ parītaḥ
praśāntam āsīnam akuṇṭha medhasam munim nṛpaḥ bhāgavataḥ abhyupetya praṇamya mūrdhnā avahitaḥ kṛta-añjaliḥ natvā girā sūnṛtayā anvapṛcchat
parīkṣit uvāca aho adya vayam brahman sat-sevyāḥ kṣatra bandhavaḥ kṛpayā atithi-rūpeṇa bhavadbhiḥ tīrthakāḥ kṛtāḥ
yeṣām saṁsmaraṇāt puṁsām sadyaḥ śuddhyanti vai gṛhāḥ kim punaḥ darśana sparśa pāda śauca āsana-ādibhiḥ
sānnidhyāt te mahā-yogin pātakāni mahānti api sadyaḥ naśyanti vai puṁsām viṣṇoḥ iva sura-itarāḥ
api me bhagavān prītaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pāṇḍu-suta priyaḥ paitṛ svaseya prīti artham tat gotrasya ātta bāndhavaḥ
anyathā te avyakta-gateḥ darśanam naḥ katham nṛṇām nitarām mriyamāṇānām saṁsiddhasya vanīyasaḥ
ataḥ pṛcchāmi saṁsiddhim yoginām paramam gurum puruṣasya iha yat kāryam mriyamāṇasya sarvathā
yat śrotavyam atho japyam yat kartavyam nṛbhiḥ prabho smartavyam bhajanīyam vā brūhi yad vā viparyayam
