kālena saḥ ajaḥ puruṣa-āyuṣā abhipravṛtta yogena virūḍha bodhaḥ svayam tat antaḥ-hṛdaye avabhātam apaśyata apaśyata yat na pūrvam
mṛṇāla gaura āyata śeṣa-bhoga paryaṅke ekam puruṣam śayānam phaṇa-ātapatra āyuta mūrdha ratna dyubhiḥ hata-dhvānta yuga-anta toye
prekṣām kṣipantam harita upala adreḥ sandhyā-abhra-nīveḥ uru rukma mūrdhnaḥ ratna udadhāra auṣadhi saumanasya vana-srajaḥ veṇu bhuja aṅghripa aṅghreḥ
āyāmataḥ vistarataḥ sva-māna dehena loka-traya saṅgraheṇa vicitra divya ābharaṇa-aṁśukānām kṛta-śriyā apāśrita veṣa deham
puṁsām sva-kāmāya vivikta-mārgaiḥ abhyarcatām kāma-dugha-aṅghri-padmam pradarśayantam kṛpayā nakha indu mayūkha bhinna aṅguli cāru-patram
mukhena loka-ārti-hara smitena parisphurat kuṇḍala maṇḍitena śoṇāyitena adhara bimba bhāsā pratyarhayantam su-nasena su-bhrvā
kadamba-kiñjalka piśaṅga vāsasā su-alaṅkṛtam mekhalayā nitambe hāreṇa ca ananta dhanena vatsa śrīvatsa vakṣaḥ-sthala vallabhena
parārdhya keyūra maṇi-praveka paryasta dordaṇḍa sahasra-śākham avyakta-mūlam bhuvana aṅghripa indram ahi-indra bhogaiḥ adhivīta valśam
cara acara okaḥ bhagavat mahīdhram ahi-indra bandhum salila upagūḍham kirīṭa sāhasra hiraṇya śṛṅgam āvirbhavat kaustubha ratna-garbham
nivītam āmnāya madhu-vrata-śriyā sva-kīrti-mayyā vana-mālayā harim sūrya indu vāyu agni agamam tri-dhāmabhiḥ parikramat prādhanikaiḥ durāsadam
tarhi eva tat nābhi saraḥ sarojam ātmānam ambhaḥ śvasanam viyat ca dadarśa devaḥ jagataḥ vidhātā na ataḥ param loka-visarga dṛṣṭiḥ
saḥ karma-bījam rajasā uparaktaḥ prajāḥ sisṛkṣan iyat eva dṛṣṭvā astaut visarga abhimukhaḥ tam īḍyam avyakta vartmani abhiveśita ātmā
brahmā uvāca jñātaḥ asi me adya sucirāt nanu deha-bhājām na jñāyate bhagavataḥ gatiḥ iti avadyam na anyat tvat asti bhagavan api tat na śuddham māyā guṇa-vyatikarāt yat uruḥ vibhāsi
rūpam yat etat avabodha-rasa udayena śaśvat nivṛtta tamasaḥ sat-anugrahāya ādau gṛhītam avatāra śata-eka-bījam yat nābhi-padma bhavanāt aham āvirāsam
na ataḥ param parama yat bhavataḥ svarūpam ānanda-mātram avikalpam aviddha-varcaḥ paśyāmi viśva-sṛjam ekam aviśvam ātman bhūta indriya ātmaka madaḥ te upāśritaḥ asmi
tat vā idam bhuvana-maṅgala maṅgalāya dhyāne sma naḥ darśitam te upāsakānām tasmai namaḥ bhagavate anuvidhema tubhyam yaḥ anādṛtaḥ naraka-bhāgbhiḥ asat-prasaṅgaiḥ
ye tu tvadīya caraṇa-ambuja kośa gandham jighranti karṇa-vivaraiḥ śruti-vāta-nītam bhaktyā gṛhīta-caraṇaḥ parayā ca teṣām na apaiṣi nātha hṛdaya ambu-ruhāt sva-puṁsām
tāvat bhayam draviṇa deha suhṛt nimittam śokaḥ spṛhā paribhavaḥ vipulaḥ ca lobhaḥ tāvat mama iti asat avagrahaḥ ārti-mūlam yāvat na te aṅghrim abhayam pravṛṇīta lokaḥ
daivena te hata-dhiyaḥ bhavataḥ prasaṅgāt sarva aśubha upaśamanāt vimukha indriyāḥ ye kurvanti kāma sukha leśa lavāya dīnāḥ lobha-abhibhūta manasaḥ akuśalāni śaśvat
kṣut tṛṭ tri-dhātubhiḥ imāḥ muhuḥ ardyamānāḥ śīta uṣṇa vāta varaṣaiḥ itara-itarāt ca kāma-agninā acyuta-ruṣā ca sudurbhareṇa sampaśyataḥ manaḥ urukrama sīdate me
yāvat pṛthaktvam idam ātmanaḥ indriya-artha māyā-balam bhagavataḥ janaḥ īśa paśyet tāvat na saṁsṛtiḥ asau pratisaṅkrameta vyarthā api duḥkha-nivaham vahatī kriyā-arthā
ahni āpṛta ārta karaṇāḥ niśi niḥśayānāḥ nānā manoratha dhiyā kṣaṇa bhagna nidrāḥ daiva āhata-artha racanāḥ ṛṣayaḥ api deva yuṣmat prasaṅga vimukhāḥ iha saṁsaranti
tvam bhakti-yoga paribhāvita hṛt saroje āsse śruta-īkṣita pathaḥ nanu nātha puṁsām yat-yat dhiyā te urugāya vibhāvayanti tat-tat vapuḥ praṇayase sat-anugrahāya
na ati prasīdati tathā upacita upacāraiḥ ārādhitaḥ sura-gaṇaiḥ hṛdi baddha-kāmaiḥ yat sarva bhūta dayayā asat alabhyayā ekaḥ nānā janeṣu avahitaḥ suhṛt antaḥ ātmā
puṁsām ataḥ vividha-karmabhiḥ adhvara-ādyaiḥ dānena ca ugra tapasā paricaryayā ca ārādhanam bhagavataḥ tava sat-kriyā-arthaḥ dharmaḥ arpitaḥ karhicit mriyate na yatra
śaśvat svarūpa mahasā eva nipīta bheda mohāya bodha dhiṣaṇāya namaḥ parasmai viśva-udbhava sthiti layeṣu nimitta līlā rāsāya te namaḥ idam cakṛma īśvarāya
yasya avatāra guṇa karma viḍambanāni nāmāni ye asu-vigame vivaśāḥ gṛṇanti te anaika janma śamalam sahasā eva hitvā saṁyānti apāvṛta amṛtam tam ajam prapadye
yaḥ vai aham ca giriśaḥ ca vibhuḥ svayam ca sthiti udbhava pralaya hetavaḥ ātma-mūlam bhittvā tri-pāt vavṛdhe ekaḥ uru prarohaḥ tasmai namaḥ bhagavate bhuvana-drumāya
lokaḥ vikarma nirataḥ kuśale pramattaḥ karmaṇi ayam tvat udite bhavat arcane sve yaḥ tāvat asya balavān iha jīvita-āśām sadyaḥ chinatti animiṣāya namaḥ astu tasmai
yasmāt bibhemi aham api dvi-para-ardha dhiṣṇyam adhyāsitaḥ sakala-loka namaskṛtam yat tepe tapaḥ bahu-savaḥ avarurutsamānaḥ tasmai namaḥ bhagavate adhimakhāya tubhyam
tiryak manuṣya vibudha-ādiṣu jīva-yoniṣu ātma icchayā ātma-kṛta setu parīpsayā yaḥ reme nirasta viṣayaḥ api avaruddha dehaḥ tasmai namaḥ bhagavate puruṣottamāya
yaḥ avidyayā anupahataḥ api daśa-ardha vṛttyā nidrām uvāha jaṭharī kṛta loka-yātraḥ antaḥ-jale ahi-kaśipu sparśa-anukūlām bhīma-ūrmi mālini janasya sukham vivṛṇvan
yat nābhi padma bhavanāt aham āsam īḍya loka-traya upakaraṇaḥ yat anugraheṇa tasmai namaḥ te udara-stha bhavāya yoga-nidrā-avasāna vikasat nalina-īkṣaṇāya
saḥ ayam samasta-jagatām suhṛt ekaḥ ātmā sattvena yat mṛḍayate bhagavān bhagena tena eva me dṛśam anuspṛśatāt yathā aham srakṣyāmi pūrva-vat idam praṇata priyaḥ asau
eṣaḥ prapanna vara-daḥ ramayā ātma-śaktyā yat yat kariṣyati gṛhīta guṇa-avatāraḥ tasmin sva-vikramam idam sṛjataḥ api cetaḥ yuñjīta karma śamalam ca yathā vijahyām
nābhi-hradāt iha sataḥ ambhasi yasya puṁsaḥ vijñāna śaktiḥ aham āsam ananta śakteḥ rūpam vicitram idam asya vivṛṇvataḥ me mā rīriṣīṣṭa nigamasya girām visargaḥ
saḥ asau adabhra karuṇaḥ bhagavān vivṛddha prema smitena nayana-amburuham vijṛmbhan utthāya viśva-vijayāya ca naḥ viṣādam mādhvyā girā apanayatāt puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca sva-sambhavam niśāmya evam tapaḥ vidyā samādhibhiḥ yāvat manaḥ vacaḥ stutvā virarāma saḥ khinna-vat
atha abhipretam anvīkṣya brahmaṇaḥ madhusūdanaḥ viṣaṇṇa cetasam tena kalpa vyatikara-ambhasā loka-saṁsthāna vijñāne ātmanaḥ parikhidyataḥ tam āha agādhayā vācā kaśmalam śamayan iva
śrī-bhagavān uvāca mā veda-garbha gāḥ tandrīm sarge udyamam āvaha tat mayā āpāditam hi agre yat mām prārthayate bhavān
bhūyaḥ tvam tapaḥ ātiṣṭha vidyām ca eva mat āśrayām tābhyām antaḥ hṛdi brahman lokān drakṣyasi apāvṛtān
tataḥ ātmani loke ca bhakti-yuktaḥ samāhitaḥ draṣṭā asi mām tatam brahman mayi lokān tvam ātmanaḥ
yadā tu sarva bhūteṣu dāruṣu agnim iva sthitam praticakṣīta mām lokaḥ jahyāt tarhi eva kaśmalam
yadā rahitam ātmānam bhūta indriya guṇa-āśayaiḥ svarūpeṇa mayā upetam paśyan svārājyam ṛcchati
nānā-karma vitānena prajāḥ bahvīḥ sisṛkṣataḥ na ātmā avasīdati asmin te varṣīyān mat anugrahaḥ
ṛṣim ādyam na badhnāti pāpīyān tvām rajaḥ-guṇaḥ yat manaḥ mayi nirbaddham prajāḥ saṁsṛjataḥ api te
jñātaḥ aham bhavatā tu adya duḥ vijñeyaḥ api dehinām yat mām tvam manyase ayuktam bhūta indriya guṇa ātmabhiḥ
tubhyam mat vicikitsāyām ātmā me darśitaḥ abahiḥ nālena salile mūlam puṣkarasya vicinvataḥ
yat cakartha aṅga mat-stotram mat-kathā abhyudaya-aṅkitam yat vā tapasi te niṣṭhā saḥ eṣaḥ mat anugrahaḥ
prītaḥ aham astu bhadram te lokānām vijaya icchayā yat astauṣīḥ guṇa-mayam nirguṇam mā anuvarṇayan
yaḥ etena pumān nityam stutvā stotreṇa mām bhajet tasya āśu samprasīdeyam sarva kāma vara-īśvaraḥ
pūrtena tapasā yajñaiḥ dānaiḥ yoga samādhinā rāddham niḥśreyasam puṁsām mat prītiḥ tattva-vit matam
aham ātmā ātmanām dhātaḥ preṣṭhaḥ san preyasām api ataḥ mayi ratim kuryāt deha-ādiḥ yat-kṛte priyaḥ
sarva veda-mayena idam ātmanā ātmā ātma-yoninā prajāḥ sṛja yathā-pūrvam yāḥ ca mayi anuśerate
maitreyaḥ uvāca tasmai evam jagat-sraṣṭre pradhāna-puruṣa-īśvaraḥ vyajya idam svena rūpeṇa kañja-nābhaḥ tirodadhe
viduraḥ uvāca antarhite bhagavati brahmā loka-pitāmahaḥ prajāḥ sasarja katidhāḥ daihikīḥ mānasīḥ vibhuḥ
ye ca me bhagavan pṛṣṭāḥ tvayi arthāḥ bahu-vit-tama tān vadasva ānupūrvyeṇa chindhi naḥ sarva saṁśayān
sūtaḥ uvāca evam sañcoditaḥ tena kṣattrā kauṣāraviḥ muniḥ prītaḥ pratyāha tān praśnān hṛdi-sthān atha bhārgava
maitreyaḥ uvāca viriñcaḥ api tathā cakre divyam varṣa-śatam tapaḥ ātmani ātmānam āveśya yathā āha bhagavān ajaḥ
tat vilokya abja-sambhūtaḥ vāyunā yat adhiṣṭhitaḥ padmam ambhaḥ ca tat-kāla-kṛta vīryeṇa kampitam
tapasā hi edhamānena vidyayā ca ātma saṁsthayā vivṛddha vijñāna balaḥ nyapāt vāyum saha ambhasā
tat vilokya viyat-vyāpi puṣkaram yat adhiṣṭhitam anena lokān prāk-līnān kalpitā asmi iti acintayat
padma-kośam tadā āviśya bhagavat karma coditaḥ ekam vyabhāṅkṣīt urudhā tridhā bhāvyam dvi-saptadhā
etāvān jīva-lokasya saṁsthā-bhedaḥ samāhṛtaḥ dharmasya hi animittasya vipākaḥ parameṣṭhī asau
viduraḥ uvāca yathā āttha bahu-rūpasya hareḥ adbhuta karmaṇaḥ kāla ākhyam lakṣaṇam brahman yathā varṇaya naḥ prabho
maitreyaḥ uvāca guṇa-vyatikara ākāraḥ nirviśeṣaḥ apratiṣṭhitaḥ puruṣaḥ tat upādānam ātmānam līlayā asṛjat
viśvam vai brahma tat-mātram saṁsthitam viṣṇu-māyayā īśvareṇa paricchinnam kālena avyakta mūrtinā
yathā idānīm tathā agre ca paścāt api etat īdṛśam
sargaḥ nava-vidhaḥ tasya prākṛtaḥ vaikṛtaḥ tu yaḥ kāla dravya guṇaiḥ asya tri-vidhaḥ pratisaṅkramaḥ
ādyaḥ tu mahataḥ sargaḥ guṇa-vaiṣamyam ātmanaḥ dvitīyaḥ tu ahamaḥ yatra dravya jñāna kriyā-udayaḥ
bhūta-sargaḥ tṛtīyaḥ tu tat-mātraḥ dravya śaktimān caturthaḥ aindriyaḥ sargaḥ yaḥ tu jñāna kriyā ātmakaḥ
vaikārikaḥ deva sargaḥ pañcamaḥ yat mayam manaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ tu tamasaḥ sargaḥ yaḥ tu abuddhi-kṛtaḥ prabhoḥ
ṣaṭ ime prākṛtāḥ sargāḥ vaikṛtān api me śṛṇu rajaḥ-bhājaḥ bhagavataḥ līlā iyam hari medhasaḥ
saptamaḥ mukhya sargaḥ tu ṣaṭ-vidhaḥ tasthuṣām ca yaḥ vanaspati oṣadhi latā tvaksārāḥ vīrudhaḥ drumāḥ
utsrotasaḥ tamaḥ-prāyāḥ antaḥ-sparśāḥ viśeṣiṇaḥ
tiraścām aṣṭamaḥ sargaḥ saḥ aṣṭāviṁśat vidhaḥ mataḥ avidaḥ bhūri tamasaḥ ghrāṇa-jñāḥ hṛdi avedinaḥ
gauḥ ajaḥ mahiṣaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sūkaraḥ gavayaḥ ruruḥ dvi-śaphāḥ paśavaḥ ca ime aviḥ uṣṭraḥ ca sattama
kharaḥ aśvaḥ aśvataraḥ gauraḥ śarabhaḥ camarī tathā ete ca eka śaphāḥ kṣattaḥ śṛṇu pañca nakhān paśūn
śvā sṛgālaḥ vṛkaḥ vyāghraḥ mārjāraḥ śaśa śallakau siṁhaḥ kapiḥ gajaḥ kūrmaḥ godhā ca makara-ādayaḥ
kaṅka gṛdhra baka śyena bhāsa bhallūka barhiṇaḥ haṁsa sārasa cakrāhva kāka ulūka ādayaḥ khagāḥ
arvāk srotaḥ tu navamaḥ kṣattaḥ eka-vidhaḥ nṛṇām rajaḥ adhikāḥ karma-parāḥ duḥkhe ca sukha māninaḥ
vaikṛtāḥ trayaḥ eva ete deva-sargaḥ ca sattama vaikārikaḥ tu yaḥ proktaḥ kaumāraḥ tu ubhaya-ātmakaḥ
deva-sargaḥ ca aṣṭa-vidhaḥ vibudhāḥ pitaraḥ asurāḥ gandharva apsarasaḥ siddhāḥ yakṣa rakṣāṁsi cāraṇāḥ bhūta preta piśācāḥ ca vidyādhrāḥ kinnara ādayaḥ daśa ete vidura ākhyātāḥ sargāḥ te viśva-sṛk kṛtāḥ
ataḥ param pravakṣyāmi vaṁśān manvantarāṇi ca evam rajaḥ-plutaḥ sraṣṭā kalpa-ādiṣu ātma-bhūḥ hariḥ sṛjati amogha saṅkalpaḥ ātmā eva ātmānam ātmanā
maitreyaḥ uvāca caramaḥ sat viśeṣāṇām anekaḥ asaṁyutaḥ sadā parama-aṇuḥ saḥ vijñeyaḥ nṛṇām aikya bhramaḥ yataḥ
sataḥ eva pada-arthasya svarūpa-avasthitasya yat kaivalyam parama mahān aviśeṣaḥ nirantaraḥ
evam kālaḥ api anumitaḥ saukṣmye sthaulye ca sattama saṁsthāna bhuktyā bhagavān avyaktaḥ vyakta-bhuk vibhuḥ
saḥ kālaḥ parama-aṇuḥ vai yaḥ bhuṅkte parama-aṇutām sataḥ aviśeṣa-bhuk yaḥ tu saḥ kālaḥ paramaḥ mahān
aṇuḥ dvau parama-aṇu syāt trasareṇuḥ trayaḥ smṛtaḥ jāla-arka raśmi avagataḥ kham eva anupatan agāt
trasareṇu-trikam bhuṅkte yaḥ kālaḥ saḥ truṭiḥ smṛtaḥ śata-bhāgaḥ tu vedhaḥ syāt taiḥ tribhiḥ tu lavaḥ smṛtaḥ
nimeṣaḥ tri-lavaḥ jñeyaḥ āmnātaḥ te trayaḥ kṣaṇaḥ kṣaṇān pañca viduḥ kāṣṭhām laghu tāḥ daśa pañca ca
laghūni vai samāmnātā daśa pañca ca nāḍikā te dve muhūrtaḥ praharaḥ ṣaṭ yāmaḥ sapta vā nṛṇām
dvādaśa-ardha pala unmānam caturbhiḥ catuḥ-aṅgulaiḥ svarṇa māṣaiḥ kṛta-chidram yāvat prastha jala-plutam
yāmāḥ catvāraḥ catvāraḥ martyānām ahanī ubhe pakṣaḥ pañca-daśa ahāni śuklaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ ca mānada
tayoḥ samuccayaḥ māsaḥ pitṝṇām tat ahaḥ-niśam dvau tau ṛtuḥ ṣaṭ ayanam dakṣiṇam ca uttaram divi
ayane ca ahanī prāhuḥ vatsaraḥ dvādaśa smṛtaḥ saṁvatsara-śatam nṝṇām parama-āyuḥ nirūpitam
graha ṛkṣa tārā cakra-sthaḥ parama-aṇu-ādinā jagat saṁvatsara-avasānena paryeti animiṣaḥ vibhuḥ
saṁvatsaraḥ parivatsaraḥ iḍā-vatsaraḥ eva ca anuvatsaraḥ vatsaraḥ ca vidura evam prabhāṣyate
yaḥ sṛjya śaktim urudhā ucchvasayan sva-śaktyā puṁsaḥ abhramāya divi dhāvati bhūta-bhedaḥ kāla-ākhyayā guṇa-mayam kratubhiḥ vitanvan tasmai balim harata vatsara-pañcakāya
viduraḥ uvāca pitṛ deva manuṣyāṇām āyuḥ param idam smṛtam pareṣām gatim ācakṣva ye syuḥ kalpāt bahiḥ vidaḥ
bhagavān veda kālasya gatim bhagavataḥ nanu viśvam vicakṣate dhīrāḥ yoga-rāddhena cakṣuṣā
maitreyaḥ uvāca kṛtam tretā dvāparam ca kaliḥ ca iti catuḥ-yugam divyaiḥ dvādaśabhiḥ varṣaiḥ sa-avadhānam nirūpitam
catvāri trīṇi dve ca ekam kṛta-ādiṣu yathā-kramam saṅkhyātāni sahasrāṇi dvi-guṇāni śatāni ca
sandhyā sandhyā-aṁśayoḥ antaḥ yaḥ kālaḥ śata-saṅkhyayoḥ tam eva āhuḥ yugam tat-jñāḥ yatra dharmaḥ vidhīyate
dharmaḥ catuḥ-pāt manujān kṛte samanuvartate saḥ eva anyeṣu adharmeṇa vyeti pādena vardhatā
tri-lokyāḥ yuga sāhasram bahiḥ ābrahmaṇaḥ dinam tāvatī eva niśā tāta yat nimīlati viśva-sṛk
niśā avasāne ārabdhaḥ loka-kalpaḥ anuvartate yāvat dinam bhagavataḥ manūn bhuñjan catuḥ-daśa
svam svam kālam manuḥ bhuṅkte sa-adhikām hi eka-saptatim
manu-antareṣu manavaḥ tat-vaṁśyāḥ ṛṣayaḥ surāḥ bhavanti ca eva yugapat sura-īśāḥ ca anu ye ca tān
eṣaḥ dainam-dinaḥ sargaḥ brāhmaḥ trailokya-vartanaḥ tiryak nṛ pitṛ devānām sambhavaḥ yatra karmabhiḥ
manu-antareṣu bhagavān bibhrat sattvam sva-mūrtibhiḥ manu-ādibhiḥ idam viśvam avati udita pauruṣaḥ
tamaḥ mātrām upādāya pratisaṁruddha-vikramaḥ kālena anugata aśeṣaḥ āste tūṣṇīm dina-atyaye
tam eva anu api dhīyante lokāḥ bhūḥ-ādayaḥ trayaḥ niśāyām anuvṛttāyām nirmukta śaśi bhāskaram
tri-lokyām dahyamānāyām śaktyā saṅkarṣaṇa agninā yānti ūṣmaṇā mahaḥ-lokāt janam bhṛgu ādayaḥ arditāḥ
tāvat tri-bhuvanam sadyaḥ kalpa-anta edhita sindhavaḥ plāvayanti utkaṭa āṭopa caṇḍa vāta īrita ūrmayaḥ
antaḥ saḥ tasmin salile āste ananta āsanaḥ hariḥ yoga nidrā nimīla-akṣaḥ stūya-mānaḥ jana-ālayaiḥ
evam vidhaiḥ ahaḥ rātraiḥ kāla-gatyā upalakṣitaiḥ apakṣitam iva asya api parama-āyuḥ vayaḥ śatam
yat ardham āyuṣaḥ tasya parārdham abhidhīyate pūrvaḥ para-ardhaḥ apakrāntaḥ hi aparaḥ adya pravartate
pūrvasya ādau para-ardhasya brāhmaḥ nāma mahān abhūt kalpaḥ yatra abhavat brahmā śabda-brahma iti yam viduḥ
tasya eva ca ante kalpaḥ abhūt yam pādmam abhicakṣate yat hareḥ nābhi sarasaḥ āsīt loka saroruham
ayam tu kathitaḥ kalpaḥ dvitīyasya api bhārata vārāhaḥ iti vikhyātaḥ yatra āsīt śūkaraḥ hariḥ
kālaḥ ayam dvi-parārdha-ākhyaḥ nimeṣaḥ upacaryate avyākṛtasya anantasya hi anādeḥ jagat-ātmanaḥ
kālaḥ ayam parama-aṇu ādiḥ dvi-parārdha antaḥ īśvaraḥ na eva īśitum prabhuḥ bhūmnaḥ īśvaraḥ dhāma-māninām
vikāraiḥ sahitaḥ yuktaiḥ viśeṣa ādibhiḥ āvṛtaḥ āṇḍa-kośaḥ bahiḥ ayam pañcāśat koṭi vistṛtaḥ
daśa-uttara-adhikaiḥ yatra praviṣṭaḥ parama-aṇu-vat lakṣyate antaḥ-gatāḥ ca anye koṭiśaḥ hi aṇḍa-rāśayaḥ
tat āhuḥ akṣaram brahma sarva-kāraṇa kāraṇam viṣṇoḥ dhāma param sākṣāt puruṣasya mahātmanaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca iti te varṇitaḥ kṣattaḥ kāla-ākhyaḥ paramātmanaḥ mahimā veda-garbhaḥ atha yathā asrākṣīt nibodha me
sasarja agre andha-tāmisram atha tāmisram ādi-kṛt mahā-moham ca moham ca tamaḥ ca ajñāna vṛttayaḥ
dṛṣṭvā pāpīyasīm sṛṣṭim na ātmānam bahu amanyata bhagavat dhyāna pūtena manasā anyām tataḥ asṛjat
sanakam ca sanandam ca sanātanam atha ātma-bhūḥ sanat-kumāram ca munīn niṣkriyān ūrdhva-retasaḥ
tān babhāṣe svabhūḥ putrān prajāḥ sṛjata putrakāḥ tat na aicchan mokṣa-dharmāṇaḥ vāsudeva parāyaṇāḥ
saḥ avadhyātaḥ sutaiḥ evam pratyākhyāta anuśāsanaiḥ krodham durviṣaham jātam niyantum upacakrame
dhiyā nigṛhyamāṇaḥ api bhruvoḥ madhyāt prajāpateḥ sadyaḥ ajāyata tat manyuḥ kumāraḥ nīla-lohitaḥ
saḥ vai ruroda devānām pūrvajaḥ bhagavān bhavaḥ nāmāni kuru me dhātaḥ sthānāni ca jagat-guro
iti tasya vacaḥ pādmaḥ bhagavān paripālayan abhyadhāt bhadrayā vācā mā rodīḥ tat karomi te
yat arodīḥ sura-śreṣṭha sa-udvegaḥ iva bālakaḥ tataḥ tvām abhidhāsyanti nāmnā rudraḥ iti prajāḥ
hṛt indriyāṇi asuḥ vyoma vāyuḥ agniḥ jalam mahī sūryaḥ candraḥ tapaḥ ca eva sthānāni agre kṛtāni te
manyuḥ, manuḥ, mahinasaḥ, mahān, śivaḥ, ṛtadhvajaḥ, ugaretāḥ, bhavaḥ, kālaḥ, vāmadevaḥ, dhṛtavrataḥ
dhīḥ, dhṛti, rasalā, umā, niyut, sarpiḥ, ilā, ambikā, irāvatī, svadhā, dīkṣā rudrāṇyaḥ rudra te striyaḥ
gṛhāṇa etāni nāmāni sthānāni ca sa-yoṣaṇaḥ ebhiḥ sṛja prajāḥ bahvīḥ prajānām asi yat patiḥ
iti ādiṣṭaḥ sva-guruṇā bhagavān nīla-lohitaḥ sattva ākṛti svabhāvena sasarja ātma-samāḥ prajāḥ
rudrāṇām rudra-sṛṣṭānām samantāt grasatām jagat niśāmya asaṅkhyaśaḥ yūthān prajā-patiḥ aśaṅkata
alam prajābhiḥ sṛṣṭābhiḥ īdṛśībhiḥ sura-uttama mayā saha dahantībhiḥ diśaḥ cakṣurbhiḥ ulbaṇaiḥ
tapaḥ ātiṣṭha bhadram te sarva bhūta sukha-āvaham tapasā eva yathā pūrvam sraṣṭā viśvam idam bhavān
tapasā eva param jyotiḥ bhagavantam adhokṣajam sarva-bhūta-guhā-āvāsam añjasā vindate pumān
maitreyaḥ uvāca evam ātma-bhuvā ādiṣṭaḥ parikramya girām patim bāḍham iti amum āmantrya viveśa tapase vanam
atha abhidhyāyataḥ sargam daśa putrāḥ prajajñire bhagavat śakti yuktasya loka santāna hetavaḥ
marīciḥ, atri, aṅgirasau, pulastyaḥ, pulahaḥ, kratuḥ, bhṛguḥ, vasiṣṭhaḥ, dakṣaḥ ca daśamaḥ tatra nāradaḥ
utsaṅgāt nāradaḥ jajñe dakṣaḥ aṅguṣṭhāt svayambhuvaḥ prāṇāt vasiṣṭhaḥ sañjātaḥ bhṛguḥ tvaci karāt kratuḥ
pulahaḥ nābhitaḥ jajñe pulastyaḥ karṇayoḥ ṛṣiḥ aṅgirāḥ mukhataḥ akṣṇaḥ atriḥ marīciḥ manasaḥ abhavat
dharmaḥ stanāt dakṣiṇataḥ yatra nārāyaṇaḥ svayam adharmaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ yasmāt mṛtyuḥ loka bhayam-karaḥ
hṛdi kāmaḥ bhruvaḥ krodhaḥ lobhaḥ ca adhara-dacchadāt āsyāt vāk sindhavaḥ meḍhrāt nirṛtiḥ pāyoḥ agha-āśrayaḥ
chāyāyāḥ kardamaḥ jajñe devahūtyāḥ patiḥ prabhuḥ manasaḥ dehataḥ ca idam jajñe viśva kṛtaḥ jagat
vācam duhitaram tanvīm svayambhūḥ haratīm manaḥ akāmām cakame kṣattaḥ sa-kāmaḥ iti naḥ śrutam
tam adharme kṛta-matim vilokya pitaram sutāḥ marīci-mukhyāḥ munayaḥ viśrambhāt pratyabodhayan
na etat pūrvaiḥ kṛtam tvat ye na kariṣyanti ca apare yaḥ tvam duhitaram gaccheḥ anigṛhya aṅgajam prabhuḥ
tejīyasām api hi etat na su-ślokyam jagat-guro yat vṛttam anutiṣṭhan vai lokaḥ kṣemāya kalpate
tasmai namaḥ bhagavate yaḥ idam svena rociṣā ātma-stham vyañjayām āsa saḥ dharmam pātum arhati
saḥ ittham gṛṇataḥ putrān puraḥ dṛṣṭvā prajā-patīn prajāpati-patiḥ tanvam tatyāja vrīḍitaḥ tadā tām diśaḥ jagṛhuḥ ghorām nīhāram yat viduḥ tamaḥ
kadācit dhyāyataḥ sraṣṭuḥ vedāḥ āsan catuḥ-mukhāt katham srakṣyāmi aham lokān samavetān yathā purā
cātuḥ hotram karma tantram upaveda nayaiḥ saha dharmasya pādāḥ catvāraḥ tathā eva āśrama vṛttayaḥ
viduraḥ uvāca saḥ vai viśva sṛjām īśaḥ veda-ādīn mukhataḥ asṛjat yat yat yena asṛjat devaḥ tat me brūhi tapaḥ-dhana
maitreyaḥ uvāca ṛk-yajuḥ-sāma-atharva ākhyān vedān pūrva-ādibhiḥ mukhaiḥ śāstram ijyām stuti-stomam prāyaścittam vyadhāt kramāt
āyuḥ-vedam dhanuḥ-vedam gāndharvam vedam ātmanaḥ sthāpatyam ca asṛjat vedam kramāt pūrva-ādibhiḥ mukhaiḥ
itihāsa purāṇāni pañcamam vedam īśvaraḥ sarvebhyaḥ eva vaktrebhyaḥ sasṛje sarva darśanaḥ
ṣoḍaśī-ukthau pūrva-vaktrāt purīṣi-agniṣṭutau atha āptoryāma-atirātrau ca vājapeyam sa-gosavam
vidyā dānam tapaḥ satyam dharmasya iti padāni ca āśramān ca yathā saṅkhyam asṛjat saha vṛttibhiḥ
sāvitram prājāpatyam ca brāhmam ca atha bṛhat tathā vārtā sañcaya śālīna śila-uñchaḥ iti vai gṛhe
vaikhānasāḥ vālakhilya audumbarāḥ phenapāḥ vane nyāse kuṭīcakaḥ pūrvam bahvodaḥ haṁsa niṣkriyau
ānvīkṣikī trayī vārtā daṇḍa nītiḥ tathā eva ca evam vyāhṛtayaḥ ca āsan praṇavaḥ hi asya dahrataḥ
tasya uṣṇik āsīt lomabhyaḥ gāyatrī ca tvacaḥ vibhoḥ triṣṭup māṁsāt snutaḥ anuṣṭup jagatī asthnaḥ prajāpateḥ
majjāyāḥ paṅktiḥ utpannā bṛhatī prāṇataḥ abhavat
sparśaḥ tasya abhavat jīvaḥ svaraḥ dehaḥ udāhṛtaḥ ūṣmāṇam indriyāṇi āhuḥ antaḥ-sthāḥ balam ātmanaḥ svarāḥ sapta vihāreṇa bhavanti sma prajāpateḥ
śabda-brahma ātmanaḥ tasya vyakta avyakta-ātmanaḥ paraḥ brahmā avabhāti vitataḥ nānā śakti upabṛṁhitaḥ
tataḥ aparām upādāya saḥ sargāya manaḥ dadhe
ṛṣīṇām bhūri-vīryāṇām api sargam avistṛtam jñātvā tat hṛdaye bhūyaḥ cintayām āsa kaurava
aho adbhutam etat me vyāpṛtasya api nityadā na hi edhante prajāḥ nūnam daivam atra vighātakam
evam yukta kṛtaḥ tasya daivam ca avekṣataḥ tadā kasya rūpam abhūt dvedhā yat kāyam abhicakṣate
tābhyām rūpa vibhāgābhyām mithunam samapadyata
yaḥ tu tatra pumān saḥ abhūt manuḥ svāyambhuvaḥ sva-rāṭ strī yā āsīt śatarūpā ākhyā mahiṣī asya mahātmanaḥ
tadā mithuna dharmeṇa prajāḥ hi edhām babhūvire
saḥ ca api śatarūpāyām pañca apatyāni ajījanat priyavrata uttānapādau tisraḥ kanyāḥ ca bhārata ākūtiḥ devahūtiḥ ca prasūtiḥ iti sattama
ākūtim rucaye prādāt kardamāya tu madhyamām dakṣāya adāt prasūtim ca yataḥ āpūritam jagat
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca niśamya vācam vadataḥ muneḥ puṇya-tamām nṛpa bhūyaḥ papraccha kauravyaḥ vāsudeva-kathā ādṛtaḥ
viduraḥ uvāca saḥ vai svāyambhuvaḥ samrāṭ priyaḥ putraḥ svayambhuvaḥ pratilabhya priyām patnīm kim cakāra tataḥ mune
caritam tasya rājarṣeḥ ādi-rājasya sattama brūhi me śraddadhānāya viṣvaksena āśrayaḥ hi asau
śrutasya puṁsām sucira śramasya nanu añjasā sūribhiḥ īḍitaḥ arthaḥ tat tat guṇa anuśravaṇam mukunda pāda-aravindam hṛdayeṣu yeṣām
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti bruvāṇam viduram vinītam sahasra-śīrṣṇaḥ caraṇa upadhānam prahṛṣṭa-romā bhagavat kathāyām praṇīyamānaḥ muniḥ abhyacaṣṭa
maitreyaḥ uvāca yadā sva-bhāryayā sārdham jātaḥ svāyambhuvaḥ manuḥ prāñjaliḥ praṇataḥ ca idam veda-garbham abhāṣata
tvam ekaḥ sarva bhūtānām janma-kṛt vṛtti-daḥ pitā tathā api naḥ prajānām te śuśrūṣā kena vā bhavet
tat vidhehi namaḥ tubhyam karmasu īḍya ātma-śaktiṣu yat kṛtvā iha yaśaḥ viṣvak amutra ca bhavet gatiḥ
brahmā uvāca prītaḥ tubhyam aham tāta svasti stāt vām kṣiti-īśvara yat nirvyalīkena hṛdā śādhi mā iti ātmanā arpitam
etāvatī ātmajaiḥ vīra kāryā hi apacitiḥ gurau śaktyā apramattaiḥ gṛhyeta sa-ādaram gata-matsaraiḥ
saḥ tvam asyām apatyāni sadṛśāni ātmanaḥ guṇaiḥ utpādya śāsa dharmeṇa gām yajñaiḥ puruṣam yaja
param śuśrūṣaṇam mahyam syāt prajā rakṣayā nṛpa bhagavān te prajā-bhartuḥ hṛṣīkeśaḥ anutuṣyati
yeṣām na tuṣṭaḥ bhagavān yajña-liṅgaḥ janārdanaḥ teṣām śramaḥ hi apārthāya yat ātmā na ādṛtaḥ svayam
manuḥ uvāca ādeśe aham bhagavataḥ varteya amīva-sūdana sthānam tu iha anujānīhi prajānām mama ca prabho
yat okaḥ sarva bhūtānām mahī magnā mahā-ambhasi asyāḥ uddharaṇe yatnaḥ deva devyāḥ vidhīyatām
maitreyaḥ uvāca parameṣṭhī tu apām madhye tathā sannām avekṣya gām katham enām samunneṣye iti dadhyau dhiyā ciram
sṛjataḥ me kṣitiḥ vārbhiḥ plāvyamānā rasām gatā atha atra kim anuṣṭheyam asmābhiḥ sarga yojitaiḥ yasya aham hṛdayāt āsam saḥ īśaḥ vidadhātu me
iti abhidhyāyataḥ nāsā-vivarāt sahasā anagha varāha-tokaḥ niragāt aṅguṣṭha parimāṇakaḥ
tasya abhipaśyataḥ kha-sthaḥ kṣaṇena kila bhārata gaja-mātraḥ pravavṛdhe tat adbhutam abhūt mahat
marīci pramukhaiḥ vipraiḥ kumāraiḥ manunā saha dṛṣṭvā tat saukaram rūpam tarkayām āsa citradhā
kim etat sūkara vyājam sattvam divyam avasthitam aho bata āścaryam idam nāsāyāḥ me viniḥsṛtam
dṛṣṭaḥ aṅguṣṭha śiraḥ mātraḥ kṣaṇāt gaṇḍa-śilā samaḥ api svit bhagavān eṣaḥ yajñaḥ me khedayan manaḥ
iti mīmāṁsataḥ tasya brahmaṇaḥ saha sūnubhiḥ bhagavān yajña puruṣaḥ jagarja aga-indra sannibhaḥ
brahmāṇam harṣayām āsa hariḥ tān ca dvija-uttamān sva-garjitena kakubhaḥ pratisvanayatā vibhuḥ
niśamya te ghargharitam sva-kheda kṣayiṣṇu māyā-maya sūkarasya janaḥ tapaḥ satya nivāsinaḥ te tribhiḥ pavitraiḥ munayaḥ agṛṇan sma
teṣām satām veda vitāna-mūrtiḥ brahma avadhārya ātma guṇa-anuvādam vinadya bhūyaḥ vibudha udayāya gajendra-līlaḥ jalam āviveśa
utkṣipta-vālaḥ kha-caraḥ kaṭhoraḥ saṭāḥ vidhunvan khara romaśa-tvak khura-āhata abhraḥ sita-daṁṣṭraḥ īkṣā jyotiḥ babhāse bhagavān mahī-dhraḥ
ghrāṇena pṛthvyāḥ padavīm vijighran kroḍa-apadeśaḥ svayam adhvara aṅgaḥ karāla daṁṣṭraḥ api akarāla dṛgbhyām udvīkṣya viprān gṛṇataḥ aviśat kam
saḥ vajra-kūṭa-aṅga nipāta-vega viśīrṇa kukṣiḥ stanayan udanvān utsṛṣṭa dīrgha ūrmi bhujaiḥ iva ārtaḥ cukrośa yajña-īśvara pāhi mā iti
khuraiḥ kṣurapraiḥ darayan tat āpaḥ utpāra-pāram tri-paruḥ rasāyām dadarśa gām tatra suṣupsuḥ agre yām jīva-dhānīm svayam abhyadhatta
sva-daṁṣṭrayā uddhṛtya mahīm nimagnām saḥ utthitaḥ saṁruruce rasāyāḥ tatra api daityam gadayā āpatantam sunābha sandīpita tīvra manyuḥ
jaghāna rundhānam asahya vikramam saḥ līlayā ibham mṛga-rāṭ iva ambhasi tat-rakta paṅka-aṅkita gaṇḍa tuṇḍaḥ yathā gajendraḥ jagatīm vibhindan
tamāla nīlam sita danta koṭyā kṣmām utkṣipantam gaja-līlayā aṅga prajñāya baddha añjalayaḥ anuvākaiḥ viriñci mukhyāḥ upatasthuḥ īśam
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ jitam jitam te ajita yajña-bhāvana trayīm tanum svām paridhunvate namaḥ yat roma garteṣu nililyuḥ addhayaḥ tasmai namaḥ kāraṇa-sūkarāya te
rūpam tava etat nanu duṣkṛta-ātmanām durdarśanam deva yat adhvara-ātmakam chandāṁsi yasya tvaci barhiḥ romasu ājyam dṛśi tu aṅghriṣu cātuḥ-hotram
srak tuṇḍe āsīt sruvaḥ īśa nāsayoḥ iḍā udare camasāḥ karṇa-randhre prāśitram āsye grasane grahāḥ tu te yat carvaṇam te bhagavan agni-hotram
dīkṣā anujanma upasadaḥ śiraḥ-dharam tvam prāyaṇīya udayanīya daṁṣṭraḥ jihvā pravargyaḥ tava śīrṣakam kratoḥ satya āvasathyam citayaḥ asavaḥ hi te
somaḥ tu retaḥ savanāni avasthitiḥ saṁsthā-vibhedāḥ tava deva dhātavaḥ satrāṇi sarvāṇi śarīra sandhiḥ tvam sarva yajña kratuḥ iṣṭi bandhanaḥ
namaḥ namaḥ te akhila mantra devatā dravyāya sarva-kratave kriyā-ātmane vairāgya bhaktyā ātma-jaya-anubhāvita jñānāya vidyā-gurave namaḥ namaḥ
daṁṣṭra-agra koṭyā bhagavan tvayā dhṛtā virājate bhū-dhara bhūḥ sa-bhūdharā yathā vanāt niḥsarataḥ datā dhṛtā matam-gajendrasya sa-patra padminī
trayī-mayam rūpam idam ca saukaram bhū-maṇḍalena atha datā dhṛtena te cakāsti śṛṅga-ūḍha ghanena bhūyasā kula-acala-indrasya yathā eva vibhramaḥ
saṁsthāpaya enām jagatām sa-tasthuṣām lokāya patnīm asi mātaram pitā vidhema ca asyai namasā saha tvayā yasyām sva-tejaḥ agnim iva araṇau adhāḥ
kaḥ śraddadhīta anyatamaḥ tava prabho rasām gatāyāḥ bhuvaḥ udvibarhaṇam na vismayaḥ asau tvayi viśva vismaye yaḥ māyayā idam sasṛje ativismayam
vidhunvatā veda-mayam nijam vapuḥ janaḥ tapaḥ satya nivāsinaḥ vayam saṭā śikha-uddhūta śiva ambu bindubhiḥ vimṛjyamānāḥ bhṛśam īśa pāvitāḥ
saḥ vai bata bhraṣṭa-matiḥ tava eṣate yaḥ karmaṇām pāram apāra-karmaṇaḥ yat yoga māyā guṇa yoga mohitam viśvam samastam bhagavan vidhehi śam
maitreyaḥ uvāca iti upasthīyamānaḥ asau munibhiḥ brahma-vādibhiḥ salile sva-khura-ākrānte upādhatta avitā avanim
saḥ ittham bhagavān urvīm viṣvaksenaḥ prajā-patiḥ rasāyāḥ līlayā unnītām apsu nyasya yayau hariḥ
yaḥ evam etām hari-medhasaḥ hareḥ kathām su-bhadrām kathanīya māyinaḥ śṛṇvīta bhaktyā śravayeta vā uśatīm janārdanaḥ asya āśu hṛdi prasīdati
tasmin prasanne sakala-āśiṣām prabhau kim durlabham tābhiḥ alam lava-ātmabhiḥ ananya-dṛṣṭyā bhajatām guhā-āśayaḥ svayam vidhatte sva-gatim paraḥ parām
kaḥ nāma loke puruṣa-artha sāra-vit purā-kathānām bhagavat kathā-sudhām āpīya karṇa-añjalibhiḥ bhava-apahām aho virajyeta vinā nara-itaram
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca niśamya kauṣāraviṇā upavarṇitām hareḥ kathām kāraṇa sūkara-ātmanaḥ punaḥ saḥ papraccha tam udyata-añjaliḥ na ca ati-tṛptaḥ viduraḥ dhṛta-vrataḥ
viduraḥ uvāca tena eva tu muni-śreṣṭha hariṇā yajña-mūrtinā ādi daityaḥ hiraṇyākṣaḥ hataḥ iti anuśuśruma
tasya ca uddharataḥ kṣauṇīm sva-daṁṣṭra-agreṇa līlayā daitya-rājasya ca brahman kasmāt hetoḥ abhūt mṛdhaḥ
śraddadhānāya bhaktāya brūhi tat janma vistaram ṛṣe na tṛpyati manaḥ param kautūhalam hi me
maitreyaḥ uvāca sādhu vīra tvayā pṛṣṭam avatāra-kathām hareḥ yat tvam pṛcchasi martyānām mṛtyu-pāśa viśātanīm
yayā uttānapadaḥ putraḥ muninā gītayā arbhakaḥ mṛtyoḥ kṛtvā eva mūrdhni aṅghrim āruroha hareḥ padam
atha atra api itihāsaḥ ayam śrutaḥ me varṇitaḥ purā brahmaṇā deva-devena devānām anupṛcchatām
ditiḥ dākṣāyaṇī kṣattaḥ mārīcam kaśyapam patim apatya-kāmā cakame sandhyāyām hṛt-śaya arditā
iṣṭvā agni jihvam payasā puruṣam yajuṣām patim nimlocati arke āsīnam agni-agāre samāhitam
ditiḥ uvāca eṣaḥ mām tvat-kṛte vidvan kāmaḥ ātta-śarāsanaḥ dunoti dīnām vikramya rambhām iva matam-gajaḥ
tat bhavān dahyamānāyām sa-patnīnām samṛddhibhiḥ prajā-vatīnām bhadram te mayi āyuṅktām anugraham
bhartari āpta-urumānānām lokān āviśate yaśaḥ patiḥ bhavat-vidhaḥ yāsām prajayā nanu jāyate
purā pitā naḥ bhagavān dakṣaḥ duhitṛ-vatsalaḥ kam vṛṇīta varam vatsāḥ iti apṛcchata naḥ pṛthak
saḥ viditvā ātma-jānām naḥ bhāvam santāna bhāvanaḥ trayodaśa adadāt tāsām yāḥ te śīlam anuvratāḥ
atha me kuru kalyāṇam kāmam kamala-locana ārta upasarpaṇam bhūman amogham hi mahīyasi
iti tām vīra mārīcaḥ kṛpaṇām bahu-bhāṣiṇīm pratyāha anunayan vācā pravṛddha anaṅga kaśmalām
eṣaḥ te aham vidhāsyāmi priyam bhīru yat icchasi tasyāḥ kāmam na kaḥ kuryāt siddhiḥ traivargikī yataḥ
sarva āśramān upādāya sva āśrameṇa kalatra-vān vyasana-arṇavam atyeti jala-yānaiḥ yathā arṇavam
yām āhuḥ ātmanaḥ hi ardham śreyaḥ kāmasya mānini yasyām sva-dhuram adhyasya pumān carati vijvaraḥ
yām āśritya indriya arātīn durjayān itara āśramaiḥ vayam jayema helābhiḥ dasyūn durga-patiḥ yathā
na vayam prabhavaḥ tām tvām anukartum gṛha-īśvari api āyuṣā vā kārtsnyena ye ca anye guṇa-gṛdhnavaḥ
atha api kāmam etam te prajātyai karavāṇi alam yathā mām na atirocanti muhūrtam pratipālaya
eṣā ghora-tamā velā ghorāṇām ghora-darśanā caranti yasyām bhūtāni bhūta-īśa anucarāṇi ha
etasyām sādhvi sandhyāyām bhagavān bhūta-bhāvanaḥ parītaḥ bhūta-parṣadbhiḥ vṛṣeṇa aṭati bhūta-rāṭ
śmaśāna cakra-anila dhūli dhūmra vikīrṇa-vidyota jaṭā-kalāpaḥ bhasma avaguṇṭha amala rukma dehaḥ devaḥ tribhiḥ paśyati devaraḥ te
na yasya loke sva-janaḥ paraḥ vā na ati ādṛtaḥ na uta kaścit vigarhyaḥ vayam vrataiḥ yat caraṇa apaviddhām āśāsmahe ajām bata bhukta-bhogām
yasya anavadya ācaritam manīṣiṇaḥ gṛṇanti avidyā paṭalam bibhitsavaḥ nirasta sāmya atiśayaḥ api yat svayam piśāca caryām acarat gatiḥ satām
hasanti yasya ācaritam hi durbhagāḥ sva-ātman ratasya aviduṣaḥ samīhitam yaiḥ vastra mālya ābharaṇa anu lepanaiḥ śva-bhojanam sva-ātmatayā upalālitam
brahma-ādayaḥ yat kṛta setu pālāḥ yat kāraṇam viśvam idam ca māyā ājñā-karī yasya piśāca caryā aho vibhūmnaḥ caritam viḍambanam
maitreyaḥ uvāca sā evam saṁvidite bhartrā manmatha unmathita indriyā jagrāha vāsaḥ brahma-ṛṣeḥ vṛṣalī iva gata-trapā
saḥ viditvā atha bhāryāyāḥ tam nirbandham vikarmaṇi natvā diṣṭāya rahasi tayā atha upaviveśa hi
atha upaspṛśya salilam prāṇān āyamya vāk-yataḥ dhyāyan jajāpa virajam brahma jyotiḥ sanātanam
ditiḥ tu vrīḍitā tena karma avadyena bhārata upasaṅgamya vipra-ṛṣim adhaḥ-mukhī abhyabhāṣata
ditiḥ uvāca na me garbham imam brahman bhūtānām ṛṣabhaḥ avadhīt rudraḥ patiḥ hi bhūtānām yasya akaravam aṁhasam
namaḥ rudrāya mahate devāya ugrāya mīḍhuṣe śivāya nyasta-daṇḍāya dhṛta-daṇḍāya manyave
saḥ naḥ prasīdatām bhāmaḥ bhagavān uru anugrahaḥ vyādhasya api anukampyānām strīṇām devaḥ satī-patiḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca sva-sargasya āśiṣam lokyām āśāsānām pravepatīm nivṛtta sandhyā-niyamaḥ bhāryām āha prajāpatiḥ
kaśyapaḥ uvāca aprāyatyāt ātmanaḥ te doṣāt mauhūrtikāt uta mat nideśa aticāreṇa devānām ca atihelanāt
bhaviṣyataḥ tava abhadrau abhadre jāṭhara-adhamau lokān sa-pālān trīn caṇḍi muhuḥ ākran-dayiṣyataḥ
prāṇinām hanyamānānām dīnānām akṛta-āgasām strīṇām nigṛhyamāṇānām kopiteṣu mahātmasu
tadā viśva-īśvaraḥ kruddhaḥ bhagavān loka-bhāvanaḥ haniṣyati avatīrya asau yathā adrīn śata-parva-dhṛk
ditiḥ uvāca vadham bhagavatā sākṣāt sunābha udāra bāhunā āśāse putrayoḥ mahyam mā kruddhāt brāhmaṇāt prabho
na brahma-daṇḍa dagdhasya na bhūta-bhaya-dasya ca nārakāḥ ca anugṛhṇanti yām yām yonim asau gataḥ
kaśyapaḥ uvāca kṛta-śoka anutāpena sadyaḥ pratyavamarśanāt bhagavati uru mānāt ca bhave mayi api ca ādarāt putrasya eva ca putrāṇām bhavitā ekaḥ satām mataḥ gāsyanti yat yaśaḥ śuddham bhagavat yaśasā samam
yogaiḥ hema iva durvarṇam bhāvayiṣyanti sādhavaḥ nirvaira-ādibhiḥ ātmānam yat śīlam anuvartitum
yat prasādāt idam viśvam prasīdati yat ātmakam saḥ sva-dṛk bhagavān yasya toṣyate ananyayā dṛśā
saḥ vai mahā-bhāgavataḥ mahā-ātmā mahā-anubhāvaḥ mahatām mahiṣṭhaḥ pravṛddha bhaktyā hi anubhāvita āśaye niveśya vaikuṇṭham imam vihāsyati
alampaṭaḥ śīla-dharaḥ guṇa-ākaraḥ hṛṣṭaḥ para-ṛddhyā vyathitaḥ duḥkhiteṣu abhūta-śatruḥ jagataḥ śoka-hartā naidāghikam tāpam iva uḍu-rājaḥ
antaḥ bahiḥ ca amalam abja-netram sva-pūruṣa icchā-anugṛhīta-rūpam pautraḥ tava śrī-lalanā lalāmam draṣṭā sphurat-kuṇḍala maṇḍita ānanam
maitreyaḥ uvāca śrutvā bhāgavatam pautram amodata ditiḥ bhṛśam putrayoḥ ca vadham kṛṣṇāt viditvā āsīt mahā-manāḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca prājāpatyam tu tat tejaḥ para-tejaḥ hanam ditiḥ dadhāra varṣāṇi śatam śaṅkamānā sura-ardanāt
loke tena āhata āloke loka-pālāḥ hata-ojasaḥ nyavedayan viśva-sṛje dhvānta-vyatikaram diśām
devāḥ ūcuḥ tamaḥ etat vibho vettha saṁvignāḥ yat vayam bhṛśam na hi avyaktam bhagavataḥ kālena aspṛṣṭa vartmanaḥ
deva-deva jagat-dhātaḥ lokanātha-śikhāmaṇe pareṣām apareṣām tvam bhūtānām asi bhāva-vit
namaḥ vijñāna-vīryāya māyayā idam upeyuṣe gṛhīta guṇa-bhedāya namaḥ te avyakta yonaye
ye tvā ananyena bhāvena bhāvayanti ātma-bhāvanam ātmani prota bhuvanam param sat asat ātmakam
teṣām su-pakva-yogānām jita śvāsa indriya ātmanām labdha yuṣmat prasādānām na kutaścit parābhavaḥ
yasya vācā prajāḥ sarvāḥ gāvaḥ tantyā iva yantritāḥ haranti balim āyattāḥ tasmai mukhyāya te namaḥ
saḥ tvam vidhatsva śam bhūman tamasā lupta karmaṇām adabhra dayayā dṛṣṭyā āpannān arhasi īkṣitum
eṣaḥ deva diteḥ garbhaḥ ojaḥ kāśyapam arpitam diśaḥ timirayan sarvāḥ vardhate agniḥ iva edhasi
maitreyaḥ uvāca saḥ prahasya mahā-bāho bhagavān śabda-gocaraḥ pratyācaṣṭa ātma-bhūḥ devān prīṇan rucirayā girā
brahmā uvāca mānasāḥ me sutāḥ yuṣmat pūrva-jāḥ sanaka-ādayaḥ ceruḥ vihāyasā lokān lokeṣu vigata-spṛhāḥ
te ekadā bhagavataḥ vaikuṇṭhasya amala-ātmanaḥ yayuḥ vaikuṇṭha-nilayam sarva-loka namaskṛtam
vasanti yatra puruṣāḥ sarve vaikuṇṭha-mūrtayaḥ ye animitta nimittena dharmeṇa ārādhayan harim
yatra ca ādyaḥ pumān āste bhagavān śabda-gocaraḥ sattvam viṣṭabhya virajam svānām naḥ mṛḍayan vṛṣaḥ
yatra naiḥśreyasam nāma vanam kāma-dughaiḥ drumaiḥ sarva ṛtu śrībhiḥ vibhrājat kaivalyam iva mūrtimat
vaimānikāḥ sa-lalanāḥ caritāni śaśvat gāyanti yatra śamala kṣapaṇāni bhartuḥ antaḥ-jale anuvikasat madhu mādhavīnām gandhena khaṇḍita dhiyaḥ api anilam kṣipantaḥ
pārāvata anyabhṛta sārasa cakravāka dātyūha haṁsa śuka tittiri barhiṇām yaḥ kolāhalaḥ viramate acira-mātram uccaiḥ bhṛṅga-adhipe hari-kathām iva gāyamāne
mandāra kunda kuraba utpala campaka arṇa punnāga nāga bakula ambuja pārijātāḥ gandhe arcite tulasikā ābharaṇena tasyāḥ yasmin tapaḥ su-manasaḥ bahu mānayanti
yat saṅkulam hari-pada ānati mātra dṛṣṭaiḥ vaidūrya mārakata hema mayaiḥ vimānaiḥ yeṣām bṛhat kaṭi-taṭāḥ smita śobhi mukhyaḥ kṛṣṇa ātmanām na rajaḥ ādadhuḥ utsmaya-ādyaiḥ
śrī rūpiṇī kvaṇayatī caraṇa-aravindam līlā-ambujena hari-sadmani mukta-doṣā saṁlakṣyate sphaṭika kuḍye upeta hemni sammārjatī iva yat-anugrahaṇe anya yatnaḥ
vāpīṣu vidruma taṭāsu amala amṛta apsu preṣyā-anvitā nija-vane tulasībhiḥ īśam abhyarcatī su-alakam unnasam īkṣya vaktram uccheṣitam bhagavatā iti amata aṅga yat-śrīḥ
yat na vrajanti agha-bhidaḥ racanā anuvādāt śṛṇvanti ye anya viṣayāḥ ku-kathāḥ mati-ghnīḥ yāḥ tu śrutāḥ hata-bhagaiḥ nṛbhiḥ ātta sārāḥ tān tān kṣipanti aśaraṇeṣu tamaḥsu hanta
ye abhyarthitām api ca naḥ nṛ-gatim prapannāḥ jñānam ca tattva-viṣayam saha-dharmam yatra na ārādhanam bhagavataḥ vitaranti amuṣya sammohitāḥ vitatayā bata māyayā te
yat ca vrajanti animiṣām ṛṣabha anuvṛttyā dūre yamāḥ hi upari naḥ spṛhaṇīya śīlāḥ bhartuḥ mithaḥ suyaśasaḥ kathana anurāga vaiklavya bāṣpa-kalayā pulakī-kṛta aṅgāḥ
tat viśva-guru adhikṛtam bhuvana eka vandyam divyam vicitra vibudha-agrya vimāna śociḥ āpuḥ parām mudam apūrvam upetya yoga-māyā balena munayaḥ tat atho vikuṇṭham
tasmin atītya munayaḥ ṣaṭ asajja mānāḥ kakṣāḥ samāna vayasau atha saptamāyām devau acakṣata gṛhīta gadau para-ardhya keyūra kuṇḍala kirīṭa viṭaṅka veṣau
matta dvi-repha vana-mālikayā nivītau vinyastayā asita catuṣṭaya bāhu madhye vaktram bhruvā kuṭilayā sphuṭa nirgamābhyām rakta īkṣaṇena ca manāk rabhasam dadhānau
dvāri etayoḥ niviviśuḥ miṣatoḥ apṛṣṭvā pūrvāḥ yathā puraṭa vajra kapāṭikāḥ yāḥ sarvatra te aviṣa-mayā munayaḥ sva-dṛṣṭyā ye sañcaranti avihatāḥ vigata abhiśaṅkāḥ
tān vīkṣya vāta-raśanān caturaḥ kumārān vṛddhān daśa-ardha vayasaḥ vidita ātma-tattvān vetreṇa ca askhalayatām a-tat-arhaṇān tau tejaḥ vihasya bhagavat-pratikūla-śīlau
tābhyām miṣatsu animiṣeṣu niṣidhyamānāḥ su-arhattamāḥ hi api hareḥ pratihāra-pābhyām ūcuḥ suhṛt-tama didṛkṣita bhaṅge īṣat kāma-anujena sahasā te upapluta akṣāḥ
munayaḥ ūcuḥ kaḥ vām iha etya bhagavat paricaryayā uccaiḥ tat-dharmiṇām nivasatām viṣamaḥ svabhāvaḥ tasmin praśānta-puruṣe gata-vigrahe vām kaḥ vā ātma-vat kuhakayoḥ pariśaṅkanīyaḥ
na hi antaram bhagavati iha samasta-kukṣau ātmānam ātmani nabhaḥ nabhasi iva dhīrāḥ paśyanti yatra yuvayoḥ sura-liṅginoḥ kim vyutpāditam hi udara-bhedi bhayam yataḥ asya
tat vām amuṣya paramasya vikuṇṭha-bhartuḥ kartum prakṛṣṭam iha dhīmahi manda-dhībhyām lokān itaḥ vrajatam antara-bhāva dṛṣṭyā pāpīyasaḥ trayaḥ ime ripavaḥ asya yatra
teṣām iti īritam ubhau avadhārya ghoram tam brahma-daṇḍam anivāraṇam astra-pūgaiḥ sadyaḥ hareḥ anucarau uru bibhyataḥ tat-pāda-grahau apatatām ati-kātareṇa
bhūyāt aghoni bhagavadbhiḥ akāri daṇḍaḥ yaḥ nau hareta sura-helanam api aśeṣam mā vaḥ anutāpa kalayā bhagavat smṛti-ghnaḥ mohaḥ bhavet iha tu nau vrajatoḥ adhaḥ adhaḥ
evam tadā eva bhagavān aravinda-nābhaḥ svānām vibudhya sat atikramam ārya hṛdyaḥ tasmin yayau paramahaṁsa mahā-munīnām anveṣaṇīya caraṇau calayan saha-śrīḥ
tam tu āgatam pratihṛta aupayikam sva-pumbhiḥ te acakṣata akṣa-viṣayam sva-samādhi-bhāgyam haṁsa-śriyoḥ vyajanayoḥ śiva-vāyu lolat śubhra-ātapatra śaśi kesara śīkara ambum
kṛtsna-prasāda su-mukham spṛhaṇīya dhāma sneha avaloka kalayā hṛdi saṁspṛśantam śyāme pṛthau urasi śobhitayā śriyā svaḥ cūḍā-maṇim subhagayantam iva ātma dhiṣṇyam
pīta-aṁśuke pṛthu-nitambini visphurantyā kāñcyā alibhiḥ virutayā vana-mālayā ca valgu prakoṣṭha valayam vinatā-suta aṁse vinyasta hastam itareṇa dhunānam abjam
vidyut kṣipat makara kuṇḍala maṇḍana arha gaṇḍa-sthala unnasa mukham maṇi-mat kirīṭam doḥ-daṇḍa ṣaṇḍa vivare haratā para-ardhya hāreṇa kandhara-gatena ca kaustubhena
atra upasṛṣṭam iti ca utsmitam indirāyāḥ svānām dhiyā viracitam bahu-sauṣṭhava-āḍhyam mahyam bhavasya bhavatām ca bhajantam aṅgam nemuḥ nirīkṣya na vitṛpta dṛśaḥ mudā kaiḥ
tasya aravinda-nayanasya pada-aravinda kiñjalka miśra tulasī makaranda vāyuḥ antaḥ-gataḥ sva-vivareṇa cakāra teṣām saṅkṣobham akṣara-juṣām api citta-tanvoḥ
te vai amuṣya vadana asita padma kośam udvīkṣya sundara-tara adhara kunda hāsam labdha āśiṣaḥ punaḥ avekṣya tadīyam aṅghri-dvandvam nakha aruṇa maṇi śrayaṇam nidadhyuḥ
puṁsām gatim mṛgayatām iha yoga-mārgaiḥ dhyāna-āspadam bahu matam nayana abhirāmam pauṁsnam vapuḥ darśayānam ananya siddhaiḥ autpattikaiḥ samagṛṇan yutam aṣṭa-bhogaiḥ
kumārāḥ ūcuḥ yaḥ antarhitaḥ hṛdi gataḥ api durātmanām tvam saḥ adya eva naḥ nayana-mūlam ananta rāddhaḥ yarhi eva karṇa-vivareṇa guhām gataḥ naḥ pitrā anuvarṇita rahāḥ bhavat-udbhavena
tam tvām vidāma bhagavan param ātma-tattvam sattvena samprati ratim racayantam eṣām yat te anutāpa viditaiḥ dṛḍha bhakti-yogaiḥ udgranthayaḥ hṛdi viduḥ munayaḥ virāgāḥ
na ātyantikam vigaṇayanti api te prasādam kim u anyat arpita bhayam bhruvaḥ unnayaiḥ te ye aṅga tvat aṅghri śaraṇāḥ bhavataḥ kathāyāḥ kīrtanya tīrtha yaśasaḥ kuśalāḥ rasa-jñāḥ
kāmam bhavaḥ sva-vṛjinaiḥ nirayeṣu naḥ stāt cetaḥ ali-vat yadi nu te padayoḥ rameta vācaḥ ca naḥ tulasi-vat yadi te aṅghri śobhāḥ pūryeta te guṇa-gaṇaiḥ yadi karṇa-randhraḥ
prāduścakartha yat idam puruhūta rūpam tena īśa nirvṛtim avāpuḥ alam dṛśaḥ naḥ tasmai idam bhagavate namaḥ it vidhema yaḥ anātmanām durudayaḥ bhagavān pratītaḥ
brahmā uvāca iti tat gṛṇatām teṣām munīnām yoga-dharmiṇām pratinandya jagāda idam vikuṇṭha-nilayaḥ vibhuḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca etau tau pārṣadau mahyam jayaḥ vijayaḥ eva ca kadarthī-kṛtya mām yat vaḥ bahu akrātām atikramam
yaḥ tu etayoḥ dhṛtaḥ daṇḍaḥ bhavadbhiḥ mām anuvrataiḥ saḥ eva anumataḥ asmābhiḥ munayaḥ deva helanāt
tat vaḥ prasādayāmi adya brahma daivam param hi me tat hi iti ātma-kṛtam manye yat sva-pumbhiḥ asat-kṛtāḥ
yat nāmāni ca gṛhṇāti lokaḥ bhṛtye kṛta-āgasi saḥ asādhu-vādaḥ tat kīrtim hanti tvacam iva āmayaḥ
yasya amṛta amala yaśaḥ śravaṇa avagāhaḥ sadyaḥ punāti jagat āśva-pacāt vikuṇṭhaḥ saḥ aham bhavadbhyaḥ upalabdha su-tīrtha kīrtiḥ chindyām sva-bāhum api vaḥ pratikūla-vṛttim
yat sevayā caraṇa padma pavitra reṇum sadyaḥ kṣata akhila malam pratilabdha śīlam na śrīḥ viraktam api mām vijahāti yasyāḥ prekṣā-lava-arthaḥ itare niyamān vahanti
na aham tathā admi yajamāna haviḥ vitāne ścyotat ghṛta plutam adan huta-bhuk mukhena yat brāhmaṇasya mukhataḥ carataḥ anughāsam tuṣṭasya mayi avahitaiḥ nija karma pākaiḥ
yeṣām bibharmi aham akhaṇḍa vikuṇṭha yoga-māyā vibhūtiḥ amala aṅghri rajaḥ kirīṭaiḥ viprān tu kaḥ na viṣaheta yat arhaṇa-ambhaḥ sadyaḥ punāti saha candra-lalāma lokān
ye me tanūḥ dvija-varān duhatīḥ madīyāḥ bhūtāni alabdha-śaraṇāni ca bheda-buddhyā drakṣyanti agha kṣata dṛśaḥ hi ahi manyavaḥ tān gṛdhrāḥ ruṣā mama kuṣanti adhidaṇḍa-netuḥ
ye brāhmaṇān mayi dhiyā kṣipataḥ arcayantaḥ tuṣyat hṛdaḥ smita sudhā ukṣita padma vaktrāḥ vāṇyā anurāga-kalayā ātmaja-vat gṛṇantaḥ sambodhayanti aham iva aham upāhṛtaḥ taiḥ
tat me sva-bhartuḥ avasāyam alakṣamāṇau yuṣmat vyatikrama gatim pratipadya sadyaḥ bhūyaḥ mama antikam itām tat anugrahaḥ me yat kalpatām acirataḥ bhṛtayoḥ vivāsaḥ
brahmā uvāca atha tasya uśatīm devīm ṛṣi-kulyām sarasvatīm na āsvādya manyu daṣṭānām teṣām ātmā api atṛpyata
satīm vyādāya śṛṇvantaḥ laghvīm guru artha gahvarām vigāhya agādha gambhīrām na viduḥ tat cikīrṣitam
te yoga-māyayā ārabdha pārameṣṭhya mahā-udayam procuḥ prāñjalayaḥ viprāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ kṣubhita-tvacaḥ
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ na vayam bhagavan vidmaḥ tava deva cikīrṣitam kṛtaḥ me anugrahaḥ ca iti yat adhyakṣaḥ prabhāṣase
brahmaṇyasya param daivam brāhmaṇāḥ kila te prabho viprāṇām deva-devānām bhagavān ātma daivatam
tvattaḥ sanātanaḥ dharmaḥ rakṣyate tanubhiḥ tava dharmasya paramaḥ guhyaḥ nirvikāraḥ bhavān mataḥ
taranti hi añjasā mṛtyum nivṛttāḥ yat anugrahāt yoginaḥ saḥ bhavān kim svit anugṛhyeta yat paraiḥ
yam vai vibhūtiḥ upayāti anuvelam anyaiḥ artha arthibhiḥ sva-śirasā dhṛta pāda reṇuḥ dhanya arpita aṅghri tulasī nava dāma dhāmnaḥ lokam madhu-vrata-pateḥ iva kāma-yānā
yaḥ tām vivikta caritaiḥ anuvartamānām na atyādriyat parama bhāgavata prasaṅgaḥ saḥ tvam dvija anupatha puṇya rajaḥ punītaḥ śrīvatsa lakṣma kim agāḥ bhaga bhājanaḥ tvam
dharmasya te bhagavataḥ tri-yuga tribhiḥ svaiḥ padbhiḥ cara-acaram idam dvija devatā artham nūnam bhṛtam tat abhighāti rajaḥ tamaḥ ca sattvena naḥ vara-dayā tanuvā nirasya
na tvam dvija uttama-kulam yadi ha ātma-gopam goptā vṛṣaḥ su-arhaṇena sa-sūnṛtena tarhi eva naṅkṣyati śivaḥ tava deva panthāḥ lokaḥ agrahīṣyat ṛṣabhasya hi tat pramāṇam
tat te anabhīṣṭam iva sattva-nidheḥ vidhitsoḥ kṣemam janāya nija-śaktibhiḥ uddhṛta areḥ na etāvatā tri-adhipateḥ bata viśva-bhartuḥ tejaḥ kṣatam tu avanatasya saḥ te vinodaḥ
yam vā anayoḥ damam adhīśa bhavān vidhatte vṛttim nu vā tat anumanmahi nirvyalīkam asmāsu vā yaḥ ucitaḥ dhriyatām saḥ daṇḍaḥ ye anāgasau vayam ayuṅkṣmahi kilbiṣeṇa
śrī-bhagavān uvāca etau sura-itara gatim pratipadya sadyaḥ saṁrambha sambhṛta samādhi anubaddha yogau bhūyaḥ sakāśam upayāsyataḥ āśu yaḥ vaḥ śāpaḥ mayā eva nimitaḥ tat aveta viprāḥ
brahmā uvāca atha te munayaḥ dṛṣṭvā nayana ānanda bhājanam vaikuṇṭham tat adhiṣṭhānam vikuṇṭham ca svayam-prabham
bhagavantam parikramya praṇipatya anumānya ca pratijagmuḥ pramuditāḥ śaṁsantaḥ vaiṣṇavīm śriyam
bhagavān anugau āha yātam mā bhaiṣṭam astu śam brahma tejaḥ samarthaḥ api hantum na icche matam tu me
etat purā eva nirdiṣṭam ramayā kruddhayā yadā purā apavāritā dvāri viśantī mayi upārate
mayi saṁrambha-yogena nistīrya brahma-helanam pratyeṣyatam nikāśam me kālena alpīyasā punaḥ
dvāḥ-sthau ādiśya bhagavān vimāna-śreṇi-bhūṣaṇam sarva-atiśayayā lakṣmyā juṣṭam svam dhiṣṇyam āviśat
tau tu gīrvāṇa-ṛṣabhau dustarāt hari-lokataḥ hata-śriyau brahma-śāpāt abhūtām vigata-smayau
tadā vikuṇṭha dhiṣaṇāt tayoḥ nipatamānayoḥ hāhā-kāraḥ mahān āsīt vimāna-agryeṣu putrakāḥ
tau eva hi adhunā prāptau pārṣada-pravarau hareḥ diteḥ jaṭhara nirviṣṭam kāśyapam tejaḥ ulbaṇam
tayoḥ asurayoḥ adya tejasā yamayoḥ hi vaḥ ākṣiptam tejaḥ etarhi bhagavān tat vidhitsati
viśvasya yaḥ sthiti laya udbhava hetuḥ ādyaḥ yoga-īśvaraiḥ api duratyaya yoga-māyaḥ kṣemam vidhāsyati saḥ naḥ bhagavān tri-adhīśaḥ tatra asmadīya vimṛśena kiyān iha arthaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca niśamya ātma-bhuvā gītam kāraṇam śaṅkayā ujjhitāḥ tataḥ sarve nyavartanta tri-divāya diva-okasaḥ
ditiḥ tu bhartuḥ ādeśāt apatya pariśaṅkinī pūrṇe varṣa-śate sādhvī putrau prasuṣuve yamau
utpātāḥ bahavaḥ tatra nipetuḥ jāyamānayoḥ divi bhuvi antarikṣe ca lokasya uru bhaya-āvahāḥ
saha acalāḥ bhuvaḥ celuḥ diśaḥ sarvāḥ prajajvaluḥ sa ulkāḥ ca aśanayaḥ petuḥ ketavaḥ ca ārti-hetavaḥ
vavau vāyuḥ su-duḥsparśaḥ phūt-kārān īrayan muhuḥ unmūlayan naga-patīn vātyā anīkaḥ rajaḥ dhvajaḥ
uddhasat taḍit ambhoda ghaṭayā naṣṭa bhā-gaṇe vyomni praviṣṭa tamasā na sma vyādṛśyate padam
cukrośa vimanāḥ vārdhiḥ udūrmiḥ kṣubhita udaraḥ sa-udapānāḥ ca saritaḥ cukṣubhuḥ śuṣka paṅkajāḥ
muhuḥ paridhayaḥ abhūvan sa-rāhvoḥ śaśi sūryayoḥ nirghātāḥ ratha-nirhrādāḥ vivarebhyaḥ prajajñire
antaḥ grāmeṣu mukhataḥ vamantyaḥ vahnim ulbaṇam sṛgāla ulūka ṭaṅkāraiḥ praṇeduḥ aśivam śivāḥ
saṅgīta-vat rodana-vat unnamayya śirodharām vyamuñcan vividhāḥ vācaḥ grāma-siṁhāḥ tataḥ tataḥ
kharāḥ ca karkaśaiḥ kṣattaḥ khuraiḥ ghnantaḥ dharā-talam khāḥ-kāra rabhasāḥ mattāḥ paryadhāvan varūthaśaḥ
rudantaḥ rāsabha trastāḥ nīḍāt udapatan khagāḥ ghoṣe araṇye ca paśavaḥ śakṛt mūtram akurvata
gāvaḥ atrasan asṛk dohāḥ toyadāḥ pūya varṣiṇaḥ vyarudan deva-liṅgāni drumāḥ petuḥ vinā anilam
grahān puṇya-tamān anye bha-gaṇān ca api dīpitāḥ aticeruḥ vakra-gatyā yuyudhuḥ ca paraḥ-param
dṛṣṭvā anyān ca mahā utpātān a-tat-tattva-vidaḥ prajāḥ brahma-putrān ṛte bhītāḥ menire viśva-samplavam
tau ādi-daityau sahasā vyajyamāna ātma pauruṣau vavṛdhāte aśma-sāreṇa kāyena adri-patī iva
divi-spṛśau hema kirīṭa koṭibhiḥ niruddha kāṣṭhau sphurat aṅgadā bhujau gām kampayantau caraṇaiḥ pade pade kaṭyā su-kāñcyā arkam atītya tasthatuḥ
prajāpatiḥ nāma tayoḥ akārṣīt yaḥ prāk sva-dehāt yamayoḥ ajāyata tam vai hiraṇyakaśipum viduḥ prajāḥ yam tam hiraṇyākṣam asūta sā agrataḥ
cakre hiraṇyakaśipuḥ dorbhyām brahma-vareṇa ca vaśe sa-pālān lokān trīn akutaḥ-mṛtyuḥ uddhataḥ
hiraṇyākṣaḥ anujaḥ tasya priyaḥ prīti-kṛt anu-aham gadā-pāṇiḥ divam yātaḥ yuyutsuḥ mṛgayan raṇam
tam vīkṣya duḥsaha javam raṇat kāñcana nūpuram vaijayantyā srajā juṣṭam aṁsa nyasta mahā-gadam
manaḥ-vīrya vara utsiktam asṛṇyam akutaḥ-bhayam bhītāḥ nililyire devāḥ tārkṣya trastāḥ iva ahayaḥ
saḥ vai tirohitān dṛṣṭvā mahasā svena daitya-rāṭ sa-indrān deva-gaṇān kṣībān apaśyan vyanadat bhṛśam
tataḥ nivṛttaḥ krīḍiṣyan gambhīram bhīma-nisvanam vijagāhe mahā-sattvaḥ vārdhim mattaḥ iva dvipaḥ
tasmin praviṣṭe varuṇasya sainikāḥ yādaḥ-gaṇāḥ sanna-dhiyaḥ sa-sādhvasāḥ ahanyamānāḥ api tasya varcasā pradharṣitāḥ dūra-taram pradudruvuḥ
saḥ varṣa-pūgān udadhau mahā-balaḥ caran mahā-ūrmīn śvasana īritān muhuḥ maurvyā abhijaghne gadayā vibhāvarīm āsedivān tāta purīm pracetasaḥ
tatra upalabhya asura-loka pālakam yādaḥ-gaṇānām ṛṣabham pracetasam smayan pralabdhum praṇipatya nīca-vat jagāda me dehi adhirāja saṁyugam
tvam loka-pālaḥ adhipatiḥ bṛhat-śravāḥ vīrya apahaḥ durmada vīra-māninām vijitya loke akhila daitya dānavān yat rāja-sūyena purā ayajat prabho
saḥ evam utsikta madena vidviṣā dṛḍham pralabdhaḥ bhagavān apām patiḥ roṣam samuttham śamayan svayā dhiyā vyavocat aṅga upaśamam gatāḥ vayam
paśyāmi na anyam puruṣāt purātanāt yaḥ saṁyuge tvām raṇa-mārga kovidam ārādhayiṣyati asura-ṛṣabha ihi tam manasvinaḥ yam gṛṇate bhavādṛśāḥ
tam vīram ārāt abhipadya vismayaḥ śayiṣyase vīraśaye śvabhiḥ vṛtaḥ yaḥ tvat-vidhānām asatām praśāntaye rūpāṇi dhatte sat anugraha icchayā
maitreyaḥ uvāca tat evam ākarṇya jala-īśa bhāṣitam mahā-manāḥ tat vigaṇayya durmadaḥ hareḥ viditvā gatim aṅga nāradāt rasātalam nirviviśe tvarā-anvitaḥ
dadarśa tatra abhijitam dharā dharam pronnīyamāna avanim agra-daṁṣṭrayā muṣṇantam akṣṇā sva-rucaḥ aruṇa śriyā jahāsa ca aho vana-gocaraḥ mṛgaḥ
āha enam ehi ajña mahīm vimuñca naḥ rasā-okasām viśva-sṛjā iyam arpitā na svasti yāsyasi anayā mama īkṣataḥ sura-adhama āsādita sūkara-ākṛte
tvam naḥ sapatnaiḥ abhavāya kim bhṛtaḥ yaḥ māyayā hanti asurān parokṣa-jit tvām yoga-māyā-balam alpa-pauruṣam saṁsthāpya mūḍha pramṛje suhṛt-śucaḥ
tvayi saṁsthite gadayā śīrṇa śīrṣaṇi asmat-bhuja cyutayā ye ca tubhyam balim haranti ṛṣayaḥ ye ca devāḥ svayam sarve na bhaviṣyanti amūlāḥ
saḥ tudyamānaḥ ari durukta tomaraiḥ daṁṣṭra-agra gām gām upalakṣya bhītām todam mṛṣan niragāt ambu-madhyāt grāha āhataḥ sa-kareṇuḥ yathā ibhaḥ
tam niḥsarantam salilāt anudrutaḥ hiraṇya-keśaḥ dviradam yathā jhaṣaḥ karāla-daṁṣṭraḥ aśani-nisvanaḥ abravīt gata-hriyām kim tu asatām vigarhitam
saḥ gām udastāt salilasya gocare vinyasya tasyām adadhāt sva sattvam abhiṣṭutaḥ viśva-sṛjā prasūnaiḥ āpūryamāṇaḥ vibudhaiḥ paśyataḥ areḥ
parā anuṣaktam tapanīya-upakalpam mahā-gadam kāñcana citra daṁśam marmāṇi abhīkṣṇam pratudantam duruktaiḥ pracaṇḍa manyuḥ prahasan tam babhāṣe
śrī-bhagavān uvāca satyam vayam bhoḥ vana-gocarāḥ mṛgāḥ yuṣmat-vidhān mṛgaye grāma-siṁhān na mṛtyu-pāśaiḥ pratimuktasya vīrāḥ vikatthanam tava gṛhṇanti abhadra
ete vayam nyāsa harāḥ rasā-okasām gata-hriyaḥ gadayā drāvitāḥ te tiṣṭhāmahe atha api kathañcit ājau stheyam kva yāmaḥ balinā utpādya vairam
tvam pad-rathānām kila yūthapa adhipaḥ ghaṭasva naḥ asvastaye āśu anūhaḥ saṁsthāpya ca asmān pramṛja aśru svakānām yaḥ svām pratijñām na atipiparti asabhyaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca saḥ adhikṣiptaḥ bhagavatā pralabdhaḥ ca ruṣā bhṛśam ājahāra ulbaṇam krodham krīḍyamānaḥ ahi-rāṭ iva
sṛjan amarṣitaḥ śvāsān manyu pracalita indriyaḥ āsādya tarasā daityaḥ gadayā nyahanat harim
bhagavān tu gadā-vegam visṛṣṭam ripuṇā urasi avañcayat tiraścīnaḥ yoga-ārūḍhaḥ iva antakam
punaḥ gadām svām ādāya bhrāmayantam abhīkṣṇaśaḥ abhyadhāvat hariḥ kruddhaḥ saṁrambhāt daṣṭa dacchadam
tataḥ ca gadayā arātim dakṣiṇasyām bhruvi prabhuḥ ājaghne saḥ tu tām saumya gadayā kovidaḥ ahanat
evam gadābhyām gurvībhyām haryakṣaḥ hariḥ eva ca jigīṣayā susaṁrabdhau anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥ
tayoḥ spṛdhoḥ tigma gadā āhata aṅgayoḥ kṣata-āsrava ghrāṇa vivṛddha manyvoḥ vicitra mārgān caratoḥ jigīṣayā vyabhāt ilāyām iva śuṣmiṇoḥ mṛdhaḥ
daityasya yajña-avayavasya māyā gṛhīta vārāha tanoḥ mahā-ātmanaḥ kauravya mahyām dviṣatoḥ vimardanam didṛkṣuḥ āgāt ṛṣibhiḥ vṛtaḥ svarāṭ
āsanna śauṇḍīram apeta sādhvasam kṛta pratīkāram ahārya vikramam vilakṣya daityam bhagavān sahasra-nīḥ jagāda nārāyaṇam ādi sūkaram
brahmā uvāca eṣaḥ te deva devānām aṅghri-mūlam upeyuṣām viprāṇām saurabheyīṇām bhūtānām api anāgasām āgaḥ-kṛt bhaya-kṛt duṣkṛt asmat rāddha-varaḥ asuraḥ anveṣan apratirathaḥ lokān aṭati kaṇṭakaḥ
mā enam māyā-vinam dṛptam niraṅkuśam asat-tamam ākrīḍa bāla-vat deva yathā āśīviṣam utthitam
na yāvat eṣaḥ vardheta svām velām prāpya dāruṇaḥ svām deva māyām āsthāya tāvat jahi agham acyuta
eṣā ghora-tamā sandhyā loka chambaṭ-karī prabho upasarpati sarva-ātman surāṇām jayam āvaha
adhunā eṣaḥ abhijit nāma yogaḥ mauhūrtikaḥ hi agāt śivāya naḥ tvam suhṛdām āśu nistara dustaram
diṣṭyā tvām vihitam mṛtyum ayam āsāditaḥ svayam vikramya enam mṛdhe hatvā lokān ādhehi śarmaṇi
maitreyaḥ uvāca avadhārya viriñcasya nirvyalīka amṛtam vacaḥ prahasya prema-garbheṇa tat apāṅgena saḥ agrahīt
tataḥ sapatnam mukhataḥ carantam akutaḥ-bhayam jaghāna utpatya gadayā hanau asuram akṣa-jaḥ
sā hatā tena gadayā vihatā bhagavat karāt vighūrṇitā apatat reje tat adbhutam iva abhavat
saḥ tadā labdha-tīrthaḥ api na babādhe nirāyudham mānayan saḥ mṛdhe dharmam viṣvaksenam prakopayan
gadāyām apaviddhāyām hāhā-kāre vinirgate mānayām āsa tat dharmam sunābham ca asmarat vibhuḥ
tam vyagra cakram diti-putra adhamena sva-pārṣada mukhyena viṣajjamānam citrāḥ vācaḥ a-tat-vidām khe-carāṇām tatra sma āsan svasti te amum jahi iti
saḥ tam niśāmya ātta-rathāṅgam agrataḥ vyavasthitam padma palāśa locanam vilokya ca amarṣa paripluta indriyaḥ ruṣā sva-danta-chadam ādaśat śvasan
karāla daṁṣṭraḥ cakṣurbhyām sañcakṣāṇaḥ dahan iva abhiplutya sva-gadayā hataḥ asi iti āhanat harim
padā savyena tām sādho bhagavān yajña-sūkaraḥ līlayā miṣataḥ śatroḥ prāharat vāta-raṁhasam
āha ca āyudham ādhatsva ghaṭasva tvam jigīṣasi iti uktaḥ saḥ tadā bhūyaḥ tāḍayan vyanadat bhṛśam
tām saḥ āpatatīm vīkṣya bhagavān samavasthitaḥ jagrāha līlayā prāptām garutmān iva pannagīm
sva-pauruṣe pratihate hata mānaḥ mahā-asuraḥ na aicchat gadām dīyamānām hariṇā vigata-prabhaḥ
jagrāha tri-śikham śūlam jvalat jvalana lolupam yajñāya dhṛta-rūpāya viprāya abhicaran yathā
tat ojasā daitya mahā-bhaṭa arpitam cakāsat antaḥ-khe udīrṇa dīdhiti cakreṇa ciccheda niśāta neminā hariḥ yathā tārkṣya patatram ujjhitam
vṛkṇe sva-śūle bahudhā ariṇā hareḥ pratyetya vistīrṇam uraḥ vibhūti-mat pravṛddha roṣaḥ saḥ kaṭhora muṣṭinā nadan prahṛtya antaradhīyata asuraḥ
tena ittham āhataḥ kṣattaḥ bhagavān ādi-sūkaraḥ na akampata manāk kva api srajā hataḥ iva dvipaḥ
atha urudhā asṛjat māyām yoga-māyā-īśvare harau yām vilokya prajāḥ trastāḥ menire asya upasaṁyamam
pravavuḥ vāyavaḥ caṇḍāḥ tamaḥ pāṁsavam airayan digbhyaḥ nipetuḥ grāvāṇaḥ kṣepaṇaiḥ prahitāḥ iva
dyauḥ naṣṭa bha-gaṇa abhra oghaiḥ sa vidyut stanayitnubhiḥ varṣadbhiḥ pūya keśa asṛk viṭ mūtra asthīni ca asakṛt
girayaḥ pratyadṛśyanta nānā āyudha mucaḥ anagha dik-vāsasaḥ yātudhānyaḥ śūlinyaḥ mukta mūrdhajāḥ
bahubhiḥ yakṣa-rakṣobhiḥ patti aśva ratha kuñjaraiḥ ātatāyibhiḥ utsṛṣṭāḥ hiṁsrāḥ vācaḥ ati-vaiśasāḥ
prāduṣkṛtānām māyānām āsurīṇām vināśayat sudarśana-astram bhagavān prāyuṅkta dayitam tri-pāt
tadā diteḥ samabhavat sahasā hṛdi vepathuḥ smarantyāḥ bhartuḥ ādeśam stanāt ca asṛk prasusruve
vinaṣṭāsu sva-māyāsu bhūyaḥ ca āvrajya keśavam ruṣā upagūhamānaḥ amum dadṛśe avasthitam bahiḥ
tam muṣṭibhiḥ vinighnantam vajra-sāraiḥ adhokṣajaḥ kareṇa karṇa-mūle ahan yathā tvāṣṭram marut-patiḥ
saḥ āhataḥ viśva-jitā hi avajñayā paribhramat gātraḥ udasta locanaḥ viśīrṇa bāhu aṅghri śiraḥ-ruhaḥ apatat yathā naga-indraḥ lulitaḥ nabhasvatā
kṣitau śayānam tam akuṇṭha varcasam karāla daṁṣṭram paridaṣṭa dat-chadam aja-ādayaḥ vīkṣya śaśaṁsuḥ āgatāḥ aho imam kaḥ nu labheta saṁsthitim
yam yoginaḥ yoga-samādhinā rahaḥ dhyāyanti liṅgāt asataḥ mumukṣayā tasya eṣaḥ daitya ṛṣabhaḥ padā āhataḥ mukham prapaśyan tanum utsasarja ha
etau tau pārṣadau asya śāpāt yātau asat-gatim punaḥ katipayaiḥ sthānam prapatsyete ha janmabhiḥ
devāḥ ūcuḥ namaḥ namaḥ te akhila-yajña-tantave sthitau gṛhīta amala sattva mūrtaye diṣṭyā hataḥ ayam jagatām aruntudaḥ tvat-pāda bhaktyā vayam īśa nirvṛtāḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca evam hiraṇyākṣam asahya-vikramam saḥ sādayitvā hariḥ ādi-sūkaraḥ jagāma lokam svam akhaṇḍita utsavam samīḍitaḥ puṣkara-viṣṭara ādibhiḥ
mayā yathā anūktam avādi te hareḥ kṛta-avatārasya sumitra ceṣṭitam yathā hiraṇyākṣaḥ udāra vikramaḥ mahā-mṛdhe krīḍana-vat nirākṛtaḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca iti kauṣārava ākhyātām āśrutya bhagavat-kathām kṣattā ānandam param lebhe mahā-bhāgavataḥ dvija
anyeṣām puṇya-ślokānām uddāma-yaśasām satām upaśrutya bhavet modaḥ śrīvatsa-aṅkasya kim punaḥ
yaḥ gaja-indram jhaṣa grastam dhyāyantam caraṇa ambujam krośantīnām kareṇūnām kṛcchrataḥ amocayat drutam
tam sukha ārādhyam ṛjubhiḥ ananya śaraṇaiḥ nṛbhiḥ kṛta-jñaḥ kaḥ na seveta durārādhyam asādhubhiḥ
yaḥ vai hiraṇyākṣa-vadham mahā-adbhutam vikrīḍitam kāraṇa sūkara ātmanaḥ śṛṇoti gāyati anumodate añjasā vimucyate brahma-vadhāt api dvijāḥ
etat mahā-puṇyam alam pavitram dhanyam yaśasyam padam āyuḥ āśiṣām prāṇa indriyāṇām yudhi śaurya vardhanam nārāyaṇaḥ ante gatiḥ aṅga śṛṇvatām
śaunakaḥ uvāca mahīm pratiṣṭhām adhyasya saute svāyambhuvaḥ manuḥ kāni anvatiṣṭhat dvārāṇi mārgāya avara janmanām
kṣattā mahā-bhāgavataḥ kṛṣṇasya ekāntikaḥ suhṛt yaḥ tatyāja agra-jam kṛṣṇe sa-apatyam agha-vān iti
dvaipāyanāt anavaraḥ mahitve tasya deha-jaḥ sarva-ātmanā śritaḥ kṛṣṇam tat-parān ca api anuvrataḥ
kim anvapṛcchat maitreyam virajāḥ tīrtha-sevayā upagamya kuśāvarte āsīnam tattva-vit-tamam
tayoḥ saṁvadatoḥ sūta pravṛttāḥ hi amalāḥ kathāḥ āpaḥ gāṅgāḥ iva agha-ghnīḥ hareḥ pāda-ambuja āśrayāḥ
tāḥ naḥ kīrtaya bhadram te kīrtanya udāra karmaṇaḥ rasa-jñaḥ kaḥ nu tṛpyeta hari-līlā-amṛtam piban
evam ugraśravāḥ pṛṣṭaḥ ṛṣibhiḥ naimiṣa-ayanaiḥ bhagavati arpita adhyātmaḥ tān āha śrūyatām iti
sūtaḥ uvāca hareḥ dhṛta kroḍa tanoḥ sva-māyayā niśamya goḥ uddharaṇam rasātalāt līlām hiraṇyākṣam avajñayā hatam sañjāta-harṣaḥ munim āha bhārataḥ
viduraḥ uvāca prajāpati-patiḥ sṛṣṭvā prajā-sarge prajāpatīn kim ārabhata me brahman prabrūhi avyakta-mārga-vit
ye marīci-ādayaḥ viprāḥ yaḥ tu svāyambhuvaḥ manuḥ te vai brahmaṇaḥ ādeśāt katham etat abhāvayan
sa-dvitīyāḥ kim asṛjan sva-tantrāḥ uta karmasu āho svit saṁhatāḥ sarve idam sma samakalpayan
maitreyaḥ uvāca daivena durvitarkyeṇa pareṇa animiṣeṇa ca jāta-kṣobhāt bhagavataḥ mahān āsīt guṇa-trayāt
rajaḥ-pradhānāt mahataḥ tri-liṅgaḥ daiva-coditāt jātaḥ sasarja bhūta-ādiḥ viyat ādīni pañcaśaḥ
tāni ca eka-ekaśaḥ sraṣṭum asamarthāni bhautikam saṁhatya daiva-yogena haimam aṇḍam avāsṛjan
saḥ aśayiṣṭa abdhi-salile āṇḍa-kośaḥ nirātmakaḥ sāgram vai varṣa-sāhasram anvavātsīt tam īśvaraḥ
tasya nābheḥ abhūt padmam sahasra-arka uru dīdhiti sarva jīva-nikāya okaḥ yatra svayam abhūt sva-rāṭ
saḥ anuviṣṭaḥ bhagavatā yaḥ śete salila-āśaye loka-saṁsthām yathā pūrvam nirmame saṁsthayā svayā
sasarja chāyayā avidyām pañca-parvāṇam agrataḥ tāmisram andha-tāmisram tamaḥ mohaḥ mahā-tamaḥ
visasarja ātmanaḥ kāyam na abhinandan tamaḥ-mayam jagṛhuḥ yakṣa-rakṣāṁsi rātrim kṣut tṛṭ samudbhavām
kṣut-tṛḍbhyām upasṛṣṭāḥ te tam jagdhum abhidudruvuḥ mā rakṣata enam jakṣadhvam iti ūcuḥ kṣut-tṛṭ-arditāḥ
devaḥ tān āha saṁvignaḥ mā mām jakṣata rakṣata aho me yakṣa-rakṣāṁsi prajāḥ yūyam babhūvitha
devatāḥ prabhayā yāḥ yāḥ dīvyan pramukhataḥ asṛjat te ahārṣuḥ devayantaḥ visṛṣṭām tām prabhām ahaḥ
devaḥ adevān jaghanataḥ sṛjati sma ati-lolupān te enam lolupatayā maithunāya abhipedire
tataḥ hasan saḥ bhagavān asuraiḥ nirapatrapaiḥ anvīyamānaḥ tarasā kruddhaḥ bhītaḥ parāpatat
saḥ upavrajya vara-dam prapanna ārti haram harim anugrahāya bhaktānām anurūpa ātma-darśanam
pāhi mām parama-ātman te preṣaṇena asṛjam prajāḥ tāḥ imāḥ yabhitum pāpāḥ upākrāmanti mām prabho
tvam ekaḥ kila lokānām kliṣṭānām kleśa nāśanaḥ tvam ekaḥ kleśa-daḥ teṣām anāsanna padām tava
saḥ avadhārya asya kārpaṇyam vivikta adhyātma darśanaḥ vimuñca ātma-tanum ghorām iti uktaḥ vimumoca ha
tām kvaṇat caraṇa-ambhojām mada vihvala locanām kāñcī-kalāpa vilasat dukūla channa rodhasam
anyonya śleṣayā uttuṅga nirantara payaḥ-dharām su-nāsām su-dvijām snigdha hāsa līlā-avalokanām
gūhantīm vrīḍayā ātmānam nīla alaka varūthinīm upalabhya asurāḥ dharma sarve sammumuhuḥ striyam
aho rūpam aho dhairyam aho asyāḥ navam vayaḥ madhye kāmayamānānām akāmā iva visarpati
vitarkayantaḥ bahudhā tām sandhyām pramadā ākṛtim abhisambhāvya viśrambhāt paryapṛcchan ku-medhasaḥ
kā asi kasya asi rambhoru kaḥ vā arthaḥ te atra bhāmini rūpa draviṇa paṇyena durbhagān naḥ vibādhase
yā vā kācit tvam abale diṣṭyā sandarśanam tava utsunoṣi īkṣamāṇānām kanduka krīḍayā manaḥ
na ekatra te jayati śālini pāda-padmam ghnantyāḥ muhuḥ kara-talena patat pataṅgam madhyam viṣīdati bṛhat stana bhāra bhītam śāntā iva dṛṣṭiḥ amalā su śikhā samūhaḥ
iti sāyantanīm sandhyām asurāḥ pramadāyatīm pralobhayantīm jagṛhuḥ matvā mūḍha-dhiyaḥ striyam
prahasya bhāva-gambhīram jighrantyā ātmānam ātmanā kāntyā sasarja bhagavān gandharva apsarasām gaṇān
visasarja tanum tām vai jyotsnām kānti-matīm priyām te eva ca ādaduḥ prītyā viśvāvasu-puraḥ-gamāḥ
sṛṣṭvā bhūta piśācān ca bhagavān ātma tandriṇā dik-vāsasaḥ mukta keśān vīkṣya ca amīlayat dṛśau
jagṛhuḥ tat-visṛṣṭām tām jṛmbhaṇa-ākhyām tanum prabhoḥ nidrām indriya-vikledaḥ yayā bhūteṣu dṛśyate yena ucchiṣṭān dharṣayanti tam unmādam pracakṣate
ūrjaḥ-vantam manyamānaḥ ātmānam bhagavān ajaḥ sādhyān gaṇān pitṛ-gaṇān parokṣeṇa asṛjat prabhuḥ
te ātma-sargam tam kāyam pitaraḥ pratipedire sādhyebhyaḥ ca pitṛbhyaḥ ca kavayaḥ yat vitanvate
siddhān vidyādharān ca eva tirodhānena saḥ asṛjat tebhyaḥ adadāt tam ātmānam antardhāna-ākhyam adbhutam
saḥ kinnarān kimpuruṣān pratyātmyena asṛjat prabhuḥ mānayan ātmanā ātmānam ātma-ābhāsam vilokayan
te tu tat jagṛhuḥ rūpam tyaktam yat parameṣṭhinā mithunī-bhūya gāyantaḥ tam eva uṣasi karmabhiḥ
dehena vai bhogavatā śayānaḥ bahu cintayā sarge anupacite krodhāt utsasarja ha tat vapuḥ
ye ahīyanta amutaḥ keśāḥ ahayaḥ te aṅga jajñire sarpāḥ prasarpataḥ krūrāḥ nāgāḥ bhoga uru kandharāḥ
saḥ ātmānam manyamānaḥ kṛta-kṛtyam iva ātmabhūḥ tadā manūn sasarja ante manasā loka bhāvanān
tebhyaḥ saḥ asṛjat svīyam puram puruṣam ātma-vān tān dṛṣṭvā ye purā sṛṣṭāḥ praśaśaṁsuḥ prajāpatim
aho etat jagat-sraṣṭaḥ sukṛtam bata te kṛtam pratiṣṭhitāḥ kriyāḥ yasmin sākam annam adāma he
tapasā vidyayā yuktaḥ yogena su-samādhinā ṛṣīn ṛṣiḥ hṛṣīkeśaḥ sasarja abhimatāḥ prajāḥ
tebhyaḥ ca ekaikaśaḥ svasya dehasya aṁśam adāt ajaḥ yat tat samādhi yoga ṛddhi tapaḥ vidyā virakti mat
viduraḥ uvāca svāyambhuvasya ca manoḥ vaṁśaḥ parama sammataḥ kathyatām bhagavan yatra maithunena edhire prajāḥ
priyavrata uttānapādau sutau svāyambhuvasya vai yathā dharmam jugupatuḥ sapta-dvīpa-vatīm mahīm
tasya vai duhitā brahman devahūti iti viśrutā patnī prajāpateḥ uktā kardamasya tvayā anagha
tasyām saḥ vai mahā-yogī yuktāyām yoga-lakṣaṇaiḥ sasarja katidhā vīryam tat me śuśrūṣave vada
ruciḥ yaḥ bhagavān brahman dakṣaḥ vā brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ yathā sasarja bhūtāni labdhvā bhāryām ca mānavīm
maitreyaḥ uvāca prajāḥ sṛja iti bhagavān kardamaḥ brahmaṇā uditaḥ sarasvatyām tapaḥ tepe sahasrāṇām samāḥ daśa
tataḥ samādhi-yuktena kriyā-yogena kardamaḥ samprapede harim bhaktyā prapanna varadāśuṣam
tāvat prasannaḥ bhagavān puṣkara-akṣaḥ kṛte yuge darśayām āsa tam kṣattaḥ śābdam brahma dadhat vapuḥ
saḥ tam virajam arka-ābham sita padma utpala srajam snigdha nīla alaka vrāta vaktra abjam virajaḥ ambaram
kirīṭinam kuṇḍalinam śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam śveta utpala krīḍanakam manaḥ sparśa smita īkṣaṇam
vinyasta caraṇa-ambhojam aṁsa-deśe garutmataḥ dṛṣṭvā khe avasthitam vakṣaḥ śriyam kaustubha kandharam
jāta-harṣaḥ apatat mūrdhnā kṣitau labdha manaḥ-rathaḥ gīrbhiḥ tu abhyagṛṇāt prīti-svabhāva-ātmā kṛta-añjaliḥ
ṛṣiḥ uvāca juṣṭam bata adya akhila sattva rāśeḥ sāṁsiddhyam akṣṇoḥ tava darśanāt naḥ yat darśanam janmabhiḥ īḍya sadbhiḥ āśāsate yoginaḥ rūḍha-yogāḥ
ye māyayā te hata medhasaḥ tvat pāda-aravindam bhava sindhu potam upāsate kāma-lavāya teṣām rāsi īśa kāmān niraye api ye syuḥ
tathā saḥ ca aham parivoḍhu-kāmaḥ samāna-śīlām gṛha-medha dhenum upeyivān mūlam aśeṣa mūlam durāśayaḥ kāma-dugha aṅghripasya
prajāpateḥ te vacasā adhīśa tantyā lokaḥ kila ayam kāma-hataḥ anubaddhaḥ aham ca loka-anugataḥ vahāmi balim ca śukla animiṣāya tubhyam
lokān ca loka-anugatān paśūn ca hitvā śritāḥ te caraṇa ātapatram parasparam tvat guṇa vāda sīdhu pīyūṣa niryāpita deha-dharmāḥ
na te ajara akṣa bhramiḥ āyuḥ eṣām trayodaśa aram tri-śatam ṣaṣṭi parva ṣaṭ nemi ananta chadi yat tri nābhi karāla-srotaḥ jagat ācchidya dhāvat
ekaḥ svayam san jagataḥ sisṛkṣayā advitīyayā ātman adhi yoga-māyayā sṛjasi adaḥ pāsi punaḥ grasiṣyase yathā ūrṇa-nābhiḥ bhagavan sva-śaktibhiḥ
na etat bata adhīśa padam tava īpsitam yat māyayā naḥ tanuṣe bhūta-sūkṣmam anugrahāya astu api yarhi māyayā lasat tulasyā bhagavān vilakṣitaḥ
tam tvā anubhūtyā uparata kriyā artham sva-māyayā vartita loka-tantram namāmi abhīkṣṇam namanīya pāda-sarojam alpīyasi kāma varṣam
ṛṣiḥ uvāca iti avyalīkam praṇutaḥ abja-nābhaḥ tam ābabhāṣe vacasā amṛtena suparṇa pakṣa upari rocamānaḥ prema smita udvīkṣaṇa vibhramat bhrūḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca viditvā tava caityam me purā eva samayoji tat yat-artham ātma niyamaiḥ tvayā eva aham samarcitaḥ
na vai jātu mṛṣā eva syāt prajā adhyakṣa mat-arhaṇam bhavat-vidheṣu atitarām mayi saṅgṛbhita ātmanām
prajāpati-sutaḥ samrāṭ manuḥ vikhyāta maṅgalaḥ brahmāvartam yaḥ adhivasan śāsti sapta arṇavām mahīm
saḥ ca iha vipra rāja-ṛṣiḥ mahiṣyā śatarūpayā āyāsyati didṛkṣuḥ tvām paraśvaḥ dharma kovidaḥ
ātma-jām asita apāṅgīm vayaḥ śīla guṇa anvitām mṛgayantīm patim dāsyati anurūpāya te prabho
samāhitam te hṛdayam yatra imān parivatsarān sā tvām brahman nṛpa-vadhūḥ kāmam āśu bhajiṣyati
yā te ātma-bhṛtam vīryam nava-dhā prasaviṣyati vīrye tvadīye ṛṣayaḥ ādhāsyanti añjasā ātmanaḥ
tvam ca samyak anuṣṭhāya nideśam me uśattamaḥ mayi tīrthī-kṛta aśeṣa kriyā arthaḥ mām prapatsyase
kṛtvā dayām ca jīveṣu dattvā ca abhayam ātma-vān mayi ātmānam saha jagat drakṣyasi ātmani ca api mām
saha aham sva-aṁśa-kalayā tvat-vīryeṇa mahā-mune tava kṣetre devahūtyām praṇeṣye tattva saṁhitām
maitreyaḥ uvāca evam tam anubhāṣya atha bhagavān pratyak akṣa jaḥ jagāma bindu-sarasaḥ sarasvatyā pariśritāt
nirīkṣataḥ tasya yayau aśeṣa siddha-īśvara abhiṣṭuta siddha-mārgaḥ ākarṇayan patra-ratha-indra pakṣaiḥ uccāritam stomam udīrṇa-sāma
atha samprasthite śukle kardamaḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ āste sma bindu-sarasi tam kālam pratipālayan
manuḥ syandanam āsthāya śātakaumbha paricchadam āropya svām duhitaram sa-bhāryaḥ paryaṭan mahīm
tasmin su-dhanvan ahani bhagavān yat samādiśat upāyāt āśrama-padam muneḥ śānta vratasya tat
yasmin bhagavataḥ netrāt nyapatan aśru-bindavaḥ kṛpayā samparītasya prapanne arpitayā bhṛśam tat vai bindu-saraḥ nāma sarasvatyā pariplutam puṇyam śiva amṛta jalam mahā-ṛṣi gaṇa sevitam
puṇya druma latā jālaiḥ kūjat puṇya mṛga dvijaiḥ sarva ṛtu phala puṣpa āḍhyam vana-rāji śriyā anvitam
matta dvija gaṇaiḥ ghuṣṭam matta bhramara vibhramam matta barhi naṭa āṭopam āhvayat matta kokilam
kadamba campaka aśoka karañja bakula āsanaiḥ kunda mandāra kuṭajaiḥ cūta-potaiḥ alaṅkṛtam kāraṇḍavaiḥ plavaiḥ haṁsaiḥ kuraraiḥ jala-kukkuṭaiḥ sārasaiḥ cakravākaiḥ ca cakoraiḥ valgu kūjitam
tathā eva hariṇaiḥ kroḍaiḥ śvāvit gavaya kuñjaraiḥ gopucchaiḥ haribhiḥ markaiḥ nakulaiḥ nābhibhiḥ vṛtam
praviśya tat tīrtha-varam ādi-rājaḥ saha-ātmajaḥ dadarśa munim āsīnam tasmin huta huta-aśanam vidyotamānam vapuṣā tapasi ugra yujā ciram na atikṣāmam bhagavataḥ snigdha apāṅga avalokanāt tat vyāhṛta amṛta-kalā pīyūṣa śravaṇena ca prāṁśum padma palāśa akṣam jaṭilam cīra-vāsasam upasaṁśritya malinam yathā arhaṇam asaṁskṛtam
atha uṭajam upāyātam nṛdevam praṇatam puraḥ saparyayā paryagṛhṇāt pratinandya anurūpayā
gṛhīta arhaṇam āsīnam saṁyatam prīṇayan muniḥ smaran bhagavat ādeśam iti āha ślakṣṇayā girā
nūnam caṅkramaṇam deva satām saṁrakṣaṇāya te vadhāya ca asatām yaḥ tvam hareḥ śaktiḥ hi pālinī
yaḥ arka indu agni indra vāyūnām yama dharma pracetasām rūpāṇi sthāne ādhatse tasmai śuklāya te namaḥ
na yadā ratham āsthāya jaitram maṇi gaṇa arpitam visphūrjat caṇḍa kodaṇḍaḥ rathena trāsayan aghān sva-sainya caraṇa kṣuṇṇam vepayan maṇḍalam bhuvaḥ vikarṣan bṛhatīm senām paryaṭasi aṁśumān iva tadā eva setavaḥ sarve varṇa āśrama nibandhanāḥ bhagavat racitāḥ rājan bhidyeran bata dasyubhiḥ
adharmaḥ ca samedheta lolupaiḥ vyaṅkuśaiḥ nṛbhiḥ śayāne tvayi lokaḥ ayam dasyu grastaḥ vinaṅkṣyati
atha api pṛcche tvām vīra yat-artham tvam iha āgataḥ tat vayam nirvyalīkena pratipadyāmahe hṛdā
maitreyaḥ uvāca evam āviṣkṛta aśeṣa guṇa karma udayaḥ munim sa-vrīḍaḥ iva tam samrāṭ upāratam uvāca ha
manuḥ uvāca brahmā asṛjat sva-mukhataḥ yuṣmān ātma-parīpsayā chandaḥ-mayaḥ tapaḥ-vidyā-yoga-yuktān alampaṭān
tat-trāṇāya asṛjat ca asmān doḥ-sahasrāt sahasra-pāt hṛdayam tasya hi brahma kṣatram aṅgam pracakṣate
ataḥ hi anyonyam ātmānam brahma kṣatram ca rakṣataḥ rakṣati sma avyayaḥ devaḥ saḥ yaḥ sat-asat-ātmakaḥ
tava sandarśanāt eva chinnāḥ me sarva-saṁśayāḥ yat svayam bhagavān prītyā dharmam āha rirakṣiṣoḥ
diṣṭyā me bhagavān dṛṣṭaḥ durdarśaḥ yaḥ akṛta-ātmanām diṣṭyā pāda-rajaḥ spṛṣṭam śīrṣṇā me bhavataḥ śivam
diṣṭyā tvayā anuśiṣṭaḥ aham kṛtaḥ ca anugrahaḥ mahān apāvṛtaiḥ karṇa-randhraiḥ juṣṭāḥ diṣṭyā uśatīḥ giraḥ
saḥ bhavān duhitṛ-sneha parikliṣṭa-ātmanaḥ mama śrotum arhasi dīnasya śrāvitam kṛpayā mune
priyavrata-uttānapadoḥ svasā iyam duhitā mama anvicchati patim yuktam vayaḥ-śīla-guṇa-ādibhiḥ
yadā tu bhavataḥ śīla śruta rūpa vayaḥ guṇān aśṛṇot nāradāt eṣā tvayi āsīt kṛta-niścayā
tat pratīccha dvija-agrya imām śraddhayā upahṛtām mayā sarva-ātmanā anurūpām te gṛha-medhiṣu karmasu
udyatasya hi kāmasya prativādaḥ na śasyate api nirmukta saṅgasya kāma raktasya kim punaḥ
yaḥ udyatam anādṛtya kīnāśam abhiyācate kṣīyate tat yaśaḥ sphītam mānaḥ ca avajñayā hataḥ
aham tvā aśṛṇavam vidvan vivāha-artham samudyatam ataḥ tvam upakurvāṇaḥ prattām pratigṛhāṇa me
ṛṣiḥ uvāca bāḍham udvoḍhu-kāmaḥ aham aprattā ca tava ātma-jā āvayoḥ anurūpaḥ asau ādyaḥ vaivāhikaḥ vidhiḥ
kāmaḥ saḥ bhūyāt nara-deva te asyāḥ putryāḥ samāmnāya-vidhau pratītaḥ kaḥ eva te tanayām na ādriyeta svayā eva kāntyā kṣipatīm iva śriyam
yām harmya-pṛṣṭhe kvaṇat-aṅghri-śobhām vikrīḍatīm kanduka-vihvala-akṣīm viśvāvasuḥ nyapatat svāt vimānāt vilokya sammoha-vimūḍha-cetāḥ
tām prārthayantīm lalanā-lalāmam asevita-śrī-caraṇaiḥ adṛṣṭām vatsām manoḥ uccapadaḥ svasāram kaḥ na anumanyeta budhaḥ abhiyātām
ataḥ bhajiṣye samayena sādhvīm yāvat tejaḥ bibhṛyāt ātmanaḥ me ataḥ dharmān pāramahaṁsya-mukhyān śukla-proktān bahu manye avihiṁsrān
yataḥ abhavat viśvam idam vicitram saṁsthāsyate yatra ca vā avatiṣṭhate prajā-patīnām patiḥ eṣaḥ mahyam param pramāṇam bhagavān anantaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca saḥ ugra-dhanvan iyat eva ābabhāṣe āsīt ca tūṣṇīm aravinda-nābham dhiyā upagṛhṇan smita-śobhitena mukhena cetaḥ lulubhe devahūtyāḥ
saḥ anu jñātvā vyavasitam mahiṣyāḥ duhituḥ sphuṭam tasmai guṇa-gaṇa-āḍhyāya dadau tulyām praharṣitaḥ
śatarūpā mahā-rājñī pāribarhān mahā-dhanān dam-patyoḥ paryadāt prītyā bhūṣā vāsaḥ paricchadān
prattām duhitaram samrāṭ sadṛkṣāya gata-vyathaḥ upaguhya ca bāhubhyām autkaṇṭhya-unmathita-āśayaḥ
aśaknuvan tat-viraham muñcan bāṣpa-kalām muhuḥ āsiñcat amba vatsa iti netra-udaiḥ duhituḥ śikhāḥ
āmantrya tam muni-varam anujñātaḥ saha-anugaḥ pratasthe ratham āruhya sa-bhāryaḥ sva-puram nṛpaḥ ubhayoḥ ṛṣi-kulyāyāḥ sarasvatyāḥ su-rodhasoḥ ṛṣīṇām upaśāntānām paśyan āśrama-sampadaḥ
tam āyāntam abhipretya brahmāvartāt prajāḥ patim gīta-saṁstuti-vāditraiḥ pratyudīyuḥ praharṣitāḥ
barhiṣmatī nāma purī sarva-sampat samanvitā nyapatan yatra romāṇi yajñasya aṅgam vidhunvataḥ kuśāḥ kāśāḥ te eva āsan śaśvat-harita varcasaḥ ṛṣayaḥ yaiḥ parābhāvya yajña-ghnān yajñam ījire
kuśa kāśa mayam barhiḥ āstīrya bhagavān manuḥ ayajat yajña-puruṣam labdhā sthānam yataḥ bhuvam
barhiṣmatīm nāma vibhuḥ yām nirviśya samāvasat tasyām praviṣṭaḥ bhavanam tāpa-traya vināśanam
sa-bhāryaḥ sa-prajaḥ kāmān bubhuje anya avirodhataḥ saṅgīyamāna sat-kīrtiḥ sa-strībhiḥ sura-gāyakaiḥ prati-ūṣeṣu anubaddhena hṛdā śṛṇvan hareḥ kathāḥ
niṣṇātam yoga-māyāsu munim svāyambhuvam manum yat ābhraṁśayitum bhogāḥ na śekuḥ bhagavat-param
ayāta-yāmāḥ tasya āsan yāmāḥ sva-antara yāpanāḥ śṛṇvataḥ dhyāyataḥ viṣṇoḥ kurvataḥ bruvataḥ kathāḥ
saḥ evam sva-antaram ninye yugānām eka-saptatim vāsudeva prasaṅgena paribhūta gati-trayaḥ
śārīrāḥ mānasāḥ divyāḥ vaiyāse ye ca mānuṣāḥ bhautikāḥ ca katham kleśāḥ bādhante hari-saṁśrayam
yaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ munibhiḥ prāha dharmān nānā-vidhān śubhān nṛṇām varṇa-āśramāṇām ca sarva-bhūta hitaḥ sadā
etat te ādi-rājasya manoḥ caritam adbhutam varṇitam varṇanīyasya tat-apatya udayam śṛṇu
maitreyaḥ uvāca pitṛbhyām prasthite sādhvī patim iṅgita-kovidā nityam paryacarat prītyā bhavānī iva bhavam prabhum
viśrambheṇa ātma-śaucena gauraveṇa damena ca śuśrūṣayā sauhṛdena vācā madhurayā ca bhoḥ
visṛjya kāmam dambham ca dveṣam lobham agham madam apramattā udyatā nityam tejīyāṁsam atoṣayat
saḥ vai deva-ṛṣi varyaḥ tām mānavīm samanuvratām daivāt garīyasaḥ patyuḥ āśāsānām mahā-āśiṣaḥ kālena bhūyasā kṣāmām karśitām vrata-caryayā prema gadgadayā vācā pīḍitaḥ kṛpayā abravīt
kardamaḥ uvāca tuṣṭaḥ aham adya tava mānavi māna-dāyāḥ śuśrūṣayā paramayā parayā ca bhaktyā yaḥ dehinām ayam atīva suhṛt saḥ dehaḥ na avekṣitaḥ samucitaḥ kṣapitum mat-arthe
ye me sva-dharma niratasya tapaḥ samādhi vidyā ātma-yoga vijitāḥ bhagavat-prasādāḥ tān eva te mat anusevanayā avaruddhān dṛṣṭim prapaśya vitarāmi abhayān aśokān
anye punaḥ bhagavataḥ bhruvaḥ udvijṛmbha vibhraṁśita artha-racanāḥ kim urukramasya siddhā asi bhuṅkṣva vibhavān nija-dharma dohān divyān naraiḥ duradhigān nṛpa-vikriyābhiḥ
evam bruvāṇam abalā akhila yoga-māyā vidyā-vicakṣaṇam avekṣya gata-ādhiḥ āsīt sampraśraya praṇaya vihvalayā girā īṣat vrīḍā avaloka vilasat hasita ānanā āha
devahūtiḥ uvāca rāddham bata dvija-vṛṣa etat amogha yoga-māyā adhipe tvayi vibho tat avaimi bhartaḥ yaḥ te abhyadhāyi samayaḥ sakṛt aṅga-saṅgaḥ bhūyāt garīyasi guṇaḥ prasavaḥ satīnām
tatra iti-kṛtyam upaśikṣa yathā upadeśam yena eṣaḥ me karśitaḥ atiriraṁ-sayā ātmā siddhyeta te kṛta manaḥ-bhava dharṣitāyāḥ dīnaḥ tat īśa bhavanam sadṛśam vicakṣva
maitreyaḥ uvāca priyāyāḥ priyam anvicchan kardamaḥ yogam āsthitaḥ vimānam kāma-gam kṣattaḥ tarhi eva āviracīkarat
sarva kāma dugham divyam sarva-ratna samanvitam sarva ṛddhi upacaya udarkam maṇi stambhaiḥ upaskṛtam
divya upakaraṇa upetam sarva-kāla sukha-āvaham paṭṭikābhiḥ patākābhiḥ vicitrābhiḥ alaṅkṛtam sragbhiḥ vicitra-mālyābhiḥ mañju śiñjat ṣaṭ-aṅghribhiḥ dukūla kṣauma kauśeyaiḥ nānā vastraiḥ virājitam
upari upari vinyasta nilayeṣu pṛthak pṛthak kṣiptaiḥ kaśipubhiḥ kāntam paryaṅka vyajana āsanaiḥ
tatra tatra vinikṣipta nānā śilpa upaśobhitam mahā-marakata sthalyā juṣṭam vidruma vedibhiḥ
dvāḥsu vidruma dehalyā bhātam vajra kapāṭa-vat śikhareṣu indra-nīleṣu hema-kumbhaiḥ adhiśritam
cakṣuḥ-mat padma-rāga agryaiḥ vajra bhittiṣu nirmitaiḥ juṣṭam vicitra vaitānaiḥ mahā-arhaiḥ hema-toraṇaiḥ
haṁsa pārāvata vrātaiḥ tatra tatra nikūjitam kṛtrimān manyamānaiḥ svān adhiruhya adhiruhya ca
vihāra-sthāna viśrāma saṁveśa prāṅgaṇa ajiraiḥ yathā-upajoṣam racitaiḥ vismāpanam iva ātmanaḥ
īdṛk gṛham tat paśyantīm na atiprītena cetasā sarva-bhūta āśaya-abhijñaḥ prāvocat kardamaḥ svayam
nimajjya asmin hrade bhīru vimānam idam āruha idam śukla-kṛtam tīrtham āśiṣām yāpakam nṛṇām
sā tat bhartuḥ samādāya vacaḥ kuvalaya-īkṣaṇā sa-rajam bibhratī vāsaḥ veṇī-bhūtān ca mūrdha-jān
aṅgam ca mala-paṅkena sañchannam śabala stanam āviveśa sarasvatyāḥ saraḥ śiva jala āśayam
sā antaḥ sarasi veśma-sthāḥ śatāni daśa kanyakāḥ sarvāḥ kiśora-vayasaḥ dadarśa utpala gandhayaḥ
tām dṛṣṭvā sahasā utthāya procuḥ prāñjalayaḥ striyaḥ vayam karma-karīḥ tubhyam śādhi naḥ karavāma kim
snānena tām mahā-arheṇa snāpayitvā manasvinīm dukūle nirmale nūtne daduḥ asyai ca māna-dāḥ
bhūṣaṇāni para-ardhyāni varīyāṁsi dyumanti ca annam sarva-guṇa upetam pānam ca eva amṛta āsavam
atha ādarśe svam ātmānam srak-viṇam viraja ambaram virajam kṛta-svasti-ayanam kanyābhiḥ bahu-mānitam
snātam kṛta-śiraḥ snānam sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam niṣka grīvam valayinam kūjat kāñcana nūpuram
śroṇyoḥ adhyastayā kāñcyā kāñcanyā bahu-ratnayā hāreṇa ca mahā-arheṇa rucakena ca bhūṣitam
su-datā su-bhruvā ślakṣṇa snigdha apāṅgena cakṣuṣā padma-kośa spṛdhā nīlaiḥ alakaiḥ ca lasat mukham
yadā sasmāra ṛṣabham ṛṣīṇām dayitam patim tatra ca āste saha strībhiḥ yatra āste saḥ prajāpatiḥ
bhartuḥ purastāt ātmānam strī-sahasra vṛtam tadā niśāmya tat yoga-gatim saṁśayam pratyapadyata
saḥ tām kṛta-mala-snānām vibhrājantīm apūrva-vat ātmanaḥ bibhratīm rūpam saṁvīta rucira stanīm vidyādharī sahasreṇa sevyamānām su-vāsasam jāta-bhāvaḥ vimānam tat ārohayat amitra-han
tasmin alupta mahimā priyayā anuraktaḥ vidyādharībhiḥ upacīrṇa vapuḥ vimāne babhrāja utkaca kumut-gaṇavān apīcyaḥ tārābhiḥ āvṛtaḥ iva uḍu-patiḥ nabhaḥ-sthaḥ
tena aṣṭa-loka-pa vihāra kula-acala-indra droṇīṣu anaṅga sakha māruta saubhagāsu siddhaiḥ nutaḥ dyu-dhuni pāta śiva-svanāsu reme ciram dhanada-vat lalanā varūthī
vaiśrambhake surasane nandane puṣpabhadrake mānase caitrarathye ca saḥ reme rāmayā rataḥ
bhrājiṣṇunā vimānena kāma-gena mahīyasā vaimānikān atyaśeta caran lokān yathā anilaḥ
kim durāpādanam teṣām puṁsām uddāma-cetasām yaiḥ āśritaḥ tīrtha-padaḥ caraṇaḥ vyasana-atyayaḥ
prekṣayitvā bhuvaḥ golam patnyai yāvān sva-saṁsthayā bahu-āścaryam mahā-yogī sva-āśramāya nyavartata
vibhajya nava-dhā ātmānam mānavīm surata utsukām rāmām niramayan reme varṣa-pūgān muhūrtavat
tasmin vimāne utkṛṣṭām śayyām rati-karīm śritā na ca abudhyata tam kālam patyā apīcyena saṅgatā
evam yoga-anubhāvena dam-patyoḥ ramamāṇayoḥ śatam vyatīyuḥ śaradaḥ kāma lālasayoḥ manāk
tasyām ādhatta retaḥ tām bhāvayan ātmanā ātma-vit nodhā vidhāya rūpam svam sarva-saṅkalpa-vit vibhuḥ
ataḥ sā suṣuve sadyaḥ devahūtiḥ striyaḥ prajāḥ sarvāḥ tāḥ cāru-sarva-aṅgyaḥ lohita utpala gandhayaḥ
patim sā pravrajiṣyantam tadā ālakṣya uśatī bahiḥ smayamānā viklavena hṛdayena vidūyatā
likhantī adhaḥ-mukhī bhūmim padā nakha maṇi śriyā uvāca lalitām vācam nirudhya aśru-kalām śanaiḥ
devahūtiḥ uvāca sarvam tat bhagavān mahyam upovāha pratiśrutam atha api me prapannāyai abhayam dātum arhasi
brahman duhitṛbhiḥ tubhyam vimṛgyāḥ patayaḥ samāḥ kaścit syāt me viśokāya tvayi pravrajite vanam
etāvatā alam kālena vyatikrāntena me prabho indriya-artha prasaṅgena parityakta para-ātmanaḥ
indriya-artheṣu sajjantyā prasaṅgaḥ tvayi me kṛtaḥ ajānantyā param bhāvam tathā api astu abhayāya me
saṅgaḥ yaḥ saṁsṛteḥ hetuḥ asatsu vihitaḥ adhiyā saḥ eva sādhuṣu kṛtaḥ niḥsaṅgatvāya kalpate
na iha yat karma dharmāya na virāgāya kalpate na tīrtha-pada sevāyai jīvan api mṛtaḥ hi saḥ
sā aham bhagavataḥ nūnam vañcitā māyayā dṛḍham yat tvām vimukti-dam prāpya na mumukṣeya bandhanāt
maitreyaḥ uvāca nirveda-vādinīm evam manoḥ duhitaram muniḥ dayāluḥ śālinīm āha śukla abhivyāhṛtam smaran
ṛṣiḥ uvāca mā khidaḥ rāja-putri ittham ātmānam prati anindite bhagavān te akṣaraḥ garbham adūrāt samprapatsyate
dhṛta-vratā asi bhadram te damena niyamena ca tapaḥ draviṇa dānaiḥ ca śraddhayā ca īśvaram bhaja
saḥ tvayā ārādhitaḥ śuklaḥ vitanvan māmakam yaśaḥ chettā te hṛdaya granthim audaryaḥ brahma bhāvanaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca devahūtī api sandeśam gauraveṇa prajāpateḥ samyak śraddhāya puruṣam kūṭa-stham abhajat gurum
tasyām bahu-tithe kāle bhagavān madhu-sūdanaḥ kārdamam vīryam āpannaḥ jajñe agniḥ iva dāruṇi
avādayan tadā vyomni vāditrāṇi ghanāghanāḥ gāyanti tam sma gandharvāḥ nṛtyanti apsarasaḥ mudā
petuḥ sumanasaḥ divyāḥ khe-caraiḥ apavarjitāḥ praseduḥ ca diśaḥ sarvāḥ ambhāṁsi ca manāṁsi ca
tat kardama āśrama-padam sarasvatyā pariśritam svayambhūḥ sākam ṛṣibhiḥ marīci ādibhiḥ abhyayāt
bhagavantam param brahma sattvena aṁśena śatru-han tattva-saṅkhyāna vijñaptyai jātam vidvān ajaḥ sva-rāṭ
sabhājayan viśuddhena cetasā tat cikīrṣitam prahṛṣyamāṇaiḥ asubhiḥ kardamam ca idam abhyadhāt
brahmā uvāca tvayā me apacitiḥ tāta kalpitā nirvyalīkataḥ yat me sañjagṛhe vākyam bhavān māna-da mānayan
etāvatī eva śuśrūṣā kāryā pitari putrakaiḥ bāḍham iti anumanyeta gauraveṇa guroḥ vacaḥ
imāḥ duhitaraḥ satyaḥ tava vatsa su-madhyamāḥ sargam etam prabhāvaiḥ svaiḥ bṛṁhayiṣyanti aneka-dhā
ataḥ tvam ṛṣi-mukhyebhyaḥ yathā-śīlam yathā-ruci ātma-jāḥ paridehi adya vistṛṇīhi yaśaḥ bhuvi
veda aham ādyam puruṣam avatīrṇam sva-māyayā bhūtānām śevadhim deham bibhrāṇam kapilam mune
jñāna vijñāna yogena karmaṇām uddharan jaṭāḥ hiraṇya-keśaḥ padma-akṣaḥ padma-mudrā pada-ambujaḥ
eṣaḥ mānavi te garbham praviṣṭaḥ kaiṭabha-ardanaḥ avidyā saṁśaya granthim chittvā gām vicariṣyati
ayam siddha-gaṇa adhīśaḥ sāṅkhya-ācāryaiḥ su-sammataḥ loke kapilaḥ iti ākhyām gantā te kīrti vardhanaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca tau āśvāsya jagat-sraṣṭā kumāraiḥ saha-nāradaḥ haṁsaḥ haṁsena yānena tri-dhāma-paramam yayau
gate śata-dhṛtau kṣattaḥ kardamaḥ tena coditaḥ yathā-uditam sva-duhitṝḥ prādāt viśva-sṛjām tataḥ
marīcaye kalām prādāt anasūyām atha atraye śraddhām aṅgirase ayacchat pulastyāya havirbhuvam pulahāya gatim yuktām kratave ca kriyām satīm khyātim ca bhṛgave ayacchat vasiṣṭhāya api arundhatīm
atharvaṇe adadāt śāntim yayā yajñaḥ vitanyate vipra-ṛṣabhān kṛta-udvāhān sa-dārān samalālayat
tataḥ te ṛṣayaḥ kṣattaḥ kṛta-dārāḥ nimantrya tam prātiṣṭhan nandim āpannāḥ svam svam āśrama-maṇḍalam
saḥ ca avatīrṇam tri-yugam ājñāya vibudha-ṛṣabham vivikte upasaṅgamya praṇamya samabhāṣata
aho pāpacyamānānām niraye svaiḥ amaṅgalaiḥ kālena bhūyasā nūnam prasīdanti iha devatāḥ
bahu janma vipakvena samyak yoga-samādhinā draṣṭum yatante yatayaḥ śūnya-agāreṣu yat padam
saḥ eva bhagavān adya helanam na gaṇayya naḥ gṛheṣu jātaḥ grāmyāṇām yaḥ svānām pakṣa-poṣaṇaḥ
svīyam vākyam ṛtam kartum avatīrṇaḥ asi me gṛhe cikīrṣuḥ bhagavān jñānam bhaktānām māna vardhanaḥ
tāni eva te abhirūpāṇi rūpāṇi bhagavan tava yāni yāni ca rocante sva-janānām arūpiṇaḥ
