tvām sūribhiḥ tattva bubhutsayā addhā sadā abhivāda arhaṇa pāda pīṭham aiśvarya vairāgya yaśaḥ avabodha vīrya śriyā pūrtam aham prapadye
param pradhānam puruṣam mahāntam kālam kavim tri-vṛtam loka-pālam ātma anubhūtya anugata prapañcam sva-chanda śaktim kapilam prapadye
ā sma abhipṛcche adya patim prajānām tvayā avatīrṇa-ṛṇaḥ uta āpta kāmaḥ parivrajat padavīm āsthitaḥ aham cariṣye tvām hṛdi yuñjan viśokaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca mayā proktam hi lokasya pramāṇam satya laukike atha ajani mayā tubhyam yat avocam ṛtam mune
etat me janma loke asmin mumukṣūṇām durāśayāt prasaṅkhyānāya tattvānām sammatāya ātma-darśane
eṣaḥ ātma-pathaḥ avyaktaḥ naṣṭaḥ kālena bhūyasā tam pravartayitum deham imam viddhi mayā bhṛtam
gaccha kāmam mayā āpṛṣṭaḥ mayi sannyasta karmaṇā jitvā sudurjayam mṛtyum amṛtatvāya mām bhaja
mām ātmānam svayam-jyotiḥ sarva-bhūta guhā āśayam ātmani eva ātmanā vīkṣya viśokaḥ abhayam ṛcchasi
mātre ādhyātmikīm vidyām śamanīm sarva-karmaṇām vitariṣye yayā ca asau bhayam ca atitariṣyati
maitreyaḥ uvāca evam samuditaḥ tena kapilena prajāpatiḥ dakṣiṇī-kṛtya tam prītaḥ vanam eva jagāma ha
vratam saḥ āsthitaḥ maunam ātma eka śaraṇaḥ muniḥ niḥsaṅgaḥ vyacarat kṣoṇīm anagniḥ aniketanaḥ
manaḥ brahmaṇi yuñjānaḥ yat tat sat-asataḥ param guṇa-avabhāse viguṇe eka-bhaktyā anubhāvite
nirahaṅkṛtiḥ nirmamaḥ ca nirdvandvaḥ sama-dṛk sva-dṛk pratyak praśānta dhīḥ dhīraḥ praśānta ūrmiḥ iva udadhiḥ
vāsudeve bhagavati sarva-jñe pratyak-ātmani pareṇa bhakti-bhāvena labdha-ātmā mukta-bandhanaḥ
ātmānam sarva-bhūteṣu bhagavantam avasthitam apaśyat sarva-bhūtāni bhagavati api ca ātmani
icchā dveṣa vihīnena sarvatra sama cetasā bhagavat bhakti-yuktena prāptā bhāgavatī gatiḥ
śaunakaḥ uvāca kapilaḥ tattva saṅkhyātā bhagavān ātma-māyayā jātaḥ svayam ajaḥ sākṣāt ātma-prajñaptaye nṛṇām
na hi asya varṣmaṇaḥ puṁsām varimṇaḥ sarva yoginām viśrutau śruta-devasya bhūri tṛpyanti me asavaḥ
yat yat vidhatte bhagavān sva-chanda-ātmā ātma-māyayā tāni me śraddadhānasya kīrtanyāni anukīrtaya
sūtaḥ uvāca dvaipāyana-sakhaḥ tu evam maitreyaḥ bhagavān tathā prāha idam viduram prītaḥ ānvīkṣikyām pracoditaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca pitari prasthite araṇyam mātuḥ priya-cikīrṣayā tasmin bindusare avātsīt bhagavān kapilaḥ kila
tam āsīnam akarmāṇam tattva mārga-agra darśanam sva-sutam devahūtiḥ āha dhātuḥ saṁsmaratī vacaḥ
devahūtiḥ uvāca nirviṇṇā nitarām bhūman asat indriya tarṣaṇāt yena sambhāvyamānena prapannā andham tamaḥ prabho
tasya tvam tamasaḥ andhasya duṣpārasya adya pāra-gam sat cakṣuḥ janmanām ante labdham me tvat-anugrahāt
yaḥ ādyaḥ bhagavān puṁsām īśvaraḥ vai bhavān kila lokasya tamasā andhasya cakṣuḥ sūryaḥ iva uditaḥ
atha me deva sammoham apākraṣṭum tvam arhasi yaḥ avagrahaḥ aham mama iti iti etasmin yojitaḥ tvayā
tam tvā gatā aham śaraṇam śaraṇyam sva-bhṛtya saṁsāra taroḥ kuṭhāram jijñāsayā aham prakṛteḥ pūruṣasya namāmi sat-dharma vidām variṣṭham
maitreyaḥ uvāca iti sva-mātuḥ niravadyam īpsitam niśamya puṁsām apavarga vardhanam dhiyā abhinandya ātma-vatām satām gatiḥ babhāṣe īṣat smita śobhita ānanaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca yogaḥ ādhyātmikaḥ puṁsām mataḥ niḥśreyasāya me atyanta uparatiḥ yatra duḥkhasya ca sukhasya ca
tam imam te pravakṣyāmi yam avocam purā anaghe ṛṣīṇām śrotu-kāmānām yogam sarva-aṅga naipuṇam
cetaḥ khalu asya bandhāya muktaye ca ātmanaḥ matam guṇeṣu saktam bandhāya ratam vā puṁsi muktaye
aham mama abhimāna utthaiḥ kāma lobha ādibhiḥ malaiḥ vītam yadā manaḥ śuddham aduḥkham asukham samam
tadā puruṣaḥ ātmānam kevalam prakṛteḥ param nirantaram svayam-jyotiḥ aṇimānam akhaṇḍitam
jñāna vairāgya yuktena bhakti yuktena ca ātmanā paripaśyati udāsīnam prakṛtim ca hata-ojasam
na yujyamānayā bhaktyā bhagavati akhila-ātmani sadṛśaḥ asti śivaḥ panthāḥ yoginām brahma-siddhaye
prasaṅgam ajaram pāśam ātmanaḥ kavayaḥ viduḥ saḥ eva sādhuṣu kṛtaḥ mokṣa-dvāram apāvṛtam
titikṣavaḥ kāruṇikāḥ suhṛdaḥ sarva-dehinām ajāta-śatravaḥ śāntāḥ sādhavaḥ sādhu-bhūṣaṇāḥ
mayi ananyena bhāvena bhaktim kurvanti ye dṛḍhām mat-kṛte tyakta karmāṇaḥ tyakta sva-jana bāndhavāḥ
mat-āśrayāḥ kathāḥ mṛṣṭāḥ śṛṇvanti kathayanti ca tapanti vividhāḥ tāpāḥ na etān mat-gata cetasaḥ
te ete sādhavaḥ sādhvi sarva saṅga vivarjitāḥ saṅgaḥ teṣu atha te prārthyaḥ saṅga-doṣa harāḥ hi te
satām prasaṅgāt mama vīrya saṁvidaḥ bhavanti hṛt karṇa rasa-ayanāḥ kathāḥ tat joṣaṇāt āśu apavarga vartmani śraddhā ratiḥ bhaktiḥ anukramiṣyati
bhaktyā pumān jāta-virāgaḥ aindriyāt dṛṣṭa śrutāt mat-racana anucintayā cittasya yattaḥ grahaṇe yoga-yuktaḥ yatiṣyate ṛjubhiḥ yoga-mārgaiḥ
asevayā ayam prakṛteḥ guṇānām jñānena vairāgya vijṛmbhitena yogena mayi arpitayā ca bhaktyā mām pratyak-ātmānam iha avarundhe
devahūtiḥ uvāca kācit tvayi ucitā bhaktiḥ kīdṛśī mama go-carā yayā padam te nirvāṇam añjasā anvāśnavai aham
yaḥ yogaḥ bhagavat-bāṇaḥ nirvāṇa-ātman tvayā uditaḥ kīdṛśaḥ kati ca aṅgāni yataḥ tattva avabodhanam
tat etat me vijānīhi yathā aham manda dhīḥ hare sukham buddhyeya durbodham yoṣā bhavat-anugrahāt
maitreyaḥ uvāca viditvā artham kapilaḥ mātuḥ ittham jāta-snehaḥ yatra tanvā abhijātaḥ tattva-āmnāyam yat pravadanti sāṅkhyam provāca vai bhakti vitāna yogam
śrī-bhagavān uvāca devānām guṇa-liṅgānām ānuśravika karmaṇām sattve eva eka-manasaḥ vṛttiḥ svābhāvikī tu yā animittā bhāgavatī bhaktiḥ siddheḥ garīyasī
jarayati āśu yā kośam nigīrṇam analaḥ yathā
na eka-ātmatām me spṛhayanti kecit mat-pāda-sevā abhiratāḥ mat-īhāḥ ye anyonyataḥ bhāgavatāḥ prasajya sabhājayante mama pauruṣāṇi
paśyanti te me rucirāṇi amba santaḥ prasanna vaktra aruṇa locanāni rūpāṇi divyāni vara-pradāni sākam vācam spṛhaṇīyām vadanti
taiḥ darśanīya avayavaiḥ udāra vilāsa hāsa īkṣita vāma sūktaiḥ hṛta ātmanaḥ hṛta prāṇān ca bhaktiḥ anicchataḥ me gatim aṇvīm prayuṅkte
atho vibhūtim mama māyāvinaḥ tām aiśvaryam aṣṭa-aṅgam anupravṛttam śriyam bhāgavatīm vā aspṛhayanti bhadrām parasya me te aśnuvate tu loke
na karhicit mat-parāḥ śānta-rūpe naṅkṣyanti no me animiṣaḥ leḍhi hetiḥ yeṣām aham priyaḥ ātmā sutaḥ ca sakhā guruḥ suhṛdaḥ daivam iṣṭam
imam lokam tathā eva amum ātmānam ubhaya ayinam ātmānam anu ye ca iha ye rāyaḥ paśavaḥ gṛhāḥ visṛjya sarvān anyān ca mām evam viśvataḥ-mukham bhajanti ananyayā bhaktyā tān mṛtyoḥ atipāraye
na anyatra mat bhagavataḥ pradhāna-puruṣa-īśvarāt ātmanaḥ sarva-bhūtānām bhayam tīvram nivartate
mat-bhayāt vāti vātaḥ ayam sūryaḥ tapati mat-bhayāt varṣati indraḥ dahati agniḥ mṛtyuḥ carati mat-bhayāt
jñāna vairāgya yuktena bhakti-yogena yoginaḥ kṣemāya pāda-mūlam me praviśanti akutaḥ-bhayam
etāvān eva loke asmin puṁsām niḥśreyasa udayaḥ tīvreṇa bhakti-yogena manaḥ mayi arpitam sthiram
śrī-bhagavān uvāca atha te sampravakṣyāmi tattvānām lakṣaṇam pṛthak yat viditvā vimucyeta puruṣaḥ prākṛtaiḥ guṇaiḥ
jñānam niḥśreyasa-arthāya puruṣasya ātma-darśanam yat āhuḥ varṇaye tat te hṛdaya granthi bhedanam
anādiḥ ātmā puruṣaḥ nirguṇaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ pratyak-dhāmā svayam-jyotiḥ viśvam yena samanvitam
saḥ eṣaḥ prakṛtim sūkṣmām daivīm guṇa-mayīm vibhuḥ yadṛcchayā iva upagatām abhyapadyata līlayā
guṇaiḥ vicitrāḥ sṛjatīm sa-rūpāḥ prakṛtim prajāḥ vilokya mumuhe sadyaḥ saḥ iha jñāna-gūhayā
evam para abhidhyānena kartṛtvam prakṛteḥ pumān karmasu kriyamāṇeṣu guṇaiḥ ātmani manyate
tat asya saṁsṛtiḥ bandhaḥ pāra-tantryam ca tat-kṛtam bhavati akartuḥ īśasya sākṣiṇaḥ nirvṛta-ātmanaḥ
kārya kāraṇa kartṛtve kāraṇam prakṛtim viduḥ bhoktṛtve sukha duḥkhānām puruṣam prakṛteḥ param
devahūtiḥ uvāca prakṛteḥ puruṣasya api lakṣaṇam puruṣa-uttama brūhi kāraṇayoḥ asya sat-asat ca yat-ātmakam
śrī-bhagavān uvāca yat tat tri-guṇam avyaktam nityam sat-asat-ātmakam pradhānam prakṛtim prāhuḥ aviśeṣam viśeṣa-vat
pañcabhiḥ pañcabhiḥ brahma caturbhiḥ daśabhiḥ tathā etat catuḥ-viṁśatikam gaṇam prādhānikam viduḥ
mahā-bhūtāni pañca eva bhūḥ āpaḥ agniḥ marut nabhaḥ tat-mātrāṇi ca tāvanti gandha-ādīni matāni me
indriyāṇi daśa śrotram tvak dṛk rasana nāsikāḥ vāk karau caraṇau meḍhram pāyuḥ daśamaḥ ucyate
manaḥ buddhiḥ ahaṅkāraḥ cittam iti antaḥ-ātmakam catuḥ-dhā lakṣyate bhedaḥ vṛttyā lakṣaṇa-rūpayā
etāvān eva saṅkhyātaḥ brahmaṇaḥ sa-guṇasya ha sanniveśaḥ mayā proktaḥ yaḥ kālaḥ pañca-viṁśakaḥ
prabhāvam pauruṣam prāhuḥ kālam eke yataḥ bhayam ahaṅkāra-vimūḍhasya kartuḥ prakṛtim īyuṣaḥ
prakṛteḥ guṇa-sāmyasya nirviśeṣasya mānavi ceṣṭā yataḥ saḥ bhagavān kālaḥ iti upalakṣitaḥ
antaḥ puruṣa-rūpeṇa kāla-rūpeṇa yaḥ bahiḥ samanveti eṣaḥ sattvānām bhagavān ātma-māyayā
daivāt kṣubhita dharmiṇyām svasyām yonau paraḥ pumān ādhatta vīryam sā asūta mahat-tattvam hiraṇmayam
viśvam ātma-gatam vyañjan kūṭa-sthaḥ jagat-aṅkuraḥ sva-tejasā apibat tīvram ātma-prasvāpanam tamaḥ
yat tat sattva-guṇam svaccham śāntam bhagavataḥ padam yat āhuḥ vāsudeva-ākhyam cittam tat mahat-ātmakam
svacchatvam avikāritvam śāntatvam iti cetasaḥ vṛttibhiḥ lakṣaṇam proktam yathā apām prakṛtiḥ parā
mahat-tattvāt vikurvāṇāt bhagavat-vīrya-sambhavāt kriyā-śaktiḥ ahaṅkāraḥ tri-vidhaḥ samapadyata vaikārikaḥ taijasaḥ ca tāmasaḥ ca yataḥ bhavaḥ manasaḥ ca indriyāṇām ca bhūtānām mahatām api
sahasra-śirasam sākṣāt yam anantam pracakṣate saṅkarṣaṇa-ākhyam puruṣam bhūta indriya manaḥ-mayam
kartṛtvam karaṇatvam ca kāryatvam ca iti lakṣaṇam śānta ghora vimūḍhatvam iti vā syāt ahaṅkṛteḥ
vaikārikāt vikurvāṇāt manaḥ tattvam ajāyata yat saṅkalpa vikalpābhyām vartate kāma-sambhavaḥ
yat viduḥ hi aniruddha-ākhyam hṛṣīkāṇām adhīśvaram śārada indīvara śyāmam saṁrādhyam yogibhiḥ śanaiḥ
taijasāt tu vikurvāṇāt buddhi tattvam abhūt sati dravya sphuraṇa vijñānam indriyāṇām anugrahaḥ
saṁśayaḥ atha viparyāsaḥ niścayaḥ smṛtiḥ eva ca svāpaḥ iti ucyate buddheḥ lakṣaṇam vṛttitaḥ pṛthak
taijasāni indriyāṇi eva kriyā jñāna vibhāgaśaḥ prāṇasya hi kriyā-śaktiḥ buddheḥ vijñāna-śaktitā
tāmasāt ca vikurvāṇāt bhagavat-vīrya coditāt śabda-mātram abhūt tasmāt nabhaḥ śrotram tu śabda-gam
artha-āśrayatvam śabdasya draṣṭuḥ liṅgatvam eva ca tat-mātratvam ca nabhasaḥ lakṣaṇam kavayaḥ viduḥ
bhūtānām chidra-dātṛtvam bahiḥ antaram eva ca prāṇa indriya ātma dhiṣṇyatvam nabhasaḥ vṛtti lakṣaṇam
nabhasaḥ śabda-tanmātrāt kāla-gatyā vikurvataḥ sparśaḥ abhavat tataḥ vāyuḥ tvak sparśasya ca saṅgrahaḥ
mṛdutvam kaṭhinatvam ca śaityam uṣṇatvam eva ca etat sparśasya sparśatvam tat-mātratvam nabhasvataḥ
cālanam vyūhanam prāptiḥ netṛtvam dravya-śabdayoḥ sarva-indriyāṇām ātmatvam vāyoḥ karma abhilakṣaṇam
vāyoḥ ca sparśa-tanmātrāt rūpam daiva-īritāt abhūt samutthitam tataḥ tejaḥ cakṣuḥ rūpa upalambhanam
dravya ākṛtitvam guṇatā vyakti-saṁsthātvam eva ca tejastvam tejasaḥ sādhvi rūpa-mātrasya vṛttayaḥ
dyotanam pacanam pānam adanam hima-mardanam tejasaḥ vṛttayaḥ tu etāḥ śoṣaṇam kṣut tṛṭ eva ca
rūpa-mātrāt vikurvāṇāt tejasaḥ daiva-coditāt rasa-mātram abhūt tasmāt ambhaḥ jihvā rasa-grahaḥ
kaṣāyaḥ madhuraḥ tiktaḥ kaṭu amlaḥ iti na-ekadhā bhautikānām vikāreṇa rasaḥ ekaḥ vibhidyate
kledanam piṇḍanam tṛptiḥ prāṇana āpyāyana undanam tāpa apanodaḥ bhūyastvam ambhasaḥ vṛttayaḥ tu imāḥ
rasa-mātrāt vikurvāṇāt ambhasaḥ daiva-coditāt gandha-mātram abhūt tasmāt pṛthvī ghrāṇaḥ tu gandha-gaḥ
karambha pūti saurabhya śānta ugra amla ādibhiḥ pṛthak dravya avayava vaiṣamyāt gandhaḥ ekaḥ vibhidyate
bhāvanam brahmaṇaḥ sthānam dhāraṇam sat-viśeṣaṇam sarva sattva guṇa udbhedaḥ pṛthivī vṛtti lakṣaṇam
nabhaḥ-guṇa-viśeṣaḥ arthaḥ yasya tat śrotram ucyate vāyoḥ guṇa-viśeṣaḥ arthaḥ yasya tat sparśanam viduḥ
tejaḥ-guṇa-viśeṣaḥ arthaḥ yasya tat cakṣuḥ ucyate ambhaḥ-guṇa-viśeṣaḥ arthaḥ yasya tat rasanam viduḥ bhūmeḥ guṇa-viśeṣaḥ arthaḥ yasya saḥ ghrāṇaḥ ucyate
parasya dṛśyate dharmaḥ hi aparasmin samanvayāt ataḥ viśeṣaḥ bhāvānām bhūmau eva upalakṣyate
etāni asaṁhatya yadā mahat-ādīni sapta vai kāla karma guṇa upetaḥ jagat-ādiḥ upāviśat
tataḥ tena anuviddhebhyaḥ yuktebhyaḥ aṇḍam acetanam utthitam puruṣaḥ yasmāt udatiṣṭhat asau virāṭ
etat aṇḍam viśeṣa-ākhyam krama vṛddhaiḥ daśa uttaraiḥ toya-ādibhiḥ parivṛtam pradhānena āvṛtaiḥ bahiḥ yatra loka-vitānaḥ ayam rūpam bhagavataḥ hareḥ
hiraṇmayāt aṇḍa-kośāt utthāya salile śayāt tam āviśya mahā-devaḥ bahudhā nirbibheda kham
nirabhidyata asya prathamam mukham vāṇī tataḥ abhavat vāṇyā vahniḥ athaḥ nāse prāṇa utaḥ ghrāṇaḥ etayoḥ
ghrāṇāt vāyuḥ abhidyetām akṣiṇī cakṣuḥ etayoḥ tasmāt sūryaḥ nyabhidyetām karṇau śrotram tataḥ diśaḥ
nirbibheda virājaḥ tvak roma śmaśru ādayaḥ tataḥ tataḥ oṣadhayaḥ ca āsan śiśnam nirbibhide tataḥ
retaḥ tasmāt āpaḥ āsan nirabhidyata vai gudam gudāt apānaḥ apānāt ca mṛtyuḥ loka-bhayam-karaḥ
hastau ca nirabhidyetām balam tābhyām tataḥ svarāṭ pādau ca nirabhidyetām gatiḥ tābhyām tataḥ hariḥ
nāḍyaḥ asya nirabhidyanta tābhyaḥ lohitam ābhṛtam nadyaḥ tataḥ samabhavan udaram nirabhidyata
kṣut-pipāse tataḥ syātām samudraḥ tu etayoḥ abhūt atha asya hṛdayam bhinnam hṛdayāt manaḥ utthitam
manasaḥ candramāḥ jātaḥ buddhiḥ buddheḥ girām patiḥ ahaṅkāraḥ tataḥ rudraḥ cittam caityaḥ tataḥ abhavat
ete hi abhyutthitāḥ devāḥ na eva asya utthāpane aśakan punaḥ āviviśuḥ khāni tam utthāpayitum kramāt
vahniḥ vācā mukham bheje na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ ghrāṇena nāsike vāyuḥ na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
akṣiṇī cakṣuṣā ādityaḥ na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ śrotreṇa karṇau ca diśaḥ na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
tvacam romabhiḥ oṣadhyaḥ na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ retasā śiśnam āpaḥ tu na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
gudam mṛtyuḥ apānena na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ hastau indraḥ balena eva na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
viṣṇuḥ gatyā eva caraṇau na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ nāḍīḥ nadyaḥ lohitena na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
kṣut-tṛḍbhyām udaram sindhuḥ na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ hṛdayam manasā candraḥ na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
buddhyā brahmā api hṛdayam na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ rudraḥ abhimatyā hṛdayam na udatiṣṭhat tadā virāṭ
cittena hṛdayam caityaḥ kṣetra-jñaḥ prāviśat yadā virāṭ tadā eva puruṣaḥ salilāt udatiṣṭhata
yathā prasuptam puruṣam prāṇa indriya manaḥ dhiyaḥ prabhavanti vinā yena na utthāpayitum ojasā
tam asmin pratyak-ātmānam dhiyā yoga-pravṛttayā bhaktyā viraktyā jñānena vivicya ātmani cintayet
śrī-bhagavān uvāca prakṛti-sthaḥ api puruṣaḥ na ajyate prākṛtaiḥ guṇaiḥ avikārāt akartṛtvāt nirguṇatvāt jala arkavat
saḥ eṣaḥ yarhi prakṛteḥ guṇeṣu abhiviṣajjate ahaṅkriyā vimūḍha ātmā kartā asmi iti abhimanyate
tena saṁsāra padavīm avaśaḥ abhyeti anirvṛtaḥ prāsaṅgikaiḥ karma-doṣaiḥ sat asat miśra yoniṣu
arthe hi avidyamāne api saṁsṛtiḥ na nivartate dhyāyataḥ viṣayān asya svapne anartha āgamaḥ yathā
ataḥ eva śanaiḥ cittam prasaktam asatām pathi bhakti-yogena tīvreṇa viraktyā ca nayet vaśam
yama-ādibhiḥ yoga-pathaiḥ abhyasan śraddhayā anvitaḥ mayi bhāvena satyena mat-kathā śravaṇena ca
sarva bhūta samatvena nirvaireṇa aprasaṅgataḥ brahma-caryeṇa maunena sva-dharmeṇa balīyasā
yadṛcchayā upalabdhena santuṣṭaḥ mita bhuk muniḥ vivikta-śaraṇaḥ śāntaḥ maitraḥ karuṇaḥ ātma-vān
sa-anubandhe ca dehe asmin akurvan asat-āgraham jñānena dṛṣṭa tattvena prakṛteḥ puruṣasya ca
nivṛtta buddhi-avasthānaḥ dūrī-bhūta anya darśanaḥ upalabhya ātmanā ātmānam cakṣuṣā iva arkam ātma-dṛk
mukta-liṅgam sat-ābhāsam asati pratipadyate sataḥ bandhum asat-cakṣuḥ sarva-anusyūtam advayam
yathā jala-sthaḥ ābhāsaḥ sthala-sthena avadṛśyate sva-ābhāsena tathā sūryaḥ jala-sthena divi sthitaḥ
evam tri-vṛt ahaṅkāraḥ bhūta-indriya-manaḥ-mayaiḥ sva-ābhāsaiḥ lakṣitaḥ anena sat-ābhāsena satya-dṛk
bhūta sūkṣma indriya manaḥ buddhi ādiṣu iha nidrayā līneṣu asati yaḥ tatra vinidraḥ nirahaṅkriyaḥ
manyamānaḥ tadā ātmānam anaṣṭaḥ naṣṭa-vat mṛṣā naṣṭe ahaṅkaraṇe draṣṭā naṣṭa-vittaḥ iva āturaḥ
evam pratyavamṛśya asau ātmānam pratipadyate sa-ahaṅkārasya dravyasya yaḥ avasthānam anugrahaḥ
devahūtiḥ uvāca puruṣam prakṛtiḥ brahman na vimuñcati karhicit anyonya apāśrayatvāt ca nityatvāt anayoḥ prabho
yathā gandhasya bhūmeḥ ca na bhāvaḥ vyatirekataḥ apām rasasya ca yathā tathā buddheḥ parasya ca
akartuḥ karma-bandhaḥ ayam puruṣasya yat-āśrayaḥ guṇeṣu satsu prakṛteḥ kaivalyam teṣu ataḥ katham
kvacit tattva avamarśena nivṛttam bhayam ulbaṇam anivṛtta nimittatvāt punaḥ pratyavatiṣṭhate
śrī-bhagavān uvāca animitta-nimittena sva-dharmeṇa amala-ātmanā tīvrayā mayi bhaktyā ca śruta sambhṛtayā ciram
jñānena dṛṣṭa-tattvena vairāgyeṇa balīyasā tapaḥ-yuktena yogena tīvreṇa ātma-samādhinā
prakṛtiḥ puruṣasya iha dahyamānā tu ahaḥ-niśam tiraḥ-bhavitrī śanakaiḥ agneḥ yoniḥ iva araṇiḥ
bhukta bhogā parityaktā dṛṣṭa doṣā ca nityaśaḥ na īśvarasya aśubham dhatte sve mahimni sthitasya ca
yathā hi apratibuddhasya prasvāpaḥ bahu-anartha-bhṛt saḥ eva pratibuddhasya na vai mohāya kalpate
evam vidita-tattvasya prakṛtiḥ mayi mānasam yuñjataḥ na apakurute ātma-ārāmasya karhicit
yadā evam adhyātma-rataḥ kālena bahu-janmanā sarvatra jāta-vairāgyaḥ ā-brahma-bhuvanāt muniḥ
mat-bhaktaḥ pratibuddha-arthaḥ mat-prasādena bhūyasā niḥśreyasam sva-saṁsthānam kaivalya-ākhyam mat-āśrayam prāpnoti iha añjasā dhīraḥ sva-dṛśā chinna-saṁśayaḥ yat gatvā na nivarteta yogī liṅgāt vinirgame
yadā na yoga-upacitāsu cetaḥ māyāsu siddhasya viṣajjate aṅga ananya-hetuṣu atha me gatiḥ syāt ātyantikī yatra na mṛtyu-hāsaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca yogasya lakṣaṇam vakṣye sabījasya nṛpa-ātma-je manaḥ yena eva vidhinā prasannam yāti sat-patham
sva-dharma-ācaraṇam śaktyā vidharmāt ca nivartanam daivāt labdhena santoṣaḥ ātma-vit caraṇa arcanam
grāmya dharma nivṛttiḥ ca mokṣa dharma ratiḥ tathā mita medhya adanam śaśvat vivikta kṣema sevanam
ahiṁsā satyam asteyam yāvat-artha parigrahaḥ brahmacaryam tapaḥ śaucam sva-adhyāyaḥ puruṣa-arcanam
maunam sat āsana jayaḥ sthairyam prāṇa-jayaḥ śanaiḥ pratyāhāraḥ ca indriyāṇām viṣayāt manasā hṛdi
sva-dhiṣṇyānām eka-deśe manasā prāṇa dhāraṇam vaikuṇṭha-līlā abhidhyānam samādhānam tathā ātmanaḥ
etaiḥ anyaiḥ ca pathibhiḥ manaḥ duṣṭam asat-patham buddhyā yuñjīta śanakaiḥ jita-prāṇaḥ hi atandritaḥ
śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya vijita-āsanaḥ āsanam tasmin svasti samāsīnaḥ ṛju-kāyaḥ samabhyaset
prāṇasya śodhayet mārgam pūra-kumbhaka-recakaiḥ pratikūlena vā cittam yathā sthiram acañcalam
manaḥ acirāt syāt virajam jita-śvāsasya yoginaḥ vāyu-agnibhyām yathā loham dhmātam tyajati vai malam
prāṇāyāmaiḥ dahet doṣān dhāraṇābhiḥ ca kilbiṣān pratyāhāreṇa saṁsargān dhyānena anīśvarān guṇān
yadā manaḥ svam virajam yogena su-samāhitam kāṣṭhām bhagavataḥ dhyāyet sva-nāsā-agra avalokanaḥ
prasanna vadana ambhojam padma-garbha aruṇa īkṣaṇam nīla-utpala dala śyāmam śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam
lasat paṅkaja kiñjalka pīta kauśeya vāsasam śrīvatsa vakṣasam bhrājat kaustubha āmukta kandharam
matta dvi-repha kalayā parītam vana-mālayā parārdhya hāra valaya kirīṭa aṅgada nūpuram
kāñcī guṇa ullasat śroṇim hṛdaya ambhoja viṣṭaram darśanīya-tamam śāntam manaḥ nayana vardhanam
apīcya-darśanam śaśvat sarva-loka namaḥ-kṛtam santam vayasi kaiśore bhṛtya anugraha kātaram
kīrtanya tīrtha-yaśasam puṇya-śloka yaśaḥ-karam dhyāyet devam samagra-aṅgam yāvat na cyavate manaḥ
sthitam vrajantam āsīnam śayānam vā guhā-āśayam prekṣaṇīya īhitam dhyāyet śuddha-bhāvena cetasā
tasmin labdha-padam cittam sarva avayava saṁsthitam vilakṣya ekatra saṁyujyāt aṅge bhagavataḥ muniḥ
sañcintayet bhagavataḥ caraṇa-aravindam vajra aṅkuśa dhvaja saroruha lāñchana āḍhyam uttuṅga rakta vilasat nakha cakravāla jyotsnābhiḥ āhata mahat hṛdaya andhakāram
yat śauca niḥsṛta sarit-pravara udakena tīrthena mūrdhni adhikṛtena śivaḥ śivaḥ abhūt dhyātuḥ manaḥ śamala-śaila nisṛṣṭa vajram dhyāyet ciram bhagavataḥ caraṇa-aravindam
jānu-dvayam jalaja-locanayā jananyā lakṣmyā akhilasya sura-vanditayā vidhātuḥ ūrvoḥ nidhāya kara-pallava-rociṣā yat saṁlālitam hṛdi vibhoḥ abhavasya kuryāt
ūrū suparṇa bhujayoḥ adhi śobhamānau ojaḥ-nidhī atasikā-kusuma avabhāsau vyālambi pīta vara vāsasi vartamāna kāñcī-kalāpa parirambhi nitamba-bimbam
nābhi-hradam bhuvana-kośa guhā udara stham yatra ātma-yoni dhiṣaṇa akhila-loka padmam vyūḍham harit-maṇi vṛṣa stanayoḥ amuṣya dhyāyet dvayam viśada hāra mayūkha gauram
vakṣaḥ adhivāsam ṛṣabhasya mahā-vibhūteḥ puṁsām manaḥ nayana nirvṛtim ādadhānam kaṇṭham ca kaustubha-maṇeḥ adhibhūṣaṇa-artham kuryāt manasi akhila-loka namaskṛtasya
bāhūn ca mandara-gireḥ parivartanena nirṇikta bāhu-valayān adhiloka-pālān sañcintayet daśa-śata-aram asahya-tejaḥ śaṅkham ca tat-kara saroruha rāja-haṁsam
kaumodakīm bhagavataḥ dayitām smareta digdhām arāti bhaṭa śoṇita-kardamena mālām madhuvrata varūtha girā upaghuṣṭām caityasya tattvam amalam maṇim asya kaṇṭhe
bhṛtya anukampita-dhiyā iha gṛhīta-mūrteḥ sañcintayet bhagavataḥ vadana aravindam yat visphuran makara kuṇḍala valgitena vidyotita amala kapolam udāra nāsam
yat śrī-niketam alibhiḥ parisevyamānam bhūtyā svayā kuṭila kuntala vṛnda juṣṭam mīna dvaya āśrayam adhikṣipat abja netram dhyāyet manaḥ-mayam atandritaḥ ullasat bhru
tasya avalokam adhikam kṛpayā atighora tāpa-traya upaśamanāya nisṛṣṭam akṣṇoḥ snigdha smita anuguṇitam vipula prasādam dhyāyet ciram vipula bhāvanayā guhāyām
hāsam hareḥ avanata akhila loka tīvra-śoka aśru-sāgara viśoṣaṇam ati-udāram sammohanāya racitam nija-māyayā asya bhrū-maṇḍalam muni-kṛte makara-dhvajasya
dhyāna-ayanam prahasitam bahula adhara-oṣṭha bhāsa aruṇāyita tanu dvija kunda-paṅkti dhyāyet sva-deha-kuhare avasitasya viṣṇoḥ bhaktyā ārdrayā arpita-manāḥ na pṛthak didṛkṣet
evam harau bhagavati pratilabdha bhāvaḥ bhaktyā dravat hṛdayaḥ utpulakaḥ pramodāt autkaṇṭhya bāṣpa-kalayā muhuḥ ardyamānaḥ tat ca api citta baḍiśam śanakaiḥ viyuṅkte
mukta-āśrayam yarhi nirviṣayam viraktam nirvāṇam ṛcchati manaḥ sahasā yathā arciḥ ātmānam atra puruṣaḥ avyavadhānam ekam anvīkṣate pratinivṛtta guṇa-pravāhaḥ
saḥ api etayā caramayā manasaḥ nivṛttyā tasmin mahimni avasitaḥ sukha-duḥkha-bāhye hetutvam api asati kartari duḥkhayoḥ yat sva-ātman vidhatte upalabdha para-ātma kāṣṭhaḥ
deham ca tam na caramaḥ sthitam utthitam vā siddhaḥ vipaśyati yataḥ adhyagamat sva-rūpam daivāt upetam atha daiva-vaśāt apetam vāsaḥ yathā parikṛtam madirā-mada-andhaḥ
dehaḥ api daiva-vaśa-gaḥ khalu karma yāvat sva-ārambhakam pratisamīkṣate eva sa-asuḥ tam sa-prapañcam adhirūḍha-samādhi-yogaḥ svāpnam punaḥ na bhajate pratibuddha vastuḥ
yathā putrāt ca vittāt ca pṛthak martyaḥ pratīyate api ātmatvena abhimatāt deha-ādeḥ puruṣaḥ tathā
yathā ulmukāt visphuliṅgāt dhūmāt vā api sva-sambhavāt api ātmatvena abhimatāt yathā agniḥ pṛthak ulmukāt
bhūta indriya antaḥ-karaṇāt pradhānāt jīva-saṁjñitāt ātmā tathā pṛthak draṣṭā bhagavān brahma-saṁjñitaḥ
sarva-bhūteṣu ca ātmānam sarva-bhūtāni ca ātmani īkṣeta ananya-bhāvena bhūteṣu iva tat-ātmatām
sva-yoniṣu yathā jyotiḥ ekam nānā pratīyate yonīnām guṇa-vaiṣamyāt tathā ātmā prakṛtau sthitaḥ
tasmāt imām svām prakṛtim daivīm sat-asat-ātmikām durvibhāvyām parābhāvya sva-rūpeṇa avatiṣṭhate
devahūtiḥ uvāca lakṣaṇam mahat-ādīnām prakṛteḥ puruṣasya ca svarūpam lakṣyate amīṣām yena tat-pārama-arthikam yathā sāṅkhyeṣu kathitam yat mūlam tat pracakṣate bhakti-yogasya me mārgam brūhi vistaraśaḥ prabho
virāgaḥ yena puruṣaḥ bhagavan sarvataḥ bhavet ācakṣva jīva-lokasya vividhāḥ mama saṁsṛtīḥ
kālasya īśvara-rūpasya pareṣām ca parasya te svarūpam bata kurvanti yat-hetoḥ kuśalam janāḥ
lokasya mithyā-abhimateḥ acakṣuṣaḥ ciram prasuptasya tamasi anāśraye śrāntasya karmasu anuviddhayā dhiyā tvam āvirāsīḥ kila yoga bhāskaraḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca iti mātuḥ vacaḥ ślakṣṇam pratinandya mahā-muniḥ ābabhāṣe kuru-śreṣṭha prītaḥ tām karuṇā arditaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca bhakti-yogaḥ bahu-vidhaḥ mārgaiḥ bhāmini bhāvyate svabhāva guṇa mārgeṇa puṁsām bhāvaḥ vibhidyate
abhisandhāya yaḥ hiṁsām dambham mātsaryam eva vā saṁrambhī bhinna dṛk bhāvam mayi kuryāt saḥ tāmasaḥ
viṣayān abhisandhāya yaśaḥ aiśvaryam eva vā arcā-ādau arcayet yaḥ mām pṛthak-bhāvaḥ saḥ rājasaḥ
karma nirhāram uddiśya parasmin vā tat-arpaṇam yajet yaṣṭavyam iti vā pṛthak-bhāvaḥ saḥ sāttvikaḥ
mat guṇa śruti mātreṇa mayi sarva-guhā-āśaye manaḥ-gatiḥ avicchinnā yathā gaṅgā ambhasaḥ ambudhau lakṣaṇam bhakti-yogasya nirguṇasya hi udāhṛtam ahaitukī avyavahitā yā bhaktiḥ puruṣa-uttame
sālokya sārṣṭi sāmīpya sārūpya ekatvam api uta dīyamānam na gṛhṇanti vinā mat sevanam janāḥ
saḥ eva bhakti-yoga ākhyaḥ ātyantikaḥ udāhṛtaḥ yena ativrajya tri-guṇam mat-bhāvāya upapadyate
niṣevitena animittena sva-dharmeṇa mahīyasā kriyā-yogena śastena na atihiṁsreṇa nityaśaḥ
mat dhiṣṇya darśana sparśa pūjā stuti abhivandanaiḥ bhūteṣu mat bhāvanayā sattvena asaṅgamena ca
mahatām bahu-mānena dīnānām anukampayā maitryā ca eva ātma-tulyeṣu yamena niyamena ca
ādhyātmika anuśravaṇāt nāma-saṅkīrtanāt ca me ārjavena ārya-saṅgena nirahaṅkriyayā tathā
mat-dharmaṇaḥ guṇaiḥ etaiḥ parisaṁśuddhaḥ āśayaḥ puruṣasya añjasā abhyeti śruta mātra guṇam hi mām
yathā vāta rathaḥ ghrāṇam āvṛṅkte gandhaḥ āśayāt evam yoga-ratam cetaḥ ātmānam avikāri yat
aham sarveṣu bhūteṣu bhūta-ātmā avasthitaḥ sadā tam avajñāya mām martyaḥ kurute arcā viḍambanam
yaḥ mām sarveṣu bhūteṣu santam ātmānam īśvaram hitvā arcām bhajate mauḍhyāt bhasmani eva juhoti saḥ
dviṣataḥ para-kāye mām māninaḥ bhinna-darśinaḥ bhūteṣu baddha-vairasya na manaḥ śāntim ṛcchati
aham ucca-avacaiḥ dravyaiḥ kriyayā utpannayā anaghe na eva tuṣye arcitaḥ arcāyām bhūta-grāma avamāninaḥ
arcā-ādau arcayet tāvat īśvaram mām sva karma kṛt yāvat na veda sva-hṛdi sarva-bhūteṣu avasthitam
ātmanaḥ ca parasya api yaḥ karoti antarā udaram tasya bhinna-dṛśaḥ mṛtyuḥ vidadhe bhayam ulbaṇam
atha mām sarva-bhūteṣu bhūta-ātmānam kṛta-ālayam arhayet dāna-mānābhyām maitryā abhinnena cakṣuṣā
jīvāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ hi ajīvānām tataḥ prāṇa-bhṛtaḥ śubhe tataḥ sa-cittāḥ pravarāḥ tataḥ ca indriya-vṛttayaḥ
tatra api sparśa-vedibhyaḥ pravarāḥ rasa-vedinaḥ tebhyaḥ gandha-vidaḥ śreṣṭhāḥ tataḥ śabda-vidaḥ varāḥ
rūpa-bheda vidaḥ tatra tataḥ ca ubhayataḥ dataḥ teṣām bahu-padāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ catuḥ-pādaḥ tataḥ dvi-pāt
tataḥ varṇāḥ ca catvāraḥ teṣām brāhmaṇaḥ uttamaḥ brāhmaṇeṣu api veda jñaḥ hi artha jñaḥ abhyadhikaḥ tataḥ
artha-jñāt saṁśaya chettā tataḥ śreyān sva-karma kṛt mukta-saṅgaḥ tataḥ bhūyān adogdhā dharmam ātmanaḥ
tasmāt mayi arpita aśeṣa kriyā artha ātmā nirantaraḥ mayi arpita ātmanaḥ puṁsaḥ mayi sannyasta karmaṇaḥ na paśyāmi param bhūtam akartuḥ sama darśanāt
manasā etāni bhūtāni praṇamet bahu-mānayan īśvaraḥ jīva kalayā praviṣṭaḥ bhagavān iti
bhakti-yogaḥ ca yogaḥ ca mayā mānavi udīritaḥ yayoḥ ekatareṇa eva puruṣaḥ puruṣam vrajet
etat bhagavataḥ rūpam brahmaṇaḥ parama-ātmanaḥ param pradhānam puruṣam daivam karma-viceṣṭitam
rūpa-bheda āspadam divyam kālaḥ iti abhidhīyate bhūtānām mahat-ādīnām yataḥ bhinna-dṛśām bhayam
yaḥ antaḥ praviśya bhūtāni bhūtaiḥ atti akhila āśrayaḥ saḥ viṣṇu ākhyaḥ adhiyajñaḥ asau kālaḥ kalayatām prabhuḥ
na ca asya kaścit dayitaḥ na dveṣyaḥ na ca bāndhavaḥ āviśati apramattaḥ asau pramattam janam anta-kṛt
yat bhayāt vāti vātaḥ ayam sūryaḥ tapati yat bhayāt yat bhayāt varṣate devaḥ bha-gaṇaḥ bhāti yat bhayāt
yat vanaḥ-patayaḥ bhītāḥ latāḥ ca oṣadhibhiḥ saha sve sve kāle abhigṛhṇanti puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
sravanti saritaḥ bhītāḥ na utsarpati uda-dhiḥ yataḥ agniḥ indhe sa-giribhiḥ bhūḥ na majjati yat bhayāt
nabhaḥ dadāti śvasatām padam yat niyamāt adaḥ lokam sva-deham tanute mahān saptabhiḥ āvṛtam
guṇa abhimāninaḥ devāḥ sarga-ādiṣu asya yat-bhayāt vartante anuyugam yeṣām vaśe etat cara-acaram
saḥ anantaḥ anta-karaḥ kālaḥ anādiḥ ādi-kṛt avyayaḥ janam janena janayan mārayan mṛtyunā antakam
kapilaḥ uvāca tasya etasya janaḥ nūnam na ayam veda uru-vikramam kālyamānaḥ api balinaḥ vāyoḥ iva ghana āvaliḥ
yam yam artham upādatte duḥkhena sukha-hetave tam tam dhunoti bhagavān pumān śocati yat-kṛte
yat adhruvasya dehasya sa-anubandhasya durmatiḥ dhruvāṇi manyate mohāt gṛha kṣetra vasūni ca
jantuḥ vai bhave etasmin yām yām yonim anuvrajet tasyām tasyām saḥ labhate nirvṛtim na virajyate
naraka sthaḥ api deham vai na pumān tyaktum icchati nārakyām nirvṛtau satyām deva-māyā vimohitaḥ
ātma jāyā suta agāra paśu draviṇa bandhuṣu nirūḍha-mūla hṛdayaḥ ātmānam bahu manyate
sandahyamāna sarva aṅgaḥ eṣām udvahana ādhinā karoti aviratam mūḍhaḥ duritāni durāśayaḥ
ākṣipta ātma indriyaḥ strīṇām asatīnām ca māyayā rahaḥ racitayā ālāpaiḥ śiśūnām kala-bhāṣiṇām
gṛheṣu kūṭa-dharmeṣu duḥkha-tantreṣu atandritaḥ kurvan duḥkha-pratīkāram sukha-vat manyate gṛhī
arthaiḥ āpāditaiḥ gurvyā hiṁsayā itaḥ-tataḥ ca tān puṣṇāti yeṣām poṣeṇa śeṣa bhuk yāti adhaḥ svayam
vārtāyām lupyamānāyām ārabdhāyām punaḥ punaḥ lobha abhibhūtaḥ niḥsattvaḥ para-arthe kurute spṛhām
kuṭumba bharaṇa akalpaḥ manda-bhāgyaḥ vṛthā udyamaḥ śriyā vihīnaḥ kṛpaṇaḥ dhyāyan śvasiti mūḍha dhīḥ
evam sva-bharaṇa akalpam tat kalatra ādayaḥ tathā na ādriyante yathā pūrvam kīnāśāḥ iva go-jaram
tatra api ajāta nirvedaḥ bhriyamāṇaḥ svayam bhṛtaiḥ jarayā upātta vairūpyaḥ maraṇa abhimukhaḥ gṛhe
āste avamatyā upanyastam gṛha-pālaḥ iva āharan āmayāvī apradīpta-agniḥ alpa āhāraḥ alpa ceṣṭitaḥ
vāyunā utkramatā uttāraḥ kapha saṁruddha nāḍikaḥ kāsa śvāsa kṛta āyāsaḥ kaṇṭhe ghura-ghurāyate
śayānaḥ pariśocadbhiḥ parivītaḥ sva-bandhubhiḥ vācyamānaḥ api na brūte kāla pāśa vaśam gataḥ
evam kuṭumba-bharaṇe vyāpṛta ātmā ajita indriyaḥ mriyate rudatām svānām uru vedanayā asta dhīḥ
yama-dūtau tadā prāptau bhīmau sa-rabhasa īkṣaṇau saḥ dṛṣṭvā trasta hṛdayaḥ śakṛt mūtram vimuñcati
yātanā dehe āvṛtya pāśaiḥ baddhvā gale balāt nayataḥ dīrgham adhvānam daṇḍyam rāja-bhaṭāḥ yathā
tayoḥ nirbhinna hṛdayaḥ tarjanaiḥ jāta vepathuḥ pathi śvabhiḥ bhakṣyamāṇaḥ ārtaḥ agham svam anusmaran
kṣut-tṛṭ parītaḥ arka dava-anala anilaiḥ santapyamānaḥ pathi tapta-vāluke kṛcchreṇa pṛṣṭhe kaśayā ca tāḍitaḥ calati aśaktaḥ api nirāśrama-udake
tatra tatra patan śrāntaḥ mūrcchitaḥ punaḥ utthitaḥ pathā pāpīyasā nītaḥ tarasā yama-sādanam
yojanānām sahasrāṇi navatim nava ca adhvanaḥ tribhiḥ muhūrtaiḥ dvābhyām vā nītaḥ prāpnoti yātanāḥ
ādīpanam sva-gātrāṇām veṣṭayitvā ulmuka-ādibhiḥ ātma-māṁsa adanam kva api sva-kṛttam parataḥ api vā
jīvataḥ ca antra abhyuddhāraḥ śva-gṛdhraiḥ yama-sādane sarpa vṛścika daṁśa ādyaiḥ daśadbhiḥ ca ātma-vaiśasam
kṛntanam ca avayavaśaḥ gaja-ādibhyaḥ bhidāpanam pātanam giri śṛṅgebhyaḥ rodhanam ca ambu-gartayoḥ
yāḥ tāmisra andha-tāmisrāḥ raurava ādyāḥ ca yātanāḥ bhuṅkte naraḥ vā nārī vā mithaḥ saṅgena nirmitāḥ
atra eva narakaḥ svargaḥ iti mātaḥ pracakṣate yāḥ yātanāḥ vai nārakyaḥ tāḥ iha api upalakṣitāḥ
evam kuṭumbam bibhrāṇaḥ udaram bharaḥ eva vā visṛjya iha ubhayam pretya bhuṅkte tat phalam īdṛśam
ekaḥ prapadyate dhvāntam hitvā idam sva kalevaram kuśala-itara pātheyaḥ bhūta droheṇa yat bhṛtam
daivena āsāditam tasya śamalam niraye pumān bhuṅkte kuṭumba-poṣasya hṛta-vittaḥ iva āturaḥ
kevalena hi adharmeṇa kuṭumba bharaṇa utsukaḥ yāti jīvaḥ andha-tāmisram caramam tamasaḥ padam
adhastāt nara-lokasya yāvatīḥ yātanā ādayaḥ kramaśaḥ samanukramya punaḥ atra āvrajet śuciḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca karmaṇā daiva-netreṇa jantuḥ deha upapattaye striyāḥ praviṣṭaḥ udaram puṁsaḥ retaḥ kaṇa āśrayaḥ
kalalam tu eka-rātreṇa pañca-rātreṇa budbudam daśa-ahena tu karkandhūḥ peśī aṇḍam vā tataḥ param
māsena tu śiraḥ dvābhyām bāhu aṅghri ādi aṅga vigrahaḥ nakha loma asthi carmāṇi liṅga chidra udbhavaḥ tribhiḥ
caturbhiḥ dhātavaḥ sapta pañcabhiḥ kṣut-tṛṭ udbhavaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ jarāyuṇā vītaḥ kukṣau bhrāmyati dakṣiṇe
mātuḥ jagdha anna-pāna ādyaiḥ edhat dhātuḥ asammate śete viṭ-mūtrayoḥ garte saḥ jantuḥ jantu sambhave
kṛmibhiḥ kṣata sarva-aṅgaḥ saukumāryāt prati-kṣaṇam mūrcchām āpnoti uru-kleśaḥ tatratyaiḥ kṣudhitaiḥ muhuḥ
kaṭu tīkṣṇa uṣṇa lavaṇa rūkṣa amla ādibhiḥ ulbaṇaiḥ mātṛ-bhuktaiḥ upaspṛṣṭaḥ sarva-aṅga utthita vedanaḥ
ulbena saṁvṛtaḥ tasmin antraiḥ ca bahiḥ āvṛtaḥ āste kṛtvā śiraḥ kukṣau bhugna pṛṣṭha śiraḥ-dharaḥ
akalpaḥ sva-aṅga ceṣṭāyām śakuntaḥ iva pañjare tatra labdha-smṛtiḥ daivāt karma janma-śata-udbhavam smaran dīrgham anucchvāsam śarma kim nāma vindate
ārabhya saptamāt māsāt labdha-bodhaḥ api vepitaḥ na ekatra āste sūti-vātaiḥ viṣṭhā-bhūḥ iva sa-udaraḥ
nāthamānaḥ ṛṣiḥ bhītaḥ sapta-vadhriḥ kṛta-añjaliḥ stuvīta tam viklavayā vācā yena udare arpitaḥ
jantuḥ uvāca tasya upasannam avitum jagat icchayā ātta-nānā-tanoḥ bhuvi calat caraṇa-aravindam saḥ aham vrajāmi śaraṇam hi akutaḥ-bhayam me yena īdṛśī gatiḥ adarśi asataḥ anurūpā
yaḥ tu atra baddhaḥ iva karmabhiḥ āvṛta ātmā bhūta indriya āśaya mayīm avalambya māyām āste viśuddham avikāram akhaṇḍa-bodham ātapyamāna hṛdaye avasitam namāmi
yaḥ pañca-bhūta racite rahitaḥ śarīre channaḥ ayathā indriya guṇa artha cit ātmakaḥ aham tena avikuṇṭha-mahimānam ṛṣim tam enam vande param prakṛti pūruṣayoḥ pumāṁsam
yat māyayā uru-guṇa karma nibandhane asmin sāṁsārike pathi caran tat abhiśrameṇa naṣṭa smṛtiḥ punaḥ ayam pravṛṇīta lokam yuktyā kayā mahat-anugraham antareṇa
jñānam yat etat adadhāt katamaḥ saḥ devaḥ trai-kālikam sthira-careṣu anuvartita aṁśaḥ tam jīva karma-padavīm anuvartamānāḥ tāpa-traya upaśamanāya vayam bhajema
dehī anya-deha vivare jaṭhara agninā asṛk viṭ mūtra kūpa patitaḥ bhṛśa tapta dehaḥ icchan itaḥ vivasitum gaṇayan svamāsān nirvāsyate kṛpaṇa-dhīḥ bhagavan kadā nu
yena īdṛśīm gatim asau daśa-māsyaḥ īśa saṅgrāhitaḥ puru-dayena bhavādṛśena svena eva tuṣyatu kṛtena saḥ dīna-nāthaḥ kaḥ nāma tat prati vinā añjalim asya kuryāt
paśyati ayam dhiṣaṇayā nanu sapta-vadhriḥ śārīrake dama-śarīrī aparaḥ sva-dehe yat sṛṣṭayā āsam tam aham puruṣam purāṇam paśye bahiḥ hṛdi ca caityam iva pratītam
saḥ aham vasan api vibho bahu-duḥkha vāsam garbhāt na nirjigamiṣe bahiḥ andha-kūpe yatra upayātam upasarpati deva-māyā mithyā matiḥ yat anu saṁsṛti cakram etat
tasmāt aham vigata viklavaḥ uddhariṣye ātmānam āśu tamasaḥ suhṛdā ātmanā eva bhūyaḥ yathā vyasanam etat aneka-randhram mā me bhaviṣyat upasādita viṣṇu-pādaḥ
kapilaḥ uvāca evam kṛta-matiḥ garbhe daśa-māsyaḥ stuvan ṛṣiḥ sadyaḥ kṣipati avācīnam prasūtyai sūti-mārutaḥ
tena avasṛṣṭaḥ sahasā kṛtvā avāk śiraḥ āturaḥ viniṣkrāmati kṛcchreṇa nirucchvāsaḥ hata smṛtiḥ
patitaḥ bhuvi asṛk miśraḥ viṣṭhā-bhūḥ iva ceṣṭate rorūyati gate jñāne viparītām gatim gataḥ
para-chandam na viduṣā puṣyamāṇaḥ janena saḥ anabhipretam āpannaḥ pratyākhyātum anīśvaraḥ
śāyitaḥ aśuci-paryaṅke jantuḥ sveda-ja dūṣite na īśaḥ kaṇḍūyane aṅgānām āsana utthāna ceṣṭane
tudanti āma-tvacam daṁśāḥ maśakāḥ matkuṇa ādayaḥ rudantam vigata jñānam kṛmayaḥ kṛmikam yathā
iti evam śaiśavam bhuktvā duḥkham paugaṇḍam eva ca alabdha abhīpsitaḥ ajñānāt iddha manyuḥ śucā arpitaḥ
saha dehena mānena vardhamānena manyunā karoti vigraham kāmī kāmiṣu antāya ca ātmanaḥ
bhūtaiḥ pañcabhiḥ ārabdhe dehe dehī abudhaḥ asakṛt aham mama iti asat grāhaḥ karoti ku-matiḥ matim
tat-artham kurute karma yat-baddhaḥ yāti saṁsṛtim yaḥ anuyāti dadat kleśam avidyā karma bandhanaḥ
yadi asadbhiḥ pathi punaḥ śiśna udara kṛta udyamaiḥ āsthitaḥ ramate jantuḥ tamaḥ viśati pūrva-vat
satyam śaucam dayā maunam buddhiḥ śrīḥ hrīḥ yaśaḥ kṣamā śamaḥ damaḥ bhagaḥ ca iti yat-saṅgāt yāti saṅkṣayam
teṣu aśānteṣu mūḍheṣu khaṇḍita-ātmasu asādhuṣu saṅgam na kuryāt śocyeṣu yoṣit krīḍā-mṛgeṣu ca
na tathā asya bhavet mohaḥ bandhaḥ ca anya-prasaṅgataḥ yoṣit-saṅgāt yathā puṁsaḥ yathā tat-saṅgi saṅgataḥ
prajā-patiḥ svām duhitaram dṛṣṭvā tat-rūpa dharṣitaḥ rohit-bhūtām saḥ anvadhāvat ṛkṣa-rūpī hata trapaḥ
tat sṛṣṭa-sṛṣṭa-sṛṣṭeṣu kaḥ nu akhaṇḍita dhīḥ pumān ṛṣim nārāyaṇam ṛte yoṣit-mayyā iha māyayā
balam me paśya māyāyāḥ strī-mayyāḥ jayinaḥ diśām yā karoti pada-ākrāntān bhrūvi jṛmbheṇa kevalam
saṅgam na kuryāt pramadāsu jātu yogasya pāram param ārurukṣuḥ mat-sevayā pratilabdha ātma-lābhaḥ vadanti yāḥ niraya dvāram asya
yā upayāti śanaiḥ māyā yoṣit deva vinirmitā tām īkṣeta ātmanaḥ mṛtyum tṛṇaiḥ kūpam iva āvṛtam
yām manyate patim mohāt mat-māyām ṛṣabha āyatīm strītvam strī-saṅgataḥ prāptaḥ vitta apatya gṛha pradam
tām ātmanaḥ vijānīyāt pati apatya gṛha ātmakam daiva upasāditam mṛtyum mṛgayoḥ gāyanam yathā
dehena jīva-bhūtena lokāt lokam anuvrajan bhuñjānaḥ eva karmāṇi karoti aviratam pumān
jīvaḥ hi asya anugaḥ dehaḥ bhūta indriya manaḥ mayaḥ tat nirodhaḥ asya maraṇam āvirbhāvaḥ tu sambhavaḥ
dravya upalabdhi sthānasya dravya īkṣā ayogyatā yadā tat pañcatvam aham-mānāt utpattiḥ dravya darśanam yathā akṣṇoḥ dravya avayava darśana ayogyatā yadā tadā eva cakṣuṣaḥ draṣṭuḥ draṣṭṛtva ayogyatā anayoḥ
tasmāt na kāryaḥ santrāsaḥ na kārpaṇyam na sambhramaḥ buddhvā jīva-gatim dhīraḥ mukta-saṅgaḥ caret iha
samyak-darśanayā buddhyā yoga vairāgya yuktayā māyā-viracite loke caret nyasya kalevaram
kapilaḥ uvāca atha yaḥ gṛha-medhīyān dharmān eva āvasan gṛhe kāmam artham ca dharmān svān dogdhi bhūyaḥ piparti tān
saḥ ca api bhagavat-dharmāt kāma-mūḍhaḥ parāk-mukhaḥ yajate kratubhiḥ devān pitṝn ca śraddhayā anvitaḥ
tat śraddhayā ākrānta matiḥ pitṛ deva vrataḥ pumān gatvā cāndramasam lokam soma-pāḥ punaḥ eṣyati
yadā ca ahi-indra śayyāyām śete ananta-āsanaḥ hariḥ tadā lokāḥ layam yānti te ete gṛha-medhinām
ye sva-dharmān na duhyanti dhīrāḥ kāma artha hetave niḥsaṅgāḥ nyasta karmāṇaḥ praśāntāḥ śuddha-cetasaḥ
nivṛtti-dharma niratāḥ nirmamāḥ nirahaṅkṛtāḥ sva-dharma āptena sattvena pariśuddhena cetasā
sūrya-dvāreṇa te yānti puruṣam viśvataḥ-mukham para-avara-īśam prakṛtim asya utpatti anta bhāvanam
dvi-parārdha avasāne yaḥ pralayaḥ brahmaṇaḥ tu te tāvat adhyāsate lokam parasya para-cintakāḥ
kṣmā ambhaḥ anala anila viyat manaḥ indriya artha bhūta ādibhiḥ parivṛtam pratisañjihīrṣuḥ avyākṛtam viśati yarhi guṇa-traya-ātmā kālam para-ākhyam anubhūya paraḥ svayambhūḥ
evam paretya bhagavantam anupraviṣṭāḥ ye yoginaḥ jita marut manasaḥ virāgāḥ tena eva sākam amṛtam puruṣam purāṇam brahma pradhānam upayānti agata abhimānāḥ
atha tam sarva-bhūtānām hṛt-padmeṣu kṛta-ālayam śruta-anubhāvam śaraṇam vraja bhāvena bhāmini
ādyaḥ sthira-carāṇām yaḥ veda-garbhaḥ saha ṛṣibhiḥ yoga-īśvaraiḥ kumāra-ādyaiḥ siddhaiḥ yoga-pravartakaiḥ bheda-dṛṣṭyā abhimānena niḥsaṅgena api karmaṇā kartṛtvāt sa-guṇam brahma puruṣam puruṣa-ṛṣabham saḥ saṁsṛtya punaḥ kāle kālena īśvara-mūrtinā jāte guṇa-vyatikare yathā pūrvam prajāyate aiśvaryam pārameṣṭhyam ca te api dharma vinirmitam niṣevya punaḥ āyānti guṇa-vyatikare sati
ye tu iha āsakta manasaḥ karmasu śraddhayā anvitāḥ kurvanti apratiṣiddhāni nityāni api ca kṛtsnaśaḥ
rajasā kuṇṭha manasaḥ kāma-ātmānaḥ ajita indriyāḥ pitṝn yajanti anudinam gṛheṣu abhirata āśayāḥ
trai-vargikāḥ te puruṣāḥ vimukhāḥ hari-medhasaḥ kathāyām kathanīya uru-vikramasya madhu-dviṣaḥ
nūnam daivena vihatāḥ ye ca acyuta kathā sudhām hitvā śṛṇvanti asat-gāthāḥ purīṣam iva viṭ-bhujaḥ
dakṣiṇena pathā aryamṇaḥ pitṛ-lokam vrajanti te prajām anu prajāyante śmaśāna anta kriyā kṛtaḥ
tataḥ te kṣīṇa su-kṛtāḥ punaḥ lokam imam sati patanti vivaśāḥ devaiḥ sadyaḥ vibhraṁśita udayāḥ
tasmāt tvam sarva-bhāvena bhajasva parameṣṭhinam tat-guṇa āśrayayā bhaktyā bhajanīya pada-ambujam
vāsudeve bhagavati bhakti-yogaḥ prayojitaḥ janayati āśu vairāgyam jñānam yat brahma-darśanam
yadā asya cittam artheṣu sameṣu indriya-vṛttibhiḥ na vigṛhṇāti vaiṣamyam priyam apriyam iti uta
saḥ tadā eva ātmanā ātmānam niḥsaṅgam sama-darśanam heya upādeya rahitam ārūḍham padam īkṣate
jñāna mātram param brahma parama-ātmā īśvaraḥ pumān dṛśi-ādibhiḥ pṛthak bhāvaiḥ bhagavān ekaḥ īyate
etāvān eva yogena samagreṇa iha yoginaḥ yujyate abhimataḥ hi arthaḥ yat asaṅgaḥ tu kṛtsnaśaḥ
jñānam ekam parācīnaiḥ indriyaiḥ brahma nirguṇam avabhāti artha-rūpeṇa bhrāntyā śabda-ādi dharmiṇā
yathā mahān aham-rūpaḥ tri-vṛt pañca-vidhaḥ sva-rāṭ ekādaśa-vidhaḥ tasya vapuḥ aṇḍam jagat yataḥ
etat vai śraddhayā bhaktyā yoga-abhyāsena nityaśaḥ samāhita-ātmā niḥsaṅgaḥ viraktyā paripaśyati
iti etat kathitam gurvi jñānam tat brahma darśanam yena anubuddhyate tattvam prakṛteḥ puruṣasya ca
jñāna-yogaḥ ca mat-niṣṭhaḥ nairguṇyaḥ bhakti lakṣaṇaḥ dvayoḥ api ekaḥ eva arthaḥ bhagavat śabda lakṣaṇaḥ
yathā indriyaiḥ pṛthak-dvāraiḥ arthaḥ bahu-guṇa āśrayaḥ ekaḥ nānā īyate tadvat bhagavān śāstra-vartmabhiḥ
kriyayā kratubhiḥ dānaiḥ tapaḥ svādhyāya marśanaiḥ ātma-indriya-jayena api sannyāsena ca karmaṇām yogena vividha-aṅgena bhakti-yogena ca eva hi dharmeṇa ubhaya-cihnena yaḥ pravṛtti nivṛtti-mān ātma-tattva avabodhena vairāgyeṇa dṛḍhena ca īyate bhagavān ebhiḥ sa-guṇaḥ nirguṇaḥ sva-dṛk
prāvocam bhakti-yogasya svarūpam te catuḥ-vidham kālasya ca avyakta-gateḥ yaḥ antardhāvati jantuṣu
jīvasya saṁsṛtīḥ bahvīḥ avidyā karma nirmitāḥ yāsu aṅga praviśan ātmā na veda gatim ātmanaḥ
na etat khalāya upadiśet na avinītāya karhicit na stabdhāya na bhinnāya na eva dharma-dhvajāya ca
na lolupāya upadiśet na gṛha-ārūḍha-cetase na abhaktāya ca me jātu na mat bhakta dviṣām api
śraddadhānāya bhaktāya vinītāya anasūyave bhūteṣu kṛta-maitrāya śuśrūṣā abhiratāya ca
bahiḥ jāta-virāgāya śānta-cittāya dīyatām nirmatsarāya śucaye yasya aham preyasām priyaḥ
yaḥ idam śṛṇuyāt amba śraddhayā puruṣaḥ sakṛt yaḥ vā abhidhatte mat-cittaḥ saḥ hi eti padavīm ca me
maitreyaḥ uvāca evam niśamya kapilasya vacaḥ janitrī sā kardamasya dayitā kila devahūtiḥ visrasta moha-paṭalā tam abhipraṇamya tuṣṭāva tattva viṣaya aṅkita siddhi bhūmim
devahūtiḥ uvāca atha api ajaḥ antaḥ-salile śayānam bhūta indriya artha ātma mayam vapuḥ te guṇa-pravāham sat aśeṣa bījam dadhyau svayam yat jaṭhara abja jātaḥ
saḥ eva viśvasya bhavān vidhatte guṇa-pravāheṇa vibhakta vīryaḥ sarga-ādi anīhaḥ avitatha abhisandhiḥ ātma-īśvaraḥ atarkya sahasra śaktiḥ
saḥ tvam bhṛtaḥ me jaṭhareṇa nātha katham nu yasya udare etat āsīt viśvam yuga-ante vaṭa-patre ekaḥ śete sma māyā śiśuḥ aṅghri pānaḥ
tvam deha tantraḥ praśamāya pāpmanām nideśa-bhājām ca vibho vibhūtaye yathā avatārāḥ tava sūkara-ādayaḥ tathā ayam api ātma-patha upalabdhaye
yat nāmadheya śravaṇa anukīrtanāt yat prahvaṇāt yat smaraṇāt api kvacit śva-adaḥ api sadyaḥ savanāya kalpate kutaḥ punaḥ te bhagavan nu darśanāt
aho bata śva-pacaḥ ataḥ garīyān yat jihvā-agre vartate nāma tubhyam tepuḥ tapaḥ te juhuvuḥ sasnuḥ āryāḥ brahma anūcuḥ nāma gṛṇanti ye te
tam tvām aham brahma param pumāṁsam pratyak-srotasi ātmani saṁvibhāvyam sva-tejasā dhvasta guṇa-pravāham vande viṣṇum kapilam veda-garbham
maitreyaḥ uvāca īḍitaḥ bhagavān evam kapila-ākhyaḥ paraḥ pumān vācā aviklavayā iti āha mātaram mātṛ-vatsalaḥ
kapilaḥ uvāca mārgeṇa anena mātaḥ te su-sevyena uditena me āsthitena parām kāṣṭhām acirāt avarotsyasi
śraddhatsva etat matam mahyam juṣṭam yat brahma-vādibhiḥ yena mām abhayam yāyāḥ mṛtyum ṛcchanti a-tat-vidaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca iti pradarśya bhagavān satīm tām ātmanaḥ gatim sva-mātrā brahma-vādinyā kapilaḥ anumataḥ yayau
sā ca api tanaya uktena yoga-ādeśena yoga-yuk tasmin āśrame āpīḍe sarasvatyāḥ samāhitā
abhīkṣṇa avagāha kapiśān jaṭilān kuṭila alakān ātmānam ca ugra-tapasā bibhratī cīriṇam kṛśam
prajā-pateḥ kardamasya tapaḥ yoga vijṛmbhitam sva-gārhasthyam anaupamyam prārthyam vaimānikaiḥ api
payaḥ phena nibhāḥ śayyāḥ dāntāḥ rukma paricchadāḥ āsanāni ca haimāni su-sparśa āstaraṇāni ca
svaccha sphaṭika kuḍyeṣu mahā-mārakateṣu ca ratna-pradīpāḥ ābhānti lalanāḥ ratna saṁyutāḥ
gṛha-udyānam kusumitaiḥ ramyam bahu-amara-drumaiḥ kūjat vihaṅga mithunam gāyat matta madhu-vratam
yatra praviṣṭam ātmānam vibudha-anucarāḥ jaguḥ vāpyām utpala gandhinyām kardamena upalālitam
hitvā tat īpsita-tamam api ākhaṇḍala-yoṣitām kiñcit cakāra vadanam putra-viśleṣaṇa āturā
vanam pravrajite patyau apatya-viraha āturā jñāta-tattvā api abhūt naṣṭe vatse gauḥ iva vatsalā
tam eva dhyāyatī devam apatyam kapilam harim babhūva acirataḥ vatsa niḥspṛhā tādṛśe gṛhe
dhyāyatī bhagavat-rūpam yat āha dhyāna-gocaram sutaḥ prasanna-vadanam samasta vyasta cintayā
bhakti-pravāha-yogena vairāgyeṇa balīyasā yukta-anuṣṭhāna jātena jñānena brahma-hetunā viśuddhena tadā ātmānam ātmanā viśvataḥ-mukham sva-anubhūtyā tiraḥ-bhūta māyā-guṇa viśeṣaṇam
brahmaṇi avasthita matiḥ bhagavati ātma-saṁśraye nivṛtta jīva āpattitvāt kṣīṇa kleśa āpta nirvṛtiḥ
nitya ārūḍha samādhitvāt parāvṛtta guṇa bhramā na sasmāra tadā ātmānam svapne dṛṣṭam iva utthitaḥ
tat-dehaḥ parataḥ poṣaḥ api akṛśaḥ ca ādhi asambhavāt babhau malaiḥ avacchannaḥ sa-dhūmaḥ iva pāvakaḥ
sva-aṅgam tapaḥ yoga mayam mukta keśam gata ambaram daiva guptam na bubudhe vāsudeva praviṣṭa dhīḥ
evam sā kapila uktena mārgeṇa acirataḥ param ātmānam brahma nirvāṇam bhagavantam avāpa ha
tat vīra āsīt puṇya-tamam kṣetram trai-lokya viśrutam nāmnā siddha-padam yatra sā saṁsiddhim upeyuṣī
tasyāḥ tat yoga vidhuta mārtyam martyam abhūt sarit srotasām pravarā saumya siddhi-dā siddha sevitā
kapilaḥ api mahā-yogī bhagavān pituḥ āśramāt mātaram samanujñāpya prāk-udīcīm diśam yayau
siddha cāraṇa gandharvaiḥ munibhiḥ ca apsaraḥ-gaṇaiḥ stūyamānaḥ samudreṇa datta arhaṇa niketanaḥ
āste yogam samāsthāya sāṅkhya ācāryaiḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ trayāṇām api lokānām upaśāntyai samāhitaḥ
etat nigaditam tāta yat pṛṣṭaḥ aham tava anagha kapilasya ca saṁvādaḥ devahūtyāḥ ca pāvanaḥ
yaḥ idam anuśṛṇoti yaḥ abhidhatte kapila-muneḥ matam ātma-yoga guhyam bhagavati kṛta-dhīḥ suparṇa-ketau upalabhate bhagavat pada-aravindam
maitreyaḥ uvāca manoḥ tu śatarūpāyām tisraḥ kanyāḥ ca jajñire ākūtiḥ devahūtiḥ ca prasūtiḥ iti viśrutāḥ
ākūtim rucaye prādāt api bhrātṛ-matīm nṛpaḥ putrikā dharmam āśritya śatarūpā anumoditaḥ
prajāpatiḥ saḥ bhagavān ruciḥ tasyām ajījanat mithunam brahma-varcasvī parameṇa samādhinā
yaḥ tayoḥ puruṣaḥ sākṣāt viṣṇuḥ yajña svarūpa-dhṛk yā strī sā dakṣiṇā bhūteḥ aṁśa-bhūtā anapāyinī
āninye sva-gṛham putryāḥ putram vitata-rociṣam svāyambhuvaḥ mudā yuktaḥ ruciḥ jagrāha dakṣiṇām
tām kāmayānām bhagavān uvāha yajuṣām patiḥ tuṣṭāyām toṣam āpannaḥ ajanayat dvādaśa ātmajān
toṣaḥ pratoṣaḥ santoṣaḥ bhadraḥ śāntiḥ iḍaspatiḥ idhmaḥ kaviḥ vibhuḥ svahnaḥ sudevaḥ rocanaḥ dvi-ṣaṭ
tuṣitāḥ nāma te devāḥ āsan svāyambhuva antare marīci-miśrāḥ ṛṣayaḥ yajñaḥ sura-gaṇa-īśvaraḥ
priyavrata uttānapādau manu-putrau mahā-ojasau tat putra pautra naptṝṇām anuvṛttam tat-antaram
devahūtim adāt tāta kardamāya ātmajām manuḥ tat-sambandhi śruta-prāyam bhavatā gadataḥ mama
dakṣāya brahma-putrāya prasūtim bhagavān manuḥ prāyacchat yat-kṛtaḥ sargaḥ tri-lokyām vitataḥ mahān
yāḥ kardama-sutāḥ proktāḥ nava brahma-ṛṣi patnayaḥ tāsām prasūti-prasavam procyamānam nibodha me
patnī marīceḥ tu kalā suṣuve kardama-ātmajā kaśyapam pūrṇimānam ca yayoḥ āpūritam jagat
pūrṇimā asūta virajam viśvagam ca param-tapa devakulyām hareḥ pāda-śaucāt yā abhūt sarit divaḥ
atreḥ patnī anasūyā trīn jajñe su-yaśasaḥ sutān dattam durvāsasam somam ātma īśa brahma sambhavān
viduraḥ uvāca atreḥ gṛhe sura-śreṣṭhāḥ sthiti utpatti anta hetavaḥ kiñcit cikīrṣavaḥ jātāḥ etat ākhyāhi me guro
maitreyaḥ uvāca brahmaṇā coditaḥ sṛṣṭau atriḥ brahma-vidām varaḥ saha patnyā yayau ṛkṣam kula-adrim tapasi sthitaḥ
tasmin prasūna-stabaka palāśa aśoka kānane vārbhiḥ sravadbhiḥ udghuṣṭe nirvindhyāyāḥ samantataḥ
prāṇāyāmena saṁyamya manaḥ varṣa-śatam muniḥ atiṣṭhat eka-pādena nirdvandvaḥ anila bhojanaḥ
śaraṇam tam prapadye aham yaḥ eva jagat-īśvaraḥ prajām ātma-samām mahyam prayacchatu iti cintayan
tapyamānam tri-bhuvanam prāṇāyāma edhasā agninā nirgatena muneḥ mūrdhnaḥ samīkṣya prabhavaḥ trayaḥ
apsaraḥ muni gandharva siddha vidyādhara uragaiḥ vitāyamāna yaśasaḥ tat āśrama-padam yayuḥ
tat prādurbhāva saṁyoga vidyotita manāḥ muniḥ uttiṣṭhan eka-pādena dadarśa vibudha ṛṣabhān
praṇamya daṇḍa-vat bhūmau upatasthe arhaṇa añjaliḥ vṛṣa haṁsa suparṇa sthān svaiḥ svaiḥ cihnaiḥ ca cihnitān
kṛpā-avalokena hasat vadanena upalambhitān tat rociṣā pratihate nimīlya muniḥ akṣiṇī
cetaḥ tat-pravaṇam yuñjan astāvīt saṁhata-añjaliḥ ślakṣṇayā sūktayā vācā sarva-loka garīyasaḥ atriḥ uvāca viśva udbhava sthiti layeṣu vibhajyamānaiḥ māyā-guṇaiḥ anuyugam vigṛhīta dehāḥ te brahma viṣṇu giriśāḥ praṇataḥ asmi aham vaḥ tebhyaḥ kaḥ eva bhavatām me iha upahūtaḥ
ekaḥ mayā iha bhagavān vividha pradhānaiḥ cittī-kṛtaḥ prajananāya katham nu yūyam atra āgatāḥ tanu-bhṛtām manasaḥ api dūrāt brūta prasīdata mahān iha vismayaḥ me
maitreyaḥ uvāca iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā trayaḥ te vibudha ṛṣabhāḥ pratyāhuḥ ślakṣṇayā vācā prahasya tam ṛṣim prabho
devāḥ ūcuḥ yathā kṛtaḥ te saṅkalpaḥ bhāvyam tena eva na anyathā sat-saṅkalpasya te brahman yat vai dhyāyati te vayam
atha asmat aṁśa-bhūtāḥ te ātmajāḥ loka-viśrutāḥ bhavitāraḥ aṅga bhadram te visrapsyanti ca te yaśaḥ
evam kāma-varam dattvā pratijagmuḥ sura-īśvarāḥ sabhājitāḥ tayoḥ samyak dampatyoḥ miṣatoḥ tataḥ
somaḥ abhūt brahmaṇaḥ aṁśena dattaḥ viṣṇoḥ tu yoga-vit durvāsāḥ śaṅkarasya aṁśaḥ nibodha aṅgirasaḥ prajāḥ
śraddhā tu aṅgirasaḥ patnī catasraḥ asūta kanyakāḥ sinīvālī kuhūḥ rākā caturthī anumatiḥ tathā
tat putrau aparau āstām khyātau svārociṣe antare utathyaḥ bhagavān sākṣāt brahmiṣṭhaḥ ca bṛhaspatiḥ
pulastyaḥ ajanayat patnyām agastyam ca havirbhuvi saḥ anya-janmani dahra-agniḥ viśravāḥ ca mahā-tapāḥ
tasya yakṣa-patiḥ devaḥ kuberaḥ tu iḍaviḍā sutaḥ rāvaṇaḥ kumbhakarṇaḥ ca tathā anyasyām vibhīṣaṇaḥ
pulahasya gatiḥ bhāryā trīn asūta satī sutān karma-śreṣṭham varīyāṁsam sahiṣṇum ca mahā-mate
kratoḥ api kriyā bhāryā vālakhilyān asūyata ṛṣīn ṣaṣṭi sahasrāṇi jvalataḥ brahma-tejasā
ūrjāyām jajñire putrāḥ vasiṣṭhasya parantapa citraketu pradhānāḥ te sapta brahma-ṛṣayaḥ amalāḥ
citraketuḥ surociḥ ca virajāḥ mitraḥ eva ca ulbaṇaḥ vasubhṛdyānaḥ dyumān śakti-ādayaḥ apare
cittiḥ tu atharvaṇaḥ patnī lebhe putram dhṛta-vratam dadhyañcam aśvaśirasam bhṛgoḥ vaṁśam nibodha me
bhṛguḥ khyātyām mahā-bhāgaḥ patnyām putrān ajījanat dhātāram ca vidhātāram śriyam ca bhagavat-parām
āyatim niyatim ca eva sute meruḥ tayoḥ adāt tābhyām tayoḥ abhavatām mṛkaṇḍaḥ prāṇaḥ eva ca
mārkaṇḍeyaḥ mṛkaṇḍasya prāṇāt vedaśirāḥ muniḥ kaviḥ ca bhārgavaḥ yasya bhagavān uśanā sutaḥ
te ete munayaḥ kṣattaḥ lokān sargaiḥ abhāvayan eṣaḥ kardama dauhitra santānaḥ kathitaḥ tava śṛṇvataḥ śraddadhānasya sadyaḥ pāpa-haraḥ paraḥ prasūtim mānavīm dakṣaḥ upayeme hi aja-ātmajaḥ
tasyām sasarja duhitṝḥ ṣoḍaśa amala-locanāḥ trayodaśa adāt dharmāya tathā ekām agnaye vibhuḥ
pitṛbhyaḥ ekām yuktebhyaḥ bhavāya ekām bhava-chide śraddhā, maitrī, dayā, śāntiḥ, tuṣṭiḥ, puṣṭiḥ, kriyā, unnatiḥ, buddhiḥ, medhā, titikṣā, hrīḥ, mūrtiḥ dharmasya patnayaḥ śraddhā asūta śubham maitrī prasādam abhayam dayā śāntiḥ sukham mudam tuṣṭiḥ smayam puṣṭiḥ asūyata yogam kriyā unnatiḥ darpam artham buddhiḥ asūyata medhā smṛtim titikṣā tu kṣemam hrīḥ praśrayam sutam mūrtiḥ sarva-guṇa utpattiḥ nara-nārāyaṇau ṛṣī
yayoḥ janmani adaḥ viśvam abhyanandat su-nirvṛtam manāṁsi kakubhaḥ vātāḥ praseduḥ saritaḥ adrayaḥ
divi avādyanta tūryāṇi petuḥ kusuma vṛṣṭayaḥ munayaḥ tuṣṭuvuḥ tuṣṭāḥ jaguḥ gandharva kinnarāḥ nṛtyanti sma striyaḥ devyaḥ āsīt parama-maṅgalam devāḥ brahma-ādayaḥ sarve upatasthuḥ abhiṣṭavaiḥ
devāḥ ūcuḥ yaḥ māyayā viracitam nijayā ātmani idam khe rūpa-bhedam iva tat praticakṣaṇāya etena dharma-sadane ṛṣi-mūrtinā adya prāduścakāra puruṣāya namaḥ parasmai
saḥ ayam sthiti vyatikara upaśamāya sṛṣṭān sattvena naḥ sura-gaṇān anumeya-tattvaḥ dṛśyāt adabhra-karuṇena vilokanena yat śrī-niketam amalam kṣipata aravindam
evam sura-gaṇaiḥ tāta bhagavantau abhiṣṭutau labdha avalokaiḥ yayatuḥ arcitau gandha-mādanam
tau imau vai bhagavataḥ hareḥ aṁśau iha āgatau bhāra-vyayāya ca bhuvaḥ kṛṣṇau yadu-kuru-udvahau
svāhā abhimāninaḥ ca agneḥ ātmajān trīn ajījanat pāvakam pavamānam ca śucim ca huta-bhojanam
tebhyaḥ agnayaḥ samabhavan catvāriṁśat ca pañca ca te eva ekona-pañcāśat sākam pitṛ-pitāmahaiḥ
vaitānike karmaṇi yat nāmabhiḥ brahma-vādibhiḥ āgneyyaḥ iṣṭayaḥ yajñe nirūpyante agnayaḥ tu te
agniṣvāttāḥ barhiṣadaḥ saumyāḥ pitaraḥ ājyapāḥ sa-agnayaḥ anagnayaḥ teṣām patnī dākṣāyaṇī svadhā
tebhyaḥ dadhāra kanye dve vayunām dhāriṇīm svadhā ubhe te brahma-vādinyau jñāna-vijñāna-pāra-ge
bhavasya patnī tu satī bhavam devam anuvratā ātmanaḥ sadṛśam putram na lebhe guṇa-śīlataḥ
pitari apratirūpe sve bhavāya anāgase ruṣā aprauḍhā eva ātmanā ātmānam ajahāt yoga-saṁyutā
viduraḥ uvāca bhave śīlavatām śreṣṭhe dakṣaḥ duhitṛ-vatsalaḥ vidveṣam akarot kasmāt anādṛtya ātmajām satīm
kaḥ tam cara-acara gurum nirvairam śānta-vigraham ātma-ārāmam katham dveṣṭi jagataḥ daivatam mahat
etat ākhyāhi me brahman jāmātuḥ śvaśurasya ca vidveṣaḥ tu yataḥ prāṇān tatyaje dustyajān satī
maitreyaḥ uvāca purā viśva-sṛjām satre sametāḥ parama-ṛṣayaḥ tathā amara-gaṇāḥ sarve sa-anugāḥ munayaḥ agnayaḥ
tatra praviṣṭam ṛṣayaḥ dṛṣṭvā arkam iva rociṣā bhrājamānam vitimiram kurvantam tat mahat sadaḥ
udatiṣṭhan sadasyāḥ te sva-dhiṣṇyebhyaḥ saha-agnayaḥ ṛte viriñcām śarvam ca tat bhāsa ākṣipta cetasaḥ
sadasaḥ patibhiḥ dakṣaḥ bhagavān sādhu sat-kṛtaḥ ajam loka-gurum natvā niṣasāda tat-ājñayā
prāk niṣaṇṇam mṛḍam dṛṣṭvā na amṛṣyat tat anādṛtaḥ uvāca vāmam cakṣurbhyām abhivīkṣya dahan iva
śrūyatām brahma-ṛṣayaḥ me saha-devāḥ saha-agnayaḥ sādhūnām bruvataḥ vṛttam na ajñānāt na ca matsarāt
ayam tu loka-pālānām yaśaḥ-ghnaḥ nirapatrapaḥ sadbhiḥ ācaritaḥ panthāḥ yena stabdhena dūṣitaḥ
eṣaḥ me śiṣyatām prāptaḥ yat me duhituḥ agrahīt pāṇim vipra-agni mukhataḥ sāvitryāḥ iva sādhuvat
gṛhītvā mṛga-śāva akṣyāḥ pāṇim markaṭa locanaḥ pratyutthāna abhivāda arhe vācā api akṛta na ucitam
lupta-kriyāya aśucaye mānine bhinna-setave anicchan api adām bālām śūdrāya iva uśatīm giram
preta-āvāseṣu ghoreṣu pretaiḥ bhūta-gaṇaiḥ vṛtaḥ aṭati unmatta-vat nagnaḥ vyupta-keśaḥ hasan rudan citā bhasma kṛta-snānaḥ preta srak nṛ-asthi-bhūṣaṇaḥ śiva-apadeśaḥ hi aśivaḥ mattaḥ matta-jana-priyaḥ patiḥ pramatha-nāthānām tamaḥ-mātra-ātmaka-ātmanām
tasmai unmāda-nāthāya naṣṭa-śaucāya durhṛde dattā bata mayā sādhvī codite parameṣṭhinā
maitreyaḥ uvāca vinindya evam saḥ giriśam apratīpam avasthitam dakṣaḥ atha apaḥ upaspṛśya kruddhaḥ śaptum pracakrame
ayam tu deva-yajane indra-upendra-ādibhiḥ bhavaḥ saha bhāgam na labhatām devaiḥ deva-gaṇa-adhamaḥ
niṣidhyamānaḥ saḥ sadasya-mukhyaiḥ dakṣaḥ giritrāya visṛjya śāpam tasmāt viniṣkramya vivṛddha-manyuḥ jagāma kauravya nijam niketanam
vijñāya śāpam giriśa anuga-agraṇīḥ nandīśvaraḥ roṣa kaṣāya dūṣitaḥ dakṣāya śāpam visasarja dāruṇam ye ca anvamodan tat-avācyatām dvijāḥ
yaḥ etat martyam uddiśya bhagavati apratidruhi druhyati ajñaḥ pṛthak-dṛṣṭiḥ tattvataḥ vimukhaḥ bhavet
gṛheṣu kūṭa-dharmeṣu saktaḥ grāmya-sukha-icchayā karma-tantram vitanute veda-vāda vipanna-dhīḥ
buddhyā para-abhidhyāyinyā vismṛta-ātma-gatiḥ paśuḥ strī-kāmaḥ saḥ astu atitarām dakṣaḥ basta-mukhaḥ acirāt
vidyā-buddhiḥ avidyāyām karma-mayyām asau jaḍaḥ saṁsarantu iha ye ca amum anu śarva avamāninam
giraḥ śrutāyāḥ puṣpiṇyāḥ madhu-gandhena bhūriṇā mathnā ca unmathita-ātmānaḥ sammuhyantu hara-dviṣaḥ
sarva-bhakṣāḥ dvijāḥ vṛttyai dhṛta-vidyā tapaḥ vratāḥ vitta deha indriya ārāmāḥ yācakāḥ vicarantu iha
tasya evam vadataḥ śāpam śrutvā dvija-kulāya vai bhṛguḥ pratyasṛjat śāpam brahma-daṇḍam duratyayam
bhava-vrata-dharāḥ ye ca ye ca tān samanuvratāḥ pāṣaṇḍinaḥ te bhavantu sat-śāstra-paripanthinaḥ
naṣṭa-śaucāḥ mūḍha-dhiyaḥ jaṭā-bhasma-asthi-dhāriṇaḥ viśantu śiva-dīkṣāyām yatra daivam sura-āsavam
brahma ca brāhmaṇān ca eva yat yūyam parinindatha setum vidhāraṇam puṁsām ataḥ pāṣaṇḍam āśritāḥ
eṣaḥ eva hi lokānām śivaḥ panthāḥ sanātanaḥ yam pūrve ca anusantasthuḥ yat pramāṇam janārdanaḥ
tat brahma paramam śuddham satām vartma sanātanam vigarhya yāta pāṣaṇḍam daivam vaḥ yatra bhūta-rāṭ
maitreyaḥ uvāca tasya evam vadataḥ śāpam bhṛgoḥ saḥ bhagavān bhavaḥ niścakrāma tataḥ kiñcit vimanāḥ iva sa-anugaḥ
te api viśva-sṛjaḥ satram sahasra parivatsarān saṁvidhāya maheṣvāsa yatra ijyaḥ ṛṣabhaḥ hariḥ
āplutya avabhṛtham yatra gaṅgā yamunayā anvitā virajena ātmanā sarve svam svam dhāma yayuḥ tataḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca sadā vidviṣatoḥ evam kālaḥ vai dhriyamāṇayoḥ jāmātuḥ śvaśurasya api su-mahān aticakrame
yadā abhiṣiktaḥ dakṣaḥ tu brahmaṇā parameṣṭhinā prajāpatīnām sarveṣām ādhipatye smayaḥ abhavat
iṣṭvā saḥ vājapeyena brahmiṣṭhān abhibhūya ca bṛhaspati-savam nāma samārebhe kratu-uttamam
tasmin brahma-ṛṣayaḥ sarve devarṣi pitṛ devatāḥ āsan kṛta-svasti-ayanāḥ tat-patnyaḥ ca sa-bhartṛkāḥ
tat upaśrutya nabhasi khe-carāṇām prajalpatām satī dākṣāyaṇī devī pitṛ-yajña-mahā-utsavam vrajantīḥ sarvataḥ digbhyaḥ upadeva-vara-striyaḥ vimāna-yānāḥ sa-preṣṭhāḥ niṣka-kaṇṭhīḥ su-vāsasaḥ dṛṣṭvā sva-nilaya-abhyāśe lola-akṣīḥ mṛṣṭa-kuṇḍalāḥ patim bhūta-patim devam autsukyāt abhyabhāṣata
satī uvāca prajāpateḥ te śvaśurasya sāmpratam niryāpitaḥ yajña-mahā-utsavaḥ kila vayam ca tatra abhisarāma vāma te yadi arthitā amī vibudhāḥ vrajanti hi
tasmin bhaginyaḥ mama bhartṛbhiḥ svakaiḥ dhruvam gamiṣyanti suhṛt-didṛkṣavaḥ aham ca tasmin bhavatā abhikāmaye saha upanītam paribarham arhitum
tatra svasṝḥ me nanu bhartṛ-sammitāḥ mātṛ-svasṝḥ klinna-dhiyam ca mātaram drakṣye cira-utkaṇṭha-manāḥ mahā-ṛṣibhiḥ unnīyamānam ca mṛḍa adhvara dhvajam
tvayi etat āścaryam aja ātma-māyayā vinirmitam bhāti guṇa-traya-ātmakam tathā api aham yoṣit atattva-vit ca te dīnā didṛkṣe bhava me bhava-kṣitim
paśya prayāntīḥ abhava anya-yoṣitaḥ api alaṅkṛtāḥ kānta-sakhāḥ varūthaśaḥ yāsām vrajadbhiḥ śiti-kaṇṭha maṇḍitam nabhaḥ vimānaiḥ kala-haṁsa pāṇḍubhiḥ
katham sutāyāḥ pitṛ-geha-kautukam niśamya dehaḥ sura-varya na iṅgate anāhutāḥ api abhiyanti sauhṛdam bhartuḥ guroḥ deha-kṛtaḥ ca ketanam
tat me prasīda idam amartya vāñchitam kartum bhavān kāruṇikaḥ bata arhati tvayā ātmanaḥ ardhe aham adabhra-cakṣuṣā nirūpitā mā anugṛhāṇa yācitaḥ
ṛṣiḥ uvāca evam giritraḥ priyayā abhibhāṣitaḥ pratyabhyadhatta prahasan suhṛt-priyaḥ saṁsmāritaḥ marma-bhidaḥ kuvāk-iṣūn yān āha kaḥ viśva-sṛjām samakṣataḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca tvayā uditam śobhanam eva śobhane anāhutāḥ api abhiyanti bandhuṣu te yadi anutpādita-doṣa-dṛṣṭayaḥ balīyasā anātmya-madena manyunā
vidyā tapaḥ vitta vapuḥ vayaḥ kulaiḥ satām guṇaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ asattama-itaraiḥ smṛtau hatāyām bhṛta-māna-durdṛśaḥ stabdhāḥ na paśyanti hi dhāma bhūyasām
na etādṛśānām sva-jana vyapekṣayā gṛhān pratīyāt anavasthita ātmanām ye abhyāgatān vakra-dhiyā abhicakṣate āropita-bhrūbhiḥ amarṣaṇa akṣibhiḥ
tathā aribhiḥ na vyathate śilīmukhaiḥ śete ardita aṅgaḥ hṛdayena dūyatā svānām yathā vakra-dhiyām duruktibhiḥ divā-niśam tapyati marma-tāḍitaḥ
vyaktam tvam utkṛṣṭa-gateḥ prajāpateḥ priyā ātmajānām asi subhru me matā tathā api mānam na pituḥ prapatsyase mat-āśrayāt kaḥ paritapyate yataḥ

ā brahma-ghoṣa ūrjita yajña vaiśasam viprarṣi-juṣṭam vibudhaiḥ ca sarvaśaḥ mṛt dāru ayaḥ kāñcana darbha carmabhiḥ nisṛṣṭa bhāṇḍam yajanam samāviśat

ataḥ tava utpannam idam kalevaram na dhārayiṣye śiti-kaṇṭha-garhiṇaḥ jagdhasya mohāt hi viśuddhim andhasaḥ jugupsitasya uddharaṇam pracakṣate
na veda-vādān anuvartate matiḥ sve eva loke ramataḥ mahā-muneḥ yathā gatiḥ deva-manuṣyayoḥ pṛthak sve eva dharme na param kṣipet sthitaḥ

mā vaḥ padavyaḥ pitaḥ asmat-āsthitāḥ yāḥ yajña-śālāsu na dhūma-vartmabhiḥ tat-anna-tṛptaiḥ asu-bhṛdbhiḥ īḍitāḥ avyakta-liṅgāḥ avadhūta-sevitāḥ
na etena dehena hare kṛta-āgasaḥ deha-udbhavena alam alam ku-janmanā vrīḍā mama abhūt ku-jana-prasaṅgataḥ tat janma dhik yaḥ mahatām avadya-kṛt
gotram tvadīyam bhagavān vṛṣadhvajaḥ dākṣāyaṇī iti āha yadā sudurmanāḥ vyapeta narma-smitam āśu tadā aham vyutsrakṣye etat kuṇapam tvat-aṅga-jam
maitreyaḥ uvāca iti adhvare dakṣam anūdya śatru-han kṣitau udīcīm niṣasāda śānta-vāk spṛṣṭvā jalam pīta-dukūla-saṁvṛtā nimīlya dṛk yoga-patham samāviśat
kṛtvā samānau anilau jita-āsanā sā udānam utthāpya ca nābhi-cakrataḥ śanaiḥ hṛdi sthāpya dhiyā urasi sthitam kaṇṭhāt bhruvoḥ madhyam aninditā ānayat
evam sva-deham mahatām mahīyasā muhuḥ samāropitam aṅkam ādarāt jihāsatī dakṣa-ruṣā manasvinī dadhāra gātreṣu anila-agni-dhāraṇām
tataḥ sva-bhartuḥ caraṇa-ambuja-āsavam jagat-guroḥ cintayatī na ca aparam dadarśa dehaḥ hata-kalmaṣaḥ satī sadyaḥ prajajvāla samādhi-ja-agninā
tat paśyatām khe bhuvi ca adbhutam mahat hā hā iti vādaḥ su-mahān ajāyata hanta priyā daiva-tamasya devī jahau asūn kena satī prakopitā
aho anātmyam mahat asya paśyata prajāpateḥ yasya cara-acaram prajāḥ jahau asūn yat vimatā ātma-jā satī manasvinī mānam abhīkṣṇam arhati
saḥ ayam durmarṣa-hṛdayaḥ brahma-dhruk ca loke apakīrtim mahatīm avāpsyati yat-aṅga-jām svām puruṣa-dviṭ udyatām na pratyaṣedhat mṛtaye aparādhataḥ
vadati evam jane satyāḥ dṛṣṭvā asu-tyāgam adbhutam dakṣam tat-pārṣadāḥ hantum udatiṣṭhan udāyudhāḥ
teṣām āpatatām vegam niśāmya bhagavān bhṛguḥ yajña-ghna-ghnena yajuṣā dakṣiṇa-agnau juhāva ha
adhvaryuṇā hūyamāne devāḥ utpetuḥ ojasā ṛbhavaḥ nāma tapasā somam prāptāḥ sahasraśaḥ
taiḥ alāta-āyudhaiḥ sarve pramathāḥ saha-guhyakāḥ hanyamānāḥ diśaḥ bhejuḥ uśadbhiḥ brahma-tejasā

kruddhaḥ su-daṣṭa-oṣṭha-puṭaḥ saḥ dhūḥ-jaṭiḥ jaṭām taḍit vahni saṭā ugra rociṣam utkṛtya rudraḥ sahasā utthitaḥ hasan gambhīra nādaḥ visasarja tām bhuvi
tataḥ atikāyaḥ tanuvā spṛśan divam sahasra bāhuḥ ghana-ruk tri-sūrya-dṛk karāla-daṁṣṭraḥ jvalat-agni mūrdhajaḥ kapāla-mālī vividha udyata āyudhaḥ
tam kim karomi iti gṛṇantam āha baddha-añjalim bhagavān bhūta-nāthaḥ dakṣam sa-yajñam jahi mat-bhaṭānām tvam agraṇīḥ rudra bhaṭa aṁśakaḥ me
ājñaptaḥ evam kupitena manyunā saḥ deva-devam paricakrame vibhum mene tadā ātmānam asaṅga-raṁhasā mahīyasām tāta sahaḥ sahiṣṇum
anvīyamānaḥ saḥ tu rudra-pārṣadaiḥ bhṛśam nadadbhiḥ vyanadat su-bhairavam udyamya śūlam jagat-antaka antakam samprādravat ghoṣaṇa bhūṣaṇa-aṅghriḥ
atha ṛtvijaḥ yajamānaḥ sadasyāḥ kakubhi udīcyām prasamīkṣya reṇum tamaḥ kim etat kutaḥ etat rajaḥ abhūt iti dvijāḥ dvija-patnyaḥ ca dadhyuḥ
vātāḥ na vānti na hi santi dasyavaḥ prācīna-barhiḥ jīvati ha ugra-daṇḍaḥ gāvaḥ na kālyante idam kutaḥ rajaḥ lokaḥ adhunā kim pralayāya kalpate

bahu evam udvigna-dṛśā ucyamāne janena dakṣasya muhuḥ mahā-ātmanaḥ utpetuḥ utpāta-tamāḥ sahasraśaḥ bhaya-āvahāḥ divi bhūmau ca paryak
tāvat saḥ rudra-anucaraiḥ mahā-makhaḥ nānā āyudhaiḥ vāmanakaiḥ udāyudhaiḥ piṅgaiḥ piśaṅgaiḥ makara-udara-ānanaiḥ paryādravadbhiḥ vidura anvarudhyata

āśāsānāḥ jīvitam adhvarasya lokaḥ sa-pālaḥ kupite na yasmin tam āśu devam priyayā vihīnam kṣamāpayadhvam hṛdi viddham duruktaiḥ
na aham na yajñaḥ na ca yūyam anye ye deha-bhājaḥ munayaḥ ca tattvam viduḥ pramāṇam bala-vīryayoḥ vā yasya ātma-tantrasya kaḥ upāyam vidhitset
saḥ ittham ādiśya surān ajaḥ tu taiḥ samanvitaḥ pitṛbhiḥ sa-prajeśaiḥ yayau sva-dhiṣṇyāt nilayam pura-dviṣaḥ kailāsam adri-pravaram priyam prabhoḥ
janma auṣadhi tapaḥ mantra yoga siddhaiḥ nara-itaraiḥ juṣṭam kinnara-gandharvaiḥ apsarobhiḥ vṛtam sadā

dadṛśuḥ tatra te ramyām alakām nāma vai purīm vanam saugandhikam ca api yatra tat-nāma paṅkajam

yayoḥ tat-snāna vibhraṣṭa nava kuṅkuma piñjaram vitṛṣaḥ api pibanti ambhaḥ pāyayantaḥ gajāḥ gajīḥ
tāra-hema mahā-ratna vimāna śata saṅkulām juṣṭām puṇyajana-strībhiḥ yathā kham sa-taḍit-ghanam

vaidūrya-kṛta sopānāḥ vāpyaḥ utpala mālinīḥ prāptam kimpuruṣaiḥ dṛṣṭvā te ārāt dadṛśuḥ vaṭam

saḥ tu upalabhya āgatam ātma-yonim sura-asura-īśaiḥ abhivandita-aṅghriḥ utthāya cakre śirasā abhivandanam arhattamaḥ kasya yathā eva viṣṇuḥ
tathā apare siddha-gaṇāḥ mahā-ṛṣibhiḥ ye vai samantāt anu nīlalohitam namaskṛtaḥ prāha śaśāṅka-śekharam kṛta-praṇāmam prahasan iva ātmabhūḥ
brahmā uvāca jāne tvām īśam viśvasya jagataḥ yoni-bījayoḥ śakteḥ śivasya ca param yat tat brahma nirantaram
tvam eva bhagavan etat śiva-śaktyoḥ svarūpayoḥ viśvam sṛjasi pāsi atsi krīḍan ūrṇa-paṭaḥ yathā
tvam eva dharma-artha-dugha abhipattaye dakṣeṇa sūtreṇa sasarjitha adhvaram tvayā eva loke avasitāḥ ca setavaḥ yān brāhmaṇāḥ śraddadhate dhṛta-vratāḥ
tvam karmaṇām maṅgala maṅgalānām kartuḥ sva-lokam tanuṣe svaḥ param vā amaṅgalānām ca tamisram ulbaṇam viparyayaḥ kena tat eva kasyacit
na vai satām tvat-caraṇa-arpita-ātmanām bhūteṣu sarveṣu abhipaśyatām tava bhūtāni ca ātmani apṛthak didṛkṣatām prāyeṇa roṣaḥ abhibhavet yathā paśum
pṛthak dhiyaḥ karma dṛśaḥ durāśayāḥ para-udayena arpita hṛt rujaḥ aniśam parān duruktaiḥ vitudanti aruntudāḥ tān mā avadhīt daiva vadhān bhavat vidhaḥ
yasmin yadā puṣkara-nābha-māyayā durantayā spṛṣṭa-dhiyaḥ pṛthak-dṛśaḥ kurvanti tatra hi anukampayā kṛpām na sādhavaḥ daiva-balāt kṛte kramam
bhavān tu puṁsaḥ paramasya māyayā durantayā aspṛṣṭa matiḥ samasta-dṛk tayā hata-ātmasu anukarma-cetaḥsu anugraham kartum iha arhasi prabho
kuru adhvarasya uddharaṇam hatasya bhoḥ tvayā asamāptasya mano prajāpateḥ na yatra bhāgam tava bhāginaḥ daduḥ ku-yājinaḥ yena makhaḥ ninīyate
jīvatāt yajamānaḥ ayam prapadyeta akṣiṇī bhagaḥ bhṛgoḥ śmaśrūṇi rohantu pūṣṇaḥ dantāḥ ca pūrva-vat
devānām bhagna-gātrāṇām ṛtvijām ca āyudha-aśmabhiḥ bhavatā anugṛhītānām āśu manyo astu anāturam
eṣaḥ te rudra bhāgaḥ astu yat ucchiṣṭaḥ adhvarasya vai yajñaḥ te rudra bhāgena kalpatām adya yajña-han
maitreyaḥ uvāca iti ajena anunītena bhavena parituṣyatā abhyadhāyi mahā-bāho prahasya śrūyatām iti
mahādevaḥ uvāca na agham prajā-īśa bālānām varṇaye na anucintaye deva-māyā abhibhūtānām daṇḍaḥ tatra dhṛtaḥ mayā
prajāpateḥ dagdha-śīrṣṇaḥ bhavatu aja-mukham śiraḥ mitrasya cakṣuṣā īkṣeta bhāgam svam barhiṣaḥ bhagaḥ
pūṣā tu yajamānasya dadbhiḥ jakṣatu piṣṭa-bhuk devāḥ prakṛta sarva-aṅgāḥ ye me uccheṣaṇam daduḥ
bāhubhyām aśvinoḥ pūṣṇaḥ hastābhyām kṛta-bāhavaḥ bhavantu adhvaryavaḥ ca anye basta-śmaśruḥ bhṛguḥ bhavet
maitreyaḥ uvāca tadā sarvāṇi bhūtāni śrutvā mīḍhuṣtama uditam parituṣṭa ātmabhiḥ tāta sādhu sādhu iti atha abruvan
tataḥ mīḍhvāṁsam āmantrya śunāsīrāḥ saha ṛṣibhiḥ bhūyaḥ tat deva-yajanam sa-mīḍhvat vedhasaḥ yayuḥ
vidhāya kārtsnyena ca tat yat āha bhagavān bhavaḥ sandadhuḥ kasya kāyena savanīya paśoḥ śiraḥ
sandhīyamāne śirasi dakṣaḥ rudra-abhivīkṣitaḥ sadyaḥ supte iva uttasthau dadṛśe ca agrataḥ mṛḍam
tadā vṛṣa-dhvaja dveṣa kalila-ātmā prajāpatiḥ śiva avalokāt abhavat śarat hradaḥ iva amalaḥ
bhava-stavāya kṛta-dhīḥ na aśaknot anurāgataḥ autkaṇṭhyāt bāṣpa-kalayā samparetām sutām smaran
kṛcchrāt saṁstabhya ca manaḥ prema-vihvalitaḥ su-dhīḥ śaśaṁsa nirvyalīkena bhāvena īśam prajāpatiḥ
dakṣaḥ uvāca bhūyān anugrahaḥ aho bhavatā kṛtaḥ me daṇḍaḥ tvayā mayi bhṛtaḥ yat api pralabdhaḥ na brahma-bandhuṣu ca vām bhagavan avajñā tubhyam hareḥ ca kutaḥ eva dhṛta-vrateṣu
vidyā tapaḥ vrata dharān mukhataḥ sma viprān brahmā ātma-tattvam avitum prathamam tvam asrāk tat brāhmaṇān parama sarva vipatsu pāsi pālaḥ paśūn iva vibho pragṛhīta daṇḍaḥ
yaḥ asau mayā avidita-tattva dṛśā sabhāyām kṣiptaḥ durukti viśikhaiḥ vigaṇayya tat mām arvāk patantam arhat-tama nindayā apāt dṛṣṭyā ārdrayā saḥ bhagavān sva-kṛtena tuṣyet
maitreyaḥ uvāca kṣamā āpya evam saḥ mīḍhvāṁsam brahmaṇā ca anumantritaḥ karma santānayām āsa sa upādhyāya ṛtvik ādibhiḥ
vaiṣṇavam yajña santatyai tri-kapālam dvija-uttamāḥ puroḍāśam niravapan vīra saṁsarga śuddhaye
adhvaryuṇā ātta haviṣā yajamānaḥ viśām-pate dhiyā viśuddhayā dadhyau tathā prāduḥ abhūt hariḥ
tadā sva-prabhayā teṣām dyotayantyā diśaḥ daśa muṣṇan tejaḥ upānītaḥ tārkṣyeṇa stotra-vājinā
śyāmaḥ hiraṇya-raśanaḥ arka-kirīṭa-juṣṭaḥ nīla-alaka bhramara maṇḍita-kuṇḍala-āsyaḥ śaṅkha abja cakra śara cāpa gadā asi carma vyagraiḥ hiraṇmaya bhujaiḥ iva karṇikāraḥ
vakṣasi adhiśrita vadhūḥ vana-mālī udāra hāsa avaloka kalayā ramayan ca viśvam pārśva bhramat vyajana-cāmara rāja-haṁsaḥ śveta-ātapatra-śaśinā upari rajyamānaḥ
tam upāgatam ālakṣya sarve sura-gaṇa-ādayaḥ praṇemuḥ sahasā utthāya brahma indra tri-akṣa nāyakāḥ
tat-tejasā hata-rucaḥ sanna-jihvāḥ sa-sādhvasāḥ mūrdhnā dhṛta-añjali-puṭāḥ upatasthuḥ adhokṣajam
api arvāk-vṛttayaḥ yasya mahi tu ātmabhū-ādayaḥ yathā-mati gṛṇanti sma kṛta-anugraha vigraham
dakṣaḥ gṛhīta arhaṇa sādana-uttamam yajña-īśvaram viśva-sṛjām param gurum sunanda-nanda-ādi-anugaiḥ vṛtam mudā gṛṇan prapede prayataḥ kṛta-añjaliḥ
dakṣaḥ uvāca śuddham sva-dhāmni uparata-akhila buddhi-avastham cit-mātram ekam abhayam pratiṣidhya māyām tiṣṭhan tayā eva puruṣatvam upetya tasyām āste bhavān apariśuddhaḥ iva ātma-tantraḥ
ṛtvijaḥ ūcuḥ tattvam na te vayam anañjana rudra śāpāt karmaṇi avagraha dhiyaḥ bhagavan vidāmaḥ dharma upalakṣaṇam idam tri-vṛt adhvara ākhyam jñātam yat artham adhidaivam adaḥ vyavasthāḥ
sadasyāḥ ūcuḥ utpatti adhvani aśaraṇe uru kleśa durge antaka ugra vyāla anviṣṭe viṣaya mṛga-tṛṣi ātma geha uru bhāraḥ dvandva śvabhre khala mṛga bhaye śoka-dāve ajña-sa-arthaḥ pāda-okaḥ te śaraṇa-da kadā yāti kāma-upasṛṣṭaḥ
rudraḥ uvāca tava vara-da vara-aṅghrau āśiṣā iha akhila-arthe hi api munibhiḥ asaktaiḥ ādareṇa arhaṇīye yadi racita-dhiyam mā avidya-lokaḥ apaviddham japati na gaṇaye tat tvat-para-anugraheṇa
bhṛguḥ uvāca yat māyayā gahanayā apahṛta ātma-bodhāḥ brahma-ādayaḥ tanu-bhṛtaḥ tamasi svapantaḥ na ātman śritam tava vidanti adhunā api tattvam saḥ ayam prasīdatu bhavān praṇata-ātma bandhuḥ
brahmā uvāca na etat svarūpam bhavataḥ asau pada-artha bheda grahaiḥ puruṣaḥ yāvat īkṣet jñānasya ca arthasya guṇasya ca āśrayaḥ māyā-mayāt vyatiriktaḥ mataḥ tvam
indraḥ uvāca idam api acyuta viśva-bhāvanam vapuḥ ānanda-karam manaḥ-dṛśām sura-vidviṭ kṣapaṇaiḥ ud-āyudhaiḥ bhuja-daṇḍaiḥ upapannam aṣṭabhiḥ
patnyaḥ ūcuḥ yajñaḥ ayam tava yajanāya kena sṛṣṭaḥ vidhvastaḥ paśupatinā adya dakṣa-kopāt tam naḥ tvam śava-śayana ābha śānta-medham yajña-ātman nalina rucā dṛśā punīhi
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ ananvitam te bhagavan viceṣṭitam yat ātmanā carasi hi karma na ajyase vibhūtaye yataḥ upaseduḥ īśvarīm na manyate svayam anuvartatīm bhavān
siddhāḥ ūcuḥ ayam tvat-kathā mṛṣṭa pīyūṣa nadyām manaḥ vāraṇaḥ kleśa dāva-agni dagdhaḥ tṛṣā ārtaḥ avagāḍhaḥ na sasmāra dāvam na niṣkrāmati brahma sampanna-vat naḥ
yajamānī uvāca su-āgatam te prasīda īśa tubhyam namaḥ śrīnivāsa śriyā kāntayā trāhi naḥ tvām ṛte adhīśa na aṅgaiḥ makhaḥ śobhate śīrṣa-hīnaḥ ka-bandhaḥ yathā puruṣaḥ
loka-pālāḥ ūcuḥ dṛṣṭaḥ kim naḥ dṛgbhiḥ asat-grahaiḥ tvam pratyak-draṣṭā dṛśyate yena viśvam māyā hi eṣā bhavadīyā hi bhūman yaḥ tvam ṣaṣṭhaḥ pañcabhiḥ bhāsi bhūtaiḥ
yoga-īśvarāḥ ūcuḥ preyān na te anyaḥ asti amutaḥ tvayi prabho viśva-ātmani īkṣet na pṛthak yaḥ ātmanaḥ atha api bhaktyā īśa tayā upadhāvatām ananya-vṛttyā anugṛhāṇa vatsala
jagat udbhava sthiti layeṣu daivataḥ bahu bhidyamāna guṇayā ātma-māyayā racita ātma bheda-mataye sva-saṁsthayā vinivartita bhrama guṇa ātmane namaḥ
brahma uvāca namaḥ te śrita-sattvāya dharma-ādīnām ca sūtaye nirguṇāya ca yat kāṣṭhām na aham veda apare api ca
agniḥ uvāca yat-tejasā aham su-samiddha-tejāḥ havyam vahe su-adhvare ājya-siktam tam yajñiyam pañca-vidham ca pañcabhiḥ su-iṣṭam yajurbhiḥ praṇataḥ asmi yajñam
devāḥ ūcuḥ purā kalpa-apāye sva-kṛtam udarī-kṛtya vikṛtam tvam eva ādyaḥ tasmin salile uraga-indra adhiśayane pumān śeṣe siddhaiḥ hṛdi vimṛśita adhyātma-padaviḥ saḥ eva adya akṣṇoḥ yaḥ pathi carasi bhṛtyān avasi naḥ
gandharvāḥ ūcuḥ aṁśa-aṁśāḥ te deva marīci-ādayaḥ ete brahma-indra-ādyāḥ deva-gaṇāḥ rudra-purogāḥ krīḍā-bhāṇḍam viśvam idam yasya vibhūman tasmai nityam nātha namaḥ te karavāma
vidyādharāḥ ūcuḥ tvat-māyayā artham abhipadya kalevare asmin kṛtvā mama aham iti durmatiḥ utpathaiḥ svaiḥ kṣiptaḥ api asat viṣaya-lālasaḥ ātma-moham yuṣmat kathā amṛta niṣevakaḥ ut vyudasyet
brāhmaṇāḥ ūcuḥ tvam kratuḥ tvam haviḥ tvam huta-āśaḥ svayam tvam hi mantraḥ samit-darbha-pātrāṇi ca tvam sadasya ṛtvijaḥ dampatī devatā agni-hotram svadhā somaḥ ājyam paśuḥ
tvam purā gām rasāyāḥ mahā-sūkaraḥ daṁṣṭrayā padminīm vāraṇa-indraḥ yathā stūyamānaḥ nadan līlayā yogibhiḥ vyujjahartha trayī-gātra yajña-kratuḥ
saḥ prasīda tvam asmākam ākāṅkṣatām darśanam te paribhraṣṭa sat-karmaṇām kīrtyamāne nṛbhiḥ nāmni yajña-īśa te yajña-vighnāḥ kṣayam yānti tasmai namaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca iti dakṣaḥ kaviḥ yajñam bhadra rudra-abhimarśitam kīrtya-māne hṛṣīkeśe sanninye yajña-bhāvane
bhagavān svena bhāgena sarva-ātmā sarva-bhāga-bhuk dakṣam babhāṣe ābhāṣya prīyamāṇaḥ iva anagha
śrī-bhagavān uvāca aham brahmā ca śarvaḥ ca jagataḥ kāraṇam param ātma-īśvaraḥ upadraṣṭā svayam-dṛk aviśeṣaṇaḥ
ātma-māyām samāviśya saḥ aham guṇa-mayīm dvi-ja sṛjan rakṣan haran viśvam dadhre saṁjñām kriyā-ucitām
tasmin brahmaṇi advitīye kevale parama-ātmani brahma-rudrau ca bhūtāni bhedena ajñaḥ anupaśyati
yathā pumān na sva-aṅgeṣu śiraḥ-pāṇi-ādiṣu kvacit pārakya-buddhim kurute evam bhūteṣu mat-paraḥ
trayāṇām eka-bhāvānām yaḥ na paśyati vai bhidām sarva-bhūta-ātmanām brahman saḥ śāntim adhigacchati
maitreyaḥ uvāca evam bhagavatā ādiṣṭaḥ prajāpati-patiḥ harim arcitvā kratunā svena devān ubhayataḥ ayajat
rudram ca svena bhāgena hi upādhāvat samāhitaḥ karmaṇā udavasānena soma-pān itarān api udavasya saha ṛtvigbhiḥ sasnau avabhṛtham tataḥ
tasmai api anubhāvena svena eva avāpta-rādhase dharme eva matim dattvā tridaśāḥ te divam yayuḥ
evam dākṣāyaṇī hitvā satī pūrva-kalevaram jajñe himavataḥ kṣetre menāyām iti śuśruma
tam eva dayitam bhūyaḥ āvṛṅkte patim ambikā ananya-bhāvā eka-gatim śaktiḥ suptā iva pūruṣam
etat bhagavataḥ śambhoḥ karma dakṣa-adhvara-druhaḥ śrutam bhāgavatāt śiṣyāt uddhavāt me bṛhaspateḥ
idam pavitram param īśa-ceṣṭitam yaśasyam āyuṣyam agha-ogha-marṣaṇam yaḥ nityadā ākarṇya naraḥ anukīrtayet dhunoti agham kaurava bhakti-bhāvataḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca sanaka-ādyāḥ nāradaḥ ca ṛbhuḥ haṁsaḥ aruṇiḥ yatiḥ na ete gṛhān brahma-sutāḥ hi āvasan ūrdhva-retasaḥ
mṛṣā adharmasya bhāryā āsīt dambham māyām ca śatru-han asūta mithunam tat tu nirṛtiḥ jagṛhe aprajaḥ
tayoḥ samabhavat lobhaḥ nikṛtiḥ ca mahā-mate tābhyām krodhaḥ ca hiṁsā ca yat duruktiḥ svasā kaliḥ
duruktau kaliḥ ādhatta bhayam mṛtyum ca sat-tama tayoḥ ca mithunam jajñe yātanā nirayaḥ tathā
saṅgraheṇa mayā ākhyātaḥ pratisargaḥ tava anagha triḥ śrutvā etat pumān puṇyam vidhunoti ātmanaḥ malam
atha ataḥ kīrtaye vaṁśam puṇya-kīrteḥ kuru-udvaha svāyambhuvasya api manoḥ hareḥ aṁśa aṁśa janmanaḥ
priyavrata uttānapādau śatarūpā-pateḥ sutau vāsudevasya kalayā rakṣāyām jagataḥ sthitau
jāye uttānapādasya sunītiḥ suruciḥ tayoḥ suruciḥ preyasī patyuḥ na itarā yat sutaḥ dhruvaḥ
ekadā suruceḥ putram aṅkam āropya lālayan uttamam na ārurukṣantam dhruvam rājā abhyanandata
tathā cikīrṣamāṇam tam sa-patnyāḥ tanayam dhruvam suruciḥ śṛṇvataḥ rājñaḥ sa-īrṣyam āha atigarvitā
na vatsa nṛpateḥ dhiṣṇyam bhavān āroḍhum arhati na gṛhītaḥ mayā yat tvam kukṣau api nṛpa-ātmajaḥ
bālaḥ asi bata na ātmānam anya strī garbha sambhṛtam nūnam veda bhavān yasya durlabhe arthe manaḥ-rathaḥ
tapasā ārādhya puruṣam tasya eva anugraheṇa me garbhe tvam sādhaya ātmānam yadi icchasi nṛpa-āsanam
maitreyaḥ uvāca mātuḥ sa-patnyāḥ saḥ durukti viddhaḥ śvasan ruṣā daṇḍa-hataḥ yathā ahiḥ hitvā miṣantam pitaram sanna-vācam jagāma mātuḥ prarudan sakāśam
tam niḥśvasantam sphurita adhara-oṣṭham sunītiḥ utsaṅge udūhya bālam niśamya tat-paura-mukhāt nitāntam sā vivyathe yat gaditam sa-patnyā
sā utsṛjya dhairyam vilalāpa śoka-dāva-agninā dāva-latā iva bālā vākyam sa-patnyāḥ smaratī saroja-śriyā dṛśā bāṣpa-kalām uvāha
dīrgham śvasantī vṛjinasya pāram apaśyatī bālakam āha bālā mā amaṅgalam tāta pareṣu maṁsthāḥ bhuṅkte janaḥ yat para-duḥkhadaḥ tat
satyam surucyā abhihitam bhavān me yat durbhagāyāḥ udare gṛhītaḥ stanyena vṛddhaḥ ca vilajjate yām bhāryā iti vā voḍhum iḍaḥ-patiḥ mām
ātiṣṭha tat tāta vimatsaraḥ tvam uktam samātrā api yat avyalīkam ārādhaya adhokṣaja pāda-padmam yadi icchase adhyāsanam uttamaḥ yathā
yasya aṅghri padmam paricarya viśva vibhāvanāya ātta guṇa-abhipatteḥ ajaḥ adhyatiṣṭhat khalu pārameṣṭhyam padam jita-ātma śvasana abhivandyam
tathā manuḥ vaḥ bhagavān pitāmahaḥ yam eka-matyā puru dakṣiṇaiḥ makhaiḥ iṣṭvā abhipede duravāpam anyataḥ bhaumam sukham divyam atha āpavargyam
tam eva vatsa āśraya bhṛtya-vatsalam mumukṣubhiḥ mṛgya pada-abja paddhatim ananya-bhāve nija-dharma-bhāvite manasi avasthāpya bhajasva pūruṣam
na anyam tataḥ padma-palāśa-locanāt duḥkha-chidam te mṛgayāmi kañcana yaḥ mṛgyate hasta-gṛhīta-padmayā śriyā itaraiḥ aṅga vimṛgyamāṇayā
maitreyaḥ uvāca evam sañjalpitam mātuḥ ākarṇya artha-āgamam vacaḥ sanniyamya ātmanā ātmānam niścakrāma pituḥ purāt
nāradaḥ tat upākarṇya jñātvā tasya cikīrṣitam spṛṣṭvā mūrdhani agha-ghnena pāṇinā prāha vismitaḥ
aho tejaḥ kṣatriyāṇām māna-bhaṅgam amṛṣyatām bālaḥ api ayam hṛdā dhatte yat sa-mātuḥ asat vacaḥ
nāradaḥ uvāca na adhunā api avamānam te sammānam vā api putraka lakṣayāmaḥ kumārasya saktasya krīḍana-ādiṣu
vikalpe vidyamāne api na hi asantoṣa hetavaḥ puṁsaḥ moham ṛte bhinnāḥ yat loke nija-karmabhiḥ
parituṣyet tataḥ tāta tāvat mātreṇa pūruṣaḥ daiva upasāditam yāvat vīkṣya īśvara-gatim budhaḥ
atha mātrā upadiṣṭena yogena avarurutsasi yat-prasādam saḥ vai puṁsām durārādhyaḥ mataḥ mama
munayaḥ padavīm yasya niḥsaṅgena uru-janmabhiḥ na viduḥ mṛgayantaḥ api tīvra-yoga samādhinā
ataḥ nivartatām eṣaḥ nirbandhaḥ tava niṣphalaḥ yatiṣyati bhavān kāle śreyasām samupasthite
yasya yat daiva vihitam saḥ tena sukha-duḥkhayoḥ ātmānam toṣayan dehī tamasaḥ pāram ṛcchati
guṇa-adhikāt mudam lipset anukrośam guṇa-adhamāt maitrīm samānāt anvicchet na tāpaiḥ abhibhūyate
dhruvaḥ uvāca saḥ ayam śamaḥ bhagavatā sukha-duḥkha hata-ātmanām darśitaḥ kṛpayā puṁsām durdarśaḥ asmat-vidhaiḥ tu yaḥ
atha api me avinītasya kṣāttram ghoram upeyuṣaḥ surucyāḥ durvacaḥ bāṇaiḥ na bhinne śrayate hṛdi
padam tri-bhuvana utkṛṣṭam jigīṣoḥ sādhu vartma me brūhi asmat pitṛbhiḥ brahman anyaiḥ api anadhiṣṭhitam
nūnam bhavān bhagavataḥ yaḥ aṅga-jaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ vitudan aṭate vīṇām hitāya jagataḥ arka-vat
maitreyaḥ uvāca iti udāhṛtam ākarṇya bhagavān nāradaḥ tadā prītaḥ pratyāha tam bālam sat-vākyam anukampayā
nāradaḥ uvāca jananyā abhihitaḥ panthāḥ saḥ vai niḥśreyasasya te bhagavān vāsudevaḥ tam bhaja tam pravaṇa-ātmanā
dharma-artha-kāma-mokṣa ākhyam yaḥ icchet śreyaḥ ātmanaḥ ekam hi eva hareḥ tatra kāraṇam pāda-sevanam
tat tāta gaccha bhadram te yamunāyāḥ taṭam śuci puṇyam madhu-vanam yatra sānnidhyam nityadā hareḥ
snātvā anusavanam tasmin kālindyāḥ salile śive kṛtvā ucitāni nivasan ātmanaḥ kalpita-āsanaḥ
prāṇāyāmena tri-vṛtā prāṇa-indriya manaḥ malam śanaiḥ vyudasya abhidhyāyet manasā guruṇā gurum
prasāda-abhimukham śaśvat prasanna vadana īkṣaṇam su-nāsam su-bhruvam cāru kapolam sura sundaram
taruṇam ramaṇīya aṅgam aruṇa-oṣṭha īkṣaṇa-adharam praṇata āśrayaṇam nṛmṇam śaraṇyam karuṇā arṇavam
śrīvatsa-aṅkam ghana-śyāmam puruṣam vana-mālinam śaṅkha cakra gadā padmaiḥ abhivyakta catuḥ-bhujam
kirīṭinam kuṇḍalinam keyūra valaya-anvitam kaustubha-ābharaṇa-grīvam pīta-kauśeya-vāsasam
kāñcī-kalāpa paryastam lasat-kāñcana-nūpuram darśanīya-tamam śāntam manaḥ-nayana-vardhanam
padbhyām nakha-maṇi-śreṇyā vilasadbhyām samarcatām hṛt-padma-karṇikā dhiṣṇyam ākramya ātmani avasthitam
smayamānam abhidhyāyet sa-anurāga-avalokanam niyatena eka-bhūtena manasā vara-da-ṛṣabham
evam bhagavataḥ rūpam su-bhadram dhyāyataḥ manaḥ nirvṛtyā parayā tūrṇam sampannam na nivartate
japaḥ ca paramaḥ guhyaḥ śrūyatām me nṛpa-ātmaja yam sapta-rātram prapaṭhan pumān paśyati khe-carān
om namaḥ bhagavate vāsudevāya mantreṇa anena devasya kuryāt dravyamayīm budhaḥ saparyām vividhaiḥ dravyaiḥ deśa kāla vibhāga-vit
salilaiḥ śucibhiḥ mālyaiḥ vanyaiḥ mūla phala-ādibhiḥ śasta aṅkura aṁśukaiḥ ca arcet tulasyā priyayā prabhum
labdhvā dravya-mayīm arcām kṣiti ambu ādiṣu vā arcayet ābhṛta-ātmā muniḥ śāntaḥ yata-vāk mita vanya-bhuk
sva-icchā avatāra caritaiḥ acintya nija-māyayā kariṣyati uttama-ślokaḥ tat dhyāyet hṛdayam-gamam
paricaryāḥ bhagavataḥ yāvatyaḥ pūrva-sevitāḥ tāḥ mantra hṛdayena eva prayuñjyāt mantra-mūrtaye
evam kāyena manasā vacasā ca manaḥ-gatam paricaryamāṇaḥ bhagavān bhakti-mat paricaryayā puṁsām amāyinām samyak bhajatām bhāva-vardhanaḥ śreyaḥ diśati abhimatam yat dharma-ādiṣu dehinām
viraktaḥ ca indriya-ratau bhakti-yogena bhūyasā tam nirantara bhāvena bhajeta addhā vimuktaye
iti uktaḥ tam parikramya praṇamya ca nṛpa-arbhakaḥ yayau madhuvanam puṇyam hareḥ caraṇa-carcitam
tapaḥ-vanam gate tasmin praviṣṭaḥ antaḥ-puram muniḥ arhita arhaṇakaḥ rājñā sukha-āsīnaḥ uvāca tam
nāradaḥ uvāca rājan kim dhyāyase dīrgham mukhena pariśuṣyatā kim vā na riṣyate kāmaḥ dharmaḥ vā arthena saṁyutaḥ
rājā uvāca sutaḥ me bālakaḥ brahman straiṇena akaruṇā-ātmanā nirvāsitaḥ pañca-varṣaḥ saha mātrā mahān kaviḥ
api anātham vane brahman mā sma adanti arbhakam vṛkāḥ śrāntam śayānam kṣudhitam parimlāna mukha-ambujam
aho me bata daurātmyam strī-jitasya upadhāraya yaḥ aṅkam premṇā ārurukṣantam na abhyanandam asat-tamaḥ
nāradaḥ uvāca mā mā śucaḥ sva-tanayam deva-guptam viśām-pate tat prabhāvam avijñāya prāvṛṅkte yat yaśaḥ jagat
su-duṣkaram karma kṛtvā loka-pālaiḥ api prabhuḥ aiṣyati acirataḥ rājan yaśaḥ vipulayan tava
maitreyaḥ uvāca iti devarṣiṇā proktam viśrutya jagatī-patiḥ rāja-lakṣmīm anādṛtya putram eva anvacintayat
tatra abhiṣiktaḥ prayataḥ tām upoṣya vibhāvarīm samāhitaḥ paryacarat ṛṣi ādeśena pūruṣam
tri rātra-ante tri rātra-ante kapittha-badara aśanaḥ ātma-vṛtti anusāreṇa māsam ninye arcayan harim
dvitīyam ca tathā māsam ṣaṣṭhe ṣaṣṭhe arbhakaḥ dine tṛṇa-parṇa-ādibhiḥ śīrṇaiḥ kṛta-annaḥ abhyarcayan vibhum
tṛtīyam ca ānayan māsam navame navame ahani ap-bhakṣaḥ uttama-ślokam upādhāvat samādhinā
caturtham api vai māsam dvādaśe dvādaśe ahani vāyu bhakṣaḥ jita-śvāsaḥ dhyāyan devam adhārayat
pañcame māsi anuprāpte jita-śvāsaḥ nṛpa-ātmajaḥ dhyāyan brahma padā ekena tasthau sthāṇuḥ iva acalaḥ
sarvataḥ manaḥ ākṛṣya hṛdi bhūta-indriya-āśayam dhyāyan bhagavataḥ rūpam na adrākṣīt kiñcana aparam
ādhāram mahat-ādīnām pradhāna puruṣa-īśvaram brahma dhārayamāṇasya trayaḥ lokāḥ cakampire
yadā eka pādena saḥ pārthiva arbhakaḥ tasthau tat-aṅguṣṭha nipīḍitā mahī nanāma tatra ardham ibha-indra dhiṣṭhitā tarī iva savya-itarataḥ pade pade
tasmin abhidhyāyati viśvam ātmanaḥ dvāram nirudhya asum ananyayā dhiyā lokāḥ nirucchvāsa nipīḍitāḥ bhṛśam sa-loka-pālāḥ śaraṇam yayuḥ harim
