devāḥ ūcuḥ na evam vidāmaḥ bhagavan prāṇa-rodham cara acarasya akhila sattva dhāmnaḥ vidhehi tat naḥ vṛjināt vimokṣam prāptāḥ vayam tvām śaraṇam śaraṇyam
śrī-bhagavān uvāca mā bhaiṣṭa bālam tapasaḥ duratyayāt nivartayiṣye pratiyāta sva-dhāma yataḥ hi vaḥ prāṇa-nirodhaḥ āsīt auttānapādiḥ mayi saṅgata-ātmā
maitreyaḥ uvāca te evam utsanna-bhayāḥ urukrame kṛta-avanāmāḥ prayayuḥ tri-viṣṭapam sahasra-śīrṣā api tataḥ garutmatā madhoḥ vanam bhṛtya didṛkṣayā gataḥ
saḥ vai dhiyā yoga-vipāka-tīvrayā hṛt padma-kośe sphuritam taḍit-prabham tirohitam sahasā eva upalakṣya bahiḥ-sthitam tat-avastham dadarśa
tat-darśanena āgata-sādhvasaḥ kṣitau avandata aṅgam vinamayya daṇḍavat dṛgbhyām prapaśyan prapiban iva arbhakaḥ cumban iva āsyena bhujaiḥ iva āśliṣan
saḥ tam vivakṣantam a-tat-vidam hariḥ jñātvā asya sarvasya ca hṛdi avasthitaḥ kṛta-añjalim brahma-mayena kambunā pasparśa bālam kṛpayā kapole
saḥ vai tadā eva pratipāditām giram daivīm parijñāta para-ātma nirṇayaḥ tam bhakti-bhāvaḥ abhyagṛṇāt asatvaram pariśruta uru-śravasam dhruva-kṣitiḥ
dhruvaḥ uvāca yaḥ antaḥ praviśya mama vācam imām prasuptām sañjīvayati akhila śakti dharaḥ sva-dhāmnā anyān ca hasta caraṇa śravaṇa tvak ādīn prāṇān namaḥ bhagavate puruṣāya tubhyam
ekaḥ tvam eva bhagavan idam ātma-śaktyā māyā-ākhyayā uru guṇayā mahat-ādi aśeṣam sṛṣṭvā anuviśya puruṣaḥ tat asat-guṇeṣu nānā iva dāruṣu vibhāvasu-vat vibhāsi
tvat-dattayā vayunayā idam acaṣṭa viśvam supta-prabuddhaḥ iva nātha bhavat-prapannaḥ tasya āpavargya śaraṇam tava pāda-mūlam vismaryate kṛta-vidā katham ārta-bandho
nūnam vimuṣṭa-matayaḥ tava māyayā te ye tvām bhava apyaya vimokṣaṇam anya-hetoḥ arcanti kalpaka-tarum kuṇapa upabhogyam icchanti yat sparśa-jam niraye api nṝṇām
yā nirvṛtiḥ tanu-bhṛtām tava pāda-padma dhyānāt bhavat-jana kathā śravaṇena vā syāt sā brahmaṇi sva-mahimani api nātha mā bhūt kim tu antaka-asi lulitāt patatām vimānāt
bhaktim muhuḥ pravahatām tvayi me prasaṅgaḥ bhūyāt ananta mahatām amala-āśayānām yena añjasā ulbaṇam uru vyasanam bhava-abdhim neṣye bhavat guṇa kathā amṛta pāna mattaḥ
te na smaranti atitarām priyam īśa martyam ye ca anu adaḥ suta suhṛt gṛha vitta dārāḥ ye tu abja-nābha bhavadīya pada-aravinda saugandhya lubdha hṛdayeṣu kṛta-prasaṅgāḥ
tiryak naga dvija sarīsṛpa deva daitya martya-ādibhiḥ paricitam sat-asat-viśeṣam rūpam sthaviṣṭham aja te mahat-ādi anekam na ataḥ param parama vedmi na yatra vādaḥ
kalpa-ante etat akhilam jaṭhareṇa gṛhṇan śete pumān sva-dṛk ananta sakhaḥ tat-aṅke yat nābhi sindhu ruha kāñcana loka padma garbhe dyumān bhagavate praṇataḥ asmi tasmai
tvam nitya mukta pariśuddha vibuddhaḥ ātmā kūṭa-sthaḥ ādi puruṣaḥ bhagavān tri-adhīśaḥ yat buddhi avasthitim akhaṇḍitayā sva-dṛṣṭyā draṣṭā sthitau adhimakhaḥ vyatiriktaḥ āsse
yasmin viruddha-gatayaḥ hi aniśam patanti vidyā-ādayaḥ vividha śaktayaḥ ānupūrvyāt tat brahma viśva-bhavam ekam anantam ādyam ānanda-mātram avikāram aham prapadye
satya āśiṣaḥ hi bhagavan tava pāda-padmam āśīḥ tathā anubhajataḥ puruṣa-artha mūrteḥ api evam arya bhagavān paripāti dīnān vāśrā iva vatsakam anugraha kātaraḥ asmān
maitreyaḥ uvāca atha abhiṣṭutaḥ evam vai sat-saṅkalpena dhī-matā bhṛtya-anuraktaḥ bhagavān pratinandya idam abravīt
śrī-bhagavān uvāca veda aham te vyavasitam hṛdi rājanya-bālaka tat prayacchāmi bhadram te durāpam api su-vrata
na anyaiḥ adhiṣṭhitam bhadra yat bhrājiṣṇu dhruva-kṣiti yatra graha ṛkṣa tārāṇām jyotiṣām cakram āhitam meḍhyām go cakra vat sthāsnu parastāt kalpa vāsinām dharmaḥ agniḥ kaśyapaḥ śukraḥ munayaḥ ye vana-okasaḥ caranti dakṣiṇī-kṛtya bhramantaḥ yat satārakāḥ
prasthite tu vanam pitrā dattvā gām dharma-saṁśrayaḥ ṣaṭ-triṁśat varṣa sāhasram rakṣitā avyāhata indriyaḥ
tvat bhrātari uttame naṣṭe mṛgayāyām tu tat-manāḥ anveṣantī vanam mātā dāva-agnim sā pravekṣyati
iṣṭvā mām yajña-hṛdayam yajñaiḥ puṣkala-dakṣiṇaiḥ bhuktvā ca iha āśiṣaḥ satyāḥ ante mām saṁsmariṣyasi
tataḥ gantā asi mat-sthānam sarva-loka namaḥ-kṛtam upariṣṭāt ṛṣibhyaḥ tvam yataḥ na āvartate gataḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca iti arcitaḥ saḥ bhagavān atidiśya ātmanaḥ padam bālasya paśyataḥ dhāma svam agāt garuḍa-dhvajaḥ
saḥ api saṅkalpa-jam viṣṇoḥ pāda-sevā upasāditam prāpya saṅkalpa nirvāṇam na atiprītaḥ abhyagāt puram
viduraḥ uvāca sudurlabham yat paramam padam hareḥ māyā-vinaḥ tat caraṇa arcana arjitam labdhvā api asiddha-artham iva eka-janmanā katham svam ātmānam amanyata artha-vit
maitreyaḥ uvāca mātuḥ sa-patnyāḥ vāk-bāṇaiḥ hṛdi viddhaḥ tu tān smaran na aicchat mukti-pateḥ muktim tasmāt tāpam upeyivān
dhruvaḥ uvāca samādhinā na eka-bhavena yat padam viduḥ sananda-ādayaḥ ūrdhva-retasaḥ māsaiḥ aham ṣaḍbhiḥ amuṣya pādayoḥ chāyām upetya apagataḥ pṛthak-matiḥ
aho bata mama anātmyam manda-bhāgyasya paśyata bhava chidaḥ pāda-mūlam gatvā yāce yat anta-vat
matiḥ vidūṣitā devaiḥ patadbhiḥ asahiṣṇubhiḥ yaḥ nārada vacaḥ tathyam na agrāhiṣam asat-tamaḥ
daivīm māyām upāśritya prasuptaḥ iva bhinna-dṛk tapye dvitīye api asati bhrātṛ bhrātṛvya hṛt rujā
mayā etat prārthitam vyartham cikitsā iva gata āyuṣi prasādya jagat-ātmānam tapasā duṣprasādanam bhava-chidam ayāce aham bhavam bhāgya vivarjitaḥ
svārājyam yacchataḥ mauḍhyāt mānaḥ me bhikṣitaḥ bata īśvarāt kṣīṇa puṇyena phalī-kārān iva adhanaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca na vai mukundasya pada-aravindayoḥ rajaḥ-juṣaḥ tāta bhavādṛśāḥ janāḥ vāñchanti tat dāsyam ṛte artham ātmanaḥ yadṛcchayā labdha manaḥ-samṛddhayaḥ
ākarṇya ātma-jam āyāntam samparetya yathā āgatam rājā na śraddadhe bhadram abhadrasya kutaḥ mama
śraddhāya vākyam devarṣeḥ harṣa-vegena dharṣitaḥ vārtā-hartuḥ atiprītaḥ hāram prādāt mahā-dhanam
sat-aśvam ratham āruhya kārtasvara-pariṣkṛtam brāhmaṇaiḥ kula-vṛddhaiḥ ca paryastaḥ amātya bandhubhiḥ śaṅkha dundubhi nādena brahma-ghoṣeṇa veṇubhiḥ niścakrāma purāt tūrṇam ātma-ja abhīkṣaṇa utsukaḥ
sunītiḥ suruciḥ ca asya mahiṣyau rukma-bhūṣite āruhya śibikām sārdham uttamena abhijagmatuḥ
tam dṛṣṭvā upavana abhyāśe āyāntam tarasā rathāt avaruhya nṛpaḥ tūrṇam āsādya prema vihvalaḥ parirebhe aṅga-jam dorbhyām dīrgha utkaṇṭha manāḥ śvasan viṣvaksena aṅghri saṁsparśa hata aśeṣa agha bandhanam
atha ājighran muhuḥ mūrdhni śītaiḥ nayana vāribhiḥ snāpayām āsa tanayam jāta uddāma manaḥ-rathaḥ
abhivandya pituḥ pādau āśīrbhiḥ ca abhimantritaḥ nanāma mātarau śīrṣṇā sat-kṛtaḥ sat-jana agraṇīḥ
suruciḥ tam samutthāpya pāda-avanatam arbhakam pariṣvajya āha jīva iti bāṣpa gadgadayā girā
yasya prasannaḥ bhagavān guṇaiḥ maitrī-ādibhiḥ hariḥ tasmai namanti bhūtāni nimnam āpaḥ iva svayam
uttamaḥ ca dhruvaḥ ca ubhau anyonyam prema-vihvalau aṅga-saṅgāt utpulakau asra ogham muhuḥ ūhatuḥ
sunītiḥ asya jananī prāṇebhyaḥ api priyam sutam upaguhya jahau ādhim tat-aṅga sparśa nirvṛtā
payaḥ stanābhyām susrāva netra-jaiḥ salilaiḥ śivaiḥ tadā abhiṣicyamānābhyām vīra vīra-suvaḥ muhuḥ
tām śaśaṁsuḥ janāḥ rājñīm diṣṭyā te putraḥ ārti-hā pratilabdhaḥ ciram naṣṭaḥ rakṣitā maṇḍalam bhuvaḥ
abhyarcitaḥ tvayā nūnam bhagavān praṇata-ārti-hā yat anudhyāyinaḥ dhīrāḥ mṛtyum jigyuḥ sudurjayam
lālyamānam janaiḥ evam dhruvam sa-bhrātaram nṛpaḥ āropya kariṇīm hṛṣṭaḥ stūyamānaḥ aviśat puram
tatra tatra upasaṅkḷptaiḥ lasat makara toraṇaiḥ sa-vṛndaiḥ kadalī stambhaiḥ pūga-potaiḥ ca tat-vidhaiḥ
cūta-pallava vāsaḥ srak muktā-dāma vilambibhiḥ upaskṛtam prati-dvāram apām kumbhaiḥ sa-dīpakaiḥ
prākāraiḥ gopura āgāraiḥ śātakumbha paricchadaiḥ sarvataḥ alaṅkṛtam śrīmat vimāna śikhara dyubhiḥ
mṛṣṭa catvara rathyā aṭṭa mārgam candana carcitam lāja akṣataiḥ puṣpa phalaiḥ taṇḍulaiḥ balibhiḥ yutam
dhruvāya pathi dṛṣṭāya tatra tatra pura-striyaḥ siddhārtha akṣata dadhi ambu dūrvā puṣpa phalāni ca upajahruḥ prayuñjānāḥ vātsalyāt āśiṣaḥ satīḥ śṛṇvan tat valgu gītāni prāviśat bhavanam pituḥ
mahā-maṇi vrāta maye saḥ tasmin bhavana-uttame lālitaḥ nitarām pitrā nyavasat divi deva-vat
payaḥ phena nibhāḥ śayyāḥ dāntāḥ rukma paricchadāḥ āsanāni mahā-arhāṇi yatra raukmāḥ upaskarāḥ
yatra sphaṭika kuḍyeṣu mahā-mārakateṣu ca maṇi-pradīpāḥ ābhānti lalanā ratna saṁyutāḥ
udyānāni ca ramyāṇi vicitraiḥ amara-drumaiḥ kūjat vihaṅga mithunaiḥ gāyat matta madhu-vrataiḥ
vāpyaḥ vaidūrya sopānāḥ padma utpala kumut-vatīḥ haṁsa kāraṇḍava kulaiḥ juṣṭāḥ cakrāhva sārasaiḥ
uttānapādaḥ rāja-ṛṣiḥ prabhāvam tanayasya tam śrutvā dṛṣṭvā adbhuta tamam prapede vismayam param
vīkṣya ūḍha-vayasam tam ca prakṛtīnām ca sammatam anurakta prajam rājā dhruvam cakre bhuvaḥ patim
ātmānam ca pravayasam ākalayya viśāmpatiḥ vanam viraktaḥ prātiṣṭhat vimṛśan ātmanaḥ gatim
maitreyaḥ uvāca prajāpateḥ duhitaram śiśumārasya vai dhruvaḥ upayeme bhramim nāma tat-sutau kalpa vatsarau
ilāyām api bhāryāyām vāyoḥ putryām mahā-balaḥ putram utkala nāmānam yoṣit ratnam ajījanat
uttamaḥ tu akṛta udvāhaḥ mṛgayāyām balīyasā hataḥ puṇya-janena adrau tat mātā asya gatim gatā
dhruvaḥ bhrātṛ-vadham śrutvā kopa amarṣa śucā arpitaḥ jaitram syandanam āsthāya gataḥ puṇya-jana-ālayam
gatvā udīcīm diśam rājā rudra-anucara sevitām dadarśa himavat droṇyām purīm guhyaka saṅkulām
dadhmau śaṅkham bṛhat-bāhuḥ kham diśaḥ ca anunādayan yena udvigna-dṛśaḥ kṣattaḥ upadevyaḥ atrasan bhṛśam
tataḥ niṣkramya balinaḥ upadeva mahā-bhaṭāḥ asahantaḥ tat ninādam abhipetuḥ udāyudhāḥ
saḥ tān āpatataḥ vīraḥ ugra-dhanvā mahā-rathaḥ eka-ekam yugapat sarvān ahan bāṇaiḥ tribhiḥ tribhiḥ
te vai lalāṭa-lagnaiḥ taiḥ iṣubhiḥ sarve eva hi matvā nirastam ātmānam āśaṁsan karma tasya tat
te api ca amum amṛṣyantaḥ pāda-sparśam iva uragāḥ śaraiḥ avidhyan yugapat dvi-guṇam pracikīrṣavaḥ
tataḥ parigha nistriṁśaiḥ prāsa-śūla paraśvadhaiḥ śakti ṛṣṭibhiḥ bhuśuṇḍībhiḥ citra-vājaiḥ śaraiḥ api abhyavarṣan prakupitāḥ sa-ratham saha-sārathim icchantaḥ tat pratīkartum ayutānām trayodaśa
auttānapādiḥ saḥ tadā śastra-varṣeṇa bhūriṇā na eva adṛśyata ācchannaḥ āsāreṇa yathā giriḥ
hāhā-kāraḥ tadā eva āsīt siddhānām divi paśyatām hataḥ ayam mānavaḥ sūryaḥ magnaḥ puṇya-jana arṇave
nadatsu yātudhāneṣu jaya-kāśiṣu atho mṛdhe udatiṣṭhat rathaḥ tasya nīhārāt iva bhāskaraḥ
dhanuḥ visphūrjayan divyam dviṣatām khedam udvahan astra-ogham vyadhamat bāṇaiḥ ghana anīkam iva anilaḥ
tasya te cāpa nirmuktāḥ bhittvā varmāṇi rakṣasām kāyān āviviśuḥ tigmāḥ girīn aśanayaḥ yathā
bhallaiḥ sañchidyamānānām śirobhiḥ cāru kuṇḍalaiḥ ūrubhiḥ hema-tālābhaiḥ dorbhiḥ valaya-valgubhiḥ hāra keyūra mukuṭaiḥ uṣṇīṣaiḥ ca mahā-dhanaiḥ āstṛtāḥ tāḥ raṇa-bhuvaḥ rejuḥ vīra manaḥ-harāḥ
hata-avaśiṣṭāḥ itare raṇa-ajirāt rakṣaḥ-gaṇāḥ kṣatriya-varya sāyakaiḥ prāyaḥ vivṛkṇa avayavāḥ vidudruvuḥ mṛgendra vikrīḍita yūthapāḥ iva
apaśyamānaḥ saḥ tadā ātatāyinam mahā-mṛdhe kañcana mānava-uttamaḥ purīm didṛkṣan api na āviśat dviṣām na māyinām veda cikīrṣitam janaḥ
iti bruvan citra-rathaḥ sva-sārathim yattaḥ pareṣām pratiyoga śaṅkitaḥ śuśrāva śabdam jaladheḥ iva īritam nabhasvataḥ dikṣu rajaḥ anu adṛśyata
kṣaṇena ācchāditam vyoma ghana anīkena sarvataḥ visphurat taḍitā dikṣu trāsayat stanayitnunā
vavṛṣuḥ rudhira ogha asṛk pūya viṭ mūtra medasaḥ nipetuḥ gaganāt asya kabandhāni agrataḥ anagha
tataḥ khe adṛśyata giriḥ nipetuḥ sarvataḥ-diśam gadā parigha nistriṁśa musalāḥ sa-aśma varṣiṇaḥ
ahayaḥ aśani niḥśvāsāḥ vamantaḥ agnim ruṣā-akṣibhiḥ abhyadhāvan gajāḥ mattāḥ siṁha vyāghrāḥ ca yūthaśaḥ
samudraḥ ūrmibhiḥ bhīmaḥ plāvayan sarvataḥ bhuvam āsasāda mahā-hrādaḥ kalpa-ante iva bhīṣaṇaḥ
evam-vidhāni anekāni trāsanāni amanasvinām sasṛjuḥ tigma-gatayaḥ āsuryā māyayā asurāḥ
dhruve prayuktām asuraiḥ tām māyām ati-dustarām niśamya tasya munayaḥ śam āśaṁsan samāgatāḥ
munayaḥ ūcuḥ auttānapāda bhagavān tava śārṅga-dhanvā devaḥ kṣiṇotu avanata ārti haraḥ vipakṣān yat nāmadheyam abhidhāya niśamya ca addhā lokaḥ añjasā tarati dustaram aṅga mṛtyum
maitreyaḥ uvāca niśamya gadatām evam ṛṣīṇām dhanuṣi dhruvaḥ sandadhe astram upaspṛśya yat nārāyaṇa nirmitam
sandhīyamāne etasmin māyāḥ guhyaka-nirmitāḥ kṣipram vineśuḥ vidura kleśāḥ jñāna-udaye yathā
tasya ārṣa-astram dhanuṣi prayuñjataḥ suvarṇa-puṅkhāḥ kalahaṁsa-vāsasaḥ viniḥsṛtāḥ āviviśuḥ dviṣat-balam yathā vanam bhīma-ravāḥ śikhaṇḍinaḥ
taiḥ tigma-dhāraiḥ pradhane śilī-mukhaiḥ itaḥ tataḥ puṇya-janāḥ upadrutāḥ tam abhyadhāvan kupitāḥ udāyudhāḥ suparṇam unnaddha-phaṇāḥ iva ahayaḥ
saḥ tān pṛṣatkaiḥ abhidhāvataḥ mṛdhe nikṛtta bāhu ūru śiraḥ-dhara udarān nināya lokam param arka-maṇḍalam vrajanti nirbhidya yam ūrdhva-retasaḥ
tān hanyamānān abhivīkṣya guhyakān anāgasaḥ citra-rathena bhūriśaḥ auttānapādim kṛpayā pitā-mahaḥ manuḥ jagāda upagataḥ saha-ṛṣibhiḥ
manuḥ uvāca alam vatsa atiroṣeṇa tamaḥ-dvāreṇa pāpmanā yena puṇya-janān etān avadhīḥ tvam anāgasaḥ
na asmat-kula ucitam tāta karma etat sat vigarhitam vadhaḥ yat upadevānām ārabdhaḥ te akṛta-enasām
nanu ekasya aparādhena prasaṅgāt bahavaḥ hatāḥ bhrātuḥ vadha abhitaptena tvayā aṅga bhrātṛ-vatsala
na ayam mārgaḥ hi sādhūnām hṛṣīkeśa anuvartinām yat ātmānam parāk gṛhya paśu-vat bhūta vaiśasam
sarva-bhūta ātma bhāvena bhūta āvāsam harim bhavān ārādhya āpa durārādhyam viṣṇoḥ tat paramam padam
saḥ tvam hareḥ anudhyātaḥ tat puṁsām api sammataḥ katham tu avadyam kṛtavān anuśikṣan satām vratam
titikṣayā karuṇayā maitryā ca akhila jantuṣu samatvena ca sarva-ātmā bhagavān samprasīdati
samprasanne bhagavati puruṣaḥ prākṛtaiḥ guṇaiḥ vimuktaḥ jīva-nirmuktaḥ brahma nirvāṇam ṛcchati
bhūtaiḥ pañcabhiḥ ārabdhaiḥ yoṣit puruṣaḥ eva hi tayoḥ vyavāyāt sambhūtiḥ yoṣit puruṣayoḥ iha
evam pravartate sargaḥ sthitiḥ saṁyamaḥ eva ca guṇa vyatikarāt rājan māyayā parama-ātmanaḥ
nimitta-mātram tatra āsīt nirguṇaḥ puruṣa-ṛṣabhaḥ vyakta avyaktam idam viśvam yatra bhramati loha-vat
saḥ khalu idam bhagavān kāla śaktyā guṇa-pravāheṇa vibhakta vīryaḥ karoti akartā eva nihanti ahantā ceṣṭā vibhūmnaḥ khalu durvibhāvyā
saḥ anantaḥ anta-karaḥ kālaḥ anādiḥ ādi-kṛt avyayaḥ janam janena janayan mārayan mṛtyunā antakam
na vai sva-pakṣaḥ asya vipakṣaḥ eva vā parasya mṛtyoḥ viśataḥ samam prajāḥ tam dhāvamānam anudhāvanti anīśāḥ yathā rajāṁsi anilam bhūta-saṅghāḥ
āyuṣaḥ apacayam jantoḥ tathā eva upacayam vibhuḥ ubhābhyām rahitaḥ sva-sthaḥ duḥsthasya vidadhāti asau
kecit karma vadanti enam svabhāvam apare nṛpa eke kālam pare daivam puṁsaḥ kāmam uta apare
avyaktasya aprameyasya nānā śakti udayasya ca na vai cikīrṣitam tāta kaḥ veda atha sva sambhavam
na ca ete putraka bhrātuḥ hantāraḥ dhanada anugāḥ visarga ādānayoḥ tāta puṁsaḥ daivam hi kāraṇam
saḥ eva viśvam sṛjati saḥ eva avati hanti ca atha api hi anahaṅkārāt na ajyate guṇa karmabhiḥ
eṣaḥ bhūtāni bhūta-ātmā bhūta-īśaḥ bhūta-bhāvanaḥ sva-śaktyā māyayā yuktaḥ sṛjati atti ca pāti ca
tam eva mṛtyum amṛtam tāta daivam sarva-ātmanā upehi jagat parāyaṇam yasmai balim viśva-sṛjaḥ haranti gāvaḥ yathā vai nasi dāma yantritāḥ
yaḥ pañca-varṣaḥ jananīm tvam vihāya mātuḥ sa-patnyāḥ vacasā bhinna-marmā vanam gataḥ tapasā pratyak-akṣam ārādhya lebhe mūrdhni padam tri-lokyāḥ
tam enam aṅga ātmani mukta-vigrahe vyapāśritam nirguṇam ekam akṣaram ātmānam anviccha vimuktam ātma-dṛk yasmin idam bhedam asat pratīyate
tvam pratyak-ātmani tadā bhagavati anante ānanda-mātre upapanna samasta śaktau bhaktim vidhāya paramām śanakaiḥ avidyā granthim vibhetsyasi mama aham iti prarūḍham
saṁyaccha roṣam bhadram te pratīpam śreyasām param śrutena bhūyasā rājan agadena yathā āmayam
yena upasṛṣṭāt puruṣāt lokaḥ udvijate bhṛśam na budhaḥ tat vaśam gacchet icchan abhayam ātmanaḥ
helanam giriśa bhrātuḥ dhanadasya tvayā kṛtam yat jaghnivān puṇya-janān bhrātṛ ghnān iti amarṣitaḥ
tam prasādaya vatsa āśu sannatyā praśrayā uktibhiḥ na yāvat mahatām tejaḥ kulam naḥ abhibhaviṣyati
evam svāyambhuvaḥ pautram anuśāsya manuḥ dhruvam tena abhivanditaḥ sākam ṛṣibhiḥ sva-puram yayau
maitreyaḥ uvāca dhruvam nivṛttam pratibuddhya vaiśasāt apeta manyum bhagavān dhana-īśvaraḥ tatra āgataḥ cāraṇa yakṣa kinnaraiḥ saṁstūyamānaḥ nyavadat kṛta-añjalim
dhana-daḥ uvāca bhoḥ bhoḥ kṣatriya-dāyāda parituṣṭaḥ asmi te anagha yat tvam pitāmaha ādeśāt vairam dustyajam atyajaḥ
na bhavān avadhīt yakṣān na yakṣāḥ bhrātaram tava kālaḥ eva hi bhūtānām prabhuḥ apyaya-bhāvayoḥ
aham tvam iti apārthā dhīḥ ajñānāt puruṣasya hi svāpni iva ābhāti a-tat-dhyānāt yayā bandha viparyayau
tat gaccha dhruva bhadram te bhagavantam adhokṣajam sarva-bhūta ātma-bhāvena sarva-bhūta ātma vigraham
bhajasva bhajanīya aṅghrim abhavāya bhava-chidam yuktam virahitam śaktyā guṇa-mayyā ātma-māyayā
vṛṇīhi kāmam nṛpa yat manaḥ-gatam mattaḥ tvam auttānapade aviśaṅkitaḥ varam vara-arhaḥ ambuja nābha pādayoḥ anantaram tvām vayam aṅga śuśruma
maitreyaḥ uvāca saḥ rāja-rājena varāya coditaḥ dhruvaḥ mahā-bhāgavataḥ mahā-matiḥ harau saḥ vavre acalitām smṛtim yayā tarati ayatnena duratyayam tamaḥ
tasya prītena manasā tām dattvā aiḍaviḍaḥ tataḥ paśyataḥ antardadhe saḥ api sva-puram pratyapadyata
atha ayajata yajña-īśam kratubhiḥ bhūri dakṣiṇaiḥ dravya-kriyā-devatānām karma karma-phala pradam
sarva-ātmani acyute asarve tīvra-oghām bhaktim udvahan dadarśa ātmani bhūteṣu tam eva avasthitam vibhum
tam evam śīla sampannam brahmaṇyam dīna vatsalam goptāram dharma-setūnām menire pitaram prajāḥ
ṣaṭ-triṁśat varṣa sāhasram śaśāsa kṣiti-maṇḍalam bhogaiḥ puṇya kṣayam kurvan abhogaiḥ aśubha kṣayam
evam bahu savam kālam mahā-ātmā avicala-indriyaḥ tri-varga aupayikam nītvā putrāya adāt nṛpa-āsanam
manyamānaḥ idam viśvam māyā racitam ātmani avidyā racita svapna gandharva-nagara upamam
ātma strī apatya suhṛdaḥ balam ṛddha-kośam antaḥ-puram parivihāra-bhuvaḥ ca ramyāḥ bhū-maṇḍalam jala-dhi mekhalam ākalayya kāla upasṛṣṭam iti saḥ prayayau viśālām
tasyām viśuddha karaṇaḥ śiva vāḥ vigāhya baddhvā āsanam jita marut manasā āhṛta akṣaḥ sthūle dadhāra bhagavat-pratirūpe etat dhyāyan tat avyavahitaḥ vyasṛjat samādhau
bhaktim harau bhagavati pravahan ajasram ānanda bāṣpa-kalayā muhuḥ ardyamānaḥ viklidyamāna hṛdayaḥ pulaka ācita aṅgaḥ na ātmānam asmarat asau iti mukta-liṅgaḥ
saḥ dadarśa vimāna agryam nabhasaḥ avatarat dhruvaḥ vibhrājayat daśa diśaḥ rākā-patim iva uditam
tatra anu deva-pravarau catuḥ-bhujau śyāmau kiśorau aruṇa ambuja īkṣaṇau sthitau avaṣṭabhya gadām suvāsasau kirīṭa hāra aṅgada cāru kuṇḍalau
vijñāya tau uttama-gāya kiṅkarau abhyutthitaḥ sādhvasa vismṛta kramaḥ nanāma nāmāni gṛṇan madhu-dviṣaḥ pārṣat pradhānau iti saṁhata añjaliḥ
tam kṛṣṇa pāda abhiniviṣṭa cetasam baddha-añjalim praśraya namra kandharam sunanda nandau upasṛtya sa-smitam pratyūcatuḥ puṣkara-nābha sammatau
sunanda-nandau ūcatuḥ bhoḥ bhoḥ rājan su-bhadram te vācam naḥ avahitaḥ śṛṇu yaḥ pañca-varṣaḥ tapasā bhavān devam atītṛpat
tasya akhila jagat dhātuḥ āvām devasya śārṅgiṇaḥ pārṣadau iha samprāptau netum tvām bhagavat-padam
sudurjayam viṣṇu-padam jitam tvayā yat sūrayaḥ aprāpya vicakṣate param ātiṣṭha tat candra diva-ākara ādayaḥ graha ṛkṣa-tārāḥ pariyanti dakṣiṇam
anāsthitam te pitṛbhiḥ anyaiḥ api aṅga karhicit ātiṣṭha jagatām vandyam tat viṣṇoḥ paramam padam
etat vimāna pravaram uttamaśloka maulinā upasthāpitam āyuṣman adhiroḍhum tvam arhasi
maitreyaḥ uvāca niśamya vaikuṇṭha niyojya mukhyayoḥ madhu-cyutam vācam urukrama-priyaḥ kṛta-abhiṣekaḥ kṛta nitya-maṅgalaḥ munīn praṇamya āśiṣam abhyavādayat
parītya abhyarcya dhiṣṇya-agryam pārṣadau abhivandya ca iyeṣa tat adhiṣṭhātum bibhrat rūpam hiraṇmayam
tadā uttānapadaḥ putraḥ dadarśa antakam āgatam mṛtyoḥ mūrdhni padam dattvā āruroha adbhutam gṛham
tadā dundubhayaḥ neduḥ mṛdaṅga paṇava ādayaḥ gandharva-mukhyāḥ prajaguḥ petuḥ kusuma vṛṣṭayaḥ
saḥ ca svaḥ-lokam ārokṣyan sunītim jananīm dhruvaḥ anvasmarat agam hitvā dīnām yāsye tri-viṣṭapam
iti vyavasitam tasya vyavasāya sura-uttamau darśayām āsatuḥ devīm puraḥ yānena gacchatīm
tatra tatra praśaṁsadbhiḥ pathi vaimānikaiḥ suraiḥ avakīryamāṇaḥ dadṛśe kusumaiḥ kramaśaḥ grahān
tri-lokīm deva-yānena saḥ ativrajya munīn api parastāt yat dhruva-gatiḥ viṣṇoḥ padam atha abhyagāt
yat bhrājamānam sva-rucā eva sarvataḥ lokāḥ trayaḥ hi anu vibhrājante ete yat na avrajan jantuṣu ye ananugrahāḥ vrajanti bhadrāṇi caranti ye aniśam
śāntāḥ sama-dṛśaḥ śuddhāḥ sarva bhūta anurañjanāḥ yānti añjasā acyuta padam acyuta-priya bāndhavāḥ
iti uttānapadaḥ putraḥ dhruvaḥ kṛṣṇa-parāyaṇaḥ abhūt trayāṇām lokānām cūḍā-maṇiḥ iva amalaḥ
gambhīra-vegaḥ animiṣam jyotiṣām cakram āhitam yasmin bhramati kauravya meḍhyām iva gavām gaṇaḥ
mahimānam vilokya asya nāradaḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ ātodyam vitudan ślokān satre agāyat pracetasām
nāradaḥ uvāca nūnam sunīteḥ pati-devatāyāḥ tapaḥ-prabhāvasya sutasya tām gatim dṛṣṭvā abhyupāyān api veda-vādinaḥ na eva adhigantum prabhavanti kim nṛpāḥ
yaḥ pañca-varṣaḥ guru-dāra vāk-śaraiḥ bhinnena yātaḥ hṛdayena dūyatā vanam mat-ādeśa karaḥ ajitam prabhum jigāya tat bhakta guṇaiḥ parājitam
yaḥ kṣatra-bandhuḥ bhuvi tasya adhirūḍham anu ārurukṣet api varṣa-pūgaiḥ ṣaṭ-pañca-varṣaḥ yat ahobhiḥ alpaiḥ prasādya vaikuṇṭham avāpa tat-padam
maitreyaḥ uvāca etat te abhihitam sarvam yat pṛṣṭaḥ aham iha tvayā dhruvasya uddāma yaśasaḥ caritam sammatam satām
dhanyam yaśasyam āyuṣyam puṇyam svasti-ayanam mahat svargyam dhrauvyam saumanasyam praśasyam agha-marṣaṇam
śrutvā etat śraddhayā abhīkṣṇam acyuta priya ceṣṭitam bhavet bhaktiḥ bhagavati yayā syāt kleśa saṅkṣayaḥ
mahattvam icchatām tīrtham śrotuḥ śīla-ādayaḥ guṇāḥ yatra tejaḥ tat icchūnām mānaḥ yatra manasvinām
prayataḥ kīrtayet prātaḥ samavāye dvi-janmanām sāyam ca puṇya-ślokasya dhruvasya caritam mahat
paurṇamāsyām sinīvālyām dvādaśyām śravaṇe athavā dina-kṣaye vyatīpāte saṅkrame arkadine api vā śrāvayet śraddadhānānām tīrtha-pāda pada-āśrayaḥ na icchan tatra ātmanā ātmānam santuṣṭaḥ iti sidhyati
jñānam ajñāta-tattvāya yaḥ dadyāt sat-pathe amṛtam kṛpāloḥ dīna-nāthasya devāḥ tasya anugṛhṇate
idam mayā te abhihitam kuru-udvaha dhruvasya vikhyāta viśuddha karmaṇaḥ hitvā arbhakaḥ krīḍanakāni mātuḥ gṛham ca viṣṇum śaraṇam yaḥ jagāma
sūtaḥ uvāca niśamya kauṣāraviṇā upavarṇitam dhruvasya vaikuṇṭha-pada adhirohaṇam prarūḍha bhāvaḥ bhagavati adhokṣaje praṣṭum punaḥ tam viduraḥ pracakrame
viduraḥ uvāca ke te pracetasaḥ nāma kasya apatyāni su-vrata kasya anvavāye prakhyātāḥ kutra vā satram āsata
manye mahā-bhāgavatam nāradam deva darśanam yena proktaḥ kriyā-yogaḥ paricaryā vidhiḥ hareḥ
sva-dharma-śīlaiḥ puruṣaiḥ bhagavān yajña-pūruṣaḥ ijyamānaḥ bhaktimatā nāradena īritaḥ kila
yāḥ tāḥ devarṣiṇā tatra varṇitāḥ bhagavat-kathāḥ mahyam śuśrūṣave brahman kārtsnyena ācaṣṭum arhasi
maitreyaḥ uvāca dhruvasya ca utkalaḥ putraḥ pitari prasthite vanam sārva-bhauma śriyam na aicchat adhirāja āsanam pituḥ
saḥ janmanā upaśānta ātmā niḥsaṅgaḥ sama-darśanaḥ dadarśa loke vitatam ātmānam lokam ātmani
ātmānam brahma nirvāṇam pratyastamita vigraham avabodha-rasa eka-ātmyam ānandam anusantatam avyavacchinna yoga agni dagdha karma mala āśayaḥ svarūpam avarundhānaḥ na ātmanaḥ anyam tadā aikṣata
jaḍa andha badhira unmatta mūka ākṛtiḥ a-tat matiḥ lakṣitaḥ pathi bālānām praśānta arciḥ iva analaḥ
matvā tam jaḍam unmattam kula-vṛddhāḥ samantriṇaḥ vatsaram bhū-patim cakruḥ yavīyāṁsam bhrameḥ sutam
svarvīthiḥ vatsarasya iṣṭā bhāryā asūta ṣaṭ ātmajān puṣpārṇam tigmaketum ca iṣam ūrjam vasum jayam
puṣpārṇasya prabhā bhāryā doṣā ca dve babhūvatuḥ prātaḥ madhyandinam sāyam iti hi āsan prabhā-sutāḥ
pradoṣaḥ niśithaḥ vyuṣṭaḥ iti doṣā sutāḥ trayaḥ vyuṣṭaḥ sutam puṣkariṇyām sarva-tejasam ādadhe
saḥ cakṣuḥ sutam ākūtyām patnyām manum avāpa ha manoḥ asūta mahiṣī virajān naḍvalā sutān purum kutsam tritam dyumnam satyavantam ṛtam vratam agniṣṭomam atīrātram pradyumnam śibim ulmukam
ulmukaḥ ajanayat putrān puṣkariṇyām ṣaṭ uttamān aṅgam sumanasam khyātim kratum aṅgirasam gayam
sunīthā aṅgasya yā patnī suṣuve venam ulbaṇam yat dauḥśīlyāt saḥ rāja-ṛṣiḥ nirviṇṇaḥ niragāt purāt
yam aṅga śepuḥ kupitāḥ vāk-vajrāḥ munayaḥ kila gata-asoḥ tasya bhūyaḥ te mamanthuḥ dakṣiṇam karam arājake tadā loke dasyubhiḥ pīḍitāḥ prajāḥ jātaḥ nārāyaṇa aṁśena pṛthuḥ ādyaḥ kṣiti-īśvaraḥ
viduraḥ uvāca tasya śīla-nidheḥ sādhoḥ brahmaṇyasya mahātmanaḥ rājñaḥ katham abhūt duṣṭā prajā yat vimanāḥ yayau
kim vā aṁhaḥ vene uddiśya brahma-daṇḍam ayūyujan daṇḍa-vrata-dhare rājñi munayaḥ dharma-kovidāḥ
na avadhyeyaḥ prajā-pālaḥ prajābhiḥ aghavān api yat asau loka-pālānām bibharti ojaḥ sva-tejasā
etat ākhyāhi me brahman sunīthā-ātmaja ceṣṭitam śraddadhānāya bhaktāya tvam para-avara vit-tamaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca aṅgaḥ aśvamedham rāja-ṛṣiḥ ājahāra mahā-kratum na ājagmuḥ devatāḥ tasmin āhūtāḥ brahma-vādibhiḥ
tam ūcuḥ vismitāḥ tatra yajamānam atha ṛtvijaḥ havīṁṣi hūyamānāni na te gṛhṇanti devatāḥ
rājan havīṁṣi aduṣṭāni śraddhayā āsāditāni te chandāṁsi ayāta-yāmāni yojitāni dhṛta-vrataiḥ
na vidāma iha devānām helanam vayam aṇu api yat na gṛhṇanti bhāgān svān ye devāḥ karma-sākṣiṇaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca aṅgaḥ dvija-vacaḥ śrutvā yajamānaḥ sudurmanāḥ tat praṣṭum vyasṛjat vācam sadasyān tat anujñayā
na āgacchanti āhutāḥ devāḥ na gṛhṇanti grahān iha sadasaḥ-patayaḥ brūta kim avadyam mayā kṛtam
sadasaḥ-patayaḥ ūcuḥ nara-deva iha bhavataḥ na agham tāvat manāk sthitam asti ekam prāktanam agham yat iha īdṛk tvam aprajaḥ
tathā sādhaya bhadram te ātmānam su-prajam nṛpa iṣṭaḥ te putra-kāmasya putram dāsyati yajña-bhuk
tathā sva-bhāga-dheyāni grahīṣyanti diva-okasaḥ yat yajña-puruṣaḥ sākṣāt apatyāya hariḥ vṛtaḥ
tān tān kāmān hariḥ dadyāt yān yān kāmayate janaḥ ārādhitaḥ yathā eva eṣaḥ tathā puṁsām phala-udayaḥ
iti vyavasitāḥ viprāḥ tasya rājñaḥ prajātaye puroḍāśam niravapan śipi-viṣṭāya viṣṇave
tasmāt puruṣaḥ uttasthau hema-mālī amala-ambaraḥ hiraṇmayena pātreṇa siddham ādāya pāyasam
saḥ vipra anumataḥ rājā gṛhītvā añjalinā odanam avaghrāya mudā yuktaḥ prādāt patnyai udāra-dhīḥ
sā tat pum-savanam rājñī prāśya vai patyuḥ ādadhe garbham kāle upāvṛtte kumāram suṣuve aprajā
saḥ bālaḥ eva puruṣaḥ mātā-maham anuvrataḥ adharma aṁśa udbhavam mṛtyum tena abhavat adhārmikaḥ
saḥ śarāsanam udyamya mṛgayuḥ vana-gocaraḥ hanti asādhuḥ mṛgān dīnān venaḥ asau iti araut janaḥ
ākrīḍe krīḍataḥ bālān vayasyān ati-dāruṇaḥ prasahya niranukrośaḥ paśu-māram amārayat
tam vicakṣya khalam putram śāsanaiḥ vividhaiḥ nṛpaḥ yadā na śāsitum kalpaḥ bhṛśam āsīt su-durmanāḥ
prāyeṇa abhyarcitaḥ devaḥ ye aprajāḥ gṛha-medhinaḥ kad-apatya bhṛtam duḥkham ye na vindanti durbharam
yataḥ pāpīyasī kīrtiḥ adharmaḥ ca mahān nṛṇām yataḥ virodhaḥ sarveṣām yataḥ ādhiḥ anantakaḥ
kaḥ tam prajā-apadeśam vai moha bandhanam ātmanaḥ paṇḍitaḥ bahu manyeta yat-arthāḥ kleśa-dāḥ gṛhāḥ
kad-apatyam varam manye sat-apatyāt śucām padāt nirvidyeta gṛhāt martyaḥ yat kleśa-nivahāḥ gṛhāḥ
evam saḥ nirviṇṇa-manāḥ nṛpaḥ gṛhāt niśīthe utthāya mahā-udaya-udayāt alabdha-nidraḥ anupalakṣitaḥ nṛbhiḥ hitvā gataḥ vena-suvam prasuptām
vijñāya nirvidya gatam patim prajāḥ purohita amātya suhṛt gaṇa-ādayaḥ vicikyuḥ urvyām ati-śoka-kātarāḥ yathā nigūḍham puruṣam ku-yoginaḥ
alakṣayantaḥ padavīm prajāpateḥ hata-udyamāḥ pratyupasṛtya te purīm ṛṣīn sametān abhivandya sa-aśravaḥ nyavedayan paurava bhartṛ viplavam
maitreyaḥ uvāca bhṛgu-ādayaḥ te munayaḥ lokānām kṣema-darśinaḥ goptari asati vai nṝṇām paśyantaḥ paśu-sāmyatām
vīra mātaram āhūya sunīthām brahma-vādinaḥ prakṛti asammatam venam abhyaṣiñcan patim bhuvaḥ
śrutvā nṛpa āsana-gatam venam ati ugra śāsanam nililyuḥ dasyavaḥ sadyaḥ sarpa trastāḥ iva ākhavaḥ
saḥ ārūḍha nṛpa-sthānaḥ unnaddhaḥ aṣṭa vibhūtibhiḥ avamene mahā-bhāgān stabdhaḥ sambhāvitaḥ svataḥ
evam mada-andhaḥ utsiktaḥ niraṅkuśaḥ iva dvipaḥ paryaṭan ratham āsthāya kampayan iva rodasī
na yaṣṭavyam na dātavyam na hotavyam dvijāḥ kvacit iti nyavārayat dharmam bherī ghoṣeṇa sarvaśaḥ
venasya āvekṣya munayaḥ durvṛttasya viceṣṭitam vimṛśya loka-vyasanam kṛpayā ūcuḥ sma satriṇaḥ
aho ubhayataḥ prāptam lokasya vyasanam mahat dāruṇi ubhayataḥ dīpte iva taskara pālayoḥ
arājaka bhayāt eṣaḥ kṛtaḥ rājā a-tat-arhaṇaḥ tataḥ api āsīt bhayam tu adya katham syāt svasti dehinām
aheḥ iva payaḥ poṣaḥ poṣakasya api anartha bhṛt venaḥ prakṛtyā eva khalaḥ sunīthā garbha sambhavaḥ
nirūpitaḥ prajā-pālaḥ saḥ jighāṁsati vai prajāḥ tathā api sāntvayema amum na asmān tat pātakam spṛśet
tat vidvadbhiḥ asat-vṛttaḥ venaḥ asmābhiḥ kṛtaḥ nṛpaḥ sāntvitaḥ yadi naḥ vācam na grahīṣyati adharma-kṛt loka-dhik-kāra sandagdham dahiṣyāmaḥ sva-tejasā
evam adhyavasāya enam munayaḥ gūḍha-manyavaḥ upavrajya abruvan venam sāntvayitvā ca sāmabhiḥ
munayaḥ ūcuḥ nṛpa-varya nibodha etat yat te vijñāpayāma bhoḥ āyuḥ śrī bala kīrtīnām tava tāta vivardhanam
dharmaḥ ācaritaḥ puṁsām vāk manaḥ kāya buddhibhiḥ lokān viśokān vitarati atha ānantyam asaṅginām
saḥ te mā vinaśet vīra prajānām kṣema-lakṣaṇaḥ yasmin vinaṣṭe nṛpatiḥ aiśvaryāt avarohati
rājan asādhu amātyebhyaḥ cora-ādibhyaḥ prajāḥ nṛpaḥ rakṣan yathā balim gṛhṇan iha pretya ca modate
yasya rāṣṭre pure ca eva bhagavān yajña-pūruṣaḥ ijyate svena dharmeṇa janaiḥ varṇa-āśrama anvitaiḥ
tasya rājñaḥ mahā-bhāga bhagavān bhūta-bhāvanaḥ parituṣyati viśva-ātmā tiṣṭhataḥ nija-śāsane
tasmin tuṣṭe kim aprāpyam jagatām īśvara-īśvare lokāḥ sapālāḥ hi etasmai haranti balim ādṛtāḥ
tam sarva-loka amara yajña saṅgraham trayī-mayam dravya-mayam tapaḥ-mayam yajñaiḥ vicitraiḥ yajataḥ bhavāya te rājan sva-deśān anuroddhum arhasi
yajñena yuṣmat viṣaye dvijātibhiḥ vitāyamānena surāḥ kalāḥ hareḥ su-iṣṭāḥ su-tuṣṭāḥ pradiśanti vāñchitam tat-helanam na arhasi vīra ceṣṭitum
venaḥ uvāca bāliśāḥ bata yūyam vā adharme dharma-māninaḥ ye vṛttidam patim hitvā jāram patim upāsate
avajānanti amī mūḍhāḥ nṛpa-rūpiṇam īśvaram na anuvindanti te bhadram iha loke paratra ca
kaḥ yajña-puruṣaḥ nāma yatra vaḥ bhaktiḥ īdṛśī bhartṛ sneha vidūrāṇām yathā jāre ku-yoṣitām
viṣṇuḥ viriñcaḥ giriśaḥ indraḥ vāyuḥ yamaḥ raviḥ parjanyaḥ dhana-daḥ somaḥ kṣitiḥ agniḥ apām-patiḥ ete ca anye ca vibudhāḥ prabhavaḥ vara-śāpayoḥ dehe bhavanti nṛpateḥ sarva-devamayaḥ nṛpaḥ
tasmāt mām karmabhiḥ viprāḥ yajadhvam gata matsarāḥ balim ca mahyam harata mattaḥ anyaḥ kaḥ agra-bhuk pumān
maitreyaḥ uvāca ittham viparyaya-matiḥ pāpīyān utpatham gataḥ anunīyamānaḥ tat-yācñām na cakre bhraṣṭa maṅgalaḥ
iti te asat-kṛtāḥ tena dvijāḥ paṇḍita-māninā bhagnāyām bhavya yācñāyām tasmai vidura cukrudhuḥ
hanyatām hanyatām eṣaḥ pāpaḥ prakṛti dāruṇaḥ jīvan jagat asau āśu kurute bhasmasāt dhruvam
na ayam arhati asat-vṛttaḥ nara-deva vara-āsanam yaḥ adhiyajña-patim viṣṇum vinindati anapatrapaḥ
kaḥ vā enam paricakṣīta venam ekam ṛte aśubham prāptaḥ īdṛśam aiśvaryam yat anugraha bhājanaḥ
ittham vyavasitāḥ hantum ṛṣayaḥ rūḍha manyavaḥ nijaghnuḥ hum-kṛtaiḥ venam hatam acyuta nindayā
ṛṣibhiḥ sva-āśrama-padam gate putra kalevaram sunīthā pālayām āsa vidyā-yogena śocatī
ekadā munayaḥ te tu sarasvat salila āplutāḥ hutvā agnīn sat-kathāḥ cakruḥ upaviṣṭāḥ sarit-taṭe
vīkṣya utthitān tadā utpātān āhuḥ loka bhayam-karān api abhadram anāthāyāḥ dasyubhyaḥ na bhavet bhuvaḥ
evam mṛśantaḥ ṛṣayaḥ dhāvatām sarvataḥ-diśam pāṁsuḥ samutthitaḥ bhūriḥ corāṇām abhilumpatām
tat upadravam ājñāya lokasya vasu lumpatām bhartari uparate tasmin anyonyam ca jighāṁ satām cora-prāyam jana-padam hīna sattvam arājakam lokān na avārayan śaktāḥ api tat-doṣa darśinaḥ
brāhmaṇaḥ sama-dṛk śāntaḥ dīnānām samupekṣakaḥ sravate brahma tasya api bhinna-bhāṇḍāt payaḥ yathā
na aṅgasya vaṁśaḥ rāja-ṛṣeḥ eṣaḥ saṁsthātum arhati amogha vīryāḥ hi nṛpāḥ vaṁśe asmin keśava āśrayāḥ
viniścitya evam ṛṣayaḥ vipannasya mahī-pateḥ mamanthuḥ ūrum tarasā tatra āsīt bāhukaḥ naraḥ
kāka-kṛṣṇaḥ ati-hrasva aṅgaḥ hrasva bāhuḥ mahā hanuḥ hrasva pāt nimna nāsa-agraḥ rakta akṣaḥ tāmra mūrdha-jaḥ
tam tu te avanatam dīnam kim karomi iti vādinam niṣīda iti abruvan tāta saḥ niṣādaḥ tataḥ abhavat
tasya vaṁśyāḥ tu naiṣādāḥ giri-kānana gocarāḥ yena aharat jāyamānaḥ vena kalmaṣam ulbaṇam
maitreyaḥ uvāca atha tasya punaḥ vipraiḥ aputrasya mahīpateḥ bāhubhyām mathyamānābhyām mithunam samapadyata
tat dṛṣṭvā mithunam jātam ṛṣayaḥ brahma-vādinaḥ ūcuḥ parama santuṣṭāḥ viditvā bhagavat kalām
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ eṣaḥ viṣṇoḥ bhagavataḥ kalā bhuvana-pālinī iyam ca lakṣmyāḥ sambhūtiḥ puruṣasya anapāyinī
ayam tu prathamaḥ rājñām pumān prathayitā yaśaḥ pṛthuḥ nāma mahā-rājaḥ bhaviṣyati pṛthu-śravāḥ
iyam ca su-datī devī guṇa bhūṣaṇa bhūṣaṇā arciḥ nāma vara-ārohā pṛthum eva avarundhatī
eṣaḥ sākṣāt hareḥ aṁśaḥ jātaḥ loka rirakṣayā iyam ca tat-parā hi śrīḥ anujajñe anapāyinī
maitreyaḥ uvāca praśaṁsanti sma tam viprāḥ gandharva-pravarāḥ jaguḥ mumucuḥ sumanaḥ-dhārāḥ siddhāḥ nṛtyanti svaḥ striyaḥ
śaṅkha tūrya mṛdaṅga ādyāḥ neduḥ dundubhayaḥ divi tatra sarve upājagmuḥ deva-ṛṣi pitṝṇām gaṇāḥ
brahmā jagat-guruḥ devaiḥ saha āsṛtya sura-īśvaraiḥ vainyasya dakṣiṇe haste dṛṣṭvā cihnam gadā-bhṛtaḥ pādayoḥ aravindam ca tam vai mene hareḥ kalām yasya apratihatam cakram aṁśaḥ saḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ
tasya abhiṣekaḥ ārabdhaḥ brāhmaṇaiḥ brahma-vādibhiḥ ābhiṣecanikāni asmai ājahruḥ sarvataḥ janāḥ
sarit samudrāḥ girayaḥ nāgāḥ gāvaḥ khagāḥ mṛgāḥ dyauḥ kṣitiḥ sarva-bhūtāni samājahruḥ upāyanam
saḥ abhiṣiktaḥ mahārājaḥ su-vāsāḥ sādhu-alaṅkṛtaḥ patnyā arciṣā alaṅkṛtayā vireje agniḥ iva aparaḥ
tasmai jahāra dhana-daḥ haimam vīra vara-āsanam varuṇaḥ salila-srāvam ātapatram śaśi-prabham
vāyuḥ ca vāla-vyajane dharmaḥ kīrti-mayīm srajam indraḥ kirīṭam utkṛṣṭam daṇḍam saṁyamanam yamaḥ
brahmā brahma-mayam varma bhāratī hāram uttamam hariḥ sudarśanam cakram tat-patnī avyāhatām śriyam
daśa-candram asim rudraḥ śata-candram tathā ambikā somaḥ amṛta-mayān aśvān tvaṣṭā rūpa-āśrayam ratham
agniḥ āja-gavam cāpam sūryaḥ raśmi-mayān iṣūn bhūḥ pāduke yoga-mayyau dyauḥ puṣpa āvalim anu-aham
nāṭyam su-gītam vāditram antardhānam ca khe-carāḥ ṛṣayaḥ ca āśiṣaḥ satyāḥ samudraḥ śaṅkham ātma-jam
sindhavaḥ parvatāḥ nadyaḥ ratha-vīthīḥ mahā-ātmanaḥ sūtaḥ atha māgadhaḥ vandī tam stotum upatasthire
stāvakān tān abhipretya pṛthuḥ vainyaḥ pratāpa-vān megha-nirhrādayā vācā prahasan idam abravīt
pṛthuḥ uvāca bhoḥ sūta he māgadha saumya vandin loke adhunā aspaṣṭa guṇasya me syāt kim āśrayaḥ me stavaḥ eṣaḥ yojyatām mā mayi abhūvan vitathāḥ giraḥ vaḥ
tasmāt parokṣe asmat upaśrutāni alam kariṣyatha stotram apīcya-vācaḥ sati uttama-śloka guṇa anuvāde jugupsitam na stavayanti sabhyāḥ
mahat guṇān ātmani kartum īśaḥ kaḥ stāvakaiḥ stāvayate asataḥ api te asya abhaviṣyan iti vipralabdhaḥ jana avahāsam kumatiḥ na veda
prabhavaḥ hi ātmanaḥ stotram jugupsanti api viśrutāḥ hrī-mantaḥ parama-udārāḥ pauruṣam vā vigarhitam
vayam tu aviditāḥ loke sūta-ādya api varīmabhiḥ karmabhiḥ katham ātmānam gāpayiṣyāma bālavat
maitreyaḥ uvāca iti bruvāṇam nṛpatim gāyakāḥ muni coditāḥ tuṣṭuvuḥ tuṣṭa manasaḥ tat vāk amṛta sevayā
na alam vayam te mahima anuvarṇane yaḥ deva varyaḥ avatatāra māyayā vena-aṅga jātasya ca pauruṣāṇi te vācaḥ-patīnām api babhramuḥ dhiyaḥ
atha api udāra śravasaḥ pṛthoḥ hareḥ kalā avatārasya kathā amṛta ādṛtāḥ yathā upadeśam munibhiḥ pracoditāḥ ślāghyāni karmāṇi vayam vitanmahi
eṣaḥ dharma-bhṛtām śreṣṭhaḥ lokam dharme anuvartayan goptā ca dharma-setūnām śāstā tat-paripanthinām
eṣaḥ vai loka-pālānām bibharti ekaḥ tanau tanūḥ kāle kāle yathā bhāgam lokayoḥ ubhayoḥ hitam
vasu kāle upādatte kāle ca ayam vimuñcati samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu pratapan sūrya-vat vibhuḥ
titikṣati akramam vainyaḥ upari ākramatām api bhūtānām karuṇaḥ śaśvat ārtānām kṣiti-vṛtti-mān
deve avarṣati asau devaḥ nara-deva vapuḥ hariḥ kṛcchra-prāṇāḥ prajāḥ hi eṣaḥ rakṣiṣyati añjasā indra-vat
āpyāyayati asau lokam vadana amṛta-mūrtinā sa-anurāga avalokena viśada smita cāruṇā
avyakta vartmā eṣaḥ nigūḍha kāryaḥ gambhīra vedhāḥ upagupta vittaḥ ananta māhātmya guṇa eka-dhāmā pṛthuḥ pracetāḥ iva saṁvṛta ātmā
durāsadaḥ durviṣahaḥ āsannaḥ api vidūra-vat na eva abhibhavitum śakyaḥ vena araṇi utthitaḥ analaḥ
antaḥ bahiḥ ca bhūtānām paśyan karmāṇi cāraṇaiḥ udāsīnaḥ iva adhyakṣaḥ vāyuḥ ātmā iva dehinām
na adaṇḍyam daṇḍayati eṣaḥ sutam ātma-dviṣām api daṇḍayati ātma-jam api daṇḍyam dharma-pathe sthitaḥ
asya apratihatam cakram pṛthoḥ ā-mānasa-acalāt vartate bhagavān arkaḥ yāvat tapati go-gaṇaiḥ
rañjayiṣyati yat lokam ayam ātma viceṣṭitaiḥ atha amum āhuḥ rājānam manaḥ-rañjanakaiḥ prajāḥ
dṛḍha-vrataḥ satya-sandhaḥ brahmaṇyaḥ vṛddha-sevakaḥ śaraṇyaḥ sarva-bhūtānām māna-daḥ dīna-vatsalaḥ
mātṛ-bhaktiḥ para-strīṣu patnyām ardhaḥ iva ātmanaḥ prajāsu pitṛ-vat snigdhaḥ kiṅkaraḥ brahma-vādinām
dehinām ātma-vat preṣṭhaḥ suhṛdām nandi-vardhanaḥ mukta-saṅga prasaṅgaḥ ayam daṇḍa-pāṇiḥ asādhuṣu
ayam tu sākṣāt bhagavān tri-adhīśaḥ kūṭa-sthaḥ ātmā kalayā avatīrṇaḥ yasmin avidyā-racitam nirarthakam paśyanti nānātvam api pratītam
ayam bhuvaḥ maṇḍalam ā-udaya-adreḥ goptā eka vīraḥ nara-deva nāthaḥ āsthāya jaitram ratham ātta-cāpaḥ paryasyate dakṣiṇataḥ yathā arkaḥ
asmai nṛ-pālāḥ kila tatra tatra balim hariṣyanti sa loka-pālāḥ maṁsyante eṣām striyaḥ ādi-rājam cakra-āyudham tat yaśaḥ uddharantyaḥ
ayam mahīm gām duduhe adhirājaḥ prajā-patiḥ vṛtti-karaḥ prajānām yaḥ līlayā adrīn sva-śarāsa koṭyā bhindan samām gām akarot yathā indraḥ
visphūrjayan āja-gavam dhanuḥ svayam yadā acarat kṣmām aviṣahyam ājau tadā nililyuḥ diśi diśi asantaḥ lāṅgūlam udyamya yathā mṛgendraḥ
eṣaḥ aśvamedhān śatam ājahāra sarasvatī prādurabhāvi yatra ahārṣīt yasya hayam purandaraḥ śata-kratuḥ carame vartamāne
eṣaḥ sva-sadma upavane sametya sanat-kumāram bhagavantam ekam ārādhya bhaktyā alabhata amalam tat jñānam yataḥ brahma param vidanti
tatra tatra giraḥ tāḥ tāḥ iti viśruta-vikramaḥ śroṣyati ātma-āśritāḥ gāthāḥ pṛthuḥ pṛthu-parākramaḥ
diśaḥ vijitya apratiruddha cakraḥ sva-tejasā utpāṭita loka-śalyaḥ sura asura indraiḥ upagīyamāna mahā-anubhāvaḥ bhavitā patiḥ bhuvaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca evam saḥ bhagavān vainyaḥ khyāpitaḥ guṇa-karmabhiḥ chandayām āsa tān kāmaiḥ pratipūjya abhinandya ca
brāhmaṇa-pramukhān varṇān bhṛtya amātya purodhasaḥ paurān jāna-padān śreṇīḥ prakṛtīḥ samapūjayat
viduraḥ uvāca kasmāt dadhāra go-rūpam dharitrī bahu-rūpiṇī yām dudoha pṛthuḥ tatra kaḥ vatsaḥ dohanam ca kim
prakṛtyā viṣamā devī kṛtā tena samā katham tasya medhyam hayam devaḥ kasya hetoḥ apāharat
sanat-kumārāt bhagavataḥ brahman brahma-vit-uttamāt labdhvā jñānam sa-vijñānam rāja-ṛṣiḥ kām gatim gataḥ
yat ca anyat api kṛṣṇasya bhavān bhagavataḥ prabhoḥ śravaḥ su-śravasaḥ puṇyam pūrva-deha kathā-āśrayam bhaktāya me anuraktāya tava ca adhokṣajasya ca vaktum arhasi yaḥ aduhyat vainya-rūpeṇa gām imām
sūtaḥ uvāca coditaḥ vidureṇa evam vāsudeva kathām prati praśasya tam prīta-manāḥ maitreyaḥ pratyabhāṣata
maitreyaḥ uvāca yadā abhiṣiktaḥ pṛthuḥ aṅga vipraiḥ āmantritaḥ janatāyāḥ ca pālaḥ prajāḥ niranne kṣiti-pṛṣṭhe etya kṣut kṣāma dehāḥ patim abhyavocan
vayam rājan jāṭhareṇa abhitaptāḥ yathā agninā koṭara-sthena vṛkṣāḥ tvām adya yātāḥ śaraṇam śaraṇyam yaḥ sādhitaḥ vṛtti-karaḥ patiḥ naḥ tat naḥ bhavān īhatu rātave annam kṣudhā arditānām nara-deva-deva yāvat na naṅkṣyāmahe ujjhita ūrjāḥ vārtā patiḥ tvam kila loka-pālaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca pṛthuḥ prajānām karuṇam niśamya paridevitam dīrgham dadhyau kuru-śreṣṭha nimittam saḥ anvapadyata
iti vyavasitaḥ buddhyā pragṛhīta śarāsanaḥ sandadhe viśikham bhūmeḥ kruddhaḥ tri-pura-hā yathā
pravepamānā dharaṇī niśāmya udāyudham ca tam gauḥ satī apādravat bhītā mṛgī iva mṛgayu drutā
tām anvadhāvat tat vainyaḥ kupitaḥ ati-aruṇa īkṣaṇaḥ śaram dhanuṣi sandhāya yatra yatra palāyate
sā diśaḥ vidiśaḥ devī rodasī ca antaram tayoḥ dhāvantī tatra tatra enam dadarśa anu udyata āyudham
loke na avindata trāṇam vainyāt mṛtyoḥ iva prajāḥ trastā tadā nivavṛte hṛdayena vidūyatā
uvāca ca mahā-bhāgam dharma-jña āpanna-vatsala trāhi mām api bhūtānām pālane avasthitaḥ bhavān
saḥ tvam jighāṁsase kasmāt dīnām akṛta kilbiṣām ahaniṣyat katham yoṣām dharma-jñaḥ iti yaḥ mataḥ
praharanti na vai strīṣu kṛta-āgaḥsu api jantavaḥ kim uta tvat-vidhāḥ rājan karuṇāḥ dīna-vatsalāḥ
mām vipāṭya ajarām nāvam yatra viśvam pratiṣṭhitam ātmānam ca prajāḥ ca imāḥ katham ambhasi dhāsyasi
pṛthuḥ uvāca vasu-dhe tvām vadhiṣyāmi mat śāsana parāk-mukhīm bhāgam barhiṣi yā vṛṅkte na tanoti ca naḥ vasu
yavasam jagdhi anudinam na eva dogdhi audhasam payaḥ tasyām evam hi duṣṭāyām daṇḍaḥ na atra na śasyate
tvam khalu oṣadhi bījāni prāk sṛṣṭāni svayambhuvā na muñcasi ātma-ruddhāni mām avajñāya manda-dhīḥ
amūṣām kṣut-parītānām ārtānām paridevitam śamayiṣyāmi mat-bāṇaiḥ bhinnāyāḥ tava medasā
pumān yoṣit uta klībaḥ ātma-sambhāvanaḥ adhamaḥ bhūteṣu niranukrośaḥ nṛpāṇām tat vadhaḥ avadhaḥ
tvām stabdhām durmadām nītvā māyā-gām tilaśaḥ śaraiḥ ātma yoga-balena imāḥ dhārayiṣyāmi aham prajāḥ
evam manyu-mayīm mūrtim kṛta-antam iva bibhratam praṇatā prāñjaliḥ prāha mahī sañjāta vepathuḥ
dharā uvāca namaḥ parasmai puruṣāya māyayā vinyasta nānā tanave guṇa-ātmane namaḥ svarūpa anubhavena nirdhuta dravya kriyā kāraka vibhrama ūrmaye
yena aham ātma-āyatanam vinirmitā dhātrā yataḥ ayam guṇa-sarga-saṅgrahaḥ saḥ eva mām hantum udāyudhaḥ svarāṭ upasthitaḥ anyam śaraṇam kam āśraye
yaḥ etat ādau asṛjat cara-acaram sva-māyayā ātma-āśrayayā avitarkyayā tayā eva saḥ ayam kila goptum udyataḥ katham nu mām dharma-paraḥ jighāṁsati
nūnam bata īśasya samīhitam janaiḥ tat-māyayā durjayayā akṛta-ātmabhiḥ na lakṣyate yaḥ tu akarot akārayat yaḥ anekaḥ ekaḥ parataḥ ca īśvaraḥ
sarga-ādi yaḥ asya anuruṇaddhi śaktibhiḥ dravya kriyā kāraka cetanā ātmabhiḥ tasmai samunnaddha niruddha śaktaye namaḥ parasmai puruṣāya vedhase
saḥ vai bhavān ātma vinirmitam jagat bhūta indriya antaḥ-karaṇa ātmakam vibho saṁsthāpayiṣyan aja mām rasātalāt abhyujjahāra ambhasaḥ ādi sūkaraḥ
apām upasthe mayi nāvi avasthitāḥ prajāḥ bhavān adya rirakṣiṣuḥ kila saḥ vīra-mūrtiḥ samabhūt dharā-dharaḥ yaḥ mām payasi ugra-śaraḥ jighāṁsasi
nūnam janaiḥ īhitam īśvarāṇām asmat-vidhaiḥ tat guṇa sarga māyayā na jñāyate mohita citta vartmabhiḥ tebhyaḥ namaḥ vīra-yaśaḥ-karebhyaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca ittham pṛthum abhiṣṭūya ruṣā prasphurita adharam punaḥ āha avaniḥ bhītā saṁstabhya ātmānam ātmanā
sanniyaccha abhibho manyum nibodha śrāvitam ca me sarvataḥ sāram ādatte yathā madhu-karaḥ budhaḥ
asmin loke atha vā amuṣmin munibhiḥ tattva darśibhiḥ dṛṣṭāḥ yogāḥ prayuktāḥ ca puṁsām śreyaḥ prasiddhaye
tān ātiṣṭhati yaḥ samyak upāyān pūrva darśitān avaraḥ śraddhayā upetaḥ upeyān vindate añjasā
tān anādṛtya yaḥ avidvān arthān ārabhate svayam tasya vyabhicaranti arthāḥ ārabdhāḥ ca punaḥ punaḥ
purā sṛṣṭāḥ hi oṣadhayaḥ brahmaṇā yāḥ viśām-pate bhujyamānāḥ mayā dṛṣṭāḥ asadbhiḥ adhṛta-vrataiḥ
apālitā anādṛtā ca bhavadbhiḥ loka-pālakaiḥ corī-bhūte atha loke aham yajña-arthe agrasam oṣadhīḥ
nūnam tāḥ vīrudhaḥ kṣīṇāḥ mayi kālena bhūyasā tatra yogena dṛṣṭena bhavān ādātum arhati
vatsam kalpaya me vīra yena aham vatsalā tava dhokṣye kṣīra-mayān kāmān anurūpam ca dohanam dogdhāram ca mahā-bāho bhūtānām bhūta-bhāvana annam īpsitam ūrjaḥ-vat bhagavān vāñchate yadi
samām ca kuru mām rājan deva-vṛṣṭam yathā payaḥ apa-ṛtau api bhadram te upāvarteta me vibho
iti priyam hitam vākyam bhuvaḥ ādāya bhū-patiḥ vatsam kṛtvā manum pāṇau aduhat sakala oṣadhīḥ
tathā apare ca sarvatra sāram ādadate budhāḥ tataḥ anye ca yathā-kāmam duduhuḥ pṛthu-bhāvitām
ṛṣayaḥ duduhuḥ devīm indriyeṣu atha sattama vatsam bṛhaspatim kṛtvā payaḥ chandaḥ-mayam śuci
kṛtvā vatsam sura-gaṇāḥ indram somam adūduhan hiraṇmayena pātreṇa vīryam ojaḥ balam payaḥ
daiteyāḥ dānavāḥ vatsam prahlādam asura ṛṣabham vidhāya adūduhan kṣīram ayaḥ pātre surā āsavam
gandharva apsarasaḥ adhukṣan pātre padma-maye payaḥ vatsam viśvāvasum kṛtvā gāndharvam madhu saubhagam
vatsena pitaraḥ aryamṇā kavyam kṣīram adhukṣata āma-pātre mahā-bhāgāḥ śraddhayā śrāddha-devatāḥ
prakalpya vatsam kapilam siddhāḥ saṅkalpanā-mayīm siddhim nabhasi vidyām ca ye ca vidyādhara-ādayaḥ
anye ca māyinaḥ māyām antardhāna adbhuta ātmanām mayam prakalpya vatsam te duduhuḥ dhāraṇāmayīm
yakṣa rakṣāṁsi bhūtāni piśācāḥ piśita-aśanāḥ bhūteśa vatsāḥ duduhuḥ kapāle kṣata-ja āsavam
tathā ahayaḥ dandaśūkāḥ sarpāḥ nāgāḥ ca takṣakam vidhāya vatsam duduhuḥ bila-pātre viṣam payaḥ
paśavaḥ yavasam kṣīram vatsam kṛtvā ca go-vṛṣam araṇya-pātre ca adhukṣan mṛga-indreṇa ca daṁṣṭriṇaḥ kravya-adāḥ prāṇinaḥ kravyam duduhuḥ sve kalevare suparṇa vatsāḥ vihagāḥ caram ca acaram eva ca
vaṭa-vatsāḥ vanaḥ-patayaḥ pṛthak rasa-mayam payaḥ girayaḥ himavat-vatsāḥ nānā dhātūn sva sānuṣu
sarve sva-mukhya vatsena sve sve pātre pṛthak payaḥ sarva-kāma dughām pṛthvīm duduhuḥ pṛthu-bhāvitām
evam pṛthu-ādayaḥ pṛthvīm anna-adāḥ su-annam ātmanaḥ doha vatsa-ādi bhedena kṣīra bhedam kuru-udvaha
tataḥ mahī-patiḥ prītaḥ sarva-kāma dughām pṛthuḥ duhitṛtve cakāra imām premṇā duhitṛ-vatsalaḥ
cūrṇayan sva dhanuḥ-koṭyā giri kūṭāni rāja-rāṭ bhū-maṇḍalam idam vainyaḥ prāyaḥ cakre samam vibhuḥ
atha asmin bhagavān vainyaḥ prajānām vṛttidaḥ pitā nivāsān kalpayām cakre tatra tatra yathā arhataḥ
grāmān puraḥ pattanāni durgāṇi vividhāni ca ghoṣān vrajān sa-śibirān ākarān kheṭa kharvaṭān
prāk pṛthoḥ iha na eva eṣā pura grāma-ādi kalpanā yathā sukham vasanti sma tatra tatra akutaḥ-bhayāḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca atha adīkṣata rājā tu haya medha śatena saḥ brahmāvarte manoḥ kṣetre yatra prācī sarasvatī
tat abhipretya bhagavān karma-atiśayam ātmanaḥ śata-kratuḥ na mamṛṣe pṛthoḥ yajña mahā-utsavam
yatra yajña-patiḥ sākṣāt bhagavān hariḥ īśvaraḥ anvabhūyata sarva-ātmā sarva-loka-guruḥ prabhuḥ
anvitaḥ brahma śarvābhyām loka-pālaiḥ saha anugaiḥ upagīyamānaḥ gandharvaiḥ munibhiḥ ca apsaraḥ-gaṇaiḥ
siddhāḥ vidyādharāḥ daityāḥ dānavāḥ guhyaka-ādayaḥ sunanda-nanda-pramukhāḥ pārṣada pravarāḥ hareḥ
kapilaḥ nāradaḥ dattaḥ yoga-īśāḥ sanaka-ādayaḥ tam anvīyuḥ bhāgavatāḥ ye ca tat-sevana-utsukāḥ
yatra dharma-dughā bhūmiḥ sarva-kāma dughā satī dogdhi sma abhīpsitān arthān yajamānasya bhārata
ūhuḥ sarva-rasān nadyaḥ kṣīra dadhi anna go-rasān taravaḥ bhūri varṣmāṇaḥ prāsūyanta madhu-cyutaḥ
sindhavaḥ ratna-nikarān girayaḥ annam catuḥ-vidham upāyanam upājahruḥ sarve lokāḥ sa-pālakāḥ
iti ca adhokṣaja-īśasya pṛthoḥ tu parama udayam asūyan bhagavān indraḥ pratighātam acīkarat
carameṇa aśva-medhena yajamāne yajuḥ-patim vainye yajña-paśum spardhan apovāha tirohitaḥ
tam atriḥ bhagavān aikṣat tvaramāṇam vihāyasā āmuktam iva pākhaṇḍam yaḥ adharme dharma vibhramaḥ
atriṇā coditaḥ hantum pṛthu-putraḥ mahā-rathaḥ anvadhāvata saṅkruddhaḥ tiṣṭha tiṣṭha iti ca abravīt
tam tādṛśa-ākṛtim vīkṣya mene dharmam śarīriṇam jaṭilam bhasmanā ācchannam tasmai bāṇam na muñcati
vadhāt nivṛttam tam bhūyaḥ hantave atriḥ acodayat jahi yajña-hanam tāta mahā-indram vibudha-adhamam
evam vainya-sutaḥ proktaḥ tvaramāṇam vihāyasā anvadravat abhikruddhaḥ rāvaṇam gṛdhra-rāṭ iva
saḥ aśvam rūpam ca tat hitvā tasmai antarhitaḥ sva-rāṭ vīraḥ sva-paśum ādāya pituḥ yajñam upeyivān
tat tasya ca adbhutam karma vicakṣya parama-ṛṣayaḥ nāmadheyam daduḥ tasmai vijita-aśvaḥ iti prabho
upasṛjya tamaḥ tīvram jahāra aśvam punaḥ hariḥ caṣāla-yūpataḥ channaḥ hiraṇya-raśanam vibhuḥ
atriḥ sandarśayām āsa tvaramāṇam vihāyasā kapāla-khaṭvāṅga dharam vīraḥ na enam abādhata
atriṇā coditaḥ tasmai sandadhe viśikham ruṣā saḥ aśvam rūpam ca tat hitvā tasthau antarhitaḥ sva-rāṭ
vīraḥ ca aśvam upādāya pitṛ-yajñam atha avrajat tat avadyam hareḥ rūpam jagṛhuḥ jñāna-durbalāḥ
yāni rūpāṇi jagṛhe indraḥ haya jihīrṣayā tāni pāpasya khaṇḍāni liṅgam khaṇḍam iha ucyate
evam indre harati aśvam vainya yajña jighāṁsayā tat gṛhīta visṛṣṭeṣu pākhaṇḍeṣu matiḥ nṛṇām dharmaḥ iti upadharmeṣu nagna rakta-paṭa ādiṣu prāyeṇa sajjate bhrāntyā peśaleṣu ca vāgmiṣu
tat abhijñāya bhagavān pṛthuḥ pṛthu-parākramaḥ indrāya kupitaḥ bāṇam ādatta udyata kārmukaḥ
tam ṛtvijaḥ śakra-vadha abhisandhitam vicakṣya duṣprekṣyam asahya raṁhasam nivārayām āsuḥ aho mahā-mate na yujyate atra anya vadhaḥ pracoditāt
vayam marut-vantam iha artha nāśanam hvayāmahe tvat-śravasā hata-tviṣam ayātayāma upahavaiḥ anantaram prasahya rājan juhavāma te ahitam
iti āmantrya kratu-patim vidura asya ṛtvijaḥ ruṣā sruk-hastān juhvataḥ abhyetya svayambhūḥ pratyaṣedhata
na vadhyaḥ bhavatām indraḥ yat yajñaḥ bhagavat-tanuḥ yam jighāṁsatha yajñena yasya iṣṭāḥ tanavaḥ surāḥ
tat idam paśyata mahat dharma vyatikaram dvijāḥ indreṇa anuṣṭhitam rājñaḥ karma etat vijighāṁsatā
pṛthu-kīrteḥ pṛthoḥ bhūyāt tarhi eka-ūna-śata-kratuḥ alam te kratubhiḥ su-iṣṭaiḥ yat bhavān mokṣa-dharma-vit
na eva ātmane mahā-indrāya roṣam āhartum arhasi ubhau api hi bhadram te uttama-śloka-vigrahau
mā asmin mahā-rāja kṛthāḥ sma cintām niśāmaya asmat vacaḥ ādṛta-ātmā yat dhyāyataḥ daiva-hatam nu kartum manaḥ ati-ruṣṭam viśate tamaḥ andham
kratuḥ viramatām eṣaḥ deveṣu duravagrahaḥ dharma-vyatikaraḥ yatra pākhaṇḍaiḥ indra nirmitaiḥ
ebhiḥ indra-upasaṁsṛṣṭaiḥ pākhaṇḍaiḥ hāribhiḥ janam hriyamāṇam vicakṣva enam yaḥ te yajña-dhruk aśva-muṭ
bhavān paritrātum iha avatīrṇaḥ dharmam janānām samaya-anurūpam vena-apacārāt avaluptam adya tat dehataḥ viṣṇu kalā asi vainya
saḥ tvam vimṛśya asya bhavam prajā-pate saṅkalpanam viśva-sṛjām pipīpṛhi aindrīm ca māyām upadharma mātaram pracaṇḍa pākhaṇḍa-patham prabho jahi
maitreyaḥ uvāca ittham saḥ loka-guruṇā samādiṣṭaḥ viśām-patiḥ tathā ca kṛtvā vātsalyam maghonā api ca sandadhe
kṛta avabhṛtha-snānāya pṛthave bhūri-karmaṇe varān daduḥ te vara-dāḥ ye tat-barhiṣi tarpitāḥ
viprāḥ satya āśiṣaḥ tuṣṭāḥ śraddhayā labdha-dakṣiṇāḥ āśiṣaḥ yuyujuḥ kṣattaḥ ādi-rājāya sat-kṛtāḥ
tvayā āhūtāḥ mahā-bāho sarve eva samāgatāḥ pūjitāḥ dāna mānābhyām pitṛ deva ṛṣi mānavāḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca bhagavān api vaikuṇṭhaḥ sākam maghavatā vibhuḥ yajñaiḥ yajña-patiḥ tuṣṭaḥ yajña-bhuk tam abhāṣata
śrī-bhagavān uvāca eṣaḥ te akārṣīt bhaṅgam haya medha śatasya ha kṣamāpayataḥ ātmānam amuṣya kṣantum arhasi
su-dhiyaḥ sādhavaḥ loke nara-deva nara-uttamāḥ na abhidruhyanti bhūtebhyaḥ yarhi na ātmā kalevaram
puruṣāḥ yadi muhyanti tvādṛśāḥ deva māyayā śramaḥ eva param jātaḥ dīrghayā vṛddha-sevayā
ataḥ kāyam imam vidvān avidyā kāma karmabhiḥ ārabdhaḥ iti na eva asmin pratibuddhaḥ anuṣajjate
asaṁsaktaḥ śarīre asmin amunā utpādite gṛhe apatye draviṇe vā api kaḥ kuryāt mamatām budhaḥ
ekaḥ śuddhaḥ svayam jyotiḥ nirguṇaḥ asau guṇa-āśrayaḥ sarva-gaḥ anāvṛtaḥ sākṣī nirātmā ātma-ātmanaḥ paraḥ
yaḥ evam santam ātmānam ātma-stham veda pūruṣaḥ na ajyate prakṛti sthaḥ api tat-guṇaiḥ saḥ mayi sthitaḥ
yaḥ sva-dharmeṇa mām nityam nirāśīḥ śraddhayā anvitaḥ bhajate śanakaiḥ tasya manaḥ rājan prasīdati
parityakta-guṇaḥ samyak darśanaḥ viśada āśayaḥ śāntim me samavasthānam brahma kaivalyam aśnute
udāsīnam iva adhyakṣam dravya jñāna kriyā ātmanām kūṭa-stham imam ātmānam yaḥ veda āpnoti śobhanam
bhinnasya liṅgasya guṇa pravāhaḥ dravya kriyā kāraka cetanā ātmanaḥ dṛṣṭāsu sampatsu vipatsu sūrayaḥ na vikriyante mayi baddha-sauhṛdāḥ
samaḥ samāna uttama madhyama adhamaḥ sukhe ca duḥkhe ca jita-indriya āśayaḥ mayā upakḷpta akhila loka saṁyutaḥ vidhatsva vīra akhila loka rakṣaṇam
śreyaḥ prajā-pālanam eva rājñaḥ yat sāmparāye su-kṛtāt ṣaṣṭham aṁśam hartā anyathā hṛta-puṇyaḥ prajānām arakṣitā kara-hāraḥ agham atti
evam dvija agrya anumata anuvṛtta dharma pradhānaḥ anyatamaḥ avitā asyāḥ hrasvena kālena gṛha upayātān draṣṭāsi siddhān anurakta-lokaḥ
varam ca mat kañcana mānava-indra vṛṇīṣva te aham guṇa-śīla yantritaḥ na aham makhaiḥ vai su-labhaḥ tapobhiḥ yogena vā yat sama-citta vartī
maitreyaḥ uvāca saḥ ittham loka-guruṇā viṣvaksenena viśva-jit anuśāsitaḥ ādeśam śirasā jagṛhe hareḥ
spṛśantam pādayoḥ premṇā vrīḍitam svena karmaṇā śata-kratum pariṣvajya vidveṣam visasarja ha
bhagavān atha viśva-ātmā pṛthunā upahṛta arhaṇaḥ samujjihānayā bhaktyā gṛhīta caraṇa-ambujaḥ
prasthāna abhimukhaḥ api enam anugraha vilambitaḥ paśyan padma-palāśa-akṣaḥ na pratasthe suhṛt satām
saḥ ādi-rājaḥ racita-añjaliḥ harim vilokitum na aśakat aśru-locanaḥ na kiñcana uvāca saḥ bāṣpa-viklavaḥ hṛdā upaguhya amum adhāt avasthitaḥ
atha avamṛjya aśru-kalāḥ vilokayan atṛpta dṛk-gocaram āha pūruṣam padā spṛśantam kṣitim aṁse unnate vinyasta hasta agram uraṅga-vidviṣaḥ
pṛthuḥ uvāca varān vibho tvat vara-da-īśvarāt budhaḥ katham vṛṇīte guṇa-vikriyā ātmanām ye nārakāṇām api santi dehinām tān īśa kaivalya-pate vṛṇe na ca
na kāmaye nātha tat api aham kvacit na yatra yuṣmat caraṇa-ambuja āsavaḥ mahat-tama antaḥ-hṛdayāt mukha cyutaḥ vidhatsva karṇa ayutam eṣaḥ me varaḥ
saḥ uttama-śloka mahat mukha-cyutaḥ bhavat pada-ambhoja sudhā kaṇa anilaḥ smṛtim punaḥ vismṛta tattva vartmanām ku-yoginām naḥ vitarati alam varaiḥ
yaśaḥ śivam su-śravaḥ ārya-saṅgame yadṛcchayā ca upaśṛṇoti te sakṛt katham guṇa-jñaḥ viramet vinā paśum śrīḥ yat pravavre guṇa saṅgraha icchayā
atha ābhaje tvā akhila pūruṣa-uttamam guṇa-ālayam padma-karā iva lālasaḥ api āvayoḥ eka-pati spṛdhoḥ kaliḥ na syāt kṛta tvat-caraṇa eka-tānayoḥ
jagat-jananyām jagat-īśa vaiśasam syāt eva yat-karmaṇi naḥ samīhitam karoṣi phalgu api uru dīna-vatsalaḥ sve eva dhiṣṇye abhiratasya kim tayā
bhajanti atha tvām ataḥ eva sādhavaḥ vyudasta māyā-guṇa vibhrama udayam bhavat pada anusmaraṇāt ṛte satām nimittam anyat bhagavan na vidmahe
manye giram te jagatām vimohinīm varam vṛṇīṣva iti bhajantam āttha yat vācā nu tantyā yadi te janaḥ asitaḥ katham punaḥ karma karoti mohitaḥ
tvat māyayā addhā janaḥ īśa khaṇḍitaḥ yat anyat āśāste ṛta ātmanaḥ abudhaḥ yathā caret bāla-hitam pitā svayam tathā tvam eva arhasi naḥ samīhitum
maitreyaḥ uvāca iti ādi-rājena nutaḥ saḥ viśva-dṛk tam āha rājan mayi bhaktiḥ astu te diṣṭyā īdṛśī dhīḥ mayi te kṛtā yayā māyām madīyām tarati sma dustyajām
tat tvam kuru mayā ādiṣṭam apramattaḥ prajā-pate mat ādeśa-karaḥ lokaḥ sarvatra āpnoti śobhanam
maitreyaḥ uvāca iti vainyasya rāja-ṛṣeḥ pratinandya artha-vat vacaḥ pūjitaḥ anugṛhītvā enam gantum cakre acyutaḥ matim
deva ṛṣi pitṛ gandharva siddha cāraṇa pannagāḥ kinnara apsarasaḥ martyāḥ khagāḥ bhūtāni anekaśaḥ yajña-īśvara-dhiyā rājñā vāk vitta añjali bhaktitaḥ sabhājitāḥ yayuḥ sarve vaikuṇṭha anugatāḥ tataḥ
bhagavān api rāja-ṛṣeḥ sa-upādhyāyasya ca acyutaḥ haran iva manaḥ amuṣya sva-dhāma pratyapadyata
adṛṣṭāya namaḥ-kṛtya nṛpaḥ sandarśita ātmane avyaktāya ca devānām devāya sva-puram yayau
maitreyaḥ uvāca mauktikaiḥ kusuma sragbhiḥ dukūlaiḥ svarṇa toraṇaiḥ mahā-surabhibhiḥ dhūpaiḥ maṇḍitam tatra tatra vai
candana aguru toya ārdra rathyā catvara mārgavat puṣpa akṣata phalaiḥ tokmaiḥ lājaiḥ arcirbhiḥ arcitam
sa-vṛndaiḥ kadalī-stambhaiḥ pūga-potaiḥ pariṣkṛtam taru pallava mālābhiḥ sarvataḥ samalaṅkṛtam
prajāḥ tam dīpa-balibhiḥ sambhṛta aśeṣa maṅgalaiḥ abhīyuḥ mṛṣṭa kanyāḥ ca mṛṣṭa kuṇḍala maṇḍitāḥ
śaṅkha dundubhi ghoṣeṇa brahma ghoṣeṇa ca ṛtvijām viveśa bhavanam vīraḥ stūyamānaḥ gata-smayaḥ
pūjitaḥ pūjayām āsa tatra tatra mahā-yaśāḥ paurān jāna-padān tān tān prītaḥ priya-vara-pradaḥ
saḥ evam ādīni anavadya ceṣṭitaḥ karmāṇi bhūyāṁsi mahān mahat-tamaḥ kurvan śaśāsa avani-maṇḍalam yaśaḥ sphītam nidhāya āruruhe param padam
sūtaḥ uvāca tat ādi-rājasya yaśaḥ vijṛmbhitam guṇaiḥ aśeṣaiḥ guṇa-vat sabhājitam kṣattā mahā-bhāgavataḥ sadaḥ-pate kauṣāravim prāha gṛṇantam arcayan
viduraḥ uvāca saḥ abhiṣiktaḥ pṛthuḥ vipraiḥ labdha aśeṣa sura-arhaṇaḥ bibhrat saḥ vaiṣṇavam tejaḥ bāhvoḥ yābhyām dudoha gām
kaḥ nu asya kīrtim na śṛṇoti abhijñaḥ yat vikrama ucchiṣṭam aśeṣa bhūpāḥ lokāḥ sa-pālāḥ upajīvanti kāmam adya api tat me vada karma śuddham
maitreyaḥ uvāca gaṅgā yamunayoḥ nadyoḥ antarā kṣetram āvasan ārabdhān eva bubhuje bhogān puṇya jihāsayā
sarvatra askhalita ādeśaḥ sapta-dvīpa eka daṇḍa-dhṛk anyatra brāhmaṇa-kulāt anyatra acyuta-gotrataḥ
ekadā āsīt mahā-satra dīkṣā tatra diva-okasām samājaḥ brahma-ṛṣīṇām ca rāja-ṛṣīṇām ca sat-tama
tasmin arhatsu sarveṣu su-arciteṣu yathā-arhataḥ utthitaḥ sadasaḥ madhye tārāṇām uḍu-rāṭ iva
prāṁśuḥ pīna-āyata bhujaḥ gauraḥ kañja aruṇa-īkṣaṇaḥ su-nāsaḥ su-mukhaḥ saumyaḥ pīna-aṁsaḥ su dvija smitaḥ
vyūḍha vakṣāḥ bṛhat-śroṇiḥ vali valgu dala udaraḥ āvarta nābhiḥ ojasvī kāñcana uruḥ udagra-pāt
sūkṣma vakra asita snigdha mūrdhajaḥ kambu kandharaḥ mahā-dhane dukūla-agrye paridhāya upavīya ca
vyañjita aśeṣa gātra śrīḥ niyame nyasta bhūṣaṇaḥ kṛṣṇa ajina dharaḥ śrīmān kuśa-pāṇiḥ kṛta ucitaḥ
śiśira snigdha tārā akṣaḥ samaikṣata samantataḥ ūcivān idam urvīśaḥ sadaḥ saṁharṣayan iva
cāru citra-padam ślakṣṇam mṛṣṭam gūḍham aviklavam sarveṣām upakāra-artham tadā anuvadan iva
rājā uvāca sabhyāḥ śṛṇuta bhadram vaḥ sādhavaḥ ye iha āgatāḥ satsu jijñāsubhiḥ dharmam āvedyam sva-manīṣitam
aham daṇḍa-dharaḥ rājā prajānām iha yojitaḥ rakṣitā vṛtti-daḥ sveṣu setuṣu sthāpitā pṛthak
tasya me tat anuṣṭhānāt yān āhuḥ brahma-vādinaḥ lokāḥ syuḥ kāma-sandohāḥ yasya tuṣyati diṣṭa-dṛk
yaḥ uddharet karam rājā prajāḥ dharmeṣu aśikṣayan prajānām śamalam bhuṅkte bhagam ca svam jahāti saḥ
tat prajāḥ bhartṛ piṇḍa-artham sva-artham eva anasūyavaḥ kuruta adhokṣaja dhiyaḥ tarhi me anugrahaḥ kṛtaḥ
yūyam tat anumodadhvam pitṛ deva ṛṣayaḥ amalāḥ kartuḥ śāstuḥ anujñātuḥ tulyam yat pretya tat phalam
asti yajña-patiḥ nāma keṣāñcit arha-sattamāḥ iha amutra ca lakṣyante jyotsnā-vatyaḥ kvacit bhuvaḥ
manoḥ uttānapādasya dhruvasya api mahī-pateḥ priyavratasya rājarṣeḥ aṅgasya asmat pituḥ pituḥ īdṛśānām atha anyeṣām ajasya ca bhavasya ca prahlādasya baleḥ ca api kṛtyam asti gadā-bhṛtā
dauhitra-ādīn ṛte mṛtyoḥ śocyān dharma-vimohitān varga svarga apavargāṇām prāyeṇa eka ātmya hetunā
yat-pāda sevā abhiruciḥ tapasvinām aśeṣa janma upacitam malam dhiyaḥ sadyaḥ kṣiṇoti anvaham edhatī satī yathā pada-aṅguṣṭha viniḥsṛtā sarit
vinirdhuta aśeṣa manaḥ-malaḥ pumān asaṅga vijñāna viśeṣa vīrya-vān yat aṅghri mūle kṛta-ketanaḥ punaḥ na saṁsṛtim kleśa-vahām prapadyate
tam eva yūyam bhajata ātma vṛttibhiḥ manaḥ vacaḥ kāya guṇaiḥ sva-karmabhiḥ amāyinaḥ kāma-dugha aṅghri-paṅkajam yathā adhikāra avasita-artha siddhayaḥ
asau iha aneka guṇaḥ aguṇaḥ adhvaraḥ pṛthak-vidha dravya guṇa kriyā uktibhiḥ sampadyate artha āśaya liṅga nāmabhiḥ viśuddha vijñāna ghanaḥ sva-rūpataḥ
pradhāna kāla āśaya dharma saṅgrahe śarīre eṣaḥ pratipadya cetanām kriyā phalatvena vibhuḥ vibhāvyate yathā analaḥ dāruṣu tat-guṇa-ātmakaḥ
aho mama amī vitaranti anugraham harim gurum yajña-bhujām adhīśvaram sva-dharma yogena yajanti māmakāḥ nirantaram kṣoṇi-tale dṛḍha-vratāḥ
mā jātu tejaḥ prabhavet mahā ṛddhibhiḥ titikṣayā tapasā vidyayā ca dedīpyamāne ajita-devatānām kule svayam rāja-kulāt dvijānām
brahmaṇya-devaḥ puruṣaḥ purātanaḥ nityam hariḥ yat caraṇa abhivandanāt avāpa lakṣmīm anapāyinīm yaśaḥ jagat pavitram ca mahat tama agraṇīḥ
yat sevayā aśeṣa guhā-āśayaḥ sva-rāṭ vipra-priyaḥ tuṣyati kāmam īśvaraḥ tat eva tat-dharma-paraiḥ vinītaiḥ sarva-ātmanā brahma-kulam niṣevyatām
pumān labheta anati-velam ātmanaḥ prasīdataḥ atyanta śamam svataḥ svayam yat nitya sambandha niṣevayā tataḥ param kim atra asti mukham haviḥ bhujām
aśnāti anantaḥ khalu tattva-kovidaiḥ śraddhā hutam yat-mukhe ijya-nāmabhiḥ na vai tathā cetanayā bahiḥ-kṛte huta-aśane pāramahaṁsya paryaguḥ
yat brahma nityam virajam sanātanam śraddhā tapaḥ maṅgala mauna saṁyamaiḥ samādhinā bibhrati ha artha dṛṣṭaye yatra idam ādarśe iva avabhāsate
teṣām aham pāda saroja reṇum āryāḥ vaheya adhi kirīṭam āyuḥ yam nityadā bibhrataḥ āśu pāpam naśyati amum sarva-guṇāḥ bhajanti
guṇa-ayanam śīla-dhanam kṛta-jñam vṛddha-āśrayam saṁvṛṇate anu sampadaḥ prasīdatām brahma-kulam gavām ca janārdanaḥ sa anucaraḥ ca mahyam
maitreyaḥ uvāca iti bruvāṇam nṛ-patim pitṛ deva dvi-jātayaḥ tuṣṭuvuḥ hṛṣṭa-manasaḥ sādhu-vādena sādhavaḥ
putreṇa jayate lokān iti satya-vatī śrutiḥ brahma-daṇḍa hataḥ pāpaḥ yat venaḥ ati atarat tamaḥ
hiraṇyakaśipuḥ ca api bhagavat nindayā tamaḥ vivikṣuḥ atyagāt sūnoḥ prahlādasya anubhāvataḥ
vīra-varya pitaḥ pṛthvyāḥ samāḥ sañjīva śāśvatīḥ yasya īdṛśī acyute bhaktiḥ sarva loka eka bhartari
aho vayam hi adya pavitra-kīrte tvayā eva nāthena mukunda nāthāḥ ye uttama-śloka-tamasya viṣṇoḥ brahmaṇya-devasya kathām vyanakti
na ati adbhutam idam nātha tava ājīvya anuśāsanam prajā anurāgaḥ mahatām prakṛtiḥ karuṇa ātmanām
adya naḥ tamasaḥ pāraḥ tvayā upāsāditaḥ prabho bhrāmyatām naṣṭa-dṛṣṭīnām karmabhiḥ daiva-saṁjñitaiḥ
namaḥ vivṛddha sattvāya puruṣāya mahīyase yaḥ brahma kṣatram āviśya bibharti idam sva-tejasā
maitreyaḥ uvāca janeṣu pragṛṇatsu evam pṛthum pṛthula vikramam tatra upajagmuḥ munayaḥ catvāraḥ sūrya varcasaḥ
tān tu siddha-īśvarān rājā vyomnaḥ avatarataḥ arciṣā lokān apāpān kurvāṇān sa-anugaḥ acaṣṭa lakṣitān
tat darśana udgatān prāṇān pratyāditsuḥ iva utthitaḥ sa sadasya anugaḥ vainyaḥ indriya-īśaḥ guṇān iva
gauravāt yantritaḥ sabhyaḥ praśraya ānata-kandharaḥ vidhi-vat pūjayām cakre gṛhīta adhi arhaṇa āsanān
tat-pāda śauca salilaiḥ mārjita alaka bandhanaḥ tatra śīlavatām vṛttam ācaran mānayan iva
hāṭaka-āsane āsīnān sva-dhiṣṇyeṣu iva pāvakān śraddhā saṁyama saṁyuktaḥ prītaḥ prāha bhava agra-jān
pṛthuḥ uvāca aho ācaritam kim me maṅgalam maṅgala-āyanāḥ yasya vaḥ darśanam hi āsīt durdarśānām ca yogibhiḥ
kim tasya durlabha-taram iha loke paratra ca yasya viprāḥ prasīdanti śivaḥ viṣṇuḥ ca sa-anugaḥ
na eva lakṣayate lokaḥ lokān paryaṭataḥ api yān yathā sarva-dṛśam sarve ātmānam ye asya hetavaḥ
adhanāḥ api te dhanyāḥ sādhavaḥ gṛha-medhinaḥ yat-gṛhāḥ hi arha-varya ambu tṛṇa bhūmi īśvara avarāḥ
vyāla ālaya drumāḥ vai teṣu arikta akhila sampadaḥ yat gṛhāḥ tīrtha-pādīya pāda-tīrtha vivarjitāḥ
su-āgatam vaḥ dvija-śreṣṭhāḥ yat vratāni mumukṣavaḥ caranti śraddhayā dhīrāḥ bālāḥ eva bṛhanti ca
kaccit naḥ kuśalam nāthāḥ indriya-artha artha-vedinām vyasana āvāpe etasmin patitānām sva-karmabhiḥ
bhavatsu kuśala praśnaḥ ātma-ārāmeṣu na iṣyate kuśala akuśalāḥ yatra na santi mati-vṛttayaḥ
tat aham kṛta-viśrambhaḥ su-hṛdaḥ vaḥ tapasvinām sampṛcche bhave etasmin kṣemaḥ kena añjasā bhavet
vyaktam ātma-vatām ātmā bhagavān ātma-bhāvanaḥ svānām anugrahāya imām siddha-rūpī carati ajaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca pṛthoḥ tat sūktam ākarṇya sāram suṣṭhu mitam madhu smayamānaḥ iva prītyā kumāraḥ pratyuvāca ha
sanat-kumāraḥ uvāca sādhu pṛṣṭam mahārāja sarva-bhūta hita-ātmanā bhavatā viduṣā ca api sādhūnām matiḥ īdṛśī
saṅgamaḥ khalu sādhūnām ubhayeṣām ca sammataḥ yat sambhāṣaṇa sampraśnaḥ sarveṣām vitanoti śam
asti eva rājan bhavataḥ madhu-dviṣaḥ pāda-aravindasya guṇa-anuvādane ratiḥ durāpā vidhunoti naiṣṭhikī kāmam kaṣāyam malam antaḥ-ātmanaḥ
śāstreṣu iyān eva su-niścitaḥ nṛṇām kṣemasya sadhryak vimṛśeṣu hetuḥ asaṅgaḥ ātma-vyatirikte ātmani dṛḍhā ratiḥ brahmaṇi nirguṇe ca yā
sā śraddhayā bhagavat-dharma caryayā jijñāsayā adhyātmika yoga-niṣṭhayā yoga-īśvara upāsanayā ca nityam puṇya-śravaḥ kathayā puṇyayā ca
artha indriya ārāma sa-goṣṭhī atṛṣṇayā tat sammatānām aparigraheṇa ca vivikta-rucyā paritoṣe ātmani vinā hareḥ guṇa pīyūṣa pānāt
ahiṁsayā pāramahaṁsya-caryayā smṛtyā mukunda ācarita-agrya sīdhunā yamaiḥ akāmaiḥ niyamaiḥ ca api anindayā nirīhayā dvandva titikṣayā ca
hareḥ muhuḥ tat-para karṇa-pūra guṇa-abhidhānena vijṛmbhamāṇayā bhaktyā hi asaṅgaḥ sat-asati anātmani syāt nirguṇe brahmaṇi ca añjasā ratiḥ
yadā ratiḥ brahmaṇi naiṣṭhikī pumān ācāryavān jñāna virāga raṁhasā dahati avīryam hṛdayam jīva-kośam pañca-ātmakam yonim iva utthitaḥ agniḥ
dagdha-āśayaḥ mukta samasta tat-guṇaḥ na eva ātmanaḥ bahiḥ antaḥ vicaṣṭe para-ātmanoḥ yat vyavadhānam purastāt svapne yathā puruṣaḥ tat vināśe
ātmānam indriya-artham ca param yat ubhayoḥ api sati āśaye upādhau vai pumān paśyati na anyadā
nimitte sati sarvatra jala-ādau api pūruṣaḥ ātmanaḥ ca parasya api bhidām paśyati na anyadā
indriyaiḥ viṣaya ākṛṣṭaiḥ ākṣiptam dhyāyatām manaḥ cetanām harate buddheḥ stambaḥ toyam iva hradāt
bhraśyati anusmṛtiḥ cittam jñāna-bhraṁśaḥ smṛti-kṣaye tat-rodham kavayaḥ prāhuḥ ātma apahnavam ātmanaḥ
na ataḥ parataraḥ loke puṁsaḥ sva-artha vyatikramaḥ yat-adhi anyasya preyastvam ātmanaḥ sva vyatikramāt
artha indriya-artha abhidhyānam sarva-artha apahnavaḥ nṛṇām bhraṁśitaḥ jñāna vijñānāt yena āviśati mukhyatām
na kuryāt karhicit saṅgam tamaḥ tīvram titīriṣuḥ dharma artha kāma mokṣāṇām yat atyanta vighātakam
tatra api mokṣaḥ eva arthe ātyantikatayā iṣyate trai-vargyaḥ arthaḥ yataḥ nityam kṛta-anta bhaya saṁyutaḥ
pare avare ca ye bhāvāḥ guṇa vyatikarāt anu na teṣām vidyate kṣemam īśa vidhvaṁsita āśiṣām
tat tvam nara-indra jagatām atha tasthūṣām ca deha indriya asu dhiṣaṇā ātmabhiḥ āvṛtānām yaḥ kṣetra-vit tapatayā hṛdi viśvak āviḥ pratyak cakāsti bhagavān tam avehi saḥ asmi
yasmin idam sat-asat ātmatayā vibhāti māyā viveka-vidhuti sraji vā ahi buddhiḥ tam nitya mukta pariśuddha viśuddha tattvam pratyūḍha karma kalila prakṛtim prapadye
yat pāda paṅkaja palāśa vilāsa bhaktyā karma āśayam grathitam udgrathayanti santaḥ tat vat na rikta-matayaḥ yatayaḥ api ruddha srotaḥ-gaṇāḥ tam araṇam bhaja vāsudevam
kṛcchraḥ mahān iha bhava-arṇavam aplava-īśām ṣaṭ-varga nakram asukhena titīrṣanti tat tvam hareḥ bhagavataḥ bhajanīyam aṅghrim kṛtvā uḍupam vyasanam uttara dustara arṇam
maitreyaḥ uvāca saḥ evam brahma-putreṇa kumāreṇa ātma-medhasā darśita ātma-gatiḥ samyak praśasya uvāca tam nṛpaḥ
rājā uvāca kṛtaḥ me anugrahaḥ pūrvam hariṇā ārta-anukampinā tam āpādayitum brahman bhagavan yūyam āgatāḥ
niṣpāditaḥ ca kārtsnyena bhagavadbhiḥ ghṛṇālubhiḥ sādhu-ucchiṣṭam hi me sarvam ātmanā saha kim dade
prāṇāḥ dārāḥ sutāḥ brahman gṛhāḥ ca sa paricchadāḥ rājyam balam mahī kośaḥ iti sarvam niveditam
sainā-patyam ca rājyam ca daṇḍa netṛtvam eva ca sarva loka-adhipatyam ca veda-śāstra-vit arhati
svam eva brāhmaṇaḥ bhuṅkte svam vaste svam dadāti ca tasya eva anugraheṇa annam bhuñjate kṣatriya-ādayaḥ
yaiḥ īdṛśī bhagavataḥ gatiḥ ātma-vāde ekāntataḥ nigamibhiḥ pratipāditā naḥ tuṣyantu adabhra karuṇāḥ sva-kṛtena nityam kaḥ nāma tat pratikaroti vinā uda-pātram
maitreyaḥ uvāca te ātma-yoga-patayaḥ ādi-rājena pūjitāḥ śīlam tadīyam śaṁsantaḥ khe abhavan miṣatām nṛṇām
vainyaḥ tu dhuryaḥ mahatām saṁsthityā ādhyātma-śikṣayā āpta kāmam iva ātmānam mene ātmani avasthitaḥ
karmāṇi ca yathā-kālam yathā-deśam yathā-balam yathā-ucitam yathā-vittam akarot brahma-sāt kṛtam
phalam brahmaṇi sannyasya nirviṣaṅgaḥ samāhitaḥ karma adhyakṣam ca manvānaḥ ātmānam prakṛteḥ param
gṛheṣu vartamānaḥ api saḥ sāmrājya śriyā anvitaḥ na asajjata indriya-artheṣu niḥ aham matiḥ arka vat
evam adhyātma-yogena karmāṇi anu samācaran putrān utpādayām āsa pañca arciṣi ātma sammatān
vijitāśvam dhūmrakeśam haryakṣam draviṇam vṛkam sarveṣām loka-pālānām dadhāra ekaḥ pṛthuḥ guṇān
gopīthāya jagat-sṛṣṭeḥ kāle sve sve acyuta-ātmakaḥ manaḥ vāk vṛttibhiḥ saumyaiḥ guṇaiḥ saṁrañjayan prajāḥ
rājā iti adhāt nāmadheyam soma-rājaḥ iva aparaḥ sūrya-vat visṛjan gṛhṇan pratapan ca bhuvaḥ vasu
durdharṣaḥ tejasā iva agniḥ mahā-indraḥ iva durjayaḥ titikṣayā dharitrī iva dyauḥ iva abhīṣṭa-daḥ nṛṇām
varṣati sma yathā-kāmam parjanyaḥ iva tarpayan samudraḥ iva durbodhaḥ sattvena acala rāṭ iva
dharma-rāṭ iva śikṣāyām āścarye himavān iva kuveraḥ iva kośa-āḍhyaḥ gupta-arthaḥ varuṇaḥ yathā
mātariśvā iva sarva-ātmā balena mahasā ojasā aviṣahyatayā devaḥ bhagavān bhūta-rāṭ iva
kandarpaḥ iva saundarye manasvī mṛga-rāṭ iva vātsalye manu-vat nṛṇām prabhutve bhagavān ajaḥ
bṛhaspatiḥ brahma-vāde ātma-vattve svayam hariḥ bhaktyā go guru vipreṣu viṣvaksena anuvartiṣu hriyā praśraya-śīlābhyām ātma-tulyaḥ para-udyame
kīrtyā ūrdhva-gītayā pumbhiḥ trai-lokye tatra tatra ha praviṣṭaḥ karṇa-randhreṣu strīṇām rāmaḥ satām iva
maitreyaḥ uvāca dṛṣṭvā ātmānam pravayasam ekadā vainyaḥ ātma-vān ātmanā vardhita aśeṣa sva-anusargaḥ prajā-patiḥ jagataḥ tasthuṣaḥ ca api vṛtti-daḥ dharma-bhṛt satām niṣpādita īśvara ādeśaḥ yat-artham iha jajñivān ātma-jeṣu ātma-jām nyasya virahāt rudatīm iva prajāsu vimanaḥsu ekaḥ sa-dāraḥ agāt tapaḥ-vanam
tatra api adābhya niyamaḥ vaikhānasa su-sammate ārabdhaḥ ugra tapasi yathā sva-vijaye purā
kanda mūla phala āhāraḥ śuṣka parṇa aśanaḥ kvacit ap-bhakṣaḥ katicit pakṣān vāyu bhakṣaḥ tataḥ param
grīṣme pañca-tapāḥ vīraḥ varṣāsu āsāraṣāṭ muniḥ ākaṇṭha magnaḥ śiśire udake sthaṇḍile-śayaḥ
titikṣuḥ yata vāk dāntaḥ ūrdhva-retāḥ jita-anilaḥ ārirādhayiṣuḥ kṛṣṇam acarat tapaḥ uttamam
tena krama anu siddhena dhvasta karma mala āśayaḥ prāṇa-āyāmaiḥ san niruddha ṣaṭ-vargaḥ chinna-bandhanaḥ
sanat-kumāraḥ bhagavān yat āha ādhyātmikam param yogam tena eva puruṣam abhajat puruṣa-ṛṣabhaḥ
bhagavat-dharmiṇaḥ sādhoḥ śraddhayā yatataḥ sadā bhaktiḥ bhagavati brahmaṇi ananya-viṣayā abhavat
tasya anayā bhagavataḥ parikarma śuddha sattva ātmanaḥ tat anusaṁsmaraṇa anupūrtyā jñānam virakti mat abhūt niśitena yena ciccheda saṁśaya-padam nija jīva-kośam
chinna anya-dhīḥ adhigata ātma-gatiḥ nirīhaḥ tat tatyaje acchinat idam vayunena yena tāvat na yoga-gatibhiḥ yatiḥ apramattaḥ yāvat gadāgraja kathāsu ratim na kuryāt
evam saḥ vīra-pravaraḥ saṁyojya ātmānam ātmani brahma-bhūtaḥ dṛḍham kāle tatyāja svam kalevaram
sampīḍya pāyum pārṣṇibhyām vāyum utsārayan śanaiḥ nābhyām koṣṭheṣu avasthāpya hṛt uraḥ kaṇṭha śīrṣaṇi
utsarpayan tu tam mūrdhni krameṇa āveśya niḥspṛhaḥ vāyum vāyau kṣitau kāyam tejaḥ tejasi ayūyujat
khāni ākāśe dravam toye yathā-sthānam vibhāgaśaḥ kṣitim ambhasi tat tejasi adaḥ vāyau nabhasi amum
indriyeṣu manaḥ tāni tat-mātreṣu yathā-udbhavam bhūta-ādinā amūni utkṛṣya mahati ātmani sandadhe
tam sarva-guṇa-vinyāsam jīve māyā-maye nyadhāt tam ca anuśayam ātma-stham asau anuśayī pumān jñāna vairāgya vīryeṇa svarūpa-sthaḥ ajahāt prabhuḥ
arciḥ nāma mahā-rājñī tat-patnī anugatā vanam su-kumārī a-tat-arhā ca yat-padbhyām sparśanam bhuvaḥ
atīva bhartuḥ vrata-dharma niṣṭhayā śuśrūṣayā ca ārṣa deha yātrayā na avindata ārtim parikarśitā api sā preyaḥ-kara sparśana māna nirvṛtiḥ
deham vipanna akhila cetana ādikam patyuḥ pṛthivyāḥ dayitasya ca ātmanaḥ ālakṣya kiñcit ca vilapya sā satī citām atha āropayat adri sānuni
vidhāya kṛtyam hradinī jala-āplutā dattvā udakam bhartuḥ udāra-karmaṇaḥ natvā divi-sthān tri-daśān triḥ parītya viveśa vahnim dhyāyatī bhartṛ pādau
vilokya anugatām sādhvīm pṛthum vīra-varam patim tuṣṭuvuḥ vara-dāḥ devaiḥ deva-patnyaḥ sahasraśaḥ
kurvatyaḥ kusuma-āsāram tasmin mandara sānuni nadatsu amara-tūryeṣu gṛṇanti sma parasparam
devyaḥ ūcuḥ aho iyam vadhūḥ dhanyā yā ca evam bhū bhujām patim sarva-ātmanā patim bheje yajña-īśam śrīḥ vadhūḥ iva
sā eṣā nūnam vrajati ūrdhvam anu vainyam patim satī paśyata asmān atītya arciḥ durvibhāvyena karmaṇā
teṣām durāpam kim tu anyat martyānām bhagavat-padam bhuvi lola āyuṣaḥ ye vai naiṣkarmyam sādhayanti uta
saḥ vañcitaḥ bata ātma-dhruk kṛcchreṇa mahatā bhuvi labdhvā āpavargyam mānuṣyam viṣayeṣu viṣajjate
maitreyaḥ uvāca stuvatīṣu amara-strīṣu pati-lokam gatā vadhūḥ yam vā ātma-vidām dhuryaḥ vainyaḥ prāpa acyuta-āśrayaḥ
ittham-bhūta anubhāvaḥ asau pṛthuḥ saḥ bhagavat-tamaḥ kīrtitam tasya caritam uddāma caritasya te
yaḥ idam su-mahat puṇyam śraddhayā avahitaḥ paṭhet śrāvayet śṛṇuyāt vā api saḥ pṛthoḥ padavīm iyāt
brāhmaṇaḥ brahma-varcasvī rājanyaḥ jagatī-patiḥ vaiśyaḥ paṭhan viṭ-patiḥ syāt śūdraḥ sattama-tām iyāt
triḥ kṛtvaḥ idam ākarṇya naraḥ nārī athavā ādṛtā aprajaḥ su-praja-tamaḥ nirdhanaḥ dhana-vat tamaḥ
aspaṣṭa-kīrtiḥ su-yaśāḥ mūrkhaḥ bhavati paṇḍitaḥ idam svasti-ayanam puṁsām amaṅgalya nivāraṇam
dhanyam yaśasyam āyuṣyam svargyam kali mala-apaham dharma artha kāma mokṣāṇām samyak siddhim abhīpsubhiḥ śraddhayā etat anuśrāvyam caturṇām kāraṇam param
vijaya-abhimukhaḥ rājā śrutvā etat abhiyāti yān balim tasmai haranti agre rājānaḥ pṛthave yathā
mukta-anya-saṅgaḥ bhagavati amalām bhaktim udvahan vainyasya caritam puṇyam śṛṇuyāt śrāvayet paṭhet
vaicitravīrya abhihitam mahat māhātmya sūcakam asmin kṛtam ati-martyam pārthavīm gatim āpnuyāt
anu-dinam idam ādareṇa śṛṇvan pṛthu-caritam prathayan vimukta saṅgaḥ bhagavati bhava-sindhu pota pāde saḥ ca nipuṇām labhate ratim manuṣyaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca vijitāśvaḥ adhirājā āsīt pṛthu-putraḥ pṛthu-śravāḥ yavīyobhyaḥ adadāt kāṣṭhāḥ bhrātṛbhyaḥ bhrātṛ-vatsalaḥ
haryakṣāya adiśat prācīm dhūmrakeśāya dakṣiṇām pratīcīm vṛka-saṁjñāya turyām draviṇase vibhuḥ
antardhāna gatim śakrāt labdhvā antardhāna saṁjñitaḥ apatya trayam ādhatta śikhaṇḍinyām su-sammatam
pāvakaḥ pavamānaḥ ca śuciḥ iti agnayaḥ purā vasiṣṭha śāpāt utpannāḥ punaḥ yoga-gatim gatāḥ
antardhānaḥ nabhasvatyām havirdhānam avindata yaḥ indram aśva-hartāram vidvān api na jaghnivān
rājñām vṛttim kara ādāna daṇḍa śulka ādi dāruṇām manyamānaḥ dīrgha sattra vyājena visasarja ha
tatra api haṁsam puruṣam parama-ātmānam ātma-dṛk yajan tat-lokatām āpa kuśalena samādhinā
havirdhānāt havirdhānī vidura asūta ṣaṭ sutān barhiṣadam gayam śuklam kṛṣṇam satyam jitavratam
barhiṣat su-mahā-bhāgaḥ hāvirdhāniḥ prajā-patiḥ kriyā-kāṇḍeṣu niṣṇātaḥ yogeṣu ca kuru-udvaha
yasya idam deva-yajanam anuyajñam vitanvataḥ prācīna-agraiḥ kuśaiḥ āsīt āstṛtam vasudhā-talam
sāmudrīm deva-deva-uktām upayeme śatadrutim yām vīkṣya cāru sarva-aṅgīm kiśorīm suṣṭhu alaṅkṛtām parikramantīm udvāhe cakame agniḥ śukīm iva
vibudha asura gandharva muni siddha nara uragāḥ vijitāḥ sūryayā dikṣu kvaṇayantyā eva nūpuraiḥ
prācīnabarhiṣaḥ putrāḥ śatadrutyām daśa abhavan tulya nāma vratāḥ sarve dharma snātāḥ pracetasaḥ
pitrā ādiṣṭāḥ prajā-sarge tapase arṇavam āviśan daśa-varṣa sahasrāṇi tapasā ārcan tapaḥ patim
yat uktam pathi dṛṣṭena giriśena prasīdatā tat dhyāyantaḥ japantaḥ ca pūjayantaḥ ca saṁyatāḥ
viduraḥ uvāca pracetasām giritreṇa yathā āsīt pathi saṅgamaḥ yat uta āha haraḥ prītaḥ tat naḥ brahman vada artha-vat
saṅgamaḥ khalu vipra-ṛṣe śivena iha śarīriṇām durlabhaḥ munayaḥ dadhyuḥ asaṅgāt yam abhīpsitam
ātma-ārāmaḥ api yaḥ tu asya loka kalpasya rādhase śaktyā yuktaḥ vicarati ghorayā bhagavān bhavaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca pracetasaḥ pituḥ vākyam śirasā ādāya sādhavaḥ diśam pratīcīm prayayuḥ tapasi ādṛta cetasaḥ
sa-samudram upa vistīrṇam apaśyan su-mahat saraḥ mahat manaḥ iva su-accham prasanna salila āśayam
nīla rakta utpala ambhaḥ-ja kahlāra indīvara ākaram haṁsa sārasa cakrāhva kāraṇḍava nikūjitam
matta bhramara sau-svarya hṛṣṭa roma latā aṅghripam padma kośa rajaḥ dikṣu vikṣipat pavana utsavam
tatra gāndharvam ākarṇya divya mārga manaḥ-haram visismyuḥ rāja-putrāḥ te mṛdaṅga paṇava ādi anu
tarhi eva sarasaḥ tasmāt niṣkrāmantam saha-anugam upagīyamānam amara-pravaram vibudha-anugaiḥ tapta-hema nikāya-ābham śiti-kaṇṭham tri-locanam prasāda su-mukham vīkṣya praṇemuḥ jāta kautukāḥ
saḥ tān prapanna-ārti-haraḥ bhagavān dharma-vatsalaḥ dharma-jñān śīla-sampannān prītaḥ prītān uvāca ha
śrī-rudraḥ uvāca yūyam vediṣadaḥ putrāḥ viditam vaḥ cikīrṣitam anugrahāya bhadram vaḥ evam me darśanam kṛtam
yaḥ param raṁhasaḥ sākṣāt tri-guṇāt jīva-saṁjñitāt bhagavantam vāsudevam prapannaḥ saḥ priyaḥ hi me
sva-dharma-niṣṭhaḥ śata-janmabhiḥ pumān viriñcatām eti tataḥ param hi mām avyākṛtam bhāgavataḥ atha vaiṣṇavam padam yathā aham vibudhāḥ kalā-atyaye
atha bhāgavatāḥ yūyam priyāḥ stha bhagavān yathā na mat bhāgavatānām ca preyān anyaḥ asti karhicit
idam viviktam japtavyam pavitram maṅgalam param niḥśreyasa-karam ca api śrūyatām tat vadāmi vaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca iti anukrośa-hṛdayaḥ bhagavān āha tān śivaḥ baddha-añjalīn rāja-putrān nārāyaṇa-paraḥ vacaḥ
śrī-rudraḥ uvāca jitam te ātma-vit varya svastaye svastiḥ astu me bhavatā ārādhasā rāddham sarvasmai ātmane namaḥ
namaḥ paṅkaja-nābhāya bhūta-sūkṣma indriya ātmane vāsudevāya śāntāya kūṭa-sthāya sva-rociṣe
saṅkarṣaṇāya sūkṣmāya durantāya antakāya ca namaḥ viśva-prabodhāya pradyumnāya antaḥ-ātmane
namaḥ namaḥ aniruddhāya hṛṣīkeśa indriya-ātmane namaḥ parama-haṁsāya pūrṇāya nibhṛta-ātmane
svarga apavarga dvārāya nityam śuci-sade namaḥ namaḥ hiraṇya vīryāya cātuḥ-hotrāya tantave
namaḥ ūrje iṣe trayyāḥ pataye yajña retase tṛpti-dāya ca jīvānām namaḥ sarva-rasa-ātmane
sarva sattva ātma dehāya viśeṣāya sthavīyase namaḥ trai-lokya pālāya saha ojaḥ balāya ca
artha liṅgāya nabhase namaḥ antaḥ bahiḥ ātmane namaḥ puṇyāya lokāya amuṣmai bhūri-varcase
pravṛttāya nivṛttāya pitṛ-devāya karmaṇe namaḥ adharma vipākāya mṛtyave duḥkha-dāya ca
namaḥ te āśiṣām īśa manave kāraṇa-ātmane namaḥ dharmāya bṛhate kṛṣṇāya akuṇṭha-medhase puruṣāya purāṇāya sāṅkhya-yoga-īśvarāya ca
śakti-traya sametāya mīḍhuṣe ahaṅkṛta-ātmane cetaḥ ākūti rūpāya namaḥ vācaḥ vibhūtaye
darśanam naḥ didṛkṣūṇām dehi bhāgavata arcitam rūpam priya-tamam svānām sarva-indriya guṇa añjanam
snigdha prāvṛṭ ghana-śyāmam sarva saundarya saṅgraham cāru āyata catuḥ-bāhu su-jāta rucira ānanam padma-kośa palāśa akṣam sundara bhru su-nāsikam su-dvijam su-kapola āsyam sama-karṇa vibhūṣaṇam
prīti prahasita apāṅgam alakaiḥ rūpa śobhitam lasat paṅkaja kiñjalka dukūlam mṛṣṭa kuṇḍalam sphurat kirīṭa valaya hāra nūpura mekhalam śaṅkha cakra gadā padma mālā maṇi uttama ṛddhi-mat
siṁha skandha tviṣaḥ bibhrat saubhaga grīva kaustubham śriyā anapāyinyā kṣipta nikaṣa aśma urasā ullasat
pūra recaka saṁvigna vali valgu dala udaram pratisaṅkrāmayat viśvam nābhyā āvarta gabhīrayā
śyāma śroṇi adhi rociṣṇu dukūla svarṇa mekhalam sama cāru aṅghri jaṅgha ūru nimna jānu su-darśanam
padā śarat padma palāśa rociṣā nakha dyubhiḥ naḥ antaḥ-agham vidhunvatā pradarśaya svīyam apāsta sādhvasam padam guro mārga guruḥ tamaḥ-juṣām
etat rūpam anudhyeyam ātma śuddhim abhīpsatām yat bhakti-yogaḥ abhaya-daḥ sva-dharmam anutiṣṭhatām
bhavān bhakti-matā labhyaḥ durlabhaḥ sarva-dehinām svārājyasya api abhimataḥ ekāntena ātma-vit gatiḥ
tam durārādhyam ārādhya satām api durāpayā ekānta bhaktyā kaḥ vāñchet pāda-mūlam vinā bahiḥ
yatra nirviṣṭam araṇam kṛta-antaḥ na abhimanyate viśvam vidhvaṁsayan vīrya śaurya visphūrjita bhruvā
kṣaṇa-ardhena api tulaye na svargam na apunaḥ-bhavam bhagavat saṅgi saṅgasya martyānām kim uta āśiṣaḥ
atha anagha-aṅghreḥ tava kīrti tīrthayoḥ antaḥ bahiḥ snāna vidhūta pāpmanām bhūteṣu anukrośa su-sattva śīlinām syāt saṅgamaḥ anugrahaḥ eṣaḥ naḥ tava
na yasya cittam bahiḥ artha vibhramam tamaḥ guhāyām ca viśuddham āviśat yat bhakti-yoga anugṛhītam añjasā muniḥ vicaṣṭe nanu tatra te gatim
yatra idam vyajyate viśvam viśvasmin avabhāti yat tat tvam brahma param jyotiḥ ākāśam iva vistṛtam
yaḥ māyayā idam puru rūpayā asṛjat bibharti bhūyaḥ kṣapayati avikriyaḥ yat bheda-buddhiḥ sat iva ātma-duḥsthayā tvam ātma-tantram bhagavan pratīmahi
kriyā kalāpaiḥ idam eva yoginaḥ śraddhā-anvitāḥ sādhu yajanti siddhaye bhūta indriya antaḥ-karaṇa upalakṣitam vede ca tantre ca te eva kovidāḥ
tvam ekaḥ ādyaḥ puruṣaḥ supta śaktiḥ tayā rajaḥ sattva tamaḥ vibhidyate mahān aham kham marut agni vāḥ dharāḥ sura-ṛṣayaḥ bhūta-gaṇāḥ idam yataḥ
sṛṣṭam sva-śaktyā idam anupraviṣṭaḥ catuḥ-vidham puram ātma-aṁśakena atho viduḥ tam puruṣam santam antaḥ bhuṅkte hṛṣīkaiḥ madhu sāra-gham yaḥ
saḥ eṣaḥ lokān ati caṇḍa-vegaḥ vikarṣasi tvam khalu kāla-yānaḥ bhūtāni bhūtaiḥ anumeya-tattvaḥ ghana-āvalīḥ vāyuḥ iva aviṣahyaḥ
pramattam uccaiḥ iti kṛtya cintayā pravṛddha lobham viṣayeṣu lālasam tvam apramattaḥ sahasā abhipadyase kṣut lelihānaḥ ahiḥ iva ākhum antakaḥ
kaḥ tvat pada-abjam vijahāti paṇḍitaḥ yaḥ te avamāna vyayamāna ketanaḥ viśaṅkayā asmat guruḥ arcati sma yat vinā upapattim manavaḥ catuḥ-daśa
atha tvam asi naḥ brahman parama-ātman vipaścitām viśvam rudra-bhaya dhvastam akutaścit-bhayā gatiḥ
idam japata bhadram vaḥ viśuddhāḥ nṛpa-nandanāḥ sva-dharmam anutiṣṭhantaḥ bhagavati arpita āśayāḥ
tam eva ātmānam ātma-stham sarva bhūteṣu avasthitam pūjayadhvam gṛṇantaḥ ca dhyāyantaḥ ca asakṛt harim
yoga-ādeśam upāsādya dhārayantaḥ muni-vratāḥ samāhita dhiyaḥ sarve etat abhyasata ādṛtāḥ
idam āha purā asmākam bhagavān viśva-sṛk patiḥ bhṛgu-ādīnām ātmajānām sisṛkṣuḥ saṁsisṛkṣatām
te vayam noditāḥ sarve prajā-sarge prajā-īśvarāḥ anena dhvasta-tamasaḥ sisṛkṣmaḥ vividhāḥ prajāḥ
atha idam nityadā yuktaḥ japan avahitaḥ pumān acirāt śreyaḥ āpnoti vāsudeva-parāyaṇaḥ
śreyasām iha sarveṣām jñānam niḥśreyasam param sukham tarati duṣpāram jñāna nauḥ vyasana arṇavam
yaḥ imam śraddhayā yuktaḥ mat-gītam bhagavat-stavam adhīyānaḥ durārādhyam harim ārādhayati asau
vindate puruṣaḥ amuṣmāt yat yat icchati asatvaram mat-gīta gītāt su-prītāt śreyasām eka vallabhāt
idam yaḥ kalye utthāya prāñjaliḥ śraddhayā anvitaḥ śṛṇuyāt śrāvayet martyaḥ mucyate karma-bandhanaiḥ
gītam mayā idam naradeva-nandanāḥ parasya puṁsaḥ parama-ātmanaḥ stavam japantaḥ eka-agra dhiyaḥ tapaḥ mahat caradhvam ante tataḥ āpsyatha īpsitam
maitreyaḥ uvāca iti sandiśya bhagavān bārhiṣadaiḥ abhipūjitaḥ paśyatām rāja-putrāṇām tatra eva antardadhe haraḥ
rudra-gītam bhagavataḥ stotram sarve pracetasaḥ japantaḥ te tapaḥ tepuḥ varṣāṇām ayutam jale
prācīnabarhiṣam kṣattaḥ karmasu āsakta mānasam nāradaḥ adhyātma tattva-jñaḥ kṛpāluḥ pratyabodhayat
śreyaḥ tvam katamat rājan karmaṇā ātmanaḥ īhase duḥkha-hāniḥ sukha-avāptiḥ śreyaḥ tat na iha ca iṣyate
rājā uvāca na jānāmi mahā-bhāga param karma apaviddha dhīḥ brūhi me vimalam jñānam yena mucyeya karmabhiḥ
gṛheṣu kūṭa-dharmeṣu putra dāra dhana artha dhīḥ na param vindate mūḍhaḥ bhrāmyan saṁsāra vartmasu
nāradaḥ uvāca bhoḥ bhoḥ prajā-pate rājan paśūn paśya tvayā adhvare saṁjñāpitān jīva-saṅghān nirghṛṇena sahasraśaḥ
ete tvām sampratīkṣante smarantaḥ vaiśasam tava samparetam ayaḥ kūṭaiḥ chindanti utthita manyavaḥ
atra te kathayiṣye amum itihāsam purātanam purañ-janasya caritam nibodha gadataḥ mama
āsīt purañjanaḥ nāma rājā rājan bṛhat-śravāḥ tasya avijñāta nāmā āsīt sakhā avijñāta ceṣṭitaḥ
saḥ anveṣamāṇaḥ śaraṇam babhrāma pṛthivīm prabhuḥ na anurūpam yadā avindat abhūt saḥ vimanāḥ iva
na sādhu mene tāḥ sarvāḥ bhū-tale yāvatīḥ puraḥ kāmān kāmayamānaḥ asau tasya tasya upapattaye
saḥ ekadā himavataḥ dakṣiṇeṣu atha sānuṣu dadarśa navabhiḥ dvārbhiḥ puram lakṣita lakṣaṇām
prākāra upavana aṭṭāla parikhaiḥ akṣa toraṇaiḥ svarṇa raupya ayasaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ saṅkulām sarvataḥ gṛhaiḥ
