atha te kva gatāḥ siddhāḥ catvāraḥ cāru-darśanāḥ vyāmocayan nīyamānam baddhvā pāśaiḥ adhaḥ bhuvaḥ
atha api me durbhagasya vibudha-uttama darśane bhavitavyam maṅgalena yena ātmā me prasīdati
anyathā mriyamāṇasya na aśuceḥ vṛṣalī-pateḥ vaikuṇṭha nāma-grahaṇam jihvā vaktum iha arhati
kva ca aham kitavaḥ pāpaḥ brahma-ghnaḥ nirapatrapaḥ kva ca nārāyaṇa iti etat bhagavat-nāma maṅgalam
saḥ aham tathā yatiṣyāmi yata-citta-indriya anilaḥ yathā na bhūyaḥ ātmānam andhe tamasi majjaye
vimucya tam imam bandham avidyā kāma karma-jam sarva-bhūta suhṛt śāntaḥ maitraḥ karuṇaḥ ātma-vān mocaye grastam ātmānam yoṣit-mayyā ātma-māyayā vikrīḍitaḥ yayā eva aham krīḍā-mṛgaḥ iva adhamaḥ
mama aham iti deha-ādau hitvā amithyā artha dhīḥ matim dhāsye manaḥ bhagavati śuddham tat kīrtana-ādibhiḥ
iti jāta-sunirvedaḥ kṣaṇa-saṅgena sādhuṣu gaṅgā-dvāram upeyāya mukta sarva-anubandhanaḥ
saḥ tasmin deva-sadane āsīnaḥ yogam āsthitaḥ pratyāhṛta indriya-grāmaḥ yuyoja manaḥ ātmani
tataḥ guṇebhyaḥ ātmānam viyujya ātma-samādhinā yuyuje bhagavat-dhāmni brahmaṇi anubhava-ātmani
yarhi upārata-dhīḥ tasmin adrākṣīt puruṣān puraḥ upalabhya upalabdhān prāk vavande śirasā dvijaḥ
hitvā kalevaram tīrthe gaṅgāyām darśanāt anu sadyaḥ sva-rūpam jagṛhe bhagavat-pārśva-vartinām
sākam vihāyasā vipraḥ mahāpuruṣa-kiṅkaraiḥ haimam vimānam āruhya yayau yatra śriyaḥ patiḥ
evam saḥ viplāvita-sarva-dharmāḥ dāsyāḥ patiḥ patitaḥ garhya-karmaṇā nipātyamānaḥ niraye hata-vrataḥ sadyaḥ vimuktaḥ bhagavat-nāma gṛhṇan
na ataḥ param karma-nibandha kṛntanam mumukṣatām tīrtha-pāda anukīrtanāt na yat punaḥ karmasu sajjate manaḥ rajaḥ-tamobhyām kalilam tataḥ anyathā
yaḥ etam paramam guhyam itihāsam agha-apaham śṛṇuyāt śraddhayā yuktaḥ yaḥ ca bhaktyā anukīrtayet na vai saḥ narakam yāti na īkṣitaḥ yama-kiṅkaraiḥ yadi api amaṅgalaḥ martyaḥ viṣṇu-loke mahīyate
mriyamāṇaḥ hareḥ nāma gṛṇan putra-upacāritam ajāmilaḥ api agāt dhāma kim uta śraddhayā gṛṇan
śrī-rājā uvāca niśamya devaḥ sva-bhaṭa upavarṇitam pratyāha kim tān api dharma-rājaḥ evam hata-ājñaḥ vihatān murāreḥ naideśikaiḥ yasya vaśe janaḥ ayam
yamasya devasya na daṇḍa-bhaṅgaḥ kutaścana ṛṣe śruta-pūrvaḥ āsīt etat mune vṛścati loka-saṁśayam na hi tvat-anyaḥ iti me viniścitam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca bhagavat-puruṣaiḥ rājan yāmyāḥ pratihata-udyamāḥ patim vijñāpayām āsuḥ yamam saṁyamanī-patim
yamadūtāḥ ūcuḥ kati santi iha śāstāraḥ jīva-lokasya vai prabho trai-vidhyam kurvataḥ karma phala abhivyakti hetavaḥ
yadi syuḥ bahavaḥ loke śāstāraḥ daṇḍa-dhāriṇaḥ kasya syātām na vā kasya mṛtyuḥ ca amṛtam eva vā
kintu śāstṛ bahutve syāt bahūnām iha karmiṇām śāstṛtvam upacāraḥ hi yathā maṇḍala-vartinām
ataḥ tvam ekaḥ bhūtānām sa-īśvarāṇām adhīśvaraḥ śāstā daṇḍa-dharaḥ nṝṇām śubha-aśubha-vivecanaḥ
tasya te vihitaḥ daṇḍaḥ na loke vartate adhunā caturbhiḥ adbhutaiḥ siddhaiḥ ājñā te vipralambhitā
nīyamānam tava ādeśāt asmābhiḥ yātanā-gṛhān vyāmocayan pātakinam chittvā pāśān prasahya te
tān te veditum icchāmaḥ yadi naḥ manyase kṣamam nārāyaṇa iti abhihite mā bhaiḥ iti āyayuḥ drutam
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca iti devaḥ saḥ āpṛṣṭaḥ prajā-saṁyamanaḥ yamaḥ prītaḥ sva-dūtān pratyāha smaran pāda-ambujam hareḥ
yamaḥ uvāca paraḥ mat anyaḥ jagataḥ tasthuṣaḥ ca otam protam paṭavat yatra viśvam yat aṁśataḥ asya sthiti janma nāśāḥ nasi ota-vat yasya vaśe ca lokaḥ
yaḥ nāmabhiḥ vāci janam nijāyām badhnāti tantryām iva dāmabhiḥ gāḥ yasmai balim te ime nāma-karma nibandha baddhāḥ cakitāḥ vahanti
aham mahendraḥ nirṛtiḥ pracetāḥ somaḥ agniḥ īśaḥ pavanaḥ viriñciḥ āditya viśve vasavaḥ atha sādhyāḥ marut-gaṇāḥ rudra-gaṇāḥ sa-siddhāḥ anye ca ye viśva-sṛjaḥ amara-īśāḥ bhṛgu-ādayaḥ aspṛṣṭa rajaḥ-tamaskāḥ yasya īhitam na viduḥ spṛṣṭa-māyāḥ sattva-pradhānāḥ api kim tataḥ anye
yam vai na gobhiḥ manasā asubhiḥ vā hṛdā girā vā asu-bhṛtaḥ vicakṣate ātmānam antaḥ-hṛdi santam ātmanām cakṣuḥ yathā eva ākṛtayaḥ tataḥ param
tasya ātma-tantrasya hareḥ adhīśituḥ parasya māyā-adhipateḥ mahā-ātmanaḥ prāyeṇa dūtāḥ iha vai manoharāḥ caranti tat rūpa guṇa svabhāvāḥ
bhūtāni viṣṇoḥ sura-pūjitāni durdarśa-liṅgāni mahā-adbhutāni rakṣanti tat-bhakti-mataḥ parebhyaḥ mattaḥ ca martyān atha sarvataḥ ca
dharmam tu sākṣāt bhagavat praṇītam na vai viduḥ ṛṣayaḥ na api devāḥ na siddha-mukhyāḥ asurāḥ manuṣyāḥ kutaḥ nu vidyādhara cāraṇa ādayaḥ
svayambhūḥ nāradaḥ śambhuḥ kumāraḥ kapilaḥ manuḥ prahlādaḥ janakaḥ bhīṣmaḥ baliḥ vaiyāsakiḥ vayam dvādaśa ete vijānīmaḥ dharmam bhāgavatam bhaṭāḥ guhyam viśuddham durbodham yam jñātvā amṛtam aśnute
etāvān eva loke asmin puṁsām dharmaḥ paraḥ smṛtaḥ bhakti-yogaḥ bhagavati tat nāma grahaṇa-ādibhiḥ
nāma uccāraṇa māhātmyam hareḥ paśyata putrakāḥ ajāmilaḥ api yena eva mṛtyu-pāśāt amucyata
etāvatā alam agha-nirharaṇāya puṁsām saṅkīrtanam bhagavataḥ guṇa karma-nāmnām vikruśya putram aghavān yat ajāmilaḥ api nārāyaṇa iti mriyamāṇaḥ iyāya muktim
prāyeṇa veda tat idam na mahājanaḥ ayam devyā vimohita-matiḥ bata māyayā alam trayyām jaḍī-kṛta-matiḥ madhu-puṣpitāyām vaitānike mahati karmaṇi yujyamānaḥ
evam vimṛśya su-dhiyaḥ bhagavati anante sarva-ātmanā vidadhate khalu bhāva-yogam te me na daṇḍam arhanti atha yadi amīṣām syāt pātakam tat api hanti urugāya-vādaḥ
te deva siddha parigīta pavitra-gāthāḥ ye sādhavaḥ samadṛśaḥ bhagavat-prapannāḥ tān na upasīdata hareḥ gadayā abhiguptān na eṣām vayam na ca vayaḥ prabhavāma daṇḍe
tān ānayadhvam asataḥ vimukhān mukunda pāda-aravinda makaranda rasāt ajasram niṣkiñcanaiḥ paramahaṁsa-kulaiḥ asaṅgaiḥ juṣṭāt gṛhe niraya-vartmani baddha-tṛṣṇān
jihvā na vakti bhagavat guṇa nāma dheyam cetaḥ ca na smarati tat caraṇa-aravindam kṛṣṇāya no namati yat śiraḥ ekadā api tān ānayadhvam asataḥ akṛta viṣṇu-kṛtyān
tat kṣamyatām saḥ bhagavān puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ sva-puruṣaiḥ yat asat kṛtam naḥ svānām aho na viduṣām racita-añjalīnām kṣāntiḥ garīyasi namaḥ puruṣāya bhūmne
tasmāt saṅkīrtanam viṣṇoḥ jagat-maṅgalam aṁhasām mahatām api kauravya viddhi aikāntika niṣkṛtam
śṛṇvatām gṛṇatām vīryāṇi uddāmāni hareḥ muhuḥ yathā su-jātayā bhaktyā śuddhyet na ātmā vrata-ādibhiḥ
kṛṣṇa-aṅghri-padma madhu liṭ na punaḥ visṛṣṭa māyā-guṇeṣu ramate vṛjina-avaheṣu anyaḥ tu kāma-hataḥ ātma-rajaḥ pramārṣṭum īheta karma yataḥ eva rajaḥ punaḥ syāt
ittham sva-bhartṛ-gaditam bhagavat-mahitvam saṁsmṛtya vismita-dhiyaḥ yama-kiṅkarāḥ te na eva acyuta-āśraya-janam pratiśaṅkamānāḥ draṣṭum ca bibhyati tataḥ prabhṛti sma rājan
itihāsam imam guhyam bhagavān kumbha-sambhavaḥ kathayām āsa malaye āsīnaḥ harim arcayan
śrī-rājā uvāca deva-asura-nṛṇām sargaḥ nāgānām mṛga-pakṣiṇām sāmāsikaḥ tvayā proktaḥ yaḥ tu svāyambhuve antare tasya eva vyāsam icchāmi jñātum te bhagavan yathā anusargam yayā śaktyā sasarja bhagavān paraḥ
śrī-sūtaḥ uvāca iti sampraśnam ākarṇya rājarṣeḥ bādarāyaṇiḥ pratinandya mahā-yogī jagāda muni-sattamāḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca yadā pracetasaḥ putrāḥ daśa prācīnabarhiṣaḥ antaḥ-samudrāt unmagnāḥ dadṛśuḥ gām drumaiḥ vṛtām
drumebhyaḥ krudhyamānāḥ te tapaḥ-dīpita-manyavaḥ mukhataḥ vāyum agnim ca sasṛjuḥ tat didhakṣayā
tābhyām nirdahyamānān tān upalabhya kurūdvaha rājā uvāca mahān somaḥ manyum praśamayan iva
na drumebhyaḥ mahā-bhāgāḥ dīnebhyaḥ drogdhum arhatha vivardhayiṣavaḥ yūyam prajānām patayaḥ smṛtāḥ
aho prajāpati-patiḥ bhagavān hariḥ avyayaḥ vanaspatīn oṣadhīḥ ca sasarja ūrjam iṣam vibhuḥ
annam carāṇām acarāḥ hi apadaḥ pāda-cāriṇām ahastāḥ hasta-yuktānām dvi-padām ca catuḥ-padaḥ
yūyam ca pitrā anvādiṣṭāḥ deva-devena ca anaghāḥ prajā-sargāya hi katham vṛkṣān nirdagdhum arhatha
ātiṣṭhata satām mārgam kopam yacchata dīpitam pitrā pitāmahena api juṣṭam vaḥ prapitāmahaiḥ
tokānām pitarau bandhū dṛśaḥ pakṣma striyāḥ patiḥ patiḥ prajānām bhikṣūṇām gṛhī ajñānām budhaḥ su-hṛt
antaḥ deheṣu bhūtānām ātmā āste hariḥ īśvaraḥ sarvam tat-dhiṣṇyam īkṣadhvam evam vaḥ toṣitaḥ hi asau
yaḥ samutpatitam dehe ākāśāt manyum ulbaṇam ātma-jijñāsayā yacchet saḥ guṇān ativartate
alam dagdhaiḥ drumaiḥ dīnaiḥ khilānām śivam astu vaḥ vārkṣī hi eṣā varā kanyā patnītve pratigṛhyatām
iti āmantrya vara-ārohām kanyām āpsarasīm nṛpa somaḥ rājā yayau dattvā te dharmeṇa upayemire
tebhyaḥ tasyām samabhavat dakṣaḥ prācetasaḥ kila yasya prajā-visargeṇa lokāḥ āpūritāḥ trayaḥ
yathā sasarja bhūtāni dakṣaḥ duhitṛ-vatsalaḥ retasā manasā ca eva tat mama avahitaḥ śṛṇu
manasā eva asṛjat pūrvam prajāpatiḥ imāḥ prajāḥ deva asura manuṣya-ādīn nabhaḥ sthala jala okasaḥ
tam abṛṁhitam ālokya prajā-sargam prajāpatiḥ vindhya-pādān upavrajya saḥ acarat duṣkaram tapaḥ
tatra aghamarṣaṇam nāma tīrtham pāpa-haram param upaspṛśya anusavanam tapasā atoṣayat harim
astauṣīt haṁsa-guhyena bhagavantam adhokṣajam tubhyam tat abhidhāsyāmi kasya atuṣyat yathā hariḥ
śrī-prajāpatiḥ uvāca namaḥ parāya avitatha anubhūtaye guṇa-traya ābhāsa nimitta bandhave adṛṣṭa-dhāmne guṇa-tattva-buddhibhiḥ nivṛtta-mānāya dadhe svayambhuve
na yasya sakhyam puruṣaḥ avaiti sakhyuḥ sakhā vasan saṁvasataḥ pure asmin guṇaḥ yathā guṇinaḥ vyakta-dṛṣṭeḥ tasmai mahā-īśāya namaskaromi
dehaḥ asavaḥ akṣāḥ manavaḥ bhūta-mātrām ātmānam anyam ca viduḥ param yat sarvam pumān veda guṇān ca tat-jñaḥ na veda sarva-jñam anantam īḍe
yadā uparāmaḥ manasaḥ nāma-rūpa rūpasya dṛṣṭa smṛti sampramoṣāt yaḥ īyate kevalayā sva-saṁsthayā haṁsāya tasmai śuci-sadmane namaḥ
manīṣiṇaḥ antaḥ-hṛdi sanniveśitam sva-śaktibhiḥ navabhiḥ ca trivṛdbhiḥ vahnim yathā dāruṇi pāñcadaśyam manīṣayā niṣkarṣanti gūḍham saḥ vai mama aśeṣa viśeṣa māyā niṣedha nirvāṇa sukha-anubhūtiḥ saḥ sarva-nāmā saḥ ca viśva-rūpaḥ prasīdatām anirukta ātma-śaktiḥ
yat yat niruktam vacasā nirūpitam dhiyā akṣabhiḥ vā manasā uta yasya mā bhūt sva-rūpam guṇa-rūpam hi tat tat saḥ vai guṇa-apāya visarga lakṣaṇaḥ
yasmin yataḥ yena ca yasya yasmai yat yaḥ yathā kurute kāryate ca para-avareṣām paramam prāk prasiddham tat brahma tat hetuḥ ananyat ekam
yat-śaktayaḥ vadatām vādinām vai vivāda saṁvāda bhuvaḥ bhavanti kurvanti ca eṣām muhuḥ ātma-moham tasmai namaḥ ananta guṇāya bhūmne
asti iti na asti iti ca vastu-niṣṭhayoḥ eka-sthayoḥ bhinna viruddha-dharmaṇoḥ avekṣitam kiñcana yoga-sāṅkhyayoḥ samam param hi anukūlam bṛhat tat
yaḥ anugraha-artham bhajatām pāda-mūlam anāma rūpaḥ bhagavān anantaḥ nāmāni rūpāṇi ca janma-karmabhiḥ bheje saḥ mahyam paramaḥ prasīdatu
yaḥ prākṛtaiḥ jñāna-pathaiḥ janānām yathā-āśayam deha-gataḥ vibhāti yathā anilaḥ pārthivam āśritaḥ guṇam saḥ īśvaraḥ me kurutām manoratham
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti stutaḥ saṁstuvataḥ saḥ tasmin aghamarṣaṇe prādurāsīt kuru-śreṣṭha bhagavān bhakta-vatsalaḥ kṛta-pādaḥ suparṇa-aṁse pralamba aṣṭa-mahā-bhujaḥ cakra śaṅkha asi carma iṣu dhanuḥ pāśa gadā dharaḥ pīta-vāsāḥ ghana-śyāmaḥ prasanna vadana īkṣaṇaḥ vana-mālā nivīta-aṅgaḥ lasat śrīvatsa-kaustubhaḥ mahā-kirīṭa kaṭakaḥ sphurat makara-kuṇḍalaḥ kāñcī aṅgulīya valaya nūpura aṅgada bhūṣitaḥ trai-lokya-mohanam rūpam bibhrat tri-bhuvana īśvaraḥ vṛtaḥ nārada nanda-ādyaiḥ pārṣadaiḥ sura-yūthapaiḥ stūyamānaḥ anugāyadbhiḥ siddha-gandharva-cāraṇaiḥ
rūpam tat mahat-āścaryam vicakṣya āgata-sādhvasaḥ nanāma daṇḍa-vat bhūmau prahṛṣṭa-ātmā prajāpatiḥ
na kiñcana udīrayitum aśakat tīvrayā mudā āpūrita manaḥ-dvāraiḥ hradinyaḥ iva nirjharaiḥ
tam tathā avanatam bhaktam prajā-kāmam prajāpatim citta-jñaḥ sarva-bhūtānām idam āha janārdanaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca prācetasa mahā-bhāga saṁsiddhaḥ tapasā bhavān yat śraddhayā mat-parayā mayi bhāvam param gataḥ
prītaḥ aham te prajā-nātha yat te asya udbṛṁhaṇam tapaḥ mama eṣaḥ kāmaḥ bhūtānām yat bhūyāsuḥ vibhūtayaḥ
brahmā bhavaḥ bhavantaḥ ca manavaḥ vibudha-īśvarāḥ vibhūtayaḥ mama hi etāḥ bhūtānām bhūti hetavaḥ
tapaḥ me hṛdayam brahman tanuḥ vidyā kriyā ākṛtiḥ aṅgāni kratavaḥ jātāḥ dharmaḥ ātmā asavaḥ surāḥ
aham eva āsam eva agre na anyat kiñca antaram bahiḥ saṁjñāna-mātram avyaktam prasuptam iva viśvataḥ
mayi ananta-guṇe anante guṇataḥ guṇa-vigrahaḥ yadā āsīt tataḥ eva ādyaḥ svayambhūḥ samabhūt ajaḥ
saḥ vai yadā mahā-devaḥ mama vīrya-upabṛṁhitaḥ mene khilam iva ātmānam udyataḥ svarga-karmaṇi atha me abhihitaḥ devaḥ tapaḥ atapyata dāruṇam nava viśva-sṛjaḥ yuṣmān yena ādau asṛjat vibhuḥ
eṣā pañcajanasya aṅga duhitā vai prajāpateḥ asiknī nāma patnītve prajeśa pratigṛhyatām
mithuna vyavāya dharmaḥ tvam prajā-sargam imam punaḥ mithuna vyavāya-dharmiṇyām bhūriśaḥ bhāvayiṣyasi
tvattaḥ adhastāt prajāḥ sarvāḥ mithunī-bhūya māyayā madīyayā bhaviṣyanti hariṣyanti ca me balim
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti uktvā miṣataḥ tasya bhagavān viśva-bhāvanaḥ svapna-upalabdha-arthaḥ iva tatra eva antardadhe hariḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tasyām saḥ pāñcajanyām vai viṣṇu-māyā-upabṛṁhitaḥ haryaśva-saṁjñān ayutam putrān ajanayat vibhuḥ
apṛthak dharma-śīlāḥ te sarve dākṣāyaṇāḥ nṛpa pitrā proktāḥ prajā-sarge pratīcīm prayayuḥ diśam
tatra nārāyaṇa-saraḥ tīrtham sindhu-samudrayoḥ saṅgamaḥ yatra su-mahat muni siddha niṣevitam
tat upasparśanāt eva vinirdhūta mala-āśayāḥ dharme pāramahaṁsye ca protpanna matayaḥ api uta tepire tapaḥ eva ugram pitṛ-ādeśena yantritāḥ prajā-vivṛddhaye yattān devarṣiḥ tān dadarśa ha
uvāca ca atha haryaśvāḥ katham srakṣyatha vai prajāḥ adṛṣṭvā antam bhuvaḥ yūyam bāliśāḥ bata pālakāḥ tathā eka puruṣam rāṣṭram bilam ca adṛṣṭa-nirgamam bahu-rūpām striyam ca api pumāṁsam puṁścalī-patim nadīm ubhayataḥ vāhām pañca-pañca adbhutam gṛham kvacit haṁsam citra-katham kṣaura-pavyam svayam bhrami
katham sva-pituḥ ādeśam avidvāṁsaḥ vipaścitaḥ anurūpam avijñāya aho sargam kariṣyatha
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tat niśamya atha haryaśvāḥ autpattika manīṣayā vācaḥ kūṭam tu devarṣeḥ svayam vimamṛśuḥ dhiyā
bhūḥ kṣetram jīva-saṁjñam yat anādi nija-bandhanam adṛṣṭvā tasya nirvāṇam kim asat-karmabhiḥ bhavet
ekaḥ eva īśvaraḥ turyaḥ bhagavān sva-āśrayaḥ paraḥ tam adṛṣṭvā abhavam puṁsaḥ kim asat-karmabhiḥ bhavet
pumān na eva eti yat gatvā bila-svargam gataḥ yathā pratyak-dhāma avidaḥ iha kim asat-karmabhiḥ bhavet
nānā rūpā ātmanaḥ buddhiḥ svairiṇī iva guṇa-anvitā tat-niṣṭhām agatasya iha kim asat-karmabhiḥ bhavet
tat-saṅga bhraṁśita aiśvaryam saṁsarantam ku-bhārya-vat tat-gatīḥ abudhasya iha kim asat-karmabhiḥ bhavet
sṛṣṭi apyaya karīm māyām velā-kūla-anta vegitām mattasya tām avijñasya kim asat-karmabhiḥ bhavet
pañca-viṁśati tattvānām puruṣaḥ adbhuta-darpaṇaḥ adhyātmam abudhasya iha kim asat-karmabhiḥ bhavet
aiśvaram śāstram utsṛjya bandha mokṣa anudarśanam vivikta-padam ajñāya kim asat-karmabhiḥ bhavet
kāla-cakram bhrami tīkṣṇam sarvam niṣkarṣayat jagat sva-tantram abudhasya iha kim asat-karmabhiḥ bhavet
śāstrasya pituḥ ādeśam yaḥ na veda nivartakam katham tat-anurūpāya guṇa-visrambhī upakramet
iti vyavasitāḥ rājan haryaśvāḥ eka-cetasaḥ prayayuḥ tam parikramya panthānam anivartanam
svara-brahmaṇi nirbhāta hṛṣīkeśa padāmbuje akhaṇḍam cittam āveśya lokān anucarat muniḥ
nāśam niśamya putrāṇām nāradāt śīla-śālinām anvatapyata kaḥ śocan su-prajastvam śucām padam
saḥ bhūyaḥ pāñcajanyāyām ajena parisāntvitaḥ putrān ajanayat dakṣaḥ savalāśvān sahasriṇaḥ
te ca pitrā samādiṣṭāḥ prajā-sarge dhṛta-vratāḥ nārāyaṇa-saraḥ jagmuḥ yatra siddhāḥ sva-pūrva-jāḥ
tat upasparśanāt eva vinirdhūta mala-āśayāḥ japantaḥ brahma paramam tepuḥ tatra mahat tapaḥ
ap-bhakṣāḥ katicit māsān katicit vāyu-bhojanāḥ ārādhayan mantram imam abhyasyantaḥ iḍaḥ-patim om namaḥ nārāyaṇāya puruṣāya mahā-ātmane viśuddha-sattva-dhiṣṇyāya mahā-haṁsāya dhīmahi
iti tān api rājendra prajā-sarga-dhiyaḥ muniḥ upetya nāradaḥ prāha vācaḥ kūṭāni pūrva-vat
dākṣāyaṇāḥ saṁśṛṇuta gadataḥ nigamam mama anvicchata anupadavīm bhrātṝṇām bhrātṛ-vatsalāḥ
bhrātṝṇām prāyaṇam bhrātā yaḥ anutiṣṭhati dharma-vit saḥ puṇya-bandhuḥ puruṣaḥ marudbhiḥ saha modate
etāvat uktvā prayayau nāradaḥ amogha-darśanaḥ te api ca anvagaman mārgam bhrātṝṇām eva māriṣa
sadhrīcīnam pratīcīnam parasya anupatham gatāḥ na adya api te nivartante paścimāḥ yāminīḥ iva
etasmin kāle utpātān bahūn paśyan prajāpatiḥ pūrva-vat nārada kṛtam putra-nāśam upāśṛṇot
cukrodha nāradāya asau putra-śoka vimūrcchitaḥ devarṣim upalabhya āha roṣāt visphurita adharaḥ
śrī-dakṣaḥ uvāca aho asādho sādhūnām sādhu-liṅgena naḥ tvayā asādhu akāri arbhakāṇām bhikṣoḥ mārgaḥ pradarśitaḥ
ṛṇaiḥ tribhiḥ amuktānām amīmāṁsita karmaṇām vighātaḥ śreyasaḥ pāpa lokayoḥ ubhayoḥ kṛtaḥ
evam tvam niranukrośaḥ bālānām mati-bhit hareḥ pārṣada-madhye carasi yaśaḥ-hā nirapatrapaḥ
nanu bhāgavatāḥ nityam bhūta-anugraha-kātarāḥ ṛte tvām sauhṛda-ghnam vai vairam-karam avairiṇām
na ittham puṁsām virāgaḥ syāt tvayā kevalinā mṛṣā manyase yadi upaśamam sneha-pāśa nikṛntanam
na anubhūya na jānāti pumān viṣaya-tīkṣṇatām nirvidyate svayam tasmāt na tathā bhinna-dhīḥ paraiḥ
yat naḥ tvam karma-sandhānām sādhūnām gṛha-medhinām kṛtavān asi durmarṣam vipriyam tava marṣitam
tantu-kṛntana yat naḥ tvam abhadram acaraḥ punaḥ tasmāt lokeṣu te mūḍha na bhavet bhramataḥ padam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca pratijagrāha tat bāḍham nāradaḥ sādhu-sammataḥ etāvān sādhu-vādaḥ hi titikṣeta īśvaraḥ svayam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tataḥ prācetasaḥ asiknyām anunītaḥ svayambhuvā ṣaṣṭim sañjanayām āsa duhitṝḥ pitṛ-vatsalāḥ
daśa dharmāya kāya adāt dvi-ṣaṭ tri-nava ca indave bhūta-aṅgiraḥ-kṛśāśvebhyaḥ dve dve tārkṣyāya ca aparāḥ
nāmadheyāni amūṣām tvam sa-apatyānām ca me śṛṇu yāsām prasūti-prasavaiḥ lokāḥ āpūritāḥ trayaḥ
bhānuḥ lambā kakut yāmiḥ viśvā sādhyā marutvatī vasuḥ muhūrtā saṅkalpā dharma-patnyaḥ sutān śṛṇu
bhānoḥ tu deva-ṛṣabhaḥ indrasenaḥ tataḥ nṛpa vidyotaḥ āsīt lambāyāḥ tataḥ ca stanayitnavaḥ
kakudaḥ saṅkaṭaḥ tasya kīkaṭaḥ tanayaḥ yataḥ bhuvaḥ durgāṇi yāmeyaḥ svargaḥ nandiḥ tataḥ abhavat
viśve-devāḥ tu viśvāyāḥ aprajān tān pracakṣate sādhyaḥ-gaṇaḥ ca sādhyāyāḥ arthasiddhiḥ tu tat-sutaḥ
marutvān ca jayantaḥ ca marutvatyāḥ babhūvatuḥ jayantaḥ vāsudeva-aṁśaḥ upendraḥ iti yam viduḥ
mauhūrtikāḥ deva-gaṇāḥ muhūrtāyāḥ ca jajñire ye vai phalam prayacchanti bhūtānām sva-sva kāla-jam
saṅkalpāyāḥ tu saṅkalpaḥ kāmaḥ saṅkalpa-jaḥ smṛtaḥ vasavaḥ aṣṭau vasoḥ putrāḥ teṣām nāmāni me śṛṇu droṇaḥ prāṇaḥ dhruvaḥ arkaḥ agniḥ doṣaḥ vāstuḥ vibhāvasuḥ droṇasya abhimateḥ patnyāḥ harṣa-śoka-bhaya-ādayaḥ
prāṇasya ūrjasvatī bhāryā sahaḥ āyuḥ purojavaḥ dhruvasya bhāryā dharaṇiḥ asūta vividhāḥ puraḥ
arkasya vāsanā bhāryā putrāḥ tarṣa-ādayaḥ smṛtāḥ agneḥ bhāryā vasoḥ dhārā putrāḥ draviṇaka-ādayaḥ
skandaḥ ca kṛttikā-putraḥ ye viśākha-ādayaḥ tataḥ doṣasya śarvarī-putraḥ śiśumāraḥ hareḥ kalā
vāstoḥ āṅgirasī putraḥ viśvakarmā ākṛtī-patiḥ tataḥ manuḥ cākṣuṣaḥ abhūt viśve sādhyāḥ manoḥ sutāḥ
vibhāvasoḥ asūta ūṣā vyuṣṭam rociṣam ātapam pañcayāmaḥ atha bhūtāni yena jāgrati karmasu
sarūpā asūta bhūtasya bhāryā rudrān ca koṭiśaḥ raivataḥ ajaḥ bhavaḥ bhīmaḥ vāmaḥ ugraḥ vṛṣākapiḥ ajaikapāt ahirbradhnaḥ bahurūpaḥ mahān iti rudrasya pārṣadāḥ ca anye ghorāḥ preta vināyakāḥ
prajāpateḥ aṅgirasaḥ svadhā patnī pitṝn atha atharva-āṅgirasam vedam putratve ca akarot satī
kṛśāśvaḥ arciṣi bhāryāyām dhūmaketum ajījanat dhiṣaṇāyām vedaśiraḥ devalam vayunam manum
tārkṣyasya vinatā kadrūḥ pataṅgī yāminī iti ca pataṅgī asūta patagān yāminī śalabhān atha suparṇā asūta garuḍam sākṣāt yajñeśa-vāhanam sūrya-sūtam anūrum ca kadrūḥ nāgān anekaśaḥ
kṛttikā-ādīni nakṣatrāṇi indoḥ patnyaḥ tu bhārata dakṣa-śāpāt saḥ anapatyaḥ tāsu yakṣma-graha-arditaḥ
punaḥ prasādya tam somaḥ kalāḥ lebhe kṣaye ditāḥ śṛṇu nāmāni lokānām mātṝṇām śaṅkarāṇi ca atha kaśyapa-patnīnām yat-prasūtam idam jagat aditiḥ ditiḥ danuḥ kāṣṭhā ariṣṭā surasā ilā muniḥ krodhavaśā tāmrā surabhiḥ saramā timiḥ timeḥ yādaḥ-gaṇāḥ āsan śvāpadāḥ saramā-sutāḥ
surabheḥ mahiṣāḥ gāvaḥ ye ca anye dvi-śaphāḥ nṛpa tāmrāyāḥ śyena gṛdhra-ādyāḥ muneḥ apsarasām gaṇāḥ
dandaśūka-ādayaḥ sarpāḥ rājan krodhavaśā-ātma-jāḥ ilāyāḥ bhūruhāḥ sarve yātudhānāḥ ca saurasāḥ
ariṣṭāyāḥ tu gandharvāḥ kāṣṭhāyāḥ dvi-śapha-itarāḥ sutāḥ danoḥ eka-ṣaṣṭiḥ teṣām prādhānikān śṛṇu dvimūrdhā śambaraḥ ariṣṭaḥ hayagrīvaḥ vibhāvasuḥ ayomukhaḥ śaṅkuśirāḥ svarbhānuḥ kapilaḥ aruṇaḥ pulomā vṛṣaparvā ca ekacakraḥ anutāpanaḥ dhūmrakeśaḥ virūpākṣaḥ vipracittiḥ ca durjayaḥ
svarbhānoḥ suprabhām kanyām uvāha namuciḥ kila vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ tu śarmiṣṭhām yayātiḥ nāhuṣaḥ balī
vaiśvānara-sutāḥ yāḥ ca catasraḥ cāru-darśanāḥ upadānavī hayaśirā pulomā kālakā tathā upadānavīm hiraṇyākṣaḥ kratuḥ hayaśirām nṛpa pulomām kālakām ca dve vaiśvānara-sute tu kaḥ upayeme atha bhagavān kaśyapaḥ brahma-coditaḥ paulomāḥ kālakeyāḥ ca dānavāḥ yuddha-śālinaḥ tayoḥ ṣaṣṭi-sahasrāṇi yajña-ghnān te pituḥ pitā jaghāna svaḥ-gataḥ rājan ekaḥ indra-priyam-karaḥ
vipracittiḥ siṁhikāyām śatam ca ekam ajījanat rāhu-jyeṣṭham ketu-śatam grahatvam ye upāgatāḥ
atha ataḥ śrūyatām vaṁśaḥ yaḥ aditeḥ anupūrvaśaḥ yatra nārāyaṇaḥ devaḥ sva-aṁśena avātarat vibhuḥ vivasvān aryamā pūṣā tvaṣṭā atha savitā bhagaḥ dhātā vidhātā varuṇaḥ mitraḥ śatruḥ urukramaḥ
vivasvataḥ śrāddhadevam saṁjñā asūyata vai manum mithunam ca mahā-bhāgā yamam devam yamīm tathā sā eva bhūtvā atha vaḍavā nāsatyau suṣuve bhuvi
chāyā śanaiścaram lebhe sāvarṇim ca manum tataḥ kanyām ca tapatīm yā vai vavre saṁvaraṇam patim
aryamṇaḥ mātṛkā patnī tayoḥ carṣaṇayaḥ sutāḥ yatra vai mānuṣī jātiḥ brahmaṇā ca upakalpitā
pūṣā anapatyaḥ piṣṭa-adaḥ bhagna-dantaḥ abhavat purā yaḥ asau dakṣāya kupitam jahāsa vivṛta-dvijaḥ
tvaṣṭuḥ daitya-ātma-jā bhāryā racanā nāma kanyakā sanniveśaḥ tayoḥ jajñe viśvarūpaḥ ca vīryavān
tam vavrire sura-gaṇāḥ svasrīyam dviṣatām api vimatena parityaktāḥ guruṇā āṅgirasena yat
śrī-rājā uvāca kasya hetoḥ parityaktāḥ ācāryeṇa ātmanaḥ surāḥ etat ācakṣva bhagavan śiṣyāṇām akramam gurau
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca indraḥ tri-bhuvana-aiśvarya mada ullaṅghita sat-pathaḥ marudbhiḥ vasubhiḥ rudraiḥ ādityaiḥ ṛbhubhiḥ nṛpa viśvedevaiḥ ca sādhyaiḥ ca nāsatyābhyām pariśritaḥ siddha cāraṇa gandharvaiḥ munibhiḥ brahmavādibhiḥ vidyādhara-apsarobhiḥ ca kinnaraiḥ pataga-uragaiḥ niṣevyamāṇaḥ maghavān stūyamānaḥ ca bhārata upagīyamānaḥ lalitam āsthāna adhyāsana-āśritaḥ pāṇḍureṇa ātapatreṇa candra-maṇḍala-cāruṇā yuktaḥ ca anyaiḥ pārameṣṭhyaiḥ cāmara vyajana-ādibhiḥ virājamānaḥ paulamyā saha ardha-āsanayā bhṛśam saḥ yadā parama-ācāryam devānām ātmanaḥ ca ha na abhyanandata samprāptam pratyutthāna āsana-ādibhiḥ vācaspatim muni-varam sura-asura-namaskṛtam na uccacāla āsanāt indraḥ paśyan api sabhā-āgatam
tataḥ nirgatya sahasā kaviḥ āṅgirasaḥ prabhuḥ āyayau sva-gṛham tūṣṇīm vidvān śrī-mada-vikriyām
tarhi eva pratibudhya indraḥ guru-helanam ātmanaḥ garhayām āsa sadasi svayam ātmānam ātmanā
aho bata mayā asādhu kṛtam vai dabhra-buddhinā yat mayā aiśvarya-mattena guruḥ sadasi kāt-kṛtaḥ
kaḥ gṛdhyet paṇḍitaḥ lakṣmīm tri-piṣṭa-pa-pateḥ api yayā aham āsuram bhāvam nītaḥ adya vibudha īśvaraḥ
yaḥ pārameṣṭhyam dhiṣaṇam adhitiṣṭhan na kañcana pratyuttiṣṭhet iti brūyuḥ dharmam te na param viduḥ
teṣām ku-patha-deṣṭṝṇām patatām tamasi hi adhaḥ ye śraddadhyuḥ vacaḥ te vai majjanti aśma-plavāḥ iva
atha aham amara-ācāryam agādha-dhiṣaṇam dvijam prasādayiṣye niśaṭhaḥ śīrṣṇā tat-caraṇam spṛśan
evam cintayataḥ tasya maghonaḥ bhagavān gṛhāt bṛhaspatiḥ gataḥ adṛṣṭām gatim adhyātma māyayā
guroḥ na adhigataḥ saṁjñām parīkṣan bhagavān svarāṭ dhyāyan dhiyā suraiḥ yuktaḥ śarma na alabhata ātmanaḥ
tat śrutvā eva asurāḥ sarve āśritya auśanasam matam devān pratyudyamam cakruḥ durmadāḥ ātatāyinaḥ
taiḥ visṛṣṭa iṣubhiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ nirbhinna aṅga uru bāhavaḥ brahmāṇam śaraṇam jagmuḥ saha-indrāḥ nata-kandharāḥ
tān tathā abhyarditān vīkṣya bhagavān ātma-bhūḥ ajaḥ kṛpayā parayā devaḥ uvāca parisāntvayan
śrī-brahmā uvāca aho bata sura-śreṣṭhāḥ hi abhadram vaḥ kṛtam mahat brahmiṣṭham brāhmaṇam dāntam aiśvaryāt na abhyanandata
tasya ayam anayasya āsīt parebhyaḥ vaḥ parābhavaḥ prakṣīṇebhyaḥ sva-vairibhyaḥ samṛddhānām ca yat surāḥ
maghavan dviṣataḥ paśya prakṣīṇān guru-atikramāt samprati upacitān bhūyaḥ kāvyam ārādhya bhaktitaḥ ādadīran nilayanam mama api bhṛgu-devatāḥ
tri-piṣṭa-pam kim gaṇayanti abhedya-mantrāḥ bhṛgūṇām anuśikṣita-arthāḥ na vipra govinda go īśvarāṇām bhavanti abhadrāṇi nara-īśvarāṇām
tat viśvarūpam bhajata āśu vipram tapasvinam tvāṣṭram atha ātma-vantam sabhājitaḥ arthān saḥ vidhāsyate vaḥ yadi kṣamiṣyadhvam uta asya karma
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca te evam uditāḥ rājan brahmaṇā vigata-jvarāḥ ṛṣim tvāṣṭram upavrajya pariṣvajya idam abruvan
śrī-devāḥ ūcuḥ vayam te atithayaḥ prāptāḥ āśramam bhadram astu te kāmaḥ sampādyatām tāta pitṝṇām samayocitaḥ
putrāṇām hi paraḥ dharmaḥ pitṛ-śuśrūṣaṇam satām api putra-vatām brahman kim uta brahmacāriṇām
ācāryaḥ brahmaṇaḥ mūrtiḥ pitā mūrtiḥ prajāpateḥ bhrātā marut-pateḥ mūrtiḥ mātā sākṣāt kṣiteḥ tanuḥ dayāyāḥ bhaginī mūrtiḥ dharmasya ātma atithiḥ svayam agneḥ abhyāgataḥ mūrtiḥ sarva-bhūtāni ca ātmanaḥ
tasmāt pitṝṇām ārtānām ārtim para-parābhavam tapasā apanayan tāta sandeśam kartum arhasi
vṛṇīmahe tvā upādhyāyam brahmiṣṭham brāhmaṇam gurum yathā añjasā vijeṣyāmaḥ sapatnān tava tejasā
na garhayanti hi artheṣu yaviṣṭha-aṅghri abhivādanam chandobhyaḥ anyatra na brahman vayaḥ jyaiṣṭhyasya kāraṇam
śrī-ṛṣiḥ uvāca abhyarthitaḥ sura-gaṇaiḥ paurahitye mahā-tapāḥ saḥ viśvarūpaḥ tān āha prasannaḥ ślakṣṇayā girā
śrī-viśvarūpaḥ uvāca vigarhitam dharma-śīlaiḥ brahma-varcaḥ upavyayam katham nu mat-vidhaḥ nāthāḥ loka-īśaiḥ abhiyācitam pratyākhyāsyati tat-śiṣyaḥ saḥ eva sva-arthaḥ ucyate
akiñcanānām hi dhanam śila uñchanam tena iha nirvartita sādhu sat-kriyaḥ katham vigarhyam nu karomi adhīśvarāḥ paurodhasam hṛṣyati yena durmatiḥ
tathā api na pratibrūyām gurubhiḥ prārthitam kiyat bhavatām prārthitam sarvam prāṇaiḥ arthaiḥ ca sādhaye
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca tebhyaḥ evam pratiśrutya viśvarūpaḥ mahā-tapāḥ paurahityam vṛtaḥ cakre parameṇa samādhinā
sura-dviṣām śriyam guptām auśanasya api vidyayā ācchidya adāt mahā-indrāya vaiṣṇavyā vidyayā vibhuḥ
yayā guptaḥ sahasra-akṣaḥ jigye asura camūḥ vibhuḥ tām prāha saḥ mahendrāya viśvarūpaḥ udāra-dhīḥ
śrī-rājā uvāca yayā guptaḥ sahasra-akṣaḥ sa-vāhān ripu-sainikān krīḍan iva vinirjitya tri-lokyāḥ bubhuje śriyam bhagavan tat mama ākhyāhi varma nārāyaṇa-ātmakam yathā ātatāyinaḥ śatrūn yena guptaḥ ajayat mṛdhe
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca vṛtaḥ purohitaḥ tvāṣṭraḥ mahendrāya anupṛcchate nārāyaṇa-ākhyam varma āha tat iha eka-manāḥ śṛṇu
śrī-viśvarūpaḥ uvāca dhauta aṅghri pāṇiḥ ācamya sa-pavitraḥ udak-mukhaḥ kṛta sva-aṅga-kara-nyāsaḥ mantrābhyām vāk-yataḥ śuciḥ nārāyaṇa-param varma sannahyet bhaye āgate pādayoḥ jānunoḥ ūrvoḥ udare hṛdi atha urasi mukhe śirasi ānupūrvyāt oṁkāra-ādīni vinyaset om namaḥ nārāyaṇāya iti viparyayam atha api vā
kara-nyāsam tataḥ kuryāt dvādaśa-akṣara vidyayā praṇava-ādi ya-kāra-antam aṅguli aṅguṣṭha-parvasu
nyaset hṛdaye oṁkāram vi-kāram anu mūrdhani ṣa-kāram tu bhruvoḥ madhye ṇa-kāram śikhayā nyaset vekāram netrayoḥ yuñjyāt na-kāram sarva-sandhiṣu ma-kāram astram uddiśya mantra-mūrtiḥ bhavet budhaḥ sa-visargam phaṭ-antam tat sarva-dikṣu vinirdiśet om viṣṇave namaḥ iti
ātmānam paramam dhyāyet dhyeyam ṣaṭ-śaktibhiḥ yutam vidyā tejaḥ tapaḥ mūrtim imam mantram udāharet
om hariḥ vidadhyāt mama sarva-rakṣām nyasta aṅghri-padmaḥ patagendra-pṛṣṭhe dara ari carma asi gadā iṣu cāpa pāśān dadhānaḥ aṣṭa guṇaḥ aṣṭa bāhuḥ
jaleṣu mām rakṣatu matsya-mūrtiḥ yādaḥ-gaṇebhyaḥ varuṇasya pāśāt sthaleṣu māyā-vaṭu vāmanaḥ avyāt trivikramaḥ khe avatu viśvarūpaḥ
durgeṣu aṭavi āji-mukha-ādiṣu prabhuḥ pāyāt nṛsiṁhaḥ asura-yūthapa ariḥ vimuñcataḥ yasya mahā-aṭṭa-hāsam diśaḥ vineduḥ nyapatan ca garbhāḥ
rakṣatu asau mā adhvani yajña-kalpaḥ sva-daṁṣṭrayā unnīta dharaḥ varāhaḥ rāmaḥ adri-kūṭeṣu atha vipravāse sa-lakṣmaṇaḥ avyāt bharata-agrajaḥ asmān
mām ugra-dharmāt akhilāt pramādāt nārāyaṇaḥ pātu naraḥ ca hāsāt dattaḥ tu ayogāt atha yoga-nāthaḥ pāyāt guṇa-īśaḥ kapilaḥ karma-bandhāt
sanat-kumāraḥ avatu kāma-devāt haya-śīrṣā mām pathi deva-helanāt devarṣi-varyaḥ puruṣa-arcana-antarāt kūrmaḥ hariḥ mām nirayāt aśeṣāt
dhanvantariḥ bhagavān pātu apathyāt dvandvāt bhayāt ṛṣabhaḥ nirjita-ātmā yajñaḥ ca lokāt avatāt jana-antāt balaḥ gaṇāt krodha-vaśāt ahīndraḥ
dvaipāyanaḥ bhagavān aprabodhāt buddhaḥ tu pāṣaṇḍa-gaṇa pramādāt kalkiḥ kaleḥ kāla-malāt prapātu dharma-avanāya uru kṛta-avatāraḥ
mām keśavaḥ gadayā prātaḥ avyāt govindaḥ āsaṅgavam ātta-veṇuḥ nārāyaṇaḥ prāhṇaḥ udātta-śaktiḥ madhyam-dine viṣṇuḥ arīndra-pāṇiḥ
devaḥ aparāhṇe madhu-hā ugra-dhanvā sāyam tri-dhāmā avatu mādhavaḥ mām doṣe hṛṣīkeśaḥ uta ardha-rātre niśīthe ekaḥ avatu padmanābhaḥ
śrīvatsa-dhāmā apara-rātre īśaḥ pratyūṣe īśaḥ asi-dharaḥ janārdanaḥ dāmodaraḥ avyāt anusandhyam prabhāte viśva-īśvaraḥ bhagavān kāla-mūrtiḥ
cakram yuga-anta anala tigma-nemi bhramat samantāt bhagavat-prayuktam dandagdhi dandagdhi ari-sainyam āśu kakṣam yathā vāta-sakhaḥ hutāśaḥ
gade aśani sparśana visphuliṅge niṣpiṇḍhi niṣpiṇḍhi ajita-priyā asi kuṣmāṇḍa vaināyaka yakṣa rakṣaḥ bhūta grahān cūrṇaya cūrṇaya arīn
tvam yātudhāna pramatha preta mātṛ piśāca vipra-graha ghora-dṛṣṭīn darendra vidrāvaya kṛṣṇa-pūritaḥ bhīma-svanaḥ areḥ hṛdayāni kampayan
tvam tigma-dhāra-asi-vara ari-sainyam īśa-prayuktaḥ mama chindhi chindhi cakṣūṁṣi carman śata-candra chādaya dviṣām aghonām hara pāpa-cakṣuṣām
yat naḥ bhayam grahebhyaḥ abhūt ketubhyaḥ nṛbhyaḥ eva ca sarīsṛpebhyaḥ daṁṣṭribhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ aṁhobhyaḥ eva ca sarvāṇi etāni bhagavat-nāma-rūpa-anukīrtanāt prayāntu saṅkṣayam sadyaḥ ye naḥ śreyaḥ-pratīpakāḥ
garuḍaḥ bhagavān stotra-stobhaḥ chandaḥ-mayaḥ prabhuḥ rakṣatu aśeṣa-kṛcchrebhyaḥ viṣvaksenaḥ sva-nāmabhiḥ
sarva-āpadbhyaḥ hareḥ nāma rūpa yāna āyudhāni naḥ buddhi indriya manaḥ prāṇān pāntu pārṣada-bhūṣaṇāḥ
yathā hi bhagavān eva vastutaḥ sat asat ca yat satyena anena naḥ sarve yāntu nāśam upadravāḥ
yathā aikātmya anubhāvānām vikalpa-rahitaḥ svayam bhūṣaṇa āyudha liṅga-ākhyāḥ dhatte śaktīḥ sva-māyayā tena eva satya-mānena sarva-jñaḥ bhagavān hariḥ pātu sarvaiḥ sva-rūpaiḥ naḥ sadā sarvatra sarva-gaḥ
vidikṣu dikṣu ūrdhvam adhaḥ samantāt antaḥ bahiḥ bhagavān nārasiṁhaḥ prahāpayan loka-bhayam svanena sva-tejasā grasta samasta tejāḥ
maghavan idam ākhyātam varma nārāyaṇa-ātmakam vijeṣyase añjasā yena daṁśitaḥ asura-yūthapān
etat dhārayamāṇaḥ tu yam yam paśyati cakṣuṣā padā vā saṁspṛśet sadyaḥ sādhvasāt saḥ vimucyate
na kutaścit bhayam tasya vidyām dhārayataḥ bhavet rāja dasyu graha-ādibhyaḥ vyādhi-ādibhyaḥ ca karhicit
imām vidyām purā kaścit kauśikaḥ dhārayan dvijaḥ yoga-dhāraṇayā sva-aṅgam jahau saḥ maru-dhanvani
tasya upari vimānena gandharva-patiḥ ekadā yayau citrarathaḥ strībhiḥ vṛtaḥ yatra dvija-kṣayaḥ
gaganāt nyapatat sadyaḥ sa-vimānaḥ hi avāk-śirāḥ saḥ vālikhilya vacanāt asthīni ādāya vismitaḥ prāsya prācī-sarasvatyām snātvā dhāma svam anvagāt
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca yaḥ idam śṛṇuyāt kāle yaḥ dhārayati ca ādṛtaḥ tam namasyanti bhūtāni mucyate sarvataḥ bhayāt
etām vidyām adhigataḥ viśvarūpāt śata-kratuḥ trailokya-lakṣmīm bubhuje vinirjitya mṛdhe asurān
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tasya āsan viśvarūpasya śirāṁsi trīṇi bhārata soma-pītham surā-pītham anna-adam iti śuśruma
saḥ vai barhiṣi devebhyaḥ bhāgam pratyakṣam uccakaiḥ adadat yasya pitaraḥ devāḥ sa-praśrayam nṛpa
saḥ eva hi dadau bhāgam parokṣam asurān prati yajamānaḥ avahat bhāgam mātṛ-sneha vaśa-anugaḥ
tat deva-helanam tasya dharma-alīkam sura-īśvaraḥ ālakṣya tarasā bhītaḥ tat śīrṣāṇi acchinat ruṣā
soma-pītham tu yat tasya śiraḥ āsīt kapiñjalaḥ kalaviṅkaḥ surā-pītham anna-adam yat saḥ tittiriḥ
brahma-hatyām añjalinā jagrāha yat api īśvaraḥ saṁvatsara-ante tat agham bhūtānām saḥ viśuddhaye bhūmi ambu druma yoṣidbhyaḥ caturdhā vyabhajat hariḥ
bhūmiḥ turīyam jagrāha khāta-pūra vareṇa vai īriṇam brahma-hatyāyāḥ rūpam bhūmau pradṛśyate
turyam cheda viroheṇa vareṇa jagṛhuḥ drumāḥ teṣām niryāsa-rūpeṇa brahma-hatyā pradṛśyate
śaśvat kāma vareṇa aṁhaḥ turīyam jagṛhuḥ striyaḥ rajaḥ-rūpeṇa tāsu aṁhaḥ māsi māsi pradṛśyate
dravya bhūyaḥ vareṇa āpaḥ turīyam jagṛhuḥ malam tāsu budbuda-phenābhyām dṛṣṭam tat harati kṣipan
hata-putraḥ tataḥ tvaṣṭā juhāva indrāya śatrave indra-śatro vivardhasva mā ciram jahi vidviṣam
atha anvāhārya-pacanāt utthitaḥ ghora-darśanaḥ kṛtāntaḥ iva lokānām yuga-anta samaye yathā
viṣvak vivardhamānam tam iṣu-mātram dine dine dagdha śaila pratīkāśam sandhyā abhra-anīka varcasam tapta tāmra śikhā śmaśrum madhyāhna arka ugra-locanam dedīpyamāne tri-śikhe śūle āropya rodasī nṛtyantam unnadantam ca cālayantam padā mahīm darī-gambhīra vaktreṇa pibatā ca nabhastalam lihatā jihvayā ṛkṣāṇi grasatā bhuvana-trayam mahatā raudra-daṁṣṭreṇa jṛmbhamāṇam muhuḥ muhuḥ vitrastāḥ dudruvuḥ lokāḥ vīkṣya sarve diśaḥ daśa
yena āvṛtāḥ ime lokāḥ tapasā tvāṣṭra-mūrtinā saḥ vai vṛtraḥ iti proktaḥ pāpaḥ parama-dāruṇaḥ
tam nijaghnuḥ abhidrutya sa-gaṇāḥ vibudha-ṛṣabhāḥ svaiḥ svaiḥ divya astra śastra-oghaiḥ saḥ agrasat tāni kṛtsnaśaḥ
tataḥ te vismitāḥ sarve viṣaṇṇāḥ grasta-tejasaḥ pratyañcam ādi-puruṣam upatasthuḥ samāhitāḥ
śrī-devāḥ ūcuḥ vāyu ambara agni ap kṣitayaḥ tri-lokāḥ brahma-ādayaḥ ye vayam udvijantaḥ harāma yasmai balim antakaḥ asau bibheti yasmāt araṇam tataḥ naḥ
avismitam tam paripūrṇa-kāmam svena eva lābhena samam praśāntam vinā upasarpati aparam hi bāliśaḥ śva lāṅgulena atititarti sindhum
yasya uru śṛṅge jagatīm sva-nāvam manuḥ yathā ābadhya tatāra durgam saḥ eva naḥ tvāṣṭra-bhayāt durantāt trātā āśritān vāri-caraḥ api nūnam
purā svayambhūḥ api saṁyama-ambhasi udīrṇa vāta ūrmi ravaiḥ karāle ekaḥ aravindāt patitaḥ tatāra tasmāt bhayāt yena saḥ naḥ astu pāraḥ
yaḥ ekaḥ īśaḥ nija-māyayā naḥ sasarja yena anusṛjāma viśvam vayam na yasya api puraḥ samīhataḥ paśyāma liṅgam pṛthak īśa māninaḥ
yaḥ naḥ sapatnaiḥ bhṛśam ardyamānān deva ṛṣi tiryak nṛṣu nityaḥ eva kṛta-avatāraḥ tanubhiḥ sva-māyayā kṛtvā ātmasāt pāti yuge yuge ca tam eva devam vayam ātma-daivatam param pradhānam puruṣam viśvam anyam vrajāma sarve śaraṇam śaraṇyam svānām saḥ naḥ dhāsyati śam mahātmā
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti teṣām mahārāja surāṇām upatiṣṭhatām pratīcyām diśi abhūt āviḥ śaṅkha-cakra-gadā-dharaḥ
ātma-tulyaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ vinā śrīvatsa-kaustubhau paryupāsitam unnidra śarat amburuha īkṣaṇam dṛṣṭvā tam avanau sarve īkṣaṇa āhlāda viklavāḥ daṇḍa-vat patitāḥ rājan śanaiḥ utthāya tuṣṭuvuḥ
śrī-devāḥ ūcuḥ namaḥ te yajña-vīryāya vayase uta te namaḥ namaḥ te hi asta-cakrāya namaḥ supuru-hūtaye
yat te gatīnām tisṛṇām īśituḥ paramam padam na arvācīnaḥ visargasya dhātaḥ veditum arhati
om namaḥ te astu bhagavan nārāyaṇa vāsudeva ādi-puruṣa mahā-puruṣa mahā-anubhāva parama-maṅgala parama-kalyāṇa parama-kāruṇika kevala jagat-ādhāra loka-eka-nātha sarva-īśvara lakṣmī-nātha paramahaṁsa-parivrājakaiḥ parameṇa ātma-yoga-samādhinā paribhāvita parisphuṭa pāramahaṁsya-dharmeṇa udghāṭita tamaḥ kapāṭa dvāre citte apāvṛte ātma-loke svayam upalabdha nija sukha-anubhavaḥ bhavān
duravabodhaḥ iva tava ayam vihāra-yogaḥ yat aśaraṇaḥ aśarīraḥ idam anavekṣita asmat samavāyaḥ ātmanā eva avikriyamāṇena sa-guṇam aguṇaḥ sṛjasi pāsi harasi
atha tatra bhavān kim deva-datta-vat iha guṇa-visarga-patitaḥ pāratantryeṇa sva-kṛta kuśala akuśalam phalam upādadāti āhosvit ātmārāmaḥ upaśama-śīlaḥ samañjasa-darśanaḥ udāste iti ha vāva na vidāmaḥ
na hi virodhaḥ ubhayam bhagavati aparimita guṇa-gaṇe īśvare anavagāhya māhātmye arvācīna vikalpa vitarka vicāra pramāṇa-ābhāsa kutarka śāstra kalila antaḥkaraṇa āśraya duravagraha vādinām vivāda anavasare uparata samasta māyā-maye kevale eva ātma-māyām antardhāya kaḥ nu arthaḥ durghaṭaḥ iva bhavati sva-rūpa dvaya abhāvāt
sama viṣama matīnām matam anusarasi yathā rajju-khaṇḍaḥ sarpa-ādi dhiyām
saḥ eva hi punaḥ sarva-vastuni vastu-svarūpaḥ sarva-īśvaraḥ sakala-jagat kāraṇa kāraṇa-bhūtaḥ sarva-pratyak-ātmatvāt sarva-guṇa ābhāsa upalakṣitaḥ ekaḥ eva paryavaśeṣitaḥ
atha ha vāva tava mahima amṛta rasa samudra vipruṣā sakṛt avalīḍhayā sva-manasi niṣyandamāna anavarata sukhena vismārita dṛṣṭa śruta viṣaya-sukha leśa-ābhāsāḥ parama-bhāgavatāḥ ekāntinaḥ bhagavati sarva-bhūta priya suhṛdi sarva-ātmani nitarām nirantaram nirvṛta manasaḥ katham u ha vā ete madhu-mathana punaḥ sva-artha-kuśalāḥ hi ātma-priya-suhṛdaḥ sādhavaḥ tvat-caraṇa-ambuja-anusevām visṛjanti na yatra punaḥ ayam saṁsāra-paryāvartaḥ
tri-bhuvana-ātma-bhavana tri-vikrama tri-nayana tri-loka-manohara-anubhāva tava eva vibhūtayaḥ diti-ja-danu-ja-ādayaḥ ca api teṣām upakrama-samayaḥ ayam iti sva-ātma-māyayā sura-nara-mṛga-miśrita-jalacara-ākṛtibhiḥ yathā-aparādham daṇḍam daṇḍa-dhara dadhartha evam enam api bhagavan jahi tvāṣṭram uta yadi manyase
asmākam tāvakānām tata-tata natānām hare tava caraṇa nalina-yugala dhyāna anubaddha hṛdaya nigaḍānām sva-liṅga-vivaraṇena ātmasāt-kṛtānām anukampā anurañjita viśada rucira śiśira smita avalokena vigalita madhura-mukha-rasa amṛta-kalayā ca antaḥ tāpam anagha arhasi śamayitum
atha bhagavan tava asmābhiḥ akhila jagat utpatti sthiti laya nimittāyamāna divya-māyā vinodasya sakala jīva-nikāyānām antaḥ-hṛdayeṣu bahiḥ api ca brahma pratyak-ātma sva-rūpeṇa pradhāna-rūpeṇa ca yathā deśa-kāla-deha-avasthāna viśeṣam tat upādāna upalambhakatayā anubhavataḥ sarva-pratyaya-sākṣiṇaḥ ākāśa-śarīrasya sākṣāt para-brahmaṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ kiyān iha vā artha-viśeṣaḥ vijñāpanīyaḥ syāt visphuliṅga-ādibhiḥ iva hiraṇya-retasaḥ
ata eva svayam tat upakalpaya asmākam bhagavataḥ parama-guroḥ tava caraṇa śata-palāśat chāyām vividha vṛjina saṁsāra pariśrama upaśamanīm upasṛtānām vayam yat kāmena upasāditāḥ
atho īśa jahi tvāṣṭram grasantam bhuvana-trayam grastāni yena naḥ kṛṣṇa tejāṁsi astra āyudhāni ca
haṁsāya dahra nilayāya nirīkṣakāya kṛṣṇāya mṛṣṭa-yaśase nirupakramāya sat-saṅgrahāya bhava-pāntha-nija-āśrama-āptau ante parīṣṭa-gataye haraye namaḥ te
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca atha evam īḍitaḥ rājan sa-ādaram tri-daśaiḥ hariḥ svam upasthānam ākarṇya prāha tān abhinanditaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca prītaḥ aham vaḥ sura-śreṣṭhāḥ mat-upasthāna-vidyayā ātma-aiśvarya-smṛtiḥ puṁsām bhaktiḥ ca eva yayā mayi
kim durāpam mayi prīte tathāpi vibudha-ṛṣabhāḥ mayi ekānta matiḥ na anyat mattaḥ vāñchati tattva-vit
na veda kṛpaṇaḥ śreyaḥ ātmanaḥ guṇa-vastu-dṛk tasya tān icchataḥ yacchet yadi saḥ api tathā-vidhaḥ
svayam niḥśreyasam vit-vān na vakti ajñāya karma hi na rāti rogiṇaḥ apathyam vāñchataḥ api bhiṣak-tamaḥ
maghavan yāta bhadram vaḥ dadhyañcam ṛṣi-sat-tamam vidyā vrata tapaḥ sāram gātram yācata mā ciram
saḥ vā adhigataḥ dadhyaṅ aśvibhyām brahma niṣkalam yat vā aśvaśiraḥ nāma tayoḥ amaratām vyadhāt
dadhyaṅ ātharvaṇaḥ tvaṣṭre varma abhedyam mat-ātmakam viśvarūpāya yat prādāt tvaṣṭā yat tvam adhāḥ tataḥ
yuṣmabhyam yācitaḥ aśvibhyām dharma-jñaḥ aṅgāni dāsyati tataḥ taiḥ āyudha śreṣṭhaḥ viśvakarma-vinirmitaḥ yena vṛtra-śiraḥ hartā mat-tejaḥ upabṛṁhitaḥ
tasmin vinihate yūyam tejaḥ astra āyudha sampadaḥ bhūyaḥ prāpsyatha bhadram vaḥ na hiṁsanti ca mat-parān
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca indram evam samādiśya bhagavān viśva-bhāvanaḥ paśyatām animeṣāṇām tatra eva antardadhe hariḥ
tathā abhiyācitaḥ devaiḥ ṛṣiḥ ātharvaṇaḥ mahān modamānaḥ uvāca idam prahasan iva bhārata
api vṛndārakāḥ yūyam na jānītha śarīriṇām saṁsthāyām yaḥ tu abhidrohaḥ duḥsahaḥ cetana apahaḥ
jijīviṣūṇām jīvānām ātmā preṣṭhaḥ iha īpsitaḥ kaḥ utsaheta tam dātum bhikṣamāṇāya viṣṇave
śrī-devāḥ ūcuḥ kim nu tat dustyajam brahman puṁsām bhūta-anukampinām bhavat-vidhānām mahatām puṇya-śloka-īḍya-karmaṇām
nūnam sva-artha-paraḥ lokaḥ na veda para-saṅkaṭam yadi veda na yāceta na iti na āha yat īśvaraḥ
śrī-ṛṣiḥ uvāca dharmam vaḥ śrotu-kāmena yūyam me pratyudāhṛtāḥ eṣaḥ vaḥ priyam ātmānam tyajantam santyajāmi aham
yaḥ adhruveṇa ātmanā nāthāḥ na dharmam na yaśaḥ pumān īheta bhūta-dayayā saḥ śocyaḥ sthāvaraiḥ api
etāvān avyayaḥ dharmaḥ puṇya-ślokaiḥ upāsitaḥ yaḥ bhūta śoka harṣābhyām ātmā śocati hṛṣyati
aho dainyam aho kaṣṭam pārakyaiḥ kṣaṇa-bhaṅguraiḥ yat na upakuryāt a-sva-arthaiḥ martyaḥ sva jñāti vigrahaiḥ
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca evam kṛta-vyavasitaḥ dadhyaṅ ātharvaṇaḥ tanum pare bhagavati brahmaṇi ātmānam sannayan jahau
yata akṣa asu manaḥ buddhiḥ tattva-dṛk dhvasta-bandhanaḥ āsthitaḥ paramam yogam na deham bubudhe gatam
atha indraḥ vajram udyamya nirmitam viśvakarmaṇā muneḥ śaktibhiḥ utsiktaḥ bhagavat tejasā anvitaḥ vṛtaḥ deva-gaṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ gajendra upari aśobhata stūyamānaḥ muni-gaṇaiḥ trai-lokyam harṣayan iva
vṛtram abhyadravat śatrum asura-anīka-yūthapaiḥ paryastam ojasā rājan kruddhaḥ rudraḥ iva antakam
tataḥ surāṇām asuraiḥ raṇaḥ parama-dāruṇaḥ tretā-mukhe narmadāyām abhavat prathame yuge
rudraiḥ vasubhiḥ ādityaiḥ aśvibhyām pitṛ vahnibhiḥ marudbhiḥ ṛbhubhiḥ sādhyaiḥ viśve-devaiḥ marut-patim dṛṣṭvā vajra-dharam śakram rocamānam svayā śriyā na amṛṣyan asurāḥ rājan mṛdhe vṛtra-puraḥsarāḥ
namuciḥ śambaraḥ anarvā dvimūrdhā ṛṣabhaḥ asuraḥ hayagrīvaḥ śaṅkuśirāḥ vipracittiḥ ayomukhaḥ pulomā vṛṣaparvā ca prahetiḥ hetiḥ utkalaḥ daiteyāḥ dānavāḥ yakṣāḥ rakṣāṁsi ca sahasraśaḥ sumāli-māli-pramukhāḥ kārtasvara paricchadāḥ pratiṣidhya indra-senā-agram mṛtyoḥ api durāsadam abhyardayan asambhrāntāḥ siṁha-nādena durmadāḥ gadābhiḥ parighaiḥ bāṇaiḥ prāsa-mudgara-tomaraiḥ
śūlaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ śataghnībhiḥ bhuśuṇḍibhiḥ sarvataḥ avākiran śastraiḥ astraiḥ ca vibudha-ṛṣabhān
na te adṛśyanta sañchannāḥ śara-jālaiḥ samantataḥ puṅkha-anupuṅkha patitaiḥ jyotīṁṣi iva nabhaḥ-ghanaiḥ
na te śastra-astra-varṣa-oghāḥ hi āseduḥ sura-sainikān chinnāḥ siddha-pathe devaiḥ laghu-hastaiḥ sahasradhā
atha kṣīṇa astra śastra oghāḥ giri śṛṅga druma upalaiḥ abhyavarṣan sura-balam cicchiduḥ tān ca pūrva-vat
tān akṣatān svasti-mataḥ niśāmya śastra-astra-pūgaiḥ atha vṛtra-nāthāḥ drumaiḥ dṛṣadbhiḥ vividha adri śṛṅgaiḥ avikṣatān tatrasuḥ indra-sainikān
sarve prayāsāḥ abhavan vimoghāḥ kṛtāḥ kṛtāḥ deva-gaṇeṣu daityaiḥ kṛṣṇa-anukūleṣu yathā mahatsu kṣudraiḥ prayuktāḥ ūṣatīḥ rūkṣa vācaḥ
te sva-prayāsam vitatham nirīkṣya harau abhaktāḥ hata yuddha-darpāḥ palāyanāya āji-mukhe visṛjya patim manaḥ te dadhuḥ ātta-sārāḥ
vṛtraḥ asurān tān anugān manasvī pradhāvataḥ prekṣya babhāṣa etat palāyitam prekṣya balam ca bhagnam bhayena tīvreṇa vihasya vīraḥ
kāla-upapannām rucirām manasvinām jagāda vācam puruṣa-pravīraḥ he vipracitte namuce puloman maya anarvan śambara me śṛṇudhvam
jātasya mṛtyuḥ dhruvaḥ eva sarvataḥ pratikriyā yasya na ca iha kḷptā lokaḥ yaśaḥ ca atha tataḥ yadi hi amum kaḥ nāma mṛtyum na vṛṇīta yuktam
dvau sammatau iha mṛtyū durāpau yat brahma-sandhāraṇayā jita-asuḥ kalevaram yoga-rataḥ vijahyāt yat agraṇīḥ vīra-śaye anivṛttaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca te evam śaṁsataḥ dharmam vacaḥ patyuḥ acetasaḥ na eva agṛhṇanta sambhrāntāḥ palāyana-parāḥ nṛpa
viśīryamāṇām pṛtanām āsurīm asura-ṛṣabhaḥ kāla-anukūlaiḥ tridaśaiḥ kālyamānām anātha-vat dṛṣṭvā atapyata saṅkruddhaḥ indra-śatruḥ amarṣitaḥ tān nivārya ojasā rājan nirbhartsya idam uvāca ha
kim vaḥ uccaritaiḥ mātuḥ dhāvadbhiḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ hataiḥ na hi bhīta-vadhaḥ ślāghyaḥ na svargyaḥ śūra-māninām
yadi vaḥ pradhane śraddhā sāram vā kṣullakāḥ hṛdi agre tiṣṭhata mātram me na cet grāmya-sukhe spṛhā
evam sura-gaṇān kruddhaḥ bhīṣayan vapuṣā ripūn vyanadat su-mahā-prāṇaḥ yena lokāḥ vicetasaḥ
tena deva-gaṇāḥ sarve vṛtra-visphoṭanena vai nipetuḥ mūrcchitāḥ bhūmau yathā eva aśaninā hatāḥ
mamarda padbhyām sura-sainyam āturam nimīlita-akṣam raṇa-raṅga-durmadaḥ gām kampayan udyata-śūlaḥ ojasā nālam vanam yūtha-patiḥ yathā unmadaḥ
vilokya tam vajra-dharaḥ ati amarṣitaḥ sva śatrave abhidravate mahā-gadām cikṣepa tām āpatatīm su-duḥsahām jagrāha vāmena kareṇa līlayā
saḥ indra-śatruḥ kupitaḥ bhṛśam tayā mahendra-vāham gadayā uru-vikramaḥ jaghāna kumbha-sthale unnadan mṛdhe tat karma sarve samapūjayan nṛpa
airāvataḥ vṛtra-gadā-abhimṛṣṭaḥ vighūrṇitaḥ adriḥ kuliśa āhataḥ yathā apāsarat bhinna-mukhaḥ saha-indraḥ muñcan asṛk sapta-dhanuḥ bhṛśa ārtaḥ
na sanna vāhāya viṣaṇṇa-cetase prāyuṅkta bhūyaḥ saḥ gadām mahā-ātmā indraḥ amṛta-syandi-kara abhimarśa vīta vyatha kṣata vāhaḥ avatasthe
saḥ tam nṛpa-indra āhava-kāmyayā ripum vajra-āyudham bhrātṛ-haṇam vilokya smaran ca tat-karma nṛ-śaṁsam aṁhaḥ śokena mohena hasan jagāda
śrī-vṛtraḥ uvāca diṣṭyā bhavān me samavasthitaḥ ripuḥ yaḥ brahma-hā guru-hā bhrātṛ-hā ca diṣṭyā anṛṇaḥ adya aham asat-tama tvayā mat-śūla nirbhinna dṛṣat hṛdā acirāt
yaḥ naḥ agra-jasya ātma-vidaḥ dvi-jāteḥ guroḥ apāpasya ca dīkṣitasya viśrabhya khaḍgena śirāṁsi avṛścat paśoḥ iva akaruṇaḥ svarga-kāmaḥ
śrī hrī dayā kīrtibhiḥ ujjhitam tvām sva-karmaṇā puruṣa-adaiḥ ca garhyam kṛcchreṇa mat-śūla vibhinna deham aspṛṣṭa-vahnim samadanti gṛdhrāḥ
anye anu ye tvā iha nṛ-śaṁsam ajñāḥ yat udyata-astrāḥ praharanti mahyam taiḥ bhūta-nāthān sa-gaṇān niśāta tri-śūla nirbhinna galaiḥ yajāmi
atho hare me kuliśena vīra hartā pramathya eva śiraḥ yadi iha tatra anṛṇaḥ bhūta-balim vidhāya manasvinām pāda-rajaḥ prapatsye
sura-īśa kasmāt na hinoṣi vajram puraḥ sthite vairiṇi mayi amogham mā saṁśayiṣṭhāḥ na gadā iva vajraḥ syāt niṣphalaḥ kṛpaṇa arthā iva yācñā
nanu eṣaḥ vajraḥ tava śakra tejasā hareḥ dadhīceḥ tapasā ca tejitaḥ tena eva śatrum jahi viṣṇu-yantritaḥ yataḥ hariḥ vijayaḥ śrīḥ guṇāḥ tataḥ
aham samādhāya manaḥ yathā āha naḥ saṅkarṣaṇaḥ tat-caraṇa-aravinde tvat-vajra raṁhaḥ lulita grāmya pāśaḥ gatim muneḥ yāmi apaviddha lokaḥ
puṁsām kila ekānta-dhiyām svakānām yāḥ sampadaḥ divi bhūmau rasāyām na rāti yat dveṣaḥ udvegaḥ ādhiḥ madaḥ kaliḥ vyasanam samprayāsaḥ
trai-vargika āyāsa vighātam asmat patiḥ vidhatte puruṣasya śakra tataḥ anumeyaḥ bhagavat-prasādaḥ yaḥ durlabhaḥ akiñcana-gocaraḥ anyaiḥ
aham hare tava pāda-eka-mūla dāsa-anudāsaḥ bhavitāsmi bhūyaḥ manaḥ smareta asu-pateḥ guṇān te gṛṇīta vāk karma karotu kāyaḥ
na nāka-pṛṣṭham na ca pārameṣṭhyam na sārva-bhaumam na rasā-ādhipatyam na yoga-siddhīḥ apunaḥ-bhavam vā samañjasa tvā virahayya kāṅkṣe
ajāta-pakṣāḥ iva mātaram khagāḥ stanyam yathā vatsatarāḥ kṣudh-ārtāḥ priyam priyā iva vyuṣitam viṣaṇṇā manaḥ aravinda-akṣa didṛkṣate tvām
mama uttama-śloka-janeṣu sakhyam saṁsāra-cakre bhramataḥ sva-karmabhiḥ tvat-māyayā ātma ātma-ja dāra geheṣu āsakta cittasya na nātha bhūyāt
śrī-ṛṣiḥ uvāca evam jihāsuḥ nṛpa deham ājau mṛtyum varam vijayāt manyamānaḥ śūlam pragṛhya abhyapatat sura-indram yathā mahā-puruṣam kaiṭabhaḥ apsu
tataḥ yuga-anta-agni kaṭhora jihvam āvidhya śūlam tarasā asura-indraḥ kṣiptvā mahā-indrāya vinadya vīraḥ hataḥ asi pāpa iti ruṣā jagāda
khe āpatat tat vicalat graha-ulka-vat nirīkṣya duṣprekṣyam ajāta-viklavaḥ vajreṇa vajrī śata-parvaṇā ācchinat bhujam ca tasya uraga-rāja bhogam
chinna eka bāhuḥ parigheṇa vṛtraḥ saṁrabdhaḥ āsādya gṛhīta vajram hanau tatāḍa indram atha amara-ibham vajram ca hastāt nyapatat maghonaḥ
vṛtrasya karma ati mahā adbhutam tat sura asurāḥ cāraṇa siddha-saṅghāḥ apūjayan tat puruhūta-saṅkaṭam nirīkṣya hā hā iti vicukruśuḥ bhṛśam
indraḥ na vajram jagṛhe vilajjitaḥ cyutam sva-hastāt ari-sannidhau punaḥ tam āha vṛtraḥ hare ātta-vajraḥ jahi sva-śatrum na viṣāda-kālaḥ
yuyutsatām kutracit ātatāyinām jayaḥ sadā ekatra na vai para-ātmanām vinā ekam utpatti laya sthiti īśvaram sarva-jñam ādyam puruṣam sanātanam
lokāḥ sa-pālāḥ yasya ime śvasanti vivaśāḥ vaśe dvijāḥ iva śicā baddhāḥ saḥ kālaḥ iha kāraṇam
ojaḥ sahaḥ balam prāṇam amṛtam mṛtyum eva ca tam ajñāya janaḥ hetum ātmānam manyate jaḍam
yathā dāru-mayī nārī yathā patra-mayaḥ mṛgaḥ evam bhūtāni maghavan īśa tantrāṇi viddhi bhoḥ
puruṣaḥ prakṛtiḥ vyaktam ātmā bhūta indriya āśayāḥ śaknuvanti asya sarga-ādau na vinā yat anugrahāt
avidvān evam ātmānam manyate anīśam īśvaram bhūtaiḥ sṛjati bhūtāni grasate tāni taiḥ svayam
āyuḥ śrīḥ kīrtiḥ aiśvaryam āśiṣaḥ puruṣasya yāḥ bhavanti eva hi tat-kāle yathā anicchoḥ viparyayāḥ
tasmāt akīrti yaśasoḥ jaya apajayayoḥ api samaḥ syāt sukha-duḥkhābhyām mṛtyu jīvitayoḥ tathā
sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti prakṛteḥ na ātmanaḥ guṇāḥ tatra sākṣiṇam ātmānam yaḥ veda saḥ na badhyate
paśya mām nirjitam śatru vṛkṇa āyudha bhujam mṛdhe ghaṭamānam yathā-śakti tava prāṇa jihīrṣayā
prāṇa-glahaḥ ayam samaraḥ iṣu-akṣaḥ vāhana-āsanaḥ atra na jñāyate amuṣya jayaḥ amuṣya parājayaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca indraḥ vṛtra-vacaḥ śrutvā gata-alīkam apūjayat gṛhīta-vajraḥ prahasan tam āha gata-vismayaḥ
indraḥ uvāca aho dānava siddhaḥ asi yasya te matiḥ īdṛśī bhaktaḥ sarva-ātmanā ātmānam suhṛdam jagat-īśvaram
bhavān atārṣīt māyām vai vaiṣṇavīm jana-mohinīm yat vihāya āsuram bhāvam mahā-puruṣatām gataḥ
khalu idam mahat āścaryam yat rajaḥ prakṛteḥ tava vāsudeve bhagavati sattva-ātmani dṛḍhā matiḥ
yasya bhaktiḥ bhagavati harau niḥśreyasa-īśvare vikrīḍataḥ amṛta-ambhodhau kim kṣudraiḥ khātaka-udakaiḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti bruvāṇau anyonyam dharma-jijñāsayā nṛpa yuyudhāte mahā-vīryau indra vṛtrau yudhām patī
āvidhya parigham vṛtraḥ kārṣṇa-ayasam arim-damaḥ indrāya prāhiṇot ghoram vāma-hastena māriṣa
saḥ tu vṛtrasya parigham karam ca karabha-upamam ciccheda yugapat devaḥ vajreṇa śata-parvaṇā
dorbhyām utkṛtta-mūlābhyām babhau rakta-sravaḥ asuraḥ chinna-pakṣaḥ yathā gotraḥ khāt bhraṣṭaḥ vajriṇā hataḥ
mahā-prāṇaḥ mahā-vīryaḥ mahā-sarpaḥ iva dvipam kṛtvā adharām hanum bhūmau daityaḥ divi uttarām hanum nabhaḥ gambhīra vaktreṇa leliha ulbaṇa jihvayā daṁṣṭrābhiḥ kāla-kalpābhiḥ grasan iva jagat-trayam ati-mātra mahā-kāyaḥ ākṣipan tarasā girīn giri-rāṭ pāda-cārī iva padbhyām nirjarayan mahīm jagrāsa saḥ samāsādya vajriṇam saha-vāhanam
vṛtra-grastam tam ālokya sa-prajāpatayaḥ surāḥ hā kaṣṭam iti nirviṇṇāḥ cukruśuḥ sa-mahā-ṛṣayaḥ
nigīrṇaḥ api asura-indreṇa na mamāra udaram gataḥ mahā-puruṣa sannaddhaḥ yoga-māyā-balena ca
bhittvā vajreṇa tat-kukṣim niṣkramya bala-bhit vibhuḥ uccakarta śiraḥ śatroḥ giri-śṛṅgam iva ojasā
vajraḥ tu tat-kandharam āśu-vegaḥ kṛntan samantāt parivartamānaḥ nyapātayat tāvat ahaḥ-gaṇena yaḥ jyotiṣām ayane vārtra-hatye
tadā ca khe dundubhayaḥ vineduḥ gandharva siddhāḥ sa-maharṣi-saṅghāḥ vārtra-ghna-liṅgaiḥ tam abhiṣṭuvānāḥ mantraiḥ mudā kusumaiḥ abhyavarṣan
vṛtrasya dehāt niṣkrāntam ātma-jyotiḥ arim-dama paśyatām sarva-devānām alokam samapadyata
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca vṛtre hate trayaḥ lokāḥ vinā śakreṇa bhūri-da sa-pālāḥ hi abhavan sadyaḥ vijvarāḥ nirvṛta indriyāḥ
deva ṛṣi pitṛ bhūtāni daityāḥ deva-anugāḥ svayam pratijagmuḥ sva-dhiṣṇyāni brahma īśa indra-ādayaḥ tataḥ
śrī-rājā uvāca indrasya anirvṛteḥ hetum śrotum icchāmi bhoḥ mune yena āsan sukhinaḥ devāḥ hareḥ duḥkham kutaḥ abhavat
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca vṛtra vikrama saṁvignāḥ sarve devāḥ saha ṛṣibhiḥ tat-vadhāya ārthayan indram na aicchat bhītaḥ bṛhat-vadhāt
indraḥ uvāca strī bhū druma jalaiḥ enaḥ viśvarūpa vadha udbhavam vibhaktam anugṛhṇadbhiḥ vṛtra-hatyām kva mārjmi aham
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ṛṣayaḥ tat upākarṇya mahā-indram idam abruvan yājayiṣyāmaḥ bhadram te hayamedhena mā sma bhaiḥ
hayamedhena puruṣam paramātmānam īśvaram iṣṭvā nārāyaṇam devam mokṣyase api jagat-vadhāt
brahma-hā pitṛ-hā go-ghnaḥ mātṛ-hā ācārya-hā agha-vān śva-adaḥ pulkasakaḥ vā api śuddhyeran yasya kīrtanāt tam aśvamedhena mahā-makhena śraddhā-anvitaḥ asmābhiḥ anuṣṭhitena hatvā api sa-brahma-cara-acaram tvam na lipyase kim khala-nigraheṇa
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam sañcoditaḥ vipraiḥ marutvān ahanat ripum brahma-hatyā hate tasmin āsasāda vṛṣākapim
tayā indraḥ sma asahat tāpam nirvṛtiḥ na amum āviśat hrīmantam vācyatām prāptam sukhayanti api no guṇāḥ
tām dadarśa anudhāvantīm cāṇḍālīm iva rūpiṇīm jarayā vepamāna-aṅgīm yakṣma-grastām asṛk-paṭām vikīrya palitān keśān tiṣṭha tiṣṭha iti bhāṣiṇīm mīna-gandhi asu gandhena kurvatīm mārga-dūṣaṇam
nabhaḥ gataḥ diśaḥ sarvāḥ sahasra-akṣaḥ viśāmpate prāk-udīcīm diśam tūrṇam praviṣṭaḥ nṛpa mānasam
saḥ āvasat puṣkara-nāla-tantūn alabdha-bhogaḥ yat iha agni-dūtaḥ varṣāṇi sāhasram alakṣitaḥ antaḥ sañcintayan brahma-vadhāt vimokṣam
tāvat triṇākam nahuṣaḥ śaśāsa vidyā tapaḥ yoga bala anubhāvaḥ saḥ sampat aiśvarya mada andha buddhiḥ nītaḥ tiraścām gatim indra-patnyā
tataḥ gataḥ brahma girā upahūtaḥ ṛtambhara dhyāna nivārita aghaḥ pāpaḥ tu dik-devatayā hata-ojāḥ tam na abhyabhūt avitam viṣṇu-patnyā
tam ca brahma-ṛṣayaḥ abhyetya hayamedhena bhārata yathāvat dīkṣayām cakruḥ puruṣa-ārādhanena ha
atha ijyamāne puruṣe sarva deva-maya-ātmani aśvamedhe mahā-indreṇa vitate brahma-vādibhiḥ saḥ vai tvāṣṭra-vadhaḥ bhūyāt api pāpa-cayaḥ nṛpa nītaḥ tena eva śūnyāya nīhāraḥ iva bhānunā
saḥ vājimedhena yathā uditena vitāyamānena marīci-miśraiḥ iṣṭvā adhiyajñam puruṣam purāṇam indraḥ mahān āsa vidhūta-pāpaḥ
idam mahā-ākhyānam aśeṣa-pāpmanām prakṣālanam tīrthapada-anukīrtanam bhakti ucchrayam bhakta-jana anuvarṇanam mahā-indra-mokṣam vijayam marutvataḥ paṭheyuḥ ākhyānam idam sadā budhāḥ śṛṇvanti atho parvaṇi parvaṇi indriyam dhanyam yaśasyam nikhila agha-mocanam ripum-jayam svasti-ayanam tathā āyuṣam
śrī-parīkṣit uvāca rajaḥ tamaḥ sva-bhāvasya brahman vṛtrasya pāpmanaḥ nārāyaṇe bhagavati katham āsīt dṛḍhā matiḥ
devānām śuddha-sattvānām ṛṣīṇām ca amala-ātmanām bhaktiḥ mukunda-caraṇe na prāyeṇa upajāyate
rajobhiḥ sama-saṅkhyātāḥ pārthivaiḥ iha jantavaḥ teṣām ye kecana īhante śreyaḥ vai manuja-ādayaḥ
prāyaḥ mumukṣavaḥ teṣām kecana eva dvija-uttama mumukṣūṇām sahasreṣu kaścit mucyeta sidhyati
muktānām api siddhānām nārāyaṇa-parāyaṇaḥ su-durlabhaḥ praśānta ātmā koṭiṣu* api mahā-mune
vṛtraḥ tu saḥ katham pāpaḥ sarva-loka upatāpanaḥ ittham dṛḍha-matiḥ kṛṣṇe āsīt saṅgrāme ulbaṇe
atra naḥ saṁśayaḥ bhūyān śrotum kautūhalam prabho yaḥ pauruṣeṇa samare sahasra-akṣam atoṣayat
śrī-sūtaḥ uvāca parīkṣitaḥ atha sampraśnam bhagavān bādarāyaṇiḥ niśamya śraddadhānasya pratinandya vacaḥ abravīt
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca śṛṇuṣva avahitaḥ rājan itihāsam imam yathā śrutam dvaipāyana mukhāt nāradāt devalāt api
āsīt rājā sārva-bhaumaḥ śūraseneṣu vai nṛpa citraketuḥ iti khyātaḥ yasya āsīt kāma-dhuk mahī
tasya bhāryā sahasrāṇām sahasrāṇi daśa abhavan sāntānikaḥ ca api nṛpaḥ na lebhe tāsu santatim
rūpa audārya vayaḥ janma vidyā aiśvarya śriya-ādibhiḥ sampannasya guṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ cintā bandhyā-pateḥ abhūt
na tasya sampadaḥ sarvāḥ mahiṣyaḥ vāma-locanāḥ sārva-bhaumasya bhūḥ ca iyam abhavan prīti-hetavaḥ
tasya ekadā tu bhavanam aṅgirāḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ lokān anucaran etān upāgacchat yadṛcchayā
tam pūjayitvā vidhi-vat pratyutthāna arhaṇa-ādibhiḥ kṛta-atithyam upāsīdat sukha-āsīnam samāhitaḥ
mahā-ṛṣiḥ tam upāsīnam praśraya-avanatam kṣitau pratipūjya mahārāja samābhāṣya idam abravīt
aṅgirāḥ uvāca api te anāmayam svasti prakṛtīnām tathā ātmanaḥ yathā prakṛtibhiḥ guptaḥ pumān rājā ca saptabhiḥ
ātmānam prakṛtiṣu addhā nidhāya śreyaḥ āpnuyāt rājñā tathā prakṛtayaḥ nara-deva āhita-adhayaḥ
api dārāḥ prajā amātyāḥ bhṛtyāḥ śreṇyaḥ atha mantriṇaḥ paurāḥ jānapadāḥ bhūpāḥ ātma-jāḥ vaśa-vartinaḥ
yasya ātmā anuvaśaḥ cet syāt sarve tat-vaśa-gāḥ ime lokāḥ sa-pālāḥ yacchanti sarve balim atandritāḥ
ātmanaḥ prīyate na ātmā parataḥ svataḥ eva vā lakṣaye alabdha-kāmam tvām cintayā śabalam mukham
evam vikalpitaḥ rājan viduṣā muninā api saḥ praśraya-avanataḥ abhyāha prajā-kāmaḥ tataḥ munim
citraketuḥ uvāca bhagavan kim na viditam tapaḥ jñāna samādhibhiḥ yoginām dhvasta-pāpānām bahiḥ antaḥ śarīriṣu
tathāpi pṛcchataḥ brūyām brahman ātmani cintitam bhavataḥ viduṣaḥ ca api coditaḥ tvat anujñayā
loka-pālaiḥ api prārthyāḥ sāmrājya aiśvarya sampadaḥ na nandayanti aprajam mām kṣut tṛṭ kāmam iva apare
tataḥ pāhi mahā-bhāga pūrvaiḥ saha gatam tamaḥ yathā tarema duṣpāram prajayā tat vidhehi naḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti arthitaḥ saḥ bhagavān kṛpāluḥ brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ śrapayitvā carum tvāṣṭram tvaṣṭāram ayajat vibhuḥ
jyeṣṭhā śreṣṭhā ca yā rājñaḥ mahiṣīṇām ca bhārata nāmnā kṛtadyutiḥ tasyai yajña ucchiṣṭam adāt dvijaḥ
atha āha nṛpatim rājan bhavitā ekaḥ tava ātmajaḥ harṣa-śoka pradaḥ tubhyam iti brahma-sutaḥ yayau
sā api tat-prāśanāt eva citraketoḥ adhārayat garbham kṛtadyutiḥ devī kṛttikā agneḥ iva ātma-jam
tasyāḥ anudinam garbhaḥ śukla-pakṣe iva uḍupaḥ vavṛdhe śūrasena-īśa tejasā śanakaiḥ nṛpa
atha kāle upāvṛtte kumāraḥ samajāyata janayan śūrasenānām śṛṇvatām paramām mudam
hṛṣṭaḥ rājā kumārasya snātaḥ śuciḥ alaṅkṛtaḥ vācayitvā āśiṣaḥ vipraiḥ kārayām āsa jātakam
tebhyaḥ hiraṇyam rajatam vāsāṁsi ābharaṇāni ca grāmān hayān gajān prādāt dhenūnām arbudāni ṣaṭ
vavarṣa kāmān anyeṣām parjanyaḥ iva dehinām dhanyam yaśasyam āyuṣyam kumārasya mahā-manāḥ
kṛcchra labdhe atha rāja-ṛṣeḥ tanaye anudinam pituḥ yathā niḥsvasya kṛcchra-āpte dhane snehaḥ anvavardhata
mātuḥ tu atitarām putre snehaḥ moha samudbhavaḥ kṛtadyuteḥ sapatnīnām prajā-kāma jvaraḥ abhavat
citraketoḥ atiprītiḥ yathā dāre prajā-vati na tathā anyeṣu sañjajñe bālam lālayataḥ anvaham
tāḥ paryatapyan ātmānam garhayantyaḥ abhyasūyayā ānapatyena duḥkhena rājñaḥ ca anādareṇa ca
dhik aprajām striyam pāpām patyuḥ ca a-gṛha-sammatām su-prajābhiḥ sapatnībhiḥ dāsīm iva tiraskṛtām
dāsīnām kaḥ nu santāpaḥ svāminaḥ paricaryayā abhīkṣṇam labdha-mānānām dāsyāḥ dāsī iva durbhagāḥ
evam sandahyamānānām sapatnyāḥ putra-sampadā rājñaḥ asammata-vṛttīnām vidveṣaḥ balavān abhūt
vidveṣa-naṣṭa-matayaḥ striyaḥ dāruṇa-cetasaḥ garam daduḥ kumārāya durmarṣāḥ nṛpatim prati
kṛtadyutiḥ ajānantī sapatnīnām agham mahat suptaḥ eva iti sañcintya nirīkṣya vyacarat gṛhe
śayānam su-ciram bālam upadhārya manīṣiṇī putram ānaya me bhadre iti dhātrīm acodayat
sā śayānam upavrajya dṛṣṭvā ca uttāra-locanam prāṇa-indriya-ātmabhiḥ tyaktam hatā asmi iti apatat bhuvi
tasyāḥ tadā ākarṇya bhṛśa-āturam svaram ghnantyāḥ karābhyām uraḥ uccakaiḥ api praviśya rājñī tvarayā ātmaja-antikam dadarśa bālam sahasā mṛtam sutam
papāta bhūmau parivṛddhayā śucā mumoha vibhraṣṭa śiroruha ambarā
tataḥ nṛpa antaḥpura-vartinaḥ janāḥ narāḥ ca nāryaḥ ca niśamya rodanam āgatya tulya-vyasanāḥ su-duḥkhitāḥ tāḥ ca vyalīkam ruruduḥ kṛta-āgasaḥ
śrutvā mṛtam putram alakṣita-antakam vinaṣṭa-dṛṣṭiḥ prapatan skhalan pathi sneha-anubandha edhitayā śucā bhṛśam vimūrcchitaḥ anuprakṛtiḥ dvijaiḥ vṛtaḥ papāta bālasya saḥ pāda-mūle mṛtasya visrasta śiroruha ambaraḥ dīrgham śvasan bāṣpa-kalā-uparodhataḥ niruddha-kaṇṭhaḥ na śaśāka bhāṣitum
patim nirīkṣya uru śuca arpitam tadā mṛtam ca bālam sutam eka-santatim janasya rājñī prakṛteḥ ca hṛt-rujam satī dadhānā vilalāpa citradhā
stana-dvayam kuṅkuma paṅka maṇḍitam niṣiñcatī sa-añjana bāṣpa bindubhiḥ vikīrya keśān vigalat srajaḥ sutam śuśoca citram kurarī iva su-svaram
aho vidhātaḥ tvam atīva bāliśaḥ yaḥ tu ātma-sṛṣṭi apratirūpam īhase pare nu jīvati aparasya yā mṛtiḥ viparyayaḥ cet tvam asi dhruvaḥ paraḥ
na hi kramaḥ cet iha mṛtyu janmanoḥ śarīriṇām astu tat ātma-karmabhiḥ yaḥ sneha-pāśaḥ nija-sarga vṛddhaye svayam kṛtaḥ te tam imam vivṛścasi
tvam tāta na arhasi ca mām kṛpaṇām anāthām tyaktum vicakṣva pitaram tava śoka-taptam añjaḥ tarema bhavatā apraja-dustaram yat dhvāntam na yāhi akaruṇena yamena dūram
uttiṣṭha tāta te ime śiśavaḥ vayasyāḥ tvām āhvayanti nṛpa-nandana saṁvihartum suptaḥ ciram hi aśanayā ca bhavān parītaḥ bhuṅkṣva stanam piba śucaḥ hara naḥ svakānām
na aham tanū-ja dadṛśe hata-maṅgalā te mugdha-smitam mudita-vīkṣaṇam ānana-abjam kiṁ vā gataḥ asi a-punaḥ-anvayam anya-lokam nītaḥ aghṛṇena na śṛṇomi kalāḥ giraḥ te
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca vilapantyā mṛtam putram iti citra-vilāpanaiḥ citraketuḥ bhṛśam taptaḥ mukta-kaṇṭhaḥ ruroda ha

śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ūcatuḥ mṛtaka upānte patitam mṛtaka-upamam śoka-abhibhūtam rājānam bodhayantau sat-uktibhiḥ
kaḥ ayam syāt tava rāja-indra bhavān yam anuśocati tvam ca asya katamaḥ sṛṣṭau purā idānīm ataḥ param

yathā dhānāsu vai dhānāḥ bhavanti na bhavanti ca evam bhūtāni bhūteṣu coditāni īśa-māyayā

śrī-rājā uvāca kau yuvām jñāna-sampannau mahiṣṭhau ca mahīyasām avadhūtena veṣeṇa gūḍhau iha samāgatau
caranti hi avanau kāmam brāhmaṇāḥ bhagavat-priyāḥ mā-dṛśām grāmya-buddhīnām bodhāya unmatta-liṅginaḥ
kumāraḥ nāradaḥ ṛbhuḥ aṅgirāḥ devalaḥ asitaḥ apāntaratamāḥ vyāsaḥ mārkaṇḍeyaḥ atha gautamaḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ bhagavān rāmaḥ kapilaḥ bādarāyaṇiḥ durvāsāḥ yājñavalkyaḥ ca jātukarṇaḥ tathā aruṇiḥ romaśaḥ cyavanaḥ dattaḥ āsuriḥ sa-patañjaliḥ ṛṣiḥ veda-śirāḥ dhaumyaḥ muniḥ pañcaśikhaḥ tathā hiraṇyanābhaḥ kauśalyaḥ śrutadevaḥ ṛtadhvajaḥ ete pare ca siddha-īśāḥ caranti jñāna-hetavaḥ
tasmāt yuvām grāmya-paśoḥ mama mūḍha-dhiyaḥ prabhū andhe tamasi magnasya jñāna-dīpaḥ udīryatām
śrī-aṅgirāḥ uvāca aham te putra-kāmasya putra-daḥ asmi aṅgirāḥ nṛpa eṣaḥ brahma-sutaḥ sākṣāt nāradaḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
ittham tvām putra-śokena magnam tamasi dustare a-tat-arham anusmṛtya mahā-puruṣa gocaram anugrahāya bhavataḥ prāptau āvām iha prabho brahmaṇyaḥ bhagavat-bhaktaḥ na avāsāditum arhasi
tadā eva te param jñānam dadāmi gṛham āgataḥ jñātvā anya-abhiniveśam te putram eva dadāmi aham

dṛśyamānāḥ vinā arthena na dṛśyante manobhavāḥ karmabhiḥ dhyāyataḥ nānā karmāṇi manasaḥ abhavan
ayam hi dehinaḥ dehaḥ dravya-jñāna-kriyā-ātmakaḥ dehinaḥ vividha kleśa santāpa kṛt udāhṛtaḥ

yat-pāda-mūlam upasṛtya nara-indra pūrve śarva-ādayaḥ bhramam imam dvitayam visṛjya sadyaḥ tadīyam atula anadhikam mahitvam prāpuḥ bhavān api param na cirāt upaiti
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca atha deva-ṛṣiḥ rājan samparetam nṛpa-ātmajam darśayitvā iti ha uvāca jñātīnām anuśocatām

kalevaram svam āviśya śeṣam āyuḥ suhṛt-vṛtaḥ bhuṅkṣva bhogān pitṛ prattān adhitiṣṭha nṛpa-āsanam
jīvaḥ uvāca kasmin janmani amī mahyam pitaraḥ mātaraḥ abhavan karmabhiḥ bhrāmyamāṇasya deva-tiryak nṛ yoniṣu
bandhu jñāti ari madhyastha mitra udāsīna vidviṣaḥ sarve eva hi sarveṣām bhavanti kramaśaḥ mithaḥ
yathā vastūni paṇyāni hema-ādīni tataḥ tataḥ paryaṭanti nareṣu evam jīvaḥ yoniṣu kartṛṣu

eṣaḥ nityaḥ avyayaḥ sūkṣmaḥ eṣaḥ sarva-āśrayaḥ sva-dṛk ātma-māyā-guṇaiḥ viśvam ātmānam sṛjate prabhuḥ
na hi asya asti priyaḥ kaścit na apriyaḥ svaḥ paraḥ api vā ekaḥ sarva-dhiyām draṣṭā kartṝṇām guṇa-doṣayoḥ
na ādatte ātmā hi guṇam na doṣam na kriyā-phalam udāsīna-vat āsīnaḥ para-avara-dṛk īśvaraḥ
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca iti udīrya gataḥ jīvaḥ jñātayaḥ tasya te tadā vismitāḥ mumucuḥ śokam chittvā ātma-sneha śṛṅkhalām
nirhṛtya jñātayaḥ jñāteḥ deham kṛtvā ucitāḥ kriyāḥ tatyajuḥ dustyajam sneham śoka moha bhaya arti dam

saḥ ittham pratibuddha-ātmā citraketuḥ dvija-uktibhiḥ gṛha-andha-kūpāt niṣkrāntaḥ saraḥ paṅkāt iva dvipaḥ

atha tasmai prapannāya bhaktāya prayata-ātmane bhagavān nāradaḥ prītaḥ vidyām etām uvāca ha
om namaḥ tubhyam bhagavate vāsudevāya dhīmahi pradyumnāya aniruddhāya namaḥ saṅkarṣaṇāya ca namaḥ vijñāna-mātrāya parama-ānanda-mūrtaye ātma-ārāmāya śāntāya nivṛtta-dvaita-dṛṣṭaye
ātma-ānanda anubhūtyā eva nyasta śakti-ūrmaye namaḥ hṛṣīkeśāya mahate namaḥ te ananta mūrtaye
vacasi uparate aprāpya yaḥ ekaḥ manasā saha anāma rūpaḥ cit-mātraḥ saḥ avyāt naḥ sat-asat-paraḥ
yasmin idam yataḥ ca idam tiṣṭhati apyeti jāyate mṛt-mayeṣu iva mṛt-jātiḥ tasmai te brahmaṇe namaḥ

citraketuḥ tu tām vidyām yathā nārada-bhāṣitām dhārayām āsa sapta-aham ap-bhakṣaḥ su-samāhitaḥ

viṣama your belief, my belief) matiḥ na yatra nṛṇām tvam aham iti mama tava iti ca yat anyatra viṣama-dhiyā racitaḥ yaḥ saḥ hi aviśuddhaḥ kṣayiṣṇuḥ adharma-bahulaḥ
kaḥ kṣemaḥ nija parayoḥ kiyān vā arthaḥ sva-para-druhā dharmeṇa sva-drohāt tava kopaḥ para-sampīḍayā ca tathā adharmaḥ

saḥ lakṣam varṣa lakṣāṇām avyāhata bala-indriyaḥ stūyamānaḥ mahā-yogī munibhiḥ siddha-cāraṇaiḥ kulācalendra-droṇīṣu nānā-saṅkalpa-siddhiṣu reme vidyādhara-strībhiḥ gāpayan harim īśvaram

śrī-pārvatī uvāca ayam kim adhunā loke śāstā daṇḍa-dharaḥ prabhuḥ asmat-vidhānām duṣṭānām nirlajjānām ca viprakṛt
na veda dharmam kila padma-yoniḥ na brahma-putrāḥ bhṛgu nārada ādyāḥ na vai kumāraḥ kapilaḥ manuḥ ca ye no niṣedhanti ati-vartinam haram
eṣām anudhyeya pada-abja-yugmam jagat-gurum maṅgala-maṅgalam svayam yaḥ kṣatra-bandhuḥ paribhūya sūrīn praśāsti dhṛṣṭaḥ tat ayam hi daṇḍyaḥ
na ayam arhati vaikuṇṭha-pāda-mūla-upasarpaṇam sambhāvita-matiḥ stabdhaḥ sādhubhiḥ paryupāsitam
ataḥ pāpīyasīm yonim āsurīm yāhi durmate yathā iha bhūyaḥ mahatām na kartā putra kilbiṣam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam śaptaḥ citraketuḥ vimānāt avaruhya saḥ prasādayām āsa satīm mūrdhnā namreṇa bhārata
citraketuḥ uvāca pratigṛhṇāmi te śāpam ātmanaḥ añjalinā ambike devaiḥ martyāya yat proktam pūrva-diṣṭam hi tasya tat
saṁsāra-cakre etasmin jantuḥ ajñāna-mohitaḥ bhrāmyan sukham ca duḥkham ca bhuṅkte sarvatra sarvadā
na eva ātmā na paraḥ ca api kartā syāt sukha-duḥkhayoḥ kartāram manyate atra ajñaḥ ātmānam param eva ca
guṇa-pravāhe etasmin kaḥ śāpaḥ kaḥ nu anugrahaḥ kaḥ svargaḥ narakaḥ kaḥ vā kim sukham duḥkham eva vā
ekaḥ sṛjati bhūtāni bhagavān ātma-māyayā eṣām bandham ca mokṣam ca sukham duḥkham ca niṣkalaḥ
na tasya kaścit dayitaḥ pratīpaḥ na jñāti bandhuḥ na paraḥ na ca svaḥ samasya sarvatra nirañjanasya sukhe na rāgaḥ kutaḥ eva roṣaḥ
tathāpi tat-śakti visargaḥ eṣām sukhāya duḥkhāya hita-ahitāya bandhāya mokṣāya ca mṛtyu janmanoḥ śarīriṇām saṁsṛtaye avakalpate
atha prasādaye na tvām śāpa-mokṣāya bhāmini yat manyase hi asādhu-uktam mama tat kṣamyatām sati
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti prasādya giriśau citraketuḥ arim-dama jagāma sva-vimānena paśyatoḥ smayatoḥ tayoḥ
tataḥ tu bhagavān rudraḥ rudrāṇīm idam abravīt devarṣi daitya siddhānām pārṣadānām ca śṛṇvatām
śrī-rudraḥ uvāca dṛṣṭavatī asi su-śroṇi hareḥ adbhuta-karmaṇaḥ māhātmyam bhṛtya-bhṛtyānām niḥspṛhāṇām mahātmanām
nārāyaṇa-parāḥ sarve na kutaścana bibhyati svarga apavarga narakeṣu api tulya artha darśinaḥ
dehinām deha-saṁyogāt dvandvāni īśvara-līlayā sukham duḥkham mṛtiḥ janma śāpaḥ anugrahaḥ eva ca
aviveka-kṛtaḥ puṁsaḥ hi artha-bhedaḥ iva ātmani guṇa-doṣa vikalpaḥ ca bhit eva sraji vat kṛtaḥ
vāsudeve bhagavati bhaktim udvahatām nṛṇām jñāna-vairāgya vīryāṇām na hi kaścit vyapāśrayaḥ
na aham viriñcaḥ na kumāra nāradau na brahma-putrāḥ munayaḥ sura-īśāḥ vidāma yasya īhitam aṁśaka-aṁśakāḥ na tat sva-rūpam pṛthak īśa māninaḥ
na hi asya asti priyaḥ kaścit na apriyaḥ svaḥ paraḥ api vā ātmatvāt sarva-bhūtānām sarva-bhūta priyaḥ hariḥ
tasya ca ayam mahā-bhāgaḥ citraketuḥ priyaḥ anugaḥ sarvatra sama-dṛk śāntaḥ hi aham ca eva acyuta-priyaḥ tasmāt na vismayaḥ kāryaḥ puruṣeṣu mahā-ātmasu mahā-puruṣa-bhakteṣu śānteṣu sama-darśiṣu
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti śrutvā bhagavataḥ śivasya umā abhibhāṣitam babhūva śānta-dhīḥ rājan devī vigata-vismayā
iti bhāgavataḥ devyāḥ pratiśaptum alantamaḥ mūrdhnā saḥ jagṛhe śāpam etāvat sādhu-lakṣaṇam
jajñe tvaṣṭuḥ dakṣiṇa-agnau dānavīm yonim āśritaḥ vṛtraḥ iti abhivikhyātaḥ jñāna-vijñāna-saṁyutaḥ
etat te sarvam ākhyātam yat mām tvam paripṛcchasi vṛtrasya asura-jāteḥ ca kāraṇam bhagavat-mateḥ
itihāsam imam puṇyam citraketoḥ mahā-ātmanaḥ māhātmyam viṣṇu-bhaktānām śrutvā bandhāt vimucyate
yaḥ etat prātaḥ utthāya śraddhayā vāk-yataḥ paṭhet itihāsam harim smṛtvā saḥ yāti paramām gatim
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca pṛśniḥ tu patnī savituḥ sāvitrīm vyāhṛtim trayīm agnihotram paśum somam cāturmāsyam mahā-makhān
siddhiḥ bhagasya bhāryā aṅga mahimānam vibhum prabhum āśiṣam ca varārohām kanyām prāsūta su-vratām
dhātuḥ kuhūḥ sinīvālī rākā ca anumatiḥ tathā sāyam darśam atha prātaḥ pūrṇamāsam anukramāt agnīn purīṣyān ādhatta kriyāyām samanantaraḥ carṣaṇī varuṇasya āsīt yasyām jātaḥ bhṛguḥ punaḥ
vālmīkiḥ ca mahā-yogī valmīkāt abhavat kila agastyaḥ ca vasiṣṭhaḥ ca mitrā-varuṇayoḥ ṛṣī
retaḥ siṣicatuḥ kumbhe urvaśyāḥ sannidhau drutam revatyām mitraḥ utsargam ariṣṭam pippalam vyadhāt
paulomyām indraḥ ādhatta trīn putrān iti naḥ śrutam jayantam ṛṣabham tāta tṛtīyam mīḍhuṣam prabhuḥ
urukramasya devasya māyā vāmana-rūpiṇaḥ kīrtau patnyām bṛhacchlokaḥ tasya āsan saubhaga-ādayaḥ
tat karma guṇa vīryāṇi kāśyapasya mahā-ātmanaḥ paścāt vakṣyāmahe adityām yathā eva avatatāra ha
atha kaśyapa-dāyādān daiteyān kīrtayāmi te yatra bhāgavataḥ śrī-mān prahrādaḥ baliḥ eva ca
diteḥ dvau eva dāyādau daitya-dānava vanditau hiraṇyakaśipuḥ nāma hiraṇyākṣaḥ ca kīrtitau
hiraṇyakaśipoḥ bhāryā kayādhuḥ nāma dānavī jambhasya tanayā sā tu suṣuve caturaḥ sutān saṁhrādam prāk anuhrādam hrādam prahrādam eva ca tat-svasā siṁhikā nāma rāhum vipracitaḥ agrahīt
śiraḥ aharat yasya hariḥ cakreṇa pibataḥ amṛtam saṁhrādasya kṛtiḥ bhāryā asūta pañcajanam tataḥ
hrādasya dhamaniḥ bhāryā asūta vātāpim ilvalam yaḥ agastyāya tu atithaye pece vātāpim ilvalaḥ
anuhrādasya sūryāyām bāṣkalaḥ mahiṣaḥ tathā virocanaḥ tu prāhrādiḥ devyām tasya abhavat baliḥ
bāṇa-jyeṣṭham putra-śatam aśanāyām tataḥ abhavat tasya anubhāvam su-ślokyam paścāt eva abhidhāsyate
bāṇaḥ ārādhya giriśam lebhe tat gaṇa-mukhyatām yat-pārśve bhagavān āste hi adya api pura-pālakaḥ
marutaḥ ca diteḥ putrāḥ catvāriṁśat nava-adhikāḥ te āsan aprajāḥ sarve nītāḥ indreṇa sa-ātmatām
śrī-rājā uvāca katham te āsuram bhāvam apohya autpattikam guro indreṇa prāpitāḥ sa-ātmyam kim tat sādhu kṛtam hi taiḥ
ime śraddadhate brahman ṛṣayaḥ hi mayā saha parijñānāya bhagavan tat naḥ vyākhyātum arhasi
śrī-sūtaḥ uvāca tat viṣṇurātasya saḥ bādarāyaṇiḥ vacaḥ niśamya ādṛtam alpam artha-vat sabhājayan san nibhṛtena cetasā jagāda satrāyaṇa sarva-darśanaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca hata-putrā ditiḥ śakra-pārṣṇi-grāheṇa viṣṇunā manyunā śoka-dīptena jvalantī paryacintayat
kadā nu bhrātṛ-hantāram indriya-ārāmam ulbaṇam aklinna-hṛdayam pāpam ghātayitvā śaye sukham
kṛmi viṭ bhasma saṁjñā āsīt yasya īśa-abhihitasya ca bhūta-dhruk tat-kṛte sva-artham kim veda nirayaḥ yataḥ
āśāsānasya tasya idam dhruvam unnaddha-cetasaḥ mada-śoṣakaḥ indrasya bhūyāt yena sutaḥ hi me
iti bhāvena sā bhartuḥ ācacāra asakṛt priyam śuśrūṣayā anurāgeṇa praśrayeṇa damena ca bhaktyā paramayā rājan manojñaiḥ valgu-bhāṣitaiḥ manaḥ jagrāha bhāva-jñā sa-smita apāṅga-vīkṣaṇaiḥ
evam striyā jaḍībhūtaḥ vidvān api manojñayā bāḍham iti āha vivaśaḥ na tat citram hi yoṣiti
vilokya ekānta-bhūtāni bhūtāni ādau prajāpatiḥ striyam cakre sva-deha ardham yayā puṁsām matiḥ hṛtā
evam śuśrūṣitaḥ tāta bhagavān kaśyapaḥ striyā prahasya parama-prītaḥ ditim āha abhinandya ca
śrī-kaśyapaḥ uvāca varam varaya vāmoru prītaḥ te aham anindite striyāḥ bhartari su-prīte kaḥ kāmaḥ iha ca agamaḥ
patiḥ eva hi nārīṇām daivatam paramam smṛtam mānasaḥ sarva-bhūtānām vāsudevaḥ śriyaḥ patiḥ saḥ eva devatā-liṅgaiḥ nāma rūpa vikalpitaiḥ ijyate bhagavān pumbhiḥ strībhiḥ ca pati-rūpa-dhṛk
tasmāt pati-vratāḥ nāryaḥ śreyaḥ-kāmāḥ su-madhyame yajante ananya-bhāvena patim ātmānam īśvaram
saḥ aham tvayā arcitaḥ bhadre īdṛk-bhāvena bhaktitaḥ tam te sampādaye kāmam asatīnām su-durlabham
ditiḥ uvāca vara-daḥ yadi me brahman putram indra-haṇam vṛṇe amṛtyum mṛta-putrā aham yena me ghātitau sutau
niśamya tat-vacaḥ vipraḥ vimanāḥ paryatapyata aho adharmaḥ su-mahān adya me samupasthitaḥ
aho artha-indriya-ārāmaḥ yoṣit-mayyā iha māyayā gṛhīta-cetāḥ kṛpaṇaḥ patiṣye narake dhruvam
kaḥ atikramaḥ anuvartantyāḥ sva-bhāvam iha yoṣitaḥ dhik mām bata abudham sva-arthe yat aham tu ajita-indriyaḥ
śarat padma utsavam vaktram vacaḥ ca śravaṇa amṛtam hṛdayam kṣura-dhārā ābham strīṇām kaḥ veda ceṣṭitam
na hi kaścit priyaḥ strīṇām añjasā sva-āśiṣā ātmanām patim putram bhrātaram vā ghnanti arthe ghātayanti ca
pratiśrutam dadāmi iti vacaḥ tat na mṛṣā bhavet vadham na arhati ca indraḥ api tatra idam upakalpate
iti sañcintya bhagavān mārīcaḥ kuru-nandana uvāca kiñcit kupitaḥ ātmānam ca vigarhayan
śrī-kaśyapaḥ uvāca putraḥ te bhavitā bhadre indra-hā adeva-bāndhavaḥ saṁvatsaram vratam idam yadi añjaḥ dhārayiṣyasi
ditiḥ uvāca dhārayiṣye vratam brahman brūhi kāryāṇi yāni me yāni ca iha niṣiddhāni na vratam ghnanti yāni uta
śrī-kaśyapaḥ uvāca na hiṁsyāt bhūta-jātāni na śapet na anṛtam vadet na chindyāt nakha-romāṇi na spṛśet yat amaṅgalam
na apsu snāyāt na kupyeta na sambhāṣeta durjanaiḥ na vasīta adhauta-vāsaḥ srajam ca vidhṛtām kvacit
na ucchiṣṭam caṇḍikā-annam ca sa-āmiṣam vṛṣala-āhṛtam bhuñjīta udakyayā dṛṣṭam pibet na añjalinā tu apaḥ
na ucchiṣṭā aspṛṣṭa-salilā sandhyāyām mukta-mūrdhajā anarcitā asaṁyata-vāk na asaṁvītā bahiḥ caret
na adhauta-pādā aprayatā na ardra-pādā udak-śirāḥ śayīta na aparāk na anyaiḥ na nagnā na ca sandhyayoḥ
dhauta-vāsā śuciḥ nityam sarva-maṅgala saṁyutā pūjayet prātaḥ-āśāt prāk go-viprān śriyam acyutam
striyaḥ vīra-vatīḥ ca arcet srak gandha bali maṇḍanaiḥ patim ca ārcya upatiṣṭheta dhyāyet koṣṭha-gatam ca tam
sāṁvatsaram puṁsavanam vratam etat aviplutam dhārayiṣyasi cet tubhyam śakra-hā bhavitā sutaḥ
bāḍham iti abhyupetya atha ditiḥ rājan mahā-manāḥ kaśyapāt garbham ādhatta vratam ca añjaḥ dadhāra sā
mātṛ-svasuḥ abhiprāyam indraḥ ājñāya māna-da śuśrūṣaṇena āśrama-sthām ditim paryacarat kaviḥ
nityam vanāt sumanasaḥ phala mūla samit kuśān patra aṅkura mṛdaḥ apaḥ ca kāle kāle upāharat
evam tasyāḥ vrata-sthāyāḥ vrata-chidram hariḥ nṛpa prepsuḥ paryacarat jihmaḥ mṛga-hā iva mṛga-ākṛtiḥ
na adhyagacchat vrata-chidram tat-paraḥ atha mahī-pate cintām tīvrām gataḥ śakraḥ kena me syāt śivam tu iha
ekadā sā tu sandhyāyām ucchiṣṭā vrata karśitā aspṛṣṭa vāri adhauta aṅghriḥ suṣvāpa vidhi mohitā
labdhvā tat-antaram śakraḥ nidrā apahṛta-cetasaḥ diteḥ praviṣṭaḥ udaram yoga-īśaḥ yoga māyayā
cakarta sapta-dhā garbham vajreṇa kanaka prabham rudantam sapta-dhā eka-ekam mā rodīḥ iti tān punaḥ
tam ūcuḥ pāṭyamānāḥ te sarve prāñjalayaḥ nṛpa kim naḥ indra jighāṁsasi bhrātaraḥ marutaḥ tava
mā bhaiṣṭa bhrātaraḥ mahyam yūyam iti āha kauśikaḥ ananya-bhāvān pārṣadān ātmanaḥ marutām gaṇān
na mamāra diteḥ garbhaḥ śrīnivāsa anukampayā bahu-dhā kuliśa kṣuṇṇaḥ drauṇi astreṇa yathā bhavān
sakṛt iṣṭvā ādi-puruṣam puruṣaḥ yāti sāmyatām saṁvatsaram kiñcit ūnam dityā yat hariḥ arcitaḥ sajūḥ indreṇa pañcāśat devāḥ te marutaḥ abhavan vyapohya mātṛ-doṣam te hariṇā soma-pāḥ kṛtāḥ
ditiḥ utthāya dadṛśe kumārān anala-prabhān indreṇa sahitān devī paryatuṣyat aninditā
atha indram āha tāta aham ādityānām bhaya-āvaham apatyam icchantī acaram vratam etat su-duṣkaram
ekaḥ saṅkalpitaḥ putraḥ sapta sapta abhavan katham yadi te viditam putra satyam kathaya mā mṛṣā
indraḥ uvāca amba te aham vyavasitam upadhārya āgataḥ antikam labdha antaraḥ acchidam garbham artha-buddhiḥ na dharma-dṛk
kṛttaḥ me sapta-dhā garbhaḥ āsan sapta kumārakāḥ te api ca eka-ekaśaḥ vṛkṇāḥ sapta-dhā na api mamrire
tataḥ tat parama-āścaryam vīkṣya vyavasitam mayā mahā-puruṣa pūjāyāḥ siddhiḥ kāpi ānuṣaṅgiṇī
ārādhanam bhagavataḥ īhamānāḥ nirāśiṣaḥ ye tu na icchanti api param te sva-artha kuśalāḥ smṛtāḥ
ārādhya ātma-pradam devam sva-ātmānam jagat-īśvaram kaḥ vṛṇīta guṇa-sparśam budhaḥ syāt narake api yat
tat idam mama daurjanyam bāliśasya mahīyasi kṣantum arhasi mātaḥ tvam diṣṭyā garbhaḥ mṛta utthitaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca indraḥ tayā abhyanujñātaḥ śuddha-bhāvena tuṣṭayā marudbhiḥ saha tām natvā jagāma tri-divam prabhuḥ
evam te sarvam ākhyātam yat mām tvam paripṛcchasi maṅgalam marutām janma kim bhūyaḥ kathayāmi te
śrī-rājā uvāca vratam puṁsavanam brahman bhavatā yat udīritam tasya veditum icchāmi yena viṣṇuḥ prasīdati
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca śukle mārgaśire pakṣe yoṣit bhartuḥ anujñayā ārabheta vratam idam sārva-kāmikam āditaḥ niśamya marutām janma brāhmaṇān anumantrya ca snātvā śukla-datī śukle vasīta alaṅkṛtā ambare pūjayet prātaḥ-āśāt prāk bhagavantam śriyā saha
alam te nirapekṣāya pūrṇa-kāma namaḥ astu te mahā-vibhūti pataye namaḥ sakala-siddhaye
yathā tvam kṛpayā bhūtyā tejasā mahima-ojasā juṣṭaḥ īśa guṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ tataḥ asi bhagavān prabhuḥ
viṣṇu-patni mahā-māye mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇe prīyethāḥ me mahā-bhāge loka-mātaḥ namaḥ astu te
om namaḥ bhagavate mahā-puruṣāya mahā-anubhāvāya mahā-vibhūti pataye saha mahā-vibhūtibhiḥ balim upaharāmi iti anena ahaḥ-ahaḥ mantreṇa viṣṇoḥ āvāhana arghya-pādya-upasparśana snāna vāsa upavīta vibhūṣaṇa gandha puṣpa dhūpa dīpa upahāra ādi upacārān su-samāhitā upāharet
haviḥ-śeṣam ca juhuyāt anale dvādaśa āhutīḥ om namaḥ bhagavate mahā-puruṣāya mahā-vibhūti pataye svāhā iti
śriyam viṣṇum ca vara-dau āśiṣām prabhavau ubhau bhaktyā sampūjayet nityam yadi icchet sarva sampadaḥ
praṇamet daṇḍa-vat bhūmau bhakti prahveṇa cetasā daśa-vāram japet mantram tataḥ stotram udīrayet
yuvām tu viśvasya vibhū jagataḥ kāraṇam param iyam hi prakṛtiḥ sūkṣmā māyā-śaktiḥ duratyayā
tasyāḥ adhīśvaraḥ sākṣāt tvam eva puruṣaḥ paraḥ tvam sarva-yajñaḥ ijyā iyam kriyā iyam phala-bhuk bhavān
guṇa-vyaktiḥ iyam devī vyañjakaḥ guṇa-bhuk bhavān tvam hi sarva-śarīrī ātmā śrīḥ śarīra indriya āśayāḥ nāma rūpe bhagavatī pratyayaḥ tvam apāśrayaḥ
yathā yuvām tri-lokasya vara-dau parame-ṣṭhinau tathā me uttama-śloka santu satyāḥ mahā-āśiṣaḥ
iti abhiṣṭūya vara-dam śrī-nivāsam śriyā saha tat niḥsārya upaharaṇam dattvā ācamanam arcayet
tataḥ stuvīta stotreṇa bhakti prahveṇa cetasā yajña-ucchiṣṭam avaghrāya punaḥ abhyarcayet harim
patim ca parayā bhaktyā mahā-puruṣa-cetasā priyaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ upanamet prema-śīlaḥ svayam patiḥ bibhṛyāt sarva-karmāṇi patnyāḥ ucca-avacāni ca
kṛtam ekatareṇa api dam-patyoḥ ubhayoḥ api patnyām kuryāt anarhāyām patiḥ etat samāhitaḥ
viṣṇoḥ vratam idam bibhrat na vihanyāt kathañcana viprān striyaḥ vīra-vatīḥ srak gandha bali maṇḍanaiḥ arcet ahaḥ-ahaḥ bhaktyā devam niyamam āsthitā udvāsya devam sve dhāmni tat niveditam agrataḥ adyāt ātma-viśuddhi-artham sarva-kāma samṛddhaye
etena pūjā-vidhinā māsān dvādaśa hāyanam nītvā atha uparamet sādhvī kārtike carame ahani
śvaḥ-bhūte apaḥ upaspṛśya kṛṣṇam abhyarcya pūrva-vat payaḥ-śṛtena juhuyāt caruṇā saha sarpiṣā pāka-yajña-vidhānena dvādaśa eva āhutīḥ patiḥ
āśiṣaḥ śirasā ādāya dvijaiḥ prītaiḥ samīritāḥ praṇamya śirasā bhaktyā bhuñjīta tat-anujñayā
ācāryam agrataḥ kṛtvā vāk-yataḥ saha bandhubhiḥ dadyāt patnyai caroḥ śeṣam su-prajāstvam su-saubhagam
etat caritvā vidhi-vat vratam vibhoḥ abhīpsita artham labhate pumān iha strī ca etat āsthāya labheta saubhagam śriyam prajām jīva-patim yaśaḥ gṛham
kanyā ca vindeta samagralakṣaṇam patim tu avīrā hata-kilbiṣām gatim mṛta-prajā jīva-sutā dhana-īśvarī su-durbhagā su-bhagā rūpam agryam vindet virūpā virujā vimucyate yaḥ āmayā-vī indriya-kalya-deham etat paṭhan abhyudaye ca karmaṇi ananta tṛptiḥ pitṛ-devatānām tuṣṭāḥ prayacchanti samasta kāmān homa-avasāne huta-bhuk śrī-hariḥ ca rājan mahat marutām janma puṇyam diteḥ vratam ca abhihitam mahat te
śrī-rājā uvāca samaḥ priyaḥ suhṛt brahman bhūtānām bhagavān svayam indrasya arthe katham daityān avadhīt viṣamaḥ yathā
na hi asya arthaḥ sura-gaṇaiḥ sākṣāt niḥśreyasa ātmanaḥ na eva asurebhyaḥ vidveṣaḥ na udvegaḥ ca aguṇasya hi
iti naḥ su-mahā-bhāga nārāyaṇa-guṇān prati saṁśayaḥ su-mahān jātaḥ tat bhavān chettum arhati
śrī-ṛṣiḥ uvāca sādhu pṛṣṭam mahā-rāja hareḥ caritam adbhutam yat bhāgavata māhātmyam bhagavat-bhakti vardhanam gīyate paramam puṇyam ṛṣibhiḥ nārada-ādibhiḥ natvā kṛṣṇāya munaye kathayiṣye hareḥ kathām
nirguṇaḥ api hi ajaḥ avyaktaḥ bhagavān prakṛteḥ paraḥ sva-māyā guṇam āviśya bādhya bādhakatām gataḥ
sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti prakṛteḥ na ātmanaḥ guṇāḥ na teṣām yugapat rājan hrāsaḥ ullāsaḥ eva vā
jaya-kāle tu sattvasya deva ṛṣīn rajasaḥ asurān tamasaḥ yakṣa-rakṣāṁsi tat-kāla-anuguṇaḥ abhajat
jyotiḥ ādiḥ iva ābhāti saṅghātāt na vivicyate vidanti ātmānam ātma-stham mathitvā kavayaḥ antataḥ
yadā sisṛkṣuḥ puraḥ ātmanaḥ paraḥ rajaḥ sṛjati eṣaḥ pṛthak sva-māyayā sattvam vicitrāsu riraṁsuḥ īśvaraḥ śayiṣyamāṇaḥ tamaḥ īrayati asau
kālam carantam sṛjati īśaḥ āśrayam pradhāna pumbhyām nara-deva satya kṛt
yaḥ eṣaḥ rājan api kālaḥ īśitā sattvam sura-anīkam iva edhayati ataḥ tat-pratyanīkān asurān sura-priyaḥ rajaḥ-tamaskān pramiṇoti uru-śravāḥ
atra eva udāhṛtaḥ pūrvam itihāsaḥ sura-ṛṣiṇā prītyā mahā-kratau rājan pṛcchate ajāta-śatrave
dṛṣṭvā mahā-adbhutam rājā rājasūye mahā-kratau vāsudeve bhagavati sāyujyam cedibhū-bhujaḥ tatra āsīnam sura-ṛṣim rājā pāṇḍu-sutaḥ kratau papraccha vismita-manāḥ munīnām śṛṇvatām idam
śrī-yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca aho ati-adbhutam hi etat durlabha ekāntinām api vāsudeve pare tattve prāptiḥ caidyasya vidviṣaḥ
etat veditum icchāmaḥ sarve eva vayam mune bhagavat-nindayā venaḥ dvijaiḥ tamasi pātitaḥ
damaghoṣa-sutaḥ pāpaḥ ārabhya kala-bhāṣaṇāt samprati amarṣī govinde dantavakraḥ ca durmatiḥ
śapatoḥ asakṛt viṣṇum yat brahma param avyayam śvitraḥ na jātaḥ jihvāyām na andham viviśatuḥ tamaḥ
katham tasmin bhagavati duravagrāhya dhāmani paśyatām sarva-lokānām layam īyatuḥ añjasā
etat bhrāmyati me buddhiḥ dīpa-arciḥ iva vāyunā brūhi etat adbhutatamam bhagavān hi atra kāraṇam
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca rājñaḥ tat vacaḥ ākarṇya nāradaḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ tuṣṭaḥ prāha tam ābhāṣya śṛṇvatyāḥ tat-sadaḥ kathāḥ
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca nindana stava satkāra nyakkāra artham kalevaram pradhāna-parayoḥ rājan avivekena kalpitam
hiṁsā tat abhimānena daṇḍa-pāruṣyayoḥ yathā vaiṣamyam iha bhūtānām mama-aham iti pārthiva
yat nibaddhaḥ abhimānaḥ ayam tat vadhāt prāṇinām vadhaḥ tathā na yasya kaivalyāt abhimānaḥ akhila-ātmanaḥ parasya dama-kartuḥ hi hiṁsā kena asya kalpyate
tasmāt vaira-anubandhena nirvaireṇa bhayena vā snehāt kāmena vā yuñjyāt kathañcit na īkṣate pṛthak
yathā vaira-anubandhena martyaḥ tat-mayatām iyāt na tathā bhakti-yogena iti me niścitā matiḥ
kīṭaḥ peśaskṛtā ruddhaḥ kuḍyāyām tam anusmaran saṁrambha-bhaya-yogena vindate tat sva-rūpatām evam kṛṣṇe bhagavati māyā-manuje īśvare vaireṇa pūta-pāpmānaḥ tam āpuḥ anucintayā
kāmāt dveṣāt bhayāt snehāt yathā bhaktyā īśvare manaḥ āveśya tat agham hitvā bahavaḥ tat gatim gatāḥ
gopyaḥ kāmāt bhayāt kaṁsaḥ dveṣāt caidya-ādayaḥ nṛpāḥ sambandhāt vṛṣṇayaḥ snehāt yūyam bhaktyā vayam vibho
katamaḥ api na venaḥ syāt pañcānām puruṣam prati tasmāt kenāpi upāyena manaḥ kṛṣṇe niveśayet
mātṛ-svasreyaḥ vaḥ caidyaḥ dantavakraḥ ca pāṇḍava pārṣada-pravarau viṣṇoḥ vipra śāpāt pada cyutau
śrī-yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca kīdṛśaḥ kasya vā śāpaḥ hari-dāsa abhimarśanaḥ aśraddheyaḥ iva ābhāti hareḥ ekāntinām bhavaḥ
deha indriya asu hīnānām vaikuṇṭha-pura vāsinām deha-sambandha sambaddham etat ākhyātum arhasi
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca ekadā brahmaṇaḥ putrāḥ viṣṇu lokam yadṛcchayā sanandana-ādayaḥ jagmuḥ carantaḥ bhuvana-trayam
pañca-ṣaṭ-dhā āyana arbha-ābhāḥ pūrveṣām api pūrva-jāḥ dik-vāsasaḥ śiśūn matvā dvāḥ-sthau tān pratyaṣedhatām
