śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti uktaḥ saḥ hasan āha vāñchātaḥ pratigṛhyatām vāmanāya mahīm dātum jagrāha jala-bhājanam
viṣṇave kṣmām pradāsyantam uśanāḥ asura-īśvaram jānan cikīrṣitam viṣṇoḥ śiṣyam prāha vidām varaḥ
śrī-śukraḥ uvāca eṣaḥ vairocane sākṣāt bhagavān viṣṇuḥ avyayaḥ kaśyapāt aditeḥ jātaḥ devānām kārya-sādhakaḥ
pratiśrutam tvayā etasmai yat anartham ajānatā na sādhu manye daityānām mahān upagataḥ anayaḥ
eṣaḥ te sthānam aiśvaryam śriyam tejaḥ yaśaḥ śrutam dāsyati ācchidya śakrāya māyā māṇavakaḥ hariḥ
tribhiḥ kramaiḥ imān lokān viśva-kāyaḥ kramiṣyati sarvasvam viṣṇave dattvā mūḍha vartiṣyase katham
kramataḥ gām padā ekena dvitīyena divam vibhoḥ kham ca kāyena mahatā tārtīyasya kutaḥ gatiḥ
niṣṭhām te narake manye hi apradātuḥ pratiśrutam pratiśrutasya yaḥ anīśaḥ pratipādayitum bhavān
na tat dānam praśaṁsanti yena vṛttiḥ vipadyate dānam yajñaḥ tapaḥ karma loke vṛttimataḥ yataḥ
dharmāya yaśase arthāya kāmāya sva-janāya ca pañcadhā vibhajan vittam iha amutra ca modate
atra api bahu-ṛcaiḥ gītam śṛṇu me asura-sattama satyam om iti yat proktam yat na iti āha anṛtam hi tat
satyam puṣpa-phalam vidyāt ātma-vṛkṣasya gīyate vṛkṣe ajīvati tat na syāt anṛtam mūlam ātmanaḥ
tat yathā vṛkṣaḥ unmūlaḥ śuṣyati udvartate acirāt evam naṣṭa anṛtaḥ sadyaḥ ātmā śuṣyet na saṁśayaḥ
parāk riktam apūrṇam vā akṣaram yat tat om iti yat kiñcit om iti brūyāt tena ricyeta vai pumān bhikṣave sarvam oṁ kurvan na alam kāmena ca ātmane
atha etat pūrṇam abhyātmam yat ca na iti anṛtam vacaḥ sarvam na iti anṛtam brūyāt saḥ duṣkīrtiḥ śvasan mṛtaḥ
strīṣu narma-vivāhe ca vṛtti-arthe prāṇa-saṅkaṭe go-brāhmaṇa-arthe hiṁsāyām na anṛtam syāt jugupsitam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca baliḥ evam gṛha-patiḥ kula-ācāryeṇa bhāṣitaḥ tūṣṇīm bhūtvā kṣaṇam rājan uvāca avahitaḥ gurum
śrī-baliḥ uvāca satyam bhagavatā proktam dharmaḥ ayam gṛhamedhinām artham kāmam yaśaḥ vṛttim yaḥ na bādheta karhicit
saḥ ca aham vitta-lobhena pratyācakṣe katham dvijam pratiśrutya dadāmi iti prāhrādiḥ kitavaḥ yathā
na hi asatyāt paraḥ adharmaḥ iti ha uvāca bhūḥ iyam sarvam soḍhum alam manye ṛte alīka-param naram
na aham bibhemi nirayāt na adhanyāt asukha-arṇavāt na sthāna-cyavanāt mṛtyoḥ yathā vipra-pralambhanāt
yat yat hāsyati loke asmin samparetam dhana-ādikam tasya tyāge nimittam kim vipraḥ tuṣyet na tena cet
śreyaḥ kurvanti bhūtānām sādhavaḥ dustyaja asubhiḥ dadhyaṅ śibi prabhṛtayaḥ kaḥ vikalpaḥ dharā-ādiṣu
yaiḥ iyam bubhuje brahman daitya-indraiḥ anivartibhiḥ teṣām kālaḥ agrasīt lokān na yaśaḥ adhigatam bhuvi
su-labhāḥ yudhi vipra-ṛṣe hi anivṛttāḥ tanu-tyajaḥ na tathā tīrthe āyāte śraddhayā ye dhana-tyajaḥ
manasvinaḥ kāruṇikasya śobhanam yat arthi kāma-upanayena durgatiḥ kutaḥ punaḥ brahma-vidām bhavādṛśām tataḥ vaṭoḥ asya dadāmi vāñchitam
yajanti yajñam kratubhiḥ yam ādṛtāḥ bhavantaḥ āmnāya-vidhāna-kovidāḥ saḥ eva viṣṇuḥ varadaḥ astu vā paraḥ dāsyāmi amuṣmai kṣitim īpsitām mune
yadyapi asau adharmeṇa mām badhnīyāt anāgasam tathāpi enam na hiṁsiṣye bhītam brahma-tanum ripum
eṣaḥ vā uttama-ślokaḥ na jihāsati yat yaśaḥ hatvā mā enām haret yuddhe śayīta nihataḥ mayā
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam aśraddhitam śiṣyam anādeśa-karam guruḥ śaśāpa daiva-prahitaḥ satya-sandham manasvinam
dṛḍham paṇḍita-mānī ajñaḥ stabdhaḥ asi asmat upekṣayā mat-śāsana-atigaḥ yaḥ tvam acirāt bhraśyase śriyaḥ
evam śaptaḥ sva-guruṇā satyāt na calitaḥ mahān vāmanāya dadau enām arcitvā udaka-pūrvakam
vindhyāvaliḥ tadā āgatya patnī jālaka-mālinī āninye kalaśam haimam avanejani-apām bhṛtam
yajamānaḥ svayam tasya śrīmat pāda-yugam mudā avanijya avahat mūrdhni tat apaḥ viśva-pāvanīḥ
tadā asura-indram divi devatā-gaṇāḥ gandharva vidyādhara siddha cāraṇāḥ tat karma sarve api gṛṇantaḥ ārjavam prasūna-varṣaiḥ vavṛṣuḥ mudā-anvitāḥ
neduḥ muhuḥ dundubhayaḥ sahasraśaḥ gandharva kimpūruṣa kinnarāḥ jaguḥ manasvinā anena kṛtam su-duṣkaram vidvān adāt yat ripave jagat-trayam
tat vāmanam rūpam avardhata adbhutam hareḥ anantasya guṇa-traya-ātmakam bhūḥ kham diśaḥ dyauḥ vivarāḥ payodhayaḥ tiryak nṛ devāḥ ṛṣayaḥ yat āsata
kāye baliḥ tasya mahā-vibhūteḥ saha-ṛtvik-ācārya-sadasyaḥ etat dadarśa viśvam tri-guṇam guṇa-ātmake bhūta indriya artha āśaya jīva-yuktam
rasām acaṣṭa aṅghri-tale atha pādayoḥ mahīm mahīdhrān puruṣasya jaṅghayoḥ patattriṇaḥ jānuni viśva-mūrteḥ ūrvoḥ gaṇam mārutam indra-senaḥ
sandhyām vibhoḥ vāsasi guhye aikṣat prajāpatīn jaghane ātma-mukhyān nābhyām nabhaḥ kukṣiṣu sapta sindhūn urukramasya urasi ca ṛkṣa-mālām
hṛdi aṅga dharmam stanayoḥ murāreḥ ṛtam ca satyam ca manasi atha indum śriyam ca vakṣasi aravinda-hastām kaṇṭhe ca sāmāni samasta-rephān indra-pradhānān amarān bhujeṣu tat-karṇayoḥ kakubhaḥ dyauḥ ca mūrdhni keśeṣu meghān śvasanam nāsikāyām akṣṇoḥ ca sūryam vadane ca vahnim vāṇyām ca chandāṁsi rase jala-īśam bhruvoḥ niṣedham ca vidhim ca pakṣmasu ahaḥ ca rātrim ca parasya puṁsaḥ manyum lalāṭe adhare eva lobham sparśe ca kāmam nṛpa retasā ambhaḥ pṛṣṭhe tu adharmam kramaṇeṣu yajñam chāyāsu mṛtyum hasite ca māyām tanū-ruheṣu oṣadhi-jātayaḥ ca nadīḥ ca nāḍīṣu śilāḥ nakheṣu buddhau ajam deva-gaṇān ṛṣīn ca prāṇeṣu gātre sthira-jaṅgamāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni dadarśa vīraḥ
sarva-ātmani idam bhuvanam nirīkṣya sarve asurāḥ kaśmalam āpuḥ aṅga sudarśanam cakram asahya tejaḥ dhanuḥ ca śārṅgam stanayitnu ghoṣam
parjanya-ghoṣaḥ jalajaḥ pāñcajanyaḥ kaumodakī viṣṇu-gadā tarasvinī vidyādharaḥ asiḥ śata-candra-yuktaḥ tūṇa-uttamau akṣayasāyakau ca
sunanda-mukhyāḥ upatasthuḥ īśam pārṣada-mukhyāḥ saha-loka-pālāḥ sphurat-kirīṭa aṅgada mīna-kuṇḍalaḥ śrīvatsa ratna-uttama mekhalā ambaraiḥ madhu-vrata srak vanamālayā āvṛtaḥ rarāja rājan bhagavān urukramaḥ kṣitim padā ekena baleḥ vicakrame nabhaḥ śarīreṇa diśaḥ ca bāhubhiḥ
padam dvitīyam kramataḥ tri-viṣṭapam na vai tṛtīyāya tadīyam aṇu api urukramasya aṅghriḥ upari upari atho mahaḥ-janābhyām tapasaḥ param gataḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca satyam samīkṣya abja-bhavaḥ nakha-indubhiḥ hata sva-dhāma-dyutiḥ āvṛtaḥ abhyagāt marīci-miśrāḥ ṛṣayaḥ bṛhat-vratāḥ sanandana-ādyāḥ nara-deva yoginaḥ
veda upavedāḥ niyamāḥ yama anvitāḥ tarka itihāsa aṅga purāṇa saṁhitāḥ ye ca apare yoga-samīra-dīpita jñāna-agninā randhita-karma-kalmaṣāḥ vavandire yat-smaraṇa-anubhāvataḥ svāyambhuvam dhāma gatāḥ akarmakam atha aṅghraye pronnamitāya viṣṇoḥ upāharat padma-bhavaḥ arhaṇa-udakam samarcya bhaktyā abhyagṛṇāt śuci-śravāḥ yat-nābhi-paṅkeruha-sambhavaḥ svayam
dhātuḥ kamaṇḍalu-jalam tat urukramasya pāda-avanejana-pavitratayā nara-indra svardhunī abhūt nabhasi sā patatī nimārṣṭi loka-trayam bhagavataḥ viśadā iva kīrtiḥ
brahma-ādayaḥ loka-nāthāḥ sva-nāthāya samādṛtāḥ sa-anugāḥ balim ājahruḥ saṅkṣipta-ātma-vibhūtaye
toyaiḥ samarhaṇaiḥ sragbhiḥ divya-gandha-anulepanaiḥ dhūpaiḥ dīpaiḥ surabhibhiḥ lāja akṣata phala aṅkuraiḥ stavanaiḥ jaya-śabdaiḥ ca tat-vīrya-mahimā-aṅkitaiḥ nṛtya-vāditra-gītaiḥ ca śaṅkha dundubhi niḥsvanaiḥ
jāmbavān ṛkṣa-rājaḥ tu bherī-śabdaiḥ manaḥ-javaḥ vijayam dikṣu sarvāsu mahā-utsavam aghoṣayat
mahīm sarvām hṛtām dṛṣṭvā tri-pada-vyāja-yācñayā ūcuḥ sva-bhartuḥ asurāḥ dīkṣitasya ati amarṣitāḥ
na vā ayam brahma-bandhuḥ viṣṇuḥ māyāvinām varaḥ dvija-rūpa praticchannaḥ deva-kāryam cikīrṣati
anena yācamānena śatruṇā vaṭu-rūpiṇā sarvasvam naḥ hṛtam bhartuḥ nyasta daṇḍasya barhiṣi
satya-vratasya satatam dīkṣitasya viśeṣataḥ na anṛtam bhāṣitum śakyam brahmaṇyasya dayā-vataḥ
tasmāt asya vadhaḥ dharmaḥ bhartuḥ śuśrūṣaṇam ca naḥ iti āyudhāni jagṛhuḥ baleḥ anucara asurāḥ
te sarve vāmanam hantum śūla paṭṭiśa pāṇayaḥ anicchantaḥ baleḥ rājan prādravan jāta-manyavaḥ
tān abhidravataḥ dṛṣṭvā ditija-anīka-pān nṛpa prahasya anucarāḥ viṣṇoḥ pratyaṣedhan udāyudhāḥ
nandaḥ sunandaḥ atha jayaḥ vijayaḥ prabalaḥ balaḥ kumudaḥ kumudākṣaḥ ca viṣvaksenaḥ patattri-rāṭ jayantaḥ śrutadevaḥ ca puṣpadantaḥ atha sātvataḥ sarve nāga-ayuta-prāṇāḥ camūm te jaghnuḥ āsurīm
hanyamānān svakān dṛṣṭvā puruṣa-anucaraiḥ baliḥ vārayām āsa saṁrabdhān kāvya-śāpam anusmaran
he vipracitte he rāho he neme śrūyatām vacaḥ mā yudhyata nivartadhvam na naḥ kālaḥ ayam artha-kṛt
yaḥ prabhuḥ sarva-bhūtānām sukha-duḥkha-upapattaye tam na ativartitum daityāḥ pauruṣaiḥ īśvaraḥ pumān
yaḥ naḥ bhavāya prāk āsīt abhavāya diva-okasām saḥ eva bhagavān adya vartate tat-viparyayam
balena sacivaiḥ buddhyā durgaiḥ mantra-auṣadha-ādibhiḥ sāma-ādibhiḥ upāyaiḥ ca kālam na atyeti vai janaḥ
bhavadbhiḥ nirjitāḥ hi ete bahuśaḥ anucarāḥ hareḥ daivena ṛddhaiḥ te eva adya yudhi jitvā nadanti naḥ
etān vayam vijeṣyāmaḥ yadi daivam prasīdati tasmāt kālam pratīkṣadhvam yaḥ naḥ arthatvāya kalpate
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca patyuḥ nigaditam śrutvā daitya-dānava-yūtha-pāḥ rasām nirviviśūḥ rājan viṣṇu-pārṣada tāḍitāḥ
atha tārkṣya-sutaḥ jñātvā virāṭ prabhu-cikīrṣitam babandha vāruṇaiḥ pāśaiḥ balim sūtye ahani kratau
hāhā-kāraḥ mahān āsīt rodasyoḥ sarvataḥ diśam nigṛhyamāṇe asura-patau viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā
tam baddham vāruṇaiḥ pāśaiḥ bhagavān āha vāmanaḥ naṣṭa-śriyam sthira-prajñam udāra-yaśasam nṛpa
padāni trīṇi dattāni bhūmeḥ mahyam tvayā asura dvābhyām krāntā mahī sarvā tṛtīyam upakalpaya
yāvat tapati asau gobhiḥ yāvat induḥ saha-uḍubhiḥ yāvat varṣati parjanyaḥ tāvatī bhūḥ iyam tava
padā ekena mayā ākrāntaḥ bhūrlokaḥ kham diśaḥ tanoḥ svarlokaḥ te dvitīyena paśyataḥ te svam ātmanā
pratiśrutam adātuḥ te niraye vāsaḥ iṣyate viśa tvam nirayam tasmāt guruṇā ca anumoditaḥ
vṛthā manorathaḥ tasya dūraḥ svargaḥ patati adhaḥ pratiśrutasya adānena yaḥ arthinam vipralambhate
vipralabdhaḥ dadāmi iti tvayā aham ca āḍhya-māninā tat vyalīka-phalam bhuṅkṣva nirayam katicit samāḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam viprakṛtaḥ rājan baliḥ bhagavatā asuraḥ bhidyamānaḥ api abhinna-ātmā pratyāha aviklavam vacaḥ
śrī-baliḥ uvāca yadi uttamaśloka bhavān mama īritam vacaḥ vyalīkam sura-varya manyate karomi ṛtam tat na bhavet pralambhanam padam tṛtīyam kuru śīrṣṇi me nijam
bibhemi na aham nirayāt pada-cyutaḥ na pāśa-bandhāt vyasanāt duratyayāt na eva artha-kṛcchrāt bhavataḥ vinigrahāt asādhu-vādāt bhṛśam udvije yathā
puṁsām ślāghya-tamam manye daṇḍam arhattama-arpitam yam na mātā pitā bhrātā suhṛdaḥ ca ādiśanti hi
tvam nūnam asurāṇām naḥ parokṣaḥ paramaḥ guruḥ yaḥ naḥ aneka mada-andhānām vibhraṁśam cakṣuḥ ādiśat
yasmin vaira-anubandhena vyūḍhena vibudha-itarāḥ bahavaḥ lebhire siddhim yām u ha ekānta-yoginaḥ tena aham nigṛhītaḥ asmi bhavatā bhūri-karmaṇā baddhaḥ ca vāruṇaiḥ pāśaiḥ na ati-vrīḍe na ca vyathe
pitāmahaḥ me bhavadīya-sammataḥ prahrādaḥ āviṣkṛta-sādhu-vādaḥ bhavat-vipakṣeṇa vicitra-vaiśasam samprāpitaḥ tvam paramaḥ sva-pitrā
kim ātmanā anena jahāti yaḥ antataḥ kim riktha-hāraiḥ svajana-ākhya-dasyubhiḥ kim jāyayā saṁsṛti-hetu-bhūtayā martyasya gehaiḥ kim iha āyuṣaḥ vyayaḥ
ittham saḥ niścitya pitāmahaḥ mahān agādha-bodhaḥ bhavataḥ pāda-padmam dhruvam prapede hi akutaḥ-bhayam janāt bhītaḥ svapakṣa-kṣapaṇasya sat-tama
atha aham api ātma-ripoḥ tava antikam daivena nītaḥ prasabham tyājita śrīḥ idam kṛta-anta-antika-varti jīvitam yayā adhruvam stabdha-matiḥ na budhyate
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tasya ittham bhāṣamāṇasya prahrādaḥ bhagavat-priyaḥ ājagāma kuru-śreṣṭha rākā-patiḥ iva utthitaḥ
tam indra-senaḥ sva-pitāmaham śriyā virājamānam nalina-āyata-īkṣaṇam prāṁśum piśaṅga-ambaram añjana-tviṣam pralamba-bāhum śubhaga-ṛṣabham aikṣata
tasmai baliḥ vāruṇa-pāśa-yantritaḥ samarhaṇam na upajahāra pūrva-vat nanāma mūrdhnā aśru-vilola-locanaḥ sa-vrīḍa nīcīna mukhaḥ babhūva ha
saḥ tatra ha āsīnam udīkṣya sat-patim harim sunanda-ādi-anugaiḥ upāsitam upetya bhūmau śirasā mahā-manāḥ nanāma mūrdhnā pulaka-aśru-viklavaḥ
śrī-prahrādaḥ uvāca tvayā eva dattam padam aindram ūrjitam hṛtam tat eva adya tathā eva śobhanam manye mahān asya kṛtaḥ hi anugrahaḥ vibhraṁśitaḥ yat śriyaḥ ātma-mohanāt
yayā hi vidvān api muhyate yataḥ tat kaḥ vicaṣṭe gatim ātmanaḥ yathā tasmai namaḥ te jagat-īśvarāya vai nārāyaṇāya akhila-loka-sākṣiṇe
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tasya anuśṛṇvataḥ rājan prahrādasya kṛta-añjaleḥ hiraṇyagarbhaḥ bhagavān uvāca madhusūdanam
baddham vīkṣya patim sādhvī tat-patnī bhaya-vihvalā prāñjaliḥ praṇatā upendram babhāṣe avāk-mukhī nṛpa
śrī-vindhyāvaliḥ uvāca krīḍā-artham ātmanaḥ idam tri-jagat kṛtam te svāmyam tu tatra kudhiyaḥ apare īśa kuryuḥ kartuḥ prabhoḥ tava kim asyataḥ āvahanti tyakta-hriyaḥ tvat avaropita kartṛ-vādāḥ
śrī-brahmā uvāca bhūta-bhāvana bhūta-īśa deva-deva jagat-maya muñca enam hṛta-sarvasvam na ayam arhati nigraham
kṛtsnāḥ te anena dattāḥ bhūḥ lokāḥ karma-arjitāḥ ca ye niveditam ca sarvasvam ātmā aviklavayā dhiyā
yat-pādayoḥ aśaṭha-dhīḥ salilam pradāya dūrvā aṅkuraiḥ api vidhāya satīm saparyām api uttamām gatim asau bhajate tri-lokīm dāśvān aviklava-manāḥ katham ārtim ṛcchet
śrī-bhagavān uvāca brahman yam anugṛhṇāmi tat viśaḥ vidhunomi aham yat-madaḥ puruṣaḥ stabdhaḥ lokam mām ca avamanyate
yadā kadācit jīva-ātmā saṁsaran nija-karmabhiḥ nānā-yoniṣu anīśaḥ ayam pauruṣīm gatim āvrajet
janma karma vayaḥ rūpa vidyā aiśvarya dhana ādibhiḥ yadi asya na bhavet stambhaḥ tatra ayam mat-anugrahaḥ
māna stambha nimittānām janma-ādīnām samantataḥ sarva-śreyaḥ pratīpānām hanta muhyet na mat-paraḥ
eṣaḥ dānava-daityānām agranīḥ kīrti-vardhanaḥ ajaiṣīt ajayām māyām sīdan api na muhyati
kṣīṇa-rikthaḥ cyutaḥ sthānāt kṣiptaḥ baddhaḥ ca śatrubhiḥ jñātibhiḥ ca parityaktaḥ yātanām anuyāpitaḥ guruṇā bhartsitaḥ śaptaḥ jahau satyam na su-vrataḥ chalaiḥ uktaḥ mayā dharmaḥ na ayam tyajati satya-vāk
eṣaḥ me prāpitaḥ sthānam duṣprāpam amaraiḥ api sāvarṇeḥ antarasya ayam bhavitā indraḥ mat-āśrayaḥ
tāvat sutalam adhyāstām viśvakarma-vinirmitam yat ādhayaḥ vyādhayaḥ ca klamaḥ tandrā parābhavaḥ na upasargāḥ nivasatām sambhavanti mama īkṣayā
indrasena mahārāja yāhi bhoḥ bhadram astu te sutalam svargibhiḥ prārthyam jñātibhiḥ parivāritaḥ
na tvām abhibhaviṣyanti loka-īśāḥ kim uta apare tvat-śāsana-atigān daityān cakram me sūdayiṣyati
rakṣiṣye sarvataḥ aham tvām sa-anugam sa-paricchadam sadā sannihitam vīra tatra mām drakṣyate bhavān
tatra dānava-daityānām saṅgāt te bhāvaḥ āsuraḥ dṛṣṭvā mat-anubhāvam vai sadyaḥ kuṇṭhaḥ vinaṅkṣyati
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti uktavantam puruṣam purātanam mahā-anubhāvaḥ akhila-sādhu-sammataḥ baddha-añjaliḥ bāṣpa-kala-ākula-īkṣaṇaḥ bhakti-utkalaḥ gadgadayā girā abravīt
śrī-baliḥ uvāca aho praṇāmāya kṛtaḥ samudyamaḥ prapanna-bhakta-artha-vidhau samāhitaḥ yat loka-pālaiḥ tvat-anugrahaḥ amaraiḥ alabdha-pūrvaḥ apasade asure arpitaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti uktvā harim ānatya brahmāṇam sa-bhavam tataḥ viveśa sutalam prītaḥ baliḥ muktaḥ saha asuraiḥ
evam indrāya bhagavān pratyānīya tri-viṣṭapam pūrayitvā aditeḥ kāmam aśāsat sakalam jagat
labdha-prasādam nirmuktam pautram vaṁśa-dharam balim niśāmya bhakti-pravaṇaḥ prahrādaḥ idam abravīt
śrī-prahrādaḥ uvāca na imam viriñcaḥ labhate prasādam na śrīḥ na śarvaḥ kim uta apare anye yat naḥ asurāṇām asi durga-pālaḥ viśva-abhivandyaiḥ abhivandita-aṅghriḥ
yat pāda-padma makaranda niṣevaṇena brahma-ādayaḥ śaraṇa-da aśnuvate vibhūtīḥ kasmāt vayam ku-sṛtayaḥ khala-yonayaḥ te dākṣiṇya-dṛṣṭi-padavīm bhavataḥ praṇītāḥ
citram tava īhitam aho amita yoga-māyā līlā visṛṣṭa-bhuvanasya viśāradasya sarva-ātmanaḥ sama-dṛśaḥ aviṣamaḥ svabhāvaḥ bhakta-priyaḥ yat asi kalpataru-svabhāvaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca vatsa prahrāda bhadram te prayāhi sutala-ālayam modamānaḥ sva-pautreṇa jñātīnām sukham āvaha
nityam draṣṭā asi mām tatra gadā-pāṇim avasthitam mat-darśana mahā-āhlāda dhvasta karma-nibandhanaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ājñām bhagavataḥ rājan prahrādaḥ balinā saha bāḍham iti amala-prajñaḥ mūrdhni ādhāya kṛta-añjaliḥ parikramya ādi-puruṣam sarva-asura-camūpatiḥ praṇataḥ tat-anujñātaḥ praviveśa mahā-bilam
atha āha uśanasam rājan hariḥ nārāyaṇaḥ antike āsīnam ṛtvijām madhye sadasi brahma-vādinām
brahman santanu śiṣyasya karma-chidram vitanvataḥ yat tat karmasu vaiṣamyam brahma-dṛṣṭam samam bhavet
śrī-śukraḥ uvāca kutaḥ tat karma-vaiṣamyam yasya karma-īśvaraḥ bhavān yajña-īśaḥ yajña-puruṣaḥ sarva-bhāvena pūjitaḥ
mantrataḥ tantrataḥ chidram deśa kāla arha vastutaḥ sarvam karoti niśchidram anusaṅkīrtanam tava
tathāpi vadataḥ bhūman kariṣyāmi anuśāsanam etat śreyaḥ param puṁsām yat tava ājñā-anupālanam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca pratinandya hareḥ ājñām uśanāḥ bhagavān iti yajña-chidram samādhatta baleḥ vipra-ṛṣibhiḥ saha
evam baleḥ mahīm rājan bhikṣitvā vāmanaḥ hariḥ dadau bhrātre mahā-indrāya tridivam yat paraiḥ hṛtam
prajāpati-patiḥ brahmā deva ṛṣi pitṛ bhūmipaiḥ dakṣa bhṛgu aṅgirāḥ mukhyaiḥ kumāreṇa bhavena ca kaśyapasya aditeḥ prītyai sarva-bhūta-bhavāya ca lokānām loka-pālānām akarot vāmanam patim
vedānām sarva-devānām dharmasya yaśasaḥ śriyaḥ maṅgalānām vratānām ca kalpam svarga-apavargayoḥ upendram kalpayām cakre patim sarva-vibhūtaye tadā sarvāṇi bhūtāni bhṛśam mumudire nṛpa
tataḥ tu indraḥ puraskṛtya deva-yānena vāmanam loka-pālaiḥ divam ninye brahmaṇā ca anumoditaḥ
prāpya tri-bhuvanam ca indraḥ upendra-bhuja-pālitaḥ śriyā paramayā juṣṭaḥ mumude gata-sādhvasaḥ
brahmā śarvaḥ kumāraḥ ca bhṛgu-ādyāḥ munayaḥ nṛpa pitaraḥ sarva-bhūtāni siddhāḥ vaimānikāḥ ca ye sumahat karma tat viṣṇoḥ gāyantaḥ param adbhutam dhiṣṇyāni svāni te jagmuḥ aditim ca śaśaṁsire
sarvam etat mayā ākhyātam bhavataḥ kula-nandana urukramasya caritam śrotṝṇām agha-mocanam
pāram mahimnaḥ uruvikramataḥ gṛṇānaḥ yaḥ pārthivāni vimame saḥ rajāṁsi martyaḥ kim jāyamānaḥ uta jātaḥ upaiti martyaḥ iti āha mantra-dṛk ṛṣiḥ puruṣasya yasya
yaḥ idam deva-devasya hareḥ adbhuta-karmaṇaḥ avatāra-anucaritam śṛṇvan yāti parām gatim
kriyamāṇe karmaṇi idam daive pitrye atha mānuṣe yatra yatra anukīrtyeta tat teṣām sukṛtam viduḥ
śrī-rājā uvāca bhagavan śrotum icchāmi hareḥ adbhuta-karmaṇaḥ avatāra-kathām ādyām māyā-matsya-viḍambanam
yat-artham adadhāt rūpam mātsyam loka-jugupsitam tamaḥ prakṛti durmarṣam karma-grastaḥ iva īśvaraḥ etat naḥ bhagavan sarvam yathāvat vaktum arhasi uttamaśloka-caritam sarva-loka-sukha-āvaham
śrī-sūtaḥ uvāca iti uktaḥ viṣṇu-rātena bhagavān bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca caritam viṣṇoḥ matsya-rūpeṇa yat kṛtam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca go vipra sura sādhūnām chandasām api ca īśvaraḥ rakṣām icchan tanūḥ dhatte dharmasya arthasya ca eva hi
ucca-avaceṣu bhūteṣu caran vāyuḥ iva īśvaraḥ na ucca-avacatvam bhajate nirguṇatvāt dhiyaḥ guṇaiḥ
āsīt atīta kalpa-ante brāhmaḥ naimittikaḥ layaḥ samudra upaplutāḥ tatra lokāḥ bhūḥ-ādayaḥ nṛpa
kālena āgata-nidrasya dhātuḥ śiśayiṣoḥ balī mukhataḥ niḥsṛtān vedān hayagrīvaḥ antike aharat
jñātvā tat dānava-indrasya hayagrīvasya ceṣṭitam dadhāra śapharī-rūpam bhagavān hariḥ īśvaraḥ
tatra rāja-ṛṣiḥ kaścit nāmnā satyavrataḥ mahān nārāyaṇa-paraḥ atapat tapaḥ saḥ salila-āśanaḥ
yaḥ asau asmin mahā-kalpe tanayaḥ saḥ vivasvataḥ śrāddhadevaḥ iti khyātaḥ manutve hariṇā arpitaḥ
ekadā kṛtamālāyām kurvataḥ jala-tarpaṇam tasya añjali udake kācit śapharī ekā abhyapadyata
satyavrataḥ añjali-gatām saha toyena bhārata utsasarja nadī-toye śapharīm draviḍa-īśvaraḥ
tam āha sā ati-karuṇam mahā-kāruṇikam nṛpam yādobhyaḥ jñāti-ghātibhyaḥ dīnām mām dīna-vatsala katham visṛjase rājan bhītām asmin sarit-jale
tam ātmanaḥ anugraha-artham prītyā matsya-vapuḥ-dharam ajānan rakṣaṇa-arthāya śapharyāḥ saḥ manaḥ dadhe
tasyāḥ dīna-taram vākyam āśrutya saḥ mahī-patiḥ kalaśa-apsu nidhāya enām dayāluḥ ninye āśramam
sā tu tatra eka-rātreṇa vardhamānā kamaṇḍalau alabdhvā ātma-avakāśam vā idam āha mahī-patim
na aham kamaṇḍalau asmin kṛcchram vastum iha utsahe kalpaya okaḥ su-vipulam yatra aham nivase sukham
saḥ enām tataḥ ādāya nyadhāt audañcana-udake tatra kṣiptā muhūrtena hasta-trayam avardhata
na me etat alam rājan sukham vastum udañcanam pṛthu dehi padam mahyam yat tvā aham śaraṇam gatā
tataḥ ādāya sā rājñā kṣiptā rājan sarovare tat āvṛtya ātmanā saḥ ayam mahā-mīnaḥ anvavardhata
na etat me svastaye rājan udakam salila-okasaḥ nidhehi rakṣā-yogena hrade mām avidāsini
iti uktaḥ saḥ anayat matsyam tatra tatra avidāsini jala-āśaye asammitam tam samudre prākṣipat jhaṣam
kṣipyamāṇaḥ tam āha idam iha mām makara-ādayaḥ adanti ati-balāḥ vīra mām na iha utsraṣṭum arhasi
evam vimohitaḥ tena vadatā valgu-bhāratīm tam āha kaḥ bhavān asmān matsya-rūpeṇa mohayan
na evam vīryaḥ jala-caraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ asmābhiḥ śrutaḥ api vā yaḥ bhavān yojana-śatam ahnā abhivyānaśe saraḥ
nūnam tvam bhagavān sākṣāt hariḥ nārāyaṇaḥ avyayaḥ anugrahāya bhūtānām dhatse rūpam jala-okasām
namaḥ te puruṣa-śreṣṭha sthiti utpatti apyaya īśvara bhaktānām naḥ prapannānām mukhyaḥ hi ātma-gatiḥ vibho
sarve līlā avatārāḥ te bhūtānām bhūti hetavaḥ jñātum icchāmi adaḥ rūpam yat-artham bhavatā dhṛtam
na te aravinda-akṣa pada-upasarpaṇam mṛṣā bhavet sarva-suhṛt priya ātmanaḥ yathā itareṣām pṛthak-ātmanām satām adīdṛśaḥ yat vapuḥ adbhutam hi naḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti bruvāṇam nṛpatim jagat-patiḥ satyavratam matsya-vapuḥ yuga-kṣaye vihartu-kāmaḥ pralaya-arṇave abravīt cikīrṣuḥ ekānta-jana-priyaḥ priyam
śrī-bhagavān uvāca saptame hi adyatanāt ūrdhvam ahani etat arimdama nimaṅkṣyati apyaya-ambhodhau trailokyam bhūḥ-bhuva-ādikam
tri-lokyām līyamānāyām saṁvarta-ambhasi vai tadā upasthāsyati nauḥ kācit viśālā tvām mayā īritā
tvam tāvat oṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ bījāni ucca-avacāni ca sapta-ṛṣibhiḥ parivṛtaḥ sarva-sattva upabṛṁhitaḥ āruhya bṛhatīm nāvam vicariṣyasi aviklavaḥ eka-arṇave nirāloke ṛṣīṇām eva varcasā
dodhūyamānām tām nāvam samīreṇa balīyasā upasthitasya me śṛṅge nibadhnīhi mahā-ahinā
aham tvām ṛṣibhiḥ sārdham saha nāvam udanvati vikarṣan vicariṣyāmi yāvat brāhmī niśā prabho
madīyam mahimānam ca param brahma iti śabditam vetsyasi anugṛhītam me sampraśnaiḥ vivṛtam hṛdi
ittham ādiśya rājānam hariḥ antaradhīyata saḥ anvavaikṣata tam kālam yam hṛṣīka-īśaḥ ādiśat
āstīrya darbhān prāk-kūlān rāja-ṛṣiḥ prāk-udak-mukhaḥ niṣasāda hareḥ pādau cintayan matsya-rūpiṇaḥ
tataḥ samudraḥ udvelaḥ sarvataḥ plāvayan mahīm vardhamānaḥ mahā-meghaiḥ varṣadbhiḥ samadṛśyata
dhyāyan bhagavat-ādeśam dadṛśe nāvam āgatām tām āruroha vipra-indraiḥ ādāya auṣadhi vīrudhaḥ
tam ūcuḥ munayaḥ prītāḥ rājan dhyāyasva keśavam saḥ vai naḥ saṅkaṭāt asmāt avitā śam vidhāsyati
saḥ anudhyātaḥ tataḥ rājñā prādurāsīt mahā-arṇave eka-śṛṅga-dharaḥ matsyaḥ haimaḥ niyuta-yojanaḥ
nibadhya nāvam tat-śṛṅge yathā-uktaḥ hariṇā purā varatreṇa ahinā tuṣṭaḥ tuṣṭāva madhusūdanam
śrī-rājā uvāca anādi avidyā upahata ātma-saṁvidaḥ tat mūla saṁsāra pariśrama āturāḥ yadṛcchayā upasṛtāḥ yam āpnuyuḥ vimukti-daḥ naḥ paramaḥ guruḥ bhavān
janaḥ abudhaḥ ayam nija-karma-bandhanaḥ sukha-icchayā karma samīhate asukham yat-sevayā tām vidhunoti asat-matim granthim saḥ bhindyāt hṛdayam saḥ naḥ guruḥ
yat-sevayā agneḥ iva rudra-rodanam pumān vijahyāt malam ātmanaḥ tamaḥ bhajeta varṇam nijam eṣaḥ saḥ avyayaḥ bhūyāt saḥ īśaḥ paramaḥ guroḥ guruḥ
na yat-prasāda ayuta-bhāga-leśam anye ca devāḥ guravaḥ janāḥ svayam kartum sametāḥ prabhavanti puṁsaḥ tam īśvaram tvām śaraṇam prapadye
acakṣuḥ andhasya yathā agraṇīḥ kṛtaḥ tathā janasya aviduṣaḥ abudhaḥ guruḥ tvam arka-dṛk sarva-dṛśām samīkṣaṇaḥ vṛtaḥ guruḥ naḥ sva-gatim bubhutsatām
janaḥ janasya ādiśate asatīm gatim yayā prapadyeta duratyayam tamaḥ tvam tu avyayam jñānam amogham añjasā prapadyate yena janaḥ nijam padam
tvam sarva-lokasya suhṛt priya īśvaraḥ hi ātmā guruḥ jñānam abhīṣṭa-siddhiḥ tathā api lokaḥ na bhavantam andha-dhīḥ jānāti santam hṛdi baddha-kāmaḥ
tvam tvām aham deva-varam vareṇyam prapadye īśam pratibodhanāya chindhi artha-dīpaiḥ bhagavan vacobhiḥ granthīn hṛdayyān vivṛṇu svam okaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti uktavantam nṛpatim bhagavān ādi-pūruṣaḥ matsya-rūpī mahā-ambhodhau viharan tattvam abravīt
purāṇa saṁhitām divyām sāṅkhya yoga kriyāvatīm satyavratasya rāja-ṛṣeḥ ātma-guhyam aśeṣataḥ
aśrauṣīt ṛṣibhiḥ sākam ātma-tattvam asaṁśayam nāvi āsīnaḥ bhagavatā proktam brahma sanātanam
atīta pralaya-apāye utthitāya saḥ vedhase hatvā asuram hayagrīvam vedān pratyāharat hariḥ
saḥ tu satyavrataḥ rājā jñāna-vijñāna-saṁyutaḥ viṣṇoḥ prasādāt kalpe asmin āsīt vaivasvataḥ manuḥ
satyavratasya rāja-ṛṣeḥ māyā-matsyasya śārṅgiṇaḥ saṁvādam mahat-ākhyānam śrutvā mucyeta kilbiṣāt
avatāram hareḥ yaḥ ayam kīrtayet anvaham naraḥ saṅkalpāḥ tasya sidhyanti saḥ yāti paramām gatim
pralaya-payasi dhātuḥ supta-śakteḥ mukhebhyaḥ śruti-gaṇam apanītam pratyupādatta hatvā ditijam akathayat yaḥ brahma satyavratānām tam aham akhila-hetum jihma-mīnam nataḥ asmi
śrī-rājā uvāca manvantarāṇi sarvāṇi tvayā uktāni śrutāni me vīryāṇi ananta-vīryasya hareḥ tatra kṛtāni ca
yaḥ asau satyavrataḥ nāma rāja-ṛṣiḥ draviḍa-īśvaraḥ jñānam yaḥ atīta-kalpa-ante lebhe puruṣa-sevayā saḥ vai vivasvataḥ putraḥ manuḥ āsīt iti śrutam tvattaḥ tasya sutāḥ proktāḥ ikṣvāku-pramukhāḥ nṛpāḥ
teṣām vaṁśam pṛthak brahman vaṁśa-anucaritāni ca kīrtayasva mahā-bhāga nityam śuśrūṣatām hi naḥ
ye bhūtāḥ ye bhaviṣyāḥ ca bhavanti adyatanāḥ ca ye teṣām naḥ puṇya-kīrtīnām sarveṣām vada vikramān
śrī-sūtaḥ uvāca evam parīkṣitā rājñā sadasi brahma-vādinām pṛṣṭaḥ provāca bhagavān śukaḥ parama-dharma-vit
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca śrūyatām mānavaḥ vaṁśaḥ prācuryeṇa parantapa na śakyate vistarataḥ vaktum varṣa-śataiḥ api
para-avareṣām bhūtānām ātmā yaḥ puruṣaḥ paraḥ saḥ eva āsīt idam viśvam kalpa-ante anyat na kiñcana
tasya nābheḥ samabhavat padma-koṣaḥ hiraṇmayaḥ tasmin jajñe mahārāja svayambhūḥ catuḥ-ānanaḥ
marīciḥ manasaḥ tasya jajñe tasya api kaśyapaḥ dākṣāyaṇyām tataḥ adityām vivasvān abhavat sutaḥ
tataḥ manuḥ śrāddhadevaḥ saṁjñāyām āsa bhārata śraddhāyām janayām āsa daśa putrān saḥ ātmavān ikṣvāku-nṛga-śaryāti-diṣṭa-dhṛṣṭa-karūṣakān nariṣyantam pṛṣadhram ca nabhagam ca kavim vibhuḥ
aprajasya manoḥ pūrvam vasiṣṭhaḥ bhagavān kila mitrā-varuṇayoḥ iṣṭim prajā-artham akarot vibhuḥ
tatra śraddhā manoḥ patnī hotāram samayācata duhitṛ-artham upāgamya praṇipatya payaḥ-vratā
preṣitaḥ adhvaryuṇā hotā vyacarat tat samāhitaḥ gṛhīte haviṣi vācā vaṣaṭ-kāram gṛṇan dvijaḥ
hotuḥ tat vyabhicāreṇa kanyā ilā nāma sā abhavat tām vilokya manuḥ prāha na atituṣṭamanāḥ gurum
bhagavan kim idam jātam karma vaḥ brahma-vādinām viparyayam aho kaṣṭam mā evam syāt brahma-vikriyā
yūyam brahma-vidaḥ yuktāḥ tapasā dagdha-kilbiṣāḥ kutaḥ saṅkalpa-vaiṣamyam anṛtam vibudheṣu iva
niśamya tat vacaḥ tasya bhagavān prapitāmahaḥ hotuḥ vyatikramam jñātvā babhāṣe ravi-nandanam
etat saṅkalpa-vaiṣamyam hotuḥ te vyabhicārataḥ tathā api sādhayiṣye te su-prajāstvam sva-tejasā
evam vyavasitaḥ rājan bhagavān saḥ mahā-yaśāḥ astauṣīt ādi-puruṣam ilāyāḥ puṁstva-kāmyayā
tasmai kāma-varam tuṣṭaḥ bhagavān hariḥ īśvaraḥ dadau ilā abhavat tena sudyumnaḥ puruṣa-ṛṣabhaḥ
saḥ ekadā mahārāja vicaran mṛgayām vane vṛtaḥ katipaya amātyaiḥ aśvam āruhya saindhavam pragṛhya ruciram cāpam śarān ca parama-adbhutān daṁśitaḥ anumṛgam vīraḥ jagāma diśam uttarām
sukumāra-vanam meroḥ adhastāt praviveśa ha yatra āste bhagavān śarvaḥ ramamāṇaḥ saha umayā
tasmin praviṣṭaḥ eva asau sudyumnaḥ para-vīra-hā apaśyat striyam ātmānam aśvam ca vaḍavām nṛpa
tathā tat-anugāḥ sarve ātma-liṅga-viparyayam dṛṣṭvā vimanasaḥ abhūvan vīkṣamāṇāḥ parasparam
śrī-rājā uvāca katham evam guṇaḥ deśaḥ kena vā bhagavan kṛtaḥ praśnam enam samācakṣva param kautūhalam hi naḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ekadā giriśam draṣṭum ṛṣayaḥ tatra su-vratāḥ diśaḥ vitimira-ābhāsāḥ kurvantaḥ samupāgaman
tān vilokya ambikā devī vivāsā vrīḍitā bhṛśam bhartuḥ aṅkāt samutthāya nīvīm āśu atha paryadhāt
ṛṣayaḥ api tayoḥ vīkṣya prasaṅgam ramamāṇayoḥ nivṛttāḥ prayayuḥ tasmāt nara-nārāyaṇa-āśramam
tat idam bhagavān āha priyāyāḥ priya-kāmyayā sthānam yaḥ praviśet etat saḥ vai yoṣit bhavet iti
tataḥ ūrdhvam vanam tat vai puruṣāḥ varjayanti hi sā ca anucara-saṁyuktā vicacāra vanāt vanam
atha tām āśrama-abhyāśe carantīm pramadā-uttamām strībhiḥ parivṛtām vīkṣya cakame bhagavān budhaḥ
sā api tam cakame su-bhrūḥ somarāja-sutam patim saḥ tasyām janayām āsa purūravasam ātma-jam
evam strītvam anuprāptaḥ sudyumnaḥ mānavaḥ nṛpaḥ sasmāra saḥ kula-ācāryam vasiṣṭham iti śuśruma
saḥ tasya tām daśām dṛṣṭvā kṛpayā bhṛśa-pīḍitaḥ sudyumnasya āśayan puṁstvam upādhāvata śaṅkaram
tuṣṭaḥ tasmai saḥ bhagavān ṛṣaye priyam āvahan svām ca vācam ṛtām kurvan idam āha viśāmpate māsam pumān saḥ bhavitā māsam strī tava gotra-jaḥ ittham vyavasthayā kāmam sudyumnaḥ avatu medinīm
ācārya-anugrahāt kāmam labdhvā puṁstvam vyavasthayā pālayām āsa jagatīm na abhyanandan sma tam prajāḥ
tasya utkalaḥ gayaḥ rājan vimalaḥ ca trayaḥ sutāḥ dakṣiṇā-patha rājānaḥ babhūvuḥ dharma-vatsalāḥ
tataḥ pariṇate kāle pratiṣṭhāna-patiḥ prabhuḥ purūravase utsṛjya gām putrāya gataḥ vanam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam gate atha sudyumne manuḥ vaivasvataḥ sute putra-kāmaḥ tapaḥ tepe yamunāyām śatam samāḥ
tataḥ ayajat manuḥ devam apatya-artham harim prabhum ikṣvāku-pūrva-jān putrān lebhe sva-sadṛśān daśa
pṛṣadhraḥ tu manoḥ putraḥ go-pālaḥ guruṇā kṛtaḥ pālayām āsa gāḥ yattaḥ rātryām vīrāsana-vrataḥ
ekadā prāviśat goṣṭham śārdūlaḥ niśi varṣati śayānāḥ gāvaḥ utthāya bhītāḥ tāḥ babhramuḥ vraje
ekām jagrāha balavān sā cukrośa bhaya-āturā tasyāḥ tu kranditam śrutvā pṛṣadhraḥ anusasāra ha khaḍgam ādāya tarasā pralīna-uḍu-gaṇe niśi ajānan acchinot babhroḥ śiraḥ śārdūla-śaṅkayā
vyāghraḥ api vṛkṇa-śravaṇaḥ nistriṁśa-agra-āhataḥ tataḥ niścakrāma bhṛśam bhītaḥ raktam pathi samutsṛjan
manyamānaḥ hatam vyāghram pṛṣadhraḥ para-vīra-hā adrākṣīt sva-hatām babhrum vyuṣṭāyām niśi duḥkhitaḥ
tam śaśāpa kula-ācāryaḥ kṛta-āgasam akāmataḥ na kṣatra-bandhuḥ śūdraḥ tvam karmaṇā bhavitā amunā
evam śaptaḥ tu guruṇā pratyagṛhṇāt kṛta-añjaliḥ adhārayat vratam vīraḥ ūrdhva-retāḥ muni-priyam
vāsudeve bhagavati sarva-ātmani pare amale ekāntitvam gataḥ bhaktyā sarva-bhūta-suhṛt samaḥ vimukta-saṅgaḥ śānta-ātmā saṁyata akṣaḥ aparigrahaḥ yat-ṛcchayā upapannena kalpayan vṛttim ātmanaḥ ātmani ātmānam ādhāya jñāna-tṛptaḥ samāhitaḥ vicacāra mahīm etām jaḍa andha badhira ākṛtiḥ
evam vṛttaḥ vanam gatvā dṛṣṭvā dāva-agnim utthitam tena upayukta-karaṇaḥ brahma prāpa param muniḥ
kaviḥ kanīyān viṣayeṣu niḥspṛhaḥ visṛjya rājyam saha bandhubhiḥ vanam niveśya citte puruṣam sva-rociṣam viveśa kaiśora-vayāḥ param gataḥ
karūṣāt mānavāt āsan kārūṣāḥ kṣatra-jātayaḥ uttarā patha goptāraḥ brahmaṇyāḥ dharma-vatsalāḥ
dhṛṣṭāt dhārṣṭam abhūt kṣatram brahma-bhūyam gatam kṣitau nṛgasya vaṁśaḥ sumatiḥ bhūtajyotiḥ tataḥ vasuḥ
vasoḥ pratīkaḥ tat-putraḥ oghavān oghavat-pitā kanyā ca oghavatī nāma sudarśanaḥ uvāha tām
citrasenaḥ nariṣyantāt ṛkṣaḥ tasya sutaḥ abhavat tasya mīḍhvān tataḥ pūrṇaḥ indrasenaḥ tu tat-sutaḥ
vītihotraḥ tu indrasenāt tasya satyaśravāḥ abhūt uruśravāḥ sutaḥ tasya devadattaḥ tataḥ abhavat
tataḥ agniveśyaḥ bhagavān agniḥ svayam abhūt sutaḥ kānīnaḥ iti vikhyātaḥ jātūkarṇyaḥ mahān ṛṣiḥ
tataḥ brahma-kulam jātam āgniveśyāyanam nṛpa nariṣyanta anvayaḥ proktaḥ diṣṭa-vaṁśam ataḥ śṛṇu
nābhāgaḥ diṣṭa-putraḥ anyaḥ karmaṇā vaiśyatām gataḥ bhalandanaḥ sutaḥ tasya vatsaprītiḥ bhalandanāt vatsaprīteḥ sutaḥ prāṁśuḥ tat-sutam pramatim viduḥ khanitraḥ pramateḥ tasmāt cākṣuṣaḥ atha viviṁśatiḥ
viviṁśateḥ sutaḥ rambhaḥ khanīnetraḥ asya dhārmikaḥ karandhamaḥ mahārāja tasya āsīt ātmajaḥ nṛpa
tasya avīkṣit sutaḥ yasya maruttaḥ cakravartī abhūt saṁvartaḥ ayājayat yam vai mahā-yogī aṅgiraḥ-sutaḥ
maruttasya yathā yajñaḥ na tathā anyaḥ asti kaścana sarvam hiraṇ-mayam tu āsīt yat kiñcit ca asya śobhanam
amādyat indraḥ somena dakṣiṇābhiḥ dvijātayaḥ marutaḥ pariveṣṭāraḥ viśvedevāḥ sabhā-sadaḥ
maruttasya damaḥ putraḥ tasya āsīt rājya-vardhanaḥ sudhṛtiḥ tat-sutaḥ jajñe saudhṛteyaḥ naraḥ sutaḥ
tat-sutaḥ kevalaḥ tasmāt dhundhumān vegavān tataḥ budhaḥ tasya abhavat yasya tṛṇabinduḥ mahīpatiḥ
tam bheje alambuṣā devī bhajanīya guṇa-ālayam vara-apsarāḥ yataḥ putrāḥ kanyā ca ilavilā abhavat
yasyām utpādayām āsa viśravāḥ dhana-dam sutam prādāya vidyām paramām ṛṣiḥ yoga-īśvaraḥ pituḥ
viśālaḥ śūnyabandhuḥ ca dhūmraketuḥ ca tat-sutāḥ viśālaḥ vaṁśa-kṛt rājā vaiśālīm nirmame purīm
hemacandraḥ sutaḥ tasya dhūmrākṣaḥ tasya ca ātmajaḥ tat-putrāt saṁyamāt āsīt kṛśāśvaḥ saha devajaḥ
kṛśāśvāt somadattaḥ abhūt yaḥ aśvamedhaiḥ iḍaspatim iṣṭvā puruṣam āpa agryām gatim yogeśvara-āśritām saumadattiḥ tu sumatiḥ tat-putraḥ janamejayaḥ ete vaiśāla-bhūpālāḥ tṛṇabindoḥ yaśaḥ-dharāḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca śaryātiḥ mānavaḥ rājā brahmiṣṭhaḥ sambabhūva ha yaḥ vā aṅgirasām satre dvitīyam ahaḥ ūcivān
sukanyā nāma tasya āsīt kanyā kamala-locanā tayā sārdham vana-gataḥ hi agamat cyavana-āśramam
sā sakhībhiḥ parivṛtā vicinvantī aṅghripān vane valmīka-randhre dadṛśe khadyote iva jyotiṣī
te daiva-coditā bālā jyotiṣī kaṇṭakena vai avidhyat mugdha-bhāvena susrāva asṛk tataḥ bahiḥ
śakṛt mūtra nirodhaḥ abhūt sainikānām ca tat-kṣaṇāt rājarṣiḥ tam upālakṣya puruṣān vismitaḥ abravīt
api abhadram naḥ yuṣmābhiḥ bhārgavasya viceṣṭitam vyaktam kena api naḥ tasya kṛtam āśrama-dūṣaṇam
sukanyā prāha pitaram bhītā kiñcit kṛtam mayā dve jyotiṣī ajānantyā nirbhinne kaṇṭakena vai
duhituḥ tat vacaḥ śrutvā śaryātiḥ jāta-sādhvasaḥ munim prasādayām āsa valmīka-antarhitam śanaiḥ
tat abhiprāyam ājñāya prādāt duhitaram muneḥ kṛcchrāt muktaḥ tam āmantrya puram prāyāt samāhitaḥ
sukanyā cyavanam prāpya patim parama-kopanam prīṇayām āsa citta-jñā apramattā anuvṛttibhiḥ
kasyacit tu atha kālasya nāsatyau āśrama āgatau tau pūjayitvā provāca vayaḥ me dattam īśvarau
graham grahīṣye somasya yajñe vām api asoma-poḥ kriyatām me vayaḥ rūpam pramadānām yat īpsitam
bāḍham iti ūcatuḥ vipram abhinandya bhiṣak-tamau nimajjatām bhavān asmin hrade siddha-vinirmite
iti uktaḥ jarayā grasta-dehaḥ dhamani-santataḥ hradam praveśitaḥ aśvibhyām valī-palita-vigrahaḥ
puruṣāḥ trayaḥ uttasthuḥ apīvyāḥ vanitā-priyāḥ padma-srajaḥ kuṇḍalinaḥ tulya-rūpāḥ su-vāsasaḥ
tān nirīkṣya vara-ārohā sa-rūpān sūrya-varcasaḥ ajānatī patim sādhvī aśvinau śaraṇam yayau
darśayitvā patim tasyai pāti-vratyena toṣitau ṛṣim āmantrya yayatuḥ vimānena triviṣṭapam
yakṣyamāṇaḥ atha śaryātiḥ cyavanasya āśramam gataḥ dadarśa duhituḥ pārśve puruṣam sūrya-varcasam
rājā duhitaram prāha kṛta-pāda-abhivandanām āśiṣaḥ ca aprayuñjānaḥ na atiprīti-manāḥ iva
cikīrṣitam te kim idam patiḥ tvayā pralambhitaḥ loka-namaskṛtaḥ muniḥ yat tvam jarā-grastam asati asammatam vihāya jāram bhajase amum adhvagam
katham matiḥ te avagatā anyathā satām kula-prasūte kula-dūṣaṇam tu idam bibharṣi jāram yat apatrapā kulam pituḥ ca bhartuḥ ca nayasi adhaḥ tamaḥ
evam bruvāṇam pitaram smayamānā śuci-smitā uvāca tāta jāmātā tava eṣaḥ bhṛgu-nandanaḥ
śaśaṁsa pitre tat sarvam vayaḥ rūpa abhilambhanam vismitaḥ parama-prītaḥ tanayām pariṣasvaje
somena yājayan vīram graham somasya ca agrahīt asoma-poḥ api aśvinoḥ cyavanaḥ svena tejasā
hantum tam ādade vajram sadyaḥ manyuḥ amarṣitaḥ sa-vajram stambhayām āsa bhujam indrasya bhārgavaḥ
anvajānan tataḥ sarve graham somasya ca aśvinoḥ bhiṣajau iti yat pūrvam soma-āhutyā bahiḥ-kṛtau
uttānabarhiḥ ānartaḥ bhūriṣeṇaḥ iti trayaḥ śaryāteḥ abhavan putrāḥ ānartāt revataḥ abhavat
saḥ antaḥ-samudre nagarīm vinirmāya kuśasthalīm āsthitaḥ abhuṅkta viṣayān ānarta-ādīn arim-dama tasya putra-śatam jajñe kakudmi-jyeṣṭham uttamam
kakudmī revatīm kanyām svām ādāya vibhum gataḥ putryāḥ varam paripraṣṭum brahmalokam apāvṛtam
āvartamāne gāndharve sthitaḥ alabdha-kṣaṇaḥ kṣaṇam tat-ante ādyam ānamya sva-abhiprāyam nyavedayat
tat śrutvā bhagavān brahmā prahasya tam uvāca ha aho rājan niruddhāḥ te kālena hṛdi ye kṛtāḥ
tat putra pautra naptṝṇām gotrāṇi ca na śṛṇmahe kālaḥ abhiyātaḥ tri nava catur-yuga vikalpitaḥ
tat gaccha deva-deva-aṁśaḥ baladevaḥ mahā-balaḥ kanyā-ratnam idam rājan nara-ratnāya dehi bhoḥ
bhuvaḥ bhāra-avatārāya bhagavān bhūta-bhāvanaḥ avatīrṇaḥ nija-aṁśena puṇya-śravaṇa-kīrtanaḥ
iti ādiṣṭaḥ abhivandya ajam nṛpaḥ sva-puram āgataḥ tyaktam puṇya-jana trāsāt bhrātṛbhiḥ dikṣu avasthitaiḥ
sutām dattvā anavadya-aṅgīm balāya bala-śāline badarī-ākhyam gataḥ rājā taptum nārāyaṇa-āśramam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca nābhāgaḥ nabhaga-apatyam yam tatam bhrātaraḥ kavim yaviṣṭham vyabhajan dāyam brahmacāriṇam āgatam
bhrātaraḥ abhāṅkta kim mahyam bhajāma pitaram tava tvām mama āryāḥ tata abhāṅkṣuḥ mā putraka tat ādṛthāḥ
ime aṅgirasaḥ satram āsate adya sumedhasaḥ ṣaṣṭham ṣaṣṭham upetya ahaḥ kave muhyanti karmaṇi
tān tvam śaṁsaya sūkte dve vaiśvadeve mahātmanaḥ te svaḥ yantaḥ dhanam satra-pariśeṣitam ātmanaḥ dāsyanti te atha tān arccha tathā saḥ kṛtavān yathā tasmai dattvā yayuḥ svargam te satra-pariśeṣaṇam
tam kaścit svīkariṣyantam puruṣaḥ kṛṣṇa-darśanaḥ uvāca uttarataḥ abhyetya mama idam vāstukam vasu
mama idam ṛṣibhiḥ dattam iti tarhi sma mānavaḥ syāt nau te pitari praśnaḥ pṛṣṭavān pitaram yathā
yajña-vāstu-gatam sarvam ucchiṣṭam ṛṣayaḥ kvacit cakruḥ hi bhāgam rudrāya saḥ devaḥ sarvam arhati
nābhāgaḥ tam praṇamya āha tava īśa kila vāstukam iti āha me pitā brahman śirasā tvām prasādaye
yat te pitā avadat dharmam tvam ca satyam prabhāṣase dadāmi te mantra-dṛśaḥ jñānam brahma sanātanam
gṛhāṇa draviṇam dattam mat-satra-pariśeṣitam iti uktvā antarhitaḥ rudraḥ bhagavān dharma-vatsalaḥ
yaḥ etat saṁsmaret prātaḥ sāyam ca susamāhitaḥ kaviḥ bhavati mantra-jñaḥ gatim ca eva tathā ātmanaḥ
nābhāgāt ambarīṣaḥ abhūt mahā-bhāgavataḥ kṛtī na aspṛśat brahma-śāpaḥ api yam na pratihataḥ kvacit
śrī-rājā uvāca bhagavan śrotum icchāmi rājarṣeḥ tasya dhīmataḥ na prābhūt yatra nirmuktaḥ brahma-daṇḍaḥ duratyayaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ambarīṣaḥ mahā-bhāgaḥ sapta-dvīpavatīm mahīm avyayām ca śriyam labdhvā vibhavam ca atulam bhuvi mene ati-durlabham puṁsām sarvam tat svapna-saṁstutam vidvān vibhava-nirvāṇam tamaḥ viśati yat pumān
vāsudeve bhagavati tat-bhakteṣu ca sādhuṣu prāptaḥ bhāvam param viśvam yena idam loṣṭra-vat smṛtam
saḥ vai manaḥ kṛṣṇa-pada-aravindayoḥ vacāṁsi vaikuṇṭha-guṇa-anuvarṇane karau hareḥ mandira-mārjana-ādiṣu śrutim cakāra acyuta sat-kathā-udaye mukunda-liṅga-ālaya-darśane dṛśau tat-bhṛtya gātra-sparśe aṅga-saṅgamam ghrāṇam ca tat-pāda saroja saurabhe śrīmat-tulasyāḥ rasanām tat-arpite pādau hareḥ kṣetra pada-anusarpaṇe śiraḥ hṛṣīkeśa pada-abhivandane kāmam ca dāsye na tu kāma-kāmyayā yathā uttamaśloka-jana-āśrayā ratiḥ
evam sadā karma-kalāpam ātmanaḥ pare adhiyajñe bhagavati adhokṣaje sarva-ātma-bhāvam vidadhat mahīm imām tat-niṣṭha vipra abhihitaḥ śaśāsa ha
īje aśvamedhaiḥ adhiyajñam īśvaram mahā-vibhūtyā upacita-aṅga-dakṣiṇaiḥ tataiḥ vasiṣṭha-asita-gautama-ādibhiḥ dhanvani abhisrotam asau sarasvatīm
yasya kratuṣu gīrvāṇaiḥ sadasyāḥ ṛtvijaḥ janāḥ tulya-rūpāḥ ca animiṣāḥ vyadṛśyanta su-vāsasaḥ
svargaḥ na prārthitaḥ yasya manujaiḥ amara-priyaḥ śṛṇvadbhiḥ upagāyadbhiḥ uttamaśloka ceṣṭitam
saṁvardhayanti yat kāmāḥ svā-rājya paribhāvitāḥ durlabhāḥ na api siddhānām mukundam hṛdi paśyataḥ
saḥ ittham bhakti-yogena tapaḥ-yuktena pārthivaḥ sva-dharmeṇa harim prīṇan sarvān kāmān śanaiḥ jahau
gṛheṣu dāreṣu suteṣu bandhuṣu dvipa-uttama syandana vāji vastuṣu akṣayya ratna ābharaṇa ambara-ādiṣu ananta-kośeṣu akarot asat-matim
tasmai adāt hariḥ cakram pratyanīka-bhaya-āvaham ekānta-bhakti-bhāvena prītaḥ bhakta-abhirakṣaṇam
ārirādhayiṣuḥ kṛṣṇam mahiṣyā tulya-śīlayā yuktaḥ sāṁvatsaram vīraḥ dadhāra dvādaśī-vratam
vrata-ante kārtike māsi tri-rātram samupoṣitaḥ snātaḥ kadācit kālindyām harim madhuvane arcayat
mahā-abhiṣeka-vidhinā sarva-upaskara-sampadā abhiṣicya ambara-ākalpaiḥ gandha-mālya arhaṇa-ādibhiḥ tat-gata-antara-bhāvena pūjayām āsa keśavam brāhmaṇān ca mahā-bhāgān siddha-arthān api bhaktitaḥ
gavām rukma-viṣāṇīnām rūpya-aṅghrīṇām su-vāsasām payaḥ-śīla vayaḥ rūpa vatsa-upaskara-sampadām prāhiṇot sādhu-viprebhyaḥ gṛheṣu nyarbudāni ṣaṭ bhojayitvā dvijān agre svādu annam guṇavat-tamam labdha-kāmaiḥ anujñātaḥ pāraṇāya upacakrame tasya tarhi atithiḥ sākṣāt durvāsāḥ bhagavān abhūt
tam ānarca atithim bhūpaḥ pratyutthāna āsana arhaṇaiḥ yayāce abhyavahārāya pāda-mūlam upāgataḥ
pratinandya saḥ tām yācñām kartum āvaśyakam gataḥ nimamajja bṛhat dhyāyan kālindī salile śubhe
muhūrta-ardha-avaśiṣṭāyām dvādaśyām pāraṇam prati cintayām āsa dharma-jñaḥ dvijaiḥ tat-dharma saṅkaṭe
brāhmaṇa-atikrame doṣaḥ dvādaśyām yat apāraṇe yat kṛtvā sādhu me bhūyāt adharmaḥ vā na mām spṛśet ambhasā kevalena atha kariṣye vrata-pāraṇam āhuḥ ap-bhakṣaṇam viprāḥ hi aśitam na aśitam ca tat
iti apaḥ prāśya rājarṣiḥ cintayan manasā acyutam pratyacaṣṭa kuru-śreṣṭha dvija-āgamanam eva saḥ
durvāsāḥ yamunā-kūlāt kṛta āvaśyakaḥ āgataḥ rājñā abhinanditaḥ tasya bubudhe ceṣṭitam dhiyā
manyunā pracalat-gātraḥ bhru-kuṭī kuṭila ānanaḥ bubhukṣitaḥ ca sutarām kṛta-añjalim abhāṣata
aho asya nṛ-śaṁsasya śriyā unmattasya paśyata dharma-vyatikramam viṣṇoḥ abhaktasya īśa-māninaḥ
yaḥ mām atithim āyātam ātithyena nimantrya ca adattvā bhuktavān tasya sadyaḥ te darśaye phalam
evam bruvāṇaḥ utkṛtya jaṭām roṣa-pradīpitaḥ tayā saḥ nirmame tasmai kṛtyām kāla-anala-upamām
tām āpatantīm jvalatīm asi-hastām padā bhuvam vepayantīm samudvīkṣya na cacāla padāt nṛpaḥ
prāk diṣṭam bhṛtya-rakṣāyām puruṣeṇa mahā-ātmanā dadāha kṛtyām tām cakram kruddha ahim iva pāvakaḥ
tat abhidravat udvīkṣya sva-prayāsam ca niṣphalam durvāsāḥ dudruve bhītaḥ dikṣu prāṇa-parīpsayā
tam anvadhāvat bhagavat-ratha-aṅgam dāva-agniḥ uddhūta śikhaḥ yathā ahim tathā anuṣaktam muniḥ īkṣamāṇaḥ guhām vivikṣuḥ prasasāra meroḥ
diśaḥ nabhaḥ kṣmām vivarān samudrān lokān sa-pālān tridivam gataḥ saḥ yataḥ yataḥ dhāvati tatra tatra sudarśanam duṣprasaham dadarśa
alabdha-nāthaḥ saḥ sadā kutaścit santrasta-cittaḥ araṇam eṣamāṇaḥ devam viriñcam samagāt vidhātaḥ trāhi ātma-yone ajita-tejasaḥ mām
śrī-brahmā uvāca sthānam madīyam saha viśvam etat krīḍā-avasāne dvi-parārdha-saṁjñe bhrū-bhaṅga-mātreṇa hi sandidhakṣoḥ kāla-ātmanaḥ yasya tirobhaviṣyati aham bhavaḥ dakṣa bhṛgu pradhānāḥ prajā-īśa bhūta-īśa sura-īśa mukhyāḥ sarve vayam yat-niyamam prapannāḥ mūrdhnyā arpitam loka-hitam vahāmaḥ
pratyākhyātaḥ viriñcena viṣṇu-cakra-upatāpitaḥ durvāsāḥ śaraṇam yātaḥ śarvam kailāsa-vāsinam
śrī-śaṅkaraḥ uvāca vayam na tāta prabhavāmaḥ bhūmni yasmin pare anye api aja jīva kośāḥ bhavanti kāle na bhavanti hi īdṛśāḥ sahasraśaḥ yatra vayam bhramāmaḥ
aham sanat-kumāraḥ ca nāradaḥ bhagavān ajaḥ kapilaḥ apāntaratamaḥ devalaḥ dharmaḥ āsuriḥ marīci pramukhāḥ ca anye siddha-īśāḥ pāra-darśanāḥ vidāmaḥ na vayam sarve yat-māyām māyayā āvṛtāḥ tasya viśva-īśvarasya idam śastram durviṣaham hi naḥ tam evam śaraṇam yāhi hariḥ te śam vidhāsyati
tataḥ nirāśaḥ durvāsāḥ padam bhagavataḥ yayau vaikuṇṭha-ākhyam yat adhyāste śrīnivāsaḥ śriyā saha
sandahyamānaḥ ajita-śastra-vahninā tat-pāda-mūle patitaḥ sa-vepathuḥ āha acyuta ananta sat-īpsita prabho kṛta-āgasam mā avahi viśva-bhāvana
ajānatā te parama-anubhāvam kṛtam mayā agham bhavataḥ priyāṇām vidhehi tasya apacitim vidhātaḥ mucyeta yat nāmni udite nārakaḥ api
śrī-bhagavān uvāca aham bhakta-parādhīnaḥ hi asvatantraḥ iva dvija sādhubhiḥ grasta-hṛdayaḥ bhaktaiḥ bhakta-jana-priyaḥ
na aham ātmānam āśāse mat-bhaktaiḥ sādhubhiḥ vinā śriyam ca ātyantikīm brahman yeṣām gatiḥ aham parā
ye dāra agāra putra āpta prāṇān vittam imam param hitvā mām śaraṇam yātāḥ katham tān tyaktum utsahe
mayi nirbaddha-hṛdayāḥ sādhavaḥ sama-darśanāḥ vaśe kurvanti mām bhaktyā sat-striyaḥ sat-patim yathā
mat-sevayā pratītam te sālokya-ādi-catuṣṭayam na icchanti sevayā pūrṇāḥ kutaḥ anyat kāla-viplutam
sādhavaḥ hṛdayam mahyam sādhūnām hṛdayam tu aham mat-anyat te na jānanti na aham tebhyaḥ manāk api
upāyam kathayiṣyāmi tava vipra śṛṇuṣva tat ayam hi ātma-abhicāraḥ te yataḥ tam yāhi mā ciram sādhuṣu prahitam tejaḥ prahartuḥ kurute aśivam
tapaḥ vidyā ca viprāṇām niḥśreyasa kare ubhe te eva durvinītasya kalpete kartuḥ anyathā
brahman tat gaccha bhadram te nābhāga-tanayam nṛpam kṣamāpaya mahā-bhāgam tataḥ śāntiḥ bhaviṣyati
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam bhagavatā ādiṣṭaḥ durvāsāḥ cakra-tāpitaḥ ambarīṣam upāvṛtya tat-pādau duḥkhitaḥ agrahīt
tasya saḥ udyamam āvīkṣya pāda-sparśa-vilajjitaḥ astāvīt tat hareḥ astram kṛpayā pīḍitaḥ bhṛśam
ambarīṣaḥ uvāca tvam agniḥ bhagavān sūryaḥ tvam somaḥ jyotiṣām patiḥ tvam āpaḥ tvam kṣitiḥ vyoma vāyuḥ mātra indriyāṇi ca
sudarśana namaḥ tubhyam sahasra-ara acyuta-priya sarva-astra-ghātin viprāya svasti bhūyāḥ iḍaspate
tvam dharmaḥ tvam ṛtam satyam tvam yajñaḥ akhila yajña-bhuk tvam loka-pālaḥ sarva-ātmā tvam tejaḥ pauruṣam param
namaḥ su-nābha akhila-dharma-setave hi adharma-śīla asura dhūma-ketave trailokya gopāya viśuddha varcase manaḥ-javāya adbhuta karmaṇe gṛṇe
tvat-tejasā dharma-mayena saṁhṛtam tamaḥ prakāśaḥ ca dṛśaḥ mahā-ātmanām duratyayaḥ te mahimā girām pate tvat-rūpam etat sat-asat para-avaram
yadā visṛṣṭaḥ tvam anañjanena vai balam praviṣṭaḥ ajita daitya-dānavam bāhu udara ūru aṅghri śiraḥ-dharāṇi vṛścan ajasram pradhane virājase
saḥ tvam jagat-trāṇa khala-prahāṇaye nirūpitaḥ sarva-sahaḥ gadā-bhṛtā viprasya ca asmat kula-daiva-hetave vidhehi bhadram tat anugrahaḥ hi naḥ
yadi asti dattam iṣṭam vā sva-dharmaḥ vā su-anuṣṭhitaḥ kulam naḥ vipra-daivam cet dvijaḥ bhavatu vijvaraḥ
yadi naḥ bhagavān prītaḥ ekaḥ sarva-guṇa-āśrayaḥ sarva-bhūta-ātma-bhāvena dvijaḥ bhavatu vijvaraḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti saṁstuvataḥ rājñaḥ viṣṇu-cakram sudarśanam aśāmyat sarvataḥ vipram pradahat rāja yācñayā
saḥ muktaḥ astra-agni-tāpena durvāsāḥ svastimān tataḥ praśaśaṁsa tam urvī-īśam yuñjānaḥ parama-āśiṣaḥ
durvāsāḥ uvāca aho ananta-dāsānām mahattvam dṛṣṭam adya me kṛta-āgasaḥ api yat rājan maṅgalāni samīhase
duṣkaraḥ kaḥ nu sādhūnām dustyajaḥ vā mahā-ātmanām yaiḥ saṅgṛhītaḥ bhagavān sātvatām ṛṣabhaḥ hariḥ
yat-nāma śruti-mātreṇa pumān bhavati nirmalaḥ tasya tīrtha-padaḥ kim vā dāsānām avaśiṣyate
rājan anugṛhītaḥ aham tvayā ati-karuṇa-ātmanā mat-agham pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā prāṇāḥ yat me abhirakṣitāḥ
rājā tam akṛta-āhāraḥ pratyāgamana kāṅkṣayā caraṇau upasaṅgṛhya prasādya samabhojayat
saḥ aśitvā ādṛtam ānītam ātithyam sārva-kāmikam tṛpta-ātmā nṛpatim prāha bhujyatām iti sa-ādaram
prītaḥ asmi anugṛhītaḥ asmi tava bhāgavatasya vai darśana sparśana ālāpaiḥ ātithyena ātma-medhasā
karma avadātam etat te gāyanti svaḥ-striyaḥ muhuḥ kīrtim parama-puṇyām ca kīrtayiṣyati bhūḥ iyam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam saṅkīrtya rājānam durvāsāḥ paritoṣitaḥ yayau vihāyasā āmantrya brahmalokam ahaitukam
saṁvatsaraḥ atyagāt tāvat yāvatā na āgataḥ gataḥ muniḥ tat-darśana-ākāṅkṣaḥ rājā ap-bhakṣaḥ babhūva ha
gate atha durvāsasi saḥ ambarīṣaḥ dvija-upayoga ati-pavitram āharat ṛṣeḥ vimokṣam vyasanam ca vīkṣya mene sva-vīryam ca para-anubhāvam
evam vidhā-aneka-guṇaḥ saḥ rājā para-ātmani brahmaṇi vāsudeve kriyā-kalāpaiḥ samuvāha bhaktim yayā āviriñcyān nirayān cakāra
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca atha ambarīṣaḥ tanayeṣu rājyam samāna-śīleṣu visṛjya dhīraḥ vanam viveśa ātmani vāsudeve manaḥ dadhat dhvasta guṇa-pravāhaḥ
iti etat puṇyam ākhyānam ambarīṣasya bhūpate saṅkīrtayan anudhyāyan bhaktaḥ bhagavataḥ bhavet
ambarīṣasya caritam ye śṛṇvanti mahā-ātmanaḥ muktim prayānti te sarve bhaktyā viṣṇoḥ prasādataḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca virūpaḥ ketumān śambhuḥ ambarīṣa sutāḥ trayaḥ virūpāt pṛṣadaśvaḥ abhūt tat-putraḥ tu rathītaraḥ
rathītarasya aprajasya bhāryāyām tantave arthitaḥ aṅgirāḥ janayām āsa brahma-varcasvinaḥ sutān
ete kṣetra-prasūtāḥ vai punaḥ tu āṅgirasāḥ smṛtāḥ rathītarāṇām pravarāḥ kṣetra-upetāḥ dvi-jātayaḥ
kṣuvataḥ tu manoḥ jajñe ikṣvākuḥ ghrāṇataḥ sutaḥ tasya putra-śata jyeṣṭhāḥ vikukṣi nimi daṇḍakāḥ
teṣām purastāt abhavan āryāvarte nṛpāḥ nṛpa pañca-viṁśatiḥ paścāt ca trayaḥ madhye apare anyataḥ
saḥ ekadā aṣṭakā-śrāddhe ikṣvākuḥ sutam ādiśat māṁsam ānīyatām medhyam vikukṣe gaccha mā ciram
tathā iti saḥ vanam gatvā mṛgān hatvā kriyā-arhaṇān śrāntaḥ bubhukṣitaḥ vīraḥ śaśam ca ādat apasmṛtiḥ
śeṣam nivedayām āsa pitre tena ca tat-guruḥ coditaḥ prokṣaṇāya āha duṣṭam etat akarmakam
jñātvā putrasya tat karma guruṇā abhihitam nṛpaḥ deśāt niḥsārayām āsa sutam tyakta-vidhim ruṣā
saḥ tu vipreṇa saṁvādam jñāpakena samācaran tyaktvā kalevaram yogī saḥ tena avāpa yat param
pitari uparate abhyetya vikukṣiḥ pṛthivīm imām śāsat īje harim yajñaiḥ śaśa-adaḥ iti viśrutaḥ
puram-jayaḥ tasya sutaḥ indra-vāhaḥ iti īritaḥ kakutsthaḥ iti ca api uktaḥ śṛṇu nāmāni karmabhiḥ
kṛta-antaḥ āsīt samaraḥ devānām saha dānavaiḥ pārṣṇigrāhaḥ vṛtaḥ vīraḥ devaiḥ daitya parājitaiḥ
vacanāt deva-devasya viṣṇoḥ viśva-ātmanaḥ prabhoḥ vāhanatve vṛtaḥ tasya babhūva indraḥ mahā-vṛṣaḥ
saḥ sannaddhaḥ dhanuḥ divyam ādāya viśikhān śitān stūyamānaḥ tam āruhya yuyutsuḥ kakudi sthitaḥ tejasā āpyāyitaḥ viṣṇoḥ puruṣasya mahā-ātmanaḥ pratīcyām diśi daityānām nyaruṇat tridaśaiḥ puram
taiḥ tasya ca abhūt pradhanam tumulam loma-harṣaṇam yamāya bhallaiḥ anayat daityān abhiyayuḥ mṛdhe
tasya iṣu-pāta abhimukham yuga-anta agnim iva ulbaṇam visṛjya dudruvuḥ daityāḥ hanyamānāḥ svam ālayam
jitvā param dhanam sarvam sa-strīkam vajra-pāṇaye pratyayacchat saḥ rāja-ṛṣiḥ iti nāmabhiḥ āhṛtaḥ
purañjayasya putraḥ abhūt anenāḥ tat-sutaḥ pṛthuḥ viśvagandhiḥ tataḥ candraḥ yuvanāśvaḥ tu tat-sutaḥ
śrāvastaḥ tat-sutaḥ yena śrāvastī nirmame purī bṛhadaśvaḥ tu śrāvastiḥ tataḥ kuvalayāśvakaḥ
yaḥ priya-artham utaṅkasya dhundhu-nāma asuram balī sutānām eka-viṁśatyā sahasraiḥ ahanat vṛtaḥ
dhundhu-māraḥ iti khyātaḥ tat-sutāḥ te ca jajvaluḥ dhundhoḥ mukha-agninā sarve trayaḥ eva avaśeṣitāḥ dṛḍhāśvaḥ kapilāśvaḥ ca bhadrāśvaḥ iti bhārata dṛḍhāśva-putraḥ haryaśvaḥ nikumbhaḥ tat-sutaḥ smṛtaḥ
bahulāśvaḥ nikumbhasya kṛśāśvaḥ atha asya senajit yuvanāśvaḥ abhavat tasya saḥ anapatyaḥ vanam gataḥ
bhāryā-śatena nirviṇṇaḥ ṛṣayaḥ asya kṛpālavaḥ iṣṭim sma vartayām cakruḥ aindrīm te su-samāhitāḥ
rājā tat-yajña-sadanam praviṣṭaḥ niśi tarṣitaḥ dṛṣṭvā śayānān viprān tān papau mantra-jalam svayam
utthitāḥ te niśamya atha vyudakam kalaśam prabho papracchuḥ kasya karma idam pītam puṁsavanam jalam
rājñā pītam viditvā vai īśvara-prahitena te īśvarāya namaḥ cakruḥ aho daiva-balam balam
tataḥ kāle upāvṛtte kukṣim nirbhidya dakṣiṇam yuvanāśvasya tanayaḥ cakravartī jajāna ha
kam dhāsyati kumāraḥ ayam stanye rorūyate bhṛśam mām dhātā vatsa mā rodīḥ iti indraḥ deśinīm adāt
na mamāra pitā tasya vipra-deva-prasādataḥ yuvanāśvaḥ atha tatra eva tapasā siddhim anvagāt
trasat-dasyuḥ iti indraḥ aṅga vidadhe nāma yasya vai yasmāt trasanti hi udvignāḥ dasyavaḥ rāvaṇa-ādayaḥ yauvanāśvaḥ atha māndhātā cakravartī avanīm prabhuḥ sapta-dvīpa-vatīm ekaḥ śaśāsa acyuta-tejasā
īje ca yajñam kratubhiḥ ātma-vit bhūri-dakṣiṇaiḥ sarva-deva-mayam devam sarva-ātmakam ati-indriyam dravyam mantraḥ vidhiḥ yajñaḥ yajamānaḥ tathā ṛtvijaḥ dharmaḥ deśaḥ ca kālaḥ ca sarvam etat yat ātmakam
yāvat sūryaḥ udeti sma yāvat ca pratitiṣṭhati tat sarvam yauvanāśvasya māndhātuḥ kṣetram ucyate
śaśabindoḥ duhitari bindumatyām adhāt nṛpaḥ purukutsam ambarīṣam mucukundam ca yoginam teṣām svasāraḥ pañcāśat saubharim vavrire patim
yamunā-antaḥ-jale magnaḥ tapyamānaḥ param tapaḥ nirvṛtim mīna-rājasya dṛṣṭvā maithuna-dharmiṇaḥ jāta-spṛhaḥ nṛpam vipraḥ kanyām ekām ayācata saḥ api āha gṛhyatām brahman kāmam kanyā svayaṁvare
saḥ vicintya apriyam strīṇām jaraṭhaḥ aham asat-mataḥ valī palitaḥ ejat-kaḥ iti aham pratyudāhṛtaḥ sādhayiṣye tathā ātmānam sura-strīṇām abhīpsitam kim punaḥ manuja-indrāṇām iti vyavasitaḥ prabhuḥ
muniḥ praveśitaḥ kṣatrā kanyā-antaḥpuram ṛddhi-mat vṛtaḥ saḥ rāja-kanyābhiḥ ekam pañcāśatā varaḥ
tāsām kaliḥ abhūt bhūyān tat-arthe apohya sauhṛdam mama anurūpaḥ na ayam vaḥ iti tat-gata-cetasām
saḥ bahu-ṛcaḥ tābhiḥ apāraṇīya tapaḥ śriyā anarghya paricchadeṣu gṛheṣu nānā upavana amala ambhaḥ saraḥsu saugandhika kānaneṣu mahā-arha śayyā āsana vastra bhūṣaṇa snāna anulepa abhyavahāra mālyakaiḥ su-alaṅkṛta strī puruṣeṣu nityadā reme anugāyat dvija bhṛṅga vandiṣu
yat gārhasthyam tu saṁvīkṣya sapta-dvīpa-vatī-patiḥ vismitaḥ stambham ajahāt sārva-bhauma śriyā-anvitam
evam gṛheṣu abhirataḥ viṣayān vividhaiḥ sukhaiḥ sevamānaḥ na ca atuṣyat ājya-stokaiḥ iva analaḥ
saḥ kadācit upāsīnaḥ ātma-apahnavam ātmanaḥ dadarśa bahu-ṛca-ācāryaḥ mīna-saṅga samutthitam
aho imam paśyata me vināśam tapasvinaḥ sat-carita vratasya antaḥ-jale vāri-cara-prasaṅgāt pracyāvitam brahma ciram dhṛtam yat
saṅgam tyajeta mithuna-vratīnām mumukṣuḥ sarva-ātmanā na visṛjet bahiḥ-indriyāṇi ekaḥ caran rahasi cittam anante īśe yuñjīta tat-vratiṣu sādhuṣu cet prasaṅgaḥ
ekaḥ tapasvī aham atha ambhasi matsya-saṅgāt pañcāśat āsam uta pañca-sahasra-sargaḥ na antam vrajāmi ubhaya-kṛtya manorathānām māyā-guṇaiḥ hṛta matiḥ viṣaye artha-bhāvaḥ
evam vasan gṛhe kālam viraktaḥ nyāsam āsthitaḥ vanam jagāma anuyayuḥ tat-patnyaḥ pati-devatāḥ
tatra taptvā tapaḥ tīkṣṇam ātma-darśanam ātmavān saha eva agnibhiḥ ātmānam yuyoja parama-ātmani
tāḥ sva-patyuḥ mahārāja nirīkṣya adhyātmikīm gatim anvīyuḥ tat-prabhāveṇa agnim śāntam iva arciṣaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca māndhātuḥ putra-pravaraḥ yaḥ ambarīṣaḥ prakīrtitaḥ pitāmahena pravṛtaḥ yauvanāśvaḥ tu tat-sutaḥ hārītaḥ tasya putraḥ abhūt māndhātṛ pravarāḥ ime
narmadā bhrātṛbhiḥ dattā purukutsāya yā uragaiḥ tayā rasātalam nītaḥ bhujaga-indra-prayuktayā
gandharvān avadhīt tatra vadhyān vai viṣṇu-śakti-dhṛk nāgāt labdha-varaḥ sarpāt abhayam smaratām idam
trasaddasyuḥ paurukutsaḥ yaḥ anaraṇyasya deha-kṛt haryaśvaḥ tat-sutaḥ tasmāt prāruṇaḥ atha tribandhanaḥ
tasya satyavrataḥ putraḥ triśaṅkuḥ iti viśrutaḥ prāptaḥ cāṇḍālatām śāpāt guroḥ kauśika-tejasā saśarīraḥ gataḥ svargam adya api divi dṛśyate pātitaḥ avāk-śirāḥ devaiḥ tena eva stambhitaḥ balāt
traiśaṅkavaḥ hariścandraḥ viśvāmitra-vasiṣṭhayoḥ yat-nimittam abhūt yuddham pakṣiṇoḥ bahu-vārṣikam
saḥ anapatyaḥ viṣaṇṇa-ātmā nāradasya upadeśataḥ varuṇam śaraṇam yātaḥ putraḥ me jāyatām prabho
yadi vīraḥ mahārāja tena eva tvām yaje iti tathā iti varuṇena asya putraḥ jātaḥ tu rohitaḥ
jātaḥ sutaḥ hi anena aṅga mām yajasva iti saḥ abravīt yadā paśuḥ nirdaśaḥ syāt atha medhyaḥ bhavet iti
nirdaśe ca saḥ āgatya yajasva iti āha saḥ abravīt dantāḥ paśoḥ yat jāyeran atha medhyaḥ bhavet iti
dantāḥ jātāḥ yajasva iti saḥ pratyāha atha saḥ abravīt yadā patanti asya dantāḥ atha medhyaḥ bhavet iti
paśoḥ nipatitāḥ dantāḥ yajasva iti āha saḥ abravīt yadā paśoḥ punaḥ dantāḥ jāyante atha paśuḥ śuciḥ
punaḥ jātāḥ yajasva iti saḥ pratyāha atha saḥ abravīt sānnāhikaḥ yadā rājan rājanyaḥ atha paśuḥ śuciḥ
iti putra-anurāgeṇa sneha-yantrita-cetasā kālam vañcayatā tam tam uktaḥ devaḥ tam aikṣata
rohitaḥ tat abhijñāya pituḥ karma cikīrṣitam prāṇa-prepsuḥ dhanuḥ-pāṇiḥ araṇyam pratyapadyata
pitaram varuṇa-grastam śrutvā jāta mahā-udaram rohitaḥ grāmam eyāya tam indraḥ pratyaṣedhata
bhūmeḥ paryaṭanam puṇyam tīrtha-kṣetra niṣevaṇaiḥ rohitāya ādiśat śakraḥ saḥ api araṇye avasat samām
evam dvitīye tṛtīye caturthe pañcame tathā abhyetya abhyetya sthaviraḥ vipraḥ bhūtvā āha vṛtra-hā
ṣaṣṭham saṁvatsaram tatra caritvā rohitaḥ purīm upavrajan ajīgartāt akrīṇāt madhyamam sutam śunaḥśepham paśum pitre pradāya samavandata
tataḥ puruṣa-medhena hariścandraḥ mahā-yaśāḥ mukta-udaraḥ ayajat devān varuṇa-ādīn mahat-kathaḥ
viśvāmitraḥ abhavat tasmin hotā ca adhvaryuḥ ātmavān jamadagniḥ abhūt brahmā vasiṣṭhaḥ ayāsyaḥ sāma-gaḥ
tasmai tuṣṭaḥ dadau indraḥ śātakaumbha-mayam ratham śunaḥśephasya māhātmyam upariṣṭāt pracakṣyate
satyam sāram dhṛtim dṛṣṭvā sa-bhāryasya ca bhūpateḥ viśvāmitraḥ bhṛśam prītaḥ dadau avihatām gatim
manaḥ pṛthivyām tām adbhiḥ tejasā apaḥ anilena tat khe vāyum dhārayan tat ca bhūta-ādau tam mahā-ātmani tasmin jñāna-kalām dhyātvā tayā ajñānam vinirdahan hitvā tām svena bhāvena nirvāṇa-sukha-saṁvidā anirdeśya apratarkyeṇa tasthau vidhvasta bandhanaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca haritaḥ rohita-sutaḥ campaḥ tasmāt vinirmitā campā-purī sudevaḥ ataḥ vijayaḥ yasya ca ātma-jaḥ
bharukaḥ tat-sutaḥ tasmāt vṛkaḥ tasya api bāhukaḥ saḥ aribhiḥ hṛta-bhūḥ rājā sa-bhāryaḥ vanam āviśat
vṛddham tam pañcatām prāptam mahiṣī anumariṣyatī aurveṇa jānatā ātmānam prajā-vantam nivāritā
ājñāya asyai sapatnībhiḥ garaḥ dattaḥ andhasā saha saha tena eva sañjātaḥ sagara-ākhyaḥ mahā-yaśāḥ sagaraḥ cakravartī āsīt sāgaraḥ yat-sutaiḥ kṛtaḥ
yaḥ tālajaṅghān yavanān śakān haihaya barbarān na avadhīt guru-vākyena cakre vikṛta-veṣiṇaḥ muṇḍān śmaśru-dharān kāṁścit mukta-keśa ardha-muṇḍitān anantaḥ-vāsasaḥ kāṁścit abahiḥ-vāsasaḥ aparān
saḥ aśvamedhaiḥ ayajata sarva-veda sura ātmakam aurva-upadiṣṭa-yogena harim ātmānam īśvaram tasya utsṛṣṭam paśum yajñe jahāra aśvam purandaraḥ
sumatyāḥ tanayāḥ dṛptāḥ pituḥ ādeśa-kāriṇaḥ hayam anveṣamāṇāḥ te samantāt nyakhanan mahīm
prāk-udīcyām diśi hayam dadṛśuḥ kapila-antike eṣaḥ vāji-haraḥ cauraḥ āste mīlita-locanaḥ hanyatām hanyatām pāpaḥ iti ṣaṣṭi-sahasriṇaḥ udāyudhāḥ abhiyayuḥ unmimeṣa tadā muniḥ
sva-śarīra-agninā tāvat mahendra hṛta-cetasaḥ mahat vyatikrama-hatāḥ bhasmasāt abhavan kṣaṇāt
na sādhu-vādaḥ muni-kopa bharjitāḥ nṛpendra-putrāḥ iti sattva-dhāmani katham tamaḥ roṣa-mayam vibhāvyate jagat-pavitra-ātmani khe rajaḥ bhuvaḥ
yasya īritā sāṅkhya-mayī dṛḍhā iha nauḥ yayā mumukṣuḥ tarate duratyayam bhava-arṇavam mṛtyu-patham vipaścitaḥ parātma-bhūtasya katham pṛthak-matiḥ
yaḥ asamañjasaḥ iti uktaḥ saḥ keśinyāḥ nṛpa-ātmajaḥ tasya putraḥ aṁśumān nāma pitāmaha-hite rataḥ
asamañjasaḥ ātmānam darśayan asamañjasam jāti-smaraḥ purā saṅgāt yogī yogāt vicālitaḥ ācaran garhitam loke jñātīnām karma vipriyam sarayvām krīḍataḥ bālān prāsyat udvejayan janam
evam vṛttaḥ parityaktaḥ pitrā sneham apohya vai yoga-aiśvaryeṇa bālān tān darśayitvā tataḥ yayau
ayodhyā-vāsinaḥ sarve bālakān punaḥ āgatān dṛṣṭvā visismire rājan rājā ca api anvatapyata
aṁśumān coditaḥ rājñā turaga anveṣaṇe yayau pitṛvya-khāta anupatham bhasma-anti dadṛśe hayam
tatra āsīnam munim vīkṣya kapila-ākhyam adhokṣajam astaut samāhita-manāḥ prāñjaliḥ praṇataḥ mahān
aṁśumān uvāca na paśyati tvām param ātmanaḥ ajanaḥ na budhyate adya api samādhi yuktibhiḥ kutaḥ apare tasya manaḥ-śarīra-dhī visarga-sṛṣṭāḥ vayam aprakāśāḥ
ye deha-bhājaḥ tri-guṇa-pradhānāḥ guṇān vipaśyanti uta vā tamaḥ ca yat-māyayā mohita cetasaḥ tvām viduḥ sva-saṁstham na bahiḥ-prakāśāḥ
tam tvām aham jñāna-ghanam svabhāva pradhvasta māyā-guṇa bheda-mohaiḥ sanandana-ādyaiḥ munibhiḥ vibhāvyam katham vimūḍhaḥ paribhāvayāmi
praśānta māyā-guṇa karma-liṅgam anāma-rūpam sat-asat-vimuktam jñāna-upadeśāya gṛhīta-deham namāmahe tvām puruṣam purāṇam
tvat-māyā racite loke vastu-buddhyā gṛha-ādiṣu bhramanti kāma lobha īrṣyā moha vibhrānta cetasaḥ
adya naḥ sarva-bhūta-ātman kāma-karma-indriya-āśayaḥ moha-pāśaḥ dṛḍhaḥ chinnaḥ bhagavan tava darśanāt
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ittham gīta-anubhāvaḥ tam bhagavān kapilaḥ muniḥ aṁśumantam uvāca idam anugrāhya dhiyā nṛpa
śrī-bhagavān uvāca aśvaḥ ayam nīyatām vatsa pitāmaha paśuḥ tava ime ca pitaraḥ dagdhāḥ gaṅgā-ambhaḥ arhanti na itarat
tam parikramya śirasā prasādya hayam ānayat sagaraḥ tena paśunā yajña-śeṣam samāpayat
rājyam aṁśumate nyasya niḥspṛhaḥ mukta-bandhanaḥ aurva-upadiṣṭa mārgeṇa lebhe gatim anuttamām
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca aṁśumān ca tapaḥ tepe gaṅgā ānayana-kāmyayā kālam mahāntam na aśaknot tataḥ kālena saṁsthitaḥ
dilīpaḥ tat-sutaḥ tat-vat aśaktaḥ kālam eyivān bhagīrathaḥ tasya sutaḥ tepe saḥ su-mahat tapaḥ
darśayām āsa tam devī prasannā varadā asmi te iti uktaḥ svam abhiprāyam śaśaṁsa avanataḥ nṛpaḥ
kaḥ api dhārayitā vegam patantyāḥ me mahī-tale anyathā bhū-talam bhittvā nṛpa yāsye rasātalam
kim ca aham na bhuvam yāsye narāḥ mayi āmṛjanti agham mṛjāmi tat agham kva aham rājan tatra vicintyatām
śrī-bhagīrathaḥ uvāca sādhavaḥ nyāsinaḥ śāntāḥ brahmiṣṭhāḥ loka-pāvanāḥ haranti agham te aṅga-saṅgāt teṣu āste hi agha-bhit hariḥ
dhārayiṣyati te vegam rudraḥ tu ātmā śarīriṇām yasmin otam idam protam viśvam śāṭī iva tantuṣu
iti uktvā saḥ nṛpaḥ devam tapasā atoṣayat śivam kālena alpīyasā rājan tasya īśaḥ ca āśu atuṣyata
tathā iti rājñā abhihitam sarva-loka-hitaḥ śivaḥ dadhāra avahitaḥ gaṅgām pāda-pūta-jalām hareḥ
bhagīrathaḥ saḥ rāja-ṛṣiḥ ninye bhuvana-pāvanīm yatra sva-pitṝṇām dehāḥ bhasmībhūtāḥ sma śerate
rathena vāyu-vegena prayāntam anudhāvatī deśān punantī nirdagdhān āsiñcat sagara-ātmajān
yat-jala sparśa-mātreṇa brahma-daṇḍa-hatāḥ api sagara-ātmajāḥ divam jagmuḥ kevalam deha-bhasmabhiḥ
bhasmībhūta-aṅga saṅgena svaḥ yātāḥ sagara-ātmajāḥ kim punaḥ śraddhayā devīm sevante ye dhṛta-vratāḥ
na hi etat param āścaryam svardhunyāḥ yat iha uditam ananta caraṇa-ambhoja prasūtāyāḥ bhava-chidaḥ
sanniveśya manaḥ yasmin śraddhayā munayaḥ amalāḥ traiguṇyam dustyajam hitvā sadyaḥ yātāḥ tat-ātmatām
śrutaḥ bhagīrathāt jajñe tasya nābhaḥ aparaḥ abhavat sindhudvīpaḥ tataḥ tasmāt ayutāyuḥ tataḥ abhavat ṛtūparṇaḥ nala-sakhaḥ yaḥ aśva-vidyām ayāt nalāt dattvā akṣa-hṛdayam ca asmai sarvakāmaḥ tu tat-sutam
tataḥ sudāsaḥ tat-putraḥ damayantī-patiḥ nṛpaḥ āhuḥ mitrasaham yam vai kalmāṣāṅghrim uta kvacit vasiṣṭha-śāpāt rakṣaḥ abhūt anapatyaḥ sva-karmaṇā
śrī-rājā uvāca kim nimittaḥ guroḥ śāpaḥ saudāsasya mahā-ātmanaḥ etat veditum icchāmaḥ kathyatām na rahaḥ yadi
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca saudāsaḥ mṛgayām kiñcit caran rakṣaḥ jaghāna ha mumoca bhrātaram saḥ atha gataḥ praticikīrṣayā sañcintayan agham rājñaḥ sūda-rūpa-dharaḥ gṛhe gurave bhoktu-kāmāya paktvā ninye nara-āmiṣam
parivekṣyamāṇam bhagavān vilokya abhakṣyam añjasā rājānam aśapat kruddhaḥ rakṣaḥ hi evam bhaviṣyasi
rakṣaḥ-kṛtam tat viditvā cakre dvādaśa-vārṣikam saḥ api apaḥ-añjalim ādāya gurum śaptum samudyataḥ vāritaḥ madayantyā apaḥ ruśatīḥ pādayoḥ jahau diśaḥ kham avanīm sarvam paśyan jīva-mayam nṛpaḥ
rākṣasam bhāvam āpannaḥ pāde kalmāṣatām gataḥ vyavāya-kāle dadṛśe vana-okaḥ dam-patī dvijau
kṣudhā-ārtaḥ jagṛhe vipram tat-patnī āha akṛta-artha-vat na bhavān rākṣasaḥ sākṣāt ikṣvākūṇām mahā-rathaḥ madayantyāḥ patiḥ vīra na adharmam kartum arhasi dehi me apatya-kāmāyāḥ akṛta-artham patim dvijam
dehaḥ ayam mānuṣaḥ rājan puruṣasya akhila artha-daḥ tasmāt asya vadhaḥ vīra sarva-artha-vadhaḥ ucyate
eṣaḥ hi brāhmaṇaḥ vidvān tapaḥ śīla guṇa-anvitaḥ ārirādhayiṣuḥ brahma mahā-puruṣa saṁjñitam sarva-bhūta ātma-bhāvena bhūteṣu antarhitam guṇaiḥ
saḥ ayam brahma-ṛṣi-varyaḥ te rāja-ṛṣi-pravarāt vibho katham arhati dharma-jña vadham pituḥ iva ātmajaḥ
tasya sādhoḥ apāpasya bhrūṇasya brahma-vādinaḥ katham vadham yathā babhroḥ manyate sat-mataḥ bhavān
yadi ayam kriyate bhakṣyaḥ tarhi mām khāda pūrvataḥ na jīviṣye vinā yena kṣaṇam ca mṛtakam yathā
evam karuṇa-bhāṣiṇyāḥ vilapantyāḥ anātha-vat vyāghraḥ paśum iva akhādat saudāsaḥ śāpa mohitaḥ
brāhmaṇī vīkṣya didhiṣum puruṣa-adena bhakṣitam śocantī ātmānam urvīśam aśapat kupitā satī
yasmāt me bhakṣitaḥ pāpa kāma-ārtāyāḥ patiḥ tvayā tava api mṛtyuḥ ādhānāt akṛta-prajña darśitaḥ
evam mitrasaham śaptvā pati-loka-parāyaṇā tat-asthīni samiddhe agnau prāsya bhartuḥ gatim gatā
viśāpaḥ dvādaśa-abda-ante maithunāya samudyataḥ vijñāpya brāhmaṇī-śāpam mahiṣyā saḥ nivāritaḥ
ataḥ ūrdhvam saḥ tatyāja strī-sukham karmaṇā aprajāḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ tat-anujñātaḥ madayantyām prajām adhāt
sā vai sapta samāḥ garbham abibhrat na vyajāyata jaghne aśmanā udaram tasyāḥ saḥ aśmakaḥ tena kathyate
aśmakāt bālikaḥ jajñe yaḥ strībhiḥ parirakṣitaḥ nārī-kavacaḥ iti uktaḥ niḥkṣatre mūlakaḥ abhavat
tataḥ daśarathaḥ tasmāt putraḥ aiḍaviḍiḥ tataḥ rājā viśvasahaḥ yasya khaṭvāṅgaḥ cakravartī abhūt
yaḥ devaiḥ arthitaḥ daityān avadhīt yudhi durjayaḥ muhūrtam āyuḥ jñātvā etya sva-puram sandadhe manaḥ
na me brahma-kulāt prāṇāḥ kula-daivāt na ca ātmajāḥ na śriyaḥ na mahī rājyam na dārāḥ ca ati-vallabhāḥ
na bālye api matiḥ mahyam adharme ramate kvacit na apaśyam uttamaślokāt anyat kiñcana vastu aham
devaiḥ kāma-varaḥ dattaḥ mahyam tri-bhuvana-īśvaraiḥ na vṛṇe tam aham kāmam bhūtabhāvana-bhāvanaḥ
ye vikṣipta-indriya-dhiyaḥ devāḥ te sva-hṛdi sthitam na vindanti priyam śaśvat ātmānam kim uta apare
atha īśa-māyā raciteṣu saṅgam guṇeṣu gandharva-pura-upameṣu rūḍham prakṛtyā ātmani viśva-kartuḥ bhāvena hitvā tam aham prapadye
iti vyavasitaḥ buddhyā nārāyaṇa-gṛhītayā hitvā anya-bhāvam ajñānam tataḥ svam bhāvam āsthitaḥ
yat tat brahma param sūkṣmam aśūnyam śūnya-kalpitam bhagavān vāsudeva iti yam gṛṇanti hi sātvatāḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca khaṭvāṅgāt dīrghabāhuḥ ca raghuḥ tasmāt pṛthu-śravāḥ ajaḥ tataḥ mahā-rājaḥ tasmāt daśarathaḥ abhavat
tasya api bhagavān eṣaḥ sākṣāt brahma-mayaḥ hariḥ aṁśa-aṁśena caturdhā agāt putratvam prārthitaḥ suraiḥ rāma lakṣmaṇa bharata śatrughnāḥ iti saṁjñayā
tasya anucaritam rājan ṛṣibhiḥ tattva-darśibhiḥ śrutam hi varṇitam bhūri tvayā sītā-pateḥ muhuḥ
guru-arthe tyakta-rājyaḥ vyacarat anuvanam padma-padbhyām priyāyāḥ pāṇi-sparśa-akṣamābhyām mṛjita-patha-rujaḥ yaḥ harīndra-anujābhyām vairūpyāt śūrpaṇakhyāḥ priya-viraha ruṣā āropita-bhrū-vijṛmbha trasta abdhiḥ baddha-setuḥ khala-dava-dahanaḥ kosala-indraḥ avatāt naḥ
viśvāmitra-adhvare yena mārīca-ādyāḥ niśā-carāḥ paśyataḥ lakṣmaṇasya eva hatāḥ nairṛta-puṅgavāḥ
yaḥ loka-vīra-samitau dhanuḥ aiśam ugram sītā-svayaṁvara-gṛhe triśata-upanītam ādāya bāla-gaja-līlaḥ iva ikṣu-yaṣṭim sajjyī-kṛtam nṛpa vikṛṣya babhañja madhye jitvā anurūpa guṇa śīla vayaḥ aṅga rūpām sītā-abhidhām śriyam urasi abhilabdhamānām mārge vrajan bhṛgupateḥ vyanayat prarūḍham darpam mahīm akṛta yaḥ triḥ arāja bījām
yaḥ satya-pāśa-parivīta-pituḥ nideśam straiṇasya ca api śirasā jagṛhe sa-bhāryaḥ rājyam śriyam praṇayinaḥ suhṛdaḥ nivāsam tyaktvā yayau vanam asūn iva mukta-saṅgaḥ
rakṣaḥ-svasuḥ vyakṛta rūpam aśuddha-buddheḥ tasyāḥ khara-triśira-dūṣaṇa-mukhya-bandhūn jaghne caturdaśa-sahasram apāraṇīya kodaṇḍa pāṇiḥ aṭamānaḥ uvāsa kṛcchram
sītā-kathā śravaṇa dīpita hṛt-śayena sṛṣṭam vilokya nṛpate daśa-kandhareṇa jaghne adbhuta-eṇa-vapuṣā āśramataḥ apakṛṣṭaḥ mārīcam āśu viśikhena yathā kam ugraḥ
rakṣaḥ-adhamena vṛka-vat vipine asamakṣam vaideha-rāja-duhitari apayāpitāyām bhrātrā vane kṛpaṇa-vat priyayā viyuktaḥ strī-saṅginām gatim iti prathayan cacāra
dagdhvā ātma-kṛtya-hata-kṛtyam ahan kabandham sakhyam vidhāya kapibhiḥ dayitā-gatim taiḥ buddhvā atha vālini hate plavaga-indra-sainyaiḥ velām agāt saḥ manu-jaḥ aja bhava arcita-aṅghriḥ
yat-roṣa vibhrama vivṛtta kaṭākṣa-pāta sambhrānta nakra makaraḥ bhaya-gīrṇa-ghoṣaḥ sindhuḥ śirasi arhaṇam parigṛhya rūpī pāda-aravindam upagamya babhāṣa etat
na tvām vayam jaḍa-dhiyaḥ nu vidāmaḥ bhūman kūṭa-stham ādi-puruṣam jagatām adhīśam yat sattvataḥ sura-gaṇāḥ rajasaḥ prajā-īśāḥ manyoḥ ca bhūta-patayaḥ saḥ bhavān guṇa-īśaḥ
kāmam prayāhi jahi viśravasaḥ avameham trailokya rāvaṇam avāpnuhi vīra patnīm badhnīhi setum iha te yaśasaḥ vitatyai gāyanti dik-vijayinaḥ yam upetya bhūpāḥ
baddhvā udadhau raghu-patiḥ vividha adri-kūṭaiḥ setum kapi-indra kara-kampita bhūruha-aṅgaiḥ sugrīva nīla hanumat pramukhaiḥ anīkaiḥ laṅkām vibhīṣaṇa-dṛśā āviśat agra-dagdhām
sā vānara-indra bala ruddha vihāra koṣṭha śrī dvāra gopura sadaḥ valabhī viṭaṅkā nirbhajyamāna dhiṣaṇa dhvaja hema-kumbha śṛṅgāṭakā gaja-kulaiḥ hradinī iva ghūrṇā
rakṣaḥ-patiḥ tat avalokya nikumbha kumbha dhūmrākṣa durmukha surāntaka narāntaka ādīn putram prahastam atikāya vikampana ādīn sarva-anugān samahinot atha kumbhakarṇam
tām yātudhāna-pṛtanām asi śūla cāpa prāsa-ṛṣṭi śakti-śara tomara khaḍga durgām sugrīva lakṣmaṇa marut-suta gandhamāda nīla aṅgada ṛkṣa panasa ādibhiḥ anvitaḥ agāt
te anīka-pāḥ raghupateḥ abhipatya sarve dvandvam varūtham ibha patti ratha aśva yodhaiḥ jaghnuḥ drumaiḥ giri gadā iṣubhiḥ aṅgada-ādyāḥ sītā abhimarṣa hata maṅgala rāvaṇa-īśān
rakṣaḥ-patiḥ sva-bala-naṣṭim avekṣya ruṣṭaḥ āruhya yānakam atha abhisasāra rāmam svaḥ-syandane dyumati mātalinā upanīte vibhrājamānam ahanat niśitaiḥ kṣurapraiḥ
rāmaḥ tam āha puruṣa-ada-purīṣa yat naḥ kāntā asamakṣam asatā apahṛtā śva-vat te tyakta-trapasya phalam adya jugupsitasya yacchāmi kālaḥ iva kartuḥ alaṅghya-vīryaḥ
evam kṣipan dhanuṣi sandhitam utsasarja bāṇam saḥ vajram iva tat-hṛdayam bibheda saḥ asṛk vaman daśa-mukhaiḥ nyapatat vimānāt hāhā iti jalpati jane sukṛtī iva riktaḥ
tataḥ niṣkramya laṅkāyāḥ yātudhānyaḥ sahasraśaḥ mandodaryā samam tatra prarudantyaḥ upādravan
svān svān bandhūn pariṣvajya lakṣmaṇa-iṣubhiḥ arditān ruruduḥ su-svaram dīnāḥ ghnantyaḥ ātmānam ātmanā
hā hatāḥ sma vayam nātha loka-rāvaṇa rāvaṇa kam yāyāt śaraṇam laṅkā tvat-vihīnā para-arditā
na vai veda mahā-bhāga bhavān kāma-vaśam gataḥ tejaḥ anubhāvam sītāyāḥ yena nītaḥ daśām imām
kṛtā eṣā vidhavā laṅkā vayam ca kula-nandana dehaḥ kṛtaḥ annam gṛdhrāṇām ātmā naraka-hetave
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca svānām vibhīṣaṇaḥ cakre kosala-indra-anumoditaḥ pitṛ-medha-vidhānena yat uktam sāmparāyikam
tataḥ dadarśa bhagavān aśoka-vanika-āśrame kṣāmām sva-viraha-vyādhim śiṁśapā mūlam āśritām
rāmaḥ priya-tamām bhāryām dīnām vīkṣya anvakampata ātma-sandarśana āhlāda vikasat mukha paṅkajām
āropya āruruhe yānam bhrātṛbhyām hanumat-yutaḥ vibhīṣaṇāya bhagavān dattvā rakṣaḥ-gaṇa-īśatām laṅkām āyuḥ ca kalpa-antam yayau cīrṇa-vrataḥ purīm
avakīryamāṇaḥ su-kusumaiḥ loka-pāla-arpitaiḥ pathi upagīyamāna-caritaḥ śatadhṛti-ādibhiḥ mudā
go-mūtra-yāvakam śrutvā bhrātaram valkala-ambaram mahā-kāruṇikaḥ atapyat jaṭilam sthaṇḍile-śayam
bharataḥ prāptam ākarṇya paura amātya purohitaiḥ pāduke śirasi nyasya rāmam pratyudyataḥ agrajam nandigrāmāt sva-śibirāt gīta-vāditra niḥsvanaiḥ brahma-ghoṣeṇa ca muhuḥ paṭhadbhiḥ brahma-vādibhiḥ svarṇa-kakṣa-patākābhiḥ haimaiḥ citra-dhvajaiḥ rathaiḥ sat-aśvaiḥ rukma sannāhaiḥ bhaṭaiḥ puraṭa-varmabhiḥ śreṇībhiḥ vāra-mukhyābhiḥ bhṛtyaiḥ ca eva pada-anugaiḥ pārameṣṭhyāni upādāya paṇyāni ucca-avacāni ca pādayoḥ nyapatat premṇā praklinna hṛdaya īkṣaṇaḥ
pāduke nyasya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ bāṣpa-locanaḥ tam āśliṣya ciram dorbhyām snāpayan netra-jaiḥ jalaiḥ rāmaḥ lakṣmaṇa-sītābhyām viprebhyaḥ ye arha-sattamāḥ tebhyaḥ svayam namaḥ-cakre prajābhiḥ ca namaḥ-kṛtaḥ
dhunvantaḥ uttara-āsaṅgān patim vīkṣya cira-āgatam uttarāḥ kosalāḥ mālyaiḥ kirantaḥ nanṛtuḥ mudā
pāduke bharataḥ agṛhṇāt cāmara vyajana uttame vibhīṣaṇaḥ sa-sugrīvaḥ śveta-chatram marut-sutaḥ dhanuḥ niṣaṅgān śatrughnaḥ sītā tīrtha-kamaṇḍalum abibhrat aṅgadaḥ khaḍgam haimam carma ṛkṣa-rāṭ nṛpa
puṣpaka-sthaḥ nutaḥ strībhiḥ stūyamānaḥ ca vandibhiḥ vireje bhagavān rājan grahaiḥ candraḥ iva uditaḥ
bhrātrā abhinanditaḥ saḥ atha sa-utsavām prāviśat purīm praviśya rāja-bhavanam guru-patnīḥ sva-mātaram gurūn vayasya avara-jān pūjitaḥ pratyapūjayat vaidehī lakṣmaṇaḥ ca eva yathā-vat samupeyatuḥ
putrān sva-mātaraḥ tāḥ tu prāṇān tanvaḥ iva utthitāḥ āropya aṅke abhiṣiñcantyaḥ bāṣpa oghaiḥ vijahuḥ śucaḥ
jaṭāḥ nirmucya vidhi-vat kula-vṛddhaiḥ samam guruḥ abhyaṣiñcat yathā eva indram catuḥ-sindhu-jala ādibhiḥ
evam kṛta-śiraḥ-snānaḥ su-vāsāḥ sragvi-alaṅkṛtaḥ su-alaṅkṛtaiḥ su-vāsobhiḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ bhāryayā babhau
agrahīt āsanam bhrātrā praṇipatya prasāditaḥ prajāḥ sva-dharma-niratāḥ varṇāśrama guṇa-anvitāḥ jugopa pitṛ-vat rāmaḥ menire pitaram ca tam
tretāyām vartamānāyām kālaḥ kṛta samaḥ abhavat rāme rājani dharma-jñe sarva-bhūta sukha-āvahe
vanāni nadyaḥ girayaḥ varṣāṇi dvīpa sindhavaḥ sarve kāma-dughāḥ āsan prajānām bharata-ṛṣabha
na ādhi vyādhi jarā glāni duḥkha śoka bhaya klamāḥ mṛtyuḥ ca anicchatām na āsīt rāme rājani adhokṣaje
eka-patnī-vrata-dharaḥ rāja-ṛṣi caritaḥ śuciḥ sva-dharmam gṛha-medhīyam śikṣayan svayam ācarat
premṇā anuvṛttyā śīlena praśraya-avanatā satī bhiyā hriyā ca bhāva-jñā bhartuḥ sītā aharat manaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca bhagavān ātmanā ātmānam rāmaḥ uttama-kalpakaiḥ sarva-deva-mayam devam īje atha ācāryavān makhaiḥ
hotre adadāt diśam prācīm brahmaṇe dakṣiṇām prabhuḥ adhvaryave pratīcīm vā uttarām sāma-gāya saḥ
ācāryāya dadau śeṣām yāvatī bhūḥ tat-antarā manyamānaḥ idam kṛtsnam brāhmaṇaḥ arhati niḥspṛhaḥ
iti ayam tat alaṅkāra-vāsobhyām avaśeṣitaḥ tathā rājñī api vaidehī saumaṅgalyā avaśeṣitā
te tu brāhmaṇa-devasya vātsalyam vīkṣya saṁstutam prītāḥ klinna-dhiyaḥ tasmai pratyarpya idam babhāṣire
aprattam naḥ tvayā kim nu bhagavan bhuvana-īśvara yat naḥ antaḥ-hṛdayam viśya tamaḥ haṁsi sva-rociṣā
namaḥ brahmaṇya-devāya rāmāya akuṇṭha-medhase uttamaśloka-dhuryāya nyasta-daṇḍa-arpita-aṅghraye
kadācit loka-jijñāsuḥ gūḍhaḥ rātryām alakṣitaḥ caran vācaḥ aśṛṇot rāmaḥ bhāryām uddiśya kasyacit
na aham bibharmi tvām duṣṭām asatīm para-veśma-gām straiṇaḥ hi bibhṛyāt sītām rāmaḥ na aham bhaje punaḥ
iti lokāt bahu-mukhāt durārādhyāt asaṁvidaḥ patyā bhītena sā tyaktā prāptā prācetasa-āśramam
antarvatnī āgate kāle yamau sā suṣuve sutau kuśaḥ lavaḥ iti khyātau tayoḥ cakre kriyāḥ muniḥ
aṅgadaḥ citraketuḥ ca lakṣmaṇasya ātmajau smṛtau takṣaḥ puṣkalaḥ iti āstām bharatasya mahīpate
subāhuḥ śrutasenaḥ ca śatrughnasya babhūvatuḥ gandharvān koṭiśaḥ jaghne bharataḥ vijaye diśām tadīyam dhanam ānīya sarvam rājñe nyavedayat śatrughnaḥ ca madhoḥ putram lavaṇam nāma rākṣasam hatvā madhuvane cakre mathurām nāma vai purīm
munau nikṣipya tanayau sītā bhartrā vivāsitā dhyāyantī rāma-caraṇau vivaram praviveśa ha
tat śrutvā bhagavān rāmaḥ rundhan api dhiyā śucaḥ smaran tasyāḥ guṇān tān tān na aśaknot roddhum īśvaraḥ
strī-pum-prasaṅgaḥ etādṛk sarvatra trāsam-āvahaḥ api īśvarāṇām kim uta grāmyasya gṛha-cetasaḥ
tataḥ ūrdhvam brahmacaryam dhārayan ajuhot prabhuḥ trayodaśa-abda-sāhasram agnihotram akhaṇḍitam
smaratām hṛdi vinyasya viddham daṇḍaka-kaṇṭakaiḥ sva-pāda-pallavam rāmaḥ ātma-jyotiḥ agāt tataḥ
na idam yaśaḥ raghu-pateḥ sura-yācñayā ātta-līlā-tanoḥ adhika-sāmya-vimukta-dhāmnaḥ rakṣaḥ-vadhaḥ jaladhi-bandhanam astra-pūgaiḥ kim tasya śatru-hanane kapayaḥ sahāyāḥ
yasya amalam nṛpa-sadaḥsu yaśaḥ adhunā api gāyanti agha-ghnam ṛṣayaḥ dik-ibha-indra-paṭṭam tam nāka-pāla vasu-pāla kirīṭa juṣṭa pāda-ambujam raghu-patim śaraṇam prapadye
saḥ yaiḥ spṛṣṭaḥ abhidṛṣṭaḥ vā saṁviṣṭaḥ anugataḥ api vā kosalāḥ te yayuḥ sthānam yatra gacchanti yoginaḥ
puruṣaḥ rāma-caritam śravaṇaiḥ upadhārayan ānṛśaṁsya-paraḥ rājan karma-bandhaiḥ vimucyate
śrī-rājā uvāca katham saḥ bhagavān rāmaḥ bhrātṝn vā svayam ātmanaḥ tasmin vā te anvavartanta prajāḥ paurāḥ ca īśvare
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca atha ādiśat dik-vijaye bhrātṝn tri-bhuvana-īśvaraḥ ātmānam darśayan svānām purīm aikṣata sa-anugaḥ
āsikta-mārgām gandha-udaiḥ kariṇām mada-śīkaraiḥ svāminam prāptam ālokya mattām vā sutarām iva
prāsāda gopura sabhā caitya deva-gṛha ādiṣu vinyasta hema-kalaśaiḥ patākābhiḥ ca maṇḍitām
pūgaiḥ sa-vṛntaiḥ rambhābhiḥ paṭṭikābhiḥ su-vāsasām ādarśaiḥ aṁśukaiḥ sragbhiḥ kṛta-kautuka toraṇām
tam upeyuḥ tatra tatra paurāḥ arhaṇa-pāṇayaḥ āśiṣaḥ yuyujuḥ deva pāhi imām prāk tvayā uddhṛtām
tataḥ prajāḥ vīkṣya patim cira-āgatam didṛkṣayā utsṛṣṭa-gṛhāḥ striyaḥ narāḥ āruhya harmyāṇi aravinda-locanam atṛpta-netrāḥ kusumaiḥ avākiran
atha praviṣṭaḥ sva-gṛham juṣṭam svaiḥ pūrva-rājabhiḥ ananta akhila koṣa āḍhyam anarghya uru paricchadam vidruma udumbara-dvāraiḥ vaidūrya-stambha paṅktibhiḥ sthalaiḥ mārakataiḥ svacchaiḥ bhrājat sphaṭika bhittibhiḥ citra-sragbhiḥ paṭṭikābhiḥ vāsaḥ maṇi-gaṇa-aṁśukaiḥ muktā-phalaiḥ cit-ullāsaiḥ kānta-kāma upapattibhiḥ dhūpa-dīpaiḥ surabhibhiḥ maṇḍitam puṣpa-maṇḍanaiḥ strī-pumbhiḥ sura-saṅkāśaiḥ juṣṭam bhūṣaṇa-bhūṣaṇaiḥ
tasmin saḥ bhagavān rāmaḥ snigdhayā priyayā iṣṭayā reme sva-ārāma dhīrāṇām ṛṣabhaḥ sītayā kila
bubhuje ca yathā-kālam kāmān dharmam apīḍayan varṣa-pūgān bahūn nṝṇām abhidhyāta aṅghri-pallavaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca kuśasya ca atithiḥ tasmāt niṣadhaḥ tat-sutaḥ nabhaḥ puṇḍarīkaḥ atha tat-putraḥ kṣemadhanvā abhavat tataḥ
devānīkaḥ tataḥ anīhaḥ pāriyātraḥ atha tat-sutaḥ tataḥ balasthalaḥ tasmāt vajranābhaḥ arka-sambhavaḥ
sagaṇaḥ tat sutaḥ tasmāt vidhṛtiḥ ca abhavat sutaḥ tataḥ hiraṇyanābhaḥ abhūt yoga-ācāryaḥ tu jaimineḥ śiṣyaḥ kauśalyaḥ ādhyātmam yājñavalkyaḥ adhyagāt yataḥ yogam mahā-udayam ṛṣiḥ hṛdaya-granthi-bhedakam
puṣpaḥ hiraṇyanābhasya dhruvasandhiḥ tataḥ abhavat sudarśanaḥ atha agnivarṇaḥ śīghraḥ tasya maruḥ sutaḥ
saḥ asau āste yoga-siddhaḥ kalāpa-grāmam āsthitaḥ kaleḥ ante sūrya-vaṁśam naṣṭam bhāvayitā punaḥ
tasmāt prasuśrutaḥ tasya sandhiḥ tasya api amarṣaṇaḥ mahasvān tat sutaḥ tasmāt viśvabāhuḥ ajāyata
tataḥ prasenajit tasmāt takṣakaḥ bhavitā punaḥ tataḥ bṛhadbalaḥ yaḥ tu pitrā te samare hataḥ
ete hi ikṣvāku-bhūpālāḥ atītāḥ śṛṇu anāgatān bṛhadbalasya bhavitā putraḥ nāmnā bṛhadraṇaḥ
ūrukriyaḥ sutaḥ tasya vatsavṛddhaḥ bhaviṣyati prativyomaḥ tataḥ bhānuḥ divākaḥ vāhinī-patiḥ
sahadevaḥ tataḥ vīraḥ bṛhadaśvaḥ atha bhānumān pratīkāśvaḥ bhānumataḥ supratīkaḥ atha tat-sutaḥ
bhavitā marudevaḥ atha sunakṣatraḥ atha puṣkaraḥ tasya antarikṣaḥ tat-putraḥ sutapāḥ tat amitrajit
bṛhadrājaḥ tu tasya api barhiḥ tasmāt kṛtañjayaḥ raṇañjayaḥ tasya sutaḥ sañjayaḥ bhavitā tataḥ
tasmāt śākyaḥ atha śuddhodaḥ lāṅgalaḥ tat-sutaḥ smṛtaḥ tataḥ prasenajit tasmāt kṣudrakaḥ bhavitā tataḥ
raṇakaḥ bhavitā tasmāt surathaḥ tanayaḥ tataḥ sumitraḥ nāma niṣṭhā-antaḥ ete bārhadbala-anvayāḥ
ikṣvākūṇām ayam vaṁśaḥ sumitra-antaḥ bhaviṣyati yataḥ tam prāpya rājānam saṁsthām prāpsyati vai kalau
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca nimiḥ ikṣvāku-tanayaḥ vasiṣṭham avṛta ṛtvijam ārabhya satram saḥ api āha śakreṇa prāk vṛtaḥ asmi bhoḥ
tam nirvartya āgamiṣyāmi tāvat mām pratipālaya tūṣṇīm āsīt gṛha-patiḥ saḥ api indrasya akarot makham
nimiḥ calam idam vidvān satram ārabhata ātmavān ṛtvigbhiḥ aparaiḥ tāvat na āgamat yāvatā guruḥ
śiṣya-vyatikramam vīkṣya tam nirvartya āgataḥ guruḥ aśapat patatāt dehaḥ nimeḥ paṇḍita-māninaḥ
nimiḥ pratidadau śāpam gurave adharma-vartine tava api patatāt dehaḥ lobhāt dharmam ajānataḥ
iti utsasarja svam deham nimiḥ adhyātma-kovidaḥ mitrā-varuṇayoḥ jajñe urvaśyām prapitāmahaḥ
gandha-vastuṣu tat-deham nidhāya muni-sattamāḥ samāpte satra-yāge ca devān ūcuḥ samāgatān
rājñaḥ jīvatu dehaḥ ayam prasannāḥ prabhavaḥ yadi tathā iti ukte nimiḥ prāha mā bhūt me deha-bandhanam
yasya yogam na vāñchanti viyoga-bhaya-kātarāḥ bhajanti caraṇa-ambhojam munayaḥ hari-medhasaḥ
deham na avarurutse aham duḥkha-śoka-bhaya-āvaham sarvatra asya yataḥ mṛtyuḥ matsyānām udake yathā
devāḥ ūcuḥ videhaḥ uṣyatām kāmam locaneṣu śarīriṇām unmeṣaṇa-nimeṣābhyām lakṣitaḥ adhyātma-saṁsthitaḥ
arājaka-bhayam nṝṇām manyamānāḥ mahā-ṛṣayaḥ deham mamanthuḥ sma nimeḥ kumāraḥ samajāyata
janmanā janakaḥ saḥ abhūt vaidehaḥ tu videha-jaḥ mithilaḥ mathanāt jātaḥ mithilā yena nirmitā
tasmāt udāvasuḥ tasya putraḥ abhūt nandivardhanaḥ tataḥ suketuḥ tasya api devarātaḥ mahīpate
tasmāt bṛhadrathaḥ tasya mahāvīryaḥ sudhṛt-pitā sudhṛteḥ dhṛṣṭaketuḥ vai haryaśvaḥ atha maruḥ tataḥ
maroḥ pratīpakaḥ tasmāt jātaḥ kṛtarathaḥ yataḥ devamīḍhaḥ tasya putraḥ viśrutaḥ atha mahādhṛtiḥ
kṛtirātaḥ tataḥ tasmāt mahāromā ca tat-sutaḥ svarṇaromā sutaḥ tasya hrasvaromā vyajāyata
tataḥ śīradhvajaḥ jajñe yajña-artham karṣataḥ mahīm sītā śīra-agrataḥ jātā tasmāt śīradhvajaḥ smṛtaḥ
kuśadhvajaḥ tasya putraḥ tataḥ dharmadhvajaḥ nṛpaḥ dharmadhvajasya dvau putrau kṛtadhvaja-mitadhvajau
kṛtadhvajāt keśidhvajaḥ khāṇḍikyaḥ tu mitadhvajāt kṛtadhvaja-sutaḥ rājan ātma-vidyā-viśāradaḥ khāṇḍikyaḥ karma-tattva-jñaḥ bhītaḥ keśidhvajāt drutaḥ bhānumān tasya putraḥ abhūt śatadyumnaḥ tu tat-sutaḥ
śuciḥ tu tanayaḥ tasmāt sanadvājaḥ sutaḥ abhavat ūrjaketuḥ sanadvājāt ajaḥ atha purujit sutaḥ
ariṣṭanemiḥ tasya api śrutāyuḥ tat supārśvakaḥ tataḥ citrarathaḥ yasya kṣemādhiḥ mithilā-adhipaḥ
tasmāt samarathaḥ tasya sutaḥ satyarathaḥ tataḥ āsīt upaguruḥ tasmāt upaguptaḥ agni-sambhavaḥ
vasvanantaḥ atha tat-putraḥ yuyudhaḥ yat subhāṣaṇaḥ śrutaḥ tataḥ jayaḥ tasmāt vijayaḥ asmāt ṛtaḥ sutaḥ
śunakaḥ tat-sutaḥ jajñe vītahavyaḥ dhṛtiḥ tataḥ bahulāśvaḥ dhṛteḥ tasya kṛtiḥ asya mahāvaśī
ete vai maithilāḥ rājan ātma-vidyā-viśāradāḥ yogeśvara-prasādena dvandvaiḥ muktāḥ gṛheṣu api
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca atha ataḥ śrūyatām rājan vaṁśaḥ somasya pāvanaḥ yasmin aila-ādayaḥ bhūpāḥ kīrtyante puṇya-kīrtayaḥ
sahasra-śirasaḥ puṁsaḥ nābhi-hrada-saroruhāt jātasya āsīt sutaḥ dhātuḥ atriḥ pitṛ-samaḥ guṇaiḥ
tasya dṛgbhyaḥ abhavat putraḥ somaḥ amṛta-mayaḥ kila vipra oṣadhi uḍu-gaṇānām brahmaṇā kalpitaḥ patiḥ
saḥ ayajat rājasūyena vijitya bhuvana-trayam patnīm bṛhaspateḥ darpāt tārām nāma aharat balāt
yadā saḥ deva-guruṇā yācitaḥ abhīkṣṇaśaḥ madāt na atyajat tat-kṛte jajñe sura-dānava vigrahaḥ
śukraḥ bṛhaspateḥ dveṣāt agrahīt sa-asura uḍupam haraḥ guru-sutam snehāt sarva-bhūta-gaṇa-āvṛtaḥ
sarva-deva-gaṇa upetaḥ mahendraḥ gurum anvayāt sura asura vināśaḥ abhūt samaraḥ tārakā-mayaḥ
niveditaḥ atha aṅgirasā somam nirbhartsya viśva-kṛt tārām sva-bhartre prāyacchat antarvatnīm avait patiḥ
tyaja tyaja āśu duṣprajñe mat-kṣetrāt āhitam paraiḥ na aham tvām bhasmasāt kuryām striyam sāntānike asati
tatyāja vrīḍitā tārā kumāram kanaka-prabham spṛhām āṅgirasaḥ cakre kumāre somaḥ eva ca
mama ayam na tava iti uccaiḥ tasmin vivadamānayoḥ papracchuḥ ṛṣayaḥ devāḥ na eva uce vrīḍitā tu sā
kumāraḥ mātaram prāha kupitaḥ alīka lajjayā kim na vacasi asat-vṛtte ātma-avadyam vada āśu me
brahmā tām rahaḥ āhūya samaprākṣīt ca sāntvayan somasya iti āha śanakaiḥ somaḥ tam tāvat agrahīt
tasya ātma-yoniḥ akṛta budhaḥ iti abhidhām nṛpa buddhyā gambhīrayā yena putreṇa āpa uḍurāṭ mudam
tataḥ purūravāḥ jajñe ilāyām yaḥ udāhṛtaḥ tasya rūpa guṇa audārya śīla draviṇa vikramān śrutvā urvaśī indra-bhavane gīyamānān sura-ṛṣiṇā tat-antikam upeyāya devī smara-śara arditā
mitrā-varuṇayoḥ śāpāt āpannā nara-lokatām niśamya puruṣa-śreṣṭham kandarpam iva rūpiṇam dhṛtim viṣṭabhya lalanā upatasthe tat-antike saḥ tām vilokya nṛpatiḥ harṣeṇa utphulla-locanaḥ uvāca ślakṣṇayā vācā devīm hṛṣṭa-tanūruhaḥ
śrī-rājā uvāca svāgatam te varārohe āsyatām karavāma kim saṁramasva mayā sākam ratiḥ nau śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
urvaśī uvāca kasyāḥ tvayi na sajjeta manaḥ dṛṣṭiḥ ca sundara yat-aṅgāntaram āsādya cyavate ha riraṁsayā
etau uraṇakau rājan nyāsau rakṣasva māna-da saṁraṁsye bhavatā sākam ślāghyaḥ strīṇām varaḥ smṛtaḥ
ghṛtam me vīra bhakṣyam syāt na īkṣe tvā anyatra maithunāt vivāsasam tat tathā iti pratipede mahāmanāḥ
aho rūpam aho bhāvaḥ nara-loka vimohanam kaḥ na seveta manujaḥ devīm tvām svayam āgatām
