sā tatra dadṛśe viśvam jagat sthāsnu ca kham diśaḥ sa-adri dvīpa abdhi bhū-golam sa-vāyu agni indu tārakam jyotiḥ-cakram jalam tejaḥ nabhasvān viyat eva ca vaikārikāṇi indriyāṇi manaḥ mātrāḥ guṇāḥ trayaḥ etat vicitram saha jīva-kāla svabhāva karma-āśaya liṅga-bhedam sūnoḥ tanau vīkṣya vidārita-āsye vrajam saha-ātmānam avāpa śaṅkām
kim svapnaḥ etat uta deva-māyā kim vā madīyaḥ bata buddhi-mohaḥ atho amuṣya eva mama arbhakasya yaḥ kaścana autpattikaḥ ātma-yogaḥ
atho yathā-vat na vitarka-gocaram cetaḥ manaḥ karma vacobhiḥ añjasā yat-āśrayam yena yataḥ pratīyate su-durvibhāvyam praṇatā asmi tat-padam
aham mama asau patiḥ eṣaḥ me sutaḥ vraja-īśvarasya akhila-vitta-pā satī gopyaḥ ca gopāḥ saha-godhanāḥ ca me yat-māyayā ittham kumatiḥ saḥ me gatiḥ

astu iti uktaḥ saḥ bhagavān vraje droṇaḥ mahā-yaśāḥ jajñe nandaḥ iti khyātaḥ yaśodā sā dharā abhavat
tataḥ bhaktiḥ bhagavati putrī-bhūte janārdane dam-patyoḥ nitarām āsīt gopa-gopīṣu bhārata
kṛṣṇaḥ brahmaṇaḥ ādeśam satyam kartum vraje vibhuḥ saha-rāmaḥ vasan cakre teṣām prītim sva-līlayā
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ekadā gṛha-dāsīṣu yaśodā nanda-gehinī karma-antara niyuktāsu nirmamantha svayam dadhi yāni yāni iha gītāni tat-bāla-caritāni ca dadhi-nirmanthane kāle smarantī tāni agāyata
kṣaumam vāsaḥ pṛthu-kaṭi-taṭe bibhratī sūtra-naddham putra-sneha-snuta kuca-yugam jāta-kampam ca su-bhrūḥ rajju-ākarṣa śrama bhuja calat-kaṅkaṇau kuṇḍale ca svinnam vaktram kabara-vigalat-mālatī nirmamantha
tām stanya-kāmaḥ āsādya mathnantīm jananīm hariḥ gṛhītvā dadhi-manthānam nyaṣedhat prītim āvahan
tam aṅkam ārūḍham apāyayat stanam sneha-snutam sa-smitam īkṣatī mukham atṛptam utsṛjya javena sā yayau utsicyamāne payasi tu adhiśrite
sañjāta-kopaḥ sphurita-aruṇa-adharam sandaśya dadbhiḥ dadhi-mantha-bhājanam bhittvā mṛṣā-aśruḥ dṛṣat-aśmanā rahaḥ jaghāsa haiyaṅgavam antaram gataḥ
uttārya gopī su-śṛtam payaḥ punaḥ praviśya saṁdṛśya ca dadhi-amatrakam bhagnam vilokya sva-sutasya karma tat jahāsa tam ca api na tatra paśyatī
ulūkhala-aṅghreḥ upari vyavasthitam markāya kāmam dadatam śici sthitam haiyaṅgavam caurya-viśaṅkita īkṣaṇam nirīkṣya paścāt sutam āgamat śanaiḥ
tām ātta-yaṣṭim prasamīkṣya satvaraḥ tataḥ avaruhya apasasāra bhīta-vat gopī anvadhāvat na yam āpa yoginām kṣamam praveṣṭum tapasā īritam manaḥ
anvañcamānā jananī bṛhat-calat-śroṇī-bhara-ākrānta-gatiḥ su-madhyamā javena visraṁsita-keśa-bandhana cyuta-prasūna-anugatiḥ parāmṛśat
kṛta-āgasam tam prarudantam akṣiṇī kaṣantam añjat-maṣiṇī sva-pāṇinā udvīkṣamāṇam bhaya-vihvala-īkṣaṇam haste gṛhītvā bhiṣayantī avāgurat
tyaktvā yaṣṭim sutam bhītam vijñāya arbhaka-vatsalā iyeṣa kila tam baddhum dāmnā a-tat-vīrya-kovidā
na ca antaḥ na bahiḥ yasya na pūrvam na api ca aparam pūrva-aparam bahiḥ ca antaḥ jagataḥ yaḥ jagat ca yaḥ tam matvā ātmajam avyaktam martya-liṅgam adhokṣajam gopikā ulūkhale dāmnā babandha prākṛtam yathā
tat dāma badhyamānasya sva-arbhakasya kṛta-āgasaḥ dvi-aṅgula ūnam abhūt tena sandadhe anyat ca gopikā
yadā āsīt tat api nyūnam tena anyat api sandadhe tat api dvi-aṅgulam nyūnam yat yat ādatta bandhanam
evam sva-geha-dāmāni yaśodā sandadhati api gopīnām su-smayantīnām smayantī vismitā abhavat
sva-mātuḥ svinna-gātrāyāḥ visrasta kabara srajaḥ dṛṣṭvā pariśramam kṛṣṇaḥ kṛpayā āsīt sva-bandhane
evam sandarśitā hi aṅga hariṇā bhṛtya-vaśyatā sva-vaśena api kṛṣṇena yasya idam sa-īśvaram vaśe
na imam viriñcaḥ na bhavaḥ na śrīḥ api aṅga-saṁśrayā prasādam lebhire gopī yat tat prāpa vimukti-dāt
na ayam sukha-āpaḥ bhagavān dehinām gopikā-sutaḥ jñāninām ca ātma-bhūtānām yathā bhakti-matām iha
kṛṣṇaḥ tu gṛha-kṛtyeṣu vyagrāyām mātari prabhuḥ adrākṣīt arjunau pūrvam guhyakau dhanada-ātmajau
purā nārada-śāpena vṛkṣatām prāpitau madāt nalakūvara maṇigrīvau iti khyātau śriyā anvitau
śrī-rājā uvāca kathyatām bhagavan etat tayoḥ śāpasya kāraṇam yat tat vigarhitam karma yena vā devarṣeḥ tamaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca rudrasya anucarau bhūtvā su-dṛptau dhanada-ātmajau kailāsa-upavane ramye mandākinyām mada-utkaṭau vāruṇīm madirām pītvā mada-āghūrṇita-locanau strī-janaiḥ anugāyadbhiḥ ceratuḥ puṣpite vane
antaḥ praviśya gaṅgāyām ambhoja vana-rājini cikrīḍatuḥ yuvatibhiḥ gajau iva kareṇubhiḥ
yadṛcchayā ca deva-ṛṣiḥ bhagavān tatra kaurava apaśyat nāradaḥ devau kṣībāṇau samabudhyata
tam dṛṣṭvā vrīḍitāḥ devyaḥ vivastrāḥ śāpa-śaṅkitāḥ vāsāṁsi paryadhuḥ śīghram vivastrau na eva guhyakau
tau dṛṣṭvā madirā-mattau śrī-mada-andhau sura-ātmajau tayoḥ anugraha-arthāya śāpam dāsyan idam jagau
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca na hi anyaḥ juṣataḥ joṣyān buddhi-bhraṁśaḥ rajaḥ-guṇaḥ śrī-madāt ābhijātya-ādiḥ yatra strī dyūtam āsavaḥ
hanyante paśavaḥ yatra nirdayaiḥ ajita-ātmabhiḥ manyamānaiḥ imam deham ajara amṛtyu naśvaram
deva-saṁjñitam api ante kṛmi viṭ bhasma-saṁjñitam bhūta-dhruk tat-kṛte sva-artham kim veda nirayaḥ yataḥ
dehaḥ kim anna-dātuḥ svam niṣektuḥ mātuḥ eva ca mātuḥ pituḥ vā balinaḥ kretuḥ agneḥ śunaḥ api vā
evam sādhāraṇam deham avyakta prabhava apyayam kaḥ vidvān ātmasāt kṛtvā hanti jantūn ṛte asataḥ
asataḥ śrī-mada-andhasya dāridryam param añjanam ātma-aupamyena bhūtāni daridraḥ param īkṣate
yathā kaṇṭaka-viddha-aṅgaḥ jantoḥ na icchati tām vyathām jīva-sāmyam gataḥ liṅgaiḥ na tathā aviddha-kaṇṭakaḥ
daridraḥ nir-aham-stambhaḥ muktaḥ sarva madaiḥ iha kṛcchram yadṛcchayā āpnoti tat hi tasya param tapaḥ
nityam kṣut kṣāma dehasya daridrasya anna-kāṅkṣiṇaḥ indriyāṇi anuśuṣyanti hiṁsā api vinivartate
daridrasya eva yujyante sādhavaḥ sama-darśinaḥ sadbhiḥ kṣiṇoti tam tarṣam tataḥ ārāt viśuddhyati
sādhūnām sama-cittānām mukunda-caraṇa-eṣiṇām upekṣyaiḥ kim dhana-stambhaiḥ asadbhiḥ asat-āśrayaiḥ
tat aham mattayoḥ mādhvyā vāruṇyā śrī-mada-andhayoḥ tamaḥ-madam hariṣyāmi straiṇayoḥ ajita-ātmanoḥ
yat imau loka-pālasya putrau bhūtvā tamaḥ-plutau na vivāsasam ātmānam vijānītaḥ su-durmadau ataḥ arhataḥ sthāvaratām syātām na evam yathā punaḥ smṛtiḥ syāt mat-prasādena tatra api mat-anugrahāt vāsudevasya sānnidhyam labdhvā divya-śarat-śate vṛtte svarlokatām bhūyaḥ labdha-bhaktī bhaviṣyataḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam uktvā saḥ devarṣiḥ gataḥ nārāyaṇa-āśramam nalakūvara maṇigrīvau āsatuḥ yamala-arjunau
ṛṣeḥ bhāgavata-mukhyasya satyam kartum vacaḥ hariḥ jagāma śanakaiḥ tatra yatra āstām yamala-arjunau
devarṣiḥ me priya-tamaḥ yat imau dhanada-ātmajau tat tathā sādhayiṣyāmi yat gītam tat mahātmanā
iti antareṇa arjunayoḥ kṛṣṇaḥ tu yamayoḥ yayau ātma-nirveśa-mātreṇa tiryak gatam ulūkhalam
bālena niṣkarṣayatā anvak ulūkhalam tat dāma-udareṇa tarasā utkalita aṅghri-bandhau niṣpetatuḥ parama-vikramita ati-vepa skandha pravāla viṭapau kṛta caṇḍa-śabdau
tatra śriyā paramayā kakubhaḥ sphurantau siddhau upetya kujayoḥ iva jāta-vedāḥ kṛṣṇam praṇamya śirasā akhila-loka-nātham baddha-añjalī virajasau idam ūcatuḥ sma
kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahā-yogin tvam ādyaḥ puruṣaḥ paraḥ vyakta-avyaktam idam viśvam rūpam te brāhmaṇāḥ viduḥ
tvam ekaḥ sarva-bhūtānām deha asu ātma indriya īśvaraḥ tvam eva kālaḥ bhagavān viṣṇuḥ avyayaḥ īśvaraḥ tvam mahān prakṛtiḥ sūkṣmā rajaḥ-sattva-tamaḥ-mayī tvam eva puruṣaḥ adhyakṣaḥ sarva-kṣetra vikāra-vit
gṛhyamāṇaiḥ tvam agrāhyaḥ vikāraiḥ prākṛtaiḥ guṇaiḥ kaḥ nu iha arhati vijñātum prāk siddham guṇa-saṁvṛtaḥ
tasmai tubhyam bhagavate vāsudevāya vedhase ātma-dyota-guṇaiḥ channa-mahimne brahmaṇe namaḥ
yasya avatārāḥ jñāyante śarīreṣu aśarīriṇaḥ taiḥ taiḥ atulya ati-śayaiḥ vīryaiḥ dehiṣu asaṅgataiḥ saḥ bhavān sarva-lokasya bhavāya vibhavāya ca avatīrṇaḥ aṁśa-bhāgena sāmpratam patiḥ āśiṣām
namaḥ parama-kalyāṇa namaḥ parama-maṅgala vāsudevāya śāntāya yadūnām pataye namaḥ
anujānīhi nau bhūman tava anucara-kiṅkarau darśanam nau bhagavataḥ ṛṣeḥ āsīt anugrahāt
vāṇī guṇa-anukathane śravaṇau kathāyām hastau ca karmasu manaḥ tava pādayoḥ naḥ smṛtyām śiraḥ tava nivāsa-jagat-praṇāme dṛṣṭiḥ satām darśane astu bhavat-tanūnām
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ittham saṅkīrtitaḥ tābhyām bhagavān gokula-īśvaraḥ dāmnā ca ulūkhale baddhaḥ prahasan āha guhyakau
śrī-bhagavān uvāca jñātam mama purā eva etat ṛṣiṇā karuṇā-ātmanā yat śrī-mada-andhayoḥ vāgbhiḥ vibhraṁśaḥ anugrahaḥ kṛtaḥ
sādhūnām sama-cittānām sutarām mat-kṛta-ātmanām darśanāt no bhavet bandhaḥ puṁsaḥ akṣṇoḥ savituḥ yathā
tat gacchatam mat-paramau nalakūvara sādanam sañjātaḥ mayi bhāvaḥ vām īpsitaḥ paramaḥ abhavaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti uktau tau parikramya praṇamya ca punaḥ punaḥ baddha-ulūkhalam āmantrya jagmatuḥ diśam uttarām
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca gopāḥ nanda-ādayaḥ śrutvā drumayoḥ patatoḥ ravam tatra ājagmuḥ kuru-śreṣṭha nirghāta-bhaya-śaṅkitāḥ
bhūmyām nipatitau tatra dadṛśuḥ yamala-arjunau babhramuḥ tat avijñāya lakṣyam patana-kāraṇam
ulūkhalam vikarṣantam dāmnā baddham ca bālakam kasya idam kutaḥ āścaryam utpātaḥ iti kātarāḥ
bālāḥ ūcuḥ anena iti tiryak gatam ulūkhalam vikarṣatā madhya-gena puruṣau api acakṣmahi
na te tat-uktam jagṛhuḥ na ghaṭeta iti tasya tat bālasya utpāṭanam tarvoḥ kecit sandigdha-cetasaḥ
ulūkhalam vikarṣantam dāmnā baddham svam ātmajam vilokya nandaḥ prahasat-vadanaḥ vimumoca ha
gopībhiḥ stobhitaḥ anṛtyat bhagavān bāla-vat kvacit udgāyati kvacit mugdhaḥ tat-vaśaḥ dāru-yantra-vat
bibharti kvacit ājñaptaḥ pīṭhaka-unmāna pādukam bāhu-kṣepam ca kurute svānām ca prītim āvahan
darśayan tat-vidām loke ātmanaḥ bhṛtya-vaśyatām vrajasya uvāha vai harṣam bhagavān bāla-ceṣṭitaiḥ
krīṇīhi bhoḥ phalāni iti śrutvā satvaram acyutaḥ phala-arthī dhānyam ādāya yayau sarva-phala-pradaḥ
phala-vikrayiṇī tasya cyuta-dhānya kara-dvayam phalaiḥ apūrayat ratnaiḥ phala-bhāṇḍam apūri ca
sarit-tīra gatam kṛṣṇam bhagna-arjunam atha āhvayat rāmam ca rohiṇī devī krīḍantam bālakaiḥ bhṛśam
na upeyātām yadā āhūtau krīḍā-saṅgena putrakau yaśodām preṣayām āsa rohiṇī putra-vatsalām
krīḍantam sā sutam bālaiḥ ati-velam saha-agrajam yaśodā ajohavīt kṛṣṇam putra-sneha-snuta-stanī
kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa aravinda-akṣa tāta ehi stanam piba alam vihāraiḥ kṣut-kṣāntaḥ krīḍā-śrāntaḥ asi putraka
he rāma āgaccha tāta āśu sa-anujaḥ kula-nandana prātaḥ eva kṛta-āhāraḥ tat bhavān bhoktum arhati
pratīkṣate tvām dāśārha bhokṣyamāṇaḥ vraja-adhipaḥ ehi āvayoḥ priyam dhehi sva-gṛhān yāta bālakāḥ
dhūli-dhūsarita-aṅgaḥ tvam putra majjanam āvaha janma-ṛkṣam te adya bhavati viprebhyaḥ dehi gāḥ śuciḥ
paśya paśya vayasyān te mātṛ-mṛṣṭān su-alaṅkṛtān tvam ca snātaḥ kṛta-āhāraḥ viharasva su-alaṅkṛtaḥ
ittham yaśodā tam aśeṣa-śekharam matvā sutam sneha-nibaddha-dhīḥ nṛpa haste gṛhītvā saha-rāmam acyutam nītvā sva-vāṭam kṛtavatī atha udayam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca gopa-vṛddhāḥ mahā-utpātān anubhūya bṛhadvane nanda-ādayaḥ samāgamya vraja-kāryam amantrayan
tatra upananda-nāmā āha gopaḥ jñāna-vayaḥ-adhikaḥ deśa-kāla-artha-tattva-jñaḥ priya-kṛt rāma-kṛṣṇayoḥ
utthātavyam itaḥ asmābhiḥ gokulasya hita-eṣibhiḥ āyānti atra mahā-utpātāḥ bālānām nāśa-hetavaḥ
muktaḥ kathañcit rākṣasyāḥ bāla-ghnyāḥ bālakaḥ hi asau hareḥ anugrahāt nūnam anaḥ ca upari na apatat
cakra-vātena nītaḥ ayam daityena vipadam viyat śilāyām patitaḥ tatra paritrātaḥ sura-īśvaraiḥ
yat na mriyeta drumayoḥ antaram prāpya bālakaḥ asau anyatamaḥ vā api tat api acyuta-rakṣaṇam
yāvat autpātikaḥ ariṣṭaḥ vrajam na abhibhavet itaḥ tāvat bālān upādāya yāsyāmaḥ anyatra sa-anugāḥ
vanam vṛndāvanam nāma paśavyam nava-kānanam gopa-gopī-gavām sevyam puṇya-adri tṛṇa vīrudham
tat tatra adya eva yāsyāmaḥ śakaṭān yuṅkta mā ciram go-dhanāni agrataḥ yāntu bhavatām yadi rocate
tat śrutvā eka-dhiyaḥ gopāḥ sādhu sādhu iti vādinaḥ vrajān svān svān samāyujya yayuḥ rūḍha-paricchadāḥ
vṛddhān bālān striyaḥ rājan sarva-upakaraṇāni ca anaḥsu āropya gopālāḥ yattāḥ ātta-śara-asanāḥ go-dhanāni puraskṛtya śṛṅgāṇi āpūrya sarvataḥ tūrya-ghoṣeṇa mahatā yayuḥ saha-purohitāḥ
gopyaḥ rūḍha-rathāḥ nūtna-kuca-kuṅkuma-kāntayaḥ kṛṣṇa-līlāḥ jaguḥ prītyā niṣka-kaṇṭhyaḥ su-vāsasaḥ
tathā yaśodā-rohiṇyau ekam śakaṭam āsthite rejatuḥ kṛṣṇa-rāmābhyām tat-kathā śravaṇa-utsuke
vṛndāvanam sampraviśya sarva-kāla-sukha-āvaham tatra cakruḥ vraja-āvāsam śakaṭaiḥ ardha-candravat
vṛndāvanam govardhanam yamunā-pulināni ca vīkṣya āsīt uttamā prītī rāma-mādhavayoḥ nṛpa
evam vraja-okasām prītim yacchantau bāla-ceṣṭitaiḥ kala-vākyaiḥ sva-kālena vatsa-pālau babhūvatuḥ
avidūre vraja-bhuvaḥ saha gopāla-dārakaiḥ cārayām āsatuḥ vatsān nānā krīḍā paricchadau
kvacit vādayataḥ veṇum kṣepaṇaiḥ kṣipataḥ kvacit kvacit pādaiḥ kiṅkiṇībhiḥ kvacit kṛtrima-go-vṛṣaiḥ vṛṣāyamāṇau nardantau yuyudhāte parasparam anukṛtya rutaiḥ jantūn ceratuḥ prākṛtau yathā
kadācit yamunā-tīre vatsān cārayatoḥ svakaiḥ vayasyaiḥ kṛṣṇa-balayoḥ jighāṁsuḥ daityaḥ āgamat
tam vatsa-rūpiṇam vīkṣya vatsa-yūtha-gatam hariḥ darśayan baladevāya śanaiḥ mugdhaḥ iva āsadat
gṛhītvā apara-pādābhyām saha lāṅgūlam acyutaḥ bhrāmayitvā kapittha-agre prāhiṇot gata-jīvitam saḥ kapitthaiḥ mahā-kāyaḥ pātyamānaiḥ papāta ha
tam vīkṣya vismitāḥ bālāḥ śaśaṁsuḥ sādhu sādhu iti devāḥ ca parisantuṣṭāḥ babhūvuḥ puṣpa-varṣiṇaḥ
tau vatsa-pālakau bhūtvā sarva-loka-eka-pālakau sa-prātaḥ-āśau go-vatsān cārayantau viceratuḥ
svam svam vatsa-kulam sarve pāyayiṣyantaḥ ekadā gatvā jala-āśaya-abhyāśam pāyayitvā papuḥ jalam
te tatra dadṛśuḥ bālāḥ mahā-sattvam avasthitam tatrasuḥ vajra-nirbhinnam gireḥ śṛṅgam iva cyutam
saḥ vai bakaḥ nāma mahān asuraḥ baka-rūpa-dhṛk āgatya sahasā kṛṣṇam tīkṣṇa-tuṇḍaḥ agrasat balī
kṛṣṇam mahā-baka-grastam dṛṣṭvā rāma-ādayaḥ arbhakāḥ babhūvuḥ indriyāṇi iva vinā prāṇam vicetasaḥ
tam tālu-mūlam pradahantam agni-vat gopāla-sūnum pitaram jagat-guroḥ caccharda sadyaḥ ati-ruṣā akṣatam bakaḥ tuṇḍena hantum punaḥ abhyapadyata
tam āpatantam saḥ nigṛhya tuṇḍayoḥ dorbhyām bakam kaṁsa-sakham satām patiḥ paśyatsu bāleṣu dadāra līlayā mudā-āvahaḥ vīraṇa-vat divaukasām
tadā baka-arim sura-loka-vāsinaḥ samākiran nandana-mallikā-ādibhiḥ samīḍire ca ānaka-śaṅkha-saṁstavaiḥ tat vīkṣya gopāla-sutāḥ visismire
muktam baka-āsyāt upalabhya bālakāḥ rāma-ādayaḥ prāṇam iva indriyaḥ gaṇaḥ sthāna-āgatam tam parirabhya nirvṛtāḥ praṇīya vatsān vrajam etya tat jaguḥ
śrutvā tat vismitāḥ gopāḥ gopyaḥ ca ati-priya-ādṛtāḥ pretya āgatam iva utsukyāt aikṣanta tṛṣita-īkṣaṇāḥ
aho bata asya bālasya bahavaḥ mṛtyavaḥ abhavan api āsīt vipriyam teṣām kṛtam pūrvam yataḥ bhayam
atha api abhibhavanti enam na eva te ghora-darśanāḥ jighāṁsayā enam āsādya naśyanti agnau pataṅga-vat
aho brahma-vidām vācaḥ na asatyāḥ santi karhicit gargaḥ yat āha bhagavān anvabhāvi tathā eva tat

tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ mudam kartum tat-mātṝṇām ca kasya ca ubhayāyitam ātmānam cakre viśva-kṛt īśvaraḥ

yatra naisarga durvairāḥ saha āsan nṛ mṛga-ādayaḥ mitrāṇi iva ajita āvāsa druta ruṭ tarṣaka-ādikam
tatra udvahat paśupa-vaṁśa-śiśutva-nāṭyam brahma advayam param anantam agādha-bodham vatsān sakhīn iva purā paritaḥ vicinvat ekam sa-pāṇi-kavalam parameṣṭhī acaṣṭa
dṛṣṭvā tvareṇa nija-dhoraṇataḥ avatīrya pṛthvyām vapuḥ kanaka-daṇḍam iva abhipātya spṛṣṭvā catuḥ-mukuṭa-koṭi-bhiḥ aṅghri-yugmam natvā mut-aśru-su-jalaiḥ akṛta abhiṣekam
utthāya utthāya kṛṣṇasya cirasya pādayoḥ patan āste mahitvam prāk-dṛṣṭam smṛtvā smṛtvā punaḥ punaḥ
śanaiḥ atha utthāya vimṛjya locane mukundam udvīkṣya vinamra-kandharaḥ kṛta-añjaliḥ praśraya-vān samāhitaḥ sa-vepathuḥ gadgadayā ailata īlayā
śrī-brahmā uvāca naumi īḍya te abhra vapuṣe taḍit ambarāya guñjā avataṁsa paripiccha lasat mukhāya vanya-sraje kavala vetra viṣāṇa veṇu lakṣma śriye mṛdu pade paśu-pa aṅga-jāya
asya api deva vapuṣaḥ mat-anugrahasya sva-icchā-mayasya na tu bhūta-mayasya kaḥ api na īśe mahi tu avasitum manasā antareṇa sākṣāt tava eva kim uta ātma sukha anubhūteḥ
jñāne prayāsam udapāsya namantaḥ eva jīvanti sat-mukharitām bhavadīya-vārtām sthāne sthitāḥ śruti-gatām tanu vāk manobhiḥ ye prāyaśaḥ ajita jitaḥ api asi taiḥ tri-lokyām
śreyaḥ sṛtim bhaktim udasya te vibho kliśyanti ye kevala bodha labdhaye teṣām asau kleśalaḥ eva śiṣyate na anyat yathā sthūla-tuṣa avaghātinām
purā iha bhūman bahavaḥ api yoginaḥ tvat arpita īhāḥ nija-karma labdhayā vibudhya bhaktyā eva kathā-upanītayā prapedire añjaḥ acyuta te gatim parām
tathā api bhūman mahimā aguṇasya te viboddhum arhati amala antaḥ-ātmabhiḥ avikriyāt sva-anubhavāt arūpataḥ hi ananya-bodhya-ātmatayā na ca anyathā
guṇa-ātmanaḥ te api guṇān vimātum hita-avatīrṇasya ke īśire asya kālena yaiḥ vā vimitāḥ su-kalpaiḥ bhū-pāṁśavaḥ khe mihikāḥ dyu-bhāsaḥ
tat te anukampām su-samīkṣamāṇaḥ bhuñjānaḥ eva ātma-kṛtam vipākam hṛt vāk vapurbhiḥ vidadhan namaḥ te jīveta yaḥ mukti-pade saḥ dāya-bhāk
paśya īśa me anāryam anante ādye para-ātmani tvayi api māyi-māyini māyām vitatya īkṣitum ātma vaibhavam hi aham kiyān aiccham iva arciḥ agnau
ataḥ kṣamasva acyuta me rajaḥ-bhuvaḥ hi ajānataḥ tvat pṛthak īśa māninaḥ aja avalepa andha-tamaḥ andha cakṣuṣaḥ eṣaḥ anukampyaḥ mayi nātha-vān iti
kva aham tamaḥ mahat aham kha cara agni vāḥ bhū saṁveṣṭita aṇḍa-ghaṭa sapta-vitasti kāyaḥ kva īdṛk vidhā avigaṇita aṇḍa para-aṇu caryā vāta-adhva roma vivarasya ca te mahitvam
utkṣepaṇam garbha-gatasya pādayoḥ kim kalpate mātuḥ adhokṣaja āgase kim asti na asti vyapadeśa bhūṣitam tava asti kukṣeḥ kiyat api anantaḥ
jagat-traya anta udadhi samplava ude nārāyaṇasya udara nābhi nālāt vinirgataḥ ajaḥ tu iti vāk na vai mṛṣā kintu īśvara tvat na vinirgataḥ asmi
nārāyaṇaḥ tvam na hi sarva dehinām ātmā asi adhīśa akhila loka sākṣī nārāyaṇaḥ aṅgam nara bhū jala ayanāt tat ca api satyam na tava eva māyā
tat cet jala-stham tava sat jagat vapuḥ kim me na dṛṣṭam bhagavan tadā eva kim vā su-dṛṣṭam hṛdi me tadā eva kim na u sapadi eva punaḥ vyadarśi
atra eva māyā-dhamana avatāre hi asya prapañcasya bahiḥ sphuṭasya kṛtsnasya ca antaḥ jaṭhare jananyāḥ māyātvam eva prakaṭī-kṛtam te
yasya kukṣau idam sarvam sa-ātmam bhāti yathā tathā tat tvayi api iha tat sarvam kim idam māyayā vinā
adya eva tvat ṛte asya kim mama na te māyātvam ādarśitam ekaḥ asi prathamam tataḥ vraja-suhṛt vatsāḥ samastāḥ api tāvantaḥ asi catuḥ-bhujāḥ tat akhilaiḥ sākam mayā upāsitāḥ tāvanti eva jaganti abhūḥ tat amitam brahma advayam śiṣyate
ajānatām tvat-padavīm anātmani ātmā ātmanā bhāsi vitatya māyām sṛṣṭau iva aham jagataḥ vidhāne iva tvam eṣaḥ ante iva tri-netraḥ
sureṣu ṛṣiṣu īśa tathā eva nṛṣu api tiryakṣu yādaḥsu api te ajanasya janma asatām durmada nigrahāya prabho vidhātaḥ sat anugrahāya ca
kaḥ vetti bhūman bhagavan para-ātman yoga-īśvara ūtīḥ bhavataḥ tri-lokyām kva vā katham vā kati vā kadā iti vistārayan krīḍasi yoga-māyām
tasmāt idam jagat aśeṣam asat-svarūpam svapna-ābham asta-dhiṣaṇam puru-duḥkha-duḥkham tvayi eva nitya sukha bodha tanau anante māyātaḥ udyat api yat sat iva avabhāti
ekaḥ tvam ātmā puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ satyaḥ svayam-jyotiḥ anantaḥ ādyaḥ nityaḥ akṣaraḥ ajasra-sukhaḥ nirañjanaḥ pūrṇa advayaḥ muktaḥ upādhitaḥ amṛtaḥ
evam-vidham tvām sakala ātmanām api sva-ātmānam ātma-ātmatayā vicakṣate guru arka labdha upaniṣat su-cakṣuṣā ye te taranti iva bhava anṛta ambudhim
ātmānam eva ātmatayā avijānatām tena eva jātam nikhilam prapañcitam jñānena bhūyaḥ api ca tat pralīyate rajjvām aheḥ bhoga bhava-abhavau yathā
ajñāna saṁjñau bhava-bandha mokṣau dvau nāma na anyau staḥ ṛta jña-bhāvāt ajasra-citi ātmani kevale pare vicāryamāṇe taraṇau iva ahanī
tvām ātmānam param matvā param ātmānam eva ca ātmā punaḥ bahiḥ mṛgyaḥ aho ajña janatā ajñatā
antaḥ-bhave ananta bhavantam eva hi atat tyajantaḥ mṛgayanti santaḥ asantam api anti ahim antareṇa santam guṇam tam kim u yanti santaḥ
atha api te deva pada-ambuja-dvaya prasāda leśa anugṛhītaḥ eva hi jānāti tattvam bhagavat mahimnaḥ na ca anyaḥ ekaḥ api ciram vicinvan
tat astu me nātha saḥ bhūri-bhāgaḥ bhave atra vā anyatra tu vā tiraścām yena aham ekaḥ api bhavat janānām bhūtvā niṣeve tava pāda-pallavam
aho ati-dhanyāḥ vraja go ramaṇyaḥ stanya amṛtam pītam atīva te mudā yāsām vibho vatsatara-ātmaja-ātmanā yat tṛptaye adya api na ca alam adhvarāḥ
aho bhāgyam aho bhāgyam nanda gopa vraja-okasām yat mitram parama-ānandam pūrṇam brahma sanātanam
eṣām tu bhāgya mahimā acyuta tāvat āstām ekādaśa eva hi vayam bata bhūri-bhāgāḥ etat hṛṣīka caṣakaiḥ asakṛt pibāmaḥ śarva-ādayaḥ aṅghri-udaja madhu amṛta-āsavam te
tat bhūri-bhāgyam iha janma kim api aṭavyām yat gokule api katama aṅghri rajaḥ abhiṣekam yat jīvitam tu nikhilam bhagavān mukundaḥ tu adya api yat pāda-rajaḥ śruti mṛgyam eva
eṣām ghoṣa-nivāsinām uta bhavān kim deva rātā iti naḥ cetaḥ viśva-phalāt phalam tvat aparam kutra api ayat muhyati sat-veṣāt iva pūtanā api sa-kulā tvām eva deva āpitā yat dhāma artha suhṛt priya ātma tanaya prāṇa āśayāḥ tvat-kṛte
tāvat rāga-ādayaḥ stenāḥ tāvat kārā-gṛham gṛham tāvat mohaḥ aṅghri nigaḍaḥ yāvat kṛṣṇa na te janāḥ
prapañcam niṣprapañcaḥ api viḍambayasi bhū-tale prapanna janatā ānanda-sandoham prathitum prabho
jānantaḥ eva jānantu kim bahu-uktyā na me prabho manasaḥ vapuṣaḥ vācaḥ vaibhavam tava go-caraḥ
anujānīhi mām kṛṣṇa sarvam tvam vetsi sarva-dṛk tvam eva jagatām nāthaḥ jagat etat tava arpitam
śrī-kṛṣṇa vṛṣṇi-kula puṣkara joṣa dāyin kṣmā nirjara dvija paśu udadhi vṛddhi kārin uddharma śārvara hara kṣiti rākṣasa dhruk ā-kalpam ā-arkam arhan bhagavan namaḥ te
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti abhiṣṭūya bhūmānam triḥ parikramya pādayoḥ natvā abhīṣṭam jagat dhātā sva-dhāma pratyapadyata
tataḥ anujñāpya bhagavān sva-bhuvam prāk avasthitān vatsān pulinam āninye yathā-pūrva sakham svakam
ekasmin api yāte abde prāṇa-īśam ca antarā ātmanaḥ kṛṣṇa māyā āhatāḥ rājan kṣaṇa-ardham menire arbhakāḥ
kim kim na vismaranti iha māyā-mohita cetasaḥ yat mohitam jagat sarvam abhīkṣṇam vismṛta-ātmakam
ūcuḥ ca suhṛdaḥ kṛṣṇam su-āgatam te ati-raṁhasā na ekaḥ api abhoji kavalaḥ ehi itaḥ sādhu bhujyatām
tataḥ hasan hṛṣīkeśaḥ abhyavahṛtya saha arbhakaiḥ darśayan carma ājagaram nyavartata vanāt vrajam
barha prasūna vana-dhātu vicitrita aṅgaḥ proddāma veṇu-dala śṛṅga rava utsava āḍhyaḥ vatsān gṛṇan anuga gīta pavitra kīrtiḥ gopī dṛk utsava dṛśiḥ praviveśa goṣṭham
adya anena mahā-vyālaḥ yaśodā nanda sūnunā hataḥ avitāḥ vayam ca asmāt iti bālāḥ vraje jaguḥ
śrī-rājā uvāca brahman para-udbhave kṛṣṇe iyān premā katham bhavet yaḥ abhūta-pūrvaḥ tokeṣu sva-udbhaveṣu api kathyatām
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca sarveṣām api bhūtānām nṛpa sva-ātmā eva vallabhaḥ itare apatya vitta ādyāḥ tat vallabhatayā eva hi
tat rāja-indra yathā snehaḥ sva-svaka ātmani dehinām na tathā mamatā-ālambi putra vitta gṛha ādiṣu
deha-ātma-vādinām puṁsām api rājanya-sat-tama yathā dehaḥ priya-tamaḥ tathā na hi anu ye ca tam
dehaḥ api mamatā bhāk cet tarhi asau na ātma-vat priyaḥ yat jīryati api dehe asmin jīvita-āśā balīyasī
tasmāt priya-tamaḥ sva-ātmā sarveṣām api dehinām tat-artham eva sakalam jagat etat cara-acaram
kṛṣṇam enam avehi tvam ātmānam akhila-ātmanām jagat-hitāya saḥ api atra dehī iva ābhāti māyayā
vastutaḥ jānatām atra kṛṣṇam sthāsnu cariṣṇu ca bhagavat-rūpam akhilam na anyat vastu iha kiñcana
sarveṣām api vastūnām bhāva-arthaḥ bhavati sthitaḥ tasya api bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ kim atat vastu rūpyatām
samāśritāḥ ye pada pallava plavam mahat padam puṇya yaśaḥ mura-areḥ bhava ambudhiḥ vatsa-padam param padam padam padam yat vipadām na teṣām
etat te sarvam ākhyātam yat pṛṣṭaḥ aham iha tvayā tat kaumāre hari-kṛtam paugaṇḍe parikīrtitam
etat suhṛdbhiḥ caritam murāreḥ agha-ardanam śādvala jemanam ca vyakta-itarat rūpam aja uru abhiṣṭavam śṛṇvan gṛṇan eti naraḥ akhila-arthān
evam vihāraiḥ kaumāraiḥ kaumāram jahatuḥ vraje nilāyanaiḥ setu-bandhaiḥ markaṭa-utplavana ādibhiḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tataḥ ca paugaṇḍa vayaḥ śritau vraje babhūvatuḥ tau paśu-pāla sammatau gāḥ cārayantau sakhibhiḥ samam padaiḥ vṛndāvanam puṇyam atīva cakratuḥ
tat mādhavaḥ veṇum udīrayan vṛtaḥ gopaiḥ gṛṇadbhiḥ sva-yaśaḥ bala-anvitaḥ paśūn puraskṛtya paśavyam āviśat vihartu-kāmaḥ kusuma-ākaram vanam
tat mañju ghoṣa ali mṛga dvija ākulam mahat manaḥ prakhya payaḥ sarasvatā vātena juṣṭam śata-patra gandhinā nirīkṣya rantum bhagavān manaḥ dadhe
saḥ tatra tatra aruṇa pallava śrīyā phala prasūna uru-bhareṇa pādayoḥ spṛśat śikhān vīkṣya vanaspatīn mudā smayan iva āha agra-jam ādi-pūruṣaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca aho amī deva-vara amara arcitam pāda-ambujam te sumanaḥ phala arhaṇam namanti upādāya śikhābhiḥ ātmanaḥ tamaḥ apahatyai taru-janma yat kṛtam
ete alinaḥ tava yaśaḥ akhila-loka tīrtham gāyantaḥ ādi-puruṣa anupatham bhajante prāyaḥ amī muni-gaṇāḥ bhavadīya mukhyāḥ gūḍham vane api na jahati anagha ātma-daivam
nṛtyanti amī śikhinaḥ īḍya mudā hariṇyaḥ kurvanti gopyaḥ iva te priyam īkṣaṇena sūktaiḥ ca kokila-gaṇāḥ gṛham āgatāya dhanyāḥ vana-okasaḥ iyān hi satām nisargaḥ
dhanyā iyam adya dharaṇī tṛṇa vīrudhaḥ tvat pāda spṛśaḥ druma latāḥ kara-ja abhimṛṣṭāḥ nadyaḥ adrayaḥ khaga mṛgāḥ sadaya avalokaiḥ gopyaḥ antareṇa bhujayoḥ api yat spṛhā śrīḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam vṛndāvanam śrīmat kṛṣṇaḥ prīta-manāḥ paśūn reme sañcārayan adreḥ sarit rodhaḥsu sa-anugaḥ
kvacit gāyati gāyatsu mada-andha aliṣu anuvrataiḥ upagīyamāna caritaḥ pathi saṅkarṣaṇa-anvitaḥ anujalpati jalpantam kala-vākyaiḥ śukam kvacit kvacit sa valgu kūjantam anukūjati kokilam kvacit ca kala-haṁsānām anukūjati kūjitam abhinṛtyati nṛtyantam barhiṇam hāsayan kvacit megha gambhirayā vācā nāmabhiḥ dūra-gān paśūn kvacit āhvayati prītyā go gopāla manaḥ-jñayā
cakora-krauñca-cakrāhva-bhāradvājān ca barhiṇaḥ anurauti sma sattvānām bhīta-vat vyāghra-siṁhayoḥ
kvacit krīḍā pariśrāntam gopa utsaṅga upabarhaṇam svayam viśramayati āryam pāda-saṁvāhana-ādibhiḥ
nṛtyataḥ gāyataḥ kva api valgataḥ yudhyataḥ mithaḥ gṛhīta-hastau gopālān hasantau praśaśaṁsatuḥ
kvacit pallava talpeṣu niyuddha śrama karśitaḥ vṛkṣa mūla āśrayaḥ śete gopa-utsaṅga upabarhaṇaḥ
pāda-saṁvāhanam cakruḥ kecit tasya mahā-ātmanaḥ apare hata-pāpmānaḥ vyajanaiḥ samavījayan
anye tat-anurūpāṇi manaḥ-jñāni mahā-ātmanaḥ gāyanti sma mahā-rāja sneha klinna dhiyaḥ śanaiḥ
evam nigūḍha ātma-gatiḥ sva-māyayā gopa-ātmajatvam caritaiḥ viḍambayan reme ramā lālita pāda-pallavaḥ grāmyaiḥ samam grāmya-vat īśa-ceṣṭitaḥ
śrīdāmā nāma gopālaḥ rāma-keśavayoḥ sakhā subala-stokakṛṣṇa-ādyāḥ gopāḥ premṇā idam abruvan
rāma rāma mahā-bāho kṛṣṇa duṣṭa-nibarhaṇa itaḥ avidūre su-mahat vanam tāla-āli saṅkulam
phalāni tatra bhūrīṇi patanti patitāni ca santi kintu avaruddhāni dhenukena durātmanā
saḥ ati-vīryaḥ asuraḥ rāma he kṛṣṇa khara-rūpa dhṛk ātma-tulya balaiḥ anyaiḥ jñātibhiḥ bahubhiḥ vṛtaḥ
tasmāt kṛta-nara-āhārāt bhītaiḥ nṛbhiḥ amitra-han na sevyate paśu-gaṇaiḥ pakṣi-saṅghaiḥ vivarjitam
vidyante abhukta-pūrvāṇi phalāni surabhīṇi ca eṣaḥ vai surabhiḥ gandhaḥ viṣūcīnaḥ avagṛhyate
prayaccha tāni naḥ kṛṣṇa gandha lobhita cetasām vāñchā asti mahatī rāma gamyatām yadi rocate
evam suhṛt vacaḥ śrutvā suhṛt priya cikīrṣayā prahasya jagmatuḥ gopaiḥ vṛtau tāla-vanam prabhū
balaḥ praviśya bāhubhyām tālān samparikampayan phalāni pātayām āsa matam-gajaḥ iva ojasā
phalānām patatām śabdam niśamya asura-rāsabhaḥ abhyadhāvat kṣiti-talam sa-nagam parikampayan
sametya tarasā pratyak dvābhyām padbhyām balam balī nihatya urasi kā-śabdam muñcan paryasarat khalaḥ
punaḥ āsādya saṁrabdhaḥ upakroṣṭā parāk sthitaḥ caraṇau aparau rājan balāya prākṣipat ruṣā
saḥ tam gṛhītvā prapadoḥ bhrāmayitvā eka-pāṇinā cikṣepa tṛṇa-rāja-agre bhrāmaṇa tyakta jīvitam
tena āhataḥ mahā-tālaḥ vepamānaḥ bṛhat-śirāḥ pārśva-stham kampayan bhagnaḥ saḥ ca anyam saḥ api ca aparam
balasya līlayā utsṛṣṭa khara-deha hata-āhatāḥ tālāḥ cakampire sarve mahā-vāta īritāḥ iva
na etat citram bhagavati hi anante jagat-īśvare ota-protam idam yasmin tantuṣu aṅga yathā paṭaḥ
tataḥ kṛṣṇam ca rāmam ca jñātayaḥ dhenukasya ye kroṣṭāraḥ abhyadravan sarve saṁrabdhāḥ hata-bāndhavāḥ
tān tān āpatataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ rāmaḥ ca nṛpa līlayā gṛhīta paścāt-caraṇān prāhiṇot tṛṇa-rājasu
phala-prakara saṅkīrṇam daitya-dehaiḥ gata-asubhiḥ rarāja bhūḥ sa-tāla-agraiḥ ghanaiḥ iva nabhaḥ-talam
tayoḥ tat su-mahat karma niśamya vibudha-ādayaḥ mumucuḥ puṣpa-varṣāṇi cakruḥ vādyāni tuṣṭuvuḥ
atha tāla phalāni ādan manuṣyāḥ gata-sādhvasāḥ tṛṇam ca paśavaḥ ceruḥ hata dhenuka kānane
kṛṣṇaḥ kamala-patra-akṣaḥ puṇya-śravaṇa-kīrtanaḥ stūyamānaḥ anugaiḥ gopaiḥ sa-agra-jaḥ vrajam āvrajat
tam go-rajaḥ churita kuntala baddha barha vanya-prasūna rucira-īkṣaṇa cāru-hāsam veṇum kvaṇantam anugaiḥ upagīta kīrtim gopyaḥ didṛkṣita dṛśaḥ abhyagaman sametāḥ
pītvā mukunda-mukha sāragham akṣi-bhṛṅgaiḥ tāpam jahuḥ viraha-jam vraja-yoṣitaḥ ahni tat sat-kṛtim samadhigamya viveśa goṣṭham sa-vrīḍa hāsa vinayam yat apāṅga mokṣam
tayoḥ yaśodā-rohiṇyau putrayoḥ putra-vatsale yathā-kāmam yathā-kālam vyadhattām parama-āśiṣaḥ
gata adhvāna-śramau tatra majjana unmardana ādibhiḥ nīvīm vasitvā rucirām divya srak gandha maṇḍitau
jananī upahṛtam prāśya svādu annam upalālitau saṁviśya vara śayyāyām sukham suṣupatuḥ vraje
evam saḥ bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ vṛndāvana-caraḥ kvacit yayau rāmam ṛte rājan kālindīm sakhibhiḥ vṛtaḥ
atha gāvaḥ ca gopāḥ ca nidāgha ātapa pīḍitāḥ duṣṭam jalam papuḥ tasyāḥ tṛṣa-ārtāḥ viṣa dūṣitam
viṣa-ambhaḥ tat upaspṛśya daiva upahata cetasaḥ nipetuḥ vyasavaḥ sarve salila-ante kuru-udvaha vīkṣya tān vai tathā-bhūtān kṛṣṇaḥ yoga-īśvara-īśvaraḥ īkṣayā amṛta-varṣiṇyā sva-nāthān samajīvayat
te sampratīta smṛtayaḥ samutthāya jala-antikāt āsan su-vismitāḥ sarve vīkṣamāṇāḥ parasparam
anvamaṁsata tat rājan govinda anugraha-īkṣitam pītvā viṣam paretasya punaḥ utthānam ātmanaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca vilokya dūṣitām kṛṣṇām kṛṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇa-ahinā vibhuḥ tasyāḥ viśuddhim anvicchan sarpam tam udavāsayat
śrī-rājā uvāca katham antaḥ-jale agādhe nyagṛhṇāt bhagavān ahim saḥ vai bahu-yuga āvāsam yathā āsīt vipra kathyatām
brahman bhagavataḥ tasya bhūmnaḥ sva-chanda-vartinaḥ gopāla udāra caritam kaḥ tṛpyeta amṛtam juṣan
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca kālindyām kāliyasya āsīt hradaḥ kaścit viṣa agninā śrapyamāṇa payāḥ yasmin patanti upari-gāḥ khagāḥ
vipruṭ-matā viṣa-da ūrmi mārutena abhimarśitāḥ mriyante tīra-gāḥ yasya prāṇinaḥ sthira-jaṅgamāḥ
tam caṇḍa-vega viṣa vīryam avekṣya tena duṣṭām nadīm ca khala saṁyamana avatāraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kadambam adhiruhya tataḥ ati-tuṅgam āsphoṭya gāḍha-raśanaḥ nyapatat viṣa-ude
sarpa-hradaḥ puruṣa-sāra nipāta-vega saṅkṣobhita uraga viṣa-ucchvasita ambu-rāśiḥ paryak plutaḥ viṣa-kaṣāya bibhīṣaṇa ūrmiḥ dhāvan dhanuḥ-śatam ananta-balasya kim tat
tasya hrade viharataḥ bhuja-daṇḍa ghūrṇa vāḥ ghoṣam aṅga vara-vāraṇa vikramasya āśrutya tat sva-sadana abhibhavam nirīkṣya cakṣuḥ-śravāḥ samasarat tat amṛṣyamāṇaḥ
tam prekṣaṇīya su-kumāra ghana avadātam śrīvatsa pīta vasanam smita sundara āsyam krīḍantam aprati-bhayam kamala udara aṅghrim sandaśya marmasu ruṣā bhujayā cachāda
tam nāga bhoga parivītam adṛṣṭa-ceṣṭam ālokya tat-priya-sakhāḥ paśu-pāḥ bhṛśa-ārtāḥ kṛṣṇe arpita ātma su-hṛt artha kalatra kāmāḥ duḥkha anuśoka bhaya mūḍha dhiyaḥ nipetuḥ
gāvaḥ vṛṣāḥ vatsataryaḥ krandamānāḥ su-duḥkhitāḥ kṛṣṇe nyasta īkṣaṇāḥ bhītāḥ rudantyaḥ iva tasthire
atha vraje mahā-utpātāḥ tri-vidhāḥ hi ati-dāruṇāḥ utpetuḥ bhuvi divi ātmani āsanna bhaya saṁśinaḥ
tān ālakṣya bhaya-udvignāḥ gopāḥ nanda-puraḥ-gamāḥ vinā rāmeṇa gāḥ kṛṣṇam jñātvā cārayitum gatam taiḥ durnimittaiḥ nidhanam matvā prāptam atat-vidaḥ tat-prāṇāḥ tat-manaskāḥ te duḥkha śoka bhaya āturāḥ ā-bāla vṛddha vanitāḥ sarve aṅga paśu-vṛttayaḥ nirjagmuḥ gokulāt dīnāḥ kṛṣṇa-darśana lālasāḥ
tān tathā kātarān vīkṣya bhagavān mādhavaḥ balaḥ prahasya kiñcit na uvāca prabhāva-jñaḥ anujasya saḥ
te anveṣamāṇāḥ dayitam kṛṣṇam sūcitayā padaiḥ bhagavat-lakṣaṇaiḥ jagmuḥ padavyā yamunā-taṭam
te tatra tatra abja yava aṅkuśa aśani dhvaja upapannāni padāni viṭ-pateḥ mārge gavām anya-pada antara-antare nirīkṣamāṇāḥ yuyuḥ aṅga sa-tvarāḥ
antaḥ hrade bhujaga bhoga parītam ārāt kṛṣṇam nirīham upalabhya jala-āśaya ante gopān ca mūḍha-dhiṣaṇān paritaḥ paśūn ca saṅkrandataḥ parama-kaśmalam āpuḥ ārtāḥ
gopyaḥ anurakta-manasaḥ bhagavati anante tat sauhṛda smita viloka giraḥ smarantyaḥ graste ahinā priya-tame bhṛśa duḥkha taptāḥ śūnyam priya-vyatihṛtam dadṛśuḥ tri-lokam
tāḥ kṛṣṇa-mātaram apatyam anupraviṣṭām tulya vyathāḥ samanugṛhya śucaḥ sravantyaḥ tāḥ tāḥ vraja-priya kathāḥ kathayantyaḥ āsan kṛṣṇa-ānane arpita dṛśaḥ mṛtaka pratīkāḥ
kṛṣṇa-prāṇān nirviśataḥ nanda-ādīn vīkṣya tam hradam pratyaṣedhat saḥ bhagavān rāmaḥ kṛṣṇa anubhāva vit
ittham sva-gokulam ananya-gatim nirīkṣya sa-strī kumāram ati-duḥkhitam ātma-hetoḥ ājñāya martya-padavīm anuvartamānaḥ sthitvā muhūrtam udatiṣṭhat uraṅga bandhāt
tat prathyamāna vapuṣā vyathita ātma bhogaḥ tyaktvā unnamayya kupitaḥ sva-phaṇān bhujaṅga tasthau śvasan śvasana-randhra viṣa-ambarīṣa stabdha īkṣaṇa ulmuka mukhaḥ harim īkṣamāṇaḥ
tam jihvayā dvi-śikhayā parilelihānam dve sṛkvaṇī hi ati-karāla viṣa-agni dṛṣṭim krīḍan amum parisasāra yathā khaga-indraḥ babhrāma saḥ api avasaram prasamīkṣamāṇaḥ
evam paribhrama hata ojasam unnata aṁsam ānamya tat pṛthu-śiraḥsu adhirūḍhaḥ ādyaḥ tat mūrdha ratna-nikara sparśa ati-tāmra pāda-ambujaḥ akhila-kalā ādi-guruḥ nanarta
tam nartum udyatam avekṣya tadā tadīya gandharva-siddha muni-cāraṇa deva-vadhvaḥ prītyā mṛdaṅga-paṇava-ānaka vādya gīta puṣpa upahāra nutibhiḥ sahasā upaseduḥ
yat yat śiraḥ na namate aṅga śata-eka-śīrṣṇaḥ tat tat mamarda khara daṇḍa dharaḥ aṅghri-pātaiḥ kṣīṇa-āyuṣaḥ bhramataḥ ulbaṇam āsyataḥ asṛk nastaḥ vaman parama kaśmalam āpa nāgaḥ
tasya akṣibhiḥ garalam udvamataḥ śiraḥsu yat yat samunnamati niḥśvasataḥ ruṣā uccaiḥ nṛtyan padā anunamayan damayām babhūva puṣpaiḥ prapūjitaḥ iva iha pumān purāṇaḥ
tat citra tāṇḍava virugna phaṇā-sahasraḥ raktam mukhaiḥ uru vaman nṛpa bhagna-gātraḥ smṛtvā cara-acara gurum puruṣam purāṇam nārāyaṇam tam araṇam manasā jagāma
kṛṣṇasya garbha jagataḥ ati-bhara avasannam pārṣṇi prahāra parirugna phaṇā ātapatram dṛṣṭvā ahim ādyam upaseduḥ amuṣya patnyaḥ ārtāḥ ślathat vasana bhūṣaṇa keśa-bandhāḥ
tāḥ tam su-vigna manasaḥ atha puraḥ-kṛta arbhāḥ kāyam nidhāya bhuvi bhūta-patim praṇemuḥ sādhvyaḥ kṛta-añjali-puṭāḥ śamalasya bhartuḥ mokṣa īpsavaḥ śaraṇa-dam śaraṇam prapannāḥ
nāga-patnyaḥ ūcuḥ nyāyyaḥ hi daṇḍaḥ kṛta-kilbiṣe asmin tava avatāraḥ khala nigrahāya ripoḥ sutānām api tulya-dṛṣṭiḥ dhatse damam phalam eva anuśaṁsam
anugrahaḥ ayam bhavataḥ kṛtaḥ hi naḥ daṇḍaḥ asatām te khalu kalmaṣa-apahaḥ yat dandaśūkatvam amuṣya dehinaḥ krodhaḥ api te anugrahaḥ eva sammataḥ
tapaḥ su-taptam kim anena pūrvam nirasta-mānena ca māna-dena dharmaḥ atha vā sarva-jana anukampayā yataḥ bhavān tuṣyati sarva-jīvaḥ
kasya anubhāvaḥ asya na deva vidmahe tava aṅghri reṇu sparaśa adhikāraḥ yat vāñchayā śrīḥ lalanā ācarat tapaḥ vihāya kāmān su-ciram dhṛta vratā
na nāka-pṛṣṭham na ca sārva-bhaumam na pārameṣṭhyam na rasa-adhipatyam na yoga-siddhīḥ apunaḥ-bhavam vā vāñchanti yat pāda rajaḥ prapannāḥ
tat eṣaḥ nātha āpa durāpam anyaiḥ tamaḥ-janiḥ krodha-vaśaḥ api ahi-īśaḥ saṁsāra-cakre bhramataḥ śarīriṇaḥ yat icchataḥ syāt vibhavaḥ samakṣaḥ
namaḥ tubhyam bhagavate puruṣāya mahā-ātmane bhūta-āvāsāya bhūtāya parāya parama-ātmane
jñāna vijñāna nidhaye brahmaṇe ananta-śaktaye aguṇāya avikārāya namaḥ te prākṛtāya ca
kālāya kāla-nābhāya kāla-avayava sākṣiṇe viśvāya tad-upadraṣṭre tat-kartre viśva hetave
bhūta mātra indriya prāṇa manaḥ buddhi āśaya ātmane tri-guṇena abhimānena gūḍha sva ātma anubhūtaye namaḥ anantāya sūkṣmāya kūṭa-sthāya vipaścite nānā vāda anurodhāya vācya vācaka śaktaye
namaḥ pramāṇa mūlāya kavaye śāstra yonaye pravṛttāya nivṛttāya nigamāya namaḥ namaḥ
namaḥ kṛṣṇāya rāmāya vasudeva-sutāya ca pradyumnāya aniruddhāya sātvatām pataye namaḥ
namaḥ guṇa-pradīpāya guṇa ātma chādanāya ca guṇa vṛtti upalakṣyāya guṇa-draṣṭre sva saṁvide
avyākṛta-vihārāya sarva-vyākṛta siddhaye hṛṣīka-īśa namaḥ te astu munaye mauna-śīline
para-avara gati jñāya sarva adhyakṣāya te namaḥ aviśvāya ca viśvāya tat-draṣṭre asya ca hetave
tvam hi asya janma-sthiti-saṁyamān vibho guṇaiḥ anīhaḥ akṛta kāla-śakti dhṛk tat-tat sva-bhāvān pratibodhayan sataḥ samīkṣayā amogha-vihāraḥ īhase
tasya eva te amūḥ tanavaḥ tri-lokyām śāntāḥ aśāntāḥ uta mūḍha-yonayaḥ śāntāḥ priyāḥ te hi adhunā avitum satām sthātuḥ ca te dharma parīpsayā īhataḥ
aparādhaḥ sakṛt bhartrā soḍhavyaḥ sva-prajā kṛtaḥ kṣantum arhasi śānta-ātman mūḍhasya tvām ajānataḥ
anugṛhṇīṣva bhagavan prāṇān tyajati pannagaḥ strīṇām naḥ sādhu-śocyānām patiḥ prāṇaḥ pradīyatām
vidhehi te kiṅkarīṇām anuṣṭheyam tava ājñayā yat śraddhayā anutiṣṭhan vai mucyate sarvataḥ bhayāt
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ittham saḥ nāga-patnībhiḥ bhagavān samabhiṣṭutaḥ mūrcchitam bhagna-śirasam visasarja aṅghri-kuṭṭanaiḥ
pratilabdha indriya prāṇaḥ kāliyaḥ śanakaiḥ harim kṛcchrāt samucchvasan dīnaḥ kṛṣṇam prāha kṛta-añjaliḥ
kāliyaḥ uvāca vayam khalāḥ saha utpattyā tāmasāḥ dīrgha-manyavaḥ svabhāvaḥ dustyajaḥ nātha lokānām yat asat grahaḥ
tvayā sṛṣṭam idam viśvam dhātaḥ guṇa visarjanam nānā sva-bhāva vīrya ojaḥ yoni bīja āśaya ākṛti
vayam ca tatra bhagavan sarpāḥ jāti uru-manyavaḥ katham tyajāmaḥ tvat-māyām dustyajām mohitāḥ svayam
bhavān hi kāraṇam tatra sarva-jñaḥ jagat-īśvaraḥ anugraham nigraham vā manyase tat vidhehi naḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti ākarṇya vacaḥ prāha bhagavān kārya-mānuṣaḥ na atra stheyam tvayā sarpa samudram yāhi mā ciram sva jñāti apatya dāra āḍhyaḥ go nṛbhiḥ bhujyate nadī
yaḥ etat saṁsmaret martyaḥ tubhyam mat anuśāsanam kīrtayan ubhayoḥ sandhyoḥ na yuṣmat bhayam āpnuyāt
yaḥ asmin snātvā mat-ākrīḍe deva-ādīn tarpayet jalaiḥ upoṣya mām smaran arcet sarva-pāpaiḥ pramucyate
dvīpam ramaṇakam hitvā hradam etam upāśritaḥ yat bhayāt saḥ suparṇaḥ tvām na adyāt mat-pāda lāñchitam
śrī-ṛṣiḥ uvāca muktaḥ bhagavatā rājan kṛṣṇena adbhuta-karmaṇā tam pūjayām āsa mudā nāga patnyaḥ ca sa-ādaram
divya ambara srak maṇibhiḥ para-ardhyaiḥ api bhūṣaṇaiḥ divya gandha anulepaiḥ ca mahatyā utpala mālayā pūjayitvā jagat-nātham prasādya garuḍa-dhvajam tataḥ prītaḥ abhyanujñātaḥ parikramya abhivandya tam sa kalatra suhṛt putraḥ dvīpam abdheḥ jagāma ha tadā eva sa-amṛta jalā yamunā nirviṣā abhavat anugrahāt bhagavataḥ krīḍā mānuṣa rūpiṇaḥ
śrī-rājā uvāca nāga ālayam ramaṇakam katham tatyāja kāliyaḥ kṛtam kim vā suparṇasya tena ekena asamañjasam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca upahāryaiḥ sarpa-janaiḥ māsi māsi iha yaḥ baliḥ vānaspatyaḥ mahā-bāho nāgānām prāk nirūpitaḥ svam svam bhāgam prayacchanti nāgāḥ parvaṇi parvaṇi gopīthāya ātmanaḥ sarve suparṇāya mahā-ātmane
viṣa vīrya mada āviṣṭaḥ kādraveyaḥ tu kāliyaḥ kadarthī-kṛtya garuḍam svayam tam bubhuje balim
tat śrutvā kupitaḥ rājan bhagavān bhagavat-priyaḥ vijighāṁsuḥ mahā-vegaḥ kāliyam samupādravat
tam āpatantam tarasā viṣa āyudhaḥ prati abhyayāt utthita na eka mastakaḥ dadbhiḥ suparṇam vyadaśat dat-āyudhaḥ karāla jihvā ucchvasita ugra locanaḥ
tam tārkṣya-putraḥ saḥ nirasya manyu-mān pracaṇḍa-vegaḥ madhusūdana-āsanaḥ pakṣeṇa savyena hiraṇya rociṣā jaghāna kadru-sutam ugra vikramaḥ
suparṇa pakṣa abhihataḥ kāliyaḥ atīva vihvalaḥ hradam viveśa kālindyāḥ tat-agamyam durāsadam
tatra ekadā jala-caram garuḍaḥ bhakṣyam īpsitam nivāritaḥ saubhariṇā prasahya kṣudhitaḥ aharat
mīnān su-duḥkhitān dṛṣṭvā dīnān mīna-patau hate kṛpayā saubhariḥ prāha tatratya kṣemam ācaran
atra praviśya garuḍaḥ yadi matsyān saḥ khādati sadyaḥ prāṇaiḥ viyujyeta satyam etat bravīmi aham
tam kāliyaḥ param veda na anyaḥ kaścana lelihaḥ avātsīt garuḍāt bhītaḥ kṛṣṇena ca vivāsitaḥ
kṛṣṇam hradāt viniṣkrāntam divya srak gandha vāsasam mahā-maṇi-gaṇa ākīrṇam jāmbūnada pariṣkṛtam upalabhya utthitāḥ sarve labdha-prāṇāḥ iva asavaḥ pramoda nibhṛta-ātmānaḥ gopāḥ prītyā abhirebhire
yaśodā rohiṇī nandaḥ gopyaḥ gopāḥ ca kaurava kṛṣṇam sametya labdha īhāḥ āsan śuṣkāḥ nagāḥ api
rāmaḥ ca acyutam āliṅgya jahāsa asya anubhāva-vit premṇā tam aṅkam āropya punaḥ punaḥ udaikṣata gāvaḥ vṛṣāḥ vatsataryaḥ lebhire paramām mudam
nandam viprāḥ samāgatya guravaḥ sa-kalatrakāḥ ūcuḥ te kāliya-grastaḥ diṣṭyā muktaḥ tava ātma-jaḥ
dehi dānam dvi-jātīnām kṛṣṇa-nirmukti hetave nandaḥ prīta-manāḥ rājan gāḥ suvarṇam tadā ādiśat
yaśodā api mahā-bhāgā naṣṭa labdha prajā satī pariṣvajya
tām rātrim tatra rāja-indra kṣut-tṛḍbhyām śrama karṣitāḥ ūṣuḥ vraja-okasaḥ gāvaḥ kālindyāḥ upakūlataḥ
tadā śuci vana udbhūtaḥ dāva-agniḥ sarvataḥ vrajam suptam niśīthe āvṛtya pradagdhum upacakrame
tataḥ utthāya sambhrāntāḥ dahyamānāḥ vraja-okasaḥ kṛṣṇam yayuḥ te śaraṇam māyā manujam īśvaram
kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahā-bhāga he rāma amita-vikrama eṣaḥ ghora-tamaḥ vahniḥ tāvakān grasate hi naḥ
su-dustarāt naḥ svān pāhi kāla-agneḥ suhṛdaḥ prabho na śaknumaḥ tvat-caraṇam santyaktum akutaḥ-bhayam
ittham sva-jana vaiklavyam nirīkṣya jagat-īśvaraḥ tam agnim apibat tīvram anantaḥ ananta-śakti-dhṛk
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca atha kṛṣṇaḥ parivṛtaḥ jñātibhiḥ mudita-ātmabhiḥ anugīyamānaḥ nyaviśat vrajam go-kula maṇḍitam
vraje vikrīḍatoḥ evam gopāla chadma māyayā grīṣmaḥ nāma ṛtuḥ abhavat na ati-preyān śarīriṇām
saḥ ca vṛndāvana guṇaiḥ vasantaḥ iva lakṣitaḥ yatra āste bhagavān sākṣāt rāmeṇa saha keśavaḥ
yatra nirjhara nirhrāda nivṛtta svana jhillikam śaśvat tat śīkara ṛjīṣa druma maṇḍala maṇḍitam
sarit saraḥ prasravaṇa ūrmi vāyunā kahlāra-kañja-utpala reṇu hāriṇā na vidyate yatra vana-okasām davaḥ nidāgha vahni arka bhavaḥ ati-śādvale
agādha toya hradinī taṭa ūrmibhiḥ dravat purīṣyāḥ pulinaiḥ samantataḥ na yatra caṇḍa aṁśu-karāḥ viṣa ulbaṇāḥ bhuvaḥ rasam śādvalitam ca gṛhṇate
vanam kusumitam śrīmat nadat citra mṛga dvijam gāyan mayūra bhramaram kūjat kokila sārasam
krīḍiṣyamāṇaḥ tat kṛṣṇaḥ bhagavān bala-saṁyutaḥ veṇum viraṇayan gopaiḥ go-dhanaiḥ saṁvṛtaḥ aviśat
pravāla barha stabaka srak dhātu kṛta-bhūṣaṇāḥ rāma-kṛṣṇa-ādayaḥ gopāḥ nanṛtuḥ yuyudhuḥ jaguḥ
kṛṣṇasya nṛtyataḥ kecit jaguḥ kecit avādayan veṇu pāṇi-talaiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ praśaśaṁsuḥ atha apare
gopa-jāti praticchannāḥ devāḥ gopāla-rūpiṇau īḍire kṛṣṇa-rāmau ca naṭāḥ iva naṭam nṛpa
bhramaṇaiḥ laṅghanaiḥ kṣepaiḥ āsphoṭana vikarṣaṇaiḥ cikṛīḍatuḥ niyuddhena kāka-pakṣa dharau kvacit
kvacit nṛtyatsu ca anyeṣu gāyakau vādakau svayam śaśaṁsatuḥ mahā-rāja sādhu sādhu iti vādinau
kvacit bilvaiḥ kvacit kumbhaiḥ kvaca āmalaka-muṣṭibhiḥ aspṛśya netra-bandha ādyaiḥ kvacit mṛga khaga īhayā
kvacit ca dardura plāvaiḥ vividhaiḥ upahāsakaiḥ kadācit syandolikayā karhicit nṛpa-ceṣṭayā
evam tau loka-siddhābhiḥ krīḍābhiḥ ceratuḥ vane nadī adri droṇi kuñjeṣu kānaneṣu saraḥsu ca
paśūn cārayatoḥ gopaiḥ tat-vane rāma-kṛṣṇayoḥ gopa-rūpī pralambaḥ agāt asuraḥ tat jihīrṣayā
tam vidvān api dāśārhaḥ bhagavān sarva-darśanaḥ anvamodata tat sakhyam vadham tasya vicintayan
tatra upāhūya gopālān kṛṣṇaḥ prāha vihāra-vit he gopāḥ vihariṣyāmaḥ dvandvī-bhūya yathā-yatham
tatra cakruḥ parivṛḍhau gopāḥ rāma-janārdanau kṛṣṇa-saṅghaṭṭinaḥ kecit āsan rāmasya ca apare
āceruḥ vividhāḥ krīḍāḥ vāhya vāhaka lakṣaṇāḥ yatra ārohanti jetāraḥ vahanti ca parājitāḥ
vahantaḥ vāhyamānāḥ ca cārayantaḥ ca go-dhanam bhāṇḍīrakam nāma vaṭam jagmuḥ kṛṣṇa-puraḥ-gamāḥ
rāma-saṅghaṭṭinaḥ yarhi śrīdāma-vṛṣabha-ādayaḥ krīḍāyām jayinaḥ tān tān ūhuḥ kṛṣṇa-ādayaḥ nṛpa
uvāha kṛṣṇaḥ bhagavān śrīdāmānam parājitaḥ vṛṣabham bhadrasenaḥ tu pralambaḥ rohiṇī-sutam
aviṣahyam manyamānaḥ kṛṣṇam dānava-puṅgavaḥ vahan druta-taram prāgāt avarohaṇataḥ param
tam udvahan dharaṇi-dhara-indra gauravam mahā-asuraḥ vigata-rayaḥ nijam vapuḥ saḥ āsthitaḥ puraṭa paricchadaḥ babhau taḍit dyu-mān uḍu-pati vāṭ iva ambu-daḥ
nirīkṣya tat vapuḥ alam ambare carat pradīpta dṛk bhru-kuṭi taṭa ugra daṁṣṭrakam jvalat śikham kaṭaka kirīṭa kuṇḍala tviṣā adbhutam hala-dharaḥ īṣat atrasat
atha āgata-smṛtiḥ abhayaḥ ripum balaḥ vihāya sārtham iva harantam ātmanaḥ ruṣā ahanat śirasi dṛḍhena muṣṭinā sura-adhipaḥ girim iva vajra raṁhasā
saḥ āhataḥ sapadi viśīrṇa mastakaḥ mukhāt vaman rudhiram apasmṛtaḥ asuraḥ mahā-ravam vyasuḥ apatat samīrayan giriḥ yathā maghavataḥ āyudha āhataḥ
dṛṣṭvā pralambam nihatam balena bala-śālinā gopāḥ su-vismitāḥ āsan sādhu sādhu iti vādinaḥ
āśiṣaḥ abhigṛṇantaḥ tam praśaśaṁsuḥ tat-arhaṇam pretya āgatam iva ālingya prema vihvala cetasaḥ
pāpe pralambe nihate devāḥ parama nirvṛtāḥ abhyavarṣan balam mālyaiḥ śaśaṁsuḥ sādhu sādhu iti
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca krīḍā āsakteṣu gopeṣu tat-gāvaḥ dūra-cāriṇīḥ svairam carantyaḥ viviśuḥ tṛṇa lobhena gahvaram
ajāḥ gāvaḥ mahiṣyaḥ ca nirviśantyaḥ vanāt vanam īṣīkā-aṭavīm nirviviśuḥ krandantyaḥ dāva tarṣitāḥ
te apaśyantaḥ paśūn gopāḥ kṛṣṇa-rāma-ādayaḥ tadā jāta-anutāpāḥ na viduḥ vicinvantaḥ gavām gatim
tṛṇaiḥ tat khura dat chinnaiḥ goḥ-padaiḥ aṅkitaiḥ gavām mārgam anvagaman sarve naṣṭa-ājīvyāḥ vicetasaḥ
muñjā-aṭavyām bhraṣṭa-mārgam krandamānam sva go-dhanam samprāpya tṛṣitāḥ śrāntāḥ tataḥ te sannyavartayan
tāḥ āhūtāḥ bhagavatā megha-gambhīrayā girā sva-nāmnām ninadam śrutvā pratineduḥ praharṣitāḥ
tataḥ samantāt dava-dhūmaketuḥ yadṛcchayā abhūt kṣaya-kṛt vana-okasām samīritaḥ sārathinā ulbaṇa ulmukaiḥ vilelihānaḥ sthira-jaṅgamān mahān
tam āpatantam paritaḥ dava-agnim gopāḥ ca gāvaḥ prasamīkṣya bhītāḥ ūcuḥ ca kṛṣṇam sa-balam prapannāḥ yathā harim mṛtyu bhaya arditāḥ janāḥ
kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahā-vīra he rāma amogha-vikrama dāva-agninā dahyamānān prapannān trātum arhathaḥ
nūnam tvat bāndhavāḥ kṛṣṇa na ca arhanti avasāditum vayam hi sarva-dharma-jña tvat-nāthāḥ tvat-parāyaṇaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca vacaḥ niśamya kṛpaṇam bandhūnām bhagavān hariḥ nimīlayata mā bhaiṣṭa locanāni iti abhāṣata
tathā iti mīlita akṣeṣu bhagavān agnim ulbaṇam pītvā mukhena tān kṛcchrāt yoga-adhīśaḥ vyamocayat
tataḥ ca te akṣīṇi unmīlya punaḥ bhāṇḍīram āpitāḥ niśamya vismitāḥ āsan ātmānam gāḥ ca mocitāḥ
kṛṣṇasya yoga-vīryam tat yoga-māyā anubhāvitam dāva-agneḥ ātmanaḥ kṣemam vīkṣya te menire amaram
gāḥ sannivartya sāya-ahne saha-rāmaḥ janārdanaḥ veṇum viraṇayan goṣṭham agāt gopaiḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ
gopīnām parama-ānandaḥ āsīt govinda-darśane kṣaṇam yuga-śatam iva yāsām yena vinā abhavat
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tayoḥ tat adbhutam karma dāva-agneḥ mokṣam ātmanaḥ gopāḥ strībhyaḥ samācakhyuḥ pralamba-vadham eva ca
gopa-vṛddhāḥ ca gopyaḥ ca tat upākarṇya vismitāḥ menire deva-pravarau kṛṣṇa-rāmau vrajam gatau
tataḥ prāvartata prāvṛṭ sarva-sattva samudbhavā vidyotamāna paridhiḥ visphūrjita nabhaḥ-talā
sāndra nīla ambudaiḥ vyoma sa-vidyut stanayitnubhiḥ aspaṣṭa jyotiḥ ācchannam brahma iva sa-guṇam babhau
aṣṭau māsān nipītam yat bhūmyāḥ ca uda-mayam vasu sva-gobhiḥ moktum ārebhe parjanyaḥ kāle āgate
taḍit-vantaḥ mahā-meghāḥ caṇḍa śvasana vepitāḥ prīṇanam jīvanam hi asya mumucuḥ karuṇāḥ iva
tapaḥ-kṛśā deva-mīḍhā āsīt varṣīyasī mahī yathā eva kāmya tapasaḥ tanuḥ samprāpya tat phalam
niśā-mukheṣu khadyotāḥ tamasā bhānti na grahāḥ yathā pāpena pāṣaṇḍāḥ na hi vedāḥ kalau yuge
śrutvā parjanya ninadam maṇḍukāḥ sasṛjuḥ giraḥ tūṣṇīm śayānāḥ prāk yadvat brāhmaṇāḥ niyama-atyaye
āsan utpatha-gāminyaḥ kṣudra nadyaḥ anuśuṣyatīḥ puṁsaḥ yathā asvatantrasya deha draviṇa sampadaḥ
haritāḥ haribhiḥ śaṣpaiḥ indragopaiḥ ca lohitā ucchilīndhra kṛta chāyā nṛṇām śrīḥ iva bhūḥ abhūt
kṣetrāṇi śaṣya-sampadbhiḥ karṣakāṇām mudam daduḥ māninām anutāpam vai daiva-adhīnam ajānatām
jala sthala okasaḥ sarve nava vāri niṣevayā abibhran ruciram rūpam yathā hari-niṣevayā
saridbhiḥ saṅgataḥ sindhuḥ cukṣobha śvasana ūrmi-mān apakva yoginaḥ cittam kāma-aktam guṇa-yuk yathā
girayaḥ varṣa-dhārābhiḥ hanyamānāḥ na vivyathuḥ abhibhūyamānāḥ vyasanaiḥ yathā adhokṣaja-cetasaḥ
mārgāḥ babhūvuḥ sandigdhāḥ tṛṇaiḥ channāḥ hi asaṁskṛtāḥ na abhyasyamānāḥ śrutayaḥ dvijaiḥ kālena ca āhatāḥ
loka bandhuṣu megheṣu vidyutaḥ cala-sauhṛdāḥ sthairyam na cakruḥ kāminyaḥ puruṣeṣu guṇiṣu iva
dhanuḥ viyati māhā-indram nirguṇam ca guṇini abhāt vyakte guṇa-vyatikare aguṇa-vān puruṣaḥ yathā
na rarāja uḍupaḥ channaḥ sva-jyotsnā rājitaiḥ ghanaiḥ aham-matyā bhāsitayā sva-bhāsā puruṣaḥ yathā
megha āgama utsavāḥ hṛṣṭāḥ pratyanandan śikhaṇḍinaḥ gṛheṣu tapta nirviṇṇāḥ yathā acyuta jana āgame
pītvā āpaḥ pāda-pāḥ padbhiḥ āsan nānā ātma-mūrtayaḥ prāk kṣāmāḥ tapasā śrāntāḥ yathā kāma-anusevayā
saraḥsu aśānta rodhaḥsu nyūṣuḥ aṅga api sārasāḥ gṛheṣu aśānta kṛtyeṣu grāmyāḥ iva durāśayāḥ
jala-oghaiḥ nirabhidyanta setavaḥ varṣati īśvare pāṣaṇḍinām asat-vādaiḥ veda-mārgāḥ kalau yathā
vyamuñcan vāyubhiḥ nunnāḥ bhūtebhyaḥ ca amṛtam ghanāḥ yathā āśiṣaḥ viṭ-patayaḥ kāle kāle dvija īritāḥ
evam vanam tat varṣiṣṭham pakva kharjura jambu mat go gopālaiḥ vṛtaḥ rantum sa-balaḥ prāviśat hariḥ
dhenavaḥ manda-gāminyaḥ ūdhaḥ bhāreṇa bhūyasā yayuḥ bhagavatā āhūtāḥ drutam prītyā snuta stanāḥ
vana-okasaḥ pramuditāḥ vana-rājīḥ madhu-cyutaḥ jala-dhārāḥ gireḥ nādāt āsannāḥ dadṛśe guhāḥ
kvacit vanaspati kroḍe guhāyām ca abhivarṣati nirviśya bhagavān reme kanda-mūla phala aśanaḥ
dadhi-odanam samānītam śīlāyām salila-antike sambhojanīyaiḥ bubhuje gopaiḥ saṅkarṣaṇa-anvitaḥ
śādvala upari saṁviśya carvataḥ mīlita īkṣaṇān tṛptān vṛṣān vatsatarān gāḥ ca sva ūdhaḥ bhara śramāḥ prāvṛṭ śriyam ca tām vīkṣya sarva-kāla sukha āvahām bhagavān pūjayām cakre ātma-śakti upabṛṁhitām
evam nivasatoḥ tasmin rāma-keśavayoḥ vraje śarat samabhavat vyabhrā svaccha-ambu aparuṣa-anilā
śaradā nīraja utpattyā nīrāṇi prakṛtim yayuḥ bhraṣṭānām iva cetāṁsi punaḥ yoga niṣevayā
vyomnaḥ ap-bhram bhūta śābalyam bhuvaḥ paṅkam apām malam śarat jahāra āśramiṇām kṛṣṇe bhaktiḥ yathā aśubham
sarva-svam jala-dāḥ hitvā virejuḥ śubhra varcasaḥ yathā tyakta-eṣaṇāḥ śāntāḥ munayaḥ mukta-kilbiṣāḥ
girayaḥ mumucuḥ toyam kvacit na mumucuḥ śivam yathā jñāna amṛtam kāle jñāninaḥ dadate na vā
na eva avidan kṣīyamāṇam jalam gādha-jale carāḥ yathā āyuḥ anu-aham kṣayyam narāḥ mūḍhāḥ kuṭumbinaḥ
gādha-vāri-carāḥ tāpam avindan śarat-arka-jam yathā daridraḥ kṛpaṇaḥ kuṭumbī avijita-indriyaḥ
śanaiḥ śanaiḥ jahuḥ paṅkam sthalāni āmam ca vīrudhaḥ yathā aham-mamatām dhīrāḥ śarīra-ādiṣu anātmasu
niścala ambuḥ abhūt tūṣnīm samudraḥ śarat āgame ātmani uparate samyak muniḥ vyuparata āgamaḥ
kedārebhyaḥ tu apaḥ agṛhṇan karṣakāḥ dṛḍha setubhiḥ yathā prāṇaiḥ sravat jñānam tat nirodhena yoginaḥ
śarat-arka aṁśu jān tāpān bhūtānām uḍupaḥ aharat deha abhimāna-jam bodhaḥ mukundaḥ vraja-yoṣitām
kham aśobhata nirmegham śarat vimala tārakam sattva-yuktam yathā cittam śabda-brahma artha darśanam
akhaṇḍa maṇḍalaḥ vyomni rarāja uḍu-gaṇaiḥ śaśī yathā yadu-patiḥ kṛṣṇaḥ vṛṣṇi-cakra āvṛtaḥ bhuvi
āśliṣya sama śīta-uṣṇam prasūna-vana mārutam janāḥ tāpam jahuḥ gopyaḥ na kṛṣṇa hṛta cetasaḥ
gāvaḥ mṛgāḥ khagāḥ nāryaḥ puṣpiṇyaḥ śaradā abhavan anvīyamānāḥ sva-vṛṣaiḥ phalaiḥ īśa-kriyāḥ iva
udahṛṣyan vāri-jāni sūrya utthāne kumut vinā rājñā tu nirbhayāḥ lokāḥ yathā dasyūn vinā nṛpa
pura grāmeṣu āgrayaṇaiḥ indriyaiḥ ca mahā-utsavaiḥ babhau bhūḥ pakva śaṣya āḍhyā kalā ābhyām nitarām hareḥ
vaṇik muni nṛpa snātāḥ nirgamya arthān prapedire varṣa ruddhāḥ yathā siddhāḥ sva-piṇḍān kāle āgate
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ittham śarat svaccha jalam padma-ākara su-gandhinā nyaviśat vāyunā vātam sa go gopālakaḥ acyutaḥ
kusumita vana-rāji śuṣmi bhṛṅga dvija kula ghuṣṭa saraḥ sarit mahīdhram madhu-patiḥ avagāhya cārayan gāḥ saha-paśu-pāla-balaḥ cukūja veṇum
tat vraja-striyaḥ āśrutya veṇu-gītam smara-udayam kāścit parokṣam kṛṣṇasya sva-sakhībhyaḥ anvavarṇayan
tat varṇayitum ārabdhāḥ smarantyaḥ kṛṣṇa-ceṣṭitam na aśakan smara-vegena vikṣipta manasaḥ nṛpa
barha āpīḍam naṭa-vara vapuḥ karṇayoḥ karṇikāram bibhrat vāsaḥ kanaka kapiśam vaijayantīm ca mālām randhrān veṇoḥ adhara sudhayā āpūrayan gopa-vṛndaiḥ vṛndā-araṇyam sva-pada ramaṇam prāviśat gīta kīrtiḥ
iti veṇu-ravam rājan sarva-bhūta manaḥ-haram śrutvā vraja-striyaḥ sarvāḥ varṇayantyaḥ abhirebhire
śrī-gopyaḥ ūcuḥ akṣaṇvatām phalam idam na param vidāmaḥ sakhyaḥ paśūn anuviveśayatoḥ vayasyaiḥ vaktram vraja-īśa sutayoḥ anu-veṇu-juṣṭam yaiḥ vā nipītam anurakta kaṭa-akṣa mokṣam
cūta pravāla barha stabaka utpala abja mālā anupṛkta paridhāna vicitra veśau madhye virejatuḥ alam paśu-pāla goṣṭhyām raṅge yathā naṭa-varau kvaca gāyamānau
gopyaḥ kim ācarat ayam kuśalam sma veṇuḥ dāmodara adhara-sudhām api gopikānām bhuṅkte svayam yat avaśiṣṭa rasam hradinyaḥ hṛṣyat tvacaḥ aśru mumucuḥ taravaḥ yathā āryāḥ
vṛndāvanam sakhi bhuvaḥ vitanoti kīrtim yat devakī-suta pada-ambuja labdha lakṣmi govinda-veṇum anu matta mayūra nṛtyam prekṣya adri-sānu avarata anya samasta sattvam
dhanyāḥ sma mūḍha-gatayaḥ api hariṇyaḥ etāḥ yāḥ nanda-nandanam upātta-vicitra-veśam ākarṇya veṇu-raṇitam saha-kṛṣṇa-sārāḥ pūjām dadhuḥ viracitām praṇaya-avalokaiḥ
kṛṣṇam nirīkṣya vanitā utsava rūpa śīlam śrutvā ca tat kvaṇita veṇu vivikta gītam devyaḥ vimāna-gatayaḥ smara nunna sārāḥ bhraśyat prasūna-kabarāḥ mumuhuḥ vinīvyaḥ
gāvaḥ ca kṛṣṇa-mukha nirgata veṇu gīta pīyūṣam uttabhita karṇa puṭaiḥ pibantyaḥ śāvāḥ snuta stana payaḥ kavalāḥ sma tasthuḥ govindam ātmani dṛśā aśru-kalāḥ spṛśantyaḥ
prāyaḥ bata amba vihagāḥ munayaḥ vane asmin kṛṣṇa-īkṣitam tat-uditam kala-veṇu-gītam āruhya ye druma-bhujān rucira-pravālān śṛṇvanti mīlita-dṛśaḥ vigata-anya-vācaḥ
nadyaḥ tadā tat upadhārya mukunda gītam āvarta lakṣita manaḥ-bhava bhagna vegāḥ āliṅgana sthagitam ūrmi-bhujaiḥ murāreḥ gṛhṇanti pāda-yugalam kamala-upahārāḥ
dṛṣṭvā ātape vraja-paśūn saha rāma-gopaiḥ sañcārayantam anu veṇum udīrayantam prema pravṛddhaḥ uditaḥ kusuma-āvalībhiḥ sakhyuḥ vyadhāt sva-vapuṣā ambudaḥ ātapatram
pūrṇāḥ pulindyaḥ urugāya pada-abja rāga śrī-kuṅkumena dayitā stana maṇḍitena tat darśana smara rujaḥ tṛṇa rūṣitena limpantyaḥ ānana kuceṣu jahuḥ tat ādhim
hanta ayam adriḥ abalāḥ hari-dāsa-varyaḥ yat rāma-kṛṣṇa-caraṇa sparaśa pramodaḥ mānam tanoti saha go-gaṇayoḥ tayoḥ yat pānīya sūyavasa kandara kanda-mūlaiḥ
gāḥ gopakaiḥ anu-vanam nayatoḥ udāra veṇu-svanaiḥ kala-padaiḥ tanubhṛtsu sakhyaḥ aspandanam gati-matām pulakaḥ taruṇam niryoga-pāśa kṛta-lakṣaṇayoḥ vicitram
evam-vidhāḥ bhagavataḥ yāḥ vṛndāvana-cāriṇaḥ varṇayantyaḥ mithaḥ gopyaḥ krīḍaḥ tat-mayatām yayuḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca hemante prathame māsi nanda-vraja kumārikāḥ ceruḥ haviṣyam bhuñjānāḥ kātyāyanī arcana-vratam
āplutya ambhasi kālindyāḥ jala-ante ca udite aruṇe kṛtva prati-kṛtim devīm ānarcuḥ nṛpa saikatīm gandhaiḥ mālyaiḥ surabhibhiḥ balibhiḥ dhūpa-dīpakaiḥ ucca-avacaiḥ ca upahāraiḥ pravāla phala taṇḍulaiḥ
kātyāyanī mahā-māye mahā-yogini adhīśvari nanda-gopa-sutam devi patim me kuru te namaḥ iti mantram japantyaḥ tāḥ pūjām cakruḥ kumārikāḥ
evam māsam vratam ceruḥ kumāryaḥ kṛṣṇa-cetasaḥ bhadra-kālīm samānarcuḥ bhūyāt nanda-sutaḥ patiḥ
ūṣasi utthāya gotraiḥ svaiḥ anyonya ābaddha bāhavaḥ kṛṣṇam uccaiḥ jaguḥ yāntyaḥ kālindyām snātum anu-aham
nadyāḥ kadācit āgatya tīre nikṣipya pūrva-vat vāsāṁsi kṛṣṇam gāyantyaḥ vijahruḥ salile mudā
bhagavān tat abhipretya kṛṣṇaḥ yoga-īśvara-īśvaraḥ vayasyaiḥ āvṛtaḥ tatra gataḥ tat karma siddhaye
tāsām vāsāṁsi upādāya nīpam āruhya satvaraḥ hasadbhiḥ prahasan bālaiḥ parihāsam uvāca ha
atra āgatya abalāḥ kāmam svam svam vāsaḥ pragṛhyatām satyam bruvāṇi na u narma yat yūyam vrata karśitāḥ
na mayā udita pūrvam vai anṛtam tat ime viduḥ eka-ekaśaḥ pratīcchadhvam saha eva iti su-madhyamāḥ
tasya tat kṣvelitam dṛṣṭvā gopyaḥ prema-pariplutāḥ vrīḍitāḥ prekṣya ca anyonyam jāta-hāsāḥ na niryayuḥ
evam bruvati govinde narmaṇā ākṣipta cetasaḥ ā-kaṇṭha magnāḥ śīta ude vepamānāḥ tam abruvan
mā anayam bhoḥ kṛthāḥ tvām tu nanda-gopa sutam priyam jānīmaḥ aṅga vraja-ślāghyam dehi vāsāṁsi vepitāḥ
śyāmasundara te dāsyaḥ karavāma tava uditam dehi vāsāṁsi dharma-jña na u cet rājñe bruvāmaḥ he
śrī-bhagavān uvāca bhavatyaḥ yadi me dāsyaḥ mayā uktam vā kariṣyatha atra āgatya sva-vāsāṁsi pratīcchata śuci smitāḥ na u cet na aham pradāsye kim kruddhaḥ rājā kariṣyati
tataḥ jala-āśayāt sarvāḥ dārikāḥ śīta-vepitāḥ pāṇibhyām yonim ācchādya protteruḥ śīta-karśitāḥ
bhagavān āhatāḥ vīkṣya śuddha bhāva prasāditaḥ skandhe nidhāya vāsāṁsi prītaḥ provāca sa-smitam
yūyam vivastrāḥ yat apaḥ dhṛta-vratāḥ vyagāhata etat tat u deva-helanam baddhvā añjalim mūrdhni apanuttaye aṁhasaḥ kṛtvā namaḥ adhaḥ-vasanam pragṛhyatām
iti acyutena abhihitam vraja-abalāḥ matvā vivastra āplavanam vrata-cyutim tat-pūrti kāmāḥ tat aśeṣa-karmarṇām sākṣāt-kṛtam nemuḥ avadya-mṛk yataḥ
tāḥ tathā avanatāḥ dṛṣṭvā bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ vāsāṁsi tābhyaḥ prāyacchat karuṇaḥ tena toṣitaḥ
dṛḍham pralabdhāḥ trapayā ca hāpitāḥ prastobhitāḥ krīḍana-vat ca kāritāḥ vastrāṇi ca eva apahṛtāni atha api amum tāḥ na abhyasūyan priya saṅga nirvṛtāḥ
paridhāya sva-vāsāṁsi preṣṭha saṅgama sajjitāḥ gṛhīta cittāḥ na u celuḥ tasmin lajjāyita īkṣaṇāḥ
tāsām vijñāya bhagavān sva-pāda sparśa kāmyayā dhṛta-vratānām saṅkalpam āha dāmodaraḥ abalāḥ
saṅkalpaḥ viditaḥ sādhvyaḥ bhavatīnām mat-arcanam mayā anumoditaḥ saḥ asau satyaḥ bhavitum arhati
na mayi āveśita dhiyām kāmaḥ kāmāya kalpate bharjitāḥ kvathitāḥ dhānāḥ prāyaḥ bījāya na iṣyate
yāta abalāḥ vrajam siddhāḥ mayā imāḥ raṁsyatha kṣapāḥ yat uddiśya vratam idam ceruḥ āryā arcanam satīḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti ādiṣṭāḥ bhagavatā labdha kāmāḥ kumārikāḥ dhyāyantyaḥ tat pada-ambhojam kṛcchrāt nirviviśuḥ vrajam
atha gopaiḥ parivṛtaḥ bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ vṛndāvanāt gataḥ dūram cārayan gāḥ saha-agrajaḥ
nidāgha arka ātape tigme chayabhiḥ svābhiḥ ātmanaḥ ātapatrāyitān vīkṣya drumān aha vraja-okasaḥ
he stoka-kṛṣṇa he aṁśo śrīdāman subala arjuna viśāla vṛṣabha ojasvin devaprastha varūthapa paśyata etān mahā-bhāgān para-artha ekānta jīvitān vāta varṣa ātapa himān sahantaḥ vārayanti naḥ
aho eṣām varam janma sarva prāṇi upajīvinam su-janasya iva yeṣām vai vimukhāḥ yānti na arthinaḥ
patra puṣpa phala chāyā mūla valkala dārubhiḥ gandha niryāsa bhasma asthi tokmaiḥ kāmān vitanvate
etāvat janma sāphalyam dehinām iha dehiṣu prāṇaiḥ arthaiḥ dhiyā vācā śreyaḥ ācaraṇam sadā
iti pravāla stabaka phala puṣpa dala utkaraiḥ tarūṇām namra śākhānām madhyataḥ yamunām gataḥ
tatra gāḥ pāyayitvā apaḥ su-mṛṣṭāḥ śītalāḥ śivāḥ tataḥ nṛpa svayam gopāḥ kāmam svādu papuḥ jalam
tasyāḥ upavane kāmam cārayantaḥ paśūn nṛpa kṛṣṇa-rāmau upāgamya kṣut-ārtāḥ idam abruvan
śrī-gopāḥ ūcuḥ rāma rāma mahā-bāho kṛṣṇa duṣṭa nibarhaṇa eṣā vai bādhate kṣut naḥ tat-śāntim kartum arhathaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti vijñāpitaḥ gopaiḥ bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ bhaktāyāḥ vipra-bhāryāyāḥ prasīdan idam abravīt
prayāta deva-yajanam brāhmaṇāḥ brahma-vādinaḥ satram āṅgirasam nāma hi āsate svarga-kāmyayā
tatra gatvā odanam gopāḥ yācata asmat visarjitāḥ kīrtayantaḥ bhagavataḥ āryasya mama ca abhidhām
iti ādiṣṭaḥ bhagavatā gatvā ayācanta te tathā kṛta-añjali-puṭāḥ viprān daṇḍa-vat patitāḥ bhuvi
he bhūmi-devāḥ śṛṇuta kṛṣṇasya ādeśa kāriṇaḥ prāptān jānīta bhadram vaḥ gopān naḥ rāma-coditān
gāḥ cārayantau avidūre odanam rāma-acyutau vaḥ laṣataḥ bubhukṣitau tayoḥ dvijāḥ odanam arthinoḥ yadi śraddhā ca vaḥ yacchata dharma-vit-tamāḥ
dīkṣāyāḥ paśu-saṁsthāyāḥ sautrāmaṇyāḥ ca sat-tamāḥ anyatra dīkṣitasya api na annam aśnan hi duṣyati
iti te bhagavat yācñām śṛṇvantaḥ api na śuśruvuḥ kṣudra-āśāḥ bhūri-karmāṇaḥ bāliśāḥ vṛddha-māninaḥ
deśaḥ kālaḥ pṛthak dravyam mantra tantra ṛtvijaḥ agnayaḥ devatāḥ yajamānaḥ ca kratuḥ dharmaḥ ca yat mayaḥ tam brahma paramam sākṣāt bhagavantam adhokṣajam manuṣya-dṛṣṭyā duṣprajñāḥ martya-ātmānaḥ na menire
na te yat om iti procuḥ na na iti ca parantapa gopāḥ nirāśāḥ pratyetya tathā ūcuḥ kṛṣṇa-rāmayoḥ
tat upākarṇya bhagavān prahasya jagat-īśvaraḥ vyājahāra punaḥ gopān darśayan laukikīm gatim
mām jñāpayata patnībhyaḥ sa-saṅkarṣaṇam āgatam dāsyanti kāmam annam vaḥ snigdhāḥ mayi uṣitāḥ dhiyā
gatvā atha patnī-śālāyām dṛṣṭvā asīnāḥ su-alaṅkṛtāḥ natvā dvija-satīḥ gopāḥ praśritāḥ idam abruvan
namaḥ vaḥ vipra-patnībhyaḥ nibodhata vacāṁsi naḥ itaḥ avidūre caratā kṛṣṇena iha iṣitāḥ vayam
gāḥ cārayan saḥ gopālaiḥ sa-rāmaḥ dūram āgataḥ bubhukṣitasya tasya annam sa-anugasya pradīyatām
śrutvā acyutam upāyātam nityam tat-darśana utsukāḥ tat-kathā ākṣpita manasaḥ babhūvuḥ jāta-sambhramāḥ
catuḥ-vidham bahu-guṇam annam ādāya bhājanaiḥ abhisasruḥ priyam sarvāḥ samudram iva nimna-gāḥ
niṣidhyamānāḥ patibhiḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ bandhubhiḥ sutaiḥ bhagavati uttama-śloke dīrgha śruta dhṛta āśayāḥ yamunā-upavane aśoka-nava-pallava maṇḍite vicarantam vṛtam gopaiḥ sa-agrajam dadṛśuḥ striyaḥ
śyāmam hiraṇya paridhim vana-mālya barha dhātu pravāla naṭa veṣam anuvrata aṁse vinyasta hastam itareṇa dhunānam abjam karṇa utpala alaka-kapola mukha-abja hāsam
prāyaḥ śruta priya-tama udaya karṇa-pūraiḥ yasmin nimagna manasaḥ tam atha akṣi-randhraiḥ antaḥ praveśya su-ciram parirabhya tāpam prājñam yathā abhimatayaḥ vijahuḥ nara-indra
tāḥ tathā tyakta-sarva-āśāḥ prāptāḥ ātma-didṛkṣayā vijñāya akhila-dṛk draṣṭā prāha prahasita-ānanaḥ
su-āgatam vaḥ mahā-bhāgāḥ āsyatām karavāma kim yat naḥ didṛkṣayā prāptāḥ upapannam idam hi vaḥ
nanu addhā mayi kurvanti kuśalāḥ sva-artha darśinaḥ ahaitukī avyavahitām bhaktim ātma priye yathā
prāṇa buddhi manaḥ sva ātma dāra apatya dhana ādayaḥ yat samparkāt priyāḥ āsan tataḥ kaḥ nu aparaḥ priyaḥ
tat yāta deva-yajanam patayaḥ vaḥ dvi-jātayaḥ sva-satram pārayiṣyanti yuṣmābhiḥ gṛha-medhinaḥ
śrī-patnyaḥ ūcuḥ mā evam vibho arhati bhavān gaditum nṛ-śaṁsam satyam kuruṣva nigamam tava pāda-mūlam prāptāḥ vayam tulasi-dāma padā avasṛṣṭam keśaiḥ nivoḍhum atilaṅghya samasta bandhūn
gṛhṇanti naḥ na patayaḥ pitarau sutāḥ vā na bhrātṛ bandhu suhṛdaḥ kutaḥ eva ca anye tasmāt bhavat prapadayoḥ patita ātmanām naḥ na anyā bhavet gatiḥ arim-dama tat vidhehi
śrī-bhagavān uvāca patayaḥ na abhyasūyeran pitṛ-bhrātṛ-suta-ādayaḥ lokāḥ ca vaḥ mayā upetāḥ devāḥ api anumanvate
na prītaye anurāgāya hi aṅga-saṅgaḥ nṛṇām iha tat manaḥ mayi yuñjānāḥ acirāt mām avāpsyatha
śravaṇāt darśanāt dhyānāt mayi bhāvaḥ anukīrtanāt na tathā sannikarṣeṇa pratiyāta tataḥ gṛhān
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti uktāḥ dvija-patnyaḥ tāḥ yajña-vāṭam punaḥ gatāḥ te ca anasūyavaḥ tābhiḥ strībhiḥ satram apārayan
tatra ekā vidhṛtā bhartrā bhagavantam yathā-śrutam hṛdā upaguhya vijahau deham karma-anubandhanam
bhagavān api govindaḥ tena eva annena gopakān catuḥ-vidhena aśayitvā svayam ca bubhuje prabhuḥ
evam līlā nara vapuḥ nṛ-lokam anuśīlayan reme go gopa gopīnām ramayan rūpa vāk kṛtaiḥ
atha anusmṛtya viprāḥ te anvatapyan kṛta-agasaḥ yat viśva-īśvarayoḥ yācñām ahanma nr-viḍambayoḥ
dṛṣṭvā strīṇām bhagavati kṛṣṇe bhaktim alaukikīm ātmānam ca tayā hīnam anutaptāḥ vyagarhayan
dhik janma naḥ tri-vṛt yat tat dhik vratam dhik bahu-jñatām dhik kulam dhik kriyā-dākṣyam vimukhaḥ ye tu adhokṣaje
nūnam bhagavataḥ māyā yoginām api mohinī yat vayam guravaḥ nṛṇām sva-arthe muhyāmahe dvijāḥ
aho paśyata nārīṇām api kṛṣṇe jagat-gurau duranta bhāvam yaḥ avidhyat mṛtyu pāśān gṛha-abhidhān
na āsām dvijāti-saṁskāraḥ na nivāsaḥ gurau api na tapaḥ na ātma-mīmāṁsā na śaucam na kriyāḥ śubhāḥ tathā api hi uttamaḥ-śloke kṛṣṇe yoga-īśvara-īśvare bhaktiḥ dṛḍhā na ca asmākam saṁskāra-ādi-matām api
nanu sva-artha vimūḍhānām pramattānām gṛha-īhayā aho naḥ smārayām āsa gopa-vākyaiḥ satām gatiḥ
anyathā pūrṇa-kāmasya kaivalya ādi āśiṣām pateḥ īśitavyaiḥ kim asmābhiḥ īśasya etat viḍambanam
hitvā anyān bhajate yam śrīḥ pāda-sparśa āśayā asakṛt sva-ātma doṣa apavargeṇa tat yācñā jana mohinī
deśaḥ kālaḥ pṛthak dravyam mantra tantra ṛtvijaḥ agnayaḥ devatā yajamānaḥ ca kratuḥ dharmaḥ ca yat mayaḥ saḥ eva bhagavān sākṣāt viṣṇuḥ yoga-īśvara-īśvaraḥ jātaḥ yaduṣu iti āśṛṇma hi api mūḍhāḥ na vidmahe
tasmai namaḥ bhagavate kṛṣṇāya akuṇṭha-medhase yat-māyā mohita dhiyaḥ bhramāmaḥ karma-vartmasu
saḥ vai naḥ ādyaḥ puruṣaḥ sva-mayā-mohita-ātmanām avijñāta anubhāvānām kṣantum arhati atikramam
iti sva-agham anusmṛtya kṛṣṇe te kṛta-helanāḥ didṛkṣavaḥ vrajam atha kaṁsāt bhītāḥ na ca acalan
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca bhagavān api tatra eva baladevena saṁyutaḥ apaśyat nivasan gopān indra yāga kṛta udyamān
tat-abhijñaḥ api bhagavān sarva-ātmā sarva-darśanaḥ praśraya-avanataḥ apṛcchat vṛddhān nanda-puraḥ-gamān
kathyatām me pitaḥ kaḥ ayam sambhramaḥ vaḥ upāgataḥ kim phalam kasya vā uddeśaḥ kena vā sādhyate makhaḥ
etat brūhi mahān kāmaḥ mahyam śuśrūṣave pitaḥ na hi gopyam hi sādhūnām kṛtyam sarva-ātmanām iha asti asva-para-dṛṣṭīnām amitra-udāsta-vidviṣām
udāsīnaḥ ari-vat varjyaḥ ātma-vat suhṛt ucyate
jñātvā ajñātvā ca karmāṇi janaḥ ayam anutiṣṭhati viduṣaḥ karma-siddhiḥ syāt yathā na aviduṣaḥ bhavet
tatra tāvat kriyā-yogaḥ bhavatām kim vicāritaḥ atha vā laukikaḥ tat me pṛcchataḥ sādhu bhaṇyatām
śrī-nandaḥ uvāca parjanyaḥ bhagavān indraḥ meghāḥ tasya ātma-mūrtayaḥ te abhivarṣanti bhūtānām prīṇanam jīvanam payaḥ
tam tāta vayam anye ca vāḥ-mucām patim īśvaram dravyaiḥ tat-retasā siddhaiḥ yajante kratubhiḥ narāḥ
tat śeṣeṇa upajīvanti tri-varga phala-hetave puṁsām puruṣa-kārāṇām parjanyaḥ phala-bhāvanaḥ
yaḥ enam visṛjet dharmam paramparya āgatam naraḥ kāmāt dveṣāt bhayāt lobhāt saḥ vai na āpnoti śobhanam
śrī śukaḥ uvāca vacaḥ niśamya nandasya tathā anyeṣām vraja-okasām indrāya manyum janayan pitaram prāha keśavaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca karmaṇā jāyate jantuḥ karmaṇā eva pralīyate sukham duḥkham bhayam kṣemam karmaṇā eva abhipadyate
asti cet īśvaraḥ kaścit phala-rūpī anya-karmaṇām kartāram bhajate saḥ api na hi akartuḥ prabhuḥ hi saḥ
kim indreṇa iha bhūtānām sva-sva karma anuvartinām anīśena anyathā kartum svabhāva vihitam nṛṇām
svabhāva tantraḥ hi janaḥ svabhāvam anuvartate svabhāva-stham idam sarvam sa deva asura mānuṣam
dehān ucca-avacān jantuḥ prāpya utsṛjati karmaṇā śatruḥ mitram udāsīnaḥ karma eva guruḥ īśvaraḥ
tasmāt sampūjayet karma svabhāva sthaḥ sva-karma kṛt añjasā yena varteta tat eva asya hi daivatam
ājīvya ekataram bhāvam yaḥ tu anyam upajīvati na tasmāt vindate kṣemam jārāt nārī asatī yathā
varteta brahmaṇā vipraḥ rājanyaḥ rakṣayā bhuvaḥ vaiśyaḥ tu vārtayā jīvet śūdraḥ tu dvija-sevayā
kṛṣi vāṇijya go-rakṣā kusīdam tūryam ucyate vārtā catuḥ-vidhā tatra vayam go-vṛttayaḥ aniśam
sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti sthiti utpatti anta hetavaḥ rajasā utpadyate viśvam anyonyam vividham jagat
rajasā coditāḥ meghāḥ varṣanti ambūni sarvataḥ prajāḥ taiḥ eva sidhyanti mahā-indraḥ kim kariṣyati
na naḥ puraḥ jana-padāḥ na grāmāḥ na gṛhāḥ vayam vana-okasaḥ tāta nityam vana śaila nivāsinaḥ
tasmāt gavām brāhmaṇānām adreḥ ca ārabhyatām makhaḥ ye indra-yāga sambhārāḥ taiḥ ayam sādhyatām makhaḥ
pacyantām vividhāḥ pākāḥ sūpa-antāḥ pāyasa-ādayaḥ saṁyāva-āpūpa śaṣkulyaḥ sarva dohaḥ ca gṛhyatām
hūyantām agnayaḥ samyak brāhmaṇaiḥ brahma-vādibhiḥ annam bahu-guṇam tebhyaḥ deyam vaḥ dhenu-dakṣiṇāḥ
anyebhyaḥ ca ā-śva-cāṇḍāla patitebhyaḥ yathā arhataḥ yavasam ca gavām dattvā giraye dīyatām baliḥ
su-alaṅkṛtāḥ bhuktavantaḥ su-anuliptāḥ su-vāsasaḥ pradakṣiṇām ca kuruta go vipra anala parvatān
etat mama matam tāta kriyatām yadi rocate ayam go-brāhmaṇa-adrīṇām mahyam ca dayitaḥ makhaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca kāla-ātmanā bhagavatā śakra darpa jighāṁsayā proktam niśamya nanda-ādyāḥ sādhu agṛhṇanta tat-vacaḥ
tathā ca vyadadhuḥ sarvam yathā āha madhusūdanaḥ vācayitvā svasti-ayanam tat-dravyeṇa giri dvijān upahṛtya balīn samyak ādṛtāḥ yavasam gavām go-dhanāni puraskṛtya girim cakruḥ pradakṣiṇam
anāṁsi anaḍut-yuktāni te ca āruhya su-alaṅkṛtāḥ gopyaḥ ca kṛṣṇa-vīryāṇi gāyantyaḥ sa dvija āśiṣaḥ
kṛṣṇaḥ tu anyatamam rūpam gopa-viśrambhaṇam gataḥ śailaḥ asmi iti bruvan bhūri balim ādat bṛhat-vapuḥ
tasmai namaḥ vraja-janaiḥ saha cakre ātmanā ātmane aho paśyata śailaḥ asau rūpī naḥ anugraham vyadhāt
eṣaḥ avajānataḥ martyān kāma-rūpī vana-okasaḥ hanti hi asmai namasyāmaḥ śarmaṇe ātmanaḥ gavām
iti adri go dvija makham vāsudeva pracoditāḥ yathā vidhāya te gopāḥ saha-kṛṣṇāḥ vrajam yayuḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca indraḥ tadā ātmanaḥ pūjām vijñāya vihatām nṛpa gopebhyaḥ kṛṣṇa-nāthebhyaḥ nanda-ādibhyaḥ cukopa ha
gaṇam sāṁvartakam nāma meghānām ca anta-kāriṇām indraḥ pracodayat kruddhaḥ vākyam ca āha īśa-mānī uta
aho śrī mada māhātmyam gopānām kānana okasām kṛṣṇam martyam upāśritya ye cakruḥ deva helanam
yathā adṛḍhaiḥ karma-mayaiḥ kratubhiḥ nāma nau-nibhaiḥ vidyām ānvīkṣikīm hitvā titīrṣanti bhava-arṇavam
vācālam bāliśam stabdham ajñam paṇḍita-māninam kṛṣṇam martyam upāśritya gopāḥ me cakruḥ apriyam
eṣām śriyā avaliptānām kṛṣṇena ādhmāpita ātmanām dhunuta śrī mada stambham paśūn nayata saṅkṣayam
aham ca airāvatam nāgam āruhya anuvraje vrajam marut-gaṇaiḥ mahā-vegaiḥ nanda-goṣṭha jighāṁsayā
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ittham maghavatā ājñaptāḥ meghāḥ nirmukta-bandhanāḥ nanda-gokulam āsāraiḥ pīḍayām āsuḥ ojasā
vidyotamānāḥ vidyudbhiḥ stanantaḥ stanayitnubhiḥ tīvraiḥ marut-gaṇaiḥ nunnāḥ vavṛṣuḥ jala-śarkarāḥ
sthūṇā sthūlāḥ varsa-dhārāḥ muñcatsu abhreṣu abhīkṣṇaśaḥ jala-oghaiḥ plāvyamānā bhūḥ na adṛśyata nataunnatam
ati-āsāra ati-vātena paśavaḥ jāta-vepanāḥ gopāḥ gopyaḥ ca śīta ārtāḥ govindam śaraṇam yayuḥ
śiraḥ sutān ca kāyena pracchādya āsāra-pīḍitāḥ vepamānāḥ bhagavataḥ pāda-mūlam upāyayuḥ
kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahā-bhaga tvat-nātham go-kulam prabho trātum arhasi devāt naḥ kupitāt bhakta-vatsala
śilā varṣa ati-vātena hanyamānam acetanam nirīkṣya bhagavān mene kupita indra kṛtam hariḥ
apa-ṛtu ati-ulbaṇam varṣam ati-vātam śilā-mayam sva-yage vihate asmābhiḥ indraḥ nāśāya varṣati
tatra prati-vidhim samyak ātma-yogena sādhaye loka-īśa māninām mauḍhyāt haniṣye śrī-madam tamaḥ
na hi sat-bhāva yuktānām surāṇām īśa vismayaḥ mattaḥ asatām māna bhaṅgaḥ praśamāya upakalpate
tasmāt mat-śaraṇam goṣṭham mat-nātham mat-parigraham gopāye sva-ātma-yogena saḥ ayam me vrataḥ āhitaḥ
iti uktvā ekena hastena kṛtvā govardhana-acalam dadhāra līlayā viṣṇuḥ chatrākam iva bālakaḥ
atha āha bhagavān gopān he amba tāta vraja-okasaḥ yathā-upajoṣam viśata giri gartam sa-godhanāḥ
na trāsaḥ iha vaḥ kāryaḥ mat-hasta adri nipātanāt vāta varṣa bhayena alam tat-trāṇam vihitam hi vaḥ
tathā nirviviśuḥ gartam kṛṣṇa āśvāsita mānasaḥ yathā-avakāśam sa-dhanāḥ sa-vrajāḥ sa-upajīvinaḥ
kṣut tṛṭ vyathām sukha apekṣām hitvā taiḥ vraja-vāsibhiḥ vīkṣyamāṇaḥ dadhāra adrim sapta-aham na acalat padāt
kṛṣṇa yoga anubhāvam tam niśamya indraḥ ati-vismitaḥ nistambhaḥ bhraṣṭa saṅkalpaḥ svān meghān sannyavārayat
kham vi-abhram udita ādityam vāta-varṣam ca dāruṇam niśamya uparatam gopān govardhana-dharaḥ abravīt
niryāta tyajata trāsam gopāḥ sa strī dhana arbhakāḥ upāratam vāta-varṣam vi-uda prāyāḥ ca nimnagāḥ
tataḥ te niryayuḥ gopāḥ svam svam ādāya go-dhanam śakaṭa ūḍha upakaraṇam strī bāla sthavirāḥ śanaiḥ
bhagavān api tam śailam sva-sthāne pūrva-vat prabhuḥ paśyatām sarva-bhūtānām sthāpayām āsa līlayā
tam prema vegāt nirbhṛtāḥ vraja-okasaḥ yathā samīyuḥ parirambhaṇa-ādibhiḥ gopyaḥ ca sa-sneham apūjayan mudā dadhi akṣata adbhiḥ yuyujuḥ sat āśiṣaḥ
yaśodā rohiṇī nandaḥ rāmaḥ ca balinām varaḥ kṛṣṇam āliṅgya yuyujuḥ āśiṣaḥ sneha kātarāḥ
divi deva-gaṇāḥ siddhāḥ sādhyāḥ gandharva-cāraṇāḥ tuṣṭuvuḥ mumucuḥ tuṣṭāḥ puṣpa-varṣāṇi pārthiva
śaṅkha dundubhayaḥ neduḥ divi deva-pracoditāḥ jaguḥ gandharva-patayaḥ tumburu-pramukhāḥ nṛpa
tataḥ anuraktaiḥ paśu-paiḥ pariśritaḥ rājan sva-goṣṭham sa-balaḥ avrajat hariḥ tathā-vidhāni asya kṛtāni gopikāḥ gāyantyaḥ īyuḥ muditāḥ hṛdi-spṛśaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam-vidhāni karmāṇi gopāḥ kṛṣṇasya vīkṣya te atat-vīrya-vidaḥ procuḥ samabhyetya su-vismitāḥ
bālakasya yat etāni karmāṇi ati-adbhutāni vai katham arhati asau janma grāmyeṣu ātma jugupsitam
yaḥ sapta-hāyanaḥ bālaḥ kareṇa ekena līlayā katham bibhrat giri-varam puṣkaram gaja-rāṭ iva
tokena ā-mīlita akṣeṇa pūtanāyāḥ mahā-ojasaḥ pītaḥ stanaḥ saha prāṇaiḥ kālena iva vayaḥ tanoḥ
hinvataḥ adhaḥ śayānasya māsyasya caraṇau udak anaḥ apatat viparyastam rudataḥ prapada āhatam
eka-hāyanaḥ āsīnaḥ hriyamāṇaḥ vihāyasā daityena yaḥ tṛṇāvartam ahan kaṇṭha graha āturam
kvacit haiyaṅgava stainye mātrā baddhaḥ udūkhale gacchan arjunayoḥ madhye bāhubhyām tau apātayat
vane sañcārayan vatsān sarāmaḥ bālakaiḥ vṛtaḥ hantu-kāmam bakam dorbhyām mukhataḥ arim apāṭayat
vatseṣu vatsa-rūpeṇa praviśantam jighāṁsayā hatvā nyapātayat tena kapitthāni ca līlayā
hatvā rāsabha daiteyam tat-bandhūn ca bala-anvitaḥ cakre tāla-vanam kṣemam paripakva phala anvitam
pralambam ghāyayitvā ugram balena bala-śālinā amocayat vraja-paśūn gopān ca āraṇya vahnitaḥ
āśī viṣa-tama ahi indram damitvā vimadam hradāt prasahya udvāsya yamunām cakre asau nirviṣa udakām
dustyajaḥ ca anurāgaḥ asmin sarveṣām naḥ vraja-okasām nanda te tanaye asmāsu tasya api autpattikaḥ katham
kva sapta-hāyanaḥ bālaḥ kva mahā-adri vidhāraṇam tataḥ naḥ jāyate śaṅkā vraja-nātha tava ātmaje
śrī-nandaḥ uvāca śrūyatām me vacaḥ gopāḥ vyetu śaṅkā ca vaḥ arbhake enam kumāram uddiśya gargaḥ me yat uvāca ha
varṇāḥ trayaḥ kila asya āsan gṛhṇataḥ anu-yugam tanūḥ śuklaḥ raktaḥ tathā pītaḥ idānīm kṛṣṇatām gataḥ
prāk ayam vasudevasya kvacit jātaḥ tava ātmajaḥ vāsudevaḥ iti śrīmān abhijñāḥ sampracakṣate
bahūni santi nāmāni rūpāṇi ca sutasya te guṇa-karma-anurūpāṇi tāni aham veda na u janāḥ
eṣaḥ vaḥ śreyaḥ ādhāsyat gopa-gokula-nandanaḥ anena sarva-durgāṇi yūyam añjaḥ tariṣyatha
purā anena vraja-pate sādhavaḥ dasyu-pīḍitāḥ arājake rakṣyamāṇāḥ jigyuḥ dasyūn samedhitāḥ
ye etasmin mahā-bhāge prītim kurvanti mānavāḥ na arayaḥ abhibhavanti etān viṣṇu-pakṣān iva asurāḥ
tasmāt nanda kumāraḥ ayam nārāyaṇa-samaḥ guṇaiḥ śriyā kīrtyā anubhāvena tat karmasu na vismayaḥ
iti addhā mām samādiśya garge ca sva-gṛham gate manye nārāyaṇasya aṁśam kṛṣṇam akliṣṭa-kāriṇam
iti nanda-vacaḥ śrutvā garga-gītam vraja-okasaḥ muditāḥ nandam ānarcuḥ kṛṣṇam ca gata vismayāḥ
deve varṣati yajña viplava ruṣā vajra aśma-varṣa anilaiḥ sīdat pāla paśu stri ātma śaraṇam dṛṣṭvā anukampī utsmayan utpāṭya eka-kareṇa śailam abalaḥ līlā ucchilīndhram yathā bibhrat goṣṭham apāt mahā-indra mada bhit prīyāt naḥ indraḥ gavām
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca govardhane dhṛte śaile āsārāt rakṣite vraje go-lokāt āvrajat kṛṣṇam surabhiḥ śakraḥ eva ca
vivikte upasaṅgamya vrīḍitaḥ kṛta-helanaḥ pasparśa pādayoḥ enam kirīṭena arka varcasā
dṛṣṭa śruta anubhāvaḥ asya kṛṣṇasya amita tejasaḥ naṣṭa tri-loka īśa madaḥ idam āha kṛta-añjaliḥ
indraḥ uvāca viśuddha-sattvam tava dhāma śāntam tapaḥ-mayam dhvasta rajaḥ tamaskam māyā-mayaḥ ayam guṇa sampravāhaḥ na vidyate te agrahaṇa anubandhaḥ
kutaḥ nu tat hetavaḥ īśa tat-kṛtāḥ lobha-ādayaḥ ye abudha linga-bhāvāḥ tathā api daṇḍam bhagavān bibharti dharmasya guptyai khala nigrahāya
pitā guruḥ tvam jagatām adhīśaḥ duratyayaḥ kālaḥ upātta daṇḍaḥ hitāya ca icchā tanubhiḥ samīhase mānam vidhunvan jagat-īśa māninām
ye mat-vidha ajñāḥ jagat-īśa māninaḥ tvām vīkṣya kāle abhayam āśu tat madam hitvā ārya mārgam prabhajanti apa-smayāḥ īhā khalānām api te anuśāsanam
saḥ tvam mama aiśvarya mada plutasya kṛta āgasaḥ te aviduṣaḥ prabhāvam kṣantum prabho atha arhasi mūḍha cetasaḥ mā evam punaḥ bhūt matiḥ īśa me asatī
tava avatāraḥ ayam adhokṣaja iha bhuvaḥ bharāṇām uru-bhāra janmanām camū-patīnām abhavāya deva bhavāya yuṣmat caraṇa anuvartinām
namaḥ tubhyam bhagavate puruṣāya mahā-ātmane vāsudevāya kṛṣṇāya sātvatām pataye namaḥ
sva chanda upātta dehāya viśuddha jñāna mūrtaye sarvasmai sarva-bījāya sarva-bhūta ātmane namaḥ
mayā idam bhagavan goṣṭha nāśāya āsāra vāyubhiḥ ceṣṭitam vihate yajñe māninā tīvra manyunā
tvayā īśa anugṛhītaḥ asmi dhvasta stambhaḥ vṛthā udyamaḥ īśvaram gurum ātmānam tvām aham śaraṇam gataḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam saṅkīrtitaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ maghonā bhagavān amum megha gambhīrayā vācā prahasan idam abravīt
śrī-bhagavān uvāca mayā te akāri maghavan makha bhaṅgaḥ anugṛhṇatā mat-anusmṛtaye nityam mattasya indra-śriyā bhṛśam
mām aiśvarya śrī mada andhaḥ daṇḍa pāṇim na paśyati tam bhraṁśayāmi sampadbhyaḥ yasya ca icchāmi anugraham
gamyatām śakra bhadram vaḥ kriyatām me anuśāsanam sthīyatām sva adhikāreṣu yuktaiḥ vaḥ stambha varjitaiḥ
atha āha surabhiḥ kṛṣṇam abhivandya manasvinī sva-santānaiḥ upāmantrya gopa-rūpiṇam īśvaram
surabhiḥ uvāca kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahā yogin viśva-ātman viśva-sambhava bhavatā loka nāthena sa-nāthāḥ vayam acyuta
tvam naḥ paramakam daivam tvam naḥ indraḥ jagat-pate bhavāya bhava go vipra devānām ye ca sādhavaḥ
indram naḥ tvā abhiṣekṣyāmaḥ brahmaṇā coditāḥ vayam avatīrṇaḥ asi viśva-ātman bhūmeḥ bhāra apanuttaye
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam kṛṣṇam upāmantrya surabhiḥ payasā ātmanaḥ jalaiḥ ākāśa-gaṅgāyāḥ airāvata kara uddhṛtaiḥ indraḥ sura ṛṣibhiḥ sākam coditaḥ deva mātṛbhiḥ abhyasiñcata dāśārham govindaḥ iti ca abhyadhāt
tatra āgatāḥ tumburu nārada ādayaḥ gandharva-vidyādhara-siddha-cāraṇāḥ jaguḥ yaśaḥ loka mala apaham hareḥ sura aṅganāḥ sannanṛtuḥ mudā anvitāḥ
tam tuṣṭuvuḥ deva-nikāya ketavaḥ hi avākiran ca adbhuta puṣpa vṛṣṭibhiḥ lokāḥ parām nirvṛtim āpnuvan trayaḥ gāvaḥ tadā gām anayan payaḥ drutām
nānā rasa oghāḥ saritaḥ vṛkṣāḥ āsan madhu sravāḥ akṛṣṭa pacya oṣadhayaḥ girayaḥ abibhran ut maṇīn
kṛṣṇe abhiṣikte etāni sarvāṇi kuru-nandana nirvairāṇi abhavan tāta krūrāṇi api nisargataḥ
iti go go-kula patim govindam abhiṣicya saḥ anujñātaḥ yayau śakraḥ vṛtaḥ deva-ādibhiḥ divam
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca ekādaśyām nirāhāraḥ samabhyarcya janārdanam snātum nandaḥ tu kālindyām dvādaśyām jalam āviśat
tam gṛhītvā anayat bhṛtyaḥ varuṇasya asuraḥ antikam avajñāya āsurīm velām praviṣṭam udakam niśi
cukruśuḥ tam apaśyantaḥ kṛṣṇa rāma iti gopakāḥ bhagavān tat upaśrutya pitaram varuṇa āhṛtam tat antikam gataḥ rājan svānām abhaya daḥ vibhuḥ
prāptam vīkṣya hṛṣīkeśam loka pālaḥ saparyayā mahatyā pūjayitvā āha tat darśana mahā utsavaḥ
śrī-varuṇaḥ uvāca adya me nibhṛtaḥ dehaḥ adya eva arthaḥ adhigataḥ prabho tvat pāda bhājaḥ bhagavan avāpuḥ pāram adhvanaḥ
namaḥ tubhyam bhagavate brahmaṇe parama-ātmane na yatra śrūyate māyā loka sṛṣṭi vikalpanā
ajānatā māmakena mūḍhena akārya-vedinā ānītaḥ ayam tava pitā tat bhavān kṣantum arhati
mama api anugraham kṛṣṇa kartum arhasi aśeṣa dṛk govinda nīyatām eṣaḥ pitā te pitṛ-vatsala
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam prasāditaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ bhagavān īśvara īśvaraḥ ādāya agāt sva-pitaram bandhūnām ca āvahan mudam
nandaḥ tu atīndriyam dṛṣṭvā loka-pāla mahā-udayam kṛṣṇe ca sannatim teṣām jñātibhyaḥ vismitaḥ abravīt
te ca autsukya dhiyaḥ rājan matvā gopāḥ tam īśvaram api naḥ sva-gatim sūkṣmām upādhāsyat adhīśvaraḥ
iti svānām saḥ bhagavān vijñāya akhila-dṛk svayam saṅkalpa siddhaye teṣām kṛpayā etat acintayat
janaḥ vai loke etasmin avidyā kāma karmabhiḥ ucca avacāsu gatiṣu na veda svām gatim bhraman
iti sañcintya bhagavān mahā-kāruṇikaḥ hariḥ darśayām āsa lokam svam gopānām tamasaḥ param
satyam jñānam anantam yat brahma jyotiḥ sanātanam yat hi paśyanti munayaḥ guṇa apāye samāhitāḥ
te tu brahma-hradam nītāḥ magnāḥ kṛṣṇena ca uddhṛtāḥ dadṛśuḥ brahmaṇaḥ lokam yatra akrūraḥ adhyagāt purā
nanda-ādayaḥ tu tam dṛṣṭvā parama ānanda nivṛtāḥ kṛṣṇam ca tatra chandobhiḥ stūyamānam su vismitāḥ
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca bhagavān api tāḥ rātrīḥ śārada utphulla mallikāḥ vīkṣya rantum manaḥ cakre yoga-māyām upāśritaḥ
tadā uḍu-rājaḥ kakubhaḥ karaiḥ mukham prācyāḥ vilimpan aruṇena śam-tamaiḥ saḥ carṣaṇīnām udagāt śucaḥ mṛjan priyaḥ priyāyāḥ iva dīrgha darśanaḥ
dṛṣṭvā kamut-vantam akhaṇḍa maṇḍalam ramā ānana ābham nava kuṅkuma aruṇam vanam ca tat komala gobhiḥ rañjitam jagau kalam vāma-dṛśām manaḥ-haram
niśamya gītam tat anaṅga vardhanam vraja-striyaḥ kṛṣṇa gṛhīta mānasāḥ ājagmuḥ anyonyam alakṣita udyamāḥ saḥ yatra kāntaḥ java lola kuṇḍalāḥ
duhantyaḥ abhiyayuḥ kāścit doham hitvā samutsukāḥ payaḥ adhiśritya saṁyāvam anudvāsya aparāḥ yayuḥ
pariveṣayantyaḥ tat hitvā pāyayantyaḥ śiśūn payaḥ śuśrūṣantyaḥ patīn kāścit aśnantyaḥ apāsya bhojanam limpantyaḥ pramṛjantyaḥ anyāḥ añjantyaḥ kāśca locane vyatyasta vastra ābharaṇāḥ kāścit kṛṣṇa-antikam yayuḥ
tāḥ vāryamāṇāḥ patibhiḥ pitṛbhiḥ bhrātṛ bandhubhiḥ govinda apahṛta ātmānaḥ na nyavartanta mohitāḥ
antaḥ-gṛha gatāḥ kāścit gopyaḥ alabdha vinirgamāḥ kṛṣṇam tat-bhāvanā yuktāḥ dadhyuḥ mīlita locanāḥ
duḥsaha preṣṭha viraha tīvra tāpa dhuta aśubhāḥ dhyāna prāpta acyuta āśleṣa nirvṛtyā kṣīṇa maṅgalāḥ tam eva parama-ātmānam jāra buddhyā api saṅgatāḥ jahuḥ guṇa-mayam deham sadyaḥ prakṣīṇa bandhanāḥ
śrī-parīkṣit uvāca kṛṣṇam viduḥ param kāntam na tu brahmatayā mune guṇa pravāha uparamaḥ tāsām guṇa-dhiyām katham
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca uktam purastāt etat te caidyaḥ siddhim yathā gataḥ dviṣan api hṛṣīkeśam kim uta adhokṣaja priyāḥ
nṛṇām niḥśreyasa arthāya vyaktiḥ bhagavataḥ nṛpa avyayasya aprameyasya nirguṇasya guṇa-ātmanaḥ
kāmam krodham bhayam sneham aikyam sauhṛdam eva ca nityam harau vidadhataḥ yānti tat-mayatām hi te
na ca evam vismayaḥ kāryaḥ bhavatā bhagavati aje yoga-īśvara īśvare kṛṣṇe yataḥ etat vimucyate
tāḥ dṛṣṭvā antikam āyātāḥ bhagavān vraja-yoṣitaḥ avadat vadatām śreṣṭhaḥ vācaḥ peśaiḥ vimohayan
śrī-bhagavān uvāca su-āgatam vaḥ mahā-bhāgāḥ priyam kim karavāṇi vaḥ vrajasya anāmayam kaccit brūta āgamana kāraṇam
rajanī eṣā ghora-rūpā ghora-sattva niṣevitā pratiyāta vrajam na iha stheyam strībhiḥ su-madhyamāḥ
mātaraḥ pitaraḥ putrāḥ bhrātaraḥ patayaḥ ca vaḥ vincinvanti hi apaśyantaḥ mā kṛḍhvam bandhu sādhvasam
dṛṣṭam vanam kusumitam rākā-īśa kara rañjitam yamunā anila līlā ejat taru pallava śobhitam tat yāta mā ciram goṣṭham śuśrūṣadhvam patīn satīḥ krandanti vatsāḥ bālāḥ ca tān pāyayata duhyata
atha vā mat-abhisnehāt bhavatyaḥ yantrita aśayāḥ āgatāḥ hi upapannam vaḥ prīyante mayi jantavaḥ
bhartuḥ śuśrūṣaṇam strīṇām paraḥ dharmaḥ hi amāyayā tat-bandhūnām ca kalyāṇaḥ prajānām ca anupoṣaṇam
duḥśīlaḥ durbhagaḥ vṛddhaḥ jaḍaḥ rogī adhanaḥ api vā patiḥ strībhiḥ na hātavyaḥ loka īpsubhiḥ apātakī
asvargyam ayaśasyam ca phalgu kṛcchram bhaya-āvaham jugupsitam ca sarvatra hi aupapatyam kula-striyaḥ
śravaṇāt darśanāt dhyānāt mayi bhāvaḥ anukīrtanāt na tathā sannikarṣeṇa pratiyāta tataḥ gṛhān
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti vipriyam ākarṇya gopyaḥ govinda-bhāṣitam viṣaṇṇāḥ bhagna saṅkalpāḥ cintām āpuḥ duratyayām
kṛtvā mukhāni ava śucaḥ śvasanena śuṣyat bimba adharāṇi caraṇena bhuvaḥ likhantyaḥ asraiḥ upātta masibhiḥ kuca kuṅkumāni tasthuḥ mṛjantyaḥ uru duḥkha bharāḥ sma tūṣṇīm
