preṣṭham priya-itaram iva pratibhāṣamāṇam kṛṣṇam tat-artha vinivartita sarva kāmāḥ netre vimṛjya rudita upahate sma kiñcit saṁrambha gadgada giraḥ abruvata anuraktāḥ
śrī-gopyaḥ ūcuḥ mā evam vibho arhati bhavān gaditum nṛ-śaṁsam santyajya sarva viṣayān tava pāda-mūlam bhaktāḥ bhajasva duravagraha mā tyaja asmān devāḥ yathā ādi-puruṣaḥ bhajate mumukṣūn
yat pati apatya suhṛdām anuvṛttiḥ aṅga strīṇām sva-dharmaḥ iti dharma-vidā tvayā uktam astu evam etat upadeśa pade tvayi īśe preṣṭhaḥ bhavān tanu-bhṛtām kila bandhuḥ ātmā
kurvanti hi tvayi ratim kuśalāḥ sve ātman nitya priye pati suta ādibhiḥ ārti-daiḥ kim tat naḥ prasīda parama-īśvara mā sma chindyāḥ āśām dhṛtām tvayi cirāt aravinda-netra
cittam sukhena bhavatā apahṛtam gṛheṣu yat nirviśati uta karau api gṛhya-kṛtye pādau padam na calataḥ tava pāda-mūlāt yāmaḥ katham vrajam atha u karavāma kim vā
siñca aṅga naḥ tvat adhara amṛta pūrakeṇa hāsa avaloka kala gīta ja hṛt-śaya agnim na u cet vayam viraha ja agni upayukta dehāḥ dhyānena yāma padayoḥ padavīm sakhe te
yarhi ambuja akṣa tava pāda talam ramāyāḥ datta kṣaṇam kvacit araṇya jana priyasya asprākṣma tat-prabhṛti na anya samakṣam añjaḥ sthātum tvayā abhiramitāḥ bata pārayāmaḥ
śrīḥ yat pada-ambuja rajaḥ cakame tulasyā labdhvā api vakṣasi padam kila bhṛtya juṣṭam yasyāḥ sva vīkṣaṇe uta anya sura prayāsaḥ tadvat vayam ca tava pāda rajaḥ prapannāḥ
tat naḥ prasīda vṛjina ardana te aṅghri-mūlam prāptāḥ visṛjya vasatīḥ tvat-upāsanā āśāḥ tvat sundara smita nirīkṣaṇa tīvra kāma tapta ātmanām puruṣa bhūṣaṇa dehi dāsyam
vīkṣya alaka āvṛta mukham tava kuṇḍala śrī gaṇḍa-sthala adhara sudham hasita avalokam datta abhayam ca bhuja-daṇḍa yugam vilokya vakṣaḥ śrī eka ramaṇam ca bhavāma dāsyaḥ
kā strī aṅga te kala pada āyata veṇu gīta sammohitā ārya caritāt na calet tri-lokyām trai-lokya saubhagam idam ca nirīkṣya rūpam yat go dvija druma mṛgāḥ pulakāni abibhran
vyaktam bhavān vraja bhaya ārti haraḥ abhijātaḥ devaḥ yathā ādi-puruṣaḥ sura-loka goptā tat naḥ nidhehi kara paṅkajam ārta bandho tapta staneṣu ca śiraḥsu ca kiṅkarīṇām
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti viklavitam tāsām śrutvā yoga-īśvara-īśvaraḥ prahasya sa-dayam gopīḥ ātma ārāmaḥ api arīramat
tābhiḥ sametābhiḥ udāra ceṣṭitaḥ priya īkṣaṇa utphulla mukhībhiḥ acyutaḥ udāra hāsa dvija kunda dīdhatiḥ vyarocata eṇa-aṅkaḥ iva uḍubhiḥ vṛtaḥ
upagīyamānaḥ udgāyan vanitā śata yūthapaḥ māIām bibhrat vaijayantīm vyacaran maṇḍayan vanam
nadyāḥ pulinam āviśya gopībhiḥ hima vālukam juṣṭam tat tarala ānandi kumuda āmoda vāyunā bāhu prasāra parirambha kara alaka ūru nīvī stana ālabhana narma nakha agra-pātaiḥ kṣvelyā avaloka hasitaiḥ vraja-sundarīṇām uttambhayan rati-patim ramayām cakāra
evam bhagavataḥ kṛṣṇāt labdha mānāḥ mahā-ātmanaḥ ātmānam menire strīṇām māninyaḥ hi adhikam bhuvi
tāsām tat saubhaga madam vīkṣya mānam ca keśavaḥ praśamāya prasādāya tatra eva antaradhīyata
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca antarhite bhagavati sahasā eva vraja-aṅganāḥ atapyan tam acakṣāṇāḥ kariṇyaḥ iva yūthapam
gatyā anurāga smita vibhrama īkṣitaiḥ manaḥ-rama āIāpa vihāra vibhramaiḥ ākṣipta cittāḥ pramadāḥ ramā-pateḥ tāḥ tāḥ viceṣṭāḥ jagṛhuḥ tat-ātmikāḥ
gati smita prekṣaṇa bhāṣaṇā ādiṣu priyāḥ priyasya pratirūḍha mūrtayaḥ asau aham tu iti abalāḥ tat-ātmikāḥ nyavediṣuḥ kṛṣṇa-vihāra vibhramāḥ
gāyantyaḥ uccaiḥ amum eva saṁhatāḥ vicikyuḥ unmattaka-vat vanāt vanam papracchuḥ ākāśa-vat antaram bahiḥ bhūteṣu santam puruṣam vanaspatīn
dṛṣṭaḥ vaḥ kaccit aśvattha plakṣa nyagrodha naḥ manaḥ nanda sūnuḥ gataḥ hṛtvā prema hāsa avalokanaiḥ
kaccit kurabaka-aśoka-nāga-punnāga-campakāḥ rāma anujaḥ māninīnām itaḥ darpa hara smitaḥ
kaccit tulasi kalyāṇi govinda caraṇa priye saha tvā ali kulaiḥ bibhrat dṛṣṭaḥ te ati-priyaḥ acyutaḥ
mālati adarśi vaḥ kaccit mallike jāti yūthike prītim vaḥ janayan yātaḥ kara sparśena mādhavaḥ
cūta priyāla panasa āsana kovidāra jambu arka bilva bakula āmra kadamba nīpāḥ ye anye para artha bhavakāḥ yamunā-upakūlāḥ śaṁsantu kṛṣṇa-padavīm rahita ātmanām naḥ
kim te kṛtam kṣiti tapaḥ bata keśava aṅghri sparśa utsava utpulakita aṅga-ruhaiḥ vibhāsi api aṅghri sambhavaḥ urukrama vikramāt vā āha u varāha vapuṣaḥ parirambhaṇena
api eṇa patni upagataḥ priyayā iha gātraiḥ tanvan dṛśām sakhi su-nirvṛtim acyutaḥ vaḥ kāntā aṅga-saṅga kuca kuṅkuma rañjitāyāḥ kunda srajaḥ kula pateḥ iha vāti gandhaḥ
bāhum priyā aṁse upadhāya gṛhīta padmaḥ rāma-anujaḥ tulasikā ali-kulaiḥ mada andhaiḥ anvīyamānaḥ iha vaḥ taravaḥ praṇāmam kim vā abhinandati caran praṇaya avalokaiḥ
pṛcchata imāḥ latāḥ bāhūn api āśliṣṭāḥ vanaspateḥ nūnam tat kara-ja spṛṣṭāḥ bibhrati utpulakāni aho
iti unmatta vacaḥ gopyaḥ kṛṣṇa-anveṣaṇa kātarāḥ līlāḥ bhagavataḥ tāḥ tāḥ hi anucakruḥ tat-ātmikāḥ
kasyācit pūtanāyantyāḥ kṛṣṇāyantī apibat stanam tokayitvā rudatī anyā padā ahan śakaṭā-yatīm
daityāyitvā jahāra anyām ekā kṛṣṇa-arbha bhāvanām riṅgayām āsa kā api aṅghrī karṣantī ghoṣa niḥsvanaiḥ
kṛṣṇa-rāmāyite dve tu gopāyantyaḥ ca kāścana vatsāyatīm hanti ca anyā tatra ekā tu bakāyatīm
āhūya dūra gāḥ yadvat kṛṣṇaḥ tam anuvartatīm veṇum kvaṇantīm krīḍantīm anyāḥ śaṁsanti sādhu iti
kasyāñcit sva-bhujam nyasya calantī āha aparā nanu kṛṣṇaḥ aham paśyata gatim lalitām iti tat manāḥ
mā bhaiṣṭa vāta varṣābhyām tat trāṇam vihitam mayā iti uktvā ekena hastena yatantī unnidadhe ambaram
āruhya ekā padā ākramya śirasi āha aparām nṛpa duṣṭa ahe gaccha jātaḥ aham khalānām nanu daṇḍa kṛt
tatra ekā uvāca he gopāḥ dāva-agnim paśyata ulbaṇam cakṣūṁṣi āśu apidadhvam vaḥ vidhāsye kṣemam añjasā
baddhā anyayā srajā kācit tanvī tatra ulūkhale badhnāmi bhāṇḍa bhettāram haiyam-gava muṣam tu iti bhītā su-dṛk pidhāya āsyam bheje bhīti viḍambanam
evam kṛṣṇam pṛcchamānāḥ vṛndāvana latāḥ tarūn vyacakṣata vana uddeśe padāni parama-ātmanaḥ
padāni vyaktam etāni nanda-sūnoḥ mahā-ātmanaḥ lakṣyante hi dhvaja ambhoja vajra aṅkuśa yava-ādibhiḥ
taiḥ taiḥ padaiḥ tat padavīm anvicchantyaḥ agrataḥ abalāḥ vadhvāḥ padaiḥ supṛktāni vilokya ārtāḥ samabruvan
kasyāḥ padāni ca etāni yātāyāḥ nanda-sūnunā aṁsa nyasta prakoṣṭhāyāḥ kareṇoḥ kariṇā yathā
anayā ārādhitaḥ nūnam bhagavan hariḥ īśvaraḥ yat naḥ vihāya govindaḥ prītaḥ yām anayat rahaḥ
dhanyāḥ aho amī ālyaḥ govinda aṅghri-abja reṇavaḥ yān brahmā īśau ramā devī dadhuḥ mūrdhni agha nuttaye
tasyāḥ amūni naḥ kṣobham kurvanti uccaiḥ padāni yat yā ekā apahṛtya gopīnām rahaḥ bhuṅkte acyuta adharam na lakṣyante padāni atra tasyāḥ nūnam tṛṇa aṅkuraiḥ khidyat sujāta aṅghri talām unninye preyasīm priyaḥ
imāni adhika magnāni padāni vahataḥ vadhūm gopyaḥ paśyata kṛṣṇasya bhāra ākrāntasya kāminaḥ atra avaropitā kāntā puṣpa hetoḥ mahā-ātmanā
atra prasūna avacayaḥ priyā-arthe preyasā kṛtaḥ prapada ākramaṇe ete paśyata asakale pade
keśa prasādhanam tu atra kāminyāḥ kāminā kṛtam tāni cūḍayatā kāntām upaviṣṭam iha dhruvam
reme tayā ca ātma-rataḥ ātma-ārāmaḥ api akhaṇḍitaḥ kāminām darśayan dainyam strīṇām ca eva durātmatām
iti evam darśayantyaḥ tāḥ ceruḥ gopyaḥ vicetasaḥ yām gopīm anayat kṛṣṇaḥ vihāya anyāḥ striyaḥ vane sā ca mene tadā ātmānam variṣṭham sarva yoṣitām hitvā gopīḥ kāma-yānāḥ mām asau bhajate priyaḥ
tataḥ gatvā vana uddeśam dṛptā keśavam abravīt na pāraye aham calitum naya mām yatra te manaḥ
evam uktaḥ priyām āha skandhe āruhyatām iti tataḥ ca antardadhe kṛṣṇaḥ sā vadhūḥ anvatapyata
hā nātha ramaṇa preṣṭha kva asi kva asi mahā-bhuja dāsyāḥ te kṛpaṇāyāḥ me sakhe darśaya sannidhim
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca anvicchantyaḥ bhagavataḥ mārgam gopyaḥ avidūritaḥ dadṛśuḥ priya viśleṣāt mohitām duḥkhitām sakhīm
tayā kathitam ākarṇya māna prāptim ca mādhavāt avamānam ca daurātmyāt vismayam paramam yayuḥ
tataḥ aviśan vanam candra jyotsnā yāvat vibhāvyate tamaḥ praviṣṭam ālakṣya tataḥ nivavṛtuḥ striyaḥ
tat-manaskāḥ tat-ālāpāḥ tat-viceṣṭāḥ tat-ātmikāḥ tat-guṇān eva gāyantyaḥ na ātma āgārāṇi sasmaruḥ
punaḥ pulinam āgatya kālindyāḥ kṛṣṇa-bhāvanāḥ samavetāḥ jaguḥ kṛṣṇam tat-āgamana kāṅkṣitāḥ
gopyaḥ ūcuḥ jayati te adhikam janmanā vrajaḥ śrayate indirā śaśvat atra hi dayita dṛśyatām dikṣu tāvakāḥ tvayi dhṛta asavaḥ tvām vicinvate
śarat uda-āśaye sādhu jāta sat sarasi-ja udara śrī muṣā dṛśā surata-nātha te aśulka dāsikāḥ vara-da nighnataḥ na iha kim vadhaḥ
viṣa jala apyayāt vyāla rākṣasāt varṣa mārutāt vaidyuta-analāt vṛṣa maya-ātmajāt viśvataḥ bhayāt ṛṣabha te vayam rakṣitāḥ muhuḥ
na khalu gopikā nandanaḥ bhavān akhila dehinām antaḥ-ātma dṛk vikhanasā arthitaḥ viśva guptaye sakhe udeyivān sātvatām kule
viracita abhayam vṛṣṇi dhūrya te caraṇam īyuṣām saṁsṛteḥ bhayāt kara saraḥ-ruham kānta kāma dam śirasi dhehi naḥ śrī kara graham
vraja-jana ārti han vīra yoṣitām nija jana smaya dhvaṁsana smita bhaja sakhe bhavat kiṅkarīḥ sma naḥ jala-ruha ānanam cāru darśaya
praṇata dehinām pāpa karṣaṇam tṛṇa cara anugam śrī niketanam phaṇi phaṇā arpitam te pada-ambujam kṛṇu kuceṣu naḥ kṛndhi hṛt-śayam
madhurayā girā valgu vākyayā budha mano-jñayā puṣkara īkṣaṇa vidhi-karīḥ imāḥ vīra muhyatīḥ adhara sīdhunā āpyāyayasva naḥ
tava kathā-amṛtam tapta-jīvanam kavibhiḥ īḍitam kalmaṣa-apaham śravaṇa-maṅgalam śṛīmat ātatam bhuvi gṛṇanti ye bhūri-dāḥ janāḥ
prahasitam priya prema vīkṣaṇam viharaṇam ca te dhyāna maṅgalam rahasi saṁvidaḥ yāḥ hṛdi spṛśaḥ kuhaka naḥ manaḥ kṣobhayanti hi
calasi yat vrajāt cārayan paśūn nalina sundaram nātha te padam śila tṛṇa aṅkuraiḥ sīdati iti naḥ kalilatām manaḥ kānta gacchati
dina parikṣaye nīla kuntalaiḥ vana-ruha ānanam bibhrat āvṛtam ghana rajaḥ-valam darśayan muhuḥ manasi naḥ smaram vīra yacchasi
praṇata kāma dam padma-ja arcitam dharaṇi maṇḍanam dhyeyam āpadi caraṇa-paṅkajam śam-tamam ca te ramaṇa naḥ staneṣu arpaya adhi-han
surata vardhanam śoka nāśanam svarita veṇunā suṣṭhu cumbitam itara rāga vismāraṇam nṛṇām vitara vīra naḥ te adhara amṛtam
aṭati yat bhavān ahni kānanam truṭi yugāyate tvām apaśyatām kuṭila kuntalam śrī mukham ca te jaḍaḥ udīkṣatām pakṣma kṛt dṛśām
pati suta anvaya bhrātṛ bāndhavān ativilaṅghya te anti acyuta āgatāḥ gati vidaḥ tava udgīta mohitāḥ kitava yoṣitaḥ kaḥ tyajet niśi
rahasi saṁvidam hṛt-śaya udayam prahasita ānanam prema vīkṣaṇam bṛhat uraḥ śriyaḥ vīkṣya dhāma te muhuḥ ati spṛhā muhyate manaḥ
vraja-vana okasām vyaktiḥ aṅga te vṛjina hantrī alam viśva-maṅgalam tyaja manāk ca naḥ tvat spṛhā ātmanām sva jana hṛt rujām yat niṣūdanam
yat te su-jāta caraṇa-ambu-ruham staneṣu bhītāḥ śanaiḥ priya dadhīmahi karkaśeṣu tena aṭavīm aṭasi tat vyathate na kim svit kūrpa-ādibhiḥ bhramati dhīḥ bhavat-āyuṣām naḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti gopyaḥ pragāyantyaḥ pralapantyaḥ ca citradhā ruruduḥ su-svaram rājan kṛṣṇa-darśana lālasāḥ
tāsām āvirabhūt śauriḥ smayamāna mukha ambujaḥ pīta ambara dharaḥ srak-vī sākṣāt man-matha man mathaḥ
tam vilokya āgatam preṣṭham prīti utphulla dṛśaḥ abalāḥ uttasthuḥ yugapat sarvāḥ tanvaḥ prāṇam iva āgatam
kācit kara-ambujam śaureḥ jagṛhe añjalinā mudā kācit dadhāra tat-bāhum aṁse candana bhūṣitam
kācit añjalinā agṛhṇāt tanvī tāmbūla carvitam ekā tat aṅghri kamalam santaptā stanayoḥ adhāt
ekā bhru-kuṭim ābadhya prema saṁrambha vihvalā ghnantī iva aikṣat kaṭa ākṣepaiḥ sandaṣṭa daśana chadā
aparā animiṣat dṛgbhyām juṣāṇā tat mukha-ambujam āpītam api na atṛpyat santaḥ tat-caraṇam yathā
tam kācit netra randhreṇa hṛdi kṛtvā nimīlya ca pulaka-aṅgī upaguhya āste yogī iva ānanda samplutā
sarvāḥ tāḥ keśava āloka parama utsava nirvṛtāḥ jahuḥ viraha-jam tāpam prājñam prāpya yathā janāḥ
tābhiḥ vidhūta śokābhiḥ bhagavān acyutaḥ vṛtaḥ vyarocata adhikam tāta puruṣaḥ śaktibhiḥ yathā
tāḥ samādāya kālindyāḥ nirviśya pulinam vibhuḥ vikasat kunda-mandāra surabhi anila sat-padam śarat candra aṁśu sandoha dhvasta doṣā tamaḥ śivam kṛṣṇāyāḥ hasta tarala ācita komala vālukam
tat darśana āhlāda vidhūta hṛt rujaḥ manaḥ-ratha antam śrutayaḥ yathā yayuḥ svaiḥ uttarīyaiḥ kuca kuṅkuma aṅkitaiḥ acīkḷpan āsanam ātma bandhave
tatra upaviṣṭaḥ bhagavān saḥ īśvaraḥ yoga-īśvara antaḥ hṛdi kalpita āsanaḥ cakāsa gopī-pariṣat gataḥ arcitaḥ trai-lokya lakṣmī eka padam vapuḥ dadhat
sabhājayitvā tam anaṅga dīpanam sa-hāsa līlā īkṣaṇa vibhrama bhruvā saṁsparśanena aṅka kṛta aṅghri hastayoḥ saṁstutya īṣat kupitāḥ babhāṣire
śrī-gopyaḥ ūcuḥ bhajataḥ anu bhajanti eke eke etat viparyayam na ubhayān ca bhajanti eke etat naḥ brūhi sādhu bhoḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca mithaḥ bhajanti ye sakhyaḥ sva-artha eka-anta udyamāḥ hi te na tatra sauhṛdam dharmaḥ sva-artha artham tat hi na anyathā
bhajanti abhajataḥ ye vai karuṇāḥ pitarau yathā dharmaḥ nirapavādaḥ atra sauhṛdam ca su-madhyamāḥ
bhajataḥ api na vai kecit bhajanti abhajataḥ kutaḥ ātma-ārāmāḥ hi āpta-kāmāḥ akṛta-jñāḥ guru-druhaḥ
na aham tu sakhyaḥ bhajataḥ api jantūn bhajāmi amīṣām anuvṛtti vṛttaye yathā adhanaḥ labdha dhane vinaṣṭe tat cintayā anyat nibhṛtaḥ na veda
evam mat artha ujjhita loka veda svānām hi vaḥ mayi anuvṛttaye abalāḥ mayā aparokṣam bhajatā tirohitam mā asūyitum ma arhatha tat priyam priyāḥ
na pāraye aham niravadya-saṁyujām sva-sādhu-kṛtyam vibudha-āyuṣā api vaḥ yāḥ mā abhajan durjara geha-śṛṅkhalāḥ saṁvṛścya tat vaḥ pratiyātu sādhunā
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ittham bhagavataḥ gopyaḥ śrutvā vācaḥ su-peśalāḥ jahuḥ viraha-jam tāpam tat aṅga upacita āśiṣaḥ
tatra ārabhata govindaḥ rāsa-krīḍam anuvrataiḥ strī ratnaiḥ anvitaḥ prītaiḥ anyonya ābaddha bāhubhiḥ
rāsa utsavaḥ sampravṛttaḥ gopī-maṇḍala maṇḍitaḥ yoga īśvareṇa kṛṣṇena tāsām madhye dvayoḥ dvayoḥ praviṣṭena gṛhīṭānām kaṇṭhe sva-nikaṭam striyaḥ yam manyeran nabhaḥ tāvat vimāna śata saṅkulam diva okasām sa dārāṇām autsukya apahṛta ātmanām
tataḥ dundubhayaḥ neduḥ nipetuḥ puṣpa vṛṣṭayaḥ jaguḥ gandharva-patayaḥ sa-strīkāḥ tat yaśaḥ amalam
valayānām nūpurāṇām kiṅkiṇīnām ca yoṣitām sa-priyāṇām abhūt śabdaḥ tumulaḥ rāsa-maṇḍale
tatra atiśuśubhe tābhiḥ bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ madhye maṇīnām haimānām mahā marakataḥ yathā
pāda nyāsaiḥ bhuja vidhutibhiḥ sa-smitaiḥ bhrū vilāsaiḥ bhajyan madhyaiḥ cala kuca paṭaiḥ kuṇḍalaiḥ gaṇḍa lolaiḥ svidyan mukhyaḥ kavara rasanā āgranthayaḥ kṛṣṇa-vadhvaḥ gāyantyaḥ tam taḍitaḥ iva tāḥ megha-cakre virejuḥ
uccaiḥ jaguḥ nṛtyamānāḥ rakta kaṇṭhyaḥ rati priyāḥ kṛṣṇa-abhimarśa muditāḥ yat gītena idam āvṛtam
kācit samam mukundena svara-jātīḥ amiśritāḥ unninye pūjitā tena prīyatā sādhu sādhu iti tat eva dhruvam unninye tasyai mānam ca bahu adāt
kācit rāsa pariśrāntā pārśva sthasya gadā-bhṛtaḥ jagrāha bāhunā skandham ślathat valaya mallikā
tatra ekā aṁsa gatam bāhum kṛṣṇasya utpala saurabham candana āliptam āghrāya hṛṣṭa romā cucumba ha
kasyāścit nāṭya vikṣipta kuṇḍala tviṣa maṇḍitam gaṇḍam gaṇḍe sandadhatyāḥ prādāt tāmbūla carvitam
nṛtyatī gāyatī kācit kūjan nūpura mekhalā pārśva-stha acyuta hasta-abjam śrāntā adhāt stanayoḥ śivam
gopyaḥ labdhvā acyutam kāntam śriyaḥ ekānta vallabham gṛhīta kaṇṭhyaḥ tat dorbhyām gāyantyaḥ tam vijahrire
karṇa utpala alaka vitaṅka kapola gharma vaktra śriyaḥ valaya nūpura ghoṣa vādyaiḥ gopyaḥ samam bhagavatā nanṛtuḥ sva keśa srasta srajaḥ bhramara gāyaka rāsa goṣṭhyām
evam pariṣvaṅga kara abhimarśa snigdha īkṣaṇa uddāma vilāsa hāsaiḥ reme ramā īśaḥ vraja-sundarībhiḥ yathā arbhakaḥ sva pratibimba vibhramaḥ
tat aṅga-saṅga pramudā ākula indriyāḥ keśān dukūlam kuca-paṭṭikām vā na añjaḥ prativyoḍhum alam vraja-striyaḥ visrasta mālā ābharaṇāḥ kuru-udvaha
kṛṣṇa-vikrīḍitam vīkṣya mumuhuḥ khe-cara striyaḥ kāma arditāḥ śaśāṅkaḥ ca sa-gaṇaḥ vismitaḥ abhavat
kṛtvā tāvantam ātmānam yāvatīḥ gopa-yoṣitaḥ reme saḥ bhagavān tābhiḥ ātma-ārāmaḥ api līlayā
tāsām rati vihāreṇa śrāntānām vadanāni saḥ prāmṛjat karuṇaḥ premṇā śantamena aṅga pāṇinā
gopyaḥ sphurat puraṭa kuṇḍala kuntala tviṭ gaṇḍa śriyā sudhita hāsa nirīkṣaṇena mānam dadhatyaḥ ṛṣabhasya jaguḥ kṛtāni puṇyāni tat kara-ruha sparśa pramodāḥ
tābhiḥ yutaḥ śramam apohitum aṅga-saṅga ghṛṣṭa srajaḥ saḥ kuca kuṅkuma rañjitāyāḥ gandharva-pa alibhiḥ anudrutaḥ āviśat vāḥ śrāntaḥ gajībhiḥ ibha-rāṭ iva bhinna setuḥ
saḥ ambhasi alam yuvatibhiḥ pariṣicyamānaḥ premṇā īkṣitaḥ prahasatībhiḥ itaḥ tataḥ aṅga vaimānikaiḥ kusuma varṣibhiḥ īḍyamānaḥ reme svayam sva-ratiḥ atra gaja-indra līlaḥ
tataḥ ca kṛṣṇā upavane jala sthala prasūna gandha anila juṣṭa dik-taṭe cacāra bhṛṅga pramadā gaṇa āvṛtaḥ yathā mada-cyut dviradaḥ kareṇubhiḥ
evam śaśāṅka aṁśu virājitāḥ niśāḥ saḥ satya-kāmaḥ anurata abalā-gaṇaḥ siṣeve ātmani avaruddha saurataḥ sarvāḥ śarat kāvya kathā rasa āśrayāḥ
śrī-parīkṣit uvāca saṁsthāpanāya dharmasya praśamāya itarasya ca avatīrṇaḥ hi bhagavān aṁśena jagat īśvaraḥ saḥ katham dharma-setūnām vaktā kartā abhirakṣitā pratīpam ācarat brahman para dāra abhimarśanam
āpta-kāmaḥ yadu-patiḥ kṛtavān vai jugupsitam kim-abhiprāyaḥ etat naḥ śaṁśayam chindhi su-vrata
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca dharma-vyatikramaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ īśvarāṇām ca sāhasam tejīyasām na doṣāya vahneḥ sarva bhujaḥ yathā
na etat samācaret jātu manasā api hi anīśvaraḥ vinaśyati ācaran mauḍhyāt yathā arudraḥ abdhijam viṣam
īśvarānām vacaḥ satyam tathā eva ācaritam kvacit teṣām yat sva-vacaḥ yuktam buddhi-mān tat samācaret
kuśala ācaritena eṣām iha sva-arthaḥ na vidyate viparyayeṇa vā anarthaḥ nirahaṅkāriṇām prabho
kim uta akhila sattvānām tiryak martya diva-okasām īśituḥ ca īśitavyānām kuśala akuśala anvayaḥ
yat pāda-paṅkaja parāga niṣeva tṛptāḥ yoga-prabhāva vidhuta akhila karma bandhāḥ svairam caranti munayaḥ api na nahyamānāḥ tasya icchayā ātta vapuṣaḥ kutaḥ eva bandhaḥ
gopīnām tat-patīnām ca sarveṣām eva dehinām yaḥ antaḥ carati saḥ adhyakṣaḥ krīḍanena iha deha bhāk
anugrahāya bhaktānām mānuṣam deham āsthitaḥ bhajate tādṛśīḥ kriḍāḥ yāḥ śrutvā tat-paraḥ bhavet
na asūyan khalu kṛṣṇāya mohitāḥ tasya māyayā manyamānāḥ sva-pārśva sthān svān svān dārān vraja-okasaḥ
brahma-rātre upāvṛtte vāsudeva anumoditāḥ anicchantyaḥ yayuḥ gopyaḥ sva-gṛhān bhagavat priyāḥ
vikrīḍitam vraja-vadhūbhiḥ idam ca viṣṇoḥ śraddhā-anvitaḥ anuśṛṇuyāt atha varṇayet yaḥ bhaktim parām bhagavati pratilabhya kāmam hṛt rogam āśu apahinoti acireṇa dhīraḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ekadā deva yatrāyām gopālāḥ jāta-kautukāḥ anobhiḥ anaḍut yuktaiḥ prayayuḥ te ambikā-vanam
tatra snātvā sarasvatyām devam paśu-patim vibhum ānarcuḥ arhaṇaiḥ bhaktyā devīm ca nṛ-pate ambikām
gāvaḥ hiraṇyam vāsāṁsi madhu madhu annam ādṛtāḥ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ daduḥ sarve devaḥ naḥ prīyatām iti
ūṣuḥ sarasvatī-tīre jalam prāśya yata-vratāḥ rajanīm tām mahā-bhāgāḥ nanda-sunandaka-ādayaḥ
kaścit mahān ahiḥ tasmin vipine ati-bubhukṣitaḥ yadṛcchayā āgataḥ nandam śayānam ura-gaḥ agrasīt
saḥ cukrośa ahinā grastaḥ kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahān ayam sarpaḥ mām grasate tāta prapannam parimocaya
tasya ca ākranditam śrutvā gopālāḥ sahasā utthitāḥ grastam ca dṛṣṭvā vibhrāntāḥ sarpam vivyadhuḥ ulmukaiḥ
alātaiḥ dahyamānaḥ api na amuñcat tam uraṅgamaḥ tam aspṛśat padā abhyetya bhagavān sātvatām patiḥ
saḥ vai bhagavataḥ śrī-mat pāda sparśa hata aśubhaḥ bheje sarpa-vapuḥ hitvā rūpam vidyādhara arcitam
tam apṛcchat hṛṣīkeśaḥ praṇatam samavasthitam dīpyamānena vapuṣā puruṣam hema mālinam
kaḥ bhavān parayā lakṣmyā rocate adbhuta darśanaḥ katham jugupsitām etām gatim vā prāpitaḥ avaśaḥ
sarpaḥ uvāca aham vidyādharaḥ kaścit sudarśanaḥ iti śrutaḥ śriyā svarūpa sampattyā vimānena ācaran diśaḥ ṛṣīn virūpa āṅgirasaḥ prāhasam rūpa darpitaḥ taiḥ imām prāpitaḥ yonim pralabdhaiḥ svena pāpmanā
śāpaḥ me anugrahāya eva kṛtaḥ taiḥ karuṇa-ātmabhiḥ yat aham loka guruṇā padā spṛṣṭaḥ hata aśubhaḥ
tam tvā aham bhava bhītānām prapannānām bhaya apaham āpṛcche śāpa nirmuktaḥ pāda-sparśāt amīva han
prapannaḥ asmi mahā-yogin mahā-puruṣa sat-pate anujānīhi mām deva sarva loka īśvara īśvara
brahma daṇḍāt vimuktaḥ aham sadyaḥ te acyuta darśanāt yat nāma gṛhṇan akhilān śrotṝn ātmānam eva ca sadyaḥ punāti kim bhūyaḥ tasya spṛṣṭaḥ padā hi te
iti anujñāpya dāśārham parikramya abhivandya ca sudarśanaḥ divam yātaḥ kṛcchrāt nandaḥ ca mocitaḥ
niśāmya kṛṣṇasya tat ātma vaibhavam vraja-okasaḥ vismita cetasaḥ tataḥ samāpya tasmin niyamam punaḥ vrajam nṛpa āyayuḥ tat kathayantaḥ ādṛtāḥ
kadācit atha govindaḥ rāmaḥ ca adbhuta vikramaḥ vijahratuḥ vane rātryām madhya-gau vraja-yoṣitām
upagīyamānau lalitam strī-janaiḥ baddha sauhṛdaiḥ su-alaṅkṛta anulipta aṅgau srak-vinau virajaḥ ambarau
niśā-mukham mānayantau udita uḍupa tārakam mallikā gandha matta ali juṣṭam kumuda vāyunā
jagatuḥ sarva-bhūtānām manaḥ śravaṇa maṅgalam tau kalpayantau yugapat svara maṇḍala mūrcchitam
gopyaḥ tat gītam ākarṇya mūrcchitāḥ na avidan nṛpa sraṁsat dukūlam ātmānam srasta keśa srajam tataḥ
evam vikrīḍatoḥ svairam gāyatoḥ sampramatta vat śaṅkhacūḍaḥ iti khyātaḥ dhana-da anucaraḥ abhyagāt
tayoḥ nirīkṣatoḥ rājan tat-nātham pramadā-janam krośantam kālayām āsa diśi udīcyām aśaṅkitaḥ
krośantam kṛṣṇa rāma iti vilokya sva-parigraham yathā gāḥ dasyunā grastāḥ bhrātarau anvadhāvatām
mā bhaiṣṭa iti abhaya ārāvau śāla hastau tarasvinau āsedatuḥ tam tarasā tvaritam guhyaka adhamam
saḥ vīkṣya tau anuprāptau kāla-mṛtyū iva udvijan visṛjya strī-janam mūḍhaḥ prādravat jīvita icchayā
tam anvadhāvat govindaḥ yatra yatra saḥ dhāvati jihīrṣuḥ tat śiraḥ ratnam tasthau rakṣan striyaḥ balaḥ
avidūre iva abhyetya śiraḥ tasya durātmanaḥ jahāra muṣṭinā eva aṅga saha cūḍa-maṇim vibhuḥ
śaṅkhacūḍam nihatya evam maṇim ādāya bhāsvaram agra-jāya adadāt prītyā paśyantīnām ca yoṣitām
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca gopyaḥ kṛṣṇe vanam yāte tam anudruta cetasaḥ kṛṣṇa-līlāḥ pragāyantyaḥ ninyuḥ duḥkhena vāsarān
śrī-gopyaḥ ūcuḥ vāma bāhu kṛta vāma kapolaḥ valgita bhruḥ adhara arpita veṇum komala aṅgulibhiḥ āśrita-mārgam gopyaḥ īrayati yatra mukundaḥ vyoma yāna vanitāḥ saha siddhaiḥ vismitāḥ tat upadhārya sa lajjāḥ kāma mārgaṇa samarpita cittāḥ kaśmalam yayuḥ apasmṛta nīvyaḥ
hanta citram abalāḥ śṛṇuta idam hāra hāsaḥ urasi sthira vidyut nanda-sūnuḥ ayam ārta janānām narma daḥ yarhi kūjita veṇuḥ vrṇdaśaḥ vraja vṛṣāḥ mṛga gāvaḥ veṇu vādya hṛta cetasaḥ ārāt danta daṣṭa kavalāḥ dhṛta karṇāḥ nidritāḥ likhita citram iva āsan
barhiṇa stabaka dhātu palāśaiḥ baddha malla paribarha viḍambaḥ karhicit sa-balaḥ āli saḥ gopaiḥ gāḥ samāhvayati yatra mukundaḥ tarhi bhagna gatayaḥ saritaḥ vai tat pada-ambuja rajaḥ anila nītam spṛhayatīḥ vayam iva abahu puṇyāḥ prema vepita bhujāḥ stimita āpaḥ
anucaraiḥ samanuvarṇita vīryaḥ ādi-pūruṣaḥ iva acala bhūtiḥ vana caraḥ giri taṭesu carantīḥ veṇunā āhvayati gāḥ saḥ yadā hi vana-latāḥ taravaḥ ātmani viṣṇum vyañjayantyaḥ iva puṣpa phala āḍhyāḥ praṇata bhāra viṭapāḥ madhu dhārāḥ prema hṛṣṭa tanavaḥ vavṛṣuḥ sma darśanīya tilakaḥ vana-mālā divya gandha tulasī madhu mattaiḥ ali kulaiḥ alaghu gītam abhīṣṭam ādriyan yarhi sandhita veṇuḥ sarasi sārasa haṁsa vihaṅgāḥ cāru gīta hṛta cetasaḥ etya harim upāsata te yata cittāḥ hanta mīlita dṛśaḥ dhṛta maunāḥ
saha-balaḥ srak avataṁsa vilāsaḥ sānuṣu kṣiti-bhṛtaḥ vraja-devyaḥ harṣayan yarhi veṇu raveṇa jāta-harṣaḥ uparambhati viśvam mahat atikramaṇa śaṅkita cetāḥ manda-mandam anugarjati meghaḥ suhṛdam abhyavarṣat sumanobhiḥ chāyayā ca vidadhat pratapatram
vividha gopa caraṇeṣu vidagdhaḥ veṇu vādye urudhā nija śikṣāḥ tava sutaḥ sati yadā adhara bimbe datta veṇuḥ anayat svara jātīḥ savanaśaḥ tat upadhārya sura-īśāḥ śakra śarva parameṣṭhi puraḥ-gāḥ kavayaḥ ānata kandhara cittāḥ kaśmalam yayuḥ aniścita tattvāḥ
nija pada-abja dalaiḥ dhvaja vajra nīraja aṅkuśa vicitra lalāmaiḥ vraja bhuvaḥ śamayan khura todam varṣma dhurya gatiḥ īḍita veṇuḥ vrajati tena vayam savilāsa vīkṣaṇa arpita manaḥ-bhava vegāḥ kuja gatim gamitāḥ na vidāmaḥ kaśmaleṇa kavaram vasanam vā
maṇi dharaḥ kvacit āgaṇayan gāḥ mālayā dayita gandha tulasyāḥ praṇayinaḥ anucarasya kadā aṁse prakṣipan bhujam agāyata yatra kvaṇita veṇu rava vañcita cittāḥ kṛṣṇam anvasata kṛṣṇa gṛhiṇyaḥ guṇa-gaṇa arṇam anugatya hariṇyaḥ gopikāḥ iva vimukta gṛha āśāḥ
kunda dāma kṛta kautuka veṣaḥ gopa godhana vṛtaḥ yamunāyām nanda-sūnuḥ anaghe tava vatsaḥ narma-daḥ praṇayiṇām vijahāra manda vāyuḥ upavāti anukūlam mānayan malaya-ja sparśena vandinaḥ tam upadeva gaṇāḥ ye vādya gīta balibhiḥ parivavruḥ
vatsalaḥ vraja-gavām yat aga dhraḥ vandyamāna caraṇaḥ pathi vṛddhaiḥ kṛtsna go-dhanam upohya dina ante gītā-veṇuḥ anuga īḍita kīrtiḥ utsavam śrama rucā api dṛśīnām unnayan khura rajaḥ churita srak ditsayā eti suhṛt āśiṣaḥ eṣaḥ devakī jaṭhara bhūḥ uḍu-rājaḥ
mada vighūrṇita locanaḥ īṣat māna-daḥ sva-suhṛdām vana-mālī badara pāṇḍu vadanaḥ mṛdu gaṇḍam maṇḍayan kanaka kuṇḍala lakṣmyā yadu-patiḥ dvirada-rāja vihāraḥ yāminī-patiḥ iva eṣaḥ dina-ante mudita vaktraḥ upayāti durantam mocayan vraja gavām dina tāpam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam vraja-striyaḥ rājan kṛṣṇa-līlā anugāyatīḥ remire ahaḥsu tat-cittāḥ tat-manaskāḥ mahā udayāḥ
śrī bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca atha tarhi āgataḥ goṣṭham ariṣṭaḥ vṛṣabha-asuraḥ mahīm mahā kakut kāyaḥ kampayan khura vikṣatām
rambhamāṇaḥ khara-taram padā ca vilikhan mahīm udyamya puccham vaprāṇi viṣāṇa agreṇa ca uddharan kiñcit kiñcit śakṛt muñcan mūtrayan stabdha locanaḥ
yasya nirhrāditena aṅga niṣṭhureṇa gavām nṛṇām patanti akālataḥ garbhāḥ sravanti sma bhayena vai nirviśanti ghanāḥ yasya kakudi acala śaṅkayā tam tīkṣṇa śṛṅgam udvīkṣya gopyaḥ gopāḥ ca tatrasuḥ
paśavaḥ dudruvuḥ bhītāḥ rājan santyajya go-kulam kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa iti te sarve govindam śaraṇam yayuḥ
bhagavān api tat vīkṣya go-kulam bhaya vidrutam mā bhaiṣṭa iti girā āśvāsya vṛṣa-asuram upāhvayat
gopālaiḥ paśubhiḥ manda trāsitaiḥ kim asattama mayi śāstari duṣṭānām tvat-vidhānām durātmanām
iti āsphotya acyutaḥ ariṣṭam tala śabdena kopayan sakhyuḥ aṁse bhuja ābhogam prasārya avasthitaḥ hariḥ
saḥ api evam kopitaḥ ariṣṭaḥ khureṇa avanim ullikhan udyat puccha bhraman meghaḥ kruddhaḥ kṛṣṇam upādravat
agra nyasta viṣāṇa agraḥ stabdha asṛk locanaḥ acyutam kaṭa-ākṣipya adravat tūrṇam indra-muktaḥ aśaniḥ yathā
gṛhītvā śṛṅgayoḥ tam vai aṣṭādaśa padāni saḥ pratyapovāha bhagavān gajaḥ prati-gajam yathā
saḥ apaviddhaḥ bhagavatā punaḥ utthāya satvaram āpatat svinna sarva aṅgaḥ niḥśvasan krodha mūrcchitaḥ
tam āpatantam saḥ nigṛhya śṛṅgayoḥ padā samākramya nipātya bhū-tale niṣpīḍayām āsa yathā ardram ambaram kṛtvā viṣāṇena jaghāna saḥ apatat
asṛk vaman mūtra śakṛt samutsṛjan kṣipan ca pādān anavasthita īkṣaṇaḥ jagāma kṛcchram nirṛteḥ atha kṣayam puṣpaiḥ kirantaḥ harim īdire suraḥ
evam kukudminam hatvā stūyamānaḥ dvijātibhiḥ viveśa goṣṭham sa-balaḥ gopīnām nayana utsavaḥ
ariṣṭe nihate daitye kṛṣṇena adbhuta-karmaṇā kaṁsāya atha āha bhagavān nāradaḥ deva-darśanaḥ
yaśodāyāḥ sutām kanyām devakyāḥ kṛṣṇam eva ca rāmam ca rohiṇī-putram vasudevena bibhyatā nyastau sva-mitre nande vai yābhyām te puruṣāḥ hatāḥ
niśamya tat bhoja-patiḥ kopāt pracalita indriyaḥ niśātam asim ādatta vasudeva-jighāṁsayā
nivāritaḥ nāradena tat-sutau mṛtyum ātmanaḥ jñātvā loha-mayaiḥ pāśaiḥ babandha saha bhāryayā
pratiyāte tu deva-ṛṣau kaṁsaḥ ābhāṣya keśinam preṣayām āsa hanyetām bhavatā rāma-keśavau
tataḥ muṣṭika-cāṇūra-śala-tośalaka-ādikān amātyān hasti-pān ca eva samāhūya āha bhoja-rāṭ
bhoḥ bhoḥ niśamyatām etat vīra cāṇūra-muṣṭikau nanda-vraje kila āsāte sutau ānakadundubheḥ rāma-kṛṣṇau tataḥ mahyam mṛtyuḥ kila nidarśitaḥ bhavadbhyām iha samprāptau hanyetām malla līlayā
mancāḥ kriyantām vividhāḥ malla-raṅga pariśritāḥ paurāḥ jānapadāḥ sarve paśyantu svaira saṁyugam
mahā-mātra tvayā bhadra raṅga dvāri upanīyatām dvipaḥ kuvalayāpīḍaḥ jahi tena mama ahitau
ārabhyatām dhanuḥ-yāgaḥ caturdaśyām yathā-vidhi viśasantu paśūn medhyān bhūta-rājāya mīḍhuṣe
iti ājñāpya artha tantra jñaḥ āhūya yadu-puṅgavam gṛhītvā pāṇinā pāṇim tataḥ akrūram uvāca ha
bhoḥ bhoḥ dāna pate mahyam kriyatām maitram ādṛtaḥ na anyaḥ tvattaḥ hita-tamaḥ vidyate bhoja-vṛṣṇiṣu
ataḥ tvām āśritaḥ saumya kārya gaurava sādhanam yathā indraḥ viṣṇum āśritya sva-artham adhyagamat vibhuḥ
gaccha nanda-vrajam tatra sutau ānakadundubheḥ āsāte tau iha anena rathena ānaya mā ciram
nisṛṣṭaḥ kila me mṛtyuḥ devaiḥ vaikuṇṭha saṁśrayaiḥ tau ānaya samam gopaiḥ nanda-ādyaiḥ sa abhyupāyanaiḥ
ghātayiṣye iha ānītau kāla-kalpena hastinā yadi muktau tataḥ mallaiḥ ghātaye vaidyuta upamaiḥ
tayoḥ nihatayoḥ taptān vasudeva-purogamān tad-bandhūn nihaniṣyāmi vṛṣṇi-bhoja-daśārhakān
ugrasenam ca pitaram sthaviram rājya kāmukam tat-bhrātaram devakam ca ye ca anye vidviṣaḥ mama
tataḥ ca eṣā mahī mitra bhavitrī naṣṭa kaṇṭakā
jarāsandhaḥ mama guruḥ dvividaḥ dayitaḥ sakhā śambaraḥ narakaḥ bāṇaḥ mayi eva kṛta-sauhṛdāḥ taiḥ aham sura pakṣīyān hatvā bhokṣye mahīm nṛpān
etat jñātvā ānaya kṣipram rāma-kṛṣṇau iha arbhakau dhanuḥ-makha nirīkṣā-artham draṣṭum yadu-pura śriyam
śrī-akrūraḥ uvāca rājan manīṣitam sadhryak tava sva avadya mārjanam siddhi-asiddhyoḥ samam kuryāt daivam hi phala sādhanam
manaḥ-rathān karoti uccaiḥ janaḥ daiva hatān api yujyate harṣa-śokābhyām tathā api ājñām karomi te
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam ādiśya ca akrūram mantriṇaḥ ca visṛjya saḥ praviveśa gṛham kaṁsaḥ tathā akrūraḥ svam ālayam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca keśī tu kaṁsa-prahitaḥ khuraiḥ mahīm mahā-hayaḥ nirjarayan manaḥ javaḥ saṭā avadhūta abhra vimāna saṅkulam kurvan nabhaḥ heṣita bhīṣita akhilaḥ tam trāsayantam bhagavān sva-gokulam tat-heṣitaiḥ vāla vighūrṇita ambudam ātmānam ājau mṛgayantam agra-nīḥ upāhvayat saḥ vyanadan mṛgendra-vat
saḥ tam niśāmya abhimukhaḥ mukhena kham piban iva abhyadravat ati-amarṣaṇaḥ jaghāna padbhyām aravinda-locanam durāsadaḥ caṇḍa javaḥ duratyayaḥ
tat vañcayitvā tam adhokṣajaḥ ruṣā pragṛhya dorbhyām parividhya pādayoḥ sa-avajñam utsṛjya dhanuḥ śata antare yathā uragam tārkṣya sutaḥ vyavasthitaḥ
saḥ labdha saṁjñaḥ punaḥ utthitaḥ ruṣā vyādāya keśī tarasā apatat harim saḥ api asya vaktre bhujam uttaram smayan praveśayām āsa yathā uragam bile
dantāḥ nipetuḥ bhagavat bhuja spṛśaḥ te keśinaḥ tapta-maya spṛśaḥ yathā bāhuḥ ca tat deha gataḥ mahā-ātmanaḥ yathā āmayaḥ saṁvavṛdhe upekṣitaḥ
samedhamānena saḥ kṛṣṇa-bāhunā niruddha vāyuḥ caraṇān ca vikṣipan prasvinna gātraḥ parivṛtta locanaḥ papāta laṇḍam visṛjan kṣitau vyasuḥ
tat-dehataḥ karkaṭikā-phala upamāt vyasoḥ apākṛṣya bhujam mahā-bhujaḥ avismitaḥ ayatna hata arikaḥ suraiḥ prasūna varṣaiḥ varṣadbhiḥ īḍitaḥ
deva-ṛṣiḥ upasaṅgamya bhāgavata pravaraḥ nṛpa kṛṣṇam akliṣṭa karmāṇam rahasi etat abhāṣata
kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa aprameya-ātman yoga-īśa jagat-īśvara vāsudeva akhila-āvāsa sātvatām pravara prabho tvam ātmā sarva bhūtānām ekaḥ jyotiḥ iva edhasām gūḍhaḥ guhā śayaḥ sākṣī mahā-puruṣaḥ īśvaraḥ
ātmanā ātma āśrayaḥ pūrvam māyayā sasṛje guṇān taiḥ idam satya saṅkalpaḥ sṛjasi atsi avasi īśvaraḥ
saḥ tvam bhū-dhara bhūtānām daitya-pramatha-rakṣasām avatīrṇaḥ vināśāya sādhūnām rakṣaṇāya ca
diṣṭyā te nihataḥ daityaḥ līlayā ayam haya-ākṛtiḥ yasya heṣita santrastāḥ tyajanti animiṣāḥ divam
cāṇūram muṣṭikam ca eva mallān anyān ca hastinam kaṁsam ca nihatam drakṣye para-śvaḥ ahani te vibho tasya anu śaṅkha-yavana-murāṇām narakasya ca pārijāta apaharaṇam indrasya ca parājayam udvāham vīra kanyānām vīrya śulka ādi lakṣaṇam nṛgasya mokṣaṇam śāpāt dvārakāyām jagat-pate syamantakasya ca maṇeḥ ādānam saha bhāryayā mṛta putra pradānam ca brāhmaṇasya sva-dhāmataḥ pauṇḍrakasya vadham paścāt kāśi-puryāḥ ca dīpanam dantavakrasya nidhanam caidyasya ca mahā-kratau yāni ca anyāni vīryāṇi dvārakām āvasan bhavān kartā drakṣyāmi aham tāni geyāni kavibhiḥ bhuvi
atha te kāla-rūpasya kṣapayiṣṇoḥ amuṣya vai akṣauhiṇīnām nidhanam drakṣyāmi arjuna sāratheḥ
viśuddha vijñāna ghanam sva-saṁsthayā samāpta sarva artham amogha vāñchitam sva-tejasā nitya nivṛtta māyā guṇa pravāham bhagavantam īmahi
tvām īśvaram sva-āśrayam ātma māyayā vinirmita aśeṣa viśeṣa kalpanam krīḍa artham adya ātta manuṣya vigraham nataḥ asmi dhuryam yadu-vṛṣṇi-sātvatām
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam yadu-patim kṛṣṇam bhāgavata pravaraḥ muniḥ praṇipatya abhyanujñātaḥ yayau tat darśana utsavaḥ
bhagavān api govindaḥ hatvā keśinam āhave paśūn apālayat pālaiḥ prītaiḥ vraja sukha āvahaḥ
ekadā te paśūn pālāḥ cārayantaḥ adri sānuṣu cakruḥ nilāyana krīḍāḥ cora pāla apadeśataḥ
tatra āsan katicit corāḥ pālāḥ ca katicit nṛpa meṣāyitāḥ ca tatra eke vijahruḥ akutaḥ-bhayāḥ
maya-putraḥ mahā māyaḥ vyomaḥ gopāla veṣa dhṛk meṣāyitān apovāha prāyaḥ corāyitaḥ bahūn
giri daryām vinikṣipya nītam nītam mahā-asuraḥ śilayā pidadhe dvāram catuḥ-pañca avaśeṣitāḥ
tasya tat karma vijñāya kṛṣṇaḥ śaraṇa daḥ satām gopān nayantam jagrāha vṛkam hariḥ iva ojasā
saḥ nijam rūpam āsthāya giri-indra sadṛśam balī icchan vimoktum ātmānam na aśaknot grahaṇa āturaḥ
tam nigṛhya acyutaḥ dorbhyām pātayitvā mahī-tale paśyatām divi devānām paśu-māram amārayat
guhā pidhānam nirbhidya gopān niḥsārya kṛcchrataḥ stūyamānaḥ suraiḥ gopaiḥ praviveśa sva gokulam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca akrūraḥ api ca tām rātrim madhu-puryām mahā-matiḥ uṣitvā ratham āsthāya prayayau nanda-gokulam
gacchan pathi mahā-bhāgaḥ bhagavati ambuja-īkṣaṇe bhaktim parām upagataḥ evam etat acintayat
kim mayā ācaritam bhadram kim taptam paramam tapaḥ kim vā atha api arhate dattam yat drakṣyāmi adya keśavam
mama etat durlabham manye uttamaḥ-śloka darśanam viṣaya-ātmanaḥ yathā brahma kīrtanam śūdra janmanaḥ
mā evam mama adhamasya api syāt eva acyuta darśanam hriyamāṇaḥ kāla nadyā kvacit tarati kaścana
mama adya amaṅgalam naṣṭam phala-vān ca eva me bhavaḥ yat namasye bhagavataḥ yogi-dhyeya aṅghri paṅkajam
kaṁsaḥ bata adya akṛta me ati-anugraham drakṣye aṅghri-padmam prahitaḥ amunā hareḥ kṛta avatārasya duratyayam tamaḥ pūrve ataran yat nakha-maṇḍala tviṣā
yat arcitam brahma-bhava ādibhiḥ suraiḥ śriyā ca devyā munibhiḥ sa-sātvataiḥ go cāraṇāya anucaraiḥ carat vane yat gopikānām kuca kuṅkuma aṅkitam
drakṣyāmi nūnam su kapola nāsikam smita avaloka aruṇa kañja locanam mukham mukundasya guḍa alaka āvṛtam pradakṣiṇam me pracaranti vai mṛgāḥ
api adya viṣṇoḥ manujatvam īyuṣaḥ bhāra avatārāya bhuvaḥ nija icchayā lāvaṇya dhāmnaḥ bhavitā upalambhanam mahyam na na syāt phalam añjasā dṛśaḥ
yaḥ īkṣitā aham rahitaḥ api asat-satoḥ sva-tejasā apāsta tamaḥ bhidā bhramaḥ sva-māyayā ātman racitaiḥ tat-īkṣayā prāṇa akṣa dhībhiḥ sadaneṣu abhīyate
yasya akhila amīva habhiḥ su-maṅgalaiḥ vācaḥ vimiśrāḥ guṇa karma janmabhiḥ prāṇanti śumbhanti punanti vai jagat yāḥ tat viraktāḥ śava śobhanāḥ matāḥ
saḥ ca avatīrṇaḥ kila sātvata anvaye sva setu pāla amara-varya śarma kṛt yaśaḥ vitanvan vraje āste īśvaraḥ gāyanti devāḥ yat aśeṣa-maṅgalam
tam tu adya nūnam mahatām gatim gurum trai-lokya kāntam dṛśi-mat mahā-utsavam rūpam dadhānam śriyaḥ īpsita āspadam drakṣye mama āsan uṣasaḥ su-darśanāḥ
atha avarūḍhaḥ sapadi īśayoḥ rathāt pradhāna-puṁsoḥ caraṇam sva-labdhaye dhiyā dhṛtam yogibhiḥ api aham dhruvam namasye ābhyām ca sakhīn vana-okasaḥ
api aṅghri mūle patitasya me vibhuḥ śirasi adhāsyat nija hasta paṅkajam datta abhayam kāla bhuja-aṅga raṁhasā prodvejitānām śaraṇa eṣiṇām nṛṇām
samarhaṇam yatra nidhāya kauśikaḥ tathā baliḥ ca āpa jagat traya indratām yat vā vihāre vraja-yoṣitām śramam sparśena saugandhika gandhi apānudat
na mayi upaiṣyati ari buddhim acyutaḥ kaṁsasya dūtaḥ prahitaḥ api viśva dṛk yaḥ antaḥ bahiḥ cetasaḥ etat īhitam kṣetra jñaḥ īkṣati amalena cakṣuṣā
api aṅghri mūle avahitam kṛta-añjalim mām īkṣitā sasmitam ārdrayā dṛśā sapadi apadhvasta samasta kilbiṣaḥ voḍhā mudam vīta viśaṅkaḥ ūrjitām
suhṛt-tamam jñātim ananya daivatam dorbhyām bṛhadbhyām parirapsyate atha mām ātmā hi tīrthī kriyate tadā eva me bandhaḥ ca karma-ātmakaḥ ucchvasiti ataḥ
labdhvā aṅga-saṅgam praṇatam kṛta-añjalim mām vakṣyate akrūra tata iti uruśravāḥ tadā vayam janma-bhṛtaḥ mahīyasā na eva ādṛtaḥ yaḥ dhik amuṣya janma tat
na tasya kaścit dayitaḥ suhṛttamaḥ na ca apriyaḥ dveṣyaḥ upekṣyaḥ eva vā tathā api bhaktān bhajate yathā tathā sura-drumaḥ yadvat upāśritaḥ artha daḥ
kim ca agra-jaḥ mā avanatam yadu-uttamaḥ smayan pariṣvajya gṛhītam añjalau gṛham praveṣya āpta samasta sat-kṛtam samprakṣyate kaṁsa kṛtam sva-bandhuṣu
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti sañcintayan kṛṣṇam śvaphalka-tanayaḥ adhvani rathena gokulam prāptaḥ sūryaḥ ca asta-girim nṛpa
padāni tasya akhila loka pāla kirīṭa juṣṭa amala pāda reṇoḥ dadarśa goṣṭhe kṣiti kautakāni vilakṣitāni abja yava aṅkuśa ādyaiḥ
tat darśana āhlāda vivṛddha sambhramaḥ premṇā ūrdhva roma aśru-kalā ākula īkṣaṇaḥ rathāt avaskandya saḥ teṣu aceṣṭata prabhoḥ amūni aṅghri rajāṁsi aho iti
deham-bhṛtām iyān arthaḥ hitvā dambham bhiyam śucam sandeśāt yaḥ hareḥ liṅga darśana śravaṇa ādibhiḥ
dadarśa kṛṣṇam rāmam ca vraje go dohanam gatau pīta-nīla ambara dharau śarat amburuha īkṣaṇau kiśorau śyāmala-śvetau śrī-niketau bṛhat bhujau su-mukhau sundara-varau bala dvirada vikramau dhvaja vajra aṅkuśa ambhojaiḥ cihnitaiḥ aṅghribhiḥ vrajam śobhayantau mahā-ātmānau sa-anukrośa smita īkṣaṇau udāra rucira krīḍau srak-vinau vana-mālinau puṇya gandha anulipta aṅgau snātau viraja vāsasau pradhāna puruṣau ādyau jagat-dhetū jagat-patī avatīrṇau jagati-arthe sva-aṁśena bala-keśavau diśaḥ vitimirāḥ rājan kurvāṇau prabhayā svayā yathā mārakataḥ śailaḥ raupyaḥ ca kanaka acitau
rathāt tūrṇam avaplutya saḥ akrūraḥ sneha vihvalaḥ papāta caraṇa-upānte daṇḍa-vat rāma-kṛṣṇayoḥ
bhagavat darśana āhlāda bāṣpa paryākula īkṣaṇaḥ pulaka ācita aṅgaḥ autkaṇṭhyāt sva-ākhyāne na aśakat nṛpa
bhagavān tam abhipretya ratha-aṅga aṅkita pāṇinā parirebhe abhyupākṛṣya prītaḥ praṇata vatsalaḥ
saṅkarṣaṇaḥ ca praṇatam upaguhya mahā-manāḥ gṛhītvā pāṇinā pāṇī anayat sa-anujaḥ gṛham pṛṣṭvā atha su-āgatam tasmai nivedya ca vara āsanam prakṣālya vidhi-vat pādau madhu-parka arhaṇam āharat
nivedya gām ca atithaye saṁvāhya śrāntam adṛtaḥ annam bahu-guṇam medhyam śraddhayā upāharat vibhuḥ
tasmai bhuktavate prītyā rāmaḥ parama dharma-vit mukha-vāsaiḥ gandha mālyaiḥ parām prītim vyadhāt punaḥ
papraccha sat-kṛtam nandaḥ katham stha niranugrahe kaṁse jīvati dāśārha sauna pālāḥ iva avayaḥ
yaḥ avadhīt sva svasuḥ tokān krośantyāḥ asu-tṛp khalaḥ kim nu svit tat prajānām vaḥ kuśalam vimṛśāmahe
ittham sū-nṛtayā vācā nandena su sabhājitaḥ akrūraḥ paripṛṣṭena jahau adhva pariśramam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca sukha upaviṣṭaḥ paryaṅke rāma-kṛṣṇa uru mānitaḥ lebhe manaḥ-rathān sarvān pathi yān saḥ cakāra ha
kim alabhyam bhagavati prasanne śrī niketane tathā api tat-parāḥ rājan na hi vāñchanti kiñcana
sāyantana aśanam kṛtvā bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ suhṛtsu vṛttam kaṁsasya papraccha anyat cikīrṣitam
śrī-bhagavān uvāca tāta saumya āgataḥ kaccit su-āgatam bhadram astu vaḥ api sva jñāti bandhūnām anamīvam anāmayam
kim nu naḥ kuśalam pṛcche edhamāne kula āmaye kaṁse mātula-nāmnā aṅga svānām naḥ tat prajāsu ca
aho asmat abhūt bhūri pitroḥ vṛjinam āryayoḥ yat-hetoḥ putra maraṇam yat-hetoḥ bandhanam tayoḥ
diṣṭyā adya darśanam svānām mahyam vaḥ saumya kāṅkṣitam sañjātam varṇyatām tāta tava āgamana kāraṇam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca pṛṣṭaḥ bhagavatā sarvam varṇayām āsa mādhavaḥ vaira-anubandham yaduṣu vasudeva vadha udyamam
yat sandeśaḥ yat artham vā dūtaḥ sampreṣitaḥ svayam yat uktam nāradena asya sva janma ānakadundubheḥ
śrutvā akrūra-vacaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ balaḥ ca para-vīra hā prahasya nandam pitaram rājñā diṣṭam vijajñatuḥ
gopān samādiśāt saḥ api gṛhyatām sarva go-rasaḥ upāyanāni gṛhṇīdhvam yujyantām śakaṭāni ca yāsyāmaḥ śvaḥ madhu-purīm dāsyāmaḥ nṛpateḥ rasān drakṣyāmaḥ su-mahat parva yānti jānapadāḥ kila evam āghoṣayat kṣatrā nanda-gopaḥ sva-gokule
gopyaḥ tāḥ tat upaśrutya babhūvuḥ vyathitāḥ bhṛśam rāma-kṛṣṇau purīm netum akrūram vrajam āgatam
kāścit tat kṛta hṛt tāpa śvāsa mlāna mukha śriyaḥ sraṁsat dukūla valaya keśa granthyaḥ ca kāścana
anyāḥ ca tat anudhyāna nivṛtta aśeṣa vṛttayaḥ na abhyajānan imam lokam ātma lokam gatāḥ iva
smarantyaḥ ca aparāḥ śaureḥ anurāga smita īritāḥ hṛdi spṛśaḥ citra padāḥ giraḥ sammumuhuḥ striyaḥ
gatim su-lalitām ceṣṭām snigdha hāsa avalokanam śoka apahāni narmāṇi proddāma caritāni ca cintayantyaḥ mukundasya bhītaḥ viraha kātarāḥ sametāḥ saṅghaśaḥ procuḥ aśru mukhyaḥ acyuta-āśayāḥ
śrī-gopyaḥ ūcuḥ aho vidhātaḥ tava na kvacit dayā saṁyojya maitryā praṇayena dehinaḥ tān ca akṛta arthān viyunaṅkṣi apārthakam vikrīḍitam te arbhaka ceṣṭitam yathā
yaḥ tvam pradarśya asita kuntala āvṛtam mukunda vaktram su-kapolam ut-nasam śoka apanoda smita leśa sundaram karoṣi pārokṣyam asādhu te kṛtam
krūraḥ tvam akrūra-samākhyayā sma naḥ cakṣuḥ hi dattam harase bata ajña vat yena eka deśe akhila sarga sauṣṭhavam tvadīyam adrākṣma vayam madhudviṣaḥ
na nanda-sūnuḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga sauhṛdaḥ samīkṣate naḥ sva kṛta āturāḥ bata vihāya gehān sva-janān sutān patīn tat dāsyam addhā upagatāḥ nava priyaḥ
sukham prabhātā rajanī iyam āśiṣaḥ satyāḥ babhūvuḥ pura yoṣitām dhruvam yāḥ saṁpraviṣṭasya mukham vrajaḥ-pateḥ pāsyanti apāṅga utkalita smita āsavam
tāsām mukundaḥ madhu mañju bhāṣitaiḥ gṛhīta cittaḥ paravān manasvī api katham punaḥ naḥ pratiyāsyate abalāḥ grāmyāḥ sa-lajja smita vibhramaiḥ bhraman
adya dhruvam tatra dṛśaḥ bhaviṣyate dāśārha-bhoja-andhaka-vṛṣṇi-sātvatām mahā-utsavaḥ śrī ramaṇam guṇa āspadam drakṣyanti ye ca adhvani devakī-sutam
mā etat-vidhasya akaruṇasya nāma bhūt akrūraḥ iti etat atīva dāruṇaḥ yaḥ asau anāśvāsya su-duḥkhitam janam priyāt priyam neṣyati pāram adhvanaḥ
anārdra-dhīḥ eṣaḥ samāsthitaḥ ratham tam anu amī ca tvarayanti durmadāḥ gopāḥ anobhiḥ sthaviraiḥ upekṣitam daivam ca naḥ adya pratikūlam īhate
nivārayāmaḥ samupetya mādhavam kim naḥ akariṣyan kula vṛddha bāndhavāḥ mukunda-saṅgāt nimiṣa ardha dustyajāt daivena vidhvaṁsita dīna cetasām
yasya anurāga lalita smita valgu mantra līlā avaloka parirambhaṇa rāsa goṣṭhām nītāḥ sma naḥ kṣaṇam iva kṣaṇadāḥ vinā tam gopyaḥ katham nu atitarema tamaḥ durantam
yaḥ ahnaḥ kṣaye vrajam ananta sakhaḥ parītaḥ gopaiḥ viśan khura rajaḥ churita alaka srak veṇum kvaṇan smita kaṭa-akṣa nirīkṣaṇena cittam kṣiṇoti amum ṛte nu katham bhavema
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam bruvāṇāḥ viraha āturāḥ bhṛśam vraja-striyaḥ kṛṣṇa viṣakta mānasāḥ visṛjya lajjām ruruduḥ sma su-svaram govinda dāmodara mādhava iti
strīṇām evam rudantīnām udite savitari atha akrūraḥ codayām āsa kṛta maitra-ādikaḥ ratham
gopāḥ tam anvasajjanta nanda-ādyāḥ śakaṭaiḥ tataḥ ādāya upāyanam bhūri kumbhān go-rasa sambhṛtān
gopyaḥ ca dayitam kṛṣṇam anuvrajya anurañjitāḥ pratyādeśam bhagavataḥ kāṅkṣantyaḥ ca avatasthire
tāḥ tathā tapyatīḥ vīkṣya sva-prasthāne yadu-uttamaḥ sāntvayām āsa sa-premaiḥ āyāsye iti dautyakaiḥ
yāvat ālakṣyate ketuḥ yāvat reṇuḥ rathasya ca anuprasthāpita ātmānaḥ lekhyāni iva upalakṣitāḥ
tāḥ nirāśāḥ nivavṛtuḥ govinda-vinivartane viśokāḥ ahanī ninyuḥ gāyantyaḥ priya ceṣṭitam
bhagavān api samprāptaḥ rāma-akrūra-yutaḥ nṛpa rathena vāyu vegena kālindīm agha nāśinīm
tatra upaspṛśya pānīyam pītvā mṛṣṭam maṇi prabham vṛkṣa ṣaṇḍam upavrajya sa-rāmaḥ ratham āviśat
akrūraḥ tau upāmantrya niveśya ca ratha-upari kālindyāḥ hradam āgatya snānam vidhi-vat ācarat
nimajjya tasmin salile japan brahma sanātanam tau eva dadṛśe akrūraḥ rāma-kṛṣṇau samanvitau
tau ratha-sthau katham iha sutau ānakadundubheḥ tarhi svit syandane na staḥ iti unmajjya vyacaṣṭa saḥ tatra api ca yathā pūrvam āsīnau punaḥ eva saḥ nyamajjat darśanam yat me mṛṣā kim salile tayoḥ
bhūyaḥ tatra api saḥ adrākṣīt stūyamānam ahi-īśvaram siddha-cāraṇa-gandharvaiḥ asuraiḥ nata kandharaiḥ sahasra śirasam devam sahasra phaṇa maulinam nīla ambaram visa śvetam śṛṅgaiḥ śvetam iva sthitam
tasya utsaṅge ghana śyāmam pīta kauśeya vāsasam puruṣam catuḥ-bhujam śāntam padma patra aruṇa īkṣaṇam cāru prasanna vadanam cāru hāsa nirīkṣaṇam su bhrū ut nasam cāru karṇam su kapola aruṇa adharam pralamba pīvara bhujam tuṅga aṁsa uraḥ-sthala śriyam kambu kaṇṭham nimna nābhim vali mat pallava udaram
bṛhat kaṭi-taṭa śroṇi karabha ūru dvaya anvitam cāru jānu-yugam cāru jaṅghā yugala saṁyutam tuṅga gulpha aruṇa nakha-vrāta dīdhitibhiḥ vṛtam nava aṅguli-aṅguṣṭha dalaiḥ vilasat pāda-paṅkajam
su-mahā arha maṇi-vrāta kirīṭa kaṭaka aṅgadaiḥ kaṭi-sūtra brahma-sūtra hāra nūpura kuṇḍalaiḥ bhrājamānam padma karam śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam śrīvatsa vakṣasam bhrājat kaustubham vana-mālinam
sunanda-nanda-pramukhaiḥ parṣadaiḥ sanaka-ādibhiḥ sura-īśaiḥ brahma-rudra-ādyaiḥ navabhiḥ ca dvija-uttamaiḥ prahrāda-nārada-vasu-pramukhaiḥ bhāgavata-uttamaiḥ stūyamānam pṛthak-bhāvaiḥ vacobhiḥ amala-ātmabhiḥ śrīyā puṣṭyā gīrā kāntyā kīrtyā tuṣṭyā ilayā ūrjayā vidyayā avidyayā śaktyā māyayā ca niṣevitam
vilokya su-bhṛśam prītaḥ bhaktyā paramayā yutaḥ hṛṣyat tanū-ruhaḥ bhāva pariklinna ātma locanaḥ girā gadgadayā astauṣīt sattvam ālambya sātvataḥ praṇamya mūrdhnā avahitaḥ kṛta-añjali-puṭaḥ śanaiḥ
śrī-akrūraḥ uvāca nataḥ asmi aham tvā akhila hetu hetum nārāyaṇam pūruṣam ādyam avyayam yat nābhi jātāt aravinda koṣāt brahmā avirāsīt yataḥ eṣaḥ lokaḥ
bhūḥ toyam agniḥ pavanam kham ādiḥ mahān ajā ādiḥ manaḥ indriyāṇi sarva-indriya arthāḥ vibudhāḥ ca sarve ye hetavaḥ te jagataḥ aṅga bhūtāḥ
na ete svarūpam viduḥ ātmanaḥ te hi ajā-ādayaḥ anātmatayā gṛhītāḥ ajaḥ anubaddhaḥ saḥ guṇaiḥ ajāyāḥ guṇāt param veda na te svarūpam
tvam yoginaḥ yajanti addhā mahā-puruṣam īśvaram sa-adhyātmam sa-adhibhutam ca sa-adhidaivam ca sādhavaḥ
trayyā ca vidyayā kecit tvām vai vaitānikāḥ dvijāḥ yajante vitataiḥ yajñaiḥ nānā rūpa amara ākhyayā
eke tvā akhila karmāṇi sannyasya upaśamam gatāḥ jñāninaḥ jñāna-yajñena yajanti jñāna-vigraham
anye ca saṁskṛta ātmānaḥ vidhinā abhihitena te yajanti tvat-mayāḥ tvām vai bahu-mūrti eka-mūrtikam
tvām eva anye śiva uktena mārgeṇa śiva-rūpiṇam bahu-ācārya vibhedena bhagavantam upāsate
sarve eva yajanti tvam sarva-deva maya īśvaram ye api anya devatā bhaktāḥ yadi api anya dhiyaḥ prabho
yathā adri prabhavāḥ nadyaḥ parjanya āpūritāḥ prabho viśanti sarvataḥ sindhum tadvat tvām gatayaḥ antataḥ
sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti bhavataḥ prakṛteḥ guṇāḥ teṣu hi prākṛtāḥ protāḥ ā-brahma sthāvara-ādayaḥ
tubhyam namaḥ te tu aviṣakta dṛṣṭaye sarva-ātmane sarva dhiyām ca sākṣiṇe guṇa pravāhaḥ ayam avidyayā kṛtaḥ pravartate deva nṛ tiryak ātmasu
agniḥ mukham te avaniḥ aṅghriḥ ikṣaṇam sūryaḥ nabhaḥ nābhiḥ atha u diśaḥ śrutiḥ dyauḥ kam sura-indrāḥ tava bāhavaḥ arṇavāḥ kukṣiḥ marut prāṇa balam prakalpitam romāṇi vṛkṣa oṣadhayaḥ śiraḥ-ruhāḥ meghāḥ parasya asthi nakhāni te adrayaḥ nimeṣaṇam rātri-ahanī prajāpatiḥ meḍhraḥ tu vṛṣṭiḥ tava vīryam iṣyate
tvayi avyaya-ātman puruṣe prakalpitāḥ lokāḥ sa-pālāḥ bahu jīva saṅkulāḥ yathā jale sañjihate jala-okasaḥ api udumbare vā maśakāḥ manaḥ maye
yāni yāni iha rūpāṇi krīḍana artham bibharṣi hi taiḥ āmṛṣṭa śucaḥ lokāḥ mudā gāyanti te yaśaḥ
namaḥ kāraṇa matsyāya pralaya abdhi carāya ca haya-śīrṣṇe namaḥ tubhyam madhu-kaiṭabha mṛtyave akūpārāya bṛhate namaḥ mandara dhāriṇe kṣiti uddhāra vihārāya namaḥ śūkara mūrtaye
namaḥ te adbhuta siṁhāya sadhu-loka bhaya apaha vāmanāya namaḥ tubhyam krānta tri-bhuvanāya ca
namaḥ bhṛgūṇām pataye dṛpta kṣatra vana chide namaḥ te raghu-varyāya rāvaṇa anta-karāya ca
namaḥ te vāsudevāya namaḥ saṅkarṣaṇāya ca pradyumnāya aniruddhāya sātvatām pataye namaḥ
namaḥ buddhāya śuddhāya daitya-dānava mohine mleccha prāya kṣatra hantre namaḥ te kalki-rūpiṇe
bhagavan jīva lokaḥ ayam mohitaḥ tava māyayā aham mama iti asat grāhaḥ bhrāmyate karma vartmasu
aham ca ātma ātma-ja agāra dāra artha sva-jana ādiṣu bhramāmi svapna kalpeṣu mūḍhaḥ satya dhiyā vibho
anitya anātma duḥkheṣu viparyaya matiḥ hi aham dvandva ārāmaḥ tamaḥ viṣṭaḥ na jāne tvā ātmanaḥ priyam
yathā abudhaḥ jalam hitvā praticchannam tat-udbhavaiḥ abhyeti mṛga-tṛṣṇām vai tadvat tvā aham parāk-mukhaḥ
na utsahe aham kṛpaṇa dhīḥ kāma karma hatam manaḥ roddhum pramāthibhiḥ ca akṣaiḥ hriyamāṇam itaḥ tataḥ
saḥ aham tava aṅghri upagataḥ asmi asatām durāpam tat ca api aham bhavat anugrahaḥ īśa manye puṁsaḥ bhavet yarhi saṁsaraṇa apavargaḥ tvayi abja nābha sat upāsanayā matiḥ syāt
namaḥ vijñāna mātrāya sarva pratyaya hetave puruṣa īśa pradhānāya brahmaṇe ananta śaktaye
namaḥ te vāsudevāya sarva bhūta kṣayāya ca hṛṣīka-īśa namaḥ tubhyam prapannam pāhi mām prabho
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca stuvataḥ tasya bhagavān darśayitvā jale vapuḥ bhūyaḥ samāharat kṛṣṇaḥ naṭaḥ nāṭyam iva ātmanaḥ
saḥ api ca antarhitam vīkṣya jalāt unmajya satvaraḥ kṛtvā ca āvaśyakam sarvam vismitaḥ ratham āgamat
tam apṛcchat hṛṣīkśaḥ kim te dṛṣṭam iva adbhutam bhūmau viyati toye va tathā tvām lakṣayāmahe
śrī-akrūraḥ uvāca adbhutāni iha yāvanti bhūmau viyati vā jale tvayi viśva-ātmake tāni kim me adṛṣṭam vipaśyataḥ
yatra adbhutāni sarvāṇi bhūmau viyati vā jale tam tvā anupaśyataḥ brahman kim me dṛṣṭam iha adbhutam
iti uktvā codayām āsa syandanam gāndinī-sutaḥ mathurām anayat rāmam kṛṣṇam ca eva dina atyaye
mārge grāma janāḥ rājan tatra tatra upasaṅgatāḥ vasudeva-sutau vīkṣya prītāḥ dṛṣṭim na ca ādaduḥ
tāvat vraja-okasaḥ tatra nanda-gopa-ādayaḥ agrataḥ pura upavanam āsādya pratīkṣantaḥ avatasthire
tān sametya āha bhagavān akrūram jagat-īśvaraḥ gṛhītvā pāṇinā pāṇim praśritam prahasan iva
bhavān praviśatām agre saha yānaḥ purīm gṛham vayam tu iha avamucya atha tataḥ drakṣyāmahe purīm
śrī-akrūraḥ uvāca na aham bhavadbhyām rahitaḥ pravekṣye mathurām prabho tyaktum na arhasi mām nātha bhaktam te bhakta-vatsala
āgaccha yāma gehān naḥ sa nāthān kuru adhokṣaja saha agra-jaḥ sa-gopālaiḥ suhṛdbhiḥ ca suhṛt-tama
punīhi pāda rajasā gṛhān naḥ gṛha-medhinām yat śaucena anutṛpyanti pitaraḥ sa agnayaḥ surāḥ
avanijya aṅghri-yugalam āsīt ślokyaḥ baliḥ mahān aiśvaryam atulam lebhe gatīm ca ekāntinām tu yā
āpaḥ te aṅghri avanejanyaḥ trīn lokān śucayaḥ apunan śirasā ādhatta yāḥ śarvaḥ svaḥ yātāḥ sagara-ātmajāḥ
deva-deva jagat-nātha puṇya śravaṇa kīrtana yadu-uttama uttamaḥ-śloka nārāyaṇa namaḥ astu te
śrī-bhagavān uvāca āyāsye bhavataḥ geham aham ārya samanvitaḥ yadu-cakra druham hatvā vitariṣye suhṛt priyam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam uktaḥ bhagavatā saḥ akrūraḥ vimanāḥ iva purīm praviṣṭaḥ kaṁsāya karma āvedya gṛham yayau
atha apara-ahne bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ saṅkarṣaṇa-anvitaḥ mathurām prāviśat gopaiḥ didṛkṣuḥ parivāritaḥ
dadarśa tam sphāṭika tuṅga gopura dvārām bṛhat hema kapāṭa toraṇām tāmra āra koṣṭhām parikhā durāsadām udyāna ramya upavana upaśobhitam sauvarṇa śṛṅgāṭaka harmya niṣkuṭaiḥ śreṇī sabhābhiḥ bhavanaiḥ upaskṛtām vaidūrya vajra amala nīla vidrumaiḥ muktā haridbhiḥ valabhīṣu vediṣu juṣṭeṣu jāla-āmukha randhra kuṭṭimeṣu āviṣṭa pārāvata barhi nāditām saṁsikta rathyā āpaṇa mārga catvarām prakīrṇa mālya aṅkura lāja taṇḍulām āpūrṇa kumbhaiḥ dadhi candana ukṣitaiḥ prasūna dīpa-āvalibhiḥ sa-pallavaiḥ sa-vṛnda rambhā kramukaiḥ sa-ketubhiḥ su-alaṅkṛta dvāra gṛhām sa-paṭṭikaiḥ
tām sampraviṣṭau vasudeva nandanau vṛtau vayasyaiḥ nara-deva vartmanā draṣṭum samīyuḥ tvaritāḥ pura striyaḥ harmyāṇi ca eva āruruhuḥ nṛpa utsukāḥ
kaścit viparyak dhṛta vastra bhūṣaṇaḥ vismṛtya ca ekam yugaleṣu atha aparāḥ kṛta eka patra śravaṇa eka nūpurāḥ na aṅktvā dvitīyam tu aparāḥ ca locanam
aśnantyaḥ ekaḥ tat apāsya sa-utsavaḥ abhyajyamānāḥ akṛta upamajjanāḥ svapantyaḥ utthāya niśamya niḥsvanam prapāyayantyaḥ arbham apohya mātaraḥ
manāṁsi tāsām aravinda locanaḥ pragalbha līlā hasita avalokaiḥ jahāra matta dvirada-indra vikramaḥ dṛśām dadat śrī ramaṇa ātmanā utsavam
dṛṣṭvā muhuḥ śrutam anudruta cetasaḥ tam tat prekṣaṇa ut-smita sudhā ukṣaṇa labdha mānāḥ ānanda mūrtim upaguhya dṛśā ātma labdham hṛṣyat tvacaḥ jahuḥ anantam arim-dama ādhim
prāsāda śikhara ārūḍhāḥ prīti utphulla mukha ambujāḥ abhyavarṣan saumanasyaiḥ pramadāḥ bala-keśavau
dadhi akṣataiḥ sa uda-pātraiḥ srak gandhaiḥ abhyupāyanaiḥ tau ānarcuḥ pramuditāḥ tatra tatra dvi-jātayaḥ
ūcuḥ paurāḥ aho gopyaḥ tapaḥ kim acaran mahat yāḥ hi etau anupaśyanti nara-loka mahā-utsavau
rajakam kañcit āyāntam raṅga-kāram gada-agrajaḥ dṛṣṭvā ayācata vāsāṁsi dhautāni ati-uttamāni ca
dehi āvayoḥ samucitāni aṅga vāsāṁsi ca arhatoḥ bhaviṣyati param śreyaḥ dātuḥ te na atra saṁśayaḥ
saḥ yācitaḥ bhagavatā paripūrṇena sarvataḥ sa-ākṣepam ruṣitaḥ prāha bhṛtyaḥ rājñaḥ su durmadaḥ
īdṛśāni eva vāsāṁsi nityam giri vane carāḥ paridhatta kim udvṛttāḥ rāja dravyāṇi abhīpsatha
yāta āśu bāliśaḥ mā evam prārthyam yadi jijīviṣā badhnanti ghnanti lumpanti dṛptam rāja-kulāni vai
evam vikatthamānasya kupitaḥ devakī-sutaḥ rajakasya kara agreṇa śiraḥ kāyāt apātayat
tasya anujīvinaḥ sarve vāsaḥ kośān visṛjya vai dadruvuḥ sarvataḥ mārgam vāsāṁsi jagṛhe acyutaḥ
vasitvā ātma-priye vastre kṛṣṇaḥ saṅkarṣaṇaḥ tathā śeṣāṇi ādatta gopebhyaḥ visṛjya bhuvi kānicit
tataḥ tu vāyakaḥ prītaḥ tayoḥ veṣam akalpayat vicitra varṇaiḥ caileyaiḥ ākalpaiḥ anurūpataḥ
nānā lakṣaṇa veṣābhyām kṛṣṇa-rāmau virejatuḥ su-alaṅkṛtau bāla gajau parvaṇi iva sita itarau
tasya prasannaḥ bhagavān prādāt sārūpyam ātmanaḥ śriyam ca paramām loke bala aiśvarya smṛti indriyam
tataḥ sudāmnaḥ bhavanam mālā-kārasya jagmatuḥ tau dṛṣṭvā saḥ samutthāya nanāma śirasā bhuvi
tayoḥ āsanam ānīya pādyam ca arghya arhaṇa ādibhiḥ pūjām sa-anugayoḥ cakre srak tāmbūla anulepanaiḥ
prāha naḥ sa-arthakam janma pāvitam ca kulam prabho pitṛ deva ṛṣayaḥ mahyam tuṣṭāḥ hi āgamanena vām
bhavantau kila viśvasya jagataḥ kāraṇam param avatīrṇau iha aṁśena kṣemāya ca bhavāya ca
na hi vām viṣamā dṛṣṭiḥ suhṛdoḥ jagat ātmanoḥ samayoḥ sarva bhūteṣu bhajantam bhajatoḥ api
tau ājñāpayatam bhṛtyam kim aham karavāṇi vām puṁsaḥ ati anugrahaḥ hi eṣaḥ bhavadbhiḥ yat niyujyate
iti abhipretya rāja-indra sudāmā prīta-mānasaḥ śastaiḥ su-gandhaiḥ kusumaiḥ malaḥ viracitāḥ dadau
tābhiḥ su-alaṅkṛtau prītau kṛṣṇa-rāmau saha anugau praṇatāya prapannāya dadatuḥ varadau varān
saḥ api vavre acalām bhaktim tasmin eva akhila ātmani tat bhakteṣu ca sauhārdam bhūteṣu ca dayām parām
iti tasmai varam dattvā śriyam ca anvaya vardhinīm balam āyuḥ yaśaḥ kāntim nirjagāma saha agra-jaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca atha vrajan rāja-pathena mādhavaḥ striyam gṛhīta aṅga vilepa bhājanām vilokya kubjām yuvatīm vara-ānanām papraccha yāntīm prahasan rasa pradaḥ
kā tvam vara-ūru etat u ha anulepanam kasya aṅgane vā kathayasva sādhu naḥ dehi āvayoḥ aṅga-vilepam uttamam śreyaḥ tataḥ te na cirāt bhaviṣyati
sairandhrī uvāca dāsī asmi aham sundara kaṁsa sammatā trivakra-nāmā hi anulepa karmaṇi mat bhāvitam bhoja-pateḥ ati-priyam vinā yuvām kaḥ anyatamaḥ tat arhati
rūpa peśala mādhurya hasita ālāpa vīkṣitaiḥ dharṣita ātmā dadau sāndram ubhayoḥ anulepanam
tataḥ tau aṅga rāgeṇa sva varṇa itara śobhinā samprāpta para bhagena śuśubhāte anurañjitau
prasannaḥ bhagavān kubjām trivakrā rucira ānanām ṛjvīm kartum manaḥ cakre darśayan darśane phalam
padbhyām ākramya prapade dvi aṅguli uttāna pāṇinā pragṛhya cibuke adhyātmam udanīnamat acyutaḥ
sā tadā ṛju samāna aṅgī bṛhat śroṇi payaḥ-dharā mukunda-sparśanāt sadyaḥ babhūva pramadā uttamā
tataḥ rūpa guṇa audārya sampannā prāha keśavam uttarīya antam ākṛṣya smayantī jāta hṛt-śayā
ehi vīra gṛham yāmaḥ na tvām tyaktum iha utsahe tvayā unmathita cittāyāḥ prasīda puruṣa-ṛṣabha
evam striyā yācya nānaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ rāmasya paśyataḥ mukham vīkṣya anu gopānām prahasan tām uvāca ha
eṣyāmi te gṛham su-bhru puṁsām ādhi vikarśanam sādhita arthaḥ agṛhāṇām naḥ pānthānām tvam para ayanam
visṛjya mādhvyā vāṇyā tām vrajan mārge vaṇik-pathaiḥ nānā upāyana tāmbūla srak gandhaiḥ sa agra-jaḥ arcitaḥ
tat darśana smara kṣobhāt ātmānam na avidan striyaḥ visrasta vāsaḥ kavara valayāḥ lekhya mūrtayaḥ
tataḥ paurān pṛcchamānaḥ dhanuṣaḥ sthānam acyutaḥ tasmin praviṣṭaḥ dadṛśe dhanuḥ aindram iva adbhutam
puruṣaiḥ bahubhiḥ guptam arcitam parama ṛddhi mat vāryamāṇaḥ nṛbhiḥ kṛṣṇaḥ prasahya dhanuḥ ādade
kareṇa vāmena sa-līlam uddhṛtam sajyam ca kṛtvā nimiṣeṇa paśyatām nṛṇām vikṛṣya prababhañja madhyataḥ yathā ikṣu daṇḍam mada-karī urukramaḥ
dhanuṣaḥ bhajyamānasya śabdaḥ kham rodasī diśaḥ pūrayām āsa yam śrutvā kaṁsaḥ trāsam upāgamat
tat rakṣiṇaḥ sa anucaram kupitāḥ ātatāyinaḥ gṛhītu kāmāḥ āvavruḥ gṛhyatām vadhyatām iti
atha tān durabhiprāyān vilokya bala-keśavau kruddhau dhanvanaḥ ādāya śakale tān ca jaghnatuḥ
balam ca kaṁsa-prahitam hatvā śālā mukhāt tataḥ niṣkramya ceratuḥ hṛṣṭau nirīkṣya pura sampadaḥ
tayoḥ tat adbhutam vīryam niśāmya pura-vāsinaḥ tejaḥ prāgalbhyam rūpam ca menire vibudha uttamau
tayoḥ vicaratoḥ svairam ādityaḥ astam upeyivān kṛṣṇa-rāmau vṛtau gopaiḥ purāt śakaṭam īyatuḥ
gopyaḥ mukunda-vigame viraha āturāḥ yāḥ āśāsata āśiṣaḥ ṛtāḥ madhu-puri abhūvan sampaśyatām puruṣa bhūṣaṇa gātra lakṣmīm hitvā itarān nu bhajataḥ cakame ayanam śrīḥ
avanikta aṅghri-yugalau bhuktvā kṣīra-upasecanam ūṣatuḥ tām sukham rātrim jñātvā kaṁsa-cikīrṣitam
kaṁsaḥ tu dhanuṣaḥ bhaṅgam rakṣiṇām sva balasya ca vadham niśamya govinda-rāma vikrīḍitam param dīrgha prajāgaraḥ bhītaḥ durnimittāni durmatiḥ bahūni acaṣṭa ubhayathā mṛtyoḥ dautya-karāṇi ca
adarśanam sva śirasaḥ pratirūpe ca sati api asati api dvitīye ca dvai-rūpyam jyotiṣām tathā chidra pratītiḥ chāyāyām prāṇa ghoṣa anupaśrutiḥ svarṇa pratītiḥ vṛkṣeṣu sva padānām adarśanam svapne preta pariṣvaṅgaḥ khara yānam viṣa adanam yāyāt nalada mālī ekaḥ taila abhyaktaḥ dik-ambaraḥ anyāni ca ittham-bhūtāni svapna jāgaritāni ca paśyan maraṇa santrastaḥ nidrām lebhe na cintayā
vyuṣṭāyām niśi kauravya sūrye ca adbhyaḥ samutthite kārayām āsa vai kaṁsaḥ malla krīḍā mahā-utsavam
ānarcuḥ puruṣāḥ raṅgam tūrya bheryaḥ ca jaghnire mañcāḥ ca alaṅkṛtāḥ sragbhiḥ patākā caila toraṇaiḥ
teṣu paurāḥ jānapadāḥ brahma kṣatra puraḥ-gamāḥ yathā-upajoṣam viviśuḥ rājānaḥ ca kṛta asanāḥ
kaṁsaḥ parivṛtaḥ amātyaiḥ rāja-mañce upāviśati maṇḍala-īśvara madhya sthaḥ hṛdayena vidūyatā
vādyamāneṣu tūryeṣu malla tāla uttareṣu ca mallāḥ su-alaṅkṛtāḥ dṛptāḥ sa-upādhyāyāḥ samāsata
cāṇūraḥ muṣṭikaḥ kūṭaḥ śalaḥ tośalaḥ eva ca te āseduḥ upasthānam valgu vādya praharṣitāḥ
nanda-gopa-ādayaḥ gopāḥ bhoja-rāja samāhutāḥ nivedita upāyanāḥ te ekasmin mañce āviśan
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca atha kṛṣṇaḥ ca rāmaḥ ca kṛta śaucau param-tapa malla dundubhi nirghoṣam śrutvā draṣṭum upeyataḥ
raṅga dvāram samāsādya tasmin nāgam avasthitam apaśyat kuvalayāpīḍam kṛṣṇaḥ ambaṣṭha pracoditam
baddhvā parikaram śauriḥ samuhya kuṭila alakān uvāca hasti-pam vācā megha nāda gabhīrayā
ambaṣṭha ambaṣṭha mārgam nau dehi apakrama ma ciram na u cet sa-kuñjaram tva adya nayāmi yama sādanam
evam nirbhartsitaḥ ambaṣṭhaḥ kupitaḥ kopitam gajam codayām āsa kṛṣṇāya kāla antaka yama upamam
kari indraḥ tam abhidrutya kareṇa tarasā agrahīt karāt vigalitaḥ saḥ amum nihatya aṅghriṣu alīyata
saṅkruddhaḥ tam acakṣāṇaḥ ghrāṇa dṛṣṭiḥ saḥ keśavam parāmṛśat puṣkareṇa saḥ prasahya vinirgataḥ
pucche pragṛhya ati-balam dhanuṣaḥ pañca-viṁśatim vicakarṣa yathā nāgam suparṇaḥ iva līlayā
saḥ paryāvartamānena savya-dakṣiṇataḥ acyutaḥ babhrāma bhrāmyamāṇena go-vatsena iva bālakaḥ
tataḥ abhimukham abhyetya pāṇinā āhatya vāraṇam prādravan pātayām āsa spṛśyamānaḥ pade pade
saḥ dhāvan krīḍayā bhūmau patitvā sahasā utthitaḥ tam matvā patitam kruddhaḥ dantābhyām saḥ ahanat kṣitim
sva vikrame pratihate kuñjara-indraḥ ati amarṣitaḥ codyamānaḥ mahāmātraiḥ kṛṣṇam abhyadravat ruṣā
tam āpatantam āsādya bhagavān madhu-sūdanaḥ nigṛhya pāṇinā hastam pātayām āsa bhū-tale
patitasya padā ākramya mṛgendraḥ iva līlayā dantam utpāṭya tena ibham hasti-pān ca ahanat hariḥ
mṛtakam dvipam utsṛjya danta pāṇiḥ samāviśat aṁsa nyasta viṣāṇaḥ asṛk mada bindubhiḥ aṅkitaḥ virūḍha sveda kaṇikā vadana ambu-ruhaḥ babhau
vṛtau gopaiḥ katipayaiḥ baladeva-janārdanau raṅgam viviśatuḥ rājan gaja-danta vara āyudhau
mallānām aśaniḥ nṛṇām nara-varaḥ strīṇām smaraḥ mūrti-mān gopānām sva-janaḥ asatām kṣiti-bhujām śāstā sva-pitroḥ śiśuḥ mṛtyuḥ bhoja-pateḥ virāṭ aviduṣām tattvam param yoginām vṛṣṇīnām para-devatā iti viditaḥ raṅgam gataḥ sa agra-jaḥ
hatam kuvalayāpīḍam dṛṣṭvā tau api durjayau kaṁsaḥ manasi api tadā bhṛśam udvivije nṛpa
tau rejatuḥ raṅga-gatau mahā-bhujau vicitra veṣa ābharaṇa srak ambarau yathā naṭau uttama veṣa dhāriṇau manaḥ kṣipantau prabhayā nirīkṣatām
nirīkṣya tau uttama-pūruṣau janāḥ mañca sthitāḥ nāgara rāṣṭrakāḥ nṛpa praharṣa vega utkalita īkṣaṇa ānanāḥ papuḥ na tṛptāḥ nayanaiḥ tat ānanam
pibantaḥ iva cakṣurbhyām lihantaḥ iva jihvayā jighrantaḥ iva nāsābhyām sliṣyantaḥ iva bāhubhiḥ ūcuḥ parasparam te vai yathā dṛṣṭam yathā śrutam tat rūpa guṇa mādhurya prāgalbhya smāritāḥ iva
etau bhagavataḥ sākṣāt hareḥ nārāyaṇasya hi avatīrṇau iha aṁśena vasudevasya veśmani
eṣaḥ vai kila devakyām jātaḥ nītaḥ ca gokulam kālam etam vasan gūḍhaḥ vavṛdhe nanda-veśmani
pūtanā anena nītā antam cakravātaḥ ca dānavaḥ arjunau guhyakaḥ keśī dhenukaḥ anye ca tat-vidhāḥ
gāvaḥ sa pālāḥ etena dāva-agneḥ parimocitāḥ kāliyaḥ damitaḥ sarpaḥ indraḥ ca vimadaḥ kṛtaḥ sapta-aham eka-hastena dhṛtaḥ adri pravaraḥ amunā varṣa vāta aśanibhyaḥ ca paritrātam ca gokulam
gopyaḥ asya nitya mudita hasita prekṣaṇam mukham paśyantyaḥ vividhān tāpān taranti sma aśramam mudā
vadanti anena vaṁśaḥ ayam yadoḥ su-bahu viśrutaḥ śriyam yaśaḥ mahatvam ca lapsyate parirakṣitaḥ
ayam ca asya agra-jaḥ śrī-man rāmaḥ kamala-locanaḥ pralambaḥ nihataḥ yena vatsakaḥ ye baka ādayaḥ
janeṣu evam bruvāṇeṣu tūryeṣu ninadatsu ca kṛṣṇa-rāmau samābhāṣya cānūraḥ vākyam abravīt
he nanda-sūno he rāma bhavantau vīra sammatau niyuddha kuśalau śrutvā rājñā āhūtau didṛkṣuṇā
priyam rājñaḥ prakurvatyaḥ śreyaḥ vindanti vai prajāḥ manasā karmaṇā vācā viparītam ataḥ anyathā
nityam pramuditāḥ gopāḥ vatsapālāḥ yathā-sphuṭam vaneṣu malla-yuddhena krīḍantaḥ cārayanti gāḥ
tasmāt rājñaḥ priyam yūyam vayam ca karavāma he bhūtāni naḥ prasīdanti sarva-bhūta mayaḥ nṛpaḥ
tat niśamya abravīt kṛṣṇaḥ deśa kāla ucitam vacaḥ niyuddham ātmanaḥ abhīṣṭam manyamānaḥ abhinandya ca
prajāḥ bhoja-pateḥ asya vayam ca api vane-carāḥ karavāma priyam nityam tat naḥ param anugrahaḥ
bālāḥ vayam tulya balaiḥ krīḍiṣyāmaḥ yathā ucitam bhavet niyuddham mā adharmaḥ spṛśet malla-sabhā sadaḥ
cāṇūraḥ uvāca na bālaḥ na kiśoraḥ tvam balaḥ ca balinām varaḥ līlayā ibhaḥ hataḥ yena sahasra dvipa sattva bhṛt
tasmāt bhavadbhyām balibhiḥ yoddhavyam na anayaḥ atra vai mayi vikrama vārṣṇeya balena saha muṣṭikaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam carcita saṅkalpaḥ bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ āsasāda atha cāṇūram muṣṭikam rohiṇī-sutaḥ
hastābhyām hastayoḥ baddhvā padbhyām eva ca pādayoḥ vicakarṣatuḥ anyonyam prasahya vijigīṣayā
aratnī dve aratnibhyām jānubhyām ca eva jānunī śiraḥ śīrṣṇā urasā uraḥ tau anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥ
paribhrāmaṇa vikṣepa parirambha avapātanaiḥ utsarpaṇa apasarpaṇaiḥ ca anyonyam pratyarundhatām
utthāpanaiḥ unnayanaiḥ cālanaiḥ sthāpanaiḥ api parasparam jigīṣantau apacakratuḥ ātmanaḥ
tat bala-abala vat yuddham sametāḥ sarva yoṣitaḥ ūcuḥ parasparam rājan sa-anukampāḥ varūthaśaḥ
mahān ayam bata adharmaḥ eṣām rāja-sabhā sadām ye bala-abala-vat yuddham rājñaḥ anvicchanti paśyataḥ
kva vajra sāra sarva aṅgau mallau śaila indra sannibhau kva ca ati su-kumāra aṅgau kiśorau na āpta yauvanau
dharma vyatikramaḥ hi asya samājasya dhruvam bhavet yatra adharmaḥ samuttiṣṭhet na stheyam tatra karhicit
na sabhām praviśet prājñaḥ sabhya doṣān anusmaran abruvan vibruvan ajñaḥ naraḥ kilbiṣam aśnute
valgataḥ śatrum abhitaḥ kṛṣṇasya vadana ambujam vīkṣyatām śrama vāri uptam padma kośam iva ambubhiḥ
kim na paśyata rāmasya mukham ātāmra locanam muṣṭikam prati sa-amarṣam hāsa saṁrambha śobhitam
puṇyāḥ bata vraja-bhuvaḥ yat ayam nṛ liṅga gūḍhaḥ purāṇa-puruṣaḥ vana citra mālyaḥ gāḥ pālayan saha balaḥ kvaṇayan ca veṇum vikrīḍayā añcati giritra ramā arcita aṅghriḥ
gopyaḥ tapaḥ kim acaran yat amuṣya rūpam lāvaṇya-sāram asama-ūrdhvam ananya-siddham dṛgbhiḥ pibanti anusava-abhinavam durāpam ekānta-dhāma yaśasaḥ śriyaḥ aiśvarasya
yaḥ dohane avahanane mathana upalepa preṅkha iṅkhana arbha-rudita ukṣaṇa mārjana ādau gāyanti ca enam anurakta dhiyaḥ aśru kaṇṭhyaḥ dhanyāḥ vraja-striyaḥ urukrama citta yānāḥ
prātaḥ vrajāt vrajataḥ āviśataḥ ca sāyam gobhiḥ samam kvaṇayataḥ asya niśamya veṇum nirgamya tūrṇam abalāḥ pathi bhūri puṇyāḥ paśyanti sa smita mukham sa-daya avalokam
evam prabhāṣamāṇāsu strīṣu yoga-īśvaraḥ hariḥ śatrum hantum manaḥ cakre bhagavān bharata-ṛṣabha
sa-bhayāḥ strī giraḥ śrutvā putra sneha śuca āturau pitarau anvatapyetām putrayoḥ abudhau balam
taiḥ taiḥ niyuddha vidhibhiḥ vividhaiḥ acyuta-itarau yuyudhāte yathā anyonyam tathā eva bala-muṣṭikau
bhagavat gātra niṣpātaiḥ vajra niṣpeṣa niṣṭhuraiḥ cāṇūraḥ bhajyamāna aṅgaḥ muhuḥ glānim avāpa ha
saḥ śyena vegaḥ utpatya muṣṭī kṛtya karau ubhau bhagavantam vāsudevam kruddhaḥ vakṣasi abādhata
na acalat tat-prahāreṇa mālā āhata iva dvipaḥ bāhvoḥ nigṛhya cāṇūram bahuśaḥ bhrāmayan hariḥ bhū pṛṣṭhe pothayām āsa tarasā kṣīṇa jīvitam visrasta ākalpa keśa srak indra-dhvajaḥ iva apatat
tathā eva muṣṭikaḥ pūrvam sva-muṣṭyā abhihatena vai balabhadreṇa balinā talena abhihataḥ bhṛśam pravepitaḥ saḥ rudhiram udvaman mukhataḥ arditaḥ vyasuḥ papāta urvī upasthe vāta āhataḥ iva aṅghripaḥ
tataḥ kūṭam anuprāptam rāmaḥ praharatām varaḥ avadhīt līlayā rājan sa-avajñam vāma muṣṭinā
tarhi eva hi śalaḥ kṛṣṇa prapada āhata śīrṣakaḥ dvidhā vidīrnaḥ tośalaka ubhau api nipetatuḥ
cāṇūre muṣṭike kūṭe śale tośalake hate śeṣāḥ pradudruvuḥ mallāḥ sarve prāṇa parīpsavaḥ
gopān vayasyān ākṛṣya taiḥ saṁsṛjya vijahratuḥ vādyamāneṣu tūryeṣu valgantau ruta nūpurau
janāḥ prajahṛṣuḥ sarve karmaṇā rāma-kṛṣṇayoḥ ṛte kaṁsam vipra mukhyāḥ sādhavaḥ sādhu sādhu iti
hateṣu malla-varyeṣu vidruteṣu ca bhoja-rāṭ nyavārayat sva tūryāṇi vākyam ca idam uvāca ha
niḥsārayata durvṛttau vasudeva-ātmajau purāt dhanam harata gopānām nandam badhnīta durmatim
vasudevaḥ tu durmedhā hanyatām āśu asat-tamaḥ ugrasenaḥ pitā ca api sa anugaḥ para pakṣa-gaḥ
evam vikatthamāne vai kaṁse prakupitaḥ avyayaḥ laghimnā utpatya tarasā mañcam uttuṅgam āruhat
tam āviśantam ālokya mṛtyum ātmanaḥ āsanāt manasvī sahasā utthāya jagṛhe saḥ asi carmaṇī
tam khaḍga pāṇim vicarantam āśu śyenam yathā dakṣiṇa-savyam ambare samagrahīt durviṣaha ugra tejāḥ yathā uragam tārkṣya-sutaḥ prasahya
pragṛhya keśeṣu calat kirīṭam nipātya raṅga-upari tuṅga mañcāt tasya upariṣṭāt svayam abja-nābhaḥ papāta viśva āśrayaḥ ātma-tantraḥ
tam samparetam vicakarṣa bhūmau hariḥ yathā ibham jagataḥ vipaśyataḥ hā hā iti śabdaḥ su-mahān tadā abhūt udīritaḥ sarva-janaiḥ nara-indra
saḥ nityadā udvigna dhiyā tam īśvaram piban adan vā vicaran svapan śvasan dadarśa cakra āyudham agrataḥ yataḥ tat eva rūpam duravāpam āpa
tasya anujāḥ bhrātaraḥ aṣṭau kaṅka-nyagrodhaka-ādayaḥ abhyadhāvan ati-kruddhāḥ bhrātuḥ nirveśa kāriṇaḥ
tathā ati-rabhasān tān tu saṁyattān rohiṇī-sutaḥ ahan parigham udyamya paśūn iva mṛga-adhipaḥ
neduḥ dundubhayaḥ vyomni brahma-īśa-ādyāḥ vibhūtayaḥ puṣpaiḥ kirantaḥ tam prītāḥ śaśaṁsuḥ nanṛtuḥ striyaḥ
teṣām striyaḥ mahārāja suhṛt maraṇa duḥkhitāḥ tatra abhīyuḥ vinighnantyaḥ śīrṣāṇi aśru vilocanāḥ
śayānān vīra śayāyām patīn āliṅgya śocatīḥ vilepuḥ su-svaram nāryaḥ visṛjantyaḥ muhuḥ śucaḥ
ha nātha priya dharma-jña karuṇa anātha vatsala tvayā hatena nihatāḥ vayam te sa gṛha prajāḥ
tvayā virahitā patyā purī iyam puruṣa ṛṣabha na śobhate vayam iva nivṛtta utsava maṅgalā
anāgasām tvam bhūtānām kṛtavān droham ulbaṇam tena imām bho daśām nītaḥ bhūta dhruk kaḥ labheta śam
sarveṣām iha bhūtānām eṣaḥ hi prabhava apyayaḥ goptā ca tat avadhyāyī na kvacit sukham edhate
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca rāja yoṣitaḥ āśvāsya bhagavān loka bhāvanaḥ yām āhuḥ laukikīm saṁsthām hatānām samakārayat
mātaram pitaram ca eva mocayitvā atha bandhanāt kṛṣṇa-rāmau vavandāte śirasā spṛśya pādayoḥ
devakī vasudevaḥ ca vijñāya jagat īśvarau kṛta saṁvandanau putrau sasvajāte na śaṅkitau
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca pitarau upalabdha arthau viditvā puruṣa-uttamaḥ mā bhūt iti nijām māyām tatāna jana mohinīm
uvāca pitarau etya sa agra-jaḥ sātvata ṛṣabhaḥ praśraya avanataḥ prīṇan amba tāta iti sa-ādaram
na asmattaḥ yuvayoḥ tāta nitya utkaṇṭhitayoḥ api bālya paugaṇḍa kaiśoraḥ putrābhyām abhavan kvacit
na labdhaḥ daiva hatayoḥ vāsaḥ nau bhavat-antike yām bālāḥ pitṛ geha sthaḥ vindante lālitāḥ mudam
sarva artha sambhavaḥ dehaḥ janitaḥ poṣitaḥ yataḥ na tayoḥ yāti nirveśam pitroḥ martyaḥ śata āyuṣā
yaḥ tayoḥ ātma-jaḥ kalpaḥ ātmanā ca dhanena ca vṛttim na dadyāt tam pretya sva māṁsam khādayanti hi
mātaram pitaram vṛddham bhāryām sādhvīm sutam śiśum gurum vipram prapannam ca kalpaḥ abibhrat śvasan mṛtaḥ
tat nau akalpayoḥ kaṁsāt nityam udvigna cetasoḥ mogham ete vyatikrāntāḥ divasāḥ vām anarcatoḥ
tat kṣantum arhathaḥ tāta mātaḥ nau para-tantrayoḥ akurvatoḥ vām śuśrūṣām kliṣṭayoḥ durhṛdā bhṛśam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti māyā manuṣyasya hareḥ viśva ātmanaḥ girā mohitau aṅkam āropya pariṣvajya āpatuḥ mudam
siñcantau aśru dhārābhiḥ sneha pāśena ca āvṛtau na kiñcit ūcatuḥ rājan bāṣpa kaṇṭhau vimohitau
evam āśvāsya pitarau bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ mātāmaham tu ugrasenam yadūnām akarot nṛpam
āha ca asmān mahā-rāja prajāḥ ca ājñaptum arhasi yayāti śāpāt yadubhiḥ na āsitavyam nṛpa āsane
mayi bhṛtye upāsīne bhavataḥ vibudha ādayaḥ balim haranti avanatāḥ kim uta anye nara adhipāḥ
sarvān svān jñāti sambandhān digbhyaḥ kaṁsa-bhaya ākulān yadu-vṛṣṇi-andhaka-madhu-dāśārha kukura-ādikān sabhājitān samāśvāsya videśa āvāsa karśitān nyavāsayat sva geheṣu vittaiḥ santarpya viśva kṛt
kṛṣṇa-saṅkarṣaṇa bhujaiḥ guptāḥ labdha manaḥ-rathāḥ gṛheṣu remire siddhāḥ kṛṣṇa-rāma gata jvarāḥ vīkṣantaḥ ahaḥ ahaḥ prītāḥ mukunda vadana ambujam nityam pramuditam śrīmat sa-daya smita vīkṣaṇam
tatra pravayasaḥ api āsan yuvānaḥ ati bala ojasaḥ pibantaḥ akṣaiḥ mukundasya mukha-ambuja sudhām muhuḥ
atha nandam samāsādya bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ saṅkarṣaṇaḥ ca rāja-indra pariṣvajya idam ūcatuḥ
pitaḥ yuvābhyām snigdhābhyām poṣitau lālitau bhṛśam pitroḥ abhyadhikā prītiḥ ātmajeṣu ātmanaḥ api hi
saḥ pitā sā ca jananī yau puṣṇītām sva putra vat śiśūn bandhubhiḥ utsṛṣṭān akalpaiḥ poṣa rakṣaṇe
yata yūyam vrajam tāta vayam ca sneha duḥkhitān jñātīn vaḥ draṣṭum eṣyāmaḥ vidhāya suhṛdām sukham
evam sāntvayya bhagavān nandam sa-vrajam acyutaḥ vāsaḥ alaṅkāra kupya ādyaiḥ arhayām āsa sa-ādaram
iti uktaḥ tau pariṣvajya nandaḥ praṇaya vihvalaḥ pūrayan aśrubhiḥ netre saha gopaiḥ vrajam yayau
atha śūra-sutaḥ rājan putrayoḥ samakārayat purodhasā brāhmaṇaiḥ ca yathā-vat dvija-saṁskṛtim
tebhyaḥ adāt dakṣiṇāḥ gāvaḥ rukma mālāḥ su alaṅkṛtāḥ su-alaṅkṛtebhyaḥ sampūjya sa vatsāḥ kṣauma mālinīḥ
yaḥ kṛṣṇa-rāma janmaṛkṣe manaḥ dattāḥ mahā-matiḥ tāḥ ca ādadāt anusmṛtya kaṁsena adharmataḥ hṛtaḥ
tataḥ ca labdha saṁskārau dvijatvam prāpya su-vratau gargāt yadu-kula ācāryāt gāyatram vratam āsthitau
prabhavau sarva vidyānām sarva-jñau jagat-īśvarau na anya siddha amalam jñānam gūhamānau nara īhitaiḥ atha u guru kule vāsam icchantau upajagatuḥ kāśyam sāndīpanim nāma hi avanti-pura vāsinam
yathā upasādya tau dāntau gurau vṛttim aninditām grāhayantau upetau sma bhaktyā devam iva ādṛtau
tayoḥ dvija-varaḥ tuṣṭaḥ śuddha bhāva anuvṛttibhiḥ provāca vedān akhilān sa aṅga upaniṣadaḥ guruḥ
sa-rahasyam dhanuḥ-vedam dharmān nyāya pathān tathā tathā ca ānvīkṣikīm vidyām rāja-nītim ca ṣaṭ-vidhām
sarvam nara-vara śreṣṭhau sarva vidyā pravartakau sakṛt nigada mātreṇa tau sañjagṛhatuḥ nṛpa ahaḥ rātraiḥ catuḥ-ṣaṣṭyā saṁyattau tāvatīḥ kalāḥ guru-dakṣiṇayā ācāryam chandayām āsatuḥ nṛpa
dvijaḥ tayoḥ tam mahimānam adbhutam saṁlakṣya rājan ati-mānuṣīm matim sammantrya patnyā saḥ mahā-arṇave mṛtam bālam prabhāse varayām babhūva ha
tathā iti atha āruhya mahā-rathau ratham prabhāsam āsādya duranta vikramau velām upavrajya niṣīdatuḥ kṣaṇam sindhuḥ viditvā arhaṇam āharat tayoḥ
tam āha bhagavān āśu guru putraḥ pradīyatām yaḥ asau iha tvayā grastaḥ bālakaḥ mahatā ūrmiṇā
śrī-samudraḥ uvāca na ca ahārṣam aham deva daityaḥ pañcajanaḥ mahān antaḥ jala caraḥ kṛṣṇa śaṅkha rūpa dharaḥ asuraḥ
āste tena āhṛtaḥ nūnam tat śrutvā satvaram prabhuḥ jalam āviśya tam hatvā na apaśyat udare arbhakam
tat aṅga prabhavam śaṅkham ādāya ratham āgamat tataḥ saṁyamanīm nāma yamasya dayitām purīm gatvā jana-ardanaḥ śaṅkham pradadhmau sa hala-āyudhaḥ śaṅkha nirhrādam ākarṇya prajā saṁyamanaḥ yamaḥ tayoḥ saparyām mahatīm cakre bhakti upabṛṁhitām uvāca avanataḥ kṛṣṇam sarva bhūta āśaya ālayam līlā manuṣyayoḥ viṣṇo yuvayoḥ karavāma kim
śrī-bhagavān uvāca guru-putram iha ānītam nija karma nibandhanam ānayasva mahā-rāja mat śāsana puraḥ-kṛtaḥ
tathā iti tena upānītam guru-putram yadu-uttamau dattvā sva-gurave bhūyaḥ vṛṇīṣva iti tam ūcatuḥ
śrī-guruḥ uvāca samyak sampāditaḥ vatsa bhavadbhyām guru-niṣkrayaḥ kaḥ nu yuṣmat-vidha guroḥ kāmānām avaśiṣyate
gacchatam sva-gṛham vīrau kīrtiḥ vām astu pāvanī chandāṁsi ayāta-yāmāni bhavantu iha paratra ca
guruṇā evam anujñātau rathena anila raṁhasā āyātau sva puram tāta parjanya ninadena vai
samanandan prajāḥ sarvāḥ dṛṣṭvā rāma-janārdanau apaśyantyaḥ bahu ahāni naṣṭa labdha dhanāḥ iva
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca vṛṣṇīnām pravaraḥ mantrī kṛṣṇasya dayitaḥ sakhā śiṣyaḥ bṛhaspateḥ sākṣāt uddhavaḥ buddhi sat-tamaḥ
tam āha bhagavān preṣṭham bhaktam ekāntinam kvacit gṛhītvā pāṇinā pāṇim prapanna ārti haraḥ hariḥ
gaccha uddhava vrajam saumya pitroḥ nau prītim āvaha gopīnām mat viyoga ādhim mat sandeśaiḥ vimocaya
tāḥ mat manaskāḥ mat prāṇāḥ mat-arthe tyakta daihikāḥ mām eva dayitam preṣṭham ātmānam manasā gatāḥ ye tyakta loka dharmāḥ ca mat-arthe tān bibharmi aham
mayi tāḥ preyasām preṣṭhe dūra-sthe gokula-striyaḥ smarantyaḥ aṅga vimuhyanti viraha autkaṇṭhya vihvalāḥ
dhārayanti ati-kṛcchreṇa prāyaḥ prāṇān kathañcana prati-āgamana sandeśaiḥ ballavyaḥ me mat-ātmikāḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti uktaḥ uddhavaḥ rājan sandeśam bhartuḥ ādṛtaḥ ādāya ratham āruhya prayayau nanda-gokulam
prāptaḥ nanda-vrajam śrīmān nimlocati vibhāvasau channa yānaḥ praviśatām paśūnām khura reṇubhiḥ
vāsita arthe abhiyudhyadbhiḥ nāditam śuśmibhiḥ vṛṣaiḥ dhāvantībhiḥ ca vāsrābhiḥ udhaḥ bhāraiḥ sva vatsakān itaḥ tataḥ vilaṅghadbhiḥ go-vatsaiḥ maṇḍitam sitaiḥ go-doha śabda abhiravam veṇūnām niḥsvanena ca gāyantībhiḥ ca karmāṇi śubhāni bala-kṛṣṇayoḥ su alaṅkṛtābhiḥ gopībhiḥ gopaiḥ ca su-virājitam agni arka atithi go vipra pitṛ deva arcana anvitaiḥ dhūpa dīpaiḥ ca mālyaiḥ ca gopa-āvāsaiḥ manaḥ-ramam sarvataḥ puṣpita vanam dvija ali kula nāditam haṁsa kāraṇḍava ākīrṇaiḥ padma-ṣaṇḍaiḥ ca maṇḍitam
tam āgatam samāgamya kṛṣṇasya anucaram priyam nandaḥ prītaḥ pariṣvajya vāsudeva-dhiyā ārcayat
bhojitam parama-annena saṁviṣṭam kaśipau sukham gata śramam paryapṛcchat pāda saṁvāhana ādibhiḥ
kaccit aṅga mahā-bhāga sakhā naḥ śūra-nandanaḥ āste kuśalī apatya-ādyaiḥ yuktaḥ muktaḥ suhṛt vrataḥ
diṣṭyā kaṁsaḥ hataḥ pāpaḥ sa anugaḥ svena pāpmanā sādhūnām dharma-śīlānām yadūnām dveṣṭi yaḥ sadā
api smarati naḥ kṛṣṇaḥ mātaram suhṛdaḥ sakhīn gopān vrajam ca ātma nātham gāvaḥ vṛndāvanam girim
api āyāsyati govindaḥ sva-janān sakṛt īkṣitum tarhi drakṣyāma tat vaktram su-nasam su smita īkṣaṇam
dāva-agneḥ vāta varṣāt ca vṛṣa sarpāt ca rakṣitāḥ duratyayebhyaḥ mṛtyubhyaḥ kṛṣṇena su-mahā-ātmanā
smaratām kṛṣṇa-vīryāṇi līlā apāṅga nirīkṣitam hasitam bhāṣitam ca aṅga sarvāḥ naḥ śithilāḥ kriyāḥ
sarit śaila vana uddeśān mukunda pada bhūṣitān ākrīḍān īkṣyamāṇānām manaḥ yāti tat-ātmatām
manye kṛṣṇam ca rāmam ca prāptau iha sura uttamau surāṇām mahat arthāya gargasya vacanam yathā
kaṁsam nāga ayuta prāṇam mallau gaja-patim yathā avadhiṣṭām līlayā eva paśūn iva mṛga-adhipaḥ
tāla-trayam mahā-sāram dhanuḥ yaṣṭim iva ibha-rāṭ babhañja ekena hastena sapta-aham adadhāt girim
pralambaḥ dhenukaḥ ariṣṭaḥ tṛṇāvartaḥ baka-ādayaḥ daityāḥ sura-asura jitaḥ hatāḥ yena iha līlayā
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti saṁsmṛtya saṁsmṛtya nandaḥ kṛṣṇa anurakta dhīḥ ati utkaṇṭhaḥ abhavat tūṣṇīm prema prasara vihvalaḥ
yaśodā varṇyamānāni putrasya caritāni ca śṛṇvantī aśrūṇi avāsrākṣīt sneha snuta payodharā
tayoḥ ittham bhagavati kṛṣṇe nanda-yaśodayoḥ vīkṣya anurāgam paramam nandam āha uddhavaḥ mudā
śrī-uddhavaḥ uvāca yuvām ślāghyatamau nūnam dehinām iha mana-da nārāyaṇe akhila-gurau yat kṛtā matiḥ īdṛśī
etau hi viśvasya ca bīja yonī rāmaḥ mukundaḥ puruṣaḥ pradhānam anvīya bhūteṣu vilakṣaṇasya jñānasya ca īśāte imau purāṇau
yasmin janaḥ prāṇa viyoga kāle kṣaṇam samāveśya manaḥ aviśuddham nirhṛtya karma āśayam āśu yāti parām gatim brahma-mayaḥ arka varṇaḥ tasmin bhavantau akhila ātma hetau nārāyaṇe kāraṇa martya mūrtau bhāvam vidhattām nitarām mahā-ātman kim vā avaśiṣṭam yuvayoḥ su-kṛtyam
āgamiṣyati adīrgheṇa kālena vrajam acyutaḥ priyam vidhāsyate pitroḥ bhagavān sātvatām patiḥ
hatvā kaṁsam raṅga madhye pratīpam sarva-sātvatām yat āha vaḥ samāgatya kṛṣṇaḥ satyam karoti tat
mā khidyatam mahā-bhāgau drakṣyathaḥ kṛṣṇam antike antaḥ hṛdi saḥ bhūtānām āste jyotiḥ iva edhasi
na hi asya asti priyaḥ kaścit na apriyaḥ vā asti amāninaḥ na uttamaḥ na adhamaḥ vā api samānasya āsamaḥ api vā
na mātā na pitā tasya na bhāryā na suta-ādayaḥ na ātmīyaḥ na paraḥ ca api na dehaḥ janma eva ca
na ca asya karma vā loke sat asat miśra yoniṣu krīḍā artham saḥ api sādhūnām paritrāṇāya kalpate
sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti bhajate nirguṇaḥ guṇān krīḍan atītaḥ api guṇaiḥ sṛjati avati hanti ajaḥ
yathā bhramarikā dṛṣṭyā bhrāmyati iva mahī īyate citte kartari tatra ātmā kartā iva aham-dhiyā smṛtaḥ
yuvayoḥ eva na eva ayam ātma-jaḥ bhagavān hariḥ sarveṣām ātma-jaḥ hi ātmā pitā mātā saḥ īśvaraḥ
dṛṣṭam śrutam bhūta bhavat bhaviṣyat sthāsnuḥ cariṣṇuḥ mahat alpakam ca vinā acyutāt vastu tarām na varyam saḥ eva sarvam parama-ātma bhūtaḥ
evam niśā sā bruvatoḥ vyatītā nandasya kṛṣṇa-anucarasya rājan gopyaḥ samutthāya nirūpya dīpān vāstūn samabhyarcya dadhīni amanthan
tāḥ dīpa dīptaiḥ maṇibhiḥ virejuḥ rajjūḥ vikarṣat bhuja kaṅkaṇa srajaḥ calan nitamba stana hāra kuṇḍala tviṣat kapola aruṇa kuṅkuma ānanāḥ
udgāyatīnām aravinda locanam vraja-aṅganānām divam aspṛśat dhvaniḥ dadhnaḥ ca nirmanthana śabda miśritaḥ nirasyate yena diśām amaṅgalam
bhagavati udite sūrye nanda-dvāri vraja-okasaḥ dṛṣṭvā ratham śātakaumbham kasya ayam iti ca abruvan
akrūraḥ āgataḥ kim vā yaḥ kaṁsasya artha sādhakaḥ yena nītaḥ madhu-purīm kṛṣṇaḥ kamala locanaḥ
kim sādhayiṣyati asmābhiḥ bhartuḥ prītasya niṣkṛtim tataḥ strīṇām vadantīnām uddhavaḥ agāt kṛta ahnikaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tam vīkṣya kṛṣṇa-anucaram vraja-striyaḥ pralamba bāhum nava kañja locanam pīta ambaram puṣkara mālinam lasat makha aravindam parimṛṣṭa kuṇḍalam su-vismitāḥ kaḥ ayam apīvya darśanaḥ kutaḥ ca kasya acyuta veṣa bhūṣaṇaḥ iti sma sarvāḥ parivavruḥ utsukāḥ tam uttamaḥ-śloka pada-ambuja āśrayam
tam praśrayeṇa avanatāḥ su sat-kṛtam sa-vrīḍa hāsa īkṣaṇa sūnṛta ādibhiḥ rahasi apṛcchan upaviṣṭam āsane vijñāya sandeśa-haram ramā-pateḥ
jānīmaḥ tvām yadu-pateḥ pārṣadam samupāgatam bhartrā iha preṣitaḥ pitroḥ bhavān priya cikīrṣayā
anyathā go-vraje tasya smaraṇīyam na cakṣmahe sneha anubandhaḥ bandhūnām muneḥ api su-dustyajaḥ
anyeṣu artha kṛtā maitrī yāvat artha viḍambanam pumbhiḥ strīṣu kṛtā yadvat sumanaḥsu iva ṣaṭ-padaiḥ
niḥsvam tyajanti gaṇikāḥ akalpam nṛ-patim prajaḥ adhīta-vidyāḥ ācāryam ṛtvijaḥ datta dakṣiṇam
khagāḥ vīta phalam vṛkṣam bhuktvā ca atithayaḥ gṛham dagdham mṛgāḥ tathā araṇyam jārāḥ bhuktvā ratām striyam
iti gopyaḥ hi govinde gata vāk kāya mānasaḥ kṛṣṇa-dūte samāyāte uddhave tyakta laukikāḥ gāyantyaḥ priya karmāṇi rudantyaḥ ca gata-hriyaḥ tasya saṁsmṛtya saṁsmṛtya yāni kaiśora bālyayoḥ
kācit madhu-karam dṛṣṭvā dhyāyantī kṛṣṇa-saṅgamam priya prasthāpitam dūtam kalpayitvā idam abravīt
gopī uvāca madhupa kitava bandho mā spṛśa aṅghrim sapatnyāḥ kuca vilulita mālā kuṅkuma śmaśrubhiḥ naḥ vahatu madhu-patiḥ tat māninīnām prasādam yadu-sadasi viḍambyam yasya dūtaḥ tvam īdṛk
sakṛt adhara sudhām svām mohinīm pāyayitvā sumanasaḥ iva sadyaḥ tatyaje asmān bhavādṛk paricarati katham tat pāda-padmam nu padmā hi api bata hṛta cetāḥ hi uttamaḥ-śloka jalpaiḥ
kim iha bahu ṣaṭ-aṅghre gāyasi tvam yadūnām adhipatim agṛhāṇām agrataḥ naḥ purāṇam vijaya sakha sakhīnām gīyatām tat prasaṅgaḥ kṣapita kuca rujaḥ te kalpayanti iṣṭam iṣṭāḥ
divi bhuvi ca rasāyām kāḥ striyaḥ tat durāpāḥ kapaṭa rucira hāsa bhrū vijṛmbhasya yāḥ syuḥ caraṇa rajaḥ upāste yasya bhūtiḥ vayam kā api ca kṛpaṇa-pakṣe hi uttamaḥ-śloka śabdaḥ
visṛja śirasi pādam vedmi aham cāṭu-kāraiḥ anunaya viduṣaḥ te abhyetya dautyaiḥ mukundāt sva kṛte iha visṛṣṭa apatya patī anya-lokāḥ vyasṛjat akṛta-cetāḥ kim nu sandheyam asmin
mṛgayuḥ iva kapi indram vivyadhe lubdha-dharmā striyam akṛta virūpām strī jitaḥ kāmayānām balim api balim attvā aveṣṭayat dhvāṅkṣavat yaḥ tat alam asita sakhyaiḥ dustyajaḥ tat kathā arthaḥ
yat anucarita līlā karṇa pīyūṣa vipruṭ sakṛt adana vidhūta dvandva dharmāḥ vinaṣṭāḥ sapadi gṛha kuṭumbam dīnam utsṛjya dīnāḥ bahavaḥ iha vihaṅgāḥ bhikṣu caryām caranti
vayam ṛtam iva jihma vyāhṛtam śraddadhānāḥ kulika rutam iva ajñāḥ kṛṣṇa vadhvaḥ hariṇyaḥ dadṛśuḥ asakṛt etat tat nakha sparśa tīvra smara rujaḥ upamantrin bhaṇyatām anya vārtā
priya sakha punaḥ āgāḥ preyasā preṣitaḥ kim varaya kim anurundhe mānanīyaḥ asi me aṅga nayasi katham iha asmān dustyaja dvandva pārśvam satatam urasi saumya śrīḥ vadhūḥ sākam āste
api bata madhu-puryām ārya-putraḥ adhunā āste smarati saḥ pitṛ-gehān saumya bandhūn ca gopān kvacit api saḥ kathāḥ naḥ kiṅkarīṇām gṛṇīte bhujam aguru-su-gandham mūrdhni adhāsyat kadā nu
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca atha uddhavaḥ niśamya evam kṛṣṇa-darśana lālasāḥ sāntvayan priya sandeśaiḥ gopīḥ idam abhāṣata
śrī-uddhavaḥ uvāca aho yūyam sma pūrṇa arthāḥ bhavatyaḥ loka pūjitāḥ vāsudeve bhagavati yāsām iti arpitam manaḥ
dāna vrata tapaḥ homa japa svādhyāya saṁyamaiḥ śreyobhiḥ vividhaiḥ ca anyaiḥ kṛṣṇe bhaktiḥ hi sādhyate
bhagavati uttamaḥ-śloke bhavatībhiḥ anuttamā bhaktiḥ pravartītā diṣṭyā munīnām api durlabhā
diṣṭyā putrān patīn dehān sva-janān bhavanāni ca hitvā avṛṇīta yūyam yat kṛṣṇa-ākhyam puruṣam param
sarva-ātma bhāvaḥ adhikṛtaḥ bhavatīnām adhokṣaje viraheṇa mahā-bhāgāḥ mahān me anugrahaḥ kṛtaḥ
śrūyatām priya sandeśaḥ bhavatīnām sukha āvahaḥ yam ādāya āgataḥ bhadrāḥ aham bhartuḥ rahaḥ karaḥ
