śrī-bhagavān uvāca bhavatīnām viyogaḥ me na hi sarva-ātmanā kvacit yathā bhūtāni bhūteṣu kham vāyu-agniḥ jalam mahī tathā aham ca manaḥ prāṇa bhūta indriya guṇa āśrayaḥ
ātmani eva ātmanā ātmānam sṛje hanmi anupālaye ātma māyā anubhāvena bhūta indriya guṇa ātmanā
ātmā jñāna-mayaḥ śuddhaḥ vyatiriktaḥ aguṇa-anvayaḥ suṣupti svapna jāgradbhiḥ māyā vṛttibhiḥ īyate
yena indriya arthān dhyāyeta mṛṣā svapna-vat utthitaḥ tat nirundhyāt indriyāṇi vinidraḥ pratyapadyata
etat antaḥ samāmnāyaḥ yogaḥ sāṅkhyam manīṣiṇām tyāgaḥ tapaḥ damaḥ satyam samudra-antāḥ iva āpa-gāḥ
yat tu aham bhavatīnām vai dūre varte priyaḥ dṛśām manasaḥ sannikarṣa artham mat anudhyāna. kāmyayā
yathā dūra-care preṣṭhe manaḥ āviśya vartate strīṇām ca na tathā cetaḥ sannikṛṣṭe akṣi-gocare
mayi āveśya manaḥ kṛtsnam vimukta aśeṣa vṛtti yat anusmarantyaḥ mām nityam acirāt mām upaiṣyatha
yāḥ mayā krīḍatā rātryām vane asmin vraje āsthitāḥ alabdha rāsāḥ kalyāṇyaḥ mā āpuḥ mat-vīrya cintayā
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam priya-tama ādiṣṭam ākarṇya vraja-yoṣitaḥ tāḥ ūcuḥ uddhavam prītaḥ tat sandeśa āgata smṛtīḥ
gopyaḥ ūcuḥ diṣṭyā ahitaḥ hataḥ kaṁsaḥ yadūnām sa-anugaḥ agha kṛt diṣṭyā āptaiḥ labdha sarva arthaiḥ kuśalī āste acyutaḥ adhunā
kaccit gada-agrajaḥ saumya karoti pura yoṣitām prītim naḥ snigdha sa-vrīḍa hāsa udāra īkṣaṇa arcitaḥ
katham rati viśeṣa jñaḥ priyaḥ ca pura-yoṣitām na anubadhyeta tat vākyaiḥ vibhramaiḥ ca anubhājitaḥ
api smarati naḥ sādho govindaḥ prastute kvacit goṣṭhi madhye pura-strīṇām grāmyāḥ svaira kathā antare
tāḥ kim niśāḥ smarati yāsu tadā priyābhiḥ vṛndāvane kumuda kunda śaśāṅka ramye reme kvaṇat caraṇa-nūpura rāsa-goṣṭhyām asmābhiḥ īḍita manojña kathaḥ kadācit
api eṣyati iha dāśārhaḥ taptāḥ sva-kṛtayā śucā sañjīvayan nu naḥ gātraiḥ yathā indraḥ vanam ambudaiḥ
kasmāt kṛṣṇaḥ iha āyāti prāpta rājyaḥ hata ahitaḥ nara-indra kanyāḥ udvāhya prītaḥ sarva suhṛt vṛtaḥ
kim asmābhiḥ vana okobhiḥ anyābhiḥ vā mahā-ātmanaḥ śrī pateḥ āpta-kāmasya kriyeta arthaḥ kṛta-ātmanaḥ
param saukhyam hi nairāśyam svairiṇī api āha piṅgalā tat jānatīnām naḥ kṛṣṇe tathā api āsā duratyayā
kaḥ utsaheta santyaktum uttamaḥśloka saṁvidam anicchataḥ api yasya śrīḥ aṅgāt na cyavate kvacit
sarit śaila vana-uddeśāḥ gāvaḥ veṇu-ravāḥ ime saṅkarṣaṇa sahāyena kṛṣṇena ācaritāḥ prabho
punaḥ punaḥ smārayanti nanda-gopa-sutam bata śrī niketaiḥ tat padakaiḥ vismartum na eva śaknumaḥ
gatyā lalitayā udāra hāsa līlā avalokanaiḥ mādhvyā girā hṛta dhiyaḥ katham tam vismarāma he
he nātha he ramā-nātha vraja-nātha ārti nāśana magnam uddhara govinda gokulam vṛjina arṇavāt
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tataḥ tāḥ kṛṣṇa-sandeśaiḥ vyapeta viraha jvarāḥ uddhavam pūjayām cakruḥ jñātvā ātmānam adhokṣajam
uvāsa katicit māsān gopīnām vinudan śucaḥ kṛṣṇa-līlā kathām gāyan ramayām āsa gokulam
yāvanti ahāni nandasya vraje avātsīt saḥ uddhavaḥ vraja-okasām kṣaṇa-prāyāṇi āsan kṛṣṇasya vārtayā
sarit vana giri droṇīḥ vīkṣan kusumitān drumān kṛṣṇam saṁsmārayan reme hari-dāsaḥ vraja-okasām
dṛṣṭvā evam ādi gopīnām kṛṣṇa-āveśa ātma viklavam uddhavaḥ parama prītaḥ tāḥ namasyan idam jagau
etāḥ param tanu bhṛtaḥ bhuvi gopa-vadhvaḥ govinde eva nikhila ātmani rūḍha bhāvāḥ vāñchanti yat bhava bhiyaḥ munayaḥ vayam ca kim brahma janmabhiḥ ananta kathā rasasya
kva imāḥ striyaḥ vana carīḥ vyabhicāra duṣṭāḥ kṛṣṇe kva ca eṣaḥ parama-ātmani rūḍha-bhāvaḥ nanu īśvaraḥ anubhajataḥ aviduṣaḥ api sākṣāt śreyaḥ tanoti agada rājaḥ iva upayuktaḥ
na ayam śriyaḥ aṅge u nitānta-rateḥ prasādaḥ svaḥ yoṣitām nalina gandha rucām kutaḥ anyāḥ rasa-utsave asya bhuja-daṇḍa gṛhīta kaṇṭha labdha-āśiṣām yaḥ udagāt vraja-vallabhīnām
āsam aho caraṇa-reṇu juṣām aham syām vṛndāvane kim api gulma-latā-oṣadhīnām yā dustyajam sva-janam ārya-patham ca hitvā bhejuḥ mukunda-padavīm śrutibhiḥ vimṛgyām
yāḥ vai śriyā arcitam aja ādibhiḥ āpta-kāmaiḥ yoga-īśvaraiḥ api yat ātmani rāsa goṣṭhyām kṛṣṇasya tat bhagavataḥ caraṇa-aravindam nyastam staneṣu vijahuḥ parirabhya tāpam
vande nanda-vraja strīṇām pāda reṇum abhīkṣṇaśaḥ yāsām hari kathā udgītam punāti bhuvana-trayam
śṛī-śukaḥ uvāca atha gopīḥ anujñāpya yaśodām nandam eva ca gopān āmantrya dāśārhaḥ yāsyan āruruhe ratham
tam nirgatam samāsādya nānā upāyana pāṇayaḥ nanda-ādayaḥ anurāgeṇa prāvocan aśru locanāḥ
manasaḥ vṛttayaḥ naḥ syuḥ kṛṣṇa pāda-ambuja āśrayāḥ vācaḥ abhidhāyinīḥ nāmnām kāyaḥ tat prahvaṇa-ādiṣu
karmabhiḥ bhrāmyamāṇānām yatra kva api īśvara icchayā maṅgala ācaritaiḥ dānaiḥ ratiḥ naḥ kṛṣṇe īśvare
evam sabhājitaḥ gopaiḥ kṛṣṇa-bhaktyā nara-adhipa uddhavaḥ punaḥ āgacchat mathurām kṛṣṇa-pālitām
kṛṣṇāya praṇipatya āha bhakti udrekam vraja-okasām vasudevāya rāmāya rājñe ca upāyanāni adāt
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca atha vijñāya bhagavān sarva ātmā sarva darśanaḥ sairandhryāḥ kāma taptāyāḥ priyam icchan gṛham yayau
mahā-arha upaskaraiḥ āḍhyam kāma upāya upabṛṁhitam muktā-dāma patākābhiḥ vitāna śayana āsanaiḥ dhūpaiḥ surabhibhiḥ dīpaiḥ srak gandhaiḥ api maṇḍitam
gṛham tam āyāntam avekṣya sā āsanāt sadyaḥ samutthāya hi jāta-sambhramā yathā upasaṇgamya sakhībhiḥ acyutam sabhājayām āsa sat-āsana ādibhiḥ
tathā uddhavaḥ sādhutayā abhipūjitaḥ nyaṣīdat urvyām abhimṛśya ca āsanam kṛṣṇaḥ api tūrṇam śayanam mahā-dhanam viveśa loka ācaritāni anuvrataḥ
sā majjana ālepa dukūla bhūṣaṇa srak gandha tāmbūla sudhā-āsava ādibhiḥ prasādhita ātmā upasasāra mādhavam sa-vrīḍa līlā utsmita vibhrama īkṣitaiḥ
āhūya kāntām nava saṅgama hriyā viśaṅkitām kaṅkaṇa bhūṣite kare pragṛhya śayyām adhiveśya rāmayā reme anulepa arpaṇa puṇya leśayā
sa anaṅga tapta kucayoḥ urasaḥ tathā akṣṇoḥ jighrantī ananta caraṇena rujaḥ mṛjantī dorbhyām stana antara-gatam parirabhya kāntam ānanda mūrtim ajahāt ati dīrgha tāpam
sa evam kaivalya nātham tam prāpya duṣprāpyam īśvaram aṅga-rāga arpaṇena aho durbhagā idam ayācata
saha uṣyatām iha preṣṭha dināni katicit mayā ramasva na utsahe tyaktum saṅgam te amburuha-īkṣaṇa
tasyai kāma varam dattvā mānayitvā ca māna-daḥ saha uddhavena sarva-īśaḥ sva dhāma agamat ṛddhi-mat
durārādhyam samārādhya viṣṇum sarva īśvara īśvaram yaḥ vṛṇīte manaḥ grāhyam asattvāt kumanīṣī asau
akrūra-bhavanam kṛṣṇaḥ saha rāma-uddhavaḥ prabhuḥ kiñcit cikīrṣayan prāgāt akrūra priya kāmyayā
saḥ tān nara-vara śreṣṭhān ārāt vīkṣya sva bāndhavān pratyutthāya pramuditaḥ pariṣvajya abhinandya ca nanāma kṛṣṇam rāmam ca saḥ taiḥ api abhivāditaḥ pūjayām āsa vidhi-vat kṛta āsana parigrahān
pāda avanejanīḥ ā āpaḥ dhārayan śirasā nṛpa arhaṇena ambaraiḥ divyaiḥ gandha srak bhūṣaṇa uttamaiḥ arcitvā śirasā ānamya pādau aṅka gatau mṛjan praśraya avanataḥ akrūraḥ kṛṣṇa-rāmau abhāṣata
diṣṭyā pāpaḥ hataḥ kaṁsaḥ sa-anugaḥ vām idam kulam bhavadbhyām uddhṛtam kṛcchrāt durantāt ca samedhitam
yuvām pradhāna-puruṣau jagat hetū jagat-mayau bhavadbhyām na vinā kiñcit param asti na ca aparam
ātma-sṛṣṭam idam viśvam anvāviśya sva śaktibhiḥ īyate bahudhā brahman śruta pratyakṣa gocaram
yathā hi bhūteṣu cara acareṣu mahī-ādayaḥ yoniṣu bhānti nānā evam bhavān kevalaḥ ātma yoniṣu ātmā ātma-tantraḥ bahudhā vibhāti
sṛjasi atha u lumpasi pāsi viśvam rajaḥ tamaḥ sattva guṇaiḥ sva-śaktibhiḥ na badhyase tat guṇa karmabhiḥ vā jñāna-ātmanaḥ te kva ca bandha hetuḥ
deha ādi upādheḥ anirūpitatvāt bhavaḥ na sākṣāt na bhidā ātmanaḥ syāt ataḥ na bandhaḥ tava na eva mokṣaḥ syātām nikāmaḥ tvayi naḥ avivekaḥ
tvayā uditaḥ ayam jagataḥ hitāya yadā yadā veda pathaḥ purāṇaḥ bādhyeta pāṣaṇḍa pathaiḥ asadbhiḥ tadā bhavān sattva-guṇam bibharti
saḥ tvam prabho adya vasudeva-gṛhe avatīrṇaḥ sva aṁśena bharam apanetum iha asi bhūmeḥ akṣauhiṇī śata vadhena sura-itara aṁśa rājñām amuṣya ca kulasya yaśaḥ vitanvan
adya īśa naḥ vasatayaḥ khalu bhūri bhāgāḥ yaḥ sarva-deva pitṛ bhūta nṛ deva mūrtiḥ yat pāda śauca salilam tri-jagat punāti saḥ tvam jagat guruḥ adhokṣaja yāḥ praviṣṭaḥ
kaḥ paṇḍitaḥ tvat aparam śaraṇam samīyāt bhakta priyāt ṛta giraḥ suhṛdaḥ kṛta-jñāt sarvān dadāti suhṛdaḥ bhajataḥ abhikāmān ātmānam api upacaya apacayau na yasya
diṣṭyā janārdana bhavān iha naḥ pratītaḥ yoga-īśvaraiḥ api durāpa-gatiḥ sura-īśaiḥ chindhi āśu naḥ suta kalatra dhana āpta geha deha ādi moha raśanām bhavadīya māyām
iti arcitaḥ saṁstutaḥ ca bhaktena bhagavān hariḥ akrūram sa-smitam prāha gīrbhiḥ sammohayan iva
śrī-bhagavān uvāca tvam naḥ guruḥ pitṛvyaḥ ca ślāghyaḥ bandhuḥ ca nityadā vayam tu rakṣyāḥ poṣyāḥ ca anukampyāḥ prajāḥ hi vaḥ
bhavat-vidhāḥ mahā-bhāgāḥ niṣevyāḥ arha sat-tamāḥ śreyaḥ kāmaiḥ nṛbhiḥ nityam devaḥ sva-arthāḥ na sādhavaḥ
na hi ap-mayāni tīrthāni na devāḥ mṛt śilā mayāḥ te punanti uru-kālena darśanāt eva sādhavaḥ
saḥ bhavān suhṛdām vai naḥ śreyān śreyaḥ cikīrṣayā jijñāsā artham pāṇḍavānām gacchasva tvam gaja-āhvayam
pitari uparate bālāḥ saha mātrā su duḥkhitāḥ ānītāḥ sva puram rājñā vasante iti śuśruma
teṣu rājā ambikā putraḥ bhrātṛ putreṣu dīna-dhīḥ samaḥ na vartate nūnam duḥ putra vaśa-gaḥ andha dṛk
gaccha jānīhi tat vṛttam adhunā sādhu asādhu vā vijñāya tat vidhāsyāmaḥ yathā śam suhṛdām bhavet
iti akrūram samādiśya bhagavān hariḥ īśvaraḥ saṅkarṣaṇa uddhavābhyām vai tataḥ sva bhavanam yayau
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca saḥ gatvā hāstina-puram paurava-indra yaśaḥ aṅkitam dadarśa tatra āmbikeyam sa bhīṣmam viduram pṛthām saha-putram ca bāhlīkam bhāradvājam sa gautamam karṇam suyodhanam drauṇim pāṇḍavān suhṛdaḥ aparān
yathā-vat upasaṅgamya bandhubhiḥ gāndinī-sutaḥ sampṛṣṭaḥ taiḥ suhṛt vārtām svayam ca apṛcchat avyayam
uvāsa katicit māsān rājñaḥ vṛtta vivitsayā duṣprajasya alpa sārasya khala chanda anuvartinaḥ
tejaḥ ojaḥ balam vīryam praśraya ādīn ca sat guṇān prajā anurāgam pārtheṣu na sahadbhiḥ cikīrṣitam kṛtam ca dhārtarāṣṭraiḥ yat gara dāna ādi apeśalam ācakhyau sarvam eva asmai pṛthā viduraḥ eva ca
pṛthā tu bhrātaram prāptam akrūram upasṛtya tam uvāca janma nilayam smarantī aśru kalā īkṣaṇā
api smaranti naḥ saumya pitarau bhrātaraḥ ca me bhaginyau bhrātṛ-putrāḥ ca jāmayaḥ sakhyaḥ eva ca
bhrātreyaḥ bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ śaraṇyaḥ bhakta vatsalaḥ paitṛ-svasreyān smarati rāmaḥ ca amburuha īkṣaṇaḥ
sapatna madhye śocantīm vṛkānām hariṇīm iva sāntvayiṣyati mām vākyaiḥ pitṛ hīnān ca bālakān
kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahā-yogin viśva-ātman viśva-bhāvana prapannām pāhi govinda śiśubhiḥ ca avasīdatīm
na anyat tava pada-ambhojāt paśyāmi śaraṇam nṛṇām bibhyatām mṛtyu saṁsārāt īśvarasya āpavargikāt
namaḥ kṛṣṇāya śuddhāya brahmaṇe parama-ātmane yoga īśvarāya yogāya tvām aham śaraṇam gatā
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti anusmṛtya sva-janam kṛṣṇam ca jagat īśvaram prārudat duḥkhitā rājan bhavatām prapitāmahī
sama duḥkha sukhaḥ akrūraḥ viduraḥ ca mahā-yaśāḥ sāntvayām āsatuḥ kuntīm tat putra utpatti hetubhiḥ
yāsyan rājānam abhyetya viṣamam putra lālasam avadat suhṛdām madhye bandhubhiḥ sauhṛda uditam
akrūraḥ uvāca bhoḥ bhoḥ vaicitravīrya tvam kurūṇām kīrti vardhana bhrātari uparate pāṇḍau adhunā āsanam āsthitaḥ
dharmeṇa pālayan urvīm prajāḥ śīlena rañjayan vartamānaḥ samaḥ sveṣu śreyaḥ kīrtim avāpsyasi
anyathā tu ācaran loke garhitaḥ yāsyase tamaḥ tasmāt samatve vartasva pāṇḍaveṣu ātma-jeṣu ca
na iha ca atyanta saṁvāsaḥ kasyacit kenacit saha rājan svena api dehena kim u jāyā ātma-ja ādibhiḥ
ekaḥ prasūyate jantuḥ ekaḥ eva pralīyate ekaḥ anubhuṅkte sukṛtam ekaḥ eva ca duṣkṛtam
adharma upacitam vittam haranti anye alpa-medhasaḥ sambhojanīya apadeśaiḥ jalāni iva jala-okasaḥ
puṣṇāti yān adharmeṇa sva-buddhyā tam apaṇḍitam te akṛta-artham prahiṇvanti prāṇāḥ rāyaḥ suta-ādayaḥ
svayam kilbiṣam ādāya taiḥ tyaktaḥ na artha kovidaḥ asiddha arthaḥ viśati andham sva dharma vimukhaḥ tamaḥ
tasmāt lokam imam rājan svapna māyā manaḥ-ratham vīkṣya āyamya ātmanā ātmānam samaḥ śāntaḥ bhava prabho
dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ uvāca yathā vadati kalyāṇīm vācam dāna pate bhavān tathā anayā na tṛpyāmi martyaḥ prāpya yathā amṛtam
tathā api sūnṛtā saumya hṛdi na sthīyate cale putra anurāga viṣame vidyut saudāmanī yathā
īśvarasya vidhim kaḥ nu vidhunoti anyathā pumān bhūmeḥ bhāra avatārāya yaḥ avatīrṇaḥ yadoḥ kule
yaḥ durvimarśa pathayā nija māyayā idam sṛṣṭvā guṇān vibhajate tat anupraviṣṭaḥ tasmai namaḥ duravabodha vihāra tantra saṁsāra cakra gataye parama-īśvarāya
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti abhipretya nṛpateḥ abhiprāyam saḥ yādavaḥ suhṛdbhiḥ samanujñātaḥ punaḥ yadu-purīm agāt
śaśaṁsa rāma-kṛṣṇābhyām dhṛtarāṣṭra-viceṣṭitam pāṇḍavān prati kauravya yat artham preṣitaḥ svayam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca astiḥ prāptiḥ ca kaṁsasya mahiṣyau bharata-ṛṣabha mṛte bhartari duḥkha ārte īyatuḥ sma pituḥ gṛhān
pitre magadha-rājāya jarāsandhāya duḥkhite vedayām cakratuḥ sarvam ātma vaidhavya kāraṇam
saḥ tat apriyam ākarṇya śoka amarṣa yutaḥ nṛpa ayādavīm mahīm kartum cakre paramam udyamam
akṣauhiṇībhiḥ viṁśatyā tisṛbhiḥ ca api saṁvṛtaḥ yadu rājadhānīm mathurām nyarudhat sarvataḥ diśam
nirīkṣya tat balam kṛṣṇaḥ udvelam iva sāgaram sva puram tena saṁruddham sva-janam ca bhaya ākulam cintayām āsa bhagavān hariḥ kāraṇa mānuṣaḥ tat deśa kāla anuguṇam sva-avatāra prayojanam
haniṣyāmi balam hi etat bhuvi bhāram samāhitam māgadhena samānītam vaśyānām sarva bhū-bhujām akṣauhiṇībhiḥ saṅkhyātam bhaṭa aśva ratha kuñjaraiḥ māgadhaḥ tu na hantavyaḥ bhūyaḥ kartā bala udyamam
etat arthaḥ avatāraḥ ayam bhū bhāra haraṇāya me saṁrakṣaṇāya sādhūnām kṛtaḥ anyeṣām vadhāya ca
anyaḥ api dharma rakṣāyai dehaḥ saṁbhriyate mayā virāmāya api adharmasya kāle prabhavataḥ kvacit
evam dhyāyati govinde ākāśāt sūrya varcasau rathau upasthitau sadyaḥ sa sūtau sa paricchadau
āyudhāni ca divyāni purāṇāni yadṛcchayā dṛṣṭvā tāni hṛṣīkeśaḥ saṅkarṣaṇam atha abravīt
paśya ārya vyasanam prāptam yadūnām tvā avatām prabho eṣaḥ te rathaḥ āyātaḥ dayitāni āyudhāni ca etat-artham hi nau janma sādhūnām īśa śarma kṛt trayaḥ-viṁśati anīka ākhyam bhūmeḥ bhāram apākuru
evam sammantrya dāśārhau daṁśitau rathinau purāt nirjagmatuḥ sva āyudha āḍhyau balena alpīyasā vṛtau
śaṅkham dadhmau vinirgatya hariḥ dāruka-sārathiḥ tataḥ abhūt para sainyānām hṛdi vitrāsa vepathuḥ
tau āha māgadhaḥ vīkṣya he kṛṣṇa puruṣa-adhama na tvayā yoddhum icchāmi bālena ekena lajjayā guptena hi tvayā manda na yotsye yāhi bandhu han
tava rāma yadi śraddhā yudhyasva dhairyam udvaha hitvā vā mat śaraiḥ chinnam deham svaḥ yāhi mām jahi
śrī-bhagavān uvāca na vai śūrāḥ vikatthante darśayanti eva pauruṣam na gṛhṇīmaḥ vacaḥ rājan āturasya mumūrṣataḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca jarā-sutaḥ tau abhisṛtya mādhavau mahā bala oghena balīyasā āvṛṇot sa sainya yāna dhvaja vāji sārathī sūrya analau vāyuḥ iva abhra reṇubhiḥ
suparṇa tāla dhvaja cihnitau rathau alakṣayantyaḥ hari-rāmayoḥ mṛdhe striyaḥ pura aṭṭālaka harmya gopuram samāśritāḥ sammumuhuḥ śucā arditāḥ
hariḥ para anīka payaḥ-mucām muhuḥ śilīmukha ati ulbaṇa varṣa pīḍitam sva sainyam ālokya sura asura arcitam vyasphūrjayat śārṅga śara-asana uttamam
gṛhṇan niśaṅgāt atha sandadhat śarān vikṛṣya muñcan śita bāṇa pūgān nighnan rathān kuñjara vāji pattīn nirantaram yadvat alāta-cakram
nirbhinna kumbhāḥ kariṇaḥ nipetuḥ anekaśaḥ aśvāḥ śara vṛkṇa kandharāḥ rathāḥ hata aśva dhvaja sūta nāyakāḥ padāyataḥ chinna bhuja ūru kandharāḥ
sañchidyamāna dvi-pada ibha vājinām aṅga prasūtāḥ śataśaḥ asṛk āpa-gaḥ bhuja ahayaḥ pūruṣa śīrṣa kacchapāḥ hata dvipa dvīpa haya graha ākulāḥ kara ūru mīnaḥ nara keśa śaivalāḥ dhanuḥ taraṅga āyudha gulma saṅkulāḥ acchūrikā āvarta bhayānakāḥ mahā-maṇi praveka ābharaṇa aśma śarkarāḥ pravartitāḥ bhīru bhaya-āvahāḥ mṛdhe manasvinām harṣa-karīḥ parasparam vinighnatā arīn muṣalena durmadān saṅkarṣaṇena aparimeya tejasā balam tat aṅga arṇava durga bhairavam duranta pāram magadha-indra pālitam kṣayam praṇītam vasudeva-putrayoḥ vikrīḍitam tat jagat īśayoḥ param
sthiti udbhava antam bhuvana-trayasya yaḥ samīhite ananta guṇaḥ sva-līlayā na tasya citram para pakṣa nigrahaḥ tathā api martya anuvidhasya varṇyate
jagrāha viratham rāmaḥ jarāsandham mahā balam hata anīka avaśiṣṭa asum siṁhaḥ siṁham iva ojasā
badhyamānam hata arātim pāśaiḥ vāruṇa mānuṣaiḥ vārayām āsa govindaḥ tena kārya cikīrṣayā
saḥ muktaḥ loka-nāthābhyām vrīḍitaḥ vīra sammataḥ tapase kṛta-saṅkalpaḥ vāritaḥ pathi rājabhiḥ vākyaiḥ pavitra artha padaiḥ nayanaiḥ prākṛtaiḥ api sva karma-bandha prāptaḥ ayam yadubhiḥ te parābhavaḥ
hateṣu sarva anīkeṣu nṛpaḥ bārhadrathaḥ tadā upekṣitah bhagavatā magadhān durmanāḥ yayau
mukundaḥ api akṣata balaḥ nistīrṇa ari bala arṇavaḥ vikīryamāṇaḥ kusumaiḥ tridaśaiḥ anumoditaḥ māthuraiḥ upasaṅgamya vijvaraiḥ mudita-ātmabhiḥ upagīyamāna vijayaḥ sūta māgadha vandibhiḥ
śaṅkha dundubhayaḥ neduḥ bherī tūryāṇi anekaśaḥ vīṇā-veṇu-mṛdaṅgāni puram praviśati prabhau sikta mārgām hṛṣṭa janām patākābhiḥ abhyalaṅkṛtām nirghuṣṭām brahma ghoṣeṇa kautuka ābaddha toraṇām
nicīyamānaḥ nārībhiḥ mālya dadhi akṣata aṅkuraiḥ nirīkṣyamāṇaḥ sa-sneham prīti utkalita locanaiḥ
āyodhana-gatam vittam anantam vīra bhūṣaṇam yadu-rājāya tat sarvam āhṛtam prādiśat prabhuḥ
evam sapta-daśa kṛtvaḥ tāvati akṣauhiṇī balaḥ yuyudhe māgadhaḥ rājā yadubhiḥ kṛṣṇa-pālitaiḥ
akṣiṇvan tat balam sarvam vṛṣṇayaḥ kṛṣṇa-tejasā hateṣu sveṣu anīkeṣu tyaktaḥ agāt aribhiḥ nṛpaḥ
aṣṭā-daśama saṅgrāme āgāmini tat-antarā nārada preṣitaḥ vīraḥ yavanaḥ pratyadṛśyata
rurodha mathurām etya tisṛbhiḥ mleccha koṭibhiḥ nṛ-loke ca apratidvandvaḥ vṛṣṇīn śrutvā ātma sammitān
tam dṛṣṭvā acintayat kṛṣṇaḥ saṅkarṣaṇa sahāya-van aho yadūnām vṛjinam prāptam hi ubhayataḥ mahat
yavanaḥ ayam nirundhe asmān adya tāvat mahā-balaḥ māgadhaḥ api adya vā śvaḥ vā para-śvaḥ vā āgamiṣyati
āvayoḥ yudhyatoḥ asya yadi āgantā jarā-sutaḥ bandhūn haniṣyati atha vā neṣyate sva puram balī
tasmāt adya vidhāsyāmaḥ durgam dvipada durgamam tatra jñātīn samādhāya yavanam ghātayāmahe
iti sammantrya bhagavān durgam dvādaśa-yojanam antaḥ samudre nagaram kṛtsna adbhutam acīkarat
dṛśyate yatra hi tvāṣṭram vijñānam śilpa naipuṇam rathyā catvara vīthībhiḥ yathā-vāstu vinirmitam sura druma latā udyāna vicitra upavana anvitam hema śṛṅgaiḥ divi spṛgbhiḥ sphaṭikā aṭṭāla gopuraiḥ rājata ārakuṭaiḥ koṣṭhaiḥ hema kumbhaiḥ alaṅkṛtaiḥ ratna kūtaiḥ gṛhaiḥ hemaiḥ mahā-mārakata sthalaiḥ vāstoḥ patīnām ca gṛhaiḥ vallabhībhiḥ ca nirmitam cātuḥ-varṇya jana ākīrṇam yadu-deva gṛha ullasat
sudharmām pārijātam ca mahā-indraḥ prāhiṇot hareḥ yatra ca avasthitaḥ martyaḥ martya-dharmaiḥ na yujyate
śyāma eka varṇān varuṇaḥ hayān śuklān manaḥ javān aṣṭau nidhi-patiḥ kośān loka-pālaḥ nija udayān
yat yat bhagavatā dattam ādhipatyam sva siddhaye sarvam pratyarpayām āsuḥ harau bhūmi gate nṛpa
tatra yoga prabhāvena nītvā sarva janam hariḥ prajā pālena rāmeṇa kṛṣṇaḥ samanumantritaḥ nirjagāma pura dvārāt padma mālī nirāyudhaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tam vilokya viniṣkrāntam ujjihānam iva uḍupam darśanīya-tamam śyāmam pīta kauśeya vāsasam śrīvatsa vakṣasam bhrājat kaustubha āmukta kandharam pṛthu dīrgha catuḥ bāhum nava kañja aruṇa īkṣaṇam nitya pramuditam śrīmat su kapolam śuci smitam mukha aravindam bibhrāṇam sphuran makara kuṇḍalam vāsudevaḥ hi ayam iti pumān śrīvatsa-lāñchanaḥ catuḥ-bhujaḥ aravinda-akṣaḥ vana mālī ati sundaraḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ nārada-proktaiḥ na anyaḥ bhavitum arhati nirāyudhaḥ calan padbhyām yotsye anena nirāyudhaḥ iti niścitya yavanaḥ prādravantam parāk mukham anvadhāvat jighṛkṣuḥ tam durāpam api yoginām
hasta prāptam iva ātmānam hariṇā saḥ pade pade nītaḥ darśayatā dūram yavana-īśaḥ adri kandaram
palāyanam yadu-kule jātasya tava na ucitam iti kṣipan anugataḥ na enam prāpa ahata aśubhaḥ
evam kṣiptaḥ api bhagavān prāviśat giri-kandaram saḥ api praviṣṭaḥ tatra anyam śayānam dadṛśe naram
nanu asau dūram ānīya śete mām iha sādhu-vat iti matvā acyutam mūḍhaḥ tam padā samatāḍayat
saḥ utthāya ciram suptaḥ śanaiḥ unmīlya locane diśaḥ vilokayan pārśve tam adrākṣīt avasthitam
saḥ tāvat tasya ruṣṭasya dṛṣṭi pātena bhārata deha-jena agninā dagdhaḥ bhasma-sāt abhavat kṣaṇāt
śrī-rājā uvāca kaḥ nāma saḥ pumān brahman kasya kim vīryaḥ eva ca kasmāt guhām gataḥ śiṣye kim tejaḥ yavana ardanaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca saḥ ikṣvāku-kule jātaḥ māndhātṛ-tanayaḥ mahān mucukundaḥ iti khyātaḥ brahmaṇyaḥ satya saṅgaraḥ
saḥ yācitaḥ sura-gaṇaiḥ indra-ādyaiḥ ātma rakṣaṇe asurebhyaḥ paritrastaiḥ tat rakṣām saḥ akarot ciram
labdhvā guham te svaḥ pālam mucukundam atha abruvan rājan viramatām kṛcchrāt bhavān naḥ paripālanāt
nara-lokam parityajya rājyam nihata kaṇṭakam asmān pālayataḥ vīra kāmaḥ te sarve ujjhitāḥ
sutāḥ mahiṣyaḥ bhavataḥ jñātayaḥ amātya mantriṇaḥ prajāḥ ca tulya-kālīnāḥ na adhunā santi kālitāḥ
kālaḥ balīyān balinām bhagavān īśvaraḥ avyayaḥ prajāḥ kālayate krīḍan paśu-pālaḥ yathā paśūn
varam vṛṇīṣva bhadram te ṛte kaivalyam adya naḥ ekaḥ eva īśvaraḥ tasya bhagavān viṣṇuḥ avyayaḥ
evam uktaḥ saḥ vai devān abhivandya mahā yaśāḥ aśayiṣṭa guhā-viṣṭaḥ nidrayā deva dattayā
yavane bhasma-sāt nīte bhagavān sātvata ṛṣabhaḥ ātmānam darśayām āsa mucukundāya dhī-mate
tam ālokya ghana śyāmam pīta kauśeya vāsasam śrīvatsa vakṣasam bhrājat kaustubhena virājitam catuḥ-bhujam rocamānam vaijayantyā ca mālayā cāru prasanna vadanam sphurat makara kuṇḍalam prekṣaṇīyam nṛ-lokasya sa anurāga smita īkṣaṇam apīvya vayasam matta mṛga-indra udāra vikramam parya-pṛcchat mahā-buddhiḥ tejasā tasya dharṣitaḥ śaṅkitaḥ śanakaiḥ rājā durdharṣam iva tejasā
śrī-mucukundaḥ uvāca kaḥ bhavān iha samprāptaḥ vipine giri-gahvare padbhyām padma palāśābhyām vicarasi uru-kaṇṭake
kim svit tejasvinām tejaḥ bhagavān vā vibhāvasuḥ sūryaḥ somaḥ mahā-indraḥ va loka pālaḥ aparaḥ api vā
manye tvām deva-devānām trayāṇām puruṣa ṛṣabham yat bādhase guha dhvāntam pradīpaḥ prabhayā yathā
śuśrūṣatām avyalīkam asmākam nara pum-gava sva janma karma gotram vā kathyatām yadi rocate
vayam tu puruṣa vyāghra aikṣvākāḥ kṣatra bandhavaḥ mucukundaḥ iti proktaḥ yauvanāśva ātma-jaḥ prabho
cira prajāgara śrāntaḥ nidrayā apahata indriyaḥ śaye asmin vijane kāmam kena api utthāpitaḥ adhunā
saḥ api bhasmī-kṛtaḥ nūnam ātmīyena eva pāpmanā anantaram bhavān śrīmān lakṣitaḥ amitra śāsanaḥ
tejasā te aviṣahyeṇa bhūri draṣṭum na śaknumaḥ hata ojasā mahā-bhaga mānanīyaḥ asi dehinam
evam sambhāṣitaḥ rājñā bhagavān bhūta bhāvanaḥ pratyāha prahasan vāṇyā megha nāda gabhīrayā
śrī-bhagavān uvāca janma karma abhidhānāni santi me aṅga sahasraśaḥ na śakyante anusaṅkhyātum anantatvāt mayā api hi
kvacit rajāṁsi vimame pārthivāni uru-janmabhiḥ guṇa karma abhidhānāni na me janmāni karhicit
kāla traya upapannāni janma karmāṇi me nṛpa anukramantaḥ na eva antam gacchanti parama ṛṣayaḥ
tathā api adyatanāni aṅga śṛṇuṣva gadataḥ mama vijñāpitaḥ viriñcena purā aham dharma guptaye bhūmeḥ bhārāyamāṇānām asurāṇām kṣayāya ca avatīrṇaḥ yadu kule gṛhe ānakadundubheḥ vadanti vāsudevaḥ iti vasudeva-sutam hi mām
kālanemiḥ hataḥ kaṁsaḥ pralamba ādyāḥ ca sat dviṣaḥ ayam ca yavanaḥ dagdhaḥ rājan te tigma cakṣuṣā
saḥ aham tava anugraha artham guhām etām upāgataḥ prārthitaḥ pracuram pūrvam tvayā aham bhakta vatsalaḥ
varān vṛṇīṣva rāja-ṛṣe sarvān kāmān dadāmi te mām prasannaḥ janaḥ kaścit na bhūyaḥ arhati śocitum
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti uktaḥ tam praṇamya āha mucukundaḥ mudā anvitaḥ jñātvā nārāyaṇam devam garga-vākyam anusmaran
śrī-mucukundaḥ uvāca vimohitaḥ ayam janaḥ īśa māyayā tvadīyayā tvām na bhajati anartha-dṛk sukhāya duḥkha prabhaveṣu sajjate gṛheṣu yoṣit puruṣaḥ ca vañcitaḥ
labdhvā janaḥ durlabham atra mānuṣam kathañcit avyaṅgam ayatnataḥ anagha pāda aravindam na bhajati asat matiḥ gṛha andha kūpe patitaḥ yathā paśuḥ
mama eṣaḥ kālaḥ ajita niṣphalaḥ gataḥ rājya śriyā unnaddha madasya bhūpateḥ martya ātma buddheḥ suta dāra kośa bhūṣu āsajjamānasya duranta cintayā
kalevare asmin ghaṭa kuḍya sannibhe nirūḍha mānaḥ nara-devaḥ iti aham vṛtaḥ ratha ibha aśva padāti anīkapaiḥ gām paryaṭan tvā agaṇayan su-durmadaḥ
pramattam uccaiḥ iti-kṛtya cintayā pravṛddha lobham viṣayeṣu lālasam tvam apramattaḥ sahasā abhipadyase kṣut lelihānaḥ ahiḥ iva ākhum antakaḥ
purā rathaiḥ hema pariṣkṛtaiḥ caran matam gajaiḥ vā nara-deva saṁjñitaḥ saḥ eva kālena duratyayena te kalevaraḥ viṭ kṛmi bhasma saṁjñitaḥ
nirjitya dik cakram abhūta vigrahaḥ vara-āsana sthaḥ sama rāja vanditaḥ gṛheṣu maithunya sukheṣu yoṣitām krīḍā-mṛgaḥ puruṣaḥ īśa nīyate
karoti karmāṇi tapaḥ su-niṣṭhitaḥ nivṛtta bhogaḥ tat apekṣayā adadat punaḥ ca bhūyāsam aham sva-rāṭ iti pravṛddha tarṣaḥ na sukhāya kalpate
bhava apavargaḥ bhramataḥ yadā bhavet janasya tarhi acyuta sat samāgamaḥ sat-saṇgamaḥ yarhi tadā eva sat gatau para avara īśe tvayi jāyate matiḥ
manye mama anugrahaḥ īśa te kṛtaḥ rājya anubandha apagamaḥ yadṛcchayā yaḥ prārthyate sādhubhiḥ eka-caryayā vanam vivikṣadbhiḥ akhaṇḍa bhūmi paiḥ
na kāmaye anyam tava pāda sevanāt akiñcana prārthya-tamāt varam vibho ārādhya kaḥ tvām hi apavarga dam hare vṛṇīta āryaḥ varam ātma bandhanam
tasmāt visṛjya āśiṣaḥ īśa sarvataḥ rajaḥ tamaḥ sattva guṇa anu-bandhanāḥ nirañjanam nirguṇam advayam param tvām jñāpti-mātram puruṣam vrajāmi aham
ciram iha vṛjina ārtaḥ tapyamānaḥ anutāpaiḥ avitṛṣa ṣaṭ amitraḥ alabdha śāntiḥ kathañcit śaraṇa da samupetaḥ tvat pada-abjam para-ātman abhayam ṛtam aśokam pāhi mā āpannam īśa
śrī-bhagavān uvāca sārvabhauma mahā-rāja matiḥ te vimala ūrjitā varaiḥ pralobhitasya api na kāmaiḥ vihatā yataḥ
pralobhitaḥ varaiḥ yat tvam apramādāya viddhi tat na dhīḥ ekānta bhaktānām āśīrbhiḥ bhidyate kvacit
yuñjānānām abhaktānām prāṇāyāma ādibhiḥ manaḥ akṣīṇa vāsanam rājan dṛśyate punaḥ utthitam
vicarasva mahīm kāmam mayi āveśita mānasaḥ astu evam nityadā tubhyam bhaktiḥ mayi anapāyinī
kṣātra dharma sthitaḥ jantūn nyavadhīḥ mṛgayā ādibhiḥ samāhitaḥ tat tapasā jahi agham mat upāśritaḥ
janmani anantare rājan sarva bhūta suhṛt-tamaḥ bhūtvā dvija-varaḥ tvam vai mam upaiṣyasi kevalam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ittham saḥ anugrahītaḥ aṅga kṛṣṇena ikṣvāku-nandanaḥ tam parikramya sannamya niścakrāma guhā mukhāt
saṁvīkṣya kṣullakān martyān paśūn vīrut vanaspatīn matvā kali-yugam prāptam jagāma diśam uttarām
tapaḥ śraddhā yutaḥ dhīraḥ niḥsaṅgaḥ mukta saṁśayaḥ samādhāya manaḥ kṛṣṇe prāviśat gandhamādanam
badarī-āśramam āsādya nara-nārāyaṇa ālayam sarva dvandva sahaḥ śāntaḥ tapasā ārādhayat harim
bhagavān punaḥ āvrajya purīm yavana veṣṭitām hatvā mleccha balam ninye tadīyam dvārakām dhanam
nīyamāne dhane gobhiḥ nṛbhiḥ ca acyuta coditaiḥ ājugāma jarāsandhaḥ trayaḥ viṁśati anīka paḥ
vilokya vega rabhasam ripu sainyasya mādhavau manuṣya ceṣṭām āpannau rājan dudruvatuḥ drutam
vihāya vittam pracuram abhītau bhīru bhīta-vat padbhyām padma palāśābhyām celatuḥ bahu-yojanam
palāyamānau tau dṛṣṭvā māgadhaḥ prahasan balī anvadhāvat ratha anīkaiḥ īśayoḥ apramāṇa-vit
pradrutya dūram saṁśrāntau tuṅgam āruhatām girim pravarṣaṇa-ākhyam bhagavān nityadā yatra varṣati
girau nilīnau ājñāya na adhigamya padam nṛpa dadāha girim edhobhiḥ samantāt agnim utsṛjan
tataḥ utpatya tarasā dahyamāna taṭāt ubhau daśa-eka yojanāt tuṅgāt nipetatuḥ adhaḥ bhuvi
alakṣyamāṇau ripuṇā sa anugena yadu uttamau sva-puram punaḥ āyātau samudra parikhām nṛpa
saḥ api dagdhau iti mṛṣā manvānaḥ bala-keśavau balam ākṛṣya su-mahat magadhān māgadhaḥ yayau
ānarta adhipatiḥ śrīmān raivataḥ raivatīm sutām brahmaṇā coditaḥ prādāt balāya iti purā uditam
bhagavān api govindaḥ upayeme kuru-udvaha vaidarbhīm bhīṣmaka-sutām śriyaḥ mātrām svayam-vare pramathya tarasā rājñaḥ śālva-ādīn caidya pakṣa-gān paśyatām sarva lokānām tārkṣya-putraḥ sudhām iva
śrī-rājā uvāca bhagavān bhīṣmaka-sutām rukmiṇīm rucira ānanām rākṣasena vidhānena upayeme iti śrutam
bhagavan śrotum icchāmi kṛṣṇasya amita tejasaḥ yathā māgadha-śālva-ādīn jitvā kanyām upāharat
brahman kṛṣṇa-kathāḥ puṇyāḥ mādhvīḥ loka mala apahāḥ kaḥ nu tṛpyeta śṛṇvānaḥ śruta jñaḥ nitya nūtanāḥ
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca rājā āsīt bhīṣmakaḥ nāma vidarbha-adhipatiḥ mahān tasya pañca abhavan putrāḥ kanyā ekā ca vara ānanā
rukmī agra-jaḥ rukma-rathaḥ rukmabāhuḥ anantaraḥ rukma-keśaḥ rukma-mālī rukmiṇī eṣā svasā satī
sā upaśrutya mukundasya rūpa vīrya guṇa śriyaḥ gṛha āgataiḥ gīyamānāḥ tam mene sadṛśam patim
tām buddhi lakṣaṇa audārya rūpa śīla guṇa āśrayām kṛṣṇaḥ ca sadṛśīm bhāryām samudvoḍhum manaḥ dadhe
bandhūnām icchatām dātum kṛṣṇāya bhaginīm nṛpa tataḥ nivārya kṛṣṇa-dviṭ rukmī caidyam amanyata
tat avetya asita apāṅgī vaidarbhī durmanā bhṛśam vicintya āptam dvijam kañcit kṛṣṇāya prāhiṇot drutam
dvārakām saḥ samabhyetya pratīhāraiḥ praveśitaḥ apaśyat ādyam puruṣam āsīnam kāñcana āsane
dṛṣṭvā brahmaṇya devaḥ tam avaruhya nija āsanāt upaveśya arhayām cakre yathā ātmānam diva-okasaḥ
tam bhuktavantam viśrāntam upagamya satām gatiḥ pāṇinā abhimṛśan pādau avyagraḥ tam apṛcchata
kaccit dvija vara śreṣṭha dharmaḥ te vṛddha sammataḥ vartate na ati kṛcchreṇa santuṣṭa manasaḥ sadā
santuṣṭaḥ yarhi varteta brāhmaṇaḥ yena kenacit ahīyamānaḥ svāt dharmāt saḥ hi asya akhila kāma-dhuk
asantuṣṭaḥ asakṛt lokān āpnoti api sura īśvaraḥ akiñcanaḥ api santuṣṭaḥ śete sarva aṅga vijvaraḥ
viprān sva lābha santuṣṭān sādhūn bhūta suhṛt-tamān nirahaṅkāriṇaḥ śāntān namasye śirasā asakṛt
kaccit vaḥ kuśalam brahman rājataḥ yasya hi prajāḥ sukham vasanti viṣaye pālyamānāḥ saḥ me priyaḥ
yataḥ tvam āgataḥ durgam nistīrya iha yat icchayā sarvam naḥ brūhi aguhyam cet kim kāryam karavāma te
evam sampṛṣṭa sampraśnaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinā līla gṛhīta dehena tasmai sarvam avarṇayat
śrī-rukmiṇī uvāca śrutvā guṇān bhuvana sundara śṛṇvatām te nirviśya karṇa vivaraiḥ harataḥ aṅga tāpam rūpam dṛśām dṛśi-matām akhila artha lābham tvayi acyuta āviśati cittam apatrapam me
kā tvā mukunda mahatī kula śīla rūpa vidyā vayaḥ draviṇa dhāmabhiḥ ātma tulyam dhīrā patim kula-vatī na vṛṇīta kanyā kāle nṛ siṁha nara-loka manaḥ abhirāmam
tat me bhavān khalu vṛtaḥ patiḥ aṅga jāyām ātmā arpitaḥ ca bhavataḥ atra vibho vidhehi mā vīra bhāgam abhimarśatu caidyaḥ ārāt gomāyu-vat mṛga-pateḥ balim ambuja-akṣa
pūrta iṣṭa datta niyama vrata deva vipra guru arcana ādibhiḥ alam bhagavān para īśaḥ ārādhitaḥ yadi gada-agrajaḥ etya pāṇim gṛhṇātu me na damaghoṣa-suta ādayaḥ anye
śvaḥ bhāvini tvam ajita udvahane vidarbhān guptaḥ sametya pṛtanā patibhiḥ parītaḥ nirmathya caidya magadha-indra balam prasahya mām rākṣasena vidhinā udvaha vīrya śulkām
antaḥ-pura antara carīm anihatya bandhūn tvām udvahe katham iti pravadāmi upāyam pūrve-dyuḥ asti mahatī kula deva yātrā yasyām bahiḥ nava vadhūḥ girijām upeyāt
yasya aṅghri paṅkaja rajaḥ snapanam mahāntaḥ vāñchanti umā-patiḥ iva ātma tamaḥ apahatyai yarhi ambuja-akṣa na labheya bhavat prasādam jahyām asūn vrata kṛśān śata janmabhiḥ syāt
brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca iti ete guhya sandeśāḥ yadu-deva mayā āhṛtāḥ vimṛśya kartum yat ca atra kriyatām tat anantaram
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca vaidarbhyāḥ saḥ tu sandeśam niśamya yadu-nandanaḥ pragṛhya pāṇinā pāṇim prahasan idam abravīt
śrī-bhagavān uvāca tathā aham api tat cittaḥ nidrām ca na labhe niśi veda aham rukmiṇā dveṣāt mama udvāhaḥ nivāritaḥ
tām ānayiṣye unmathya rājanya apasadān mṛdhe mat parām anavadya aṅgīm edhasaḥ agni śikhām iva
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca udvāha ṛkṣam ca vijñāya rukmiṇyāḥ madhusūdanaḥ rathaḥ saṁyujyatām āśu dāruka iti āha sārathim
saḥ ca aśvaiḥ śaibya-sugrīva-meghapuṣpa-balāhakaiḥ yuktam ratham upānīya tasthau prāñjaliḥ agrataḥ
āruhya syandanam śauriḥ dvijam āropya tūrṇa-gaiḥ ānartāt eka rātreṇa vidarbhān agamat hayaiḥ
rājā saḥ kuṇḍina-patiḥ putra sneha vaśa anugaḥ śiśupālāya svām kanyām dāsyan karmāṇi akārayat
puram sammṛṣṭa saṁsikta mārga rathyā catuḥ-patham citra dhvaja patākābhiḥ toraṇaiḥ samalaṅkṛtam srak gandha mālya ābharaṇaiḥ virajaḥ ambara bhūṣitaiḥ juṣṭam strī puruṣaiḥ śrī-mat gṛhaiḥ aguru-dhūpitaiḥ
pitṝn devān samabhyarcya viprān ca vidhi-vat nṛpa bhojayitvā yathā nyāyam vācayām āsa maṅgalam
su-snātām su-datīm kanyām kṛta kautuka-maṅgalām āhata aṁśuka yugmena bhūṣitām bhūṣaṇa uttamaiḥ
cakruḥ sāma-ṛg-yajuḥ mantraiḥ vadhvāḥ rakṣām dvija-uttamaḥ purohitaḥ atharva-vit vai juhāva graha śāntaye
hiraṇya rūpya vāsāṁsi tilān ca guḍa miśritān prādāt dhenūḥ ca viprebhyaḥ rājā vidhi vidām varaḥ
evam cedi-patiḥ rājā damaghoṣaḥ sutāya vai kārayām āsa mantra-jñaiḥ sarvam abhyudaya ucitam
mada cyudbhiḥ gaja anīkaiḥ syandanaiḥ hema mālibhiḥ patti aśva saṅkulaiḥ sainyaiḥ parītaḥ kuṇḍinam yayau
tam vai vidarbha-adhipatiḥ samabhyetya abhipūjya ca niveśayām āsa mudā kalpita anya niveśane
tatra śālvaḥ jarāsandhaḥ dantavakraḥ vidūrathaḥ ājagmuḥ caidya pakṣīyāḥ pauṇḍraka ādyāḥ sahasraśaḥ
kṛṣṇa-rāma-dviṣaḥ yattāḥ kanyām caidyāya sādhitum yadi āgatya haret kṛṣṇaḥ rāma ādyaiḥ yadubhiḥ vṛtaḥ yotsyāmaḥ saṁhatāḥ tena iti niścita-mānasāḥ ājagmuḥ bhū-bhujaḥ sarve samagra bala vāhanāḥ
śrutvā etat bhagavān rāmaḥ vipakṣīya nṛpa udyamam kṛṣṇam ca ekam gatam hartum kanyām kalaha śaṅkitaḥ balena mahatā sārdham bhrātṛ sneha pariplutaḥ tvaritaḥ kuṇḍinam prāgāt gaja aśva ratha pattibhiḥ
bhīṣma-kanyā vara-ārohā kāṅkṣantī āgamanam hareḥ pratyāpattim apaśyantī dvijasya acintayat tadā
aho tri-yāma antaritaḥ udvāhaḥ me alpa rādhasaḥ na āgacchati aravinda-akṣaḥ na aham vedmi atra kāraṇam saḥ api na āvartate adya api mat sandeśa haraḥ dvijaḥ
api mayi anavadya ātmā dṛṣṭvā kiñcit jugupsitam mat pāṇi grahaṇe nūnam na āyāti hi kṛta-udyamaḥ
durbhagāyāḥ na me dhātā na anukūlaḥ mahā-īśvaraḥ devī vā vimukhī gaurī rudrāṇī giri-jā satī
evam cintayatī bālā govinda hṛta mānasā nyamīlayata kāla jñā netre ca aśru-kalā ākule
evam vadhvāḥ pratīkṣantyāḥ govinda-āgamanam nṛpa vāmaḥ ūruḥ bhujaḥ netram asphuran priya bhāṣiṇaḥ
atha kṛṣṇa-vinirdiṣṭaḥ saḥ eva dvija sat-tamaḥ antaḥ-pura carīm devīm rāja putrīm dadarśa ha
sa tam prahṛṣṭa vadanam avyagra ātma gatim satī ālakṣya lakṣaṇa abhijñā samapṛcchat śuci smitā
tasyāḥ āvedayat prāptam śaśaṁsa yadu-nandanam uktam ca satya vacanam ātma upanayanam prati
tam āgatam samājñāya vaidarbhī hṛṣṭa mānasā na paśyantī brāhmaṇāya priyam anyat nanāma sā
prāptau śrutvā sva duhituḥ udvāha prekṣaṇa utsukau abhyayāt tūrya ghoṣeṇa. rāma-kṛṣṇau samarhaṇaiḥ
madhu-parkam upānīya vāsāṁsi virajāṁsi saḥ upāyanāni abhīṣṭāni vidhi-vat samapūjayat
tayoḥ niveśanam śrī-mat upākalpya mahā-matiḥ sa sainyayoḥ sa anugayoḥ ātithyam vidadhe yathā
evam rājñām sametānām yathā vīryam yathā vayaḥ yathā balam yathā vittam sarvaiḥ kāmaiḥ samarhayat
kṛṣṇam āgatam ākarṇya vidarbha-pura vāsinaḥ āgatya netra añjalibhiḥ papuḥ tat mukha paṅkajam
asya eva bhāryā bhavitum rukmiṇī arhati na aparā asau api anavadya ātmā bhaiṣmyāḥ samucitaḥ patiḥ
kiñcit su-caritam yat naḥ tena tuṣṭaḥ tri-loka kṛt anugṛhṇātu gṛhṇātu vaidarbhyāḥ pāṇim acyutaḥ
evam prema kalā baddhāḥ vadanti sma pura-okasaḥ kanyā ca antaḥ-purāt prāgāt bhaṭaiḥ guptā ambikā-ālayam
padbhyām viniryayau draṣṭum bhavānyāḥ pāda-pallavam sā ca anudhyāyatī samyak mukunda caraṇa-ambujam yata-vāk mātṛbhiḥ sārdham sakhībhiḥ parivāritā guptā rāja bhaṭaiḥ śūraiḥ sannaddhaiḥ udyata āyudhaiḥ mṛdaṅga-śaṅkha-paṇavāḥ tūrya bheryaḥ ca jaghnire
nānā upahāra balibhiḥ vāra-mukhyāḥ sahasraśaḥ srak gandha vastra ābharaṇaiḥ dvija patnyaḥ sv-alaṅkṛtāḥ gāyantyaḥ ca stuvantaḥ ca gāyakāḥ vādya-vādakāḥ parivārya vadhūm jagmuḥ sūta māgadha vandinaḥ
āsādya devī sadanam dhauta pāda kara ambujā upaspṛśya śuciḥ śāntā praviveśa ambikā-antikam
tām vai pravayasaḥ bālām vidhi jñāḥ vipra yoṣitaḥ bhavānīm vandayām cakruḥ bhava-patnīm bhava-anvitām
namasye tvā ambike abhīkṣṇam sva santāna yutām śivām bhūyāt patiḥ me bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ tat anumodatām
adbhiḥ gandha akṣataiḥ dhūpaiḥ vāsaḥ srak mālya bhūṣaṇaiḥ nānā upahāra balibhiḥ pradīpa āvalibhiḥ pṛthak vipra-striyaḥ pati matīḥ tathā taiḥ samapūjayat lavaṇa āpūpa tāmbūla kaṇṭha-sūtra phala ikṣubhiḥ
tasyai striyaḥ tāḥ pradaduḥ śeṣām yuyujuḥ āśiṣaḥ tābhyaḥ devyai namaḥ cakre śeṣām ca jagṛhe vadhūḥ
muni vratam atha tyaktvā niścakrāma ambikā-gṛhāt pragṛhya pāṇinā bhṛtyām ratna mudrā upaśobhinā
tām deva māyām iva dhīra mohinīm su-madhyamām kuṇḍala maṇḍita ānanām śyāmām nitamba arpita ratna mekhalām vyañjat stanīm kuntala śaṅkita īkṣaṇām śuci smitām bimba-phala adhara dyuti śoṇāyamāna dvija kunda kuḍmalām padā calantīm kala-haṁsa gāminīm siñjat kalā nūpura dhāma śobhinā vilokya vīrāḥ mumuhuḥ samāgatāḥ yaśasvinaḥ tat kṛta hṛt-śaya arditāḥ yām vīkṣya te nṛ-patayaḥ tat udāra hāsa vrīḍā avaloka hṛta cetasaḥ ujjhita astrāḥ petuḥ kṣitau gaja ratha aśva gatāḥ vimūḍhāḥ yātrā chalena haraye arpayatīm sva śobhām sā evam śanaiḥ calayatī cala padma kośau prāptim tadā bhagavataḥ prasamīkṣamāṇā utsārya vāma kara-jaiḥ alakān apāṅgaiḥ prāptān hriyā aikṣata nṛpān dadṛśe acyutam ca tām rāja-kanyām ratham ārurukṣatīm jahāra kṛṣṇaḥ dviṣatām samīkṣatām
ratham samāropya suparṇa lakṣaṇam rājanya cakram paribhūya mādhavaḥ tataḥ yayau rāma puraḥ-gamaḥ śanaiḥ śṛgāla madhyāt iva bhāga hṛt hariḥ
tam māninaḥ sva abhibhavam yaśaḥ kṣayam pare jarāsandha-mukhāḥ na sehire aho dhik asmān yaśaḥ ātta-dhanvanām gopaiḥ hṛtam keśariṇām mṛgaiḥ iva
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti sarve su-saṁrabdhāḥ vāhān āruhya daṁśitāḥ svaiḥ svaiḥ balaiḥ parikrāntāḥ anvīyuḥ dhṛta kārmukāḥ
tān āpatataḥ ālokya yādava-anīka yūtha-paḥ tasthuḥ tat sammukhāḥ rājan visphūrjya sva dhanūṁṣi te
aśva-pṛṣṭhe gaja skandhe ratha upasthe astra kovidāḥ mumucuḥ śara varṣāṇi meghāḥ adriṣu apaḥ yathā
patyuḥ balam śara āsāraiḥ channam vīkṣya su-madhyamā sa-vrīḍam aikṣat tat vaktram bhaya vihvala locanā
prahasya bhagavān āha mā sma bhaiḥ vāma-locane vinaṅkṣyati adhunā eva etat tāvakaiḥ śātravam balam
teṣām tat vikramam vīrāḥ gada saṅkarṣaṇa ādayaḥ amṛṣyamāṇāḥ nārācaiḥ jaghnuḥ haya gajān rathān
petuḥ śirāṁsi rathinām aśvinām gajinām bhuvi sa kuṇḍala kirīṭāni sa uṣṇīṣāṇi ca koṭiśaḥ
hastāḥ sa asi gadā iṣu-āsāḥ karabhāḥ ūravaḥ aṅghrayaḥ aśva aśvatara nāga uṣṭra khara martya śirāṁsi ca
hanyamāna bala-anīkāḥ vṛṣṇibhiḥ jaya kāṅkṣibhiḥ rājānaḥ vimukhāḥ jagmuḥ jarāsandha-puraḥ-sarāḥ
śiśupālam samabhyetya hṛta dāram iva āturam naṣṭa tviṣam gata utsāham śuṣyat vadanam abruvan
bhoḥ bhoḥ puruṣa śārdūla daurmana-syam idam tyaja na priya apriyayoḥ rājan niṣṭhā dehiṣu dṛśyate
yathā dāru-mayī yoṣit nṛtyate kuhaka icchayā evam īśvara tantraḥ ayam īhate sukha duḥkhayoḥ
śaureḥ sapta-daśa aham vai saṁyugāni parājitaḥ trayaḥ-viṁśatibhiḥ sainyaiḥ jigye ekam aham param
tathā api aham na śocāmi na prahṛṣyāmi karhicit kālena daiva yuktena jānan vidrāvitam jagat
adhunā api vayam sarve vīra yūtha-pa yūtha-pāḥ parājitāḥ phalgu tantraiḥ yadubhiḥ kṛṣṇa-pālitaiḥ
ripavaḥ jigyuḥ adhunā kāle ātma anusārīṇi tadā vayam vijeṣyāmaḥ yadā kālaḥ pradakṣiṇaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam prabodhitaḥ mitraiḥ caidyaḥ agāt sa-anugaḥ puram hata śeṣāḥ punaḥ te api yayuḥ svam svam puram nṛpāḥ
rukmī tu rākṣasa udvāham kṛṣṇa-dviṭ asahan svasuḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ anvagamat kṛṣṇam akṣauhiṇyā vṛtaḥ balī
rukmī amarṣī su-saṁrabdhaḥ śṛṇvatām sarva bhū-bhujām pratijajñe mahā-bāhuḥ daṁśitaḥ sa-śarāsanaḥ ahatvā samare kṛṣṇam apratyūhya ca rukmiṇīm kuṇḍinam na pravekṣyāmi satyam etat bravīmi vaḥ
iti uktvā ratham āruhya sārathim prāha satvaraḥ codaya aśvān yataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ tasya me saṁyugam bhavet
adya aham niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ gopālasya su-durmateḥ neṣye vīrya madam yena svasā me prasabham hṛtā
vikatthamānaḥ ku-matiḥ īśvarasya apramāṇa-vit rathena ekena govindam tiṣṭha tiṣṭha iti atha āhvayat
dhanuḥ vikṛṣya su dṛḍham jaghne kṛṣṇam tribhiḥ śaraiḥ āha ca atra kṣaṇam tiṣṭha yadūnām kula pāṁsana
yatra yāsi svasāram me muṣitvā dhvāṅkṣa-vat haviḥ hariṣye adya madam manda māyinaḥ kūṭa yodhinaḥ
yāvat na me hataḥ bāṇaiḥ śayīthaḥ muñca dārīkām smayan kṛṣṇaḥ dhanuḥ chittvā ṣaḍbhiḥ vivyādha rukmiṇam
aṣṭabhiḥ caturaḥ vāhān dvābhyām sūtam dhvajam tribhiḥ saḥ ca anyat dhanuḥ ādhāya kṛṣṇam vivyādha pañcabhiḥ
taiḥ tāḍitaḥ śara oghaiḥ tu ciccheda dhanuḥ acyutaḥ punaḥ anyat upādatta tat api acchinat avyayaḥ
parigham paṭṭiśam śūlam carma-asī śakti tomarau yat yat āyudham ādatta tat sarvam saḥ acchinat hariḥ
tataḥ rathāt avaplutya khaḍga paṇiḥ jighāṁsayā kṛṣṇam abhyadravat kruddhaḥ pataṅgaḥ iva pāvakam
tasya ca āpatataḥ khaḍgam tilaśaḥ carma ca iṣubhiḥ chittvā asim ādade tigmam rukmiṇam hantum udyataḥ
dṛṣṭvā bhrātṛ vadha udyogam rukmiṇī bhaya vihvalā patitvā pādayoḥ bhartuḥ uvāca karuṇam satī
śrī-rukmiṇī uvāca yoga-īśvara aprameya-ātman deva-deva jagat-pate hantum na arhasi kalyāṇa bhrātaram me mahā-bhuja
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tayā paritrāsa vikampita aṅgayā śucā avaśuṣyat mukha ruddha kaṇṭhayā kātarya visraṁsita hema mālayā gṛhīta pādaḥ karuṇaḥ nyavartata
cailena baddhvā tam asādhu-kāriṇam sa-śmaśru-keśam pravapan vyarūpayat tāvat mamarduḥ para sainyam adbhutam yadu-pravīrāḥ nalinīm yathā gajāḥ
kṛṣṇa antikam upavrajya dadṛśuḥ tatra rukmiṇam tathā-bhūtam hata prāyam dṛṣṭvā saṅkarṣaṇaḥ vibhuḥ vimucya baddham karuṇaḥ bhagavān kṛṣṇam abravīt
asādhu idam tvayā kṛṣṇa kṛtam asmat jugupsitam vapanam śmaśru-keśānām vairūpyam suhṛdaḥ vadhaḥ
mā eva asmān sādhvi asūyethāḥ bhrātuḥ vairūpya cintayā sukha duḥkha daḥ na ca anyaḥ asti yataḥ sva kṛta bhuk pumān
bandhuḥ vadha arha doṣaḥ api na bandhoḥ vadham arhati tyājyaḥ svena eva doṣeṇa hataḥ kim hanyate punaḥ
kṣatriyāṇām ayam dharmaḥ prajāpati vinirmitaḥ bhrātā api bhrātaram hanyāt yena ghora-tamaḥ tataḥ
rājyasya bhūmeḥ vittasya striyaḥ mānasya tejasaḥ māninaḥ anyasya vā hetoḥ śrī mada andhāḥ kṣipanti hi
tava iyam viṣamā buddhiḥ sarva-bhūteṣu durhṛdām yat manyase sadā abhadram suhṛdām bhadram ajña-vat
ātma mohaḥ nṛṇām eva kalpate deva māyayā suhṛt durhṛt udāsīnaḥ iti deha ātma māninām
ekaḥ eva paraḥ hi ātmā sarveṣām api dehinām nānā iva gṛhyate mūḍhaiḥ yathā jyotiḥ yathā nabhaḥ
dehaḥ ādi anta vān eṣaḥ dravya prāṇa guṇa ātmakaḥ ātmani avidyayā kḷptaḥ saṁsārayati dehinam
na ātmanaḥ anyena saṁyogaḥ viyogaḥ ca asataḥ sati tat hetutvāt tat prasiddheḥ dṛk rūpābhyām yathā raveḥ
janma-ādayaḥ tu dehasya vikriyāḥ na ātmanaḥ kvacit kalānām iva na eva indoḥ mṛtiḥ hi asya kuhūḥ iva
yathā śayānaḥ ātmānam viṣayān phalam eva ca anubhuṅkte api asati arthe tathā āpnoti abudhaḥ bhavam
tasmāt ajñāna jam śokam ātma śoṣa vimohanam tattva jñānena nirhṛtya sva-sthā bhava śuci-smite
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam bhagavatā tanvī rāmeṇa pratibodhitā vaimanasyam parityajya manaḥ buddhyā samādadhe
prāṇa avaśeṣaḥ utṣṛṣṭaḥ dviḍbhiḥ hata bala prabhaḥ smaran virūpa-karaṇam vitatha ātma manaḥ-rathaḥ cakre bhoja-kaṭam nāma nivāsāya mahat puram
ahatvā durmatim kṛṣṇam apratyūhya yavīyasīm kuṇḍinam na pravekṣyāmi iti uktvā tatra avasat ruṣā
bhagavān bhīṣmaka-sutām evam nirjitya bhūmi-pān puram ānīya vidhi-vat upayeme kuru-udvaha
tadā mahā-utsavaḥ nṝṇām yadu-puryām gṛhe gṛhe abhūt ananya-bhāvānām kṛṣṇe yadu-patau nṛpa
narāḥ nāryaḥ ca muditāḥ pramṛṣṭa maṇi kuṇḍalāḥ pāribarham upājahruḥ varayoḥ citra vāsasoḥ
sā vṛṣṇi-purī uttambhita indra-ketubhiḥ vicitra mālya ambara ratna toraṇaiḥ babhau prati dvāri upakḷpta maṅgalaiḥ āpūrṇa kumbha aguru dhūpa dīpakaiḥ
sikta mārgā mada cyudbhiḥ āhūta preṣṭha bhū-bhujām gajaiḥ dvāḥsu parāmṛṣṭa rambhā pūga upaśobhitā
kuru-sṛñjaya-kaikeya-vidarbha-yadu-kuntayaḥ mithaḥ mumudire tasmin sambhramāt paridhāvatām
rukmiṇyāḥ haraṇam śrutvā gīyamānam tataḥ tataḥ rājānaḥ rāja-kanyāḥ ca babhūvuḥ bhṛśa vismitāḥ
dvārakāyām abhūt rājan mahā-modaḥ pura-okasām rukmiṇyā ramayā upetam dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇam śriyaḥ patim
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca kāmaḥ tu vāsudeva aṁśaḥ dagdhaḥ prāk rudra manyunā deha upapattaye bhūyaḥ tam eva pratyapadyat
saḥ eva jātaḥ vaidarbhyām kṛṣṇa-vīrya samudbhavaḥ pradyumnaḥ iti vikhyātaḥ sarvataḥ anavamaḥ pituḥ
tam śambaraḥ kāma rūpī hṛtvā tokam aniḥ-daśam saḥ viditvā ātmanaḥ śatrum prāsya udanvati agāt gṛham
tam nirjagāra bala-vān mīnaḥ saḥ api aparaiḥ saha vṛtaḥ jālena mahatā gṛhītaḥ matsya-jīvibhiḥ
tam śambarāya kaivartāḥ upājahruḥ upāyanam sūdāḥ mahānasam nītvā avadyan sudhitinā adbhutam
dṛṣṭvā tat udare bālam māyāvatyai nyavedayan nāradaḥ akathayat sarvam tasyāḥ śaṅkita cetasaḥ bālasya tattvam utpattim matsya udara niveśanam
sā ca kāmasya vai patnī ratiḥ nama yaśasvinī patyuḥ nirdagdha dehasya deha utpattim pratīkṣatī nirūpitā śambareṇa sā sūda-odana sādhane kāma-devam śiśum buddhvā cakre sneham tadā arbhake
na ati-dīrgheṇa kālena saḥ kārṣṇiḥ rūḍha yauvanaḥ janayām āsa nārīṇām vīkṣantīnām ca vibhramam
sā tam patim padma dala-āyata īkṣaṇam pralamba bāhum nara-loka sundaram sa-vrīḍa hāsa uttabhita bhruvā īkṣatī prītyā upatasthe ratiḥ aṅga saurataiḥ
tām āha bhagavān kārṣṇiḥ mātaḥ te matiḥ anyathā mātṛ-bhāvam atikramya vartase kāminī yathā
ratiḥ uvāca bhavān nārāyaṇa-sutah śambareṇa hṛtaḥ gṛhāt aham te adhikṛtā patnī ratiḥ kāmaḥ bhavān prabho
eṣaḥ tvā aniḥ-daśam sindhau akṣipat śambaraḥ asuraḥ matsyaḥ agrasīt tat udarāt itaḥ prāptaḥ bhavān prabho
tam imam jahi durdharṣam durjayam śatrum ātmanaḥ māyā śata vidam tam ca māyābhiḥ mohana-ādibhiḥ
pariśocati te mātā kurarī iva gata prajā putra sneha ākulā dīnā vivatsā gauḥ iva āturā
prabhāṣya evam dadau vidyām pradyumnāya mahā-ātmane māyāvatī mahā-māyām sarva māyā vināśinīm
saḥ ca śambaram abhyetya saṁyugāya samāhvayat aviṣahyaiḥ tam ākṣepaiḥ kṣipan sañjanayan kalim
saḥ adhikṣiptaḥ durvācobhiḥ padā āhataḥ iva uragaḥ niścakrāma gadā pāṇiḥ amarṣāt tāmra locanaḥ
gadām āvidhya tarasā pradyumnāya mahā-ātmane prakṣipya vyanadan nādam vajra niṣpeṣa niṣṭhuram
tām āpatantīm bhagavān pradyumnaḥ gadayā gadām apāsya śatrave kruddhaḥ prāhiṇot sta-gadām nṛpa
saḥ ca māyām samāśritya daiteyīm maya darśitam mumuce astra-mayam varṣam kārṣṇau vaihāyasaḥ asuraḥ
bādhyamānaḥ astra varṣeṇa raukmiṇeyaḥ mahā-rathaḥ sattva-ātmikām mahā-vidyām sarva mayā upamardinīm
tataḥ gauhyaka-gāndharva-paiśāca-uraga-rākṣasīḥ prāyuṅkta śataśaḥ daityaḥ kārṣṇiḥ vyadhamayat saḥ tāḥ
niśātam asim udyamya sa kirīṭam sa kuṇḍalam śambarasya śiraḥ kāyāt tāmra śmaśru ojasā aharat
ākīryamāṇaḥ divi-jaiḥ stuvadbhiḥ kusuma utkaraiḥ bhāryayā ambara cāriṇyā puram nītaḥ vihāyasā
antaḥ-pura varam rājan lalanā śata saṅkulam viveśa patnyā gaganāt vidyutā iva balāhakaḥ
tam dṛṣṭvā jala-da śyāmam pīta kauśeya vāsasam pralamba bāhum tāmra akṣam su-smitam rucira ānanam su-alaṅkṛta mukha ambhojam nīla vakra ālaka-ālibhiḥ kṛṣṇam matvā striyaḥ hrītāḥ nililyuḥ tatra tatra ha
avadhārya śanaiḥ īṣat vailakṣaṇyena yoṣitaḥ upajagmuḥ pramuditāḥ sa strī ratnam su-vismitaḥ
atha tatra asita apāṅgī vaidarbhī valgu bhāṣinī asmarat sva-sutam naṣṭam sneha snuta payaḥ-dharā
kaḥ nu ayam nara-vaidūryaḥ kasya vā kamala-īkṣaṇaḥ dhṛtaḥ kayā vā jaṭhare kā iyam labdhā tu anena vā
mama ca api ātmajaḥ naṣṭaḥ nītaḥ yaḥ sūtikā-gṛhāt etat tulya vayaḥ rūpaḥ yadi jīvati kutracit
katham tu anena samprāptam sārūpyam śārṅga-dhanvanaḥ ākṛtyā avayavaiḥ gatyā svara hāsa avalokanaiḥ
saḥ eva vā bhavet nūnam yaḥ me garbhe dhṛtaḥ arbhakaḥ amuṣmin prītiḥ adhikā vāmaḥ sphurati me bhujaḥ
evam mīmāṁsamānāyām vaidarbhyām devakī-sutaḥ devakī-ānakadundubhyām uttamaḥ-ślokaḥ āgamat
vijñāta arthaḥ api bhagavān tūṣṇīm āsa janārdanaḥ nāradaḥ akathayat sarvam śambara āharaṇa ādikam
tat śrutvā mahat āścaryam kṛṣṇa-antaḥ-pura yoṣitaḥ abhyanandan bahūn abdān naṣṭam mṛtam iva āgatam
devakī vasudevaḥ ca kṛṣṇa-rāmau tathā striyaḥ dam-patī tau pariṣvajya rukmiṇī ca yayuḥ mudam
naṣṭam pradyumnam āyātam ākarṇya dvārakā-okasaḥ aho mṛtaḥ iva āyātaḥ bālaḥ diṣṭyā iti ha abruvan
yam vai muhuḥ pitṛ sa-rūpa nija īśa bhāvāḥ tat mātaraḥ yat abhajan raha rūḍha bhāvāḥ citram na tat khalu ramā āspada bimba bimbe kāme smare akṣa-viṣaye kim uta anya nāryaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca satrājitaḥ sva tanayām kṛṣṇāya kṛta kilbiṣaḥ syamantakena maṇinā svayam udyamya dattavān
śrī-rājā uvāca satrājitaḥ kim akarot brahman kṛṣṇasya kilbiṣaḥ syamantakaḥ kutaḥ tasya kasmāt dattā sutā hareḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca āsīt satrājitaḥ sūryaḥ bhaktasya paramaḥ sakhā prītaḥ tasmai maṇim prādāt saḥ ca tuṣṭaḥ syamantakam
saḥ tam bibhrat maṇim kaṇṭhe bhrājamānaḥ yathā raviḥ praviṣṭaḥ dvārakām rājan tejasā na upalakṣitaḥ
tam vilokya janāḥ dūrāt tejasā muṣṭa dṛṣṭayaḥ dīvyate akṣaiḥ bhagavate śaśaṁsuḥ sūrya śaṅkitāḥ
nārāyaṇa namaḥ te astu śaṅkha cakra gadā dhara dāmodara aravinda-akṣa govinda yadu-nandana
eṣaḥ āyāti savitā tvām didṛkṣuḥ jagat-pate muṣṇan gabhasti cakreṇa nṛṇām cakṣūṁṣi tigma guḥ
nanu anvicchanti te mārgam tri-lokyām vibudha ṛṣabhāḥ yñātvā adya gūḍham yaduṣu draṣṭum tvām yāti ajaḥ prabho
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca niśamya bāla vacanam prahasya ambuja locanaḥ prāha na asau raviḥ devaḥ satrājit maṇinā jvalan
satrājit sva gṛham śrīmat kṛta kautuka maṅgalam praviśya deva-sadane maṇim vipraiḥ nyaveśayat
dine dine svarṇa bhārān aṣṭau saḥ sṛjati prabho durbhikṣa māri ariṣṭāni sarpa ādhi vyādhayaḥ aśubhāḥ na santi māyinaḥ tatra yatra āste abhyarcitaḥ maṇiḥ
saḥ yācitaḥ maṇim kva api yadu-rājāya śauriṇā na eva artha kāmukaḥ prādāt yācñā bhaṅgam atarkayan
tam ekadā maṇim kaṇṭhe pratimucya mahā prabham prasenaḥ hayam āruhya mṛgāyām vyacarat vane
prasenam sa hayam hatvā maṇim ācchidya keśarī girim viśan jāmbavatā nihataḥ maṇim icchatā
saḥ api cakre kumārasya maṇim krīḍanakam bile apaśyan bhrātaram bhrātā satrājit paryatapyata
prāyaḥ kṛṣṇena nihataḥ maṇi grīvaḥ vanam gataḥ bhrātā mama iti tat śrutvā karṇe karṇe ajapan janāḥ
bhagavān tat upaśrutya duryaśaḥ liptam ātmani mārṣṭum prasena-padavīm anvapadyata nāgaraiḥ
hatam prasenam aśvam ca vīkṣya keśariṇā vane tam ca adri pṛṣṭhe nihatam ṛkṣeṇa dadṛśuḥ janāḥ
ṛkṣa-rāja bilam bhīmam andhena tamasā āvṛtam ekaḥ viveśa bhagavān avasthāpya bahiḥ prajāḥ
tatra dṛṣṭvā maṇi-preṣṭham bāla krīḍanakam kṛtam hartum kṛta-matiḥ tasmin avatasthe arbhaka-antike
tam apūrvam naram dṛṣṭvā dhātrī cukrośa bhīta-vat tat śrutvā abhyadravat kruddhaḥ jāmbavān balinām varaḥ
saḥ vai bhagavatā tena yuyudhe svāmīnā ātmanaḥ puruṣam prākṛtam matvā kupitaḥ na anubhāva vit
dvandva yuddham su-tumulam ubhayoḥ vijigīṣatoḥ āyudha aśma drumaiḥ dorbhiḥ kravya arthe śyenayoḥ iva
āsīt tat aṣṭā-viṁśa aham itara-itara muṣṭibhiḥ vajra niṣpeṣa paruṣaiḥ aviśramam ahaḥ-niśam
kṛṣṇa-muṣṭi viniṣpāta niṣpiṣṭa aṅga uru bandhanaḥ kṣīṇa sattvaḥ svinna gātraḥ tam āha atīva vismitaḥ
jāne tvām sarva bhūtānām prāṇaḥ ojaḥ sahaḥ balam viṣṇum purāṇa puruṣam prabhaviṣṇum adhīśvaram
tvam hi viśva sṛjām sraṣṭā sṛṣṭānām api yat ca sat kālaḥ kalayatām īśaḥ paraḥ ātmā tathā ātmanām
yasya īṣat utkalita roṣa kaṭā-akṣa mokṣaiḥ vartma ādiśat kṣubhita nakra timiṅgalaḥ abdhiḥ setuḥ kṛtaḥ sva yaśaḥ ujjvalitā ca laṅkā rakṣaḥ śirāṁsi bhuvi petuḥ iṣu kṣatāni
iti vijñāta-vijñānam ṛkṣa rājānam acyutaḥ vyājahāra mahā-rāja bhagavān devakī-suraḥ abhimṛśya aravinda-akṣaḥ pāṇinā śam kareṇa tam kṛpayā parayā bhaktam megha gambhīrayā girā
maṇi hetoḥ iha prāptāḥ vayam ṛkṣa-pate bilam mithyā abhiśāpam pramṛjan ātmanaḥ maṇinā amunā
iti uktaḥ svām duhitaram kanyām jāmbavatīm mudā arhaṇa-artham saḥ maṇinā kṛṣṇāya upajahāra ha
adṛṣṭvā nirgamam śaureḥ praviṣṭasya bilam janaḥ pratīkṣya dvādaśa ahāni duḥkhitāḥ sva puram yayuḥ
niśamya devakī devī rukmiṇī ānakadundubhiḥ suhṛdaḥ jñātayaḥ aśocan bilāt kṛṣṇam anirgatam
satrājitam śapantaḥ te duḥkhitāḥ dvārakā-okasaḥ upatasthuḥ candrabhāgām durgām kṛṣṇa-upalabdhaye
teṣām tu devī upasthānāt pratyādiṣṭa āśiṣāḥ saḥ ca prādurbabhūva siddha arthaḥ sa-dāraḥ harṣayan hariḥ
upalabhya hṛṣīkeśam mṛtam punaḥ iva āgatam saha patnyā maṇi grīvam sarve jāta mahā utsavāḥ
satrājitam samāhūya sabhāyām rāja sannidhau prāptim ca ākhyāya bhagavān maṇim tasmai nyavedayat
saḥ ca ati vrīḍitaḥ ratnam gṛhītvā avāk mukhaḥ tataḥ anutapyamānaḥ bhavanam agamat svena pāpmanā
saḥ anudhyāyan tat eva agham bala-vat vigraha ākulaḥ katham mṛjāmi ātma rajaḥ prasīdet vā acyutaḥ katham kim kṛtvā sādhu mahyam syāt na śapet vā janaḥ yathā adīrgha darśanam kṣudram mūḍham draviṇa lolupam dāsye duhitaram tasmai strī ratnam ratnam eva ca upāyaḥ ayam samīcīnaḥ tasya śāntiḥ na ca anyathā
evam vyavasitaḥ buddhyā satrājit sva sutām śubhām maṇim ca svayam udyamya kṛṣṇāya upajahāra ha
tām satyabhāmām bhagavān upayeme yathā-vidhi bahubhiḥ yācitām śīla rūpa audārya guṇa anvitām
bhagavān āha na maṇim pratīcchāmaḥ vayam nṛpa tava āstām deva bhaktasya vayam ca phala bhāginaḥ
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca vijñāta arthaḥ api govindaḥ dagdhān ākarṇya pāṇḍavān kuntīm ca kulya karaṇe saha-rāmaḥ yayau kurūn
bhīṣmam kṛpam sa-viduram gāndhārīm droṇam eva ca tulya duḥkhau ca saṅgamya hā kaṣṭam iti ha ūcatuḥ
labdhvā etat antaram rājan śatadhanvānam ūcatuḥ akrūra-kṛtavarmāṇau maniḥ kasmāt na gṛhyate
yaḥ asmabhyam sampratiśrutya kanyā ratnam vigarhya naḥ kṛṣṇāya adāt na satrājit kasmāt bhrātaram anviyāt
evam bhinna matiḥ tābhyām satrājitam asat-tamaḥ śayānam avadhīt lobhāt saḥ pāpaḥ kṣīṇa jīvitaḥ
strīṇām vikrośamānānām krandantīnām anātha vat hatvā paśūn saunika vat maṇim ādāya jagmivān
satyabhāmā ca pitaram hatam vīkṣya śucā-arpitā vyalapat tata tāta iti hā hatā asmi iti muhyatī
taila droṇyām mṛtam prāsya jagāma gaja-sāhvayam kṛṣṇāya vidita-arthāya taptā ācakhyau pituḥ vadham
tat ākarṇya īśvarau rājan anusṛtya nṛ-lokatām aho naḥ paramam kaṣṭam iti asra akṣau vilepatuḥ
āgatya bhagavān tasmāt sa-bhāryaḥ sa-agrajaḥ puram śatadhanvānam ārebhe hantum hartum maṇim tataḥ
saḥ api kṛta-udyamam jñātvā bhītaḥ prāṇa parīpsayā sāhāyye kṛtavarmāṇam ayācata saḥ ca abravīt
na aham īśvarayoḥ kuryām helanam rāma-kṛṣṇayoḥ kaḥ nu kṣemāya kalpeta tayoḥ vṛjinam ācaran kaṁsaḥ saha anugaḥ apītaḥ yat dveṣāt tyājitaḥ śriyā jarāsandhaḥ saptadaśa saṁyugāt virathaḥ gataḥ
pratyākhyātaḥ saḥ ca akrūram pārṣṇi-grāham ayācata saḥ api āha kaḥ virudhyeta vidvān īśvarayoḥ balam
yaḥ idam līlayā viśvam sṛjati avati hanti ca ceṣṭām viśva-sṛjaḥ yasya na viduḥ mohitāḥ ajayā
yaḥ sapta hāyanaḥ śailam utpāṭya ekena pāṇinā dadhāra līlayā bālaḥ ucchilīndhram iva arbhakaḥ
namaḥ tasmai bhagavate kṛṣṇāya adbhuta karmaṇe anantāya ādi-bhūtāya kūṭa-sthāya ātmane namaḥ
pratyākhyātaḥ saḥ tena api śatadhanvā mahā-maṇim tasmin nyasya aśvam āruhya śata yojana gam yayau
garuḍa-dhvajam āruhya ratham rāma janārdanau anvayātām mahā-vegaiḥ aśvaiḥ rājan guru druham
mithilāyām upavane visṛjya patitam hayam padbhyām adhāvat santrastaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ api anvadravat ruṣā
padāteḥ bhagavān tasya padātiḥ tigma neminā cakreṇa śiraḥ utkṛtya vāsasoḥ vyacinot maṇim
alabdha maṇiḥ āgatya kṛṣṇaḥ āha agra-ja antikam vṛthā hataḥ śatadhanuḥ maṇiḥ tatra na vidyate
tataḥ āha balaḥ nūnam saḥ maṇiḥ śatadhanvanā kasmiṁścit puruṣe nyastaḥ tam anveṣa puram vraja
aham vaideham icchāmi draṣṭum priya-tamam mama iti uktvā mithilām rājan viveśa yadu-nandanaḥ
tam dṛṣṭvā sahasā utthāya maithilaḥ prīta-mānasaḥ arhayām āsa vidhi-vat arhaṇīyam samarhaṇaiḥ
uvāsa tasyām katicit mithilāyām samāḥ vibhuḥ mānitaḥ prīti-yuktena janakena mahā-ātmanā tataḥ aśikṣat gadām kāle dhārtarāṣṭraḥ suyodhanaḥ
keśavaḥ dvārakām etya nidhanam śatadhanvanaḥ aprāptim ca maṇeḥ prāha priyāyāḥ priya kṛt vibhuḥ
tataḥ saḥ kārayām āsa kriyā bandhoḥ hatasya vai sākam suhṛdbhiḥ bhagavān yāḥ yāḥ syuḥ sāmparāyikīḥ
akrūraḥ kṛtavarmā ca śrutvā śatadhanoḥ vadham vyūṣatuḥ bhaya-vitrastau dvārakāyāḥ prayojakau
akrūre proṣite ariṣṭāni āsan vai dvārakā-okasām śārīrāḥ mānasaḥ tāpāḥ muhuḥ daivika bhautikāḥ
iti aṅga upadiśanti eke vismṛtya prāk udāhṛtam muni vāsa nivāse kim ghaṭeta ariṣṭa darśanam
deve avarṣati kāśī-īśaḥ śvaphalkāya āgatāya vai sva sutām gāndinīm prādāt tataḥ avarṣat sma kāśiṣu
tat sutaḥ tat-prabhāvaḥ asau akrūraḥ yatra yatra ha devaḥ abhivarṣate tatra na upatāpāḥ na mārikāḥ
iti vṛddha vacaḥ śrutvā na etāvat iha kāraṇam iti matvā samānāyya prāha akrūram janārdanaḥ
pūjayitvā abhibhāṣya enam kathayitvā priyāḥ kathāḥ vijñāta akhila citta jñaḥ smayamānaḥ uvāca ha nanu dāna pate nyastaḥ tvayi āste śatadhanvanā syamantakaḥ. maniḥ śrī-mān viditaḥ pūrvam eva naḥ
satrājitaḥ anapatyatvāt gṛhṇīyuḥ duhituḥ sutāḥ dāyam ninīya āpaḥ piṇḍān vimucya ṛṇam ca śeṣitam
tathā api durdharaḥ tu anyaiḥ tvayi āstām suvrate maṇiḥ kintu mam agra-jaḥ samyak na pratyeti maṇim prati darśayasva mahā-bhāga bandhūnām śāntim āvaha avyucchinnāḥ makhāḥ te adya vartante rukma vedayaḥ
evam sāmabhiḥ ālabdhaḥ śvaphalka-tanayaḥ maṇim ādāya vāsasā ācchannaḥ dadau sūrya sama prabham
syamantakam darśayitvā jñātibhyaḥ rajaḥ ātmanaḥ vimṛjya maṇinā bhūyaḥ tasmai pratyarpayat prabhuḥ
yaḥ tu etat bhagavataḥ īśvarasya viṣṇoḥ vīrya āḍhyam vṛjina haram su-maṅgalam ca ākhyānam paṭhati śṛṇoti anusmaret vā duṣkīrtim duritam apohya yāti śāntim
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ekadā pāṇḍavān draṣṭum pratītān puruṣa-uttamaḥ indraprastham gataḥ śrī-mān yuyudhāna-ādibhir vṛtaḥ
dṛṣṭvā tam āgatam pārthāḥ mukundam akhila īśvaram uttasthuḥ yugapat vīraḥ prāṇāḥ mukhyam iva āgatam
pariṣvajya acyutam vīrāḥ aṅga saṅga hata enasaḥ sa-anurāga smitam vaktram vīkṣya tasya mudam yayuḥ
yudhiṣṭhirasya bhīmasya kṛtvā pāda abhivandanam phālgunam parirabhya atha yamābhyām ca abhivanditaḥ
parama āsane āsīnam kṛṣṇā kṛṣṇam aninditā nava ūḍhā vrīḍitā kiñcit śanaiḥ etya abhyavandata
tathā eva sātyakiḥ pārthaiḥ pūjitaḥ ca abhivanditaḥ niṣasāda āsane anye ca pūjitāḥ paryupāsata
pṛthām samāgatya kṛta abhivādanaḥ tayā ati hārda ardra dṛśā abhirambhitaḥ āpṛṣṭavān tām kuśalam saha snuṣām pitṛ svasāram paripṛṣṭa bāndhavaḥ
tam āha prema vaiklavya ruddha kaṇṭhā aśru locanā smarantī tān bahūn kleśān kleśa apāya ātma darśanam
tadā eva kuśalam naḥ abhūt sa nāthāḥ te kṛtāḥ vayam jñātīn naḥ smaratā kṛṣṇa bhrātā me preṣitaḥ tvayā
na te asti sva para bhrāntiḥ viśvasya suhṛt ātmanaḥ tathā api smaratām śaśvat kleśān haṁsi hṛdi sthitaḥ
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca kim naḥ ācaritam śreyaḥ na veda aham adhīśvara yoga īśvarāṇām durdarśaḥ yat naḥ dṛṣṭaḥ ku-medhasam
iti vai vārṣikān māsān rājñā saḥ abhyarthitaḥ sukham janayan nayana ānandam indraprastha-okasām vibhuḥ
ekadā ratham āruhya vijayaḥ vānara dhvajam gāṇḍīvam dhanuḥ ādāya tūṇau ca akṣaya sāyakau sākam kṛṣṇena sannaddhaḥ vihartum vipinam mahat bahu vyāla-mṛga ākīrṇam prāviśat para vīra hā
tatra avidhyat śaraiḥ vyāghrān śūkarān mahiṣān rurūn śarabhān gavayān khaḍgān hariṇān śaśa śallakān
tān ninyuḥ kiṅkarāḥ rājñe medhyān parvaṇi upāgate tṛṭ parītaḥ pariśrāntaḥ bibhatsuḥ yamunām agāt
tatra upaspṛśya viśadam pītvā vāri mahā-rathau kṛṣṇau dadṛśatuḥ kanyām carantīm cāru-darśanām
tām āsādya varā ārohām su dvijām rucira ānanām papraccha preṣitaḥ sakhyā phālgunaḥ pramadā uttamām
kā tvam kasya asi su-śroṇi kutaḥ vā kim cikīrṣasi manye tvām patim icchantīm sarvam kathaya śobhane
śrī-kālindī uvāca aham devasya savituḥ duhitā patim icchatī viṣṇum vareṇyam vara-dam tapaḥ paramam āsthitaḥ
na anyam patim vṛṇe vīra tam ṛte śrī niketanam tuṣyatām me saḥ bhagavān mukundaḥ anātha saṁśrayaḥ
kālindī iti samākhyātā vasāmi yamunā-jale nirmite bhavane pitrā yāvat acyuta darśanam
tathā avadat guḍākeśaḥ vāsudevāya saḥ api tām ratham āropya tat vidvān dharma-rājam upāgamat
yadā eva kṛṣṇaḥ sandiṣṭaḥ pārthānām parama adbhutam kārayām āsa nagaram vicitram viśvakarmaṇā
bhagavān tatra nivasan svānām priya cikīrṣayā agnaye khāṇḍavam dātum arjunasya āsa sārathiḥ
saḥ agniḥ tuṣṭaḥ dhanuḥ adāt hayān śvetān ratham nṛpa arjunāya akṣayau tūṇau varma ca abhedyam astribhiḥ
mayaḥ ca mocitaḥ vahneḥ sabhām sakhye upāharat yasmin duryodhanasya āsīt jala sthala dṛśi bhramaḥ
saḥ tena samanujñātaḥ su-hṛdbhiḥ ca anumoditaḥ āyayau dvārakām bhūyaḥ sātyaki-pramukhaiḥ vṛtaḥ
atha upayeme kālindīm su puṇya ṛtu ṛkṣe ūrjite vitanvan parama ānandam svānām parama maṅgalaḥ
vindya-anuvindyau āvantyau duryodhana-vaśa-anugau svayamvare sva bhaginīm kṛṣṇe saktām nyaṣedhatām
rājādhidevyāḥ tanayām mitravindām pitṛ svasuḥ prasahya hṛtavān kṛṣṇaḥ rājan rājñām prapaśyatām
nagnajit nāma kauśalyaḥ āsīt rājā ati dhārmikaḥ tasya satyā abhavat kanyā devī nāgnajitī nṛpa
na tām śekuḥ nṛpāḥ voḍhum ajitvā sapta go-vṛṣān tīkṣṇa śṛṅgān su durdharṣān vīrya gandha asahān khalān
tām śrutvā vṛṣa jit labhyām bhagavān sātvatām patiḥ jagāma kauśalya-puram sainyena mahatā vṛtaḥ
saḥ kośala-patiḥ prītaḥ pratyutthāna āsana ādibhiḥ arhaṇena api guruṇā pūjayan pratinanditaḥ
varam vilokya abhimatam samāgatam narendra kanyā cakame ramā patim bhūyāt ayam me patiḥ āśiṣaḥ analaḥ karotu satyāḥ yadi me dhṛtaḥ vrataḥ
yat pāda paṅkaja rajaḥ śirasā bibharti śṛīḥ abja-jaḥ sa giri-śaḥ saha loka pālaiḥ līlā tanuḥ sva kṛta setu parīpsayā yaḥ kāle adadhat saḥ bhagavān mama kena tuṣyet
arcitam punaḥ iti āha nārāyaṇa jagat pate ātma ānandena pūrṇasya karavāṇi kim alpakaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tam āha bhagavān hṛṣṭaḥ kṛta āsana parigrahaḥ megha gambhīrayā vācā sa smitam kuru nandana
śrī-bhagavān uvāca nara-indra yācñā kavibhiḥ vigarhitā rājanya bandhoḥ nija dharma vartinaḥ tathā api yāce tava sauhṛda icchayā kanyām tvadīyām na hi śulka-dāḥ vayam
śrī-rājā uvāca kaḥ anyaḥ te abhyadhikaḥ nātha kanyā varaḥ iha īpsitaḥ guṇa eka dhāmnaḥ yasya aṅge śrīḥ vasati anapāyinī
kintu asmābhiḥ kṛtaḥ pūrvam samayaḥ sātvata-ṛṣabha puṁsām vīrya parīkṣā artham kanyā vara parīpsayā
sapta ete go-vṛṣāḥ vīra durdāntāḥ duravagrahāḥ etaiḥ bhagnāḥ su-bahavaḥ bhinna gātrāḥ nṛpa ātma-jāḥ
yat ime nigṛhītāḥ syuḥ tvayā eva yadu-nandana varaḥ bhavān abhimataḥ duhituḥ me śriyaḥ pate
evam samayam ākarṇya baddhvā parikaram prabhuḥ ātmānam saptadhā kṛtvā nyagṛhṇāt līlayā eva tān
baddhvā tān dāmabhiḥ śauriḥ bhagna darpān hata ojasaḥ vyakarṣat līlayā baddhān bālaḥ dāru mayān yathā
tataḥ prītaḥ sutām rājā dadau kṛṣṇāya vismitaḥ tām pratyagṛhṇāt bhagavān vidhi-vat sadṛśīm prabhuḥ
rāja patnyaḥ ca duhituḥ kṛṣṇam labdhvā priyam patim lebhire parama ānandam jātaḥ ca parama utsavaḥ
śaṅkha bherī ānakāḥ neduḥ gīta vādya dvija āśiṣaḥ narāḥ nāryaḥ pramuditāḥ su-vāsaḥ srak alaṅkṛtāḥ
daśa dhenu sahasrāṇi pāribarham adāt vibhuḥ yuvatīnām tri-sāhasram niṣka grīva su vāsasam nava nāga sahasrāṇi nāgāt śata-guṇān rathān rathāt śata-guṇān aśvān aśvāt śata-guṇān narān
dam-patī ratham āropya mahatyā senayā vṛtau sneha praklinna hṛdayaḥ yāpayām āsa kośalaḥ
śrutvā etat rurudhuḥ bhū-pāḥ nayantam pathi kanyakām bhagna vīryāḥ su durmarṣāḥ yadubhiḥ go-vṛṣaiḥ purā
tān asyataḥ śara vrātān bandhu priya kṛt arjunaḥ gaṇḍīvī kālayām āsa siṁhaḥ kṣudra mṛgān iva
pāribarham upāgṛhya dvārakām etya satyayā reme yadūnām ṛṣabhaḥ bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ
śrutakīrteḥ sutām bhadrām upayeme pitṛ-svasuḥ kaikeyīm bhrātṛbhiḥ dattām kṛṣṇaḥ santardana-ādibhiḥ
sutām ca madra-adhipateḥ lakṣmaṇām lakṣaṇaiḥ yutām svayam-vare jahāra ekaḥ saḥ suparṇaḥ sudhām iva
anyāḥ ca evam-vidhāḥ bhāryāḥ kṛṣṇasya āsan sahasraśaḥ bhaumam hatvā tat nirodhāt āhṛtāḥ cāru darśanāḥ
śrī-rājā uvāca yathā hataḥ bhagavatā bhaumaḥ yena ca tāḥ striyaḥ niruddhāḥ etat ācakṣva vikramam śārṅga-dhanvanaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca indreṇa hṛta-chatreṇa hṛta-kuṇḍala bandhunā hṛta amara-adri sthānena jñāpitaḥ bhauma-ceṣṭitam sa bhāryaḥ garuḍa-ārūḍhaḥ prāg-jyotiṣa-puram yayau giri durgaiḥ śastra durgaiḥ jala agni anila durgamam mura-pāśa ayutaiḥ ghoraiḥ dṛḍhaiḥ sarvataḥ āvṛtam
gadayā nirbibheda adrīn śastra-durgāṇi sāyakaiḥ cakreṇa agnim jalam vāyum mura-pāśān tathā asinā
śaṅkha nādena yantrāṇi hṛdayāni manasvinām prākāram gadayā gurvyā nirbibheda gadādharaḥ
pāñcajanya dhvanim śrutvā yuga anta aśani bhīṣaṇam muraḥ śayānaḥ uttasthau daityaḥ pañca-śirāḥ jalāt
tri-śūlam udyamya su durnirīkṣaṇaḥ yuga-anta sūrya anala rociḥ ulbaṇaḥ grasan tri-lokīm iva pañcabhiḥ mukhaiḥ abhyadravat tārkṣya-sutam yathā uragaḥ
āvidhya śūlam tarasā garutmate nirasya vaktraiḥ vyanadat saḥ pañcabhiḥ saḥ rodasī sarva diśaḥ ambaram mahān āpūrayan aṇda kaṭāham āvṛṇot
tadā āpatat vai tri-śikham garutmate hariḥ śarābhyām abhinat tridhā ojasā mukheṣu tam ca api śaraiḥ atāḍayat tasmai gadām saḥ api ruṣā vyamuñcata
tām āpatantīm gadayā gadām mṛdhe gada-agrajaḥ nirbibhide sahasradhā udyamya bāhūn abhidhāvataḥ ajitaḥ śirāṁsi cakreṇa jahāra līlayā
vyasuḥ papāta ambhasi kṛtta śīrṣaḥ nikṛtta śṛṅgaḥ adriḥ iva indra tejasā tasya ātma-jāḥ sapta pituḥ vadha āturāḥ pratikriyā amarṣa juṣaḥ samudyatāḥ
tāmraḥ antarikṣaḥ śravaṇaḥ vibhāvasuḥ vasuḥ nabhasvān aruṇaḥ ca saptamaḥ pīṭham puraḥ-kṛtya camū-patim mṛdhe bhauma prayuktāḥ niragan dhṛta āyudhāḥ
prāyuñjata āsādya śarān asīn gadāḥ śakti ṛṣti śūlāni ajite ruṣā ulbaṇāḥ tat śastra kūṭam bhagavān sva mārgaṇaiḥ amogha vīryaḥ tilaśaḥ cakarta ha
tān pīṭha-mukhyān anayat yama kṣayam nikṛtta śīrṣa ūru bhuja aṅghri varmaṇaḥ sva anīka pān acyuta cakra sāyakaiḥ tathā nirastān narakaḥ dharā sutaḥ nirīkṣya durmarṣaṇaḥ āsravat madaiḥ gajaiḥ payaḥ-dhi prabhavaiḥ nirākramāt
dṛṣṭvā sa-bhāryam garuḍa-upari sthitam sūrya upariṣṭāt sa-taḍit ghanam yathā kṛṣṇam saḥ tasmai vyasṛjat śata-ghnīm yodhāḥ ca sarve yugapat ca vivyadhuḥ
tat bhauma-sainyam bhagavān gadāgrajaḥ vicitra vājaiḥ niśitaiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ nikṛtta bāhu ūru śiraḥ-dhra vigraham cakāra tarhi eva hata aśva kuñjaram
yāni yodhaiḥ prayuktāni śastra astrāṇi kuru-udvaha hariḥ tāni acchinat tīkṣṇaiḥ śaraiḥ ekaśaḥ tribhiḥ uhyamānaḥ su-parṇena pakṣābhyām nighnatā gajān gurutmatā hanyamānaḥ tuṇḍa pakṣa nakheḥ gajāḥ puram eva āviśann ārtāḥ narakaḥ yudhi ayudhyata
dṛṣṭvā vidrāvitam sainyam garuḍena arditam svakam tam bhaumaḥ prāharat śaktyā vajraḥ pratihataḥ yataḥ na akampata tayā viddhaḥ mālā āhataḥ iva dvipaḥ
śūlam bhaumaḥ acyutam hantum ādade vitatha udyamaḥ tat visargāt pūrvam eva narakasya śiraḥ hariḥ apāharat gaja sthasya cakreṇa kṣura neminā
sa kuṇḍalam cāru kirīṭa bhūṣaṇam babhau pṛthivyām patitam samujjvalam hā hā iti sādhu iti ṛṣayaḥ sura-īśvaraḥ mālyaiḥ mukundam vikirantaḥ īḍire
tataḥ ca bhūḥ kṛṣṇam upetya kuṇḍale pratapta jāmbūnada ratna bhāsvare sa vaijayantyā vana-mālayā arpayat prācetasam chatram atha u mahā-maṇim
astauṣīt atha viśva īśam devī deva vara arcitam prāñjaliḥ praṇatā rājan bhakti pravaṇayā dhiyā
bhūmiḥ uvāca namaḥ te deva-deva īśa śaṅkha cakra gadā dhara bhakta icchā upātta rūpāya parama-ātman namaḥ astu te
namaḥ paṅkaja-nābhāya namaḥ paṅkaja-māline namaḥ paṅkaja-netrāya namaḥ te paṅkaja-aṅghraye
namaḥ bhagavate tubhyam vāsudevāya viṣṇave puruṣāya ādi bījāya pūrṇa bodhāya te namaḥ
ajāya janayitre asya brahmaṇe ananta śaktaye para avara ātman bhūta ātman parama-ātman namaḥ astu te
tvam vai sisṛkṣuḥ ajaḥ utkaṭam prabho tamaḥ nirodhāya bibharṣi asaṁvṛtaḥ sthānāya sattvam jagataḥ jagat-pate kālaḥ pradhānam puruṣaḥ bhavān paraḥ
aham payaḥ jyotiḥ atha anilaḥ nabhaḥ mātrāṇi devāḥ manaḥ indriyāṇi kartā mahān iti akhilam cara acaram tvayi advitīye bhagavan ayam bhramaḥ
tasya ātma-jaḥ ayam tava pāda paṅkajam bhītaḥ prapanna ārti hara upasāditaḥ tat pālaya enam kuru hasta-paṅkajam śirasi amuṣya akhila kalmaṣa apaham
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti bhūmi arthitaḥ vāgbhiḥ bhagavān bhakti namrayā dattvā abhayam bhauma-gṛham prāviśat sakala ṛddhi mat
tatra rājanya kanyānām ṣaṭ-sahasra adhika ayutam bhauma āhṛtānām vikramya rājabhyaḥ dadṛśe hariḥ
tam praviṣṭam striyaḥ vīkṣya nara varyam vimohitāḥ manasā vavrire abhīṣṭam patim daiva upasāditam
bhūyāt patiḥ ayam mahyam dhātā tat anumodatām iti sarvāḥ pṛthak kṛṣṇe bhāvena hṛdayam dadhuḥ
tāḥ prāhiṇot dvāravatīm su-mṛṣṭa virajaḥ ambarāḥ nara-yānaiḥ mahā kośān ratha aśvān draviṇam mahat
airāvata kula ibhān ca catuḥ dantān tarasvinaḥ pāṇḍurān ca catuḥ-ṣaṣṭim prerayām āsa keśavaḥ
gatvā sura indra bhavanam dattvā adityai ca kuṇḍale pūjitaḥ tridaśa indreṇa mahā-indryāṇyā ca sa priyaḥ coditaḥ bhāryayā utpāṭya pārijātam garutmati āropya sa-indrān vibudhān nirjitya upānayat puram
sthāpitaḥ satyabhāmāyāḥ gṛha udyāna upaśobhanaḥ anvaguḥ bhramarāḥ svargāt tat gandha āsava lampaṭāḥ
yayāca ānamya kirīṭa koṭibhiḥ pādau spṛśan acyutam artha sādhanam siddha arthaḥ etena vigṛhyate mahān aho surāṇām ca tamaḥ dhik āḍhyatām
atha u muhūrte ekasmin nānā agāreṣu tāḥ striyaḥ yathā upayeme bhagavān tāvat rūpa dharaḥ avyayaḥ
gṛheṣu tāsām anapāyī atarka kṛt nirasta sāmya atiśayeṣu avasthitaḥ reme ramābhiḥ nija kāma samplutaḥ yathā itaraḥ gārhaka-medhikān caran
ittham ramā-patim avāpya patim striyaḥ tāḥ brahmā-ādayaḥ api na viduḥ padavīm yadīyām bhejuḥ mudā aviratam edhitayā anurāga hāsa avaloka nava saṅgama jalpa lajjāḥ
pratyudgama āsana vara arhaṇa pāda śauca tāmbūla viśramaṇa vījana gandha mālyaiḥ keśa prasāra śayana snapana upahāryaiḥ dāsī śatāḥ api vibhoḥ vidadhuḥ sma dāsyam
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca karhicit sukham āsīnam sva talpa stham jagat gurum patim paryacarat bhaiṣmī vyajanena sakhī-janaiḥ
yaḥ tu etat līlayā viśvam sṛjati atti avati īśvaraḥ saḥ hi jātaḥ sva setūnām gopīthāya yaduṣu ajaḥ
tasmin antaḥ-gṛhe bhrājat muktā dāma vilambinā virājite vitānena dīpaiḥ maṇi mayaiḥ api mallikā dāmabhiḥ puṣpaiḥ dvirepha kula nādite jāla randhra praviṣṭaiḥ ca gobhiḥ candramasaḥ amalaiḥ pārijāta vana āmoda vāyunā udyāna śālinā dhūpaiḥ aguru jaiḥ rājan jāla-randhra vinirgataiḥ payaḥ phena nibhe śubhre paryaṅke kaśipu uttame upatasthe sukha āsīnam jagatām īśvaram patim
vāla vyajanam ādāya ratna daṇḍam sakhī karāt tena vījayatī devī upāsām cakre īśvaram
sā upa acyutam kvaṇayatī maṇi nūpurābhyām reje aṅgulīya valaya vyajana agra-hastā vastra anta gūḍha kuca kuṅkuma śoṇa hāra bhāsā nitamba dhṛtayā ca parārdhya kāñcyā
tām rūpiṇīm śrīyam ananya gatim nirīkṣya yā līlayā dhṛta tanoḥ anurūpa rūpā prītaḥ smayan alaka kuṇḍala niṣka kaṇṭha vaktra ullasat smita sudhām hariḥ ābabhāṣe
śrī-bhagavān uvāca rāja-putri īpsitā bhū-paiḥ loka pāla vibhūtibhiḥ mahā anubhāvaiḥ śrī-madbhiḥ rūpa audārya bala ūrjitaiḥ
tān prāptān arthinaḥ hitvā caidya ādīn smara darmadān dattā bhrātrā sva pitrā ca kasmāt naḥ vavṛṣe asamān
rājabhyaḥ bibhyataḥ su-bhru samudram śaraṇam gatān bala-vadbhiḥ kṛta-dveṣān prāyaḥ tyakta nṛpa āsanān
aspaṣṭa vartmanām puṁsām aloka patham īyuṣāṁ āsthitāḥ padavīm su-bhru prāyaḥ sīdanti yoṣitaḥ
niṣkiñcanāḥ vayam śaśvat niṣkiñcana-jana priyāḥ tasmāt prāyeṇa na hi āḍhyāḥ mām bhajanti su-madhyame
yayoḥ ātma-samam vittam janma aiśvarya ākṛtiḥ bhavaḥ tayoḥ vivāhaḥ maitrī ca na uttama adhamayoḥ kvacit
vaidarbhi etat avijñāya tvayā adīrgha-samīkṣayā vṛtāḥ vayam guṇaiḥ hīnāḥ bhikṣubhiḥ ślāghitāḥ mudhā
atha ātmanaḥ anurūpam vai bhajasva kṣatriya-ṛṣabham yena tvam āśiṣaḥ satyāḥ iha amutra ca lapsyase
caidya-śālva-jarāsandha-dantavakra-ādayaḥ nṛpāḥ mama dviṣanti vāma-ūru rukmī ca api tava agra-jaḥ
teṣām vīrya mada andhānām dṛptānām smaya nuttaye ānitā asi mayā bhadre tejaḥ upaharatā asatām
udāsīnāḥ vayam nūnam na strī apatya artha kāmukāḥ ātma-labdhyā āsmahe pūrṇāḥ gehayoḥ jyotiḥ akriyāḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca etāvat uktvā bhagavān ātmānam vallabhām iva manyamānām aviśleṣāt tat darpa ghnaḥ upāramat
iti tri-loka īśa pateḥ tadā ātmanaḥ priyasya devī aśruta pūrvam apriyam āśrutya bhītā hṛdi jāta vepathuḥ cintām durantām rudatī jagāma ha
padā su-jātena nakha aruṇa śrīyā bhuvam likhantī aśrubhiḥ añjana asitaiḥ āsiñcatī kuṅkuma rūṣitau stanau tasthau adhaḥ mukhī ati duḥkha ruddha vāk
taṣyāḥ su-duḥkha bhaya śoka vinaṣṭa buddheḥ hastāt ślathat valayataḥ vyajanam papāta dehaḥ ca viklava dhiyaḥ sahasā eva muhyan rambhā iva vāyu vihataḥ pravikīrya keśān
tat dṛṣṭvā bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ priyāyāḥ prema bandhanam hāsya prauḍhim ajānantyāḥ karuṇaḥ saḥ anvakampata
paryaṅkāt avaruhya āśu tām utthāpya catur-bhujaḥ keśān samuhya tat vaktram prāmṛjat padma-pāṇinā
pramṛjya aśru-kale netre stanau ca upahatau śucā aśliṣya bāhunā rājan ananya viṣayām satīm sāntvayām āsa sāntva jñaḥ kṛpayā kṛpaṇām prabhuḥ hāsya prauḍhi bhramat cittām atat-arhām satām gatiḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca mā mā vaidarbhi asūyethāḥ jāne tvām mat parāyaṇām tvat vacaḥ śrotu kāmena kṣvelyā ācaritam aṅgane
mukham ca prema saṁrambha sphurita adharam īkṣitum kaṭā kṣepa aruṇa apāṅgam sundara bhru kuṭī taṭam
ayam hi paramaḥ lābhaḥ gṛheṣu gṛha-medhinām yat narmaiḥ īyate yāmaḥ priyayā bhīru bhāmini
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca sā evam bhagavatā rājan vaidarbhī parisāntvitā jñātvā tat parihāsa uktim priya tyāga bhayam jahau
babhāṣa ṛṣabham puṁsām vīkṣantī bhagavat mukham sa-vrīḍa hāsa rucira snigdha apāṅgena bhārata
śrī-rukmiṇī uvāca nanu evam etat aravinda-vilocana āha yat vai bhavān bhagavataḥ asadṛśī vibhūmnaḥ kva sve mahimni abhirataḥ bhagavān tri adhīśaḥ kva aham guṇa prakṛtiḥ ajña gṛhīta pādā
satyam bhayāt iva guṇebhyaḥ urukrama antaḥ śete samudre upalambhana-mātraḥ ātma nityam kat indriya-gaṇaiḥ kṛta-vigrahaḥ tvam tvat sevakaiḥ nṛpa padam vidhutam tamaḥ andham
tvat pāda padma makaranda juṣām munīnām vartma asphuṭam nṛ paśubhiḥ nanu durvibhāvyam yasmāt alaukikam iva īhitam īśvarasya bhūman tava īhitam atha u anu ye bhavantam
niṣkiñcanaḥ nanu bhavān na yataḥ asti kiñcit yasmai balim bali bhujaḥ api haranti aja-ādyāḥ na tvā vidanti asu-tṛpaḥ antakam āḍhyatā andhāḥ preṣṭhaḥ bhavān bali-bhujām api te api tubhyam
tvam vai samasta puruṣa artha mayaḥ phala ātmā yat vāñchayā su-matayaḥ visṛjanti kṛtsnam teṣām vibho samucitaḥ bhavataḥ samājaḥ puṁsaḥ striyāḥ ca ratayoḥ sukha-duḥkhinoḥ na
tvam nyasta daṇḍa munibhiḥ gadita anubhāvaḥ ātmā ātmā daḥ ca jagatām iti me vṛtaḥ asi hitvā bhavat bhruvaḥ udīrita kāla vega dhvasta āśiṣaḥ abja bhava nāka patīn kutaḥ anye
jāḍyam vacaḥ tava gadāgraja yaḥ tu bhū-pān vidrāvya śārṅga ninadena jahartha mām tvam siṁhaḥ yathā sva balim īśa paśūn sva-bhāgam tebhyaḥ bhayāt yat udadhim śaraṇaṁ-prapannaḥ
yat vāñchayā nṛpa śikhāmaṇayaḥ aṅga-vainya-jāyanta-nāhuṣa-gaya-ādayaḥ aikya patyam rājyam visṛjya viviśuḥ vanam ambuja-akṣa sīdanti te anupadavīm te iha āsthitāḥ kim
ka anyam śrayeta tava pāda saroja gandham āghrāya sat mukharitam janatā apavargam lakṣmī ālayam tu avigaṇayya guṇa ālayasya martyā sadā uru bhayam artha vivikta dṛṣṭiḥ
tam tvā anurūpam abhajam jagatām adhīśam ātmānam atra ca paratra ca kāma pūram syāt me tava aṅghriḥ araṇam sṛtibhiḥ bhramantyāḥ yaḥ vai bhajantam upayāti anṛta apavargaḥ
tasyāḥ syuḥ acyuta nṛpāḥ bhavatā upadiṣṭāḥ strīṇām gṛheṣu khara go śva viḍāla bhṛtyāḥ yat karṇa mūlam ari karṣaṇa na upayāyāt yuṣmat kathā mṛḍa viriñca sabhāsu gītā
tvak śmaśru roma nakha keśa pinaddham antaḥ māṁsa asthi rakta kṛmi viṭ kapha pitta vātam jīvat śavam bhajati kānta matiḥ vimūḍhā yā te pada-abja makarandam ajighratī strī
astu ambuja-akṣa mama te caraṇa anurāgaḥ ātman ratasya mayi ca anatirikta dṛṣṭeḥ yarhi asya vṛddhaye upātta rajaḥ ati-mātraḥ mām īkṣase tat u ha naḥ parama anukampā
na eva alīkam aham manye vacaḥ te madhu-sūdana ambāyāḥ eva hi prāyaḥ kanyāyāḥ syāt ratiḥ kvacit
vyūḍhāyāḥ ca api puṁścalyāḥ manaḥ abhyeti navam navam budhaḥ asatīm na bibhryāt tām bibhrat ubhaya cyutaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca sādhvi etat śrotu kāmaiḥ tvam rāja-putri pralambhitā mayā uditam yat anvāttha sarvam fat satyam eva hi
yān yān kāmayase kāmān mayi akāmāya bhāmini santi hi eka-anta bhaktāyāḥ tava kalyāṇi nityadā
upalabdham pati prema pāti vratyam ca te anaghe yat vākyaiḥ cālyamānāyāḥ na dhīḥ mayi apakarṣitā
ye mām bhajanti dāmpatye tapasā vrata caryayā kāma-ātmānaḥ apavarga īśam mohitāḥ mama māyayā
mām prāpya mānini apavarga sampadam vāñchanti ye sampadaḥ eva tat patim te manda-bhāgāḥ niraye api ye nṛṇām mātrā-ātmakatvāt nirayaḥ su-saṅgamaḥ
diṣṭyā gṛha īśvari asakṛt mayi tvayā kṛtā anuvṛttiḥ bhava mocanī khalaiḥ su-duṣkarā asau sutarām durāśiṣaḥ hi asum bharāyāḥ nikṛtim juṣaḥ striyāḥ
na tvādṛśīm praṇayinīm gṛhiṇīm gṛheṣu paśyāmi mānini yayā sva vivāha kāle prāptān nṛpān na vigaṇayya rahaḥ haraḥ me prasthāpitaḥ dvijaḥ upaśruta sat kathasya
bhrātuḥ virūpa-karaṇam yudhi nirjitasya prodvāha parvaṇi ca tat vadham akṣa-goṣṭhyām duḥkham samuṭtham asahaḥ asmat ayoga bhītyā na eva abravīḥ kim api tena vayam jitāḥ te
dūtaḥ tvayā ātma labhane su-vivikta mantraḥ prasthāpitaḥ mayi cirāyati śūnyam etat matvā jihāse idam aṅgam ananya yogyam tiṣṭheta tat tvayi vayam pratinanda-yāmaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam saurata saṁlāpaiḥ bhagavān jagat īśvaraḥ sva rataḥ ramayā reme nara-lokam viḍambayan
tathā anyāsām api vibhuḥ gṛheṣu gṛha-vān iva āsthitaḥ gṛha-medhīyān dharmān loka guruḥ hariḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca eka-ekaśaḥ tāḥ kṛṣṇasya putrān daśa-daśa abalāḥ ajījanan anavamān pituḥ sarva ātma sampadā
gṛhāt anapagam vīkṣya rāja-putryaḥ acyutam sthitam preṣṭham nyamaṁsata svam svam na tat tattva vidaḥ striyaḥ
cāru abja kośa vadana āyata bāhu netra sa-prema hāsa rasa vīkṣita valgu jalpaiḥ sammohitāḥ bhagavataḥ na manaḥ vijetum svaiḥ vibhramaiḥ samaśakan vanitāḥ vibhūmnaḥ
smāya avaloka lava darśita bhāva hāri bhrū maṇḍala prahita saurata mantra śauṇḍaiḥ patnyaḥ tu ṣoḍaśa sahasram anaṅga bāṇaiḥ yasya indriyam vimathitum karaṇaiḥ na śekuḥ
ittham ramā-patim avāpya patim striyaḥ tāḥ brahma-ādayaḥ api na viduḥ padavīm yadīyām bhejuḥ mudā aviratam edhitayā anurāga hāsa avaloka nava saṅgama lālasa ādyam
pratyudgama āsana vara arhaṇa pāda śauca tāmbūla viśramaṇa vījana gandha mālyaiḥ keśa prasāra śayana snapana upahāryaiḥ dāsī śatāḥ api vibhoḥ vidadhuḥ-sma dāsyam
tāsām yāḥ daśa putrāṇām kṛṣṇa-strīṇām purā uditāḥ aṣṭau mahiṣyaḥ tat putrān pradyumna-ādīn gṛṇāmi te
cārudeṣṇaḥ sudeṣṇaḥ ca cārudehaḥ ca vīrya-vān sucāruḥ cāruguptaḥ ca bhadracāruḥ tathā aparaḥ cārucandraḥ vicāraḥ ca cāraḥ ca daśamaḥ hareḥ pradyumna-pramukhāḥ jātaḥ rukmiṇyām na avamāḥ pituḥ
bhānuḥ subhānuḥ svarbhānuḥ prabhānaḥ bhānumān tathā candrabhānuḥ bṛhadbhānuḥ atibhānuḥ tathā aṣṭamaḥ śrībhānuḥ pratibhānuḥ ca satyabhāmā ātmajāḥ daśa sāmbaḥ sumitraḥ purujit śatajit ca sahasrajit vijayaḥ citraketuḥ ca vasumān draviḍaḥ kratuḥ jāmbavatyāḥ sutāḥ hi ete sāmba-ādyāḥ pitṛ sammatāḥ
vīraḥ candraḥ aśvasenaḥ ca citraguḥ vegavān vṛṣaḥ āmaḥ śaṅkuḥ vasuḥ śrī-mān kuntiḥ nāgnajiteḥ sutāḥ
śrutaḥ kaviḥ vṛṣaḥ vīraḥ subāhuḥ bhadraḥ ekalaḥ śāntiḥ darśaḥ pūrṇamāsaḥ kālindyāḥ somakaḥ avaraḥ
praghoṣaḥ gātravān siṁhaḥ balaḥ prabalaḥ ūrdhagaḥ mādryāḥ putrāḥ mahāśaktiḥ sahaḥ ojaḥ aparājitaḥ
vṛkaḥ harṣaḥ anilaḥ gṛdhraḥ vardhana-unnādaḥ eva ca mahāṁsaḥ pāvanaḥ vahniḥ mitravindā ātmajāḥ kṣudhiḥ
saṅgrāmajit bṛhatsenaḥ śūraḥ praharaṇaḥ arijit jayaḥ subhadraḥ bhadrāyāḥ vāmaḥ āyuś ca satyakaḥ
dīptimān tāmratapta-ādyāḥ rohiṇyāḥ tanayāḥ hareḥ pradyumnāt ca aniruddhaḥ abhūt rukmavatyām mahā-balaḥ putryām tu rukmiṇaḥ rājan nāmnā bhojakaṭe pure
eteṣām putra pautrāḥ ca babhūvuḥ koṭiśaḥ nṛpa mātaraḥ kṛṣṇa-jātīnām sahasrāṇi ca ṣoḍaśa
śrī-rājā uvāca katham rukmī ari putrāya prādāt duhitaram yudhi kṛṣṇena paribhūtaḥ tam hantum randhram pratīkṣate etat ākhyāhi me vidvan dviṣoḥ vaivāhikam mithaḥ
anāgatam atītam ca vartamānam atīndriyam viprakṛṣṭam vyavahitam samyak paśyanti yoginaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca vṛtaḥ svayaṁvare sākṣāt anaṅgaḥ aṅga-yataḥ tayā rājñaḥ sametān nirjitya jahāra eka-rathaḥ yudhi
yadi api anusmaran vairam rukmī kṛṣṇa avamānitaḥ vyatarat bhāgineyāya sutām kurvan svasuḥ priyam
rukmiṇyāḥ tanayām rājan kṛtavarma-sutaḥ balī upayeme viśāla akṣīm kanyām cārumatīm kila
dauhitrāya aniruddhāya pautrīm rukmī ādadāt hareḥ rocanām baddha vairaḥ api svasuḥ priya-cikīrṣayā jānan adharmam tat yaunam sneha pāśa anubandhanaḥ
tasmin abhyudaye rājan rukmiṇī rāma-keśavau puram bhojakaṭam jagmuḥ sāmba-pradyumnaka-ādayaḥ
tasmin nivṛtte udvāhe kāliṅga-pramukhāḥ nṛpāḥ dṛptāḥ te rukmiṇam procuḥ balam akṣaiḥ vinirjaya anakṣa-jñaḥ hi ayam rājan api tat vyasanam mahat iti uktaḥ balam āhūya tena akṣaiḥ rukmī adīvyata
śatam sahasram ayatam rāmaḥ tatra ādade paṇam tam tu rukmī ajayat tatra kāliṅgaḥ prāhasat balam dantān sandarśayan uccaiḥ na amṛṣyat tat hala-āyudhaḥ
tataḥ lakṣam rukmī agṛhṇāt glaham tatra ajayat balaḥ jitavān aham iti āha rukmī kaitavam āśritaḥ
manyunā kṣubhitaḥ śrī-mān samudraḥ iva parvaṇi jātyā aruṇa akṣaḥ ati ruṣā nyarbudam glaham ādade
tam ca api jitavān rāmaḥ dharmeṇa chalam āśritaḥ rukmī jitam mayā atra ime vadantu prāśnikāḥ iti
tadā abravīt nabhaḥ vāṇī balena eva jitaḥ glahaḥ dharmataḥ vacanena eva rukmī vadati vai mṛṣā
tām anādṛtya vaidarbhaḥ duṣṭa rājanya coditaḥ saṅkarṣaṇam parihasan babhāṣe kāla coditaḥ
na eva akṣa kovidāḥ yūyam gopālāḥ vana gocarāḥ akṣaiḥ dīvyanti rājānaḥ bāṇaiḥ ca na bhavādṛśāḥ
rukmiṇā evam adhikṣiptaḥ rājabhiḥ ca upahāsitaḥ kruddhaḥ parigham udyamya jaghne tam nṛmṇa-saṁsadi
kaliṅga-rājam tarasā gṛhītvā daśame pade dantān apātayat kruddhaḥ yaḥ ahasat vivṛtaiḥ dvijaiḥ
anye nirbhinna bāhu ūru śirasaḥ rudhira ukṣitāḥ rājānaḥ dudruvuḥ bhītāḥ balena parigha arditāḥ
nihate rukmiṇi śyāle na abravīt sādhu asādhu vā rukmiṇī-balayoḥ rājan sneha bhaṅga bhayāt hariḥ
tataḥ aniruddham saha sūryayā varam ratham samāropya yayuḥ kuśasthalīm rāma-ādayaḥ bhojakaṭāt daśārhāḥ siddha akhila arthāḥ madhusūdana āśrayāḥ
śrī-rājā uvāca bāṇasya tanayām ūṣām upayeme yadu-uttamaḥ tatra yuddham abhūt ghoram hari-śaṅkarayoḥ mahat etat sarvam mahā-yogin samākhyātum tvam arhasi
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca bāṇaḥ putra śata jyeṣṭhaḥ baleḥ āsīt mahā-ātmanaḥ yena vāmana-rūpāya haraye adāyi medinī tasya aurasaḥ sutaḥ bāṇaḥ śiva-bhakti rataḥ sada mānyaḥ vadānyaḥ dhī-man ca satya-sandhaḥ dṛḍha-vrataḥ śoṇita-ākhye pure ramye saḥ rājyam akarot purā tasya śambhoḥ prasādena kinkarāḥ iva te amarāḥ sahasra bāhuḥ vādyena tāṇḍave atoṣayat mṛḍam
bhagavān sarva bhūta īśaḥ śaraṇyaḥ bhakta vatsalaḥ vareṇa chandayām āsa saḥ tam vavre pura adhipam
saḥ ekadā āha giri-śam pārśva stham vīrya durmadaḥ kirīṭena arka varṇena saṁspṛśan tat pada-ambujam
namasye tvām mahā-deva lokānām gurum īśvaram puṁsām apūrṇa kāmānām kāma-pūra amara-aṅghripam
doḥ sahasram tvayā dattam param bhārāya me abhavat tri-lokyam pratiyoddhāram na labhe tvat ṛte samam
kaṇḍūtyā nibhṛtaiḥ dorbhiḥ yuyutsuḥ dik gajān aham ādya ayam cūrṇayan adrīn bhītāḥ te api pradudruvuḥ
