iti uktaḥ ku-matiḥ hṛṣṭaḥ sva gṛham prāviśat nṛpa pratīkṣan giriśa ādeśam sva-vīrya naśanam ku-dhīḥ
tasya ūṣā nāma duhitā svapne prādyumninā ratim kanyā alabhata kāntena prāk adṛṣṭa śrutena sā
sā tatra tam apaśyantī kva asi kānta iti vādinī sakhīnām madhye uttasthau vihvalā vrīḍitā bhṛśam
bāṇasya mantrī kumbhāṇḍaḥ Citralekhā ca tat sutā sakhī apṛcchat sakhīm ūṣām kautūhala samanvitā
kam tvam mṛgayase su-bhru kīdṛṣaḥ te manaḥ-rathaḥ hasta grāham na te adya api rāja-putri upalakṣaye
dṛṣṭaḥ kaścit naraḥ svapne śyāmaḥ kamala locanaḥ pīta vāsāḥ bṛhat bāhuḥ yoṣitām hṛdayam gamaḥ
tam aham mṛgaye kāntam pāyayitvā ādharam madhu kva api yātaḥ spṛhayatīm kṣiptvā mām vṛjina arṇave
citralekhā uvāca vyasanam te apakarṣāmi tri-lokyām yadi bhāvyate tam āneṣye varam yaḥ te manaḥ hartā tam ādiśa
iti uktvā deva-gandharva siddha-cāraṇa-pannagān daitya-vidyādharān yakṣān manu-jān ca yathā alikhat
manujeṣu ca sā vṛṣṇīn śūram ānakadundubhim vyalikhat rāma-kṛṣṇau ca pradyumnam vīkṣya lajjitā aniruddham vilikhitam vīkṣya ūṣā avāk mukhī hriyā saḥ asau asau iti prāha smayamānā mahī-pate
citralekhā tam ājñāya pautram kṛṣṇasya yoginī yayau vihāyasā rājan dvārakām kṛṣṇa-pālitām
tatra suptam su paryaṅke pradyumnim yogam āsthitā gṛhītvā śoṇita-puram salshyai priyam adarśayat
sā ca tam sundara-varam vilokya mudita ānanā duṣprekṣye sva gṛhe pumbhiḥ reme pradyumninā samam
parārdhya vāsaḥ srak gandha dhūpa dīpa āsana ādibhiḥ pāna bhojana bhakṣyaiḥ ca vākyaiḥ śuśrūṣaṇa arcitaḥ gūḍhaḥ kanyā-pure śaśvat pravṛddha snehayā tayā na ahaḥ-gaṇān saḥ bubudhe ūṣayā apahṛta indriyaḥ
tām tathā yadu-vīreṇa bhujyamānām hata vratām hetubhiḥ lakṣayām cakruḥ ā-prītām duravacchadaiḥ bhaṭāḥ āvedayām cakruḥ rājan te duhituḥ vayam viceṣṭitam lakṣayāmaḥ kanyāyāḥ kula dūṣaṇam
anapāyibhiḥ asmābhiḥ guptāyāḥ ca gṛhe prabho kanyāyāḥ dūṣaṇam pumbhiḥ duṣprekṣyāyāḥ na vidmahe
tataḥ pravyathitaḥ bāṇaḥ duhituḥ śruta dūṣaṇaḥ tvaritaḥ kanyakā āgāram prāptaḥ adrākṣīt yadu-udvaham
kāma ātmajam tam bhuvana eka sundaram śyāmam piśaṅga ambaram ambuja īkṣaṇam bṛhat bhujam kuṇḍala kuntala tviṣā smita avalokena ca maṇḍita ānanam dīvyantam akṣaiḥ priyayā abhinṛmṇayā tat aṅga saṅga stana kuṅkuma srajam bāhvoḥ dadhānam madhu mallikā āśritām tasyāḥ agre āsīnam avekṣya vismitaḥ
saḥ tam praviṣṭam vṛtam ātatāyibhiḥ bhaṭaiḥ anīkaiḥ avalokya mādhavaḥ udyamya maurvam parigham vyavasthitaḥ yathā anṭakaḥ daṇḍa dharaḥ jighāṁsayā
jighṛkṣayā tān paritaḥ prasarpataḥ śunaḥ yathā śūkara yūtha paḥ ahanat te hanyamānāḥ bhavanāt vinirgatāḥ nirbhinna mūrdha ūru bhujāḥ pradudruvuḥ
tam nāga-pāśaiḥ bali-nandanaḥ balī ghnantam sva sainyam kupitaḥ babandha ha ūṣā bhṛśam śoka viṣāda vihvalā baddham niśamya aśru-kalā akṣī arautsīt
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca apaśyatām ca aniruddham tat bandhūnām ca bhārata catvāraḥ vārṣikaḥ māsāḥ vyatīyuḥ anuśocatām
nāradāt tat upākarṇya vārtām baddhasya karma ca prayayuḥ śoṇita-puram vṛṣṇayaḥ kṛṣṇa daivatāḥ
pradyumnaḥ yuyudhānaḥ ca gadaḥ sāmbaḥ atha sāraṇaḥ nanda-upananda-bhadra ādyāḥ rāma-kṛṣṇa-anuvartinaḥ akṣauhiṇībhiḥ dvādaśabhiḥ sametāḥ sarvataḥ diśam rurudhuḥ bāṇa-nagaram samantāt sātvata-ṛṣabhāḥ
bhajyamāna pura udyāna prākāra aṭṭāla gopuram prekṣamāṇaḥ ruṣā āviṣṭaḥ tulya sainyaḥ abhiniryayau
bāṇa-arthe bhagavān rudraḥ sa-sutaḥ pramathaiḥ vṛtaḥ āruhya nandi vṛṣabham yuyudhe rāma-kṛṣṇayoḥ
āsīt su-tumulam yuddham adbhutam roma-harṣaṇam kṛṣṇa-śaṅkarayoḥ rājan pradyumna-guhayoḥ api
kumbhāṇḍa-kūpakarṇābhyām balena saha saṁyugaḥ sāmbasya bāṇa-putreṇa bāṇena saha sātyakeḥ
brahma-ādayaḥ sura adhīśāḥ munayaḥ siddha-cāraṇāḥ gandharva-apsarasaḥ yakṣāḥ vimānaiḥ draṣṭum āgaman
śaṅkara anucarān śauriḥ bhūta-pramatha guhyakān ḍākinīḥ yātudhānān ca vetālān sa-vināyakān preta mātṛ piśācān ca kuṣmāṇḍān brahma-rākṣasān drāvayām āsa tīkṣṇa-agraiḥ śaraiḥ śārṅga-dhanuḥ cyutaiḥ
pṛthak-vidhāni prāyuṅkta piṇākī astrāṇi śārṅgiṇe prati-astraiḥ śamayām āsa śārṅga-pāṇiḥ avismitaḥ
brahma-astrasya ca brahma-astram vāyavyasya ca parvatam āgneyasya ca pārjanyam naijam pāśupatasya ca
mohayitvā tu giriśam jṛmbhaṇa-astreṇa jṛmbhitam bāṇasya pṛtanām śauriḥ jaghāna asi gadā iṣubhiḥ
skandaḥ pradyumna-bāṇa oghaiḥ ardyamānaḥ samantataḥ asṛk vimuñcan gātrebhyaḥ śikhinā apākramat raṇāt
kumbhāṇḍa-kūpakarṇaḥ ca petatuḥ muṣala arditau dudruvuḥ tat anīkāni hata nāthāni sarvataḥ
viśīryamāṇam sva balam dṛṣṭvā bāṇaḥ ati amarṣitaḥ kṛṣṇam abhyadravat saṅkhye rathī hitvā eva sātyakim
dhanūṁṣi ākṛṣya yugapat bāṇaḥ pañca-śatāni vai eka-ekasmin śarau dvau dvau sandadhe raṇa durmadaḥ
tāni ciccheda bhagavān dhanūṁsi yugapat hariḥ sārathim ratham aśvān ca hatvā śaṅkham apūrayat
tat mātā koṭarā nāma nagnā mukta śiraḥ-ruhā puraḥ avatasthe kṛṣṇasya putra prāṇa rirakṣayā
tataḥ tiryak mukhaḥ nagnām anirīkṣan gadāgrajaḥ bāṇaḥ ca tāvat virathaḥ chinna dhanvā āviśat puram
vidrāvite bhūta-gaṇe jvaraḥ tu tri śirāḥ tri pāt abhyadhāvata dāśārham dahan iva diśaḥ daśa
atha nārāyaṇaḥ devaḥ tam dṛṣṭvā vyasṛjat jvaram māheśvaraḥ vaiṣṇavaḥ ca yuyudhāte jvarau ubhau
māheśvaraḥ samākrandan vaiṣṇavena bala arditaḥ alabdhvā abhayam anyatra bhītaḥ māheśvaraḥ jvaraḥ śaraṇa arthī hṛṣīkeśam tuṣṭāva prayata-añjaliḥ
jvaraḥ uvāca namāmi tvā ananta śaktim para īśam sarva ātmānam kevalam jñapti mātram viśva utpatti sthāna saṁrodha hetum yat tat brahma brahma lingam praśāntam
kālaḥ daivam karma jīvaḥ svabhāvaḥ dravyam kṣetram prāṇaḥ ātmā vikāraḥ tat saṅghāṭaḥ bīja roha pravāhaḥ tvat māyā eṣā tat niṣedham prapadye
nānā bhāvaiḥ līlayā eva upapannaiḥ devān sādhūn loka setūn bibharṣi haṁsi ut-mārgān hiṁsayā vartamānān janma etat te bhāra hārāya bhūmeḥ
taptaḥ aham te tejasā duḥsahena śānta ugreṇa ati ulbaṇena jvareṇa tāvat tāpaḥ dehinām te aṅghri mūlam na u severan yāvat āśā anubaddhāḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca tri-śiraḥ te prasannaḥ asmi vyetu te mat jvarāt bhayam yaḥ nau smarati saṁvādam tasya tvat na bhavet bhayam
iti uktaḥ acyutam ānamya gataḥ māheśvaraḥ jvaraḥ bāṇaḥ tu ratham ārūḍhaḥ prāgāt yotsyan janārdanam
tataḥ bāhu sahasreṇa nānā āyudha dharaḥ asuraḥ mumoca parama kruddhaḥ bāṇān cakra-āyudhe nṛpa
tasya asyataḥ astrāṇi asakṛt cakreṇa kṣura neminā ciccheda bhagavān bāhūn śākhāḥ iva vanaspateḥ
bāhuṣu chidyamāneṣu bāṇasya bhagavān bhavaḥ bhakta anukampī upavrajya cakra-āyudham abhāṣata
śrī-rudraḥ uvāca tvam hi brahma param jyotiḥ gūḍham brahmaṇi vāk-maye yam paśyanti amala ātmānaḥ ākāśam iva kevalam
nābhiḥ nabhaḥ agniḥ mukham ambu retaḥ dyauḥ śīrṣam āśāḥ śrutiḥ aṅghriḥ urvī candraḥ manaḥ yasya dṛk arkaḥ ātmā aham samudraḥ jaṭharam bhuja indraḥ romāṇi yasya oṣadhayaḥ ambu-vāhāḥ keśāḥ viriñcaḥ dhiṣaṇā visargaḥ prajā-patiḥ hṛdayam yasya dharmaḥ saḥ vai bhavān puruṣaḥ loka kalpaḥ
tava avatāraḥ ayam akuṇṭha dhāman dharmasya guptyai jagataḥ hitāya vayam ca sarve bhavatā anubhāvitāḥ vibhāvayāmaḥ bhuvanāni sapta
tvam ekaḥ ādyaḥ puruṣaḥ advitīyaḥ turyaḥ sva-dṛk hetuḥ ahetuḥ īśaḥ pratīyase atha api yathā vikāram sva māyayā sarva guṇa prasiddhyai
yathā eva sūryaḥ pihitaḥ chāyayā svayā chāyām ca rūpāṇi ca sañcakāsti evam guṇena apihitaḥ guṇān tvam ātma-pradīpaḥ guṇinaḥ ca bhūman
yat māyā mohita dhiyaḥ putra dāra gṛha ādiṣu unmajjanti nimajjanti prasaktāḥ vṛjina arṇave
deva dattam imam labdhvā nṛ lokam ajita indriyaḥ yaḥ na ādriyeta tvat pādau saḥ śocyaḥ hi ātma vañcakaḥ
yaḥ tvām visṛjate martyaḥ ātmānam priyam īśvaram viparyaya indriya-artha artham viṣam atti amṛtam tyajan
aham brahmā atha vibudhāḥ munayaḥ ca amala āśayāḥ sarva-ātmanā prapannāḥ tvām ātmānam preṣṭham īśvaram
tam tvā jagat sthiti udaya anta hetum samam praśāntam suhṛt ātma daivam ananyam ekam jagat ātma ketam bhava apavargāya bhajāma devam
ayam mama iṣṭaḥ dayitaḥ anuvartī mayā abhayam dattam amuṣya deva sampādyatām tat bhavataḥ prasādaḥ yathā hi te daitya patau prasādaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca yat āttha bhagavan tvam naḥ karavāma priyam tava bhavataḥ yat vyavasitam tat me sādhu anumoditam
avadhyaḥ ayam mama api eṣaḥ vairocani-sutaḥ asuraḥ prahrādāya varaḥ dattaḥ na vadhyaḥ me tava anvayaḥ
darpa upaśamanāya asya pravṛkṇāḥ bāhavaḥ mayā sūditam ca balam bhūri yat ca bhārāyitam bhuvaḥ
catvāraḥ asya bhujāḥ śiṣṭāḥ bhaviṣyati ajara amaraḥ pārṣada mukhyaḥ bhavataḥ na kutaścit-bhayaḥ asuraḥ
iti labdhvā abhayam kṛṣṇam praṇamya śirasā asuraḥ pradyumnim ratham āropya sa-vadhvaḥ samupānayat
akṣauhiṇyā parivṛtam su vāsaḥ samalaṅkṛtam sa-patnīkam puraḥ-kṛtya yayau rudra anumoditaḥ
sva rājadhānīm samalaṅkṛtām dhvajaiḥ sa toraṇaiḥ ukṣita mārga catvarām viveśa śaṅkha ānaka dundubhi svanaiḥ abhyudyataḥ paura suhṛt dvijātibhiḥ
yaḥ evam kṛṣṇa-vijayam śaṅkareṇa ca saṁyugam saṁsmaret prātaḥ utthāya na tasya syāt parājayaḥ
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca ekadā upavanam rājan jagmuḥ yadu-kumārakāḥ vihartum sāmba-pradyumna-cāru-bhānu-gada-ādayaḥ
krīḍitvā su-ciram tatra vicinvantaḥ pipāsitāḥ jalam nirudake kūpe dadṛśuḥ sattvam adbhutam
kṛkalāsam giri nibham vīkṣya vismita mānasāḥ tasya ca uddharaṇe yatnam cakruḥ te kṛpayā anvitāḥ
carma-jaiḥ tāntavaiḥ pāśaiḥ baddhvā patitam arbhakāḥ na aśaknuran samuddhartum kṛṣṇāya ācakhyuḥ utsukāḥ
tatra āgatya aravinda-akṣaḥ bhagavān viśva bhāvanaḥ vīkṣya ujjahāra vāmena tam kareṇa saḥ līlayā
saḥ uttamaḥ-śloka kara abhimṛṣṭaḥ vihāya sadyaḥ kṛkalāsa rūpam santapta cāmīkara caru varṇaḥ svargī adbhuta alaṅkaraṇa ambara srak
papraccha vidvān api tat nidānam janeṣu vikhyāpayitum mukundaḥ kaḥ tvam mahā-bhāga vareṇya rūpaḥ deva-uttamam tvām gaṇayāmi nūnam
daśām imām vā katamena karmaṇā samprāpitaḥ asi atat-arhaḥ su-bhadra ātmānam ākhyāhi vivitsatām naḥ yat manyase naḥ kṣamam atra vaktum
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti sma rājā sampṛṣṭaḥ kṛṣṇena ananta mūrtinā mādhavam praṇipatya āha kirīṭena arka varcasa
nṛgaḥ uvāca nṛgaḥ nāma nara-indraḥ aham ikṣvāku-tanayaḥ prabho dāniṣu ākhyāyamāneṣu yadi te karṇam aspṛśam
kim nu te aviditam nātha sarva bhūta ātma sākṣiṇaḥ kālena avyāhata dṛśaḥ vakṣye atha api tava ājñayā
yāvatyaḥ sikatāḥ bhūmeḥ yāvatyaḥ divi tārakāḥ yāvatyaḥ varṣa dhārāḥ ca tāvatīḥ adadam sma gāḥ
payaḥ-vinīḥ taruṇīḥ śīla rūpa guṇa upapannāḥ kapilāḥ hema śṛṅgīḥ nyāya arjitāḥ rūpya khurāḥ sa-vatsāḥ dukūla mālā ābharaṇāḥ dadau aham
su alaṅkṛtebhyaḥ guṇa śīla vadbhyaḥ sīdat kuṭumbebhyaḥ ṛta vratebhyaḥ tapaḥ śruta brahma vadānya sadbhyaḥ prādām yuvabhyaḥ dvija pum-gavebhyaḥ go bhū hiraṇya āyatana aśva hastinaḥ kanyāḥ sa dāsīḥ tila rūpya śayyāḥ vāsāṁsi ratnāni paricchadān rathān iṣṭam ca yajñaiḥ caritam ca pūrtam
kasyacit dvija mukhyasya bhraṣṭā gauḥ mama go-dhane sampṛktā aviduṣā sā ca mayā dattā dvi-jātaye
tām nīyamānām tat svāmī dṛṣṭvā uvāca mama iti tam mama iti parigrāhī āha nṛgaḥ me dattavān iti
viprau vivadamānau mām ūcatuḥ sva artha sādhakau bhavān dātā apahartā iti tat śrutvā me abhavat bhramaḥ
anunītau ubhau viprau dharma kṛcchra gatena vai gavām lakṣam prakṛṣṭānām dāsyāmi eṣā pradīyatām bhavantau anugṛhṇītām kiṅkarasya avijānataḥ samuddharatam mām kṛcchrāt patantam niraye aśucau
na aham pratīcche vai rājan iti uktvā svāmī apākramat na anyat gavām api ayutam icchāmi iti aparaḥ yayau
etasmin antare yāmaiḥ dūtaiḥ nītaḥ yama-kṣayam yamena pṛṣṭaḥ tatra aham deva-deva jagat pate
pūrvam tvam aśubham bhuṅkṣe uta āha u nṛ-pate śubham na antam dānasya dharmasya paśye lokasya bhāsvataḥ
pūrvam deva aśubham bhuñje iti prāha pata iti saḥ tāvat adrākṣam ātmānam kṛkalāsam patan prabho
brahmaṇyasya vadānyasya tava dāsasya keśava smṛtiḥ na adya api vidhvastā bhavat sandarśana arthinaḥ
saḥ tvam katham mama vibho akṣi-pathaḥ para-ātmā yoga īśvaraiḥ śruti dṛśā amala hṛt vibhāvyaḥ sākṣāt adhokṣaja uru vyasana andha buddheḥ syāt me anudṛśyaḥ iha yasya bhava apavargaḥ
deva-deva jagat nātha go-vinda puruṣa-uttama nārāyaṇa hṛṣīkeśa puṇya-śloka acyuta avyaya anujānīhi mām kṛṣṇa yāntam deva-gatim prabho yatra kva api sataḥ cetaḥ bhūyāt me tvat pada āspadam
namaḥ te sarva-bhāvāya brahmaṇe ananta śaktaye kṛṣṇāya vāsudevāya yogānām pataye namaḥ
iti uktvā tam parikramya pādau spṛṣṭvā sva maulinā anujñātaḥ vimāna agryam āruhat paśyatām nṛṇām
kṛṣṇaḥ parijanam prāha bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ brahmaṇya devaḥ dharma ātmā rājanyān anuśikṣayan
durjaram bata brahma svam bhuktam agneḥ manāk api tejīyasaḥ api kim uta rājñām īśvara māninām
na aham hālāhalam manye viṣam yasya pratikriyā brahma-svam hi viṣam proktam na asya pratividhiḥ bhuvi
hinasti viṣam attāram vahniḥ adbhiḥ praśāmyati kulam sa-mūlam dahati brahma-sva araṇi pāvakaḥ
brahma-svam duranujñātam bhuktam hanti tri pūruṣam prasahya tu balāt bhuktam daśa pūrvān daśa aparān
rājānaḥ rāja lakṣmyā andhāḥ na ātma pātam vicakṣate nirayam ye abhimanyante brahma-svam sādhu bāliśaḥ
gṛhṇanti yāvataḥ pāṁśūn krandatām aśru-bindavaḥ viprāṇām hṛta vṛttīnām vadānyānām kuṭumbinām rājānaḥ rāja-kulyāḥ ca tāvataḥ abdān niraṅkuśāḥ kumbhī-pākeṣu pacyante brahma-dāya apahāriṇaḥ
sva dattām para dattām vā brahma-vṛttim haret ca yaḥ ṣaṣṭi varṣa sahasrāṇi viṣṭhāyām jāyate kṛmiḥ
na me brahma dhanam bhūyāt yat gṛdhvā alpa-āyuṣaḥ narāḥ parājitāḥ cyutāḥ rājyāt bhavanti udvejinaḥ ahayaḥ
vipram kṛta āgasam api na eva druhyata māmakāḥ ghnantam bahu śapantam vā namaḥ-kuruta nityaśaḥ
yathā aham praṇame viprān anu-kālam samāhitaḥ tathā namata yūyam ca yaḥ anyathā me saḥ daṇḍa bhāk
brāhmaṇa arthaḥ hi apahṛtaḥ hartāram pātayati adhaḥ ajānantam api hi enam nṛgam brāhmaṇa gauḥ iva
evam viśrāvya bhagavān mukundaḥ dvārakā-okasaḥ pāvanaḥ sarva lokānām viveśa nija mandiram
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca balabhadraḥ kuru-śreṣṭha bhagavān ratham āsthitaḥ suhṛt didṛkṣuḥ utkaṇṭhaḥ prayayau nanda-gokulam
pariṣvaktaḥ cira utkaṇṭhaiḥ gopaiḥ gopībhiḥ eva ca rāmaḥ abhivādya pitarau āśīrbhiḥ abhinanditaḥ
ciram naḥ pāhi dāśārha sa anujaḥ jagat īśvaraḥ iti āropya aṅkam āliṅgya netraiḥ siṣicatuḥ jalaiḥ
gopa vṛddhān ca vidhi-vat yaviṣṭhaiḥ abhivanditaḥ yathā-vayaḥ yathā-sakhyam yathā-sambandham ātmanaḥ samupetya atha gopālān hāsya hasta-graha ādibhiḥ viśrāntam sukham āsīnam papracchuḥ paryupāgatāḥ pṛṣṭāḥ ca anāmayam sveṣu prema gadgadayā girā kṛṣṇe kamala patra akṣe sannyasta akhila rādhasaḥ
kaccit naḥ bāndhavāḥ rāma sarve kuśalam āsate kaccit smaratha naḥ rāma yūyam dāra suta anvitāḥ
diṣṭyā kaṁsaḥ hataḥ pāpaḥ diṣṭyā muktāḥ suhṛt-janāḥ nihatya nirjitya ripūn diṣṭyā durgam samāśrītāḥ
gopyaḥ hasantyaḥ papracchuḥ rāma sandarśana ādṛtāḥ kaccit āste sukham kṛṣṇaḥ pura strī-jana vallabhaḥ
kaccit smarati vā bandhūn pitaram mātaram ca saḥ api asau mātaram draṣṭum sakṛt api āgamiṣyati api vā smarate asmākam anusevām mahā bhujaḥ
mātaram pitaram bhrātṝn patīn putrān svasṝn api yat arthe jahima dāśārha dustyajān sva-janān prabho tāḥ naḥ sadyaḥ parityajya gataḥ sañchinna sauhṛdaḥ katham nu tādṛśam strībhiḥ na śraddhīyeta bhāṣītam
katham nu gṛhṇanti anavasthita ātmanaḥ vacaḥ kṛta-ghnasya budhāḥ pura striyaḥ gṛhṇanti vai citra kathasya sundara smita avaloka ucchvasita smara āturāḥ
kim naḥ tat kathayā gopyaḥ kathāḥ kathayata aparāḥ yāti asmābhiḥ vinā kālaḥ yadi tasya tathā eva naḥ
iti prahasitam śaureḥ jalpitam cāru vīkṣitam gatim prema pariṣvaṅgam smarantyaḥ ruruduḥ striyaḥ
saṅkarṣaṇaḥ tāḥ kṛṣṇasya sandeśaiḥ hṛdayam gamaiḥ sāntvayām āsa bhagavān nānā anunaya kovidaḥ
dvau māsau tatra ca avātsīt madhum mādhavam eva ca rāmaḥ kṣapāsu bhagavān gopīnām ratim āvahan
pūrṇa candra kalā mṛṣṭe kaumudī gandha vāyunā yamunā upavane reme sevite strī gaṇaiḥ vṛtaḥ
varuṇa preṣitā devī vāruṇī vṛkṣa koṭarāt patantī tat vanam sarvam sva gandhena adhyavāsayat
tam gandham madhu dhārāyāḥ vāyunā upahṛtam balaḥ āghrāya upagataḥ tatra lalanābhiḥ samam papau
upagīyamānaḥ gandharvaiḥ vanitā śobhi maṇḍale reme kareṇu yūtha īśaḥ māhā-indraḥ iva vāraṇaḥ
neduḥ dundubhayaḥ vyomni vavṛṣuḥ kusumaiḥ mudā gandharvāḥ munayaḥ rāmam tat-vīryaiḥ īḍire tadā
upagīyamāna caritaḥ vanitābhiḥ halāyudhaḥ vaneṣu vyacarat kṣīvaḥ mada vihvala locanaḥ
srak-vī eka kuṇḍalaḥ mattaḥ vaijayantyā ca mālayā bibhrat smita mukha ambhojam sveda prāleya bhūṣitam saḥ ājuhāva yamunām jala kṛīḍā artham īśvaraḥ nijam vākyam anādṛtya mattaḥ iti āpa-gām balaḥ anāgatām hala agreṇa kupitaḥ vicakarṣa ha
pāpe tvam mām avajñāya yat na āyāsi mayā āhutā neṣye tvām lāṅgala agreṇa śatadhā kāma cāriṇīm
evam nirbhartsitā bhītā yamunā yadu-nandanam uvāca cakitā vācam patitā pādayoḥ nṛpa
rāma rāma mahā-bāho na jāne tava vikramam yasya eka aṁśena vidhṛtā jagatī jagataḥ pate
param bhāvam bhagavataḥ bhagavan mām ajānatīm moktum arhasi viśva ātman prapannām bhakta vatsala
tataḥ vyamuñcat yamunām yācitaḥ bhagavān balaḥ vijagāha jalam strībhiḥ kareṇubhiḥ iva ibha rāṭ
kāmam vihṛtya salilāt uttīrṇāya asita ambare bhūṣaṇāni mahā arhāṇi dadau kāntiḥ śubhām srajam
vasitvā vāsasī nīle mālām āmucya kāñcanīm reje su alaṅkṛtaḥ liptaḥ māhā-indraḥ iva vāraṇaḥ
adya api dṛśyate rājan yamunā ākṛṣṭa vartmanā balasya ananta vīryasya vīryam sūcayatī iva hi
evam sarvā niśāḥ yātāḥ ekā iva ramataḥ vraje rāmasya ākṣipta cittasya mādhuryaiḥ vraja-yoṣitām
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca nanda vrajam gate rāme karūṣa-adhipatiḥ nṛpa vāsudevaḥ aham iti ajñaḥ dūtam kṛṣṇāya prāhiṇot
tvam vāsudevaḥ bhagavān avatīrṇaḥ jagat patiḥ iti prastobhitaḥ bālaiḥ mene ātmānam acyutam
dūtam ca prāhiṇot mandaḥ kṛṣṇāya avyakta vartmane dvārakāyām yathā bālaḥ nṛpaḥ bāla kṛtaḥ abudhaḥ
dūtaḥ tu dvārakām etya sabhāyām āsthitam prabhum kṛṣṇam kamala patra akṣam rāja sandeśam abravīt
vāsudevaḥ avatīrṇaḥ aham ekaḥ eva na ca aparaḥ bhūtānām anukampā artham tvam tu mithyā abhidhām tyaja
yāni tvam asmat cihnāni mauḍhyāt bibharṣi sātvata tyaktvā ehi mām tvam śaraṇam na u cet dehi mama āhavam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca katthanam tat upākarṇya pauṇḍrakasya alpa medhasaḥ ugrasena-ādayaḥ sabhyāḥ uccakaiḥ jahasuḥ tadā
uvāca dūtam bhagavān parihāsa kathām anu utsrakṣye mūḍha cihnāni yaiḥ tvam evam vikatthase
mukham tat apidhāya ajña kaṅka gṛdhra vaṭaiḥ vṛtaḥ śayiṣyase hataḥ tatra bhavitā śaraṇam śunām
iti dūtaḥ tam ākṣepam svāmine sarvam āharat kṛṣṇaḥ api ratham āsthāya kāśīm upajagāma ha
pauṇḍrakaḥ api tat udyogam upalabhya mahā-rathaḥ akṣauhiṇībhyām saṁyuktaḥ niścakrāma purāt drutam
tasya kāśī-patiḥ mitram pārṣṇi-grāhaḥ anvayāt nṛpa akṣauhiṇībhiḥ tisṛbhiḥ apaśyat pauṇḍrakam hariḥ śaṅkha ari asi gadā śārṅga śrīvatsa ādi upalakṣitam bibhrāṇam kaustubha-maṇim vana-mālā vibhūṣitam kauśeya vāsasī pīte vasānam garuḍa-dhvajam amūlya mauli ābharaṇam sphurat makara kuṇḍalam
dṛṣṭvā tam ātmanaḥ tulyam veṣam kṛtrimam āsthitam yathā naṭam raṅga gatam vijahāsa bhṛśam hariḥ
śūlaiḥ gadābhiḥ parighaiḥ śakti ṛṣṭi prāsa tomaraiḥ asibhiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ bāṇaiḥ prāharan arayaḥ harim
kṛṣṇaḥ tu tat pauṇḍraka-kāśirājayoḥ balam gaja syandana vāji patti mat gadā asi cakra isubhiḥ ārdayat bhṛśam yathā yuga ante huta-bhuk pṛthak prajāḥ
āyodhanam tat ratha vāji kuñjara dvipat khara uṣṭraiḥ ariṇā avakhaṇḍitaiḥ babhau citam moda vaham manasvinām ākrīḍanam bhūta-pateḥ iva ulbaṇam
atha āha pauṇḍrakam śauriḥ bhoḥ bhoḥ pauṇḍraka yat bhavān dūta vākyena mām āha tāni astrāṇi utsṛjāmi te
tyājayiṣye abhidhānam me yat tvayā ajña mṛṣā dhṛtam vrajāmi śaraṇam te adya yadi na icchāmi saṁyugam
iti kṣiptvā śitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ virathī kṛtya pauṇḍrakam śiraḥ avṛścat ratha-aṅgena vajreṇa indraḥ yathā gireḥ
tathā kāśī-pateḥ kāyāt śiraḥ utkṛtya patribhiḥ nyapātayat kāśi-puryām padma kośam iva anilaḥ
evam matsariṇam hatvā pauṇḍrakam sa sakham hariḥ dvārakām āviśat siddhaiḥ gīyamāna kathā amṛtaḥ
saḥ nityam bhagavat dhyāna pradhvasta akhila bandhanaḥ bibhrāṇaḥ ca hareḥ rājan svarūpam tat-mayaḥ abhavat
śiraḥ patitam ālokya rāja-dvāre sa-kuṇḍalam kim idam kasya vā vaktram iti saṁśiśire janāḥ
rājñaḥ kāśī-pateḥ jñātvā mahiṣyaḥ putra bāndhavāḥ paurāḥ ca hā hatāḥ rājan nātha nātha iti prārudan
sudakṣiṇaḥ tasya sutaḥ kṛtvā saṁsthā-vidhim pateḥ nihatya pitṛ hantāram yāsyāmi apacitim pituḥ iti ātmanā abhisandhāya sa upādhyāyaḥ mahā-īśvaram su-dakṣiṇaḥ arcayām āsa parameṇa samādhinā
prītaḥ avimukte bhagavān tasmai varam adāt vibhuḥ pitṛ hantṛ vadha upāyam saḥ vavre varam īpsitam
dakṣiṇa-agnim paricara brāhmaṇaiḥ samam ṛtvijam abhicāra-vidhānena saḥ ca agniḥ pramathaiḥ vṛtaḥ sādhayiṣyati saṅkalpam abrahmaṇye prayojitaḥ iti ādiṣṭaḥ tathā cakre kṛṣṇāya abhicaran vratī
tataḥ agniḥ utthitaḥ kuṇḍāt mūrti-mān ati bhīṣaṇaḥ tapta tāmra śikhā śmaśruḥ aṅgāra udgāri locanaḥ daṁṣṭra ugra bhru kuṭī daṇḍa kaṭhora āsyaḥ sva jihvayā ālihan sṛkvaṇī nagnaḥ vidhunvan tri-śikham jvalat
padbhyām tāla pramāṇābhyām kampayan avanī talam saḥ abhyadhāvat vṛtaḥ bhūtaiḥ dvārakām pradahan diśaḥ
tam ābhicāra dahanam āyāntam dvārakā-okasaḥ vilokya tatrasuḥ sarve vana-dāhe mṛgāḥ yathā
akṣaiḥ sabhāyām krīḍantam bhagavantam bhaya āturāḥ trāhi trāhi tri loka īśa vahneḥ pradahataḥ puram
śrutvā tat jana vaiklavyam dṛṣṭvā svānām ca sādhvasam śaraṇyaḥ samprahasya āha mā bhaiṣṭa iti avitā asmi aham
sarvasya antaḥ bahiḥ sākṣī kṛtyām māhā-īśvarīm vibhuḥ vijñāya tat vighāta artham pārśva stham cakram ādiśat
tat sūrya koṭi pratimam sudarśanam jājvalyamānam pralaya anala prabham sva tejasā kham kakubhaḥ atha rodasī cakram mukunda astram atha agnim ārdayat
kṛtyā analaḥ pratihataḥ saḥ ratha-aṅga-pāṇeḥ astra ojasā saḥ nṛpa bhagna-mukhaḥ nivṛttaḥ vārānasīm parisametya sudakṣiṇam tam sa ṛtvik-janam samadahat sva kṛtaḥ abhicāraḥ
cakram ca viṣṇoḥ tat anupraviṣṭam vārāṇasīm sa aṭṭa sabhā ālaya āpaṇām sa gopura aṭṭālaka koṣṭha saṅkulām sa kośa hasti aśva ratha anna śālinīm
dagdhvā vārāṇasīm sarvām viṣṇoḥ cakram sudarśanam bhūyaḥ pārśvam upātiṣṭhat kṛṣṇasya akliṣṭa karmaṇaḥ
yaḥ enam śrāvayet martyaḥ uttamaḥ-śloka vikramam samāhitaḥ vā śṛṇuyāt sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate
śrī-rājā uvāca bhūyaḥ aham śrotum icchāmi rāmasya adbhuta karmaṇaḥ anantasya aprameyasya yat anyat kṛtavān prabhuḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca narakasya sakhā kaścit dvividaḥ nāma vānaraḥ sugrīva sacivaḥ saḥ atha bhrātā maindasya vīrya-vān
sakhyuḥ saḥ apacitim kurvan vānaraḥ rāṣṭra viplavam pura grāma ākarān ghoṣān adahat vahnim utsṛjan
kvacit saḥ śailān utpāṭya taiḥ deśān samacūrṇayat ānartān sutarām eva yatra āste mitra hā hariḥ
kvacit samudra madhya sthaḥ dorbhyām utkṣipya tat jalam deśān nāga ayuta prāṇaḥ velā kūle nyamajjayat
āśramān ṛṣi mukhyānām kṛtva bhagna vanaspatīn adūṣayat śakṛt mūtraiḥ agnīn vaitānikān khalaḥ
puruṣān yoṣitaḥ dṛptaḥ kṣmā-bhṛt droṇī guhāsu saḥ nikṣipya ca apyadhāt śailaiḥ peśaṣkārī iva kīṭakam
evam deśān viprakurvan dūṣayan ca kula striyaḥ śrutvā su-lalitam gītam girim raivatakam yayau
tatra apaśyat yadu-patim rāmam puṣkara mālinam su-darśanīya sarva aṅgam lalanā yūtha madhya-gam gāyantam vāruṇīm pītvā mada vihvala locanam vibhrājamānam vapuṣā prabhinnam iva vāraṇam
duṣṭaḥ śākhā-mṛgaḥ śākhām ārūḍhaḥ kampayan drumān cakre kilakilā-śabdam ātmānam sampradarśayan
tasya dhārṣṭyam kapeḥ vīkṣya taruṇyaḥ jāti cāpalāḥ hāsya-priyāḥ vijahasuḥ baladeva-parigrahāḥ
tāḥ helayām āsa kapiḥ bhrū kṣepaiḥ sammukha ādibhiḥ darśayan sva gudam tāsām rāmasya ca nirīkṣitaḥ
tam grāvṇā prāharat kruddhaḥ balaḥ praharatām varaḥ saḥ vañcayitvā grāvāṇam madirā kalaśam kapiḥ gṛhītvā helayām āsa dhūrtaḥ tam kopayan hasan nirbhidya kalaśam duṣṭaḥ vāsāṁsi āsphālayat balam kadarthīkṛtya bala-vān vipracakre mada uddhataḥ
tam tasya avinayam dṛṣṭvā deśān ca tat upadrutān kruddhaḥ muṣalam ādatta halam ca ari jighāṁsayā
dvividaḥ api mahā vīryaḥ śālam udyamya pāṇinā abhyetya tarasā tena balam mūrdhani atāḍayat
tam tu saṅkarṣaṇaḥ mūrdhni patantam acalaḥ yathā pratijagrāha bala-vān sunandena ahanat ca tam
mūṣala āhata mastiṣkaḥ vireje rakta dhārayā giriḥ yathā gairikayā prahāram na anucintayan punaḥ anyam samutkṣipya kṛtvā niṣpatram ojasā tena ahanat su-saṅkruddhaḥ tam balaḥ śatadhā acchinat tataḥ anyena ruṣā jaghne tam ca api śatadhā acchinat
evam yudhyan bhagavatā bhagne bhagne punaḥ punaḥ ākṛṣya sarvataḥ vṛkṣān nirvṛkṣam akarot vanam
tataḥ amuñcat śilā varṣam balasya upari amarṣitaḥ tat sarvam cūrṇayām āsa līlayā muṣala-āyudhaḥ
saḥ bāhū tāla saṅkāśau muṣṭī kṛtya kapi īśvaraḥ āsādya rohiṇī-putram tābhyām vakṣasi arūrujat
yādava-indraḥ api tam dorbhyām tyaktvā muṣala-lāṅgale jatrau abhyardayat kruddhaḥ saḥ apatat rudhiram vaman
cakampe tena patatā sa ṭaṅkaḥ sa vanaspatiḥ parvataḥ kuru-śārdūla vāyunā nauḥ iva ambhasi
jaya-śabdaḥ namaḥ-śabdaḥ sādhu sādhu iti ca ambare sura siddha muni-indrāṇām āsīt kusuma varṣiṇām
evam nihatya dvividam jagat vyatikara āvaham saṁstūyamānaḥ bhagavān janaiḥ sva puram āviśat
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca duryodhana-sutām rājan lakṣmaṇām samitim-jayaḥ svayaṁvara sthām aharat sāmbaḥ jāmbavatī-sutaḥ
kauravāḥ kupitāḥ ūcuḥ durvinītaḥ ayam arbhakaḥ kadarthī-kṛtya naḥ kanyām akāmām aharat balāt
badhnīta imam durvinītam kim kariṣyanti vṛṣṇayaḥ ye asmat prasāda upacitām dattām naḥ bhuñjate mahīm
nigṛhītam sutam śrutvā yadi eṣyanti iha vṛṣṇayaḥ bhagna darpāḥ śamam yānti prāṇāḥ iva su saṁyatāḥ
iti karṇaḥ śalaḥ bhūriḥ yajñaketuḥ suyodhanaḥ sāmbam ārebhire yoddhum kuru-vṛddha anumoditāḥ
dṛṣṭvā anudhāvataḥ sāmbaḥ dhārtarāṣṭrān mahārathaḥ pragṛhya ruciram cāpam tasthau siṁhaḥ iva ekalaḥ
tam te jighṛkṣavaḥ kruddhāḥ tiṣṭha tiṣṭha iti bhāṣiṇaḥ āsādya dhanvinaḥ bāṇaiḥ karṇa-agraṇyaḥ samākiran
saḥ apaviddhaḥ kuru-śreṣṭha kurubhiḥ yadu-nandanaḥ na amṛṣyat tat acintya arbhaḥ siṁhaḥ kṣudra mṛgaiḥ iva
visphūrjya ruciram cāpam sarvān vivyādha sāyakaiḥ karṇa-ādīn ṣaṭ rathān vīraḥ tāvadbhiḥ yugapat pṛthak caturbhiḥ caturaḥ vāhān eka-ekena ca sārathīn rathinaḥ ca mahā-iṣu-āsān tasya tat te abhyapūjayan
tam tu te viratham cakruḥ catvāraḥ caturaḥ hayān ekaḥ tu sārathim jaghne cicheda anyaḥ śara-asanam
tam baddhvā virathī-kṛtya kṛcchreṇa kuravaḥ yudhi kumāram svasya kanyām ca sva-puram jayinaḥ aviśan
tat śrutvā nārada uktena rājan sañjāta manyavaḥ kurūn prati udyamam cakruḥ ugrasena pracoditāḥ
sāntvayitvā tu tān rāmaḥ sannaddhān vṛṣṇi-puṅgavān na aicchat kurūṇām vṛṣṇīnām kalim kali mala apahaḥ jagāma hāstina-puram rathena āditya varcasā brāhmaṇaiḥ kula vṛddhaiḥ ca vṛtaḥ candraḥ iva grahaiḥ
gatvā gajāhvayam rāmaḥ bāhya upavanam āsthitaḥ uddhavam preṣayām āsa dhṛtarāṣṭram bubhutsayā
saḥ abhivandya ambikā-putram bhīṣmam droṇam ca bāhlikam duryodhanam ca vidhi-vat rāmam āgatam abravīt
te ati prītāḥ tam ākarṇya prāptam rāmam suhṛt-tamam tam arcayitvā abhiyayuḥ sarve maṅgala pāṇayaḥ
tam saṅgamya yathā nyāyam gām arghyam ca nyavedayan teṣām ye tat prabhāva jñāḥ praṇemuḥ śirasā balam
bandhūn kuśalinaḥ śrutvā pṛṣṭvā śivam anāmayam parasparam atha u rāmaḥ babhāṣe aviklavam vacaḥ
ugrasenaḥ kṣita īśa īśaḥ yat vaḥ ājñāpayat prabhuḥ tat avyagra-dhiyaḥ śrutvā kurudhvam avilambitam
yat yūyam bahavaḥ tu ekam jitvā adharmeṇa dhārmikam abadhnīta atha tat mṛṣye bandhūnām aikya kāmyayā
vīrya śaurya bala unnaddham ātma śakti samam vacaḥ kuravaḥ baladevasya niśamya ūcuḥ prakopitāḥ
aho mahat citram idam kāla gatyā duratyayā ārurakṣati upānat vai śiraḥ mukuṭa sevitam
ete yaunena sambaddhāḥ saha śayyā āsana aśanāḥ vṛṣṇayaḥ tulyatām nītāḥ asmat datta nṛpa-āsanāḥ
cāmara vyajane śaṅkham ātapatram ca pāṇḍuram kirīṭam āsanam śayyām bhuñjate asmat upekṣayā
alam yadūnām nara-deva lāñchanaiḥ dātuḥ pratīpaiḥ phaṇinām iva amṛtam ye asmat prasāda upacitāḥ hi yādavāḥ ājñāpayanti adya gata-trapāḥ bata
katham indraḥ api kurubhiḥ bhīṣma-droṇa-arjuna-ādibhiḥ adattam avarundhīta siṁha grastam iva uraṇaḥ
śrī-bādarāyaniḥ uvāca janma bandhu śrīyā unnaddha madāḥ te bharata-ṛṣabha āśrāvya rāmam durvācyam asabhyāḥ puram āviśan
dṛṣṭvā kurūṇām dauḥśīlyam śrutvā avācyāni ca acyutaḥ avocat kopa saṁrabdhaḥ duṣprekṣyaḥ prahasan muhuḥ
nūnam nānā mada unnaddhāḥ śāntim na icchanti asādhavaḥ teṣām hi praśamaḥ daṇḍaḥ paśūnām laguḍaḥ yathā
aho yadūn su-saṁrabdhān kṛṣṇam ca kupitam śanaiḥ sāntvayitvā aham eteṣām śamam icchan iha āgataḥ te ime manda-matayaḥ kalaha abhiratāḥ khalāḥ tam mām avajñāya muhuḥ durbhāṣān māninaḥ abruvan
na ugrasenaḥ kila vibhuḥ bhoja-vṛṣṇi-andhaka īśvaraḥ śakra-ādayaḥ loka pālāḥ yasya ādeśa anuvartinaḥ
sudharmā ākramyate yena pārijātaḥ amara aṅghripaḥ ānīya bhujyate saḥ asau na kila adhyāsana arhaṇaḥ
yasya pāda-yugam sākṣāt śrīḥ upāste akhila īśvarī saḥ na arhati kila śrī-īśaḥ nara-deva paricchadān
yasya aṅghri paṅkaja rajaḥ akhila loka pālaiḥ mauli uttamaiḥ dhṛtam upāsita tīrtha tīrtham brahmā bhavaḥ aham api yasya kalāḥ kalāyāḥ śrīḥ ca udvahema ciram asya nṛpa-āsanam kva
bhuñjate kurubhiḥ dattam bhū khaṇḍam vṛṣṇayaḥ kila upānahaḥ kila vayam svayam tu kuravaḥ śiraḥ
aho aiśvarya mattānām mattānām iva māninām asambaddhāḥ giraḥ rukṣāḥ kaḥ saheta anuśāsītā
adya niṣkauravāṁ pṛthvīm kariṣyāmi iti amarṣitaḥ gṛhītvā halam uttasthau dahan iva jagat trayam
lāṅgala agreṇa nagaram udvidārya gajāhvayam vicakarṣa saḥ gaṅgāyām prahariṣyan amarṣitaḥ
jala-yānam iva āghūrṇam gaṅgāyām nagaram patat ākṛṣyamāṇam ālokya kauravāḥ jāta sambhramāḥ tam eva śaraṇam jagmuḥ sa kuṭumbaḥ jijīviṣavaḥ sa lakṣmaṇam puraḥ-kṛtya sāmbam prāñjalayaḥ prabhum

tvam eva mūrdhni idam ananta līlayā bhū maṇḍalam bibharṣi sahasra-mūrdhan ante ca yaḥ sva ātma niruddha viśvaḥ śeṣe advitīyaḥ pariśiṣyamāṇaḥ
kopaḥ te akhila śikṣā artham na dveṣāt na ca matsarāt bibhrataḥ bhagavan sattvam sthiti pālana tat-paraḥ
namaḥ te sarva bhūta ātman sarva śakti dhara avyaya viśva karman namaḥ te astu tvām vayam śaraṇam gatāḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam prapannaiḥ saṁvignaiḥ vepamāna ayanaiḥ balaḥ prasāditaḥ su prasannaḥ mā bhaiṣṭa iti abhayam dadau
duryodhanaḥ pāribarham kuñjarān ṣaṣṭi hāyanān dadau ca dvādaśa śatāni ayutāni turaṅgamān rathānām ṣaṭ-sahasrāṇi raukmāṇām sūrya varcasām dāsīnām niṣka kaṇṭthīnām sahasram duhitṛ vatsalaḥ
pratigṛhya tu tat sarvam bhagavān sātvata ṛṣabhaḥ sa sutaḥ sa snuṣaḥ prāyāt su-hṛdbhiḥ abhinanditaḥ
tataḥ praviṣṭaḥ sva puram hala-āyudhaḥ sametya bandhūn anurakta cetasaḥ śaśaṁsa sarvam yadu-puṅgavānām madhye sabhāyām kuruṣu sva ceṣṭitam
adya api ca puram hi etat sūcayat rāma vikramam samunnatam dakṣiṇataḥ gaṅgāyām anudṛśyate
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca narakam nihatam śrutvā tathā udvāham ca yoṣitām kṛṣṇena ekena bahvīnām tat didṛkṣuḥ sma nāradaḥ citram bata etat ekena vapuṣā yugapat pṛthak gṛheṣu dvi aṣṭa sāhasram striyaḥ ekaḥ udāvahat iti utsukaḥ dvāravatīm deva ṛṣiḥ draṣṭum āgamat puṣpita upavana ārāma dvija ali kula nāditām utphulla indīvara ambhoja kahlāra kumuda utpalaiḥ churiteṣu saraḥsu uccaiḥ kūjitām haṁsa sārasaiḥ prāsāda lakṣaiḥ navabhiḥ juṣṭām sphāṭika rājataiḥ mahā-marakata prakhyaiḥ svarṇa ratna paricchadaiḥ vibhakta rathyā patha catvara āpaṇaiḥ śālā-sabhābhiḥ rucirām sura ālayaiḥ saṁsikta mārga aṅgana vīthi dehalīm patat patāka dhvaja vārita ātapām

viṣṭabdham vidruma stambhaiḥ vaidūrya phalaka uttamaiḥ indranīla-mayaiḥ kuḍyaiḥ jagatyā ca ahata tviṣā vitānaiḥ nirmitaiḥ tvaṣṭrā muktā-dāma vilambibhiḥ dāntaiḥ āsana paryaṅkaiḥ maṇi uttama pariṣkṛtaiḥ dāsībhiḥ niṣka kaṇṭhībhiḥ su-vāsobhiḥ alaṅkṛtam pumbhiḥ sa-kañcuka uṣṇīṣa su-vastra maṇi kuṇḍalaiḥ ratna pradīpa nikara dyutibhiḥ nirasta dhvāntam vicitra valabhīṣu śikhaṇḍinaḥ aṅga nṛtyanti yatra vihita aguru dhūpam akṣaiḥ niryāntam īkṣya ghana buddhayaḥ unnadantaḥ
tasmin samāna guṇa rūpa vayaḥ su-veṣa dāsī sahasra yutayā anusavam gṛhiṇyā vipraḥ dadarśa cāmara vyajanena rukma daṇḍena sātvata-patim parivījayantyā
tam sannirīkṣya bhagavān sahasā utthita śrī paryaṅkataḥ sakala dharma bhṛtām variṣṭhaḥ ānamya pāda-yugalam śirasā kirīṭa juṣṭena sa-añjaliḥ avīviśat āsane sve
tasya avanijya caraṇau tat apaḥ sva mūrdhnā bibhrat jagat guru-tamaḥ api satām patiḥ hi brahmaṇya devaḥ iti yat guṇa nāma yuktam tasya eva yat caraṇa śaucam aśeṣa tīrtham
sampūjya deva ṛṣi varyam ṛṣiḥ purāṇaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ nara-sakhaḥ vidhinā uditena vāṇyā abhibhāṣya mitayā amṛta miṣṭayā tam prāha prabho bhagavate karavāma he kim
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca na eva adbhutam tvayi vibho akhila loka nāthe maitrī janeṣu sakaleṣu damaḥ khalānām niḥśreyasāya hi jagat sthiti rakṣaṇābhyām svaira avatāraḥ uru-gāya vidāma suṣṭhu
dṛṣṭam tava aṅghri yugalam janatā apavargam brahma-ādibhiḥ hṛdi vicintyam agādha bodhaiḥ saṁsāra kūpa patita uttaraṇa avalambam dhyāyan carāmi anugṛhāṇa yathā smṛtiḥ syāt
tataḥ anyat āviśat geham kṛṣṇa-patnyāḥ saḥ nāradaḥ yoga-īśvara īśvarasya aṅga yoga-māyā vivitsayā
dīvyantam akṣaiḥ tatra api priyayā ca uddhavena ca pūjitaḥ parayā bhaktyā pratyutthāna āsana ādibhiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ ca aviduṣā iva asau kadā āyātaḥ bhavān iti kriyate kim nu pūrṇānām apūrṇaiḥ asmat-ādibhiḥ atha api brūhi naḥ brahman janma etat śobhanam kuru saḥ tu vismitaḥ utthāya tūṣṇīm anyat agāt gṛham
tatra api acaṣṭa govindam lālayantam sutān śiśūn tataḥ anyasmin gṛhe apaśyat majjanāya kṛta-udyamam
juhvantam ca vitāna-agnīn yajantam pañcabhiḥ makhaiḥ bhojayantam dvijān kva api bhuñjānam avaśeṣitam
kva api sandhyām upāsīnam japantam brahma vāk-yatam ekatra ca asi carmābhyām carantam asi-vartmasu
aśvaiḥ gajaiḥ rathaiḥ kva api vicarantam gada-agrajam kvacit śayānam paryaṅke stūyamānam ca vandibhiḥ
mantrayantam ca kasmiṁścit mantri-bhiḥ ca uddhava-ādibhiḥ jala krīḍā ratam kva api vāra-mukhyā abalā vṛtam
kutracit dvija mukhyebhyaḥ dadatam gāḥ su alaṅkṛtāḥ itihāsa purāṇāni śṛṇvantam maṅgalāni ca
hasantam hāsa-kathayā kadācit priyayā gṛhe kva api dharmam sevamānam artha kāmau ca kutracit
dhyāyantam ekam āsīnam puruṣam prakṛteḥ param śuśrūṣantam gurūn kva api kāmaiḥ bhogaiḥ saparyayā
kurvantam vigraham kaiścit sandhim ca anyatra keśavam kutra api saha rāmeṇa cintayantam satām śivam
putrāṇām duhitṝṇām ca kāle vidhi upayāpanam dāraiḥ varaiḥ tat sadṛśaiḥ kalpayantam vibhūtibhiḥ
prasthāpana upanayanaiḥ apatyānām mahā utsavān vīkṣya yoga-īśvara īśasya yeṣām lokāḥ visismire
yajantam sakalān devān kva api kratubhiḥ ūrjitaiḥ pūrtayantam kvacit dharmam kūrpa ārāma maṭha ādibhiḥ
carantam mṛgayām kva api hayam āruhya saindhavam ghnantam tatra paśūn medhyān parītam yadu-puṅgavaiḥ
avyakta liṅgam prakṛtiṣu antaḥ-pura gṛha-ādiṣu kvacit carantam yoga-īśam tat-tat bhāva bubhutsayā
atha uvāca hṛṣīkeśam nāradaḥ prahasan iva yoga-māyā udayam vīkṣya mānuṣīm īyuṣaḥ gatim
vidāma yoga-māyāḥ te durdarśāḥ api māyinām yoga-īśvara ātman nirbhātāḥ bhavat pāda niṣevayā
anujānīhi mām deva lokān te yaśasā āplutān paryaṭāmi tava udgāyan līlāḥ bhuvana pāvanīḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca brahman dharmasya vaktā aham kartā tat anumoditā tat śikṣayan lokam imam āsthitaḥ putra mā khidaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti ācarantam sat dharmān pāvanān gṛha-medhinām tam eva sarva geheṣu santam ekam dadarśa ha
kṛṣṇasya ananta vīryasya yoga-māyā mahā udayam muhuḥ dṛṣṭvā ṛṣiḥ abhūt vismitaḥ jātakautukaḥ
iti artha kāma dharmeṣu kṛṣṇena śraddhita ātmanā samyak sabhājitaḥ prītaḥ tam eva anusmaran yayau
evam manuṣya padavīm anuvartamānaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ akhila bhavāya gṛhīta śaktiḥ reme aṅga ṣoḍaśa sahasra vara aṅganānām sa-vrīḍa sauhṛda nirīkṣaṇa hāsa juṣṭaḥ
yāni iha viśva vilaya udbhava vṛtti hetuḥ karmāṇi ananya viṣayāṇi hariḥ cakāra yaḥ tu aṅga gāyati śṛṇoti anumodate vā bhaktiḥ bhavet bhagavati hi apavarga mārge
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca atha uṣasi upavṛttāyām kukkuṭān kūjataḥ aśapan gṛhīta kaṇṭhyaḥ patibhiḥ mādhavyaḥ viraha āturāḥ
vayāṁsi aroruvan kṛṣṇam bodhayanti iva vandinaḥ gāyatsu aliṣu anidrāṇi mandāra vana vāyubhiḥ
muhūrtam tam tu vaidarbhī na amṛṣyat ati śobhanam parirambhaṇa viśleṣāt priya bāhu antaram gatā
brāhme muhūrte utthāya vāri upaspṛśya mādhavaḥ dadhyau prasanna karaṇaḥ ātmānam tamasaḥ param ekam svayam-jyotiḥ ananyam avyayam sva-saṁsthayā nitya nirasta kalmaṣam brahma-ākhyam asya udbhava nāśa hetubhiḥ sva śaktibhiḥ lakṣita bhāva nirvṛtim
atha āplutaḥ ambhasi amale yathā-vidhi kriyā kalāpam paridhāya vāsasī cakāra sandhyā-upagama ādi sat-tamaḥ huta analaḥ brahma jajāpa vāk yataḥ
upasthāya arkam udyantam tarpayitvā ātmanaḥ kalāḥ devān ṛṣīn pitṝn vṛddhān viprān abhyarcya ca ātma-vān dhenūnām rukma śṛṅgīnām sādhvīnām mauktika srajām payasvinīnām gṛṣṭīnām sa-vatsānām su-vāsasām dadau rūpya khura agrāṇām kṣauma ajina tilaiḥ saha alaṅkṛtebhyaḥ viprebhyaḥ badvam badvam dine dine
go vipra devatā vṛddha gurūn bhūtāni sarvaśaḥ namaskṛtya ātma sambhūtīḥ maṅgalāni samaspṛśat
ātmānam bhūṣayām āsa nara-loka vibhūṣaṇam vāsobhiḥ bhūṣaṇaiḥ svīyaiḥ divya srak anulepanaiḥ
avekṣya ājyam tathā ādarśam go vṛṣa dvija devatāḥ kāmān ca sarva varṇānām paura antaḥ-pura cāriṇām pradāpya prakṛtīḥ kāmaiḥ pratoṣya pratyanandata
saṁvibhajya agrataḥ viprān srak tāmbūla anulepanaiḥ suhṛdaḥ prakṛtīḥ dārān upāyuṅkta tataḥ svayam
tāvat sūtaḥ upānīya syandanam parama adbhutam sugrīva-ādyaiḥ hayaiḥ yuktam praṇamya avasthitaḥ agrataḥ
gṛhītvā pāṇinā pāṇī sāratheḥ tam atha āruhat sātyaki-uddhava saṁyuktaḥ pūrva adrim iva bhāskaraḥ
īkṣitaḥ antaḥ-pura strīṇām sa-vrīḍa prema vīkṣitaiḥ kṛcchrāt visṛṣṭaḥ niragāt jāta hāsaḥ haran manaḥ
sudharmā-ākhyām sabhām sarvaiḥ vṛṣṇibhiḥ parivāritaḥ prāviśat yat nivistānām na santi aṅga ṣaṭ ūrmayaḥ
tatra upaviṣṭaḥ parama-āsane vibhuḥ babhau sva bhāsā kakubhaḥ avabhāsayan vṛtaḥ nr siṁhaiḥ yadubhiḥ yadu-uttamaḥ yathā uḍu-rājaḥ divi tārakā-gaṇaiḥ
tatra upamantriṇaḥ rājan nānā hāsya rasaiḥ vibhum upatasthuḥ naṭa-ācāryāḥ nartakyaḥ tāṇdavaiḥ pṛthak
mṛdaṅga vīṇā muraja veṇu tāla dara svanaiḥ nanṛtuḥ jaguḥ tuṣṭuvuḥ ca sūta māgadha vandinaḥ
tatra āhuḥ brāhmaṇāḥ kecit āsīnāḥ brahma vādinaḥ pūrveṣām puṇya yaśasām rājñām ca ākathayan kathāḥ
tatra ekaḥ puruṣaḥ rājan āgataḥ apūrva darśanaḥ vijñāpitaḥ bhagavate pratīhāraiḥ praveśitaḥ
saḥ namaskṛtya kṛṣṇāya para-īśāya kṛta-añjaliḥ rājñām āvedayat duḥkham jarāsandha nirodha-jam
ye ca dik-vijaye tasya sannatim na yayuḥ nṛpāḥ prasahya ruddhāḥ tena āsan ayute dve giri-vraje
rājānaḥ ūcuḥ kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa aprameya-ātman prapanna bhaya bhañjana vayam tvām śaraṇam yāmaḥ bhava bhītāḥ pṛthak dhiyaḥ
lokaḥ vikarma nirataḥ kuśale pramattaḥ karmaṇi ayam tvat udite bhavat arcane sve yaḥ tāvat asya bala-vān iha jīvita āśām sadyaḥ chinatti animiṣāya namaḥ astu tasmai
loke bhavān jagat inaḥ kalayā avatīrṇaḥ sat rakṣaṇāya khala nigrahaṇāya ca anyaḥ kaścit tvadīyam atiyāti nideśam īśa kim vā janaḥ sva kṛtam ṛcchati tat na vidmaḥ
svapnāyitam nṛpa sukham para-tantram īśa śaśvat bhayena mṛtakena dhuram vahāmaḥ hitvā tat ātmani sukham tvat anīha labhyam kliśyāmahe ati kṛpaṇāḥ tava māyayā iha
tat naḥ bhavān praṇata śoka hara aṅghri yugmaḥ baddhān viyuṅkṣva magadha-āhvaya karma pāśāt yaḥ bhū-bhujaḥ ayuta matam gaja vīryam ekaḥ bibhrat rurodha bhavane mṛga-rāṭ iva avīḥ
yaḥ vai tvayā dvi nava kṛtvaḥ udātta cakra bhagnaḥ mṛdhe khalu bhavantam ananta vīryam jitvā nr-loka niratam sakṛt ūḍha darpaḥ yuṣmat prajāḥ rujati naḥ ajita tat vidhehi

śrī-śukaḥ uvāca rāja dūte bruvati evam deva ṛṣiḥ parama dyutiḥ bibhrat piṅga jaṭā bhāram prādurāsīt yathā raviḥ
tam dṛṣṭvā bhagavan kṛṣṇaḥ sarva loka īśvara īśvaraḥ vavanda utthitaḥ śīrṣṇā sa sabhyaḥ sa anugaḥ mudā

na hi te aviditam kiñcit lokeṣu īśvara kartṛṣu atha pṛcchāmahe yuṣmān pāṇḍavānām cikīrṣitam
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca dṛṣṭā mayā te bahuśaḥ duratyayā māyā vibho viśva sṛjaḥ ca māyinaḥ bhūteṣu bhūman carataḥ sva śaktibhiḥ vahneḥ iva channa rucaḥ na me adbhutam
tava īhitam kaḥ arhati sādhu veditum sva māyayā idam sṛjataḥ niyacchataḥ yat vidyamāna ātmatayā avabhāsate tasmai namaḥ te sva vilakṣaṇa-ātmane
jīvasya yaḥ saṁsarataḥ vimokṣaṇam na jānataḥ anartha vahāt śarīrataḥ līlā avatāraiḥ sva yaśaḥ pradīpakam prājvālayat tvā tam aham prapadye
atha api āśrāvaye brahma nara-loka viḍambanam rājñaḥ paitṛ svasreyasya bhaktasya ca cikīrṣitam
yakṣyati tvām makha indreṇa rājasūyena pāṇḍavaḥ pārameṣṭhya kāmaḥ nṛ-patiḥ tat bhavān anumodatām
tasmin deva kratu vare bhavantam vai sura ādayaḥ didṛkṣavaḥ sameṣyanti rājānaḥ ca yaśasvinaḥ
śravaṇāt kīrtanāt dhyānāt pūyante ante-vasāyinaḥ tava brahma-mayasya īśa kim uta īkṣā abhimarśinaḥ
yasya amalam divi yaśaḥ prathitam rasāyām bhūmau ca te bhuvana maṅgala dik vitānam mandākinī iti divi bhogavatī iti ca adhaḥ gaṅgā iti ca iha caraṇa ambu punāti viśvam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tatra teṣu ātma pakṣeṣu agṛṇatsu vijigīṣayā vācaḥ peśaiḥ smayan bhṛtyam uddhavam prāha keśavaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca tvam hi naḥ paramam cakṣuḥ suhṛt mantra artha tattva-vit atha atra brūhi anuṣṭheyam śraddadhmaḥ karavāma tat
iti upāmantritaḥ bhartrā sarva-jñena api mugdha vat nideśam śirasa ādhāya uddhavaḥ pratyabhāṣata
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti udīritam ākarṇya deva-ṛṣeḥ uddhavaḥ abravīt sabhyānām matam ājñāya kṛṣṇasya ca mahā-matiḥ
śrī-uddhavaḥ uvāca yat uktam ṛṣinā deva sācivyam yakṣyataḥ tvayā kāryam paitṛ-ṣvasreyasya rakṣā ca śaraṇa eṣiṇām
yaṣṭavyam rājasūyena dik cakra jayinā vibho ataḥ jarā-suta jayaḥ ubhaya arthaḥ mataḥ mama
asmākam ca mahān arthaḥ hi etena eva bhaviṣyati yaśaḥ ca tava govinda rājñaḥ baddhān vimuñcataḥ
saḥ vai durviṣahaḥ rājā nāga ayuta samaḥ bale balinām api ca anyeṣām bhīmam sama-balam vinā
dvai-rathe saḥ tu jetavyaḥ mā śata akṣauhiṇī yutaḥ brāhmaṇyaḥ abhyarthitaḥ vipraiḥ na pratyākhyāti karhicit
brahma veṣa dharaḥ gatvā tam bhikṣeta vṛka-udaraḥ haniṣyati na sandehaḥ dvai-rathe tava sannidhau

tvat pāduke aviratam pari ye caranti dhyāyanti abhadra naśane śucayaḥ gṛṇanti vindanti te kamala nābha bhava apavargam āśāsate yadi te āśiṣaḥ īśa na anye
tat deva-deva bhavataḥ caraṇa-aravinda sevā anubhāvam iha paśyatu lokaḥ eṣaḥ ye tvām bhajanti na bhajanti uta vā ubhayeṣām niṣṭhām pradarśaya vibho kuru-sṛñjayānām
na brahmaṇaḥ sva para bheda matiḥ tava syāt sarva ātmanaḥ sama dṛśaḥ sva sukha anubhūteḥ saṁsevatām sura-taroḥ iva te prasādaḥ sevā anurūpam udayaḥ na viparyayaḥ atra

na kaścit mat param loke tejasā yaśasā śriyā vibhūtibhiḥ vā abhibhavet devaḥ api kim u pārthivaḥ

hariścandraḥ rantidevaḥ uñcha-vṛttiḥ śibiḥ baliḥ vyādhaḥ kapotaḥ bahavaḥ hi adhruveṇa dhruvam gatāḥ

ittham tayoḥ prahatayoḥ gadayoḥ nr vīrau kruddhau sva muṣṭibhiḥ ayaḥ sparaśaiḥ apiṣṭām śabdaḥ tayoḥ praharatoḥ ibhayoḥ iva āsīt nirghāta vajra paruṣaḥ tala tāḍana utthaḥ

niśamya dharma-rājaḥ tat keśavena anukampitam ānanda aśru-kalām muñcan premṇā na uvāca kiñcana
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam yudhiṣṭhiraḥ rājā jarāsandha-vadham vibhoḥ kṛṣṇasya ca anubhāvam tam śrutvā prītaḥ tam abravīt
śrī-yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca ye syuḥ trai-lokya guravaḥ sarve lokāḥ mahā-īśvarāḥ vahanti durlabham labdhvā śirasā eva anuśāsanam
saḥ bhavān aravinda-akṣaḥ dīnānām īśa māninām dhatte anuśāsanam bhūman tat atyanta viḍambanam
na hi ekasya advitīyasya brahmaṇaḥ parama-ātmanaḥ karmabhiḥ vardhate tejaḥ hrasate ca yathā raveḥ
na vai te ajita bhaktānām mama aham iti mādhava tvam tava iti ca nānā dhīḥ paśūnām iva vaikṛtī
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti uktvā yajñiye kāle vavre yuktān saḥ ṛtvijaḥ kṛṣṇa anumoditaḥ pārthaḥ brāhmaṇān brahma vādinaḥ
dvaipāyanaḥ bharadvājaḥ sumantuḥ gotamaḥ asitaḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ cyavanaḥ kaṇvaḥ maitreyaḥ kavaṣaḥ tritaḥ viśvāmitraḥ vāmadevaḥ sumatiḥ jaiminiḥ kratuḥ pailaḥ parāśaraḥ gargaḥ vaiśampāyanaḥ eva ca atharvā kaśyapaḥ dhaumyaḥ rāmaḥ bhārgavaḥ āsuriḥ vītihotraḥ madhucchandāḥ vīrasenaḥ akṛtavraṇaḥ
upahūtāḥ tathā ca anye droṇa-bhīṣma-kṛpa-ādayaḥ dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ saha-sutaḥ viduraḥ ca mahā-matiḥ brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāḥ vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ yajña didṛkṣavaḥ tatra īyuḥ sarva rājānaḥ rājñām prakṛtayaḥ nṛpa
tataḥ te deva-yajanam brāhmaṇāḥ svarṇa lāṅgalaiḥ kṛṣṭvā tatra yathā-āmnāyam dīkṣayām cakrire nṛpam
haimāḥ kila upakaraṇāḥ varuṇasya yathā purā indra-ādayaḥ loka-pālāḥ viriñci-bhava-saṁyutāḥ sa-gaṇāḥ siddha-gandharvāḥ vidyādhara mahā-uragāḥ munayaḥ yakṣa-rakṣāṁsi khaga-kinnara-cāraṇāḥ rājānaḥ ca samāhūtāḥ rāja patnyaḥ ca sarvaśaḥ rājasūyam samīyuḥ sma rājñaḥ pāṇḍu-sutasya vai menire kṛṣṇa-bhaktasya su-upapannam avismitāḥ
ayājayan mahā-rājam yājakāḥ deva varcasaḥ rājasūyena vidhi-vat pracetasam iva amarāḥ
sūtye ahani avanī-pālaḥ yājakān sadasaḥ patīn apūjayat mahā-bhāgān yathāvat su-samāhitaḥ
sadasya agrya arhaṇa arham vai vimṛśantaḥ sabhā sadaḥ na adhyagacchan anaika-antyāt sahadevaḥ tadā abravīt
arhati hi acyutaḥ śraiṣṭhyam bhagavān sātvatām patiḥ eṣaḥ vai devatāḥ sarvāḥ deśa kāla dhana ādayaḥ
yat-ātmakam idam viśvam kratavaḥ ca yat-ātmakāḥ agniḥ āhutayaḥ mantrāḥ sāṅkhyam yogaḥ ca yat paraḥ ekaḥ eva advitīyaḥ asau aitat-ātmyam idam jagat ātmanā ātma āśrayaḥ sabhyāḥ sṛjati avati hanti ajaḥ
vividhāni iha karmāṇi janayan yat avekṣayā īhate yat ayam sarvaḥ śreyaḥ dharma-ādi lakṣaṇam
tasmāt kṛṣṇāya mahate dīyatām parama arhaṇam evam cet sarva bhūtānām ātmanaḥ ca arhaṇam bhavet
sarva bhūta ātma bhūtāya kṛṣṇāya ananya darśine deyam śāntāya pūrṇāya dattasya ānantyam icchatā
iti uktvā sahadevaḥ abhūt tūṣṇīm kṛṣṇa anubhāva vit tat śrutvā tuṣṭuvuḥ sarve sādhu sādhu iti sat tamāḥ
śrutvā dvija īritam rājā jñātvā hārdam sabhā-sadām samarhayat hṛṣīkeśam prītaḥ praṇaya vihvalaḥ
tat pādau avanijya āpaḥ śirasā loka pāvanīḥ sa bhāryaḥ sa anuja amātyaḥ sa kuṭumbaḥ vahan mudā vāsobhiḥ pīta kauṣeyaiḥ bhūṣaṇaiḥ ca mahā-dhanaiḥ arhayitvā aśru pūrṇa akṣaḥ na aśakat samavekṣitum
ittham sabhājitam vīkṣya sarve prāñjalayaḥ janāḥ namaḥ jaya iti nemuḥ tam nipetuḥ puṣpa vṛṣṭayaḥ
ittham niśamya damaghoṣa-sutaḥ sva pīṭhāt utthāya kṛṣṇa-guṇa varṇana jāta manyuḥ utkṣipya bāhum idam āha sadasi amarṣī saṁśrāvayan bhagavate paruṣāṇi abhītaḥ
īśaḥ duratyayaḥ kālaḥ iti satya-vatī srutiḥ vṛddhānām api yat buddhiḥ bāla vākyaiḥ vibhidyate
yūyam pātra vidām śreṣṭhāḥ mā mandhvam bāla bhāṣitam sadasaḥ-patayaḥ sarve kṛṣṇaḥ yat sammataḥ arhaṇe
tapaḥ vidyā vrata dharān jñāna vidhvasta kalmaṣān parama ṛṣīn brahma niṣṭhān loka-pālaiḥ ca pūjitān sadaḥ-patīn atikramya gopālaḥ kula pāṁsanaḥ yathā kākaḥ puroḍāśam saparyām katham arhati
varṇa āśrama kula apetaḥ sarva dharma bahiḥ-kṛtaḥ svaira vartī guṇaiḥ hīnaḥ saparyām katham arhati
yayātinā eṣām hi kulam śaptam sadbhiḥ bahiḥ-kṛtam vṛthā pāna ratam śaśvat saparyām katham arhati
brahma-ṛṣi sevitān deśān hitvā ete abrahma-varcasam samudram durgam āśritya bādhante dasyavaḥ prajāḥ
evam ādīni abhadrāṇi babhāṣe naṣṭa maṅgalaḥ na uvāca kiñcit bhagavān yathā siṁhaḥ śivā rutam
bhagavat nindanam śrutvā duḥsaham tat sabhā-sadaḥ karṇau pidhāya nirjagmuḥ śapantaḥ cedi-pam ruṣā
nindām bhagavataḥ śṛṇvan tat parasya janasya vā tataḥ na apaiti yaḥ saḥ api yāti adhaḥ su-kṛtāt cyutaḥ
tataḥ pāṇḍu-sutāḥ kruddhāḥ matsya-kaikaya-sṛñjayāḥ ut-āyudhāḥ samuttasthuḥ śisupāla-jighāṁsavaḥ
tataḥ caidyaḥ tu asambhrāntaḥ jagṛhe khaḍga carmaṇī bhartsayan kṛṣṇa pakṣīyān rājñaḥ sadasi bhārata
tāvat utthāya bhagavān svān nivārya svayam ruṣā śiraḥ kṣura anta cakreṇa jahāra patataḥ ripoḥ
śabdaḥ kolāhalaḥ atha āsīt śiśupāle hate mahān tasya anuyāyinaḥ bhūpāḥ dudruvuḥ jīvita eṣiṇaḥ
caidya deha utthitam jyotiḥ vāsudevam upāviśat paśyatām sarva bhūtānām ulkā iva bhuvi khāt cyutā
janma traya anuguṇita vaira saṁrabdhayā dhiyā dhyāyan tat-mayatām yātaḥ bhāvaḥ hi bhava kāraṇam
ṛtvigbhyaḥ sa-sadasyebhyaḥ dakṣiṇām vipulām adāt sarvān sampūjya vidhi-vat cakre avabhṛtham eka-rāṭ
sādhayitvā kratuḥ rājñaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ yoga-īśvara īśvaraḥ uvāsa katicit māsān su-hṛdbhiḥ abhiyācitaḥ
tataḥ anujñāpya rājānam anicchantam api īśvaraḥ yayau sa-bhāryaḥ sa-amātyaḥ sva puram devakī-sutaḥ
varṇitam tat upākhyānam mayā te bahu vistaram vaikuṇṭha-vāsinoḥ janma vipra śāpāt punaḥ punaḥ
rājasūya avabhṛthyena snātaḥ rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ brahma-kṣatra sabhā madhye śuśubhe sura rāṭ iva
rājñā sabhājitāḥ sarve sura mānava khe-carāḥ kṛṣṇam kratum ca śaṁsantaḥ sva dhāmāni yayuḥ mudā
duryodhanam ṛte pāpam kalim kuru-kula āmayam yaḥ na sehe śrīyam sphītām dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍu-sutasya tām
yaḥ idam kīrtayet viṣṇoḥ karma caidya-vadha ādikam rāja mokṣam vitānam ca sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate
śrī-rājā uvāca ajāta-śatroḥ tam dṛṣṭvā rājasūya mahā udayam sarve mumudire brahman nṛ-devāḥ ye samāgatāḥ duryodhanam varjayitvā rājānaḥ sa ṛṣayaḥ surāḥ iti śrutam naḥ bhagavan tatra kāraṇam ucyatām
śrī-bāḍarāyaniḥ uvāca pitāmahasya te yajñe rājasūye mahā-ātmanaḥ bāndhavāḥ paricaryāyām tasya āsan prema bandhanāḥ
bhīmaḥ mahānasa adhyakṣaḥ dhana adhyakṣaḥ suyodhanaḥ sahadevaḥ tu pūjāyām nakulaḥ dravya sādhane guru śuśrūṣaṇe jiṣṇuḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pāda avanejane pariveṣaṇe drupada-jā karṇaḥ dāne mahāmanāḥ yuyudhānaḥ vikarṇaḥ ca hārdikyaḥ vidura-ādayaḥ bāhlīka-putrāḥ bhūn-ādyāḥ ye ca santardana-ādayaḥ nirūpitāḥ mahā yajñe nānā karmasu te tadā pravartante sma rāja-indra rājñaḥ priya cikīrṣavaḥ
ṛtvik sadasya bahu-vitsu suhṛt-tameṣu su iṣṭeṣu sūnṛta samarhaṇa dakṣiṇābhiḥ caidye ca sātvata-pateḥ caraṇam praviṣṭe cakruḥ tataḥ tu avabhṛtha-snapanam dyu nadyām
mṛdaṅga śaṅkha paṇava dhundhuri ānaka go-mukhāḥ vāditrāṇi vicitrāṇi neduḥ āvabhṛtha utsave
nārtakyaḥ nanṛtuḥ hṛṣṭāḥ gāyakāḥ yūthaśaḥ jaguḥ vīṇā veṇu tala unnādaḥ teṣām saḥ divam aspṛśat
citra dhvaja patāka agraiḥ ibha indra syandana arvabhiḥ su-alaṅkṛtaiḥ bhaṭaiḥ bhū-pāḥ niryayuḥ rukma mālinaḥ
yadu-sṛñjaya-kāmboja kuru-kekaya-kośalāḥ kampayantaḥ bhuvam sainyaiḥ yajamāna puraḥ-sarāḥ
sadasya ṛtvik dvija śreṣṭhāḥ brahma ghoṣeṇa bhūyasā deva ṛṣi pitṛ gandharvāḥ tuṣṭuvuḥ puṣpa varṣiṇaḥ
su-alaṅkṛtāḥ narāḥ nāryaḥ gandha srak bhūṣaṇa ambaraiḥ vilimpantyaḥ abhiṣiñcantyaḥ vijahruḥ vividhaiḥ rasaiḥ
taila go-rasa gandha-uda haridrā sāndra kuṅkumaiḥ pumbhiḥ liptāḥ pralimpantyaḥ vijahruḥ vāra-yoṣitaḥ
guptāḥ nṛbhiḥ niragaman upalabdhum etat devyaḥ yathā divi vimāna varaiḥ nṛ-devyaḥ tāḥ mātuleya sakhibhiḥ pariṣicyamānāḥ sa-vrīḍa hāsa vikasat vadanāḥ virejuḥ
tāḥ devarān uta sakhīn siṣicuḥ dṛtībhiḥ klinna ambarāḥ vivṛta gātra kuca ūru madhyāḥ autsukya mukta kavarāt cyavamāna mālyāḥ kṣobham dadhuḥ mala dhiyam ruciraiḥ vihāraiḥ
saḥ samrāṭ ratham āruḍhaḥ sat aśvam rukma mālinam vyarocata sva-patnībhiḥ kriyābhiḥ kratu rāṭ iva
patnī-saṁyāja avabhṛthyaiḥ caritvā te tam ṛtvijaḥ ācāntam snāpayām cakruḥ gaṅgāyām saha kṛṣṇayā
deva dundubhayaḥ neduḥ nara dundubhibhiḥ samam mumucuḥ puṣpa varṣāṇi deva ṛṣi pitṛ mānavāḥ
sasnuḥ tatra tataḥ sarve varṇa-āśrama yutāḥ narāḥ mahā pātakī api yataḥ sadyaḥ mucyeta kilbiṣāt
atha rājā ahate kṣaume paridhāya su-alaṅkṛtaḥ ṛtvik sadasya vipra ādīn ānarca ābharaṇa ambaraiḥ
bandhūn jñātīn nṛpān mitra suhṛdaḥ anyān ca sarvaśaḥ abhīkṣṇam pūjayām āsa nārāyaṇa-paraḥ nṛpaḥ
sarve janāḥ sura rucaḥ maṇi kuṇḍala srak uṣṇīṣa kañcuka dukūla mahā-arghya hārāḥ nāryaḥ ca kuṇḍala yuga alaka-vṛnda juṣṭa vaktra śriyaḥ kanaka mekhalayā virejuḥ
atha ṛtvijaḥ mahā-śīlāḥ sadasyāḥ brahma vādinaḥ brahma kṣatriya viṭ śūdrāḥ ājānaḥ ye samāgatāḥ deva ṛṣi pitṛ bhūtāni loka pālāḥ saha anugāḥ pūjitāḥ tam anujñāpya sva dhāmāni yayuḥ nṛpa
hari dāsasya rāja-ṛṣeḥ rājasūya mahā-udayam na eva atṛpyan praśaṁsantaḥ piban martyaḥ amṛtam yathā
tataḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ rājā suhṛt sambandhi bāndhavān premṇā nivārayām āsa kṛṣṇam ca tyāga kātaraḥ
bhagavān api tatra aṅga nyāvātsīt tat priyam karaḥ prasthāpya yadu-vīrān ca sāmba-ādīn ca kuśasthalīm
ittham rājā dharma sutaḥ manaḥ-ratha mahā arṇavam su dustaram samuttīrya kṛṣṇena āsīt gata-jvaraḥ
ekadā antaḥ-pure tasya vīkṣya duryodhanaḥ śrīyam atapyat rājasūyasya mahitvam ca acyuta-ātmanaḥ
yasmin nara-indra ditija-indra sura-indra lakṣmīḥ nānā vibhānti kila viśva-sṛjā upakḷptāḥ tābhiḥ patīn drupada-rāja sutā upatasthe yasyām viṣakta hṛdayaḥ kuru-rāṭ atapyat
yasmin tadā madhu pateḥ mahiṣī sahasram śroṇī bhareṇa śanakaiḥ kvaṇat aṅghri śobham madhye su-cāru kuca kuṅkuma śoṇa hāram śrī-mat mukham pracala kuṇḍala kuntala āḍhyam
sabhāyām maya kḷptāyām kva api dharma-sutaḥ adhirāṭ vṛtaḥ anugaiḥ bandhubhiḥ ca kṛṣṇena api sva cakṣuṣā āsīnaḥ kāñcane sākṣāt āsane maghavān iva pārameṣṭhya śriyā juṣṭaḥ stūyamānaḥ ca vandibhiḥ
tatra duryodhanaḥ mānī parītaḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ nṛpa kirīṭa mālī nyaviśat asi hastaḥ kṣipan ruṣā
sthale abhyagṛhṇāt vastra antam jalam matvā sthale apatat jale ca sthala vat bhrāntyā maya māyā vimohitaḥ
jahāsa bhīmaḥ tam dṛṣṭvā striyaḥ nṛ-patayaḥ apare nivāryamāṇāḥ api aṅga rājñā kṛṣṇa anumoditāḥ
saḥ vrīḍitaḥ avāk vadanaḥ ruṣā jvalan niṣkramya tūṣṇīm prayayau gaja-āhvayam hā-hā iti śabdaḥ su-mahān abhūt satām ajāta-śatruḥ vimanāḥ iva abhavat babhūva tūṣṇīm bhagavān bhuvaḥ bharam samujjihīrṣuḥ bhramati sma yat dṛśā
etat te abhihitam rājan yat pṛṣṭaḥ aham iha tvayā suyodhanasya daurātmyam rājasūye mahā-kratau
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca atha anyat api kṛṣṇasya śṛṇu karma adbhutam nṛpa krīḍā nara śarīrasya yathā saubha-patiḥ hataḥ
śiśupāla-sakhaḥ śālvaḥ rukmiṇī-udvāhe āgataḥ yadubhiḥ nirjitaḥ saṅkhye jarāsandha-ādayaḥ tathā
śālvaḥ pratijñām akarot śṛṇvatām sarva bhū-bhujām ayādavām kṣmām kariṣye pauruṣam mama paśyata
iti mūḍhaḥ pratijñāya devam paśu-patim prabhum āradhayām āsa nṛpaḥ pāṁśu muṣṭim sakṛt grasan
saṁvatsara ante bhagavān āśu-toṣaḥ umā-patiḥ vareṇa chandayām āsa śālvam śaraṇam āgatam
deva asura manuṣyāṇām gandharva uraga rakṣasām abhedyam kāma gam vavre saḥ yānam vṛṣṇi bhīṣaṇam
tathā iti giri-śa ādiṣṭaḥ mayaḥ para puram jayaḥ puram nirmāya śālvāya prādāt saubham ayaḥ mayam
saḥ labdhvā kāma-gam yānam tamaḥ dhāma durāsadam yayau dvāravatīm śālvaḥ vairam vṛṣṇi-kṛtam smaran
nirudhya senayā śālvaḥ mahatyā bharata-ṛṣabha purīm babhañja upavanān udyanāni ca sarvaśaḥ sa-gopurāṇi dvārāṇi prāsāda aṭṭāla tolikāḥ vihārān saḥ vimāna agryāt nipetuḥ śastra vṛṣṭayaḥ śilā drumāḥ ca aśanayaḥ sarpāḥ āsāra-śarkarāḥ pracaṇḍaḥ cakravātaḥ abhūt rajasā ācchādditāḥ diśaḥ
iti ardyamānā saubhena kṛṣṇasya nagarī bhṛśam na abhyapadyata śam rājan tri-pureṇa yathā mahī
pradyumnaḥ bhagavān vīkṣya bādhyamānāḥ nijāḥ prajāḥ mā bhaiṣṭa iti abhyadhāt vīraḥ ratha ārūḍhaḥ mahā yaśāḥ
sātyakiḥ cārudeṣṇaḥ ca sāmbaḥ akrūraḥ saha anujaḥ hārdikyaḥ bhānuvindaḥ ca gadaḥ ca śuka-sāraṇau apare ca mahā iṣv-āsāḥ ratha yūtha-pa yūtha-pāḥ niryayuḥ daṁśitāḥ guptāḥ ratha ibha aśva padātibhiḥ
tataḥ pravavṛte yuddham śālvānām yadubhiḥ saha yathā asurāṇām vibudhaiḥ tumulam loma-harṣaṇam
tāḥ ca saubha-pateḥ māyāḥ divya astraiḥ rukmiṇī-sutaḥ kṣaṇena nāśayām āsa naiśam tamaḥ iva uṣṇa guḥ
vivyādha pañca viṁśatyā svarṇa puṅkhaiḥ ayaḥ mukhaiḥ śālvasya dhvajinī-pālam śaraiḥ sannata parvabhiḥ śatena atāḍayat śālvam eka-ekena asya sainikān daśabhiḥ daśabhiḥ netṝn vāhanāni tribhiḥ tribhiḥ
tat adbhutam mahat karma pradyumnasya mahā-ātmanaḥ dṛṣṭvā tam pūjayām āsuḥ sarve sva para sainikāḥ
bahu rūpa eka rūpam tat dṛśyate na ca dṛśyate māyā-mayam maya kṛtam durvibhāvyam paraiḥ abhūt
kvacit bhūmau kvacit vyomni giri mūrdhni jale kvacit alāta-cakra vat bhrāmyat saubham tat duravasthitam
yatra yatra upalakṣyeta sa-saubhaḥ saha-sainikaḥ śālvaḥ tataḥ tataḥ amuñcan śarān sātvata yūtha-pāḥ
śaraiḥ agni arka saṁsparśaiḥ āśī viṣa durāsadaiḥ pīḍyamāna pura anīkaḥ śālvaḥ amuhyat para īritaiḥ
śālva anīka-pa śastra oghaiḥ vṛṣṇi-vīrāḥ bhṛśa arditāḥ na tatyajuḥ raṇam svam svam loka dvaya jigīṣavaḥ
śālva-amātyaḥ dyumān nāma pradyumnam prāk prapīḍitaḥ āsādya gadayā maurvyā vyāhatya vyanadat balī
pradyumnam gadayā śīrṇa vakṣaḥ-sthalam arim damam apovāha raṇāt sūtaḥ dharma vit dāruka-ātmajaḥ
labdha saṁjñaḥ muhūrtena kārṣṇiḥ sārathim abravīt aho asādhu idam sūta yat raṇāt me apasarpaṇam
na yadūnām kule jātaḥ śrūyate raṇa vicyutaḥ vinā mat klība cittena sūtena prāpta kilbiṣāt
kim nu vakṣye abhisaṅgamya pitarau rāma-keśavau yuddhāt samyak apakrāntaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ tatra ātmanaḥ kṣamam
vyaktam me kathayiṣyanti hasantyaḥ bhrātṛ-jāmayaḥ klaibyam katham katham vīra tava anyaiḥ kathyatām mṛdhe
sārathiḥ uvāca dharmam vijānatā āyuḥ-man kṛtam etat mayā vibho sūtaḥ kṛcchra gatam rakṣet rathinam sārathim rathī
etat viditvā tu bhavān mayā apovāhitaḥ raṇāt upasṛṣṭaḥ pareṇa iti mūrcchitaḥ gadayā hataḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca saḥ upaspṛśya salilam daṁśitaḥ dhṛta kārmukaḥ naya mam dyumataḥ pārśvam vīrasya iti āha sārathim
vidhamantam sva sainyāni dyumantam rukmiṇī-sutaḥ pratihatya pratyavidhyāt nārācaiḥ aṣṭabhiḥ smayan
caturbhiḥ caturaḥ vāhān sūtam ekena ca ahanat dvābhyām dhanuḥ ca ketum ca śareṇa anyena vai śiraḥ
gada-sātyaki-sāmba-ādyāḥ jaghnuḥ saubha-pateḥ balam petuḥ samudre saubheyāḥ sarve sañchinna kandharāḥ
evam yadūnām śālvānām nighnatām itara-itaram yuddham tri nava rātram tat abhūt tumulam ulbaṇam
indraprastham gataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ āhūtaḥ dharma-sūnunā rājasūye atha nivṛtte śiśupāle ca saṁsthite kuru-vṛddhān anujñāpya munīn ca sa sutām pṛthām nimittāni ati ghorāṇi paśyan dvāravatīm yayau
āha ca aham iha āyātaḥ ārya miśra abhisaṅgataḥ rājanyāḥ caidya-pakṣīyāḥ nūnam hanyuḥ purīm mama
vīkṣya tat kadanam svānām nirūpya pura rakṣaṇam saubham ca śālva-rājam ca dārukam prāha keśavaḥ
ratham prāpaya me sūta śālvasya antikam āśu vai sambhramaḥ te na kartavyaḥ māyā-vī saubha-rāṭ ayam
iti uktaḥ codayām āsa ratham āsthāya dārukaḥ viśantam dadṛśuḥ sarve sve pare ca aruṇa-anujam
śālvaḥ ca kṛṣṇam ālokya hata prāya bala īśvaraḥ prāharat kṛṣṇa-sūtāya śaktim bhīma ravām mṛdhe
tām āpatantīm nabhasi mahā ulkām iva raṁhasā bhāsayantīm diśaḥ śauriḥ sāyakaiḥ śatadhā acchinat
tam ca ṣoḍaśabhiḥ viddhvā bāṇaiḥ saubham ca khe bhramat avidhyat śara sandohaiḥ kham sūryaḥ iva raśmibhiḥ
śālvaḥ śaureḥ tu doḥ savyam sa śārṅgam śārṅga-dhanvanaḥ bibheda nyapatat hastāt śārṅgam asīt tat adbhutam
hāhā-kāraḥ mahān āsīt bhūtānām tatra paśyatām ninadya saubha-rāṭ uccaiḥ idam āha janārdanam
yat tvayā mūḍha naḥ sakhyuḥ bhrātuḥ bhāryā hṛtā īkṣatām pramattaḥ saḥ sabhā madhye tvayā vyāpāditaḥ sakhā tam tvā adya niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ aparājita māninam nayāmi apunaḥ-āvṛttim yadi tiṣṭheḥ mama agrataḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca vṛthā tvam katthase manda na paśyasi antike antakam pauruṣam darśayanti sma śūrāḥ na bahu bhāṣiṇaḥ
iti uktvā bhagavān śālvam gadayā bhīma vegayā tatāḍa jatrau saṁrabdhaḥ saḥ cakampe vaman asṛk
gadāyām sannivṛttāyām śālvaḥ tu antaradhīyata tataḥ muhūrte āgatya puruṣaḥ śirasā acyutam devakyā prahitaḥ asmi iti natvā prāha vacaḥ rudan
kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahā-bāho pitā te pitṛ vatsala baddhvā apanītaḥ śālvena saunikena yathā paśuḥ
niśamya vipriyam kṛṣṇaḥ mānuṣīm prakṛtim gataḥ vimanaskaḥ ghṛṇī snehāt babhāṣe prākṛtaḥ yathā
katham rāmam asambhrāntam jitvā ajeyam sura asuraiḥ śālvena alpīyasā nītaḥ pitā me bala-vān vidhiḥ
iti bruvāṇe govinde saubha-rāṭ pratyupasthitaḥ vasudevam iva ānīya kṛṣṇam ca idam uvāca saḥ
eṣaḥ te janitā tātaḥ yat-artham iha jīvasi vadhiṣye vīkṣataḥ te amum īśaḥ cet pāhi bāliśa
evam nirbhartsya māyā-vī khaḍgena ānakadundubheḥ utkṛtya śiraḥ ādāya kha stham saubham samāviśat
tataḥ muhūrtam prakṛtau upaplutaḥ sva-bodhaḥ āste sva-jana anuṣaṅgataḥ mahā-anubhāvaḥ tat abudhyat āsurīm māyām saḥ śālva prasṛtām maya uditām
na tatra dūtam na pituḥ kalevaram prabuddhaḥ ājau samapaśyat acyutaḥ svāpnam yathā ca ambara cāriṇam ripum saubha-stham ālokya nihantum udyataḥ
evam vadanti rāja-ṛṣe ṛṣayaḥ ke ca na anvitāḥ yat sva vācaḥ virudhyeta nūnam te na smaranti uta
kva śoka mohau snehaḥ vā bhayam vā ye ajñā sambhavāḥ kva ca akhaṇḍita vijñāna jñāna aiśvaryaḥ tu akhaṇḍitaḥ
yat pāda sevā ūrjitayā ātma-vidyayā hinvanti anādi ātma viparyaya-graham labhante ātmīyam anantam aiśvaram kutaḥ nu mohaḥ paramasya sat gateḥ
tam śastra pūgaiḥ praharantam ojasā śālvam śaraiḥ śauriḥ amogha vikramaḥ viddhvā acchinat varma dhanuḥ śiraḥ maṇim saubham ca śatroḥ gadayā ruroja ha
tat kṛṣṇa-hasta īritayā vicūrṇitam papāta toye gadayā sahasradhā visṛjya tat bhū-talam āsthitaḥ gadām udyamya śālvaḥ acyutam abhyagāt drutam
ādhāvataḥ sa-gadam tasya bāhum bhallena chittvā atha ratha-aṅgam adbhutam vadhāya śālvasya laya arka sannibham bibhrat babhau sa-arkaḥ iva udaya acalaḥ
jahāra tena eva śiraḥ sa kuṇḍalam kirīṭa yuktam puru māyinaḥ hariḥ vajreṇa vṛtrasya yathā purandaraḥ babhūva hā-hā iti vacaḥ tadā nṛṇām
tasmin nipatite pāpe saubhe ca gadayā hate neduḥ dundubhayaḥ rājan divi deva-gaṇa īritāḥ sakhīnām apacitim kurvan dantavakraḥ rūṣā abhyagāt
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca śiśupālasya śālvasya pauṇḍrakasya api durmatiḥ para-loka gatānāṁ ca kurvan pārokṣya sauhṛdam ekaḥ padātiḥ saṅkruddhaḥ gadā pāṇiḥ prakampayan padbhyām imam mahā-rāja mahā sattvaḥ vyadṛśyata
tam tathā āyāntam ālokya gadām ādāya satvaraḥ avaplutya rathāt kṛṣṇaḥ sindhum velā iva pratyadhāt
gadām udyamya kārūṣaḥ mukundam prāha durmadaḥ diṣṭyā diṣṭyā bhavān adya mama dṛṣṭi patham gataḥ
tvam mātuleyaḥ naḥ kṛṣṇa mitra dhruk mām jighāṁsasi ataḥ tvām gadayā manda haniṣye vajra-kalpayā
tarhi ānṛṇyam upaimi ajña mitrāṇām mitra-vatsalaḥ bandhu rūpam arim hatvā vyādhim deha-caram yathā
evam rūkṣaiḥ tudan vākyaiḥ kṛṣṇam totraiḥ iva dvipam gadayā atāḍayat mūrdhni siṁha-vat vyanadat ca saḥ
gadayā abhihataḥ api ājau na cacāla yadu-udvahaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ api tam ahan gurvyā kaumodakyā stana-antare
gadā nirbhinna hṛdayaḥ udvaman rudhiram mukhāt prasārya keśa bāhu aṅghrīn dharaṇyām nyapatat vyasuḥ
tataḥ sūkṣma-taram jyotiḥ kṛṣṇam āviśat adbhutam paśyatām sarva bhūtānām yathā caidya-vadhe nṛpa
vidūrathaḥ tu tat bhrātā bhrātṛ śoka pariplutaḥ āgacchat asi carmābhyām ucchvasan tat jighāṁsayā
tasya ca āpatataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ cakreṇa kṣura neminā śiraḥ jahāra rāja-indra sa kirīṭam sa kuṇḍalam
evam saubham ca śālvam ca dantavakram saha anujam hatvā durviṣahān anyaiḥ īḍitaḥ sura mānavaiḥ munibhiḥ siddha gandharvaiḥ vidyādhara mahā-uragaiḥ apsarobhiḥ pitṛ-gaṇaiḥ yakṣaiḥ kinnara-cāraṇaiḥ upagīyamāna vijayaḥ kusumaiḥ abhivarṣitaḥ vṛtaḥ ca vṛṣṇi-pravaraiḥ viveśa alaṅkṛtām purīm
evam yoga īśvaraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ bhagavān jagat īśvaraḥ īyate paśu dṛṣṭīnām nirjitaḥ jayati iti saḥ
śrutvā yuddha udyamam rāmaḥ kurūṇām saha pāṇḍavaiḥ tīrtha abhiṣeka vyājena madhya-sthaḥ prayayau kila
snātvā prabhāse santarpya deva ṛṣi pitṛ mānavān sarasvatīm prati-srotam yayau brāhmaṇa-saṁvṛtaḥ
pṛthu udakam bindu-saraḥ trita-kūpam sudarśanam viśālam brahma-tīrtham ca cakram prācīm sarasvatīm yamunām anu yāni eva gaṅgām anu ca bhārata jagāma naimiṣam yatra ṛṣayaḥ satram āsate
tam āgatam abhipretya munayaḥ dīrgha satriṇaḥ abhinandya yathā nyāyam praṇamya utthāya ca ārcayan
saḥ arcitaḥ sa parīvāraḥ kṛta āsana parigrahaḥ romaharṣaṇam āsīnam mahā-ṛṣeḥ śiṣyam aikṣata
apratyutthāyinam sūtam akṛta prahvaṇa añjalim adhyāsīnam ca tān viprān cukopa udvīkṣya mādhavaḥ
yasmāt asau imān viprān adhyāste pratiloma-jaḥ dharma pālān tathā eva asmān vadham arhati durmatiḥ
ṛṣeḥ bhagavataḥ bhūtvā śiṣyaḥ adhītya bahūni ca sa itihāsa purāṇāni dharma-śāstrāṇi sarvaśaḥ adāntasya avinītasya vṛthā paṇḍita māninaḥ na guṇāya bhavanti sma naṭasya iva ajita ātmanaḥ
etat arthaḥ hi loke asmin avatāraḥ mayā kṛtaḥ vadhyāḥ me dharma-dhvajinaḥ te hi pātakinaḥ adhikāḥ
etāvat uktvā bhagavān nivṛttaḥ asat vadhāt api bhāvitvāt tam kuśa agreṇa kara sthena ahanat prabhuḥ
hā-hā iti vādinaḥ sarve munayaḥ khinna mānasāḥ ūcuḥ saṅkarṣaṇam devam adharmaḥ te kṛtaḥ prabho
asya brahma-āsanam dattam asmābhiḥ yadu-nandana āyuḥ ca ātma aklamam tāvat yāvat satram samāpyate
ajānatā eva ācaritaḥ tvayā brahma vadhaḥ yathā yoga īśvarasya bhavataḥ na āmnāyaḥ api niyāmakaḥ yadi etat brahma hatyāyāḥ pāvanam loka pāvana cariṣyati bhavān loka-saṅgrahaḥ ananya coditaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca cariṣye vadha nirveśam loka anugraha kāmyayā niyamaḥ prathame kalpe yāvān saḥ tu vidhīyatām
dīrgham āyuḥ bata etasya sattvam indriyam eva ca āśāsitam yat tat brūte sādhaye yoga-māyayā
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ astrasya tava vīryasya mṛtyoḥ asmākam eva ca yathā bhavet vacaḥ satyam tathā rāma vidhīyatām
śrī-bhagavān uvāca ātmā vai putraḥ utpannaḥ iti veda-anuśāsanam tasmāt asya bhavet vaktā āyuḥ indriya sattva vān
kim vaḥ kāmaḥ muni śreṣṭhāḥ brūta aham karavāṇi atha ajānataḥ tu apacitim yathā me cintyatām budhāḥ
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ ilvalasya sutaḥ ghoraḥ balvalaḥ nāma dānavaḥ saḥ dūṣayati naḥ satram etya parvaṇi parvaṇi
tam pāpam jahi dāśārha tat naḥ śuśrūṣaṇam param pūya śoṇita vit mūtra surā māṁsa abhivarṣiṇam
tataḥ ca bhāratam varṣam parītya su-samāhitaḥ caritvā dvādaśa māsān tīrtha snāyī viśudhyasi
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tataḥ parvaṇi upāvṛtte pracaṇḍaḥ pāṁśu varṣaṇaḥ bhīmaḥ vāyuḥ abhūt rājan pūya gandhaḥ tu sarvaśaḥ
tataḥ amedhya mayam varṣam balvalena vinirmitam abhavat yajña śālāyām saḥ anvadṛśyata śūla dhṛk
tam vilokya bṛhat kāyam bhinna añjana caya upamam tapta tāmra śikhā śmaśrum daṁṣṭrā ugra bhru kuṭī mukham sasmāra mūṣalam rāmaḥ para sainya vidāraṇam halam ca daitya damanam te tūrṇam upatasthatuḥ
tam ākṛṣya hala agreṇa balvalam gagane caram mūṣalena ahanat kruddhaḥ mūrdhni brahma druham balaḥ
saḥ apatat bhuvi nirbhinna lalāṭaḥ asṛk samutsṛjan muñcan ārta svaram śailaḥ yathā vajra hataḥ aruṇaḥ
saṁstutya munayaḥ rāmam prayujya avitatha āśiṣaḥ abhyaṣiñcan mahā-bhāgāḥ vṛtra ghnam vibudhāḥ yathā
vaijayantīm daduḥ mālām śrī dhāma amlāna paṅkajām rāmāya vāsasī divye divyāni ābharaṇāni ca
atha taiḥ abhyanujñātaḥ kauśikīm etya brāhmaṇaiḥ snātvā sarovaram agāt yataḥ sarayūḥ āsravat
anu srotena sarayūm prayāgam upagamya saḥ snātvā santarpya deva-ādīn jagāma pulaha-āśramam
gomatīm gaṇḍakīm snātvā vipāśām śoṇe āplutaḥ gayām gatvā pitṝn iṣṭvā gaṅgā sāgara saṅgame upaspṛśya mahā-indra-adrau rāmam dṛṣṭvā abhivādya ca sapta-godāvarīm veṇām pampām bhīmarathīm tataḥ skandam dṛṣṭvā yayau rāmaḥ śrī-śailam giri-śa ālayam draviḍeṣu mahā puṇyam dṛṣṭvā adrim veṅkaṭam prabhuḥ kāma-koṣṇīm purīm kāñcīm kāverīm ca sarit varām śrī-raṅga-ākhyam mahā-puṇyam yatra sannihitaḥ hariḥ ṛṣabha-adrim hareḥ kṣetram dakṣiṇām mathurām tathā sāmudram setum agamat mahā pātaka nāśanam
tatra ayutam adāt dhenūḥ brahmaṇebhyaḥ hala-āyudhaḥ kṛtamālām tāmraparṇīm malayam ca kula-acalam tatra agastyam samāsīnam namaskṛtya abhivādya ca yojitaḥ tena ca āśīrbhiḥ anujñātaḥ gataḥ arṇavam dakṣiṇam tatra kanyā-ākhyām durgām devīm dadarśa saḥ
tataḥ phālgunam āsādya pañca-apsarasam uttamam viṣṇuḥ sannihitaḥ yatra snātvā asparśat gava ayutam
tataḥ abhivrajya bhagavān keralān tu trigartakān gokarṇa-ākhyam śiva-kṣetram sānnidhyam yatra dhūrjaṭeḥ āryām dvaipa ayanīm dṛṣṭvā śūrpārakam agāt balaḥ tāpīm payoṣṇīm nirvindhyām upaspṛśya atha daṇḍakam praviśya revām agamat yatra māhiṣmatī purī manu-tīrtham upaspṛśya prabhāsam punaḥ āgamat
śrutvā dvijaiḥ kathyamānam kuru-pāṇḍava saṁyuge sarva rājanya nidhanam bhāram mene hṛtam bhuvaḥ
saḥ bhīma-duryodhanayoḥ gadābhyām yudhyatoḥ mṛdhe vārayiṣyan vinaśanam jagāma yadu nandanaḥ
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ tu tam dṛṣṭvā yamau kṛṣṇa-arjunau api abhivādya abhavan tuṣṇīm kim vivakṣuḥ iha āgataḥ
gadā pāṇī ubhau dṛṣṭvā saṁrabdhau vijaya eṣiṇau maṇḍalāni vicitrāṇi carantau idam abravīt
yuvām tulya balau vīrau he rājan he vṛkodara ekam prāṇa adhikam manye uta ekam śikṣayā adhikam
tasmāt ekatarasya iha yuvayoḥ sama vīryayoḥ na lakṣyate jayaḥ anyaḥ vā viramatu aphalaḥ raṇaḥ
na tat vākyam jagṛhatuḥ baddha vairau nṛpa artha-vat anusmarantau anyonyam duruktam duṣkṛtāni ca
diṣṭam tat anumanvānaḥ rāmaḥ dvāravatīm yayau ugrasena-ādibhiḥ prītaiḥ jñātibhiḥ samupāgataḥ
tam punaḥ naimiṣam prāptam ṛṣayaḥ ayājayan mudā kratu aṅgam kratubhiḥ sarvaiḥ nivṛtta akhila vigraham
tebhyaḥ viśuddham vijñānam bhagavān vyatarat vibhuḥ yena eva ātmani adaḥ viśvam ātmānam viśva-gam viduḥ
sva patyā avabhṛtha snātaḥ jñāti bandhu suhṛt vṛtaḥ reje sva-jyotsnayā iva induḥ su vāsāḥ suṣṭhu alaṅkṛtaḥ
īdṛk-vidhāni asaṅkhyāni balasya bala-śālinaḥ anantasya aprameyasya māyā martyasya santi hi
yaḥ anusmareta rāmasya karmāṇi adbhuta karmaṇaḥ sāyam prātaḥ anantasya viṣṇoḥ saḥ dayitaḥ bhavet
śrī-rājā uvāca bhagavan yāni ca anyāni mukundasya mahā-ātmanaḥ vīryāṇi ananta vīryasya śrotum icchāmi he prabho
kaḥ nu śrutvā asakṛt brahman uttamaḥ-śloka sat kathāḥ virameta viśeṣa jñaḥ viṣaṇṇaḥ kāma mārgaṇaiḥ
sā vāk yayā tasya guṇān gṛṇīte karau ca tat karma karau manaḥ ca smaret vasantam sthira jaṅgameṣu śṛṇoti tat puṇya kathāḥ saḥ karṇaḥ
śiraḥ tu tasya ubhaya liṅgam ānamet tat eva yat paśyati tat hi cakṣuḥ aṅgāni viṣṇoḥ atha tat janānām pāda-udakam yāni bhajanti nityam
sūtaḥ uvāca viṣṇu-rātena sampṛṣṭaḥ bhagavān bādarāyaṇiḥ vāsudeve bhagavati nimagna hṛdayaḥ abravīt
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca kṛṣṇasya āsīt sakhā kaścit brāhmaṇaḥ brahma vit-tamaḥ viraktaḥ indriya-artheṣu praśānta ātmā jita indriyaḥ
yadṛcchayā upapannena vartamānaḥ gṛha-āśramī tasya bhāryā ku-cailasya kṣut kṣāmā ca tathā-vidhā
pati-vratā patim prāha mlāyatā vadanena sā daridram sīdamānā vai vepamānā abhigamya ca
nanu brahman bhagavataḥ sakhā sākṣāt śriyaḥ patiḥ brahmaṇyaḥ ca śaraṇyaḥ ca bhagavān sātvata ṛṣabhaḥ
tam upaihi mahā-bhaga sādhūnām ca para-ayaṇam dāsyati draviṇam bhūri sīdate te kuṭumbine
āste adhunā dvāravatyām bhoja-vṛṣṇi-andhaka īśvaraḥ smarataḥ pāda-kamalam ātmanām api yacchati kim nu artha kāmān bhajataḥ na ati abhīṣṭān jagat guruḥ
saḥ evam bhāryayā vipraḥ bahuśaḥ prārthitaḥ muhuḥ ayam hi paramaḥ lābhaḥ uttamaḥ-śloka darśanam iti sañcintya manasā gamanāya matim dadhe api asti upāyanam kiñcit gṛhe kalyāṇi dīyatām
yācitvā caturaḥ muṣṭīn viprān pṛthuka-taṇḍulān caila khaṇḍena tān baddhvā bhartre prādāt upāyanam
saḥ tān ādāya vipra-agryaḥ prayayau dvārakām kila kṛṣṇa-sandarśanam mahyam katham syāt iti cintayan
trīṇi gulmāni atīyāya tisraḥ kakṣāḥ ca sa-dvijaḥ vipraḥ agamya andhaka-vṛṣṇīnām gṛheṣu acyuta dharmiṇām gṛham dvi aṣṭa sahasrāṇām mahiṣīṇām hareḥ dvijaḥ viveśa ekatamam śrī-mat brahma-ānandam gataḥ yathā
tam vilokya acyutaḥ dūrāt priyā paryaṅkam āsthitaḥ sahasā utthāya ca abhyetya dorbhyām paryagrahīt mudā
sakhyuḥ priyasya vipra-ṛṣeḥ aṅga saṅga ati nirvṛtaḥ prītaḥ vyamuñcat ap bindūn netrābhyām puṣkara-īkṣaṇaḥ
atha upaveśya paryaṅke svayam sakhyuḥ samarhaṇam upahṛtya avanijya asya pādau pāda-avanejanīḥ agrahīt śirasā rājan bhagavān loka pāvanaḥ vyalimpat divya gandhena candana aguru kuṅkumaiḥ dhūpaiḥ surabhibhiḥ mitram pradīpa avalibhiḥ mudā arcitvā āvedya tāmbūlam gām ca su-āgatam abravīt
ku cailam malinam kṣāmam dvijam dhamani-santatam devī paryacarat sākṣāt cāmara vyajanena vai
antaḥ-pura janaḥ dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇena amala kīrtinā vismitaḥ abhūt ati prītyā avadhūtam sabhājitam
kim anena kṛtam puṇyam avadhūtena bhikṣuṇā śriyā hīnena loke asmin garhitena adhamena ca yaḥ asau tri loka guruṇā śrī nivāsena sambhṛtaḥ paryaṅka sthām śrīyam hitvā pariṣvaktaḥ agra-jaḥ yathā
kathayām cakratuḥ gāthāḥ pūrvāḥ gurukule satoḥ ātmanoḥ lalitāḥ rājan karau gṛhya parasparam
śrī-bhagavān uvāca api brahman gurukulāt bhavatā labdha dakṣiṇāt samāvṛttena dharma jña bhāryā ūḍhā sadṛśī na vā
prāyaḥ gṛheṣu te cittam akāma-vihitam tathā na eva ati prīyase vidvan dhaneṣu viditam hi me
kecit kurvanti karmāṇi kāmaiḥ ahata cetasaḥ tyayantaḥ prakṛtīḥ daivīḥ yathā aham loka-saṅgraham
kaccit gurukule vāsam brahman smarasi nau yataḥ dvijaḥ vijñāya vijñeyam tamasaḥ pāram aśnute
saḥ vai sat karmaṇām sākṣāt dvi-jāteḥ iha sambhavaḥ ādyaḥ aṅga yatra āśramiṇām yathā aham jñāna daḥ guruḥ
nanu artha kovidāḥ brahman varṇāśrama-vatām iha ye mayā guruṇā vācā taranti añjaḥ bhava arṇavam
na aham ijyā prajātibhyām tapasā upaśamena vā tuṣyeyam sarva bhūta ātmā guru śuśrūṣayā yathā
api naḥ smaryate brahman vṛttam nivasatām gurau guru dāraiḥ coditānām indhana anayane kvacit praviṣṭānām mahā-araṇyam apa-ṛtau su-mahat dvija vāta varṣam abhūt tīvram niṣṭhurāḥ stanayitnavaḥ
sūryaḥ ca astam gataḥ tāvat tamasā ca āvṛtāḥ diśaḥ nimnam kūlam jala-mayam na prājñāyata kiñcana
vayam bhṛśam tatra mahā anila ambubhiḥ nihanyamānāḥ muhuḥ ambu-samplave diśaḥ avidantaḥ atha parasparam vane gṛhīta hastāḥ paribabhrima āturāḥ
etat viditvā udite ravau sāndīpaniḥ guruḥ anveṣamāṇaḥ naḥ śiṣyān ācāryaḥ apaśyat āturān
aho he putrakaḥ yūyam asmat arthe ati duḥkhitāḥ ātmā vai prāṇinām preṣṭhaḥ tam anādṛtya mat parāḥ
etat eva hi sat śiṣyaiḥ kartavyam guru niṣkṛtam yat vai viśuddha bhāvena sarva artha ātmā arpaṇam gurau
tuṣṭaḥ aham bho dvija śreṣṭhāḥ satyāḥ santu manaḥ-rathāḥ chandāṁsi ayāta-yāmāni bhavantu iha paratra ca
ittham-vidhāni anekāni vasatām guru veśmani guroḥ anugraheṇa eva pumān pūrṇaḥ praśāntaye
śrī-brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca kim asmābhiḥ anirvṛttam deva-deva jagat guro bhavatā satya kāmena yeṣām vāsaḥ guroḥ abhūt
yasya chandaḥ mayam brahma dehe āvapanam vibho śreyasām tasya guruṣu vāsaḥ atyanta viḍambanam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca saḥ ittham dvija mukhyena saha saṅkathayan hariḥ sarva bhūta manaḥ abhijñaḥ smayamānaḥ uvāca tam brahmaṇyaḥ brāhmaṇam kṛṣṇaḥ bhagavān prahasan priyam premṇā nirīkṣaṇena eva prekṣan khalu satām gatiḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca kim upāyanam ānītam brahman me bhavatā gṛhāt aṇu api upāhṛtam bhaktaiḥ premṇā bhūri eva me bhavet bhūri api abhakta upahṛtam na me toṣāya kalpate
patram puṣpam phalam toyam yaḥ me bhaktyā prayacchati tat aham bhakti-upahṛtam aśnāmi prayata-ātmanaḥ
iti uktaḥ api dvijaḥ tasmai vrīḍitaḥ pataye śriyaḥ pṛthuka prasṛtim rājan na prāyacchat avāk mukhaḥ
sarva bhūta ātma dṛk sākṣāt tasya āgamana kāraṇam vijñāya acintayat na ayam śrī kāmaḥ mā abhajat purā patnyāḥ pati vratāyāḥ tu sakhā priya cikīrṣayā prāptaḥ mām asya dāsyāmi sampadaḥ amartya durlabhāḥ
ittham vicintya vasanāt cīra baddhān dvi-janmanaḥ svayam jahāra kim idam iti pṛthuka-taṇḍulān
nanu etat upanītam me parama prīṇanam sakhe tarpayanti aṅga mām viśvam ete pṛṭhuka-taṇḍulāḥ
iti muṣṭim sakṛt jagdhvā dvitīyam jagdhum ādade tāvat śrīḥ jagṛhe hastam tat parā parame-sthinaḥ
etāvatā alam viśva ātman sarva sampat samṛddhaye asmin loke atha vā amuṣmin puṁsaḥ tvat toṣa kāraṇam
brāhmaṇaḥ tām tu rajanīm uṣitvā acyuta mandire bhuktvā pītvā sukham mene ātmānam svaḥ gatam yathā
śvaḥ-bhūte viśva bhāvena sva sukhena abhivanditaḥ jagāma sva ālayam tāta pathi anuvrajya nanditaḥ
saḥ ca alabdhvā dhanam kṛṣṇāt na tu yācitavān svayam sva gṛhān vrīḍitaḥ agacchat mahat darśana nirvṛtaḥ
aho brahmaṇya devasya dṛṣṭa brahmaṇyatā mayā yat daridra-tamaḥ lakṣmīm āśliṣṭaḥ bibhratā urasi
kva aham daridraḥ pāpīyān kva kṛṣṇaḥ śrī-niketanaḥ brahma-bandhuḥ iti sma aham bāhubhyām parirambhitaḥ
nivāsitaḥ priyā juṣṭe paryaṅke bhrātaraḥ yathā mahiṣyā vījitaḥ śrāntaḥ bāla vyajana hastayā
śuśrūṣayā paramayā pāda saṁvāhana ādibhiḥ pūjitaḥ deva-devena vipra-devena deva vat
svarga apavargayoḥ puṁsām rasāyām bhuvi sampadām sarvāsām api siddhīnām mūlam tat caraṇa arcanam
adhanaḥ ayam dhanam prāpya mādyan uccaiḥ na mām smaret iti kāruṇikaḥ nūnam dhanam me abhūri na ādadāt
iti tat cintayan antaḥ prāptaḥ nija gṛha antikam sūrya anala indu saṅkāśaiḥ vimānaiḥ sarvataḥ vṛtam vicitra upavana udyānaiḥ kūjat dvija kula ākulaiḥ protphulla kumuda ambhoja kahlāra utpala vāribhiḥ juṣṭam su alaṅkṛtaiḥ pumbhiḥ strībhiḥ ca hariṇā akṣibhiḥ kim idam kasya vā sthānam katham tat idam iti abhūt
evam mīmāṁsamānam tam narāḥ nāryaḥ amara prabhāḥ pratyagṛhṇan mahā-bhāgam gīta vādyena bhūyasā
patim āgatam ākarṇya patnī uddharṣā ati sambhramā niścakrāma gṛhāt tūrṇam rūpiṇī śrīḥ iva ālayāt
pati-vratā patim dṛṣṭvā prema utkaṇṭha aśru locanā mīlita akṣī anamat buddhyā manasā pariṣasvaje
patnīm vīkṣya visphurantīm devīm vaimānikīm iva dāsīnām niṣka kaṇṭhīnām madhye bhāntīm saḥ vismitaḥ
prītaḥ svayam tayā yuktaḥ praviṣṭaḥ nija mandiram maṇi stambha śata upetam mahā-indra bhavanam yathā
payaḥ phena nibhāḥ śayyāḥ dāntāḥ rukma paricchadāḥ paryaṅkāḥ hema daṇḍāni cāmara-vyajanāni ca āsanāni ca haimāni mṛdu upastaraṇāni ca muktā-dāma vilambīni vitānāni dyumanti ca svaccha sphaṭika kuḍyeṣu mahā-mārakateṣu ca ratna dīpān bhrājamānān lalanāḥ ratna saṁyutāḥ vilokya brāhmaṇaḥ tatra samṛddhīḥ sarva sampadām tarkayām āsa nirvyagraḥ sva samṛddhim ahaitukīm
nūnam bata etat mama durbhagasya śaśvat daridrasya samṛddhi hetuḥ mahā-vibhūteḥ avalokataḥ anyaḥ na eva upapadyeta yadu-uttamasya
nanu abruvānaḥ diśate samakṣam yāciṣṇave bhūri api bhūri bhojaḥ parjanya-vat tat svayam īkṣamāṇaḥ dāśārhakāṇām ṛṣabhaḥ sakhā me
kiñcit karoti uru api yat sva dattam suhṛt kṛtam phalgu api bhūri kārī mayā upanītam pṛthuka eka muṣṭim pratyagrahīt prīti-yutaḥ mahā-ātmā
tasya eva me sauhṛda sakhya maitrī dāsyam punaḥ janmani janmani syāt mahā-anubhāvena guṇa ālayena viṣajjataḥ tat puruṣa prasaṅgaḥ
bhaktāya citrāḥ bhagavān hi sampadaḥ rājyam vibhūtīḥ na samarthayati ajaḥ adīrgha bodhāya vicakṣanaḥ svayam paśyan nipātam dhaninām mada udbhavam
ittham vyavasitaḥ buddhyā bhaktaḥ atīva janārdane viṣayān jāyayā tyakṣyan bubhuje na ati-lampaṭaḥ
tasya vai deva-devasya hareḥ yajña pateḥ prabhoḥ brāhmaṇāḥ prabhavaḥ daivam na tebhyaḥ vidyate param
evam saḥ vipraḥ bhagavat suhṛt tadā dṛṣṭvā sva bhṛtyaiḥ ajitam parājitam tat dhyāna vega udgrathita ātma bandhanaḥ tat dhāma lebhe acirataḥ satām gatim
etat brahmaṇya-devasya śrutvā brahmaṇyatām naraḥ labdha bhāvaḥ bhagavati karma bandhāt vimucyate
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca atha ekadā dvāravatyām vasatoḥ rāma-kṛṣṇayoḥ sūrya uparāgaḥ su-mahān āsīt kalpa kṣaye yathā
tam jñātvā manujāḥ rājan purastāt eva sarvataḥ samanta-pañcakam kṣetram yayuḥ śreyaḥ vidhitsayā
niḥkṣatriyām mahīm kurvan rāmaḥ śastra bhṛtām varaḥ nṛpāṇām rudhira oghena yatra cakre mahā hradān īje ca bhagavān rāmaḥ yatra aspṛṣṭaḥ api karmaṇā lokam saṅgrāhayan īśaḥ yathā anyaḥ agha apanuttaye mahatyām tīrtha-yātrāyām tatra āgan bhāratīḥ prajāḥ vṛṣṇayaḥ ca tathā akrūra-vasudeva-āhuka-ādayaḥ yayuḥ bhārata tat kṣetram svam agham kṣapayiṣṇavaḥ gada-pradyumna-sāmba-ādayaḥ sucandra-śuka-sāraṇaiḥ āste aniruddhaḥ rakṣāyām kṛtavarmā ca yūtha-paḥ
te rathaiḥ deva dhiṣṇya ābhaiḥ hayaiḥ ca tarala plavaiḥ gajaiḥ nadadbhiḥ abhra ābhaiḥ nṛbhiḥ vidyādhara dyubhiḥ vyarocanta mahā tejāḥ pathi kāñcana mālinaḥ divya srak vastra sannāhāḥ kalatraiḥ khe-carāḥ iva
tatra snātvā mahā-bhāgāḥ upoṣya su-samāhitāḥ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ daduḥ dhenūḥ vāsaḥ srak rukma mālinīḥ
rāma hradeṣu vidhi-vat punaḥ āplutya vṛṣṇayaḥ daduḥ su annam dvija agryebhyaḥ kṛṣṇe naḥ bhaktiḥ astu iti
svayam ca tat anujñātāḥ vṛṣṇayaḥ kṛṣṇa devatāḥ bhuktvā upaviviśuḥ kāmam snigdha chāyā aṅghripa aṅghriṣu
tatra āgatān te dadṛśuḥ suhṛt sambandhinaḥ nṛpān matsya-uśīnara-kauśalya-vidarbha-kuru-sṛñjayān kāmboja-kaikayān madrān kuntīn ānarta-keralān anyān ca eva ātma-pakṣīyān parān ca śataśaḥ nṛpa nanda-ādīn suhṛdaḥ gopān gopīḥ ca utkaṇṭhitāḥ ciram
anyonya sandarśana harṣa raṁhasā protphulla hṛt vaktra saroruha śriyaḥ āśliṣya gāḍham nayanaiḥ sravat jalāḥ hṛṣyat tvacaḥ ruddha giraḥ yayuḥ mudam
striyaḥ ca saṁvīkṣya mithaḥ ati sauhṛda smita amala apāṅga dṛśaḥ abhirebhire stanaiḥ stanān kuṅkuma paṅka rūṣitān nihatya dorbhiḥ praṇaya aśru locanāḥ
tataḥ abhivādya te vṛddhān yaviṣṭhaiḥ abhivāditāḥ su-āgatam kuśalam pṛṣṭvā cakruḥ kṛṣṇa kathāḥ mithaḥ
pṛthā bhrātṝn svasṝḥ vīkṣya tat putrān pitarau api bhrātṛ patnīḥ mukundam ca jahau saṅkathayā śucaḥ
kuntī uvāca ārya bhrātaḥ aham manye ātmānam akṛta āśiṣam yat vai āpatsu mat vārtām na anusmaratha sat-tamāḥ
suhṛdaḥ jñātayaḥ putrāḥ bhrātaraḥ pitarau api na anusmaranti sva-janam yasya daivam adakṣiṇam
śrī-vasudevaḥ uvāca amba mā asmān asūyethāḥ daiva krīḍanakān narān īśasya hi vaśe lokaḥ kurute kāryate atha vā
kaṁsa pratāpitāḥ sarve vayam yātāḥ diśam diśam etarhi eva punaḥ sthānam daivena āsāditāḥ svasaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca vasudeva-ugrasena-ādyaiḥ yadubhiḥ te arcitāḥ nṛpāḥ āsan acyuta sandarśa parama ānanda nirvṛtāḥ
bhīṣmaḥ droṇaḥ ambikā-putraḥ gāndhārī sa sutāḥ tathā sa-dārāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ kuntī sañjayaḥ viduraḥ kṛpaḥ kuntībhojaḥ virāṭaḥ ca bhīṣmakaḥ nagnajit mahān purujit drupadaḥ śalyaḥ dhṛṣṭaketuḥ saḥ kāśi-rāṭ damaghoṣaḥ viśālākṣaḥ maithilaḥ madra-kekayau yudhāmanyuḥ suśarmā ca sa-sutāḥ bāhlika-ādayaḥ rājānaḥ ye ca rāja-indra yudhiṣṭhiram anuvratāḥ śrī niketam vapuḥ śaureḥ sa-stṛīkam vīkṣya vismitāḥ
atha te rāma-kṛṣṇābhyām samyak prāpta samarhaṇāḥ praśaśaṁsuḥ mudā yuktāḥ vṛṣṇīn kṛṣṇa parigrahān
aho bhoja-pate yūyam janma-bhājaḥ nṛṇām iha yat paśyatha asakṛt kṛṣṇam durdarśam api yoginām
yat viśrutiḥ śruti nutā idam alam punāti pāda avanejana payaḥ ca vacaḥ ca śāstram bhūḥ kāla bharjita bhagā api yat aṅghri padma sparśa uttha śaktiḥ abhivarṣati naḥ akhila arthān tat darśana sparśana anupatha prajalpa śayyā āsana aśana sa-yauna sa-piṇḍa bandhaḥ yeṣām gṛhe niraya vartmani vartatām vaḥ svarga apavarga viramaḥ svayam āsa viṣṇuḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca nandaḥ tatra yadūn prāptān jñātvā kṛṣṇa puraḥ-gamān tatra agamat vṛtaḥ gopaiḥ anaḥ stha arthaiḥ didṛkṣayā
tam dṛṣṭvā vṛṣṇayaḥ hṛṣṭāḥ tanvaḥ prāṇam iva utthitāḥ pariṣaśvajire gāḍham cira darśana kātarāḥ
vasudevaḥ pariṣvajya samprītaḥ prema vihvalaḥ smaran kaṁsa-kṛtān kleśān putra nyāsam ca gokule
kṛṣṇa-rāmau pariṣvajya pitarau abhivādya ca na kiñcana ūcatuḥ premṇā sa-aśru kaṇṭhau kuru-udvaha
tau ātma-āsanam āropya bāhubhyām parirabhya ca yaśodā ca mahā-bhāgā sutau vijahatuḥ śucaḥ
rohiṇī devakī ca atha pariṣvajya vraja-īśvarīm smarantyau tat kṛtam maitṛīm bāṣpa kaṇṭhyau samūcatuḥ
kā vismareta vām maitrīm anivṛttām vraja-īśvari avāpya api aindram aiśvaryam yasyāḥ na iha prati-kriyā
etau adṛṣṭa pitarau yuvayoḥ sma pitroḥ samprīṇana abhyudaya poṣaṇa pālanāni prāpya ūṣatuḥ bhavati pakṣma ha yadvat akṣṇoḥ nyastau akutra ca bhayau na satām paraḥ svaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca gopyaḥ ca kṛṣṇam upalabhya cirāt abhīṣṭam yat prekṣaṇe dṛśiṣu pakṣma kṛtam śapanti dṛgbhiḥ hṛdī-kṛtam alam parirabhya sarvāḥ tat bhāvam āpuḥ api nitya yujām durāpam
bhagavān tāḥ tathā-bhūtāḥ vivikte upasaṅgataḥ āśliṣya anāmayam pṛṣṭvā prahasan idam abravīt
api smaratha naḥ sakhyaḥ svānām artha cikīrṣayā gatān cirāyitān śatru pakṣa kṣapaṇa cetasaḥ
api avadhyāyatha asmān svit akṛta-jña āviśaṅkayā nūnam bhūtāni bhagavān yunakti viyunakti ca
vāyuḥ yathā ghana anīkam tṛṇam tūlam rajāṁsi ca saṁyojya ākṣipate bhūyaḥ tathā bhūtāni bhūta kṛt
mayi bhaktiḥ hi bhūtānām amṛtatvāya kalpate diṣṭyā yat āsīt mat snehaḥ bhavatīnām mat āpanaḥ
aham hi sarva bhūtānām ādiḥ antaḥ antaram bahiḥ bhautikānām yathā kham vāḥ bhūḥ vāyuḥ jyotiḥ aṅganāḥ
evam hi etāni bhūtāni bhūteṣu ātmā ātmanā tataḥ ubhayam mayi atha pare paśyata ābhātam akṣare
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca adhyātma śikṣayā gopyaḥ evam kṛṣṇena śikṣitāḥ tat anusmaraṇa dhvasta jīva-kośāḥ tam adhyagan
āhuḥ ca te nalina-nabha pada-aravindam yoga-īśvaraiḥ hṛdi vicintyam agādha-bodhaiḥ saṁsāra-kūpa patita uttaraṇa avalambam geham juṣām api manasi udiyāt sadā naḥ
