śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tathā anugṛhya bhagavān gopīnām saḥ guruḥ gatiḥ yudhiṣṭhiram atha apṛcchat sarvān ca su-hṛdaḥ avyayam
te evam loka nāthena paripṛṣṭāḥ su sat-kṛtāḥ pratyūcuḥ hṛṣṭa manasaḥ tat pāda īkṣā hata aṁhasaḥ
kutaḥ aśivam tvat caraṇa ambuja āsavam mahat manastaḥ mukha niḥsṛtam kvacit pibanti ye karṇa puṭaiḥ alam prabho deham bhṛtām deha kṛt asmṛti chidam
hi tvā ātma dhāma vidhuta ātma kṛta tri avasthām ānanda samplavam akhaṇḍam akuṇṭha bodham kāla upasṛṣṭa nigama avane ātta yoga-māyā ākṛtim parama-haṁsa gatim natāḥ sma
śrī-ṛṣiḥ uvāca iti uttamaḥ-śloka śikhā-maṇim janeṣu abhiṣṭuvatsu andhaka-kaurava striyaḥ sametya govinda-kathāḥ mithaḥ agṛṇan tri loka gītāḥ śṛṇu varṇayāmi te
śrī-draupadī uvāca he vaidarbhi acyutaḥ bhadre he jāmbavati kauśale he satyabhāme kālindi śaibye rohiṇi lakṣmaṇe he kṛṣṇa-patnyaḥ etat naḥ brūte vaḥ bhagavān svayam upayeme yathā lokam anukurvan sva-māyayā
śrī-rukmiṇī uvāca caidyāya mā arpayitum udyata kārmukeṣu rājasu ajeya bhaṭa śekharita aṅghri reṇuḥ ninye mṛgendraḥ iva bhāgam aja avi yūthāt tat śrī niketa caraṇaḥ astu mama arcanāya
śrī-satyabhāmā uvāca yaḥ me sanābhi vadha tapta hṛdā tatena lipta abhiśāpam apamārṣṭum upājahāra jitvā ṛkṣa-rājam atha ratnam adāt saḥ tena bhītaḥ pitā adiśata mām prabhave api dattām
śrī-jāmbavatī uvāca prājñāya deha kṛt amum nija nātha daivam sītā patim tri nava ahāni amunā abhyayudhyat jñātvā parīkṣitaḥ upāharat arhaṇam mām pādau pragṛhya maṇinā aham amuṣya dāsī
śrī-kālindī uvāca tapaḥ carantīm ājñāya sva pāda sparśana āśayā sakhyā upetya agrahīt pāṇim yaḥ aham tat gṛha mārjanī
śrī-mitravindā uvāca yaḥ mām svayaṁ-vare upetya vijitya bhū-pān ninye śva yūtha gam iva ātma balim dvipa-ariḥ bhrātṝn ca me apakurutaḥ sva puram śrī okaḥ tasya astu me anu-bhavam aṅghri avanejanatvam
śrī-satyā uvāca sapta ukṣaṇaḥ ati bala vīrya su tīkṣṇa śṛṅgān pitrā kṛtān kṣitipa vīrya parīkṣaṇāya tān vīra durmada hanaḥ tarasā nigṛhya krīḍan babandha ha yathā śiśavaḥ aja tokān yaḥ ittham vīrya śulkām mām dāsībhiḥ catuḥ-aṅgiṇīm pathi nirjitya rājanyān ninye tat dāsyam astu me
śrī-bhadrā uvāca pitā me mātuleyāya svayam āhūya dattavān kṛṣṇe kṛṣṇāya tat cittām akṣauhiṇyā sakhī-janaiḥ asya me pāda saṁsparśaḥ bhavet janmani janmani karmabhiḥ bhrāmyamāṇāyāḥ yena tat śreyaḥ ātmanaḥ
śrī-lakṣmaṇā uvāca mama api rājñi acyuta janma karma śrutvā muhuḥ nārada gītam āsa ha cittam mukunde kila padma-hastayā vṛtaḥ su sammṛśya vihāya loka pān
jñātvā mama matam sādhvi pitā duhitṛ vatsalaḥ bṛhatsenaḥ iti khyātaḥ tatra upāyam acīkarat
yathā svayam-vare rājñi matsyaḥ pārtha īpsayā kṛtaḥ ayam tu bahiḥ ācchannaḥ dṛśyate saḥ jale param
śrutvā etat sarvataḥ bhū-pāḥ āyayuḥ mat pituḥ puram sarva astra śastra tattva jñāḥ sa upādhyāyāḥ sahasraśaḥ
pitrā sampūjitāḥ sarve yathā vīryam yathā vayaḥ ādaduḥ sa śaram cāpam veddhum parṣadi mat dhiyaḥ
ādāya vyasṛjan kecit sajyam kartum anīśvarāḥ ā-koṣṭham jyām samutkṛṣya petuḥ eke amunā hatāḥ
sajyam kṛtvā apare vīrāḥ māgadha ambaṣṭha cedi-pāḥ bhīmaḥ duryodhanaḥ karṇaḥ na avidan tad avasthitim
matsya ābhāsam jale vīkṣya jñātvā ca tat avasthitim pārthaḥ yattaḥ asṛjat bāṇam na acchinat paspṛśe param
rājanyeṣu nivṛtteṣu bhagna māneṣu māniṣu bhagavān dhanuḥ ādāya sajyam kṛtvā atha līlayā tasmin sandhāya viśikham matsyam vīkṣya sakṛt jale chittvā iṣuṇā apātayat tam sūrye ca abhijite sthite
divi dundubhayaḥ neduḥ jaya śabda yutāḥ bhuvi devāḥ ca kusuma āsārān mumucuḥ harṣa vihvalāḥ
tat raṅgam āviśam aham kala nūpurābhyām padbhyām pragṛhya kanaka ujjvala ratna mālām nūtne nivīya paridhāya ca kauśika agrye sa-vrīḍa hāsa vadanā kavarī dhṛta srak
unnīya vaktram uru kuntala kuṇḍala tviṭ gaṇḍa-sthalam śiśira hāsa kaṭa-akṣa mokṣaiḥ rājñaḥ nirīkṣya paritaḥ śanakaiḥ murāreḥ aṁse anurakta hṛdayā nidadhe sva mālām
tāvat mṛdaṅga-paṭahāḥ śaṅkha bherī ānaka ādayaḥ nineduḥ naṭa nartakyaḥ nanṛtuḥ gāyakāḥ jaguḥ
evam vṛte bhagavati mayā īśe nṛpa yūtha-pāḥ na sehire yājñaseni spardhantaḥ hṛt-śaya āturāḥ
mām tāvat ratham āropya haya ratna catuṣṭayam śārṅgam udyamya sannaddhaḥ tasthau ājau catuḥ bhujaḥ
dārukaḥ codayām āsa kāñcana upaskaram ratham miṣatām bhū-bhujām rājñi mṛgāṇām mṛga-rāṭ iva
te anvasajjanta rājanyāḥ niṣeddhum pathi kecana saṁyattāḥ uddhṛta iṣu-āsāḥ grāma-siṁhā yathā harim
te śārṅga cyuta bāṇa oghaiḥ kṛtta bāhu aṅghri kandharāḥ nipetuḥ pradhane kecit eke santyajya dudruvuḥ
tataḥ purīm yadu-patiḥ ati alaṅkṛtām ravi chada dhvaja paṭa citra toraṇām kuśasthalīm divi bhuvi ca abhisaṁstutām samāviśat taraṇiḥ iva sva ketanam
pitā me pūjayām āsa suhṛt sambandhi bāndhavān mahā arha vāsaḥ alaṅkāraiḥ śayyā āsana paricchadaiḥ
dāsībhiḥ sarva sampadbhiḥ bhaṭa ibha ratha vājibhiḥ āyudhāni mahā-arhāṇi dadau pūrṇasya bhaktitaḥ
ātma-ārāmasya tasya imāḥ vayam vai gṛha dāsikāḥ sarva saṅga nivṛttyā addhā tapasā ca babhūvima
mahiṣyaḥ ūcuḥ bhaumam nihatya sa gaṇam yudhi tena ruddhāḥ jñātvā atha naḥ kṣiti-jaye jita rāja kanyāḥ nirmucya saṁsṛti vimokṣam anusmarantīḥ pāda-ambujam pariṇināya yaḥ āpta-kāmaḥ
na vayam sādhvi sāmrājyam sva-rājyam bhaujyam api uta vairājyam pārameṣṭhyam ca ānantyam vā hareḥ padam kāmayāmahe etasya śrī-mat pāda rajaḥ śrīyaḥ kuca kuṅkuma gandha āḍhyam mūrdhnā voḍhum gadābhṛtaḥ
vraja striyaḥ yat vāñchanti pulindyaḥ tṛṇa vīrudhaḥ gāvaḥ cārayataḥ gopāḥ pāda sparśam mahā-ātmanaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca śrutvā pṛthā subala-putrī atha yājñasenī mādhavī atha kṣiti-pa patnyaḥ uta sva gopyaḥ kṛṣṇe akhila ātmani harau praṇaya anubandham sarvāḥ visismyuḥ alam aśru-kala ākula akṣyaḥ
iti sambhāṣamāṇāsu strībhiḥ strīṣu nṛbhiḥ nṛṣu āyayuḥ munayaḥ tatra kṛṣṇa-rāma didṛkṣayā dvaipāyanaḥ nāradaḥ ca cyavanaḥ devalaḥ asitaḥ viśvāmitraḥ śatānandaḥ bharadvājaḥ atha gautamaḥ rāmaḥ sa śiṣyaḥ bhagavān vasiṣṭhaḥ gālavaḥ bhṛguḥ pulastyaḥ kaśyapaḥ atriḥ ca mārkaṇḍeyaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ dvitaḥ tritaḥ ca ekataḥ ca brahma-putrāḥ tathā aṅgirāḥ agastyaḥ yājñavalkyaḥ ca vāmadeva-ādayaḥ apare
tān dṛṣṭvā sahasā utthāya prāk āsīnāḥ nṛpa-ādayaḥ pāṇḍavāḥ kṛṣṇa-rāmau ca praṇemuḥ viśva vanditān
tān ānarcuḥ yathā sarve saha-rāma acyutaḥ arcayat sv-āgata āsana pādya arghya mālya dhūpa anulepanaiḥ
uvāca sukham āsīnān bhagavān dharma gup tanuḥ sadasaḥ tasya mahataḥ yata vācaḥ anuśṛṇvataḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca aho vayam janma-bhṛtaḥ labdham kārtsnyena tat phalam devānām api duṣprāpam yat yoga-īśvara darśanam
kim su-alpa tapasām nṝṇām arcāyām deva cakṣuṣām darśana sparśana praśna prahva pāda-arcana ādikam
na hi ap mayāni tīrthāni na devāḥ mṛt śilā mayāḥ te punanti uru-kālena darśanāt eva sādhavaḥ
na agniḥ na sūryaḥ na ca candra tārakāḥ na bhūḥ jalam kham śvasanaḥ atha vāk manaḥ upāsitāḥ bheda kṛtaḥ haranti agham vipaścitaḥ ghnanti muhūrta sevayā
yasya ātma buddhiḥ kuṇape tri-dhātuke sva dhīḥ kalatra-ādiṣu bhaume ijya dhīḥ yat tīrtha buddhiḥ salile na karhicit janeṣu abhijñeṣu saḥ eva gaḥ kharaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca niśamya ittham bhagavataḥ kṛṣṇasya akuṇṭha medhasaḥ vacaḥ duranvayam viprāḥ tūṣṇīm āsan bhramat dhiyaḥ
ciram vimṛśya munayaḥ īśvarasya īśitavyatām jana-saṅgrahaḥ iti ūcuḥ smayantaḥ tam jagat gurum
śrī-munayaḥ ūcuḥ yat māyayā tattva vit uttamāḥ vayam vimohitāḥ viśva sṛjām adhīśvaraḥ yat īśitavyāyati gūḍhaḥ īhayā aho vicitram bhagavat viceṣṭitam
anīhaḥ etat bahudhā ekaḥ ātmanā sṛjati avati atti na badhyate yathā bhaumaiḥ hi bhūmiḥ bahu nāma-rūpiṇī aho vibhūmnaḥ caritam viḍambanam
atha api kāle sva-jana abhiguptaye bibharṣi sattvam khala nigrahāya ca sva līlayā veda-patham sanātanam varṇa-āśrama ātmā puruṣaḥ paraḥ bhavān
brahma te hṛdayam śuklam tapaḥ svādhyāya saṁyamaiḥ yatra upalabdham sat vyaktam avyaktam ca tataḥ param
tasmāt brahma kulam brahman śāstra yoneḥ tvam ātmanaḥ sabhājayasi sat dhāma tat brahmaṇya agranīḥ bhavān
adya naḥ janma sāphalyam vidyāyāḥ tapasaḥ dṛśaḥ tvayā saṅgamya sat gatyā yat antaḥ śreyasām paraḥ
namaḥ tasmai bhagavate kṛṣṇāya akuṇṭha medhase sva yoga-māyayā ācchanna mahimne parama-ātmane
na yam vidanti amī bhū-pāḥ eka ārāmāḥ ca vṛṣṇayaḥ māyā javanikā ācchannam ātmānam kālam īśvaram
yathā śayānaḥ puruṣaḥ ātmānam guṇa tattva dṛk nāma mātra indriya ābhātam na veda rahitam param evam tvā nāma-mātreṣu viṣayeṣu indriya īhayā māyayā vibhramat cittaḥ na veda smṛti upaplavāt
tasya adya te dadṛśima aṅghrim agha ogha marṣa tīrtha āspadam hṛdi kṛtam su vipakva yogaiḥ utsikta bhakti upahata āśaya jīva kośāḥ āpuḥ bhavat gatim atha anugṛhāṇa bhaktān
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti anujñāpya dāśārham dhṛtarāṣṭram yudhiṣṭhiram rāja ṛṣe sva āśramān gantum munayaḥ dadhire manaḥ
tat vīkṣya tān upavrajya vasudevaḥ mahā yaśāḥ praṇamya ca upasaṅgṛhya babhāṣa idam su yantritaḥ
śrī-vasudevaḥ uvāca namaḥ vaḥ sarva devebhyaḥ ṛṣayaḥ śrotum arhatha karmaṇā karma nirhāraḥ yathā syāt naḥ tat ucyatām
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca na ati citram idam viprāḥ vasudevaḥ bubhutsayā kṛṣṇam matvā arbhakam yat naḥ pṛcchati śreyaḥ ātmanaḥ
sannikarṣaḥ atra martyānām anādaraṇa kāraṇam gāṅgam hitvā yathā anya ambhaḥ tatratyaḥ yāti śuddhaye
yasya anubhūtiḥ kālena laya utpatti ādinā asya vai svataḥ anyasmāt ca guṇataḥ na kutaścana riṣyati tam kleśa karma paripāka guṇa pravāhaiḥ avyāhata anubhavam īśvaram advitīyam prāṇa ādibhiḥ sva vibhavaiḥ upagūḍham anyaḥ manyeta sūryam iva megha hima uparāgaiḥ
atha ūcuḥ munayaḥ rājan ābhāṣya ānaka-dundubhim sarveṣām śṛṇvatām rājñām tathā eva acyuta-rāmayoḥ
karmaṇā karma nirhāraḥ eṣaḥ sādhu nirūpitaḥ yat śraddhayā yajet viṣṇum sarva yajña īśvaram makhaiḥ
cittasya upaśamaḥ ayam vai kavibhiḥ śāstra cakṣuṣā darśitaḥ su-gamaḥ yogaḥ dharmaḥ ca ātma mut āvahaḥ
ayam svasti ayanaḥ panthā dvi-jāteḥ gṛha medhinaḥ yat śraddhayā āpta vittena śuklena ījyeta pūruṣaḥ
vitta eṣaṇām yajña dānaiḥ gṛhaiḥ dāra suta eṣaṇām ātma loka eṣaṇām deva kālena visṛjet budhaḥ grāme tyakta eṣaṇāḥ sarve yayuḥ dhīrāḥ tapaḥ vanam
ṛṇaiḥ tribhiḥ dvi-jaḥ jātaḥ deva ṛṣi pitṝṇām prabho yajña adhyayana putraiḥ tāni anistīrya tyajan patet
tvam tu adya muktaḥ dvābhyām vai ṛṣi pitroḥ mahā-mate yajñaiḥ deva ṛṇam unmucya nirṛṇaḥ aśaraṇaḥ bhava
vasudeva bhavān nūnam bhaktyā paramayā harim jagatām īśvaram prārcaḥ saḥ yat vām putratām gataḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti tat vacanam śrutvā vasudevaḥ mahā-manāḥ tān ṛṣīn ṛtvijaḥ vavre mūrdhnā ānamya prasādya ca
te enam ṛṣayaḥ rājan vṛtāḥ dharmeṇa dhārmikam tasmin ayājayan kṣetre makhaiḥ uttama kalpakaiḥ
tat dīkṣāyām pravṛttāyām vṛṣṇayaḥ puṣkara srajaḥ snātāḥ suvāsasaḥ rājan rājānaḥ suṣṭhu alaṅkṛtāḥ tat mahiṣyaḥ ca muditāḥ niṣka kaṇṭhyaḥ su-vāsasaḥ dīkṣā śālām upājagmuḥ āliptāḥ vastu pāṇayaḥ
neduḥ mṛdaṅga-paṭaha śaṅkha bherī-ānaka ādayaḥ nanṛtuḥ naṭa-nartakyaḥ tuṣṭuvuḥ sūta-māgadhāḥ jaguḥ su-kaṇṭhyaḥ gandharvyaḥ saṅgītam saha bhartṛkāḥ
tam abhyaṣiñcan vidhivat aktam abhyaktam ṛtvijaḥ patnībhiḥ aṣṭā-daśabhiḥ soma-rājam iva uḍubhiḥ
tābhiḥ dukūla valayaiḥ hāra nūpura kuṇḍalaiḥ su alaṅkṛtābhiḥ vibabhau dīkṣitaḥ ajina saṁvṛtaḥ
tasya ṛtvijaḥ mahā-rāja ratna kauśeya vāsasaḥ sa sadasyāḥ virejuḥ te yathā vṛtra-haṇaḥ adhvare
tadā rāmaḥ ca kṛṣṇaḥ ca svaiḥ svaiḥ bandhubhiḥ anvitau rejatuḥ sva sutaiḥ dāraiḥ jīva īśau sva-vibhūtibhiḥ
īje anu-yajñam vidhinā agni-hotra ādi lakṣaṇaiḥ prākṛtaiḥ vaikṛtaiḥ yajñaiḥ dravya jñāna kriyā īśvaram
atha ṛtvigbhyaḥ adadāt kāle yathā-āmnātam saḥ dakṣiṇāḥ su-alaṅkṛtebhyaḥ alaṅkṛtya go bhū kanyāḥ mahā dhanāḥ
patnī-saṁyāja avabhṛthyaiḥ caritvā te mahāṛṣayaḥ sasnuḥ rāma hrade viprāḥ yajamāna puraḥ-sarāḥ
snātaḥ alaṅkāra vāsāṁsi vandibhyaḥ adāt tathā striyaḥ tataḥ su-alaṅkṛtaḥ varṇān ā śvabhyaḥ annena pūjayat
bandhūn sa-dārān sa-sutān pāribarheṇa bhūyasā vidarbha-kośala-kurūn kāśi-kekaya-sṛñjayān sadasya ṛtvik sura-gaṇān nṛ bhūta pitṛ cāraṇān śrī-niketam anujñāpya śaṁsantaḥ prayayuḥ kratum
dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ anujaḥ pārthāḥ bhīṣmaḥ droṇaḥ pṛthā yamau nāradaḥ bhagavān vyāsaḥ suhṛt sambandhi bāndhavāḥ bandhūn pariṣvajya yadūn sauhṛda āklinna cetasaḥ yayuḥ viraha kṛcchreṇa sva deśān ca apare janāḥ
nandaḥ tu saha gopālaiḥ bṛhatyā pūjayā arcitaḥ kṛṣṇa-rāma-ugrasena-ādyaiḥ nyavātsīt bandhu vatsalaḥ
vasudevaḥ añjasā uttīrya manaḥ-ratha mahā arṇavam suhṛt vṛtaḥ prīta manāḥ nandam āha kare spṛśan
śrī-vasudevaḥ uvāca bhrātaḥ īśa kṛtaḥ pāśaḥ nṛṇām yaḥ sneha saṁjñitaḥ tam dustyajam aham manye śūrāṇām api yoginām
asmāsu apratikalpā iyam yat kṛta-ajñeṣu sat-tamaiḥ maitrī arpitā aphalā ca api na nivarteta karhicit
prāk akalpāt ca kuśalam bhrātaḥ vaḥ na ācarāma hi adhunā śrī mada andha akṣāḥ na paśyāmaḥ puraḥ sataḥ
mā rājya śrīḥ abhūt puṁsaḥ śreyaḥ kāmasya māna-da sva-janān uta bandhūn vā na paśyati yayā andha dṛk
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam sauhṛda śaithilya cittaḥ ānakadundubhiḥ ruroda tat kṛtām maitrīm smaran aśru vilocanaḥ
nandaḥ tu sakhyuḥ priya kṛt premṇā govinda-rāmayoḥ adya śvaḥ iti māsān trīn yadubhiḥ mānitaḥ avasat
tataḥ kāmaiḥ pūryamāṇaḥ sa-vrajaḥ saha-bāndhavaḥ para ardhya ābharaṇa kṣauma nānā anarghya paricchadaiḥ vasudeva-ugrasenābhyām kṛṣṇa-uddhava-bala-ādibhiḥ dattam ādāya pāribarham yāpitaḥ yadubhiḥ yayau
nandaḥ gopāḥ ca gopyaḥ ca govinda caraṇa-ambuje manaḥ kṣiptam punaḥ hartum anīśāḥ mathurām yayuḥ
bandhuṣu pratiyāteṣu vṛṣṇayaḥ kṛṣṇa-devatāḥ vīkṣya prāvṛṣam āsannāt yayuḥ dvāravatīm punaḥ
janebhyaḥ kathayām cakruḥ yadu-deva mahā-utsavam yat āsīt tīrtha-yātrāyām suhṛt sandarśana ādikam
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca atha ekadā ātmajau prāptau kṛta pāda abhivandanau vasudevaḥ abhinandya āha prītyā saṅkarṣaṇa-acyutau
munīnām saḥ vacaḥ śrutvā putrayoḥ dhāma sūcakam tat vīryaiḥ jāta visrambhaḥ paribhāṣya abhyabhāṣata
kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahā-yogin saṅkarṣaṇa sanātana jāne vām asya yat sākṣāt pradhāna puruṣau parau
yatra yena yataḥ yasya yasmai yat yat yathā yadā syāt idam bhagavān sākṣāt pradhāna-puruṣa īśvaraḥ
etat nānā-vidham viśvam ātma sṛṣṭam adhokṣaja ātmanā anupraviśya ātman prāṇaḥ jīvaḥ bibharṣi aja
prāṇa ādīnām viśva sṛjām śaktayaḥ yāḥ parasya tāḥ pāratantryāt vaisādṛśyāt dvayoḥ ceṣṭā eva ceṣṭatām
kāntiḥ tejaḥ prabhā sattā candra agni arka ṛkṣa vidyutām yat sthairyam bhū-bhṛtām bhūmeḥ vṛttiḥ gandhaḥ arthataḥ bhavān
tarpaṇam prāṇanam apām deva tvam tāḥ ca tat rasaḥ ojaḥ sahaḥ balam ceṣṭā gatiḥ vāyoḥ tava īśvara
diśām tvam avakāśaḥ asi diśaḥ kham sphoṭaḥ āśrayaḥ nādaḥ varṇaḥ tvam oṁkāraḥ ākṛtīnām pṛthak-kṛtiḥ
indriyam tu indriyāṇām tvam devāḥ ca tat anugrahaḥ avabodhaḥ bhavān buddheḥ jīvasya anusmṛtiḥ satī
bhūtānām asi bhūta-ādiḥ indriyāṇām ca taijasaḥ vaikārikaḥ vikalpānām pradhānam anuśāyinam
naśvareṣu iha bhāveṣu tat asi tvam anaśvaram yathā dravya vikāreṣu dravya-mātram nirūpitam
sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti guṇāḥ tat vṛttayaḥ ca yāḥ tvayi addhāḥ brahmaṇi pare kalpitāḥ yoga-māyayā
tasmāt na santi amī bhāvāḥ yarhi tvayi vikalpitāḥ tvam ca amīṣu vikāreṣu hi anyadā avyāvahārikaḥ
guṇa pravāhe etasmin abudhāḥ tu akhila ātmanaḥ gatim sūkṣmām abodhena saṁsaranti iha karmabhiḥ
yadṛcchayā nṛtām prāpya su-kalpām iha durlabhām sva arthe pramattasya vayaḥ gatam tvat māyayā īśvara
asau aham mama eva ete dehe ca asya anvaya-ādiṣu sneha pāśaiḥ nibadhnāti bhavān sarvam idam jagat
yuvām na naḥ sutau sākṣāt pradhāna-puruṣa īśvarau bhū bhāra kṣatra kṣapaṇe avatīrṇau tathā āttha ha
tat te gataḥ asmi araṇam adya pāda-aravindam āpanna saṁsṛti bhaya apaham ārta bandho etāvatā alam alam indriya lālasena martya ātma dṛk tvayi pare yat apatya buddhiḥ
sūtī-gṛhe nanu jagāda bhavān ajaḥ nau sañjajñe iti anu-yugam nija dharma guptyai nānā tanūḥ gagana-vat vidadhat jahāsi kaḥ veda bhūmnaḥ uru-gāya vibhūti māyām
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ākarṇya ittham pituḥ vākyam bhagavān sātvata-ṛṣabhaḥ pratyāha praśraya ānamraḥ prahasan ślakṣṇayā girā
śrī-bhagavān uvāca vacaḥ vaḥ samaveta artham tāta etat upamanmahe yat naḥ putrān samuddiśya tattva grāmaḥ udāhṛtaḥ
aham yūyam asau āryaḥ ime ca dvārakā-okasaḥ sarve api evam yadu-śreṣṭha vimṛgyāḥ sa cara acaram
ātmā hi ekaḥ svayam-jyotiḥ nityaḥ anyaḥ nirguṇaḥ guṇaiḥ ātma sṛṣṭaiḥ tat kṛteṣu bhūteṣu bahudhā īyate
kham vāyuḥ jyotiḥ āpaḥ bhūḥ tat kṛteṣu yathā-āśayam āviḥ tiraḥ alpa bhūri ekaḥ nānātvam yāti asau api
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam bhagavatā rājan vasudevaḥ udāhṛtaḥ śrutvā vinaṣṭa nānā dhīḥ tūṣṇīm prīta manāḥ abhūt
atha tatra kuru-śreṣṭha devakī sarva devatā śrutvā nītam guroḥ putram ātmajābhyām su vismitā kṛṣṇa-rāmau samāśrāvya putrān kaṁsa-vihiṁsitān smarantī kṛpaṇam prāha vaiklavyāt aśru locanā
śrī-devakī uvāca rāma rāma aprameya-ātman kṛṣṇa yoga-īśvara īśvara veda aham vām viśva sṛjām īśvarau ādi pūruṣau
kāla vidhvasta sattvānām rājñām ut-śāstra vartinām bhūmeḥ bhārāyamāṇānām avatīrṇau kila adya me
yasya aṁśa aṁśa aṁśa bhāgena viśva utpatti laya udayāḥ bhavanti kila viśva-ātman tat tvā adya aham gatim gatā
cirāt mṛta suta ādāne guruṇā kila coditau āninyathuḥ pitṛ sthānāt gurave guru-dakṣiṇām tathā me kurutam kāmam yuvām yoga-īśvara īśvarau bhoja-rāja hatān putrān kāmaye draṣṭum āhṛtān
ṛṣiḥ uvāca evam sañcoditau mātrā rāmaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ ca bhārata sutalam saṁviviśatuḥ yoga-māyāyam upāśritau
tasmin praviṣṭau upalabhya daitya-rāṭ viśva ātma daivam sutarām tathā ātmanaḥ tat darśana āhlāda paripluta āśayaḥ sadyaḥ samutthāya nanāma sa anvayaḥ
tayoḥ samānīya vara āsanam mudā niviṣṭayoḥ tatra mahā-ātmanoḥ tayoḥ dadhāra pādau avanijya tat jalam sa vṛndaḥ ā-brahma punat yat ambu ha
samarhayām āsa saḥ tau vibhūtibhiḥ mahā-arha vastra ābharaṇa anulepanaiḥ tāmbūla dīpa amṛta bhakṣaṇa ādibhiḥ sva gotra vitta ātma samarpaṇena ca
saḥ indra-senaḥ bhagavat pāda-ambujam bibhrat muhuḥ prema vibhinnayā dhiyā uvāca ha ānanda jala ākula īkṣaṇaḥ prahṛṣṭa romā nṛpa gadgada akṣaram
baliḥ uvāca namaḥ anantāya bṛhate namaḥ kṛṣṇāya vedhase sāṅkhya yoga vitānāya brahmaṇe parama-ātmane
darśanam vām hi bhūtānām duṣprāpam ca api adurlabham rajaḥ tamaḥ svabhāvānām yat naḥ prāptau yadṛcchayā
daitya-dānava gandharvāḥ siddha-vidyādhara-cāraṇāḥ yakṣa rakṣaḥ piśācāḥ ca bhūta pramatha-nāyakāḥ viśuddha sattva dhāmni addhā tvayi śāstra śarīriṇi nityam nibaddha vairāḥ te vayam ca anye ca tādṛśāḥ kecana udbaddha vaireṇa bhaktyā kecana kāmataḥ na tathā sattva saṁrabdhāḥ sannikṛṣṭāḥ sura ādayaḥ
idam ittham iti prāyaḥ tava yoga-īśvara īśvara na vidanti api yoga-īśāḥ yoga-māyām kutaḥ vayam
tat naḥ prasīda nirapekṣa vimṛgya yuṣmat pāda aravinda dhiṣaṇa anya gṛha andha kūpāt niṣkramya viśva śaraṇa aṅghri upalabdha vṛttiḥ śāntaḥ yathā ekaḥ uta sarva sakhaiḥ carāmi
śādhi asmān īśitavya īśa niṣpāpān kuru naḥ prabho pumān yat śraddhayā ātiṣṭhan codanāyāḥ vimucyate
śrī-bhagavān uvāca āsan marīceḥ ṣaṭ putrāḥ ūrṇāyām prathame antare devāḥ kam jahasuḥ vīkṣya sutām yabhitum udyatam
tena āsurīm agan yonim adhunā avadya karmaṇā hiraṇyakaśipoḥ jātāḥ nītāḥ te yoga-māyayā devakyāḥ udare jātāḥ rājan kaṁsa vihiṁsitāḥ sā tān śocati ātma-jān svān te ime adhyāsate antike
itaḥ etān praṇeṣyāmaḥ mātṛ śoka apanuttaye tataḥ śāpāt vinirmuktāḥ lokam yāsyanti vijvarāḥ
smara-udgīthaḥ pariṣvaṅgaḥ pataṅgaḥ kṣudrabhṛt ghṛṇī ṣaṭ ime mat prasādena punaḥ yāsyanti sat gatim
iti uktvā tān samādāya indrasenena pūjitau punaḥ dvāravatīm etya mātuḥ putrān ayacchatām
tān dṛṣṭvā bālakān devī putra sneha snuta stanī pariṣvajya aṅkam āropya mūrdhni ajighrat abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
apāyayat stanam prītā suta sparśa parisnutam mohitā māyayā viṣṇoḥ yayā sṛṣṭiḥ pravartate
pītvā amṛtam payaḥ tasyāḥ pīta śeṣam gadā-bhṛtaḥ nārāyaṇa aṅga saṁsparśa pratilabdha ātma darśanāḥ te namaskṛtya govindam devakīm pitaram balam miṣatām sarva bhūtānām yayuḥ dhāma diva-okasām
tam dṛṣṭvā devakī devī mṛta āgamana nirgamam mene su vismitā māyām kṛṣṇasya racitām nṛpa
evam-vidhāni adbhutāni kṛṣṇasya parama-ātmanaḥ vīryāṇi ananta vīryasya santi anantāni bhārata
śrī-sūtaḥ uvāca yaḥ idam anuśṛṇoti śrāvayet vā murāreḥ caritam amṛta kīrteḥ varṇitam vyāsa-putraiḥ jagat agha bhit alam tat bhakta sat karṇa-pūram bhagavati kṛta cittaḥ yāti tat kṣema dhāma
śrī-rājā uvāca brahman veditum icchāmaḥ svasāram rāma-kṛṣṇayoḥ yathā upayeme vijayaḥ yā mama āsīt pitāmahī
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca arjunaḥ tīrtha yātrāyām paryaṭan avanīm prabhuḥ gataḥ prabhāsam aśṛṇot mātuleyīm saḥ ātmanaḥ duryodhanāya rāmaḥ tām dāsyati iti na ca apare tat lipsuḥ saḥ yatiḥ bhūtvā tri-daṇḍī dvārakām agāt
tatra vai vārṣikān māsān avātsīt sva artha sādhakaḥ pauraiḥ sabhājitaḥ abhīkṣṇam rāmeṇa ajānatā ca saḥ
ekadā gṛham ānīya ātithyena nimantrya tam śraddhayā upahṛtam bhaikṣyam balena bubhuje kila
saḥ apaśyat tatra mahatīm kanyām vīra manaḥ-harām prīti utphulla īkṣanaḥ tasyām bhāva kṣubdham manaḥ dadhe
sā api tam cakame vīkṣya nārīṇām hṛdayam-gamam hasantī vrīḍitā apāṅgī tat nyasta hṛdaya īkṣaṇā
tām param samanudhyāyan antaram prepsuḥ arjunaḥ na lebhe śam bhramat cittaḥ kāmena ati-balīyasā
mahatyām deva yātrāyām ratha sthām durga nirgatām jahāra anumataḥ pitroḥ kṛṣṇasya ca mahā-rathaḥ
ratha sthaḥ dhanuḥ ādāya śūrān ca arundhataḥ bhaṭān vidrāvya krośatām svānām sva bhāgam mṛga-rāṭ iva
tat śrutvā kṣubhitaḥ rāmaḥ parvaṇi iva mahā-arṇavaḥ gṛhīta pādaḥ kṛṣṇena suhṛdbhiḥ ca anusāntvitaḥ
prāhiṇot pāribarhāṇi vara-vadhvoḥ mudā balaḥ mahā-dhana upaskara ibha ratha aśva nara yoṣitaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca kṛṣṇasya āsīt dvija śreṣṭhaḥ śrutadevaḥ iti śrutaḥ kṛṣṇa eka bhaktyā pūrṇa arthaḥ śāntaḥ kaviḥ alampaṭaḥ
saḥ uvāsa videheṣu mithilāyām gṛha-āśramī anīhayā āgata āhārya nirvartita nija kriyaḥ
yātrā-mātram tu ahaḥ ahaḥ daivāt upanamati uta na adhikam tāvatā tuṣṭaḥ kriyāḥ cakre yathā ucitāḥ
tathā tat rāṣṭra pālaḥ aṅga bahulāśvaḥ iti śrutaḥ maithilaḥ niraham-mānaḥ ubhau api acyuta-priyau
tayoḥ prasannaḥ bhagavān dārukeṇa āhṛtam ratham āruhya sākam munibhiḥ videhān prayayau prabhuḥ
nāradaḥ vāmadevaḥ atriḥ kṛṣṇaḥ rāmaḥ asitaḥ aruṇiḥ aham bṛhaspatiḥ kaṇvaḥ maitreyaḥ cyavana ādayaḥ
tatra tatra tam āyāntam paurāḥ jānapadāḥ nṛpa upatasthuḥ sa arghya hastāḥ grahaiḥ sūryam iva uditam
ānarta dhanva kuru-jāṅgala kaṅka matsya pāñcāla kunti madhu kekaya kośala arṇāḥ anye ca tat mukha sarojam udāra hāsa snigdha īkṣaṇam nṛpa papuḥ dṛśibhiḥ nṛ-nāryaḥ
tebhyaḥ sva vīkṣaṇa vinaṣṭa tamisra dṛgbhyaḥ kṣemam tri loka guruḥ artha-dṛśam ca yacchan śṛṇvan dik anta dhavalam sva yaśaḥ aśubha ghnam gītam suraiḥ nṛbhiḥ agāt śanakaiḥ videhān
te acyutam prāptam ākarṇya paurāḥ jānapadāḥ nṛpa abhīyuḥ muditāḥ tasmai gṛhīta arhaṇa pāṇayaḥ
dṛṣṭvā te uttamaḥ-ślokam prīti utphulla ānana āśayāḥ kaiḥ dhṛta añjalibhiḥ nemuḥ śruta pūrvān tathā munīn
sta anugrahāya samprāptam manvānau tam jagat gurum maithilaḥ śrutadevaḥ ca pādayoḥ petatuḥ prabhoḥ
nyamantrayetām dāśārham ātithyena saha dvijaiḥ maithilaḥ śrutadevaḥ ca yugapat saṁhata añjalī
bhagavān tat abhipretya dvayoḥ priya cikīrṣayā ubhayoḥ āviśat geham ubhābhyām tat alakṣitaḥ
śrāntān api atha tān dūrāt janakaḥ sva gṛha āgatān ānīteṣu āsana agryeṣu sukha āsīnān mahā-manāḥ pravṛddha bhaktyā ut-dharṣa hṛdaya asra āvila īkṣaṇaḥ natvā tat aṅghrīn prakṣālya tat apaḥ loka pāvanīḥ sa kuṭumbaḥ vahan mūrdhnā pūjayām cakre īśvarān gandha mālya ambara ākalpa dhūpa dīpa arghya go vṛṣaiḥ
vācā madhurayā prīṇan idam āha anna tarpitān pādau aṅka gatau viṣṇoḥ saṁspṛśan śanakaiḥ mudā
śrī-bahulāśvaḥ uvāca bhavān hi sarva bhūtānām ātmā sākṣī sva-dṛk vibho atha naḥ tvat pada-ambhojam smaratām darśanam gataḥ
sva vacaḥ tat ṛtam kartum asmat dṛk gocaraḥ bhavān yat āttha eka-anta bhaktāt me na anantaḥ śrīḥ ajaḥ priyaḥ
kaḥ nu tvat caraṇa-ambhojam evam vit visṛjet pumān niṣkiñcanānām śāntānām munīnām yaḥ tvam ātma daḥ
yaḥ avatīrya yadoḥ vaṁśe nṛṇām saṁsaratām iha yaśaḥ vitene tat śāntyai trai-lokya vṛjina apaham
namaḥ tubhyam bhagavate kṛṣṇāya akuṇṭha medhase nārāyaṇāya ṛṣaye su-śāntam tapaḥ īyuṣe
dināni katicit bhūman gṛhān naḥ nivasa dvijaiḥ sametaḥ pāda rajasā punīhi idam nimeḥ kulam
iti upāmantritaḥ rajñā bhagavān loka bhāvanaḥ uvāsa kurvan kalyāṇam mithilā nara yoṣitām
śrutadevaḥ acyutam prāptam sva-gṛhān janakaḥ yathā natvā munīn su saṁhṛṣṭaḥ dhunvan vāsaḥ nanarta ha
tṛṇa pīṭha bṛṣīṣu etān ānīteṣu upaveśya saḥ sva-āgatena abhinandya aṅghrīn sa-bhāryaḥ avanije mudā
tat ambhasā mahā-bhāgaḥ ātmānam sa gṛha anvayam snāpayām cakre uddharṣaḥ labdha sarva manaḥ-rathaḥ
phala arhaṇa uśīra śiva amṛta ambubhiḥ mṛdā surabhyā tulasī kuśa ambujaiḥ ārādhayām āsa yathā upapannayā saparyayā sattva vivardhana andhasā
saḥ tarkayām āsa kutaḥ mama anu abhūt gṛha andha kūpe patitasya saṅgamaḥ yaḥ sarva tīrtha āspada pāda reṇubhiḥ kṛṣṇena ca asya ātma niketa bhū-suraiḥ
su-upaviṣṭān kṛta ātithyān śrutadevaḥ upasthitaḥ sa-bhārya sva-jana apatyaḥ uvāca aṅghri abhimarśanaḥ
śrutadevaḥ uvāca na adya naḥ darśanam prāptaḥ param parama pūruṣaḥ yarhi idam śaktibhiḥ sṛṣṭvā praviṣṭaḥ hi ātma sattayā
yathā śayānaḥ puruṣaḥ manasā eva ātma māyayā sṛṣṭvā lokam param svāpnam anuviśya avabhāsate
śṛṇvatām gadatām śaśvat arcatām tvā abhivandatām nṛṇām saṁvadatām antaḥ hṛdi bhāsi amala ātmanām
hṛdi sthaḥ api ati dūra-sthaḥ karma vikṣipta cetasām ātma śaktibhiḥ agrāhyaḥ api anti upeta guṇa ātmanām
namaḥ astu te adhyātma vidām para-ātmane anātmane sva-ātma vibhakta mṛtyave sa-kāraṇa akāraṇa liṅgam īyuṣe sva-māyayā asaṁvṛta ruddha dṛṣṭaye
saḥ tvam śādhi sva bhṛtyān naḥ kim deva karavāma he etat antaḥ nṛṇām kleśaḥ yat bhavān akṣi go-caraḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tat uktam iti upākarṇya bhagavān praṇata ārti hā gṛhītvā pāṇinā pāṇim prahasan tam uvāca ha
śrī-bhagavān uvāca brahman te anugraha arthāya samprāptān viddhi amūn munīn sañcaranti mayā lokān punantaḥ pāda reṇubhiḥ
devāḥ kṣetrāṇi tīrthāni darśana sparśana arcanaiḥ śanaiḥ punanti kālena tat api arhat-tama īkṣayā
brāhmaṇaḥ janmanā śreyān sarveṣām prāṇinām iha tapasā vidyayā tuṣṭyā kim u mat kalayā yutaḥ
na brāhmaṇāt me dayitam rūpam etat catuḥ-bhujam sarva veda mayaḥ vipraḥ sarva deva mayaḥ hi aham
duṣprajñāḥ aviditvā evam avajānanti asūyavaḥ gurum mām vipram ātmānam arcā-ādaū ijya dṛṣṭayaḥ
cara acaram idam viśvam bhāvāḥ ye ca asya hetavaḥ mat rūpāṇi iti cetasi ādhatte vipraḥ mat īkṣayā
tasmāt brahma-ṛṣīn etān brahman mat śraddhayā arcaya evam cet arcitaḥ asmi addhā na anyathā bhūri bhūtibhiḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca saḥ ittham prabhunā ādiṣṭaḥ saha kṛṣṇān dvija uttamān ārādhya eka-ātma bhavena maithilaḥ ca āpa sat gatim
evam sva bhaktayoḥ rājan bhagavān bhakta bhakti-man uṣitvā ādiśya sat mārgam punaḥ dvāravatīm agāt
śrī-parīkṣit uvāca brahman brahmaṇi anirdeśye nirguṇe guṇa vṛttayaḥ katham caranti śrutayaḥ sākṣāt sat asataḥ pare
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca buddhi indriya manaḥ prāṇān janāṇām asṛjat prabhuḥ mātra artham ca bhava artham ca ātmane akalpanāya ca
sā eṣā hi upaniṣat brāhmī pūrveṣām pūrva-jaiḥ dhṛta śraddhayā dhārayet yaḥ tām kṣemam gacchet akiñcanaḥ
atra te varṇayiṣyāmi gāthām nārāyaṇa-anvitām nāradasya ca saṁvādam ṛṣeḥ nārāyaṇasya ca
ekadā nāradaḥ lokān paryaṭan bhagavat priyaḥ sanātanam ṛṣim draṣṭum yayau nārāyaṇa-āśramam
yaḥ vai bhārata-varṣe asmin kṣemāya svastaye nṛṇām dharma jñāna śama upetam ā-kalpāt āsthitaḥ tapaḥ
tatra upaviṣṭam ṛṣibhiḥ kalāpa-grāma vāsibhiḥ parītam praṇataḥ apṛcchat idam eva kuru-udvaha
tasmai hi avocat bhagavān ṛṣīṇām śṛṇvatām idam yaḥ brahma vādaḥ pūrveṣām jana-loka-nivāsinām
śrī-bhagavān uvāca svāyambhuva brahma satram jana-loke abhavat purā tatra sthānām mānasānām munīnām ūrdhva retasām
śvetadvīpam gatavati tvayi draṣṭum tat īśvaram brahma vādaḥ su saṁvṛttaḥ śrutayaḥ yatra śerate tatra ha ayam abhūt praśnaḥ tvam mām yam anupṛcchasi
tulya śruta tapaḥ śīlāḥ tulya svīya ari madhyamāḥ api cakruḥ pravacanam ekam śuśrūṣavaḥ apare
śrī-sanandanaḥ uvāca sva sṛṣṭam idam āpīya śayānam saha śaktibhiḥ tat ante bodhayām cakruḥ tat liṅgaiḥ śrutayaḥ param yathā śayānam saṁrājam vandinaḥ tat parākramaiḥ pratyūṣe abhetya suślokaiḥ bodhayanti anujīvinaḥ
śrī-śrutayaḥ ūcuḥ jayajaya jahi ajām ajita doṣa gṛbhīta guṇām tvam asi yat ātmanā samavaruddha samasta bhagaḥ aga jagat okasām akhila śakti avabodhaka te kvacit ajayā ātmanā ca carataḥ anucaret nigamaḥ
bṛhat upalabdham etat avayanti avaśeṣatayā yataḥ udaya astam-ayau vikṛteḥ mṛdi vā avikṛtāt ataḥ ṛṣayaḥ dadhuḥ tvayi manaḥ vacana ācaritam katham ayathā bhavanti bhuvi datta padāni nṛṇām
iti tava sūrayaḥ tri adhipate akhila loka mala kṣapaṇa kathā amṛta abdhim avagāhya tapāṁsi jahuḥ kim uta punaḥ sva dhāma vidhuta āśaya kāla guṇāḥ parama bhajanti ye padam ajasra sukha anubhavam
dṛtayaḥ iva śvasanti asu-bhṛtaḥ yadi te anuvidhāḥ mahat aham ādayaḥ aṇḍam asṛjan yat anugrahataḥ puruṣa vidhaḥ anvayaḥ atra caramaḥ anna-maya-ādiṣu yaḥ sat-asataḥ param tvam atha yat eṣu avaśeṣam ṛtam
udaram upāsate ye ṛṣi vartmasu kūrpa dṛśaḥ parisara paddhatim hṛdayam āruṇayaḥ daharam tataḥ udagāt ananta tava dhāma śiraḥ paramam punaḥ iha yat sametya na patanti kṛta-anta mukhe
sva kṛta vicitra yoniṣu viśan iva hetutayā taratamataḥ cakāssi anala-vat sva kṛta anukṛtiḥ atha vitathāsu amūṣu avitatham tava dhāma samam viraja dhiyaḥ anuyanti abhivipaṇyavaḥ eka-rasam
sva kṛta pureṣu amīṣu abahiḥ antara saṁvaraṇam tava puruṣam vadanti akhila śakti dhṛtaḥ aṁśa kṛtam iti nṛ gatim vivicya kavayaḥ nigama āvapanam bhavataḥ upāsate aṅghrim abhavam bhuvi viśvasitāḥ
duravagama ātma tattva nigamāya tava ātta tanoḥ carita mahā amṛta abdhi parivarta pariśramaṇāḥ na parilaṣanti kecit apavargam api īśvara te caraṇa saroja haṁsa kula saṅga visṛṣṭa gṛhāḥ
tvat anupatham kulāyam idam ātma suhṛt priya vat carati tathā unmukhe tvayi hite priye ātmani ca na bata ramanti aho asat upāsanayā ātma hanaḥ yat anuśayāḥ bhramanti uru bhaye ku śarīra bhṛtaḥ
nibhṛta marut manaḥ akṣa dṛḍha-yoga yujaḥ hṛdi yat munayaḥ upāsate tat arayaḥ api yayuḥ smaraṇāt striyaḥ uraga-indra bhoga bhuja daṇḍa viṣakta dhiyaḥ vayam api te samāḥ sama dṛśaḥ aṅghri saroja sudhāḥ
kaḥ iha nu veda bata avara janma layaḥ agra-saram yataḥ udagāt ṛṣiḥ yam anu deva-gaṇāḥ ubhaye tarhi na sat na ca asat ubhayam na ca kāla javaḥ kim api na tatra śāstram avakṛṣya śayīta yadā
janim asataḥ sataḥ mṛtim uta ātmani ye ca bhidām vipaṇam ṛtam smaranti upadiśanti te ārupitaiḥ tri guṇa mayaḥ pumān iti bhidā yat abodha kṛtā tvayi na tataḥ paratra saḥ bhavet avabodha rase
sat iva manaḥ tri-vṛt tvayi vibhāti asat ā-manujāt sat abhimṛśanti aśeṣam idam ātmatayā ātma-vidaḥ na hi vikṛtim tyajanti kanakasya tat-ātmatayā sva kṛtam anupraviṣṭam idam ātmatayā avasitam
tava pari ye caranti akhila sattva niketatayā te uta padā ākramanti avigaṇayya śiraḥ nirṛteḥ parivayase paśūn iva girā vibudhān api tān tvayi kṛta sauhṛdāḥ khalu punanti na ye vimukhāḥ
tvam akaraṇaḥ sva-rāṭ akhila kāraka śakti dharaḥ tava balim udvahanti samadanti ajayā animiṣāḥ varṣa bhujaḥ akhila kṣiti pateḥ iva viśva sṛjaḥ vidadhati yatra ye tu adhikṛtā bhavataḥ cakitāḥ
sthira cara jātayaḥ syuḥ ajayā uttha nimitta yujaḥ viharaḥ udīkṣayā yadi parasya vimukta tataḥ na hi paramasya kaścit aparaḥ na paraḥ ca bhavet viyataḥ iva apadasya tava śūnya tulām dadhataḥ
aparimitāḥ dhruvāḥ tanu-bhṛtaḥ yadi sarva-gatāḥ tarhi na śāsyatā iti niyamaḥ dhruva na itarathā ajani ca yat-mayam tat avimucya niyantṛ bhavet samam anujānatām yat amatam mata duṣṭatayā
na ghaṭate udbhavaḥ prakṛti pūruṣayoḥ ajayoḥ ubhaya yujā bhavanti asu-bhṛtaḥ jala budbuda vat tvayi te ime tataḥ vividha nāma guṇaiḥ parame saritaḥ iva arṇave madhuni lilyuḥ aśeṣa rasāḥ
nṛṣu tava māyayā bhramam amīṣu avagatya bhṛśam tvayi su-dhiyaḥ abhave dadhati bhāvam anuprabhavam katham anuvartatām bhava bhayam tava yat bhru kuṭiḥ sṛjati muhuḥ tri-nemiḥ a bhavat śaraṇeṣu bhayam
vijita hṛṣīka vāyubhiḥ adānta manaḥ tura-gam ye iha yatanti yantum ati lolam upāya khidaḥ vyasana śata anvitāḥ samavahāya guroḥ caraṇam vaṇijaḥ iva aja santi akṛta karṇa-dharāḥ jala-dhau
svajana suta ātma dāra dhana dhāma dharā asu rathaiḥ tvayi sati kim nṛṇām śrayataḥ ātmani sarva-rase iti sat ajānatām mithunataḥ rataye caratām sukhayati kaḥ nu iha sva vihate sva nirasta bhage
bhuvi puru puṇya tīrtha sadanāni ṛṣayaḥ vimadaḥ te uta bhavat pada ambuja hṛdaḥ agha bhit aṅghri jalāḥ dadhati sakṛt manaḥ tvayi ye ātmani nitya sukhe na punaḥ upāsate puruṣa sāra hara āvasathān
sataḥ idam utthitam sat iti cet nanu tarka hatam vyabhicarati kva ca kva ca mṛṣā na tathā ubhaya yuk vyavahṛtaye vikalpaḥ iṣitaḥ andha paramparayā bhramayati bhāratī te uru vṛttibhiḥ uktha jaḍān
na yat idam agre āsa na bhaviṣyat ataḥ nidhanāt anu mitam antarā tvayi vibhāti mṛṣā ekarase ataḥ upamīyate draviṇa jāti vikalpa pathaiḥ vitatha manaḥ vilāsam ṛtam iti avayanti abudhaḥ
saḥ yat ajayā tu ajām anuśayīta guṇān ca juṣan bhajati sa-rūpatām tat-anu mṛtyum apeta bhagaḥ tvam uta jahāsi tām ahiḥ iva tvacam ātta-bhagaḥ mahasi mahīyase aṣṭa-guṇite aparimeya bhagaḥ
yadi na samuddharanti yatayaḥ hṛdi kāma jaṭāḥ duradhigamaḥ asatām hṛdi gataḥ asmṛta kaṇṭha maṇiḥ asu tṛpa yoginām ubhayataḥ api asukham bhagavan anapagata antakāt anadhirūḍha padāt bhavataḥ
tvat avagamī na vetti bhavat uttha śubha-aśubhayoḥ guṇa-viguṇa anvayān tarhi deha-bhṛtām ca giraḥ anu-yugam anu-aham sa-guṇa gīta paramparayā śravaṇa bhṛtaḥ yataḥ tvam apavarga gatiḥ manujaiḥ
dyu patayaḥ eva te na yayuḥ antam anantatayā tvam api yat antara aṇḍa nicayāḥ nanu sa āvaranāḥ khe iva rajāṁsi vānti vayasā saha yat śrutayaḥ tvayi hi phalanti atat nirasanena bhavat nidhanāḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca iti etat brahmaṇaḥ putrāḥ āśrutya ātma anuśāsanam sanandanam atha ānarcuḥ siddhāḥ jñātvā ātmanaḥ gatim
iti aśeṣa samāmnāya purāṇa upaniṣat rasaḥ samuddhṛtaḥ pūrva jātaiḥ vyoma yānaiḥ mahā-ātmabhiḥ
tvam ca etat brahma dāyāda śraddhayā ātma-ānuśāsanam dhārayan cara gām kāmam kāmānām bharjanam nṛṇām
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam saḥ ṛṣiṇā ādiṣṭam gṛhītvā śraddhayā ātma-vān pūrṇaḥ śruta dharaḥ rājan āha vīra vrataḥ muniḥ
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca namaḥ tasmai bhagavate kṛṣṇāya amala kīrtaye yaḥ dhatte sarva bhūtānām abhavāya uśatīḥ kalāḥ
iti ādyam ṛṣim ānamya tat śiṣyān ca mahā-ātmanaḥ tataḥ agāt āśramam sākṣāt pituḥ dvaipāyanasya me
sabhājitaḥ bhagavatā kṛta āsana parigrahaḥ tasmai tat varṇayām āsa nārāyaṇa-mukhāt śrutam
iti etat varṇitam rājan yat naḥ praśnaḥ kṛtaḥ tvayā yathā brahmaṇi anirdeśye nirguṇe api manaḥ caret
yaḥ asya utprekṣakaḥ ādi madhya nidhane yaḥ avyakta jīva īśvaraḥ yaḥ sṛṣṭvā idam anupraviśya ṛṣiṇā cakre puraḥ śāsti tāḥ yam sampadya jahāti ajām anuśayī suptaḥ kulāyam yathā tam kaivalya nirasta yonim abhayam dhyāyet ajasram harim
śrī-rājā uvāca deva asura manuṣyeṣu ye bhajanti aśivam śivam prāyaḥ te dhaninaḥ bhojāḥ na tu lakṣmyāḥ patim harim
etat veditum icchāmaḥ sandehaḥ atra mahān hi naḥ viruddha śīlayoḥ prabhvoḥ viruddhā bhajatām gatiḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca śivaḥ śakti yutaḥ śaśvat tri liṅgaḥ guṇa saṁvṛtaḥ vaikārikaḥ taijasaḥ ca tāmasaḥ ca iti aham tridhā
tataḥ vikārāḥ abhavan ṣoḍaśa amīṣu kañcana upadhāvan vibhūtīnām sarvāsām aśnute gatim
hariḥ hi nirguṇaḥ sākṣāt puruṣaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ saḥ sarva dṛk upadraṣṭā tam bhajan nirguṇaḥ bhavet
nivṛtteṣu aśva-medheṣu rājā yuṣmat pitāmahāḥ śṛṇvan bhagavataḥ dharmān apṛcchat idam acyutam
saḥ āha bhagavān tasmai prītaḥ śuśrūṣave prabhuḥ nṛṇām niḥśreyasa arthāya yaḥ avatīrṇaḥ yadoḥ kule
śrī-bhagavān uvāca yasya aham anugṛhṇāmi hariṣye tat dhanam śanaiḥ tataḥ adhanam tyajanti asya sva-janāḥ duḥkha-duḥkhitam
saḥ yadā vitatha udyogaḥ nirviṇṇaḥ syāt dhana īhayā mat paraiḥ kṛta maitrasya kariṣye mat anugraham
tat brahma paramam sūkṣmam cit mātram sat anantakam vijñāya ātmatayā dhīraḥ saṁsārāt parimucyate
ataḥ mām su durārādhyam hitvā anyān bhajate janaḥ tataḥ te āśu toṣebhyaḥ labdha rājya śriyā uddhatāḥ mattāḥ pramattāḥ vara dān vismayanti avajānate
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca śāpa prasādayoḥ īśāḥ brahma-viṣṇu-śiva-ādayaḥ sadyaḥ śāpa-prasādaḥ aṅga śivaḥ brahmā na ca acyutaḥ
atra ca udāharanti imam itihāsam purātanam vṛka-asurāya giri-śaḥ varam dattvā āpa saṅkaṭam
vṛkaḥ nāma asuraḥ putraḥ śakuneḥ pathi nāradam dṛṣṭvā āśu toṣam papraccha deveṣu triṣu durmatiḥ
saḥ āha devam giriśam upādhāva āśu siddhyasi yaḥ alpābhyām guṇa doṣābhyām āśu tuṣyati kupyati
daśa-āsya bāṇayoḥ tuṣṭaḥ stuvatoḥ vandinoḥ iva aiśvaryam atulam dattvā tataḥ āpa su saṅkaṭam
iti ādiṣṭaḥ tam asuraḥ upādhāvat sva gātrataḥ kedāre ātma kravyeṇa juhvānaḥ agni mukham haram
deva upalabdhim aprāpya nirvedāt saptame ahani śiraḥ avṛścat sudhitinā tat tīrtha klinna mūrdha-jam tadā mahā kāruṇikaḥ saḥ dhūrjaṭiḥ yathā vayam ca agniḥ iva utthitaḥ analāt nigṛhya dorbhyām bhujayoḥ nyavārayat tat sparśanāt bhūyaḥ upaskṛta ākṛtiḥ
tam āha ca aṅga alam alam vṛṇīṣva me yathā abhikāmam vitarāmi te varam prīyeya toyena nṛṇām prapadyatām aho tvayā ātmā bhṛśam ardyate vṛthā
devam saḥ vavre pāpīyān varam bhūta bhaya āvaham yasya yasya karam śīrṣṇi dhāsye saḥ mriyatām iti
tat śrutvā bhagavān rudraḥ durmanāḥ iva bhārata om iti prahasan tasmai dade aheḥ amṛtam yathā
saḥ tat vara parīkṣā-artham śambhoḥ mūrdhni kila asuraḥ sva hastam dhātum ārebhe saḥ abibhyat sva kṛtāt śivaḥ
tena upasṛṣṭaḥ santrastaḥ parādhāvan sa vepathuḥ yāvat antam divaḥ bhūmeḥ kāṣṭhānām udagāt udak
ajānantaḥ prati-vidhim tūṣṇīm āsan sura īśvarāḥ tataḥ vaikuṇṭham agamat bhāsvaram tamasaḥ param yatra nārāyaṇaḥ sākṣāt nyāsinām paramaḥ gatiḥ śāntānām nyasta daṇḍānām yataḥ na āvartate gataḥ
tam tathā vyasanam dṛṣṭvā bhagavān vṛjina ardanaḥ dūrāt pratyudiyāt bhūtvā baṭukaḥ yoga-māyayā mekhala ajina daṇḍa akṣaiḥ tejasā agniḥ iva jvalan abhivādayām āsa ca tam kuśa-pāṇiḥ vinīta-vat
śrī-bhagavān uvāca śākuneya bhavān vyaktam śrāntaḥ kim dūram āgataḥ kṣaṇam viśramyatām puṁsaḥ ātmā ayam sarva kāma dhuk
yadi naḥ śravaṇāya alam yuṣmat vyavasitam vibho bhaṇyatām prāyaśaḥ pumbhiḥ dhṛtaiḥ sva arthān samīhate
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam bhagavatā pṛṣṭaḥ vacasā amṛta varṣiṇā gata klamaḥ abravīt tasmai yathā pūrvam anuṣṭhitam
śrī-bhagavān uvāca evam cet tarhi tat vākyam na vayam śraddadhīmahi yaḥ dakṣa-śāpāt paiśācyam prāptaḥ preta-piśāca rāṭ
yadi vaḥ tatra viśrambhaḥ dānava-indra jagat gurau tarhi aṅga āśu sva śirasi hastam nyasya pratīyatām
yadi asatyam vacaḥ śambhoḥ kathañcit dānava-ṛṣabha tadā enam jahi asat vācam na yat vaktā anṛtam punaḥ
ittham bhagavataḥ citraiḥ vacobhiḥ saḥ su peśalaiḥ bhinna dhīḥ vismṛtaḥ śīrṣṇi sva hastam ku-matiḥ nyadhāt
atha apatat bhinna śirāḥ vajra āhataḥ iva kṣaṇāt jaya śabdaḥ namaḥ śabdaḥ sādhu śabdaḥ abhavat divi
mumucuḥ puṣpa varṣāṇi hate pāpe vṛka-asure deva-ṛṣi pitṛ gandharvāḥ mocitaḥ saṅkaṭāt śivaḥ
muktam giriśam abhyāha bhagavān puruṣa-uttamaḥ aho deva mahā-deva pāpaḥ ayam svena pāpmanā hataḥ kaḥ nu mahatsu īśa jantuḥ vai kṛta kilbiṣaḥ kṣemī syāt kim u viśva īśe kṛta-āgaskaḥ jagat gurau
yaḥ evam avyākṛta śakti udanvataḥ parasya sākṣāt parama-ātmanaḥ hareḥ giritra mokṣam kathayet śṛṇoti vā vimucyate saṁsṛtibhiḥ tathā aribhiḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca sarasvatyāḥ taṭe rājan ṛṣayaḥ satram āsata vitarkaḥ samabhūt teṣām triṣu adhīśeṣu kaḥ mahān
tasya jijñāsayā te vai bhṛgum brahma-sutam nṛpa tat jñaptyai preṣayām āsuḥ saḥ abhyagāt brahmaṇaḥ sabhām
na tasmai prahvaṇam stotram cakre sattva parīkṣayā tasmai cukrodha bhagavān prajvalan svena tejasā
saḥ ātmani utthitam manyum ātma-jāya ātmanā prabhuḥ aśīśamat yathā vahnim sva yonyā vāriṇā ātma-bhūḥ
tataḥ kailāsam agamat saḥ tam devaḥ mahā-īśvaraḥ parirabdhum samārebhe utthāya bhrātaram mudā
na aicchat tvam asi utpatha-gaḥ iti devaḥ cukopa ha śūlam udyamya tam hantum ārebhe tigma locanaḥ patitvā pādayoḥ devī sāntvayām āsa tam girā atha u jagāma vaikuṇṭham yatra devaḥ janārdanaḥ
śayānam śriyaḥ utsaṅge padā vakṣasi atāḍayat tataḥ utthāya bhagavān saha lakṣmyā satām gatiḥ sva talpāt avaruhya atha nanāma śirasā munim āha te su-āgatam brahman niṣīda atra āsane kṣaṇam ajānatām āgatān vaḥ kṣantum arhatha naḥ prabho
punīhi saha lokam mām loka pālān ca mat-gatān pāda udakena bhavataḥ tīrthānām tīrtha kāriṇā adya aham bhagavan lakṣmyāḥ āsam eka-anta bhājanam vatsyati urasi me bhūtiḥ bhavat pāda hata aṁhasaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam bruvāṇe vaikuṇṭhe bhṛguḥ tat mandrayā girā nirvṛtaḥ tarpitaḥ tūṣṇīm bhakti utkaṇṭhaḥ aśru locanaḥ
punaḥ ca satram āvrajya munīnām brahma-vādinām sva anubhūtam aśeṣeṇa rājan bhṛguḥ avarṇayat
tat niśamya atha munayaḥ vismitāḥ mukta saṁśayāḥ bhūyāṁsam śraddadhuḥ viṣṇum yataḥ śāntiḥ yataḥ abhayam dharmaḥ sākṣāt yataḥ jñānam vairāgyam ca tat anvitam aiśvaryam ca aṣṭadhā yasmāt yaśaḥ ca ātma mala apaham munīnām nyasta daṇḍānām śāntānām sama cetasām akiñcanānām sādhūnām yam āhuḥ paramām gatim sattvam yasya priyā mūrtiḥ brāhmaṇāḥ tu iṣṭa devatāḥ bhajanti anāśiṣaḥ śāntāḥ yam vā nipuṇa buddhayaḥ
tri-vidha ākṛtayaḥ tasya rākṣasāḥ asurāḥ surāḥ guṇinyāḥ māyayā sṛṣṭāḥ sattvam tat tīrtha sādhanam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ittham sārasvatāḥ viprāḥ nṛṇām saṁśaya nuttaye puruṣasya pada-ambhoja sevayā tat gatim gataḥ
śrī-sūtaḥ uvāca iti etat muni tanaya āsya padma gandha pīyūṣam bhava bhaya bhit parasya puṁsaḥ su-ślokam śravaṇa puṭaiḥ pibati abhīkṣṇam pānthaḥ adhva bhramaṇa pariśramam jahāti
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ekadā dvāravatyām tu vipra patnyāḥ kumārakaḥ jāta mātraḥ bhuvam spṛṣṭvā mamāra kila bhārata
vipraḥ gṛhītvā mṛtakam rāja dvāri upadhāya saḥ idam provāca vilapan āturaḥ dīna mānasaḥ
brahma dviṣaḥ śaṭha dhiyaḥ lubdhasya viṣaya-ātmanaḥ kṣatra-bandhoḥ karma doṣāt pañcatvam me gataḥ arbhakaḥ
hiṁsā vihāram nṛ-patim duḥśīlam ajita indriyam prajāḥ bhajantyaḥ sīdanti daridrāḥ nitya duḥkhitāḥ
evam dvitīyam vipra-ṛṣiḥ tṛtīyam tu evam eva ca visṛjya saḥ nṛpa-dvāri tām gāthām samagāyata
tām arjunaḥ upaśrutya karhicit keśava antike parete navame bāle brāhmaṇam samabhāṣata kim svit brahman tvat nivāse iha na asti dhanuḥ-dharaḥ rājanya-bandhuḥ ete vaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ satre āsate
dhana dāra ātmaja apṛktāḥ yatra śocanti brāhmaṇāḥ te vai rājanya-veṣeṇa naṭāḥ jīvanti asum-bharāḥ
aham prajāḥ vām bhagavan rakṣiṣye dīnayoḥ iha anistīrṇa pratijñaḥ agnim pravekṣye hata kalmaṣaḥ
śrī-brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca saṅkarṣaṇaḥ vāsudevaḥ pradyumnaḥ dhanvinām varaḥ aniruddhaḥ aprati-rathaḥ na trātum śaknuvanti yat tat katham nu bhavān karma duṣkaram jagat īśvaraiḥ tvam cikīrṣasi bāliśyāt tat na śraddadhmahe vayam
śrī-arjunaḥ uvāca na aham saṅkarṣaṇaḥ brahman na kṛṣṇaḥ kārṣṇiḥ eva ca aham vai arjunaḥ nāma gāṇḍīvam yasya vai dhanuḥ
mā avamaṁsthāḥ mama brahman vīryam tri-ambaka toṣaṇam mṛtyum vijitya pradhane āneṣye te prajāḥ prabho
evam viśrambhitaḥ vipraḥ phālgunena param tapa jagāma sva gṛham prītaḥ pārtha vīryam niśāmayan
prasūti kāle āsanne bhāryāyāḥ dvija sat-tamaḥ pāhi pāhi prajām mṛtyoḥ iti āha arjunam āturaḥ
saḥ upaspṛśya śuci ambhaḥ namaḥ-kṛtya mahā-īśvaram divyāni astrāṇi saṁsmṛtya sajyam gāṇḍīvam ādade
nyaruṇat sūtikā-āgāram śaraiḥ nānā astra yojitaiḥ tiryak ūrdhvam adhaḥ pārthaḥ cakāra śara pañjaram
tataḥ kumāraḥ sañjātaḥ vipra patnyāḥ rudan muhuḥ sadyaḥ adarśanam āpede sa śarīraḥ vihāyasā
tadā āha vipraḥ vijayam vinindan kṛṣṇa-sannidhau mauḍhyam paśyata me yaḥ aham śraddadhe klība katthanam
na pradyumnaḥ na aniruddhaḥ na rāmaḥ na ca keśavaḥ yasya śekuḥ paritrātum kaḥ anyaḥ tat avitā īśvaraḥ
dhik arjunam mṛṣā vādam dhik ātma ślāghinaḥ dhanuḥ daiva upasṛṣṭam yaḥ mauḍhyāt āninīṣati durmatiḥ
evam śapati vipra-ṛṣau vidyām āsthāya phālgunaḥ yayau saṁyamanīm asu yatra āste bhagavān yamaḥ
vipra apatyam acakṣāṇaḥ tataḥ aindrīm agāt purīm āgneyīm nairṛtīm saumyam vāyavyām vāruṇīm atha rasātalam nāka-pṛṣṭham dhiṣṇyāni anyāni udāyudhaḥ tataḥ alabdha dvija sutaḥ hi anistīrṇa pratiśrutaḥ agnim vivikṣuḥ kṛṣṇena pratyuktaḥ pratiṣedhatā
darśaye dvija sūnūn te mā avajña ātmānam ātmanā ye te naḥ kīrtim vimalām manuṣyāḥ sthāpayiṣyanti
iti sambhāṣya bhagavān arjunena saha īśvaraḥ divyam sva ratham āsthāya pratīcīm diśam āviśat
sapta dvīpān sa sindhūn ca sapta sapta girīn atha loka-alokam tathā atītya viveśa su-mahat tamaḥ
tatra aśvāḥ śaibya-sugrīva-meghapuṣpa-balāhakāḥ tamasi bhraṣṭa gatayaḥ babhūvuḥ bharata-ṛṣabha tān dṛṣṭvā bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ mahā yoga-īśvara īśvaraḥ sahasra āditya saṅkāśam sva cakram prāhiṇot puraḥ
tamaḥ su ghoram gahanam kṛtam mahat vidārayat bhūri-tareṇa rociṣā manaḥ javam nirviviśe sudarśanam guṇa cyutaḥ rāma śaraḥ yathā camūḥ
dvāreṇa cakra anupathena tat tamaḥ param param jyotiḥ ananta pāram samaśnuvānam prasamīkṣya phālgunaḥ pratāḍita akṣaḥ apidadhe akṣiṇī ubhe
tataḥ praviṣṭaḥ salilam nabhasvatā balīyasā ejat bṛhat ūrmi bhūṣaṇam tatra adbhutam vai bhavanam dyumat-tamam bhrājat maṇi stambha sahasra śobhitam
tasmin mahā bhogam anantam adbhutam sahasra mūrdhanya phaṇā maṇi dyubhiḥ vibhrājamānam dvi guṇa īkṣaṇa ulbaṇam sita acala ābham śiti kaṇṭha jihvam
dadarśa tat bhoga sukha āsanam vibhum mahā-anubhāvam puruṣa-uttama uttamam sāndra ambuda ābham su piśaṅga vāsasam prasanna vaktram rucira āyata īkṣaṇam mahā maṇi vrāta kirīṭa kuṇḍala prabhā parikṣipta sahasra kuntalam pralamba cāru aṣṭa bhujam sa kaustubham śrīvatsa-lakṣmam vana mālayā āvṛtam sunanda-nanda-pramukhaiḥ sva-pārṣadaiḥ cakra-ādibhiḥ mūrti dharaiḥ nija āyudhaiḥ puṣṭyā śriyā kīrti-ajayā akhila ṛdhibhiḥ niṣevyamānam parameṣṭhinam patim
vavanda ātmānam anantam acyutaḥ jiṣṇuḥ ca tat darśana jāta sādhvasaḥ tau āha bhūmā parame-sthinām prabhuḥ baddha-añjalī sa smitam ūrjayā girā
dvija ātma-jāḥ me yuvayoḥ didṛkṣuṇā mayā upanītāḥ bhuvi dharma guptaye kalā avatīrṇau avaneḥ bhara asurān hatvā iha bhūyaḥ tvarayā itam anti me
pūrṇa kāmau api yuvām nara-nārāyaṇau ṛṣī dharmam ācaratām sthityai ṛṣabhau loka-saṅgraham
iti ādiṣṭau bhagavatā tau kṛṣṇau parame-ṣṭhinā om iti ānamya bhūmānam ādāya dvija dārakān nyavartetām svakam dhāma samprahṛṣṭau yathā gatam viprāya dadatuḥ putrān yathā rūpam yathā vayaḥ
niśāmya vaiṣṇavam dhāma pārthaḥ parama vismitaḥ yat kiñcit pauruṣam puṁsām mene kṛṣṇa anukampitam
iti īdṛśāni anekāni vīryāṇi iha pradarśayan bubhuje viṣayān grāmyān īje ca ati urjitaiḥ makhaiḥ
pravavarṣa akhilān kāmān prajāsu brāhmaṇa-ādiṣu yathā-kālam yathā eva indraḥ bhagavān śraiṣṭhyam āsthitaḥ
hatvā nṛpān adharmiṣṭhān ghātayitvā arjuna-ādibhiḥ añjasā vartayām āsa dharmam dharma-suta-ādibhiḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca sukham sva puryām nivasan dvārakāyām śriyaḥ patiḥ sarva sampat samṛddhāyām juṣṭāyām vṛṣṇi-puṅgavaiḥ strībhiḥ ca uttama veṣābhiḥ nava yauvana kāntibhiḥ kanduka-ādibhiḥ harmyeṣu krīḍantībhiḥ taḍit dyubhiḥ nityam saṅkula mārgāyām mada-cyudbhiḥ matam gajaiḥ su alaṅkṛtaiḥ bhaṭaiḥ aśvaiḥ rathaiḥ ca kanaka ujjvalaiḥ udyāna upavana āḍhyāyām puṣpita druma rājiṣu nirviśat bhṛṅga vihagaiḥ nāditāyām samantataḥ reme ṣoḍaśa sāhasra patnīnām eka vallabhaḥ tāvat vicitra rūpaḥ asau tat geheṣu mahā-ṛddhiṣu protphulla utpala kahlāra kumuda ambhoja reṇubhiḥ vāsita amala toyeṣu kūjat dvija kuleṣu ca vijahāra vigāhya ambhaḥ hradinīṣu mahā-udayaḥ kuca kuṅkuma lipta aṅgaḥ parirabdhaḥ ca yoṣitām
upagīyamānaḥ gandharvaiḥ mṛdaṅga-paṇava-ānakān vādayadbhiḥ mudā vīṇām sūta-māgadha-vandibhiḥ sicyamānaḥ acyutaḥ tābhiḥ hasantībhiḥ sma recakaiḥ pratiṣiñcan vicikrīḍe yakṣībhiḥ yakṣa-rāṭ iva
tāḥ klinna vastra vivṛta ūru kuca pradeśāḥ siñcantyaḥ uddhṛta bṛhat kavara prasūnāḥ kāntam sma recaka jihīrṣayayā upaguhya jāta smara utsmaya lasad vadanāḥ virejuḥ
kṛṣṇaḥ tu tat stana viṣajjita kuṅkuma srak krīḍā abhiṣaṅga dhuta kuntala vṛnda bandhaḥ siñcan muhuḥ yuvatibhiḥ pratiṣicyamānaḥ reme kareṇubhiḥ iva ibha-patiḥ parītaḥ
naṭānām nartakīnām ca gīta vādya upajīvinām krīḍā alaṅkāra vāsāṁsi kṛṣṇaḥ adāt tasya ca striyaḥ
kṛṣṇasya evam viharataḥ gati ālāpa īkṣita smitaiḥ narma kṣveli pariṣvaṅgaiḥ strīṇām kila hṛtāḥ dhiyaḥ
ūcuḥ mukunda eka dhiyaḥ giraḥ unmatta vat jaḍam cintayantyaḥ aravinda-akṣam tāni me gadataḥ śṛṇu
mahiṣyaḥ ūcuḥ kurari vilapasi tvam vīta nidrā na śeṣe svapiti jagati rātryām īśvaraḥ gupta bodhaḥ vayam iva sakhi kaccit gāḍha nirviddha cetāḥ nalina nayana hāsa udāra līlā īkṣitena
netre nimīlayasi naktam adṛṣṭa bandhuḥ tvam roravīṣi karuṇam bata cakravāki dāsyam gatā vayam iva acyuta pāda juṣṭām kim vā srajam spṛhayase kavareṇa voḍhum
bhoḥ bhoḥ sadā niṣṭanase udanvan alabdha nidraḥ adhigata prajāgaraḥ kim vā mukunda apahṛta ātma lāñchanaḥ prāptām daśām tvam ca gataḥ duratyayām
tvam yakṣmaṇā bala-vatā asi gṛhītaḥ indo kṣīṇaḥ tamaḥ na nija dīdhitibhiḥ kṣiṇoṣi kaccit mukunda-gaditāni yathā vayam tvam vismṛtya bhoḥ sthagita gīḥ upalakṣyase naḥ
kim nu ācaritam asmābhiḥ malaya anila te apriyam govinda apāṅga nirbhinne hṛdi īrayasi naḥ smaram
megha śrī-man tvam asi dayitaḥ yādava-indrasya nūnam śrīvatsa-aṅkam vayam iva bhavān dhyāyati prema baddhaḥ ati utkaṇṭhaḥ śavala hṛdayaḥ asmat vidhaḥ bāṣpa dhārāḥ smṛtvā smṛtvā visṛjasi muhuḥ duḥkha daḥ tat prasaṅgaḥ
priya rāva padāni bhāṣase mṛta sañjīvikayā anayā girā karavāṇi kim adya te priyam vada me valgita kaṇṭha kokila
na calasi na vadasi udāra buddhe kṣiti-dhara cintayase mahāntam artham api bata vasudeva-nandana aṅghrim vayam iva kāmayase stanaiḥ vidhartum
śuṣyat hradāḥ karaśitāḥ bata sindhu patnyaḥ samprati apāsta kamala śrīyaḥ iṣṭa bhartuḥ yadvat vayam madhu-pateḥ praṇaya avalokam aprāpya muṣṭa hṛdayāḥ puru karśitāḥ sma
haṁsa su-āgatam āsyatām piba payaḥ brūhi aṅga śaureḥ kathām dūtam tvām nu vidāma kaccit ajitaḥ svasti āste uktam purā kim vā naḥ cala sauhṛdaḥ smarati tam kasmāt bhajāmaḥ vayam kṣaudra ālāpaya kāma dam śriyam ṛte sā eva eka-niṣṭhā striyām
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti īdṛśena bhāvena kṛṣṇe yoga-īśvara īśvare kriyamāṇena mādhavyaḥ lebhire paramām gatim
śruta mātraḥ api yaḥ strīṇām prasahya ākarṣate manaḥ uru gāya uru gītaḥ vā paśyantīnām ca kim punaḥ
yāḥ samparyacaran premṇā pāda saṁvāhana ādibhiḥ jagat gurum bhartṛ buddhyā tāsām kim varṇyate tapaḥ
evam veda uditam dharmam anutiṣṭhan satām gatiḥ gṛham dharma artha kāmānām muhuḥ ca ādarśayat padam
āsthitasya param dharmam kṛṣṇasya gṛha-medhinām āsan ṣoḍaśa sāhasram mahiṣyaḥ ca śata adhikam
tāsām strī ratna bhūtānām aṣṭau yāḥ prāk udāhṛtāḥ rukmiṇī-pramukhāḥ rājan tat putrāḥ ca anupūrvaśaḥ
eka-ekasyām daśa daśa kṛṣṇaḥ ajījanat ātma-jān yāvatyaḥ ātmanaḥ bhāryāḥ amogha gatiḥ īśvaraḥ
teṣām uddāma vīryāṇām aṣṭā-daśa mahā-rathāḥ āsan udāra yaśasaḥ teṣām nāmāni me śṛṇu
pradyumnaḥ ca aniruddhaḥ ca dīptimān bhānuḥ eva ca sāmbaḥ madhuḥ bṛhat-bhānuḥ citra-bhānuḥ vṛkaḥ aruṇaḥ puṣkaraḥ veda-bāhuḥ ca śrutadevaḥ sunandanaḥ citra-bāhuḥ virūpaḥ ca kaviḥ nyagrodhaḥ eva ca
eteṣām api rāja-indra tanu-jānām madhu-dviṣaḥ pradyumnaḥ āsīt prathamaḥ pitṛvat rukmiṇī-sutaḥ
saḥ rukmiṇaḥ duhitaram upayeme mahā-rathaḥ tasyām tataḥ aniruddhaḥ abhūt nāga ayuta bala anvitaḥ
saḥ ca api rukmiṇaḥ pautrīm dauhitraḥ jagṛhe tataḥ vajraḥ tasya abhavat yaḥ tu mauṣalāt avaśeṣitaḥ
prati-bāhuḥ abhūt tasmāt subāhuḥ tasya ca ātma-jaḥ su-bāhoḥ śānta-senaḥ abhūt śata-senaḥ tu tat sutaḥ
na hi etasmin kule jātāḥ adhanaḥ a-bahu prajāḥ alpa-āyuṣaḥ alpa vīryāḥ ca abrahmaṇyāḥ ca jajñire
yadu-vaṁśa prasūtānām puṁsām vikhyāta karmaṇām saṅkhyā na śakyate kartum api varṣa ayutaiḥ nṛpa
tisraḥ koṭyaḥ sahasrāṇām aṣṭā-aśīti śatāni ca āsan yadu-kula ācāryāḥ kumārāṇām iti śrutam
saṅkhyānam yādavānām kaḥ kariṣyati mahā-ātmanām yatra ayutānām ayuta lakṣeṇa āste saḥ āhukaḥ
deva-asura āhava hatāḥ daiteyāḥ ye su dāruṇāḥ te ca utpannāḥ manuṣyeṣu prajāḥ dṛptāḥ babādhire
tat nigrahāya hariṇā proktāḥ devāḥ yadoḥ kule avatīrṇāḥ kula śatam teṣām eka-adhikam nṛpa
teṣām pramāṇam bhagavān prabhutvena abhavat hariḥ ye ca anuvartinaḥ tasya vavṛdhuḥ sarva yādavāḥ
śayyā āsana aṭana ālāpa krīḍa snāna ādi karmasu na viduḥ santam ātmānam vṛṣṇayaḥ kṛṣṇa cetasaḥ
tīrtham cakre nṛpa ūnam yat ajani yaduṣu svaḥ sarit pāda śaucam vidviṭ snigdhāḥ svarūpam yayuḥ ajita parā śrīḥ yat arthe anya yatnaḥ yat nāma amaṅgala ghnam śrutam atha gaditam yat kṛtaḥ gotra dharmaḥ kṛṣṇasya etat na citram kṣiti bhara haraṇam kāla cakra āyudhasya
jayati jana-nivāsaḥ devakī-janma-vādaḥ yadu-vara-pariṣat svaiḥ dorbhiḥ asyan adharmam sthira-cara-vṛjina-ghnaḥ su-smita śrī-mukhena vraja-pura-vanitānām vardhayan kāma-devam
ittham parasya nija vartma rirakṣayā ātta līlā tanoḥ tat anurūpa viḍambanāni karmāṇi karma kaṣaṇāni yadu-uttamasya śrūyāt amuṣya padayoḥ anuvṛttim icchan
martyaḥ tayā anusavam edhitayā mukunda śrīmat kathā śravaṇa kīrtana cintayā eti tat dhāma dustara kṛta-anta java apavargam grāmāt vanam kṣiti-bhujaḥ api yayuḥ yat arthāḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca kṛtvā daitya vadham kṛṣṇaḥ sa-rāmaḥ yadubhiḥ vṛtaḥ bhuvaḥ avatārayat bhāram javiṣṭham janayan kalim
ye kopitāḥ su-bahu pāṇḍu-sutāḥ sapatnaiḥ duḥ-dyūta helana kaca-grahaṇa ādibhiḥ tān kṛtvā nimittam itara-itarataḥ sametān hatvā nṛpān niraharat kṣiti bhāram īśaḥ
bhū-bhāra rāja pṛtanāḥ yadubhiḥ nirasya guptaiḥ sva-bāhubhiḥ acintayat aprameyaḥ manye avaneḥ nanu gataḥ api agatam hi bhāram yat yādavam kulam aho aviṣahyam āste
na eva anyataḥ paribhavaḥ asya bhavet kathañcit mat-saṁśrayasya vibhava unnahanasya nityam antaḥ kalim yadu-kulasya vidhāya veṇu-stambasya vahnim iva śāntim upaimi dhāma
evam vyavasitaḥ rājan satya-saṅkalpaḥ īśvaraḥ śāpa-vyājena viprāṇām sañjahre sva-kulam vibhuḥ
sva-mūrtyā loka lāvaṇya nirmuktyā locanam nṛṇām gīrbhiḥ tāḥ smaratām cittam padaiḥ tān īkṣatām kriyāḥ ācchidya kīrtim su-ślokām vitatya hi añjasā nu kau tamaḥ anayā tariṣyanti iti agāt svam padam īśvaraḥ
śrī-rājā uvāca brahmaṇyānām vadānyānām nityam vṛddha-upasevinām vipra-śāpaḥ katham abhūt vṛṣṇīnām kṛṣṇa-cetasām
yat-nimittaḥ saḥ vai śāpaḥ yādṛśaḥ dvija-sat-tama katham eka-ātmanām bhedaḥ etat sarvam vadasva me
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca bibhrat vapuḥ sakala sundara sanniveśam karma ācaran bhuvi su-maṅgalam āpta-kāmaḥ āsthāya dhāma ramamāṇaḥ udāra-kīrtiḥ saṁhartum aicchata kulam sthita kṛtya śeṣaḥ
karmāṇi puṇya nivahāni su-maṅgalāni gāyat jagat kali mala apaharāṇi kṛtvā kāla-ātmanā nivasatā yadu-deva gehe piṇḍārakam samagaman munayaḥ nisṛṣṭāḥ viśvāmitraḥ asitaḥ kaṇvaḥ durvāsāḥ bhṛguḥ aṅgirāḥ kaśyapaḥ vāmadevaḥ atriḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ nārada-ādayaḥ
krīḍantaḥ tān upavrajya kumārāḥ yadu-nandanāḥ upasaṅgṛhya papracchuḥ avinītāḥ vinīta-vat te veṣayitvā strī-veṣaiḥ sāmbam jāmbavatī-sutam eṣā pṛcchati vaḥ viprāḥ antarvatnī asita-īkṣanā praṣṭum vilajjatī sākṣāt prabrūta amogha-darśanāḥ prasoṣyantī putra-kāmā kim svit sañjanayiṣyati
evam pralabdhāḥ munayaḥ tān ūcuḥ kupitāḥ nṛpa janayiṣyati vaḥ mandāḥ muṣalam kula-nāśanam
tat śrutvā te ati-santrastāḥ vimucya sahasā udaram sāmbasya dadṛśuḥ tasmin muṣalam khalu ayaḥ-mayam
kim kṛtam manda-bhāgyaiḥ naḥ kim vadiṣyanti naḥ janāḥ iti vihvalitāḥ gehān ādāya muṣalam yayuḥ
tat ca upanīya sadasi parimlāna mukha śriyaḥ rājñe āvedayām cakruḥ sarva-yādava sannidhau
śrutvā amogham vipra-śāpam dṛṣṭvā ca muṣalam nṛpa vismitāḥ bhaya santrastāḥ babhūvuḥ dvārakā-okasaḥ
tat cūrṇayitvā muṣalam yadu-rājaḥ saḥ āhukaḥ samudra salile prāsyat loham ca asya avaśeṣitam
kaścit matsyaḥ agrasīt loham cūrṇāni taralaiḥ tataḥ uhyamānāni velāyām lagnāni āsan kila erakāḥ
matsyaḥ gṛhītaḥ matsya-ghnaiḥ jālena anyaiḥ saha arṇave tasya udara-gatam loham saḥ śalye lubdhakaḥ akarot
bhagavān jñāta sarva-arthaḥ īśvaraḥ api tat-anyathā kartum na aicchat vipra-śāpam kāla-rūpī anvamodata
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca govinda bhuja guptāyām dvāravatyām kuru-udvaha avātsīt nāradaḥ abhīkṣṇam kṛṣṇa-upāsana lālasaḥ
kaḥ nu rājan indriya-vān mukunda-caraṇa-ambujam na bhajet sarvataḥ-mṛtyuḥ upāśyam amara-uttamaiḥ
tam ekadā tu deva-ṛṣim vasudevaḥ gṛha-āgatam arcitam sukham āsīnam abhivādya idam abravīt
śrī-vasudevaḥ uvāca bhagavan bhavataḥ yātrā svastaye sarva-dehinām kṛpaṇānām yathā pitroḥ uttama-śloka vartmanām
bhūtānām deva-caritam duḥkhāya ca sukhāya ca sukhāya eva hi sādhūnām tvādṛśām acyuta ātmanām
bhajanti ye yathā devān devāḥ api tathā eva tān chāyā iva karma sacivāḥ sādhavaḥ dīna-vatsalāḥ
brahman tathā api pṛcchāmaḥ dharmān bhāgavatān tava yān śrutvā śraddhayā martyaḥ mucyate sarvataḥ bhayāt
aham kila purā anantam prajā-arthaḥ bhuvi mukti-dam apūjayam na mokṣāya mohitaḥ deva-māyayā
yathā vicitra-vyasanāt bhavadbhiḥ viśvataḥ-bhayāt mucyema hi añjasā eva addhā tathā naḥ śādhi su-vrata
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca rājan evam kṛta-praśnaḥ vasudevena dhīmatā prītaḥ tam āha deva-ṛṣiḥ hareḥ saṁsmāritaḥ guṇaiḥ
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca samyak etat vyavasitam bhavatā sātvata-ṛṣabha yat pṛcchase bhāgavatān dharmān tvam viśva-bhāvanān
śrutaḥ anupaṭhitaḥ dhyātaḥ ādṛtaḥ vā anumoditaḥ sadyaḥ punāti sat-dharmaḥ deva viśva druhaḥ api hi
tvayā parama kalyāṇaḥ puṇya śravaṇa kīrtanaḥ smāritaḥ bhagavān adya devaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ mama
atra api udāharanti imam itihāsam purātanam ārṣabhāṇām ca saṁvādam videhasya mahā-ātmanaḥ
priyavrataḥ nāma sutaḥ manoḥ svāyambhuvasya yaḥ tasya āgnīdhraḥ tataḥ nābhiḥ ṛṣabhaḥ tat-sutaḥ smṛtaḥ
tam āhuḥ vāsudeva-aṁśam mokṣa-dharma vivakṣayā avatīrṇam suta śatam tasya āsīt brahma pāra-gam
teṣām vai bharataḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ nārāyaṇa-parāyaṇaḥ vikhyātam varṣam etat yat-nāmnā bhāratam adbhutam
saḥ bhukta bhogām tyaktvā imām nirgataḥ tapasā harim upāsīnaḥ tat-padavīm lebhe vai janmabhiḥ tribhiḥ
teṣām nava nava-dvīpa patayaḥ asya samantataḥ karma-tantra praṇetāraḥ ekāśītiḥ dvi-jātayaḥ
nava abhavan mahā-bhāgāḥ munayaḥ hi artha-śaṁsinaḥ śramaṇāḥ vāta-rasanāḥ ātma-vidyā viśāradāḥ kaviḥ haviḥ antarīkṣaḥ prabuddhaḥ pippalāyanaḥ āvirhotraḥ atha drumilaḥ camasaḥ karabhājanaḥ
te ete bhagavat rūpam viśvam sat-asat-ātmakam ātmanaḥ avyatirekeṇa paśyantaḥ vyacaran mahīm
avyāhata iṣṭa-gatayaḥ sura siddha sādhya gandharva yakṣa nara kinnara nāga lokān muktāḥ caranti muni cāraṇa bhūta-nātha vidyādhara dvija gavām bhuvanāni kāmam
te ekadā nimeḥ satram upajagmuḥ yadṛcchayā vitāyamānam ṛṣibhiḥ ajanābhe mahā-ātmanaḥ
tān dṛṣṭvā sūrya saṅkāśān mahā-bhāgavatān nṛpa yajamānaḥ agnayaḥ viprāḥ sarve eva upatasthire
videhaḥ tān abhipretya nārāyaṇa-parāyaṇān prītaḥ sampūjayām cakre āsana-sthān yathā-arhataḥ
tān rocamānān sva-rucā brahma-putra-upamān nava papraccha parama-prītaḥ praśraya avanataḥ nṛpaḥ
śrī-videhaḥ uvāca manye bhagavataḥ sākṣāt pārṣadān vaḥ madhu-dviṣaḥ visṇoḥ bhūtāni lokānām pāvanāya caranti hi
durlabhaḥ mānuṣaḥ dehaḥ dehinām kṣaṇa-bhaṅguraḥ tatra api durlabham manye vaikuṇṭhapriya darśanam
ataḥ ātyantikam kṣemam pṛcchāmaḥ bhavataḥ anaghāḥ saṁsāre asmin kṣaṇa-ardhaḥ api sat-saṅgaḥ śevadhiḥ nṛṇām
dharmān bhāgavatān brūta yadi naḥ śrutaye kṣamam yaiḥ prasannaḥ prapannāya dāsyati ātmānam api ajaḥ
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca evam te niminā pṛṣṭāḥ vasudeva mahat-tamāḥ pratipūjya abruvan prītyā sa-sadasya ṛtvijam nṛpam
śrī-kaviḥ uvāca manye akutaścit-bhayam acyutasya pāda-ambuja upāsanam atra nityam udvigna-buddheḥ asat ātma-bhāvāt viśva-ātmanā yatra nivartate bhīḥ
ye vai bhagavatā proktāḥ upāyāḥ hi ātma-labdhaye añjaḥ puṁsām aviduṣām viddhi bhāgavatān hi tān
yān āsthāya naraḥ rājan na pramādyeta karhicit dhāvan nimīlya vā netre na skhalet na patet iha
kāyena vācā manasā indriyaiḥ vā buddhyā ātmanā vā anusṛta svabhāvāt karoti yat yat sakalam parasmai nārāyaṇāya iti samarpayet tat
bhayam dvitīya abhiniveśataḥ syāt īśāt apetasya viparyayaḥ asmṛtiḥ tat māyayā ataḥ budhaḥ ābhajet tam bhaktyā ekayā īśam guru-devatā-ātmā
avidyamānaḥ api avabhāti hi dvayaḥ dhyātuḥ dhiyā svapna manaḥ-rathau yathā tat karma saṅkalpa-vikalpakam manaḥ budhaḥ nirundhyāt abhayam tataḥ syāt
śṛṇvan su-bhadrāṇi ratha-aṅga-pāṇeḥ janmāni karmāṇi ca yāni loke gītāni nāmāni tat-arthakāni gāyan vilajjaḥ vicaret asaṅgaḥ
evam-vrataḥ sva priya nāma kīrtya jāta anurāgaḥ druta-cittaḥ uccaiḥ hasati atho roditi rauti gāyati unmāda-vat nṛtyati loka-bāhyaḥ
kham vāyum agnim salilam mahīm ca jyotīṁṣi sattvāni diśaḥ druma-ādīn sarit samudrān ca hareḥ śarīram yat kim ca bhūtam praṇamet ananyaḥ
bhaktiḥ para-īśa anubhavaḥ viraktiḥ anyatra ca eṣaḥ trikaḥ eka-kālaḥ prapadyamānasya yathā aśnataḥ syuḥ tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭiḥ kṣut-apāyaḥ anu-ghāsam
iti acyuta aṅghrim bhajataḥ anuvṛttyā bhaktiḥ viraktiḥ bhagavat-prabodhaḥ bhavanti vai bhāgavatasya rājan tataḥ parām śāntim upaiti sākṣāt
śrī-rājā uvāca atha bhāgavatam brūta yat-dharmaḥ yādṛśaḥ nṛṇām yathā ācarati yat brūte yaiḥ liṅgaiḥ bhagavat-priyaḥ
śrī-haviḥ uvāca sarva-bhūteṣu yaḥ paśyet bhagavat-bhāvam ātmanaḥ bhūtāni bhagavati ātmani eṣaḥ bhāgavata-uttamaḥ
īśvare tat-adhīneṣu bāliśeṣu dviṣatsu ca prema maitrī kṛpā upekṣāḥ yaḥ karoti saḥ madhyamaḥ
arcāyām eva haraye pūjām yaḥ śraddhayā īhate na tat bhakteṣu ca anyeṣu saḥ bhaktaḥ prākṛtaḥ smṛtaḥ
gṛhītvā api indriyaiḥ arthān yaḥ na dveṣṭi na hṛṣyati viṣṇoḥ māyām idam paśyan saḥ vai bhāgavata-uttamaḥ
deha indriya prāṇa manaḥ dhiyām yaḥ janma apyaya kṣut bhaya tarṣa kṛcchraiḥ saṁsāra dharmaiḥ avimuhyamānaḥ smṛtyā hareḥ bhāgavata-pradhānaḥ
na kāma karma bījānām yasya cetasi sambhavaḥ vāsudeva-eka-nilayaḥ saḥ vai bhāgavata-uttamaḥ
na yasya janma karmabhyām na varṇa-āśrama jātibhiḥ sajjate asmin aham-bhāvaḥ dehe vai saḥ hareḥ priyaḥ
na yasya svaḥ paraḥ iti vitteṣu ātmani vā bhidā sarva-bhūta samaḥ śāntaḥ saḥ vai bhāgavata-uttamaḥ
tri-bhuvana vibhava-hetave api akuṇṭha-smṛtiḥ ajita-ātma sura-ādibhiḥ vimṛgyāt na calati bhagavat pada-aravindāt lava nimiṣa ardham api yaḥ saḥ vaiṣṇava-agryaḥ
bhagavataḥ uru-vikrama aṅghri śākhā nakha maṇi candrikayā nirasta-tāpe hṛdi katham upasīdatām punaḥ saḥ prabhavati candre iva udite arka tāpaḥ
visṛjati hṛdayam na yasya sākṣāt hariḥ avaśa abhihitaḥ api agha ogha nāśaḥ praṇaya rasanayā dhṛta aṅghri-padmaḥ saḥ bhavati bhāgavata-pradhānaḥ uktaḥ
śrī-rājā uvāca parasya viṣṇoḥ īśasya māyinām api mohinīm māyām veditum icchāmaḥ bhagavantaḥ bruvantu naḥ
na anutṛpye juṣan yuṣmat vacaḥ hari-kathā amṛtam saṁsāra tāpa nistaptaḥ martyaḥ tat-tāpa bheṣajam
śrī-antarīkṣaḥ uvāca ebhiḥ bhūtāni bhūta-ātmā mahā-bhūtaiḥ mahā-bhuja sasarja ucca-avacāni ādyaḥ sva mātrā ātma prasiddhaye
evam sṛṣṭāni bhūtāni praviṣṭaḥ pañca-dhātubhiḥ ekadhā daśadhā ātmānam vibhajan juṣate guṇān
guṇaiḥ guṇān saḥ bhuñjānaḥ ātma pradyotitaiḥ prabhuḥ manyamānaḥ idam sṛṣṭam ātmānam iha sajjate
karmāṇi karmabhiḥ kurvan sa-nimittāni deha-bhṛt tat tat karma-phalam gṛhṇan bhramati iha sukha itaram
ittham karma-gatīḥ gacchan bahu-abhadra vahāḥ pumān ābhūta-samplavāt sarga-pralayau aśnute avaśaḥ
dhātu upaplave āsanne vyaktam dravya guṇa ātmakam anādi nidhanaḥ kālaḥ hi avyaktāya apakarṣati
śata-varṣā hi anāvṛṣṭiḥ bhaviṣyati ulbaṇā bhuvi tat-kāla upacita uṣṇa arkaḥ lokān trīn pratapiṣyati
pātāla-talam ārabhya saṅkarṣaṇa-mukha analaḥ dahan ūrdhva-śikhaḥ viṣvak vardhate vāyunā īritaḥ
saṁvartakaḥ megha-gaṇaḥ varṣati sma śatam samāḥ dhārābhiḥ hasti-hastābhiḥ līyate salile virāṭ
tataḥ virājam utsṛjya vairājaḥ puruṣaḥ nṛpa avyaktam viśate sūkṣmam nirindhanaḥ iva analaḥ
vāyunā hṛta gandhā bhūḥ salilatvāya kalpate salilam tat hṛta-rasam jyotiṣṭvāya upakalpate
hṛta-rūpam tu tamasā vāyau jyotiḥ pralīyate hṛta-sparśaḥ avakāśena vāyuḥ nabhasi līyate kāla-ātmanā hṛta-guṇam nabhaḥ ātmani līyate
indriyāṇi manaḥ buddhiḥ saha vaikārikaiḥ nṛpa praviśanti hi ahaṅkāram sva-guṇaiḥ aham ātmani
eṣā māyā bhagavataḥ sarga sthiti anta kāriṇī tri-varṇā varṇitā asmābhiḥ kim bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
śrī-rājā uvāca yathā etām aiśvarīm māyām dustarām akṛta-ātmabhiḥ taranti añjaḥ sthūla-dhiyaḥ maha-ṛṣe idam ucyatām
śrī-prabuddhaḥ uvāca karmāṇi ārabhamāṇānām duḥkha-hatyai sukhāya ca paśyet pāka viparyāsam mithunī-cāriṇām nṛṇām
nitya ārti-dena vittena durlabhena ātma-mṛtyunā gṛha apatya āpta paśubhiḥ kā prītiḥ sādhitaiḥ calaiḥ
evam lokam param vidyāt naśvaram karma-nirmitam sa-tulya atiśaya dhvaṁsam yathā maṇḍala-vartinām
tasmāt gurum prapadyeta jijñāsuḥ śreyaḥ uttamam śābde pare ca niṣṇātam brahmaṇi upaśama-āśrayam
tatra bhāgavatān dharmān śikṣet guru-ātma-daivataḥ amāyayā anuvṛttyā yaiḥ tuṣyet ātmā ātma-daḥ hariḥ
sarvataḥ manasaḥ asaṅgam ādau saṅgam ca sādhuṣu dayām maitrīm praśrayam ca bhūteṣu addhā yathā ucitam
śaucam tapaḥ titikṣām ca maunam svādhyāyam ārjavam brahmacaryam ahiṁsām ca samatvam dvandva-saṁjñayoḥ
sarvatra ātma īśvara anvīkṣām kaivalyam aniketatām vivikta-cīra vasanam santoṣam yena kenacit
śraddhām bhāgavate śāstre anindām anyatra ca api hi manaḥ vāk karma daṇḍam ca satyam śama damau api
śravaṇam kīrtanam dhyānam hareḥ adbhuta-karmaṇaḥ janma karma guṇānām ca tat-arthe akhila ceṣṭitam iṣṭam dattam tapaḥ japtam vṛttam yat ca ātmanaḥ priyam dārān sutān gṛhān prāṇān yat parasmai nivedanam
evam kṛṣṇa-ātma-nātheṣu manuṣyeṣu ca sauhṛdam paricaryām ca ubhayatra mahatsu nṛṣu sādhuṣu
paraspara anukathanam pāvanam bhagavat yaśaḥ mithaḥ ratiḥ mithaḥ tuṣṭiḥ nivṛttiḥ mithaḥ ātmanaḥ
smarantaḥ smārayantaḥ ca mithaḥ agha-ogha-haram harim bhaktyā sañjātayā bhaktyā bibhrati utpulakām tanum
kvacit rudanti acyuta cintayā kvacit hasanti nandanti vadanti alaukikāḥ nṛtyanti gāyanti anuśīlayanti ajam bhavanti tūṣṇīm param etya nirvṛtāḥ
iti bhāgavatān dharmān śikṣan bhaktyā tat-utthayā nārāyaṇa-paraḥ māyām añjaḥ tarati dustarām
śrī-rājā uvāca nārāyaṇa-abhidhānasya brahmaṇaḥ parama-ātmanaḥ niṣṭhām arhatha naḥ vaktum yūyam hi brahma-vit-tamāḥ
śrī-pippalāyanaḥ uvāca sthiti udbhava pralaya hetuḥ ahetuḥ asya yat svapna jāgara suṣuptiṣu sat bahiḥ ca deha indriya āsu hṛdayāni caranti yena sañjīvitāni tat avehi param nara-indra
na etat manaḥ viśati vāk uta cakṣuḥ ātmā prāṇa indriyāṇi ca yathā analam arciṣaḥ svāḥ śabdaḥ api bodhaka niṣedhatayā ātma mūlam artha-uktam āha yat-ṛte na niṣedha siddhiḥ
sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti tri-vṛt ekam ādau sūtram mahān aham iti pravadanti jīvam jñāna kriyā artha phala rūpatayā uru-śakti brahma eva bhāti sat asat ca tayoḥ param yat
na ātmā jajāna na mariṣyati na edhate asau na kṣīyate savana-vit vyabhicāriṇām hi sarvatra śaśvat anapāyi upalabdhi-mātram prāṇaḥ yathā indriya-balena vikalpitam sat
aṇḍeṣu peśiṣu taruṣu aviniściteṣu prāṇaḥ hi jīvam upadhāvati tatra tatra sanne yat indriya-gaṇe ahami ca prasupte kūṭa-sthaḥ āśayam ṛte tat anusmṛtiḥ naḥ
yarhi abja-nābha caraṇa eṣaṇayā uru-bhaktyā cetaḥ malāni vidhamet guṇa-karma-jāni tasmin viśuddhe upalabhyate ātma-tattvam sākṣāt yathā amala-dṛśoḥ savitṛ prakāśaḥ
śrī-rājā uvāca karma-yogam vadata naḥ puruṣaḥ yena saṁskṛtaḥ vidhūya iha āśu karmāṇi naiṣkarmyam vindate param
evam praśnam ṛṣīn pūrvam apṛccham pituḥ antike na abruvan brahmaṇaḥ putrāḥ tatra kāraṇam ucyatām
śrī-āvirhotraḥ uvāca karma akarma vikarma iti veda-vādaḥ na laukikaḥ vedasya ca īśvara-ātmatvāt tatra muhyanti sūrayaḥ
parokṣa-vādaḥ vedaḥ ayam bālānām anuśāsanam karma-mokṣāya karmāṇi vidhatte hi agadam yathā
na ācaret yaḥ tu veda-uktam svayam ajñaḥ ajita-indriyaḥ vikarmaṇā hi adharmeṇa mṛtyoḥ mṛtyum upaiti saḥ
veda-uktam eva kurvāṇaḥ nihsaṅgaḥ arpitam īśvare naiṣkarmyam labhate siddhim rocana-arthā phala-śrutiḥ
yaḥ āśu hṛdaya-granthim nirjihīrṣuḥ parātmanaḥ vidhinā upacaret devam tantra-uktena ca keśavam
labdhvā anugrahaḥ ācāryāt tena sandarśita āgamaḥ mahā-puruṣam abhyarcet mūrtyā abhimatayā ātmanaḥ
śuciḥ sammukham āsīnaḥ prāṇa-saṁyamana-ādibhiḥ piṇḍam viśodhya sannyāsa kṛta-rakṣaḥ arcayet harim
arcā-ādau hṛdaye ca api yathā-labdha upacārakaiḥ dravya kṣiti ātma liṅgāni niṣpādya prokṣya ca āsanam pādya-ādīn upakalpya atha sannidhāpya samāhitaḥ hṛt-ādibhiḥ kṛta-nyāsaḥ mūla-mantreṇa ca arcayet
sa-aṅga upāṅgām sa-pārṣadām tām tām mūrtim sva-mantrataḥ pādya arghya ācamanīya ādyaiḥ snāna vāsaḥ vibhūṣaṇaiḥ gandha mālya akṣata sragbhiḥ dhūpa dīpa upahārakaiḥ sa-aṅgam sampūjya vidhivat stavaiḥ stutvā namet harim
ātmānam tat mayam dhyāyan mūrtim sampūjayet hareḥ śeṣām ādhāya śirasā sva-dhāmni udvāsya sat-kṛtam
evam agni arka toya ādau atithau hṛdaye ca yaḥ yajati īśvaram ātmānam acirāt mucyate hi saḥ
śrī-rājā uvāca yāni yāni iha karmāṇi yaiḥ yaiḥ svacchanda janmabhiḥ cakre karoti kartā vā hariḥ tāni bruvantu naḥ
śrī-drumilaḥ uvāca yaḥ vai anantasya guṇān anantān anukramiṣyan saḥ tu bāla-buddhiḥ rajāṁsi bhūmeḥ gaṇayet kathañcit kālena na eva akhila-śakti-dhāmnaḥ
bhūtaiḥ yadā pañcabhiḥ ātma-sṛṣṭaiḥ puram virājam viracayya tasmin sva-aṁśena viṣṭaḥ puruṣa-abhidhānam avāpa nārāyaṇaḥ ādi-devaḥ
yat-kāye eṣaḥ bhuvana-traya sanniveśaḥ yasya indriyaiḥ tanu-bhṛtām ubhaya-indriyāṇi jñānam svataḥ śvasanataḥ balam ojaḥ īhā sattva-ādibhiḥ sthiti laya udbhave ādi-kartā
ādau abhūt śata-dhṛtiḥ rajasā asya sarge viṣṇuḥ sthitau kratu-patiḥ dvija dharma setuḥ rudraḥ apyayāya tamasā puruṣaḥ saḥ ādyaḥ iti udbhava-sthiti-layāḥ satatam prajāsu
dharmasya dakṣa-duhitari ajaniṣṭa mūrtyām nārāyaṇaḥ naraḥ ṛṣi-pravaraḥ praśāntaḥ naiṣkarmya-lakṣaṇam uvāca cacāra karma yaḥ adya api ca āste ṛṣi-varya niṣevita aṅghriḥ
indraḥ viśaṅkya mama dhāma jighṛkṣati iti kāmam nyayuṅkta sa-gaṇam saḥ badarī-upākhyam gatvā apsaraḥ-gaṇa vasanta su-manda-vātaiḥ strī-prekṣaṇa iṣubhiḥ avidhyat atat-mahi-jñaḥ
vijñāya śakra kṛtam akramam ādi-devaḥ prāha prahasya gata-vismayaḥ ejamānān mā bhaiḥ vibho madana māruta deva-vadhvaḥ gṛhṇīta naḥ balim aśūnyam imam kurudhvam
ittham bruvati abhaya-de nara-deva devāḥ sa-vrīḍa namra śirasaḥ sa-ghṛṇam tam ūcuḥ na etat vibho tvayi pare avikṛte vicitram sva-ārāma dhīra nikara ānata pāda-padme
tvām sevatām sura-kṛtāḥ bahavaḥ antarāyāḥ sva-okaḥ vilaṅghya paramam vrajatām padam te na anyasya barhiṣi balīn dadataḥ sva-bhāgān dhatte padam tvam avitā yadi vighna mūrdhni
kṣut tṛṭ tri-kāla-guṇa māruta jaihva śaiṣṇān asmān apāra jala-dhīn atitīrya kecit krodhasya yānti viphalasya vaśam pade goḥ majjanti duścara tapaḥ ca vṛthā utsṛjanti
iti pragṛṇatām teṣām striyaḥ ati-adbhuta darśanāḥ darśayām āsa śuśrūṣām su-arcitāḥ kurvatīḥ vibhuḥ
te deva-anucarāḥ dṛṣṭvā striyaḥ śrīḥ iva rūpiṇīḥ gandhena mumuhuḥ tāsām rūpa audārya hata śriyaḥ
tān āha deva-deva-īśaḥ praṇatān prahasan iva āsām ekatamām vṛṅdhvam sa-varṇām svarga bhūṣaṇām
om iti ādeśam ādāya natvā tam sura vandinaḥ urvaśīm apsaraḥ-śreṣṭhām puraḥ-kṛtya divam yayuḥ
indrāya ānamya sadasi śṛṇvatām tri-diva okasām ūcuḥ nārāyaṇa-balam śakraḥ tatra āsa vismitaḥ
haṁsa-svarūpī avadat acyutaḥ ātma-yogam dattaḥ kumāraḥ ṛṣabhaḥ bhagavān pitā naḥ viṣṇuḥ śivāya jagatām kalayā avatīrṇaḥ tena āhṛtāḥ madhu-bhidā śrutayaḥ haya-āsye
guptaḥ apyaye manuḥ ilā oṣadhayaḥ ca mātsye krauḍe hataḥ diti-jaḥ uddharatā ambhasaḥ kṣmām kaurme dhṛtaḥ adriḥ amṛta-unmathane sva-pṛṣṭhe grāhāt prapannam ibha-rājam amuñcat ārtam
saṁstunvataḥ nipatitān śramaṇān ṛṣīn ca śakram ca vṛtra-vadhataḥ tamasi praviṣṭam deva-striyaḥ asura-gṛhe pihitāḥ anāthāḥ jaghne asura-indram abhayāya satām nṛsiṁhe
deva-asure yudhi ca daitya-patīn sura-arthe hatvā antareṣu bhuvanāni adadhāt kalābhiḥ bhūtvā atha vāmanaḥ imām aharat baleḥ kṣmām yācñā-chalena samadāt aditeḥ sutebhyaḥ
niḥkṣatriyām akṛta gām ca triḥ-sapta-kṛtvaḥ rāmaḥ tu haihaya-kula apyaya bhārgava agniḥ saḥ abdhim babandha daśa-vaktram ahan sa-laṅkam sītā-patiḥ jayati loka mala ghna kīrtiḥ
bhūmeḥ bhara avataraṇāya yaduṣu ajanmā jātaḥ kariṣyati suraiḥ api duṣkarāṇi vādaiḥ vimohayati yajña-kṛtaḥ atat-arhān śūdrān kalau kṣiti-bhujaḥ nyahaniṣyat ante
evam-vidhāni janmāni karmāṇi ca jagat-pateḥ bhūrīṇi bhūri-yaśasaḥ varṇitāni mahā-bhuja
śrī-rājā uvāca bhagavantam harim prāyaḥ na bhajanti ātma-vittamāḥ teṣām aśānta kāmānām kā niṣṭhā avijita ātmanām
śrī-camasaḥ uvāca mukha bāhu ūru pādebhyaḥ puruṣasya āśramaiḥ saha catvāraḥ jajñire varṇāḥ guṇaiḥ vipra-ādayaḥ pṛthak
yaḥ eṣām puruṣaṁ sākṣāt ātma-prabhavam īśvaram na bhajanti avajānanti sthānāt bhraṣṭāḥ patanti adhaḥ
dūre hari-kathāḥ kecit dūre ca acyuta kīrtanāḥ striyaḥ śūdra-ādayaḥ ca eva te anukampyāḥ bhavādṛśām
vipraḥ rājanya-vaiśyau vā hareḥ prāptāḥ pada-antikam śrautena janmanā atha api muhyanti āmnāya-vādinaḥ
karmaṇi akovidāḥ stabdhāḥ mūrkhāḥ paṇḍita-māninaḥ vadanti cāṭukān mūḍhāḥ yayā mādhvyā girā utsukāḥ
rajasā ghora-saṅkalpāḥ kāmukāḥ ahi-manyavaḥ dāmbhikāḥ māninaḥ pāpāḥ vihasanti acyuta-priyān
vadanti te anyonyam upāsita-striyaḥ gṛheṣu maithunya-pareṣu ca āśiṣaḥ yajanti asṛṣṭa anna-vidhāna dakṣiṇam vṛttyai param ghnanti paśūn atat-vidaḥ
śriyā vibhūtyā abhijanena vidyayā tyāgena rūpeṇa balena karmaṇā jāta smayena andha dhiyaḥ saha-īśvarān sataḥ avamanyanti hari-priyān khalāḥ
sarveṣu śaśvat tanu-bhṛtsu avasthitam yathā kham ātmānam abhīṣṭam īśvaram veda-upagītam ca na śṛṇvate abudhāḥ manaḥ-rathānām pravadanti vārtayā
loke vyavāya āmiṣa madya sevāḥ nityāḥ hi jantoḥ na hi tatra codanā vyavasthitiḥ teṣu vivāha yajña surā-grahaiḥ āsu nivṛttiḥ iṣṭā
dhanam ca dharma-eka-phalam yataḥ vai jñānam sa-vijñānam anupraśānti gṛheṣu yuñjanti kalevarasya mṛtyum na paśyanti duranta vīryam
yat ghrāṇa bhakṣaḥ vihitaḥ surāyāḥ tathā paśoḥ ālabhanam na hiṁsā evam vyavāyaḥ prajayā na ratyai imam viśuddham na viduḥ sva-dharmam
ye tu anevam-vidaḥ asantaḥ stabdhāḥ sat-abhimāninaḥ paśūn druhyanti viśrabdhāḥ pretya khādanti te ca tān
dviṣantaḥ para-kāyeṣu sva-ātmānam harim īśvaram mṛtake sa-anubandhe asmin baddha-snehāḥ patanti adhaḥ
ye kaivalyam asamprāptāḥ ye ca atītāḥ ca mūḍhatām trai-vargikāḥ hi akṣaṇikāḥ ātmānam ghātayanti te
ete ātma-hanaḥ aśāntāḥ ajñāne jñāna-māninaḥ sīdanti akṛta kṛtyāḥ vai kāla dhvasta manaḥ-rathāḥ
hitvā ātma-māyā racitāḥ gṛha apatya suhṛt striyaḥ tamaḥ viśanti anicchantaḥ vasudeva-parāk-mukhāḥ
śrī-rājā uvāca kasmin kāle saḥ bhagavān kim varṇaḥ kīdṛśaḥ nṛbhiḥ nāmnā vā kena vidhinā pūjyate tat iha ucyatām
śrī-karabhājanaḥ uvāca kṛtam tretā dvāparam ca kaliḥ iti eṣu keśavaḥ nānā varṇa abhidhā ākāraḥ nānā eva vidhinā ijyate
kṛte śuklaḥ catuḥ-bāhuḥ jaṭilaḥ valkala-ambaraḥ kṛṣṇa-ajina upavīta akṣān bibhrat danda kamaṇḍalū
manuṣyāḥ tu tadā śāntāḥ nirvairāḥ suhṛdaḥ samāḥ yajanti tapasā devam śamena ca damena ca
haṁsaḥ su-parṇaḥ vaikuṇṭhaḥ dharmaḥ yoga-īśvaraḥ amalaḥ īśvaraḥ puruṣaḥ avyaktaḥ parama-ātmā iti gīyate
tretāyām rakta-varṇaḥ asau catuḥ-bāhuḥ tri-mekhalaḥ hiraṇya-keśaḥ trayi-ātmā sruk-sruva-ādi upalakṣaṇaḥ
tam tadā manujāḥ devam sarva-deva-mayam harim yajanti vidyayā trayyā dharmiṣṭhāḥ brahma-vādinaḥ
viṣṇuḥ yajñaḥ pṛśni-garbhaḥ sarva-devaḥ uru-kramaḥ vṛṣākapiḥ jayantaḥ ca uru-gāyaḥ iti īryate
dvāpare bhagavān śyāmaḥ pīta-vāsāḥ nija-āyudhaḥ śrīvatsa-ādibhiḥ aṅkaiḥ ca lakṣaṇaiḥ upalakṣitaḥ
tam tadā puruṣam martyāḥ mahā-rāja upalakṣaṇam yajanti veda-tantrābhyām param jijñāsavaḥ nṛpa
namaḥ te vāsudevāya namaḥ saṅkarṣaṇāya ca pradyumnāya aniruddhāya tubhyam bhagavate namaḥ nārāyaṇāya ṛṣaye puruṣāya mahā-ātmane viśva-īśvarāya viśvāya sarva-bhūta-ātmane namaḥ
iti dvāpare uru-īśa stuvanti jagat-īśvaram nānā tantra vidhānena kalau api tathā śṛṇu
kṛṣṇa-varṇam tviṣā akṛṣṇam sa-aṅga upa-aṅga astra pārṣadam yajñaiḥ saṅkīrtana-prāyaiḥ yajanti hi su-medhasaḥ
dhyeyam sadā paribhava ghnam abhīṣṭa doham tīrtha āspadam śiva-viriñci nutam śaraṇyam bhṛtya ārti-ham praṇata-pāla bhava-abdhi potam vande mahā-puruṣa te caraṇa-aravindam
tyaktvā su-dustyaja sura-īpsita rājya-lakṣmīm dharmiṣṭhaḥ ārya-vacasā yat agāt araṇyam māyā-mṛgam dayitayā īpsitam anvadhāvat vande mahā-puruṣa te caraṇa-aravindam
evam yuga-anurūpābhyām bhagavān yuga-vartibhiḥ manujaiḥ ijyate rājan śreyasām īśvaraḥ hariḥ
kalim sabhājayanti āryāḥ guṇa-jñaḥ sāra-bhāginaḥ yatra saṅkīrtanena eva sarva sva-arthaḥ abhilabhyate
na hi ataḥ paramaḥ lābhaḥ dehinām bhrāmyatām iha yataḥ vindeta paramām śāntim naśyati saṁsṛtiḥ
kṛta-ādiṣu prajāḥ rājan kalau icchanti sambhavam kalau khalu bhaviṣyanti nārāyaṇa-parāyaṇāḥ kvacit kvacit mahā-rāja draviḍeṣu ca bhūriśaḥ tāmraparṇī nadī yatra kṛtamālā payasvinī kāverī ca mahā-puṇyā pratīcī ca mahā-nadī ye pibanti jalam tāsām manujāḥ manuja-īśvara prāyaḥ bhaktāḥ bhagavati vāsudeve amala-āśayāḥ
deva ṛṣi bhūta āpta nṛṇām pitṝṇām na kiṅkaraḥ na ayam ṛṇī ca rājan sarva-ātmanā yaḥ śaraṇam śaraṇyam gataḥ mukundam parihṛtya kartam
sva-pāda-mūlam bhajataḥ priyasya tyakta anya bhāvasya hariḥ para-īśaḥ vikarma yat ca utpatitam kathañcit dhunoti sarvam hṛdi sanniviṣṭaḥ
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca dharmān bhāgavatān ittham śrutvā atha mithilā-īśvaraḥ jāyanteyān munīn prītaḥ sa-upādhyāyaḥ hi apūjayat
tataḥ antardadhire siddhāḥ sarva-lokasya paśyataḥ rājā dharmān upātiṣṭhan avāpa paramām gatim
tvam api etān mahā-bhāga dharmān bhāgavatān śrutān āsthitaḥ śraddhayā yuktaḥ niḥsaṅgaḥ yāsyase param
yuvayoḥ khalu dam-patyoḥ yaśasā pūritam jagat putratām agamat yat vām bhagavān īśvaraḥ hariḥ
darśana āliṅgana ālāpaiḥ śayana āsana bhojanaiḥ ātmā vām pāvitaḥ kṛṣṇe putra-sneham prakurvatoḥ
vaireṇa yam nṛ-patayaḥ śiśupāla-pauṇḍra-śālva-ādayaḥ gati vilāsa vilokana ādyaiḥ dhyāyantaḥ ākṛta dhiyaḥ śayana āsana-ādau tat-sāmyam āpuḥ anurakta-dhiyām punaḥ kim
mā apatya-buddhim akṛthāḥ kṛṣṇe sarva-ātmani īśvare māyā manuṣya-bhāvena gūḍha-aiśvarye pare avyaye
bhū-bhāra asura rājanya hantave guptaye satām avatīrṇasya nirvṛtyai yaśaḥ loke vitanyate
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca etat śrutvā mahā-bhāgaḥ vasudevaḥ ati-vismitaḥ devakī ca mahā-bhāgā jahatuḥ moham ātmanaḥ
itihāsam imam puṇyam dhārayet yaḥ samāhitaḥ saḥ vidhūya iha śamalam brahma-bhūyāya kalpate
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca atha brahmā ātma-jaiḥ devaiḥ prajā-īśaiḥ āvṛtaḥ abhyagāt bhavaḥ ca bhūta bhavya-īśaḥ yayau bhūta gaṇaiḥ vṛtaḥ
indraḥ marudbhiḥ bhagavān ādityāḥ vasavaḥ aśvinau ṛbhavaḥ aṅgirasaḥ rudrāḥ viśve sādhyāḥ ca devatāḥ gandharva-apsarasaḥ nāgāḥ siddha-cāraṇa guhyakāḥ ṛṣayaḥ pitaraḥ ca eva sa vidyādhara-kinnarāḥ dvārakām upasañjagmuḥ sarve kṛṣṇa-didṛkṣavaḥ vapuṣā yena bhagavān nara-loka manaḥ-ramaḥ yaśaḥ vitene lokeṣu sarva-loka mala apaham
tasyām vibhrājamānāyām samṛddhāyām mahā-ṛddhibhiḥ vyacakṣata avitṛpta akṣāḥ kṛṣṇam adbhuta-darśanam
svarga-udyāna upagaiḥ mālyaiḥ chādayantaḥ yadu-uttamam gīrbhiḥ citra pada-arthābhiḥ tuṣṭuvuḥ jagat-īśvaram
śrī-devāḥ ūcuḥ natāḥ sma te nātha pada-aravindam buddhi indriya prāṇa manaḥ vacobhiḥ yat cintyate antaḥ hṛdi bhāva-yuktaiḥ mumukṣubhiḥ karma-maya uru-pāśāt
tvam māyayā tri-guṇayā ātmani durvibhāvyam vyaktam sṛjasi avasi lumpasi tat guṇa sthaḥ na etaiḥ bhavān ajita karmabhiḥ ajyate vai yat sve sukhe avyavahite abhirataḥ anavadyaḥ
śuddhiḥ nṛṇām na tu tathā īḍya durāśayānām vidyā śruta adhyayana dāna tapaḥ kriyābhiḥ sattva-ātmanām ṛṣabha te yaśasi pravṛddha sat śraddhayā śravaṇa-sambhṛtayā yathā syāt
syāt naḥ tava aṅghriḥ aśubha-āśaya dhūma-ketuḥ kṣemāya yaḥ munibhiḥ ārdra-hṛdā uhyamānaḥ yaḥ sātvataiḥ sama-vibhūtaye ātma-vadbhiḥ vyūhe arcitaḥ savanaśaḥ svaḥ-atikramāya
yaḥ cintyate prayata-pāṇibhiḥ adhvara-agnau trayyā nirukta vidhinā īśa haviḥ gṛhītvā adhyātma-yoge uta yogibhiḥ ātma-māyām jijñāsubhiḥ parama-bhāgavataiḥ parīṣṭaḥ
paryuṣṭayā tava vibho vanamālayā iyam saṁspārdhinī bhagavatī prati-patnī-vat śrīḥ yaḥ su-praṇītam amuyā arhaṇam ādadan naḥ bhūyāt sadā aṅghriḥ aśubha-āśaya dhūma-ketuḥ
ketuḥ tri-vikrama yataḥ tri-patat patākaḥ yaḥ te bhaya-abhaya karaḥ asura-deva camvoḥ svargāya sādhuṣu khaleṣu itarāya bhūman pādaḥ punātu bhagavan bhajatām agham naḥ
nasi ota gāvaḥ iva yasya vaśe bhavanti brahma-ādayaḥ tanu-bhṛtaḥ mithuḥ ardyamānāḥ kālasya te prakṛti-pūruṣayoḥ parasya śam naḥ tanotu caraṇaḥ puruṣa-uttamasya
asya asi hetuḥ udaya sthiti saṁyamānām avyakta jīva mahatām api kālam āhuḥ saḥ ayam tri-ṇābhiḥ akhila apacaye pravṛttaḥ kālaḥ gabhīra rayaḥ uttama-pūruṣaḥ tvam
tvattaḥ pumān samadhigamya yayā asya vīryam dhatte mahāntam iva garbham amogha-vīryaḥ saḥ ayam tayā anugataḥ ātmanaḥ āṇḍa-kośam haimam sasarja bahiḥ āvaraṇaiḥ upetam
tat tasthūṣaḥ ca jagataḥ ca bhavān adhīśaḥ yat māyayā uttha guṇa vikriyayā upanītān arthān juṣan api hṛṣīka-pate na liptaḥ ye anye svataḥ parihṛtāt api bibhyati sma
smāya avaloka lava darśita bhāva hāri bhrū-maṇḍala prahita saurata mantra śauṇḍaiḥ patnyaḥ tu ṣoḍaśa-sahasram anaṅga bāṇaiḥ yasya indriyam vimathitum karaṇaiḥ na vibhvyaḥ
vibhvyaḥ tava amṛta kathā uda-vahāḥ tri-lokyāḥ pāda-avane ja saritaḥ śamalāni hantum ānuśravam śrutibhiḥ aṅghri-jam aṅga-saṅgaiḥ tīrtha-dvayam śuci-ṣadaḥ te upaspṛśanti
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca iti abhiṣṭūya vibudhaiḥ sa-īśaḥ śata-dhṛtiḥ harim abhyabhāṣata govindam praṇamya ambaram āśritaḥ
śrī-brahmā uvāca bhūmeḥ bhāra avatārāya purā vijñāpitaḥ prabho tvam asmābhiḥ aśeṣa-ātman tat tathā eva upapāditam
dharmaḥ ca sthāpitaḥ satsu satya-sandheṣu vai tvayā kīrtiḥ ca dikṣu vikṣiptā sarva-loka mala apahā
avatīrya yadoḥ vaṁśe bibhrat rūpam anuttamam karmāṇi uddāma-vṛttāni hitāya jagataḥ akṛthāḥ
yāni te caritāni īśa manuṣyāḥ sādhavaḥ kalau śṛṇvantaḥ kīrtayantaḥ ca tariṣyanti añjasā tamaḥ
yadu-vaṁśe avatīrṇasya bhavataḥ puruṣa-uttama śarat-śatam vyatīyāya pañca-viṁśa adhikam prabho
na adhunā te akhila-ādhāra deva-kārya avaśeṣitam kulam ca vipra-śāpena naṣṭa-prāyam abhūt idam tataḥ sva-dhāma paramam viśasva yadi manyase sa-lokān loka-pālān naḥ pāhi vaikuṇṭha kiṅkarān
śrī-bhagavān uvāca avadhāritam etat me yat āttha vibudha-īśvara kṛtam vaḥ kāryam akhilam bhūmeḥ bhāraḥ avatāritaḥ
tat idam yādava-kulam vīrya śaurya śriyā uddhatam lokam jighṛkṣat ruddham me velayā iva mahā-arṇavaḥ
yadi asaṁhṛtya dṛptānām yadūnām vipulam kulam gantā asmi anena lokaḥ ayam udvelena vinaṅkṣyati
idānīm nāśaḥ ārabdhaḥ kulasya dvija-śāpa-jaḥ yāsyāmi bhavanam brahman etat-ante tava anagha
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti uktaḥ loka-nāthena svayam-bhūḥ praṇipatya tam saha deva-gaṇaiḥ devaḥ sva-dhāma samapadyata
atha tasyām mahā-utpātān dvāravatyām samutthitān vilokya bhagavān āha yadu-vṛddhān samāgatān
śrī-bhagavān uvāca ete vai su-mahā-utpātāḥ vyuttiṣṭhanti iha sarvataḥ śāpaḥ ca naḥ kulasya āsīt brāhmaṇebhyaḥ duratyayaḥ
na vastavyam iha asmābhiḥ jijīviṣubhiḥ āryakāḥ prabhāsam su-mahat puṇyam yāsyāmaḥ adya eva mā ciram
yatra snātvā dakṣa-śāpāt gṛhītaḥ yakṣmaṇā uḍu-rāṭ vimuktaḥ kilbiṣāt sadyaḥ bheje bhūyaḥ kalā udayam
vayam ca tasmin āplutya tarpayitvā pitṝn surān bhojayitvā uṣijaḥ viprān nānā guṇa-vatā andhasā teṣu dānāni pātreṣu śraddhayā uptvā mahānti vai vṛjināni tariṣyāmaḥ dānaiḥ naubhiḥ iva arṇavam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam bhagavatā ādiṣṭāḥ yādavāḥ kuru-nandana gantum kṛta-dhiyaḥ tīrtham syandanān samayūyujan
tat nirīkṣya uddhavaḥ rājan śrutvā bhagavatā uditam dṛṣṭvā ariṣṭāni ghorāṇi nityam kṛṣṇam anuvrataḥ vivikte upasaṅgamya jagatām īśvara īśvaram praṇamya śirasā pādau prāñjaliḥ tam abhāṣata
