śrī-uddhavaḥ uvāca deva-deva īśa yoga-īśa puṇya śravaṇa-kīrtana saṁhṛtya etat kulam nūnam lokam santyakṣyate bhavān vipra-śāpam samarthaḥ api pratyahan na yat īśvaraḥ
na aham tava aṅghri-kamalam kṣaṇa ardham api keśava tyaktum samutsahe nātha sva-dhāma naya mām api
tava vikrīḍitam kṛṣṇa nṛṇām parama-maṅgalam karṇa pīyūṣam āsādya tyajanti anya spṛhām janāḥ
sayyā āsana aṭana sthāna snāna krīḍā āsana ādiṣu katham tvām priyam ātmānam vayam bhaktāḥ tyajema hi
tvayā upabhukta srak gandha vāsaḥ alaṅkāra carcitāḥ ucchiṣṭa bhojinaḥ dāsāḥ tava māyām jayema hi
vāta-vasanāḥ ye ṛṣayaḥ śramaṇāḥ ūrdhva-manthinaḥ brahma-ākhyam dhāma te yānti śāntāḥ sannyāsinaḥ amalāḥ
vayam tu iha mahā-yogin bhramantaḥ karma-vartmasu tvat vārtayā tariṣyāmaḥ tāvakaiḥ dustaram tamaḥ smarantaḥ kīrtayantaḥ te kṛtāni gaditāni ca gati utsmita īkṣaṇa kṣveli yat nṛ-loka viḍambanam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam vijñāpitaḥ rājan bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ ekāntinam priyam bhṛtyam uddhavam samabhāṣata
śrī-bhagavān uvāca yat āttha mām mahā-bhāga tat cikīrṣitam eva me brahmā bhavaḥ loka-pālāḥ svaḥ-vāsam me abhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ
mayā niṣpāditam hi atra deva-kāryam aśeṣataḥ yat artham avatīrṇaḥ aham aṁśena brahmaṇā arthitaḥ
kulam vai śāpa nirdagdham naṅkṣyati anyonya vigrahāt samudraḥ saptame hi enām purīm ca plāvayiṣyati
yarhi eva ayam mayā tyaktaḥ lokaḥ ayam naṣṭa-maṅgalaḥ bhaviṣyati acirāt sādho kalinā api nirākṛtaḥ
na vastavyam tvayā eva iha mayā tyakte mahītale janaḥ abhadra ruciḥ bhadra bhaviṣyati kalau yuge
tvam tu sarvam parityajya sneham sva-jana-bandhuṣu mayi āveśya manaḥ saṁyak sama-dṛk vicarasva gām
yat idam manasā vācā cakṣurbhyām śravaṇa-ādibhiḥ naśvaram gṛhyamāṇam ca viddhi māyā-manaḥ-mayam
puṁsaḥ ayuktasya nānā arthaḥ bhramaḥ saḥ guṇa doṣa bhāk karma akarma vikarma iti guṇa doṣa dhiyaḥ bhidā
tasmāt yukta indriya-grāmaḥ yukta cittaḥ idam jagat ātmani īkṣasva vitatam ātmānam mayi adhīśvare
jñāna vijñāna saṁyuktaḥ ātma-bhūtaḥ śarīriṇām ātma-anubhava tuṣṭa-ātmā na antarāyaiḥ vihanyase
doṣa-buddhyā ubhaya-atītaḥ niṣedhāt na nivartate guṇa-buddhyā ca vihitam na karoti yathā arbhakaḥ
sarva-bhūta su-hṛt śāntaḥ jñāna-vijñāna niścayaḥ paśyan mat-ātmakam viśvam na vipadyeta vai punaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti ādiṣṭaḥ bhagavatā mahā-bhāgavataḥ nṛpa uddhavaḥ praṇipatya āha tattvam jijñāsuḥ acyutam
śrī-uddhavaḥ uvāca yoga-īśa yoga-vinyāsa yoga-ātman yoga-sambhava niḥśreyasāya me proktaḥ tyāgaḥ sannyāsa lakṣaṇaḥ
tyāgaḥ ayam duṣkaraḥ bhūman kāmānām viṣaya ātmabhiḥ sutarām tvayi sarva-ātman abhaktaiḥ iti me matiḥ
saḥ aham mama aham iti mūḍha matiḥ vigāḍhaḥ tvat-māyayā viracita ātmani sa-anubandhe tat tu añjasā nigaditam bhavatā yathā aham saṁsādhayāmi bhagavan anuśādhi bhṛtyam
satyasya te sva-dṛśaḥ ātmanaḥ ātmanaḥ anyam vaktāram īśa vibudheṣu api na anucakṣe sarve vimohita dhiyaḥ tava māyayā ime brahma-ādayaḥ tanu-bhṛtaḥ bahiḥ artha bhāvāḥ
tasmāt bhavantam anavadyam ananta-pāram sarva-jñam īśvaram akuṇṭha vikuṇṭha dhiṣṇyam nirviṇṇa dhīḥ aham u he vṛjina abhitaptaḥ nārāyaṇam nara-sakham śaraṇam prapadye
śrī-bhagavān uvāca prāyeṇa manujāḥ loke loka-tattva vicakṣaṇāḥ samuddharanti hi ātmānam ātmanā eva aśubha-āśayāt
ātmanaḥ guruḥ ātmā eva puruṣasya viśeṣataḥ yat pratyakṣa anumānābhyām śreyaḥ asau anuvindate
puruṣatve ca mām dhīrāḥ sāṅkhya-yoga viśāradāḥ āvistarām prapaśyanti sarva śakti upabṛṁhitam
eka dvi tri catuḥ pādaḥ bahu-pādaḥ tathā apadaḥ bahvyaḥ santi puraḥ sṛṣṭāḥ tāsām me pauruṣī priyā
atra mām mṛgayanti addhā yuktāḥ hetubhiḥ īśvaram gṛhyamāṇaiḥ guṇaiḥ liṅgaiḥ agrāhyam anumānataḥ
atra api udāharanti imam itihāsam purātanam avadhūtasya saṁvādam yadoḥ amita-tejasaḥ
avadhūtam dvijam kañcit carantam akutaḥ-bhayam kavim nirīkṣya taruṇam yaduḥ papraccha dharma-vit
śrī-yaduḥ uvāca kutaḥ buddhiḥ iyam brahman akartuḥ su-viśāradā yām āsādya bhavān lokam vidvān carati bāla-vat
prāyaḥ dharma artha kāmeṣu vivitsāyām ca mānavāḥ hetunā eva samīhante āyuṣaḥ yaśasaḥ śriyaḥ
tvam tu kalpaḥ kaviḥ dakṣaḥ su-bhagaḥ amṛta-bhāṣaṇaḥ na kartā na īhase kiñcit jaḍa unmatta piśāca-vat
janeṣu dahyamāneṣu kāma lobha dava-agninā na tapyase agninā muktaḥ gaṅgā-ambhaḥ sthaḥ iva dvipaḥ
tvam hi naḥ pṛcchatām brahman ātmani ānanda kāraṇam brūhi sparśa-vihīnasya bhavataḥ kevala-ātmanaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca yadunā evam mahā-bhāgaḥ brahmaṇyena su-medhasā pṛṣṭaḥ sabhājitaḥ prāha praśraya avanatam dvijaḥ
śrī-brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca santi me guravaḥ rājan bahavaḥ buddhi upāśritāḥ yataḥ buddhim upādāya muktaḥ aṭāmi iha tān śṛṇu
pṛthivī vāyuḥ ākāśam āpaḥ agniḥ candramāḥ raviḥ kapotaḥ ajagaraḥ sindhuḥ pataṅgaḥ madhu-kṛt gajaḥ madhu-hā hariṇaḥ mīnaḥ piṅgalā kuraraḥ arbhakaḥ kumārī śara-kṛt sarpaḥ ūrṇa-nābhiḥ supeśa-kṛt ete me guravaḥ rājan catuḥ-viṁśatiḥ āśritāḥ śikṣā vṛttibhiḥ eteṣām anvaśikṣam iha ātmanaḥ
yataḥ yat anuśikṣāmi yathā vā nāhuṣa-ātma-ja tat tathā puruṣa-vyāghra nibodha kathayāmi te
bhūtaiḥ ākramyamāṇaḥ api dhīraḥ daiva vaśa anugaiḥ tat vidvān na calet mārgāt anvaśikṣam kṣiteḥ vratam
śaśvat para artha sarva-īhaḥ para-artha ekānta sambhavaḥ sādhuḥ śikṣeta bhū-bhṛttaḥ naga-śiṣyaḥ para-ātmatām
prāṇa-vṛttyā eva santuṣyet muniḥ na eva indriya-priyaiḥ jñānam yathā na naśyeta na avakīryeta vāk manaḥ
viṣayeṣu āviśan yogī nānā-dharmeṣu sarvataḥ guṇa doṣa vyapeta-ātmā na viṣajjeta vāyu-vat
pārthiveṣu iha deheṣu praviṣṭaḥ tat guṇa āśrayaḥ guṇaiḥ na yujyate yogī gandhaiḥ vāyuḥ iva ātma-dṛk
antarhitaḥ ca sthira jaṅgameṣu brahma-ātma-bhāvena samanvayena vyāptyā avyavacchedam asaṅgam ātmanaḥ muniḥ nabhastvam vitatasya bhāvayet
tejaḥ ap anna mayaiḥ bhāvaiḥ megha-ādyaiḥ vāyunā īritaiḥ na spṛśyate nabhaḥ tat-vat kāla-sṛṣṭaiḥ guṇaiḥ pumān
svacchaḥ prakṛtitaḥ snigdhaḥ mādhuryaḥ tīrtha-bhūḥ nṛṇām muniḥ punāti apām mitram īkṣā upasparśa kīrtanaiḥ
tejasvī tapasā dīptaḥ durdharṣa udara-bhājanaḥ sarva bhakṣyaḥ api yukta-ātmā na ādatte malam agni-vat
kvacit channaḥ kvacit spaṣṭaḥ upāsyaḥ śreyaḥ icchatām bhuṅkte sarvatra dātṝṇām dahan prāk uttara aśubham
sva-māyayā sṛṣṭam idam sat-asat lakṣaṇam vibhuḥ praviṣṭaḥ īyate tat-tat svarūpaḥ agniḥ iva edhasi
visarga ādyāḥ śmaśāna antāḥ bhāvāḥ dehasya na ātmanaḥ kalānām iva candrasya kālena avyakta vartmanā
kālena hi ogha vegena bhūtānām prabhava apyayau nityau api na dṛśyete ātmanaḥ agneḥ yathā arciṣām
guṇaiḥ guṇān upādatte yathā-kālam vimuñcati na teṣu yujyate yogī gobhiḥ gāḥ iva go-patiḥ
budhyate sve na bhedena vyakti sthaḥ iva tat-gataḥ lakṣyate sthūla-matibhiḥ ātmā ca avasthitaḥ arkavat
na ati-snehaḥ prasaṅgaḥ vā kartavyaḥ kva api kenacit kurvan vindeta santāpam kapotaḥ iva dīna-dhīḥ
kapotaḥ kaścana araṇye kṛta-nīḍaḥ vanaspatau kapotyā bhāryayā sa-ardham uvāsa katicit samāḥ
kapotau sneha guṇita hṛdayau gṛha-dharmiṇau dṛṣṭim dṛṣṭyā aṅgam aṅgena buddhim buddhyā babandhatuḥ
śayyā āsana aṭana sthāna vārtā krīḍā aśana ādikam mithunī-bhūya viśrabdhau ceratuḥ vana rājiṣu
yam yam vāñchati sā rājan tarpayantī anukampitā tam tam samanayat kāmam kṛcchreṇa api ajita-indriyaḥ
kapotī prathamam garbham gṛhṇantī kāle āgate aṇḍāni suṣuve nīḍe sva-patyuḥ sannidhau satī
teṣu kāle vyajāyanta racita avayavāḥ hareḥ śaktibhiḥ durvibhāvyābhiḥ komala aṅga tanūruhāḥ
prajāḥ pupuṣatuḥ prītau dam-patī putra vatsalau śṛṇvantau kūjitam tāsām nirvṛtau kala-bhāṣitaiḥ
tāsām patatraiḥ su-sparśaiḥ kūjitaiḥ mugdha ceṣṭitaiḥ pratyudgamaiḥ adīnānām pitarau mudam āpatuḥ
sneha anubaddha hṛdayau anyonyam viṣṇu-māyayā vimohitau dīna-dhiyau śiśūn pupuṣatuḥ prajāḥ
ekadā jagmatuḥ tāsām anna artham tau kuṭumbinau paritaḥ kānane tasmin arthinau ceratuḥ ciram
dṛṣṭvā tān lubdhakaḥ kaścit yadṛcchātaḥ vane caraḥ jagṛhe jālam ātatya carataḥ sva-ālaya-antike
kapotaḥ ca kapotī ca prajā poṣe sadā utsukau gatau poṣaṇam ādāya sva nīḍam upajagmatuḥ
kapotī sva-ātma-jān vīkṣya bālakān jāla saṁvṛtān tān abhyadhāvat krośantī krośataḥ bhṛśa duḥkhitā
sā asakṛt sneha guṇitā dīna-cittā aja māyayā svayam ca abadhyata śicā baddhān paśyantī apasmṛtiḥ
kapotaḥ sva-ātma-jān baddhān ātmanaḥ api adhikān priyān bhāryām ca ātma-samām dīnaḥ vilalāpa ati-duḥkhitaḥ
aho me paśyata apāyam alpa-puṇyasya durmateḥ atṛptasya akṛta-arthasya gṛhaḥ trai-vargikaḥ hataḥ
anurūpā anukūlā ca yasya me pati-devatā śūnye gṛhe mām santyajya putraiḥ svaḥ yāti sādhubhiḥ
saḥ aham śūnye gṛhe dīnaḥ mṛta-dāraḥ mṛta-prajaḥ jijīviṣe kim artham vā vidhuraḥ duḥkha jīvitaḥ
tān tathā eva āvṛtān śigbhiḥ mṛtyu grastān viceṣṭataḥ svayam ca kṛpaṇaḥ śikṣu paśyan api abudhaḥ apatat
tam labdhvā lubdhakaḥ krūraḥ kapotam gṛha-medhinam kapotakān kapotīm ca siddha-arthaḥ prayayau gṛham
evam kuṭumbī aśānta ātmā dvandva ārāmaḥ patatri-vat puṣṇan kuṭumbam kṛpaṇaḥ sa-anubandhaḥ avasīdati
yaḥ prāpya mānuṣam lokam mukti dvāram apāvṛtam gṛheṣu khaga-vat saktaḥ tam ārūḍha cyutam viduḥ
śrī-brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca sukham aindriyakam rājan svarge narake eva ca dehinām yat yathā duḥkham tasmāt na iccheta tat budhaḥ
grāsam su-mṛṣṭam virasam mahāntam stokam eva vā yadṛcchayā eva āpatitam graset ājagaraḥ akriyaḥ
śayīta ahāni bhūrīṇi nirāhāraḥ anupakramaḥ yadi na upanayet grāsaḥ mahā-ahiḥ iva diṣṭa bhuk
ojaḥ sahaḥ bala yutam bibhrat deham akarmakam śayānaḥ vīta nidraḥ ca na īheta indriya-vān api
muniḥ prasanna gambhīraḥ durvigāhyaḥ duratyayaḥ ananta-pāraḥ hi akṣobhyaḥ stimita udaḥ iva arṇavaḥ
samṛddha kāmaḥ hīnaḥ vā nārāyaṇa paraḥ muniḥ na utsarpeta na śuṣyeta saridbhiḥ iva sāgaraḥ
dṛṣṭvā striyam deva-māyām tat-bhāvaiḥ ajita indriyaḥ pralobhitaḥ patati andhe tamasi agnau pataṅga-vat
yoṣit hiraṇya ābharaṇa ambara ādi dravyeṣu māyā raciteṣu mūḍhaḥ pralobhita ātmā hi upabhoga buddhyā pataṅga-vat naśyati naṣṭa dṛṣṭiḥ
stokam stokam graset grāsam dehaḥ varteta yāvatā gṛhān ahiṁsan ātiṣṭhet vṛttim mādhu-karīm muniḥ
aṇubhyaḥ ca mahadbhyaḥ ca śāstrebhyaḥ kuśalaḥ naraḥ sarvataḥ sāram ādadyāt puṣpebhyaḥ iva ṣaṭpadaḥ
sāyantanam śvastanam vā na saṅgṛhṇīta bhikṣitam pāṇi pātra udara amatraḥ makṣikā iva na saṅgrahī
sāyantanam śvastanam vā na saṅgṛhṇīta bhikṣukaḥ makṣikā iva saṅgṛhṇan saha tena vinaśyati
padā api yuvatīm bhikṣuḥ na spṛśet dāravīm api spṛśan karī iva badhyeta kariṇyāḥ aṅga-saṅgataḥ
na adhigacchet striyam prājñaḥ karhicit mṛtyum ātmanaḥ bala adhikaiḥ saḥ hanyeta gajaiḥ anyaiḥ gajaḥ yathā
na deyam na upabhogyam ca lubdhaiḥ yat duḥkha sañcitam bhuṅkte tat api tat ca anyaḥ madhu-hā iva artha vit madhu
su-duḥkha upārjitaiḥ vittaiḥ āśāsānām gṛha āśiṣaḥ madhu-hā iva agrataḥ bhuṅkte yatiḥ vai gṛha-medhinām
grāmya gītam na śṛṇuyāt yatiḥ vana caraḥ kvacit śikṣeta hariṇāt baddhāt mṛgayoḥ gīta mohitāt
nṛtya vāditra gītāni juṣan grāmyāni yoṣitām āsām krīḍanakaḥ vaśyaḥ ṛṣya-śṛṅgaḥ mṛgī-sutaḥ
jihvayā ati-pramāthinyā janaḥ rasa-vimohitaḥ mṛtyum ṛcchati asat buddhiḥ mīnaḥ tu baḍiśaiḥ yathā
indriyāṇi jayanti āśu nirāhārāḥ manīṣiṇaḥ varjayitvā tu rasanam tat nirannasya vardhate
tāvat jita-indriyaḥ na syāt vijita-anya-indriyaḥ pumān na jayet rasanam yāvat jitam sarvam jite rase
piṅgalā nāma veśyā āsīt videha-nagare purā tasyāḥ me śikṣitaṁ kiñcit nibodha nṛpa-nandana
sā svairiṇī ekadā kāntam saṅkete upaneṣyatī abhūt kāle bahiḥ dvāre bibhratī rūpam uttamam
mārge āgacchataḥ vīkṣya puruṣān puruṣa-ṛṣabha tān śulka-dān vitta-vataḥ kāntān mene artha-kāmukī
āgateṣu apayāteṣu sā saṅketa-upajīvinī api anyaḥ vitta-vān kaḥ api mām upaiṣyati bhūri-daḥ evam durāśayā dhvasta nidrā dvāri avalambatī nirgacchantī praviśatī niśītham samapadyata
tasyāḥ vitta āśayā śuṣyat vaktrāyāḥ dīna cetasaḥ nirvedaḥ paramaḥ jajñe cintā hetuḥ sukha āvahaḥ
tasyāḥ nirviṇṇa cittāyāḥ gītam śṛṇu yathā mama nirvedaḥ āśā pāśānām puruṣasya yathā hi asiḥ
na hi aṅga ajāta nirvedaḥ deha bandham jihāsati yathā vijñāna rahitaḥ manujaḥ mamatām nṛpa
piṅgalā uvāca aho me moha vitatim paśyata avijita-ātmanaḥ yā kāntāt asataḥ kāmam kāmaye yena bāliśā
santam samīpe ramaṇam rati pradam vitta pradam nityam imam vihāya akāma-dam duḥkha bhaya ādhi śoka moha pradam tuccham aham bhaje ajñā
aho mayā ātmā paritāpitaḥ vṛthā sāṅketya vṛttyā ati-vigarhya vārtayā straiṇāt narāt yā artha-tṛṣaḥ anuśocyāt krītena vittam ratim ātmanā icchatī
yat asthibhiḥ nirmita vaṁśa vaṁśya sthūṇam tvacā roma-nakhaiḥ pinaddham kṣarat nava dvāram agāram etat viṭ mūtra pūrṇam mat upaiti kā anyā
videhānām pure hi asmin aham ekā eva mūḍha dhīḥ yā anyam icchantī asatī asmāt ātma-dāt kāmam acyutāt
su-hṛt preṣṭha-tamaḥ nāthaḥ ātmā ca ayam śarīriṇām tam vikrīya ātmanā eva aham rame anena yathā ramā
kiyat priyam te vyabhajan kāmāḥ ye kāma-dāḥ narāḥ ādi anta vantaḥ bhāryāyāḥ devāḥ vā kāla vidrutāḥ
nūnam me bhagavān prītaḥ viṣṇuḥ kena api karmaṇā nirvedaḥ ayam durāśāyāḥ yat me jātaḥ sukha āvahaḥ
mā evam syuḥ manda-bhāgyāyāḥ kleśāḥ nirveda hetavaḥ yena anubandham nirhṛtya puruṣaḥ śamam ṛcchati
tena upakṛtam ādāya śirasā grāmya saṅgatāḥ tyaktvā durāśāḥ śaraṇam vrajāmi tam adhīśvaram
santuṣṭā śraddadhatī etat yathā-lābhena jīvatī viharāmi amunā eva aham ātmanā ramaṇena vai
saṁsāra kūpe patitam viṣayaiḥ muṣita īkṣaṇam grastam kāla ahinā ātmānam kaḥ anyaḥ trātum adhīśvaraḥ
ātmā eva hi ātmanaḥ goptā nirvidyeta yadā akhilāt apramattaḥ idam paśyet grastam kāla ahinā jagat
śrī-brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca evam vyavasita matiḥ durāśām kānta tarṣa jām chittvā upaśamam āsthāya śayyām upaviveśa sā
āśā hi paramam duḥkham nairāśyam paramam sukham yathā sañchidya kānta āśām sukham suṣvāpa piṅgalā
śrī-brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca parigrahaḥ hi duḥkhāya yat yat priya-tamam nṛṇām anantam sukham āpnoti tat vidvān yaḥ tu akiñcanaḥ
sa-āmiṣam kuraram jaghnuḥ balinaḥ anye nirāmiṣāḥ tadā āmiṣam parityajya saḥ sukham samavindata
na me māna apamānau staḥ na cintā geha putriṇām ātma krīḍaḥ ātma ratiḥ vicarāmi iha bāla-vat
dvau eva cintayā muktau parama-ānande āplutau yaḥ vimugdhaḥ jaḍaḥ bālaḥ yaḥ guṇebhyaḥ param gataḥ
kvacit kumārī tu ātmānam vṛṇānān gṛham āgatān svayam tān arhayām āsa kva api yāteṣu bandhuṣu
teṣām abhyavahāra-artham śālīn rahasi pārthiva avaghnantyāḥ prakoṣṭha sthāḥ cakruḥ śaṅkhāḥ svanam mahat
sā tat jugupsitam matvā mahatī vrīḍitā tataḥ babhañja eka-ekaśaḥ śaṅkhān dvau dvau pāṇyoḥ aśeṣayat
ubhayoḥ api abhūt ghoṣaḥ hi avaghnantyāḥ sva-śaṅkhayoḥ tatra api ekam nirabhidat ekasmāt na abhavat dhvaniḥ
anvaśikṣam imam tasyāḥ upadeśam arim-dama lokān anucaran etān loka tattva vivitsayā
vāse bahūnām kalahaḥ bhavet vārtā dvayoḥ api ekaḥ eva vaset tasmāt kumāryāḥ iva kaṅkaṇaḥ
manaḥ ekatra saṁyuñjyāt jita śvāsaḥ jita āsanaḥ vairāgya abhyāsa-yogena dhriyamāṇam atandritaḥ
yasmin manaḥ labdha padam yat etat śanaiḥ śanaiḥ muñcati karma reṇūn sattvena vṛddhena rajaḥ tamaḥ ca vidhūya nirvāṇam upaiti anindhanam
tadā evam ātmani avaruddha cittaḥ na veda kiñcit bahiḥ antaram vā yathā iṣu kāraḥ nṛ-patim vrajantam iṣau gata-ātmā na dadarśa pārśve
eka cārī aniketaḥ syāt apramattaḥ guhā-āśayaḥ alakṣyamāṇaḥ ācāraiḥ muniḥ ekaḥ alpa bhāṣaṇaḥ
gṛha ārambhaḥ hi duḥkhāya viphalaḥ ca adhruva ātmanaḥ sarpaḥ parakṛtam veśma praviśya sukham edhate
ekaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ devaḥ pūrva sṛṣṭam sva-māyayā saṁhṛtya kāla kalayā kalpa-ante idam īśvaraḥ ekaḥ eva advitīyaḥ abhūt ātma-ādhāraḥ akhila āśrayaḥ
kālena ātma-anubhāvena sāmyam nītāsu śaktiṣu sattva-ādiṣu ādi-puruṣaḥ pradhāna-puruṣa-īśvaraḥ para avarāṇām paramaḥ āste kaivalya saṁjñitaḥ kevala anubhava ānanda sandohaḥ nirupādhikaḥ
kevala ātma anubhāvena sva-māyām tri guṇa ātmikām saṅkṣobhayan sṛjati ādau tayā sūtram arindama
tām āhuḥ tri-guṇa vyaktim sṛjantīm viśvataḥ-mukham yasmin protam idam viśvam yena saṁsarate pumān
yathā ūrna-nābhiḥ hṛdayāt ūrṇām santatya vaktrataḥ tayā vihṛtya bhūyaḥ tām grasati evam mahā-īśvaraḥ
yatra yatra manaḥ dehī dhārayet sakalam dhiyā snehāt dveṣāt bhayāt vā api yāti tat-tat svarūpatām
kīṭaḥ peśaskṛtam dhyāyan kuḍyām tena praveśitaḥ yāti tat sa-ātmatām rājan pūrva-rūpam asantyajan
evam gurubhyaḥ etebhyaḥ eṣā me śikṣitā matiḥ sva-ātma upaśikṣitām buddhim śṛṇu me vadataḥ prabho
dehaḥ guruḥ mama virakti viveka hetuḥ bibhrat sma sattva nidhanam satata ārti udarkam tattvāni anena vimṛśāmi yathā tathā api pārakyam iti avasitaḥ vicarāmi asaṅgaḥ
jāyā ātma-ja artha paśu bhṛtya gṛha āpta vargān puṣṇāti yat priya-cikīrṣayā vitanvan sva-ante sa-kṛcchram avaruddha dhanaḥ saḥ dehaḥ sṛṣṭvā asya bījam avasīdati vṛkṣa dharmaḥ
jihvā ekataḥ amum apakarṣati karhi tarṣā śiśnaḥ anyataḥ tvak udaram śravaṇam kutaścit ghrāṇaḥ anyataḥ capala-dṛk kva ca karma-śaktiḥ bahvyaḥ sa-patnyaḥ iva geha-patim lunanti
sṛṣṭvā purāṇi vividhāni ajayā ātma-śaktyā vṛkṣān sarīsṛpa paśūn khaga danda-śūkān taiḥ taiḥ atuṣṭa hṛdayaḥ puruṣam vidhāya brahma avaloka dhiṣaṇam mudam āpā devaḥ
labdhvā su-durlabham idam bahu sambhava ante mānuṣyam artha-dam anityam api iha dhīraḥ tūrṇam yateta na patet anu-mṛtyu yāvat niḥśreyasāya viṣayaḥ khalu sarvataḥ syāt
evam sañjāta vairāgyaḥ vijñāna ālokaḥ ātmani vicarāmi mahīm etām mukta saṅgaḥ anahaṅkṛtaḥ
na hi ekasmāt guroḥ jñānam su-sthiram syāt su-puṣkalam brahma etat advitīyam vai gīyate bahudhā ṛṣibhiḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca iti uktvā saḥ yadum vipraḥ tam āmantrya gabhīra dhīḥ vanditaḥ su-arcitaḥ rājñā yayau prītaḥ yathā āgatam
avadhūta vacaḥ śrutvā pūrveṣām naḥ saḥ pūrvajaḥ sarva saṅga vinirmuktaḥ sama-cittaḥ babhūva ha
śrī-bhagavān uvāca mayā uditeṣu avahitaḥ sva-dharmeṣu mat-āśrayaḥ varṇa-āśrama kula ācāram akāma ātmā samācaret
anvīkṣeta viśuddha ātmā dehinām viṣaya-ātmanām guṇeṣu tattva dhyānena sarva ārambha viparyayam
suptasya viṣaya ālokaḥ dhyāyataḥ vā manaḥ-rathaḥ nānā ātmakatvāt viphalaḥ tathā bheda-ātma dhīḥ guṇaiḥ
nivṛttam karma seveta pravṛttam mat-paraḥ tyajet jijñāsāyām sampravṛttaḥ na ādriyet karma codanām
yamān abhīkṣṇam seveta niyamān mat-paraḥ kvacit mat-abhijñam gurum śāntam upāsīta mat-ātmakam
amānī amatsaraḥ dakṣaḥ nirmamaḥ dṛḍha-sauhṛdaḥ asatvaraḥ artha-jijñāsuḥ anasūyuḥ amogha-vāk
jāyā apatya gṛha kṣetra svajana draviṇa ādiṣu udāsīnaḥ samam paśyan sarveṣu artham iva ātmanaḥ
vilakṣaṇaḥ sthūla sūkṣmāt dehāt ātmā īkṣitā sva-dṛk yathā agniḥ dāruṇaḥ dāhyāt dāhakaḥ anyaḥ prakāśakaḥ
nirodha utpatti aṇu bṛhat nānātvam tat-kṛtān guṇān antaḥ praviṣṭaḥ ādhatte evam deha guṇān paraḥ
yaḥ asau guṇaiḥ viracitaḥ dehaḥ ayam puruṣasya hi saṁsāraḥ tat-nibandhaḥ ayam puṁsaḥ vidyā chit ātmanaḥ
tasmāt jijñāsayā ātmānam ātma stham kevalam param saṅgamya niraset etat vastu buddhim yathā-kramam
ācāryaḥ araṇiḥ ādyaḥ syāt ante-vāsī uttara araṇiḥ tat-sandhānam pravacanam vidyā sandhiḥ sukha āvahaḥ
vaiśāradī sā ati-viśuddha buddhiḥ dhunoti māyām guṇa samprasūtām guṇān ca sandahya yat ātmam etat svayam ca śāṁyati asamit yathā agniḥ
atha eṣām karma kartṝṇām bhoktṝṇām sukha-duḥkhayoḥ nānātvam atha nityatvam loka kāla āgama ātmanām manyase sarva bhāvānām saṁsthā hi autpattikī yathā tat-tat ākṛti bhedena jāyate bhidyate ca dhīḥ evam api aṅga sarveṣām dehinām deha-yogataḥ kāla avayavataḥ santi bhāvāḥ janma ādayaḥ asakṛt
tatra api karmaṇām kartuḥ asvātantryam ca lakṣyate bhoktuḥ ca duḥkha-sukhayoḥ kaḥ nu arthaḥ vivaśam bhajet
na dehinām sukham kiñcit vidyate viduṣām api tathā ca duḥkham mūḍhānām vṛthā ahaṅkaraṇam param
yadi prāptim vighātam ca jānanti sukha duḥkhayoḥ te api addhā na viduḥ yogam mṛtyuḥ na prabhavet yathā
kaḥ nu arthaḥ sukhayati enam kāmaḥ vā mṛtyuḥ antike āghātam nīyamānasya vadhyasya iva na tuṣṭi-daḥ
śrutam ca dṛṣṭa-vat duṣṭam spardhā asūyā atyaya vyayaiḥ bahu antarāya kāmatvāt kṛṣi-vat ca api niṣphalam
antarāyaiḥ avihitaḥ yadi dharmaḥ sv-anuṣṭhitaḥ tena api nirjitam sthānam yathā gacchati tat śṛṇu
iṣṭvā iha devatāḥ yajñaiḥ svaḥ-lokam yāti yājñikaḥ bhuñjīta deva-vat tatra bhogān divyān nija arjitān
sva puṇya upacite śubhre vimāne upagīyate gandharvaiḥ viharan madhye devīnām hṛdya veṣa dhṛk
strībhiḥ kāma-ga yānena kiṅkiṇī-jāla-mālinā krīḍan na veda ātma pātam sura ākrīḍeṣu nirvṛtaḥ
tāvat saḥ modate svarge yāvat puṇyam samāpyate kṣīṇa puṇyaḥ patati arvāk anicchan kāla cālitaḥ
yadi adharma rataḥ saṅgāt asatām vā ajita indriyaḥ kāma ātmā kṛpaṇaḥ lubdhaḥ straiṇaḥ bhūta vihiṁsakaḥ paśūn avidhinā ālabhya preta-bhūta gaṇān yajan narakān avaśaḥ jantuḥ gatvā yāti ulbaṇam tamaḥ karmāṇi duḥkha udarkāṇi kurvan dehena taiḥ punaḥ deham ābhajate tatra kim sukham martya dharmiṇaḥ
lokānām loka-pālānām mat bhayam kalpa-jīvinām brahmaṇaḥ api bhayam mattaḥ dvi-parārdha para āyuṣaḥ
guṇāḥ sṛjanti karmāṇi guṇaḥ anusṛjate guṇān jīvaḥ tu guṇa saṁyuktaḥ bhuṅkte karma phalāni asau
yāvat syāt guṇa vaiṣamyam tāvat nānātvam ātmanaḥ nānātvam ātmanaḥ yāvat pāratantryam tadā eva hi
yāvat asya asvatantratvam tāvat īśvarataḥ bhayam ye etat samupāsīran te muhyanti śucā arpitāḥ
kālaḥ ātmā āgamaḥ lokaḥ svabhāvaḥ dharmaḥ eva ca iti mām bahudhā prāhuḥ guṇa vyatikare sati
śrī-uddhavaḥ uvāca guṇeṣu vartamānaḥ api deha jeṣu anapāvṛtaḥ guṇaiḥ na badhyate dehī badhyate vā katham vibho
katham varteta viharet kaiḥ vā jñāyeta lakṣaṇaiḥ kim bhuñjīta uta visṛjet śayīta āsīta yāti vā etat acyuta me brūhi praśnam praśna-vidām vara nitya-baddhaḥ nitya-muktaḥ ekaḥ eva iti me bhramaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca baddhaḥ muktaḥ iti vyākhyā guṇataḥ me na vastutaḥ guṇasya māyā mūlatvāt na me mokṣaḥ na bandhanam
śoka mohau sukham duḥkham deha-āpattiḥ ca māyayā svapnaḥ yathā ātmanaḥ khyātiḥ saṁsṛtiḥ na tu vāstavī
vidyā avidye mama tanū viddhi uddhava śarīriṇām mokṣa bandha karī ādye māyayā me vinirmite
ekasya eva mama aṁśasya jīvasya eva mahā-mate bandhaḥ asya avidyayā anādiḥ vidyayā ca tathā itaraḥ
atha baddhasya muktasya vailakṣaṇyam vadāmi te viruddha dharmiṇoḥ tāta sthitayoḥ eka-dharmiṇi
suparṇau etau sadṛśau sakhāyau yadṛcchayā etau kṛta nīḍau ca vṛkṣe ekaḥ tayoḥ khādati pippala annam anyaḥ nirannaḥ api balena bhūyān
ātmānam anyam ca saḥ veda vidvān apippala-adaḥ na tu pippala-adaḥ yaḥ avidyayā yuk saḥ tu nitya baddhaḥ vidyā-mayaḥ yaḥ saḥ tu nitya muktaḥ
deha sthaḥ api na deha sthaḥ vidvān svapnāt yathā utthitaḥ adeha sthaḥ api deha sthaḥ ku-matiḥ svapna dṛk yathā
indriyaiḥ indriya artheṣu guṇaiḥ api guṇeṣu ca gṛhyamāṇeṣu aham kuryāt na vidvān yaḥ tu avikriyaḥ
daiva adhīne śarīre asmin guṇa bhāvyena karmaṇā vartamānaḥ abudhaḥ tatra kartā asmi iti nibadhyate
evam viraktaḥ śayane āsana aṭana majjane darśana sparśana ghrāṇa bhojana śravaṇa ādiṣu na tathā badhyate vidvān tatra tatra ādayan guṇān
prakṛti sthaḥ api asaṁsaktaḥ yathā kham savitā anilaḥ vaiśāradyā īkṣayā asaṅga śitayā chinna saṁśayaḥ pratibuddhaḥ iva svapnāt nānātvāt vinivartate
yasya syuḥ vīta saṅkalpāḥ prāṇa indriya manaḥ dhiyām vṛttayaḥ saḥ vinirmuktaḥ deha sthaḥ api hi tat guṇaiḥ
yasya ātmā hiṁsyate hiṁsraiḥ yena kiñcit yadṛcchayā arcyate vā kvacit tatra na vyatikriyate budhaḥ
na stuvīta na nindeta kurvataḥ sādhu asādhu vā vadataḥ guṇa-doṣābhyām varjitaḥ sama-dṛk muniḥ
na kuryāt na vadet kiñcit na dhyāyet sādhu asādhu vā ātma-ārāmaḥ anayā vṛttyā vicaret jaḍa-vat muniḥ
śabda-brahmaṇi niṣṇātaḥ na niṣṇāyāt pare yadi śramaḥ tasya śrama phalaḥ hi adhenum iva rakṣataḥ
gām dugdha dohām asatīm ca bhāryām deham para adhīnam asat prajām ca vittam tu atīrthī-kṛtam aṅga vācam hīnām mayā rakṣati duḥkha-duḥkhī
yasyām na me pāvanam aṅga karma sthiti udbhava prāṇa-nirodham asya līlā-avatāra īpsita janma vā syāt vandhyām giram tām bibhṛyāt na dhīraḥ
evam jijñāsayā apohya nānātva bhramam ātmani upārameta virajam manaḥ mayi arpya sarva-ge
yadi anīśaḥ dhārayitum manaḥ brahmaṇi niścalam mayi sarvāṇi karmāṇi nirapekṣaḥ samācara
śraddhāluḥ mat-kathāḥ śṛṇvan su-bhadrāḥ loka pāvanīḥ gāyan anusmaran karma janma ca abhinayan muhuḥ mat-arthe dharma kāma arthān ācaran mat apāśrayaḥ labhate niścalām bhaktim mayi uddhava sanātane
sat saṅga labdhayā bhaktyā mayi mām saḥ upāsitā saḥ vai me darśitam sadbhiḥ añjasā vindate padam
śrī-uddhavaḥ uvāca sādhuḥ tava uttama-śloka mataḥ kīdṛk-vidhaḥ prabho bhaktiḥ tvayi upayujyeta kīdṛśī sadbhiḥ ādṛtā etat me puruṣa-adhyakṣa loka-adhyakṣa jagat-prabho praṇatāya anuraktāya prapannāya ca kathyatām
tvam brahma paramam vyoma puruṣaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ avatīrṇaḥ asi bhagavan sva icchā upātta pṛthak vapuḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca kṛpāluḥ akṛta-drohaḥ titikṣuḥ sarva-dehinām satya-sāraḥ anavadya-ātmā samaḥ sarva-upakārakaḥ kāmaiḥ ahata dhīḥ dāntaḥ mṛduḥ śuciḥ akiñcanaḥ anīhaḥ mita-bhuk śāntaḥ sthiraḥ mat-śaraṇaḥ muniḥ apramattaḥ gabhīra-ātmā dhṛti-mān jita ṣaṭ-guṇaḥ amānī māna-daḥ kalyaḥ maitraḥ kāruṇikaḥ kaviḥ ājñāya evam guṇān doṣān mayā ādiṣṭān api svakān dharmān santyajya yaḥ sarvān mām bhajeta saḥ tu sat-tamaḥ
jñātvā ajñātvā atha ye vai mām yāvān yaḥ ca asmi yādṛśaḥ bhajanti ananya-bhāvena te me bhakta-tamāḥ matāḥ
mat-liṅga mat-bhakta-jana darśana sparśana arcanam paricaryā stutiḥ prahva guṇa karma anukīrtanam mat-kathā śravaṇe śraddhā mat-anudhyānam uddhava sarva-lābha upaharaṇam dāsyena ātma-nivedanam mat-janma-karma-kathanam mama parva anumodanam gīta tāṇḍava vāditra goṣṭhībhiḥ mat-gṛha utsavaḥ yātrā bali-vidhānam ca sarva vārṣika parvasu vaidikī tāntrikī dīkṣā madīya vrata dhāraṇam mama arcā sthāpane śraddhā svataḥ saṁhatya ca udyamaḥ udyāna upavana ākrīḍa pura mandira karmaṇi sammārjana upalepābhyām seka maṇḍala-vartanaiḥ gṛha śuśrūṣaṇam mahyam dāsa-vat yat amāyayā amānitvam adambhitvam kṛtasya aparikīrtanam api dīpa avalokam me na upayuñjyāt niveditam yat yat iṣṭa-tamam loke yat ca ati-priyam ātmanaḥ tat tat nivedayet mahyam tat ānantyāya kalpate
sūryaḥ agniḥ brāhmaṇāḥ gāvaḥ vaiṣṇavaḥ kham marut jalam bhūḥ ātmā sarva-bhūtāni bhadra pūjā padāni me
sūrye tu vidyayā trayyā haviṣā agnau yajeta mām ātithyena tu vipra agrye goṣu aṅga yavasa-ādinā vaiṣṇave bandhu sat-kṛtyā hṛdi khe dhyāna niṣṭhayā vāyau mukhya dhiyā toye dravyaiḥ toya-puraḥ-saraiḥ sthaṇḍile mantra-hṛdayaiḥ bhogaiḥ ātmānam ātmani kṣetra-jñam sarva-bhūteṣu samatvena yajeta mām
dhiṣṇyeṣu iti eṣu mat-rūpam śaṅkha cakra gadā ambujaiḥ yuktam catuḥ-bhujam śāntam dhyāyan arcet samāhitaḥ
iṣṭā pūrtena mām evam yaḥ yajeta samāhitaḥ labhate mayi sat-bhaktim mat-smṛtiḥ sādhu sevayā
prāyeṇa bhakti-yogena sat-saṅgena vinā uddhava na upāyaḥ vidyate samyak prāyaṇam hi satām aham
atha etat paramam guhyam śṛṇvataḥ yadu-nandana su-gopyam api vakṣyāmi tvam me bhṛtyaḥ su-hṛt sakhā
śrī-bhagavān uvāca na rodhayati mām yogaḥ na sāṅkhyam dharmaḥ eva ca na svādhyāyaḥ tapaḥ tyāgaḥ na iṣṭā-pūrtam na dakṣiṇā vratāni yajñaḥ chandāṁsi tīrthāni niyamāḥ yamāḥ yathā avarundhe sat-saṅgaḥ sarva saṅga apahaḥ hi mām
sat-saṅgena hi daiteyāḥ yātudhānāḥ mṛgāḥ khagāḥ gandharva apsarasaḥ nāgāḥ siddhāḥ cāraṇa guhyakāḥ vidyādharāḥ manuṣyeṣu vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ striyaḥ antya-jāḥ rajaḥ-tamaḥ-prakṛtayaḥ tasmin tasmin yuge yuge bahavaḥ mat padam prāptāḥ tvāṣṭra kāyādhava ādayaḥ vṛṣaparvā baliḥ bāṇaḥ mayaḥ ca atha vibhīṣaṇaḥ sugrīvaḥ hanumān ṛkṣaḥ gajaḥ gṛdhraḥ vaṇikpathaḥ vyādhaḥ kubjā vraje gopyaḥ yajña-patnyaḥ tathā apare
te na adhīta śruti-gaṇāḥ na upāsita mahat-tamaḥ avrata atapta tapasaḥ mat-saṅgāt mām upāgatāḥ
kevalena hi bhāvena gopyaḥ gāvaḥ nagāḥ mṛgāḥ ye anye mūḍha-dhiyaḥ nāgāḥ siddhāḥ mām īyuḥ añjasā
yam na yogena sāṅkhyena dāna vrata tapaḥ adhvaraiḥ vyākhyā svādhyāya sannyāsaiḥ prāpnuyāt yatna-vān api
rāmeṇa sārdham mathurām praṇīte śvāphalkinā mayi anurakta cittāḥ vigāḍha bhāvena na me viyoga tīvra ādhayaḥ anyam dadṛśuḥ sukhāya
tāḥ tāḥ kṣapāḥ preṣṭha-tamena nītāḥ mayā eva vṛndāvana go-careṇa kṣaṇa ardha-vat tāḥ punaḥ aṅga tāsām hīnāḥ mayā kalpa samāḥ babhūvuḥ
tāḥ na avidan mayi anuṣaṅga baddha dhiyaḥ svam ātmānam adaḥ tathā idam yathā samādhau munayaḥ abdhi toye nadyaḥ praviṣṭāḥ iva nāma rūpe
mat kāmāḥ ramaṇam jāram asvarūpa-vidaḥ abalāḥ brahma mām paramam prāpuḥ saṅgāt śata-sahasraśaḥ
tasmāt tvam uddhava utsṛjya codanām praticodanām pravṛttim ca nivṛttim ca śrotavyam śrutam eva ca mām ekam eva śaraṇam ātmānam sarva-dehinām yāhi sarva-ātma-bhāvena mayā syāḥ hi akutaḥ-bhayaḥ
śrī-uddhavaḥ uvāca saṁśayaḥ śṛṇvataḥ vācam tava yoga-īśvara īśvara na nivartate ātma sthaḥ yena bhrāmyati me manaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca saḥ eṣaḥ jīvaḥ vivara prasūtiḥ prāṇena ghoṣeṇa guhām praviṣṭaḥ manaḥ-mayam sūkṣmam upetya rūpam mātrā svaraḥ varṇaḥ iti sthaviṣṭhaḥ
yathā analaḥ khe anila bandhuḥ uṣmā balena dāruṇi adhimathyamānaḥ aṇuḥ prajātaḥ haviṣā samedhate tathā eva me vyaktiḥ iyam hi vāṇī
evam gadiḥ karma gatiḥ visargaḥ ghrāṇaḥ rasaḥ dṛk sparśaḥ śrutiḥ ca saṅkalpa vijñānam atha abhimānaḥ sūtram rajaḥ sattva tamaḥ vikāraḥ
ayam hi jīvaḥ tri-vṛt abja yoniḥ avyaktaḥ ekaḥ vayasā saḥ ādyaḥ viśliṣṭa śaktiḥ bahudhā iva bhāti bījāni yonim pratipadya yat-vat
yasmin idam protam aśeṣam otam paṭaḥ yathā tantu vitāna saṁsthaḥ yaḥ eṣaḥ saṁsāra taruḥ purāṇaḥ karma ātmakaḥ puṣpa phale prasūte
dve asya bīje śata mūlaḥ tri nālaḥ pañca skandhaḥ pañca rasa prasūtiḥ daśa eka śākhaḥ dvi suparṇa nīḍaḥ tri valkalaḥ dvi phalaḥ arkam praviṣṭaḥ adanti ca ekam phalam asya gṛdhrāḥ grāme carāḥ ekam araṇya vāsāḥ haṁsāḥ yaḥ ekam bahu-rūpam ijyaiḥ māyā-mayam veda saḥ veda vedam
evam guru upāsanayā eka bhaktyā vidyā kuṭhāreṇa śitena dhīraḥ vivṛścya jīva āśayam apramattaḥ sampadya ca ātmānam atha tyaja astram
śrī-bhagavān uvāca sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti guṇāḥ buddheḥ na ca ātmanaḥ sattvena anyatamau hanyāt sattvam sattvena ca eva hi
sattvāt dharmaḥ bhavet vṛddhāt puṁsaḥ mat-bhakti lakṣaṇaḥ sāttvika upāsayā sattvam tataḥ dharmaḥ pravartate
dharmaḥ rajaḥ tamaḥ hanyāt sattva vṛddhiḥ anuttamaḥ āśu naśyati tat mūlaḥ hi adharmaḥ ubhaye hate
āgamaḥ apaḥ prajāḥ deśaḥ kālaḥ karma ca janma ca dhyānam mantraḥ atha saṁskāraḥ daśa ete guṇa hetavaḥ
tat tat sāttvikam eva eṣām yat yat vṛddhāḥ pracakṣate nindanti tāmasam tat tat rājasam tat upekṣitam
sāttvikāni eva seveta pumān sattva vivṛddhaye tataḥ dharmaḥ tataḥ jñānam yāvat smṛtiḥ apohanam
veṇu saṅgharṣa-jaḥ vahniḥ dagdhvā śāmyati tat vanam evam guṇa vyatyaya-jaḥ dehaḥ śāmyati tat kriyaḥ
śrī-uddhavaḥ uvāca vidanti martyāḥ prāyeṇa viṣayān padam āpadām tathā api bhuñjate kṛṣṇa tat katham śva khara aja vat
śrī-bhagavān uvāca aham iti anyathā-buddhiḥ pramattasya yathā hṛdi utsarpati rajaḥ ghoram tataḥ vaikārikam manaḥ rajaḥ yuktasya manasaḥ saṅkalpaḥ sa-vikalpakaḥ tataḥ kāmaḥ guṇa dhyānāt duḥsahaḥ syāt hi durmateḥ
karoti kāma vaśa gaḥ karmāṇi avijita indriyaḥ duḥkha udarkāṇi sampaśyan rajaḥ vega vimohitaḥ
rajaḥ-tamobhyām yat api vidvān vikṣipta dhīḥ punaḥ atandritaḥ manaḥ yuñjan doṣa dṛṣṭiḥ na sajjate
apramattaḥ anuyuñjīta manaḥ mayi arpayan śanaiḥ anirviṇṇaḥ yathā-kālam jita śvāsaḥ jita āsanaḥ
etāvān yogaḥ ādiṣṭaḥ mat-śiṣyaiḥ sanaka-ādibhiḥ sarvataḥ manaḥ ākṛṣya mayi addhā āveśyate yathā
śrī-uddhavaḥ uvāca yadā tvam sanaka-ādibhyaḥ yena rūpeṇa keśava yogam ādiṣṭavān etat rūpam icchāmi veditum
śrī-bhagavān uvāca putrāḥ hiraṇya-garbhasya mānasāḥ sanaka-ādayaḥ papracchuḥ pitaram sūkṣmām yogasya ekāntikīm gatim
sanaka-ādayaḥ ūcuḥ guṇeṣu āviśate cetaḥ guṇāḥ cetasi ca prabho katham anyonya santyāgaḥ mumukṣoḥ atititīrṣoḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca evam pṛṣṭaḥ mahā-devaḥ svayam-bhūḥ bhūta bhāvanaḥ dhyāyamānaḥ praśna bījam na abhyapadyata karma-dhīḥ
saḥ mām acintayat devaḥ praśna pāra titīrṣayā tasya aham haṁsa-rūpeṇa sakāśam agamam tadā
dṛṣṭvā mām te upavrajya kṛtvā pāda abhivandanam brahmāṇam agrataḥ kṛtvā papracchuḥ kaḥ bhavān iti
iti aham munibhiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ tattva jijñāsubhiḥ tadā yat avocam aham tebhyaḥ tat uddhava nibodha me
vastunaḥ yadi anānātve ātmanaḥ praśnaḥ īdṛśaḥ katham ghaṭeta vaḥ viprāḥ vaktuḥ vā me kaḥ āśrayaḥ
pañca ātmakeṣu bhūteṣu samāneṣu ca vastutaḥ kaḥ bhavān iti vaḥ praśnaḥ vācā ārambhaḥ hi anarthakaḥ
manasā vacasā dṛṣṭyā gṛhyate anyaiḥ api indriyaiḥ aham eva na mattaḥ anyat iti budhyadhvam añjasā
guṇeṣu āviśate cetaḥ guṇāḥ cetasi ca prajāḥ jīvasya dehaḥ ubhayam guṇāḥ cetaḥ mat-ātmanaḥ
guṇeṣu ca āviśat cittam abhīkṣṇam guṇa-sevayā guṇāḥ ca citta prabhavāḥ mat-rūpaḥ ubhayam tyajet
jāgrat svapnaḥ su-suptam ca guṇataḥ buddhi vṛttayaḥ tāsām vilakṣaṇaḥ jīvaḥ sākṣitvena viniścitaḥ
yarhi saṁsṛti bandhaḥ ayam ātmanaḥ guṇa vṛtti-daḥ mayi turye sthitaḥ jahyāt tyāgaḥ tat guṇa cetasām
ahaṅkāra kṛtam bandham ātmanaḥ artha viparyayam vidvān nirvidya saṁsāra cintām turye sthitaḥ tyajet
yāvat nānā artha dhīḥ puṁsaḥ na nivarteta yuktibhiḥ jāgarti api svapan ajñaḥ svapne jāgaraṇam yathā
asattvāt ātmanaḥ anyeṣām bhāvānām tat kṛtā bhidā gatayaḥ hetavaḥ ca asya mṛṣā svapna dṛśaḥ yathā
yaḥ jāgare bahiḥ anukṣaṇa dharmiṇaḥ arthān bhuṅkte samasta karaṇaiḥ hṛdi tat-sadṛkṣān svapne suṣupte upasaṁharate saḥ ekaḥ smṛti anvayāt tri-guṇa vṛtti dṛk indriya īśaḥ
evam vimṛśya guṇataḥ manasaḥ tri-avasthāḥ mat-māyayā mayi kṛtāḥ iti niścita-arthāḥ sañchidya hārdam anumāna sat-ukti tīkṣṇa jñāna asinā bhajata mā akhila saṁśaya ādhim
īkṣeta vibhramam idam manasaḥ vilāsam dṛṣṭam vinaṣṭam ati-lolam alāta-cakram vijñānam ekam urudhā iva vibhāti māyā svapnaḥ tridhā guṇa visarga kṛtaḥ vikalpaḥ
dṛṣṭim tataḥ pratinivartya nivṛtta tṛṣṇaḥ tūṣṇīm bhavet nija sukha anubhavaḥ nirīhaḥ sandṛśyate kva ca yadi idam avastu buddhyā tyaktam bhramāya na bhavet smṛtiḥ ā-nipātāt
deham ca naśvaram avasthitam utthitam vā siddhaḥ na paśyati yataḥ adhyagamat sva-rūpam daivāt apetam atha daiva vaśāt upetam vāsaḥ yathā parikṛtam madirā mada andhaḥ
dehaḥ api daiva vaśa-gaḥ khalu karma yāvat sva-ārambhakam pratisamīkṣate eva sa-asuḥ tam sa-prapañcam adhirūḍha samādhi yogaḥ svāpnam punaḥ na bhajate pratibuddha vastuḥ
mayā etat uktam vaḥ viprāḥ guhyam yat sāṅkhya yogayoḥ jānīta mā āgatam yajñam yuṣmat dharma vivakṣayā
aham yogasya sāṅkhyasya satyasya ṛtasya tejasaḥ para-ayaṇam dvija-śreṣṭhāḥ śriyaḥ kīrteḥ damasya ca
mām bhajanti guṇāḥ sarve nirguṇam nirapekṣakam su-hṛdam priyam ātmānam sāmya asaṅga ādayaḥ aguṇāḥ
iti me chinna sandehāḥ munayaḥ sanaka-ādayaḥ sabhājayitvā parayā bhaktyā agṛṇata saṁstavaiḥ
taiḥ aham pūjitaḥ saṁyak saṁstutaḥ parama-ṛṣibhiḥ pratyeyāya svakam dhāma paśyataḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ
śrī-uddhavaḥ uvāca vadanti kṛṣṇa śreyāṁsi bahūni brahma-vādinaḥ teṣām vikalpa prādhānyam uta aho eka mukhyatā
bhavatā udāhṛtaḥ svāmin bhakti-yogaḥ anapekṣitaḥ nirasya sarvataḥ saṅgam yena tvayi āviśet manaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca kālena naṣṭā pralaye vāṇī iyam veda-saṁjñitā mayā ādau brahmaṇe proktā dharmaḥ yasyām mat-ātmakaḥ
tena proktā sva-putrāya manave pūrva-jāya sā tataḥ bhṛgu-ādayaḥ agṛhṇan sapta brahma mahā-ṛṣayaḥ
tebhyaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ tat putrāḥ deva dānava guhyakāḥ manuṣyāḥ siddha-gandharvāḥ sa-vidyādhara-cāraṇāḥ kindevāḥ kinnarāḥ nāgāḥ rakṣaḥ kimpuruṣa ādayaḥ bahvyaḥ teṣām prakṛtayaḥ rajaḥ-sattva-tamaḥ-bhuvaḥ yābhiḥ bhūtāni bhidyante bhūtānām patayaḥ tathā yathā-prakṛti sarveṣām citrāḥ vācaḥ sravanti hi
evam prakṛti vaicitryāt bhidyante matayaḥ nṛṇām pāramparyeṇa keṣāñcit pāṣaṇḍa matayaḥ apare
mat-māyā mohita dhiyaḥ puruṣāḥ puruṣa-ṛṣabha śreyaḥ vadanti aneka-antam yathā-karma yathā-ruci
dharmam eke yaśaḥ ca anye kāmam satyam damam śamam anye vadanti sva-artham vai aiśvaryam tyāga bhojanam kecit yajñam tapaḥ dānam vratāni niyamān yamān
ādi-anta-vantaḥ eva eṣām lokāḥ karma vinirmitāḥ duḥkha udarkāḥ tamaḥ niṣṭhāḥ kṣudrāḥ mandāḥ śucā arpitāḥ
mayi arpita ātmanaḥ sabhya nirapekṣasya sarvataḥ mayā ātmanā sukham yat tat kutaḥ syāt viṣaya ātmanām
akiñcanasya dāntasya śāntasya sama-cetasaḥ mayā santuṣṭa manasaḥ sarvāḥ sukha-mayāḥ diśaḥ
na pārameṣṭhyam na mahā-indra-dhiṣṇyam na sārvabhaumam na rasa-ādhipatyam na yoga-siddhīḥ apunaḥ-bhavam vā mayi arpita ātmā icchati mat vinā anyat
na tathā me priya-tamaḥ ātma-yoniḥ na śaṅkaraḥ na ca saṅkarṣaṇaḥ na śrīḥ na eva ātmā ca yathā bhavān
nirapekṣam munim śāntam nirvairam sama-darśanam anuvrajāmi aham nityam pūyeya iti aṅghri reṇubhiḥ
niṣkiñcanāḥ mayi anurakta-cetasaḥ śāntāḥ mahāntaḥ akhila jīva vatsalāḥ kāmaiḥ anālabdha dhiyaḥ juṣanti te yat nairapekṣyam na viduḥ sukham mama
bādhyamānaḥ api mat-bhaktaḥ viṣayaiḥ ajita indriyaḥ prāyaḥ pragalbhayā bhaktyā viṣayaiḥ na abhibhūyate
yathā agniḥ su-samṛddha arciḥ karoti edhāṁsi bhasma-sāt tathā mat-viṣayā bhaktiḥ uddhava enāṁsi kṛtsnaśaḥ
na sādhayati mām yogaḥ na sāṅkhyam dharmaḥ uddhava na svādhyāyaḥ tapaḥ tyāgaḥ yathā bhaktiḥ mama ūrjitā
bhaktyā aham ekayā grāhyaḥ śraddhayā ātmā priyaḥ satām bhaktiḥ punāti mat-niṣṭhā śva-pākān api sambhavāt
dharmaḥ satya dayā upetaḥ vidyā vā tapasā anvitā mat-bhaktyā apetam ātmānam na samyak prapunāti hi
katham vinā roma-harṣam dravatā cetasā vinā vinā ānanda aśru-kalayā śudhyet bhaktyā vinā āśayaḥ
vāk gadgadā dravate yasya cittam rudati abhīkṣṇam hasati kvacit ca vilajjaḥ udgāyati nṛtyate ca mat-bhakti-yuktaḥ bhuvanam punāti
yathā agninā hema malam jahāti dhmātam punaḥ svam bhajate ca rūpam ātmā ca karma anuśayam vidhūya mat-bhakti-yogena bhajati atho mām
yathā yathā ātmā parimṛjyate asau mat-puṇya-gāthā śravaṇa abhidhānaiḥ tathā tathā paśyati vastu sūkṣmam cakṣuḥ yathā eva añjana samprayuktam
viṣayān dhyāyataḥ cittam viṣayeṣu viṣajjate mām anusmarataḥ cittam mayi eva pravilīyate
tasmāt asat abhidhyānam yathā svapna manaḥ-ratham hitvā mayi samādhatsva manaḥ mat-bhāva bhāvitam
strīṇām strī saṅginām saṅgam tyaktvā dūrataḥ ātma-vān kṣeme vivikte āsīnaḥ cintayet mām atandritaḥ
na tathā asya bhavet kleśaḥ bandhaḥ ca anya-prasaṅgataḥ yoṣit saṅgāt yathā puṁsaḥ yathā tat saṅgi saṅgataḥ
śrī-uddhavaḥ uvāca yathā tvām aravinda-akṣa yādṛśam vā yat-ātmakam dhyāyet mumukṣuḥ etat me dhyānam tvam vaktum arhasi
śrī-bhagavān uvāca same āsane āsīnaḥ sama-kāyaḥ yathā-sukham hastau utsaṅge ādhāya sva-nāsa-agra kṛta īkṣaṇaḥ prāṇasya śodhayet mārgam pūra-kumbhaka-recakaiḥ viparyayeṇa api śanaiḥ abhyaset nirjita indriyaḥ
hṛdi avicchinnam oṁkāram ghaṇṭā nādam bisa-ūrṇa-vat prāṇena udīrya tatra atha punaḥ saṁveśayet svaram
evam praṇava saṁyuktam prāṇam eva samabhyaset daśa-kṛtvaḥ tri-savanam māsāt arvāk jita anilaḥ
hṛt puṇḍarīkam antaḥ-stham ūrdhva-nālam adhaḥ-mukham dhyātvā ūrdhva-mukham unnidram aṣṭa-patram sa-karṇikam karṇikāyām nyaset sūrya soma agnīn uttara-uttaram vahni-madhye smaret rūpam mama etat dhyāna-maṅgalam samam praśāntam su-mukham dīrgha-cāru-catuḥ-bhujam su-cāru sundara grīvam su-kapolam śuci-smitam samāna karṇa vinyasta sphurat makara kuṇḍalam hema ambaram ghana-śyāmam śrī-vatsa śrī-niketanam śaṅkha cakra gadā padma vana-mālā vibhūṣitam nūpuraiḥ vilasat pādam kaustubha prabhayā yutam dyumat kirīṭa kaṭaka kaṭi-sūtra aṅgada āyutam sarva-aṅga sundaram hṛdyam prasāda sumukha īkṣaṇam su-kumāram abhidhyāyet sarva-aṅgeṣu manaḥ dadhat indriyāṇi indriya-arthebhyaḥ manasā ākṛṣya tat manaḥ buddhyā sārathinā dhīraḥ praṇayet mayi sarvataḥ
tat sarva vyāpakam cittam ākṛṣya ekatra dhārayet na anyāni cintayet bhūyaḥ su-smitam bhāvayet mukham
tatra labdha-padam cittam ākṛṣya vyomni dhārayet tat ca tyaktvā mat ārohaḥ na kiñcit api cintayet
evam samāhita matiḥ mām eva ātmānam ātmani vicaṣṭe mayi sarva-ātman jyotiḥ jyotiṣi saṁyutam
dhyānena ittham su-tīvreṇa yuñjataḥ yoginaḥ manaḥ saṁyāsyati āśu nirvāṇam dravya-jñāna-kriyā bhramaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca jita-indriyasya yuktasya jita-śvāsasya yoginaḥ mayi dhārayataḥ cetaḥ upatiṣṭhanti siddhayaḥ
śrī-uddhavaḥ uvāca kayā dhāraṇayā kā svit katham vā siddhiḥ acyuta kati vā siddhayaḥ brūhi yoginām siddhi-daḥ bhavān
śrī-bhagavān uvāca siddhayaḥ aṣṭādaśa proktāḥ dhāraṇāḥ yoga pāra-gaiḥ tāsām aṣṭau mat-pradhānāḥ daśa eva guṇa-hetavaḥ
aṇimā mahimā mūrteḥ laghimā prāptiḥ indriyaiḥ prākāmyam śruta dṛṣṭeṣu śakti-preraṇam īśitā guṇeṣu asaṅgaḥ vaśitā yat kāmaḥ tat avasyati etāḥ me siddhayaḥ saumya aṣṭau autpattikāḥ matāḥ
anūrmi-mattvam dehe asmin dūra śravaṇa darśanam manaḥ-javaḥ kāma-rūpam para-kāya praveśanam sva-chanda mṛtyuḥ devānām saha krīḍā anudarśanam yathā saṅkalpa saṁsiddhiḥ ājñā apratihatā gatiḥ
tri-kāla-jñatvam advandvam para citta ādi abhijñatā agni arka ambu viṣa ādīnām pratiṣṭambhaḥ aparājayaḥ etāḥ ca uddeśataḥ proktāḥ yoga dhāraṇa siddhayaḥ yayā dhāraṇayā yā syāt yathā vā syāt nibodha me
bhūta-sūkṣma ātmani mayi tat-mātram dhārayet manaḥ aṇimānam avāpnoti tat-mātra upāsakaḥ mama
mahat-tattva ātmani mayi yathā saṁstham manaḥ dadhat mahimānam avāpnoti bhūtānām ca pṛthak pṛthak
parama-aṇu-maye cittam bhūtānām mayi rañjayan kāla sūkṣma arthatām yogī laghimānam avāpnuyāt
dhārayan mayi aham-tattve manaḥ vaikārike akhilam sarva indriyāṇām ātmatvam prāptim prāpnoti mat-manāḥ
mahati ātmani yaḥ sūtre dhārayet mayi mānasam prākāmyam pārameṣṭhyam me vindate avyakta-janmanaḥ
viṣṇau tri-adhīśvare cittam dhārayet kāla vigrahe saḥ īśitvam avāpnoti kṣetra-jña kṣetra codanām
nārāyaṇe turīya-ākhye bhagavat śabda-śabdite manaḥ mayi ādadhat yogī mat-dharmā vaśitām iyāt
nirguṇe brahmaṇi mayi dhārayan viśadam manaḥ parama-ānandam āpnoti yatra kāmaḥ avasīyate
śveta-dvīpa patau cittam śuddhe dharma-maye mayi dhārayan śvetatām yāti ṣaṭ-ūrmi rahitaḥ naraḥ
mayi ākāśa-ātmani prāṇe manasā ghoṣam udvahan tatra upalabdhāḥ bhūtānām haṁsaḥ vācaḥ śṛṇoti asau
cakṣuḥ tvaṣṭari saṁyojya tvaṣṭāram api cakṣuṣi mām tatra manasā dhyāyan viśvam paśyati dūrataḥ
manaḥ mayi su-saṁyojya deham tat anu-vāyunā mat-dhāraṇā anubhāvena tatra ātmā yatra vai manaḥ
yadā manaḥ upādāya yat yat rūpam bubhūṣati tat tat bhavet manaḥ-rūpam mat-yoga-balam āśrayaḥ
para kāyam viśan siddhaḥ ātmānam tatra bhāvayet piṇḍam hitvā viśet prāṇaḥ vāyu-bhūtaḥ ṣaṭ-aṅghri-vat
pārṣṇyā āpīḍya gudam prāṇam hṛt uraḥ kaṇṭha mūrdhasu āropya brahma-randhreṇa brahma nītvā utsṛjet tanum
vihariṣyan sura ākrīḍe mat stham sattvam vibhāvayet vimānena upatiṣṭhanti sattva vṛttīḥ sura striyaḥ
yathā saṅkalpayet buddhyā yadā vā mat-paraḥ pumān mayi satye manaḥ yuñjan tathā tat samupāśnute
yaḥ vai mat bhāvam āpannaḥ īśituḥ vaśituḥ pumān kutaścit na vihanyeta tasya ca ājñā yathā mama
mat-bhaktyā śuddha-sattvasya yoginaḥ dhāraṇā-viduḥ tasya trai-kālikī buddhiḥ janma-mṛtyu upabṛṁhitā
agni ādibhiḥ na hanyeta muneḥ yoga-mayam vapuḥ mat-yoga śānta cittasya yādasām udakam yathā
mat vibhūtīḥ abhidhyāyan śrīvatsa astra vibhūṣitāḥ dhvaja ātapatra vyajanaiḥ saḥ bhavet aparājitaḥ
upāsakasya mām evam yoga-dhāraṇayā muneḥ siddhayaḥ pūrva kathitāḥ upatiṣṭhanti aśeṣataḥ
jita-indriyasya dāntasya jita-śvāsa ātmanaḥ muneḥ mat dhāraṇām dhārayataḥ kā sā siddhiḥ su-durlabhā
antarāyān vadanti etāḥ yuñjataḥ yogam uttamam mayā sampadyamānasya kāla kṣapaṇa hetavaḥ
janma auṣadhi tapaḥ mantraiḥ yāvatīḥ iha siddhayaḥ yogena āpnoti tāḥ sarvāḥ na anyaiḥ yoga-gatim vrajet
sarvāsām api siddhīnām hetuḥ patiḥ aham prabhuḥ aham yogasya sāṅkhyasya dharmasya brahma-vādinām
aham ātmā āntaraḥ bāhyaḥ anāvṛtaḥ sarva-dehinām yathā bhūtāni bhūteṣu bahiḥ antaḥ svayam tathā
śrī-uddhavaḥ uvāca tvam brahma paramam sākṣāt anādi antam apāvṛtam sarveṣām api bhāvānām trāṇa sthiti apyaya udbhavaḥ
ucca avaceṣu bhūteṣu durjñeyam akṛta-ātmabhiḥ upāsate tvām bhagavan yāthā-tathyena brāhmaṇāḥ
yeṣu yeṣu ca bhūteṣu bhaktyā tvām parama-ṛṣayaḥ upāsīnāḥ prapadyante saṁsiddhim tat vadasva me
gūḍhaḥ carasi bhūta-ātmā bhūtānām bhūta-bhāvana na tvām paśyanti bhūtāni paśyantam mohitāni te
yāḥ kāḥ ca bhūmau divi vai rasāyām vibhūtayaḥ dikṣu mahā-vibhūte tāḥ mahyam ākhyāhi anubhāvitāḥ te namāmi te tīrtha-pada aṅghri-padmam
śrī-bhagavān uvāca evam etat aham pṛṣṭaḥ praśnam praśna-vidām vara yuyutsunā vinaśane sapatnaiḥ arjunena vai
jñātvā jñāti vadham garhyam adharmam rājya hetukam tataḥ nivṛttaḥ haratā aham hataḥ ayam iti laukikaḥ
saḥ tadā puruṣa-vyāghraḥ yuktyā me pratibodhitaḥ abhyabhāṣata mām evam yathā tvam raṇa mūrdhani
aham ātmā uddhava amīṣām bhūtānām su-hṛt īśvaraḥ aham sarvāṇi bhūtāni teṣām sthiti udbhava apyayaḥ
aham gatiḥ gati-matām kālaḥ kalayatām aham gunāṇām ca api aham sāmyam guṇini autpattikaḥ guṇaḥ
guṇinām api aham sūtram mahatām ca mahān aham sūkṣmāṇām api aham jīvaḥ durjayānām aham manaḥ
hiraṇya-garbhaḥ vedānām mantrāṇām praṇavaḥ tri-vṛt akṣarāṇām a-kāraḥ asmi padāni chandasām aham
indraḥ aham sarva-devānām vasūnām asmi havya-vāṭ ādityānām aham viṣṇuḥ rudrāṇām nīla-lohitaḥ
brahma-ṛṣīṇām bhṛguḥ aham rāja-ṛṣīṇām aham manuḥ deva-ṛṣīṇām nāradaḥ aham havirdhānī asmi dhenuṣu
siddha-īśvarāṇām kapilaḥ suparṇaḥ aham patatriṇām prajāpatīnām dakṣaḥ aham pitṝṇām aham aryamā
mām viddhi uddhava daityānām prahlādam asura-īśvaram somam nakṣatra-oṣadhīnām dhana-īśam yakṣa-rakṣasām
airāvatam gaja-indrāṇām yādasām varuṇam prabhum tapatām dyu-matām sūryam manuṣyāṇām ca bhū-patim
uccaiḥśravāḥ turaṅgāṇām dhātūnām asmi kāñcanam yamaḥ saṁyamatām ca aham sarpāṇām asmi vāsukiḥ
nāga-indrāṇām anantaḥ aham mṛga-indraḥ śṛṅgi-daṁṣṭriṇām āśramāṇām aham turyaḥ varṇānām prathamaḥ anagha
tirthānām srotasām gaṅgā samudraḥ sarasām aham āyudhānām dhanuḥ aham tri-pura-ghnaḥ dhanuḥ-matām
dhiṣṇyānām asmi aham meruḥ gahanānām himālayaḥ vanaspatīnām aśvatthaḥ oṣadhīnām aham yavaḥ
purodhasām vasiṣṭhaḥ aham brahmiṣṭhānām bṛhaspatiḥ skandaḥ aham sarva-senānyām agraṇyām bhagavān ajaḥ
yajñānām brahma-yajñaḥ aham vratānām avihiṁsanam vāyu agni arka ambu vāk ātmā śucīnām api aham śuciḥ
yogānām ātma-saṁrodhaḥ mantraḥ asmi vijigīṣatām ānvīkṣikī kauśalānām vikalpaḥ khyāti-vādinām
strīṇām tu śatarūpā aham puṁsām svāyambhuvaḥ manuḥ nārāyaṇaḥ munīnām ca kumāraḥ brahmacāriṇām
dharmāṇām asmi sannyāsaḥ kṣemāṇām abahiḥ-matiḥ guhyānām sunṛtam maunam mithunānām ajaḥ tu aham
saṁvatsaraḥ asmi animiṣām ṛtūnām madhu-mādhavau māsānām mārgaśīrṣaḥ aham nakṣatrāṇām tathā abhijit
aham yugānām ca kṛtam dhīrāṇām devalaḥ asitaḥ dvaipāyanaḥ asmi vyāsānām kavīnām kāvyaḥ ātma-vān
vāsudevaḥ bhagavatām tvam tu bhāgavateṣu aham kimpuruṣāṇām hanumān vidyādhrāṇām sudarśanaḥ
ratnānām padma-rāgaḥ asmi padma-kośaḥ su-peśasām kuśaḥ asmi darbha-jātīnām gavyam ājyam haviḥṣu aham
vyavasāyinām aham lakṣmīḥ kitavānām chala-grahaḥ titikṣā asmi titikṣūṇām sattvam sattva-vatām aham
ojaḥ sahaḥ balavatām karma aham viddhi sātvatām sātvatām nava-mūrtīnām ādi-mūrtiḥ aham parā
viśvāvasuḥ pūrvacittiḥ gandharva-apsarasām aham bhūdharāṇām aham sthairyam gandha-mātram aham bhuvaḥ
apām rasaḥ ca paramaḥ tejiṣṭhānām vibhāvasuḥ prabhā sūrya indu tārāṇām śabdaḥ aham nabhasaḥ paraḥ
brahmaṇyānām baliḥ aham vīrāṇām aham arjunaḥ bhūtānām sthitiḥ utpattiḥ aham vai pratisaṅkramaḥ
gati ukti utsarga upādānam ānanda sparśa lakṣaṇam āsvāda śruti avaghrāṇam aham sarva-indriya indriyam
pṛthivī vāyuḥ ākāśaḥ āpaḥ jyotiḥ aham mahān vikāraḥ puruṣaḥ avyaktam rajaḥ sattvam tamaḥ param aham etat prasaṅkhyānam jñānam tattva-viniścayaḥ
mayā īśvareṇa jīvena guṇena guṇinā vinā sarva-ātmanā api sarveṇa na bhāvaḥ vidyate kvacit
saṅkhyānam parama-aṇūnām kālena kriyate mayā na tathā me vibhūtīnām sṛjataḥ aṇḍāni koṭiśaḥ
tejaḥ śrīḥ kīrtiḥ aiśvaryam hrīḥ tyāgaḥ saubhagam bhagaḥ vīryam titikṣā vijñānam yatra yatra saḥ me aṁśakaḥ
etāḥ te kīrtitāḥ sarvāḥ saṅkṣepeṇa vibhūtayaḥ manaḥ vikārāḥ eva ete yathā vācā abhidhīyate
vācam yaccha manaḥ yaccha prāṇān yaccha indriyāṇi ca ātmānam ātmanā yaccha na bhūyaḥ kalpase adhvane
yaḥ vai vāk-manasī saṁyak asaṁyacchan dhiyā yatiḥ tasya vratam tapaḥ dānam sravati āma ghaṭa ambu-vat
tasmāt vacaḥ manaḥ prāṇān niyacchet mat-parāyaṇaḥ mat bhakti yuktayā buddhyā tataḥ parisamāpyate
śrī-uddhavaḥ uvāca yaḥ tvayā abhihitaḥ pūrvam dharmaḥ tvat-bhakti-lakṣaṇaḥ varṇa-āśrama ācāravatām sarveṣām dvi-padām api yathā anuṣṭhīyamānena tvayi bhaktiḥ nṛṇām bhavet sva-dharmeṇa aravinda-akṣa tat mama ākhyātum arhasi
purā kila mahā-bāho dharmam paramakam prabho yat tena haṁsa-rūpeṇa brahmaṇe abhyāttha mādhava saḥ idānīm su-mahatā kālena amitra-karśana na prāyaḥ bhavitā martya-loke prāk anuśāsitaḥ
vaktā kartā avitā na anyaḥ dharmasya acyuta te bhuvi sabhāyām api vairiñcyām yatra mūrti-dharāḥ kalāḥ kartrā avitrā pravaktrā ca bhavatā madhusūdana tyakte mahī-tale deva vinaṣṭam kaḥ pravakṣyati
tat tvam naḥ sarva-dharma-jña dharmaḥ tvat-bhakti lakṣaṇaḥ yathā yasya vidhīyeta tathā varṇaya me prabho
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ittham sva-bhṛtya-mukhyena pṛṣṭaḥ saḥ bhagavān hariḥ prītaḥ kṣemāya martyānām dharmān āha sanātanān
śrī-bhagavān uvāca dharmyaḥ eṣaḥ tava praśnaḥ naiḥśreyasa-karaḥ nṛṇām varṇa-āśrama ācāra-vatām tam uddhava nibodha me
ādau kṛta-yuge varṇaḥ nṛṇām haṁsaḥ iti smṛtaḥ kṛta-kṛtyāḥ prajāḥ jātyā tasmāt kṛta-yugam viduḥ
vedaḥ praṇavaḥ eva agre dharmaḥ aham vṛṣa-rūpa-dhṛk upāsate tapaḥ-niṣṭhāḥ haṁsam mām mukta kilbiṣāḥ
tretā-mukhe mahā-bhāga prāṇāt me hṛdayāt trayī vidyā prādurabhūt tasyāḥ aham āsam tri-vṛt makhaḥ
vipra kṣatriya viṭ śūdrāḥ mukha bāhu ūru pāda jāḥ vairājāt puruṣāt jātāḥ ye ātma ācāra lakṣaṇāḥ
gṛha-āśramaḥ jaghanataḥ brahmacaryam hṛdaḥ mama vakṣaḥ-sthalāt vane vāsaḥ sannyāsaḥ śirasi sthitaḥ
varṇānām āśramāṇām ca janma bhūmi anusāriṇīḥ āsan prakṛtayaḥ nṝṇām nīcaiḥ nīca uttama uttamāḥ
śamaḥ damaḥ tapaḥ śaucam santoṣaḥ kṣāntiḥ ārjavam mat-bhaktiḥ ca dayā satyam brahma prakṛtayaḥ tu imāḥ
tejaḥ balam dhṛtiḥ śauryam titikṣā audāryam udyamaḥ sthairyam brahmaṇyam aiśvaryam kṣatra prakṛtayaḥ tu imāḥ
āstikyam dāna-niṣṭhā ca adambhaḥ brahma-sevanam atuṣṭiḥ artha upacayaiḥ vaiśya prakṛtayaḥ tu imāḥ
śuśrūṣaṇam dvija gavām devānām ca api amāyayā tatra labdhena santoṣaḥ śūdra prakṛtayaḥ tu imāḥ
aśaucam anṛtam steyam nāstikyam śuṣka-vigrahaḥ kāmaḥ krodhaḥ ca tarṣaḥ ca saḥ bhāvaḥ antya avasāyinām
ahiṁsā satyam asteyam a-kāma-krodha-lobhatā bhūta priya hita īhā ca dharmaḥ ayam sārva-varṇikaḥ
dvitīyam prāpya ānupūrvyāt janma upanayanam dvijaḥ vasan gurukule dāntaḥ brahma adhīyīta ca āhūtaḥ
mekhalā ajina daṇḍa akṣa brahma-sūtra kamaṇḍalūn jaṭilaḥ adhauta dat-vāsaḥ arakta-pīṭhaḥ kuśān dadhat
snāna bhojana homeṣu japa uccāre ca vāk-yataḥ na chindyāt nakha romāṇi kakṣa upastha gatāni api
retaḥ na avakiret jātu brahma-vrata-dharaḥ svayam avakīrṇe avagāhya apsu yata-asuḥ tri-padām japet
agni arka ācārya go vipra guru vṛddha surān śuciḥ samāhitaḥ upāsīta sandhye dve yata-vāk japan
ācāryam mām vijānīyāt na avamanyeta karhicit na martya-buddhyā asūyeta sarva-deva mayaḥ guruḥ
sāyam prātaḥ upānīya bhaikṣyam tasmai nivedayet yat ca anyat api anujñātam upayuñjīta saṁyataḥ
śuśrūṣamāṇaḥ ācāryam sadā upāsīta nīca-vat yāna śayyā āsana sthānaiḥ na ati dūre kṛta-añjaliḥ
evam vṛttaḥ gurukule vaset bhoga vivarjitaḥ vidyā samāpyate yāvat bibhrat vratam akhaṇḍitam
yadi asau chandasām lokam ārokṣyan brahma-viṣṭapam gurave vinyaset deham sva-adhyāya artham bṛhat-vrataḥ
agnau gurau ātmani ca sarva-bhūteṣu mām param apṛthak-dhīḥ upāsīta brahma-varcasvī akalmaṣaḥ
strīṇām nirīkṣaṇa sparśa saṁlāpa kṣvelana ādikam prāṇinaḥ mithunī-bhūtān agṛha-sthaḥ agrataḥ tyajet
śaucam ācamanam snānam sandhyā upāstiḥ mama arcanam tīrtha-sevā japaḥ aspṛśya abhakṣya asambhāṣya varjanam sarva āśrama prayuktaḥ ayam niyamaḥ kula-nandana mat-bhāvaḥ sarva-bhūteṣu manaḥ vāk kāya saṁyamaḥ
evam bṛhat-vrata dharaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ agniḥ iva jvalan mat-bhaktaḥ tīvra-tapasā dagdha karma āśayaḥ amalaḥ
atha anantaram āvekṣyan yathā jijñāsita āgamaḥ gurave dakṣiṇām dattvā snāyāt guru anumoditaḥ
gṛham vanam vā upaviśet pravrajet vā dvija-uttamaḥ āśramāt āśramam gacchet na anyathā amat-paraḥ caret
gṛha arthī sadṛśīm bhāryām udvahet ajugupsitām yavīyasīm tu vayasā yām sa-varṇām anu kramāt
ijyā adhyayana dānāni sarveṣām ca dvi-janmanām pratigrahaḥ adhyāpanam ca brāhmaṇasya eva yājanam
pratigraham manyamānaḥ tapaḥ tejaḥ yaśaḥ nudam anyābhyām eva jīveta śilaiḥ vā doṣa dṛk tayoḥ
brāhmaṇasya hi dehaḥ ayam kṣudra kāmāya na iṣyate kṛcchrāya tapase ca iha pretya ananta sukhāya ca
śila-uñcha vṛttyā parituṣṭa cittaḥ dharmam mahāntam virajam juṣāṇaḥ mayi arpita ātmā gṛhe eva tiṣṭhan na ati prasaktaḥ samupaiti śāntim
samuddharanti ye vipram sīdantam mat-parāyaṇam tān uddhariṣye na cirāt āpadbhyaḥ nauḥ iva arṇavāt
sarvāḥ samuddharet rājā pitā iva vyasanāt prajāḥ ātmānam ātmana dhīraḥ yathā gaja-patiḥ gajān
evam-vidhaḥ nara-patiḥ vimānena arka-varcasā vidhūya iha aśubham kṛtsnam indreṇa saha modate
sīdan vipraḥ vaṇik vṛttyā paṇyaiḥ eva āpadam taret khaḍgena vā āpadā ākrāntaḥ na śva vṛttyā kathañcana
vaiśya vṛttyā tu rājanyaḥ jīvet mṛgayayā āpadi caret vā vipra-rūpeṇa na śva vṛttyā kathañcana
śūdra vṛttim bhajet vaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ kāru kaṭa kriyām kṛcchrāt muktaḥ na garhyeṇa vṛttim lipseta karmaṇā
veda-adhyāya svadhā svāhā bali anna-ādyaiḥ yathā udayam deva ṛṣi pitṛ bhūtāni mat-rūpāṇi anu-aham yajet
yadṛcchayā upapannena śuklena upārjitena vā dhanena apīḍayan bhṛtyān nyāyena eva āharet kratūn
kuṭumbeṣu na sajjeta na pramādyet kuṭumbī api vipaścit naśvaram paśyet adṛṣṭam api dṛṣṭa-vat
putra dāra āpta bandhūnām saṅgamaḥ pāntha saṅgamaḥ anu-deham viyanti ete svapnaḥ nidrā anugaḥ yathā
ittham parimṛśan muktaḥ gṛheṣu atithi-vat vasan na gṛhaiḥ anubadhyeta nirmamaḥ nirahaṅkṛtaḥ
karmabhiḥ gṛha-medhīyaiḥ iṣṭvā mām eva bhakti-mān tiṣṭhet vanam vā upaviśet prajā-vān vā parivrajet
yaḥ tu āsakta matiḥ gehe putra vitta eṣaṇa āturaḥ straiṇaḥ kṛpaṇa dhīḥ mūḍhaḥ mama aham iti badhyate
aho me pitarau vṛddhau bhāryā bāla-ātma-jā ātmā-jāḥ anāthāḥ mām ṛte dīnāḥ katham jīvanti duḥkhitāḥ
evam gṛha āśaya ākṣipta hṛdayaḥ mūḍha dhīḥ ayam atṛptaḥ tān anudhyāyan mṛtaḥ andham viśate tamaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca vanam vivikṣuḥ putreṣu bhāryām nyasya saha eva vā vane eva vaset śāntaḥ tṛtīyam bhāgam āyuṣaḥ
kanda mūla phalaiḥ vanyaiḥ medhyaiḥ vṛttim prakalpayet vasīta valkalam vāsaḥ tṛṇa parṇa ajināni vā
keśa roma nakha śmaśru malāni bibhṛyāt dataḥ na dhāvet apsu majjeta tri-kālam sthaṇḍile śayaḥ
grīṣme tapyeta pañca-agnīn varṣāsu āsāra ṣāṭ jale ā-kaṇṭha magnaḥ śiśire evam vṛttaḥ tapaḥ caret
agni pakvam samaśnīyāt kāla pakvam atha api vā ulūkhala aśma kuṭṭaḥ vā danta ulūkhalaḥ eva vā
svayam sañcinuyāt sarvam ātmanaḥ vṛtti kāraṇam deśa kāla bala abhijñaḥ na ādadīta anyadā āhṛtam
vanyaiḥ caru puroḍāśaiḥ nirvapet kāla-coditān na tu śrautena paśunā mām yajeta vana-āśramī
agni-hotram ca darśaḥ ca paurṇa-māsaḥ ca pūrva-vat cātuḥ-māsyāni ca muneḥ āmnātāni ca naigamaiḥ
evam cīrṇena tapasā muniḥ dhamani-santataḥ mām tapaḥ-mayam ārādhya rṣi-lokāt upaiti mām
yaḥ tu etat kṛcchrataḥ cīrṇam tapaḥ niḥśreyasam mahat kāmāya alpīyase yuñjyāt bāliśaḥ kaḥ aparaḥ tataḥ
yadā asau niyame akalpaḥ jarayā jāta vepathuḥ ātmani agnīn samāropya mat-cittaḥ agnim samāviśet
yadā karma vipākeṣu lokeṣu niraya-ātmasu virāgaḥ jāyate samyak nyasta agniḥ pravrajet tataḥ
iṣṭvā yathā upadeśam mām dattvā sarva-svam ṛtvije agnīn sva-prāṇe āveśya nirapekṣaḥ parivrajet
viprasya vai sannyasataḥ devāḥ dāra-ādi-rūpiṇaḥ vighnān kurvanti ayam hi asmān ākramya samiyāt param
bibhṛyāt cet muniḥ vāsaḥ kaupīna ācchādanam param tyaktam na daṇḍa pātrābhyām anyat kiñcit anāpadi
dṛṣṭi pūtam nyaset pādam vastra pūtam pibet jalam satya pūtām vadet vācam manaḥ pūtam samācaret
mauna anīha anila-āyāmāḥ daṇḍāḥ vāk deha cetasām na hi ete yasya santi aṅga veṇubhiḥ na bhavet yatiḥ
bhikṣām caturṣu varṇeṣu vigarhyān varjayan caret sapta āgārān asaṅkḷptān tuṣyet labdhena tāvatā
bahiḥ jala āśayam gatvā tatra upaspṛśya vāk-yataḥ vibhajya pāvitam śeṣam bhuñjīta aśeṣam āhṛtam
ekaḥ caret mahīm etām niḥsaṅgaḥ saṁyata-indriyaḥ ātma-krīḍaḥ ātma-rataḥ ātma-vān sama-darśanaḥ
vivikta kṣema śaraṇaḥ mat bhāva vimala āśayaḥ ātmānam cintayet ekam abhedena mayā muniḥ
anvīkṣeta ātmanaḥ bandham mokṣam ca jñāna niṣṭhayā bandhaḥ indriya vikṣepaḥ mokṣaḥ eṣām ca saṁyamaḥ
tasmāt niyamya ṣaṭ-vargam mat-bhāvena caret muniḥ viraktaḥ kṣudra kāmebhyaḥ labdhvā ātmani sukham mahat
pura grāma vrajān sa-arthān bhikṣā-artham praviśan caret puṇya deśa sarit śaila vana āśrama-vatīm mahīm
vānaprastha-āśrama padeṣu abhīkṣṇam bhaikṣyam ācaret saṁsidhyati āśu asammohaḥ śuddha sattvaḥ śīla andhasā
na etat vastutayā paśyet dṛśyamānam vinaśyati asakta cittaḥ viramet iha amutra cikīrṣitāt
yat etat ātmani jagat manaḥ vāk prāṇa saṁhatam sarvam māyā iti tarkeṇa sva-sthaḥ tyaktvā na tat smaret
jñāna niṣṭhaḥ viraktaḥ vā mat-bhaktaḥ vā anapekṣakaḥ sa-liṅgān āśramān tyaktvā caret avidhi-gocaraḥ
budhaḥ bālaka-vat krīḍet kuśalaḥ jaḍa-vat caret vadet unmatta-vat vidvān go-caryām naigamaḥ caret
veda-vāda rataḥ na syāt na pāṣaṇḍī na haitukaḥ śuṣka-vāda vivāde na kañcit pakṣam samāśrayet
na udvijeta janāt dhīraḥ janam ca udvejayet na tu ati-vādān titikṣeta na avamanyeta kañcana deham uddiśya paśu-vat vairam kuryāt na kenacit
ekaḥ eva paraḥ hi ātmā bhūteṣu ātmani avasthitaḥ yathā induḥ uda pātreṣu bhūtāni eka ātmakāni ca
alabdhvā na viṣīdeta kāle kāle aśanam kvacit labdhvā na hṛṣyet dhṛti-mān ubhayam daiva tantritam
āhāra artham samīheta yuktam tat prāṇa dhāraṇam tattvam vimṛśyate tena tat vijñāya vimucyate
yadṛcchayā upapanna annam adyāt śreṣṭham uta aparam tathā vāsaḥ tathā śayyām prāptam prāptam bhajet muniḥ
śaucam ācamanam snānam na tu codanayā caret anyān ca niyamān jñānī yathā aham līlayā īśvaraḥ
na hi tasya vikalpa ākhyā yā ca mat vīkṣayā hatā ā deha antāt kvacit khyātiḥ tataḥ sampadyate mayā
duḥkha udarkeṣu kāmeṣu jāta nirvedaḥ ātma-vān ajijñāsita mat dharmaḥ munim gurum upavrajet
tāvat paricaret bhaktaḥ śraddhā-vān anasūyakaḥ yāvat brahma vijānīyāt mām eva gurum ādṛtaḥ
yaḥ tu asaṁyata ṣaṭ vargaḥ pracaṇḍa indriya sārathiḥ jñāna vairāgya rahitaḥ tridaṇḍam upajīvati surān ātmānam ātma-stham nihnute mām ca dharma-hā avipakva kaṣāyaḥ asmāt amuṣmāt ca vihīyate
bhikṣoḥ dharmaḥ śamaḥ ahiṁsā tapaḥ īkṣā vana okasaḥ gṛhiṇaḥ bhūta-rakṣā ijyā dvi-jasya ācārya sevanam
brahma-caryam tapaḥ śaucam santoṣaḥ bhūta sauhṛdam gṛhasthasya api ṛtau gantuḥ sarveṣām mat upāsanam
iti mām yaḥ sva-dharmeṇa bhajet nityam ananya-bhāk sarva-bhūteṣu mat bhāvaḥ mat-bhaktim vindate dṛḍhām
bhaktyā uddhava anapāyinyā sarva loka mahā-īśvaram sarva utpatti apyayam brahma kāraṇam mā upayāti saḥ
iti sva-dharma nirṇikta sattvaḥ nirjñāta mat-gatiḥ jñāna vijñāna sampannaḥ na cirāt samupaiti mām
varṇāśrama-vatām dharmaḥ eṣaḥ ācāra lakṣaṇaḥ saḥ eva mat-bhakti yutaḥ niḥśreyasa karaḥ paraḥ
etat te abhihitam sādho bhavān pṛcchati yat ca mām yathā sva-dharma saṁyuktaḥ bhaktaḥ mām samiyāt param
śrī-bhagavān uvāca yaḥ vidyā śruta sampannaḥ ātma-vān na ānumānikaḥ māyā mātram idam jñātvā jñānam ca mayi sannyaset
jñāninaḥ tu aham eva iṣṭaḥ sva-arthaḥ hetuḥ ca sammataḥ svargaḥ ca eva apavargaḥ ca na anyaḥ arthaḥ mat rte priyaḥ
jñāna vijñāna saṁsiddhāḥ padam śreṣṭham viduḥ mama jñānī priya-tamaḥ ataḥ me jñānena asau bibharti mām
tapaḥ tīrtham japaḥ dānam pavitrāṇi itarāṇi ca na alam kurvanti tām siddhim yā jñāna kalayā kṛtā
tasmāt jñānena sahitam jñātvā sva-ātmānam uddhava jñāna vijñāna sampannaḥ bhaja mām bhakti bhāvataḥ
jñāna vijñāna yajñena mām iṣṭvā ātmānam ātmani sarva yajña patim mām vai saṁsiddhim munayaḥ agaman
tvayi uddhava āśrayati yaḥ tri-vidhaḥ vikāraḥ māyā antarā āpatati na ādi apavargayoḥ yat janma ādayaḥ asya yat amī tava tasya kim syuḥ ādi antayoḥ yat asataḥ asti tat eva madhye
śrī-uddhavaḥ uvāca jñānam viśuddham vipulam yathā etat vairagya vijñāna yutam purāṇam ākhyāhi viśva-īśvara viśva-mūrte tvat bhakti-yogam ca mahat vimṛgyam
tāpa trayeṇa abhihatasya ghore santapyamānasya bhava adhvani īśa paśyāmi na anyat śaraṇam tava aṅghri dvandva ātapatrāt amṛta abhivarṣāt
daṣṭam janam sampatitam bile asmin kāla ahinā kṣudra sukha uru tarṣam samuddhara enam kṛpayā āpavargyaiḥ vacobhiḥ āsiñca mahā-anubhāva
śrī-bhagavān uvāca ittham etat purā rājā bhīṣmam dharma bhṛtām varam ajāta-śatruḥ papraccha sarveṣām naḥ anuśṛṇvatām
nivṛtte bhārate yuddhe suhṛt nidhana vihvalaḥ śrutvā dharmān bahūn paścāt mokṣa dharmān apṛcchata
tān aham te abhidhāsyāmi deva-vrata mukhāt śrutān jñāna vairāgya vijñāna śraddhā bhakti upa-bṛṁhitān
nava ekādaśa pañca trīn bhāvān bhūteṣu yena vai īkṣeta atha ekam api eṣu tat jñānam mama niścitam
etat eva hi vijñānam na tathā ekena yena yat sthiti utpatti apyayān paśyet bhāvānām tri-guṇa ātmanām
ādau ante ca madhye ca sṛjyāt sṛjyam yat anviyāt punaḥ tat pratisaṅkrāme yat śiṣyeta tat eva sat
śrutiḥ pratyakṣam aitihyam anumānam catuṣṭayam pramāneṣu anavasthānāt vikalpāt saḥ virajyate
karmaṇām pariṇāmitvāt ā viriñcyāt amaṅgalam vipaścit naśvaram paśyet adṛṣṭam api dṛṣṭa-vat
bhakti-yogaḥ purā eva uktaḥ prīyamāṇāya te anagha punaḥ ca kathayiṣyāmi mat bhakteḥ kāraṇam param
śraddhā amṛta kathāyām me śaśvat mat anukīrtanam pariniṣṭhā ca pūjāyām stutibhiḥ stavanam mama ādaraḥ paricaryāyām sarva-aṅgaiḥ abhivandanam mat bhakta pūjā abhyadhikā sarva-bhūteṣu mat matiḥ mat-artheṣu aṅga-ceṣṭā ca vacasā mat-guṇa īraṇam mayi arpaṇam ca manasaḥ sarva-kāma vivarjanam mat-arthe artha parityāgaḥ bhogasya ca sukhasya ca iṣṭam dattam hutam japtam mat-artham yat vratam tapaḥ evam dharmaiḥ manuṣyānām uddhava ātma-nivedinām mayi sañjāyate bhaktiḥ kaḥ anyaḥ arthaḥ asya avaśiṣyate
yadā ātmani arpitam cittam śāntam sattva upabṛṁhitam dharmam jñānam saḥ vairāgyam aiśvaryam ca abhipadyate
yat arpitam tat vikalpe indriyaiḥ paridhāvati rajaḥ-valam ca asat niṣṭham cittam viddhi viparyayam
dharmaḥ mat bhakti kṛt proktaḥ jñānam ca aikātmya darśanam guṇeṣu asaṅgaḥ vairāgyam aiśvaryam ca aṇimā ādayaḥ
śrī-uddhavaḥ uvāca yamaḥ kati-vidhaḥ proktaḥ niyamaḥ vā ari-karṣaṇa kaḥ śamaḥ kaḥ damaḥ kṛṣṇa kā titikṣā dhṛtiḥ prabho kim dānam kim tapaḥ śauryam kim satyam ṛtam ucyate kaḥ tyāgaḥ kim dhanam ca iṣṭam kaḥ yajñaḥ kā ca dakṣiṇā puṁsaḥ kim svit balam śrī-man bhagaḥ lābhaḥ ca keśava kā vidyā hrīḥ parā kā śrīḥ kim sukham duḥkham eva ca kaḥ paṇḍitaḥ kaḥ ca mūrkhaḥ kaḥ panthāḥ utpathaḥ ca kaḥ kaḥ svargaḥ narakaḥ kaḥ svit kaḥ bandhuḥ uta kim gṛham kaḥ āḍhyaḥ kaḥ daridraḥ vā kṛpaṇaḥ kaḥ kaḥ īśvaraḥ etān praśnān mama brūhi viparītān ca sat-pate
śrī-bhagavān uvāca ahiṁsā satyam asteyam asaṅgaḥ hrīḥ asañcayaḥ āstikyam brahmacaryam ca maunam sthairyam kṣamā abhayam śaucam japaḥ tapaḥ homaḥ śraddhā ātithyam mat-arcanam tīrtha-aṭanam para-artha-īhā tuṣṭiḥ ācārya-sevanam ete yamāḥ sa-niyamāḥ ubhayoḥ dvādaśa smṛtāḥ puṁsām upāsitāḥ tāta yathā-kāmam duhanti hi
śamaḥ mat niṣṭhatā buddheḥ damaḥ indriya saṁyamaḥ titikṣā duḥkha sammarṣaḥ jihvā upastha jayaḥ dhṛtiḥ daṇḍa nyāsaḥ param dānam kāma tyāgaḥ tapaḥ smṛtam svabhāva vijayaḥ śauryam satyam ca sama-darśanam anyat ca su-nṛtā vāṇī kavibhiḥ parikīrtitā karmasu asaṅgamaḥ śaucam tyāgaḥ sannyāsaḥ ucyate dharmaḥ iṣṭam dhanam nṝṇām yajñaḥ aham bhagavat-tamaḥ dakṣiṇā jñāna-sandeśaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ param balam
bhagaḥ me aiśvaraḥ bhāvaḥ lābhaḥ mat-bhaktiḥ uttamaḥ vidyā ātmani bhidā bādhaḥ jugupsā hrīḥ akarmasu śrīḥ guṇāḥ nairapekṣya ādyāḥ sukham duḥkha sukha atyayaḥ duḥkham kāma sukha apekṣā paṇḍitaḥ bandha mokṣa vit mūrkhaḥ deha ādi aham-buddhiḥ panthāḥ mat nigamaḥ smṛtaḥ utpathaḥ citta vikṣepaḥ svargaḥ sattva-guṇa udayaḥ narakaḥ tamaḥ unnāhaḥ bandhuḥ guruḥ aham sakhe gṛham śarīram mānuṣyam guṇa āḍhyaḥ hi āḍhyaḥ ucyate daridraḥ yaḥ tu asantuṣṭaḥ kṛpaṇaḥ yaḥ ajita indriyaḥ guṇeṣu asakta dhīḥ īśaḥ guṇa saṅgaḥ viparyayaḥ ete uddhava te praśnāḥ sarve sādhu nirūpitāḥ kim varṇitena bahunā lakṣaṇam guṇa doṣayoḥ guṇa-doṣa dṛśiḥ doṣaḥ guṇaḥ tu ubhaya varjitaḥ
śrī-uddhavaḥ uvāca vidhiḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ ca nigamaḥ hi īśvarasya te avekṣate araviṇḍa-akṣa guṇam doṣam ca karmaṇām
varṇa-āśrama vikalpam ca pratiloma anuloma-jam dravya deśa vayaḥ kālān svargam narakam eva ca
guṇa doṣa bhidā dṛṣṭim antareṇa vacaḥ tava niḥśreyasam katham nṝṇām niṣedha vidhi lakṣaṇam
pitṛ deva manuṣyāṇām vedaḥ cakṣuḥ tava īśvara śreyaḥ tu anupalabdhe arthe sādhya-sādhanayoḥ api
guṇa doṣa bhidā dṛṣṭiḥ nigamāt te na hi svataḥ nigamena apavādaḥ ca bhidāyāḥ iti ha bhramaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca yogāḥ trayaḥ mayā proktāḥ nṝṇām śreyaḥ vidhitsayā jñānam karma ca bhaktiḥ ca na upāyaḥ anyaḥ asti kutracit
nirviṇṇānām jñāna-yogaḥ nyāsinām iha karmasu teṣu anirviṇṇa cittānām karma-yogaḥ tu kāminām
yadṛcchayā mat-kathā-ādau jāta śraddhaḥ tu yaḥ pumān na nirviṇṇaḥ na ati-saktaḥ bhakti-yogaḥ asya siddhi-daḥ
tāvat karmāṇi kurvīta na nirvidyeta yāvatā mat-kathā śravaṇa-ādau vā śraddhā yāvat na jāyate
sva-dharma sthaḥ yajan yajñaiḥ anāśīḥ-kāmaḥ uddhava na yāti svarga narakau yadi anyat na samācaret
asmin loke vartamānaḥ sva-dharma sthaḥ anaghaḥ śuciḥ jñānam viśuddham āpnoti mat bhaktim vā yadṛcchayā
svargiṇaḥ api etam icchanti lokam nirayiṇaḥ tathā sādhakam jñāna-bhaktibhyām ubhayam tat asādhakam
na naraḥ svaḥ-gatim kāṅkṣet nārakīm vā vicakṣaṇaḥ na imam lokam ca kāṅkṣeta deha āveśāt pramādyati
etat vidvān purā mṛtyoḥ abhavāya ghaṭeta saḥ apramattaḥ idam jñātvā martyam api artha siddhi-dam
chidyamānam yamaiḥ etaiḥ kṛta-nīḍam vanaspatim khagaḥ sva-ketam utsṛjya kṣemam yāti hi alampaṭaḥ
ahaḥ rātraiḥ chidyamānam buddhvā āyuḥ bhaya vepathuḥ mukta-saṅgaḥ param buddhvā nirīhaḥ upaśāmyati
nṛ deham ādyam su-labham su-durlabham plavam su-kalpam guru karṇa-dhāram mayā anukūlena nabhasvatā īritam pumān bhava abdhim na taret saḥ ātma-hā
yadā ārambheṣu nirviṇṇaḥ viraktaḥ saṁyata indriyaḥ abhyāsena ātmanaḥ yogī dhārayet acalam manaḥ
dhāryamāṇam manaḥ yarhi bhrāmyat āśu anavasthitam atandritaḥ anurodhena mārgeṇa ātma vaśam nayet
manaḥ gatim na visṛjet jita-prāṇaḥ jita-indriyaḥ sattva sampannayā buddhyā manaḥ ātma-vaśam nayet
eṣaḥ vai paramaḥ yogaḥ manasaḥ saṅgrahaḥ smṛtaḥ hṛdaya-jñatvam anvicchan damyasya iva arvataḥ muhuḥ
sāṅkhyena sarva bhāvānām pratiloma anulomataḥ bhava apyayau anudhyāyet manaḥ yāvat prasīdati
nirviṇṇasya viraktasya puruṣasya ukta-vedinaḥ manaḥ tyajati daurātmyam cintitasya anucintayā
yama-ādibhiḥ yoga-pathaiḥ ānvīkṣikyā ca vidyayā mama arcā upāsanābhiḥ vā na anyaiḥ yogyam smaret manaḥ
yadi kuryāt pramādena yogī karma vigarhitam yogena eva dahet aṁhaḥ na anyat tatra kadācana
sve sve adhikāre yā niṣṭhā saḥ guṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ karmaṇām jāti aśuddhānām anena niyamaḥ kṛtaḥ guṇa doṣa vidhānena saṅgānām tyājana icchayā
jāta śraddhaḥ mat-kathāsu nirviṇṇaḥ sarva karmasu veda duḥkha ātmakān kāmān parityāge api anīśvaraḥ tataḥ bhajeta mām prītaḥ śraddhāluḥ dṛḍha niścayaḥ juṣamāṇaḥ ca tān kāmān duḥkha udarkān ca garhayan
proktena bhakti-yogena bhajataḥ mā asakṛt muneḥ kāmāḥ hṛdayyāḥ naśyanti sarve mayi hṛdi sthite
bhidyate hṛdaya granthiḥ chidyante sarva saṁśayāḥ kṣīyante ca asya karmāṇi mayi dṛṣṭe akhila-ātmani
tasmāt mat-bhakti-yuktasya yoginaḥ vai mat-ātmanaḥ na jñānam na ca vairāgyam prāyaḥ śreyaḥ bhavet iha
yat karmabhiḥ yat tapasā jñāna vairāgyataḥ ca yat yogena dāna dharmeṇa śreyobhiḥ itaraiḥ api sarvam mat-bhakti-yogena mat-bhaktaḥ labhate añjasā svarga apavargam mat-dhāma kathañcit yadi vāñchati
na kiñcit sādhavaḥ dhīrāḥ bhaktāḥ hi ekāntinaḥ mama vāñchanti api mayā dattam kaivalyam apunaḥ-bhavam
nairapekṣyam param prāhuḥ niḥśreyasam analpakam tasmāt nirāśiṣaḥ bhaktiḥ nirapekṣasya me bhavet
na mayi eka-anta bhaktānām guṇa doṣa udbhavāḥ guṇāḥ sādhūnām sama-cittānām buddheḥ param upeyuṣām
evam etān mayā diṣṭān anutiṣṭhanti me pathaḥ kṣemam vindanti mat-sthānam yat brahma paramam viduḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca ye etān mat-pathaḥ hitvā bhakti jñāna kriyā ātmakān kṣudrān kāmān calaiḥ prāṇaiḥ juṣantaḥ saṁsaranti te
sve sve adhikāre yā niṣṭhā saḥ guṇaḥ parikīrtitaḥ viparyayaḥ tu doṣaḥ syāt ubhayoḥ eṣaḥ niścayaḥ
śuddhi aśuddhī vidhīyete samāneṣu api vastuṣu dravyasya vicikitsā artham guṇa-doṣau śubha-aśubhau dharma-artham vyavahāra-artham yātrā-artham iti ca anagha
darśitaḥ ayam mayā ācāraḥ dharmam udvahatām dhuram
bhūmi ambu agni anila ākāśāḥ bhūtānām pañca dhātavaḥ ā-brahma sthāvara-ādīnām śārīrāḥ ātma saṁyutāḥ
vedena nāma rūpāṇi viṣamāṇi sameṣu api dhātuṣu uddhava kalpyante eteṣām sva-artha siddhaye
deśa kāla ādi bhāvānām vastūnām mama sat-tama guṇa-doṣau vidhīyete niyama-artham hi karmaṇām
akṛṣṇa-sāraḥ deśānām abrahmaṇyaḥ aśuciḥ bhavet kṛṣṇa-sāraḥ api asauvīra kīkaṭa asaṁskṛta īraṇam
karmaṇyaḥ guṇavān kālaḥ dravyataḥ svataḥ eva vā yataḥ nivartate karma saḥ doṣaḥ akarmakaḥ smṛtaḥ
dravyasya śuddhi aśuddhī ca dravyeṇa vacanena ca saṁskāreṇa atha kālena mahatva-alpatayā atha vā
śaktyā aśaktyā atha vā buddhyā samṛddhyā ca yat ātmane agham kurvanti hi yathā deśa avasthā anusārataḥ
dhānya dāru asthi tantūnām rasa taijasa carmaṇām kāla vāyu agni mṛt toyaiḥ pārthivānām yuta ayutaiḥ
amedhya liptam yat yena gandha lepam vyapohati bhajate prakṛtim tasya tat śaucam tāvat iṣyate
snāna dāna tapaḥ avasthā vīrya saṁskāra karmabhiḥ mat-smṛtyā ca ātmanaḥ śaucam śuddhaḥ karma ācaret dvijaḥ
mantrasya ca parijñānam karma śuddhiḥ mat-arpaṇam dharmaḥ sampadyate ṣaḍbhiḥ adharmaḥ tu viparyayaḥ
kvacit guṇaḥ api doṣaḥ syāt doṣaḥ api vidhinā guṇaḥ guṇa-doṣa artha niyamaḥ tat bhidām eva bādhate
samāna karma ācaraṇam patitānām na pātakam autpattikaḥ guṇaḥ saṅgaḥ na śayānaḥ patati adhaḥ
yataḥ yataḥ nivarteta vimucyeta tataḥ tataḥ eṣaḥ dharmaḥ nṛṇām kṣemaḥ śoka moha bhaya apahaḥ
viṣayeṣu guṇa-adhyāsāt puṁsaḥ saṅgaḥ tataḥ bhavet saṅgāt tatra bhavet kāmaḥ kāmāt eva kaliḥ nṛṇām
kaleḥ durviṣahaḥ krodhaḥ tamaḥ tam anuvartate tamasā grasyate puṁsaḥ cetanā vyāpinī drutam
tayā virahitaḥ sādho jantuḥ śūnyāya kalpate tataḥ asya sva-artha vibhraṁśaḥ mūrcchitasya mṛtasya ca
viṣaya abhiniveśena na ātmānam veda na aparam vṛkṣa jīvakayā jīvan vyartham bhastrā iva yaḥ śvasan
phala-śrutiḥ iyam nṝṇām na śreyaḥ rocanam param śreyaḥ vivakṣayā proktam yathā bhaiṣajya rocanam
utpattyā eva hi kāmeṣu prāṇeṣu sva-janeṣu ca āsakta-manasaḥ martyāḥ ātmanaḥ anartha hetuṣu
natān aviduṣaḥ sva-artham bhrāmyataḥ vṛjina adhvani katham yuñjyāt punaḥ teṣu tān tamaḥ viśataḥ budhaḥ
evam vyavasitam kecit avijñāya ku-buddhayaḥ phala-śrutim kusumitām na veda-jñāḥ vadanti hi
kāminaḥ kṛpaṇāḥ lubdhāḥ puṣpeṣu phala-buddhayaḥ agni mugdhāḥ dhūma-tāntāḥ svam lokam na vidanti te
na te mām aṅga jānanti hṛdi-stham yaḥ idam yataḥ uktha-śastrāḥ hi asu-tṛpaḥ yathā nīhāra cakṣuṣaḥ
te me matam avijñāya parokṣam viṣaya-ātmakāḥ hiṁsāyām yadi rāgaḥ syāt yajñe eva na codanā hiṁsā-vihārāḥ hi ālabdhaiḥ paśubhiḥ sva-sukha icchayā yajante devatāḥ yajñaiḥ pitṛ bhūta-patīn khalāḥ
svapna upamam amum lokam asantam śravaṇa-priyam āśiṣaḥ hṛdi saṅkalpya tyajanti arthān yathā vaṇik
rajaḥ sattva tamaḥ niṣṭhāḥ rajaḥ sattva tamaḥ juṣaḥ upāsate indra-mukhyān deva-ādīn na yathā eva mām
iṣṭvā iha devatāḥ yajñaiḥ gatvā raṁsyāmahe divi tasya ante iha bhūyāsmaḥ mahā-śālāḥ mahā-kulāḥ evam puṣpitayā vācā vyākṣipta-manasām nṛṇām māninām ca ati-lubdhānām mad-vārtā api na rocate
vedāḥ brahma-ātma viṣayāḥ tri-kāṇḍa-viṣayāḥ ime parokṣa-vādāḥ ṛṣayaḥ parokṣam mama ca priyam
śabda-brahma su-durbodham prāṇa indriya manaḥ mayam ananta-pāram gambhīram durvigāhyam samudra-vat
mayā upabṛṁhitam bhūmnā brahmaṇā ananta-śaktinā bhūteṣu ghoṣa-rūpeṇa viseṣu ūrṇā iva lakṣyate
yathā ūrṇa-nābhiḥ hṛdayāt ūrṇām udvamate mukhāt ākāśāt ghoṣa-vān prāṇaḥ manasā sparśa-rūpiṇā chandaḥ-mayaḥ amṛta-mayaḥ sahasra-padavīm prabhuḥ oṁkārāt vyañjita sparśa svara uṣma anta-stha bhūṣitām vicitra bhāṣā vitatām chandobhiḥ catuḥ-uttaraiḥ ananta-pārām bṛhatīm sṛjati ākṣipate svayam
gāyatrī uṣṇik anuṣṭup ca bṛhatī paṅktiḥ eva ca triṣṭup jagatī aticchandaḥ hi atyaṣṭi-atijagat-virāṭ
kim vidhatte kim ācaṣṭe kim anūdya vikalpayet iti asyāḥ hṛdayam loke na anyaḥ mat veda kaścana
mām vidhatte abhidhatte mām vikalpya apohyate tu aham etāvān sarva-veda arthaḥ śabdaḥ āsthāya mām bhidām māyā-mātram anūdya ante pratiṣidhya prasīdati
śrī-uddhavaḥ uvāca kati tattvāni viśva-īśa saṅkhyātāni ṛṣibhiḥ prabho nava ekādaśa pañca trīṇi āttha tvam iha śuśruma kecit ṣaṭ-viṁśatim prāhuḥ apare pañca-viṁśatim sapta eke nava ṣaṭ kecit catvāri ekādaśa apare kecit saptadaśa prāhuḥ ṣoḍaśa eke trayodaśa etāvattvam hi saṅkhyānām ṛṣayaḥ yat-vivakṣayā gāyanti pṛthak āyuḥ-man idam naḥ vaktum arhasi
śrī-bhagavān uvāca yuktam ca santi sarvatra bhāṣante brāhmaṇāḥ yathā māyām madīyām udgṛhya vadatām kim nu durghaṭam
na etat evam yathā āttha tvam yat aham vacmi tat tathā evam vivadatām hetum śaktayaḥ me duratyayāḥ
yāsām vyatikarāt āsīt vikalpaḥ vadatām padam prāpte śama dame apyeti vādaḥ tam anu śāmyati
paraspara anupraveśāt tattvānām puruṣa-ṛṣabha paurva aparya prasaṅkhyānam yathā vaktuḥ vivakṣitam
ekasmin api dṛśyante praviṣṭāni itarāṇi ca pūrvasmin vā parasmin vā tattve tattvāni sarvaśaḥ
paurva aparyam ataḥ amīṣām prasaṅkhyānam abhīpsatām yathā viviktam yat-vaktram gṛhṇīmaḥ yukti sambhavāt
anādi avidyā yuktasya puruṣasya ātma-vedanam svataḥ na sambhavāt anyaḥ tattva-jñaḥ jñāna-daḥ bhavet
puruṣa īśvarayoḥ atra na vailakṣaṇyam aṇu api tat anya kalpanā apārthā jñānam ca prakṛteḥ guṇaḥ
prakṛtiḥ guṇa sāmyam vai prakṛteḥ na ātmanaḥ guṇāḥ sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti sthiti utpatti anta hetavaḥ
sattvam jñānam rajaḥ karma tamaḥ ajñānam iha ucyate guṇa vyatikaraḥ kālaḥ svabhāvaḥ sūtram eva ca
puruṣaḥ prakṛtiḥ vyaktam ahaṅkāraḥ nabhaḥ anilaḥ jyotiḥ āpaḥ kṣitiḥ iti tattvāni uktāni me nava
śrotram tvak darśanam ghrāṇaḥ jihvā iti jñāna-śaktayaḥ vāk pāṇi upastha pāyu aṅghriḥ karmāṇi aṅga ubhayam manaḥ
śabdaḥ sparśaḥ rasaḥ gandhaḥ rūpam ca iti artha jātayaḥ gati ukti utsarga śilpāni karma-āyatana siddhayaḥ
sarga ādau prakṛtiḥ hi asya kārya kāraṇa rūpiṇī sattva-ādibhiḥ guṇaiḥ dhatte puruṣaḥ avyaktaḥ īkṣate
vyakta-ādayaḥ vikurvāṇāḥ dhātavaḥ puruṣa īkṣayā labdha vīryāḥ sṛjanti aṇḍam saṁhatāḥ prakṛteḥ balāt
sapta eva dhātavaḥ iti tatra arthāḥ pañca kha-ādayaḥ jñānam ātmā ubhaya ādhāraḥ tataḥ deha indriya asavaḥ
ṣaṭ iti atra api bhūtāni pañca ṣaṣṭhaḥ paraḥ pumān taiḥ yuktaḥ ātma sambhūtaiḥ sṛṣṭvā idam samupāviśat
catvāri eva iti tatra api tejaḥ āpaḥ annam ātmanaḥ jātāni taiḥ idam jātam janma avayavinaḥ khalu
saṅkhyāne saptadaśake bhūta mātra indriyāṇi ca pañca pañca eka-manasā ātmā saptadaśaḥ smṛtaḥ
tadvat ṣoḍaśa-saṅkhyāne ātmā eva manaḥ ucyate bhūta indriyāṇi pañca eva manaḥ ātmā trayodaśa
ekādaśatve ātmā asau mahā-bhūta indriyāṇi ca aṣṭau prakṛtayaḥ ca eva puruṣaḥ ca nava iti atha
iti nānā prasaṅkhyānam tattvānām ṛṣibhiḥ kṛtam sarvam nyāyyam yukti-mattvāt viduṣām kim aśobhanam
śrī-uddhavaḥ uvāca prakṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ ca ubhau yadi api ātma vilakṣaṇau anyonya apāśrayāt kṛṣṇa dṛśyate na bhidā tayoḥ prakṛtau lakṣyate hi ātmā prakṛtiḥ ca tathā ātmani
evam me puṇḍarīka-akṣa mahāntam saṁśayam hṛdi chettum arhasi sarva-jña vacobhiḥ naya naipuṇaiḥ
tvattaḥ jñānam hi jīvānām pramoṣaḥ te atra śaktitaḥ tvam eva hi ātma māyāyāḥ gatim vettha na ca aparaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca prakṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ ca iti vikalpaḥ puruṣa-ṛṣabha eṣaḥ vaikārikaḥ sargaḥ guṇa vyatikara ātmakaḥ
mama aṅga māyā guṇa-mayī anekadhā vikalpa buddhīḥ ca guṇaiḥ vidhatte vaikārikaḥ tri-vidhaḥ adhyātmam ekam atha adhidaivam adhibhūtam anyat
dṛk rūpam ārkam vapuḥ atra randhre parasparam sidhyati yaḥ svataḥ khe ātmā yat eṣām aparaḥ yaḥ ādyaḥ svayā anubhūtyā akhila siddha siddhiḥ
evam tvak-ādi śravaṇa-ādi cakṣuḥ jihvā-adi nāsa-ādi ca citta-yuktam
yaḥ asau guṇa kṣobha kṛtaḥ vikāraḥ pradhāna-mūlāt mahataḥ prasūtaḥ aham tri-vṛt moha vikalpa hetuḥ vaikārikaḥ tāmasaḥ aindriyaḥ ca
ātma aparijñāna-mayaḥ vivādaḥ hi asti iti na asti iti bhidā artha-niṣṭhaḥ vyarthaḥ api na eva uparameta puṁsām mattaḥ parāvṛtta dhiyām sva-lokāt
śrī-uddhavaḥ uvāca tvattaḥ parāvṛtta dhiyaḥ sva-kṛtaiḥ karmabhiḥ prabho ucca-avacān yathā dehān gṛhṇanti visṛjanti ca tat mama ākhyāhi govinda durvibhāvyam anātmabhiḥ na hi etat prāyaśaḥ loke vidvāṁsaḥ santi vañcitāḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca manaḥ karma-mayam nṝṇām indriyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ yutam lokāt lokam prayāti anyaḥ ātmā tat anuvartate
dhyāyat manaḥ anu viṣayān dṛṣṭān vā anuśrutān atha udyat sīdat karma-tantram smṛtiḥ tat anu śāmyati
viṣaya abhiniveśena na ātmānam yat smaret punaḥ jantoḥ vai kasyacit hetoḥ mṛtyuḥ atyanta vismṛtiḥ
janma tu ātmatayā puṁsaḥ sarva-bhāvena bhūri-da viṣaya svī-kṛtim prāhuḥ yathā svapna manaḥ-rathaḥ
svapnam manaḥ-ratham ca ittham prāktanam na smarati asau tatra pūrvam iva ātmānam apūrvam ca anupaśyati
indriya-ayana sṛṣṭyā idam trai-vidhyam bhāti vastuni bahiḥ antaḥ bhidā hetuḥ janaḥ asat-jana kṛt yathā
nityadā hi aṅga bhūtāni bhavanti na bhavanti ca kālena alakṣya vegena sūkṣmatvāt tat na dṛśyate
yathā arciṣām srotasām ca phalānām vā vanaspateḥ tathā eva sarva-bhūtānām vayaḥ avasthā ādayaḥ kṛtāḥ
saḥ ayam dīpaḥ arciṣām yadvat srotasām tat idam jalam saḥ ayam pumān iti nṛṇām mṛṣā gīḥ dhīḥ mṛṣā-āyuṣām
mā svasya karma-bījena jāyate saḥ api ayam pumān mriyate vā amaraḥ bhrāntyā yathā agniḥ dāru saṁyutaḥ
niṣeka garbha janmāni bālya kaumāra yauvanam vayaḥ-madhyam jarā mṛtyuḥ iti avasthāḥ tanoḥ nava
etāḥ manaḥ-rathaḥ-mayīḥ ha anyasya ucca avacāḥ tanūḥ guṇa-saṅgāt upādatte kvacit kaścit jahāti ca
ātmanaḥ pitṛ putrābhyām anumeyau bhava apyayau na bhava-apyaya-vastūnām abhijñaḥ dvaya lakṣaṇaḥ
taroḥ bīja vipākābhyām yaḥ vidvān janma saṁyamau taroḥ vilakṣaṇaḥ draṣṭā evam draṣṭā tanoḥ pṛthak
prakṛteḥ evam ātmānam avivicya abudhaḥ pumān tattvena sparśa sammūḍhaḥ saṁsāram pratipadyate
sattva-saṅgāt ṛṣīn devān rajasā asura mānuṣān tamasā bhūta tiryaktvam bhrāmitaḥ yāti karmabhiḥ
nṛtyataḥ gāyataḥ paśyan yathā eva anukaroti tān evam buddhi guṇān paśyan anīhaḥ api anukāryate
yathā ambhasā pracalatā taravaḥ api calāḥ iva cakṣuṣā bhrāmyamāṇena dṛśyate bhramatī iva bhūḥ yathā manaḥ-ratha dhiyaḥ viṣaya anubhavaḥ mṛṣā svapna-dṛṣṭāḥ ca dāśārha tathā saṁsāraḥ ātmanaḥ
arthe hi avidyamāne api saṁsṛtiḥ na nivartate dhyāyataḥ viṣayān asya svapne anartha āgamaḥ yathā
tasmāt uddhava mā bhuṅkṣva viṣayān asat indriyaiḥ ātma agrahaṇa nirbhātam paśya vaikalpikam bhramam
kṣiptaḥ avamānitaḥ asadbhiḥ pralabdhaḥ asūyitaḥ atha vā tāḍitaḥ sanniruddhaḥ vā vṛttyā vā parihāpitaḥ niṣṭhyutaḥ mūtritaḥ vā ajñaiḥ bahudhā evam prakampitaḥ śreyaḥ-kāmaḥ kṛcchra-gataḥ ātmanā ātmānam uddharet
śrī-uddhavaḥ uvāca yathā evam anubudhyeyam vada naḥ vadatām vara
su-duḥsaham imam manye ātmani asat atikramam viduṣām api viśva-ātman prakṛtiḥ hi balīyasī ṛte tvat-dharma niratān śāntān te caraṇa-ālayān
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca saḥ evam āśaṁsitaḥ uddhavena bhāgavata mukhyena dāśārha mukhyaḥ sabhājayan bhṛtya vacaḥ mukundaḥ tam ābabhāṣe śravaṇīya vīryaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca bārhaspatya saḥ na asti atra sādhuḥ vai durjana īritaiḥ duruktaiḥ bhinnam ātmānam yaḥ samādhātum īśvaraḥ
na tathā tapyate viddhaḥ pumān bāṇaiḥ tu marma-gaiḥ yathā tudanti marma-sthāḥ hi asatām paruṣa iṣavaḥ
kathayanti mahat puṇyam itihāsam iha uddhava tam aham varṇayiṣyāmi nibodha su-samāhitaḥ
kenacit bhikṣuṇā gītam paribhūtena durjanaiḥ smaratā dhṛti-yuktena vipākam nija-karmaṇām
avantiṣu dvijaḥ kaścit āsīt āḍhya-tamaḥ śriyā vārtā vṛttiḥ kadaryaḥ tu kāmī lubdhaḥ ati-kopanaḥ
jñātayaḥ atithayaḥ tasya vāk-mātreṇa api na arcitāḥ śūnya-avasathe ātmā api kāle kāmaiḥ anarcitaḥ
duḥśīlasya kadaryasya druhyante putra bāndhavāḥ dārāḥ duhitaraḥ bhṛtyāḥ visaṇṇāḥ na ācaran priyam
tasya evam yakṣa-vittasya cyutasya ubhaya lokataḥ dharma kāma vihīnasya cukrudhuḥ pañca-bhāginaḥ
tat avadhyāna visrasta puṇya skandhasya bhūri-da arthaḥ api agacchat nidhanam bahu āyāsa pariśramaḥ
jñātayaḥ jagṛhuḥ kiñcit kiñcit dasyavaḥ uddhava daivataḥ kālataḥ kiñcit brahma-bandhoḥ nṛ pārthivāt
saḥ evam draviṇe naṣṭe dharma kāma vivarjitaḥ upekṣitaḥ ca sva-janaiḥ cintām āpa duratyayām
tasya evam dhyāyataḥ dīrgham naṣṭa-rāyaḥ tapasvinaḥ khidyataḥ bāṣpa-kaṇṭhasya nirvedaḥ su-mahān abhūt
saḥ ca āha idam aho kaṣṭam vṛthā ātmā me anutāpitaḥ na dharmāya na kāmāya yasya artha āyāsaḥ īdṛśaḥ
prāyeṇa arthāḥ kadaryāṇām na sukhāya kadācana iha ca ātma upatāpāya mṛtasya narakāya ca
yaśaḥ yaśasvinām śuddham ślāghyāḥ ye guṇinām guṇāḥ lobhaḥ su-alpaḥ api tān hanti śvitraḥ rūpam iva īpsitam
arthaysa sādhane siddhe utkarṣe rakṣaṇe vyaye nāśa upabhoge āyāsaḥ trāsaḥ cintā bhramaḥ nṛṇām
steyam hiṁsā anṛtam dambhaḥ kāmaḥ krodhaḥ smayaḥ madaḥ bhedaḥ vairam aviśvāsaḥ saṁspardhā vyasanāni ca ete pañcadaśa anarthāḥ hi artha-mūlāḥ matāḥ nṛṇām tasmāt anartham artha-ākhyam śreyaḥ-arthī dūrataḥ tyajet
bhidyante bhrātaraḥ dārāḥ pitaraḥ suhṛdaḥ tathā eka āsnigdhāḥ kākiṇinā sadyaḥ sarve arayaḥ kṛtāḥ
arthena alpīyasā hi ete saṁrabdhāḥ dīpta manyavaḥ tyajanti āśu spṛdhaḥ ghnanti sahasā utsṛjya sauhṛdam
labdhvā janma amara prārthyam mānuṣyam tat dvija-āgryatām tat anādṛtya ye sva-artham ghnanti yānti aśubhām gatim
svarga apavargayoḥ dvāram prāpya lokam imam pumān draviṇe kaḥ anuṣajjeta martyaḥ anarthasya dhāmani
deva ṛṣi pitṛ bhūtāni jñātīn bandhūn ca bhāginaḥ asaṁvibhajya ca ātmānam yakṣa-vittaḥ patati adhaḥ
vyarthayā artha īhayā vittam pramattasya vayaḥ balam kuśalāḥ yena sidhyanti jaraṭhaḥ kim nu sādhaye
kasmāt saṅkliśyate vidvān vyarthayā artha-īhayā asakṛt kasyacit māyayā nūnam lokaḥ ayam su-vimohitaḥ
kim dhanaiḥ dhana-daiḥ vā kim kāmaiḥ vā kāma-daiḥ uta mṛtyunā grasyamānasya karmabhiḥ vā uta janma-daiḥ
nūnam me bhagavān tuṣṭaḥ sarva-deva-mayaḥ hariḥ yena nītaḥ daśām etām nirvedaḥ ca ātmanaḥ plavaḥ
saḥ aham kāla-avaśeṣeṇa śoṣayiṣye aṅgam ātmanaḥ apramattaḥ akhila sva-arthe yadi syāt siddhaḥ ātmani
tatra mām anumoderan devāḥ tri-bhuvana īśvarāḥ muhūrtena brahmalokam khaṭvāṅga samasādhayat
śrī-bhagavān uvāca iti abhipretya manasā hi āvantyaḥ dvija-sat-tamaḥ unmucya hṛdaya granthīn śāntaḥ bhikṣuḥ abhūt muniḥ
saḥ cacāra mahīm etām saṁyata ātma indriya anilaḥ bhikṣā-artham nagara grāmān asaṅgaḥ alakṣitaḥ aviśat
tam vai pravayasam bhikṣum avadhūtam asat janāḥ dṛṣṭvā paryabhavan bhadra bahvībhiḥ paribhūtibhiḥ
kecit tri-veṇum jagṛhuḥ eke pātram kamaṇḍalum pīṭham ca eke akṣa-sūtram ca kanthām cīrāṇi kecana pradāya ca punaḥ tāni darśitāni ādaduḥ muneḥ
annam ca bhaikṣya sampannam bhuñjānasya sarit taṭe mūtrayanti ca pāpiṣṭhāḥ ṣṭhīvanti asya ca mūrdhani
yata-vācam vācayanti tāḍayanti na vakti cet tarjayanti apare vāgbhiḥ stenaḥ ayam iti vādinaḥ badhnanti rajjvā tam kecit badhyatām badhyatām iti
kṣipanti eke avajānantaḥ eṣaḥ dharma-dhvajaḥ śaṭhaḥ kṣīṇa-vittaḥ imām vṛttim agrahīt sva-jana ujjhitaḥ
