aho eṣaḥ mahā-sāraḥ dhṛtimān giri-rāṭ iva maunena sādhayati artham baka-vat dṛḍha niścayaḥ iti eke vihasanti enam eke durvātayanti ca tam babandhuḥ nirurudhuḥ yathā krīḍanakam dvijam
evam saḥ bhautikam duḥkham daivikam daihikam ca yat bhoktavyam ātmanaḥ diṣṭam prāptam prāptam abudhyata
paribhūtaḥ imām gāthām agāyata nara-adhamaiḥ pātayadbhiḥ sva-dharma sthaḥ dhṛtim āsthāya sāttvikīm
dvijaḥ uvāca na ayam janaḥ me sukha duḥkha hetuḥ na devatā ātmā graha karma kālāḥ manaḥ param kāraṇaṁ āmananti saṁsāra cakram parivartayet yat
manaḥ guṇān vai sṛjate balīyaḥ tataḥ ca karmāṇi vilakṣaṇāni śuklāni kṛṣṇāni atha lohitāni tebhyaḥ sa-varṇāḥ sṛtayaḥ bhavanti
anīhaḥ ātmā manasā samīhatā hiraṇ-mayaḥ mat-sakhaḥ udvicaṣṭe manaḥ sva-liṅgam parigṛhya kāmān juṣan nibaddhaḥ guṇa-saṅgataḥ asau
dānam sva-dharmaḥ niyamaḥ yamaḥ ca śrutam ca karmāṇi ca sat vratāni sarve manaḥ-nigrahaḥ lakṣaṇa antāḥ paraḥ hi yogaḥ manasaḥ samādhiḥ
samāhitam yasya manaḥ praśāntam dāna-ādibhiḥ kim vada tasya kṛtyam asaṁyatam yasya manaḥ vinaśyat dāna-ādibhiḥ cet aparam kim ebhiḥ
manaḥ vaśe anye hi abhavan sma devāḥ manaḥ ca na anyasya vaśam sameti bhīṣmaḥ hi devaḥ sahasaḥ sahīyān yuñjyāt vaśe tam saḥ hi deva-devaḥ
tam durjayam śatrum asahya vegam arum-tudam tat na vijitya kecit kurvanti asat vigraham atra martyaiḥ mitrāṇi udāsīna ripūn vimūḍhāḥ
deham manaḥ-mātram imam gṛhītvā mama aham iti andha dhiyaḥ manuṣyāḥ eṣaḥ aham anyaḥ ayam iti bhrameṇa duranta-pāre tamasi bhramanti
janaḥ tu hetuḥ sukha-duḥkhayoḥ cet kim ātmanaḥ ca atra hi bhaumayoḥ tat jihvām kvacit sandaśati sva dadbhiḥ tat vedanāyām katamāya kupyet
duḥkhasya hetuḥ yadi devatāḥ tu kim ātmanaḥ tatra vikārayoḥ tat yat aṅgam aṅgena nihanyate kvacit krudhyeta kasmai puruṣaḥ sva-dehe
ātmā yadi syāt sukha-duḥkha hetuḥ kim anyataḥ tatra nija svabhāvaḥ na hi ātmanaḥ anyat yadi tat mṛṣā syāt krudhyeta kasmāt na sukham na duḥkham
grahāḥ nimittam sukha-duḥkhayoḥ cet kim ātmanaḥ ajasya janasya te vai grahaiḥ grahasya eva vadanti pīḍām krudhyeta kasmai puruṣaḥ tataḥ anyaḥ
karma astu hetuḥ sukha-duḥkhayoḥ cet kim ātmanaḥ tat hi jaḍa-ajaḍatve dehaḥ tu acit puruṣaḥ ayam su-parṇaḥ krudhyeta kasmai na hi karma mūlam
kālaḥ tu hetuḥ sukha-duḥkhayoḥ cet kim ātmanaḥ tatra tat-ātmakaḥ asau na agneḥ hi tāpaḥ na himasya tat syāt krudhyeta kasmai na parasya dvandvam
na kenacit kva api kathañcana asya dvandva uparāgaḥ parataḥ parasya yathā ahamaḥ saṁsṛti rūpiṇaḥ syāt evam prabuddhaḥ na bibheti bhūtaiḥ
etām saḥ āsthāya para-ātma-niṣṭhām adhyāsitām pūrva-tamaiḥ mahā-ṛṣibhiḥ aham tariṣyāmi duranta-pāram tamaḥ mukunda-aṅghri niṣevayā eva
śrī-bhagavān uvāca nirvidya naṣṭa-draviṇe gata-klamaḥ pravrajya gām paryaṭamānaḥ ittham nirākṛtaḥ asadbhiḥ api sva-dharmāt akampitaḥ amūm muniḥ āha gāthām
sukha-duḥkha-pradaḥ na anyaḥ puruṣasya ātma vibhramaḥ mitra udāsīna ripavaḥ saṁsāraḥ tamasaḥ kṛtaḥ
tasmāt sarva-ātmanā tāta nigṛhāṇa manaḥ dhiyā mayi āveśitayā yuktaḥ etāvān yoga-saṅgrahaḥ
yaḥ etām bhikṣuṇā gītām brahma niṣṭhām samāhitaḥ dhārayan śrāvayan śṛṇvan dvandvaiḥ na eva abhibhūyate
śrī-bhagavān uvāca atha te sampravakṣyāmi sāṅkhyam pūrvaiḥ viniścitam yat vijñāya pumān sadyaḥ jahyāt vaikalpikam bhramam
āsīt jñānam atha u arthaḥ ekam eva avikalpitam yadā viveka nipuṇāḥ ādau kṛta-yuge ayuge
tat māyā phala rūpeṇa kevalam nirvikalpitam vāk manaḥ agocaram satyam dvidhā samabhavat bṛhat
tayoḥ ekataraḥ hi arthaḥ prakṛtiḥ sā ubhaya-ātmikā jñānam tu anyatamaḥ bhāvaḥ puruṣaḥ saḥ abhidhīyate
tamaḥ rajaḥ sattvam iti prakṛteḥ abhavan guṇāḥ mayā prakṣobhyamāṇāyāḥ puruṣa anumatena ca
tebhyaḥ samabhavat sūtram mahān sūtreṇa saṁyutaḥ tataḥ vikurvataḥ jātaḥ yaḥ ahaṅkāraḥ vimohanaḥ
vaikārikaḥ taijasaḥ ca tāmasaḥ ca iti aham tri-vṛt tat-mātra indriya manasām kāraṇam cit-acit mayaḥ
arthaḥ tat-mātrikāt jajñe tāmasāt indriyāṇi ca taijasāt devatāḥ āsan ekādaśa ca vaikṛtāt
mayā sañcoditāḥ bhāvāḥ sarve saṁhatya kāriṇaḥ aṇḍam utpādayām āsuḥ mama āyatanam uttamam
tasmin aham samabhavam aṇḍe salila saṁsthitau mama nābhyām abhūt padmam viśva-ākhyam tatra ca ātma-bhūḥ
saḥ asṛjat tapasā yuktaḥ rajasā mat anugrahāt lokān sa-pālān viśva ātmā bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svaḥ iti tridhā
devānām okaḥ āsīt svaḥ bhūtānām ca bhuvaḥ padam martya-ādīnām ca bhūḥ lokaḥ siddhānām tritayāt param
adhaḥ asurāṇām nāgānām bhūmeḥ okaḥ asṛjat prabhuḥ tri-lokyām gatayaḥ sarvāḥ karmaṇām tri-guṇa-ātmanām
yogasya tapasaḥ ca eva nyāsasya gatayaḥ amalāḥ mahaḥ janaḥ tapaḥ satyam bhakti-yogasya mat gatiḥ
mayā kāla-ātmanā dhātrā karma-yuktam idam jagat guṇa-pravāhe etasmin unmajjati nimajjati
aṇuḥ bṛhat kṛśaḥ sthūlaḥ yaḥ yaḥ bhāvaḥ prasidhyati sarvaḥ api ubhaya saṁyuktaḥ prakṛtyā puruṣeṇa ca
yaḥ tu yasya ādiḥ antaḥ ca saḥ vai madhyam ca tasya san vikāraḥ vyavahāra-arthaḥ yathā taijasa pārthivāḥ
yat upādāya pūrvaḥ tu bhāvaḥ vikurute aparam ādiḥ antaḥ yadā yasya tat satyam abhidhīyate
prakṛtiḥ yasya upādānam ādhāraḥ puruṣaḥ paraḥ sataḥ abhivyañjakaḥ kālaḥ brahma tat tritayam tu aham
sargaḥ pravartate tāvat paurva-aparyeṇa nityaśaḥ mahān guṇa-visarga arthaḥ sthiti-antaḥ yāvat īkṣaṇam
virāṭ mayā āsādyamānaḥ loka kalpa vikalpakaḥ pañcatvāya viśeṣāya kalpate bhuvanaiḥ saha
anne pralīyate martyam annam dhānāsu līyate dhānāḥ bhūmau pralīyante bhūmiḥ gandhe pralīyate apsu pralīyate gandhaḥ āpaḥ ca sva-guṇe rase līyate jyotiṣi rasaḥ jyotiḥ rūpe pralīyate rūpam vāyau saḥ ca sparśe līyate saḥ api ca ambare ambaram śabda tat-mātre indriyāṇi sva-yoniṣu yoniḥ vaikārike saumya līyate manasi īśvare śabdaḥ bhūta-ādim apyeti bhūta-ādiḥ mahati prabhuḥ saḥ līyate mahān sveṣu guṇeṣu guṇa-vat-tamaḥ te avyakte sampralīyante tat kāle līyate avyaye kālaḥ māyā-maye jīve jīvaḥ ātmani mayi aje ātmā kevalaḥ ātma-sthaḥ vikalpa apāya lakṣaṇaḥ
evam anvīkṣamāṇasya katham vaikalpikaḥ bhramaḥ manasaḥ hṛdi tiṣṭheta vyomni iva arka udaye tamaḥ
eṣaḥ sāṅkhya-vidhiḥ proktaḥ saṁśaya granthi bhedanaḥ pratiloma-anulomābhyām para avara dṛśā mayā
śrī-bhagavān uvāca guṇānām asammiśrāṇām pumān yena yathā bhavet tat me puruṣa-varya idam upadhāraya śaṁsataḥ
śamaḥ damaḥ titikṣā īkṣā tapaḥ satyam dayā smṛtiḥ tuṣṭiḥ tyāgaḥ aspṛhā śraddhā hrīḥ dayā-ādiḥ sva-nirvṛtiḥ kāmaḥ īhā madaḥ tṛṣṇā stambhaḥ āśīḥ bhidā sukham mada-utsāhaḥ yaśaḥ-prītiḥ hāsyam vīryam bala-udyamaḥ krodhaḥ lobhaḥ anṛtam hiṁsā yācñā dambhaḥ klamaḥ kaliḥ śoka-mohau viṣāda-ārtī nidrā āśā bhīḥ anudyamaḥ sattvasya rajasaḥ ca etāḥ tamasaḥ ca ānupūrvaśaḥ vṛttayaḥ varṇita prāyāḥ sannipātam atho śṛṇu
sannipātaḥ tu aham iti mama iti uddhava yā matiḥ vyavahāraḥ sannipātaḥ manaḥ mātrā indriya asubhiḥ
dharme ca arthe ca kāme ca yadā asau pariniṣṭhitaḥ guṇānām sannikarṣaḥ ayam śraddhā rati dhana āvahaḥ
pravṛtti lakṣaṇe niṣṭhā pumān yarhi gṛha-āśrame sva-dharme ca anu tiṣṭheta guṇānām samitiḥ hi sā
puruṣam sattva-saṁyuktam anumīyāt śama-ādibhiḥ kāma-ādibhiḥ rajaḥ-yuktam krodha-ādyaiḥ tamasā yutam
yadā bhajati mām bhaktyā nirapekṣaḥ sva-karmabhiḥ tam sattva-prakṛtim vidyāt puruṣam striyam eva vā
yadā āśiṣaḥ āśāsya mām bhajeta sva-karmabhiḥ tam rajaḥ-prakṛtim vidyāt hiṁsām āśāsya tāmasam
sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti guṇāḥ jīvasya na eva me citta-jāḥ yaiḥ tu bhūtānām sajjamānaḥ nibadhyate
yadā itarau jayet sattvam bhāsvaram viśadam śivam tadā sukhena yujyeta dharma jñāna ādibhiḥ pumān
yadā jayet tamaḥ sattvam rajaḥ saṅgam bhidā calam tadā duḥkhena yujyeta karmaṇā yaśasā śriyā
yadā jayet rajaḥ sattvam tamaḥ mūḍham layam jaḍam yujyeta śoka mohābhyām nidrayā hiṁsayā āśayā
yadā cittam prasīdeta indriyāṇām ca nirvṛtiḥ dehe abhayam manaḥ asaṅgam tat sattvam viddhi mat padam
vikurvan kriyayā ca ā dhīḥ anivṛttiḥ ca cetasām gātra asvāsthyam manaḥ bhrāntam rajaḥ etaiḥ niśāmaya
sīdat cittam vilīyeta cetasaḥ grahaṇe akṣamam manaḥ naṣṭam tamaḥ glāniḥ tamaḥ tat upadhāraya
edhamāne guṇe sattve devānām balam edhate asurāṇām ca rajasi tamasi uddhava rakṣasām
sattvāt jāgaraṇam vidyāt rajasā svapnam ādiśet prasvāpam tamasā jantoḥ turīyam triṣu santatam
upari upari gacchanti sattvena brāhmaṇāḥ janāḥ tamasā adhaḥ adhaḥ ā-mukhyāt rajasā antara-cāriṇaḥ
sattve pralīnāḥ svaḥ yānti nara-lokam rajaḥ-layāḥ tamaḥ-layāḥ tu nirayam yānti mām eva nirguṇāḥ
mat-arpaṇam niṣphalam vā sāttvikam nija karma tat rājasam phala-saṅkalpam hiṁsā-prāya-ādi tāmasam
kaivalyam sāttvikam jñānam rajaḥ vaikalpikam ca yat prākṛtam tāmasam jñānam mat-niṣṭham nirguṇam smṛtam
vanam tu sāttvikaḥ vāsaḥ grāmaḥ rājasaḥ ucyate tāmasam dyūta-sadanam mat-niketam tu nirguṇam
sāttvikaḥ kārakaḥ asaṅgī rāga-andhaḥ rājasaḥ smṛtaḥ tāmasaḥ smṛti vibhraṣṭaḥ nirguṇaḥ mat-apāśrayaḥ
sāttvikī ādhyātmikī śraddhā karma śraddhā tu rājasī tāmasī adharme yā śraddhā mat-sevāyām tu nirguṇā
pathyam pūtam anāyastam āhāryam sāttvikam smṛtam rājasam ca indriya-preṣṭham tāmasam ca ārti-da aśuci
sāttvikam sukham ātma-uttham viṣaya-uttham tu rājasam tāmasam moha dainya uttham nirguṇam mat-apāśrayam
dravyam deśaḥ phalam kālaḥ jñānam karma ca kārakaḥ śraddhā avasthā ākṛtiḥ niṣṭhā trai-guṇyaḥ sarvaḥ eva hi
sarve guṇa-mayāḥ bhāvāḥ puruṣa avyakta dhiṣṭhitāḥ dṛṣṭam śrutam anudhyātam buddhyā vā puruṣa-ṛṣabha
etāḥ saṁsṛtayaḥ puṁsaḥ guṇa karma nibandhanāḥ yena ime nirjitāḥ saumya guṇāḥ jīvena citta-jāḥ bhakti-yogena mat-niṣṭhaḥ mat-bhāvāya prapadyate
tasmāt deham imam labdhvā jñāna vijñāna sambhavam guṇa-saṅgam vinirdhūya mām bhajantu vicakṣaṇāḥ
niḥsaṅgaḥ mām bhajet vidvān apramattaḥ jita-indriyaḥ rajaḥ tamaḥ ca abhijayet sattva-saṁsevayā muniḥ
sattvam ca abhijayet yuktaḥ nairapekṣyeṇa śānta dhīḥ sampadyate guṇaiḥ muktaḥ jīvaḥ jīvam vihāya mām
jīvaḥ jīva-vinirmuktaḥ guṇaiḥ ca āśaya-sambhavaiḥ mayā eva brahmaṇā pūrṇaḥ na bahiḥ na antaraḥ caret
śrī-bhagavān uvāca mat-lakṣaṇam imam kāyam labdhvā mat-dharme āsthitaḥ ānandam parama-ātmānam ātma-stham samapaiti mām
guṇa-mayyā jīva-yonyā vimuktaḥ jñāna niṣṭhayā guṇeṣu māyā-mātreṣu dṛśyamāneṣu avastutaḥ vartamānaḥ api na pumān yujyate avastubhiḥ guṇaiḥ
saṅgam na kuryāt asatām śiśna udara tṛpām kvacit tasya anugaḥ tamasi andhe patati andha-anuga andha-vat
ailaḥ samrāṭ imām gāthām agāyata bṛhat śravāḥ urvaśī-virahāt muhyan nirviṇṇaḥ śoka saṁyame
tyaktvā ātmānam vrajantīm tām nagnaḥ unmatta-vat nṛpaḥ vilapan anvagāt jāye ghore tiṣṭha iti viklavaḥ
kāmān atṛptaḥ anujuṣan kṣullakān varṣa yāminīḥ na veda yāntīḥ na āyāntīḥ urvaśī ākṛṣṭa cetanaḥ
ailaḥ uvāca aho me moha vistāraḥ kāma kaśmala cetasaḥ devyā gṛhīta kaṇṭhasya na āyuḥ khaṇḍāḥ ime smṛtāḥ
na aham veda abhinirmuktaḥ sūryaḥ vā abhyuditaḥ amuyā mūṣitaḥ varṣa pūgānām bata ahāni gatāni uta
aho me ātma sammohaḥ yena ātmā yoṣitām kṛtaḥ krīḍā-mṛgaḥ cakravartī naradeva śikhā-maṇiḥ
sa-paricchadam ātmānam hitvā tṛṇam iva īśvaram yāntīm striyam ca anvagaman nagnaḥ unmatta-vat rudan
kutaḥ tasya anubhāvaḥ syāt tejaḥ īśatvam eva vā yaḥ anvagaccham striyam yāntīm khara-vat pāda tāḍitaḥ
kim vidyayā kim tapasā kim tyāgena śrutena vā kim viviktena maunena strībhiḥ yasya manaḥ hṛtam
sva-arthasya akovidam dhik mām mūrkham paṇḍita-māninam yaḥ aham īśvaratām prāpya strībhiḥ go-khara-vat jitaḥ
sevataḥ varṣa-pūgān me urvaśyāḥ adhara āsavam na tṛpyati ātma-bhūḥ kāmaḥ vahniḥ āhutibhiḥ yathā
puṁścalyā apahṛtam cittam kaḥ nu anyaḥ mocitum prabhuḥ ātma-ārāma īśvaram ṛte bhagavantam adhokṣajam
bodhitasya api devyā me su-ukta vākyena durmateḥ manaḥ-gataḥ mahā-mohaḥ na apayāti ajita-ātmanaḥ
kim etayā naḥ apakṛtam rajjvā vā sarpa-cetasaḥ draṣṭuḥ svarūpa aviduṣaḥ yaḥ aham yat ajita-indriyaḥ
kva ayam malīmasaḥ kāyaḥ daurgandhya ādi ātmakaḥ aśuciḥ kva guṇāḥ saumanasya ādyāḥ hi adhyāsaḥ avidyayā kṛtaḥ
pitroḥ kim svam nu bhāryāyāḥ svāminaḥ agneḥ śva-gṛdhrayoḥ kim ātmanaḥ kim suhṛdām iti yaḥ na avasīyate tasmin kalevare amedhye tuccha-niṣṭhe viṣajjate aho su-bhadram su-nasam su-smitam ca mukham striyaḥ
tvak māṁsa rudhira snāyu medaḥ majjā asthi saṁhatau viṭ mūtra pūye ramatām kṛmīṇām kiyat antaram
atha api na upasajjeta strīṣu straiṇeṣu ca artha-vit viṣaya indriya saṁyogāt manaḥ kṣubhyati na anyathā
adṛṣṭāt aśrutāt bhāvāt na bhāvaḥ upajāyate asamprayuñjataḥ prāṇān śāmyati stimitam manaḥ
tasmāt saṅgaḥ na kartavyaḥ strīṣu straiṇeṣu ca indriyaiḥ viduṣām ca api avisrabdhaḥ ṣaṭ-vargaḥ kim u mādṛśām
śrī-bhagavān uvāca evam pragāyan nṛpa deva devaḥ saḥ urvaśī-lokam atha u vihāya ātmānam ātmani avagamya mām vai upāramat jñāna vidhūta mohaḥ
tataḥ duḥsaṅgam utsṛjya satsu sajjeta buddhi-mān santaḥ eva asya chindanti manaḥ vyāsaṅgam uktibhiḥ
santaḥ anapekṣāḥ mat-cittāḥ praśāntāḥ sama-darśinaḥ nirmamāḥ nirahaṅkārāḥ nirdvandvāḥ niṣparigrahāḥ
teṣu nityam mahā-bhāga mahā-bhāgeṣu mat-kathāḥ sambhavanti hi tāḥ nṝṇām juṣatām prapunanti agham
tāḥ ye śṛṇvanti gāyanti hi anumodanti ca ādṛtāḥ mat-parāḥ śraddadhānāḥ ca bhaktim vindanti te mayi
bhaktim labdhavataḥ sādhoḥ kim anyat avaśiṣyate mayi ananta-guṇe brahmaṇi ānanda anubhava ātmani
yathā upaśrayamāṇasya bhagavantam vibhāvasum śītam bhayam tamaḥ apyeti sādhūn saṁsevataḥ tathā
nimajjya unmajjatām ghore bhava abdhau parama ayanam santaḥ brahma-vidaḥ śāntāḥ nauḥ dṛḍhā iva apsu majjatām
annam hi prāṇinām prāṇaḥ ārtānām śaraṇam tu aham dharmaḥ vittam nṛṇām pretya santaḥ arvāk bibhyataḥ araṇam
santaḥ diśanti cakṣūṁṣi bahiḥ arkaḥ samutthitaḥ devatāḥ bāndhavāḥ santaḥ santaḥ ātmā aham eva ca
vaitasenaḥ tataḥ api evam urvaśyāḥ loka niṣpṛhaḥ mukta saṅgaḥ mahīm etām ātma-ārāmaḥ cacāra ha
śrī-uddhavaḥ uvāca kriyā-yogam samācakṣva bhavat ārādhanam prabho yasmāt tvām ye yathā arcanti sātvatāḥ sātvata-ṛṣabha
etat vadanti munayaḥ muhuḥ niḥśreyasam nṛṇām nāradaḥ bhagavān vyāsaḥ ācāryaḥ aṅgirasaḥ sutaḥ
niḥsṛtam te mukha-ambhojāt yat āha bhagavān ajaḥ putrebhyaḥ bhṛgu-mukhyebhyaḥ devyai ca bhagavān bhavaḥ etat vai sarva-varṇānām āśramāṇām ca sammatam śreyasām uttamam manye strī śūdrāṇām ca māna-da
etat kamala-patra-akṣa karma-bandha vimocanam bhaktāya anuraktāya brūhi viśva-īśvara īśvara
śrī-bhagavān uvāca na hi antaḥ ananta-pārasya karma-kāṇḍasya ca uddhava saṅkṣiptam varṇayiṣyāmi yathā-vat anupūrvaśaḥ
vaidikaḥ tāntrikaḥ miśraḥ iti me tri-vidhaḥ makhaḥ trayāṇām īpsitena eva vidhinā mām samarcaret
yadā sva nigamena uktam dvijatvam prāpya pūruṣaḥ yathā yajeta mām bhaktyā śraddhayā tat nibodha me
arcāyām sthaṇḍile agnau vā sūrye vā apsu hṛdi dvijaḥ dravyeṇa bhakti-yuktaḥ arcet sva-gurum mām amāyayā
pūrvam snānam prakurvīta dhauta dantaḥ aṅga śuddhaye ubhayaiḥ api ca snānam mantraiḥ mṛt-grahaṇa-ādinā
sandhyā upāsti ādi karmāṇi vedena ācoditāni me pūjām taiḥ kalpayet samyak-saṅkalpaḥ karma pāvanīm
śailī dāru-mayī lauhī lepyā lekhyā ca saikatī manaḥ-mayī maṇi-mayī pratimā aṣṭa-vidhā smṛtā
calā acalā iti dvi-vidhā pratiṣṭhā jīva-mandiram udvāsa āvāhane na staḥ sthirāyām uddhava arcane
asthirāyām vikalpaḥ syāt sthaṇḍile tu bhavet dvayam snapanam tu avilepyāyām anyatra parimārjanam
dravyaiḥ prasiddhaiḥ mat-yāgaḥ pratimā-ādiṣu amāyinaḥ bhaktasya ca yathā-labdhaiḥ hṛdi bhāvena ca eva hi
snāna alaṅkaraṇam preṣṭham arcāyām eva tu uddhava sthaṇḍile tattva-vinyāsaḥ vahnau ājya plutam haviḥ sūrye ca abhyarhaṇam preṣṭham salile salila-ādibhiḥ śraddhayā upāhṛtam preṣṭham bhaktena mama vāri api
bhūri api abhakta upāhṛtam na me toṣāya kalpate gandhaḥ dhūpaḥ sumanasaḥ dīpaḥ anna-ādyam ca kim punaḥ
śuciḥ sambhṛta sambhāraḥ prāk darbhaiḥ kalpita āsanaḥ āsīnaḥ prāk udak vā arcet arcāyām tu atha sammukhaḥ
kṛta-nyāsaḥ kṛta-nyāsām mat-arcām pāṇinā āmṛjet kalaśam prokṣaṇīyam ca yathā-vat upasādhayet
tat adbhiḥ deva-yajanam dravyāṇi ātmānam eva ca prokṣya pātrāṇi trīṇi adbhiḥ taiḥ taiḥ dravyaiḥ ca sādhayet
pādya arghya ācamanīya artham trīṇi pātrāṇi deśikaḥ hṛdā śīrṣṇā atha śikhayā gāyatryā ca abhimantrayet
piṇḍe vāyu agni saṁśuddhe hṛt padma sthām parām mama aṇvīm jīva-kalām dhyāyet nāda-ante siddha bhāvitām
tayā ātma-bhūtayā piṇḍe vyāpte sampūjya tat-mayaḥ āvāhya arcā-ādiṣu sthāpya nyasta-aṅgam mām prapūjayet
pādya upasparśa arhaṇa ādīn upacārān prakalpayet dharma-ādibhiḥ ca navabhiḥ kalpayitvā āsanam mama padmam aṣṭa-dalam tatra karṇikā kesara ujjvalam ubhābhyām veda-tantrābhyām mahyam tu ubhaya siddhaye
sudarśanam pāñcajanyam gadā asi iṣu dhanuḥ halān muṣalam kaustubham mālām śrīvatsam ca anupūjayet
nandam sunandam garuḍam pracaṇḍam caṇḍam eva ca mahā-balam balam ca eva kumudam kumuda-īkṣaṇam
durgām vināyakam vyāsam viṣvaksenam gurūn surān sve sve sthāne tu abhimukhān pūjayet prokṣaṇa-ādibhiḥ
candana uśīra karpūra kuṅkuma aguru vāsitaiḥ salilaiḥ snāpayet mantraiḥ nityadā vibhave sati svarṇa-gharma-anuvākena mahā-puruṣa-vidyayā pauruṣeṇa api sūktena sāmabhiḥ rājana-ādibhiḥ
vastra upavīta ābharaṇa patra srak gandha-lepanaiḥ alaṅkurvīta sa-prema mat-bhaktaḥ mām yathā ucitam
pādyam ācamanīyam ca gandham sumanasaḥ akṣatān dhūpa dīpa upahāryāṇi dadyāt me śraddhayā arcakaḥ
guḍa pāyasa sarpīṁṣi śaṣkulī āpūpa modakān saṁyāva dadhi sūpān ca naivedyam sati kalpayet
abhyaṅga unmardana ādarśa danta-dhāva abhiṣecanam anna ādya gītā nṛtyāni parvaṇi syuḥ uta anu-aham
vidhinā vihite kuṇḍe mekhalā garta vedibhiḥ agnim ādhāya paritaḥ samūhet pāṇinā uditam
paristīrya atha paryukṣet anvādhāya yathā-vidhi prokṣaṇyā āsādya dravyāṇi prokṣya agnau bhāvayeta mām
tapta jāmbū-nada prakhyam śaṅkha cakra gadā ambujaiḥ lasat catuḥ-bhujam śāntam padma kiñjalka vāsasam sphurat kirīṭa kaṭaka kaṭi-sūtra vara-aṅgadam śrī-vatsa vakṣasam bhrājat kaustubham vana-mālinam dhyāyan abhyarcya dārūṇi haviṣā abhighṛtāni ca prāsya ājya bhāgau āghārau dattvā ca ājya plutam haviḥ juhuyāt mūla-mantreṇa ṣoḍaśa-ṛcā avadānataḥ dharma-ādibhyaḥ yathā-nyāyam mantraiḥ sviṣṭi-kṛtam budhaḥ
abhyarcya atha namaskṛtya pārṣadebhyaḥ balim haret mūla-mantram japet brahma smaran nārāyaṇa-ātmakam
dattvā ācamanam uccheṣam viṣvaksenāya kalpayet mukha-vāsam surabhi-mat tāmbūla-ādyam atha arhayet
upagāyan gṛṇan nṛtyan karmāṇi abhinayan mama mat-kathāḥ śrāvayan śṛṇvan muhūrtam kṣaṇikaḥ bhavet
stavaiḥ ucca-avacaiḥ stotraiḥ paurāṇaiḥ prākṛtaiḥ api stutvā prasīda bhagavan iti vandeta daṇḍa-vat
śiraḥ mat-pādayoḥ kṛtvā bāhubhyām ca parasparam prapannam pāhi mām īśa bhītam mṛtyu graha arṇavāt
iti śeṣām mayā dattām śirasi ādhāya sa-ādaram udvāsayet cet udvāsyam jyotiḥ jyotiṣi tat punaḥ
arcā-ādiṣu yadā yatra śraddhā mām tatra ca arcayet sarva-bhūteṣu ātmani ca sarva-ātmā aham avasthitaḥ
evam kriyā-yoga pathaiḥ pumān vaidika-tāntrikaiḥ arcan ubhayataḥ siddhim mattaḥ vindati abhīpsitām
mat-arcām sampratiṣṭhāpya mandiram kārayet dṛḍham puṣpa-udyānāni ramyāṇi pūjā yātrā utsava āśritān
pūjā-ādīnām pravāha-artham mahā-parvasu atha anu-aham kṣetra āpaṇa pura grāmān dattvā mat-sārṣṭitām iyāt
pratiṣṭhayā sārva-bhaumam sadmanā bhuvana-trayam pūjā-ādinā brahma-lokam tribhiḥ mat-sāmyatām iyāt
mām eva nairapekṣyeṇa bhakti-yogena vindati bhakti-yogam saḥ labhate evam yaḥ pūjayeta mām
yaḥ sva-dattām paraiḥ dattām hareta sura-viprayoḥ vṛttim saḥ jāyate viṭ-bhuk varṣāṇām ayuta ayutam
kartuḥ ca sāratheḥ hetoḥ anumodituḥ eva ca karmaṇām bhāginaḥ pretya bhūyaḥ bhūyasi tat phalam
śrī-bhagavān uvāca para svabhāva karmāṇi na praśaṁset na garhayet viśvam eka-ātmakam paśyan prakṛtyā puruṣeṇa ca
para svabhāva karmāṇi yaḥ praśaṁsati nindati saḥ āśu bhraśyate sva-arthāt asati abhiniveśataḥ
taijase nidrayā āpanne piṇḍa sthaḥ naṣṭa-cetanaḥ māyām prāpnoti mṛtyum vā tadvat nānā-artha dṛk pumān
kim bhadram kim abhadram vā dvaitasya avastunaḥ kiyat vācā uditam tat anṛtam manasā dhyātam eva ca
chāyā pratyāhvaya ābhāsāḥ hi asantaḥ api artha kāriṇaḥ evam deha-ādayaḥ bhāvāḥ yacchanti ā-mṛtyutaḥ bhayam
ātmā eva tat idam viśvam sṛjyate sṛjati prabhuḥ trāyate trāti viśva-ātmā hriyate harati īśvaraḥ tasmāt na hi ātmanaḥ anyasmāt anyaḥ bhāvaḥ nirūpitaḥ nirūpite ayam tri-vidhā nirmūlā bhātiḥ ātmani idam guṇa-mayam viddhi tri-vidham māyayā kṛtam
etat vidvān mat uditam jñāna vijñāna naipuṇam na nindati na ca stauti loke carati sūrya-vat
pratyakṣeṇa anumānena nigamena ātma-saṁvidā ādi-anta-vat asat jñātvā niḥsaṅgaḥ vicaret iha
śrī-uddhavaḥ uvāca na eva ātmanaḥ na dehasya saṁsṛtiḥ draṣṭṛ-dṛśyayoḥ anātma sva-dṛśoḥ īśa kasya syāt upalabhyate
ātmā avyayaḥ aguṇaḥ śuddhaḥ svayam-jyotiḥ anāvṛtaḥ agni-vat dāru-vat acit dehaḥ kasya iha saṁsṛtiḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca yāvat deha indriya prāṇaiḥ ātmanaḥ sannikarṣaṇam saṁsāraḥ phala-vān tāvat apārthaḥ api avivekinaḥ
arthe hi avidyamāne api saṁsṛtiḥ na nivartate dhyāyataḥ viṣayān asya svapne anartha āgamaḥ yathā
yathā hi apratibuddhasya prasvāpaḥ bahu anartha bhṛt saḥ eva pratibuddhasya na vai mohāya kalpate
śoka harṣa bhaya krodha lobha moha spṛhā ādayaḥ ahaṅkārasya dṛśyante janma mṛtyuḥ ca na ātmanaḥ
deha indriya prāṇa manaḥ abhimānaḥ jīvaḥ antaḥ ātmā guṇa karma mūrtiḥ sūtram mahān iti urudhā iva gītaḥ saṁsāre ādhāvati kāla tantraḥ
amūlam etat bahu-rūpa rūpitam manaḥ vacaḥ prāṇa śarīra karma jñāna asinā upāsanayā śitena chittvā muniḥ gām vicarati atṛṣṇaḥ
jñānam vivekaḥ nigamaḥ tapaḥ ca pratyakṣam aitihyam atha anumānam ādi antayoḥ asya yat eva kevalam kālaḥ ca hetuḥ ca tat eva madhye
yathā hiraṇyam su-akṛtam purastāt paścāt ca sarvasya hiraṇ-mayasya tat eva madhye vyavahāryamāṇam nānā apadeśaiḥ aham asya tadvat
vijñānam etat tri-avastham aṅga guṇa-trayam kāraṇa kārya kartṛ samanvayena vyatirekataḥ ca yena eva turyeṇa tat eva satyam
na yat purastāt uta yat na paścāt madhye ca tat na vyapadeśa-mātram bhūtam prasiddham ca pareṇa yat yat tat eva tat syāt iti me manīṣā
avidyamānaḥ api avabhāsate yaḥ vaikārikaḥ rājasa sargaḥ eṣaḥ brahma svayam jyotiḥ ataḥ vibhāti brahma indriya artha ātma vikāra citram
evam sphuṭam brahma viveka-hetubhiḥ para apavādena viśāradena chittvā ātma sandeham upārameta sva-ānanda tuṣṭaḥ akhila kāmukebhyaḥ
na ātmā vapuḥ pārthivam indriyāṇi devāḥ hi asuḥ vāyuḥ jalam huta-āśaḥ manaḥ anna-mātram dhiṣaṇā ca sattvam ahaṅkṛtiḥ kham kṣitiḥ artha sāmyam
samāhitaiḥ kaḥ karaṇaiḥ guṇa-ātmabhiḥ guṇaḥ bhavet mat su-vivikta dhāmnaḥ vikṣipyamāṇaiḥ uta kim nu dūṣaṇam ghanaiḥ upetaiḥ vigataiḥ raveḥ kim
yathā nabhaḥ vāyu anala ambu bhū guṇaiḥ gata-āgataiḥ vā ṛtu-guṇaiḥ na sajjate tathā akṣaram sattva-rajaḥ-tamaḥ malaiḥ aham-mateḥ saṁsṛti-hetubhiḥ param
tathā api saṅgaḥ parivarjanīyaḥ guṇeṣu māyā-raciteṣu tāvat mat-bhakti-yogena dṛḍhena yāvat rajaḥ nirasyeta manaḥ kaṣāyaḥ
yathā āmayaḥ asādhu cikitsitaḥ nṛṇām punaḥ punaḥ santudati prarohan evam manaḥ apakva kaṣāya karma ku-yoginam vidhyati sarva-saṅgam
ku-yoginaḥ ye vihita antarāyaiḥ manuṣya-bhūtaiḥ tridaśa upasṛṣṭaiḥ te prāktana abhyāsa balena bhūyaḥ yuñjanti yogam na tu karma-tantram
karoti karma kriyate ca jantuḥ kena api asau coditaḥ ā-nipātāt na tatra vidvān prakṛtau sthitaḥ api nivṛtta tṛṣṇaḥ sva sukha anubhūtyā
tiṣṭhantam āsīnam uta vrajantam śayānam ukṣantam adantam annam sva-bhāvam anyat kim api īhamānam ātmānam ātma-stha matiḥ na veda
yadi sma paśyati asat indriya-artham nānā anumānena viruddham anyat na manyate vastutayā manīṣī svāpnam yathā utthāya tirodadhānam
pūrvam gṛhītam guṇa karma citram ajñānam ātmani aviviktam aṅga nivartate tat punaḥ īkṣayā eva na gṛhyate na api visṛjya ātmā
yathā hi bhānoḥ udayaḥ nṛ cakṣuṣām tamaḥ nihanyāt na tu sat vidhatte evam samīkṣā nipuṇā satī me hanyāt tamisram puruṣasya buddheḥ
eṣaḥ svayam-jyotiḥ ajaḥ aprameyaḥ mahā-anubhūtiḥ sakala-anubhūtiḥ ekaḥ advitīyaḥ vacasām virāme yena īṣitāḥ vāk asavaḥ caranti
etāvān ātma sammohaḥ yat vikalpaḥ tu kevale ātman ṛte svam ātmānam avalambaḥ na yasya hi
yat nāma ākṛtibhiḥ grāhyam pañca-varṇam abādhitam vyarthena api artha-vādaḥ ayam dvayam paṇḍita-māninām
yoginaḥ apakva-yogasya yuñjataḥ kāyaḥ utthitaiḥ upasargaiḥ vihanyeta tatra ayam vihitaḥ vidhiḥ
yoga-dhāraṇayā kāṁścit āsanaiḥ dhāraṇā-anvitaiḥ tapaḥ mantra auṣadhaiḥ kāṁścit upasargān vinirdahet
kāṁścit mama anudhyānena nāma saṅkīṛtana ādibhiḥ yoga-īśvara anuvṛttyā vā hanyāt aśubha-dān śanaiḥ
kecit deham imam dhīrāḥ su-kalpam vayasi sthiram vidhāya vividha upāyaiḥ atha yuñjanti siddhaye
na hi tat kuśala ādṛtyam tat āyāsaḥ hi apārthakaḥ anta-vattvāt śarīrasya phalasya iva vanaspateḥ
yogam niṣevataḥ nityam kāyaḥ cet kalpatām iyāt tat śraddadhyāt na mati-mān yogam utsṛjya mat-paraḥ
yoga-caryām imām yogī vicaran mat-apāśrayaḥ na antarāyaiḥ vihanyeta niḥspṛhaḥ sva sukha anubhūḥ
śrī-uddhavaḥ uvāca su-dustarām imām manye yoga-caryām anātmanaḥ yathā añjasā pumān siddhyet tat me brūhi añjasā acyuta
prāyaśaḥ puṇḍarīka-akṣa yuñjantaḥ yoginaḥ manaḥ viṣīdanti asamādhānāt manaḥ-nigraha karśitāḥ
atha ataḥ ānanda-dugham pada-ambujam haṁsāḥ śrayeran aravinda-locana sukham nu viśva-īśvara yoga-karmabhiḥ tvat-māyayā amī vihatāḥ na māninaḥ
kim citram acyuta tava etat aśeṣa-bandho dāseṣu ananya-śaraṇeṣu yat ātma-sāttvam yaḥ arocayat saha mṛgaiḥ svayam īśvarāṇām śrīmat kirīṭa taṭa pīḍita pāda-pīṭhaḥ
tam tvā akhila ātma dayita īśvaram āśrītānām sarva-artha dam sva-kṛta vit visṛjeta kaḥ nu kaḥ vā bhajet kim api vismṛtaye anu bhūtyai kim vā bhavet na tava pāda rajaḥ juṣām naḥ
na eva upayanti apacitim kavayaḥ tava īśa brahma-āyuṣā api kṛtam ṛddha mudaḥ smarantaḥ yaḥ antaḥ bahiḥ tanu-bhṛtām aśubham vidhunvan ācārya caittya vapuṣā sva gatim vyanakti
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti uddhavena ati-anurakta cetasā pṛṣṭaḥ jagat krīḍanakaḥ sva-śaktibhiḥ gṛhīta mūrti trayaḥ īśvara īśvaraḥ jagāda sa-prema manaḥ-hara smitaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca hanta te kathayiṣyāmi mama dharmān su-maṅgalān yān śraddhayā ācaran martyaḥ mṛtyum jayati durjayam
kuryāt sarvāṇi karmāṇi mat-artham śanakaiḥ smaran mayi arpita manaḥ-cittaḥ mat-dharma ātma-manaḥ ratiḥ
deśān puṇyān āśrayeta mat-bhaktaiḥ sādhubhiḥ śritān deva asura manuṣyeṣu mat-bhakta ācaritāni ca
pṛthak satreṇa vā mahyam parva yātrā mahā-utsavān kārayet gīta nṛtya-ādyaiḥ mahā-rāja vibhūtibhiḥ
mām eva sarva-bhūteṣu bahiḥ antaḥ apāvṛtam īkṣeta ātmani ca ātmānam yathā kham amala-āśayaḥ
iti sarvāṇi bhūtāni mat-bhāvena mahā-dyute sabhājayan manyamānaḥ jñānam kevalam āśritaḥ brāhmaṇe pukkase stene brahmaṇye arke sphuliṅgake akrūre krūrake ca eva sama-dṛk paṇḍitaḥ mataḥ
nareṣu abhīkṣṇam mat-bhāvam puṁsaḥ bhāvayataḥ acirāt spardhā asūyā tiraskārāḥ sa ahaṅkārāḥ viyanti hi
visṛjya smayamānān svān dṛśam vrīḍām ca daihikīm praṇamet daṇḍa-vat bhūmau ā śva cāṇḍāla go kharam
yāvat sarveṣu bhūteṣu mat-bhāvaḥ na upajāyate tāvat evam upāsīta vāk manaḥ kāya vṛttibhiḥ
sarvam brahma-ātmakam tasya vidyayā ātma-manīṣayā paripaśyan uparamet sarvataḥ mukta-saṁśayaḥ
ayam hi sarva kalpānām sadhrīcīnaḥ mataḥ mama mat-bhāvaḥ sarva-bhūteṣu manaḥ-vāk-kāya-vṛttibhiḥ
na hi aṅga upakrame dhvaṁsaḥ mat-dharmasya uddhava aṇu api mayā vyavasitaḥ samyak nirguṇa-tvāt anāśiṣaḥ
yaḥ yaḥ mayi pare dharmaḥ kalpyate niṣphalāya cet tat āyāsaḥ nirarthaḥ syāt bhaya-ādeḥ iva sat-tama
eṣā buddhi-matām buddhiḥ manīṣā ca manīṣiṇām yat satyam anṛtena iha martyena āpnoti mā amṛtam
eṣaḥ te abhihitaḥ kṛtsnaḥ brahma-vādasya saṅgrahaḥ samāsa vyāsa vidhinā devānām api durgamaḥ
abhīkṣṇaśaḥ te gaditam jñānam vispaṣṭa yukti mat etat vijñāya mucyeta puruṣaḥ naṣṭa saṁśayaḥ
sa-viviktam tava praśnam mayā etat api dhārayet sanātanam brahma-guhyam param brahma adhigacchati
yaḥ etat mama bhakteṣu sampradadyāt su-puṣkalam tasya aham brahma-dāyasya dadāmi ātmānam ātmanā
yaḥ etat samadhīyīta pavitram paramam śuci saḥ pūyeta ahaḥ ahaḥ mām jñāna-dīpena darśayan
yaḥ etat śraddhayā nityam avyagraḥ śṛṇuyāt naraḥ mayi bhaktim parām kurvan karmabhiḥ na saḥ badhyate
api uddhava tvayā brahma sakhe samavadhāritam api te vigataḥ mohaḥ śokaḥ ca asau manaḥ-bhavaḥ
na etat tvayā dāmbhikāya nāstikāya śaṭhāya ca aśuśrūṣoḥ abhaktāya durvinītāya dīyatām
etaiḥ doṣaiḥ vihīnāya brahmaṇyāya priyāya ca sādhave śucaye brūyāt bhaktiḥ syāt śūdra yoṣitām
na etat vijñāya jijñāsoḥ jñātavyam avaśiṣyate pītvā pīyūṣam amṛtam pātavyam na avaśiṣyate
jñāne karmaṇi yoge ca vārtāyām daṇḍa-dhāraṇe yāvān arthaḥ nṛṇām tāta tāvān te aham catuḥ-vidhaḥ
martyaḥ yadā tyakta samasta karmā nivedita-ātmā vicikīrṣitaḥ me tadā amṛtatvam pratipadyamānaḥ mayā ātma-bhūyāya ca kalpate vai
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca saḥ evam ādarśita yoga-mārgaḥ tadā uttamaḥ-śloka vacaḥ niśamya baddha-añjaliḥ prīti uparuddha kaṇṭhaḥ na kiñcit ūce aśru paripluta akṣaḥ
viṣṭabhya cittam praṇaya avaghūrṇam dhairyeṇa rājan bahu-manyamānaḥ kṛta-añjaliḥ prāha yadu-pravīram śīrṣṇā spṛśan tat caraṇa-aravindam
śrī-uddhavaḥ uvāca vidrāvitaḥ moha mahā-andhakāraḥ yaḥ āśritaḥ me tava sannidhānāt vibhāvasoḥ kim nu samīpa-gasya śītam tamaḥ bhīḥ prabhavanti aja ādya
pratyarpitaḥ me bhavatā anukampinā bhṛtyāya vijñāna-mayaḥ pradīpaḥ hitvā kṛta-jñaḥ tava pāda-mūlam kaḥ anyam samīyāt śaraṇam tvadīyam
vṛkṇaḥ ca me su-dṛḍhaḥ sneha-pāśaḥ dāśārha-vṛṣṇi-andhaka-sātvateṣu prasāritaḥ sṛṣṭi vivṛddhaye tvayā sva-māyayā hi ātma su-bodha hetinā
namaḥ astu te mahā-yogin prapannam anuśādhi mām yathā tvat caraṇa-ambhoje ratiḥ syāt anapāyinī
śrī-bhagavān uvāca gaccha uddhava mayā ādiṣṭaḥ badarī-ākhyam mama āśramam tatra mat-pāda tīrtha ude snāna upasparśanaiḥ śuciḥ īkṣayā alakanandāyāḥ vidhūta aśeṣa kalmaṣaḥ vasānaḥ valkalāni aṅga vanya bhuk sukha niḥspṛhaḥ titikṣuḥ dvandva-mātrāṇām su-śīlaḥ saṁyata-indriyaḥ śāntaḥ samāhita dhiyā jñāna vijñāna saṁyutaḥ mattaḥ anuśikṣitam yat te viviktam anubhāvayan mayi āveśita vāk cittaḥ mat-dharma nirataḥ bhava ativrajya gatīḥ tisraḥ mām eṣyasi tataḥ param
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca saḥ evam uktaḥ hari-medhasā uddhavaḥ pradakṣiṇam tam parisṛtya pādayoḥ śiraḥ nidhāya aśru-kalābhiḥ ārdra dhīḥ nyaṣiñcat advandva-paraḥ api apakrame
su-dustyaja sneha viyoga kātaraḥ na śaknuvan tam parihātum āturaḥ kṛcchram yayau mūrdhani bhartṛ pāduke bibhran namaskṛtya yayau punaḥ punaḥ
tataḥ tam antaḥ hṛdi sanniveśya gataḥ mahā-bhāgavataḥ viśālām yathā upadiṣṭām jagat eka bandhunā tapaḥ samāsthāya hareḥ agāt gatim
yaḥ etat ānanda samudra sambhṛtam jñāna amṛtam bhāgavatāya bhāṣitam kṛṣṇena yoga-īśvara sevita aṅghriṇā sat śraddhayā āsevya jagat vimucyate
bhava bhayam apahantum jñāna-vijñāna sāram nigama kṛt upajahre bhṛṅga-vat veda-sāram amṛtam udadhitaḥ ca apāyayat bhṛtya-vargān puruṣam ṛṣabham ādyam kṛṣṇa-saṁjñam nataḥ asmi
śrī-rājā uvāca tataḥ mahā-bhāgavate uddhave nirgate vanam dvāravatyām kim akarot bhagavān bhūta bhāvanaḥ
brahma-śāpa upasaṁsṛṣṭe sva-kule yādava-ṛṣabhaḥ preyasīm sarva-netrāṇām tanum saḥ katham atyajat
pratyākraṣṭum nayanam abalāḥ yatra lagnam na śekuḥ karṇa āviṣṭam na sarati tataḥ yat satām ātma lagnam yat śrīḥ vācām janayati ratim kim nu mānam kavīnām dṛṣṭvā jiṣṇoḥ yudhi ratha-gatam yat ca tat-sāmyam īyuḥ
śrī-ṛṣiḥ uvāca divi bhuvi antarikṣe ca mahā-utpātān samutthitān dṛṣṭvā āsīnān su-dharmāyām kṛṣṇaḥ prāha yadūn idam
śrī-bhagavān uvāca ete ghorāḥ mahā utpātāḥ dvārvatyām yama ketavaḥ muhūrtam api na stheyam atra naḥ yadu-puṅgavāḥ
striyaḥ bālāḥ ca vṛddhāḥ ca śaṅkha-uddhāram vrajantu itaḥ vayam prabhāsam yāsyāmaḥ yatra pratyak sarasvatī
tatra abhiṣicya śucayaḥ upoṣya su-samāhitāḥ devatāḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ snapana ālepana arhaṇaiḥ
brāhmaṇān tu mahā-bhāgān kṛta svasti-ayanāḥ vayam go bhū hiraṇya vāsobhiḥ gaja aśva ratha veśmabhiḥ
vidhiḥ eṣaḥ hi ariṣṭa ghnaḥ maṅgala-ayanam uttamam deva dvija gavām pūjā bhūteṣu paramaḥ bhavaḥ
iti sarve samākarṇya yadu-vṛddhāḥ madhu-dviṣaḥ tathā iti naubhiḥ uttīrya prabhāsam prayayuḥ rathaiḥ
tasmin bhagavatā ādiṣṭam yadu-devena yādavāḥ cakruḥ paramayā bhaktyā sarva śreyaḥ upabṛṁhitam
tataḥ tasmin mahā pānam papuḥ maireyakam madhu diṣṭa vibhraṁśita dhiyaḥ yat dravaiḥ bhraśyate matiḥ
mahā-pāna abhimattānām vīrāṇām dṛpta cetasām kṛṣṇa-māyā vimūḍhānām saṅgharṣaḥ su-mahān abhūt
yuyudhuḥ krodha saṁrabdhāḥ velāyām ātatāyinaḥ dhanurbhiḥ asibhiḥ bhallaiḥ gadābhiḥ tomara ṛṣṭibhiḥ
patat-patākaiḥ ratha kuñjara ādibhiḥ khara uṣṭra gobhiḥ mahiṣaiḥ naraiḥ api mithaḥ sametya aśvataraiḥ su-durmadāḥ nyahan śaraiḥ dadbhiḥ iva dvipāḥ vane
pradyumna-sāmbau yudhi rūḍha matsarau akrūra-bhojau aniruddha-sātyakī subhadra-saṅgrāmajitau su-dāruṇau gadau sumitrā-surathau samīyatuḥ
anye ca ye vai niśaṭha-ulmaka-ādayaḥ sahasrajit-śatajit-bhānu-mukhyaḥ anyonyam āsādya mada andha-kāritāḥ jaghnuḥ mukundena vimohitāḥ bhṛśam
dāśārha-vṛṣṇi-andhaka-bhoja-sātvatāḥ madhu-arbudāḥ māthura-śūrasenāḥ visarjanāḥ kukurāḥ kuntayaḥ ca mithaḥ tu jaghnuḥ su-visṛjya sauhṛdam
putrāḥ ayudhyan pitṛbhiḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ ca svasrīya dauhitra pitṛvya mātulaiḥ mitrāṇi mitraiḥ suhṛdaḥ suhṛdbhiḥ jñātīn tu ahan jñātayaḥ eva mūḍhāḥ
śareṣu hīyamāneṣu bhajyamāneṣu dhanvasu śastreṣu kṣīyamāneṣu muṣṭibhiḥ jahruḥ erakāḥ
tāḥ vajra-kalpāḥ hi abhavan parighāḥ muṣṭinā bhṛtāḥ jaghnuḥ dviṣaḥ taiḥ kṛṣṇena vāryamāṇāḥ tu tam ca te
pratyanīkam manyamānāḥ balabhadram ca mohitāḥ hantum kṛta-dhiyaḥ rājan āpannāḥ ātatāyinaḥ
atha tau api saṅkruddhau udyamya kuru-nandana erakā-muṣṭi parighau carantau jaghnatuḥ yudhi
brahma-śāpa upasṛṣṭānām kṛṣṇa-māyā āvṛta ātmanām spardhā krodhaḥ kṣayam ninye vaiṇavaḥ agniḥ yathā vanam
evam naṣṭeṣu sarveṣu kuleṣu sveṣu keśavaḥ avatāritaḥ bhuvaḥ bhāraḥ iti mene avaśeṣitaḥ
rāmaḥ samudra velāyām yogam āsthāya pauruṣam tatyāja lokam mānuṣyam saṁyojya ātmānam ātmani
rāma-niryāṇam ālokya bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ niṣasāda dharā-upasthe tuṣṇīm āsādya pippalam
bibhrat catuḥ-bhujam rūpam bhrājiṣṇu prabhayā svayā diśaḥ vitimirāḥ kurvan vidhūmaḥ iva pāvakaḥ śrīvatsa-aṅkam ghana-śyāmam tapta hāṭaka varcasam kauśeya ambara yugmena parivītam su-maṅgalam sundara smita vaktra abjam nīla kuntala maṇḍitam puṇḍarīka abhirāma akṣam sphurat makara kuṇḍalam kaṭi-sūtra brahma-sūtra kirīṭa kaṭaka aṅgadaiḥ hāra nūpura mudrābhiḥ kaustubhena virājitam vana-mālā parīta aṅgam mūrti-madbhiḥ nija āyudhaiḥ kṛtvā urau dakṣiṇe pādam āsīnam paṅkaja aruṇam
muṣala avaśeṣa ayaḥ khaṇḍa kṛta iṣuḥ lubdhakaḥ jarā mṛga āsya ākāram tat caraṇam vivyādha mṛga-śaṅkayā
catuḥ-bhujam tam puruṣam dṛṣṭvā saḥ kṛta-kilbiṣaḥ bhītaḥ papāta śirasā pādayoḥ asura-dviṣaḥ
ajānatā kṛtam idam pāpena madhusūdana kṣantum arhasi pāpasya uttamaḥ-śloka me anagha
yasya anusmaraṇam nṛṇām ajñāna dhvānta nāśanam vadanti tasya te viṣṇo mayā asādhu kṛtam prabho
tat mā āśu jahi vaikuṇṭha pāpmānam mṛga-lubdhakam yathā punaḥ aham tu evam na kuryām sat atikramam
yasya ātma-yoga racitam na viduḥ viriñcaḥ rudra-ādayaḥ asya tanayāḥ patayaḥ girām ye tvat-māyayā pihita dṛṣṭayaḥ etat añjaḥ kim tasya te vayam asat gatayaḥ gṛṇīmaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca mā bhaiḥ jare tvam uttiṣṭha kāmaḥ eṣaḥ kṛtaḥ hi me yāhi tvam mat-anujñātaḥ svargam su-kṛtinām padam
iti ādiṣṭaḥ bhagavatā kṛṣṇena icchā-śarīriṇā triḥ parikramya tam natvā vimānena divam yayau
dārukaḥ kṛṣṇa padavīm anvicchan adhigamya tām vāyum tulasikā-āmodam āghrāya abhimukham yayau
tam tatra tigma dyubhiḥ āyudhaiḥ vṛtam hi aśvattha mūle kṛta-ketanam patim sneha pluta ātmā nipapāta pādayoḥ rathāt avaplutya sa-bāṣpa locanaḥ
apaśyataḥ tvat caraṇa-ambujam prabho dṛṣṭiḥ praṇaṣṭā tamasi praviṣṭā diśaḥ na jāne na labhe ca śāntim yathā niśāyām uḍupe praṇaṣṭe
iti bruvati sūte vai rathaḥ garuḍa-lāñchanaḥ kham utpapāta rāja-indra sa-aśva dhvajaḥ udīkṣataḥ
tam anvagacchan divyāni viṣṇu praharaṇāni ca tena ati-vismita ātmānam sūtam āha janārdanaḥ
gaccha dvāravatīm sūta jñātīnām nidhanam mithaḥ saṅkarṣaṇasya niryāṇam bandhubhyaḥ brūhi mat-daśām
dvārakāyām ca na stheyam bhavadbhiḥ ca sva-bandhubhiḥ mayā tyaktām yadu-purīm samudraḥ plāvayiṣyati
svam svam parigraham sarve ādāya pitarau ca naḥ arjunena avitāḥ sarve indraprastham gamiṣyatha
tvam tu mat-dharmam āsthāya jñāna-niṣṭhaḥ upekṣakaḥ mat-māyā racitām etām vijñāya upaśamam vraja
iti uktaḥ tam parikramya namaḥ-kṛtya punaḥ punaḥ tat-pādau śīrṣṇi upādhāya durmanāḥ prayayau purīm
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca atha tatra āgamat brahmā bhavānyā ca samam bhavaḥ mahā-indra-pramukhāḥ devāḥ munayaḥ sa prajā-īśvarāḥ
pitaraḥ siddha-gandharvāḥ vidyādhara-mahā-uragāḥ cāraṇāḥ yakṣa-rakṣāṁsi kinnara-apsarasaḥ dvijāḥ draṣṭu-kāmāḥ bhagavataḥ niryāṇam parama-utsukāḥ gāyantaḥ ca gṛṇantaḥ ca śaureḥ karmāṇi janma ca
vavṛṣuḥ puṣpa-varṣāṇi vimāna āvalibhiḥ nabhaḥ kurvantaḥ saṅkulam rājan bhaktyā paramayā yutāḥ
bhagavān pitāmaham vīkṣya vibhūtīḥ ātmanaḥ vibhuḥ saṁyojya ātmani ca ātmānam padma-netre nyamīlyat
loka abhirāmām sva-tanum dhāraṇā dhyāna maṅgalam yoga-dhāraṇayā āgneyyā adagdhvā dhāma āviśat svakam
divi dundubhayaḥ neduḥ petuḥ sumanasaḥ ca khāt satyam dharmaḥ dhṛtiḥ bhūmeḥ kīrtiḥ śrīḥ ca anu tam yayuḥ
deva-ādayaḥ brahma-mukhyāḥ na viśantam sva-dhāmani avijñāta gatim kṛṣṇam dadṛśuḥ ca ati-vismitāḥ
saudāmanyāḥ yathā ākāśe yāntyāḥ hitvā abhra-maṇḍalam gatiḥ na lakṣyate martyaiḥ tathā kṛṣṇasya daivataiḥ
brahma-rudra-ādayaḥ te tu dṛṣṭvā yoga-gatim hareḥ vismitāḥ tām praśaṁsantaḥ svam svam lokam yayuḥ tadā
rājan parasya tanu-bhṛt janana apyaya īhāḥ māyā viḍambanam avehi yathā naṭasya sṛṣṭvā ātmanā idam anuviśya vihṛtya ca ante saṁhṛtya ca ātma-mahinā uparataḥ saḥ āste
martyena yaḥ guru-sutam yama-loka nītam tvām ca ānayat śaraṇa-daḥ parama-astra dagdham jigye antaka antakam api īśam asau anīśaḥ kim sva avane svaḥ anayat mṛgayum sa-deham
tathā api aśeṣa sthiti sambhava apyayeṣu ananya-hetuḥ yat aśeṣa śakti dhṛk na aicchat praṇetum vapuḥ atra śeṣitam martyena kim sva-stha gatim pradarśayan
yaḥ etām prātaḥ utthāya kṛṣṇasya padavīm parām prayataḥ kīrtayet bhaktyā tām eva āpnoti anuttamam
dārukaḥ dvārakām etya vasudeva-ugrasenayoḥ patitvā caraṇau asraiḥ nyaṣiñcat kṛṣṇa-vicyutaḥ
kathayām āsa nidhanam vṛṣṇīnām kṛtsnaśaḥ nṛpa tat śrutvā udvigna hṛdayāḥ janāḥ śoka virmūrcchitāḥ tatra sma tvaritāḥ jagmuḥ kṛṣṇa-viśleṣa vihvalāḥ vyasavaḥ śerate yatra jñātayaḥ ghnantaḥ ānanam
devakī rohiṇī ca eva vasudevaḥ tathā sutau kṛṣṇa-rāmau apaśyantaḥ śoka-ārtāḥ vijahuḥ smṛtim
prāṇān ca vijahuḥ tatra bhagavat viraha āturāḥ upagahya patīn tāta citām āruruhuḥ striyaḥ
rāma-patnyaḥ ca tat-deham upaguhya agnim āviśan vasudeva-patnyaḥ tat-gātram pradyumna-ādīn hareḥ snuṣāḥ kṛṣṇa-patnyaḥ aviśan agnim rukmiṇī-ādyāḥ tat-ātmikāḥ
arjunaḥ preyasaḥ sakhyuḥ kṛṣṇasya viraha āturaḥ ātmānam sāntvayām āsa kṛṣṇa-gītaiḥ sat-uktibhiḥ
bandhūnām naṣṭa-gotrāṇām arjunaḥ sāmparāyikam hatānām kārayām āsa yathā-vat anupūrvaśaḥ
dvārakām hariṇā tyaktām samudraḥ aplāvayat kṣaṇāt varjayitvā mahā-rāja śrīmat-bhagavat ālayam
nityam sannihitaḥ tatra bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ smṛtyā aśeṣa-aśubha haram sarva-maṅgala maṅgalam
strī bāla vṛddhān ādāya hata śeṣān dhanañjayaḥ indraprastham samāveśya vajram tatra abhyaṣecayat
śrutvā suhṛt vadham rājan arjunāt te pitāmahāḥ tvām tu vaṁśa-dharam kṛtvā jagmuḥ sarve mahā-patham
yaḥ etat deva-devasya viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi janma ca kīrtayet śraddhayā martyaḥ sarva-pāpaiḥ pramucyate
ittham hareḥ bhagavataḥ rucira avatāra vīryāṇi bāla caritāni ca śam-tamāni anyatra ca iha ca śrutāni gṛṇan manuṣyaḥ bhaktim parām paramahaṁsa gatau labheta
om namaḥ bhagavate vāsudevāya janma-ādi asya yataḥ anvayāt itarataḥ ca artheṣu abhijñaḥ sva-rāṭ tene brahma hṛdā yaḥ ādi-kavaye muhyanti yat sūrayaḥ tejaḥ vāri mṛdām yathā vinimayaḥ yatra tri-sargaḥ amṛṣā dhāmnā svena sadā nirasta kuhakam satyam param dhīmahi
dharmaḥ projjhita kaitavaḥ atra paramaḥ nirmatsarāṇām satām vedyam vāstavam atra vastu śivadam tāpa-traya unmūlanam śrīmat bhāgavate mahā-muni kṛte kim vā paraiḥ īśvaraḥ sadyaḥ hṛdi avarudhyate atra kṛtibhiḥ śuśrūṣubhiḥ tat-kṣaṇāt
nigama kalpa-taroḥ galitam phalam śuka mukhāt amṛta drava saṁyutam pibata bhāgavatam rasam ālayam muhuḥ aho rasikāḥ bhuvi bhāvukāḥ
naimiṣe animiṣa-kṣetre ṛṣayaḥ śaunaka-ādayaḥ satram svargāya lokāya sahasra samam āsata
te ekadā tu munayaḥ prātaḥ huta huta-agnayaḥ sat-kṛtam sūtam āsīnam papracchuḥ idam ādarāt
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ tvayā khalu purāṇāni sa-itihāsāni ca anagha ākhyātāni api adhītāni dharma-śāstrāṇi yāni uta
yāni veda-vidām śreṣṭhaḥ bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ anye ca munayaḥ sūta parāvara-vidaḥ viduḥ
vettha tvam saumya tat sarvam tattvataḥ tat anugrahāt brūyuḥ snigdhasya śiṣyasya guravaḥ guhyam api uta
tatra tatra añjasā āyuṣman bhavatā yat viniścitam puṁsām ekāntataḥ śreyaḥ tat naḥ śaṁsitum arhasi
prāyeṇa alpa āyuṣaḥ sabhya kalau asmin yuge janāḥ mandāḥ sumanda-matayaḥ manda-bhāgyāḥ hi upadrutāḥ
bhūrīṇi bhūri karmāṇi śrotavyāni vibhāgaśaḥ ataḥ sādho atra yat sāram samuddhṛtya manīṣayā brūhi bhadrāya bhūtānām yena ātmā suprasīdati
sūta jānāsi bhadram te bhagavān sātvatām patiḥ devakyām vasudevasya jātaḥ yasya cikīrṣayā
tat naḥ śuśrūṣamāṇānām arhasi aṅga anuvarṇitum yasya avatāraḥ bhūtānām kṣemāya ca bhavāya ca
āpannaḥ saṁsṛtim ghorām yat nāma vivaśaḥ gṛṇan tataḥ sadyaḥ vimucyeta yat bibheti svayam bhayam
yat pāda saṁśrayāḥ sūta munayaḥ praśamāyanāḥ sadyaḥ punanti upaspṛṣṭāḥ svardhunī āpaḥ anusevayā
kaḥ vā bhagavataḥ tasya puṇya śloka-īḍya karmaṇaḥ śuddhi-kāmaḥ na śṛṇuyāt yaśaḥ kali mala-apaham
tasya karmāṇi udārāṇi parigītāni sūribhiḥ brūhi naḥ śraddadhānānām līlayā dadhataḥ kalāḥ
atha ākhyāhi hareḥ dhīman avatāra kathāḥ śubhāḥ līlā vidadhataḥ svairam īśvarasya ātma māyayā
vayam tu na vitṛpyāmaḥ uttama-śloka vikrame yat śṛṇvatām rasa jñānām svādu svādu pade pade
kṛtavān kila karmāṇi saha rāmeṇa keśavaḥ atimartyāni bhagavān gūḍhaḥ kapaṭa mānuṣaḥ
kalim āgatam ājñāya kṣetre asmin vaiṣṇave vayam āsīnāḥ dīrgha satreṇa kathāyām sa-kṣaṇāḥ hareḥ
tvam naḥ sandarśitaḥ dhātrā dustaram nistitīrṣatām kalim sattva-haram puṁsām karṇa-dhāraḥ iva arṇavam
brūhi yoga-īśvare kṛṣṇe brahmaṇye dharma varmaṇi svām kāṣṭhām adhunā upete dharmaḥ kam śaraṇam gataḥ
vyāsaḥ uvāca iti sampraśna saṁhṛṣṭaḥ viprāṇām raumaharṣaṇiḥ pratipūjya vacaḥ teṣām pravaktum upacakrame
sūtaḥ uvāca yam pravrajantam anupetam apeta kṛtyam dvaipāyanaḥ viraha kātaraḥ ājuhāva putra iti tat-mayatayā taravaḥ abhineduḥ tam sarva bhūta hṛdayam munim ānataḥ asmi
yaḥ sva-anubhāvam akhila śruti sāram ekam adhyātma dīpam atititīrṣatām tamaḥ andham saṁsāriṇām karuṇayā āha purāṇa guhyam tam vyāsa-sūnum upayāmi gurum munīnām
nārāyaṇam namaḥ-kṛtya naram ca eva nara-uttamam devīm sarasvatīm vyāsam tataḥ jayam udīrayet
munayaḥ sādhu pṛṣṭaḥ aham bhavadbhiḥ loka maṅgalam yat kṛtaḥ kṛṣṇa sampraśnaḥ yena ātmā suprasīdati
saḥ vai puṁsām paraḥ dharmaḥ yataḥ bhaktiḥ adhokṣaje ahaitukī apratihatā yayā ātmā suprasīdati
vāsudeve bhagavati bhakti-yogaḥ prayojitaḥ janayati āśu vairāgyam jñānam ca yat ahaitukam
dharmaḥ svanuṣṭhitaḥ puṁsām viṣvaksena kathāsu yaḥ na utpādayet yadi ratim śramaḥ eva hi kevalam
dharmasya hi āpavargyasya na arthaḥ arthāya upakalpate na arthasya dharma-eka-antasya kāmaḥ lābhāya hi smṛtaḥ
kāmasya na indriya prītiḥ lābhaḥ jīveta yāvatā jīvasya tattva jijñāsā na arthaḥ yaḥ ca iha karmabhiḥ
vadanti tat tattva-vidaḥ tattvam yat jñānam advayam brahma iti paramātmā iti bhagavān iti śabdyate
tat śraddadhānāḥ munayaḥ jñāna vairāgya yuktayā paśyanti ātmani ca ātmānam bhaktyā śruta gṛhītayā
ataḥ pumbhiḥ dvija-śreṣṭhāḥ varṇa-āśrama vibhāgaśaḥ svanuṣṭhitasya dharmasya saṁsiddhiḥ hari toṣaṇam
tasmāt ekena manasā bhagavān sātvatām patiḥ śrotavyaḥ kīrtitavyaḥ ca dhyeyaḥ pūjyaḥ ca nityadā
yat anudhyā asinā yuktāḥ karma granthi nibandhanam chindanti kovidāḥ tasya kaḥ na kuryāt kathā ratim
śuśrūṣoḥ śraddadhānasya vāsudeva kathā ruciḥ syāt mahat-sevayā viprāḥ puṇya-tīrtha niṣevaṇāt
śṛṇvatām sva-kathāḥ kṛṣṇaḥ puṇya śravaṇa kīrtanaḥ hṛdi antaḥ sthaḥ hi abhadrāṇi vidhunoti suhṛt satām
naṣṭa prāyeṣu abhadreṣu nityam bhāgavata sevayā bhagavati uttama śloke bhaktiḥ bhavati naiṣṭhikī
tadā rajaḥ tamaḥ bhāvāḥ kāma lobha ādayaḥ ca ye cetaḥ etaiḥ anāviddham sthitam sattve prasīdati
evam prasanna manasaḥ bhagavat-bhakti yogataḥ bhagavat tattva vijñānam mukta saṅgasya jāyate
bhidyate hṛdaya granthiḥ chidyante sarva saṁśayāḥ kṣīyante ca asya karmāṇi dṛṣṭe eva ātmani īśvare
ataḥ vai kavayaḥ nityam bhaktim paramayā mudā vāsudeve bhagavati kurvanti ātma prasādanīm
sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti prakṛteḥ guṇāḥ taiḥ yuktaḥ paraḥ puruṣaḥ ekaḥ iha asya dhatte sthiti-ādaye hari viriñci hara iti saṁjñāḥ śreyāṁsi tatra khalu sattva tanoḥ nṛṇām syuḥ
pārthivāt dāruṇaḥ dhūmaḥ tasmāt agniḥ trayī mayaḥ tamasaḥ tu rajaḥ tasmāt sattvam yat brahma darśanam
bhejire munayaḥ atha agre bhagavantam adhokṣajam sattvam viśuddham kṣemāya kalpante ye anu tān iha
mumukṣavaḥ ghora rūpān hitvā bhūta-patīn atha nārāyaṇa kalāḥ śāntāḥ bhajanti hi anasūyavaḥ
rajaḥ tamaḥ prakṛtayaḥ sama-śīlāḥ bhajanti vai pitṛ bhūta prajeśa-ādīn śriyā aiśvarya prajā īpsavaḥ
vāsudeva parāḥ vedāḥ vāsudeva parāḥ makhāḥ vāsudeva parāḥ yogāḥ vāsudeva parāḥ kriyāḥ vāsudeva param jñānam vāsudeva param tapaḥ vāsudeva paraḥ dharmaḥ vāsudeva parāḥ gatiḥ
saḥ eva idam sasarja agre bhagavān ātma-māyayā sat asat rūpayā ca asau guṇa-maya aguṇaḥ vibhuḥ
tayā vilasiteṣu eṣu guṇeṣu guṇavān iva antaḥ praviṣṭaḥ ābhāti vijñānena vijṛmbhitaḥ
yathā hi avahitaḥ vahniḥ dāruṣu ekaḥ sva-yoniṣu nānā iva bhāti viśva-ātmā bhūteṣu ca tathā pumān
asau guṇa-mayaiḥ bhāvaiḥ bhūta sūkṣma indriya ātmabhiḥ sva-nirmiteṣu nirviṣṭaḥ bhuṅkte bhūteṣu tat-guṇān
bhāvayati eṣaḥ sattvena lokān vai loka-bhāvanaḥ līlā avatāra anurataḥ deva tiryak nara-ādiṣu
sūtaḥ uvāca jagṛhe pauruṣam rūpam bhagavān mahat-ādibhiḥ sambhūtam ṣoḍaśa-kalam ādau loka sisṛkṣayā
yasya ambhasi śayānasya yoga-nidrām vitanvataḥ nābhi hrada ambujāt āsīt brahmā viśva sṛjām patiḥ
yasya avayava saṁsthānaiḥ kalpitaḥ loka vistaraḥ tat vai bhagavataḥ rūpam viśuddham sattvam ūrjitam
paśyanti adaḥ rūpam adabhra cakṣuṣā sahasra-pāda ūru bhuja-ānana adbhutam sahasra mūrdha śravaṇa akṣi nāsikam sahasra mauli ambara kuṇḍala ullasat
etat nānā avatārāṇām nidhānam bījam avyayam yasya aṁśa aṁśena sṛjyante deva tiryak nara-ādayaḥ
saḥ eva prathamam devaḥ kaumāram sargam āśritaḥ cacāra duścaram brahmā brahmacaryam akhaṇḍitam
dvitīyam tu bhavāya asya rasātala gatām mahīm uddhariṣyan upādatta yajñeśaḥ saukaram vapuḥ
tṛtīyam ṛṣi-sargam vai devarṣitvam upetya saḥ tantram sātvatam ācaṣṭa naiṣkarmyam karmaṇām yataḥ
turye dharma-kalā sarge nara-nārāyaṇau ṛṣī bhūtvā ātma-upaśama upetam akarot duścaram tapaḥ
pañcamaḥ kapilaḥ nāma siddheśaḥ kāla viplutam provāca āsuraye sāṅkhyam tattva-grāma vinirṇayam
ṣaṣṭham atreḥ apatyatvam vṛtaḥ prāptaḥ anasūyayā ānvīkṣikīm alarkāya prahlāda-ādibhyaḥ ūcivān
tataḥ saptame ākūtyām ruceḥ yajñaḥ abhyajāyata saḥ yāma-ādyaiḥ sura-gaṇaiḥ apāt svāyambhuva-antaram
aṣṭame merudevyām tu nābheḥ jātaḥ urukramaḥ darśayan vartma dhīrāṇām sarva āśrama namaskṛtam
ṛṣibhiḥ yācitaḥ bheje navamam pārthivam vapuḥ dugdha imām oṣadhīḥ viprāḥ tena ayam saḥ uśattamaḥ
rūpam saḥ jagṛhe mātsyam cākṣuṣa udadhi samplave nāvi āropya mahī mayyām apāt vaivasvatam manum
sura asurāṇām udadhim mathnatām mandarācalam dadhre kamaṭha rūpeṇa pṛṣṭhe ekādaśe vibhuḥ
dhānvantaram dvādaśamam trayodaśamam eva ca apāyayat surān anyān mohinyā mohayan striyā
caturdaśam nāra-siṁham bibhrat daitya-indram ūrjitam dadāra karajaiḥ ūrau erakām kaṭa-kṛt yathā
pañcadaśam vāmanakam kṛtvā agāt adhvaram baleḥ pada-trayam yācamānaḥ pratyāditsuḥ tri-piṣṭapam
avatāre ṣoḍaśame paśyan brahma-druhaḥ nṛpān triḥ-sapta kṛtvaḥ kupitaḥ niḥ kṣatrām akarot mahīm
tataḥ saptadaśe jātaḥ satyavatyām parāśarāt cakre veda-taroḥ śākhāḥ dṛṣṭvā puṁsaḥ alpa-medhasaḥ
nara devatvam āpannaḥ sura kārya cikīrṣayā samudra nigraha-ādīni cakre vīryāṇi ataḥ param
ekonaviṁśe viṁśatime vṛṣṇiṣu prāpya janmanī rāma kṛṣṇau iti bhuvaḥ bhagavān aharat bharam
tataḥ kalau sampravṛtte sammohāya sura dviṣām buddhaḥ nāmnā añjana-sutaḥ kīkaṭeṣu bhaviṣyati
atha asau yuga-sandhyāyām dasyu prāyeṣu rājasu janitā viṣṇu yaśasaḥ nāmnā kalkiḥ jagat-patiḥ
avatārāḥ hi asaṅkhyeyāḥ hareḥ sattva-nidheḥ dvijāḥ yathā avidāsinaḥ kulyāḥ sarasaḥ syuḥ sahasraśaḥ
ṛṣayaḥ manavaḥ devāḥ manu-putrāḥ mahā-ojasaḥ kalāḥ sarve hareḥ eva sa-prajāpatayaḥ smṛtāḥ
ete ca aṁśa kalāḥ puṁsaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ tu bhagavān svayam indra-ari vyākulam lokam mṛḍayanti yuge yuge
janma guhyam bhagavataḥ yaḥ etat prayataḥ naraḥ sāyam prātaḥ gṛṇan bhaktyā duḥkha-grāmāt vimucyate
etat rūpam bhagavataḥ hi arūpasya cit-ātmanaḥ māyā guṇaiḥ viracitam mahat-ādibhiḥ ātmani
yathā nabhasi megha-oghaḥ reṇuḥ vā pārthivaḥ anile evam draṣṭari dṛśyatvam āropitam abuddhibhiḥ
ataḥ param yat avyaktam avyūḍha guṇa-bṛṁhitam adṛṣṭa aśruta vastutvāt saḥ jīvaḥ yat punaḥ-bhavaḥ
yatra ime sat-asat rūpe pratiṣiddhe sva-saṁvidā avidyayā ātmani kṛte iti tat brahma-darśanam
yadi eṣā uparatā devī māyā vaiśāradī matiḥ sampannaḥ eva iti viduḥ mahimni sve mahīyate
evam janmāni karmāṇi hi akartuḥ ajanasya ca varṇayanti sma kavayaḥ veda-guhyāni hṛt-pateḥ
saḥ vā idam viśvam amogha-līlaḥ sṛjati avati atti na sajjate asmin bhūteṣu ca antarhitaḥ ātma-tantraḥ ṣāṭ-vargikam jighrati ṣaṭ-guṇa-īśaḥ
na ca asya kaścit nipuṇena dhātuḥ avaiti jantuḥ kumanīṣaḥ ūtīḥ nāmāni rūpāṇi manaḥ-vacobhiḥ santanvataḥ naṭa-caryām iva ajñaḥ
saḥ veda dhātuḥ padavīm parasya duranta-vīryasya ratha-aṅga-pāṇeḥ yaḥ amāyayā santatayā anuvṛttyā bhajeta tat-pāda saroja-gandham
atha iha dhanyāḥ bhagavantaḥ ittham yat vāsudeve akhila loka-nāthe kurvanti sarva-ātmakam ātma bhāvam na yatra bhūyaḥ parivartaḥ ugraḥ
idam bhāgavatam nāma purāṇam brahma-sammitam uttama-śloka caritam cakāra bhagavān ṛṣiḥ niḥśreyasāya lokasya dhanyam svasti-ayanam mahat
tat idam grāhayām āsa sutam ātmavatām varam sarva veda itihāsānām sāram sāram samuddhṛtam
saḥ tu saṁśrāvayām āsa mahā-rājam parīkṣitam prāya-upaviṣṭam gaṅgāyām parītam parama-ṛṣibhiḥ
kṛṣṇe sva-dhāma upagate dharma jñāna ādibhiḥ saha kalau naṣṭa-dṛśām eṣaḥ purāṇa-arkaḥ adhunā uditaḥ
tatra kīrtayataḥ viprāḥ vipra-ṛṣeḥ bhūri tejasaḥ aham ca adhyagamam tatra niviṣṭaḥ tat-anugrahāt saḥ aham vaḥ śrāvayiṣyāmi yathā-adhītam yathā-mati
vyāsaḥ uvāca iti bruvāṇam saṁstūya munīnām dīrgha satriṇām vṛddhaḥ kula-patiḥ sūtam bahu-ṛcaḥ śaunakaḥ abravīt
śaunakaḥ uvāca sūta sūta mahā-bhāga vada naḥ vadatām vara kathām bhāgavatīm puṇyām yat āha bhagavān śukaḥ
kasmin yuge pravṛttā iyam sthāne vā kena hetunā kutaḥ sañcoditaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kṛtavān saṁhitām muniḥ
tasya putraḥ mahā-yogī sama-dṛk nirvikalpakaḥ ekānta-matiḥ unnidraḥ gūḍhaḥ mūḍhaḥ iva īyate
dṛṣṭvā anuyāntam ṛṣim ātmajam api anagnam devyaḥ hriyā paridadhuḥ na sutasya citram tat vīkṣya pṛcchati munau jagaduḥ tava asti strī-pum bhidā na tu sutasya vivikta dṛṣṭeḥ
katham ālakṣitaḥ pauraiḥ samprāptaḥ kuru-jāṅgalān unmatta mūka jaḍavat vicaran gaja-sāhvaye
katham vā pāṇḍaveyasya rājarṣeḥ muninā saha saṁvādaḥ samabhūt tāta yatra eṣā sātvatī śrutiḥ
saḥ go-dohana-mātram hi gṛheṣu gṛha-medhinām avekṣate mahā-bhāgaḥ tīrthī kurvan tat āśramam
abhimanyu-sutam sūta prāhuḥ bhāgavata-uttamam tasya janma mahā-āścaryam karmāṇi ca gṛṇīhi naḥ
saḥ samrāṭ kasya vā hetoḥ pāṇḍūnām māna-vardhanaḥ prāya-upaviṣṭaḥ gaṅgāyām anādṛtya adhirāṭ śriyam
namanti yat-pāda niketam ātmanaḥ śivāya hānīya dhanāni śatravaḥ katham saḥ vīraḥ śriyam aṅga dustyajām yuvā aiṣata utsraṣṭum aho saha asubhiḥ
śivāya lokasya bhavāya bhūtaye ye uttama-śloka-parāyaṇāḥ janāḥ jīvanti na ātma-artham asau para-āśrayam mumoca nirvidya kutaḥ kalevaram
tat sarvam naḥ samācakṣva pṛṣṭaḥ yat iha kiñcana manye tvām viṣaye vācām snātam anyatra chāndasāt
sūtaḥ uvāca dvāpare samanuprāpte tṛtīye yuga paryaye jātaḥ parāśarāt yogī vāsavyām kalayā hareḥ
saḥ kadācit sarasvatyāḥ upaspṛśya jalam śuciḥ vivikte ekaḥ āsīnaḥ udite ravi-maṇḍale
para-avara jñaḥ saḥ ṛṣiḥ kālena avyakta raṁhasā yuga-dharma vyatikaram prāptam bhuvi yuge yuge
bhautikānām ca bhāvānām śakti-hrāsam ca tat-kṛtam aśraddadhānān niḥsattvān durmedhān hrasita āyuṣaḥ durbhagān ca janān vīkṣya muniḥ divyena cakṣuṣā sarva varṇa-āśramāṇām yat dadhyau hitam amogha-dṛk
cātuḥ hotram karma śuddham prajānām vīkṣya vaidikam vyadadhāt yajña santatyai vedam ekam catuḥ-vidham
ṛg-yajuḥ-sāma-atharva-ākhyāḥ vedāḥ catvāraḥ uddhṛtāḥ itihāsa purāṇam ca pañcamaḥ vedaḥ ucyate
tatra ṛg-veda-dharaḥ pailaḥ sāma-gaḥ jaiminiḥ kaviḥ vaiśampāyanaḥ eva ekaḥ niṣṇātaḥ yajuṣām uta
atharva aṅgirasām āsīt sumantuḥ dāruṇaḥ muniḥ itihāsa-purāṇānām pitā me romaharṣaṇaḥ
te ete ṛṣayaḥ vedam svam svam vyasyan anekadhā śiṣyaiḥ praśiṣyaiḥ tat-śiṣyaiḥ vedāḥ te śākhinaḥ abhavan
te eva vedāḥ durmedhaiḥ dhāryante puruṣaiḥ yathā evam cakāra bhagavān vyāsaḥ kṛpaṇa-vatsalaḥ
strī śūdra dvija-bandhūnām trayī na śruti-gocarā karma-śreyasi mūḍhānām śreyaḥ evam bhavet iha iti bhāratam ākhyānam kṛpayā muninā kṛtam
evam pravṛttasya sadā bhūtānām śreyasi dvijāḥ sarvātmakena api yadā na atuṣyat hṛdayam tataḥ
na atiprasīdat hṛdayaḥ sarasvatyāḥ taṭe śucau vitarkayan vivikta-sthaḥ idam ca uvāca dharma-vit
dhṛta-vratena hi mayā chandāṁsi guravaḥ agnayaḥ mānitāḥ nirvyalīkena gṛhītam ca anuśāsanam bhārata vyapadeśena hi āmnāya-arthaḥ ca pradarśitaḥ dṛśyate yatra dharma-ādiḥ strī-śūdra-ādibhiḥ api uta
tathāpi bata me daihyaḥ hi ātmā ca eva ātmanā vibhuḥ asampannaḥ iva ābhāti brahma-varcasya sattamaḥ
kim vā bhāgavatāḥ dharmāḥ na prāyeṇa nirūpitāḥ priyāḥ paramahaṁsānām te eva hi acyuta priyāḥ
tasya evam khilam ātmānam manyamānasya khidyataḥ kṛṣṇasya nāradaḥ abhyāgāt āśramam prāk udāhṛtam
tam abhijñāya sahasā pratyutthāya āgatam muniḥ pūjayām āsa vidhi-vat nāradam sura-pūjitam
sūtaḥ uvāca atha tam sukham āsīnaḥ upāsīnam bṛhat-śravāḥ devarṣiḥ prāha viprarṣim vīṇā-pāṇiḥ smayan iva
nāradaḥ uvāca pārāśarya mahā-bhāga bhavataḥ kaccit ātmanā parituṣyati śārīraḥ ātmā mānasaḥ eva vā
jijñāsitam susampannam api te mahat-adbhutam kṛtavān bhāratam yaḥ tvam sarva-artha paribṛṁhitam
jijñāsitam adhītam ca brahma yat tat sanātanam tathāpi śocasi ātmānam akṛta-arthaḥ iva prabho
vyāsaḥ uvāca asti eva me sarvam idam tvayā uktam tathāpi na ātmā parituṣyate me tat mūlam avyaktam agādha-bodham pṛcchāmahe tvā ātma-bhava ātma-bhūtam
saḥ vai bhavān veda samasta guhyam upāsitaḥ yat puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ para-avara-īśaḥ manasā eva viśvam sṛjati avati atti guṇaiḥ asaṅgaḥ
tvam paryaṭan arkaḥ iva tri-lokīm antaḥ-caraḥ vāyuḥ iva ātma sākṣī para-avare brahmaṇi dharmataḥ vrataiḥ snātasya me nyūnam alam vicakṣva
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca bhavatā anudita-prāyam yaśaḥ bhagavataḥ amalam yena eva asau na tuṣyeta manye tat darśanam khilam
yathā dharma-ādayaḥ ca arthāḥ muni-varya anukīrtitāḥ na tathā vāsudevasya mahimā hi anuvarṇitaḥ
na yat vacaḥ citra-padam hareḥ yaśaḥ jagat pavitram pragṛṇīta karhicit tat vāyasam tīrtham uśanti mānasāḥ na yatra haṁsāḥ niramanti uśik-kṣayāḥ
tat vāk visargaḥ janatā agha viplavaḥ yasmin prati-ślokam abaddhavati api nāmāni anantasya yaśaḥ aṅkitāni yat śṛṇvanti gāyanti gṛṇanti sādhavaḥ
naiṣkarmyam api acyuta bhāva varjitam na śobhate jñānam alam nirañjanam kutaḥ punaḥ śaśvat abhadram īśvare na ca arpitam karma yat api akāraṇam
atho mahā-bhāga bhavān amogha-dṛk śuci śravāḥ satya-rataḥ dhṛta-vrataḥ urukramasya akhila bandha muktaye samādhinā anusmara tat-viceṣṭitam
tataḥ anyathā kiñcana yat vivakṣataḥ pṛthak dṛśaḥ tat-kṛta rūpa nāmabhiḥ na karhicit kvāpi ca duḥsthitā matiḥ labheta vāta-āhata nauḥ iva āspadam
jugupsitam dharma-kṛte anuśāsataḥ svabhāva-raktasya mahān vyatikramaḥ yat-vākyataḥ dharmaḥ iti itaraḥ sthitaḥ na manyate tasya nivāraṇam janaḥ
vicakṣaṇaḥ asya arhati veditum vibhoḥ ananta-pārasya nivṛttitaḥ sukham pravartamānasya guṇaiḥ anātmanaḥ tataḥ bhavān darśaya ceṣṭitam vibhoḥ
tyaktvā sva-dharmam caraṇa-ambujam hareḥ bhajan apakvaḥ atha patet tataḥ yadi yatra kva vā abhadram abhūt amuṣya kim kaḥ vā arthaḥ āptaḥ abhajatām sva-dharmataḥ
tasya eva hetoḥ prayateta kovidaḥ na labhyate yat bhramatām upari adhaḥ tat labhyate duḥkhavat anyataḥ sukham kālena sarvatra gabhīra raṁhasā
na vai janaḥ jātu kathañcana āvrajet mukunda-sevī anyavat aṅga saṁsṛtim smaran mukunda-aṅghri upagūhanam punaḥ vihātum icchet na rasa-grahaḥ janaḥ
idam hi viśvam bhagavān iva itaraḥ yataḥ jagat sthāna nirodha sambhavāḥ tat hi svayam veda bhavān tathā api te prādeśa-mātram bhavataḥ pradarśitam
tvam ātmanā ātmānam avehi amogha-dṛk parasya puṁsaḥ paramātmanaḥ kalām ajam prajātam jagataḥ śivāya tat mahā-anubhāva abhyudayaḥ adhigaṇya-tām
idam hi puṁsaḥ tapasaḥ śrutasya vā sviṣṭasya sūktasya ca buddhi dattayoḥ avicyutaḥ arthaḥ kavibhiḥ nirūpitaḥ yat uttamaśloka guṇa-anuvarṇanam
aham purā atīta-bhave abhavam mune dāsyāḥ tu kasyāścana veda-vādinām nirūpitaḥ bālakaḥ eva yoginām śuśrūṣaṇe prāvṛṣi nirvivikṣatām
te mayi apeta akhila cāpale arbhake dānte adhṛta-krīḍanake anuvartini cakruḥ kṛpām yadyapi tulya-darśanāḥ śuśrūṣamāṇe munayaḥ alpa-bhāṣiṇi
ucchiṣṭa-lepān anumoditaḥ dvijaiḥ sakṛt sma bhuñje tat apāsta kilbiṣaḥ evam pravṛttasya viśuddha-cetasaḥ tat dharmaḥ eva ātma-ruciḥ prajāyate
tatra anu aham kṛṣṇa-kathāḥ pragāyatām anugraheṇa aśṛṇavam manaḥ-harāḥ tāḥ śraddhayā me anupadam viśṛṇvataḥ priyaśravasi aṅga mama abhavat ruciḥ
tasmin tadā labdha ruceḥ mahā-mate priyaśravasi askhalitā matiḥ mama yayā aham etat sat-asat sva-māyayā paśye mayi brahmaṇi kalpitam pare
ittham śarat prāvṛṣikau ṛtū hareḥ viśṛṇvataḥ me anusavam yaśaḥ amalam saṅkīrtyamānam munibhiḥ mahā-ātmabhiḥ bhaktiḥ pravṛttā ātma rajaḥ tama upahā
tasya evam me anuraktasya praśritasya hata enasaḥ śraddadhānasya bālasya dāntasya anucarasya ca
jñānam guhyatamam yat tat sākṣāt bhagavatā uditam anvavocan gamiṣyantaḥ kṛpayā dīna-vatsalāḥ
yena eva aham bhagavataḥ vāsudevasya vedhasaḥ māyā anubhāvam avidam yena gacchanti tat-padam
etat saṁsūcitam brahman tāpa-traya cikitsitam yat īśvare bhagavati karma brahmaṇi bhāvitam
āmayaḥ yaḥ ca bhūtānām jāyate yena suvrata tat eva hi āmayam dravyam na punāti cikitsitam
evam nṛṇām kriyā-yogāḥ sarve saṁsṛti hetavaḥ te eva ātma vināśāya kalpante kalpitāḥ pare
yat atra kriyate karma bhagavat paritoṣaṇam jñānam yat tat adhīnam hi bhakti-yoga samanvitam
kurvāṇāḥ yatra karmāṇi bhagavat śikṣayā asakṛt gṛṇanti guṇa nāmāni kṛṣṇasya anusmaranti ca
oṁ namaḥ bhagavate tubhyam vāsudevāya dhīmahi pradyumnāya, aniruddhāya and saṅkarṣaṇāya namaḥ ca
iti mūrti abhidhānena mantra-mūrtim amūrtikam yajate yajña puruṣam saḥ samyak darśanaḥ pumān
imam sva-nigamam brahman avetya mat anuṣṭhitam adāt me jñānam aiśvaryam svasmin bhāvam ca keśavaḥ
tvam api adabhra śruta viśrutam vibhoḥ samāpyate yena vidām bubhutsitam prākhyāhi duḥkhaiḥ muhuḥ ardita-ātmanām saṅkleśa nirvāṇam uśanti na anyathā
sūtaḥ uvāca evam niśamya bhagavān devarṣeḥ janma karma ca bhūyaḥ papraccha tam brahman vyāsaḥ satyavatī-sutaḥ
vyāsaḥ uvāca bhikṣubhiḥ vipravasite vijñāna ādeṣṭṛbhiḥ tava vartamānaḥ vayasi ādye tataḥ kim akarot bhavān
svāyambhuva kayā vṛttyā vartitam te param vayaḥ katham ca idam udasrākṣīḥ kāle prāpte kalevaram
prāk kalpa viṣayām etām smṛtim te muni-sattama na hi eṣaḥ vyavadhāt kālaḥ eṣaḥ sarva nirākṛtiḥ
nāradaḥ uvāca bhikṣubhiḥ vipravasite vijñāna ādeṣṭṛbhiḥ mama vartamānaḥ vayasi ādye tataḥ etat akāraṣam
eka-ātmajā me jananī yoṣit mūḍhā ca kiṅkarī mayi ātmaje ananya-gatau cakre sneha-anubandhanam
sā asvatantrā na kalpā āsīt yoga-kṣemam mama icchatī īśasya hi vaśe lokaḥ yoṣā dāru-mayī yathā
aham ca tat brahma-kule ūṣivān tat upekṣayā dik-deśa kāla avyutpannaḥ bālakaḥ pañca hāyanaḥ
ekadā nirgatām gehāt duhantīm niśi gām pathi sarpaḥ adaśat padā spṛṣṭaḥ kṛpaṇām kāla-coditaḥ
tadā tat aham īśasya bhaktānām śam abhīpsataḥ anugraham manyamānaḥ prātiṣṭham diśam uttarām
sphītān jana-padān tatra pura grāma vraja ākarān kheṭa kharvaṭa vāṭīḥ ca vanāni upavanāni ca
citra-dhātu vicitra adrīn ibha-bhagna bhuja drumān jalāśayān śiva jalān nalinīḥ sura-sevitāḥ citra-svanaiḥ patra-rathaiḥ vibhramat bhramara-śriyaḥ
nala veṇu śaraḥ tanba kuśa kīcaka gahvaram ekaḥ eva atiyātaḥ aham adrākṣam vipinam mahat ghoram pratibhaya-ākāram vyāla ulūka śiva ajiram
pariśrānta indriya ātmā aham tṛṭ-parītaḥ bubhukṣitaḥ snātvā pītvā hrade nadyāḥ upaspṛṣṭaḥ gata śramaḥ
tasmin nirmanuje araṇye pippala upasthe āśritaḥ ātmanā ātmānam ātma-stham yathā-śrutam acintayam
dhyāyataḥ caraṇa-ambhojam bhāva-nirjita cetasā autkaṇṭhya aśru-kala akṣasya hṛdi āsīt me śanaiḥ hariḥ
premā atibhara nirbhinna pulaka aṅgaḥ ati-nirvṛtaḥ ānanda samplave līnaḥ na apaśyam ubhayam mune
rūpam bhagavataḥ yat tat manaḥ kāntam śucā-apaham apaśyan sahasā uttasthe vaiklavyāt durmanāḥ iva
didṛkṣuḥ tat aham bhūyaḥ praṇidhāya manaḥ hṛdi vīkṣamāṇaḥ api na apaśyam avitṛptaḥ iva āturaḥ
evam yatantam vijane mām āha agocaraḥ girām gambhīra ślakṣṇayā vācā śucaḥ praśamayan iva
hanta asmin janmani bhavān mā mām draṣṭum iha arhati avipakva kaṣāyāṇām durdarśaḥ aham kuyoginām
sakṛt yat darśitam rūpam etat kāmāya te anagha mat kāmaḥ śanakaiḥ sādhuḥ sarvān muñcati hṛt-śayān
sat-sevayā adīrghayā api jātā mayi dṛḍhā matiḥ hitvā avadyam imam lokam gantā mat-janatām asi
matiḥ mayi nibaddhā iyam na vipadyeta karhicit prajā sarga nirodhe api smṛtiḥ ca mat anugrahāt
etāvat uktvā upararāma tat mahat bhūtam nabhaḥ-liṅgam aliṅgam īśvaram aham ca tasmai mahatām mahīyase śīrṣṇā avanāmam vidadhe anukampitaḥ
nāmāni anantasya hata-trapaḥ paṭhan guhyāni bhadrāṇi kṛtāni ca smaran gām paryaṭan tuṣṭa-manāḥ gata-spṛhaḥ kālam pratīkṣan vimadaḥ vimatsaraḥ
evam kṛṣṇa-mateḥ brahman na āsaktasya amala-ātmanaḥ kālaḥ prādurabhūt kāle taḍit saudāmanī yathā
prayujyamāne mayi tām śuddhām bhāgavatīm tanum ārabdha karma nirvāṇaḥ nyapatat pāñca-bhautikaḥ
kalpa-ante idam ādāya śayāne ambhasi udanvataḥ śiśayiṣoḥ anuprāṇam viviśe antaḥ aham vibhoḥ
sahasra yuga paryante utthāya idam sisṛkṣataḥ marīci-miśrāḥ ṛṣayaḥ prāṇebhyaḥ aham ca jajñire
antaḥ bahiḥ ca lokān trīn paryemi askandita vrataḥ anugrahāt mahā-viṣṇoḥ avighāta gatiḥ kvacit
deva dattām imām vīṇām svara brahma vibhūṣitām mūrcchayitvā hari-kathām gāyamānaḥ carāmi aham
pragāyataḥ sva-vīryāṇi tīrtha-pādaḥ priya-śravāḥ āhūtaḥ iva me śīghram darśanam yāti cetasi
etat hi ātura-cittānām mātrā sparśa icchayā muhuḥ bhava-sindhu plavaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ hari-carya anuvarṇanam
yama-ādibhiḥ yoga-pathaiḥ kāma lobha hataḥ muhuḥ mukunda sevayā yadvat tathā ātmā addhā na śāmyati
sarvam tat idam ākhyātam yat pṛṣṭaḥ aham tvayā anagha janma karma rahasyam me bhavataḥ ca ātma toṣaṇam
sūtaḥ uvāca evam sambhāṣya bhagavān nāradaḥ vāsavī sutam āmantrya vīṇām raṇayan yayau yādṛcchikaḥ muniḥ
aho devarṣiḥ dhanyaḥ ayam yat kīrtim śārṅga-dhanvanaḥ gāyan mādyan idam tantryā ramayati āturam jagat
śaunakaḥ uvāca nirgate nārade sūta bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ śrutavān tat abhipretam tataḥ kim akarot vibhuḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca brahma-nadyām sarasvatyām āśramaḥ paścime taṭe śamyāprāsaḥ iti proktaḥ ṛṣīṇām satra-vardhanaḥ
tasmin sve āśrame vyāsaḥ badarī ṣaṇḍa maṇḍite āsīnaḥ apaḥ upaspṛśya praṇidadhyau manaḥ svayam
bhakti yogena manasi samyak praṇihite amale apaśyat puruṣam pūrṇam māyām ca tat apāśrayam
yayā sammohitaḥ jīvaḥ ātmānam tri-guṇa-ātmakam paraḥ api manute anartham tat kṛtam ca abhipadyate
anartha upaśamam sākṣāt bhakti-yogam adhokṣaje lokasya ajānataḥ vidvān cakre sātvata saṁhitām
yasyām vai śrūyamāṇāyām kṛṣṇe parama pūruṣe bhaktiḥ utpadyate puṁsaḥ śoka moha bhaya apahā
saḥ saṁhitām bhāgavatīm kṛtvā anukramya ca ātma-jam śukam adhyāpayām āsa nivṛtti niratam muniḥ
śaunakaḥ uvāca saḥ vai nivṛtti nirataḥ sarvatra upekṣakaḥ muniḥ kasya vā bṛhatīm etām ātma-ārāmaḥ samabhyasat
sūtaḥ uvāca ātmārāmāḥ ca munayaḥ nirgranthāḥ api urukrame kurvanti ahaitukīm bhaktim ittham-bhūta guṇaḥ hariḥ
hareḥ guṇa ākṣipta matiḥ bhagavān bādarāyaṇiḥ adhyagāt mahat ākhyānam nityam viṣṇu-jana priyaḥ
parīkṣitaḥ atha rājarṣeḥ janma karma vilāpanam saṁsthām ca pāṇḍu-putrāṇām vakṣye kṛṣṇa-kathā-udayam
yadā mṛdhe kaurava sṛñjayānām vīreṣu atho vīra-gatim gateṣu vṛkodara āviddha gadā abhimarśa bhagna uru-daṇḍe dhṛtarāṣṭra-putre bhartuḥ priyam drauṇiḥ iti sma paśyan kṛṣṇā sutānām svapatām śirāṁsi upāharat vipriyam eva tasya jugupsitam karma vigarhayanti
mātā śiśūnām nidhanam sutānām niśamya ghoram paritapyamānā tadā arudat vāṣpa-kala-ākula-akṣī tām sāntvayan āha kirīṭamālī
tadā śucaḥ te pramṛjāmi bhadre yat brahma-bandhoḥ śiraḥ ātatāyinaḥ gāṇḍīva-muktaiḥ viśikhaiḥ upāhare tvā ākramya yat snāsyasi dagdha-putrā
iti priyām valgu vicitra jalpaiḥ saḥ sāntvayitvā acyuta-mitra-sūtaḥ anvādravat daṁśitaḥ ugra-dhanvā kapi-dhvajaḥ guru-putram rathena
tam āpatantam saḥ vilakṣya dūrāt kumāra-hā udvigna-manāḥ rathena parādravat prāṇa parīpsuḥ urvyām yāvat-gamam rudra-bhayāt yathā kaḥ
yadā aśaraṇam ātmānam aikṣata śrānta-vājinam astram brahma-śiraḥ mene ātma-trāṇam dvija-ātma-jaḥ
atha upaspṛśya salilam sandadhe tat samāhitaḥ ajānan api saṁhāram prāṇa-kṛcchre upasthite
tataḥ prāduṣkṛtam tejaḥ pracaṇḍam sarvataḥ diśam prāṇa-āpadam abhiprekṣya viṣṇum jiṣṇuḥ uvāca ha
arjunaḥ uvāca kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahā-bāho bhaktānām abhayaṅkara tvam ekaḥ dahyamānānām apavargaḥ asi saṁsṛteḥ
tvam ādyaḥ puruṣaḥ sākṣāt īśvaraḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ māyām vyudasya cit-śaktyā kaivalye sthitaḥ ātmani
saḥ eva jīva-lokasya māyā-mohita cetasaḥ vidhatse svena vīryeṇa śreyaḥ dharma-ādi lakṣaṇam
tathā ayam ca avatāraḥ te bhuvaḥ bhāra jihīrṣayā svānām ca ananya-bhāvānām anudhyānāya ca asakṛt
kim idam svit kutaḥ vā iti deva-deva na vedmi aham sarvataḥ mukham āyāti tejaḥ parama dāruṇam
śrī-bhagavān uvāca vettha idam droṇa-putrasya brāhmam astram pradarśitam na eva asau veda saṁhāram prāṇa-bādhe upasthite
na hi asya anyatamam kiñcit astram prati avakarśanam jahi astra-tejaḥ unnaddham astra-jñaḥ hi astra-tejasā
sūtaḥ uvāca śrutvā bhagavatā proktam phālgunaḥ para-vīra-hā spṛṣṭvā āpaḥ tam parikramya brāhmam brāhma-astram sandadhe
saṁhatya anyonyam ubhayoḥ tejasī śara saṁvṛte āvṛtya rodasī kham ca vavṛdhāte arka vahni-vat
dṛṣṭvā astra tejaḥ tu tayoḥ trīn lokān pradahat mahat dahyamānāḥ prajāḥ sarvāḥ sāṁvartakam amaṁsata
prajā upadravam ālakṣya loka vyatikaram ca tam matam ca vāsudevasya sañjahāra arjunaḥ dvayam
tataḥ āsādya tarasā dāruṇam gautamī-sutam babandha amarṣa tāmra-akṣaḥ paśum raśanayā yathā
śibirāya ninīṣantam rajjvā baddhvā ripum balāt prāha arjunam prakupitaḥ bhagavān ambuja-īkṣaṇaḥ
mā enam pārtha arhasi trātum brahma-bandhum imam jahi yaḥ asau anāgasaḥ suptān avadhīt niśi bālakān
mattam pramattam unmattam suptam bālam striyam jaḍam prapannam viratham bhītam na ripum hanti dharma-vit
sva-prāṇān yaḥ para-prāṇaiḥ prapuṣṇāti aghṛṇaḥ khalaḥ tat-vadhaḥ tasya hi śreyaḥ yat doṣāt yāti adhaḥ pumān
pratiśrutam ca bhavatā pāñcālyai śṛṇvataḥ mama āhariṣye śiraḥ tasya yaḥ te mānini putra-hā
tat asau vadhyatām pāpaḥ ātatāyī ātma bandhu-hā bhartuḥ ca vipriyam vīra kṛtavān kula-pāṁsanaḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca evam parīkṣatā dharmam pārthaḥ kṛṣṇena coditaḥ na aicchat hantum guru-sutam yadyapi ātma-hanam mahān
atha upetya sva śibiram govinda priya sārathiḥ nyavedayat tam priyāyai śocantyai ātma-jān hatān
tathā āhṛtam paśu-vat pāśa-baddham avāk-mukham karma jugupsitena nirīkṣya kṛṣṇā apakṛtam guroḥ sutam vāma svabhāvā kṛpayā nanāma ca
uvāca ca asahantī asya bandhana ānayanam satī mucyatām mucyatām eṣaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ nitarām guruḥ
sa-rahasyaḥ dhanuḥ-vedaḥ sa-visarga upasaṁyamaḥ astra grāmaḥ ca bhavatā śikṣitaḥ yat anugrahāt
saḥ eṣaḥ bhagavān droṇaḥ prajā-rūpeṇa vartate tasya ātmanaḥ ardham patnī āste na anvagāt vīrasūḥ kṛpī
tat dharma-jña mahā-bhāga bhavadbhiḥ gauravam kulam vṛjinam na arhati prāptum pūjyam vandyam abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
mā rodīt asya jananī gautamī pati-devatā yathā aham mṛta-vatsā ārtā rodimi aśru-mukhī muhuḥ
yaiḥ kopitam brahma-kulam rājanyaiḥ ajita ātmabhiḥ tat kulam pradahati āśu sa-anubandham śucā-arpitam
sūtaḥ uvāca dharmyam nyāyyam sa-karuṇam nirvyalīkam samam mahat rājā dharma-sutaḥ rājñyāḥ pratyanandat vacaḥ dvijāḥ
nakulaḥ sahadevaḥ ca yuyudhānaḥ dhanañjayaḥ bhagavān devakī-putraḥ ye ca anye yāḥ ca yoṣitaḥ
tatra āha amarṣitaḥ bhīmaḥ tasya śreyān vadhaḥ smṛtaḥ na bhartuḥ na ātmanaḥ ca arthe yaḥ ahan suptān śiśūn vṛthā
niśamya bhīma gaditam draupadyāḥ ca catuḥ-bhujaḥ ālokya vadanam sakhyuḥ idam āha hasan iva
śrī-bhagavān uvāca brahma-bandhuḥ na hantavyaḥ ātatāyī vadha-arhaṇaḥ mayā eva ubhayam āmnātam paripāhi anuśāsanam kuru pratiśrutam satyam yat tat sāntvayatā priyām priyam ca bhīmasenasya pāñcālyāḥ mahyam eva ca
sūtaḥ uvāca arjunaḥ sahasā ājñāya hareḥ hārdam atha asinā maṇim jahāra mūrdhanyam dvijasya saha mūrdhajam
vimucya raśanā-baddham bāla-hatyā hata-prabham tejasā maṇinā hīnam śibirāt nirayāpayat
vapanam draviṇa adānam sthānāt niryāpaṇam tathā eṣaḥ hi brahma-bandhūnām vadhaḥ na anyaḥ asti daihikaḥ
putra śoka āturāḥ sarve pāṇḍavāḥ saha kṛṣṇayā svānām mṛtānām yat kṛtyam cakruḥ nirharaṇa-ādikam
sūtaḥ uvāca atha te samparetānām svānām udakam icchatām dātum sa-kṛṣṇāḥ gaṅgāyām puraskṛtya yayuḥ striyaḥ
te ninīya udakam sarve vilapya ca bhṛśam punaḥ āplutāḥ hari-pādābja rajaḥ pūta sarit jale
tatra āsīnam kuru-patim dhṛtarāṣṭram saha-anujam gāndhārīm putra śoka-artām pṛthām kṛṣṇām ca mādhavaḥ
sāntvayām āsa munibhiḥ hata-bandhūn śucārpitān bhūteṣu kālasya gatim darśayan na pratikriyām
sādhayitvā ajāta-śatroḥ svam rājyam kitavaiḥ hṛtam ghātayitvā asataḥ rājñaḥ kaca sparśa kṣata āyuṣaḥ
yājayitvā aśvamedhaiḥ tam tribhiḥ uttama kalpakaiḥ tat yaśaḥ pāvanam dikṣu śata-manyoḥ iva atanot
āmantrya pāṇḍu-putrān ca śaineya uddhava saṁyutaḥ dvaipāyana-ādibhiḥ vipraiḥ pūjitaiḥ pratipūjitaḥ
gantum kṛtamatiḥ brahman dvārakām ratham āsthitaḥ upalebhe abhidhāvantīm uttarām bhaya-vihvalām
uttarā uvāca pāhi pāhi mahā-yogin deva-deva jagat-pate na anyam tvat abhayam paśye yatra mṛtyuḥ parasparam
abhidravati mām īśa śaraḥ tapta ayasaḥ vibho kāmam dahatu mām nātha mā me garbhaḥ nipātyatām
sūtaḥ uvāca upadhārya vacaḥ tasyāḥ bhagavān bhakta-vatsalaḥ apāṇḍavam idam kartum drauṇeḥ astram abudhyata
tarhi eva atha muni-śreṣṭha pāṇḍavāḥ pañca sāyakān ātmanaḥ abhimukhān dīptān ālakṣya astrāṇi upādaduḥ
vyasanam vīkṣya tat teṣām ananya viṣaya ātmanām sudarśanena sva-astreṇa svānām rakṣām vyadhāt vibhuḥ
antaḥsthaḥ sarva bhūtānām ātmā yoga-īśvaraḥ hariḥ sva-māyayā āvṛṇot garbham vairāṭyāḥ kuru-tantave
yadyapi astram brahma-śiraḥ tu amogham ca apratikriyam vaiṣṇavam tejaḥ āsādya samaśāmyat bhṛgu-udvaha
mā maṁsthāḥ hi etat āścaryam sarva āścarya-maye acyute yaḥ idam māyayā devyā sṛjati avati hanti ajaḥ
brahma-tejaḥ vinirmuktaiḥ ātma-jaiḥ saha kṛṣṇayā prayāṇa abhimukham kṛṣṇam idam āha pṛthā satī
kuntī uvāca namasye puruṣam tvā ādyam īśvaram prakṛteḥ param alakṣyam sarva bhūtānām antaḥ bahiḥ avasthitam
māyā javanikā ācchannam ajñā adhokṣajam avyayam na lakṣyase mūḍha-dṛśā naṭaḥ nāṭya-dharaḥ yathā
tathā paramahaṁsānām munīnām amala-ātmanām bhakti-yoga vidhāna-artham katham paśyema hi striyaḥ
kṛṣṇāya vāsudevāya devakī-nandanāya ca nanda-gopa kumārāya govindāya namaḥ namaḥ
namaḥ paṅkaja-nābhāya namaḥ paṅkaja-māline namaḥ paṅkaja-netrāya namaḥ te paṅkaja-aṅghraye
yathā hṛṣīkeśa khalena devakī kaṁsena ruddhā ati-ciram śuca-arpitā vimocitā aham ca saha-ātma-jā vibho tvayā eva nāthena muhuḥ vipat-gaṇāt
viṣāt mahā-agneḥ puruṣa-ada darśanāt asat sabhāyāḥ vana-vāsa kṛcchrataḥ mṛdhe mṛdhe aneka mahā-ratha astrataḥ drauṇi astrataḥ ca āsma hare abhirakṣitāḥ
vipadaḥ santu tāḥ śaśvat tatra tatra jagat-guro bhavataḥ darśanam yat syāt apunaḥ bhava-darśanam
janma aiśvarya śruta śrībhiḥ edhamāna madaḥ pumān na eva arhati abhidhātum vai tvām akiñcana-gocaram
namaḥ akiñcana-vittāya nivṛtta guṇa vṛttaye ātma-ārāmāya śāntāya kaivalya-pataye namaḥ
manye tvām kālam īśānam anādi-nidhanam vibhum samam carantam sarvatra bhūtānām yat mithaḥ kaliḥ
na veda kaścit bhagavan cikīrṣitam tava īhamānasya nṛṇām viḍambanam na yasya kaścit dayitaḥ asti karhicit dveṣyaḥ ca yasmin viṣamā matiḥ nṛṇām
janma karma ca viśva-ātman ajasya akartuḥ ātmanaḥ tiryak nṛ ṛṣiṣu yādaḥsu tat atyanta viḍambanam
gopī ādade tvayi kṛtāgasi dāma tāvat yā te daśā aśru-kalila añjana sambhrama akṣam vaktram ninīya bhaya-bhāvanayā sthitasya sā mām vimohayati bhīḥ api yat bibheti
kecit āhuḥ ajam jātam puṇya-ślokasya kīrtaye yadoḥ priyasya anvavāye malayasya iva candanam
apare vasudevasya devakyām yācitaḥ abhyagāt ajaḥ tvam asya kṣemāya vadhāya ca sura-dviṣām
bhāra-avatāraṇāya anye bhuvaḥ nāvaḥ iva udadhau sīdantyāḥ bhūri bhāreṇa jātaḥ hi ātma-bhuvā arthitaḥ
bhave asmin kliśyamānānām avidyā kāma karmabhiḥ śravaṇa smaraṇa arhāṇi kariṣyan iti kecana
śṛṇvanti gāyanti gṛṇanti abhīkṣṇaśaḥ smaranti nandanti tava īhitam janāḥ te eva paśyanti acireṇa tāvakam bhava-pravāha uparamam pada-ambujam
api adya naḥ tvam sva-kṛta īhita prabho jihāsasi svit suhṛdaḥ anujīvinaḥ yeṣām na ca anyat bhavataḥ pada-ambujāt parāyaṇam rājasu yojita aṁhasām
ke vayam nāma-rūpābhyām yadubhiḥ saha pāṇḍavāḥ bhavataḥ adarśanam yarhi hṛṣīkāṇām iva īśituḥ
na iyam śobhiṣyate tatra yathā idānīm gadādhara tvat padaiḥ aṅkitā bhāti sva-lakṣaṇa vilakṣitaiḥ
ime jana-padāḥ svṛddhāḥ supakva auṣadhi vīrudhaḥ vana adri nadī udanvantaḥ hi edhante tava vīkṣitaiḥ
atha viśva-īśa viśva-ātman viśva-mūrte svakeṣu me sneha-pāśam imam chindhi dṛḍham pāṇḍuṣu vṛṣṇiṣu
tvayi me ananya-viṣayā matiḥ madhu-pate asakṛt ratim udvahatāt addhā gaṅgā iva ogham udanvati
śrī-kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa-sakha vṛṣṇi ṛṣabha avani dhruk rājanya-vaṁśa dahana anapavarga vīrya govinda go dvija sura arti-hara avatāra yoga-īśvara akhila guro bhagavan namaḥ te
sūtaḥ uvāca pṛthayā ittham kala-padaiḥ pariṇūta akhila udayaḥ mandam jahāsa vaikuṇṭhaḥ mohayan iva māyayā
tām bāḍham iti upāmantrya praviśya gajasāhvayam striyaḥ ca sva-puram yāsyan premṇā rājñā nivāritaḥ
vyāsa-ādyaiḥ īśvara īhā jñaiḥ kṛṣṇena adbhuta-karmaṇā prabodhitaḥ api itihāsaiḥ na abudhyata śucā arpitaḥ
āha rājā dharma-sutaḥ cintayan suhṛdām vadham prākṛtena ātmanā viprāḥ sneha moha vaśam gataḥ
aho me paśyata ajñānam hṛdi rūḍham durātmanaḥ pārakyasya eva dehasya bahvyaḥ me akṣauhiṇīḥ hatāḥ
bāla dvi-ja suhṛt mitra pitṛ bhrātṛ guru druhaḥ na me syāt nirayāt mokṣaḥ hi api varṣa ayuta āyutaiḥ
na enaḥ rājñaḥ prajā-bhartuḥ dharma yuddhe vadhaḥ dviṣām iti me na tu bodhāya kalpate śāsanam vacaḥ
strīṇām mat hata-bandhūnām drohaḥ yaḥ asau iha utthitaḥ karmabhiḥ gṛhamedhīyaiḥ na aham kalpaḥ vyapohitum
yathā paṅkena paṅka-ambhaḥ surayā vā surākṛtam bhūta-hatyām tathā eva ekām na yajñaiḥ mārṣṭum arhati
sūtaḥ uvāca iti bhītaḥ prajā-drohāt sarva dharma vivitsayā tataḥ vinaśanam prāgāt yatra deva-vrataḥ apatat
tadā te bhrātaraḥ sarve sat-aśvaiḥ svarṇa bhūṣitaiḥ anvagacchan rathaiḥ viprāḥ vyāsa dhaumya ādayaḥ tathā
bhagavān api vipra-ṛṣe rathena sa-dhanañjayaḥ saḥ taiḥ vyarocata nṛpaḥ kuvera iva guhyakaiḥ
dṛṣṭvā nipatitam bhūmau divaḥ cyutam iva amaram praṇemuḥ pāṇḍavāḥ bhīṣmam sa-anugāḥ saha cakriṇā
tatra brahma-ṛṣayaḥ sarve deva-ṛṣayaḥ ca sattama rāja-ṛṣayaḥ ca tatra āsan draṣṭum bharata puṅgavam
parvataḥ nāradaḥ dhaumyaḥ bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ bṛhadaśvaḥ bharadvājaḥ sa-śiṣyaḥ reṇukā-sutaḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ indrapramadaḥ tritaḥ gṛtsamadaḥ asitaḥ kakṣīvān gautamaḥ atriḥ ca kauśikaḥ atha sudarśanaḥ
anye ca munayaḥ brahman brahmarāta ādayaḥ amalāḥ śiṣyaiḥ upetāḥ ājagmuḥ kaśyapa āṅgirasa ādayaḥ
tān sametān mahā-bhāgān upalabhya vasu-uttamaḥ pūjayām āsa dharma-jñaḥ deśa kāla vibhāga-vit
kṛṣṇam ca tat prabhāva-jñaḥ āsīnam jagat-īśvaram hṛdi-stham pūjayām āsa māyayā upātta vigraham
pāṇḍu putrān upāsīnān praśraya prema saṅgatān abhyācaṣṭa anurāga aśraiḥ andhībhūtena cakṣuṣā
aho kaṣṭam aho anyāyyam yat yūyam dharma-nandanāḥ jīvitum na arhatha kliṣṭam vipra dharma acyuta āśrayāḥ
saṁsthite ati-rathe pāṇḍau pṛthā bāla-prajā vadhūḥ yuṣmat-kṛte bahūn kleśān prāptā toka-vatī muhuḥ
sarvam kāla-kṛtam manye bhavatām ca yat apriyam sa-pālaḥ yat-vaśe lokaḥ vāyoḥ iva ghana-āvaliḥ
yatra dharma-sutaḥ rājā gadā-pāṇiḥ vṛkodaraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ astrī gāṇḍivam cāpam suhṛt kṛṣṇaḥ tataḥ vipat
na hi asya karhicit rājan pumān veda vidhitsitam yat vijijñāsayā yuktāḥ muhyanti kavayaḥ api hi
tasmāt idam daiva-tantram vyavasya bharata-ṛṣabha tasya anuvihitaḥ anāthāḥ nātha pāhi prajāḥ prabho
eṣaḥ vai bhagavān sākṣāt ādyaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ pumān mohayan māyayā lokam gūḍhaḥ carati vṛṣṇiṣu
asya anubhāvam bhagavān veda guhya-tamam śivaḥ deva-ṛṣiḥ nāradaḥ sākṣāt bhagavān kapilaḥ nṛpa
yam manyase mātuleyam priyam mitram suhṛt-tamam akaroḥ sacivam dūtam sauhṛdāt atha sārathim
sarva-ātmanaḥ sama-dṛśaḥ hi advayasya anahaṅkṛteḥ tat-kṛtam mati vaiṣamyam niravadyasya na kvacit
tathāpi ekānta bhakteṣu paśya bhū-pa anukampitam yat me asūn tyajataḥ sākṣāt kṛṣṇaḥ darśanam āgataḥ
bhaktyā āveśya manaḥ yasmin vācā yat nāma kīrtayan tyajan kalevaram yogī mucyate kāma-karmabhiḥ
saḥ deva-devaḥ bhagavān pratīkṣatām kalevaram yāvat idam hinomi aham prasanna hāsa aruṇa-locana ullasat mukha-ambujaḥ dhyāna-pathaḥ catur-bhujaḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ tat ākarṇya śayānam śara-pañjare apṛcchat vividhān dharmān ṛṣīṇām ca anuśṛṇvatām
puruṣa sva-bhāva vihitān yathā varṇam yathā āśramam vairāgya rāga upādhibhyām āmnāta ubhaya lakṣaṇān
dāna-dharmān rāja-dharmān mokṣa-dharmān vibhāgaśaḥ strī-dharmān bhagavat-dharmān samāsa vyāsa yogataḥ
dharma artha kāma mokṣān ca saha upāyān yathā mune nānā ākhyāna itihāseṣu varṇayām āsa tattva-vit
dharmam pravadataḥ tasya saḥ kālaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ yaḥ yoginaḥ chanda-mṛtyoḥ vāñchitaḥ tu uttarāyaṇaḥ
tadā upasaṁhṛtya giraḥ sahasraṇīḥ vimukta-saṅgam manaḥ ādi-pūruṣe kṛṣṇe lasat-pīta-paṭe catur-bhuje puraḥ sthite amīlita dṛk vyadhārayat
viśuddhayā dhāraṇayā hata-aśubhaḥ tat īkṣayā eva āśu gatā yudha śramaḥ nivṛtta sarva indriya vṛtti vibhramaḥ tuṣṭāva janyam visṛjan janārdanam
śrī-bhīṣmaḥ uvāca iti matiḥ upakalpitā vitṛṣṇā bhagavati sātvata-puṅgave vibhūmni sva-sukham upagate kvacit vihartum prakṛtim upeyuṣi yat-bhava pravāhaḥ
tri-bhuvana kamanam tamāla-varṇam ravi-kara gaura varāmbaram dadhāne vapuḥ alaka-kula-āvṛta anana-abjam vijaya-sakhe ratiḥ astu me anavadyā
yudhi turaga rajaḥ vidhūmra viṣvak kaca lulita śramavāri alaṅkṛta āsye mama niśita śaraiḥ vibhidyamāna tvaci vilasat kavace astu kṛṣṇe ātmā
sapadi sakhi-vacaḥ niśamya madhye nija parayoḥ balayoḥ ratham niveśya sthitavati para-sainika āyuḥ akṣṇā hṛtavati pārtha sakhe ratiḥ mama astu
vyavahita pṛtanā mukham nirīkṣya sva-jana vadhāt vimukhasya doṣa-buddhyā kumatim aharat ātma-vidyayā yaḥ caraṇa ratiḥ paramasya tasya me astu
sva-nigamam apahāya mat-pratijñām ṛtam adhi kartum avaplutaḥ ratha-sthaḥ dhṛta ratha caraṇaḥ abhyayāt caladguḥ hariḥ iva hantum ibham gata uttarīyaḥ
śita viśikha hataḥ viśīrṇa-daṁśaḥ kṣataja pariplutaḥ ātatāyinaḥ me prasabham abhisasāra mat-vadha-artham saḥ bhavatu me bhagavān gatiḥ mukundaḥ
vijaya ratha kuṭumbe ātta-totre dhṛta-haya raśmini tat-śriyā īkṣaṇīye bhagavati ratiḥ astu me mumūrṣoḥ yam iha nirīkṣya hatāḥ gatāḥ sva-rūpam
lalita gati vilāsa valgu-hāsa praṇaya nirīkṣaṇa kalpita urumānāḥ kṛtam anukṛtavatyaḥ unmada-andhāḥ prakṛtim agan kila yasya gopa-vadhvaḥ
muni-gaṇa nṛpa-varya saṅkule antaḥ-sadasi yudhiṣṭhira rāja-sūye eṣām arhaṇam upapeda īkṣaṇīyaḥ mama dṛśi gocaraḥ eṣaḥ āviḥ ātmā
tam imam aham ajam śarīra-bhājām hṛdi hṛdi dhiṣṭhitam ātma kalpitānām pratidṛśam iva na ekadhā arkam ekam samadhigataḥ asmi vidhūta bheda-mohaḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca kṛṣṇe evam bhagavati manaḥ vāk dṛṣṭi vṛttibhiḥ ātmani ātmānam āveśya saḥ antaḥ-śvāsaḥ upāramat
sampadyamānam ājñāya bhīṣmam brahmaṇi niṣkale sarve babhūvuḥ te tūṣṇīm vayāṁsi iva dina-atyaye
tatra dundubhayaḥ neduḥ deva mānava vāditāḥ śaśaṁsuḥ sādhavaḥ rājñām khāt petuḥ puṣpa-vṛṣṭayaḥ
tasya nirharaṇa-ādīni samparetasya bhārgava yudhiṣṭhiraḥ kārayitvā muhūrtam duḥkhitaḥ abhavat
tuṣṭuvuḥ munayaḥ hṛṣṭāḥ kṛṣṇam tat guhya nāmabhiḥ tataḥ te kṛṣṇa-hṛdayāḥ sva-āśramān prayayuḥ punaḥ
tataḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ gatvā saha kṛṣṇaḥ gajāhvayam pitaram sāntvayām āsa gāndhārīm ca tapasvinīm
pitrā ca anumataḥ rājā vāsudeva-anumoditaḥ cakāra rājyam dharmeṇa pitṛ paitāmaham vibhuḥ
śaunakaḥ uvāca hatvā svariktha spṛdhaḥ ātatāyinaḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ dharma-bhṛtām variṣṭhaḥ saha-anujaiḥ pratyavaruddha bhojanaḥ katham pravṛttaḥ kim akāraṣīt tataḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca vaṁśam kuroḥ vaṁśa-dava-agni nirhṛtam saṁrohayitvā bhava-bhāvanaḥ hariḥ niveśayitvā nija-rājye īśvaraḥ yudhiṣṭhiram prīta-manāḥ babhūva ha
niśamya bhīṣma-uktam atha acyuta-uktam pravṛtta vijñāna vidhūta vibhramaḥ śaśāsa gām indra iva ajita-āśrayaḥ paridhi-upāntām anuja anuvartitaḥ
kāmam vavarṣa parjanyaḥ sarva kāma dughā mahī siṣicuḥ sma vrajān gāvaḥ payasā udhasvatīḥ mudā
nadyaḥ samudrāḥ girayaḥ savanaspati vīrudhaḥ phalanti oṣadhayaḥ sarvāḥ kāmam anvṛtu tasya vai
na ādhayaḥ vyādhayaḥ kleśāḥ daiva-bhūta-ātma hetavaḥ ajāta-śatrau abhavan jantūnām rājñi karhicit
uṣitvā hāstinapure māsān katipayān hariḥ suhṛdām ca viśokāya svasuḥ ca priya-kāmyayā
āmantrya ca abhyanujñātaḥ pariṣvajya abhivādya tam āruroha ratham kaiścit pariṣvaktaḥ abhivāditaḥ
subhadrā draupadī kuntī virāṭa-tanayā tathā gāndhārī dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ ca yuyutsuḥ gautamaḥ yamau vṛkodaraḥ ca dhaumyaḥ ca striyaḥ matsya-sutā-ādayaḥ na sehire vimuhyantaḥ viraham śārṅga-dhanvanaḥ
sat-saṅgāt mukta-duḥsaṅgaḥ hātum na utsahate budhaḥ kīrtyamānam yaśaḥ yasya sakṛt ākarṇya rocanam tasmin nyasta-dhiyaḥ pārthāḥ saheran viraham katham darśana sparśa saṁlāpa śayana āsana bhojanaiḥ
sarve te animiṣaiḥ akṣaiḥ tam anu druta-cetasaḥ vīkṣantaḥ sneha-sambaddhāḥ viceluḥ tatra tatra ha
nyarundhan udgalat bāṣpam autkaṇṭhyāt devakī-sute niryāti agārāt naḥ abhadram iti syāt bāndhava striyaḥ
mṛdaṅga śaṅkha bheryaḥ ca vīṇā paṇava gomukhāḥ dhundhurī ānaka ghaṇṭā ādyāḥ neduḥ dundubhayaḥ tathā
prāsāda śikhara ārūḍhāḥ kuru-nāryaḥ didṛkṣayā vavṛṣuḥ kusumaiḥ kṛṣṇam prema vrīḍā-smita-īkṣaṇāḥ
sita-ātapatram jagrāha muktā-dāma vibhūṣitam ratna-daṇḍam guḍākeśaḥ priyaḥ priyatamasya ha
uddhavaḥ sātyakiḥ ca eva vyajane parama-adbhute vikīryamāṇaḥ kusumaiḥ reje madhu-patiḥ pathi
aśrūyanta āśiṣaḥ satyāḥ tatra tatra dvija-īritāḥ na anurūpa anurūpāḥ ca nirguṇasya guṇa-ātmanaḥ
anyonyam āsīt sañjalpaḥ uttama-śloka cetasām kaurava-indra pura strīṇām sarva śruti manaḥ-haraḥ
