pramāṇam aṇḍa-kośasya bāhya abhyantara bhedataḥ mahatām ca anucaritam varṇa āśrama viniścayaḥ
yugāni yuga-mānam ca dharmaḥ yaḥ ca yuge yuge avatāra anucaritam yat āścaryatamam hareḥ
nṛṇām sādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ sa-viśeṣaḥ ca yādṛśaḥ śreṇīnām rājarṣīṇām ca dharmaḥ kṛcchreṣu jīvatām
tattvānām parisaṅkhyānam lakṣaṇam hetu-lakṣaṇam puruṣa ārādhana vidhiḥ yogasya adhyātmikasya ca
yoga-īśvara aiśvarya gatiḥ liṅga bhaṅgaḥ tu yoginām veda upaveda dharmāṇām itihāsa purāṇayoḥ
samplavaḥ sarva-bhūtānām vikramaḥ pratisaṅkramaḥ iṣṭā pūrtasya kāmyānām tri-vargasya ca yaḥ vidhiḥ
yaḥ vā anuśāyinām sargaḥ pāṣaṇḍasya ca sambhavaḥ ātmanaḥ bandha mokṣau ca vyavasthānam sva-rūpataḥ
yathā ātma-tantraḥ bhagavān vikrīḍati ātma-māyayā visṛjya vā yathā māyām udāste sākṣivat vibhuḥ
sarvam etat ca bhagavan pṛcchataḥ me anupūrvaśaḥ tattvataḥ arhasi udāhartum prapannāya mahā-mune
atra pramāṇam hi bhavān parameṣṭhī yathā ātma-bhūḥ apare ca anutiṣṭhanti pūrveṣām pūrva-jaiḥ kṛtam
na me asavaḥ parāyanti brahman anaśanāt amī pibataḥ acyuta pīyūṣam tat vākya-abdhi viniḥsṛtam
sūtaḥ uvāca saḥ upāmantritaḥ rājñā kathāyām iti sat-pateḥ brahma-rātaḥ bhṛśam prītaḥ viṣṇu-rātena saṁsadi
prāha bhāgavatam nāma purāṇam brahma-sammitam brahmaṇe bhagavat-proktam brahma-kalpe upāgate
yat yat parīkṣit ṛṣabhaḥ pāṇḍūnām anupṛcchati ānupūrvyeṇa tat sarvam ākhyātum upacakrame
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ātma māyām ṛte rājan parasya anubhava-ātmanaḥ na ghaṭeta artha sambandhaḥ svapna draṣṭuḥ iva añjasā
bahu-rūpaḥ iva ābhāti māyayā bahu-rūpayā ramamāṇaḥ guṇeṣu asyāḥ mama aham iti manyate
yarhi vāva mahimni sve parasmin kāla māyayoḥ rameta gata-sammohaḥ tyaktvā udāste tadā ubhayam
ātma-tattva viśuddhi artham yat āha bhagavān ṛtam brahmaṇe darśayan rūpam avyalīka vrata ādṛtaḥ
saḥ ādi-devaḥ jagatām paraḥ guruḥ svadhiṣṇyam āsthāya sisṛkṣayā aikṣata tām na adhyagacchat dṛśam atra sammatām prapañca nirmāṇa vidhiḥ yayā bhavet
saḥ cintayan dvi akṣaram ekadā ambhasi upāśṛṇot dviḥ gaditam vacaḥ vibhuḥ sparśeṣu yat ṣoḍaśam ekaviṁśam niṣkiñcanānām nṛpa yat dhanam viduḥ
niśamya tat vaktṛ didṛkṣayā diśaḥ vilokya tatra anyat apaśyamānaḥ svadhiṣṇyam āsthāya vimṛśya tat hitam tapasi upādiṣṭaḥ iva ādadhe manaḥ
divyam sahasra abdam amogha darśanaḥ jita anila ātmā vijita ubhaya indriyaḥ atapyata sma akhila loka tāpanam tapaḥ tapīyān tapatām samāhitaḥ
tasmai sva-lokam bhagavān sabhājitaḥ sandarśayām āsa param na yat param vyapeta saṅkleśa vimoha sādhvasam sva-dṛṣṭa-vadbhiḥ puruṣaiḥ abhiṣṭutam
pravartate yatra rajaḥ tamaḥ tayoḥ sattvam ca miśram na ca kāla vikramaḥ na yatra māyā kim uta apare hareḥ anuvratāḥ yatra sura asura arcitāḥ
śyāma avadātāḥ śata-patra locanāḥ piśaṅga vastrāḥ su-rucaḥ su-peśasaḥ sarve catuḥ bāhavaḥ unmiṣan maṇi praveka niṣka-ābharaṇāḥ su-varcasaḥ
pravāla vaidūrya mṛṇāla varcasaḥ parisphurat kuṇḍala mauli mālinaḥ
bhrājiṣṇubhiḥ yaḥ paritaḥ virājate lasat vimāna avalibhiḥ mahā-ātmanām vidyotamānaḥ pramada uttama adyubhiḥ sa-vidyut abhrāvalibhiḥ yathā nabhaḥ
śrīḥ yatra rūpiṇī urugāya pādayoḥ karoti mānam bahudhā vibhūtibhiḥ preṅkham śritā yā kusumākara anugaiḥ vigīyamānā priya-karma gāyatī
dadarśa tatra akhila sātvatām patim śriyaḥ patim yajña patim jagat patim sunanda nanda prabala arhaṇa ādibhiḥ sva-pārṣada agraiḥ parisevitam vibhum
bhṛtya prasāda abhimukham dṛk āsavam prasanna hāsa aruṇa locana ānanam kirīṭinam kuṇḍalinam catuḥ-bhujam pīta aṁśukam vakṣasi lakṣitam śriyā
adhyarhaṇīya āsanam āsthitam param vṛtam catuḥ ṣoḍaśa pañca śaktibhiḥ yuktam bhagaiḥ svaiḥ itaratra ca adhruvaiḥ sve eva dhāman ramamāṇam īśvaram
tat darśana āhlāda paripluta antaraḥ hṛṣyat tanuḥ prema-bhara aśru locanaḥ nanāma pāda-ambujam asya viśva-sṛk yat pāramahaṁsyena pathā adhigamyate
tam prīyamāṇam samupasthitam kavim prajā visarge nija śāsana arhaṇam babhāṣe īṣat smita śociṣā girā priyaḥ priyam prīta-manāḥ kare spṛśan
śrī-bhagavān uvāca tvayā aham toṣitaḥ samyak veda-garbha sisṛkṣayā ciram bhṛtena tapasā dustoṣaḥ kūṭa-yoginām
varam varaya bhadram te vara-īśam mā (mām) abhivāñchitam brahman śreyaḥ pariśrāmaḥ puṁsām mat darśana avadhiḥ
manīṣita anubhāvaḥ ayam mama loka avalokanam yat upaśrutya rahasi cakartha paramam tapaḥ
pratyādiṣṭam mayā tatra tvayi karma vimohite tapaḥ me hṛdayam sākṣāt ātmā aham tapasaḥ anagha
sṛjāmi tapasā eva idam grasāmi tapasā punaḥ bibharmi tapasā viśvam vīryam me duścaram tapaḥ
brahmā uvāca bhagavan sarva-bhūtānām adhyakṣaḥ avasthitaḥ guhām veda hi apratiruddhena prajñānena cikīrṣitam
tathā api nāthamānasya nātha nāthaya nāthitam para-avare yathā rūpe jānīyām te tu arūpiṇaḥ
yathā ātma māyā yogena nānā śakti upabṛṁhitam vilumpan visṛjan gṛhṇan bibhrat ātmānam ātmanā
krīḍasi amogha saṅkalpa ūrṇanābhiḥ yathā ūrṇute tathā tat-viṣayām dhehi manīṣām mayi mādhava
bhagavat śikṣitam aham karavāṇi hi atandritaḥ na ihamānaḥ prajā-sargam badhyeyam yat anugrahāt
yāvat sakhā sakhyuḥ iva īśa te kṛtaḥ prajā visarge vibhajāmi bhoḥ janam aviklavaḥ te parikarmaṇi sthitaḥ mā me samunnaddha madaḥ aja māninaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca jñānam parama guhyam me yat vijñāna samanvitam sa-rahasyam tat aṅgam ca gṛhāṇa gaditam mayā
yāvān aham yathā bhāvaḥ yat rūpa guṇa karmakaḥ tathā eva tattva-vijñānam astu te mat anugrahāt
aham eva āsam eva agre na anyat yat sat asat param paścāt aham yat etat ca yaḥ avaśiṣyeta saḥ asmi aham
ṛte artham yat pratīyeta na pratīyeta ca ātmani tat vidyāt ātmanaḥ māyām yathā ābhāsaḥ yathā tamaḥ
yathā mahānti bhūtāni bhūteṣu ucca-avaceṣu anu praviṣṭāni apraviṣṭāni tathā teṣu na teṣu aham
etāvat eva jijñāsyam tattva jijñāsunā ātmanaḥ anvaya vyatirekābhyām yat syāt sarvatra sarvadā
etat matam samātiṣṭha parameṇa samādhinā bhavān kalpa vikalpeṣu na vimuhyati karhicit
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca sampradiśya evam ajanaḥ janānām parameṣṭhinam paśyataḥ tasya tat rūpam ātmanaḥ nyaruṇat hariḥ
antarhita indriya-arthāya haraye vihita-añjaliḥ sarva-bhūta mayaḥ viśvam sasarja idam saḥ pūrva-vat
prajā-patiḥ dharma-patiḥ ekadā niyamān yamān bhadram prajānām anvicchan ātiṣṭhat sva-artha kāmyayā
tam nāradaḥ priyatamaḥ riktha-ādānām anuvrataḥ śuśrūṣamāṇaḥ śīlena praśrayeṇa damena ca
māyām vividiṣan viṣṇoḥ māyā-īśasya mahā-muniḥ mahā-bhāgavataḥ rājan pitaram paryatoṣayat
tuṣṭam niśāmya pitaram lokānām prapitāmaham devarṣiḥ paripapraccha bhavān yat mā anupṛcchati
tasmai idam bhāgavatam purāṇam daśa-lakṣaṇam proktam bhagavatā prāha prītaḥ putrāya bhūta-kṛt
nāradaḥ prāha munaye sarasvatyāḥ taṭe nṛpa dhyāyate brahma paramam vyāsāya amita tejase
yat uta aham tvayā pṛṣṭaḥ vairājāt puruṣāt idam yathā āsīt tat upākhyāste praśnān anyān ca kṛtsnaśaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca atra sargaḥ visargaḥ ca sthānam poṣaṇam ūtayaḥ manvantara īśa-anukathāḥ nirodhaḥ muktiḥ āśrayaḥ
daśamasya viśuddhi artham navānām iha lakṣaṇam varṇayanti mahā-ātmānaḥ śrutena arthena ca añjasā
bhūta mātrā indriya dhiyām janma sargaḥ udāhṛtaḥ brahmaṇaḥ guṇa-vaiṣamyāt visargaḥ pauruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ
sthitiḥ vaikuṇṭha-vijayaḥ poṣaṇam tat-anugrahaḥ manvantarāṇi sat-dharmaḥ ūtayaḥ karma-vāsanāḥ
avatāra anucaritam hareḥ ca asya anuvartinām puṁsām īśa-kathāḥ proktāḥ nānā ākhyāna upabṛṁhitāḥ
nirodhaḥ asya anuśayanam ātmanaḥ saha śaktibhiḥ muktiḥ hitvā anyathā rūpam sva-rūpeṇa vyavasthitiḥ
ābhāsaḥ ca nirodhaḥ ca yataḥ asti adhyavasīyate saḥ āśrayaḥ param brahma paramātmā iti śabdyate
yaḥ adhyātmikaḥ ayam puruṣaḥ saḥ asau eva adhidaivikaḥ yaḥ tatra ubhaya vicchedaḥ puruṣaḥ hi ādhibhautikaḥ
ekam ekatara abhāve yadā na upalabhāmahe tritayam tatra yaḥ veda saḥ ātmā sva āśraya āśrayaḥ
puruṣaḥ aṇḍam vinirbhidya yadā asau saḥ vinirgataḥ ātmanaḥ ayanam anvicchan apaḥ asrākṣīt śuciḥ śucīḥ
tāsu avātsīt sva sṛṣṭāsu sahasram parivatsarān tena nārāyaṇaḥ nāma yat āpaḥ puruṣa-udbhavāḥ
dravyam karma ca kālaḥ ca sva-bhāvaḥ jīvaḥ eva ca yat anugrahataḥ santi na santi yat-upekṣayā
ekaḥ nānātvam anvicchan yoga-talpāt samutthitaḥ vīryam hiraṇmayam devaḥ māyayā vyasṛjat tridhā
adhidaivam atha adhyātmam adhibhūtam iti prabhuḥ atha ekam pauruṣam vīryam tridhā abhidyata tat śṛṇu
antaḥ śarīre ākāśāt puruṣasya viceṣṭataḥ ojaḥ sahaḥ balam jajñe tataḥ prāṇaḥ mahān asuḥ
anuprāṇanti yam prāṇāḥ prāṇantam sarva-jantuṣu apānantam apānanti nara-devam iva anugāḥ
prāṇena ākṣipatā kṣut tṛṭ antarā jāyate vibhoḥ pipāsataḥ jakṣataḥ ca prāk mukham nirabhidyata
mukhataḥ tālu nirbhinnam jihvā tatra upajāyate tataḥ nānā-rasaḥ jajñe jihvayā yaḥ adhigamyate
vivakṣoḥ mukhataḥ bhūmnaḥ vahniḥ vāk vyāhṛtam tayoḥ jale ca etasya suciram nirodhaḥ samajāyata
nāsike nirabhidyetām dodhūyati nabhasvati tatra vāyuḥ gandha-vahaḥ ghrāṇaḥ nasi jighṛkṣataḥ
yadā ātmani nirālokam ātmānam ca didṛkṣataḥ nirbhinne hi akṣiṇī tasya jyotiḥ cakṣuḥ guṇa-grahaḥ
bodhyamānasya ṛṣibhiḥ ātmanaḥ tat jighṛkṣataḥ karṇau ca nirabhidyetām diśaḥ śrotram guṇa-grahaḥ
vastunaḥ mṛdu kāṭhinya laghu guru oṣṇa śītatām jighṛkṣataḥ tvak nirbhinnā tasyām roma mahī-ruhāḥ tatra ca antaḥ bahiḥ vātaḥ tvacā labdha guṇaḥ vṛtaḥ
hastau ruruhatuḥ tasya nānā karma cikīrṣayā tayoḥ tu balavān indraḥ ādānam ubhaya-āśrayam
gatim jigīṣataḥ pādau ruruhāte abhikāmikām padbhyām yajñaḥ svayam havyam karmabhiḥ kriyate nṛbhiḥ
nirabhidyata śiśnaḥ vai prajā-ānanda amṛta-arthinaḥ upasthaḥ āsīt kāmānām priyam tat ubhaya-āśrayam
utsisṛkṣoḥ dhātu-malam nirabhidyata vai gudam tataḥ pāyuḥ tataḥ mitraḥ utsargaḥ ubhaya āśrayaḥ
āsisṛpsoḥ puraḥ puryāḥ nābhi-dvāram apānataḥ tatra apānaḥ tataḥ mṛtyuḥ pṛthaktvam ubhaya āśrayam
āditsoḥ anna-pānānām āsan kukṣi antra nāḍayaḥ nadyaḥ samudrāḥ ca tayoḥ tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭiḥ tat āśraye
nididhyāsoḥ ātma-māyām hṛdayam nirabhidyata tataḥ manaḥ candraḥ iti saṅkalpaḥ kāmaḥ eva ca
tvak carma māṁsa rudhira medaḥ majjā asthi dhātavaḥ bhūmi ap tejaḥ mayāḥ sapta prāṇaḥ vyoma ambu vāyubhiḥ
guṇa-ātmakāni indriyāṇi bhūta-ādi prabhavāḥ guṇāḥ manaḥ sarva vikāra ātmā buddhiḥ vijñāna rūpiṇī
etat bhagavataḥ rūpam sthūlam te vyāhṛtam mayā mahī ādibhiḥ ca avaraṇaiḥ aṣṭabhiḥ bahiḥ āvṛtam
ataḥ param sūkṣmatamam avyaktam nirviśeṣaṇam anādi madhya nidhanam nityam vāk manasaḥ param
amunī bhagavat rūpe mayā te hi anuvarṇite ubhe api na gṛhṇanti māyā sṛṣṭe vipaḥ-citaḥ
saḥ vācya vācakatayā bhagavān brahma rūpa-dhṛk nāma rūpa kriyā dhatte sa-karma akarmakaḥ paraḥ
prajā-patīn manūn devān ṛṣīn pitṛ-gaṇān pṛthak siddha cāraṇa gandharvān vidyādhra asura guhyakān kinnara apsarasaḥ nāgān sarpān kimpuruṣān narān mātṝ rakṣaḥ piśācān ca preta bhūta vināyakān kūṣmāṇḍa unmāda vetālān yātudhānān grahān api khagān mṛgān paśūn vṛkṣān girīn nṛpa sarīsṛpān dvi-vidhāḥ catuḥ-vidhāḥ ye anye jala sthala nabha-okasaḥ kuśala akuśalāḥ miśrāḥ karmaṇām gatayaḥ tu imāḥ
sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti tisraḥ sura nṛ nārakāḥ tatra api ekaikaśaḥ rājan bhidyante gatayaḥ tridhā yadā ekaikataraḥ anyābhyām sva-bhāvaḥ upahanyate
saḥ eva idam jagat-dhātā bhagavān dharma-rūpa-dhṛk puṣṇāti sthāpayan viśvam tiryak nara sura-ādibhiḥ
tataḥ kāla agni rudra-ātmā yat sṛṣṭam idam ātmanaḥ sam niyacchati tat kāle ghana-anīkam iva anilaḥ
ittham bhāvena kathitaḥ bhagavān bhagavat-tamaḥ na ittham bhāvena hi param draṣṭum arhanti sūrayaḥ
na asya karmaṇi janma-ādau parasya anuvidhīyate kartṛtva pratiṣedha-artham māyayā āropitam hi tat
ayam tu brahmaṇaḥ kalpaḥ sa-vikalpaḥ udāhṛtaḥ vidhiḥ sādhāraṇaḥ yatra sargāḥ prākṛta vaikṛtāḥ
parimāṇam ca kālasya kalpa lakṣaṇa vigraham yathā purastāt vyākhyāsye pādmam kalpam atho śṛṇu
śaunakaḥ uvāca yat āha naḥ bhavān sūta kṣattā bhāgavata-uttamaḥ cacāra tīrthāni bhuvaḥ tyaktvā bandhūn su-dustyajān
kṣattuḥ kauśāraveḥ tasya saṁvādaḥ adhyātma saṁśritaḥ yat vā saḥ bhagavān tasmai pṛṣṭaḥ tattvam uvāca ha brūhi naḥ tat idam saumya vidurasya viceṣṭitam bandhu-tyāga nimittam ca yathā eva āgatavān punaḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca rājñā parīkṣitā pṛṣṭaḥ yat avocat mahā-muniḥ tat vaḥ abhidhāsye śṛṇuta rājñaḥ praśna anusārataḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam etat purā pṛṣṭaḥ maitreyaḥ bhagavān kila kṣattrā vanam praviṣṭena tyaktvā sva-gṛham ṛddhimat
yat vai ayam mantra-kṛt vaḥ bhagavān akhila-īśvaraḥ pauravendra gṛham hitvā praviveśa ātmasāt kṛtam
rājā uvāca kutra kṣattuḥ bhagavatā maitreyeṇa āsa saṅgamaḥ kadā vā saha saṁvādaḥ etat varṇaya naḥ prabho
na hi alpa-artha udayaḥ tasya vidurasya amala-ātmanaḥ tasmin varīyasi praśnaḥ sādhu-vāda upabṛṁhitaḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca saḥ evam ṛṣi-varyaḥ ayam pṛṣṭaḥ rājñā parīkṣitā pratyāha tam su-bahu-vit prīta-ātmā śrūyatām iti
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca yadā tu rājā sva-sutān asādhūn puṣṇan na dharmeṇa vinaṣṭa-dṛṣṭiḥ bhrātuḥ yaviṣṭhasya sutān vibandhūn praveśya lākṣā bhavane dadāha
yadā sabhāyām kuru-deva-devyāḥ keśa-abhimarśam suta-karma garhyam na vārayām āsa nṛpaḥ snuṣāyāḥ svāsraiḥ harantyāḥ kuca-kuṅkumāni
dyūte tu adharmeṇa jitasya sādhoḥ satya-avalambasya vanam gatasya na yācataḥ adāt samayena dāyam tamaḥ-juṣāṇaḥ yat ajāta-śatroḥ
yadā ca pārtha-prahitaḥ sabhāyām jagat-guruḥ yāni jagāda kṛṣṇaḥ na tāni puṁsām amṛta-ayanāni rājā uru mene kṣata puṇya-leśaḥ
yadā upahūtaḥ bhavanam praviṣṭaḥ mantrāya pṛṣṭaḥ kila pūrvajena atha āha tat mantra dṛśām varīyān yat mantriṇaḥ vaidurikam vadanti
ajāta-śatroḥ pratiyaccha dāyam titikṣataḥ durviṣaham tava āgaḥ saha anujaḥ yatra vṛkodara ahiḥ śvasan ruṣā yat tvam alam bibheṣi
pārthān tu devaḥ bhagavān mukundaḥ gṛhītavān sa kṣiti-deva-devaḥ āste sva-puryām yadu-deva-devaḥ vinirjita aśeṣa nṛdeva devaḥ
saḥ eṣaḥ doṣaḥ puruṣa-dviṭ āste gṛhān praviṣṭaḥ yam apatya-matyā puṣṇāsi kṛṣṇāt vimukhaḥ gata-śrīḥ tyaja āśu aśaivam kula kauśalāya
iti ūcivān tatra suyodhanena pravṛddha kopa sphurita adhareṇa asat-kṛtaḥ sat spṛhaṇīya-śīlaḥ kṣattā sa karṇa anuja saubalena
kaḥ enam atra upajuhāva jihmam dāsyāḥ sutam yat balinā eva puṣṭaḥ tasmin pratīpaḥ para-kṛtya āste nirvāsyatām āśu purāt śvasānaḥ
svayam dhanuḥ dvāri nidhāya māyām bhrātuḥ puraḥ marmasu tāḍitaḥ api saḥ ittham ati-ulbaṇa karṇa bāṇaiḥ gata-vyathaḥ ayāt uru māna-yānaḥ
saḥ nirgataḥ kaurava puṇya labdhaḥ gaja-āhvayāt tīrtha-padaḥ padāni anvākramat puṇya cikīrṣayā urvyām adhiṣṭhitaḥ yāni sahasra mūrtiḥ
pureṣu puṇya upavana adri kuñjeṣu apaṅka toyeṣu sarit saraḥsu ananta-liṅgaiḥ samalaṅkṛteṣu cacāra tīrtha āyataneṣu ananyaḥ
gām paryaṭan medhya vivikta-vṛttiḥ sadā āplutaḥ adhaḥ śayanaḥ avadhūtaḥ alakṣitaḥ svaiḥ avadhūta-veṣaḥ vratāni cere hari-toṣaṇāni
ittham vrajan bhāratam eva varṣam kālena yāvat gatavān prabhāsam tāvat śaśāsa kṣitim eka-cakrām eka ātapatrām ajitena pārthaḥ
tatra atha śuśrāva suhṛt vinaṣṭim vanam yathā veṇuja-vahni saṁśrayam saṁspardhayā dagdham atha anuśocan sarasvatīm pratyak iyāya tūṣṇīm
tasyām tritasya uśanasaḥ manoḥ ca pṛthoḥ atha agneḥ asitasya vāyoḥ tīrtham sudāsasya gavām guhasya yat śrāddhadevasya saḥ āsiṣeve
anyāni ca iha dvija-deva devaiḥ kṛtāni nānā āyatanāni viṣṇoḥ prati aṅga mukhya aṅkita mandirāṇi yat darśanāt kṛṣṇam anusmaranti
tataḥ tu ativrajya surāṣṭram ṛddham sauvīra matsyān kurujāṅgalān ca kālena tāvat yamunām upetya tatra uddhavam bhāgavatam dadarśa
saḥ vāsudeva anucaram praśāntam bṛhaspateḥ prāk tanayam pratītam āliṅgya gāḍham praṇayena bhadram svānām apṛcchat bhagavat prajānām
kaccit purāṇau puruṣau svanābhya pādma-anuvṛttyā iha kila avatīrṇau āsāte urvyāḥ kuśalam vidhāya kṛta-kṣaṇau kuśalam śūra-gehe
kaccit kurūṇām paramaḥ suhṛt naḥ bhāmaḥ saḥ āste sukham aṅga śauriḥ yaḥ vai svasṝṇām pitṛ-vat dadāti varān vadānyaḥ vara tarpaṇena
kaccit varūtha adhipatiḥ yadūnām pradyumnaḥ āste sukham aṅga vīraḥ yam rukmiṇī bhagavataḥ abhilebhe ārādhya viprān smaram ādi-sarge
kaccit sukham sātvata vṛṣṇi bhoja dāśārhakāṇām adhipaḥ saḥ āste yam abhyaṣiñcat śata-patra-netraḥ nṛpa-āsana-āśām parihṛtya dūrāt
kaccit hareḥ saumya sutaḥ sadṛkṣaḥ āste agraṇīḥ rathinām sādhu sāmbaḥ asūta yam jāmbavatī vratāḍhyā devam guham yaḥ ambikayā dhṛtaḥ agre
kṣemam saḥ kaccit yuyudhānaḥ āste yaḥ phālgunāt labdha dhanuḥ-rahasyaḥ lebhe añjasā adhokṣaja sevayā eva gatim tadīyām yatibhiḥ durāpām
kaccit budhaḥ svasti anamīvaḥ āste śvaphalka-putraḥ bhagavat prapannaḥ yaḥ kṛṣṇa pāda-aṅkita mārga pāṁsuṣu aceṣṭata prema-vibhinna dhairyaḥ
kaccit śivam devaka-bhoja-putryāḥ viṣṇu-prajāyāḥ iva deva-mātuḥ yā vai sva-garbheṇa dadhāra devam trayī yathā yajña-vitānam artham
api svit āste bhagavān sukham vaḥ yaḥ sātvatām kāma-dughaḥ aniruddhaḥ yam āmananti sma hi śabda-yonim manaḥ-mayam sattva turīya tattvam
api svit anye ca nija-ātma daivam ananya vṛttyā samanuvratāḥ ye hṛdīka satya-ātmaja cārudeṣṇa gada ādayaḥ svasti caranti saumya
api sva-dorbhyām vijaya acyutā-bhyām dharmeṇa dharmaḥ paripāti setum duryodhanaḥ atapyata yat sabhāyām sāmrājya lakṣmyā vijaya-anuvṛttyā
kim vā kṛta agheṣu agham ati-amarṣī bhīmaḥ ahi-vat dīrgha-tamam vyamuñcat yasya aṅghri-pātam raṇa-bhūḥ na sehe mārgam gadāyāḥ carataḥ vicitram
kaccit yaśaḥ-dhā ratha-yūthapānām gāṇḍīva dhanvā uparata-ariḥ āste alakṣitaḥ yat śara-kūṭa-gūḍhaḥ māyā-kirātaḥ giriśaḥ tutoṣa
yamau utasvit tanayau pṛthāyāḥ pārthaiḥ vṛtau pakṣmabhiḥ akṣiṇī iva remāte uddāya mṛdhe sva-riktham parāt suparṇau iva vajri-vaktrāt
aho pṛthā api dhriyate arbhaka-arthe rājarṣi varyeṇa vinā api tena yaḥ tu eka vīraḥ adhirathaḥ vijigye dhanuḥ dvitīyaḥ kakubhaḥ catasraḥ
saumya anuśoce tam adhaḥ-patantam bhrātre paretāya vidudruhe yaḥ niryāpitaḥ yena suhṛt sva-puryāḥ aham sva-putrān samanu-vratena
saḥ aham hareḥ martya viḍambanena dṛśaḥ nṛṇām cālayataḥ vidhātuḥ na anya upalakṣyaḥ padavīm prasādāt carāmi paśyan gata-vismayaḥ atra
nūnam nṛpāṇām tri mada-utpathānām mahīm muhuḥ cālayatām camūbhiḥ vadhāt prapanna ārti-jihīrṣaya īśaḥ api upaikṣata agham bhagavān kurūṇām
ajasya janma utpatha-nāśanāya karmāṇi akartuḥ grahaṇāya puṁsām nanu anyathā kaḥ arhati deha-yogam paraḥ guṇānām uta karma-tantram
tasya prapanna akhila-loka-pānām avasthitānām anuśāsane sve arthāya jātasya yaduṣu ajasya vārtām sakhe kīrtaya tīrtha-kīrteḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti bhāgavataḥ pṛṣṭaḥ kṣattrā vārtām priya-āśrayām prativaktum na ca utsehe autkaṇṭhyāt smārita īśvaraḥ
yaḥ pañca hāyanaḥ mātrā prātaḥ-āśāya yācitaḥ tat na aicchat racayan yasya saparyām bāla-līlayā
saḥ katham sevayā tasya kālena jarasam gataḥ pṛṣṭaḥ vārtām pratibrūyāt bhartuḥ pādau anusmaran
saḥ muhūrtam abhūt tūṣṇīm kṛṣṇa-aṅghri sudhayā bhṛśam tīvreṇa bhakti-yogena nimagnaḥ sādhu nirvṛtaḥ
pulaka-udbhinna sarva-aṅgaḥ muñcan mīlat dṛśā śucaḥ pūrṇa-arthaḥ lakṣitaḥ tena sneha-prasara samplutaḥ
śanakaiḥ bhagavat lokāt nṛlokam punaḥ āgataḥ vimṛjya netre viduram prītyā āha uddhavaḥ utsmayan
uddhavaḥ uvāca kṛṣṇa-dyumaṇi nimloce gīrṇeṣu ajagareṇa ha kim nu naḥ kuśalam brūyām gata-śrīṣu gṛheṣu aham
durbhagaḥ bata lokaḥ ayam yadavaḥ nitarām api ye saṁvasantaḥ na viduḥ harim mīnāḥ iva uḍupam
iṅgita-jñāḥ puru-prauḍhāḥ eka ārāmāḥ ca sātvatāḥ sātvatām ṛṣabham sarve bhūta-āvāsam amaṁsata
devasya māyayā spṛṣṭāḥ ye ca anyat asat āśritāḥ bhrāmyate dhīḥ na tat vākyaiḥ ātmani upta-ātmanaḥ harau
pradarśya atapta tapasām avitṛpta-dṛśām nṛṇām ādāya antaḥ adhāt yaḥ tu sva-bimbam loka-locanam
yat martya līlā-upayikam sva-yoga-māyā-balam darśayatā gṛhītam vismāpanam svasya ca saubhaga-ṛddheḥ param padam bhūṣaṇa bhūṣaṇa-aṅgam
yat dharma-sūnoḥ bata rājasūye nirīkṣya dṛk svastyayanam tri-lokaḥ kārtsnyena ca adya iha gatam vidhātuḥ arvāk sṛtau kauśalam iti amanyata
yasya anurāga pluta hāsa rāsa līlā avaloka pratilabdha mānāḥ vraja-striyaḥ dṛgbhiḥ anupravṛtta dhiyaḥ avatasthuḥ kila kṛtya-śeṣāḥ
sva-śānta-rūpeṣu itaraiḥ sva-rūpaiḥ abhyardyamāneṣu anukampita-ātmā para-avara īśaḥ mahat-aṁśa-yuktaḥ hi ajaḥ api jātaḥ bhagavān yathā agniḥ
mām khedayati etat ajasya janma viḍambanam yat vasudeva-gehe vraje ca vāsaḥ ari bhayāt iva svayam purāt vyavātsīt yat ananta-vīryaḥ
dunoti cetaḥ smarataḥ mama etat yat āha pādau abhivandya pitroḥ tāta amba kaṁsāt uru śaṅkitānām prasīdatam naḥ akṛta niṣkṛtīnām
kaḥ vā amuṣya aṅghri saroja-reṇum vismartum īśīta pumān vijighran yaḥ visphurat bhrū-viṭapena bhūmeḥ bhāram kṛta-antena tiraścakāra
dṛṣṭā bhavadbhiḥ nanu rājasūye caidyasya kṛṣṇam dviṣataḥ api siddhiḥ yām yoginaḥ saṁspṛhayanti samyak yogena kaḥ tat viraham saheta
tathā eva ca anye nara-loka vīrāḥ ye āhave kṛṣṇa mukha-aravindam netraiḥ pibantaḥ nayana-abhirāmam pārtha astra-pūtaḥ padam āpuḥ asya
svayam tu asāmya atiśayaḥ tri-adhīśaḥ svārājya lakṣmī āpta samasta-kāmaḥ balim haradbhiḥ cira-loka-pālaiḥ kirīṭa-koṭyā iḍita-pāda-pīṭhaḥ
tat tasya kaiṅkaryam alam bhṛtān naḥ viglāpayati aṅga yat ugrasenam tiṣṭhan niṣaṇṇam parameṣṭhi-dhiṣṇye nyabodhayat deva nidhāraya iti
aho bakī yam stana kāla kūṭam jighāṁsayā apāyayat api asādhvī lebhe gatim dhātrī-ucitām tataḥ anyam kam vā dayālum śaraṇam vrajema
manye asurān bhāgavatān tri-adhīśe saṁrambha mārga abhiniviṣṭa-cittān ye saṁyuge acakṣata tārkṣya-putram aṁse sunābha āyudham āpatantam
vasudevasya devakyām jātaḥ bhoja-indra bandhane cikīrṣuḥ bhagavān asyāḥ śam ajena abhiyācitaḥ
tataḥ nanda-vrajam itaḥ pitrā kaṁsāt vibibhyatā ekādaśa samāḥ tatra gūḍha-arciḥ sa-balaḥ avasat
parītaḥ vatsapaiḥ vatsān cārayan vyaharat vibhuḥ yamunā upavane kūjat dvija saṅkulita aṅghripe
kaumārīm darśayan ceṣṭām prekṣaṇīyām vraja-okasām rudan iva hasan mugdha bāla-siṁha avalokanaḥ
saḥ eva go-dhanam lakṣmyāḥ niketam sita-go-vṛṣam cārayan anugān gopān raṇat veṇuḥ arīramat
prayuktān bhoja-rājena māyinaḥ kāma-rūpiṇaḥ līlayā vyanudat tān tān bālaḥ krīḍanakān iva
vipannān viṣa-pānena nigṛhya bhujaga-adhipam utthāpya apāyayat gāvaḥ tat toyam prakṛti sthitam
ayājayat go-savena gopa-rājam dvija-uttamaiḥ vittasya ca uru-bhārasya cikīrṣan sat-vyayam vibhuḥ
varṣati indre vrajaḥ kopāt bhagnamāne ati vihvalaḥ gotra līlā-ātapatreṇa trātaḥ bhadra anugṛhṇatā
śarat śaśi karaiḥ mṛṣṭam mānayan rajanī-mukham gāyan kala-padam reme strīṇām maṇḍala-maṇḍanaḥ
uddhavaḥ uvāca tataḥ saḥ āgatya puram sva-pitroḥ cikīrṣayā śam baladeva-saṁyutaḥ nipātya tuṅgāt ripu-yūtha-nātham hatam vyakarṣat vyasum ojasā urvyām
sāndīpaneḥ sakṛt proktam brahma adhītya sa-vistaram tasmai prādāt varam putram mṛtam pañca-jana udarāt
samāhutāḥ bhīṣmaka kanyayā ye śriyaḥ sa-varṇena bubhūṣayā eṣām gāndharva vṛttyā miṣatām sva-bhāgam jahre padam mūrdhni dadhat suparṇaḥ
kakudminaḥ aviddha-nasaḥ damitvā svayaṁvare nāgnajitīm uvāha tat-bhagnamānān api gṛdhyataḥ ajñān jaghne akṣataḥ śastra-bhṛtaḥ sva-śastraiḥ
priyam prabhuḥ grāmyaḥ iva priyāyāḥ vidhitsuḥ ārcchat dyutarum yat arthe vajrī ādravat tam sa-gaṇaḥ ruṣā andhaḥ krīḍā-mṛgaḥ nūnam ayam vadhūnām
sutam mṛdhe kham vapuṣā grasantam dṛṣṭvā sunābha unmathitam dharitryā āmantritaḥ tat-tanayāya śeṣam dattvā tat antaḥ-puram āviveśa
tatra āhṛtāḥ tāḥ nara-deva-kanyāḥ kujena dṛṣṭvā harim ārta-bandhum utthāya sadyaḥ jagṛhuḥ praharṣa vrīḍa anurāga prahita-avalokaiḥ
āsām muhūrte ekasmin nānā-āgāreṣu yoṣitām sa-vidham jagṛhe pāṇīn anurūpaḥ sva-māyayā
tāsu apatyāni ajanayat ātma-tulyāni sarvataḥ eka-ekasyām daśa daśa prakṛteḥ vibubhūṣayā
kāla māgadha śālva ādīn anīkaiḥ rundhataḥ puram ajīghanat svayam divyam sva-puṁsām tejaḥ ādiśat
śambaram dvividam bāṇam muram balvalam eva ca anyān ca dantavakra-ādīn avadhīt kān ca ghātayat
atha te bhrātṛ-putrāṇām pakṣayoḥ patitān nṛpān cacāla bhūḥ kurukṣetram yeṣām āpatatām balaiḥ
saḥ karṇa duḥśāsana saubalānām kumantra-pākena hata-śriya āyuṣam suyodhanam sa-anucaram śayānam bhagna ūrum ūrvyām na nananda paśyan
kiyān bhuvaḥ ayam kṣapita uru bhāraḥ yat droṇa bhīṣma arjuna bhīma mūlaiḥ aṣṭādaśa akṣauhiṇikaḥ mat-aṁśaiḥ āste balam durviṣaham yadūnām
mithaḥ yadā eṣām bhavitā vivādaḥ madhu-āmada ātāmra-vilocanānām na eṣām vadha-upāyaḥ iyān ataḥ anyaḥ mayi udyate antaḥ-dadhate svayam sma
evam sañcintya bhagavān sva-rājye sthāpya dharmajam nandayām āsa suhṛdaḥ sādhūnām vartma darśayan
uttarāyām dhṛtaḥ pūroḥ vaṁśaḥ sādhu-abhimanyunā saḥ vai drauṇi-astra sampluṣṭaḥ punaḥ bhagavatā dhṛtaḥ
ayājayat dharma-sutam aśvamedhaiḥ tribhiḥ vibhuḥ saḥ api kṣmām anujaiḥ rakṣan reme kṛṣṇam anuvrataḥ
bhagavān api viśva-ātmā loka veda patha-anugaḥ kāmān siṣeve dvārvatyām asaktaḥ sāṅkhyam āsthitaḥ
snigdha smita-avalokena vācā pīyūṣa-kalpayā caritreṇa anavadyena śrī niketena ca ātmanā
imam lokam amum ca eva ramayan sutarām yadūn reme kṣaṇadayā datta kṣaṇa strī kṣaṇa sauhṛdaḥ
tasya evam ramamāṇasya saṁvatsara gaṇān bahūn gṛhamedheṣu yogeṣu virāgaḥ samajāyata
daiva adhīneṣu kāmeṣu daiva-adhīnaḥ svayam pumān kaḥ viśrambheta yogena yogeśvaram anuvrataḥ
puryām kadācit krīḍadbhiḥ yadu bhoja kumārakaiḥ kopitāḥ munayaḥ śepuḥ bhagavat mata kovidāḥ
tataḥ katipayaiḥ māsaiḥ vṛṣṇi bhoja andhaka-ādayaḥ yayuḥ prabhāsam saṁhṛṣṭāḥ rathaiḥ deva vimohitāḥ
tatra snātvā pitṝn devān ṛṣīn ca eva tat ambhasā tarpayitvā atha viprebhyaḥ gāvaḥ bahu-guṇāḥ daduḥ
hiraṇyam rajatam śayyām vāsāṁsi ajina kambalān yānam rathān ibhān kanyāḥ dharām vṛtti-karīm api
annam ca uru-rasam tebhyaḥ dattvā bhagavat-arpaṇam go vipra artha asavaḥ śūrāḥ praṇemuḥ bhuvi mūrdhabhiḥ
uddhavaḥ uvāca atha te tat anujñātāḥ bhuktvā pītvā ca vāruṇīm tayā vibhraṁśita-jñānāḥ duruktaiḥ marma paspṛśuḥ
teṣām maireya doṣeṇa viṣamīkṛta cetasām nimlocati ravau āsīt veṇūnām iva mardanam
bhagavān sva-ātma-māyāyā gatim tām avalokya saḥ sarasvatīm upaspṛśya vṛkṣa-mūlam upāviśat
aham ca uktaḥ bhagavatā prapanna ārti-hareṇa ha badarīm tvam prayāhi iti sva-kulam sañjihīrṣuṇā
tathā api tat-abhipretam jānan aham arim-dama pṛṣṭhataḥ anvagamam bhartuḥ pāda-viśleṣaṇa akṣamaḥ
adrākṣam ekam āsīnam vicinvan dayitam patim śrī-niketam sarasvatyām kṛta-ketam aketanam

vāme ūrau adhiśritya dakṣiṇa-aṅghri-saroruham apāśrita arbhaka aśvattham akṛśam tyakta pippalam
tasmin mahā-bhāgavataḥ dvaipāyana suhṛt sakhā lokān anucaran siddhe āsasāda yadṛcchayā
tasya anuraktasya muneḥ mukundaḥ pramoda-bhāva ānata kandharasya āśṛṇvataḥ mām anurāga-hāsa samīkṣayā viśra-mayan uvāca
śrī-bhagavān uvāca veda aham antaḥ manasi īpsitam te dadāmi yat tat duravāpam anyaiḥ satre purā viśva-sṛjām vasūnām mat-siddhi-kāmena vaso tvayā iṣṭaḥ
saḥ eṣaḥ sādho caramaḥ bhavānām āsāditaḥ te mat anugrahaḥ yat yat mām nṛ-lokān rahaḥ utsṛjantam diṣṭyā dadṛśvān viśada-anuvṛttyā
purā mayā proktam ajāya nābhye padme niṣaṇṇāya mama ādi-sarge jñānam param mat-mahimā avabhāsam yat sūrayaḥ bhāgavatam vadanti
iti ādṛta uktaḥ paramasya puṁsaḥ pratikṣaṇa anugraha-bhājanaḥ aham sneha uttha romā skhalita akṣaraḥ tam muñcan śucaḥ prāñjaliḥ ābabhāṣe
kaḥ nu īśa te pāda-saroja-bhājām su-durlabhaḥ artheṣu caturṣu api iha tathā api na aham pravṛṇomi bhūman bhavat pada-ambhoja niṣevaṇa-utsukaḥ
karmāṇi anīhasya bhavaḥ abhavasya te durga-āśrayaḥ atha ari-bhayāt palāyanam kāla-ātmanaḥ yat pramadā-āyuta āśramaḥ sva-ātman rateḥ khidyati dhīḥ vidām iha
mantreṣu mām vai upahūya yat tvam akuṇṭhita akhaṇḍa sadā ātma bodhaḥ pṛccheḥ prabho mugdhaḥ iva apramattaḥ tat naḥ manaḥ mohayati iva deva
jñānam param sva-ātma rahaḥ prakāśam provāca kasmai bhagavān samagram api kṣamam naḥ grahaṇāya bhartaḥ vada añjasā yat vṛjinam tarema
iti āvedita hārdāya mahyam saḥ bhagavān paraḥ ādideśa aravinda-akṣaḥ ātmanaḥ paramām sthitim
saḥ evam ārādhita pāda-tīrthāt adhīta tattva-ātma vibodha mārgaḥ praṇamya pādau parivṛtya devam iha āgataḥ aham viraha ātura-ātmā
saḥ aham tat darśana āhlāda viyoga ārti-yutaḥ prabho gamiṣye dayitam tasya badaryāśrama maṇḍalam
yatra nārāyaṇaḥ devaḥ naraḥ ca bhagavān ṛṣiḥ mṛdu tīvram tapaḥ dīrgham tepāte loka-bhāvanau
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti uddhavāt upākarṇya suhṛdām duḥsaham vadham jñānena aśamayat kṣattā śokam utpatitam budhaḥ
saḥ tam mahā-bhāgavatam vrajantam kaurava-ṛṣabhaḥ viśrambhāt abhyadhatta idam mukhyam kṛṣṇa parigrahe
viduraḥ uvāca jñānam param sva-ātma rahaḥ prakāśam yat āha yoga-īśvaraḥ īśvaraḥ te vaktum bhavān naḥ arhati yat hi viṣṇoḥ bhṛtyāḥ sva-bhṛtya-artha-kṛtaḥ caranti
uddhavaḥ uvāca nanu te tattva-saṁrādhyaḥ ṛṣiḥ kauṣāravaḥ antike sākṣāt bhagavatā ādiṣṭaḥ martya-lokam jihāsatā
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti saha vidureṇa viśva-mūrteḥ guṇa-kathayā sudhayā plāvita-uru-tāpaḥ kṣaṇam iva puline yamasvasuḥ tām samuṣitaḥ aupagaviḥ niśām tataḥ agāt
rājā uvāca nidhanam upagateṣu vṛṣṇi bhojeṣu adhiratha yūtha-pa yūtha-peṣu mukhyaḥ saḥ tu katham avaśiṣṭaḥ uddhavaḥ yat hariḥ api tatyaje ākṛtim tri-adhīśaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca brahma-śāpa apadeśena kālena amogha vāñchitaḥ saṁhṛtya sva-kulam sphītam tyakṣyan deham acintayat
asmāt lokāt uparate mayi jñānam mat-āśrayam arhati uddhavaḥ eva addhā samprati ātmavatām varaḥ
na uddhavaḥ aṇu api mat nyūnaḥ yat guṇaiḥ na arditaḥ prabhuḥ ataḥ mat-vayunam lokam grāhayan iha tiṣṭhatu
evam tri-loka guruṇā sandiṣṭaḥ śabda-yoninā badaryāśramam āsādya harim īje samādhinā
viduraḥ api uddhavāt śrutvā kṛṣṇasya parama-ātmanaḥ krīḍayā upātta dehasya karmāṇi ślāghitāni ca
deha-nyāsam ca tasya evam dhīrāṇām dhairya vardhanam anyeṣām duṣkara-taram paśūnām viklava ātmanām
ātmānam ca kuru-śreṣṭha kṛṣṇena manasā īkṣitam dhyāyan gate bhāgavate ruroda prema-vihvalaḥ
kālindyāḥ katibhiḥ siddhe ahobhiḥ bharata-ṛṣabha prāpadyata svaḥ-saritam yatra mitrā-sutaḥ muniḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca dvāri dyu-nadyāḥ ṛṣabhaḥ kurūṇām maitreyam āsīnam agādha-bodham kṣattā upasṛtya acyuta bhāva siddhaḥ papraccha sauśīlya guṇa-abhitṛptaḥ
viduraḥ uvāca sukhāya karmāṇi karoti lokaḥ na taiḥ sukham vā anyat upāramam vā vindeta bhūyaḥ tataḥ eva duḥkham yat atra yuktam bhagavān vadet naḥ
janasya kṛṣṇāt vimukhasya daivāt adharma-śīlasya su-duḥkhitasya anugrahāya iha caranti nūnam bhūtāni bhavyāni janārdanasya
tat sādhu-varya ādiśa vartma śam naḥ saṁrādhitaḥ bhagavān yena puṁsām hṛdi sthitaḥ yacchati bhakti-pūte jñānam sa tattva adhigamam purāṇam
karoti karmāṇi kṛta avatāraḥ yāni ātma-tantraḥ bhagavān tri-adhīśaḥ yathā sasarja agre idam nirīhaḥ saṁsthāpya vṛttim jagataḥ vidhatte
yathā punaḥ sve khe idam niveśya śete guhāyām saḥ nivṛtta vṛttiḥ yoga-īśvara adhīśvaraḥ ekaḥ etat anupraviṣṭaḥ bahudhā yathā āsīt
krīḍan vidhatte dvija go surāṇām kṣemāya karmāṇi avatāra bhedaiḥ manaḥ na tṛpyati api śṛṇvatām naḥ su-śloka mauleḥ carita amṛtāni
yaiḥ tattva bhedaiḥ adhiloka-nāthaḥ lokān alokān saha loka-pālān acīkḷpat yatra hi sarva sattva nikāya bhedaḥ adhikṛtaḥ pratītaḥ
yena prajānām uta ātma-karma rūpa abhidhānām ca bhidām vyadhatta nārāyaṇaḥ viśvasṛk ātma-yoniḥ etat ca naḥ varṇaya vipra-varya
para avareṣām bhagavan vratāni śrutāni me vyāsa mukhāt abhīkṣṇam atṛpnuma kṣulla sukha-āvahānām teṣām ṛte kṛṣṇa-kathā amṛta-oghāt
kaḥ tṛpnuyāt tīrtha-padaḥ abhidhānāt satreṣu vaḥ sūribhiḥ īḍyamānāt yaḥ karṇa-nāḍīm puruṣasya yātaḥ bhava-pradām geha-ratim chinatti
muniḥ vivakṣuḥ bhagavat guṇānām sakhā api te bhāratam āha kṛṣṇaḥ yasmin nṛṇām grāmya sukha-anuvādaiḥ matiḥ gṛhītā nu hareḥ kathāyām
sā śraddadhānasya vivardhamānā viraktim anyatra karoti puṁsaḥ hareḥ pada-anusmṛti nirvṛtasya samasta-duḥkha apyayam āśu dhatte
tān śocya śocyān avidaḥ anuśoce hareḥ kathāyām vimukhān aghena kṣiṇoti devaḥ animiṣaḥ tu yeṣām āyuḥ vṛthā vāda gati smṛtīnām
tat asya kauṣārava śarma-dātuḥ hareḥ kathām eva kathāsu sāram uddhṛtya puṣpebhyaḥ iva ārta-bandho śivāya naḥ kīrtaya tīrtha kīrteḥ
saḥ viśva janma sthiti saṁyama-arthe kṛta avatāraḥ pragṛhīta śaktiḥ cakāra karmāṇi ati-pūruṣāṇi yāni īśvaraḥ kīrtaya tāni mahyam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca saḥ evam bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ kṣattrā kauṣāravaḥ muniḥ puṁsām niḥśreyasa arthena tam āha bahu mānayan
maitreyaḥ uvāca sādhu pṛṣṭam tvayā sādho lokān sādhu anugṛhṇatā kīrtim vitanvatā loke ātmanaḥ adhokṣaja ātmanaḥ
na etat citram tvayi kṣattaḥ bādarāyaṇa vīrya-je gṛhītaḥ ananya-bhāvena yat tvayā hariḥ īśvaraḥ
māṇḍavya śāpāt bhagavān prajā saṁyamanaḥ yamaḥ bhrātuḥ kṣetre bhujiṣyāyām jātaḥ satyavatī sutāt
bhavān bhagavataḥ nityam sammataḥ sa-anugasya ha yasya jñāna upadeśāya mā ādiśat bhagavān vrajan
atha te bhagavat līlāḥ yoga-māyā uru bṛṁhitāḥ viśva sthiti udbhava anta arthāḥ varṇayāmi anupūrvaśaḥ
bhagavān ekaḥ āsa idam agre ātmā ātmanām vibhuḥ ātmā icchā anugatau ātmā nānā-mati upalakṣaṇaḥ
saḥ vā eṣaḥ tadā draṣṭā na apaśyat dṛśyam eka-rāṭ mene asantam iva ātmānam supta śaktiḥ asupta dṛk
sā vā etasya saṁdraṣṭuḥ śaktiḥ sat-asat-ātmikā māyā nāma mahā-bhāga yayā idam nirmame vibhuḥ
kāla vṛttyā tu māyāyām guṇa-mayyām adhokṣajaḥ puruṣeṇa ātma-bhūtena vīryam ādhatta vīryavān
tataḥ abhavat mahat tattvam avyaktāt kāla-coditāt vijñāna-ātmā ātma-deha-stham viśvam vyañjan tamaḥ-nudaḥ
saḥ api aṁśa guṇa kāla ātmā bhagavat dṛṣṭi-gocaraḥ ātmānam vyakarot ātmā viśvasya asya sisṛkṣayā
mahat tattvāt vikurvāṇāt aham tattvam vyajāyata kārya kāraṇa kartṛ ātmā bhūta indriya manaḥ-mayaḥ vaikārikaḥ taijasaḥ ca tāmasaḥ ca iti aham tridhā
aham-tattvāt vikurvāṇāt manaḥ vaikārikāt abhūt vaikārikāḥ ca ye devāḥ artha abhivyañjanam yataḥ
taijasāni indriyāṇi eva jñāna karma mayāni ca
tāmasaḥ bhūta-sūkṣma-ādiḥ yataḥ kham liṅgam ātmanaḥ
kāla māyā aṁśa-yogena bhagavat vīkṣitam nabhaḥ nabhasaḥ anusṛtam sparśam vikurvat nirmame anilam
anilaḥ api vikurvāṇaḥ nabhasā uru-bala-anvitaḥ sasarja rūpa tat-mātram jyotiḥ lokasya locanam
anilena anvitam jyotiḥ vikurvat paravīkṣitam ādhatta ambhaḥ rasa-mayam kāla māyā-aṁśa yogataḥ
jyotiṣā ambhaḥ anusaṁsṛṣṭam vikurvat brahma vīkṣitam mahīm gandha guṇām ādhāt kāla māyā aṁśa yogataḥ
bhūtānām nabhaḥ ādīnām yat yat bhavya avara varam teṣām para anusaṁsargāt yathā saṅkhyam guṇān viduḥ
ete devāḥ kalāḥ viṣṇoḥ kāla māyā aṁśa liṅginaḥ nānātvāt sva-kriyā anīśāḥ procuḥ prāñjalayaḥ vibhum
devāḥ ūcuḥ namāma te deva pada-aravindam prapanna tāpa upaśama ātapatram yat-mūla-ketāḥ yatayaḥ añjasā uru saṁsāra-duḥkham bahiḥ utkṣipanti
dhātaḥ yat asmin bhave īśa jīvāḥ tāpa trayeṇa abhihatāḥ na śarma ātman labhante bhagavan tava aṅghri-chāyām sa-vidyām ataḥ āśrayema
mārganti yat te mukha-padma nīḍaiḥ chandaḥ suparṇaiḥ ṛṣayaḥ vivikte yasya agha-marṣa-uda sarit varāyāḥ padam padam tīrtha-padaḥ prapannāḥ
yat śraddhayā śrutavatyā ca bhaktyā sammṛjyamāne hṛdaye avadhāya jñānena vairāgya balena dhīrāḥ vrajema tat te aṅghri saroja-pīṭham
viśvasya janma sthiti saṁyama-arthe kṛta avatārasya pada-ambujam te vrajema sarve śaraṇam yat īśa smṛtam prayacchati abhayam sva-puṁsām
yat sa-anubandhe asati deha gehe mama aham iti ūḍha durāgrahāṇām puṁsām su-dūram vasataḥ api puryām bhajema tat te bhagavan pada-abjam
tān vai hi asat vṛttibhiḥ akṣibhiḥ ye parāhṛta antaḥ-manasaḥ pareśa atho na paśyanti urugāya nūnam ye te padanyāsa vilāsa lakṣyāḥ
pānena te deva kathā sudhāyāḥ pravṛddha bhaktyā viśada-āśayāḥ ye vairāgya-sāram pratilabhya bodham yathā añjasā anvīyuḥ akuṇṭha-dhiṣṇyam
tathā apare ca ātma-samādhi yoga balena jitvā prakṛtim baliṣṭhām tvām eva dhīrāḥ puruṣam viśanti teṣām śramaḥ syāt na tu sevayā te
tat te vayam loka sisṛkṣayā ādya tvayā anusṛṣṭāḥ tribhiḥ ātmabhiḥ sma sarve viyuktāḥ sva-vihāra-tantram na śaknumaḥ tat pratihartave te
yāvat balim te aja harāma kāle yathā vayam ca annam adāma yatra yathā ubhayeṣām te ime hi lokāḥ balim harantaḥ annam adanti anūhāḥ
tvam naḥ surāṇām asi sa-anvayānām kūṭa-sthaḥ ādyaḥ puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ tvam deva śaktyām guṇa-karma-yonau retaḥ tu ajāyām kavim ādadhe ajaḥ
tataḥ vayam mat-pramukhāḥ yat-arthe babhūvima ātman karavāma kim te tvam naḥ sva-cakṣuḥ paridehi śaktyā deva kriyā-arthe yat anugrahāṇām
ṛṣiḥ uvāca iti tāsām sva-śaktīnām satīnām asametya saḥ prasupta loka-tantrāṇām niśāmya gatim īśvaraḥ
kāla-sañjñām tadā devīm bibhrat śaktim urukramaḥ trayaḥ-viṁśati tattvānām gaṇam yugapat āviśat
saḥ anupraviṣṭaḥ bhagavān ceṣṭā-rūpeṇa tam gaṇam bhinnam saṁyojayām āsa suptam karma prabodhayan
prabuddha karmā daivena trayaḥ-viṁśatikaḥ gaṇaḥ preritaḥ ajanayat svābhiḥ mātrābhiḥ adhipūruṣam
pareṇa viśatā svasmin mātrayā viśva-sṛk gaṇaḥ cukṣobha anyonyam āsādya yasmin lokāḥ cara-acarāḥ
hiraṇmayaḥ saḥ puruṣaḥ sahasra parivatsarān āṇḍa-kośe uvāsa apsu sarva-sattva upabṛṁhitaḥ
saḥ vai viśva-sṛjām garbhaḥ deva karma ātma śaktimān vibabhāja ātmanā ātmānam ekadhā daśadhā tridhā
eṣaḥ hi aśeṣa sattvānām ātmā aṁśaḥ parama-ātmanaḥ ādyaḥ avatāraḥ yatra asau bhūta-grāmaḥ vibhāvyate
sa-ādhyātmaḥ sa-ādhidaivaḥ ca sa-ādhibhūtaḥ iti tridhā virāṭ prāṇaḥ daśa-vidhaḥ ekadhā hṛdayena ca
smaran viśva-sṛjām īśaḥ vijñāpitam adhokṣajaḥ virājam atapat svena tejasā eṣām vivṛttaye
atha tasya abhitaptasya katidhā āyatanāni ha nirabhidyanta devānām tāni me gadataḥ śṛṇu
tasya agniḥ āsyam nirbhinnam loka-pālaḥ aviśat padam vācā sva-aṁśena vaktavyam yayā asau pratipadyate
nirbhinnam tālu varuṇaḥ loka-pālaḥ aviśat hareḥ jihvayā aṁśena ca rasam yayā asau pratipadyate
nirbhinne aśvinau nāse viṣṇoḥ āviśatām padam ghrāṇena aṁśena gandhasya pratipattiḥ yataḥ bhavet
nirbhinne akṣiṇī tvaṣṭā loka-pālaḥ aviśat vibhoḥ cakṣuṣā aṁśena rūpāṇām pratipattiḥ yataḥ bhavet
nirbhinnāni asya carmāṇi loka-pālaḥ anilaḥ aviśat prāṇena aṁśena saṁsparśam yena asau pratipadyate
karṇau asya vinirbhinnau dhiṣṇyam svam viviśuḥ diśaḥ śrotreṇa aṁśena śabdasya siddhim yena prapadyate
tvacam asya vinirbhinnām viviśuḥ dhiṣṇyam oṣadhīḥ aṁśena romabhiḥ kaṇḍūm yaiḥ asau pratipadyate
meḍhram tasya vinirbhinnam sva-dhiṣṇyam kaḥ upāviśat retasā aṁśena yena asau ānandam pratipadyate
gudam puṁsaḥ vinirbhinnam mitraḥ loka-īśaḥ āviśat pāyunā aṁśena yena asau visargam pratipadyate
hastau asya vinirbhinnau indraḥ svaḥ-patiḥ āviśat vārtayā aṁśena puruṣaḥ yayā vṛttim prapadyate
pādau asya vinirbhinnau loka-īśaḥ viṣṇuḥ āviśat gatyā sva-aṁśena puruṣaḥ yayā prāpyam prapadyate
buddhim ca asya vinirbhinnām vāk-īśaḥ dhiṣṇyam āviśat bodhena aṁśena boddhavyam pratipattiḥ yataḥ bhavet
hṛdayam ca asya nirbhinnam candramā dhiṣṇyam āviśat manasā aṁśena yena asau vikriyām pratipadyate
ātmānam ca asya nirbhinnam abhimānaḥ aviśat padam karmaṇā aṁśena yena asau kartavyam pratipadyate
sattvam ca asya vinirbhinnam mahān dhiṣṇyam upāviśat cittena aṁśena yena asau vijñānam pratipadyate
śīrṣṇaḥ asya dyauḥ dharā padbhyām kham nābheḥ udapadyata guṇānām vṛttayaḥ yeṣu pratīyante sura-ādayaḥ
ātyantikena sattvena divam devāḥ prapedire dharām rajaḥ svabhāvena paṇayaḥ ye ca tān anu
tārtīyena svabhāvena bhagavat-nābhim āśritāḥ ubhayoḥ antaram vyoma ye rudra-pārṣadām gaṇāḥ
mukhataḥ avartata brahma puruṣasya kuru-udvaha yaḥ tu unmukhatvāt varṇānām mukhyaḥ abhūt brāhmaṇaḥ guruḥ
bāhubhyaḥ avartata kṣatram kṣatriyaḥ tat anuvrataḥ yaḥ jātaḥ trāyate varṇān pauruṣaḥ kaṇṭaka kṣatāt
viśaḥ avartanta tasya ūrvoḥ loka-vṛttikarīḥ vibhoḥ vaiśyaḥ tat udbhavaḥ vārtām nṛṇām yaḥ samavartayat
padbhyām bhagavataḥ jajñe śuśrūṣā dharma siddhaye tasyām jātaḥ purā śūdraḥ yat-vṛttyā tuṣyate hariḥ
ete varṇāḥ sva-dharmeṇa yajanti sva-gurum harim śraddhayā ātma viśuddhi-artham yat jātāḥ saha vṛttibhiḥ
etat kṣattaḥ bhagavataḥ daiva-karma-ātma-rūpiṇaḥ kaḥ śraddadhyāt upākartum yoga-māyā bala-udayam
tathā api kīrtayāmi aṅga yathā mati yathā śrutam kīrtim hareḥ svām sat-kartum giram anyābhidhā asatīm
eka-anta lābham vacasaḥ nu puṁsām suśloka mauleḥ guṇa-vādam āhuḥ śruteḥ ca vidvadbhiḥ upākṛtāyām kathā-sudhāyām upasamprayogam
ātmanaḥ avasitaḥ vatsa mahimā kavinā ādinā saṁvatsara sahasra-ante dhiyā yoga-vipakkayā
ataḥ bhagavataḥ māyā māyinām api mohinī yat svayam ca ātma-vartma ātmā na veda kim uta apare
yataḥ aprāpya nyavartanta vācaḥ ca manasā saha aham ca anye ime devāḥ tasmai bhagavate namaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam bruvāṇam maitreyam dvaipāyana-sutaḥ budhaḥ prīṇayan iva bhāratyā viduraḥ pratyabhāṣata
viduraḥ uvāca brahman katham bhagavataḥ cit-mātrasya avikāriṇaḥ līlayā ca api yujyeran nirguṇasya guṇāḥ kriyāḥ
krīḍāyām udyamaḥ arbhasya kāmaḥ cikrīḍiṣā anyataḥ svataḥ-tṛptasya ca katham nivṛttasya sadā anyataḥ
asrākṣīt bhagavān viśvam guṇa-mayyā ātma māyayā tayā saṁsthāpayati etat bhūyaḥ praty-apidhāsyati
deśataḥ kālataḥ yaḥ asau avasthātaḥ svataḥ anyataḥ avilupta avabodha ātmā saḥ yujyeta ajayā katham
bhagavān ekaḥ eva eṣaḥ sarva kṣetreṣu avasthitaḥ amuṣya durbhagatvam vā kleśaḥ vā karmabhiḥ kutaḥ
etasmin me manaḥ vidvan khidyate ajñāna saṅkaṭe tat naḥ parāṇuda vibho kaśmalam mānasam mahat
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca saḥ ittham coditaḥ kṣattrā tattva-jijñāsunā muniḥ pratyāha bhagavat-cittaḥ smayan iva gata-smayaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca sā iyam bhagavataḥ māyā yat nayena virudhyate īśvarasya vimuktasya kārpaṇyam uta bandhanam
yat arthena vinā amuṣya puṁsaḥ ātma-viparyayaḥ pratīyate upadraṣṭuḥ sva-śiraḥ chedana-ādikaḥ
yathā jale candramasaḥ kampa-ādiḥ tat-kṛtaḥ guṇaḥ dṛśyate asan api draṣṭuḥ ātmanaḥ anātmanaḥ guṇaḥ
saḥ vai nivṛtti dharmeṇa vāsudeva anukampayā bhagavat bhakti-yogena tirodhatte śanaiḥ iha
yadā indriya uparāmaḥ atha draṣṭṛ-ātmani pare harau vilīyante tadā kleśāḥ saṁsuptasya iva kṛtsnaśaḥ
aśeṣa saṅkleśa śamam vidhatte guṇa-anuvāda śravaṇam murāreḥ kim vā punaḥ tat caraṇa-aravinda parāga-sevā ratiḥ ātma-labdhā
viduraḥ uvāca sañchinnaḥ saṁśayaḥ mahyam tava sūkta-asinā vibho ubhayatra api bhagavan manaḥ me sampradhāvati
sādhu etat vyāhṛtam vidvan na ātma māyā ayanam hareḥ ābhāti apārtham nirmūlam viśva-mūlam na yat bahiḥ
yaḥ ca mūḍha-tamaḥ loke yaḥ ca buddheḥ param gataḥ tau ubhau sukham edhete kliśyati antaritaḥ janaḥ
artha-abhāvam viniścitya pratītasya api na ātmanaḥ tām ca api yuṣmat caraṇa sevayā aham parāṇude
yat sevayā bhagavataḥ kūṭa-sthasya madhu-dviṣaḥ rati-rāsaḥ bhavet tīvraḥ pādayoḥ vyasana ardanaḥ
durāpā hi alpa-tapasaḥ sevā vaikuṇṭha vartmasu yatra upagīyate nityam deva devaḥ jana-ardanaḥ
sṛṣṭvā agre mahat-ādīni sa-vikārāṇi anukramāt tebhyaḥ virājam uddhṛtya tam anu prāviśat vibhuḥ
yam āhuḥ ādyam puruṣam sahasra aṅghri ūru bāhukam yatra viśvaḥ ime lokāḥ sa-vikāśam te āsate
yasmin daśa-vidhaḥ prāṇaḥ sa indriya artha indriyaḥ tri-vṛt tvayā īritaḥ yataḥ varṇāḥ tat-vibhūtīḥ vadasva naḥ
yatra putraiḥ ca pautraiḥ ca naptṛbhiḥ saha gotra-jaiḥ prajāḥ vicitra ākṛtayaḥ āsan yābhiḥ idam tatam
prajā-patīnām saḥ patiḥ cakḷpe kān prajāpatīn sargān ca eva anusargān ca manūn manvantara-adhipān
upari adhaḥ ca ye lokāḥ bhūmeḥ mitra-ātmaja āsate teṣām saṁsthām pramāṇam ca bhūḥ-lokasya ca varṇaya
tiryak mānuṣa devānām sarīsṛpa patattriṇām vada naḥ sarga saṁvyūham gārbha sveda dvija udbhidām
guṇa avatāraiḥ viśvasya sarga sthiti apyaya āśrayam sṛjataḥ śrīnivāsasya vyācakṣva udāra vikramam
varṇa-āśrama vibhāgān ca rūpa śīla-svabhāvataḥ ṛṣīṇām janma karmāṇi vedasya ca vikarṣaṇam
yajñasya ca vitānāni yogasya ca pathaḥ prabho naiṣkarmyasya ca sāṅkhyasya tantram vā bhagavat smṛtam
pāṣaṇḍa-patha vaiṣamyam pratiloma niveśanam jīvasya gatayaḥ yāḥ ca yāvatīḥ guṇa karma-jāḥ
dharma artha kāma mokṣāṇām nimittāni avirodhataḥ vārtāyāḥ daṇḍa-nīteḥ ca śrutasya ca vidhim pṛthak
śrāddhasya ca vidhim brahman pitṝṇām sargam eva ca graha nakṣatra tārāṇām kāla avayava saṁsthitim
dānasya tapasaḥ vāpi yat ca iṣṭā pūrtayoḥ phalam pravāsa-sthasya yaḥ dharmaḥ yaḥ ca puṁsaḥ uta āpadi
yena vā bhagavān tuṣyet dharma-yoniḥ janārdanaḥ samprasīdati vā yeṣām etat ākhyāhi me anagha
anuvratānām śiṣyāṇām putrāṇām ca dvija-uttama anāpṛṣṭam api brūyuḥ guravaḥ dīna-vatsalāḥ
tattvānām bhagavan teṣām katidhā pratisaṅkramaḥ tatra imam ke upāsīran ke u svit anuśerate
puruṣasya ca saṁsthānam svarūpam vā parasya ca jñānam ca naigamam yat tat guru śiṣya prayojanam
nimittāni ca tasya iha proktāni anagha sūribhiḥ svataḥ jñānam kutaḥ puṁsām bhaktiḥ vairāgyam eva vā
etān me pṛcchataḥ praśnān hareḥ karma vivitsayā brūhi me ajñasya mitratvāt ajayā naṣṭa-cakṣuṣaḥ
sarve vedāḥ ca yajñāḥ ca tapaḥ dānāni ca anagha jīva abhaya pradānasya na kurvīran kalām api
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca saḥ ittham āpṛṣṭa purāṇa-kalpaḥ kuru-pradhānena muni-pradhānaḥ pravṛddha harṣaḥ bhagavat kathāyām sañcoditaḥ tam prahasan iva āha
maitreyaḥ uvāca sat-sevanīyaḥ bata pūru-vaṁśaḥ yat loka-pālaḥ bhagavat-pradhānaḥ babhūvitha iha ajita kīrti-mālām pade pade nūtanayasi abhīkṣṇam
saḥ aham nṛṇām kṣulla sukhāya duḥkham mahat gatānām viramāya tasya pravartaye bhāgavatam purāṇam yat āha sākṣāt bhagavān ṛṣibhyaḥ
āsīnam urvyām bhagavantam ādyam saṅkarṣaṇam devam akuṇṭha-sattvam vivitsavaḥ tattvam ataḥ parasya kumāra mukhyāḥ munayaḥ anvapṛcchan
svam eva dhiṣṇyam bahu mānayantam yat vāsudeva abhidham āmananti pratyak-dhṛta-akṣa ambuja-kośam īṣat unmīlayantam vibudha udayāya
svardhunī-uda ārdraiḥ sva-jaṭā kalāpaiḥ upaspṛśantaḥ caraṇa-upadhānam padmam yat arcanti ahi-rāja kanyāḥ sa-prema nānā balibhiḥ vara-arthāḥ
muhuḥ gṛṇantaḥ vacasā anurāga skhalat-padena asya kṛtāni tat-jñāḥ kirīṭa sāhasra maṇi-praveka pradyotita uddāma phaṇā sahasram
proktam kila etat bhagavattamena nivṛtti dharma-abhiratāya tena sanat-kumārāya saḥ ca āha pṛṣṭaḥ sāṅkhyāyanāya aṅga dhṛta-vratāya
sāṅkhyāyanaḥ pāramahaṁsya-mukhyaḥ vivakṣamāṇaḥ bhagavat-vibhūtīḥ jagāda saḥ asmat gurave anvitāya parāśarāya atha bṛhaspateḥ ca
provāca mahyam saḥ dayāluḥ uktaḥ muniḥ pulastyena purāṇam ādyam saḥ aham tava etat kathayāmi vatsa śraddhālave nityam anuvratāya
uda āplutam viśvam idam tadā āsīt yat nidrayā amīlita dṛk nyamīlayat ahi-indra talpe adhiśayānaḥ ekaḥ kṛta-kṣaṇaḥ sva-ātma-ratau nirīhaḥ
saḥ antaḥ śarīre arpita bhūta sūkṣmaḥ kāla-ātmikām śaktim udīrayāṇaḥ uvāsa tasmin salile pade sve yathā analaḥ dāruṇi ruddha-vīryaḥ
catuḥ yugānām ca sahasram apsu svapan svayā udīritayā sva-śaktyā kāla-ākhyayā āsādita karma-tantraḥ lokān apītān dadṛśe sva-dehe
tasya artha sūkṣma abhiniviṣṭa-dṛṣṭeḥ antaḥ-gataḥ arthaḥ rajasā tanīyān guṇena kāla-anugatena viddhaḥ sūṣyan tadā abhidyata nābhi-deśāt
saḥ padma-kośaḥ sahasā udatiṣṭhat kālena karma pratibodhanena sva-rociṣā tat salilam viśālam vidyotayan arkaḥ iva ātma-yoniḥ
tat loka padmam saḥ u eva viṣṇuḥ prāvīviśat sarva guṇa-avabhāsam tasmin svayam veda-mayaḥ vidhātā svayam-bhuvam yam sma vadanti saḥ abhūt
tasyām saḥ ca ambhaḥ ruha-karṇikāyām avasthitaḥ lokam apaśyamānaḥ parikraman vyomni vivṛtta-netraḥ catvāri lebhe anudiśam mukhāni
tasmāt yuga-anta śvasana avaghūrṇa jala ūrmi-cakrāt salilāt virūḍham upāśritaḥ kañjam u loka-tattvam na ātmānam addhā avidat ādi-devaḥ
kaḥ eṣaḥ yaḥ asau aham abja-pṛṣṭhe etat kutaḥ vā abjam ananyat apsu asti hi adhastāt iha kiñcana etat adhiṣṭhitam yatra satā nu bhāvyam
saḥ ittham udvīkṣya tat abja nāla nāḍībhiḥ antaḥ-jalam āviveśa na arvāk-gataḥ tat-khara-nāla nāla nābhim vicinvan tat avindata ajaḥ
tamasi apāre vidura ātma-sargam vicinvataḥ abhūt su-mahān tri-nemiḥ yaḥ deha-bhājām bhayam īrayāṇaḥ parikṣiṇoti āyuḥ ajasya hetiḥ
tataḥ nivṛttaḥ apratilabdha-kāmaḥ sva-dhiṣṇyam āsādya punaḥ saḥ devaḥ śanaiḥ jita-śvāsa nivṛtta cittaḥ nyaṣīdat ārūḍha samādhi-yogaḥ
kālena saḥ ajaḥ puruṣa-āyuṣā abhipravṛtta yogena virūḍha bodhaḥ svayam tat antaḥ-hṛdaye avabhātam apaśyata apaśyata yat na pūrvam
mṛṇāla gaura āyata śeṣa-bhoga paryaṅke ekam puruṣam śayānam phaṇa-ātapatra āyuta mūrdha ratna dyubhiḥ hata-dhvānta yuga-anta toye
prekṣām kṣipantam harita upala adreḥ sandhyā-abhra-nīveḥ uru rukma mūrdhnaḥ ratna udadhāra auṣadhi saumanasya vana-srajaḥ veṇu bhuja aṅghripa aṅghreḥ
āyāmataḥ vistarataḥ sva-māna dehena loka-traya saṅgraheṇa vicitra divya ābharaṇa-aṁśukānām kṛta-śriyā apāśrita veṣa deham
puṁsām sva-kāmāya vivikta-mārgaiḥ abhyarcatām kāma-dugha-aṅghri-padmam pradarśayantam kṛpayā nakha indu mayūkha bhinna aṅguli cāru-patram
mukhena loka-ārti-hara smitena parisphurat kuṇḍala maṇḍitena śoṇāyitena adhara bimba bhāsā pratyarhayantam su-nasena su-bhrvā
kadamba-kiñjalka piśaṅga vāsasā su-alaṅkṛtam mekhalayā nitambe hāreṇa ca ananta dhanena vatsa śrīvatsa vakṣaḥ-sthala vallabhena
parārdhya keyūra maṇi-praveka paryasta dordaṇḍa sahasra-śākham avyakta-mūlam bhuvana aṅghripa indram ahi-indra bhogaiḥ adhivīta valśam
cara acara okaḥ bhagavat mahīdhram ahi-indra bandhum salila upagūḍham kirīṭa sāhasra hiraṇya śṛṅgam āvirbhavat kaustubha ratna-garbham
nivītam āmnāya madhu-vrata-śriyā sva-kīrti-mayyā vana-mālayā harim sūrya indu vāyu agni agamam tri-dhāmabhiḥ parikramat prādhanikaiḥ durāsadam
tarhi eva tat nābhi saraḥ sarojam ātmānam ambhaḥ śvasanam viyat ca dadarśa devaḥ jagataḥ vidhātā na ataḥ param loka-visarga dṛṣṭiḥ
saḥ karma-bījam rajasā uparaktaḥ prajāḥ sisṛkṣan iyat eva dṛṣṭvā astaut visarga abhimukhaḥ tam īḍyam avyakta vartmani abhiveśita ātmā
brahmā uvāca jñātaḥ asi me adya sucirāt nanu deha-bhājām na jñāyate bhagavataḥ gatiḥ iti avadyam na anyat tvat asti bhagavan api tat na śuddham māyā guṇa-vyatikarāt yat uruḥ vibhāsi
rūpam yat etat avabodha-rasa udayena śaśvat nivṛtta tamasaḥ sat-anugrahāya ādau gṛhītam avatāra śata-eka-bījam yat nābhi-padma bhavanāt aham āvirāsam
na ataḥ param parama yat bhavataḥ svarūpam ānanda-mātram avikalpam aviddha-varcaḥ paśyāmi viśva-sṛjam ekam aviśvam ātman bhūta indriya ātmaka madaḥ te upāśritaḥ asmi
tat vā idam bhuvana-maṅgala maṅgalāya dhyāne sma naḥ darśitam te upāsakānām tasmai namaḥ bhagavate anuvidhema tubhyam yaḥ anādṛtaḥ naraka-bhāgbhiḥ asat-prasaṅgaiḥ
ye tu tvadīya caraṇa-ambuja kośa gandham jighranti karṇa-vivaraiḥ śruti-vāta-nītam bhaktyā gṛhīta-caraṇaḥ parayā ca teṣām na apaiṣi nātha hṛdaya ambu-ruhāt sva-puṁsām
tāvat bhayam draviṇa deha suhṛt nimittam śokaḥ spṛhā paribhavaḥ vipulaḥ ca lobhaḥ tāvat mama iti asat avagrahaḥ ārti-mūlam yāvat na te aṅghrim abhayam pravṛṇīta lokaḥ
daivena te hata-dhiyaḥ bhavataḥ prasaṅgāt sarva aśubha upaśamanāt vimukha indriyāḥ ye kurvanti kāma sukha leśa lavāya dīnāḥ lobha-abhibhūta manasaḥ akuśalāni śaśvat
kṣut tṛṭ tri-dhātubhiḥ imāḥ muhuḥ ardyamānāḥ śīta uṣṇa vāta varaṣaiḥ itara-itarāt ca kāma-agninā acyuta-ruṣā ca sudurbhareṇa sampaśyataḥ manaḥ urukrama sīdate me
yāvat pṛthaktvam idam ātmanaḥ indriya-artha māyā-balam bhagavataḥ janaḥ īśa paśyet tāvat na saṁsṛtiḥ asau pratisaṅkrameta vyarthā api duḥkha-nivaham vahatī kriyā-arthā
ahni āpṛta ārta karaṇāḥ niśi niḥśayānāḥ nānā manoratha dhiyā kṣaṇa bhagna nidrāḥ daiva āhata-artha racanāḥ ṛṣayaḥ api deva yuṣmat prasaṅga vimukhāḥ iha saṁsaranti
tvam bhakti-yoga paribhāvita hṛt saroje āsse śruta-īkṣita pathaḥ nanu nātha puṁsām yat-yat dhiyā te urugāya vibhāvayanti tat-tat vapuḥ praṇayase sat-anugrahāya
na ati prasīdati tathā upacita upacāraiḥ ārādhitaḥ sura-gaṇaiḥ hṛdi baddha-kāmaiḥ yat sarva bhūta dayayā asat alabhyayā ekaḥ nānā janeṣu avahitaḥ suhṛt antaḥ ātmā
puṁsām ataḥ vividha-karmabhiḥ adhvara-ādyaiḥ dānena ca ugra tapasā paricaryayā ca ārādhanam bhagavataḥ tava sat-kriyā-arthaḥ dharmaḥ arpitaḥ karhicit mriyate na yatra
śaśvat svarūpa mahasā eva nipīta bheda mohāya bodha dhiṣaṇāya namaḥ parasmai viśva-udbhava sthiti layeṣu nimitta līlā rāsāya te namaḥ idam cakṛma īśvarāya
yasya avatāra guṇa karma viḍambanāni nāmāni ye asu-vigame vivaśāḥ gṛṇanti te anaika janma śamalam sahasā eva hitvā saṁyānti apāvṛta amṛtam tam ajam prapadye
yaḥ vai aham ca giriśaḥ ca vibhuḥ svayam ca sthiti udbhava pralaya hetavaḥ ātma-mūlam bhittvā tri-pāt vavṛdhe ekaḥ uru prarohaḥ tasmai namaḥ bhagavate bhuvana-drumāya
lokaḥ vikarma nirataḥ kuśale pramattaḥ karmaṇi ayam tvat udite bhavat arcane sve yaḥ tāvat asya balavān iha jīvita-āśām sadyaḥ chinatti animiṣāya namaḥ astu tasmai
yasmāt bibhemi aham api dvi-para-ardha dhiṣṇyam adhyāsitaḥ sakala-loka namaskṛtam yat tepe tapaḥ bahu-savaḥ avarurutsamānaḥ tasmai namaḥ bhagavate adhimakhāya tubhyam
tiryak manuṣya vibudha-ādiṣu jīva-yoniṣu ātma icchayā ātma-kṛta setu parīpsayā yaḥ reme nirasta viṣayaḥ api avaruddha dehaḥ tasmai namaḥ bhagavate puruṣottamāya
yaḥ avidyayā anupahataḥ api daśa-ardha vṛttyā nidrām uvāha jaṭharī kṛta loka-yātraḥ antaḥ-jale ahi-kaśipu sparśa-anukūlām bhīma-ūrmi mālini janasya sukham vivṛṇvan
yat nābhi padma bhavanāt aham āsam īḍya loka-traya upakaraṇaḥ yat anugraheṇa tasmai namaḥ te udara-stha bhavāya yoga-nidrā-avasāna vikasat nalina-īkṣaṇāya
saḥ ayam samasta-jagatām suhṛt ekaḥ ātmā sattvena yat mṛḍayate bhagavān bhagena tena eva me dṛśam anuspṛśatāt yathā aham srakṣyāmi pūrva-vat idam praṇata priyaḥ asau
eṣaḥ prapanna vara-daḥ ramayā ātma-śaktyā yat yat kariṣyati gṛhīta guṇa-avatāraḥ tasmin sva-vikramam idam sṛjataḥ api cetaḥ yuñjīta karma śamalam ca yathā vijahyām
nābhi-hradāt iha sataḥ ambhasi yasya puṁsaḥ vijñāna śaktiḥ aham āsam ananta śakteḥ rūpam vicitram idam asya vivṛṇvataḥ me mā rīriṣīṣṭa nigamasya girām visargaḥ
saḥ asau adabhra karuṇaḥ bhagavān vivṛddha prema smitena nayana-amburuham vijṛmbhan utthāya viśva-vijayāya ca naḥ viṣādam mādhvyā girā apanayatāt puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca sva-sambhavam niśāmya evam tapaḥ vidyā samādhibhiḥ yāvat manaḥ vacaḥ stutvā virarāma saḥ khinna-vat
atha abhipretam anvīkṣya brahmaṇaḥ madhusūdanaḥ viṣaṇṇa cetasam tena kalpa vyatikara-ambhasā loka-saṁsthāna vijñāne ātmanaḥ parikhidyataḥ tam āha agādhayā vācā kaśmalam śamayan iva
śrī-bhagavān uvāca mā veda-garbha gāḥ tandrīm sarge udyamam āvaha tat mayā āpāditam hi agre yat mām prārthayate bhavān
bhūyaḥ tvam tapaḥ ātiṣṭha vidyām ca eva mat āśrayām tābhyām antaḥ hṛdi brahman lokān drakṣyasi apāvṛtān
tataḥ ātmani loke ca bhakti-yuktaḥ samāhitaḥ draṣṭā asi mām tatam brahman mayi lokān tvam ātmanaḥ
yadā tu sarva bhūteṣu dāruṣu agnim iva sthitam praticakṣīta mām lokaḥ jahyāt tarhi eva kaśmalam
yadā rahitam ātmānam bhūta indriya guṇa-āśayaiḥ svarūpeṇa mayā upetam paśyan svārājyam ṛcchati
nānā-karma vitānena prajāḥ bahvīḥ sisṛkṣataḥ na ātmā avasīdati asmin te varṣīyān mat anugrahaḥ
ṛṣim ādyam na badhnāti pāpīyān tvām rajaḥ-guṇaḥ yat manaḥ mayi nirbaddham prajāḥ saṁsṛjataḥ api te
jñātaḥ aham bhavatā tu adya duḥ vijñeyaḥ api dehinām yat mām tvam manyase ayuktam bhūta indriya guṇa ātmabhiḥ
tubhyam mat vicikitsāyām ātmā me darśitaḥ abahiḥ nālena salile mūlam puṣkarasya vicinvataḥ
yat cakartha aṅga mat-stotram mat-kathā abhyudaya-aṅkitam yat vā tapasi te niṣṭhā saḥ eṣaḥ mat anugrahaḥ
prītaḥ aham astu bhadram te lokānām vijaya icchayā yat astauṣīḥ guṇa-mayam nirguṇam mā anuvarṇayan
yaḥ etena pumān nityam stutvā stotreṇa mām bhajet tasya āśu samprasīdeyam sarva kāma vara-īśvaraḥ
pūrtena tapasā yajñaiḥ dānaiḥ yoga samādhinā rāddham niḥśreyasam puṁsām mat prītiḥ tattva-vit matam
aham ātmā ātmanām dhātaḥ preṣṭhaḥ san preyasām api ataḥ mayi ratim kuryāt deha-ādiḥ yat-kṛte priyaḥ
sarva veda-mayena idam ātmanā ātmā ātma-yoninā prajāḥ sṛja yathā-pūrvam yāḥ ca mayi anuśerate
maitreyaḥ uvāca tasmai evam jagat-sraṣṭre pradhāna-puruṣa-īśvaraḥ vyajya idam svena rūpeṇa kañja-nābhaḥ tirodadhe
viduraḥ uvāca antarhite bhagavati brahmā loka-pitāmahaḥ prajāḥ sasarja katidhāḥ daihikīḥ mānasīḥ vibhuḥ
ye ca me bhagavan pṛṣṭāḥ tvayi arthāḥ bahu-vit-tama tān vadasva ānupūrvyeṇa chindhi naḥ sarva saṁśayān
sūtaḥ uvāca evam sañcoditaḥ tena kṣattrā kauṣāraviḥ muniḥ prītaḥ pratyāha tān praśnān hṛdi-sthān atha bhārgava
maitreyaḥ uvāca viriñcaḥ api tathā cakre divyam varṣa-śatam tapaḥ ātmani ātmānam āveśya yathā āha bhagavān ajaḥ
tat vilokya abja-sambhūtaḥ vāyunā yat adhiṣṭhitaḥ padmam ambhaḥ ca tat-kāla-kṛta vīryeṇa kampitam
tapasā hi edhamānena vidyayā ca ātma saṁsthayā vivṛddha vijñāna balaḥ nyapāt vāyum saha ambhasā
tat vilokya viyat-vyāpi puṣkaram yat adhiṣṭhitam anena lokān prāk-līnān kalpitā asmi iti acintayat
padma-kośam tadā āviśya bhagavat karma coditaḥ ekam vyabhāṅkṣīt urudhā tridhā bhāvyam dvi-saptadhā
etāvān jīva-lokasya saṁsthā-bhedaḥ samāhṛtaḥ dharmasya hi animittasya vipākaḥ parameṣṭhī asau
viduraḥ uvāca yathā āttha bahu-rūpasya hareḥ adbhuta karmaṇaḥ kāla ākhyam lakṣaṇam brahman yathā varṇaya naḥ prabho
maitreyaḥ uvāca guṇa-vyatikara ākāraḥ nirviśeṣaḥ apratiṣṭhitaḥ puruṣaḥ tat upādānam ātmānam līlayā asṛjat
viśvam vai brahma tat-mātram saṁsthitam viṣṇu-māyayā īśvareṇa paricchinnam kālena avyakta mūrtinā
yathā idānīm tathā agre ca paścāt api etat īdṛśam
sargaḥ nava-vidhaḥ tasya prākṛtaḥ vaikṛtaḥ tu yaḥ kāla dravya guṇaiḥ asya tri-vidhaḥ pratisaṅkramaḥ
ādyaḥ tu mahataḥ sargaḥ guṇa-vaiṣamyam ātmanaḥ dvitīyaḥ tu ahamaḥ yatra dravya jñāna kriyā-udayaḥ
bhūta-sargaḥ tṛtīyaḥ tu tat-mātraḥ dravya śaktimān caturthaḥ aindriyaḥ sargaḥ yaḥ tu jñāna kriyā ātmakaḥ
vaikārikaḥ deva sargaḥ pañcamaḥ yat mayam manaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ tu tamasaḥ sargaḥ yaḥ tu abuddhi-kṛtaḥ prabhoḥ
ṣaṭ ime prākṛtāḥ sargāḥ vaikṛtān api me śṛṇu rajaḥ-bhājaḥ bhagavataḥ līlā iyam hari medhasaḥ
saptamaḥ mukhya sargaḥ tu ṣaṭ-vidhaḥ tasthuṣām ca yaḥ vanaspati oṣadhi latā tvaksārāḥ vīrudhaḥ drumāḥ
utsrotasaḥ tamaḥ-prāyāḥ antaḥ-sparśāḥ viśeṣiṇaḥ
tiraścām aṣṭamaḥ sargaḥ saḥ aṣṭāviṁśat vidhaḥ mataḥ avidaḥ bhūri tamasaḥ ghrāṇa-jñāḥ hṛdi avedinaḥ
gauḥ ajaḥ mahiṣaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sūkaraḥ gavayaḥ ruruḥ dvi-śaphāḥ paśavaḥ ca ime aviḥ uṣṭraḥ ca sattama
kharaḥ aśvaḥ aśvataraḥ gauraḥ śarabhaḥ camarī tathā ete ca eka śaphāḥ kṣattaḥ śṛṇu pañca nakhān paśūn
śvā sṛgālaḥ vṛkaḥ vyāghraḥ mārjāraḥ śaśa śallakau siṁhaḥ kapiḥ gajaḥ kūrmaḥ godhā ca makara-ādayaḥ
kaṅka gṛdhra baka śyena bhāsa bhallūka barhiṇaḥ haṁsa sārasa cakrāhva kāka ulūka ādayaḥ khagāḥ
arvāk srotaḥ tu navamaḥ kṣattaḥ eka-vidhaḥ nṛṇām rajaḥ adhikāḥ karma-parāḥ duḥkhe ca sukha māninaḥ
vaikṛtāḥ trayaḥ eva ete deva-sargaḥ ca sattama vaikārikaḥ tu yaḥ proktaḥ kaumāraḥ tu ubhaya-ātmakaḥ
deva-sargaḥ ca aṣṭa-vidhaḥ vibudhāḥ pitaraḥ asurāḥ gandharva apsarasaḥ siddhāḥ yakṣa rakṣāṁsi cāraṇāḥ bhūta preta piśācāḥ ca vidyādhrāḥ kinnara ādayaḥ daśa ete vidura ākhyātāḥ sargāḥ te viśva-sṛk kṛtāḥ
ataḥ param pravakṣyāmi vaṁśān manvantarāṇi ca evam rajaḥ-plutaḥ sraṣṭā kalpa-ādiṣu ātma-bhūḥ hariḥ sṛjati amogha saṅkalpaḥ ātmā eva ātmānam ātmanā
maitreyaḥ uvāca caramaḥ sat viśeṣāṇām anekaḥ asaṁyutaḥ sadā parama-aṇuḥ saḥ vijñeyaḥ nṛṇām aikya bhramaḥ yataḥ
sataḥ eva pada-arthasya svarūpa-avasthitasya yat kaivalyam parama mahān aviśeṣaḥ nirantaraḥ
evam kālaḥ api anumitaḥ saukṣmye sthaulye ca sattama saṁsthāna bhuktyā bhagavān avyaktaḥ vyakta-bhuk vibhuḥ
saḥ kālaḥ parama-aṇuḥ vai yaḥ bhuṅkte parama-aṇutām sataḥ aviśeṣa-bhuk yaḥ tu saḥ kālaḥ paramaḥ mahān
aṇuḥ dvau parama-aṇu syāt trasareṇuḥ trayaḥ smṛtaḥ jāla-arka raśmi avagataḥ kham eva anupatan agāt
trasareṇu-trikam bhuṅkte yaḥ kālaḥ saḥ truṭiḥ smṛtaḥ śata-bhāgaḥ tu vedhaḥ syāt taiḥ tribhiḥ tu lavaḥ smṛtaḥ
nimeṣaḥ tri-lavaḥ jñeyaḥ āmnātaḥ te trayaḥ kṣaṇaḥ kṣaṇān pañca viduḥ kāṣṭhām laghu tāḥ daśa pañca ca
laghūni vai samāmnātā daśa pañca ca nāḍikā te dve muhūrtaḥ praharaḥ ṣaṭ yāmaḥ sapta vā nṛṇām
dvādaśa-ardha pala unmānam caturbhiḥ catuḥ-aṅgulaiḥ svarṇa māṣaiḥ kṛta-chidram yāvat prastha jala-plutam
yāmāḥ catvāraḥ catvāraḥ martyānām ahanī ubhe pakṣaḥ pañca-daśa ahāni śuklaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ ca mānada
tayoḥ samuccayaḥ māsaḥ pitṝṇām tat ahaḥ-niśam dvau tau ṛtuḥ ṣaṭ ayanam dakṣiṇam ca uttaram divi
ayane ca ahanī prāhuḥ vatsaraḥ dvādaśa smṛtaḥ saṁvatsara-śatam nṝṇām parama-āyuḥ nirūpitam
graha ṛkṣa tārā cakra-sthaḥ parama-aṇu-ādinā jagat saṁvatsara-avasānena paryeti animiṣaḥ vibhuḥ
saṁvatsaraḥ parivatsaraḥ iḍā-vatsaraḥ eva ca anuvatsaraḥ vatsaraḥ ca vidura evam prabhāṣyate
yaḥ sṛjya śaktim urudhā ucchvasayan sva-śaktyā puṁsaḥ abhramāya divi dhāvati bhūta-bhedaḥ kāla-ākhyayā guṇa-mayam kratubhiḥ vitanvan tasmai balim harata vatsara-pañcakāya
viduraḥ uvāca pitṛ deva manuṣyāṇām āyuḥ param idam smṛtam pareṣām gatim ācakṣva ye syuḥ kalpāt bahiḥ vidaḥ
bhagavān veda kālasya gatim bhagavataḥ nanu viśvam vicakṣate dhīrāḥ yoga-rāddhena cakṣuṣā
maitreyaḥ uvāca kṛtam tretā dvāparam ca kaliḥ ca iti catuḥ-yugam divyaiḥ dvādaśabhiḥ varṣaiḥ sa-avadhānam nirūpitam
catvāri trīṇi dve ca ekam kṛta-ādiṣu yathā-kramam saṅkhyātāni sahasrāṇi dvi-guṇāni śatāni ca
sandhyā sandhyā-aṁśayoḥ antaḥ yaḥ kālaḥ śata-saṅkhyayoḥ tam eva āhuḥ yugam tat-jñāḥ yatra dharmaḥ vidhīyate
dharmaḥ catuḥ-pāt manujān kṛte samanuvartate saḥ eva anyeṣu adharmeṇa vyeti pādena vardhatā
tri-lokyāḥ yuga sāhasram bahiḥ ābrahmaṇaḥ dinam tāvatī eva niśā tāta yat nimīlati viśva-sṛk
niśā avasāne ārabdhaḥ loka-kalpaḥ anuvartate yāvat dinam bhagavataḥ manūn bhuñjan catuḥ-daśa
svam svam kālam manuḥ bhuṅkte sa-adhikām hi eka-saptatim
manu-antareṣu manavaḥ tat-vaṁśyāḥ ṛṣayaḥ surāḥ bhavanti ca eva yugapat sura-īśāḥ ca anu ye ca tān
eṣaḥ dainam-dinaḥ sargaḥ brāhmaḥ trailokya-vartanaḥ tiryak nṛ pitṛ devānām sambhavaḥ yatra karmabhiḥ
manu-antareṣu bhagavān bibhrat sattvam sva-mūrtibhiḥ manu-ādibhiḥ idam viśvam avati udita pauruṣaḥ
tamaḥ mātrām upādāya pratisaṁruddha-vikramaḥ kālena anugata aśeṣaḥ āste tūṣṇīm dina-atyaye
tam eva anu api dhīyante lokāḥ bhūḥ-ādayaḥ trayaḥ niśāyām anuvṛttāyām nirmukta śaśi bhāskaram
tri-lokyām dahyamānāyām śaktyā saṅkarṣaṇa agninā yānti ūṣmaṇā mahaḥ-lokāt janam bhṛgu ādayaḥ arditāḥ
tāvat tri-bhuvanam sadyaḥ kalpa-anta edhita sindhavaḥ plāvayanti utkaṭa āṭopa caṇḍa vāta īrita ūrmayaḥ
antaḥ saḥ tasmin salile āste ananta āsanaḥ hariḥ yoga nidrā nimīla-akṣaḥ stūya-mānaḥ jana-ālayaiḥ
evam vidhaiḥ ahaḥ rātraiḥ kāla-gatyā upalakṣitaiḥ apakṣitam iva asya api parama-āyuḥ vayaḥ śatam
yat ardham āyuṣaḥ tasya parārdham abhidhīyate pūrvaḥ para-ardhaḥ apakrāntaḥ hi aparaḥ adya pravartate
pūrvasya ādau para-ardhasya brāhmaḥ nāma mahān abhūt kalpaḥ yatra abhavat brahmā śabda-brahma iti yam viduḥ
tasya eva ca ante kalpaḥ abhūt yam pādmam abhicakṣate yat hareḥ nābhi sarasaḥ āsīt loka saroruham
ayam tu kathitaḥ kalpaḥ dvitīyasya api bhārata vārāhaḥ iti vikhyātaḥ yatra āsīt śūkaraḥ hariḥ
kālaḥ ayam dvi-parārdha-ākhyaḥ nimeṣaḥ upacaryate avyākṛtasya anantasya hi anādeḥ jagat-ātmanaḥ
kālaḥ ayam parama-aṇu ādiḥ dvi-parārdha antaḥ īśvaraḥ na eva īśitum prabhuḥ bhūmnaḥ īśvaraḥ dhāma-māninām
vikāraiḥ sahitaḥ yuktaiḥ viśeṣa ādibhiḥ āvṛtaḥ āṇḍa-kośaḥ bahiḥ ayam pañcāśat koṭi vistṛtaḥ
daśa-uttara-adhikaiḥ yatra praviṣṭaḥ parama-aṇu-vat lakṣyate antaḥ-gatāḥ ca anye koṭiśaḥ hi aṇḍa-rāśayaḥ
tat āhuḥ akṣaram brahma sarva-kāraṇa kāraṇam viṣṇoḥ dhāma param sākṣāt puruṣasya mahātmanaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca iti te varṇitaḥ kṣattaḥ kāla-ākhyaḥ paramātmanaḥ mahimā veda-garbhaḥ atha yathā asrākṣīt nibodha me
sasarja agre andha-tāmisram atha tāmisram ādi-kṛt mahā-moham ca moham ca tamaḥ ca ajñāna vṛttayaḥ
dṛṣṭvā pāpīyasīm sṛṣṭim na ātmānam bahu amanyata bhagavat dhyāna pūtena manasā anyām tataḥ asṛjat
sanakam ca sanandam ca sanātanam atha ātma-bhūḥ sanat-kumāram ca munīn niṣkriyān ūrdhva-retasaḥ
tān babhāṣe svabhūḥ putrān prajāḥ sṛjata putrakāḥ tat na aicchan mokṣa-dharmāṇaḥ vāsudeva parāyaṇāḥ
saḥ avadhyātaḥ sutaiḥ evam pratyākhyāta anuśāsanaiḥ krodham durviṣaham jātam niyantum upacakrame
dhiyā nigṛhyamāṇaḥ api bhruvoḥ madhyāt prajāpateḥ sadyaḥ ajāyata tat manyuḥ kumāraḥ nīla-lohitaḥ
saḥ vai ruroda devānām pūrvajaḥ bhagavān bhavaḥ nāmāni kuru me dhātaḥ sthānāni ca jagat-guro
iti tasya vacaḥ pādmaḥ bhagavān paripālayan abhyadhāt bhadrayā vācā mā rodīḥ tat karomi te
yat arodīḥ sura-śreṣṭha sa-udvegaḥ iva bālakaḥ tataḥ tvām abhidhāsyanti nāmnā rudraḥ iti prajāḥ
hṛt indriyāṇi asuḥ vyoma vāyuḥ agniḥ jalam mahī sūryaḥ candraḥ tapaḥ ca eva sthānāni agre kṛtāni te
manyuḥ, manuḥ, mahinasaḥ, mahān, śivaḥ, ṛtadhvajaḥ, ugaretāḥ, bhavaḥ, kālaḥ, vāmadevaḥ, dhṛtavrataḥ
dhīḥ, dhṛti, rasalā, umā, niyut, sarpiḥ, ilā, ambikā, irāvatī, svadhā, dīkṣā rudrāṇyaḥ rudra te striyaḥ
gṛhāṇa etāni nāmāni sthānāni ca sa-yoṣaṇaḥ ebhiḥ sṛja prajāḥ bahvīḥ prajānām asi yat patiḥ
iti ādiṣṭaḥ sva-guruṇā bhagavān nīla-lohitaḥ sattva ākṛti svabhāvena sasarja ātma-samāḥ prajāḥ
rudrāṇām rudra-sṛṣṭānām samantāt grasatām jagat niśāmya asaṅkhyaśaḥ yūthān prajā-patiḥ aśaṅkata
alam prajābhiḥ sṛṣṭābhiḥ īdṛśībhiḥ sura-uttama mayā saha dahantībhiḥ diśaḥ cakṣurbhiḥ ulbaṇaiḥ
tapaḥ ātiṣṭha bhadram te sarva bhūta sukha-āvaham tapasā eva yathā pūrvam sraṣṭā viśvam idam bhavān
tapasā eva param jyotiḥ bhagavantam adhokṣajam sarva-bhūta-guhā-āvāsam añjasā vindate pumān
maitreyaḥ uvāca evam ātma-bhuvā ādiṣṭaḥ parikramya girām patim bāḍham iti amum āmantrya viveśa tapase vanam
atha abhidhyāyataḥ sargam daśa putrāḥ prajajñire bhagavat śakti yuktasya loka santāna hetavaḥ
marīciḥ, atri, aṅgirasau, pulastyaḥ, pulahaḥ, kratuḥ, bhṛguḥ, vasiṣṭhaḥ, dakṣaḥ ca daśamaḥ tatra nāradaḥ
utsaṅgāt nāradaḥ jajñe dakṣaḥ aṅguṣṭhāt svayambhuvaḥ prāṇāt vasiṣṭhaḥ sañjātaḥ bhṛguḥ tvaci karāt kratuḥ
pulahaḥ nābhitaḥ jajñe pulastyaḥ karṇayoḥ ṛṣiḥ aṅgirāḥ mukhataḥ akṣṇaḥ atriḥ marīciḥ manasaḥ abhavat
dharmaḥ stanāt dakṣiṇataḥ yatra nārāyaṇaḥ svayam adharmaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ yasmāt mṛtyuḥ loka bhayam-karaḥ
hṛdi kāmaḥ bhruvaḥ krodhaḥ lobhaḥ ca adhara-dacchadāt āsyāt vāk sindhavaḥ meḍhrāt nirṛtiḥ pāyoḥ agha-āśrayaḥ
chāyāyāḥ kardamaḥ jajñe devahūtyāḥ patiḥ prabhuḥ manasaḥ dehataḥ ca idam jajñe viśva kṛtaḥ jagat
vācam duhitaram tanvīm svayambhūḥ haratīm manaḥ akāmām cakame kṣattaḥ sa-kāmaḥ iti naḥ śrutam
tam adharme kṛta-matim vilokya pitaram sutāḥ marīci-mukhyāḥ munayaḥ viśrambhāt pratyabodhayan
na etat pūrvaiḥ kṛtam tvat ye na kariṣyanti ca apare yaḥ tvam duhitaram gaccheḥ anigṛhya aṅgajam prabhuḥ
tejīyasām api hi etat na su-ślokyam jagat-guro yat vṛttam anutiṣṭhan vai lokaḥ kṣemāya kalpate
tasmai namaḥ bhagavate yaḥ idam svena rociṣā ātma-stham vyañjayām āsa saḥ dharmam pātum arhati
saḥ ittham gṛṇataḥ putrān puraḥ dṛṣṭvā prajā-patīn prajāpati-patiḥ tanvam tatyāja vrīḍitaḥ tadā tām diśaḥ jagṛhuḥ ghorām nīhāram yat viduḥ tamaḥ
kadācit dhyāyataḥ sraṣṭuḥ vedāḥ āsan catuḥ-mukhāt katham srakṣyāmi aham lokān samavetān yathā purā
cātuḥ hotram karma tantram upaveda nayaiḥ saha dharmasya pādāḥ catvāraḥ tathā eva āśrama vṛttayaḥ
viduraḥ uvāca saḥ vai viśva sṛjām īśaḥ veda-ādīn mukhataḥ asṛjat yat yat yena asṛjat devaḥ tat me brūhi tapaḥ-dhana
maitreyaḥ uvāca ṛk-yajuḥ-sāma-atharva ākhyān vedān pūrva-ādibhiḥ mukhaiḥ śāstram ijyām stuti-stomam prāyaścittam vyadhāt kramāt
āyuḥ-vedam dhanuḥ-vedam gāndharvam vedam ātmanaḥ sthāpatyam ca asṛjat vedam kramāt pūrva-ādibhiḥ mukhaiḥ
itihāsa purāṇāni pañcamam vedam īśvaraḥ sarvebhyaḥ eva vaktrebhyaḥ sasṛje sarva darśanaḥ
ṣoḍaśī-ukthau pūrva-vaktrāt purīṣi-agniṣṭutau atha āptoryāma-atirātrau ca vājapeyam sa-gosavam
vidyā dānam tapaḥ satyam dharmasya iti padāni ca āśramān ca yathā saṅkhyam asṛjat saha vṛttibhiḥ
sāvitram prājāpatyam ca brāhmam ca atha bṛhat tathā vārtā sañcaya śālīna śila-uñchaḥ iti vai gṛhe
vaikhānasāḥ vālakhilya audumbarāḥ phenapāḥ vane nyāse kuṭīcakaḥ pūrvam bahvodaḥ haṁsa niṣkriyau
ānvīkṣikī trayī vārtā daṇḍa nītiḥ tathā eva ca evam vyāhṛtayaḥ ca āsan praṇavaḥ hi asya dahrataḥ
tasya uṣṇik āsīt lomabhyaḥ gāyatrī ca tvacaḥ vibhoḥ triṣṭup māṁsāt snutaḥ anuṣṭup jagatī asthnaḥ prajāpateḥ
majjāyāḥ paṅktiḥ utpannā bṛhatī prāṇataḥ abhavat
sparśaḥ tasya abhavat jīvaḥ svaraḥ dehaḥ udāhṛtaḥ ūṣmāṇam indriyāṇi āhuḥ antaḥ-sthāḥ balam ātmanaḥ svarāḥ sapta vihāreṇa bhavanti sma prajāpateḥ
śabda-brahma ātmanaḥ tasya vyakta avyakta-ātmanaḥ paraḥ brahmā avabhāti vitataḥ nānā śakti upabṛṁhitaḥ
tataḥ aparām upādāya saḥ sargāya manaḥ dadhe
ṛṣīṇām bhūri-vīryāṇām api sargam avistṛtam jñātvā tat hṛdaye bhūyaḥ cintayām āsa kaurava
aho adbhutam etat me vyāpṛtasya api nityadā na hi edhante prajāḥ nūnam daivam atra vighātakam
evam yukta kṛtaḥ tasya daivam ca avekṣataḥ tadā kasya rūpam abhūt dvedhā yat kāyam abhicakṣate
tābhyām rūpa vibhāgābhyām mithunam samapadyata
yaḥ tu tatra pumān saḥ abhūt manuḥ svāyambhuvaḥ sva-rāṭ strī yā āsīt śatarūpā ākhyā mahiṣī asya mahātmanaḥ
tadā mithuna dharmeṇa prajāḥ hi edhām babhūvire
saḥ ca api śatarūpāyām pañca apatyāni ajījanat priyavrata uttānapādau tisraḥ kanyāḥ ca bhārata ākūtiḥ devahūtiḥ ca prasūtiḥ iti sattama
ākūtim rucaye prādāt kardamāya tu madhyamām dakṣāya adāt prasūtim ca yataḥ āpūritam jagat
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca niśamya vācam vadataḥ muneḥ puṇya-tamām nṛpa bhūyaḥ papraccha kauravyaḥ vāsudeva-kathā ādṛtaḥ
viduraḥ uvāca saḥ vai svāyambhuvaḥ samrāṭ priyaḥ putraḥ svayambhuvaḥ pratilabhya priyām patnīm kim cakāra tataḥ mune
caritam tasya rājarṣeḥ ādi-rājasya sattama brūhi me śraddadhānāya viṣvaksena āśrayaḥ hi asau
śrutasya puṁsām sucira śramasya nanu añjasā sūribhiḥ īḍitaḥ arthaḥ tat tat guṇa anuśravaṇam mukunda pāda-aravindam hṛdayeṣu yeṣām
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti bruvāṇam viduram vinītam sahasra-śīrṣṇaḥ caraṇa upadhānam prahṛṣṭa-romā bhagavat kathāyām praṇīyamānaḥ muniḥ abhyacaṣṭa
maitreyaḥ uvāca yadā sva-bhāryayā sārdham jātaḥ svāyambhuvaḥ manuḥ prāñjaliḥ praṇataḥ ca idam veda-garbham abhāṣata
tvam ekaḥ sarva bhūtānām janma-kṛt vṛtti-daḥ pitā tathā api naḥ prajānām te śuśrūṣā kena vā bhavet
tat vidhehi namaḥ tubhyam karmasu īḍya ātma-śaktiṣu yat kṛtvā iha yaśaḥ viṣvak amutra ca bhavet gatiḥ
brahmā uvāca prītaḥ tubhyam aham tāta svasti stāt vām kṣiti-īśvara yat nirvyalīkena hṛdā śādhi mā iti ātmanā arpitam
etāvatī ātmajaiḥ vīra kāryā hi apacitiḥ gurau śaktyā apramattaiḥ gṛhyeta sa-ādaram gata-matsaraiḥ
saḥ tvam asyām apatyāni sadṛśāni ātmanaḥ guṇaiḥ utpādya śāsa dharmeṇa gām yajñaiḥ puruṣam yaja
param śuśrūṣaṇam mahyam syāt prajā rakṣayā nṛpa bhagavān te prajā-bhartuḥ hṛṣīkeśaḥ anutuṣyati
yeṣām na tuṣṭaḥ bhagavān yajña-liṅgaḥ janārdanaḥ teṣām śramaḥ hi apārthāya yat ātmā na ādṛtaḥ svayam
manuḥ uvāca ādeśe aham bhagavataḥ varteya amīva-sūdana sthānam tu iha anujānīhi prajānām mama ca prabho
yat okaḥ sarva bhūtānām mahī magnā mahā-ambhasi asyāḥ uddharaṇe yatnaḥ deva devyāḥ vidhīyatām
maitreyaḥ uvāca parameṣṭhī tu apām madhye tathā sannām avekṣya gām katham enām samunneṣye iti dadhyau dhiyā ciram
sṛjataḥ me kṣitiḥ vārbhiḥ plāvyamānā rasām gatā atha atra kim anuṣṭheyam asmābhiḥ sarga yojitaiḥ yasya aham hṛdayāt āsam saḥ īśaḥ vidadhātu me
iti abhidhyāyataḥ nāsā-vivarāt sahasā anagha varāha-tokaḥ niragāt aṅguṣṭha parimāṇakaḥ
tasya abhipaśyataḥ kha-sthaḥ kṣaṇena kila bhārata gaja-mātraḥ pravavṛdhe tat adbhutam abhūt mahat
marīci pramukhaiḥ vipraiḥ kumāraiḥ manunā saha dṛṣṭvā tat saukaram rūpam tarkayām āsa citradhā
kim etat sūkara vyājam sattvam divyam avasthitam aho bata āścaryam idam nāsāyāḥ me viniḥsṛtam
dṛṣṭaḥ aṅguṣṭha śiraḥ mātraḥ kṣaṇāt gaṇḍa-śilā samaḥ api svit bhagavān eṣaḥ yajñaḥ me khedayan manaḥ
iti mīmāṁsataḥ tasya brahmaṇaḥ saha sūnubhiḥ bhagavān yajña puruṣaḥ jagarja aga-indra sannibhaḥ
brahmāṇam harṣayām āsa hariḥ tān ca dvija-uttamān sva-garjitena kakubhaḥ pratisvanayatā vibhuḥ
niśamya te ghargharitam sva-kheda kṣayiṣṇu māyā-maya sūkarasya janaḥ tapaḥ satya nivāsinaḥ te tribhiḥ pavitraiḥ munayaḥ agṛṇan sma
teṣām satām veda vitāna-mūrtiḥ brahma avadhārya ātma guṇa-anuvādam vinadya bhūyaḥ vibudha udayāya gajendra-līlaḥ jalam āviveśa
utkṣipta-vālaḥ kha-caraḥ kaṭhoraḥ saṭāḥ vidhunvan khara romaśa-tvak khura-āhata abhraḥ sita-daṁṣṭraḥ īkṣā jyotiḥ babhāse bhagavān mahī-dhraḥ
ghrāṇena pṛthvyāḥ padavīm vijighran kroḍa-apadeśaḥ svayam adhvara aṅgaḥ karāla daṁṣṭraḥ api akarāla dṛgbhyām udvīkṣya viprān gṛṇataḥ aviśat kam
saḥ vajra-kūṭa-aṅga nipāta-vega viśīrṇa kukṣiḥ stanayan udanvān utsṛṣṭa dīrgha ūrmi bhujaiḥ iva ārtaḥ cukrośa yajña-īśvara pāhi mā iti
khuraiḥ kṣurapraiḥ darayan tat āpaḥ utpāra-pāram tri-paruḥ rasāyām dadarśa gām tatra suṣupsuḥ agre yām jīva-dhānīm svayam abhyadhatta
sva-daṁṣṭrayā uddhṛtya mahīm nimagnām saḥ utthitaḥ saṁruruce rasāyāḥ tatra api daityam gadayā āpatantam sunābha sandīpita tīvra manyuḥ
jaghāna rundhānam asahya vikramam saḥ līlayā ibham mṛga-rāṭ iva ambhasi tat-rakta paṅka-aṅkita gaṇḍa tuṇḍaḥ yathā gajendraḥ jagatīm vibhindan
tamāla nīlam sita danta koṭyā kṣmām utkṣipantam gaja-līlayā aṅga prajñāya baddha añjalayaḥ anuvākaiḥ viriñci mukhyāḥ upatasthuḥ īśam
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ jitam jitam te ajita yajña-bhāvana trayīm tanum svām paridhunvate namaḥ yat roma garteṣu nililyuḥ addhayaḥ tasmai namaḥ kāraṇa-sūkarāya te
rūpam tava etat nanu duṣkṛta-ātmanām durdarśanam deva yat adhvara-ātmakam chandāṁsi yasya tvaci barhiḥ romasu ājyam dṛśi tu aṅghriṣu cātuḥ-hotram
srak tuṇḍe āsīt sruvaḥ īśa nāsayoḥ iḍā udare camasāḥ karṇa-randhre prāśitram āsye grasane grahāḥ tu te yat carvaṇam te bhagavan agni-hotram
dīkṣā anujanma upasadaḥ śiraḥ-dharam tvam prāyaṇīya udayanīya daṁṣṭraḥ jihvā pravargyaḥ tava śīrṣakam kratoḥ satya āvasathyam citayaḥ asavaḥ hi te
somaḥ tu retaḥ savanāni avasthitiḥ saṁsthā-vibhedāḥ tava deva dhātavaḥ satrāṇi sarvāṇi śarīra sandhiḥ tvam sarva yajña kratuḥ iṣṭi bandhanaḥ
namaḥ namaḥ te akhila mantra devatā dravyāya sarva-kratave kriyā-ātmane vairāgya bhaktyā ātma-jaya-anubhāvita jñānāya vidyā-gurave namaḥ namaḥ
daṁṣṭra-agra koṭyā bhagavan tvayā dhṛtā virājate bhū-dhara bhūḥ sa-bhūdharā yathā vanāt niḥsarataḥ datā dhṛtā matam-gajendrasya sa-patra padminī
trayī-mayam rūpam idam ca saukaram bhū-maṇḍalena atha datā dhṛtena te cakāsti śṛṅga-ūḍha ghanena bhūyasā kula-acala-indrasya yathā eva vibhramaḥ
saṁsthāpaya enām jagatām sa-tasthuṣām lokāya patnīm asi mātaram pitā vidhema ca asyai namasā saha tvayā yasyām sva-tejaḥ agnim iva araṇau adhāḥ
kaḥ śraddadhīta anyatamaḥ tava prabho rasām gatāyāḥ bhuvaḥ udvibarhaṇam na vismayaḥ asau tvayi viśva vismaye yaḥ māyayā idam sasṛje ativismayam
vidhunvatā veda-mayam nijam vapuḥ janaḥ tapaḥ satya nivāsinaḥ vayam saṭā śikha-uddhūta śiva ambu bindubhiḥ vimṛjyamānāḥ bhṛśam īśa pāvitāḥ
saḥ vai bata bhraṣṭa-matiḥ tava eṣate yaḥ karmaṇām pāram apāra-karmaṇaḥ yat yoga māyā guṇa yoga mohitam viśvam samastam bhagavan vidhehi śam
maitreyaḥ uvāca iti upasthīyamānaḥ asau munibhiḥ brahma-vādibhiḥ salile sva-khura-ākrānte upādhatta avitā avanim
saḥ ittham bhagavān urvīm viṣvaksenaḥ prajā-patiḥ rasāyāḥ līlayā unnītām apsu nyasya yayau hariḥ
yaḥ evam etām hari-medhasaḥ hareḥ kathām su-bhadrām kathanīya māyinaḥ śṛṇvīta bhaktyā śravayeta vā uśatīm janārdanaḥ asya āśu hṛdi prasīdati
tasmin prasanne sakala-āśiṣām prabhau kim durlabham tābhiḥ alam lava-ātmabhiḥ ananya-dṛṣṭyā bhajatām guhā-āśayaḥ svayam vidhatte sva-gatim paraḥ parām
kaḥ nāma loke puruṣa-artha sāra-vit purā-kathānām bhagavat kathā-sudhām āpīya karṇa-añjalibhiḥ bhava-apahām aho virajyeta vinā nara-itaram
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca niśamya kauṣāraviṇā upavarṇitām hareḥ kathām kāraṇa sūkara-ātmanaḥ punaḥ saḥ papraccha tam udyata-añjaliḥ na ca ati-tṛptaḥ viduraḥ dhṛta-vrataḥ
viduraḥ uvāca tena eva tu muni-śreṣṭha hariṇā yajña-mūrtinā ādi daityaḥ hiraṇyākṣaḥ hataḥ iti anuśuśruma
tasya ca uddharataḥ kṣauṇīm sva-daṁṣṭra-agreṇa līlayā daitya-rājasya ca brahman kasmāt hetoḥ abhūt mṛdhaḥ
śraddadhānāya bhaktāya brūhi tat janma vistaram ṛṣe na tṛpyati manaḥ param kautūhalam hi me
maitreyaḥ uvāca sādhu vīra tvayā pṛṣṭam avatāra-kathām hareḥ yat tvam pṛcchasi martyānām mṛtyu-pāśa viśātanīm
yayā uttānapadaḥ putraḥ muninā gītayā arbhakaḥ mṛtyoḥ kṛtvā eva mūrdhni aṅghrim āruroha hareḥ padam
atha atra api itihāsaḥ ayam śrutaḥ me varṇitaḥ purā brahmaṇā deva-devena devānām anupṛcchatām
ditiḥ dākṣāyaṇī kṣattaḥ mārīcam kaśyapam patim apatya-kāmā cakame sandhyāyām hṛt-śaya arditā
iṣṭvā agni jihvam payasā puruṣam yajuṣām patim nimlocati arke āsīnam agni-agāre samāhitam
ditiḥ uvāca eṣaḥ mām tvat-kṛte vidvan kāmaḥ ātta-śarāsanaḥ dunoti dīnām vikramya rambhām iva matam-gajaḥ
tat bhavān dahyamānāyām sa-patnīnām samṛddhibhiḥ prajā-vatīnām bhadram te mayi āyuṅktām anugraham
bhartari āpta-urumānānām lokān āviśate yaśaḥ patiḥ bhavat-vidhaḥ yāsām prajayā nanu jāyate
purā pitā naḥ bhagavān dakṣaḥ duhitṛ-vatsalaḥ kam vṛṇīta varam vatsāḥ iti apṛcchata naḥ pṛthak
saḥ viditvā ātma-jānām naḥ bhāvam santāna bhāvanaḥ trayodaśa adadāt tāsām yāḥ te śīlam anuvratāḥ
atha me kuru kalyāṇam kāmam kamala-locana ārta upasarpaṇam bhūman amogham hi mahīyasi
iti tām vīra mārīcaḥ kṛpaṇām bahu-bhāṣiṇīm pratyāha anunayan vācā pravṛddha anaṅga kaśmalām
eṣaḥ te aham vidhāsyāmi priyam bhīru yat icchasi tasyāḥ kāmam na kaḥ kuryāt siddhiḥ traivargikī yataḥ
sarva āśramān upādāya sva āśrameṇa kalatra-vān vyasana-arṇavam atyeti jala-yānaiḥ yathā arṇavam
yām āhuḥ ātmanaḥ hi ardham śreyaḥ kāmasya mānini yasyām sva-dhuram adhyasya pumān carati vijvaraḥ
yām āśritya indriya arātīn durjayān itara āśramaiḥ vayam jayema helābhiḥ dasyūn durga-patiḥ yathā
na vayam prabhavaḥ tām tvām anukartum gṛha-īśvari api āyuṣā vā kārtsnyena ye ca anye guṇa-gṛdhnavaḥ
atha api kāmam etam te prajātyai karavāṇi alam yathā mām na atirocanti muhūrtam pratipālaya
eṣā ghora-tamā velā ghorāṇām ghora-darśanā caranti yasyām bhūtāni bhūta-īśa anucarāṇi ha
etasyām sādhvi sandhyāyām bhagavān bhūta-bhāvanaḥ parītaḥ bhūta-parṣadbhiḥ vṛṣeṇa aṭati bhūta-rāṭ
śmaśāna cakra-anila dhūli dhūmra vikīrṇa-vidyota jaṭā-kalāpaḥ bhasma avaguṇṭha amala rukma dehaḥ devaḥ tribhiḥ paśyati devaraḥ te
na yasya loke sva-janaḥ paraḥ vā na ati ādṛtaḥ na uta kaścit vigarhyaḥ vayam vrataiḥ yat caraṇa apaviddhām āśāsmahe ajām bata bhukta-bhogām
yasya anavadya ācaritam manīṣiṇaḥ gṛṇanti avidyā paṭalam bibhitsavaḥ nirasta sāmya atiśayaḥ api yat svayam piśāca caryām acarat gatiḥ satām
hasanti yasya ācaritam hi durbhagāḥ sva-ātman ratasya aviduṣaḥ samīhitam yaiḥ vastra mālya ābharaṇa anu lepanaiḥ śva-bhojanam sva-ātmatayā upalālitam
brahma-ādayaḥ yat kṛta setu pālāḥ yat kāraṇam viśvam idam ca māyā ājñā-karī yasya piśāca caryā aho vibhūmnaḥ caritam viḍambanam
maitreyaḥ uvāca sā evam saṁvidite bhartrā manmatha unmathita indriyā jagrāha vāsaḥ brahma-ṛṣeḥ vṛṣalī iva gata-trapā
saḥ viditvā atha bhāryāyāḥ tam nirbandham vikarmaṇi natvā diṣṭāya rahasi tayā atha upaviveśa hi
atha upaspṛśya salilam prāṇān āyamya vāk-yataḥ dhyāyan jajāpa virajam brahma jyotiḥ sanātanam
ditiḥ tu vrīḍitā tena karma avadyena bhārata upasaṅgamya vipra-ṛṣim adhaḥ-mukhī abhyabhāṣata
ditiḥ uvāca na me garbham imam brahman bhūtānām ṛṣabhaḥ avadhīt rudraḥ patiḥ hi bhūtānām yasya akaravam aṁhasam
namaḥ rudrāya mahate devāya ugrāya mīḍhuṣe śivāya nyasta-daṇḍāya dhṛta-daṇḍāya manyave
saḥ naḥ prasīdatām bhāmaḥ bhagavān uru anugrahaḥ vyādhasya api anukampyānām strīṇām devaḥ satī-patiḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca sva-sargasya āśiṣam lokyām āśāsānām pravepatīm nivṛtta sandhyā-niyamaḥ bhāryām āha prajāpatiḥ
kaśyapaḥ uvāca aprāyatyāt ātmanaḥ te doṣāt mauhūrtikāt uta mat nideśa aticāreṇa devānām ca atihelanāt
bhaviṣyataḥ tava abhadrau abhadre jāṭhara-adhamau lokān sa-pālān trīn caṇḍi muhuḥ ākran-dayiṣyataḥ
prāṇinām hanyamānānām dīnānām akṛta-āgasām strīṇām nigṛhyamāṇānām kopiteṣu mahātmasu
tadā viśva-īśvaraḥ kruddhaḥ bhagavān loka-bhāvanaḥ haniṣyati avatīrya asau yathā adrīn śata-parva-dhṛk
ditiḥ uvāca vadham bhagavatā sākṣāt sunābha udāra bāhunā āśāse putrayoḥ mahyam mā kruddhāt brāhmaṇāt prabho
na brahma-daṇḍa dagdhasya na bhūta-bhaya-dasya ca nārakāḥ ca anugṛhṇanti yām yām yonim asau gataḥ
kaśyapaḥ uvāca kṛta-śoka anutāpena sadyaḥ pratyavamarśanāt bhagavati uru mānāt ca bhave mayi api ca ādarāt putrasya eva ca putrāṇām bhavitā ekaḥ satām mataḥ gāsyanti yat yaśaḥ śuddham bhagavat yaśasā samam
yogaiḥ hema iva durvarṇam bhāvayiṣyanti sādhavaḥ nirvaira-ādibhiḥ ātmānam yat śīlam anuvartitum
yat prasādāt idam viśvam prasīdati yat ātmakam saḥ sva-dṛk bhagavān yasya toṣyate ananyayā dṛśā
saḥ vai mahā-bhāgavataḥ mahā-ātmā mahā-anubhāvaḥ mahatām mahiṣṭhaḥ pravṛddha bhaktyā hi anubhāvita āśaye niveśya vaikuṇṭham imam vihāsyati
alampaṭaḥ śīla-dharaḥ guṇa-ākaraḥ hṛṣṭaḥ para-ṛddhyā vyathitaḥ duḥkhiteṣu abhūta-śatruḥ jagataḥ śoka-hartā naidāghikam tāpam iva uḍu-rājaḥ
antaḥ bahiḥ ca amalam abja-netram sva-pūruṣa icchā-anugṛhīta-rūpam pautraḥ tava śrī-lalanā lalāmam draṣṭā sphurat-kuṇḍala maṇḍita ānanam
maitreyaḥ uvāca śrutvā bhāgavatam pautram amodata ditiḥ bhṛśam putrayoḥ ca vadham kṛṣṇāt viditvā āsīt mahā-manāḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca prājāpatyam tu tat tejaḥ para-tejaḥ hanam ditiḥ dadhāra varṣāṇi śatam śaṅkamānā sura-ardanāt
loke tena āhata āloke loka-pālāḥ hata-ojasaḥ nyavedayan viśva-sṛje dhvānta-vyatikaram diśām
devāḥ ūcuḥ tamaḥ etat vibho vettha saṁvignāḥ yat vayam bhṛśam na hi avyaktam bhagavataḥ kālena aspṛṣṭa vartmanaḥ
deva-deva jagat-dhātaḥ lokanātha-śikhāmaṇe pareṣām apareṣām tvam bhūtānām asi bhāva-vit
namaḥ vijñāna-vīryāya māyayā idam upeyuṣe gṛhīta guṇa-bhedāya namaḥ te avyakta yonaye
ye tvā ananyena bhāvena bhāvayanti ātma-bhāvanam ātmani prota bhuvanam param sat asat ātmakam
teṣām su-pakva-yogānām jita śvāsa indriya ātmanām labdha yuṣmat prasādānām na kutaścit parābhavaḥ
yasya vācā prajāḥ sarvāḥ gāvaḥ tantyā iva yantritāḥ haranti balim āyattāḥ tasmai mukhyāya te namaḥ
saḥ tvam vidhatsva śam bhūman tamasā lupta karmaṇām adabhra dayayā dṛṣṭyā āpannān arhasi īkṣitum
eṣaḥ deva diteḥ garbhaḥ ojaḥ kāśyapam arpitam diśaḥ timirayan sarvāḥ vardhate agniḥ iva edhasi
maitreyaḥ uvāca saḥ prahasya mahā-bāho bhagavān śabda-gocaraḥ pratyācaṣṭa ātma-bhūḥ devān prīṇan rucirayā girā
brahmā uvāca mānasāḥ me sutāḥ yuṣmat pūrva-jāḥ sanaka-ādayaḥ ceruḥ vihāyasā lokān lokeṣu vigata-spṛhāḥ
te ekadā bhagavataḥ vaikuṇṭhasya amala-ātmanaḥ yayuḥ vaikuṇṭha-nilayam sarva-loka namaskṛtam
vasanti yatra puruṣāḥ sarve vaikuṇṭha-mūrtayaḥ ye animitta nimittena dharmeṇa ārādhayan harim
yatra ca ādyaḥ pumān āste bhagavān śabda-gocaraḥ sattvam viṣṭabhya virajam svānām naḥ mṛḍayan vṛṣaḥ
yatra naiḥśreyasam nāma vanam kāma-dughaiḥ drumaiḥ sarva ṛtu śrībhiḥ vibhrājat kaivalyam iva mūrtimat
vaimānikāḥ sa-lalanāḥ caritāni śaśvat gāyanti yatra śamala kṣapaṇāni bhartuḥ antaḥ-jale anuvikasat madhu mādhavīnām gandhena khaṇḍita dhiyaḥ api anilam kṣipantaḥ
pārāvata anyabhṛta sārasa cakravāka dātyūha haṁsa śuka tittiri barhiṇām yaḥ kolāhalaḥ viramate acira-mātram uccaiḥ bhṛṅga-adhipe hari-kathām iva gāyamāne
mandāra kunda kuraba utpala campaka arṇa punnāga nāga bakula ambuja pārijātāḥ gandhe arcite tulasikā ābharaṇena tasyāḥ yasmin tapaḥ su-manasaḥ bahu mānayanti
yat saṅkulam hari-pada ānati mātra dṛṣṭaiḥ vaidūrya mārakata hema mayaiḥ vimānaiḥ yeṣām bṛhat kaṭi-taṭāḥ smita śobhi mukhyaḥ kṛṣṇa ātmanām na rajaḥ ādadhuḥ utsmaya-ādyaiḥ
śrī rūpiṇī kvaṇayatī caraṇa-aravindam līlā-ambujena hari-sadmani mukta-doṣā saṁlakṣyate sphaṭika kuḍye upeta hemni sammārjatī iva yat-anugrahaṇe anya yatnaḥ
