sarveṣām eva jantūnām satatam deha-poṣaṇe asti prajñā samāyattā kaḥ viśeṣaḥ tadā nṛṇām labdhvā iha ante manuṣyatvam hitvā deha-ādi asat-graham ātma sṛtyā vihāya idam jīva-ātmā saḥ viśiṣyate
bhaktiḥ kṛṣṇe dayā jīveṣu akuṇṭha-jñānam ātmani yadi syāt ātmanaḥ bhūyāt apavargaḥ tu saṁsṛteḥ
adṛṣṭam dṛṣṭa-vat naṅkṣet bhūtam svapnavat anyathā bhūtam bhavat bhaviṣyat ca suptam sarva rahaḥ-rahaḥ
viduraḥ uvāca ye tvayā abhihitāḥ brahman sutāḥ prācīnabarhiṣaḥ te rudra-gītena harim siddhim āpuḥ pratoṣya kām
kim bārhaspatya iha paratra vā atha kaivalya-nātha priya pārśva-vartinaḥ āsādya devam giri-śam yadṛcchayā prāpuḥ param nūnam atha pracetasaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca pracetasaḥ antaḥ udadhau pituḥ ādeśa-kāriṇaḥ japa-yajñena tapasā puram-janam atoṣayan
daśa-varṣa sahasra-ante puruṣaḥ tu sanātanaḥ teṣām āvirabhūt kṛcchram śāntena śamayan rucā
suparṇa skandham ārūḍhaḥ meru śṛṅgam iva ambudaḥ pīta-vāsāḥ maṇi-grīvaḥ kurvan vitimirāḥ diśaḥ
kāśiṣṇunā kanaka varṇa vibhūṣaṇena bhrājat kapola vadanaḥ vilasat kirīṭaḥ aṣṭa āyudhaiḥ anucaraiḥ munibhiḥ sura-indraiḥ āsevitaḥ garuḍa kinnara gīta kīrtiḥ
pīna āyata aṣṭa bhuja maṇḍala madhya lakṣmyā spardhat śriyā parivṛtaḥ vana-mālayā ādyaḥ barhiṣmataḥ puruṣaḥ āha sutān prapannān parjanya nāda rutayā sa-ghṛṇa avalokaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca varam vṛṇīdhvam bhadram vaḥ yūyam me nṛpa-nandanāḥ sauhārdena apṛthak dharmāḥ tuṣṭaḥ aham sauhṛdena vaḥ
yaḥ anusmarati sandhyāyām yuṣmān anudinam naraḥ tasya bhrātṛṣu ātma-sāmyam tathā bhūteṣu sauhṛdam
ye tu mām rudra-gītena sāyam prātaḥ samāhitāḥ stuvanti aham kāma-varān dāsye prajñām ca śobhanām
yat yūyam pituḥ ādeśam agrahīṣṭa mudā-anvitāḥ atho vaḥ uśatī kīrtiḥ lokān anu bhaviṣyati
bhavitā viśrutaḥ putraḥ anavamaḥ brahmaṇaḥ guṇaiḥ yaḥ etām ātma-vīryeṇa tri-lokīm pūrayiṣyati
kaṇḍoḥ pramlocayā labdhā kanyā kamala-locanā tām ca apaviddhām jagṛhuḥ bhūruhāḥ nṛpa-nandanāḥ
kṣut kṣāmāyāḥ mukhe rājā somaḥ pīyūṣa varṣiṇīm deśinīm rodamānāyāḥ nidadhe saḥ dayā-anvitaḥ
prajā-visarge ādiṣṭāḥ pitrā mām anuvartatā tatra kanyām vara-ārohām tām udvahata mā ciram
apṛthak dharma śīlānām sarveṣām vaḥ su-madhyamā apṛthak dharma śīlā iyam bhūyāt patnī arpita-āśayā
divya varṣa sahasrāṇām sahasram ahata ojasaḥ bhaumān bhokṣyatha bhogān vai divyān ca anugrahāt mama
atha mayi anapāyinyā bhaktyā pakva-guṇa āśayāḥ upayāsyatha mat-dhāma nirvidya nirayāt ataḥ
gṛheṣu āviśatām ca api puṁsām kuśala-karmaṇām mat-vārtā yāta yāmānām na bandhāya gṛhāḥ matāḥ
navya-vat hṛdaye yat jñaḥ brahma etat brahma-vādibhiḥ na muhyanti na śocanti na hṛṣyanti yataḥ gatāḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca evam bruvāṇam puruṣa-artha bhājanam jana-ardanam prāñjalayaḥ pracetasaḥ tat darśana dhvasta tamaḥ rajaḥ malāḥ girā agṛṇan gadgadayā suhṛt-tamam
pracetasaḥ ūcuḥ namaḥ namaḥ kleśa vināśanāya nirūpita udāra guṇa āhvayāya manaḥ vacaḥ vega puraḥ javāya sarva-akṣa mārgaiḥ agata adhvane namaḥ
śuddhāya śāntāya namaḥ sva-niṣṭhayā manasi apārtham vilasat dvayāya namaḥ jagat sthāna laya udayeṣu gṛhīta māyā guṇa vigrahāya
namaḥ viśuddha-sattvāya haraye hari-medhase vāsudevāya kṛṣṇāya prabhave sarva-sātvatām
namaḥ kamala-nābhāya namaḥ kamala-māline namaḥ kamala-pādāya namaḥ te kamala-īkṣaṇa
namaḥ kamala-kiñjalka piśaṅga amala vāsase sarva-bhūta nivāsāya namaḥ ayuṅkṣmahi sākṣiṇe
rūpam bhagavatā tu etat aśeṣa kleśa saṅkṣayam āviṣkṛtam naḥ kliṣṭānām kim anyat anukampitam
etāvat tvam hi vibhubhiḥ bhāvyam dīneṣu vatsalaiḥ yat anusmaryate kāle sva-buddhyā abhadra-randhana
yena upaśāntiḥ bhūtānām kṣullakānām api īhatām antarhitaḥ antaḥ-hṛdaye kasmāt naḥ veda na āśiṣaḥ
asau eva varaḥ asmākam īpsitaḥ jagataḥ pate prasannaḥ bhagavān yeṣām apavarga guruḥ gatiḥ
varam vṛṇīmahe atha api nātha tvat parataḥ parāt na hi antaḥ tvat vibhūtīnām saḥ anantaḥ iti gīyase
pārijāte añjasā labdhe sāraṅgaḥ anyat na sevate tvat-aṅghri mūlam āsādya sākṣāt kim kim vṛṇīmahi
yāvat te māyayā spṛṣṭāḥ bhramāmaḥ iha karmabhiḥ tāvat bhavat-prasaṅgānām saṅgaḥ syāt naḥ bhave bhave
tulayāma lavena api na svargam na apunaḥ-bhavam bhagavat saṅgi saṅgasya martyānām kim uta āśiṣaḥ
yatra īḍyante kathāḥ mṛṣṭāḥ tṛṣṇāyāḥ praśamaḥ yataḥ nirvairam yatra bhūteṣu na udvegaḥ yatra kaścana
yatra nārāyaṇaḥ sākṣāt bhagavān nyāsinām gatiḥ saṁstūyate sat-kathāsu mukta-saṅgaiḥ punaḥ punaḥ
teṣām vicaratām padbhyām tīrthānām pāvana-icchayā bhītasya kim na roceta tāvakānām samāgamaḥ
vayam tu sākṣāt bhagavan bhavasya priyasya sakhyuḥ kṣaṇa saṅgamena suduścikitsyasya bhavasya mṛtyoḥ bhiṣak-tamam tvā adya gatim gatāḥ sma
yat naḥ svadhītam guravaḥ prasāditāḥ viprāḥ ca vṛddhāḥ ca sat-ānuvṛttyā āryāḥ natāḥ su-hṛdaḥ bhrātaraḥ ca sarvāṇi bhūtāni anasūyayā eva yat naḥ su-taptam tapaḥ etat īśa nirandhasām kālam adabhram apsu sarvam tat etat puruṣasya bhūmnaḥ vṛṇīmahe te paritoṣaṇāya
manuḥ svayambhūḥ bhagavān bhavaḥ ca ye anye tapaḥ jñāna viśuddha sattvāḥ adṛṣṭa-pārāḥ api yat mahimnaḥ stuvanti atho tvā ātma-samam gṛṇīmaḥ
namaḥ samāya śuddhāya puruṣāya parāya ca vāsudevāya sattvāya tubhyam bhagavate namaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca iti pracetobhiḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ hariḥ prītaḥ tathā iti āha śaraṇya vatsalaḥ anicchatām yānam atṛpta cakṣuṣām yayau sva-dhāma anapavarga-vīryaḥ
atha niryāya salilāt pracetasaḥ udanvataḥ vīkṣya akupyan drumaiḥ channām gām gām roddhum iva ucchritaiḥ
tataḥ agni mārutau rājan amuñcan mukhataḥ ruṣā mahīm nirvīrudham kartum saṁvartakaḥ iva atyaye
bhasmasāt kriyamāṇān tān drumān vīkṣya pitāmahaḥ āgataḥ śamayām āsa putrān barhiṣmataḥ nayaiḥ
tatra avaśiṣṭāḥ ye vṛkṣāḥ bhītāḥ duhitaram tadā ujjahruḥ te pracetobhyaḥ upadiṣṭāḥ svayambhuvā
te ca brahmaṇaḥ ādeśāt māriṣām upayemire yasyām mahat avajñānāt ajani ajana-yoni-jaḥ
cākṣuṣe tu antare prāpte prāk sarge kāla-vidrute yaḥ sasarja prajāḥ iṣṭāḥ saḥ dakṣaḥ daiva coditaḥ
yaḥ jāyamānaḥ sarveṣām tejaḥ tejasvinām rucā svayā upādatta dākṣyāt ca karmaṇām dakṣam abruvan tam prajā sarga rakṣāyām anādiḥ abhiṣicya ca yuyoja yuyuje anyān ca saḥ vai sarva prajā-patīn
maitreyaḥ uvāca tataḥ utpanna vijñānāḥ āśu adhokṣaja bhāṣitam smarantaḥ ātma-je bhāryām visṛjya prāvrajan gṛhāt
dīkṣitāḥ brahma-satreṇa sarva bhūta ātma-medhasā pratīcyām diśi velāyām siddhaḥ abhūt yatra jājaliḥ
tān nirjita prāṇa manaḥ vacaḥ dṛśaḥ jita-āsanān śānta samāna vigrahān pare amale brahmaṇi yojita ātmanaḥ sura-asura-īḍyaḥ dadṛśe sma nāradaḥ
tam āgatam te utthāya praṇipatya abhinandya ca pūjayitvā yathā ādeśam sukha-āsīnam atha abruvan
pracetasaḥ ūcuḥ su-āgatam te sura-ṛṣe adya diṣṭyā naḥ darśanam gataḥ tava caṅkramaṇam brahman abhayāya yathā raveḥ
yat ādiṣṭam bhagavatā śivena adhokṣajena ca tat gṛheṣu prasaktānām prāyaśaḥ kṣapitam prabho
tat naḥ pradyotaya adhyātma jñānam tattva artha darśanam yena añjasā tariṣyāmaḥ dustaram bhava-sāgaram
maitreyaḥ uvāca iti pracetasām pṛṣṭaḥ bhagavān nāradaḥ muniḥ bhagavati uttama-śloke āviṣṭa ātmā abravīt nṛpān
nāradaḥ uvāca tat janma tāni karmāṇi tat āyuḥ tat manaḥ vacaḥ nṛṇām yena hi viśva-ātmā sevyate hariḥ īśvaraḥ
kim janmabhiḥ tribhiḥ vā iha śaukra sāvitra yājñikaiḥ karmabhiḥ vā trayī proktaiḥ puṁsaḥ api vibudha āyuṣā
śrutena tapasā vā kim vacobhiḥ citta vṛttibhiḥ buddhyā vā kim nipuṇayā balena indriya-rādhasā
kim vā yogena sāṅkhyena nyāsa svādhyāyayoḥ api kim vā śreyobhiḥ anyaiḥ ca na yatra ātma-pradaḥ hariḥ
śreyasām api sarveṣām ātmā hi avadhiḥ arthataḥ sarveṣām api bhūtānām hariḥ ātmā ātma-daḥ priyaḥ
yathā taroḥ mūla niṣecanena tṛpyanti tat skandha bhuja upaśākhāḥ prāṇa upahārāt ca yathā indriyāṇām tathā eva sarva arhaṇam acyuta ijyā
yathā eva sūryāt prabhavanti vāraḥ punaḥ ca tasmin praviśanti kāle bhūtāni bhūmau sthira jaṅgamāni tathā harau eva guṇa-pravāhaḥ
etat padam tat jagat-ātmanaḥ param sakṛt vibhātam savituḥ yathā prabhā yathā asavaḥ jāgrati supta śaktayaḥ dravya kriyā jñāna bhidā-bhrama atyayaḥ
yathā nabhasi abhra tamaḥ prakāśāḥ bhavanti bhū-pāḥ na bhavanti anukramāt evam pare brahmaṇi śaktayaḥ tu amūḥ rajaḥ tamaḥ sattvam iti pravāhaḥ
tena ekam ātmānam aśeṣa dehinām kālam pradhānam puruṣam para-īśam sva-tejasā dhvasta guṇa-pravāham ātma eka-bhāvena bhajadhvam addhā
dayayā sarva-bhūteṣu santuṣṭyā yena kena vā sarva-indriya upaśāntyā ca tuṣyati āśu janārdanaḥ
apahata sakala eṣaṇa amala ātmani aviratam edhita bhāvanā upahūtaḥ nija-jana vaśa gatvam ātmanaḥ ayan na sarati chidra-vat akṣaraḥ satām hi
na bhajati ku-manīṣiṇām saḥ ijyām hariḥ adhana ātma-dhana priyaḥ rasa-jñaḥ śruta dhana kula karmaṇām madaiḥ ye vidadhati pāpam akiñcaneṣu satsu
śriyam anucaratīm tat arthinaḥ ca dvipada-patīn vibudhān ca yat sva-pūrṇaḥ na bhajati nija bhṛtya-varga tantraḥ katham amum udvisṛjet pumān kṛta-jñaḥ
maitreyaḥ uvāca iti pracetasaḥ rājan anyāḥ ca bhagavat-kathāḥ śrāvayitvā brahma-lokam yayau svāyambhuvaḥ muniḥ
te api tat mukha niryātam yaśaḥ loka mala apaham hareḥ niśamya tat pādam dhyāyantaḥ tat-gatim yayuḥ
etat te abhihitam kṣattaḥ yat mām tvam paripṛṣṭavān pracetasām nāradasya saṁvādam hari-kīrtanam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca yaḥ eṣaḥ uttānapadaḥ mānavasya anuvarṇitaḥ vaṁśaḥ priyavratasya api nibodha nṛpa-sattama
yaḥ nāradāt ātma-vidyām adhigamya punaḥ mahīm bhuktvā vibhajya putrebhyaḥ aiśvaram samagāt padam
imām tu kauṣāraviṇā upavarṇitām kṣattā niśamya ajita-vāda sat-kathām pravṛddha bhāvaḥ aśru kalā ākulaḥ muneḥ dadhāra mūrdhnā caraṇam hṛdā hareḥ
viduraḥ uvāca saḥ ayam adya mahā-yogin bhavatā karuṇa-ātmanā darśitaḥ tamasaḥ pāraḥ yatra akiñcana-gaḥ hariḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti ānamya tam āmantrya viduraḥ gaja-sāhvayam svānām didṛkṣuḥ prayayau jñātīnām nirvṛta-āśayaḥ
etat yaḥ śṛṇuyāt rājan rājñām hari arpita-ātmanām āyuḥ dhanam yaśaḥ svasti gatim aiśvaryam āpnuyāt
rājā uvāca priya-vrataḥ bhāgavataḥ ātma-ārāmaḥ katham mune gṛhe aramata yat-mūlaḥ karma-bandhaḥ parābhavaḥ
na nūnam mukta-saṅgānām tādṛśānām dvija-ṛṣabha gṛheṣu abhiniveśaḥ ayam puṁsām bhavitum arhati
mahatām khalu vipra-ṛṣe uttama-śloka-pādayoḥ chāyā nirvṛta cittānām na kuṭumbe spṛhā-matiḥ
saṁśayaḥ ayam mahān brahman dāra āgāra suta ādiṣu saktasya yat siddhiḥ abhūt kṛṣṇe ca matiḥ acyutā
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca bāḍham uktam bhagavataḥ uttama-ślokasya śrīmat-caraṇa-aravinda makaranda rase āveśita cetasaḥ bhāgavata paramahaṁsa dayita kathām kiñcit antarāya vihatām svām śiva-tamām padavīm na prāyeṇa hinvanti
yarhi vāva ha rājan saḥ rāja-putraḥ priyavrataḥ parama bhāgavataḥ nāradasya caraṇa upasevayā añjasā avagata parama-artha sa-tattvaḥ brahma-satreṇa dīkṣiṣyamāṇaḥ avani-tala paripālanāya āmnāta pravara guṇa gaṇa ekānta bhājanatayā sva-pitrā upāmantritaḥ bhagavati vāsudeve eva avyavadhāna samādhi-yogena samāveśita sakala kāraka kriyā-kalāpaḥ na eva abhyanandat yadyapi tat apratyāmnātavyam tat-adhikaraṇe ātmanaḥ anyasmāt asataḥ api parābhavam anvīkṣamāṇaḥ
atha ha bhagavān ādi-devaḥ etasya guṇa-visargasya paribṛṁhaṇa anudhyāna vyavasita sakala jagat abhiprāyaḥ ātma yoniḥ akhila nigama nija-gaṇa pariveṣṭitaḥ sva-bhavanāt avatatāra
saḥ tatra tatra gagana-tale uḍu-patiḥ iva vimāna-āvalibhiḥ anupatham amara parivṛḍhaiḥ abhipūjyamānaḥ pathi pathi ca varūthaśaḥ siddha gandharva sādhya cāraṇa muni-gaṇaiḥ upagīyamānaḥ gandha-mādana droṇīm avabhāsayan upasasarpa
tatra ha vā enam deva-ṛṣiḥ haṁsa-yānena pitaram bhagavantam hiraṇya-garbham upalabhamānaḥ sahasā eva utthāya arhaṇena saha pitā-putrābhyām avahita-añjaliḥ upatasthe
bhagavān api bhārata tat upanīta arhaṇaḥ sūkta vākena atitarām udita guṇa-gaṇa avatāra su-jayaḥ priyavratam ādi-puruṣaḥ tam sa-daya hāsa avalokaḥ iti ha uvāca
śrī-bhagavān uvāca nibodha tāta idam ṛtam bravīmi mā asūyitum devam arhasi aprameyam vayam bhavaḥ te tataḥ eṣaḥ mahā-ṛṣiḥ vahāmaḥ sarve vivaśāḥ yasya diṣṭam
na tasya kaścit tapasā vidyayā vā na yoga vīryeṇa manīṣayā vā na eva artha dharmaiḥ parataḥ svataḥ vā kṛtam vihantum tanu-bhṛt vibhūyāt
bhavāya nāśāya ca karma kartum śokāya mohāya sadā bhayāya sukhāya duḥkhāya ca deha-yogam avyakta diṣṭam janatā aṅga dhatte
yat vāci tantyām guṇa karma dāmabhiḥ su-dustaraiḥ vatsa vayam su-yojitāḥ sarve vahāmaḥ balim īśvarāya protāḥ nasi iva dvi-pade catuḥ-padaḥ
īśa-abhisṛṣṭam hi avarundhmahe aṅga duḥkham sukham vā guṇa-karma saṅgāt āsthāya tat tat yat ayuṅkta nāthaḥ cakṣuṣmatā andhāḥ iva nīyamānāḥ
muktaḥ api tāvat bibhṛyāt sva-deham ārabdham aśnan abhimāna-śūnyaḥ yathā anubhūtam pratiyāta-nidraḥ kim tu anya-dehāya guṇān na vṛṅkte
bhayam pramattasya vaneṣu api syāt yataḥ saḥ āste saha ṣaṭ-sapatnaḥ jita-indriyasya ātma-rateḥ budhasya gṛha-āśramaḥ kim nu karoti avadyam
yaḥ ṣaṭ sapatnān vijigīṣamāṇaḥ gṛheṣu nirviśya yateta pūrvam atyeti durga-āśritaḥ ūrjita-arīn kṣīṇeṣu kāmam vicaret vipaścit
tvam tu abja-nābha aṅghri saroja kośa durga āśritaḥ nirjita ṣaṭ-sapatnaḥ bhuṅkṣva iha bhogān puruṣa atidiṣṭān vimukta saṅgaḥ prakṛtim bhajasva
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti samabhihitaḥ mahā-bhāgavataḥ bhagavataḥ tri-bhuvana guroḥ anuśāsanam ātmanaḥ laghutayā avanata śirodharaḥ bāḍham iti sa-bahu-mānam uvāha
bhagavān api manunā yathāvat upakalpita-apacitiḥ priyavrata-nāradayoḥ aviṣamam abhisamīkṣamāṇayoḥ ātmasam avasthānam avāk-manasam kṣayam avyavahṛtam pravartayan agamat
manuḥ api pareṇa evam pratisandhita manaḥ-rathaḥ sura-ṛṣi-vara anumatena ātma-jam akhila dharā-maṇḍala sthiti guptaye āsthāpya svayam ati-viṣama viṣaya viṣa jala-āśaya āśāyāḥ upararāma
iti ha vāva saḥ jagatī-patiḥ īśvara-icchayā adhiniveśita karma-adhikāraḥ akhila-jagat bandha dhvaṁsana para anubhāvasya bhagavataḥ ādi-puruṣasya aṅghri yugala anavarata dhyāna-anubhāvena parirandhita kaṣāya āśayaḥ avadātaḥ api māna-vardhanaḥ mahatām mahītalam anuśaśāsa
atha ca duhitaram prajāpateḥ viśvakarmaṇaḥ upayeme barhiṣmatīm nāma tasyām u ha vāva ātma-jān ātma-samāna śīla guṇa karma rūpa vīrya udārān daśa bhāvayām babhūva kanyām ca yavīyasīm ūrjasvatīm nāma
āgnīdhra idhma-jihva yajña-bāhu mahā-vīra hiraṇya-retaḥ ghṛtapṛṣṭha savana medhā-tithi vītihotra kavayaḥ iti sarve eva agni nāmānaḥ
eteṣām kaviḥ mahāvīraḥ savanaḥ iti trayaḥ āsan ūrdhva-retasaḥ te ātma-vidyāyām arbha-bhāvāt ārabhya kṛta-paricayāḥ pāramahaṁsyam eva āśramam abhajan
tasmin u ha vā upaśama-śīlāḥ parama-ṛṣayaḥ sakala jīva nikāya āvāsasya bhagavataḥ vāsudevasya bhītānām śaraṇa-bhūtasya śrīmat caraṇa-aravinda avirata smaraṇa avigalita parama bhakti-yoga anubhāvena paribhāvita antaḥ hṛdaya adhigate bhagavati sarveṣām bhūtānām ātma-bhūte pratyak ātmani eva ātmanaḥ tādātmyam aviśeṣeṇa samīyuḥ
anyasyām api jāyāyām trayaḥ putrāḥ āsan uttamaḥ tāmasaḥ raivataḥ iti manu-antara adhipatayaḥ
evam upaśama-ayaneṣu sva-tanayeṣu atha jagatī-patiḥ jagatīm arbudāni ekādaśa parivatsarāṇām avyāhata akhila puruṣa-kāra sāra sambhṛta doḥ-daṇḍaḥ yugala āpīḍita maurvī-guṇa stanita viramita dharma pratipakṣaḥ barhiṣmatyāḥ ca anudinam edhamāna pramoda prasaraṇa yauṣiṇya vrīḍā pramuṣita hāsa avaloka rucira kṣveli-ādibhiḥ parābhūyamāna vivekaḥ iva anavabudhyamānaḥ iva mahā-manāḥ bubhuje
yāvat avabhāsayati sura-girim anuparikrāman bhagavān ādityaḥ vasudhā-talam ardhena eva pratapati ardhena avacchādayati tadā hi bhagavat-upāsanā upacita ati-puruṣa prabhāvaḥ tat anabhinandan samajavena rathena jyotiḥ-mayena rajanīm api dinam kariṣyāmi iti sapta-kṛt vastaraṇim anuparyakrāmat dvitīyaḥ iva pataṅgaḥ
ye vā u ha tat-ratha caraṇa nemi kṛta parikhātāḥ te sapta sindhavaḥ āsan yataḥ eva kṛtāḥ sapta bhuvaḥ dvīpāḥ
jambū plakṣa śālmali kuśa krauñca śāka puṣkara saṁjñāḥ teṣām parimāṇam pūrvasmāt pūrvasmāt uttaraḥ uttaraḥ yathā saṅkhyam dvi-guṇa mānena bahiḥ samantataḥ upakḷptāḥ
kṣāra uda ikṣu-rasa uda surā uda ghṛta uda kṣīra uda dadhi-maṇḍa uda śuddha-udāḥ sapta jala-dhayaḥ sapta dvīpa parikhāḥ iva abhyantara dvīpa samānāḥ eka-ekaśyena yathā-anupūrvam saptasu api bahiḥ dvīpeṣu pṛthak paritaḥ upakalpitāḥ teṣu jambū-ādiṣu barhiṣmatī patiḥ anuvratān ātma-jān āgnīdhra-idhmajihva-yajñabāhu-hiraṇyaretaḥ-ghṛtapṛṣṭha-medhātithi-vītihotra-saṁjñān yathā-saṅkhyena eka-ekasmin ekam eva adhi-patim vidadhe
duhitaram ca ūrjasvatīm nāma uśanase prāyacchat yasyām āsīt devayānī nāma kāvya-sutā
na evam-vidhaḥ puruṣa-kāraḥ uru-kramasya puṁsām tat-aṅghri rajasā jita-ṣaṭ-guṇānām citram vidūra-vigataḥ sakṛt ādadīta yat nāmadheyam adhunā saḥ jahāti bandham
saḥ evam aparimita bala parākramaḥ ekadā tu deva-ṛṣi caraṇa-anuśayana anu patita guṇa-visarga saṁsargeṇa anirvṛtam iva ātmānam manyamānaḥ ātma nirvedaḥ idam āha
aho asādhu anuṣṭhitam yat abhiniveśitaḥ aham indriyaiḥ avidyā racita viṣama viṣaya andha-kūpe tat alam alam amuṣyāḥ vanitāyāḥ vinoda-mṛgam mām dhik dhik iti garhayām cakāra
para-devatā prasāda adhigata ātma-pratyavamarśena anupravṛttebhyaḥ putrebhyaḥ imām yathā-dāyam vibhajya bhukta-bhogām ca mahiṣīm mṛtakam iva saha mahā-vibhūtim apahāya svayam nihita nirvedaḥ hṛdi gṛhīta hari vihāra anubhāvaḥ bhagavataḥ nāradasya padavīm punaḥ eva anusasāra
tasya ha vā ete ślokāḥ priyavrata kṛtam karma kaḥ nu kuryāt vinā īśvaram yaḥ nemi nimnaiḥ akarot chāyām ghnan sapta vāridhīn
bhū-saṁsthānam kṛtam yena sarit giri vana-ādibhiḥ sīmā ca bhūta nirvṛtyai dvīpe dvīpe vibhāgaśaḥ
bhaumam divyam mānuṣam ca mahitvam karma yoga jam yaḥ cakre niraya aupamyam puruṣa anujana priyaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam pitari sampravṛtte tat-anuśāsane vartamānaḥ āgnīdhraḥ jambū-dvīpa-okasaḥ prajāḥ aurasa-vat dharma avekṣamāṇaḥ paryagopāyat
saḥ ca kadācit pitṛloka kāmaḥ sura-vara vanitā ākrīḍā acala-droṇyām bhagavantam viśva-sṛjām patim ābhṛta paricaryā-upakaraṇaḥ ātma eka-agryeṇa tapasvī ārādhayām babhūva
tat upalabhya bhagavān ādi-puruṣaḥ sadasi gāyantīm pūrvacittim nāma apsarasam abhiyāpayām āsa
sā ca tat āśrama upavanam ati ramaṇīyam vividha nibiḍa viṭapi viṭapa nikara saṁśliṣṭa puraṭa latā ārūḍha sthala-vihaṅgama mithunaiḥ procyamāna śrutibhiḥ pratibodhyamāna salila-kukkuṭa kāraṇḍava kala-haṁsa ādibhiḥ vicitram upakūjita amala jala-āśaya kamala-ākaram upababhrāma
tasyāḥ sulalita gamana pada-vinyāsa gati vilāsāyāḥ ca anupadam khaṇa-khaṇāyamāna rucira caraṇa-ābharaṇa svanam upākarṇya naradeva-kumāraḥ samādhi yogena āmīlita nayana nalina mukula yugalam īṣat vikacayya vyacaṣṭa
tām eva avidūre madhukarīm iva sumanasaḥ upajighrantīm divi-ja manu-ja manaḥ nayana āhlāda dughaiḥ gati vihāra vrīḍā vinaya avaloka su-svara-akṣara avayavaiḥ manasi nṛṇām kusuma-āyudhasya vidadhatīm vivaram nija-mukha vigalita amṛta-āsava sa-hāsa bhāṣaṇa āmoda mada-andha madhukara nikara uparodhena druta pada vinyāsena valgu spandana stana kalaśa kabara bhāra raśanām devīm tat-avalokanena vivṛta-avasarasya bhagavataḥ makara-dhvajasya vaśam upanītaḥ jaḍa-vat iti ha uvāca
kā tvam cikīrṣasi ca kim muni-varya śaile māyā asi kāpi bhagavat para-devatāyāḥ vijye bibharṣi dhanuṣī suhṛt ātmanaḥ arthe kim vā mṛgān mṛgayase vipine pramattān
bāṇau imau bhagavataḥ śata-patra-patrau śāntau apuṅkha rucirau ati-tigma-dantau kasmai yuyuṅkṣasi vane vicaran na vidmaḥ kṣemāya naḥ jaḍa-dhiyām tava vikramaḥ astu
śiṣyāḥ ime bhagavataḥ paritaḥ paṭhanti gāyanti sāma sa-rahasyam ajasram īśam yuṣmat śikhā vilulitāḥ sumanaḥ abhivṛṣṭīḥ sarve bhajanti ṛṣi-gaṇāḥ iva veda-śākhāḥ
vācam param caraṇa-pañjara tittirīṇām brahman arūpa mukharām śṛṇavāma tubhyam labdhā kadamba ruciḥ aṅka-viṭaṅka-bimbe yasyām alāta-paridhiḥ kva ca valkalam te
kim sambhṛtam rucirayoḥ dvija śṛṅgayoḥ te madhye kṛśaḥ vahasi yatra dṛśiḥ śritā me paṅkaḥ aruṇaḥ surabhiḥ ātma-viṣāṇe īdṛk yena āśramam su-bhaga me surabhī-karoṣi
lokam pradarśaya suhṛt-tama tāvakam me yatratyaḥ ittham urasā avayavau apūrvau asmat-vidhasya manaḥ-unnayanau bibharti bahu adbhutam sarasa rāsa sudhā-ādi vaktre
kā vā ātma-vṛttiḥ adanāt haviḥ aṅga vāti viṣṇoḥ kalā asi animiṣa unmakarau ca karṇau udvigna mīna-yugalam dvija-paṅkti śociḥ āsanna bhṛṅga-nikaram saraḥ it mukham te
yaḥ asau tvayā kara-saroja hataḥ pataṅgaḥ dikṣu bhraman bhramataḥ ejayate akṣiṇī me muktam na te smarasi vakra jaṭā varūtham kaṣṭaḥ anilaḥ harati lampaṭaḥ eṣaḥ nīvīm
rūpam tapaḥ-dhana tapaḥ caratām tapaḥ-ghnam hi etat tu kena tapasā bhavatā upalabdham cartum tapaḥ arhasi mayā saha mitra mahyam kim vā prasīdati saḥ vai bhava-bhāvanaḥ me
na tvām tyajāmi dayitam dvija-deva dattam yasmin manaḥ dṛk api naḥ na viyāti lagnam mām cāru-śṛṅgi arhasi netum anuvratam te cittam yataḥ pratisarantu śivāḥ sacivyaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti lalanā anunaya ati-viśāradaḥ grāmya-vaidagdhyayā paribhāṣayā tām vibudha-vadhūm vibudha-matiḥ adhisabhājayām āsa
sā ca tataḥ tasya vīra-yūtha-pateḥ buddhi śīla rūpa vayaḥ śriyā audāryeṇa parākṣipta manāḥ tena saha ayuta ayuta parivatsara upalakṣaṇam kālam jambūdvīpa-patinā bhauma svarga bhogān bubhuje
tasyām u ha vā ātma-jān saḥ rāja-varaḥ āgnīdhraḥ nābhi kiṁpuruṣa hari-varṣa ilāvṛta ramyaka hiraṇmaya kuru bhadrāśva ketu-māla saṁjñān nava putrān ajanayat
sā sūtvā atha sutān nava anuvatsaram gṛhe eva apahāya pūrvacittiḥ bhūyaḥ eva ajam devam upatasthe
āgnīdhra-sutāḥ te mātuḥ anugrahāt autpattikena eva saṁhanana bala upetāḥ pitrā vibhaktāḥ ātma-tulya nāmāni yathā-bhāgam jambūdvīpa-varṣāṇi bubhujuḥ
āgnīdhraḥ rājā atṛptaḥ kāmānām apsarasam eva anudinam adhi manyamānaḥ tasyāḥ sa-lokatām śrutibhiḥ avārundha yatra pitaraḥ mādayante
samparete pitari nava bhrātaraḥ meru-duhitṝḥ merudevīm prati-rūpām ugra-daṁṣṭrīm latām ramyām śyāmām nārīm bhadrām deva-vītim iti saṁjñāḥ nava udavahan
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca nābhiḥ apatya-kāmaḥ aprajayā merudevyā bhagavantam yajña-puruṣam avahita-ātmā ayajata
tasya ha vāva śraddhayā viśuddha-bhāvena yajataḥ pravargyeṣu pracaratsu dravya deśa kāla mantra ṛtvik dakṣiṇā vidhāna yoga upapattyā duradhigamaḥ api bhagavān bhāgavata-vātsalyatayā su-pratīkaḥ ātmānam aparājitam nija-jana abhipreta-artha vidhitsayā gṛhīta-hṛdayaḥ hṛdayaṅgamam manaḥ-nayana-ānandana avayava abhirāmam āviścakāra
atha ha tam āviṣkṛta-bhuja-yugala-dvayam hiraṇmayam puruṣa-viśeṣam kapiśa-kauśeya-ambara-dharam urasi vilasat śrīvatsa lalāmam dara-vara vana-ruha vana-mālā acchūri amṛta-maṇi gadā-ādibhiḥ upalakṣitam sphuṭa-kiraṇa pravara mukuṭa kuṇḍala kaṭaka kaṭi-sūtra hāra keyūra nūpura ādi aṅga bhūṣaṇa vibhūṣitam ṛtvik sadasya gṛha-patayaḥ adhanāḥ iva uttama-dhanam upalabhya sa-bahu-mānam arhaṇena avanata śīrṣāṇaḥ upatasthuḥ
ṛtvijaḥ ūcuḥ arhasi muhuḥ arhat-tama arhaṇam asmākam anupathānām namaḥ namaḥ iti etāvat sat upaśikṣitam kaḥ arhati pumān prakṛti guṇa vyatikara matiḥ anīśaḥ īśvarasya parasya prakṛti-puruṣayoḥ arvāktanābhiḥ nāma-rūpa-ākṛtibhiḥ rūpa nirūpaṇam sakala jana-nikāya vṛjina nirasana śivatama pravara guṇa-gaṇa eka-deśa kathanāt ṛte
parijana anurāga viracita śabala saṁśabda salila sita-kisalaya tulasikā dūrvā-aṅkuraiḥ api sambhṛtayā saparyayā kila parama parituṣyasi
atha anayā api na bhavataḥ ijyayā urubhāra-bharayā samucitam artham iha upalabhāmahe
ātmanaḥ eva anusavanam añjasā avyatirekeṇa bobhūyamāna aśeṣa puruṣa-artha sva-rūpasya kintu nātha āśiṣaḥ āśāsānānām etat abhisaṁrādhana mātram bhavitum arhati
tat yathā bāliśānām svayam ātmanaḥ śreyaḥ param aviduṣām parama-parama-puruṣa prakarṣa-karuṇayā sva-mahimānam ca apavarga-ākhyam upakalpayiṣyan svayam na apacitaḥ eva itara-vat iha upalakṣitaḥ
atha ayam eva varaḥ hi arhat-tama yarhi barhiṣi rāja-ṛṣeḥ varada-ṛṣabhaḥ bhavān nija-puruṣa īkṣaṇa-viṣayaḥ āsīt
asaṅga niśita jñāna anala vidhūta aśeṣa malānām bhavat-svabhāvānām ātma-ārāmāṇām munīnām anavarata pariguṇita guṇa-gaṇa parama-maṅgala āyana guṇa-gaṇa-kathanaḥ asi
atha kathañcit skhalana kṣut patana jṛmbhaṇa duravasthāna ādiṣu vivaśānām naḥ smaraṇāya jvara-maraṇa-daśāyām api sakala kaśmala nirasanāni tava guṇa kṛta nāmadheyāni vacana-gocarāṇi bhavantu
kiñca ayam rāja-ṛṣiḥ apatya-kāmaḥ prajām bhavādṛśīm āśāsānaḥ īśvaram āśiṣām svarga-apavargayoḥ api bhavantam upadhāvati prajāyām artha-pratyayaḥ dhana-dam iva adhanaḥ phalīkaraṇam
kaḥ vā iha te aparājitaḥ aparājitayā māyayā anavasita-padavya anāvṛta-matiḥ viṣaya-viṣa raya anāvṛta prakṛtiḥ anupāsita mahat-caraṇaḥ
yat u ha vāva tava punaḥ adabhra-kartaḥ iha samāhūtaḥ tatra artha-dhiyām mandānām naḥ tat yat deva-helanam deva-deva arhasi sāmyena sarvān prativoḍhum aviduṣām
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti nigadena abhiṣṭūyamānaḥ bhagavān animiṣa-ṛṣabhaḥ varṣa-dhara abhivādita abhivandita caraṇaḥ sadayam idam āha
śrī-bhagavān uvāca aho bata aham ṛṣayaḥ bhavadbhiḥ avitatha-gīrbhiḥ varam asulabham abhiyācitaḥ yat amuṣya ātma-jaḥ mayā sadṛśaḥ bhūyāt iti mama aham eva abhirūpaḥ kaivalyāt athāpi brahma-vādaḥ na mṛṣā bhavitum arhati mama eva hi mukham yat dvija-deva-kulam
tataḥ āgnīdhrīye aṁśa-kalayā avatariṣyāmi ātma-tulyam anupalabhamānaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti niśāmayantyāḥ merudevyāḥ patim abhidhāya antardadhe bhagavān
barhiṣi tasmin eva viṣṇu-datta bhagavān parama-ṛṣibhiḥ prasāditaḥ nābheḥ priya-cikīrṣayā tat-avarodhāyane merudevyām dharmān darśayitu-kāmaḥ vāta-raśanānām śramaṇānām ṛṣīṇām ūrdhva-manthinām śuklayā tanuvā avatatāra
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca atha ha tam utpattyā eva abhivyajyamāna bhagavat-lakṣaṇam sāmya upaśama vairāgya aiśvarya mahā-vibhūtibhiḥ anudinam edhamāna anubhāvam prakṛtayaḥ prajāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ devatāḥ ca avani-tala samavanāya atitarām jagṛdhuḥ
tasya ha vā ittham varṣmaṇā varīyasā bṛhat-ślokena ca ojasā balena śriyā yaśasā vīrya-śauryābhyām ca pitā ṛṣabhaḥ iti idam nāma cakāra
yasya hi indraḥ spardhamānaḥ bhagavān varṣe na vavarṣa tat avadhārya bhagavān ṛṣabhadevaḥ yoga-īśvaraḥ prahasya ātma-yoga-māyayā sva-varṣam ajanābham nāma abhyavarṣat
nābhiḥ tu yathā-abhilaṣitam su-prajastvam avarudhya ati-pramoda bhara vihvalaḥ gadgada-akṣarayā girā svairam gṛhīta nara-loka-sadharmam bhagavantam purāṇa-puruṣam māyā vilasita matiḥ vatsa tāta iti sa-anurāgam upalālayan parām nirvṛtim upagataḥ
vidita anurāgam āpaura-prakṛti jana-padaḥ rājā nābhiḥ ātmajam samaya-setu-rakṣāyām abhiṣicya brāhmaṇeṣu upanidhāya saha merudevyā viśālāyām prasanna-nipuṇena tapasā samādhi-yogena nara-nārāyaṇa-ākhyam bhagavantam vāsudevam upāsīnaḥ kālena tat-mahimānam avāpa
yasya ha pāṇḍaveya ślokau udāharanti kaḥ nu tat karma rāja-ṛṣeḥ nābheḥ anu ācaret pumān apatyatām agāt yasya hariḥ śuddhena karmaṇā
brahmaṇyaḥ anyaḥ kutaḥ nābheḥ viprāḥ maṅgala-pūjitāḥ yasya barhiṣi yajña-īśam darśayām āsuḥ ojasā
atha ha bhagavān ṛṣabha-devaḥ sva varṣam karma-kṣetram anumanyamānaḥ pradarśita gurukula-vāsaḥ labdha varaiḥ gurubhiḥ anujñātaḥ gṛha-medhinām dharmān anuśikṣamāṇaḥ jayantyām indra-dattāyām ubhaya-lakṣaṇam karma samāmnāyāmnātam abhiyuñjan ātmajānām ātma-samānānām śatam janayām āsa
yeṣām khalu mahā-yogī bharataḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭha-guṇaḥ āsīt yena idam varṣam bhāratam iti vyapadiśanti
tam anu kuśāvarta ilāvartaḥ brahmāvartaḥ malayaḥ ketuḥ bhadra-senaḥ indra-spṛk vidarbhaḥ kīkaṭaḥ iti nava navati pradhānāḥ
kaviḥ haviḥ antarikṣaḥ prabuddhaḥ pippalāyanaḥ āvirhotraḥ atha drumilaḥ camasaḥ karabhājanaḥ iti bhāgavata-dharma-darśanāḥ nava mahā-bhāgavatāḥ teṣām sucaritam bhagavat-mahimā-upabṛṁhitam vasudeva-nārada-saṁvādam upaśamāyanam upariṣṭāt varṇayiṣyāmaḥ
yavīyāṁsaḥ ekāśītiḥ jāyanteyāḥ pituḥ ādeśakarāḥ mahā-śālīnāḥ mahā-śrotriyāḥ yajña-śīlāḥ karma-viśuddhāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ babhūvuḥ
bhagavān ṛṣabha saṁjñaḥ ātma-tantraḥ svayam nitya nivṛtta anartha paramparaḥ kevala ānanda-anubhavaḥ īśvaraḥ eva viparīta-vat karmāṇi ārabhamāṇaḥ kālena anugatam dharmam ācaraṇena upaśikṣayan a-tat-vidām samaḥ upaśāntaḥ maitraḥ kāruṇikaḥ dharma artha yaśaḥ prajā ānanda amṛta avarodhena gṛheṣu lokam niyamayat
yat yat śīrṣaṇya ācaritam tat tat anuvartate lokaḥ
yadyapi sva-viditam sakala-dharmam brāhmam guhyam brāhmaṇaiḥ darśita-mārgeṇa sāma-ādibhiḥ upāyaiḥ janatām anuśaśāsa
dravya deśa kāla vayaḥ śraddhā ṛtvik vividha-uddeśa upacitaiḥ sarvaiḥ api kratubhiḥ yathā-upadeśam śata-kṛtvaḥ iyāja
bhagavatā ṛṣabheṇa parirakṣyamāṇe etasmin varṣe na kaścana puruṣaḥ vāñchati avidyamānam iva ātmanaḥ anyasmāt kathañcana kimapi karhicit avekṣate bhartari anusavanam vijṛmbhita sneha-atiśayam antareṇa
saḥ kadācit aṭamānaḥ bhagavān ṛṣabhaḥ brahmāvarta-gataḥ brahma-ṛṣi-pravara-sabhāyām prajānām niśāmayantīnām ātmajān avahita-ātmanaḥ praśraya praṇaya bhara su-yantritān api upaśikṣayan iti ha uvāca
ṛṣabhaḥ uvāca na ayam dehaḥ deha-bhājām nṛ-loke kaṣṭān kāmān arhate viṭ-bhujām ye tapaḥ divyam putrakāḥ yena sattvam śuddhyet yasmāt brahma-saukhyam tu anantam
mahat-sevām dvāram āhuḥ vimukteḥ tamaḥ-dvāram yoṣitām saṅgi saṅgam mahāntaḥ te sama-cittāḥ praśāntāḥ vimanyavaḥ suhṛdaḥ sādhavaḥ ye
ye vā mayi īśe kṛta-sauhṛda-arthāḥ janeṣu dehambhara-vārtikeṣu gṛheṣu jāyā ātma-ja rāti matsu na prīti-yuktāḥ yāvat-arthāḥ ca loke
nūnam pramattaḥ kurute vikarma yat indriya-prītaye āpṛṇoti na sādhu manye yataḥ ātmanaḥ ayam asan api kleśa-daḥ āsa dehaḥ
parābhavaḥ tāvat abodha-jātaḥ yāvat na jijñāsate ātma-tattvam yāvat kriyāḥ tāvat idam manaḥ vai karma-ātmakam yena śarīra-bandhaḥ
evam manaḥ karma-vaśam prayuṅkte avidyayā ātmani upadhīyamāne prītiḥ na yāvat mayi vāsudeve na mucyate deha-yogena tāvat
yadā na paśyati ayathā guṇa-īhām sva-arthe pramattaḥ sahasā vipaścit gata-smṛtiḥ vindati tatra tāpān āsādya maithunyam agāram ajñaḥ
puṁsaḥ striyāḥ mithunī-bhāvam etam tayoḥ mithaḥ hṛdaya-granthim āhuḥ ataḥ gṛha kṣetra suta āpta vittaiḥ janasya mohaḥ ayam aham mama iti
yadā manaḥ hṛdaya-granthiḥ asya karma-anubaddhaḥ dṛḍhaḥ āślatheta tadā janaḥ samparivartate asmāt muktaḥ param yāti atihāya hetum
haṁse gurau mayi bhaktyā anuvṛtyā vitṛṣṇayā dvandva titikṣayā ca sarvatra jantoḥ vyasana avagatyā jijñāsayā tapasā īhā-nivṛttyā mat-karmabhiḥ mat-kathayā ca nityam mat-deva-saṅgāt guṇa-kīrtanāt me nirvaira sāmya upaśamena putrāḥ jihāsayā deha geha ātma-buddheḥ adhyātma-yogena vivikta-sevayā prāṇa indriya ātma abhijayena sadhryak sat-śraddhayā brahmacaryeṇa śaśvat asampramādena yamena vācām sarvatra mat-bhāva vicakṣaṇena jñānena vijñāna virājitena yogena dhṛti udyama sattva yuktaḥ liṅgam vyapohet kuśalaḥ aham-ākhyam
karma-āśayam hṛdaya-granthi bandham avidyayā āsāditam apramattaḥ anena yogena yathā-upadeśam samyak vyapohya uparameta yogāt
putrān ca śiṣyān ca nṛpaḥ guruḥ vā mat-loka-kāmaḥ mat-anugraha-arthaḥ ittham vimanyuḥ anuśiṣyāt a-tat-jñān na yojayet karmasu karma-mūḍhān kam yojayan manu-jaḥ artham labheta nipātayan naṣṭa-dṛśam hi garte
lokaḥ svayam śreyasi naṣṭa-dṛṣṭiḥ yaḥ arthān samīheta nikāma-kāmaḥ anyonya-vairaḥ sukha-leśa-hetoḥ ananta-duḥkham ca na veda mūḍhaḥ
kaḥ tam svayam tat-abhijñaḥ vipaścit avidyāyām antare vartamānam dṛṣṭvā punaḥ tam sa-ghṛṇaḥ ku-buddhim prayojayet utpatha-gam yathā andham
guruḥ na saḥ syāt sva-janaḥ na saḥ syāt pitā na saḥ syāt jananī na sā syāt daivam na tat syāt na patiḥ ca saḥ syāt na mocayet yaḥ samupeta-mṛtyum
idam śarīram mama durvibhāvyam sattvam hi me hṛdayam yatra dharmaḥ pṛṣṭhe kṛtaḥ me yat adharmaḥ ārāt ataḥ hi mām ṛṣabham prāhuḥ āryāḥ
tasmāt bhavantaḥ hṛdayena jātāḥ sarve mahīyāṁsam amum sa-nābham akliṣṭa-buddhyā bharatam bhajadhvam śuśrūṣaṇam tat bharaṇam prajānām
bhūteṣu vīrudbhyaḥ uduttamāḥ ye sarīsṛpāḥ teṣu sa-bodha-niṣṭhāḥ tataḥ manuṣyāḥ pramathāḥ tataḥ api gandharva siddhāḥ vibudha-anugāḥ ye deva asurebhyaḥ maghavat-pradhānāḥ dakṣa-ādayaḥ brahma-sutāḥ tu teṣām bhavaḥ paraḥ saḥ atha viriñca-vīryaḥ saḥ mat-paraḥ aham dvija-deva-devaḥ
na brāhmaṇaiḥ tulaye bhūtam anyat paśyāmi viprāḥ kim ataḥ param tu yasmin nṛbhiḥ prahutam śraddhayā aham aśnāmi kāmam na tathā agni-hotre
dhṛtā tanūḥ uśatī me purāṇī yena iha sattvam paramam pavitram śamaḥ damaḥ satyam anugrahaḥ ca tapaḥ titikṣā anubhavaḥ ca yatra
mattaḥ api anantāt parataḥ parasmāt svarga-apavarga-adhipateḥ na kiñcit yeṣām kim u syāt itareṇa teṣām akiñcanānām mayi bhakti-bhājām
sarvāṇi mat-dhiṣṇyatayā bhavadbhiḥ carāṇi bhūtāni sutāḥ dhruvāṇi sambhāvitavyāni pade pade vaḥ vivikta-dṛgbhiḥ tat u ha arhaṇam me
manaḥ vacaḥ dṛk karaṇa īhitasya sākṣāt-kṛtam me paribarhaṇam hi vinā pumān yena mahā-vimohāt kṛtānta-pāśāt na vimoktum īśet
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam anuśāsya ātma-jān svayam anuśiṣṭān api loka-anuśāsana-artham mahā-anubhāvaḥ parama-suhṛt bhagavān ṛṣabha-apadeśaḥ upaśama-śīlānām uparata-karmaṇām mahā-munīnām bhakti jñāna vairāgya lakṣaṇam pāramahaṁsya dharmam upaśikṣamāṇaḥ sva-tanaya śata jyeṣṭham parama-bhāgavatam bhagavat-jana-parāyaṇam bharatam dharaṇi-pālanāya abhiṣicya svayam bhavane eva urvarita śarīra-mātra parigrahaḥ unmattaḥ iva gagana-paridhānaḥ prakīrṇa-keśaḥ ātmani āropita āhavanīyaḥ brahmāvartāt pravavrāja
jaḍa andha mūka badhira piśāca unmādaka vat avadhūta-veṣaḥ abhibhāṣyamāṇaḥ api janānām gṛhīta mauna vrataḥ tūṣṇīm babhūva
tatra tatra pura grāma ākara kheṭa vāṭa kharvaṭa śibira vraja ghoṣa sārtha giri vana āśrama ādiṣu anupatham avanicara-apasadaiḥ paribhūyamānaḥ makṣikābhiḥ iva vana-gajaḥ tarjana tāḍana avamehana ṣṭhīvana grāva-śakṛt rajaḥ prakṣepa pūti-vāta duruktaiḥ tat avigaṇayan eva asat-saṁsthāne etasmin deha-upalakṣaṇe sat-apadeśe ubhaya-anubhava-svarūpeṇa sva-mahima avasthānena asamāropita-aham-mama-abhimānatvāt avikhaṇḍita-manāḥ pṛthivīm eka-caraḥ paribabhrāma
ati-su-kumāra kara caraṇa uraḥ-sthala vipula bāhu aṁsa gala vadana ādi avayava vinyāsaḥ prakṛti sundara sva-bhāva hāsa su-mukhaḥ nava-nalina-dalāyamāna śiśira tāra aruṇa āyata nayana ruciraḥ sadṛśa subhaga kapola karṇa kaṇṭha nāsaḥ vigūḍha-smita vadana mahā-utsavena pura-vanitānām manasi kusuma-śarāsanam upadadhānaḥ parāk avalambamāna kuṭila jaṭila kapiśa keśa bhūri-bhāraḥ avadhūta malina nija-śarīreṇa graha-gṛhītaḥ iva adṛśyata
yarhi vāva saḥ bhagavān lokam imam yogasya addhā pratīpam iva ācakṣāṇaḥ tat pratikriyā karma bībhatsitam iti vratam ājagaram āsthitaḥ śayānaḥ eva aśnāti pibati khādati avamehati hadati sma ceṣṭamānaḥ uccarite ādigdha-uddeśaḥ
tasya ha yaḥ purīṣa surabhi saugandhya vāyuḥ tam deśam daśa yojanam samantāt surabhim cakāra
evam go mṛga kāka caryayā vrajan tiṣṭhan āsīnaḥ śayānaḥ kāka-mṛga-go-caritaḥ pibati khādati avamehati sma
iti nānā yoga caryā ācaraṇaḥ bhagavān kaivalya-patiḥ ṛṣabhaḥ avirata parama mahā ānanda-anubhavaḥ ātmani sarveṣām bhūtānām ātma-bhūte bhagavati vāsudeve ātmanaḥ avyavadhāna ananta rodara bhāvena siddha samasta artha paripūrṇaḥ yoga-aiśvaryāṇi vaihāyasa manaḥ-java antardhāna parakāya-praveśa dūra-grahaṇa ādīni yadṛcchayā upagatāni na añjasā nṛpa hṛdayena abhyanandat
rājā uvāca na nūnam bhagavaḥ ātmārāmāṇām yoga-samīrita jñāna avabharjita karma-bījānām aiśvaryāṇi punaḥ kleśadāni bhavitum arhanti yadṛcchayā upagatāni
ṛṣiḥ uvāca satyam uktam kintu iha vā eke na manasaḥ addhā viśrambham anavasthānasya śaṭha kirātaḥ iva saṅgacchante
tathā ca uktam na kuryāt karhicit sakhyam manasi hi anavasthite yat viśrambhāt cirāt cīrṇam caskanda tapaḥ aiśvaram
nityam dadāti kāmasya chidram tam anu ye arayaḥ yoginaḥ kṛta-maitrasya patyuḥ jāyā iva puṁścalī
kāmaḥ manyuḥ madaḥ lobhaḥ śoka moha bhaya ādayaḥ karma-bandhaḥ ca yat-mūlaḥ svīkuryāt kaḥ nu tat budhaḥ
atha evam akhila-loka-pāla-lalāmaḥ api vilakṣaṇaiḥ jaḍa-vat avadhūta-veṣa-bhāṣā-caritaiḥ avilakṣita-bhagavat-prabhāvaḥ yoginām sāmparāya-vidhim anuśikṣayan sva-kalevaram jihāsuḥ ātmani ātmānam asaṁvyavahitam anartha-antara-bhāvena anvīkṣamāṇaḥ uparata-anuvṛttiḥ upararāma
tasya ha vā evam mukta-liṅgasya bhagavataḥ ṛṣabhasya yoga-māyā-vāsanayā dehaḥ imām jagatīm abhimāna-ābhāsena saṅkramamāṇaḥ koṅka-veṅka-kuṭakān dakṣiṇa karṇāṭakān deśān yadṛcchayā upagataḥ kuṭakācala-upavane āsya kṛta-aśma-kavalaḥ unmādaḥ iva mukta-mūrdhajaḥ asaṁvītaḥ eva vicacāra
atha samīra-vega vidhūta veṇu vikarṣaṇa jāta ugra dāva-analaḥ tat vanam ālelihānaḥ saha tena dadāha
yasya kila anucaritam upākarṇya koṅka-veṅka-kuṭakānām rājā arhat-nāma upaśikṣya kalau adharme utkṛṣyamāṇe bhavitavyena vimohitaḥ sva-dharma-patham akutaḥ-bhayam apahāya ku-patha-pākhaṇḍam asamañjasam nija-manīṣayā mandaḥ sampravartayiṣyate
yena ha vāva kalau manuja-apasadāḥ deva-māyā-mohitāḥ sva-vidhi-niyoga-śauca-cāritra-vihīnāḥ deva-helanāni apavratāni nija-nija-icchayā gṛhṇānāḥ asnāna-anācamana-aśauca-keśa-ulluñcana-ādīni kalinā adharma-bahulena upahata-dhiyaḥ brahma-brāhmaṇa-yajña-puruṣa-loka-vidūṣakāḥ prāyeṇa bhaviṣyanti
te ca hi arvāktanayā nija-loka-yātrayā andha-paramparayā āśvastāḥ tamasi andhe svayam eva prapatiṣyanti
ayam avatāraḥ rajasā upapluta kaivalya-upaśikṣaṇa-arthaḥ
tasya anuguṇān ślokān gāyanti aho bhuvaḥ sapta-samudra-vatyāḥ dvīpeṣu varṣeṣu adhipuṇyam etat gāyanti yatratya-janāḥ murāreḥ karmāṇi bhadrāṇi avatāravanti
aho nu vaṁśaḥ yaśasā avadātaḥ praiyavrataḥ yatra pumān purāṇaḥ kṛta-avatāraḥ puruṣaḥ saḥ ādyaḥ cacāra dharmam yat akarma-hetum
kaḥ nu asya kāṣṭhām aparaḥ anugacchet manaḥ-rathena api abhavasya yogī yaḥ yoga-māyāḥ spṛhayati udastāḥ hi asattayā yena kṛta-prayatnāḥ
iti ha sma sakala veda loka deva brāhmaṇa gavām parama guroḥ bhagavataḥ ṛṣabha-ākhyasya viśuddha ācaritam īritam puṁsām samasta duścarita abhiharaṇam parama mahā maṅgala ayanam idam anuśraddhayā upacitayā anuśṛṇoti āśrāvayati vā avahitaḥ bhagavati tasmin vāsudeve eka-antataḥ bhaktiḥ anayoḥ api samanuvartate
yasyām eva kavayaḥ ātmānam aviratam vividha vṛjina saṁsāra paritāpa upatapyamānam anusavanam snāpayantaḥ tayā eva parayā nirvṛtyā hi apavargam ātyantikam parama-puruṣa-artham api svayam āsāditam no eva ādriyante bhagavadīyatvena eva parisamāpta-sarva-arthāḥ
rājan patiḥ guruḥ alam bhavatām yadūnām daivam priyaḥ kula-patiḥ kva ca kiṅkaraḥ vaḥ astu evam aṅga bhagavān bhajatām mukundaḥ muktim dadāti karhicit sma na bhakti-yogam
nitya-anubhūta nija-lābha-nivṛtta-tṛṣṇaḥ śreyasi a-tat-racanayā cira supta buddheḥ lokasya yaḥ karuṇayā abhayam ātma-lokam ākhyāt namaḥ bhagavate ṛṣabhāya tasmai
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca bharataḥ tu mahā-bhāgavataḥ yadā bhagavatā avani-tala paripālanāya sañcintitaḥ tat-anuśāsana-paraḥ pañcajanīm viśvarūpa-duhitaram upayeme
tasyām u ha vā ātma-jān kārtsnyena anurūpān ātmanaḥ pañca janayām āsa bhūta-ādiḥ iva bhūta-sūkṣmāṇi su-matim rāṣṭra-bhṛtam su-darśanam āvaraṇam dhūmra-ketum iti
ajanābham nāma etat varṣam bhāratam iti yataḥ ārabhya vyapadiśanti
saḥ bahu-vit mahī-patiḥ pitṛ pitāmaha vat uru-vatsalatayā sve sve karmaṇi vartamānāḥ prajāḥ sva-dharmam anuvartamānaḥ paryapālayat
īje ca bhagavantam yajña-kratu-rūpam kratubhiḥ uccāvacaiḥ śraddhayā āhṛta agni-hotra darśa pūrṇamāsa cāturmāsya paśu-somānām prakṛti vikṛtibhiḥ anusavanam cātuḥ-hotra-vidhinā
sampracaratsu nānā-yāgeṣu viracita-aṅga-kriyeṣu apūrvam yat tat kriyā-phalam dharma-ākhyam pare brahmaṇi yajña-puruṣe sarva-devatā-liṅgānām mantrāṇām artha-niyāma-katayā sākṣāt-kartari para-devatāyām bhagavati vāsudeve eva bhāvayamānaḥ ātma-naipuṇya-mṛdita-kaṣāyaḥ haviḥṣu adhvaryubhiḥ gṛhyamāṇeṣu saḥ yajamānaḥ yajña-bhājaḥ devān tān puruṣa-avayaveṣu abhyadhyāyat
evam karma-viśuddhyā viśuddha-sattvasya antaḥ-hṛdaya-ākāśa-śarīre brahmaṇi bhagavati vāsudeve mahā-puruṣa rūpa upalakṣaṇe śrīvatsa kaustubha vana-mālā ari-dara gadā-ādibhiḥ upalakṣite nija-puruṣa-hṛt-likhitena ātmani puruṣa-rūpeṇa virocamāne uccaistarām bhaktiḥ anudinam edhamāna rayā ajāyata
evam varṣa-ayuta-sahasra paryanta avasita-karma-nirvāṇa-avasaraḥ adhibhujyamānam sva-tanayebhyaḥ riktham pitṛ-paitāmaham yathā-dāyam vibhajya svayam sakala-sampat niketāt sva-niketāt pulaha-āśramam pravavrāja
yatra ha vāva bhagavān hariḥ adya-api tatratyānām nija-janānām vātsalyena sannidhāpyate icchā-rūpeṇa
yatra āśrama-padāni ubhayataḥ nābhibhiḥ dṛṣat cakraiḥ cakra-nadī nāma sarit-pravarā sarvataḥ pavitrī-karoti
tasmin vāva kila saḥ ekalaḥ pulaha-āśrama-upavane vividha-kusuma-kisalaya-tulasikā-ambubhiḥ kanda-mūla-phala-upahāraiḥ ca samīhamānaḥ bhagavataḥ ārādhanam viviktaḥ uparata viṣaya-abhilāṣaḥ upabhṛta upaśamaḥ parām nirvṛtim avāpa
tayā ittham avirata puruṣa paricaryayā bhagavati pravardhamāna anurāga bhara druta hṛdaya śaithilyaḥ praharṣa-vegena ātmani udbhidyamāna-roma-pulaka-kulakaḥ autkaṇṭhya pravṛtta praṇaya-bāṣpa-niruddha-avaloka-nayanaḥ evam nija-ramaṇa-aruṇa-caraṇa-aravinda anudhyāna paricita bhakti-yogena paripluta parama āhlāda gambhīra hṛdaya-hrada avagāḍha dhiṣaṇaḥ tām api kriyamāṇām bhagavat saparyām na sasmāra
ittham dhṛta-bhagavat-vrataḥ aiṇeya-ajina-vāsasa anusavana abhiṣeka ardra kapiśa kuṭila-jaṭā kalāpena ca virocamānaḥ sūryarcā bhagavantam hiraṇmayam puruṣam ujjihāne sūrya-maṇḍale abhyupatiṣṭhan etat u ha uvāca
paraḥ-rajaḥ savituḥ jāta-vedaḥ devasya bhargaḥ manasā idam jajāna su-retasā adaḥ punaḥ āviśya caṣṭe haṁsam gṛdhrāṇam nṛṣat riṅgirām imaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ekadā tu mahā-nadyām kṛta-abhiṣeka-naiyamika-avaśyakaḥ brahma-akṣaram abhigṛṇānaḥ muhūrta-trayam udaka-ante upaviveśa
tatra tadā rājan hariṇī pipāsayā jalāśaya-abhyāśam eka eva upajagāma
tayā pepīyamāne udake tāvat eva avidūreṇa nadataḥ mṛga-pateḥ unnādaḥ loka-bhayam-kara udapatat
tam upaśrutya sā mṛga-vadhūḥ prakṛti-viklavā cakita-nirīkṣaṇā sutarām api hari bhaya abhiniveśa vyagra-hṛdayā pāriplava-dṛṣṭiḥ agata-tṛṣā bhayāt sahasā eva uccakrāma
tasyāḥ utpatantyāḥ antarvatnyāḥ uru-bhaya avagalitaḥ yoni-nirgataḥ garbhaḥ srotasi nipapāta
tat-prasava utsarpaṇa bhaya kheda āturā sva-gaṇena viyujyamānā kasyāñcit daryām kṛṣṇa-sārasatī nipapāta atha ca mamāra
tam tu eṇa-kuṇakam kṛpaṇam srotasā anūhyamānam abhivīkṣya apaviddham bandhuḥ iva anukampayā rāja-ṛṣiḥ bharataḥ ādāya mṛta-mātaram iti āśrama-padam anayat
tasya ha vā eṇa-kuṇake uccaiḥ etasmin kṛta-nija-abhimānasya ahaḥ-ahaḥ tat-poṣaṇa pālana lālana prīṇana anudhyānena ātma-niyamāḥ saha-yamāḥ puruṣa-paricaryā-ādayaḥ eka-ekaśaḥ katipayena ahaḥ-gaṇena viyujyamānāḥ kila sarve eva udavasan
aho bata ayam hariṇa-kuṇakaḥ kṛpaṇaḥ īśvara-ratha-caraṇa-paribhramaṇa-rayeṇa sva-gaṇa suhṛt bandhubhyaḥ parivarjitaḥ śaraṇam ca mā upasāditaḥ mām eva mātā-pitarau bhrātṛ-jñātīn yauthikān ca eva upeyāya na anyam kañcana veda mayi ati visrabdhaḥ ca ataḥ eva mayā mat-parāyaṇasya poṣaṇa-pālana-prīṇana-lālanam anasūyunā anuṣṭheyam śaraṇya upekṣā doṣa-viduṣā
nūnam hi āryāḥ sādhavaḥ upaśama-śīlāḥ kṛpaṇa-suhṛdaḥ evaṁ-vidha-arthe sva-arthān api guru-tarān upekṣante
iti kṛta-anuṣaṅgaḥ āsana śayana aṭana snāna āśana-ādiṣu saha mṛga-jahunā sneha-anubaddha hṛdayaḥ āsīt
kuśa kusuma samit palāśa phala-mūla udakāni āhariṣyamāṇaḥ vṛkasālā-vṛka ādibhyaḥ bhayam āśaṁsamānaḥ yadā saha hariṇa-kuṇakena vanam samāviśati
pathiṣu ca mugdha-bhāvena tatra tatra viṣakta-mati praṇaya bhara hṛdayaḥ kārpaṇyāt skandhena udvahati evam utsaṅge urasi ca ādhāya upalālayan mudam paramām avāpa
kriyāyām nirvartyamānāyām antarāle api utthāya utthāya yadā enam abhicakṣīta tarhi vāva saḥ varṣa-patiḥ prakṛti-sthena manasā tasmai āśiṣaḥ āśāste svasti stāt vatsa te sarvataḥ iti
anyadā bhṛśam udvigna-manāḥ naṣṭa-draviṇaḥ iva kṛpaṇaḥ sa-karuṇam ati-tarṣeṇa hariṇa-kuṇaka viraha vihvala hṛdaya santāpaḥ tam eva anuśocan kila kaśmalam mahat abhirambhitaḥ iti ha uvāca
api bata saḥ vai kṛpaṇaḥ eṇa-bālakaḥ mṛta-hariṇī-sutaḥ aho mama anāryasya śaṭha kirāta mateḥ akṛta-sukṛtasya kṛta-visrambhaḥ ātma-pratyayena tat avigaṇayan su-janaḥ iva agamiṣyati
api kṣemeṇa asmin āśrama-upavane śaṣpāṇi carantam deva-guptam drakṣyāmi
api ca na vṛkaḥ sālā-vṛkaḥ anyatamaḥ vā na-eka-caraḥ eka-caraḥ vā bhakṣayati
nimlocati ha bhagavān sakala-jagat kṣema-udayaḥ trayī-ātmā adya api mama na mṛga-vadhū-nyāsaḥ āgacchati
api svit akṛta-sukṛtam āgatya mām sukhayiṣyati hariṇa-rāja-kumāraḥ vividha rucira darśanīya nija mṛga-dāraka vinodaiḥ asantoṣam svānām apanudan
kṣvelikāyām mām mṛṣā samādhinā āmīlita-dṛśam prema-saṁrambheṇa cakita-cakitaḥ āgatya pṛṣat aparuṣa viṣāṇa agreṇa luṭhati
āsādita haviṣi barhiṣi dūṣite mayā upālabdhaḥ bhīta-bhītaḥ sapadi uparata-rāsaḥ ṛṣi-kumāravat avahita karaṇa-kalāpaḥ āste
kim vā are ācaritam tapaḥ tapasvinyā anayā yat iyam avaniḥ sa-vinaya kṛṣṇa-sāra-tanaya tanutara subhaga śiva-tama akhara khura pada-paṅktibhiḥ draviṇa-vidhura-āturasya kṛpaṇasya mama draviṇa-padavīm sūcayanti ātmānam ca sarvataḥ kṛta-kautukam dvijānām svarga-apavarga-kāmānām deva-yajanam karoti
api svit asau bhagavān uḍu-patiḥ enam mṛga-pati-bhayāt mṛta-mātaram mṛga-bālakam sva-āśrama-paribhraṣṭam anukampayā kṛpaṇa-jana-vatsalaḥ paripāti
kim vā ātma-ja viśleṣa jvara dava-dahana śikhābhiḥ upatapyamāna hṛdaya sthala-nalinīkam mām upasṛta-mṛgī-tanayam śiśira-śānta anurāga guṇita nija-vadana-salila amṛta-maya gabhastibhiḥ svadhayati iti ca
evam aghaṭamāna manaḥ-ratha ākula hṛdayaḥ mṛga-dāraka-ābhāsena sva-ārabdha-karmaṇā yoga-ārambhaṇataḥ vibhraṁśitaḥ saḥ yoga-tāpasaḥ bhagavat-ārādhana-lakṣaṇāt ca katham itarathā jāti-antare eṇa-kuṇake āsaṅgaḥ sākṣāt niḥśreyasa pratipakṣatayā prāk parityakta dustyaja hṛdaya-abhijātasya tasya evam antarāya vihata yoga-ārambhaṇasya rāja-ṛṣeḥ bharatasya tāvat mṛga-arbhaka poṣaṇa pālana prīṇana lālana anuṣaṅgeṇa avigaṇayataḥ ātmānam ahiḥ iva ākhu-bilam duratikramaḥ kālaḥ karāla rabhasaḥ āpadyata
tadānīm api pārśva-vartinam ātma-jam iva anuśocantam abhivīkṣamāṇaḥ mṛge eva abhiniveśita-manāḥ visṛjya lokam imam saha mṛgeṇa kalevaram mṛtam anu na mṛta janma-anusmṛtiḥ itara-vat mṛga-śarīram avāpa
tatra api ha vā ātmanaḥ mṛgatva-kāraṇam bhagavat-ārādhana-samīhā anubhāvena anusmṛtya bhṛśam anutapya-mānaḥ āha
aho kaṣṭam bhraṣṭaḥ aham ātma-vatām anupathāt yat vimukta-samasta-saṅgasya vivikta puṇya-araṇya śaraṇasya ātma-vataḥ ātmani sarveṣām ātmanām bhagavati vāsudeve tat anuśravaṇa manana saṅkīrtana ārādhana anusmaraṇa abhiyogena aśūnya sakala-yāmena kālena samāveśitam samāhitam kārtsnyena manaḥ tat tu punaḥ mama abudhasya ārāt mṛga-sutam anu parisusrāva
iti evam nigūḍha nirvedaḥ visṛjya mṛgīm mātaram punaḥ bhagavat-kṣetram upaśama-śīla muni-gaṇa-dayitam śālagrāmam pulastya-pulaha-āśramam kālañjarāt pratyājagāma
tasmin api kālam pratīkṣamāṇaḥ saṅgāt ca bhṛśam udvignaḥ ātma-sahacaraḥ śuṣka-parṇa-tṛṇa-vīrudhā vartamānaḥ mṛgatva-nimitta avasānam eva gaṇayan mṛga-śarīram tīrtha-udaka-klinnam utsasarja
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca atha kasyacit dvija-varasya aṅgiraḥ-pravarasya śama dama tapaḥ svādhyāya adhyayana tyāga santoṣa titikṣā praśraya vidyā anasūya ātma-jñāna-ānanda yuktasya ātma-sadṛśa śruta śīla ācāra rūpa audārya guṇāḥ nava sa-udaryāḥ aṅga-jāḥ babhūvuḥ mithunam ca yavīyasyām bhāryāyām yaḥ tu tatra pumān tam parama-bhāgavatam rāja-ṛṣi pravaram bharatam utsṛṣṭa mṛga-śarīram carama-śarīreṇa vipratvam gatam āhuḥ
tatra api sva-jana-saṅgāt ca bhṛśam udvijamānaḥ bhagavataḥ karma-bandha vidhvaṁsana śravaṇa smaraṇa guṇa-vivaraṇa caraṇa-aravinda yugalam manasā vidadhat ātmanaḥ pratighātam āśaṅkamānaḥ bhagavat-anugraheṇa anusmṛta sva-pūrva janma-āvaliḥ ātmānam unmatta jaḍa andha badhira svarūpeṇa darśayām āsa lokasya
tasya api ha vā ātma-jasya vipraḥ putra-sneha-anubaddha-manāḥ ā-sama-āvartanāt saṁskārān yathā-upadeśam vidadhānaḥ upanītasya ca punaḥ śauca-ācamana-ādīn karma-niyamān anabhipretān api samaśikṣayat anuśiṣṭena hi bhāvyam pituḥ putreṇa iti
saḥ ca api tat u ha pitṛ-sannidhau eva asadhrīcīnam iva sma karoti chandāṁsi adhyāpayiṣyan saha vyāhṛtibhiḥ sa-praṇava-śiraḥ tri-padīm sāvitrīm graiṣma-vāsantikān māsān adhīyānam api asamaveta-rūpam grāhayām āsa
evam sva tanu-je ātmani anurāga-āveśita-cittaḥ śauca adhyayana vrata niyama guru anala śuśrūṣaṇa-ādi aupakurvāṇaka karmāṇi anabhiyuktāni api samanuśiṣṭena bhāvyam iti asat-āgrahaḥ putram anuśāsya svayam tāvat anadhigata-manorathaḥ kālena apramattena svayam gṛhe eva pramattaḥ upasaṁhṛtaḥ
atha yavīyasī dvija-satī sva-garbha-jātam mithunam sapatnyai upanyasya svayam anusaṁsthayā pati-lokam agāt
pitari uparate bhrātaraḥ enam a-tat-prabhāva-vidaḥ trayyām vidyāyām eva paryavasita matayaḥ na para-vidyāyām jaḍa-matiḥ iti bhrātuḥ anuśāsana-nirbandhāt nyavṛtsanta
saḥ ca prākṛtaiḥ dvi-pada-paśubhiḥ unmatta jaḍa badhira mūka iti abhibhāṣyamāṇaḥ yadā tat-anurūpāṇi prabhāṣate karmāṇi ca kāryamāṇaḥ para-icchayā karoti viṣṭitaḥ vetanataḥ vā yācñayā yadṛcchayā vā upasāditam alpam bahu mṛṣṭam kat-annam vā abhyavaharati param na indriya-prīti-nimittam nitya nivṛtta nimitta sva-siddha viśuddha anubhava-ānanda sva-ātma-lābha-adhigamaḥ sukha-duḥkhayoḥ dvandva-nimittayoḥ asambhāvita-deha-abhimānaḥ śīta uṣṇa vāta varṣeṣu vṛṣaḥ iva anāvṛta-aṅgaḥ pīnaḥ saṁhanana-aṅgaḥ sthaṇḍila-saṁveśana anunmardana amajjana rajasā mahā-maṇiḥ iva anabhivyakta brahma-varcasaḥ ku-paṭa-āvṛta kaṭiḥ upavītena uru-maṣiṇā dvi-jātiḥ iti brahma-bandhuḥ iti saṁjñayā a-tat-jña-jana avamataḥ vicacāra
yadā tu parataḥ āhāram karma-vetanataḥ īhamānaḥ sva-bhrātṛbhiḥ api kedāra-karmaṇi nirūpitaḥ tat api karoti kintu na samam viṣamam nyūnam adhikam iti veda kaṇa piṇyāka phalī-karaṇa kulmāṣa sthālī-purīṣa-ādīni api amṛta-vat abhyavaharati
atha kadācit kaścit vṛṣala-patiḥ bhadra-kālyai puruṣa-paśum ālabhata apatya-kāmaḥ
tasya ha daiva-muktasya paśoḥ padavīm tat-anucarāḥ paridhāvantaḥ niśi niśītha-samaye tamasā āvṛtāyām anadhigata-paśavaḥ ākasmikena vidhinā kedārān vīra-āsanena mṛga-varāha-ādibhyaḥ saṁrakṣamāṇam aṅgiraḥ-pravara-sutam apaśyan
atha te enam anavadya-lakṣaṇam avamṛśya bhartṛ-karma-niṣpattim manyamānāḥ baddhvā raśanayā caṇḍikā-gṛham upaninyuḥ mudā vikasita-vadanāḥ
atha paṇayaḥ tam sva-vidhinā abhiṣicya ahatena vāsasā ācchādya bhūṣaṇa ālepa srak tilaka-ādibhiḥ upaskṛtam bhuktavantam dhūpa dīpa mālya lāja kisalaya-aṅkura phala upahāra upetayā vaiśasa-saṁsthayā mahatā gīta-stuti mṛdaṅga paṇava ghoṣeṇa ca puruṣa-paśum bhadra-kālyāḥ purataḥ upaveśayām āsuḥ
atha vṛṣala-rāja-paṇiḥ puruṣa-paśoḥ asṛk-āsavena devīm bhadra-kālīm yakṣyamāṇaḥ tat-abhimantritam asim ati-karāla niśitam upādade
iti teṣām vṛṣalānām rajaḥ tamaḥ prakṛtīnām dhana-mada rajaḥ utsikta manasām bhagavat-kalā vīra-kulam kat-arthī-kṛtya utpathena svairam viharatām hiṁsā-vihārāṇām karma ati-dāruṇam yat brahma-bhūtasya sākṣāt brahma-ṛṣi-sutasya nirvairasya sarva-bhūta-suhṛdaḥ sūnāyām api ananumatam ālambhanam tat upalabhya brahma-tejasā ati-durviṣaheṇa dandahyamānena vapuṣā sahasā uccacāṭa sā eva devī bhadra-kālī
bhṛśam amarṣa roṣa āveśa rabhasa-vilasita bhru-kuṭi viṭapa kuṭila daṁṣṭra aruṇa-īkṣaṇa āṭopa ati bhayānaka vadanā hantu-kāmā iva idam mahā-aṭṭa-hāsam ati saṁrambheṇa vimuñcantī tataḥ utpatya pāpīyasām duṣṭānām tena eva asinā vivṛkṇa śīrṣṇām galāt sravantam asṛk-āsavam ati-uṣṇam saha gaṇena nipīya ati-pāna mada vihvalā uccaiḥ-tarām sva-pārṣadaiḥ saha jagau nanarta ca vijahāra ca śiraḥ-kanduka līlayā
evam eva khalu mahat abhicāra ati-kramaḥ kārtsnyena ātmane phalati
na vā etat viṣṇu-datta mahat adbhutam yat asambhramaḥ sva-śiraḥ-chedane āpatite api vimukta deha-ādi-ātma-bhāva su-dṛḍha hṛdaya-granthīnām sarva-sattva-suhṛt-ātmanām nirvairāṇām sākṣāt bhagavatā animiṣa ari-vara āyudhena apramattena taiḥ taiḥ bhāvaiḥ parirakṣyamāṇānām tat-pāda-mūlam akutaścit bhayam upasṛtānām bhāgavata parama-haṁsānām
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca atha sindhu-sauvīra-pateḥ rahū-gaṇasya vrajataḥ ikṣu-matyāḥ taṭe tat-kula-patinā śibikā-vāha puruṣa-anveṣaṇa-samaye daivena upasāditaḥ saḥ dvija-varaḥ upalabdhaḥ eṣaḥ pīvā yuvā saṁhanana-aṅgaḥ go-khara-vat dhuram voḍhum alam iti pūrva-viṣṭi-gṛhītaiḥ saha gṛhītaḥ prasabham a-tat-arhaḥ uvāha śibikām saḥ mahā-anubhāvaḥ
yadā hi dvija-varasya iṣu-mātra avaloka-anugateḥ na samāhitā puruṣa-gatiḥ tadā viṣama-gatām sva-śibikām rahūgaṇaḥ upadhārya puruṣān adhivahataḥ āha he voḍhāraḥ sādhu atikramata kim iti viṣamam uhyate yānam iti
atha te īśvara-vacaḥ sa-upālambham upākarṇya upāya turīyāt śaṅkita-manasaḥ tam vijñāpayām babhūvuḥ
na vayam nara-deva pramattāḥ bhavat-niyama-anupathāḥ sādhu eva vahāmaḥ ayam adhunā eva niyuktaḥ api na drutam vrajati na anena saha voḍhum u ha vayam pārayāmaḥ iti
sāṁsargikaḥ doṣaḥ eva nūnam ekasya api sarveṣām sāṁsargikāṇām bhavitum arhati iti niścitya niśamya kṛpaṇa-vacaḥ rājā rahūgaṇaḥ upāsita-vṛddhaḥ api nisargeṇa balāt kṛtaḥ īṣat utthita manyuḥ avispaṣṭa brahma-tejasam jāta-vedasam iva rajasā āvṛta matiḥ āha
aho kaṣṭam bhrātaḥ vyaktam uru pariśrāntaḥ dīrgham adhvānam ekaḥ eva ūhivān su-ciram na ati-pīvā na saṁhanana-aṅgaḥ jarasā ca upadrutaḥ bhavān sakhe no eva apare ete saṅghaṭṭinaḥ iti bahu vipralabdhaḥ api avidyayā racita dravya-guṇa-karma-āśaya sva-carama-kalevare avastuni saṁsthāna-viśeṣe aham mama iti anadhyāropita mithyā pratyayaḥ brahma-bhūtaḥ tūṣṇīm śibikām pūrva-vat uvāha
atha punaḥ sva-śibikāyām viṣama-gatāyām prakupitaḥ uvāca rahūgaṇaḥ kim idam are tvam jīvat mṛtaḥ mām kat-arthī-kṛtya bhartṛ-śāsanam aticarasi pramattasya ca te karomi cikitsām daṇḍa-pāṇiḥ iva janatāyāḥ yathā prakṛtim svām bhajiṣyase iti
evam bahu abaddham api bhāṣamāṇam nara-deva-abhimānam rajasā tamasā anuviddhena madena tiraskṛta aśeṣa bhagavat-priya-niketam paṇḍita-māninam saḥ bhagavān brāhmaṇaḥ brahma-bhūta sarva-bhūta-suhṛt-ātmā yoga-īśvara caryāyām na ati-vyutpanna-matim smayamānaḥ iva vigata-smayaḥ idam āha
brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca tvayā uditam vyaktam avipralabdham bhartuḥ saḥ me syāt yadi vīra bhāraḥ gantuḥ yadi syāt adhigamyam adhvā pīvā iti rāśau na vidām pravādaḥ
sthaulyam kārśyam vyādhayaḥ ādhayaḥ ca kṣut tṛṭ bhayam kaliḥ icchā jarā ca nidrā ratiḥ manyuḥ aham madaḥ śucaḥ dehena jātasya hi me na santi
jīvat-mṛtatvam niyamena rājan ādi-anta-vat yat vikṛtasya dṛṣṭam sva-svāmya-bhāvaḥ dhruvaḥ īḍya yatra tarhi ucyate asau vidhi-kṛtya-yogaḥ
viśeṣa-buddheḥ vivaram manāk ca paśyāmaḥ yat na vyavahārataḥ anyat kaḥ īśvaraḥ tatra kim īśitavyam tathāpi rājan karavāma kim te
unmatta matta jaḍa-vat sva-saṁsthām gatasya me vīra cikitsitena arthaḥ kiyān bhavatā śikṣitena stabdha pramattasya ca piṣṭa-peṣaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca etāvat anuvāda-paribhāṣayā pratyudīrya muni-varaḥ upaśama-śīlaḥ uparata anātmya nimittaḥ upabhogena karma-ārabdham vyapanayan rāja-yānam api tathā uvāha
saḥ ca api pāṇḍaveya sindhu-sauvīra-patiḥ tattva-jijñāsāyām samyak-śraddhayā adhikṛta-adhikāraḥ tat hṛdaya-granthi mocanam dvija-vacaḥ āśrutya bahu-yoga-grantha-sammatam tvarayā avaruhya śirasā pāda-mūlam upasṛtaḥ kṣamāpayan vigata-nṛpa-deva-smayaḥ uvāca
kaḥ tvam nigūḍhaḥ carasi dvijānām bibharṣi sūtram katamaḥ avadhūtaḥ kasya asi kutratyaḥ iha api kasmāt kṣemāya naḥ cet asi na uta śuklaḥ
na aham viśaṅke sura-rāja-vajrāt na tryakṣa-śūlāt na yamasya daṇḍāt na agni arka soma anila vitta-pa astrāt śaṅke bhṛśam brahma-kula avamānāt
tat brūhi asaṅgaḥ jaḍa-vat nigūḍha vijñāna-vīryaḥ vicarasi apāraḥ vacāṁsi yoga-grathitāni sādho na naḥ kṣamante manasā api bhettum
aham ca yoga-īśvaram ātma-tattva-vidām munīnām paramam gurum vai praṣṭum pravṛttaḥ kim iha araṇam tat sākṣāt harim jñāna-kalā-avatīrṇam
saḥ vai bhavān loka-nirīkṣaṇa-artham avyakta-liṅgaḥ vicarati api svit yoga-īśvarāṇām gatim andha-buddhiḥ katham vicakṣīta gṛha-anubandhaḥ
dṛṣṭaḥ śramaḥ karmataḥ ātmanaḥ vai bhartuḥ gantuḥ bhavataḥ ca anumanye yathā asatā uda ānayana-ādi abhāvāt sa-mūlaḥ iṣṭaḥ vyavahāra-mārgaḥ
sthāli agni-tāpāt payasaḥ abhitāpaḥ tat-tāpataḥ taṇḍula-garbha-randhiḥ deha-indriya-asvāśaya sannikarṣāt tat-saṁsṛtiḥ puruṣasya anurodhāt
śāstā abhigoptā nṛ-patiḥ prajānām yaḥ kiṅkaraḥ vai na pinaṣṭi piṣṭam sva-dharmam ārādhanam acyutasya yat īhamānaḥ vijahāti agha-ogham
tat me bhavān nara-deva-abhimāna-madena tucchīkṛta sat-tamasya kṛṣīṣṭa maitrī-dṛśam ārta-bandho yathā tare sat-avadhyānam aṁhaḥ
na vikriyā viśva-suhṛt sakhasya sāmyena vīta-abhimateḥ tava api mahat-vimānāt sva-kṛtāt hi mādṛk naṅkṣyati adūrāt api śūla-pāṇiḥ
brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca akovidaḥ kovida-vāda-vādān vadasi atho na ati-vidām variṣṭhaḥ na sūrayaḥ hi vyavahāram enam tattva avamarśena saha āmananti
tathā eva rājan uru-gārha-medha vitāna-vidyā uru vijṛmbhiteṣu na veda-vādeṣu hi tattva-vādaḥ prāyeṇa śuddhaḥ nu cakāsti sādhuḥ
na tasya tattva-grahaṇāya sākṣāt varīyasīḥ api vācaḥ samāsan svapne niruktyā gṛha-medhi-saukhyam na yasya heya-anumitam svayam syāt
yāvat manaḥ rajasā pūruṣasya sattvena vā tamasā vā anuruddham cetobhiḥ ākūtibhiḥ ātanoti niraṅkuśam kuśalam ca itaram vā
saḥ vāsanā ātmā viṣaya-uparaktaḥ guṇa-pravāhaḥ vikṛtaḥ ṣoḍaśa-ātmā bibhrat pṛthak-nāmabhiḥ rūpa-bhedam antaḥ-bahiṣṭvam ca puraiḥ tanoti
duḥkham sukham vyatiriktam ca tīvram kāla-upapannam phalam āvyanakti āliṅgya māyā-racita antaḥ-ātmā sva-dehinam saṁsṛti cakra-kūṭaḥ
tāvān ayam vyavahāraḥ sadā āviḥ kṣetra-jña sākṣyaḥ bhavati sthūla-sūkṣmaḥ tasmāt manaḥ liṅgam adaḥ vadanti guṇa-aguṇatvasya para-avarasya
guṇa-anuraktam vyasanāya jantoḥ kṣemāya nairguṇyam atho manaḥ syāt yathā pradīpaḥ ghṛta-vartim aśnan śikhāḥ sadhūmāḥ bhajati hi anyadā svam padam tathā guṇa-karma-anubaddham vṛttīḥ manaḥ śrayate anyatra tattvam
ekādaśa āsan manasaḥ hi vṛttayaḥ ākūtayaḥ pañca dhiyaḥ abhimānaḥ mātrāṇi karmāṇi puram ca tāsām vadanti ha ekādaśa vīra bhūmīḥ
gandha ākṛti sparśa rasa śravāṁsi visarga rati arti abhijalpa śilpāḥ ekādaśam svīkaraṇam mama iti śayyām aham dvādaśam eke āhuḥ
dravya sva-bhāva āśaya karma kālaiḥ ekādaśa amī manasaḥ vikārāḥ sahasraśaḥ śataśaḥ koṭiśaḥ ca kṣetra-jñataḥ na mithaḥ na svataḥ syuḥ
kṣetra-jñaḥ etāḥ manasaḥ vibhūtīḥ jīvasya māyā-racitasya nityāḥ āvirhitāḥ kvāpi tirohitāḥ ca śuddhaḥ vicaṣṭe hi aviśuddha kartuḥ
kṣetra-jñaḥ ātmā puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ sākṣāt svayam jyotiḥ ajaḥ pareśaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ bhagavān vāsudevaḥ sva-māyayā ātmani avadhīyamānaḥ yathā anilaḥ sthāvara jaṅgamānām ātma-svarūpeṇa niviṣṭaḥ īśet evam paraḥ bhagavān vāsudevaḥ kṣetra-jñaḥ ātmā idam anupraviṣṭaḥ
na yāvat etām tanu-bhṛt narendra vidhūya māyām vayunā udayena vimukta-saṅgaḥ jita-ṣaṭ-sapatnaḥ veda ātma-tattvam bhramati iha tāvat
na yāvat etat manaḥ ātma-liṅgam saṁsāra-tāpa āvapanam janasya yat śoka moha āmaya rāga lobha vaira anubandham mamatām vidhatte
bhrātṛvyam enam tat adabhra-vīryam upekṣayā adhyedhitam apramattaḥ guroḥ hareḥ caraṇa upāsanā-astraḥ jahi vyalīkam svayam ātma-moṣam
rahūgaṇaḥ uvāca namaḥ namaḥ kāraṇa-vigrahāya svarūpa-tucchīkṛta-vigrahāya namaḥ avadhūta dvija-bandhu-liṅga nigūḍha nitya-anubhavāya tubhyam
jvara āmaya ārtasya yathā agadam sat nidāgha-dagdhasya yathā hima-ambhaḥ ku-deha māna ahi vidaṣṭa dṛṣṭeḥ brahman vacaḥ te amṛtam auṣadham me
tasmāt bhavantam mama saṁśaya-artham prakṣyāmi paścāt adhunā su-bodham adhyātma-yoga grathitam tava uktam ākhyāhi kautūhala-cetasaḥ me
yat āha yoga-īśvara dṛśyamānam kriyā-phalam sat vyavahāra-mūlam na hi añjasā tattva-vimarśanāya bhavān amuṣmin bhramate manaḥ me
brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca ayam janaḥ nāma calan pṛthivyām yaḥ pārthivaḥ pārthiva kasya hetoḥ tasya api ca aṅghryoḥ adhi gulpha jaṅghā jānu uru madhyora śiraḥ-dhara aṁsāḥ aṁse adhi dārvī śibikā ca yasyām sauvīra-rājā iti apadeśaḥ āste yasmin bhavān rūḍha nija-abhimānaḥ rājā asmi sindhuṣu iti durmada-andhaḥ
śocyān imān tvam adhi-kaṣṭa-dīnān viṣṭyā nigṛhṇan niranugrahaḥ asi janasya goptā asmi vikatthamānaḥ na śobhase vṛddha-sabhāsu dhṛṣṭaḥ
yadā kṣitau eva cara-acarasya vidāma niṣṭhām prabhavam ca nityam tat nāmataḥ anyat vyavahāra-mūlam nirūpyatām sat-kriyayā anumeyam
evam niruktam kṣiti-śabda vṛttam asat nidhānāt parama-aṇavaḥ ye avidyayā manasā kalpitāḥ te yeṣām samūhena kṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ
evam kṛśam sthūlam aṇuḥ bṛhat yat asat ca sat jīvam ajīvam anyat dravya sva-bhāva āśaya kāla karma nāmnā ajayā avehi kṛtam dvitīyam
jñānam viśuddham parama-artham ekam anantaram tu abahiḥ brahma satyam pratyak praśāntam bhagavat-śabda-saṁjñam yat vāsudevam kavayaḥ vadanti
rahūgaṇa etat tapasā na yāti na ca ijyayā nirvapaṇāt gṛhāt vā na chandasā na eva jala-agni-sūryaiḥ vinā mahat pāda-rajaḥ abhiṣekam
yatra uttama-śloka-guṇa-anuvādaḥ prastūyate grāmya-kathā-vighātaḥ niṣevyamāṇaḥ anudinam mumukṣoḥ matim satīm yacchati vāsudeve
aham purā bharataḥ nāma rājā vimukta dṛṣṭa-śruta saṅga-bandhaḥ ārādhanam bhagavataḥ īhamānaḥ mṛgaḥ abhavam mṛga-saṅgāt hata-arthaḥ
sā mām smṛtiḥ mṛga-dehe api vīra kṛṣṇa-arcana-prabhavā no jahāti atho aham jana-saṅgāt asaṅgaḥ viśaṅkamānaḥ avivṛtaḥ carāmi
tasmāt naraḥ asaṅga su-saṅga jāta jñāna-asinā iha eva vivṛkṇa-mohaḥ harim tad-īhā kathana-śrutābhyām labdha-smṛtiḥ yāti atipāram adhvanaḥ
brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca duratyaye adhvani ajayā niveśitaḥ rajaḥ-tamaḥ-sattva-vibhakta-karma-dṛk saḥ eṣaḥ sa-arthaḥ artha-paraḥ paribhraman bhava-aṭavīm yāti na śarma vindati
yasyām ime ṣaṭ nara-deva dasyavaḥ sa-artham vilumpanti ku-nāyakam balāt gomāyavaḥ yatra haranti sa-arthikam pramattam āviśya yathā uraṇam vṛkāḥ
prabhūta vīrut tṛṇa gulma gahvare kaṭhora daṁśaiḥ maśakaiḥ upadrutaḥ kvacit tu gandharva-puram prapaśyati kvacit kvacit ca āśu-raya ulmuka graham
nivāsa toya draviṇa ātma-buddhiḥ tataḥ tataḥ dhāvati bhoḥ aṭavyām kvacit ca vātyā utthita pāṁsu dhūmrāḥ diśaḥ na jānāti rajaḥ-vala-akṣaḥ
adṛśya jhillī svana karṇa-śūla ulūka vāgbhiḥ vyathita antaḥ-ātmā apuṇya-vṛkṣān śrayate kṣudha arditaḥ marīci-toyāni abhidhāvati kvacit
kvacit vitoyāḥ saritaḥ abhiyāti parasparam ca ālaṣate nirandhaḥ āsādya dāvam kvacit agni-taptaḥ nirvidyate kva ca yakṣaiḥ hṛta asuḥ
śūraiḥ hṛta-svaḥ kva ca nirviṇṇa-cetāḥ śocan vimuhyan upayāti kaśmalam kvacit ca gandharva-puram praviṣṭaḥ pramodate nirvṛta-vat muhūrtam
calan kvacit kaṇṭaka-śarkara aṅghriḥ naga ārurukṣuḥ vimanāḥ iva āste pade pade abhyantara vahninā arditaḥ kauṭumbikaḥ krudhyati vai janāya
kvacit nigīrṇaḥ ajagara-ahinā janaḥ na avaiti kiñcit vipine apaviddhaḥ daṣṭaḥ sma śete kva ca danda-śūkaiḥ andhaḥ andha-kūpe patitaḥ tamisre
karhi sma cit kṣudra rasān vicinvan tat makṣikābhiḥ vyathitaḥ vimānaḥ tatra ati kṛcchrāt pratilabdhamānaḥ balāt vilumpanti atha tam tataḥ anye
kvacit ca śīta-ātapa-vāta-varṣa pratikriyām kartum anīśaḥ āste kvacit mithaḥ vipaṇan yat ca kiñcit vidveṣam ṛcchati uta vitta-śāṭhyāt
kvacit kvacit kṣīṇa-dhanaḥ tu tasmin śayyā āsana sthāna vihāra hīnaḥ yācan parāt apratilabdha-kāmaḥ pārakya-dṛṣṭiḥ labhate avamānam
anyonya vitta-vyatiṣaṅga vṛddha vaira-anubandhaḥ vivahan mithaḥ ca adhvani amuṣmin uru-kṛcchra vitta-bādha upasargaiḥ viharan vipannaḥ
tān tān vipannān saḥ hi tatra tatra vihāya jātam parigṛhya sa-arthaḥ āvartate adya api na kaścit atra vīra adhvanaḥ pāram upaiti yogam
manasvinaḥ nirjita-dik-gajendrāḥ mama iti sarve bhuvi baddha-vairāḥ mṛdhe śayīran na tu tat vrajanti yat nyasta-daṇḍaḥ gata-vairaḥ abhiyāti
prasajjati kvāpi latā-bhuja-āśrayaḥ tat-āśraya avyakta-pada dvija-spṛhaḥ kvacit kadācit hari-cakrataḥ trasan sakhyam vidhatte baka-kaṅka-gṛdhraiḥ
taiḥ vañcitaḥ haṁsa-kulam samāviśan arocayan śīlam upaiti vānarān tat-jāti-rāsena sunirvṛta-indriyaḥ paraspara udvīkṣaṇa vismṛta avadhiḥ
drumeṣu raṁsyan suta-dāra-vatsalaḥ vyavāya-dīnaḥ vivaśaḥ sva-bandhane kvacit pramādāt giri-kandare patan vallīm gṛhītvā gaja-bhītaḥ āsthitaḥ
ataḥ kathañcit saḥ vimuktaḥ āpadaḥ punaḥ ca sa-artham praviśati arim-dama adhvani amuṣmin ajayā niveśitaḥ bhraman janaḥ adya api na veda kaścana
rahūgaṇa tvam api hi adhvanaḥ asya sannyasta-daṇḍaḥ kṛta-bhūta-maitraḥ asat-jita-ātmā hari-sevayā śitam jñāna-asim ādāya tara ati-pāram
rājā uvāca aho nṛ-janma akhila-janma-śobhanam kim janmabhiḥ tu aparaiḥ api amuṣmin na yat hṛṣīkeśa-yaśaḥ kṛta-ātmanām mahā-ātmanām vaḥ pracuraḥ samāgamaḥ
na hi adbhutam tvat-caraṇa-abja-reṇubhiḥ hata-aṁhasaḥ bhaktiḥ adhokṣaje amalā mauhūrtikāt yasya samāgamāt ca me dustarka mūlaḥ apahataḥ avivekaḥ
namaḥ mahadbhyaḥ astu namaḥ śiśubhyaḥ namaḥ yuvabhyaḥ namaḥ ā-vaṭubhyaḥ ye brāhmaṇāḥ gām avadhūta-liṅgāḥ caranti tebhyaḥ śivam astu rājñām
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti evam uttarā-mātaḥ saḥ vai brahma-ṛṣi-sutaḥ sindhu-pataye ātma-sa-tattvam vigaṇayataḥ para-anubhāvaḥ parama-kāruṇikatayā upadiśya rahūgaṇena sa-karuṇam abhivandita-caraṇaḥ āpūrṇa-arṇavaḥ iva nibhṛta karaṇa ūrmi āśayaḥ dharaṇim imām vicacāra
sauvīra-patiḥ api su-jana samavagata paramātma-sa-tattvaḥ ātmani avidyā adhyāropitām ca deha ātma-matim visasarja evam hi nṛpa bhagavat-āśrita-āśrita-anubhāvaḥ
rājā uvāca yaḥ ha vā iha bahu-vidā mahā-bhāgavata tvayā abhihitaḥ parokṣeṇa vacasā jīva-loka-bhava-adhvā saḥ hi ārya-manīṣayā kalpita-viṣayaḥ na añjasā avyutpanna-loka samadhigamaḥ atha tat eva etat duravagamam samaveta-anukalpena nirdiśyatām iti
saḥ ha uvāca saḥ eṣaḥ deha-ātma-māninām sattva-ādi guṇa viśeṣa vikalpita kuśala akuśala samavahāra vinirmita vividha deha-āvalibhiḥ viyoga-saṁyoga-ādi anādi-saṁsāra-anubhavasya dvāra-bhūtena ṣaṭ-indriya-vargeṇa tasmin durga-adhva-vat asugame adhvani āpatitaḥ īśvarasya bhagavataḥ viṣṇoḥ vaśa-vartinyā māyayā jīva-lokaḥ ayam yathā vaṇik sa-arthaḥ artha-paraḥ sva-deha-niṣpādita karma anubhavaḥ śmaśāna-vat aśivatamāyām saṁsāra-aṭavyām gataḥ na adya api viphala bahu-pratiyoga īhaḥ tat-tāpa-upaśa-manīm hari-guru-caraṇa-aravinda madhukara-anupadavīm avarundhe
yasyām u ha vā ete ṣaṭ-indriya-nāmānaḥ karmaṇā dasyavaḥ eva te tat yathā puruṣasya dhanam yat kiñcit dharma-aupayikam bahu-kṛcchra-adhigatam sākṣāt parama-puruṣa-ārādhana-lakṣaṇaḥ yaḥ asau dharmaḥ tam tu sāmparāye udāharanti tat-dharmyam dhanam darśana sparśana śravaṇa āsvādana avaghrāṇa saṅkalpa vyavasāya gṛha grāmya-upabhogena kunāthasya ajita-ātmanaḥ yathā sārthasya vilumpanti
atha ca yatra kauṭumbikāḥ dāra-apatya-ādayaḥ nāmnā karmaṇā vṛka-sṛgālāḥ eva anicchataḥ api kadaryasya kuṭumbinaḥ uraṇaka-vat saṁrakṣyamāṇam miṣataḥ api haranti
yathā hi anuvatsaram kṛṣyamāṇam api adagdha-bījam kṣetram punaḥ eva āvapana-kāle gulma tṛṇa vīrudbhiḥ gahvaram iva bhavati evam eva gṛha-āśramaḥ karma-kṣetram yasmin na hi karmāṇi utsīdanti yat ayam kāma-karaṇḍaḥ eṣaḥ āvasathaḥ
tatra gataḥ daṁśa maśaka sama apasadaiḥ manu-jaiḥ śalabha śakunta taskara mūṣaka-ādibhiḥ uparudhyamāna bahiḥ-prāṇaḥ kvacit parivartamānaḥ asmin adhvani avidyā-kāma karmabhiḥ uparakta-manasā anupapanna-artham nara-lokam gandharva-nagaram upapannam iti mithyā-dṛṣṭiḥ anupaśyati
tatra ca kvacit ātapa-udaka-nibhān viṣayān upadhāvati pāna bhojana vyavāya ādi vyasana lolupaḥ
kvacit ca aśeṣa doṣa niṣadanam purīṣa viśeṣam tat-varṇa-guṇa nirmita-matiḥ suvarṇam upāditsati agni-kāma kātaraḥ iva ulmuka-piśācam
atha kadācit nivāsa pānīya draviṇa ādi aneka ātma-upajīvana abhiniveśaḥ etasyām saṁsāra-aṭavyām itaḥ tataḥ paridhāvati
kvacit ca vātyā aupamyayā pramadayā āroham āropitaḥ tat-kāla-rajasā rajanī-bhūtaḥ iva asādhu-maryādaḥ rajaḥ-vala-akṣaḥ api dik-devatāḥ atirajaḥ-vala-matiḥ na vijānāti
kvacit sakṛt avagata-viṣaya-vaitathyaḥ svayam para-abhidhyānena vibhraṁśita smṛtiḥ tayā eva marīci-toya prāyān tān eva abhidhāvati
kvacit ulūka jhillī svana-vat ati-paruṣa rabhasa āṭopam pratyakṣam parokṣam vā ripu rāja-kula nirbhartsitena ati-vyathita karṇa-mūla-hṛdayaḥ
saḥ yadā dugdha pūrva sukṛtaḥ tadā kāraskara-kākatuṇḍa-ādi apuṇya-druma-latā viṣa-uda-pāna-vat ubhaya-artha-śūnya draviṇān jīvat-mṛtān svayam jīvat mriyamāṇaḥ upadhāvati
ekadā asat-prasaṅgāt nikṛta-matiḥ vyudaka-srotaḥ skhalana-vat ubhayataḥ api duḥkha-dam pākhaṇḍam abhiyāti
yadā tu para-bādhayā andhaḥ ātmane na upanamati tadā hi pitṛ-putra barhiṣmataḥ pitṛ-putrān vā saḥ khalu bhakṣayati
kvacit āsādya gṛham dāva-vat priya-artha-vidhuram asukha-udarkam śoka-agninā dahyamānaḥ bhṛśam nirvedam upagacchati
kvacit kāla-viṣa-mita rāja-kula rakṣasā apahṛta priya-tama dhana asuḥ pramṛtakaḥ iva vigata-jīva-lakṣaṇaḥ āste
kadācit manoratha-upagata pitṛ pitā-maha-ādi asat sat iti svapna-nirvṛti-lakṣaṇam anubhavati
kvacit gṛha-āśrama karma-codana ati-bhara-girim ārurukṣamāṇaḥ loka vyasana karṣita-manāḥ kaṇṭaka-śarkarā-kṣetram praviśan iva sīdati
kvacit ca duḥsahena kāya-abhyantara-vahninā gṛhīta-sāraḥ sva-kuṭumbāya krudhyati
saḥ eva punaḥ nidrā-ajagara gṛhītaḥ andhe tamasi magnaḥ śūnya-araṇye iva śete na anyat kiñcana veda śavaḥ iva apaviddhaḥ
kadācit bhagna-māna-daṁṣṭraḥ durjana-danda-śūkaiḥ alabdha-nidrā-kṣaṇaḥ vyathita-hṛdayena anukṣīyamāṇa vijñānaḥ andha-kūpe andha-vat patati
karhi sma cit kāma-madhu-lavān vicinvan yadā para-dāra para-dravyāṇi avarundhānaḥ rājñā svāmibhiḥ vā nihataḥ patati apāre niraye
atha ca tasmāt ubhayathā api hi karma asmin ātmanaḥ saṁsāra āvapanam udāharanti
muktaḥ tataḥ yadi bandhāt deva-dattaḥ upācchinatti tasmāt api viṣṇu-mitraḥ iti anavasthitiḥ
kvacit ca śīta-vāta-ādi aneka adhidaivika bhautika ātmīyānām daśānām pratinivāraṇe akalpaḥ duranta cintayā viṣaṇṇaḥ āste
kvacit mithaḥ vyavaharan yat kiñcit dhanam anyebhyaḥ vā kākiṇikā-mātram api apaharan yat kiñcit vā vidveṣam eti vitta-śāṭhyāt
adhvani amuṣmin ime upasargāḥ tathā sukha duḥkha rāga dveṣa bhaya abhimāna pramāda unmāda śoka moha lobha mātsarya īrṣya avamāna kṣut pipāsā ādhi vyādhi janma jarā maraṇa ādayaḥ
kvāpi deva-māyayā striyā bhuja-latā upagūḍhaḥ praskanna viveka vijñānaḥ yat-vihāra gṛha-ārambha ākula-hṛdayaḥ tat āśraya-avasakta suta duhitṛ kalatra bhāṣita-avaloka viceṣṭita apahṛta-hṛdayaḥ ātmānam ajita ātmā apāre andhe tamasi prahiṇoti
kadācit īśvarasya bhagavataḥ viṣṇoḥ cakrāt paramāṇu-ādi dvi-parārdha apavarga kāla upalakṣaṇāt parivartitena vayasā raṁhasā harataḥ ā-brahma tṛṇa-stamba-ādīnām bhūtānām animiṣataḥ miṣatām vitrasta-hṛdayaḥ tam eva īśvaram kāla-cakra-nija-āyudham sākṣāt bhagavantam yajña-puruṣam anādṛtya pākhaṇḍa-devatāḥ kaṅka gṛdhra baka vaṭa-prāyāḥ ārya-samaya-parihṛtāḥ sāṅketyena abhidhatte
yadā pākhaṇḍibhiḥ ātma-vañcitaiḥ taiḥ uru vañcitaḥ brahma-kulam samāvasan teṣām śīlam upanayana-ādi śrauta smārta karma-anuṣṭhānena bhagavataḥ yajña-puruṣasya ārādhanam eva tat arocayan śūdra-kulam bhajate nigama-ācāre aśuddhitaḥ yasya mithunī-bhāvaḥ kuṭumba-bharaṇam yathā vānara-jāteḥ
tatra api niravarodhaḥ svaireṇa viharan ati-kṛpaṇa-buddhiḥ anyonya mukha-nirīkṣaṇa-ādinā grāmya-karmaṇā eva vismṛta kāla-avadhiḥ
kvacit druma-vat aihika-artheṣu gṛheṣu raṁsyan yathā vānaraḥ suta-dāra-vatsalaḥ vyavāya-kṣaṇaḥ
evam adhvani avarundhānaḥ mṛtyu-gaja-bhayāt tamasi giri-kandara-prāye
kvacit śīta-vāta-ādi aneka daivika bhautika ātmīyānām duḥkhānām pratinivāraṇe akalpaḥ duranta viṣaya viṣaṇṇaḥ āste
kvacit mithaḥ vyavaharan yat kiñcit dhanam upayāti vitta-śāṭhyena
kvacit kṣīṇa-dhanaḥ śayyā-āsana-aśana-ādi upabhoga vihīnaḥ yāvat apratilabdha manoratha upagata ādāne avasita-matiḥ tataḥ tataḥ avamāna-ādīni janāt abhilabhate
evam vitta-vyatiṣaṅga vivṛddha vaira-anubandhaḥ api pūrva-vāsanayā mithaḥ udvahati atha apavahati
etasmin saṁsāra adhvani nānā kleśa upasarga bādhitaḥ āpanna vipannaḥ yatra yaḥ tam u ha vāva itaraḥ tatra visṛjya jātam jātam upādāya śocan muhyan bibhyat vivadan krandan saṁhṛṣyan gāyan nahyamānaḥ sādhu-varjitaḥ na eva āvartate adya api yataḥ ārabdhaḥ eṣaḥ nara-loka sa-arthaḥ yam adhvanaḥ pāram upadiśanti
yat idam yoga-anuśāsanam na vā etat avarundhate yat nyasta-daṇḍāḥ munayaḥ upaśama-śīlāḥ uparata-ātmānaḥ samavagacchanti
yat api dik-ibha-jayinaḥ yajvinaḥ ye vai rāja-ṛṣayaḥ kim tu param mṛdhe śayīran asyām eva mama iyam iti kṛta vaira-anu-bandhāyām visṛjya svayam upasaṁhṛtāḥ
karma-vallīm avalambya tataḥ āpadaḥ kathañcit narakāt vimuktaḥ punaḥ api evam saṁsāra-adhvani vartamānaḥ nara-loka-sa-artham upayāti evam upari gataḥ api
tasya idam upagāyanti ārṣabhasya iha rāja-ṛṣeḥ manasā api mahā-ātmanaḥ na anuvartma arhati nṛpaḥ makṣikā iva garutmataḥ
yaḥ dustyajān dāra-sutān suhṛt rājyam hṛdi-spṛśaḥ jahau yuvā eva mala-vat uttama-śloka-lālasaḥ
yaḥ dustyajān kṣiti suta sva-jana-artha-dārān prārthyām śriyam sura-varaiḥ sa-daya-avalokām na aicchat nṛpaḥ tat-ucitam mahatām madhu-dviṭ sevā-anurakta manasām abhavaḥ api phalguḥ
yajñāya dharma-pataye vidhi-naipuṇāya yogāya sāṅkhya-śirase prakṛti-īśvarāya nārāyaṇāya haraye namaḥ iti udāram hāsyan mṛgatvam api yaḥ samudājahāra
yaḥ idam bhāgavata sabhājita avadāta guṇa karmaṇaḥ rāja-ṛṣeḥ bharatasya anucaritam svasti-ayanam āyuṣyam dhanyam yaśasyam svargya apavargyam vā anuśṛṇoti ākhyāsyati abhinandati ca sarvāḥ eva āśiṣaḥ ātmanaḥ āśāste na kāñcana parataḥ iti
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca bharatasya ātma-jaḥ sumatiḥ nāma-abhihitaḥ yam u ha vāva kecit pākhaṇḍinaḥ ṛṣabha-padavīm anuvartamānam ca anāryāḥ aveda-samāmnātām devatām sva-manīṣayā pāpīyasyā kalau kalpayiṣyanti
tasmāt vṛddha-senāyām devatājit-nāma putraḥ abhavat
atha āsuryām tat-tanayaḥ deva-dyumnaḥ tataḥ dhenu-matyām sutaḥ parameṣṭhī tasya suvarcalāyām pratīhaḥ upajātaḥ
yaḥ ātma-vidyām ākhyāya svayam saṁśuddhaḥ mahā-puruṣam anusasmāra
pratīhāt suvarcalāyām pratihartṛ-ādayaḥ trayaḥ āsan ijyā-kovidāḥ sūnavaḥ pratihartuḥ stutyām aja-bhūmānau ajaniṣātām
bhūmnaḥ ṛṣi-kulyāyām udgīthaḥ tataḥ prastāvaḥ deva-kulyāyām prastāvāt niyutsāyām hṛdaya-jaḥ āsīt vibhuḥ vibhoḥ ratyām ca pṛthu-ṣeṇaḥ tasmāt naktaḥ ākūtyām jajñe naktāt druti-putraḥ gayaḥ rāja-ṛṣi-pravaraḥ udāra-śravāḥ ajāyata sākṣāt bhagavataḥ viṣṇoḥ jagat-rirak-ṣiṣayā gṛhīta sattvasya kalā-ātma-vattva-ādi lakṣaṇena mahā-puruṣatām prāptaḥ
saḥ vai sva-dharmeṇa prajā-pālana poṣaṇa prīṇana upalālana anuśāsana lakṣaṇena ijyā-ādinā ca bhagavati mahā-puruṣe para-avare brahmaṇi sarva-ātmanā arpita parama-artha-lakṣaṇena brahma-vit caraṇa-anusevayā āpādita bhagavat-bhakti-yogena ca abhīkṣṇaśaḥ paribhāvita ati-śuddha-matiḥ uparata-anātmye ātmani svayam upalabhyamāna brahma-ātma-anubhavaḥ api nirabhimānaḥ eva avanim ajūgupat
tasya imām gāthām pāṇḍaveya purā-vidaḥ upagāyanti
gayam nṛpaḥ kaḥ pratiyāti karmabhiḥ yajvā abhimānī bahu-vit dharma-goptā samāgata-śrīḥ sadasaḥ-patiḥ satām sat-sevakaḥ anyaḥ bhagavat-kalām ṛte
yam abhyaṣiñcan parayā mudā satīḥ satya āśiṣaḥ dakṣa-kanyāḥ saridbhiḥ yasya prajānām duduhe dharā āśiṣaḥ nirāśiṣaḥ guṇa-vatsa-snuta-udhāḥ
chandāṁsi akāmasya ca yasya kāmān dudūhuḥ ājahruḥ atho balim nṛpāḥ pratyañcitāḥ yudhi dharmeṇa viprāḥ yadā āśiṣām ṣaṣṭham aṁśam paretya
yasya adhvare bhagavān adhvara-ātmā maghoni mādyati uru soma-pīthe śraddhā viśuddha acala bhakti-yoga samarpita ijyā phalam ājahāra
yat-prīṇanāt barhiṣi deva-tiryak manuṣya vīrut tṛṇam ā-viriñcāt prīyeta sadyaḥ saḥ ha viśva-jīvaḥ prītaḥ svayam prītim agāt gayasya
gayāt gayantyām citra-rathaḥ sugatiḥ avarodhanaḥ iti trayaḥ putrāḥ babhūvuḥ citrarathāt ūrṇāyām samrāṭ ajaniṣṭa tataḥ utkalāyām marīciḥ marīceḥ bindu-matyām bindum ānudapadyata tasmāt saraghāyām madhuḥ nāma abhavat madhoḥ sumanasi vīra-vrataḥ tataḥ bhojāyām manthu-pramanthū jajñāte manthoḥ satyāyām bhauvanaḥ tataḥ dūṣaṇāyām tvaṣṭā ajaniṣṭa tvaṣṭuḥ virocanāyām virajaḥ virajasya śatajit-pravaram putra-śatam kanyā ca viṣūcyām kila jātam
tatra ayam ślokaḥ praiyavratam vaṁśam imam virajaḥ carama-udbhavaḥ akarot ati-alam kīrtyā viṣṇuḥ sura-gaṇam yathā
rājā uvāca uktaḥ tvayā bhū-maṇḍala āyāma-viśeṣaḥ yāvat ādityaḥ tapati yatra ca asau jyotiṣām gaṇaiḥ candramā vā saha dṛśyate
tatra api priyavrata-ratha-caraṇa-parikhātaiḥ saptabhiḥ sapta sindhavaḥ upakḷptāḥ yataḥ etasyāḥ sapta-dvīpa viśeṣa-vikalpaḥ tvayā bhagavan khalu sūcitaḥ etat eva akhilam aham mānataḥ lakṣaṇataḥ ca sarvam vijijñāsāmi
bhagavataḥ guṇa-maye sthūla-rūpe āveśitam manaḥ hi aguṇe api sūkṣmatame ātma-jyotiṣi pare brahmaṇi bhagavati vāsudeva-ākhye kṣamam āveśitum tat u ha etat guro arhasi anuvarṇayitum iti
ṛṣiḥ uvāca na vai mahā-rāja bhagavataḥ māyā-guṇa-vibhūteḥ kāṣṭhām manasā vacasā vā adhigantum alam vibudha-āyuṣā api puruṣaḥ tasmāt prādhānyena eva bhū-golaka-viśeṣam nāma-rūpa māna lakṣaṇataḥ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ
yaḥ vā ayam dvīpaḥ kuvalaya kamala-kośa abhyantara kośaḥ niyuta-yojana-viśālaḥ samavartulaḥ yathā puṣkara-patram
yasmin nava varṣāṇi nava-yojana-sahasra āyāmāni aṣṭabhiḥ maryādā giribhiḥ suvibhaktāni bhavanti
eṣām madhye ilāvṛtam nāma abhyantara-varṣam yasya nābhyām avasthitaḥ sarvataḥ sauvarṇaḥ kula-giri-rājaḥ meruḥ dvīpa-āyāma-samunnāhaḥ karṇikā-bhūtaḥ kuvalaya kamalasya mūrdhani dvā-triṁśat sahasra yojana vitataḥ mūle ṣoḍaśa-sahasram tāvat āntaḥ-bhūmyām praviṣṭaḥ
uttara-uttareṇa ilāvṛtam nīlaḥ śvetaḥ śṛṅgavān iti trayaḥ ramyaka hiraṇmaya kurūṇām varṣāṇām maryādā-girayaḥ prāk-āyatāḥ ubhayataḥ kṣāroda avadhayaḥ dvi-sahasra-pṛthavaḥ eka-ekaśaḥ pūrvasmāt pūrvasmāt uttaraḥ uttaraḥ daśa-aṁśa-adhika-aṁśena dairghyaḥ eva hrasanti
evam dakṣiṇena ilāvṛtam niṣadhaḥ hema-kūṭaḥ himālayaḥ iti prāk-āyatāḥ yathā nīla-ādayaḥ ayuta-yojana-utsedhāḥ hari-varṣa kimpuruṣa bhāratānām yathā-saṅkhyam
tathā eva ilāvṛtam apareṇa pūrveṇa ca mālyavad-gandha-mādanau ā-nīla-niṣadha-āyatau dvi-sahasram paprathatuḥ ketumāla-bhadrāśvayoḥ sīmānam vidadhāte
mandaraḥ meru-mandaraḥ supārśvaḥ kumudaḥ iti ayuta-yojana-vistāra-unnāhāḥ meroḥ catuḥ-diśam avaṣṭambha-girayaḥ upakḷptāḥ
caturṣu eteṣu cūta-jambū-kadamba nyagrodhāḥ catvāraḥ pādapa-pravarāḥ parvata-ketavaḥ iva adhi sahasra-yojana-unnāhāḥ tāvat viṭapa-vitatayaḥ śata-yojana pariṇāhāḥ
hradāḥ catvāraḥ payaḥ madhu ikṣu-rasa mṛṣṭa-jalāḥ yat upasparśinaḥ upadeva-gaṇāḥ yoga-aiśvaryāṇi svābhāvikāni bharata-ṛṣabha dhārayanti deva-udyānāni ca bhavanti catvāri nandanam caitra-ratham vaibhrājakam sarvataḥ-bhadram iti
yeṣu amara-parivṛḍhāḥ saha sura-lalanā lalāma yūtha-patayaḥ upadeva-gaṇaiḥ upagīyamāna mahimānaḥ kila viharanti
mandara-utsaṅge ekādaśa-śata-yojana-uttuṅga devacūta-śirasaḥ giri-śikhara-sthūlāni phalāni amṛta-kalpāni patanti
teṣām viśīryamāṇānām ati-madhura surabhi sugandhi bahula aruṇa-rasa-udena aruṇodā nāma nadī mandara-giri-śikharāt nipatantī pūrveṇa ilāvṛtam upaplāvayati
yat upajoṣaṇāt bhavānyāḥ anucarīṇām puṇya-jana-vadhūnām avayava sparśa sugandha-vātaḥ daśa-yojanam samantāt anuvāsayati
evam jambū-phalānām ati-ucca-nipāta viśīrṇānām anasthi-prāyāṇām ibha-kāya-nibhānām rasena jambū nāma nadī meru-mandara-śikharāt ayuta-yojanāt avani-tale nipatantī dakṣiṇena ātmānam yāvat ilāvṛtam upasyandayati
tāvat ubhayoḥ api rodhasoḥ yā mṛttikā tat-rasena anuvidhyamānā vāyu-arka-saṁyoga-vipākena sadā amara-loka-ābharaṇam jāmbū-nadam nāma suvarṇam bhavati yat u ha vāva vibudha-ādayaḥ saha yuvatibhiḥ mukuṭa kaṭaka kaṭi-sūtra ādi ābharaṇa rūpeṇa khalu dhārayanti
yaḥ tu mahā-kadambaḥ supārśva-nirūḍhaḥ yāḥ tasya koṭarebhyaḥ viniḥsṛtāḥ pañca āyāma pariṇāhāḥ pañca madhu-dhārāḥ supārśva-śikharāt patantyaḥ apareṇa ātmānam ilāvṛtam anumodayanti
yāḥ hi upayuñjānānām mukha-nirvāsitaḥ vāyuḥ samantāt śata-yojanam anuvāsayati
evam kumuda-nirūḍhaḥ yaḥ śata-valśaḥ nāma vaṭaḥ tasya skandhebhyaḥ nīcīnāḥ payaḥ dadhi madhu ghṛta guḍa anna ādi ambara śayyā āsana ābharaṇa-ādayaḥ sarve eva kāma-dughāḥ nadāḥ kumuda-agrāt patantaḥ tam uttareṇa ilāvṛtam upayojayanti
yān upajuṣāṇānām na kadācit api prajānām valī palita klama sveda daurgandhya jarā āmaya mṛtyu śīta uṣṇa vaivarṇya upasarga ādayaḥ tāpa viśeṣāḥ bhavanti yāvat jīvam sukham niratiśayam eva
kuraṅga kurara kusumbha-vaikaṅka-trikūṭa-śiśira-pataṅga-rucaka-niṣadha-śinīvāsa-kapila-śaṅkha-vaidūrya-jārudhi-haṁsa-ṛṣabha-nāga-kālañjara-nārada ādayaḥ viṁśati-girayaḥ meroḥ karṇikāyāḥ iva kesara-bhūtāḥ mūla-deśe paritaḥ upakḷptāḥ
jaṭhara-devakūṭau merum pūrveṇa aṣṭādaśa-yojana-sahasram udagāyatau dvi-sahasram pṛthu-tuṅgau bhavataḥ evam apareṇa pavana-pāriyātrau dakṣiṇena kailāsa-karavīrau prāk-āyatau evam uttarataḥ triśṛṅga-makarau aṣṭabhiḥ etaiḥ parisṛtaḥ agniḥ iva paritaḥ cakāsti kāñcana-giriḥ
meroḥ mūrdhani bhagavataḥ ātma-yoneḥ madhyataḥ upakḷptām purīm ayuta-yojana sāhasrīm sama-caturasrām śāta-kaumbhīm vadanti
tām anuparitaḥ loka-pālānām aṣṭānām yathā-diśam yathā-rūpam turīya-mānena puraḥ aṣṭau upakḷptāḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tatra bhagavataḥ sākṣāt yajña-liṅgasya viṣṇoḥ vikramataḥ vāma-pāda aṅguṣṭha nakha nirbhinna ūrdhva aṇḍa-kaṭāha vivareṇa antaḥ-praviṣṭā yā bāhya-jala-dhārā tat caraṇa-paṅkaja avanejana aruṇa-kiñjalka uparañjitā akhila-jagat agha-mala apahā upasparśana amalā sākṣāt bhagavat-padī iti anupalakṣita vacaḥ abhidhīyamānā ati-mahatā kālena yuga-sahasra-upalakṣaṇena divaḥ mūrdhani avatatāra yat tat viṣṇu-padam āhuḥ
yatra ha vāva vīra-vrataḥ auttānapādiḥ parama-bhāgavataḥ asmat kula-devatā caraṇa-aravinda udakam iti yām anusavanam utkṛṣyamāṇa bhagavat-bhakti-yogena dṛḍham klidyamāna-antaḥ-hṛdayaḥ autkaṇṭhya vivaśa amīlita locana yugala kuḍmala vigalita amala bāṣpa-kalayā abhivyajyamāna roma-pulaka-kulakaḥ adhunā api parama-ādareṇa śirasā bibharti
tataḥ sapta ṛṣayaḥ tat prabhāva-abhijñāḥ yām nanu tapasaḥ ātyantikī siddhiḥ etāvatī bhagavati sarva-ātmani vāsudeve anuparata bhakti-yoga lābhena eva upekṣita anya artha-ātma-gatayaḥ muktim iva āgatām mumukṣavaḥ iva sa-bahu-mānam adya api jaṭā-jūṭaiḥ udvahanti
tataḥ aneka sahasra koṭi vimāna-anīka saṅkula deva-yānena avatarantī indu-maṇḍalam āvārya brahma-sadane nipatati
tatra caturdhā bhidyamānā caturbhiḥ nāmabhiḥ catuḥ-diśam abhispandantī nada-nadī-patim eva abhiniviśati sītā-alakanandā cakṣuḥ bhadrā iti
sītā tu brahma-sadanāt kesarācala-ādi giri śikharebhyaḥ adhaḥ adhaḥ prasravantī gandhamādana mūrdhasu patitvā antareṇa bhadrāśva-varṣam prācyām diśi kṣāra-samudram abhipraviśati
evam mālyavat-śikharāt niṣpatantī tataḥ anuparata-vegā ketumālam abhi cakṣuḥ pratīcyām diśi sarit-patim praviśati
bhadrā ca uttarataḥ meru-śirasaḥ nipatitā giri-śikharāt giri-śikharam atihāya śṛṅgavataḥ śṛṅgāt avasyandamānā uttarān tu kurūn abhitaḥ udīcyām diśi jaladhim abhipraviśati
tathā eva alakanandā dakṣiṇena brahma-sadanāt bahūni giri-kūṭāni atikramya hemakūṭāt haimakūṭāni ati-rabhasatara raṁhasā luṭhayantī bhāratam abhivarṣam dakṣiṇasyām diśi jaladhim abhipraviśati yasyām snāna-artham ca āgacchataḥ puṁsaḥ pade pade aśvamedha-rājasūya-ādīnām phalam na durlabham iti
anye ca nadāḥ nadyaḥ ca varṣe varṣe santi bahuśaḥ meru-ādi-giri-duhitaraḥ śataśaḥ
tatra api bhāratam eva varṣam karma-kṣetram anyāni aṣṭa varṣāṇi svargiṇām puṇya śeṣa upabhoga-sthānāni bhaumāni svarga-padāni vyapadiśanti
eṣu puruṣāṇām ayuta puruṣa āyuḥ-varṣāṇām deva-kalpānām nāga-ayuta-prāṇānām vajra-saṁhanana bala vayaḥ moda pramudita mahā-saurata mithuna vyavāya-apavarga varṣa dhṛta-eka-garbha kalatrāṇām tatra tu tretā-yuga-samaḥ kālaḥ vartate
