yatra ha deva-patayaḥ svaiḥ svaiḥ gaṇa-nāyakaiḥ vihita mahā-arhaṇāḥ sarva-ṛtu kusuma-stabaka phala kisalaya-śriyā ānamyamāna viṭapa latā viṭapibhiḥ upaśumbhamāna rucira kānana āśrama-āyatana varṣa-giri-droṇīṣu tathā ca amala-jala-āśayeṣu vikaca vividha nava-vanaruha-āmoda mudita rāja-haṁsa jala-kukkuṭa kāraṇḍava sārasa cakravāka-ādibhiḥ madhukara-nikara-ākṛtibhiḥ upakūjiteṣu jala-krīḍā-ādibhiḥ vicitra vinodaiḥ su-lalita sura-sundarīṇām kāma kalila vilāsa hāsa līlā-avaloka ākṛṣṭa-manaḥ dṛṣṭayaḥ svairam viharanti
navasu api varṣeṣu bhagavān nārāyaṇaḥ mahā-puruṣaḥ puruṣāṇām tat-anugrahāya ātma-tattva-vyūhena ātmanā adya api sannidhīyate
ilāvṛte tu bhagavān bhavaḥ eka eva pumān na hi anyaḥ tatra aparaḥ nirviśati bhavānyāḥ śāpa-nimitta-jñaḥ yat-pravekṣyataḥ strī-bhāvaḥ tat paścāt vakṣyāmi
bhavānī-nāthaiḥ strī-gaṇa arbuda-sahasraiḥ avarudhyamānaḥ bhagavataḥ catuḥ-mūrteḥ mahā-puruṣasya turīyām tāmasīm mūrtim prakṛtim ātmanaḥ saṅkarṣaṇa-saṁjñām ātma-samādhi-rūpeṇa sannidhāpya etat abhigṛṇan bhavaḥ upadhāvati
śrī-bhagavān uvāca om namo bhagavate mahā-puruṣāya sarva-guṇa-saṅkhyānāya anantāya avyaktāya namaḥ iti
bhaje bhajanya araṇa-pāda-paṅkajam bhagasya kṛtsnasya param parāyaṇam bhakteṣu alam bhāvita-bhūta-bhāvanam bhava-apaham tvā bhava-bhāvam īśvaram
na yasya māyā guṇa citta vṛttibhiḥ nirīkṣataḥ hi aṇu api dṛṣṭiḥ ajyate īśe yathā naḥ ajita manyu raṁhasām kaḥ tam na manyeta jigīṣuḥ ātmanaḥ
asat-dṛśaḥ yaḥ pratibhāti māyayā kṣībaḥ iva madhu āsava tāmra-locanaḥ na nāga-vadhvaḥ arhaṇe īśire hriyā yat-pādayoḥ sparśana dharṣita indriyāḥ
yam āhuḥ asya sthiti janma saṁyamam tribhiḥ vihīnam yam anantam ṛṣayaḥ na veda siddha-artham iva kvacit sthitam bhū-maṇḍalam mūrdha-sahasra-dhāmasu
yasya ādyaḥ āsīt guṇa-vigrahaḥ mahān vijñāna dhiṣṇyaḥ bhagavān ajaḥ kila yat sambhavaḥ aham tri-vṛtā sva-tejasā vaikārikam tāmasam aindriyam sṛje ete vayam yasya vaśe mahā-ātmanaḥ sthitāḥ śakuntāḥ iva sūtra-yantritāḥ mahān aham vaikṛta tāmasa indriyāḥ sṛjāmaḥ sarve yat anugrahāt idam
yat nirmitām karhi api karma-parvaṇīm māyām janaḥ ayam guṇa-sarga-mohitaḥ na veda nistāraṇa-yogam añjasā tasmai namaḥ te vilaya-udaya-ātmane
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tathā ca bhadra-śravā nāma dharma-sutaḥ tat kula-patayaḥ puruṣāḥ bhadrāśva-varṣe sākṣāt bhagavataḥ vāsudevasya priyām tanum dharma-mayīm hayaśīrṣa-abhidhānām parameṇa samādhinā sannidhāpya idam abhigṛṇantaḥ upadhāvanti
bhadraśravasaḥ ūcuḥ om namaḥ bhagavate dharmāya ātma-viśodhanāya namaḥ iti

mā agāra dāra ātma-ja vitta bandhuṣu saṅgaḥ yadi syāt bhagavat-priyeṣu naḥ yaḥ prāṇa-vṛttyā parituṣṭaḥ ātma-vān siddhyati adūrāt na tathā indriya-priyaḥ

antaḥ bahiḥ ca akhila-loka-pālakaiḥ adṛṣṭa-rūpaḥ vicarasi uru svanaḥ saḥ īśvaraḥ tvam yaḥ idam vaśe anayat nāmnā yathā dārumayīm naraḥ striyam

karoti viśva sthiti saṁyama udayam yasya īpsitam na īpsitam īkṣituḥ guṇaiḥ māyā yathā ayaḥ bhramate tat-āśrayam grāvṇaḥ namaḥ te guṇa-karma-sākṣiṇe

na janma nūnam mahataḥ na saubhagam na vāk na buddhiḥ na ākṛtiḥ toṣa-hetuḥ taiḥ yat visṛṣṭān api naḥ vana-okasaḥ cakāra sakhye bata lakṣmaṇa-agra-jaḥ
suraḥ asuraḥ vā api atha vā anaraḥ naraḥ sarva-ātmanā yaḥ su-kṛtajñam uttamam bhajeta rāmam manuja-ākṛtim harim yaḥ uttarān anayat kosalān divam iti

tam bhagavān nāradaḥ varṇa-āśrama-vatībhiḥ bhāratībhiḥ prajābhiḥ bhagavat-proktābhyām sāṅkhya yogābhyām bhagavat-anubhāva-upavarṇanam sāvarṇeḥ upadekṣyamāṇaḥ parama-bhakti-bhāvena upasarati idam ca abhigṛṇāti

idam hi yoga-īśvara yoga-naipuṇam hiraṇya-garbhaḥ bhagavān jagāda yat yat anta-kāle tvayi nirguṇe manaḥ bhaktyā dadhīta ujjhita-duṣkalevaraḥ
yathā aihika amuṣmika kāma-lampaṭaḥ suteṣu dāreṣu dhaneṣu cintayan śaṅketa vidvān ku-kalevara atyayāt yaḥ tasya yatnaḥ śramaḥ eva kevalam

bhārate api asmin varṣe sarit śailāḥ santi bahavaḥ malayaḥ maṅgala-prasthaḥ mainākaḥ tri-kūṭaḥ ṛṣabhaḥ kūṭakaḥ kollakaḥ sahyaḥ devagiriḥ ṛṣya-mūkaḥ śrī-śailaḥ veṅkaṭaḥ mahendraḥ vāri-dhāraḥ vindhyaḥ śuktimān ṛkṣa-giriḥ pāriyātraḥ droṇaḥ citra-kūṭaḥ govardhanaḥ raivatakaḥ kakubhaḥ nīlaḥ gokāmukhaḥ indrakīlaḥ kāma-giriḥ iti ca anye ca śata-sahasraśaḥ śailāḥ teṣām nitamba-prabhavāḥ nadāḥ nadyaḥ ca santi asaṅkhyātāḥ
etāsām apaḥ bhāratyaḥ prajāḥ nāmabhiḥ eva punantīnām ātmanā ca upaspṛśanti candra-vasā tāmra-parṇī avaṭodā kṛta-mālā vaihāyasī kāverī veṇī payasvinī śarkarāvartā tuṅga-bhadrā kṛṣṇā-veṇyā bhīma-rathī godāvarī nirvindhyā payoṣṇī tāpī revā surasā narmadā carmaṇvatī sindhuḥ andhaḥ śoṇaḥ ca nadau mahā-nadī veda-smṛtiḥ ṛṣi-kulyā tri-sāmā kauśikī mandākinī yamunā sarasvatī dṛṣadvatī gomatī sarayū rodhasvatī saptavatī suṣomā śata-drūḥ candrabhāgā marudvṛdhā vitastā asiknī viśvā iti mahā-nadyaḥ

yaḥ asau bhagavati sarva-bhūta-ātmani anātmye anirukte anilayane parama-ātmani vāsudeve ananya nimitta bhakti-yoga-lakṣaṇaḥ nānā-gati nimitta avidyā-granthi randhana dvāreṇa yadā hi mahā-puruṣa puruṣa prasaṅgaḥ
etat eva hi devāḥ gāyanti aho amīṣām kim akāri śobhanam prasannaḥ eṣām svit uta svayam hariḥ yaiḥ janma labdham nṛṣu bhārata-ajire mukunda sevā-aupayikam spṛhā hi naḥ

na yatra vaikuṇṭha-kathā-sudhā-āpagāḥ na sādhavaḥ bhāgavatāḥ tat-āśrayāḥ na yatra yajña-īśa-makhāḥ mahā-utsavāḥ sureśa-lokaḥ api na vai saḥ sevyatām
