śrī-śukaḥ uvāca jambūdvīpasya ca rājan upadvīpān aṣṭau ha eke upadiśanti sagara-ātma-jaiḥ aśva-anveṣaṇe imām mahīm paritaḥ nikhanadbhiḥ upakalpitān tat yathā svarṇa-prasthaḥ candra-śuklaḥ āvartanaḥ ramaṇakaḥ mandara-hariṇaḥ pāñcajanyaḥ siṁhalaḥ laṅkā iti
evam tava bhārata-uttama jambūdvīpa-varṣa-vibhāgaḥ yathā-upadeśam upavarṇitaḥ iti
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ataḥ param plakṣa-ādīnām pramāṇa-lakṣaṇa-saṁsthānataḥ varṣa-vibhāgaḥ upavarṇyate
jambū-dvīpaḥ ayam yāvat-pramāṇa-vistāraḥ tāvatā kṣāra-udadhinā pariveṣṭitaḥ yathā meruḥ jambū-ākhyena lavaṇa-udadhiḥ api tataḥ dvi-guṇa-viśālena plakṣa-ākhyena parikṣiptaḥ yathā parikhā bāhya upavanena plakṣaḥ jambū-pramāṇaḥ dvīpa-ākhyā-karaḥ hiraṇmayaḥ utthitaḥ yatra agniḥ upāste sapta-jihvaḥ tasya adhipatiḥ priyavrata-ātmajaḥ idhma-jihvaḥ svam dvīpam sapta varṣāṇi vibhajya sapta-varṣa-nāmabhyaḥ ātmajebhyaḥ ākalayya svayam ātma-yogena upararāma
śivam yavasam subhadram śāntam kṣemam amṛtam abhayam iti varṣāṇi teṣu girayaḥ nadyaḥ ca sapta eva abhijñātāḥ maṇi-kūṭaḥ vajra-kūṭaḥ indra-senaḥ jyotiṣmān suparṇaḥ hiraṇya-ṣṭhīvaḥ megha-mālaḥ iti setu-śailāḥ aruṇā nṛmṇā āṅgirasī sāvitrī supta-bhātā ṛtambharā satyambharā iti mahā-nadyaḥ yāsām jala-upasparśana vidhūta rajaḥ-tamasaḥ haṁsa pataṅga ūrdhvāyana satyāṅga saṁjñāḥ catvāraḥ varṇāḥ sahasra-āyuṣaḥ vibudha-upama sandarśana prajananāḥ svarga-dvāram trayyā vidyayā bhagavantam trayī-mayam sūryam ātmānam yajante
pratnasya viṣṇoḥ rūpam yat satyasya ṛtasya brahmaṇaḥ amṛtasya ca mṛtyoḥ ca sūryam ātmānam īmahi iti
plakṣa-ādiṣu pañcasu puruṣāṇām āyuḥ indriyam ojaḥ sahaḥ balam buddhiḥ vikramaḥ iti ca sarveṣām autpattikī siddhiḥ aviśeṣeṇa vartate
plakṣaḥ sva-samānena ikṣu-rasa udena āvṛtaḥ yathā tathā dvīpaḥ api śālmalaḥ dvi-guṇa-viśālaḥ samānena surā-udena āvṛtaḥ parivṛṅkte
yatra ha vai śālmalī plakṣa-āyāmā yasyām vāva kila nilayam āhuḥ bhagavataḥ chandaḥ-stutaḥ patattri-rājasya sā dvīpa-hūtaye upalakṣyate
tat-dvīpa-adhipatiḥ priyavrata-ātmajaḥ yajña-bāhuḥ sva-sutebhyaḥ saptabhyaḥ tat-nāmāni sapta-varṣāṇi vyabhajat surocanam saumanasyam ramaṇakam deva-varṣam pāribhadram āpyāyanam avijñātam iti
teṣu varṣa-adrayaḥ nadyaḥ ca sapta eva abhijñātāḥ svarasaḥ śata-śṛṅgaḥ vāma-devaḥ kundaḥ mukundaḥ puṣpa-varṣaḥ sahasra-śrutiḥ iti anumatiḥ sinīvālī sarasvatī kuhū rajanī nandā rākā iti
tat-varṣa-puruṣāḥ śrutadhara vīryadhara vasundhara iṣandhara saṁjñāḥ bhagavantam veda-mayam somam ātmānam vedena yajante
sva-gobhiḥ pitṛ-devebhyaḥ vibhajan kṛṣṇa-śuklayoḥ prajānām sarvāsām rājā andhaḥ somaḥ naḥ āstu iti
evam surodāt bahiḥ tat-dvi-guṇaḥ samānena āvṛtaḥ ghṛta-udena yathā-pūrvaḥ kuśa-dvīpa yasmin kuśa-stambaḥ deva-kṛtaḥ tat-dvīpa-ākhyā-karaḥ jvalanaḥ iva aparaḥ sva-śaṣpa-rociṣā diśaḥ virājayati
tat-dvīpa-patiḥ praiyavrataḥ rājan hiraṇyaretā nāma svam dvīpam saptabhyaḥ sva-putrebhyaḥ yathā-bhāgam vibhajya svayam tapaḥ ātiṣṭhata vasu vasudāna dṛḍharuci nābhi-gupta stutya-vrata vivikta vāma-deva nāmabhyaḥ
teṣām varṣeṣu sīmā-girayaḥ nadyaḥ ca abhijñātāḥ sapta sapta eva cakraḥ catuḥ-śṛṅgaḥ kapilaḥ citra-kūṭaḥ devānīkaḥ ūrdhva-romā draviṇaḥ iti rasa-kulyā madhu-kulyā mitra-vindā śruta-vindā deva-garbhā ghṛta-cyutā mantra-mālā iti
yāsām payobhiḥ kuśa-dvīpa-okasaḥ kuśala kovida abhiyukta kulaka saṁjñāḥ bhagavantam jātaveda sa-rūpiṇam karma-kauśalena yajante
parasya brahmaṇaḥ sākṣāt jāta-vedaḥ asi havyavāṭ devānām puruṣa-aṅgānām yajñena puruṣam yaja iti
tathā ghṛta-udāt bahiḥ krauñca-dvīpaḥ dvi-guṇaḥ sva-mānena kṣīra-udena paritaḥ upakḷptaḥ vṛtaḥ yathā kuśa-dvīpaḥ ghṛta-udena yasmin krauñcaḥ nāma parvata-rājaḥ dvīpa-nāma nirvartakaḥ āste
yaḥ asau guha-praharaṇa unmathita nitamba-kuñjaḥ api kṣīra-udena āsicyamānaḥ bhagavatā varuṇena abhiguptaḥ vibhayaḥ babhūva
tasmin api praiyavrataḥ ghṛta-pṛṣṭhaḥ nāma adhipatiḥ sve dvīpe varṣāṇi sapta vibhajya teṣu putra-nāmasu sapta rikthā-dān varṣa-pān niveśya svayam bhagavān bhagavataḥ parama-kalyāṇa-yaśasaḥ ātma-bhūtasya hareḥ caraṇa-aravindam upajagāma
āmaḥ madhu-ruhaḥ megha-pṛṣṭhaḥ sudhāmā bhrājiṣṭhaḥ lohitārṇaḥ vanaspatiḥ iti ghṛtapṛṣṭha-sutāḥ teṣām varṣa-girayaḥ sapta sapta eva nadyaḥ ca abhikhyātāḥ śuklaḥ vardhamānaḥ bhojanaḥ upabarhiṇaḥ nandaḥ nandanaḥ sarvataḥ-bhadraḥ iti abhayā amṛtaughā āryakā tīrthavatī rūpavatī pavitravatī śuklā iti
yāsām ambhaḥ pavitram amalam upayuñjānāḥ puruṣa ṛṣabha draviṇa devaka saṁjñāḥ varṣa-puruṣāḥ āpaḥ-mayam devam apām pūrṇena añjalinā yajante
āpaḥ puruṣa-vīryāḥ stha punantīḥ bhūḥ bhuvaḥ suvaḥ tāḥ naḥ punīta amīva-ghnīḥ spṛśatām ātmanā bhuvaḥ iti
evam purastāt kṣīra-udāt paritaḥ upaveśitaḥ śāka-dvīpaḥ dvā-triṁśat lakṣa yojana āyāmaḥ samānena ca dadhi-maṇḍa-udena parītaḥ yasmin śākaḥ nāma mahīruhaḥ sva-kṣetra-vyapadeśakaḥ yasya ha mahā-surabhi gandhaḥ tam dvīpam anuvāsayati
tasya api praiyavrataḥ eva adhipatiḥ nāmnā medhā-tithiḥ saḥ api vibhajya sapta varṣāṇi putra-nāmāni teṣu sva-ātmajān purojava manojava pavamāna dhūmrānīka citra-repha bahu-rūpa viśvadhāra saṁjñān nidhāpya adhipatīn svayam bhagavati anante āveśita-matiḥ tapaḥ-vanam praviveśa
eteṣām varṣa-maryādā girayaḥ nadyaḥ ca sapta sapta eva īśānaḥ uruśṛṅgaḥ bala-bhadraḥ śata-kesaraḥ sahasra-srotaḥ deva-pālaḥ mahānasaḥ iti anaghā āyurdā ubhayaspṛṣṭiḥ aparājitā pañcapadī sahasra-srutiḥ nija-dhṛtiḥ iti
tat-varṣa-puruṣāḥ ṛta-vrata satya-vrata dāna-vrata anuvrata nāmānaḥ bhagavantam vāyu-ātmakam prāṇāyāma vidhūta rajaḥ-tamasaḥ parama samādhinā yajante
antaḥ-praviśya bhūtāni yaḥ bibharti ātma-ketubhiḥ antaryāmī īśvaraḥ sākṣāt pātu naḥ yat-vaśe sphuṭam
evam eva dadhi-maṇḍa-udāt parataḥ puṣkara-dvīpaḥ tataḥ dvi-guṇa-āyāmaḥ samantataḥ upakalpitaḥ samānena svādu-udakena samudreṇa bahiḥ āvṛtaḥ yasmin bṛhat puṣkaram jvalana-śikhā amala kanaka patra ayuta-ayutam bhagavataḥ kamala āsanasya adhyāsanam parikalpitam
tat-dvīpa-madhye mānasottara nāma ekaḥ eva arvācīna parācīna varṣayoḥ maryādā acalaḥ ayuta yojana ucchrāya-āyāmaḥ yatra tu catasṛṣu dikṣu catvāri purāṇi loka-pālānām indra-ādīnām yat upariṣṭāt sūrya-rathasya merum paribhramataḥ saṁvatsara-ātmakam cakram devānām ahaḥ-rātrābhyām paribhramati
tat-dvīpasya api adhipatiḥ praiyavrataḥ vītihotraḥ nāma etasya ātma-jau ramaṇaka dhātaki nāmānau varṣa-patī niyujya saḥ svayam pūrvaja-vat bhagavat-karma-śīlaḥ eva āste
tat-varṣa-puruṣāḥ bhagavantam brahma-rūpiṇam sa-karmakeṇa karmaṇā ārādhayanti idam ca udāharanti
yat tat karma-mayam liṅgam brahma-liṅgam janaḥ arcayet ekāntam advayam śāntam tasmai bhagavate namaḥ iti
tataḥ parastāt lokāloka-nāma acalaḥ loka-alokayoḥ antarāle paritaḥ upakṣiptaḥ
yāvat mānasottara-mervoḥ antaram tāvatī bhūmiḥ kāñcanī anyā ādarśa-tala-upamā yasyām prahitaḥ padārthaḥ na kathañcit punaḥ pratyupalabhyate tasmāt sarva-sattva parihṛtā āsīt
loka alokaḥ iti samākhyā yat anena acalena loka alokasya antarvartinā avasthāpyate
saḥ loka-traya-ante paritaḥ īśvareṇa vihitaḥ yasmāt sūrya-ādīnām dhruva-apavargāṇām jyotiḥ-gaṇānām gabhastayaḥ arvācīnān trīn lokān āvitanvānāḥ na kadācit parācīnāḥ bhavitum utsahante tāvat unnahana-āyāmaḥ
etāvān loka-vinyāsaḥ māna lakṣaṇa saṁsthābhiḥ vicintitaḥ kavibhiḥ saḥ tu pañcāśat-koṭi gaṇitasya bhū-golasya turīya-bhāgaḥ ayam lokāloka-acalaḥ
tat-upariṣṭāt catasṛṣu āśāsu ātma-yoninā akhila-jagad-guruṇā adhiniveśitāḥ ye dvirada-patayaḥ ṛṣabhaḥ puṣkara-cūḍaḥ vāmanaḥ aparājitaḥ iti sakala-loka-sthiti-hetavaḥ
teṣām sva-vibhūtīnām loka-pālānām ca vividha vīrya-upabṛṁhaṇāya bhagavān parama-mahā-puruṣaḥ mahā-vibhūti-patiḥ antaryāmī ātmanaḥ viśuddha-sattvam dharma-jñāna-vairāgya aiśvarya-ādi aṣṭa mahā-siddhi upalakṣaṇam viṣvaksena-ādibhiḥ sva-pārṣada-pravaraiḥ parivāritaḥ nija vara-āyudha upaśobhitaiḥ nija bhuja-daṇḍaiḥ sandhārayamāṇaḥ tasmin giri-vare samantāt sakala-loka-svastaye āste
ā-kalpam evam veṣam gataḥ eṣaḥ bhagavān ātma-yoga-māyayā viracita vividha-loka-yātrā gopīyāya iti arthaḥ
yaḥ antaḥ-vistāraḥ etena hi aloka-parimāṇam ca vyākhyātam yat bahiḥ lokāloka-acalāt tataḥ parastāt yogeśvara-gatim viśuddhām udāharanti
aṇḍa-madhya-gataḥ sūryaḥ dyāv-ābhūmyoḥ yat antaram sūrya aṇḍa-golayoḥ madhye koṭyaḥ syuḥ pañca-viṁśatiḥ
mṛte aṇḍe eṣaḥ etasmin yat abhūt tataḥ mārtaṇḍa iti vyapadeśaḥ hiraṇya-garbhaḥ iti yat hiraṇya-aṇḍa-samudbhavaḥ
sūryeṇa hi vibhajyante diśaḥ kham dyauḥ mahī bhidā svarga apavargau narakāḥ rasaukāṁsi ca sarvaśaḥ
deva tiryak manuṣyāṇām sarīsṛpa sa-vīrudhām sarva-jīva-nikāyānām sūryaḥ ātmā dṛk īśvaraḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca etāvān eva bhū-valayasya sanniveśaḥ pramāṇa-lakṣaṇataḥ vyākhyātaḥ
etena hi divaḥ maṇḍala-mānam tat-vidaḥ upadiśanti yathā dvi-dalayoḥ niṣpāva-ādīnām te antareṇa antarikṣam tat ubhaya sandhitam
yat madhya-gataḥ bhagavān tapatām patiḥ tapanaḥ ātapena tri-lokīm pratapati avabhāsayati ātma-bhāsā saḥ eṣaḥ udagayana dakṣiṇa-ayana vaiṣuvata saṁjñābhiḥ māndya śaighrya samānābhiḥ gatibhiḥ ārohaṇa avarohaṇa samāna sthāneṣu yathā-savanam abhipadyamānaḥ makara-ādiṣu rāśiṣu ahaḥ-rātrāṇi dīrgha hrasva samānāni vidhatte
yadā meṣa-tulayoḥ vartate tadā ahaḥ-rātrāṇi samānāni bhavanti yadā vṛṣabha-ādiṣu pañcasu ca rāśiṣu carati tadā ahāni eva vardhante hrasati ca māsi māsi eka-ekā ghaṭikā rātriṣu
yadā vṛścika-ādiṣu pañcasu vartate tadā ahaḥ-rātrāṇi viparyayāṇi bhavanti
yāvat dakṣiṇa-ayanam ahāni vardhante yāvat udagayanam rātrayaḥ
evam nava koṭayaḥ eka-pañcāśat lakṣāṇi yojanānām mānasottara-giri parivartanasya upadiśanti tasmin aindrīm purīm pūrvasmāt meroḥ devadhānīm nāma dakṣiṇataḥ yāmyām saṁyamanīm nāma paścāt vāruṇīm nimlocanīm nāma uttarataḥ saumyām vibhāvarīm nāma tāsu udaya madhyāhna astamaya niśīthāni iti bhūtānām pravṛtti nivṛtti nimittāni samaya-viśeṣeṇa meroḥ catuḥ-diśam
tatratyānām divasa-madhyaṅgataḥ eva sadā ādityaḥ tapati savyena acalam dakṣiṇena karoti yatra udeti tasya ha samāna-sūtra-nipāte nimlocati yatra kvacana syandena abhitapati tasya ha eṣaḥ samāna-sūtra-nipāte prasvāpayati tatra gatam na paśyanti ye tam samanupaśyeran
yadā ca aindryāḥ puryāḥ pracalate pañcadaśa ghaṭikābhiḥ yāmyām sapāda-koṭi-dvayam yojanānām sārdha dvādaśa-lakṣāṇi sādhikāni ca upayāti
evam tataḥ vāruṇīm saumyām aindrīṁ ca punaḥ tathā anye ca grahāḥ soma-ādayaḥ nakṣatraiḥ saha jyotiḥ-cakre samabhyudyanti saha vā nimlocanti
evam muhūrtena catuḥ-triṁśat lakṣa yojanāni aṣṭa-śatādhikāni sauraḥ rathaḥ trayī-mayaḥ asau catasṛṣu parivartate purīṣu
yasya ekam cakram dvādaśa aram ṣaṭ nemi tri-ṇābhi saṁvatsara-ātmakam samāmananti tasya akṣaḥ meroḥ mūrdhani kṛtaḥ mānasottare kṛta itara-bhāgaḥ yatra protam ravi-ratha-cakram taila-yantra-cakra-vat bhramat mānasottara-girau paribhramati
tasmin akṣe kṛta-mūlaḥ dvitīyaḥ akṣaḥ turyamānena sammitaḥ taila-yantra-akṣa-vat dhruve kṛta upari-bhāgaḥ
ratha-nīḍaḥ tu ṣaṭ-triṁśat-lakṣa-yojana-āyataḥ tat-turīya-bhāga viśālaḥ tāvān ravi-ratha-yugaḥ yatra hayāḥ chandaḥ-nāmānaḥ sapta aruṇa-yojitāḥ vahanti devam ādityam
purastāt savituḥ aruṇaḥ paścāt ca niyuktaḥ sautye karmaṇi kila āste
tathā vālikhilyāḥ ṛṣayaḥ aṅguṣṭha-parva-mātrāḥ ṣaṣṭi-sahasrāṇi purataḥ sūryam su-ukta-vākāya niyuktāḥ saṁstuvanti
tathā anye ca ṛṣayaḥ gandharva-apsarasaḥ nāgāḥ grāmaṇyaḥ yātudhānāḥ devāḥ iti eka-ekaśaḥ gaṇāḥ sapta caturdaśa māsi māsi bhagavantam sūryam ātmānam nānā nāmānam pṛthak nānā-nāmānaḥ pṛthak karmabhiḥ dvandvaśaḥ upāsate
lakṣa-uttaram sārdha nava-koṭi-yojana parimaṇḍalam bhū-valayasya kṣaṇena sagavyūti-uttaram dvi-sahasra-yojanāni saḥ bhuṅkte
rājā uvāca yat etat bhagavataḥ ādityasya merum dhruvam ca pradakṣiṇena parikrāmataḥ rāśīnām abhimukham pracalitam ca apradakṣiṇam bhagavatā upavarṇitam amuṣya vayam katham anumimīmahi iti
saḥ ha uvāca yathā kulāla-cakreṇa bhramatā saha bhramatām tat-āśrayāṇām pipīlika-ādīnām gatiḥ anyā eva pradeśa-antareṣu api upalabhyamānatvāt evam nakṣatra-rāśibhiḥ upalakṣitena kāla-cakreṇa dhruvam merum ca pradakṣiṇena paridhāvatā saha paridhāvamānānām tat-āśrayāṇām sūrya-ādīnām grahāṇām gatiḥ anyā eva nakṣatra-antare rāśi-antare ca upalabhyamānatvāt
saḥ eṣaḥ bhagavān ādi-puruṣaḥ eva sākṣāt nārāyaṇaḥ lokānām svastaye ātmānam trayī-mayam karma-viśuddhi nimittam kavibhiḥ api ca vedena vijijñāsyamānaḥ dvādaśa-dhā vibhajya ṣaṭsu vasanta-ādiṣu ṛtuṣu yathā-upajoṣam ṛtu-guṇān vidadhāti
tam etam iha puruṣāḥ trayyā vidyayā varṇa-āśrama-ācāra anupathāḥ ucca-avacaiḥ karmabhiḥ āmnātaiḥ yoga-vitānaiḥ ca śraddhayā yajantaḥ añjasā śreyaḥ samadhigacchanti
atha saḥ eṣaḥ ātmā lokānām dyāv-ā-pṛthivyoḥ antareṇa nabhaḥ-valayasya kāla-cakra-gataḥ dvādaśa māsān bhuṅkte rāśi-saṁjñān saṁvatsara-avayavān māsaḥ pakṣa-dvayam divā naktam ca iti sapāda-ṛkṣa-dvayam upadiśanti yāvatā ṣaṣṭham aṁśam bhuñjīta saḥ vai ṛtuḥ iti upadiśyate saṁvatsara-avayavaḥ
atha ca yāvatā ardhena nabhaḥ-vīthyām pracarati tam kālam ayanam ācakṣate
atha ca yāvat nabhaḥ-maṇḍalam saha dyau āpṛthivyoḥ maṇḍalābhyām kārtsnyena saḥ ha bhuñjīta tam kālam saṁvatsaram parivatsaram iḍāvatsaram anuvatsaram vatsaram iti bhānoḥ māndya śaighrya sama gatibhiḥ samāmananti
evam candramā arka-gabhastibhyaḥ upariṣṭāt lakṣa-yojanataḥ upalabhyamānaḥ arkasya saṁvatsara-bhuktim pakṣābhyām māsa-bhuktim sapāda-ṛkṣābhyām dinena eva pakṣa-bhuktim agracārī druta-tara-gamanaḥ bhuṅkte
atha ca āpūryamāṇābhiḥ ca kalābhiḥ amarāṇām kṣīyamāṇābhiḥ ca kalābhiḥ pitṝṇām ahaḥ-rātrāṇi pūrva-pakṣa-apara-pakṣābhyām vitanvānaḥ sarva-jīva-nivaha prāṇaḥ jīvaḥ ca ekam ekam nakṣatram triṁśatā muhūrtaiḥ bhuṅkte
yaḥ eṣaḥ ṣoḍaśa-kalaḥ puruṣaḥ bhagavān manaḥ-mayaḥ anna-mayaḥ amṛta-mayaḥ deva pitṛ manuṣya bhūta paśu pakṣi sarīsṛpa vīrudhām prāṇa api āyana-śīlatvāt sarva-mayaḥ iti varṇayanti
tataḥ upariṣṭāt dvi-lakṣa-yojanataḥ nakṣatrāṇi merum dakṣiṇena eva kāla-ayane īśvara-yojitāni saha abhijitā aṣṭā-viṁśatiḥ
tataḥ upariṣṭāt uśanā dvi-lakṣa-yojanataḥ upalabhyate purataḥ paścāt saha eva vā arkasya śaighrya māndya sāmyābhiḥ gatibhiḥ arkavat carati lokānām nityadā anukūlaḥ eva prāyeṇa varṣayan cāreṇa anumīyate saḥ vṛṣṭi-viṣṭambha graha-upaśamanaḥ
uśanasā budhaḥ vyākhyātaḥ tataḥ upariṣṭāt dvi-lakṣa-yojanataḥ budhaḥ soma-sutaḥ upalabhyamānaḥ prāyeṇa śubha-kṛt yadā arkāt vyatiricyeta tadā ativāta abhra prāya anāvṛṣṭi-ādi bhayam āśaṁsate
ataḥ ūrdhvam aṅgārakaḥ api yojana-lakṣa-dvitaye upalabhyamānaḥ tribhiḥ tribhiḥ pakṣaiḥ eka-ekaśaḥ rāśīn dvādaśa anubhuṅkte yadi na vakreṇa abhivartate prāyeṇa aśubha-grahaḥ agha-śaṁsaḥ
tataḥ upariṣṭāt dvi-lakṣa-yojana-antara-gatāḥ bhagavān bṛhaspatiḥ eka-ekasmin rāśau parivatsaram parivatsaram carati yadi na vakraḥ syāt prāyeṇa anukūlaḥ brāhmaṇa-kulasya
tataḥ upariṣṭāt yojana-lakṣa-dvayāt pratīyamānaḥ śanaiścaraḥ eka-ekasmin rāśau triṁśat māsān vilam-bamānaḥ sarvān eva anuparyeti tāvadbhiḥ anuvatsaraiḥ prāyeṇa hi sarveṣām aśāntikaraḥ
tataḥ uttarasmāt ṛṣayaḥ ekādaśa-lakṣa-yojana-antare upalabhyante ye eva lokānām śam anubhāvayantaḥ bhagavataḥ viṣṇoḥ yat paramam padam pradakṣiṇam prakramanti
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca atha tasmāt parataḥ trayodaśa-lakṣa-yojana-antarataḥ yat tat viṣṇoḥ paramam padam abhivadanti yatra ha mahā-bhāgavataḥ dhruvaḥ auttānapādiḥ agninā indreṇa prajāpatinā kaśyapena dharmeṇa ca samakāla-yugbhiḥ sa-bahu-mānam dakṣiṇataḥ kriyamāṇaḥ idānīm api kalpa-jīvinām ājīvyaḥ upāste tasya iha anubhāvaḥ upavarṇitaḥ
saḥ hi sarveṣām jyotiḥ-gaṇānām graha-nakṣatra-ādīnām animiṣeṇa avyakta raṁhasā bhagavatā kālena bhrāmyamāṇānām sthāṇuḥ iva avaṣṭambhaḥ īśvareṇa vihitaḥ śaśvat avabhāsate
yathā meḍhīstambhe ākramaṇa-paśavaḥ saṁyojitāḥ tribhiḥ tribhiḥ savanaiḥ yathā-sthānam maṇḍalāni caranti evam bha-gaṇāḥ graha-ādayaḥ etasmin antaḥ-bahiḥ-yogena kāla-cakre āyojitāḥ dhruvam eva avalambya vāyunā udīryamāṇāḥ ā-kalpa-antam paricaṅ kramanti nabhasi yathā meghāḥ śyena-ādayaḥ vāyu-vaśāḥ karma-sārathayaḥ parivartante evam jyotiḥ-gaṇāḥ prakṛti puruṣa saṁyoga-anugṛhītāḥ karma-nirmita gatayaḥ bhuvi na patanti
kecana etat jyotiḥ-anīkam śiśumāra-saṁsthānena bhagavataḥ vāsudevasya yoga-dhāraṇāyām anuvarṇayanti
yasya puccha-agre avākśirasaḥ kuṇḍalī-bhūta-dehasya dhruvaḥ upakalpitaḥ tasya lāṅgūle prajāpatiḥ agniḥ indraḥ dharmaḥ iti puccha-mūle dhātā vidhātā ca kaṭyām sapta-ṛṣayaḥ tasya dakṣiṇa-āvarta-kuṇḍalī-bhūta-śarīrasya yāni udagayanāni dakṣiṇa-pārśve tu nakṣatrāṇi upakalpayanti dakṣiṇa-āyanāni tu savye yathā śiśumārasya kuṇḍalā-bhoga-sanniveśasya pārśvayoḥ ubhayoḥ api avayavāḥ samasaṅkhyāḥ bhavanti pṛṣṭhe tu ajavīthī ākāśa-gaṅgā ca udarataḥ
punarvasu puṣyau dakṣiṇa-vāmayoḥ śroṇyoḥ ārdrā aśleṣe ca dakṣiṇa-vāmayoḥ paścimayoḥ pādayoḥ abhijit-uttarāṣāḍhe dakṣiṇa-vāmayoḥ nāsikayoḥ yathā-saṅkhyam śravaṇa-pūrvāṣāḍhe dakṣiṇa-vāmayoḥ locanayoḥ dhaniṣṭhā mūlam ca dakṣiṇa-vāmayoḥ karṇayoḥ maghā-ādīni aṣṭa nakṣatrāṇi dakṣiṇa-āyanāni vāma-pārśva vaṅkriṣu yuñjīta tathā eva mṛga-śīrṣā-ādīni udagayanāni dakṣiṇa-pārśva-vaṅkriṣu prātilomyena prayuñjīta śatabhiṣā jyeṣṭhe skandhayoḥ dakṣiṇa-vāmayoḥ nyaset
uttarā-hanau agastiḥ adharā-hanau yamaḥ mukheṣu ca aṅgārakaḥ śanaiścaraḥ upasthe bṛhaspatiḥ kakudi vakṣasi ādityaḥ hṛdaye nārāyaṇaḥ manasi candraḥ nābhyām uśanā stanayoḥ aśvinau budhaḥ prāṇāpānayoḥ rāhuḥ gale ketavaḥ sarva-aṅgeṣu romasu sarve tārā-gaṇāḥ
etat u ha eva bhagavataḥ viṣṇoḥ sarva-devatā-mayam rūpam ahaḥ-ahaḥ sandhyāyām prayataḥ vāgyataḥ nirīkṣamāṇaḥ upatiṣṭheta namaḥ jyotiḥ-lokāya kālāyanāya animiṣām pataye mahā-puruṣāya abhidhīmahi iti
graha-ṛkṣa-tārā-mayam ādhidaivikam pāpa-apaham mantra-kṛtām tri-kālam namasyataḥ smarataḥ vā tri-kālam naśyeta tat-kāla-jam āśu pāpam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca adhastāt savituḥ yojana ayute svarbhānuḥ nakṣatra-vat carati iti eke yaḥ asau amaratvam grahatvam ca alabhata bhagavat-anukampayā svayam asura-apasadaḥ saiṁhikeyaḥ hi a-tat-arhaḥ tasya tāta janma karmāṇi ca upariṣṭāt vakṣyāmaḥ
yat adaḥ taraṇeḥ maṇḍalam pratapataḥ tat vistarataḥ yojana ayutam ācakṣate dvādaśa-sahasram somasya trayodaśa sahasram rāhoḥ yaḥ parvaṇi tat-vyavadhāna-kṛt vaira-anubandhaḥ sūryā candramasau abhidhāvati
tat niśamya ubhayatra api bhagavatā rakṣaṇāya prayuktam sudarśanam nāma bhāgavatam dayitam astram tat tejasā durviṣaham muhuḥ parivartamānam abhyavasthitaḥ muhūrtam udvijamānaḥ cakita hṛdayaḥ ārāt eva nivartate tat uparāgam iti vadanti lokāḥ
tataḥ adhastāt siddha-cāraṇa vidyādharāṇām sadanāni tāvat mātra eva
tataḥ adhastāt yakṣa-rakṣaḥ-piśāca-preta-bhūta-gaṇānām vihāra-ajiram antarikṣam yāvat vāyuḥ pravāti yāvat meghāḥ upalabhyante
tataḥ adhastāt śata-yojana antare iyam pṛthivī yāvat haṁsa bhāsa śyena suparṇa-ādayaḥ patattri-pravarāḥ utpatanti iti
upavarṇitam bhūmeḥ yathā-sanniveśa-avasthānam avaneḥ api adhastāt sapta bhū-vivarāḥ eka-ekaśaḥ yojana-ayuta-antareṇa āyāma-vistāreṇa upakḷptāḥ atalam vitalam sutalam talātalam mahātalam rasātalam pātālam iti
eteṣu hi bila-svargeṣu svargāt api adhika kāma-bhoga aiśvarya-ānanda bhūti vibhūtibhiḥ su-samṛddha bhavana udyāna ākrīḍa-vihāreṣu daitya dānava kādraveyāḥ nitya pramudita anurakta kalatra apatya bandhu suhṛt anucarāḥ gṛha-patayaḥ īśvarāt api apratihata-kāmāḥ māyā vinodāḥ nivasanti
yeṣu mahā-rāja mayena māyā-vinā vinirmitāḥ puraḥ nānā-maṇi-pravara praveka viracita vicitra bhavana prākāra gopura sabhā caitya catvara āyatana-ādibhiḥ nāga asura mithuna pārāvata śuka sārikā ākīrṇa kṛtrima bhūmibhiḥ vivara-īśvara gṛha-uttamaiḥ samalaṅkṛtāḥ cakāsati
udyānāni ca atitarām manaḥ indriya ānandibhiḥ kusuma phala stabaka subhaga kisalaya avanata rucira viṭapa viṭapinām latā-aṅga-āliṅgitānām śrībhiḥ sa-mithuna vividha vihaṅgama jala-āśayānām amala-jala-pūrṇānām jhaṣa-kula-ullaṅghana kṣubhita nīra nīraja kumuda kuvalaya kahlāra nīla-utpala lohita śata-patra-ādi vaneṣu kṛta-niketanānām eka-vihāra-ākula madhura vividha svana-ādibhiḥ indriya-utsavaiḥ amara-loka-śriyam atiśayitāni
yatra ha vāva na bhayam ahaḥ-rātra-ādibhiḥ kāla-vibhāgaiḥ upalakṣyate
yatra hi mahā-ahi pravara śiraḥ-maṇayaḥ sarvam tamaḥ prabādhante
na vā eteṣu vasatām divya auṣadhi rasa rasāyana anna pāna snāna-ādibhiḥ ādhayaḥ vyādhayaḥ valī palita jarā ādayaḥ ca deha-vaivarṇya daurgandhya sveda klama glāniḥ iti vayaḥ avasthāḥ ca bhavanti
na hi teṣām kalyāṇānām prabhavati kutaścana mṛtyuḥ vinā bhagavat-tejasaḥ cakra-apadeśāt
yasmin praviṣṭe asura-vadhūnām prāyaḥ puṁsavanāni bhayāt eva sravanti patanti ca
atha atale maya-putraḥ asuraḥ balaḥ nivasati yena ha vā iha sṛṣṭāḥ ṣaṭ-ṇavatiḥ māyāḥ kāścana adya api māyā-vinaḥ dhārayanti yasya ca jṛmbhamāṇasya mukhataḥ trayaḥ strī-gaṇāḥ udapadyanta svairiṇyaḥ kāminyaḥ puṁścalyaḥ iti yāḥ vai bila-ayanam praviṣṭam puruṣam rasena hāṭaka-ākhyena sādhayitvā sva-vilāsa avalokana anurāga smita saṁlāpa upagūhana-ādibhiḥ svairam kila ramayanti yasmin upayukte puruṣaḥ īśvaraḥ aham siddhaḥ aham iti ayuta mahā-gaja balam ātmānam abhimanyamānaḥ katthate mada-andhaḥ iva
tataḥ adhastāt vitale haraḥ bhagavān hāṭakeśvaraḥ sva-pārṣada bhūta-gaṇa āvṛtaḥ prajāpati-sarga upabṛṁhaṇāya bhavaḥ bhavānyā saha mithunī-bhūtaḥ āste yataḥ pravṛttā sarit-pravarā hāṭakī nāma bhavayoḥ vīryeṇa yatra citra-bhānuḥ mātariśvanā samidhyamānaḥ ojasā pibati tat niṣṭhyūtam hāṭaka-ākhyam suvarṇam bhūṣaṇena asura-indra avarodheṣu puruṣāḥ saha puruṣībhiḥ dhārayanti
tataḥ adhastāt sutale udāra-śravāḥ puṇya-ślokaḥ virocana-ātmajaḥ baliḥ bhagavatā mahā-indrasya priyam cikīrṣamāṇena āditeḥ labdha-kāyaḥ bhūtvā vaṭu vāmana-rūpeṇa parākṣipta loka-trayaḥ bhagavat-anukampayā eva punaḥ praveśitaḥ indra-ādiṣu avidyamānayā susamṛddhayā śriyā abhijuṣṭaḥ sva-dharmeṇa ārādhayan tam eva bhagavantam ārādhanīyam apagata-sādhvasaḥ āste adhunā api
no eva etat sākṣātkāraḥ bhūmi-dānasya yat tat bhagavati aśeṣa-jīva-nikāyānām jīva-bhūta-ātma-bhūte parama-ātmani vāsudeve tīrtha-tame pātre upapanne parayā śraddhayā parama-ādara samāhita-manasā sampratipāditasya sākṣāt apavarga-dvārasya yat bila-nilaya aiśvaryam
yasya ha vāva kṣuta patana praskhalana-ādiṣu vivaśaḥ sakṛt nāma abhigṛṇan puruṣaḥ karma-bandhanam añjasā vidhunoti yasya ha eva pratibādhanam mumukṣavaḥ anyathā eva upalabhante
tat bhaktānām ātma-vatām sarveṣām ātmani ātma-de ātmatayā eva
na vai bhagavān nūnam amuṣya anujagrāha yat uta punaḥ ātma-anusmṛti moṣaṇam māyā-maya bhoga-aiśvaryam eva ātanuta iti
yat tat bhagavatā anadhigata-anya-upāyena yācñā-chalena apahṛta sva-śarīra-avaśeṣita loka-trayaḥ varuṇa-pāśaiḥ ca sampratimuktaḥ giri-daryām ca apaviddhaḥ iti ha uvāca
nūnam bata ayam bhagavān artheṣu na niṣṇātaḥ yaḥ asau indraḥ yasya sacivaḥ mantrāya vṛtaḥ ekāntataḥ bṛhaspatiḥ tam atihāya svayam upendreṇa ātmānam ayācata ātmanaḥ ca āśiṣaḥ no eva tat-dāsyam ati gambhīra-vayasaḥ kālasya manvantara-parivṛttam kiyat loka-trayam idam
yasya anudāsyam eva asmat pitā-mahaḥ kila vavre na tu sva pitryam yat uta akutaḥ-bhayam padam dīyamānam bhagavataḥ param iti bhagavatā uparate khalu sva-pitari
tasya mahā-anubhāvasya anupatham amṛjita-kaṣāyaḥ kaḥ vā asmat-vidhaḥ parihīṇa-bhagavat-anugrahaḥ upajigamiṣati iti
tasya anucaritam upariṣṭāt vistariṣyate yasya bhagavān svayam akhila-jagad-guruḥ nārāyaṇaḥ dvāri gadā-pāṇiḥ avatiṣṭhate nija-jana-anukampita-hṛdayaḥ yena aṅguṣṭhena padā daśa-kandharaḥ yojana-ayuta-ayutam dik-vijaye uccāṭitaḥ
tataḥ adhastāt talātale mayaḥ nāma dānava-indraḥ tri-pura-adhipatiḥ bhagavatā purāriṇā tri-lokī śam cikīrṣuṇā nirdagdha sva-pura-trayaḥ tat-prasādāt labdha padaḥ māyā-vinām ācāryaḥ mahā-devena parirakṣitaḥ vigata-sudarśana-bhayaḥ mahīyate
tataḥ adhastāt mahātale kādraveyāṇām sarpāṇām na eka-śirasām krodha-vaśaḥ nāma gaṇaḥ kuhaka takṣaka kāliya suṣeṇa ādi pradhānāḥ mahā-bhogavantaḥ patattri-rāja-adhipateḥ puruṣa-vāhāt anavaratam udvijamānāḥ sva kalatra-apatya suhṛt kuṭumba saṅgena kvacit pramattāḥ viharanti
tataḥ adhastāt rasātale daiteyāḥ dānavāḥ paṇayaḥ nāma nivāta-kavacāḥ kāleyāḥ hiraṇya-puravāsinaḥ iti vibudha-pratyanīkāḥ utpattyāḥ mahā-ojasaḥ mahā-sāhasinaḥ bhagavataḥ sakala-loka-anubhāvasya hareḥ eva tejasā pratihata bala avalepāḥ bila-īśayāḥ iva vasanti ye vai saramayā indra-dūtyā vāgbhiḥ mantra-varṇābhiḥ indrāt bibhyati
tataḥ adhastāt pātāle nāga-loka-patayaḥ vāsuki pramukhāḥ śaṅkha kulika mahā-śaṅkha śveta dhanañjaya dhṛtarāṣṭra śaṅkha-cūḍa kambala aśvatara deva-datta ādayaḥ mahā-bhoginaḥ mahā-amarṣāḥ nivasanti yeṣām u ha vai pañca sapta daśa śata sahasra śīrṣāṇām phaṇāsu viracitāḥ mahā-maṇayaḥ rociṣṇavaḥ pātāla-vivara timira-nikaram sva-rociṣā vidhamanti
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tasya mūla-deśe triṁśat yojana sahasra-antare āste yā vai kalā bhagavataḥ tāmasī samākhyātā anantaḥ iti sātvatīyāḥ draṣṭṛ-dṛśyayoḥ saṅkarṣaṇam aham iti abhimāna lakṣaṇam yam saṅkarṣaṇam iti ācakṣate
yasya idam kṣiti-maṇḍalam bhagavataḥ ananta-mūrteḥ sahasra-śirasaḥ ekasmin eva śīrṣaṇi dhriyamāṇam siddhārthaḥ iva lakṣyate
yasya ha vā idam kālena upasañjihīrṣataḥ amarṣa viracita rucira bhramat bhruvoḥ antareṇa sāṅkarṣaṇaḥ nāma rudraḥ ekādaśa-vyūhaḥ tri-akṣaḥ tri-śikham śūlam uttambhayan udatiṣṭhat
yasya aṅghri-kamala yugala aruṇa-viśada nakha maṇi-ṣaṇḍa maṇḍaleṣu ahi-patayaḥ saha sātvata-ṛṣabhaiḥ ekānta-bhakti-yogena avanamantaḥ sva-vadanāni parisphurat kuṇḍala prabhā maṇḍita gaṇḍa-sthalāni ati-manoharāṇi pramudita-manasaḥ khalu vilokayanti
yasya eva hi nāga-rāja-kumāryaḥ āśiṣaḥ āśāsānāḥ cāru aṅga-valaya vilasita viśada vipula dhavala subhaga rucira bhuja rajata-stambheṣu aguru candana kuṅkuma paṅka anulepena avalimpamānāḥ tat-abhimarśana unmathita hṛdaya makara-dhvaja āveśa rucira lalita smitāḥ tat anurāga mada mudita mada vighūrṇita aruṇa karuṇa-avaloka nayana vadana aravindam sa-vrīḍam kila vilokayanti
saḥ eva bhagavān anantaḥ ananta-guṇa-arṇavaḥ ādi-devaḥ upasaṁhṛta amarṣa roṣa vegaḥ lokānām svastaye āste
dhyāyamānaḥ sura asura uraga siddha gandharva vidyādhara muni gaṇaiḥ anavarata mada-mudita vikṛta vihvala locanaḥ su-lalita mukharika amṛtena āpyāyamānaḥ sva-pārṣada vibudha-yūtha-patīn aparimlāna rāga nava tulasikā āmoda madhu-āsavena mādyan madhukara-vrāta madhura-gīta śrīyam vaijayantīm svām vanamālām nīla-vāsāḥ eka-kuṇḍalaḥ hala-kakudi kṛta subhaga sundara bhujaḥ bhagavān mahā-indraḥ vāraṇa-indraḥ iva kāñcanīm kakṣām udāra-līlaḥ bibharti
yaḥ eṣaḥ evam anuśrutaḥ dhyāyamānaḥ mumukṣūṇām anādi kāla karma-vāsanā grathitam avidyā-mayam hṛdaya-granthim sattva-rajaḥ-tamaḥ-mayam antaḥ-hṛdayam gataḥ āśu nirbhinatti tasya anubhāvān bhagavān svāyambhuvaḥ nāradaḥ saha tumburuṇā sabhāyām brahmaṇaḥ saṁślokayām āsa
utpatti sthiti laya hetavaḥ asya kalpāḥ sattva-ādyāḥ prakṛti-guṇāḥ yat īkṣayā āsan yat-rūpam dhruvam akṛtam yat ekam ātman nānā adhāt katham u ha veda tasya vartma
mūrtim naḥ puru-kṛpayā babhāra sattvam saṁśuddham sat-asat idam vibhāti tatra yat-līlām mṛga-patiḥ ādade anavadyām ādātum sva-jana-manāṁsi udāra-vīryaḥ
yat nāma śrutam anukīrtayet akasmāt ārtaḥ vā yadi patitaḥ pralambhanāt vā hanti aṁhaḥ sapadi nṛṇām aśeṣam anyam kam śeṣāt bhagavataḥ āśrayet mumukṣuḥ
mūrdhani arpitam aṇu-vat sahasra-mūrdhnaḥ bhū-golam sa-giri-sarit-samudra-sattvam ānantyāt animita-vikramasya bhūmnaḥ kaḥ vīryāṇi adhi gaṇayet sahasra-jihvaḥ
evam-prabhāvaḥ bhagavān anantaḥ duranta-vīrya uru guṇa-anubhāvaḥ mūle rasāyāḥ sthitaḥ ātma-tantraḥ yaḥ līlayā kṣmām sthitaye bibharti
etāḥ hi eva iha nṛbhiḥ upagantavyāḥ gatayaḥ yathā-karma vinirmitāḥ yathā-upadeśam anuvarṇitāḥ kāmān kāmayamānaiḥ
etāvatīḥ hi rājan puṁsaḥ pravṛtti-lakṣaṇasya dharmasya vipāka-gatayaḥ ucca-avacāḥ visadṛśāḥ yathā-praśnam vyācakhye kim anyat kathayāma iti
rājā uvāca maharṣe etat vaicitryam lokasya katham iti
ṛṣiḥ uvāca tri-guṇatvāt kartuḥ śraddhayā karma-gatayaḥ pṛthak vidhāḥ sarvāḥ eva sarvasya tāratamyena bhavanti
atha idānīm pratiṣiddha lakṣaṇasya adharmasya tathā eva kartuḥ śraddhāyāḥ vaisādṛśyāt karma-phalam visadṛśam bhavati yā hi anādi avidyayā kṛta kāmānām tat-pariṇāma-lakṣaṇāḥ sṛtayaḥ sahasraśaḥ pravṛttāḥ tāsām prācuryeṇa anuvarṇayiṣyāmaḥ
rājā uvāca narakāḥ nāma bhagavan kim deśa-viśeṣāḥ athavā bahiḥ tri-lokyāḥ āhosvit antarāle iti
ṛṣiḥ uvāca antarāle eva tri-jagatyāḥ tu diśi dakṣiṇasyām adhastāt bhūmeḥ upariṣṭāt ca jalāt yasyām agniṣvāttā-ādayaḥ pitṛ-gaṇāḥ diśi svānām gotrāṇām parameṇa samādhinā satyāḥ eva āśiṣaḥ āśāsānāḥ nivasanti
yatra ha vāva bhagavān pitṛ-rājaḥ vaivasvataḥ sva-viṣayam prāpiteṣu sva-puruṣaiḥ jantuṣu sampareteṣu yathā-karma-avadyam doṣam eva anullaṅghita-bhagavat-śāsanaḥ sagaṇaḥ damam dhārayati
tatra ha eke narakān eka-viṁśatim gaṇayanti atha tān te rājan nāma-rūpa-lakṣaṇataḥ anukramiṣyāmaḥ tāmisraḥ andha-tāmisraḥ rauravaḥ mahā-rauravaḥ kumbhī-pākaḥ kāla-sūtram asi-patravanam sūkara-mukham andha-kūpaḥ kṛmi-bhojanaḥ sandaṁśaḥ tapta-sūrmiḥ vajra-kaṇṭaka-śālmalī vaitaraṇī pūyodaḥ prāṇa-rodhaḥ viśasanam lālā-bhakṣaḥ sārameyādanam avīciḥ ayaḥ-pānam iti kiñca kṣāra-kardamaḥ rakṣaḥ-gaṇa-bhojanaḥ śūla-protaḥ danda-śūkaḥ avaṭa-nirodhanaḥ paryāvartanaḥ sūcī-mukham iti aṣṭā-viṁśatiḥ narakāḥ vividha yātanā-bhūmayaḥ
tatra yaḥ tu para-vitta-apatya-kalatrāṇi apaharati saḥ hi kāla-pāśa-baddhaḥ yama-puruṣaiḥ ati-bhayānakaiḥ tāmisre narake balāt nipātyate anaśana anudapāna daṇḍa-tāḍana santarjana-ādibhiḥ yātanābhiḥ yātyamānaḥ jantuḥ yatra kaśmalam āsāditaḥ ekadā eva mūrcchām upayāti tāmisra-prāye
evam eva andhatāmisre yaḥ tu vañcayitvā puruṣam dāra-ādīn upayuṅkte yatra śarīrī nipātyamānaḥ yātanā-sthaḥ vedanayā naṣṭa matiḥ naṣṭa dṛṣṭiḥ ca bhavati yathā vanaspatiḥ vṛścyamāna mūlaḥ tasmāt andhatāmisram tam upadiśanti
yaḥ tu iha vā etat aham iti mama idam iti bhūta-droheṇa kevalam sva-kuṭumbam eva anudinam prapuṣṇāti saḥ tat iha vihāya svayam eva tat aśubhena raurave nipatati
ye tu iha yathā eva amunā vihiṁsitāḥ jantavaḥ paratra yama-yātanām upagatam te eva ruravaḥ bhūtvā tathā tam eva vihiṁsanti tasmāt rauravam iti āhuḥ ruruḥ iti sarpāt ati-krūra sattvasya apadeśaḥ
evam eva mahā-rauravaḥ yatra nipatitam puruṣam kravyādāḥ nāma ruravaḥ tam kravyeṇa ghātayanti yaḥ kevalam dehambharaḥ
yaḥ tu iha vā ugraḥ paśūn pakṣiṇaḥ vā prāṇataḥ uparandhayati tam apakaruṇam puruṣa-ādaiḥ api vigarhitam amutra yama-anucarāḥ kumbhīpāke tapta-taile uparandhayanti
yaḥ tu iha brahma-dhruk saḥ kālasūtra-saṁjñake narake ayuta-yojana-parimaṇḍale tāmra-maye tapta khale upari-adhastāt agni arkābhyām ati-tapyamāne abhiniveśitaḥ kṣut-pipāsābhyām ca dahyamāna antaḥ bahiḥ śarīraḥ āste śete ceṣṭate avatiṣṭhati paridhāvati ca yāvanti paśu-romāṇi tāvat varṣa-sahasrāṇi
yaḥ tu iha vai nija-veda-pathāt anāpadi apagataḥ pākhaṇḍam ca upagataḥ tam asi-patravanam praveśya kaśayā praharanti tatra ha asau itaḥ tataḥ dhāvamānaḥ ubhayataḥ dhāraiḥ tāla-vana-asi-patraiḥ chidyamāna sarva-aṅgaḥ hā hataḥ asmi iti paramayā vedanayā mūrcchitaḥ pade pade nipatati sva-dharma-hā pākhaṇḍa-anugatam phalam bhuṅkte
yaḥ tu iha vai rājā rāja-puruṣaḥ vā adaṇḍye daṇḍam praṇayati brāhmaṇe vā śarīra-daṇḍam saḥ pāpīyān narake amutra sūkaramukhe nipatati tatra ati-balaiḥ viniṣpiṣyamāṇa avayavaḥ yathā eva iha ikṣu-khaṇḍaḥ ārta-svareṇa svanayan kvacit mūrcchitaḥ kaśmalam upagataḥ yathā eva iha adṛṣṭa-doṣāḥ uparuddhāḥ
yaḥ tu iha vai bhūtānām īśvara upakalpita vṛttīnām avivikta para-vyathānām svayam puruṣa-upakalpita vṛttiḥ vivikta para-vyathaḥ vyathām ācarati saḥ paratra andhakūpe tat abhidroheṇa nipatati tatra ha asau taiḥ jantubhiḥ paśu mṛga pakṣi sarīsṛpaiḥ maśaka yūkā matkuṇa makṣika-ādibhiḥ ye ke ca abhidrugdhāḥ taiḥ sarvataḥ abhidruhyamāṇaḥ tamasi vihata nidrā-nirvṛtiḥ alabdha avasthānaḥ parikrāmati yathā ku-śarīre jīvaḥ
yaḥ tu iha vā asaṁ-vibhajya aśnāti yat kiñcana upanatam anirmita pañca-yajñaḥ vāyasa saṁstutaḥ saḥ paratra kṛmibhojane naraka-adhame nipatati tatra śata-sahasra-yojane kṛmi-kuṇḍe kṛmi-bhūtaḥ svayam kṛmibhiḥ eva bhakṣyamāṇaḥ kṛmi-bhojanaḥ yāvat tat apratta-aprahūta adaḥ anirveśam ātmānam yātayate
yaḥ tu iha vai steyena balāt vā hiraṇya ratna ādīni brāhmaṇasya vā apaharati anyasya vā anāpadi puruṣaḥ tam amutra rājan yama-puruṣāḥ ayaḥ-mayaiḥ agni-piṇḍaiḥ sandaṁśaiḥ tvaci niṣkuṣanti
yaḥ tu iha vā agamyām striyam agamyam vā puruṣam yoṣit abhigacchati tau amutra kaśayā tāḍayantaḥ tigmayā sūrmyā loha-mayyā puruṣam āliṅgayanti striyam ca puruṣa-rūpayā sūrmyā
yaḥ tu iha vai sarva-abhigamaḥ tam amutra niraye vartamānam vajrakaṇṭaka-śālmalīm āropya niṣkarṣanti
ye tu iha vai rājanyāḥ rāja-puruṣāḥ vā apākhaṇḍāḥ dharma-setūn bhindanti te samparetya vaitaraṇyām nipatanti bhinna-maryādāḥ tasyām niraya-parikhā-bhūtāyām nadyām yādaḥ-gaṇaiḥ itaḥ tataḥ bhakṣyamāṇāḥ ātmanā na viyujyamānāḥ ca asubhiḥ uhyamānāḥ sva-aghena karma-pākam anusmarantaḥ viṭ mūtra pūya śoṇita keśa nakha asthi medaḥ māṁsa vasā vāhinyām upatapyante
ye tu iha vai vṛṣalī-patayaḥ naṣṭa śauca-ācāra-niyamāḥ tyakta-lajjāḥ paśu-caryām caranti te ca api pretya pūya viṭ mūtra śleṣma malā pūrṇa arṇave nipatanti tat eva atibībhatsitam aśnanti
ye tu iha vai śva gardabha patayaḥ brāhmaṇa-ādayaḥ mṛgayā vihārāḥ atīrthe ca mṛgān nighnanti tān api samparetān lakṣya-bhūtān yama-puruṣāḥ iṣubhiḥ vidhyanti
ye tu iha vai dāmbhikāḥ dambha-yajñeṣu paśūn viśasanti tān amuṣmin loke vaiśase narake patitān niraya-patayaḥ yātayitvā viśasanti
yaḥ tu iha vai savarṇām bhāryām dvijaḥ retaḥ pāyayati kāma-mohitaḥ tam pāpa-kṛtam amutra retaḥ-kulyāyām pātayitvā retaḥ sampāyayanti
ye tu iha vai dasyavaḥ agni-dāḥ garadāḥ grāmān sārthān vā vilumpanti rājānaḥ rāja-bhaṭāḥ vā tān ca api hi paretya yamadūtāḥ vajra-daṁṣṭrāḥ śvānaḥ sapta-śatāni viṁśatiḥ ca sarabhasam khādanti
yaḥ tu iha vā anṛtam vadati sākṣye dravya-vinimaye dāne vā kathañcit saḥ vai pretya narake avīcimati adhaḥ-śirāḥ niravakāśe yojana-śata ucchrāyāt giri mūrdhnaḥ sampātyate yatra jalam iva sthalam aśma-pṛṣṭham avabhāsate tat avīcimat tilaśaḥ viśīryamāṇa śarīraḥ na mriyamāṇaḥ punaḥ āropitaḥ nipatati
yaḥ tu iha vai vipraḥ rājanyaḥ vaiśyaḥ vā soma-pīthaḥ tat kalatram vā surām vrata-sthaḥ api vā pibati pramādataḥ teṣām nirayam nītānām urasi padā ākramya asye vahninā dravamāṇam kārṣṇāyasam niṣiñcanti
atha ca yaḥ tu iha vā ātma-sambhāvanena svayam adhamaḥ janma tapaḥ vidyā ācāra varṇa-āśrama-vataḥ varīyasaḥ na bahu manyeta saḥ mṛtakaḥ eva mṛtvā kṣārakardame niraye avāk-śirā nipātitaḥ durantāḥ yātanāḥ hi aśnute
ye tu iha vai puruṣāḥ puruṣa-medhena yajante yāḥ ca striyaḥ nṛ-paśūn khādanti tān ca te paśavaḥ iva nihatāḥ yama-sadane yātayantaḥ rakṣaḥ-gaṇāḥ saunikāḥ iva svadhitinā avadāya asṛk pibanti nṛtyanti ca gāyanti ca hṛṣyamāṇāḥ yathā iha puruṣa-adāḥ
ye tu iha vā anāgasaḥ araṇye grāme vā vaiśrambhakaiḥ upasṛtān upaviśrambhayya jijīviṣūn śūla-sūtra-ādiṣu upaprotān krīḍanakatayā yātayanti te api ca pretya yama-yātanāsu śūla-ādiṣu prota-ātmānaḥ kṣut-tṛḍbhyām ca abhihatāḥ kaṅka-vaṭa-ādibhiḥ ca itaḥ tataḥ tigma-tuṇḍaiḥ āhanyamānāḥ ātma-śamalam smaranti
ye tu iha vai bhūtāni udvejayanti narāḥ ulbaṇa-svabhāvāḥ yathā dandaśūkāḥ te api pretya narake dandaśūka-ākhye nipatanti yatra nṛpa dandaśūkāḥ pañca-mukhāḥ sapta-mukhāḥ upasṛtya grasanti yathā bileśayān
ye tu iha vā andha-avaṭa kusūla guha-ādiṣu bhūtāni nirundhanti tathā amutra teṣu eva upaveśya sagareṇa vahninā dhūmena nirundhanti
yaḥ tu iha vā atithīn abhyāgatān vā gṛha-patiḥ asakṛt upagata manyuḥ didhakṣuḥ iva pāpena cakṣuṣā nirīkṣate tasya ca api niraye pāpa-dṛṣṭeḥ akṣiṇī vajra-tuṇḍāḥ gṛdhrāḥ kaṅka kāka vaṭa-ādayaḥ prasahya uru-balāt utpāṭayanti
yaḥ tu iha vā āḍhya-abhimatiḥ ahaṅkṛtiḥ tiryak-prekṣaṇaḥ sarvataḥ abhiviśaṅkī artha-vyaya-nāśa-cintayā pariśuṣyamāṇa hṛdaya-vadanaḥ nirvṛtim anavagataḥ grahaḥ iva artham abhirakṣati saḥ ca api pretya tat utpādana utkarṣaṇa saṁrakṣaṇa śamala-grahaḥ sūcīmukhe narake nipatati yatra ha vitta-graham pāpa-puruṣam dharmarāja-puruṣāḥ vāyakāḥ iva sarvataḥ aṅgeṣu sūtraiḥ parivayanti
evam-vidhāḥ narakāḥ yama-ālaye santi śataśaḥ sahasraśaḥ teṣu sarveṣu ca sarve eva adharma-vartinaḥ ye kecit iha uditāḥ anuditāḥ ca avani-pate paryāyeṇa viśanti tathā eva dharma-anuvartinaḥ itaratra iha tu punaḥ-bhave te ubhaya-śeṣābhyām niviśanti
nivṛtti-lakṣaṇa-mārgaḥ ādau eva vyākhyātaḥ etāvān eva aṇḍa-kośaḥ yaḥ caturdaśa-dhā purāṇeṣu vikalpitaḥ upagīyate yat tat bhagavataḥ nārāyaṇasya sākṣāt mahā-puruṣasya sthaviṣṭham rūpam ātma-māyā guṇa mayam anuvarṇitam ādṛtaḥ paṭhati śṛṇoti śrāvayati saḥ upageyam bhagavataḥ paramātmanaḥ agrāhyam api śraddhā bhakti viśuddha buddhiḥ veda
śrutvā sthūlam tathā sūkṣmam rūpam bhagavataḥ yatiḥ sthūle nirjitam ātmānam śanaiḥ sūkṣmam dhiyā nayet iti
bhū dvīpa varṣa sarit adri nabhaḥ samudra pātāla dik naraka bhāgaṇa-loka saṁsthā gītā mayā tava nṛpa adbhutam īśvarasya sthūlam vapuḥ sakala-jīva-nikāya dhāma
śrī-parīkṣit uvāca nivṛtti-mārgaḥ kathitaḥ ādau bhagavatā yathā krama yoga-upalabdhena brahmaṇā yat asaṁsṛtiḥ
pravṛtti lakṣaṇaḥ ca eva trai-guṇya viṣayaḥ mune yaḥ asau alīna-prakṛteḥ guṇa-sargaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
adharma-lakṣaṇāḥ nānā narakāḥ ca anuvarṇitāḥ manu-antaraḥ ca vyākhyātaḥ ādyaḥ svāyambhuvaḥ yataḥ
priyavrata uttānapadoḥ vaṁśaḥ tat-caritāni ca dvīpa varṣa samudra adri nadī udyāna vanaspatīn dharā-maṇḍala saṁsthānam bhāga lakṣaṇa mānataḥ jyotiṣām vivarāṇām ca yathā idam asṛjat vibhuḥ
adhunā iha mahā-bhāga yathā eva narakān naraḥ nānā ugra yātanān na īyāt tat me vyākhyātum arhasi
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca na cet iha eva apacitim yathā aṁhasaḥ kṛtasya kuryāt manaḥ ukta pāṇibhiḥ dhruvam saḥ vai pretya narakān upaiti ye kīrtitāḥ me bhavataḥ tigma-yātanāḥ
tasmāt purā eva āśu iha pāpa-niṣkṛtau yateta mṛtyoḥ avipadyata ātmanā doṣasya dṛṣṭvā guru-lāghavam yathā bhiṣak cikitseta rujām nidāna-vit
śrī-rājā uvāca dṛṣṭa śrutābhyām yat pāpam jānan api ātmanaḥ ahitam karoti bhūyaḥ vivaśaḥ prāyaścittam atho katham
kvacit nivartate abhadrāt kvacit carati tat punaḥ prāyaścittam atho apārtham manye kuñjara-śaucavat
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca karmaṇā karma-nirhāraḥ na hi ātyantikaḥ iṣyate avidvat-adhikāritvāt prāyaścittam vimarśanam
na aśnataḥ pathyam eva annam vyādhayaḥ abhibhavanti hi evam niyama-kṛt rājan śanaiḥ kṣemāya kalpate
tapasā brahmacaryeṇa śamena ca damena ca tyāgena satya śaucābhyām yamena niyamena vā deha-vāk-buddhi-jam dhīrāḥ dharma-jñāḥ śraddhayā anvitāḥ kṣipanti agham mahat api veṇu-gulmam iva analaḥ
kecit kevalayā bhaktyā vāsudeva parāyaṇāḥ agham dhunvanti kārtsnyena nīhāram iva bhāskaraḥ
na tathā hi agha-vān rājan pūyeta tapaḥ-ādibhiḥ yathā kṛṣṇa-arpita-prāṇaḥ tat-puruṣa-niṣevayā
sadhrīcīnaḥ hi ayam loke panthāḥ kṣemaḥ akutaḥ-bhayaḥ su-śīlāḥ sādhavaḥ yatra nārāyaṇa-parāyaṇāḥ
prāyaścittāni cīrṇāni nārāyaṇa-parāṅmukham na niṣpunanti rājendra surā-kumbham iva āpa-gāḥ
sakṛt manaḥ kṛṣṇa-pada-aravindayoḥ niveśitam tat guṇa-rāgi yaiḥ iha na te yamam pāśa-bhṛtaḥ ca tat bhaṭān svapne api paśyanti hi cīrṇa-niṣkṛtāḥ
atra ca udāharanti imam itihāsam purātanam dūtānām viṣṇu yamayoḥ saṁvādaḥ tam nibodha me
kānya-kubje dvijaḥ kaścit dāsī-patiḥ ajāmilaḥ nāmnā naṣṭa-sat-ācāraḥ dāsyāḥ saṁsarga-dūṣitaḥ
bandī-akṣaiḥ kaitavaiḥ cauryaiḥ garhitām vṛttim āsthitaḥ bibhrat kuṭumbam aśuciḥ yātayām āsa dehinaḥ
evam nivasataḥ tasya lālayānasya tat sutān kālaḥ atyagāt mahān rājan aṣṭāśītyā āyuṣaḥ samāḥ
tasya pravayasaḥ putrāḥ daśa teṣām tu yaḥ avamaḥ bālaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ nāmnā pitroḥ ca dayitaḥ bhṛśam
saḥ baddha-hṛdayaḥ tasmin arbhake kala-bhāṣiṇi nirīkṣamāṇaḥ tat līlām mumude jaraṭhaḥ bhṛśam
bhuñjānaḥ prapiban khādan bālakam sneha-yantritaḥ bhojayan pāyayan mūḍhaḥ na veda āgatam antakam
saḥ evam vartamānaḥ ajñaḥ mṛtyu-kāle upasthite matim cakāra tanaye bāle nārāyaṇa-āhvaye
saḥ pāśa-hastān trīn dṛṣṭvā puruṣān ati-dāruṇān vakra-tuṇḍān ūrdhva-romṇaḥ ātmānam netum āgatān dūre krīḍanaka-āsaktam putram nārāyaṇa-āhvayam plāvitena svareṇa uccaiḥ ājuhāva ākula-indriyaḥ
niśamya mriyamāṇasya mukhataḥ hari-kīrtanam bhartuḥ nāma mahā-rāja pārṣadāḥ sahasā āpatan
vikarṣataḥ antaḥ hṛdayāt dāsī-patim ajāmilam yama-preṣyān viṣṇu-dūtāḥ vārayām āsuḥ ojasā
ūcuḥ niṣedhitāḥ tān te vaivasvata puraḥ-sarāḥ ke yūyam pratiṣed-dhāraḥ dharma-rājasya śāsanam
kasya vā kutaḥ āyātāḥ kasmāt asya niṣedhatha kim devāḥ upadevāḥ yāḥ yūyam kim siddha-sat-tamāḥ
sarve padma-palāśa-akṣāḥ pīta kauśeya vāsasaḥ kirīṭinaḥ kuṇḍalinaḥ lasat puṣkara-mālinaḥ sarve ca nūtna-vayasaḥ sarve cāru catuḥ-bhujāḥ dhanuḥ niṣaṅga asi gadā śaṅkha cakra ambuja śriyaḥ diśaḥ vitimira ālokāḥ kurvantaḥ svena tejasā kim artham dharma-pālasya kiṅkarān naḥ niṣedhatha
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti ukte yamadūtaiḥ te vāsudeva-ukta-kāriṇaḥ tān pratyūcuḥ prahasya idam megha-nirhrādayā girā
śrī-viṣṇudūtāḥ ūcuḥ yūyam vai dharma-rājasya yadi nirdeśa-kāriṇaḥ brūta dharmasya naḥ tattvam yat ca adharmasya lakṣaṇam
katham svit dhriyate daṇḍaḥ kim vā asya sthānam īpsitam daṇḍyāḥ kim kāriṇaḥ sarve āho svit katicit nṛṇām
yamadūtāḥ ūcuḥ veda praṇihitaḥ dharmaḥ hi adharmaḥ tat-viparyayaḥ vedaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ sākṣāt svayam-bhūḥ iti śuśruma
yena sva-dhāmni amī bhāvāḥ rajaḥ-sattva-tamaḥ-mayāḥ guṇa nāma kriyā rūpaiḥ vibhāvyante yathā-tatham
sūryaḥ agniḥ kham marut devaḥ somaḥ sandhyā ahanī diśaḥ kam kuḥ svayam dharmaḥ iti hi ete daihyasya sākṣiṇaḥ
etaiḥ adharmaḥ vijñātaḥ sthānam daṇḍasya yujyate sarve karma-anurodhena daṇḍam arhanti kāriṇaḥ
sambhavanti hi bhadrāṇi viparītāni ca anaghāḥ kāriṇām guṇa-saṅgaḥ asti deha-vān na hi akarma-kṛt
yena yāvān yathā adharmaḥ dharmaḥ vā iha samīhitaḥ saḥ eva tat-phalam bhuṅkte tathā tāvat amutra vai
yathā iha deva-pravarāḥ trai-vidhyam upalabhyate bhūteṣu guṇa-vaicitryāt tathā anyatra anumīyate
vartamānaḥ anyayoḥ kālaḥ guṇa-abhijñāpakaḥ yathā evam janma anyayoḥ etat dharma adharma nidarśanam
manasā eva pure devaḥ pūrva-rūpam vipaśyati anumīmāṁsate apūrvam manasā bhagavān ajaḥ
yathā ajñaḥ tamasā yuktaḥ upāste vyaktam eva hi na veda pūrvam aparam naṣṭa janma-smṛtiḥ tathā
pañcabhiḥ kurute sva-arthān pañca veda atha pañcabhiḥ ekaḥ tu ṣoḍaśena trīn svayam saptadaśaḥ aśnute
tat etat ṣoḍaśa-kalam liṅgam śakti-trayam mahat dhatte anusaṁsṛtim puṁsi harṣa śoka bhaya ārti dām
dehī ajñaḥ ajita-ṣaṭ-vargaḥ na icchan karmāṇi kāryate kośakāraḥ iva ātmānam karmaṇā ācchādya muhyati
na hi kaścit kṣaṇam api jātu tiṣṭhati akarma-kṛt kāryate hi avaśaḥ karma guṇaiḥ svābhāvikaiḥ balāt
labdhvā nimittam avyaktam vyakta-avyaktam bhavati uta yathā-yoni yathā-bījam sva-bhāvena balīyasā
eṣaḥ prakṛti-saṅgena puruṣasya viparyayaḥ āsīt saḥ eva na cirāt īśa-saṅgāt vilīyate
ayam hi śruta-sampannaḥ śīla vṛtta guṇa ālayaḥ dhṛta-vrataḥ mṛduḥ dāntaḥ satya-vāk mantra-vit śuciḥ guru agni atithi vṛddhānām śuśrūṣuḥ anahaṅkṛtaḥ sarva-bhūta-suhṛt sādhuḥ mita-vāk anasūyakaḥ
ekadā asau vanam yātaḥ pitṛ sandeśa kṛt dvijaḥ ādāya tataḥ āvṛttaḥ phala-puṣpa samit-kuśān dadarśa kāminam kañcit śūdram saha bhujiṣyayā pītvā ca madhu maireyam mada āghūrṇita netrayā mattayā viślathat-nīvyā vyapetam nirapatrapam krīḍantam anugāyantam hasantam anayā antike
dṛṣṭvā tām kāma-liptena bāhunā parirambhitām jagāma hṛt-śaya vaśam sahasā eva vimohitaḥ
stambhayan ātmanā ātmānam yāvat sattvam yathā-śrutam na śaśāka samādhātum manaḥ madana-vepitam
tat-nimitta smara-vyāja graha-grastaḥ vicetanaḥ tām eva manasā dhyāyan sva-dharmāt virarāma ha
tām eva toṣayām āsa pitryeṇa arthena yāvatā grāmyaiḥ manaḥ-ramaiḥ kāmaiḥ prasīdeta yathā tathā
viprām sva-bhāryām aprauḍhām kule mahati lambhitām visasarja acirāt pāpaḥ svairiṇyā apāṅga-viddha-dhīḥ
yataḥ tataḥ ca upaninye nyāyataḥ anyāyataḥ dhanam babhāra asyāḥ kuṭum-binyāḥ kuṭumbam manda-dhīḥ ayam
yat asau śāstram ullaṅghya svaira-cārī ati-garhitaḥ avartata ciram kālam agha-āyuḥ aśuciḥ malāt
tataḥ enam daṇḍa-pāṇeḥ sakāśam kṛta-kilbiṣam neṣyāmaḥ akṛta-nirveśam yatra daṇḍena śuddhyati
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca evam te bhagavat-dūtāḥ yamadūta abhibhāṣitam upadhārya atha tān rājan pratyāhuḥ naya-kovidāḥ
śrī-viṣṇudūtāḥ ūcuḥ aho kaṣṭam dharma-dṛśām adharmaḥ spṛśate sabhām yatra adaṇḍyeṣu apāpeṣu daṇḍaḥ yaiḥ dhriyate vṛthā
prajānām pitaraḥ ye ca śāstāraḥ sādhavaḥ samāḥ yadi syāt teṣu vaiṣamyam kam yānti śaraṇam prajāḥ
yat yat ācarati śreyān itaraḥ tat tat īhate saḥ yat pramāṇam kurute lokaḥ tat anuvartate
yasya aṅke śiraḥ ādhāya lokaḥ svapiti nirvṛtaḥ svayam dharmam adharmam vā na hi veda yathā paśuḥ saḥ katham nyarpita-ātmānam kṛta-maitram acetanam visrambhaṇīyaḥ bhūtānām sa-ghṛṇaḥ dogdhum arhati
ayam hi kṛta-nirveśaḥ janma koṭi aṁhasām api yat vyājahāra vivaśaḥ nāma svasti-ayanam hareḥ
etena eva hi aghonaḥ asya kṛtam syāt agha niṣkṛtam yadā nārāyaṇa āya iti jagāda catuḥ-akṣaram
stenaḥ surā-paḥ mitra-dhruk brahma-hā guru-talpa-gaḥ strī rāja pitṛ go hantā ye ca pātakinaḥ apare sarveṣām api agha-vatām idam eva su-niṣkṛtam nāma-vyāharaṇam viṣṇoḥ yataḥ tat-viṣayā matiḥ
na niṣkṛtaiḥ uditaiḥ brahma-vādibhiḥ tathā viśuddhyati agha-vān vrata-ādibhiḥ yathā hareḥ nāma-padaiḥ udāhṛtaiḥ tat uttamaśloka guṇa upalambhakam
na aikāntikam tat hi kṛte api niṣkṛte manaḥ punaḥ dhāvati cet asat-pathe tat karma-nirhāram abhīpsatām hareḥ guṇa-anuvādaḥ khalu sattva-bhāvanaḥ
atha enam mā apanayata kṛta aśeṣa agha-niṣkṛtam yat asau bhagavat-nāma mriyamāṇaḥ samagrahīt
sāṅketyam pārihāsyam vā stobham helanam eva vā vaikuṇṭha nāma-grahaṇam aśeṣa agha-haram viduḥ
patitaḥ skhalitaḥ bhagnaḥ sandaṣṭaḥ taptaḥ āhataḥ hariḥ iti avaśena āha pumān na arhati yātanāḥ
gurūṇām ca laghūnām ca gurūṇi ca laghūni ca prāyaścittāni pāpānām jñātvā uktāni mahā-ṛṣibhiḥ
taiḥ tāni aghāni pūyante tapaḥ dāna vrata-ādibhiḥ na adharma-jam tat hṛdayam tat api īśa-aṅghri sevayā
ajñānāt athavā jñānāt uttamaśloka nāma yat saṅkīrtitam agham puṁsaḥ dahet edhaḥ yathā analaḥ
yathā agadam vīrya-tamam upayuktam yadṛcchayā ajānataḥ api ātma-guṇam kuryāt mantraḥ api udāhṛtaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca te evam su-vinirṇīya dharmam bhāgavatam nṛpa tam yāmya-pāśāt nirmucya vipram mṛtyoḥ amūmucan
iti pratyuditāḥ yāmyāḥ dūtāḥ yātvā yama-antikam yama-rājñe yathā sarvam ācacakṣuḥ arindama
dvijaḥ pāśāt vinirmuktaḥ gata-bhīḥ prakṛtim gataḥ vavande śirasā viṣṇoḥ kiṅkarān darśana-utsavaḥ
tam vivakṣum abhipretya mahāpuruṣa-kiṅkarāḥ sahasā paśyataḥ tasya tatra antardadhire anagha
ajāmilaḥ api atha ākarṇya dūtānām yama-kṛṣṇayoḥ dharmam bhāgavatam śuddham trai-vedyam ca guṇa-aśrayam bhakti-mān bhagavati āśu māhātmya śravaṇāt hareḥ anutāpaḥ mahān āsīt smarataḥ aśubham ātmanaḥ
aho me paramam kaṣṭam abhūt avijita-ātmanaḥ yena viplāvitam brahma vṛṣalyām jāyatā ātmanā
dhik mām vigarhitam sadbhiḥ duṣkṛtam kula-kajjalam hitvā bālām satīm yaḥ aham surā-pīm asatīm agām
vṛddhau anāthau pitarau na anya-bandhū tapasvinau aho mayā adhunā tyaktau akṛta-jñena nīca-vat
saḥ aham vyaktam patiṣyāmi narake bhṛśa-dāruṇe dharma-ghnāḥ kāminaḥ yatra vindanti yama-yātanāḥ
kim idam svapne āho svit sākṣāt dṛṣṭam iha adbhutam kva yātāḥ adya te ye mām vyakarṣan pāśa-pāṇayaḥ
atha te kva gatāḥ siddhāḥ catvāraḥ cāru-darśanāḥ vyāmocayan nīyamānam baddhvā pāśaiḥ adhaḥ bhuvaḥ
atha api me durbhagasya vibudha-uttama darśane bhavitavyam maṅgalena yena ātmā me prasīdati
anyathā mriyamāṇasya na aśuceḥ vṛṣalī-pateḥ vaikuṇṭha nāma-grahaṇam jihvā vaktum iha arhati
kva ca aham kitavaḥ pāpaḥ brahma-ghnaḥ nirapatrapaḥ kva ca nārāyaṇa iti etat bhagavat-nāma maṅgalam
saḥ aham tathā yatiṣyāmi yata-citta-indriya anilaḥ yathā na bhūyaḥ ātmānam andhe tamasi majjaye
vimucya tam imam bandham avidyā kāma karma-jam sarva-bhūta suhṛt śāntaḥ maitraḥ karuṇaḥ ātma-vān mocaye grastam ātmānam yoṣit-mayyā ātma-māyayā vikrīḍitaḥ yayā eva aham krīḍā-mṛgaḥ iva adhamaḥ
mama aham iti deha-ādau hitvā amithyā artha dhīḥ matim dhāsye manaḥ bhagavati śuddham tat kīrtana-ādibhiḥ
iti jāta-sunirvedaḥ kṣaṇa-saṅgena sādhuṣu gaṅgā-dvāram upeyāya mukta sarva-anubandhanaḥ
saḥ tasmin deva-sadane āsīnaḥ yogam āsthitaḥ pratyāhṛta indriya-grāmaḥ yuyoja manaḥ ātmani
tataḥ guṇebhyaḥ ātmānam viyujya ātma-samādhinā yuyuje bhagavat-dhāmni brahmaṇi anubhava-ātmani
yarhi upārata-dhīḥ tasmin adrākṣīt puruṣān puraḥ upalabhya upalabdhān prāk vavande śirasā dvijaḥ
hitvā kalevaram tīrthe gaṅgāyām darśanāt anu sadyaḥ sva-rūpam jagṛhe bhagavat-pārśva-vartinām
sākam vihāyasā vipraḥ mahāpuruṣa-kiṅkaraiḥ haimam vimānam āruhya yayau yatra śriyaḥ patiḥ
evam saḥ viplāvita-sarva-dharmāḥ dāsyāḥ patiḥ patitaḥ garhya-karmaṇā nipātyamānaḥ niraye hata-vrataḥ sadyaḥ vimuktaḥ bhagavat-nāma gṛhṇan
na ataḥ param karma-nibandha kṛntanam mumukṣatām tīrtha-pāda anukīrtanāt na yat punaḥ karmasu sajjate manaḥ rajaḥ-tamobhyām kalilam tataḥ anyathā
yaḥ etam paramam guhyam itihāsam agha-apaham śṛṇuyāt śraddhayā yuktaḥ yaḥ ca bhaktyā anukīrtayet na vai saḥ narakam yāti na īkṣitaḥ yama-kiṅkaraiḥ yadi api amaṅgalaḥ martyaḥ viṣṇu-loke mahīyate
mriyamāṇaḥ hareḥ nāma gṛṇan putra-upacāritam ajāmilaḥ api agāt dhāma kim uta śraddhayā gṛṇan
śrī-rājā uvāca niśamya devaḥ sva-bhaṭa upavarṇitam pratyāha kim tān api dharma-rājaḥ evam hata-ājñaḥ vihatān murāreḥ naideśikaiḥ yasya vaśe janaḥ ayam
yamasya devasya na daṇḍa-bhaṅgaḥ kutaścana ṛṣe śruta-pūrvaḥ āsīt etat mune vṛścati loka-saṁśayam na hi tvat-anyaḥ iti me viniścitam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca bhagavat-puruṣaiḥ rājan yāmyāḥ pratihata-udyamāḥ patim vijñāpayām āsuḥ yamam saṁyamanī-patim
yamadūtāḥ ūcuḥ kati santi iha śāstāraḥ jīva-lokasya vai prabho trai-vidhyam kurvataḥ karma phala abhivyakti hetavaḥ
yadi syuḥ bahavaḥ loke śāstāraḥ daṇḍa-dhāriṇaḥ kasya syātām na vā kasya mṛtyuḥ ca amṛtam eva vā
kintu śāstṛ bahutve syāt bahūnām iha karmiṇām śāstṛtvam upacāraḥ hi yathā maṇḍala-vartinām
ataḥ tvam ekaḥ bhūtānām sa-īśvarāṇām adhīśvaraḥ śāstā daṇḍa-dharaḥ nṝṇām śubha-aśubha-vivecanaḥ
tasya te vihitaḥ daṇḍaḥ na loke vartate adhunā caturbhiḥ adbhutaiḥ siddhaiḥ ājñā te vipralambhitā
nīyamānam tava ādeśāt asmābhiḥ yātanā-gṛhān vyāmocayan pātakinam chittvā pāśān prasahya te
tān te veditum icchāmaḥ yadi naḥ manyase kṣamam nārāyaṇa iti abhihite mā bhaiḥ iti āyayuḥ drutam
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca iti devaḥ saḥ āpṛṣṭaḥ prajā-saṁyamanaḥ yamaḥ prītaḥ sva-dūtān pratyāha smaran pāda-ambujam hareḥ
yamaḥ uvāca paraḥ mat anyaḥ jagataḥ tasthuṣaḥ ca otam protam paṭavat yatra viśvam yat aṁśataḥ asya sthiti janma nāśāḥ nasi ota-vat yasya vaśe ca lokaḥ
yaḥ nāmabhiḥ vāci janam nijāyām badhnāti tantryām iva dāmabhiḥ gāḥ yasmai balim te ime nāma-karma nibandha baddhāḥ cakitāḥ vahanti
aham mahendraḥ nirṛtiḥ pracetāḥ somaḥ agniḥ īśaḥ pavanaḥ viriñciḥ āditya viśve vasavaḥ atha sādhyāḥ marut-gaṇāḥ rudra-gaṇāḥ sa-siddhāḥ anye ca ye viśva-sṛjaḥ amara-īśāḥ bhṛgu-ādayaḥ aspṛṣṭa rajaḥ-tamaskāḥ yasya īhitam na viduḥ spṛṣṭa-māyāḥ sattva-pradhānāḥ api kim tataḥ anye
yam vai na gobhiḥ manasā asubhiḥ vā hṛdā girā vā asu-bhṛtaḥ vicakṣate ātmānam antaḥ-hṛdi santam ātmanām cakṣuḥ yathā eva ākṛtayaḥ tataḥ param
tasya ātma-tantrasya hareḥ adhīśituḥ parasya māyā-adhipateḥ mahā-ātmanaḥ prāyeṇa dūtāḥ iha vai manoharāḥ caranti tat rūpa guṇa svabhāvāḥ
bhūtāni viṣṇoḥ sura-pūjitāni durdarśa-liṅgāni mahā-adbhutāni rakṣanti tat-bhakti-mataḥ parebhyaḥ mattaḥ ca martyān atha sarvataḥ ca
dharmam tu sākṣāt bhagavat praṇītam na vai viduḥ ṛṣayaḥ na api devāḥ na siddha-mukhyāḥ asurāḥ manuṣyāḥ kutaḥ nu vidyādhara cāraṇa ādayaḥ
svayambhūḥ nāradaḥ śambhuḥ kumāraḥ kapilaḥ manuḥ prahlādaḥ janakaḥ bhīṣmaḥ baliḥ vaiyāsakiḥ vayam dvādaśa ete vijānīmaḥ dharmam bhāgavatam bhaṭāḥ guhyam viśuddham durbodham yam jñātvā amṛtam aśnute
etāvān eva loke asmin puṁsām dharmaḥ paraḥ smṛtaḥ bhakti-yogaḥ bhagavati tat nāma grahaṇa-ādibhiḥ
nāma uccāraṇa māhātmyam hareḥ paśyata putrakāḥ ajāmilaḥ api yena eva mṛtyu-pāśāt amucyata
etāvatā alam agha-nirharaṇāya puṁsām saṅkīrtanam bhagavataḥ guṇa karma-nāmnām vikruśya putram aghavān yat ajāmilaḥ api nārāyaṇa iti mriyamāṇaḥ iyāya muktim
prāyeṇa veda tat idam na mahājanaḥ ayam devyā vimohita-matiḥ bata māyayā alam trayyām jaḍī-kṛta-matiḥ madhu-puṣpitāyām vaitānike mahati karmaṇi yujyamānaḥ
evam vimṛśya su-dhiyaḥ bhagavati anante sarva-ātmanā vidadhate khalu bhāva-yogam te me na daṇḍam arhanti atha yadi amīṣām syāt pātakam tat api hanti urugāya-vādaḥ
te deva siddha parigīta pavitra-gāthāḥ ye sādhavaḥ samadṛśaḥ bhagavat-prapannāḥ tān na upasīdata hareḥ gadayā abhiguptān na eṣām vayam na ca vayaḥ prabhavāma daṇḍe
tān ānayadhvam asataḥ vimukhān mukunda pāda-aravinda makaranda rasāt ajasram niṣkiñcanaiḥ paramahaṁsa-kulaiḥ asaṅgaiḥ juṣṭāt gṛhe niraya-vartmani baddha-tṛṣṇān
jihvā na vakti bhagavat guṇa nāma dheyam cetaḥ ca na smarati tat caraṇa-aravindam kṛṣṇāya no namati yat śiraḥ ekadā api tān ānayadhvam asataḥ akṛta viṣṇu-kṛtyān
tat kṣamyatām saḥ bhagavān puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ sva-puruṣaiḥ yat asat kṛtam naḥ svānām aho na viduṣām racita-añjalīnām kṣāntiḥ garīyasi namaḥ puruṣāya bhūmne
tasmāt saṅkīrtanam viṣṇoḥ jagat-maṅgalam aṁhasām mahatām api kauravya viddhi aikāntika niṣkṛtam
śṛṇvatām gṛṇatām vīryāṇi uddāmāni hareḥ muhuḥ yathā su-jātayā bhaktyā śuddhyet na ātmā vrata-ādibhiḥ
kṛṣṇa-aṅghri-padma madhu liṭ na punaḥ visṛṣṭa māyā-guṇeṣu ramate vṛjina-avaheṣu anyaḥ tu kāma-hataḥ ātma-rajaḥ pramārṣṭum īheta karma yataḥ eva rajaḥ punaḥ syāt
ittham sva-bhartṛ-gaditam bhagavat-mahitvam saṁsmṛtya vismita-dhiyaḥ yama-kiṅkarāḥ te na eva acyuta-āśraya-janam pratiśaṅkamānāḥ draṣṭum ca bibhyati tataḥ prabhṛti sma rājan
itihāsam imam guhyam bhagavān kumbha-sambhavaḥ kathayām āsa malaye āsīnaḥ harim arcayan
śrī-rājā uvāca deva-asura-nṛṇām sargaḥ nāgānām mṛga-pakṣiṇām sāmāsikaḥ tvayā proktaḥ yaḥ tu svāyambhuve antare tasya eva vyāsam icchāmi jñātum te bhagavan yathā anusargam yayā śaktyā sasarja bhagavān paraḥ
śrī-sūtaḥ uvāca iti sampraśnam ākarṇya rājarṣeḥ bādarāyaṇiḥ pratinandya mahā-yogī jagāda muni-sattamāḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca yadā pracetasaḥ putrāḥ daśa prācīnabarhiṣaḥ antaḥ-samudrāt unmagnāḥ dadṛśuḥ gām drumaiḥ vṛtām
drumebhyaḥ krudhyamānāḥ te tapaḥ-dīpita-manyavaḥ mukhataḥ vāyum agnim ca sasṛjuḥ tat didhakṣayā
tābhyām nirdahyamānān tān upalabhya kurūdvaha rājā uvāca mahān somaḥ manyum praśamayan iva
na drumebhyaḥ mahā-bhāgāḥ dīnebhyaḥ drogdhum arhatha vivardhayiṣavaḥ yūyam prajānām patayaḥ smṛtāḥ
aho prajāpati-patiḥ bhagavān hariḥ avyayaḥ vanaspatīn oṣadhīḥ ca sasarja ūrjam iṣam vibhuḥ
annam carāṇām acarāḥ hi apadaḥ pāda-cāriṇām ahastāḥ hasta-yuktānām dvi-padām ca catuḥ-padaḥ
yūyam ca pitrā anvādiṣṭāḥ deva-devena ca anaghāḥ prajā-sargāya hi katham vṛkṣān nirdagdhum arhatha
ātiṣṭhata satām mārgam kopam yacchata dīpitam pitrā pitāmahena api juṣṭam vaḥ prapitāmahaiḥ
tokānām pitarau bandhū dṛśaḥ pakṣma striyāḥ patiḥ patiḥ prajānām bhikṣūṇām gṛhī ajñānām budhaḥ su-hṛt
antaḥ deheṣu bhūtānām ātmā āste hariḥ īśvaraḥ sarvam tat-dhiṣṇyam īkṣadhvam evam vaḥ toṣitaḥ hi asau
yaḥ samutpatitam dehe ākāśāt manyum ulbaṇam ātma-jijñāsayā yacchet saḥ guṇān ativartate
alam dagdhaiḥ drumaiḥ dīnaiḥ khilānām śivam astu vaḥ vārkṣī hi eṣā varā kanyā patnītve pratigṛhyatām
iti āmantrya vara-ārohām kanyām āpsarasīm nṛpa somaḥ rājā yayau dattvā te dharmeṇa upayemire
tebhyaḥ tasyām samabhavat dakṣaḥ prācetasaḥ kila yasya prajā-visargeṇa lokāḥ āpūritāḥ trayaḥ
yathā sasarja bhūtāni dakṣaḥ duhitṛ-vatsalaḥ retasā manasā ca eva tat mama avahitaḥ śṛṇu
manasā eva asṛjat pūrvam prajāpatiḥ imāḥ prajāḥ deva asura manuṣya-ādīn nabhaḥ sthala jala okasaḥ
tam abṛṁhitam ālokya prajā-sargam prajāpatiḥ vindhya-pādān upavrajya saḥ acarat duṣkaram tapaḥ
tatra aghamarṣaṇam nāma tīrtham pāpa-haram param upaspṛśya anusavanam tapasā atoṣayat harim
astauṣīt haṁsa-guhyena bhagavantam adhokṣajam tubhyam tat abhidhāsyāmi kasya atuṣyat yathā hariḥ
śrī-prajāpatiḥ uvāca namaḥ parāya avitatha anubhūtaye guṇa-traya ābhāsa nimitta bandhave adṛṣṭa-dhāmne guṇa-tattva-buddhibhiḥ nivṛtta-mānāya dadhe svayambhuve
na yasya sakhyam puruṣaḥ avaiti sakhyuḥ sakhā vasan saṁvasataḥ pure asmin guṇaḥ yathā guṇinaḥ vyakta-dṛṣṭeḥ tasmai mahā-īśāya namaskaromi
dehaḥ asavaḥ akṣāḥ manavaḥ bhūta-mātrām ātmānam anyam ca viduḥ param yat sarvam pumān veda guṇān ca tat-jñaḥ na veda sarva-jñam anantam īḍe
yadā uparāmaḥ manasaḥ nāma-rūpa rūpasya dṛṣṭa smṛti sampramoṣāt yaḥ īyate kevalayā sva-saṁsthayā haṁsāya tasmai śuci-sadmane namaḥ
manīṣiṇaḥ antaḥ-hṛdi sanniveśitam sva-śaktibhiḥ navabhiḥ ca trivṛdbhiḥ vahnim yathā dāruṇi pāñcadaśyam manīṣayā niṣkarṣanti gūḍham saḥ vai mama aśeṣa viśeṣa māyā niṣedha nirvāṇa sukha-anubhūtiḥ saḥ sarva-nāmā saḥ ca viśva-rūpaḥ prasīdatām anirukta ātma-śaktiḥ
yat yat niruktam vacasā nirūpitam dhiyā akṣabhiḥ vā manasā uta yasya mā bhūt sva-rūpam guṇa-rūpam hi tat tat saḥ vai guṇa-apāya visarga lakṣaṇaḥ
yasmin yataḥ yena ca yasya yasmai yat yaḥ yathā kurute kāryate ca para-avareṣām paramam prāk prasiddham tat brahma tat hetuḥ ananyat ekam
yat-śaktayaḥ vadatām vādinām vai vivāda saṁvāda bhuvaḥ bhavanti kurvanti ca eṣām muhuḥ ātma-moham tasmai namaḥ ananta guṇāya bhūmne
asti iti na asti iti ca vastu-niṣṭhayoḥ eka-sthayoḥ bhinna viruddha-dharmaṇoḥ avekṣitam kiñcana yoga-sāṅkhyayoḥ samam param hi anukūlam bṛhat tat
yaḥ anugraha-artham bhajatām pāda-mūlam anāma rūpaḥ bhagavān anantaḥ nāmāni rūpāṇi ca janma-karmabhiḥ bheje saḥ mahyam paramaḥ prasīdatu
yaḥ prākṛtaiḥ jñāna-pathaiḥ janānām yathā-āśayam deha-gataḥ vibhāti yathā anilaḥ pārthivam āśritaḥ guṇam saḥ īśvaraḥ me kurutām manoratham
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti stutaḥ saṁstuvataḥ saḥ tasmin aghamarṣaṇe prādurāsīt kuru-śreṣṭha bhagavān bhakta-vatsalaḥ kṛta-pādaḥ suparṇa-aṁse pralamba aṣṭa-mahā-bhujaḥ cakra śaṅkha asi carma iṣu dhanuḥ pāśa gadā dharaḥ pīta-vāsāḥ ghana-śyāmaḥ prasanna vadana īkṣaṇaḥ vana-mālā nivīta-aṅgaḥ lasat śrīvatsa-kaustubhaḥ mahā-kirīṭa kaṭakaḥ sphurat makara-kuṇḍalaḥ kāñcī aṅgulīya valaya nūpura aṅgada bhūṣitaḥ trai-lokya-mohanam rūpam bibhrat tri-bhuvana īśvaraḥ vṛtaḥ nārada nanda-ādyaiḥ pārṣadaiḥ sura-yūthapaiḥ stūyamānaḥ anugāyadbhiḥ siddha-gandharva-cāraṇaiḥ
rūpam tat mahat-āścaryam vicakṣya āgata-sādhvasaḥ nanāma daṇḍa-vat bhūmau prahṛṣṭa-ātmā prajāpatiḥ
na kiñcana udīrayitum aśakat tīvrayā mudā āpūrita manaḥ-dvāraiḥ hradinyaḥ iva nirjharaiḥ
tam tathā avanatam bhaktam prajā-kāmam prajāpatim citta-jñaḥ sarva-bhūtānām idam āha janārdanaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca prācetasa mahā-bhāga saṁsiddhaḥ tapasā bhavān yat śraddhayā mat-parayā mayi bhāvam param gataḥ
prītaḥ aham te prajā-nātha yat te asya udbṛṁhaṇam tapaḥ mama eṣaḥ kāmaḥ bhūtānām yat bhūyāsuḥ vibhūtayaḥ
brahmā bhavaḥ bhavantaḥ ca manavaḥ vibudha-īśvarāḥ vibhūtayaḥ mama hi etāḥ bhūtānām bhūti hetavaḥ
tapaḥ me hṛdayam brahman tanuḥ vidyā kriyā ākṛtiḥ aṅgāni kratavaḥ jātāḥ dharmaḥ ātmā asavaḥ surāḥ
aham eva āsam eva agre na anyat kiñca antaram bahiḥ saṁjñāna-mātram avyaktam prasuptam iva viśvataḥ
mayi ananta-guṇe anante guṇataḥ guṇa-vigrahaḥ yadā āsīt tataḥ eva ādyaḥ svayambhūḥ samabhūt ajaḥ
saḥ vai yadā mahā-devaḥ mama vīrya-upabṛṁhitaḥ mene khilam iva ātmānam udyataḥ svarga-karmaṇi atha me abhihitaḥ devaḥ tapaḥ atapyata dāruṇam nava viśva-sṛjaḥ yuṣmān yena ādau asṛjat vibhuḥ
eṣā pañcajanasya aṅga duhitā vai prajāpateḥ asiknī nāma patnītve prajeśa pratigṛhyatām
mithuna vyavāya dharmaḥ tvam prajā-sargam imam punaḥ mithuna vyavāya-dharmiṇyām bhūriśaḥ bhāvayiṣyasi
tvattaḥ adhastāt prajāḥ sarvāḥ mithunī-bhūya māyayā madīyayā bhaviṣyanti hariṣyanti ca me balim
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti uktvā miṣataḥ tasya bhagavān viśva-bhāvanaḥ svapna-upalabdha-arthaḥ iva tatra eva antardadhe hariḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tasyām saḥ pāñcajanyām vai viṣṇu-māyā-upabṛṁhitaḥ haryaśva-saṁjñān ayutam putrān ajanayat vibhuḥ
apṛthak dharma-śīlāḥ te sarve dākṣāyaṇāḥ nṛpa pitrā proktāḥ prajā-sarge pratīcīm prayayuḥ diśam
tatra nārāyaṇa-saraḥ tīrtham sindhu-samudrayoḥ saṅgamaḥ yatra su-mahat muni siddha niṣevitam
tat upasparśanāt eva vinirdhūta mala-āśayāḥ dharme pāramahaṁsye ca protpanna matayaḥ api uta tepire tapaḥ eva ugram pitṛ-ādeśena yantritāḥ prajā-vivṛddhaye yattān devarṣiḥ tān dadarśa ha
uvāca ca atha haryaśvāḥ katham srakṣyatha vai prajāḥ adṛṣṭvā antam bhuvaḥ yūyam bāliśāḥ bata pālakāḥ tathā eka puruṣam rāṣṭram bilam ca adṛṣṭa-nirgamam bahu-rūpām striyam ca api pumāṁsam puṁścalī-patim nadīm ubhayataḥ vāhām pañca-pañca adbhutam gṛham kvacit haṁsam citra-katham kṣaura-pavyam svayam bhrami
katham sva-pituḥ ādeśam avidvāṁsaḥ vipaścitaḥ anurūpam avijñāya aho sargam kariṣyatha
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tat niśamya atha haryaśvāḥ autpattika manīṣayā vācaḥ kūṭam tu devarṣeḥ svayam vimamṛśuḥ dhiyā
bhūḥ kṣetram jīva-saṁjñam yat anādi nija-bandhanam adṛṣṭvā tasya nirvāṇam kim asat-karmabhiḥ bhavet
ekaḥ eva īśvaraḥ turyaḥ bhagavān sva-āśrayaḥ paraḥ tam adṛṣṭvā abhavam puṁsaḥ kim asat-karmabhiḥ bhavet
pumān na eva eti yat gatvā bila-svargam gataḥ yathā pratyak-dhāma avidaḥ iha kim asat-karmabhiḥ bhavet
nānā rūpā ātmanaḥ buddhiḥ svairiṇī iva guṇa-anvitā tat-niṣṭhām agatasya iha kim asat-karmabhiḥ bhavet
tat-saṅga bhraṁśita aiśvaryam saṁsarantam ku-bhārya-vat tat-gatīḥ abudhasya iha kim asat-karmabhiḥ bhavet
sṛṣṭi apyaya karīm māyām velā-kūla-anta vegitām mattasya tām avijñasya kim asat-karmabhiḥ bhavet
pañca-viṁśati tattvānām puruṣaḥ adbhuta-darpaṇaḥ adhyātmam abudhasya iha kim asat-karmabhiḥ bhavet
aiśvaram śāstram utsṛjya bandha mokṣa anudarśanam vivikta-padam ajñāya kim asat-karmabhiḥ bhavet
kāla-cakram bhrami tīkṣṇam sarvam niṣkarṣayat jagat sva-tantram abudhasya iha kim asat-karmabhiḥ bhavet
śāstrasya pituḥ ādeśam yaḥ na veda nivartakam katham tat-anurūpāya guṇa-visrambhī upakramet
iti vyavasitāḥ rājan haryaśvāḥ eka-cetasaḥ prayayuḥ tam parikramya panthānam anivartanam
svara-brahmaṇi nirbhāta hṛṣīkeśa padāmbuje akhaṇḍam cittam āveśya lokān anucarat muniḥ
nāśam niśamya putrāṇām nāradāt śīla-śālinām anvatapyata kaḥ śocan su-prajastvam śucām padam
saḥ bhūyaḥ pāñcajanyāyām ajena parisāntvitaḥ putrān ajanayat dakṣaḥ savalāśvān sahasriṇaḥ
te ca pitrā samādiṣṭāḥ prajā-sarge dhṛta-vratāḥ nārāyaṇa-saraḥ jagmuḥ yatra siddhāḥ sva-pūrva-jāḥ
tat upasparśanāt eva vinirdhūta mala-āśayāḥ japantaḥ brahma paramam tepuḥ tatra mahat tapaḥ
ap-bhakṣāḥ katicit māsān katicit vāyu-bhojanāḥ ārādhayan mantram imam abhyasyantaḥ iḍaḥ-patim om namaḥ nārāyaṇāya puruṣāya mahā-ātmane viśuddha-sattva-dhiṣṇyāya mahā-haṁsāya dhīmahi
iti tān api rājendra prajā-sarga-dhiyaḥ muniḥ upetya nāradaḥ prāha vācaḥ kūṭāni pūrva-vat
dākṣāyaṇāḥ saṁśṛṇuta gadataḥ nigamam mama anvicchata anupadavīm bhrātṝṇām bhrātṛ-vatsalāḥ
bhrātṝṇām prāyaṇam bhrātā yaḥ anutiṣṭhati dharma-vit saḥ puṇya-bandhuḥ puruṣaḥ marudbhiḥ saha modate
etāvat uktvā prayayau nāradaḥ amogha-darśanaḥ te api ca anvagaman mārgam bhrātṝṇām eva māriṣa
sadhrīcīnam pratīcīnam parasya anupatham gatāḥ na adya api te nivartante paścimāḥ yāminīḥ iva
etasmin kāle utpātān bahūn paśyan prajāpatiḥ pūrva-vat nārada kṛtam putra-nāśam upāśṛṇot
cukrodha nāradāya asau putra-śoka vimūrcchitaḥ devarṣim upalabhya āha roṣāt visphurita adharaḥ
śrī-dakṣaḥ uvāca aho asādho sādhūnām sādhu-liṅgena naḥ tvayā asādhu akāri arbhakāṇām bhikṣoḥ mārgaḥ pradarśitaḥ
ṛṇaiḥ tribhiḥ amuktānām amīmāṁsita karmaṇām vighātaḥ śreyasaḥ pāpa lokayoḥ ubhayoḥ kṛtaḥ
evam tvam niranukrośaḥ bālānām mati-bhit hareḥ pārṣada-madhye carasi yaśaḥ-hā nirapatrapaḥ
nanu bhāgavatāḥ nityam bhūta-anugraha-kātarāḥ ṛte tvām sauhṛda-ghnam vai vairam-karam avairiṇām
na ittham puṁsām virāgaḥ syāt tvayā kevalinā mṛṣā manyase yadi upaśamam sneha-pāśa nikṛntanam
na anubhūya na jānāti pumān viṣaya-tīkṣṇatām nirvidyate svayam tasmāt na tathā bhinna-dhīḥ paraiḥ
yat naḥ tvam karma-sandhānām sādhūnām gṛha-medhinām kṛtavān asi durmarṣam vipriyam tava marṣitam
tantu-kṛntana yat naḥ tvam abhadram acaraḥ punaḥ tasmāt lokeṣu te mūḍha na bhavet bhramataḥ padam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca pratijagrāha tat bāḍham nāradaḥ sādhu-sammataḥ etāvān sādhu-vādaḥ hi titikṣeta īśvaraḥ svayam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tataḥ prācetasaḥ asiknyām anunītaḥ svayambhuvā ṣaṣṭim sañjanayām āsa duhitṝḥ pitṛ-vatsalāḥ
daśa dharmāya kāya adāt dvi-ṣaṭ tri-nava ca indave bhūta-aṅgiraḥ-kṛśāśvebhyaḥ dve dve tārkṣyāya ca aparāḥ
nāmadheyāni amūṣām tvam sa-apatyānām ca me śṛṇu yāsām prasūti-prasavaiḥ lokāḥ āpūritāḥ trayaḥ
bhānuḥ lambā kakut yāmiḥ viśvā sādhyā marutvatī vasuḥ muhūrtā saṅkalpā dharma-patnyaḥ sutān śṛṇu
bhānoḥ tu deva-ṛṣabhaḥ indrasenaḥ tataḥ nṛpa vidyotaḥ āsīt lambāyāḥ tataḥ ca stanayitnavaḥ
kakudaḥ saṅkaṭaḥ tasya kīkaṭaḥ tanayaḥ yataḥ bhuvaḥ durgāṇi yāmeyaḥ svargaḥ nandiḥ tataḥ abhavat
viśve-devāḥ tu viśvāyāḥ aprajān tān pracakṣate sādhyaḥ-gaṇaḥ ca sādhyāyāḥ arthasiddhiḥ tu tat-sutaḥ
marutvān ca jayantaḥ ca marutvatyāḥ babhūvatuḥ jayantaḥ vāsudeva-aṁśaḥ upendraḥ iti yam viduḥ
mauhūrtikāḥ deva-gaṇāḥ muhūrtāyāḥ ca jajñire ye vai phalam prayacchanti bhūtānām sva-sva kāla-jam
saṅkalpāyāḥ tu saṅkalpaḥ kāmaḥ saṅkalpa-jaḥ smṛtaḥ vasavaḥ aṣṭau vasoḥ putrāḥ teṣām nāmāni me śṛṇu droṇaḥ prāṇaḥ dhruvaḥ arkaḥ agniḥ doṣaḥ vāstuḥ vibhāvasuḥ droṇasya abhimateḥ patnyāḥ harṣa-śoka-bhaya-ādayaḥ
prāṇasya ūrjasvatī bhāryā sahaḥ āyuḥ purojavaḥ dhruvasya bhāryā dharaṇiḥ asūta vividhāḥ puraḥ
arkasya vāsanā bhāryā putrāḥ tarṣa-ādayaḥ smṛtāḥ agneḥ bhāryā vasoḥ dhārā putrāḥ draviṇaka-ādayaḥ
skandaḥ ca kṛttikā-putraḥ ye viśākha-ādayaḥ tataḥ doṣasya śarvarī-putraḥ śiśumāraḥ hareḥ kalā
vāstoḥ āṅgirasī putraḥ viśvakarmā ākṛtī-patiḥ tataḥ manuḥ cākṣuṣaḥ abhūt viśve sādhyāḥ manoḥ sutāḥ
vibhāvasoḥ asūta ūṣā vyuṣṭam rociṣam ātapam pañcayāmaḥ atha bhūtāni yena jāgrati karmasu
sarūpā asūta bhūtasya bhāryā rudrān ca koṭiśaḥ raivataḥ ajaḥ bhavaḥ bhīmaḥ vāmaḥ ugraḥ vṛṣākapiḥ ajaikapāt ahirbradhnaḥ bahurūpaḥ mahān iti rudrasya pārṣadāḥ ca anye ghorāḥ preta vināyakāḥ
prajāpateḥ aṅgirasaḥ svadhā patnī pitṝn atha atharva-āṅgirasam vedam putratve ca akarot satī
kṛśāśvaḥ arciṣi bhāryāyām dhūmaketum ajījanat dhiṣaṇāyām vedaśiraḥ devalam vayunam manum
tārkṣyasya vinatā kadrūḥ pataṅgī yāminī iti ca pataṅgī asūta patagān yāminī śalabhān atha suparṇā asūta garuḍam sākṣāt yajñeśa-vāhanam sūrya-sūtam anūrum ca kadrūḥ nāgān anekaśaḥ
kṛttikā-ādīni nakṣatrāṇi indoḥ patnyaḥ tu bhārata dakṣa-śāpāt saḥ anapatyaḥ tāsu yakṣma-graha-arditaḥ
punaḥ prasādya tam somaḥ kalāḥ lebhe kṣaye ditāḥ śṛṇu nāmāni lokānām mātṝṇām śaṅkarāṇi ca atha kaśyapa-patnīnām yat-prasūtam idam jagat aditiḥ ditiḥ danuḥ kāṣṭhā ariṣṭā surasā ilā muniḥ krodhavaśā tāmrā surabhiḥ saramā timiḥ timeḥ yādaḥ-gaṇāḥ āsan śvāpadāḥ saramā-sutāḥ
surabheḥ mahiṣāḥ gāvaḥ ye ca anye dvi-śaphāḥ nṛpa tāmrāyāḥ śyena gṛdhra-ādyāḥ muneḥ apsarasām gaṇāḥ
dandaśūka-ādayaḥ sarpāḥ rājan krodhavaśā-ātma-jāḥ ilāyāḥ bhūruhāḥ sarve yātudhānāḥ ca saurasāḥ
ariṣṭāyāḥ tu gandharvāḥ kāṣṭhāyāḥ dvi-śapha-itarāḥ sutāḥ danoḥ eka-ṣaṣṭiḥ teṣām prādhānikān śṛṇu dvimūrdhā śambaraḥ ariṣṭaḥ hayagrīvaḥ vibhāvasuḥ ayomukhaḥ śaṅkuśirāḥ svarbhānuḥ kapilaḥ aruṇaḥ pulomā vṛṣaparvā ca ekacakraḥ anutāpanaḥ dhūmrakeśaḥ virūpākṣaḥ vipracittiḥ ca durjayaḥ
svarbhānoḥ suprabhām kanyām uvāha namuciḥ kila vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ tu śarmiṣṭhām yayātiḥ nāhuṣaḥ balī
vaiśvānara-sutāḥ yāḥ ca catasraḥ cāru-darśanāḥ upadānavī hayaśirā pulomā kālakā tathā upadānavīm hiraṇyākṣaḥ kratuḥ hayaśirām nṛpa pulomām kālakām ca dve vaiśvānara-sute tu kaḥ upayeme atha bhagavān kaśyapaḥ brahma-coditaḥ paulomāḥ kālakeyāḥ ca dānavāḥ yuddha-śālinaḥ tayoḥ ṣaṣṭi-sahasrāṇi yajña-ghnān te pituḥ pitā jaghāna svaḥ-gataḥ rājan ekaḥ indra-priyam-karaḥ
vipracittiḥ siṁhikāyām śatam ca ekam ajījanat rāhu-jyeṣṭham ketu-śatam grahatvam ye upāgatāḥ
atha ataḥ śrūyatām vaṁśaḥ yaḥ aditeḥ anupūrvaśaḥ yatra nārāyaṇaḥ devaḥ sva-aṁśena avātarat vibhuḥ vivasvān aryamā pūṣā tvaṣṭā atha savitā bhagaḥ dhātā vidhātā varuṇaḥ mitraḥ śatruḥ urukramaḥ
vivasvataḥ śrāddhadevam saṁjñā asūyata vai manum mithunam ca mahā-bhāgā yamam devam yamīm tathā sā eva bhūtvā atha vaḍavā nāsatyau suṣuve bhuvi
chāyā śanaiścaram lebhe sāvarṇim ca manum tataḥ kanyām ca tapatīm yā vai vavre saṁvaraṇam patim
aryamṇaḥ mātṛkā patnī tayoḥ carṣaṇayaḥ sutāḥ yatra vai mānuṣī jātiḥ brahmaṇā ca upakalpitā
pūṣā anapatyaḥ piṣṭa-adaḥ bhagna-dantaḥ abhavat purā yaḥ asau dakṣāya kupitam jahāsa vivṛta-dvijaḥ
tvaṣṭuḥ daitya-ātma-jā bhāryā racanā nāma kanyakā sanniveśaḥ tayoḥ jajñe viśvarūpaḥ ca vīryavān
tam vavrire sura-gaṇāḥ svasrīyam dviṣatām api vimatena parityaktāḥ guruṇā āṅgirasena yat
śrī-rājā uvāca kasya hetoḥ parityaktāḥ ācāryeṇa ātmanaḥ surāḥ etat ācakṣva bhagavan śiṣyāṇām akramam gurau
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca indraḥ tri-bhuvana-aiśvarya mada ullaṅghita sat-pathaḥ marudbhiḥ vasubhiḥ rudraiḥ ādityaiḥ ṛbhubhiḥ nṛpa viśvedevaiḥ ca sādhyaiḥ ca nāsatyābhyām pariśritaḥ siddha cāraṇa gandharvaiḥ munibhiḥ brahmavādibhiḥ vidyādhara-apsarobhiḥ ca kinnaraiḥ pataga-uragaiḥ niṣevyamāṇaḥ maghavān stūyamānaḥ ca bhārata upagīyamānaḥ lalitam āsthāna adhyāsana-āśritaḥ pāṇḍureṇa ātapatreṇa candra-maṇḍala-cāruṇā yuktaḥ ca anyaiḥ pārameṣṭhyaiḥ cāmara vyajana-ādibhiḥ virājamānaḥ paulamyā saha ardha-āsanayā bhṛśam saḥ yadā parama-ācāryam devānām ātmanaḥ ca ha na abhyanandata samprāptam pratyutthāna āsana-ādibhiḥ vācaspatim muni-varam sura-asura-namaskṛtam na uccacāla āsanāt indraḥ paśyan api sabhā-āgatam
tataḥ nirgatya sahasā kaviḥ āṅgirasaḥ prabhuḥ āyayau sva-gṛham tūṣṇīm vidvān śrī-mada-vikriyām
tarhi eva pratibudhya indraḥ guru-helanam ātmanaḥ garhayām āsa sadasi svayam ātmānam ātmanā
aho bata mayā asādhu kṛtam vai dabhra-buddhinā yat mayā aiśvarya-mattena guruḥ sadasi kāt-kṛtaḥ
kaḥ gṛdhyet paṇḍitaḥ lakṣmīm tri-piṣṭa-pa-pateḥ api yayā aham āsuram bhāvam nītaḥ adya vibudha īśvaraḥ
yaḥ pārameṣṭhyam dhiṣaṇam adhitiṣṭhan na kañcana pratyuttiṣṭhet iti brūyuḥ dharmam te na param viduḥ
teṣām ku-patha-deṣṭṝṇām patatām tamasi hi adhaḥ ye śraddadhyuḥ vacaḥ te vai majjanti aśma-plavāḥ iva
atha aham amara-ācāryam agādha-dhiṣaṇam dvijam prasādayiṣye niśaṭhaḥ śīrṣṇā tat-caraṇam spṛśan
evam cintayataḥ tasya maghonaḥ bhagavān gṛhāt bṛhaspatiḥ gataḥ adṛṣṭām gatim adhyātma māyayā
guroḥ na adhigataḥ saṁjñām parīkṣan bhagavān svarāṭ dhyāyan dhiyā suraiḥ yuktaḥ śarma na alabhata ātmanaḥ
tat śrutvā eva asurāḥ sarve āśritya auśanasam matam devān pratyudyamam cakruḥ durmadāḥ ātatāyinaḥ
taiḥ visṛṣṭa iṣubhiḥ tīkṣṇaiḥ nirbhinna aṅga uru bāhavaḥ brahmāṇam śaraṇam jagmuḥ saha-indrāḥ nata-kandharāḥ
tān tathā abhyarditān vīkṣya bhagavān ātma-bhūḥ ajaḥ kṛpayā parayā devaḥ uvāca parisāntvayan
śrī-brahmā uvāca aho bata sura-śreṣṭhāḥ hi abhadram vaḥ kṛtam mahat brahmiṣṭham brāhmaṇam dāntam aiśvaryāt na abhyanandata
tasya ayam anayasya āsīt parebhyaḥ vaḥ parābhavaḥ prakṣīṇebhyaḥ sva-vairibhyaḥ samṛddhānām ca yat surāḥ
maghavan dviṣataḥ paśya prakṣīṇān guru-atikramāt samprati upacitān bhūyaḥ kāvyam ārādhya bhaktitaḥ ādadīran nilayanam mama api bhṛgu-devatāḥ
tri-piṣṭa-pam kim gaṇayanti abhedya-mantrāḥ bhṛgūṇām anuśikṣita-arthāḥ na vipra govinda go īśvarāṇām bhavanti abhadrāṇi nara-īśvarāṇām
tat viśvarūpam bhajata āśu vipram tapasvinam tvāṣṭram atha ātma-vantam sabhājitaḥ arthān saḥ vidhāsyate vaḥ yadi kṣamiṣyadhvam uta asya karma
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca te evam uditāḥ rājan brahmaṇā vigata-jvarāḥ ṛṣim tvāṣṭram upavrajya pariṣvajya idam abruvan
śrī-devāḥ ūcuḥ vayam te atithayaḥ prāptāḥ āśramam bhadram astu te kāmaḥ sampādyatām tāta pitṝṇām samayocitaḥ
putrāṇām hi paraḥ dharmaḥ pitṛ-śuśrūṣaṇam satām api putra-vatām brahman kim uta brahmacāriṇām
ācāryaḥ brahmaṇaḥ mūrtiḥ pitā mūrtiḥ prajāpateḥ bhrātā marut-pateḥ mūrtiḥ mātā sākṣāt kṣiteḥ tanuḥ dayāyāḥ bhaginī mūrtiḥ dharmasya ātma atithiḥ svayam agneḥ abhyāgataḥ mūrtiḥ sarva-bhūtāni ca ātmanaḥ
tasmāt pitṝṇām ārtānām ārtim para-parābhavam tapasā apanayan tāta sandeśam kartum arhasi
vṛṇīmahe tvā upādhyāyam brahmiṣṭham brāhmaṇam gurum yathā añjasā vijeṣyāmaḥ sapatnān tava tejasā
na garhayanti hi artheṣu yaviṣṭha-aṅghri abhivādanam chandobhyaḥ anyatra na brahman vayaḥ jyaiṣṭhyasya kāraṇam
śrī-ṛṣiḥ uvāca abhyarthitaḥ sura-gaṇaiḥ paurahitye mahā-tapāḥ saḥ viśvarūpaḥ tān āha prasannaḥ ślakṣṇayā girā
śrī-viśvarūpaḥ uvāca vigarhitam dharma-śīlaiḥ brahma-varcaḥ upavyayam katham nu mat-vidhaḥ nāthāḥ loka-īśaiḥ abhiyācitam pratyākhyāsyati tat-śiṣyaḥ saḥ eva sva-arthaḥ ucyate
akiñcanānām hi dhanam śila uñchanam tena iha nirvartita sādhu sat-kriyaḥ katham vigarhyam nu karomi adhīśvarāḥ paurodhasam hṛṣyati yena durmatiḥ
tathā api na pratibrūyām gurubhiḥ prārthitam kiyat bhavatām prārthitam sarvam prāṇaiḥ arthaiḥ ca sādhaye
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca tebhyaḥ evam pratiśrutya viśvarūpaḥ mahā-tapāḥ paurahityam vṛtaḥ cakre parameṇa samādhinā
sura-dviṣām śriyam guptām auśanasya api vidyayā ācchidya adāt mahā-indrāya vaiṣṇavyā vidyayā vibhuḥ
yayā guptaḥ sahasra-akṣaḥ jigye asura camūḥ vibhuḥ tām prāha saḥ mahendrāya viśvarūpaḥ udāra-dhīḥ
śrī-rājā uvāca yayā guptaḥ sahasra-akṣaḥ sa-vāhān ripu-sainikān krīḍan iva vinirjitya tri-lokyāḥ bubhuje śriyam bhagavan tat mama ākhyāhi varma nārāyaṇa-ātmakam yathā ātatāyinaḥ śatrūn yena guptaḥ ajayat mṛdhe
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca vṛtaḥ purohitaḥ tvāṣṭraḥ mahendrāya anupṛcchate nārāyaṇa-ākhyam varma āha tat iha eka-manāḥ śṛṇu
śrī-viśvarūpaḥ uvāca dhauta aṅghri pāṇiḥ ācamya sa-pavitraḥ udak-mukhaḥ kṛta sva-aṅga-kara-nyāsaḥ mantrābhyām vāk-yataḥ śuciḥ nārāyaṇa-param varma sannahyet bhaye āgate pādayoḥ jānunoḥ ūrvoḥ udare hṛdi atha urasi mukhe śirasi ānupūrvyāt oṁkāra-ādīni vinyaset om namaḥ nārāyaṇāya iti viparyayam atha api vā
kara-nyāsam tataḥ kuryāt dvādaśa-akṣara vidyayā praṇava-ādi ya-kāra-antam aṅguli aṅguṣṭha-parvasu
nyaset hṛdaye oṁkāram vi-kāram anu mūrdhani ṣa-kāram tu bhruvoḥ madhye ṇa-kāram śikhayā nyaset vekāram netrayoḥ yuñjyāt na-kāram sarva-sandhiṣu ma-kāram astram uddiśya mantra-mūrtiḥ bhavet budhaḥ sa-visargam phaṭ-antam tat sarva-dikṣu vinirdiśet om viṣṇave namaḥ iti
ātmānam paramam dhyāyet dhyeyam ṣaṭ-śaktibhiḥ yutam vidyā tejaḥ tapaḥ mūrtim imam mantram udāharet
om hariḥ vidadhyāt mama sarva-rakṣām nyasta aṅghri-padmaḥ patagendra-pṛṣṭhe dara ari carma asi gadā iṣu cāpa pāśān dadhānaḥ aṣṭa guṇaḥ aṣṭa bāhuḥ
jaleṣu mām rakṣatu matsya-mūrtiḥ yādaḥ-gaṇebhyaḥ varuṇasya pāśāt sthaleṣu māyā-vaṭu vāmanaḥ avyāt trivikramaḥ khe avatu viśvarūpaḥ
durgeṣu aṭavi āji-mukha-ādiṣu prabhuḥ pāyāt nṛsiṁhaḥ asura-yūthapa ariḥ vimuñcataḥ yasya mahā-aṭṭa-hāsam diśaḥ vineduḥ nyapatan ca garbhāḥ
rakṣatu asau mā adhvani yajña-kalpaḥ sva-daṁṣṭrayā unnīta dharaḥ varāhaḥ rāmaḥ adri-kūṭeṣu atha vipravāse sa-lakṣmaṇaḥ avyāt bharata-agrajaḥ asmān
mām ugra-dharmāt akhilāt pramādāt nārāyaṇaḥ pātu naraḥ ca hāsāt dattaḥ tu ayogāt atha yoga-nāthaḥ pāyāt guṇa-īśaḥ kapilaḥ karma-bandhāt
sanat-kumāraḥ avatu kāma-devāt haya-śīrṣā mām pathi deva-helanāt devarṣi-varyaḥ puruṣa-arcana-antarāt kūrmaḥ hariḥ mām nirayāt aśeṣāt
dhanvantariḥ bhagavān pātu apathyāt dvandvāt bhayāt ṛṣabhaḥ nirjita-ātmā yajñaḥ ca lokāt avatāt jana-antāt balaḥ gaṇāt krodha-vaśāt ahīndraḥ
dvaipāyanaḥ bhagavān aprabodhāt buddhaḥ tu pāṣaṇḍa-gaṇa pramādāt kalkiḥ kaleḥ kāla-malāt prapātu dharma-avanāya uru kṛta-avatāraḥ
mām keśavaḥ gadayā prātaḥ avyāt govindaḥ āsaṅgavam ātta-veṇuḥ nārāyaṇaḥ prāhṇaḥ udātta-śaktiḥ madhyam-dine viṣṇuḥ arīndra-pāṇiḥ
devaḥ aparāhṇe madhu-hā ugra-dhanvā sāyam tri-dhāmā avatu mādhavaḥ mām doṣe hṛṣīkeśaḥ uta ardha-rātre niśīthe ekaḥ avatu padmanābhaḥ
śrīvatsa-dhāmā apara-rātre īśaḥ pratyūṣe īśaḥ asi-dharaḥ janārdanaḥ dāmodaraḥ avyāt anusandhyam prabhāte viśva-īśvaraḥ bhagavān kāla-mūrtiḥ
cakram yuga-anta anala tigma-nemi bhramat samantāt bhagavat-prayuktam dandagdhi dandagdhi ari-sainyam āśu kakṣam yathā vāta-sakhaḥ hutāśaḥ
gade aśani sparśana visphuliṅge niṣpiṇḍhi niṣpiṇḍhi ajita-priyā asi kuṣmāṇḍa vaināyaka yakṣa rakṣaḥ bhūta grahān cūrṇaya cūrṇaya arīn
tvam yātudhāna pramatha preta mātṛ piśāca vipra-graha ghora-dṛṣṭīn darendra vidrāvaya kṛṣṇa-pūritaḥ bhīma-svanaḥ areḥ hṛdayāni kampayan
tvam tigma-dhāra-asi-vara ari-sainyam īśa-prayuktaḥ mama chindhi chindhi cakṣūṁṣi carman śata-candra chādaya dviṣām aghonām hara pāpa-cakṣuṣām
yat naḥ bhayam grahebhyaḥ abhūt ketubhyaḥ nṛbhyaḥ eva ca sarīsṛpebhyaḥ daṁṣṭribhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ aṁhobhyaḥ eva ca sarvāṇi etāni bhagavat-nāma-rūpa-anukīrtanāt prayāntu saṅkṣayam sadyaḥ ye naḥ śreyaḥ-pratīpakāḥ
garuḍaḥ bhagavān stotra-stobhaḥ chandaḥ-mayaḥ prabhuḥ rakṣatu aśeṣa-kṛcchrebhyaḥ viṣvaksenaḥ sva-nāmabhiḥ
sarva-āpadbhyaḥ hareḥ nāma rūpa yāna āyudhāni naḥ buddhi indriya manaḥ prāṇān pāntu pārṣada-bhūṣaṇāḥ
yathā hi bhagavān eva vastutaḥ sat asat ca yat satyena anena naḥ sarve yāntu nāśam upadravāḥ
yathā aikātmya anubhāvānām vikalpa-rahitaḥ svayam bhūṣaṇa āyudha liṅga-ākhyāḥ dhatte śaktīḥ sva-māyayā tena eva satya-mānena sarva-jñaḥ bhagavān hariḥ pātu sarvaiḥ sva-rūpaiḥ naḥ sadā sarvatra sarva-gaḥ
vidikṣu dikṣu ūrdhvam adhaḥ samantāt antaḥ bahiḥ bhagavān nārasiṁhaḥ prahāpayan loka-bhayam svanena sva-tejasā grasta samasta tejāḥ
maghavan idam ākhyātam varma nārāyaṇa-ātmakam vijeṣyase añjasā yena daṁśitaḥ asura-yūthapān
etat dhārayamāṇaḥ tu yam yam paśyati cakṣuṣā padā vā saṁspṛśet sadyaḥ sādhvasāt saḥ vimucyate
na kutaścit bhayam tasya vidyām dhārayataḥ bhavet rāja dasyu graha-ādibhyaḥ vyādhi-ādibhyaḥ ca karhicit
imām vidyām purā kaścit kauśikaḥ dhārayan dvijaḥ yoga-dhāraṇayā sva-aṅgam jahau saḥ maru-dhanvani
tasya upari vimānena gandharva-patiḥ ekadā yayau citrarathaḥ strībhiḥ vṛtaḥ yatra dvija-kṣayaḥ
gaganāt nyapatat sadyaḥ sa-vimānaḥ hi avāk-śirāḥ saḥ vālikhilya vacanāt asthīni ādāya vismitaḥ prāsya prācī-sarasvatyām snātvā dhāma svam anvagāt
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca yaḥ idam śṛṇuyāt kāle yaḥ dhārayati ca ādṛtaḥ tam namasyanti bhūtāni mucyate sarvataḥ bhayāt
etām vidyām adhigataḥ viśvarūpāt śata-kratuḥ trailokya-lakṣmīm bubhuje vinirjitya mṛdhe asurān
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tasya āsan viśvarūpasya śirāṁsi trīṇi bhārata soma-pītham surā-pītham anna-adam iti śuśruma
saḥ vai barhiṣi devebhyaḥ bhāgam pratyakṣam uccakaiḥ adadat yasya pitaraḥ devāḥ sa-praśrayam nṛpa
saḥ eva hi dadau bhāgam parokṣam asurān prati yajamānaḥ avahat bhāgam mātṛ-sneha vaśa-anugaḥ
tat deva-helanam tasya dharma-alīkam sura-īśvaraḥ ālakṣya tarasā bhītaḥ tat śīrṣāṇi acchinat ruṣā
soma-pītham tu yat tasya śiraḥ āsīt kapiñjalaḥ kalaviṅkaḥ surā-pītham anna-adam yat saḥ tittiriḥ
brahma-hatyām añjalinā jagrāha yat api īśvaraḥ saṁvatsara-ante tat agham bhūtānām saḥ viśuddhaye bhūmi ambu druma yoṣidbhyaḥ caturdhā vyabhajat hariḥ
bhūmiḥ turīyam jagrāha khāta-pūra vareṇa vai īriṇam brahma-hatyāyāḥ rūpam bhūmau pradṛśyate
turyam cheda viroheṇa vareṇa jagṛhuḥ drumāḥ teṣām niryāsa-rūpeṇa brahma-hatyā pradṛśyate
śaśvat kāma vareṇa aṁhaḥ turīyam jagṛhuḥ striyaḥ rajaḥ-rūpeṇa tāsu aṁhaḥ māsi māsi pradṛśyate
dravya bhūyaḥ vareṇa āpaḥ turīyam jagṛhuḥ malam tāsu budbuda-phenābhyām dṛṣṭam tat harati kṣipan
hata-putraḥ tataḥ tvaṣṭā juhāva indrāya śatrave indra-śatro vivardhasva mā ciram jahi vidviṣam
atha anvāhārya-pacanāt utthitaḥ ghora-darśanaḥ kṛtāntaḥ iva lokānām yuga-anta samaye yathā
viṣvak vivardhamānam tam iṣu-mātram dine dine dagdha śaila pratīkāśam sandhyā abhra-anīka varcasam tapta tāmra śikhā śmaśrum madhyāhna arka ugra-locanam dedīpyamāne tri-śikhe śūle āropya rodasī nṛtyantam unnadantam ca cālayantam padā mahīm darī-gambhīra vaktreṇa pibatā ca nabhastalam lihatā jihvayā ṛkṣāṇi grasatā bhuvana-trayam mahatā raudra-daṁṣṭreṇa jṛmbhamāṇam muhuḥ muhuḥ vitrastāḥ dudruvuḥ lokāḥ vīkṣya sarve diśaḥ daśa
yena āvṛtāḥ ime lokāḥ tapasā tvāṣṭra-mūrtinā saḥ vai vṛtraḥ iti proktaḥ pāpaḥ parama-dāruṇaḥ
tam nijaghnuḥ abhidrutya sa-gaṇāḥ vibudha-ṛṣabhāḥ svaiḥ svaiḥ divya astra śastra-oghaiḥ saḥ agrasat tāni kṛtsnaśaḥ
tataḥ te vismitāḥ sarve viṣaṇṇāḥ grasta-tejasaḥ pratyañcam ādi-puruṣam upatasthuḥ samāhitāḥ
śrī-devāḥ ūcuḥ vāyu ambara agni ap kṣitayaḥ tri-lokāḥ brahma-ādayaḥ ye vayam udvijantaḥ harāma yasmai balim antakaḥ asau bibheti yasmāt araṇam tataḥ naḥ
avismitam tam paripūrṇa-kāmam svena eva lābhena samam praśāntam vinā upasarpati aparam hi bāliśaḥ śva lāṅgulena atititarti sindhum
yasya uru śṛṅge jagatīm sva-nāvam manuḥ yathā ābadhya tatāra durgam saḥ eva naḥ tvāṣṭra-bhayāt durantāt trātā āśritān vāri-caraḥ api nūnam
purā svayambhūḥ api saṁyama-ambhasi udīrṇa vāta ūrmi ravaiḥ karāle ekaḥ aravindāt patitaḥ tatāra tasmāt bhayāt yena saḥ naḥ astu pāraḥ
yaḥ ekaḥ īśaḥ nija-māyayā naḥ sasarja yena anusṛjāma viśvam vayam na yasya api puraḥ samīhataḥ paśyāma liṅgam pṛthak īśa māninaḥ
yaḥ naḥ sapatnaiḥ bhṛśam ardyamānān deva ṛṣi tiryak nṛṣu nityaḥ eva kṛta-avatāraḥ tanubhiḥ sva-māyayā kṛtvā ātmasāt pāti yuge yuge ca tam eva devam vayam ātma-daivatam param pradhānam puruṣam viśvam anyam vrajāma sarve śaraṇam śaraṇyam svānām saḥ naḥ dhāsyati śam mahātmā
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti teṣām mahārāja surāṇām upatiṣṭhatām pratīcyām diśi abhūt āviḥ śaṅkha-cakra-gadā-dharaḥ
ātma-tulyaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ vinā śrīvatsa-kaustubhau paryupāsitam unnidra śarat amburuha īkṣaṇam dṛṣṭvā tam avanau sarve īkṣaṇa āhlāda viklavāḥ daṇḍa-vat patitāḥ rājan śanaiḥ utthāya tuṣṭuvuḥ
śrī-devāḥ ūcuḥ namaḥ te yajña-vīryāya vayase uta te namaḥ namaḥ te hi asta-cakrāya namaḥ supuru-hūtaye
yat te gatīnām tisṛṇām īśituḥ paramam padam na arvācīnaḥ visargasya dhātaḥ veditum arhati
om namaḥ te astu bhagavan nārāyaṇa vāsudeva ādi-puruṣa mahā-puruṣa mahā-anubhāva parama-maṅgala parama-kalyāṇa parama-kāruṇika kevala jagat-ādhāra loka-eka-nātha sarva-īśvara lakṣmī-nātha paramahaṁsa-parivrājakaiḥ parameṇa ātma-yoga-samādhinā paribhāvita parisphuṭa pāramahaṁsya-dharmeṇa udghāṭita tamaḥ kapāṭa dvāre citte apāvṛte ātma-loke svayam upalabdha nija sukha-anubhavaḥ bhavān
duravabodhaḥ iva tava ayam vihāra-yogaḥ yat aśaraṇaḥ aśarīraḥ idam anavekṣita asmat samavāyaḥ ātmanā eva avikriyamāṇena sa-guṇam aguṇaḥ sṛjasi pāsi harasi

na hi virodhaḥ ubhayam bhagavati aparimita guṇa-gaṇe īśvare anavagāhya māhātmye arvācīna vikalpa vitarka vicāra pramāṇa-ābhāsa kutarka śāstra kalila antaḥkaraṇa āśraya duravagraha vādinām vivāda anavasare uparata samasta māyā-maye kevale eva ātma-māyām antardhāya kaḥ nu arthaḥ durghaṭaḥ iva bhavati sva-rūpa dvaya abhāvāt
