atha ha vāva tava mahima amṛta rasa samudra vipruṣā sakṛt avalīḍhayā sva-manasi niṣyandamāna anavarata sukhena vismārita dṛṣṭa śruta viṣaya-sukha leśa-ābhāsāḥ parama-bhāgavatāḥ ekāntinaḥ bhagavati sarva-bhūta priya suhṛdi sarva-ātmani nitarām nirantaram nirvṛta manasaḥ katham u ha vā ete madhu-mathana punaḥ sva-artha-kuśalāḥ hi ātma-priya-suhṛdaḥ sādhavaḥ tvat-caraṇa-ambuja-anusevām visṛjanti na yatra punaḥ ayam saṁsāra-paryāvartaḥ
tri-bhuvana-ātma-bhavana tri-vikrama tri-nayana tri-loka-manohara-anubhāva tava eva vibhūtayaḥ diti-ja-danu-ja-ādayaḥ ca api teṣām upakrama-samayaḥ ayam iti sva-ātma-māyayā sura-nara-mṛga-miśrita-jalacara-ākṛtibhiḥ yathā-aparādham daṇḍam daṇḍa-dhara dadhartha evam enam api bhagavan jahi tvāṣṭram uta yadi manyase

atha bhagavan tava asmābhiḥ akhila jagat utpatti sthiti laya nimittāyamāna divya-māyā vinodasya sakala jīva-nikāyānām antaḥ-hṛdayeṣu bahiḥ api ca brahma pratyak-ātma sva-rūpeṇa pradhāna-rūpeṇa ca yathā deśa-kāla-deha-avasthāna viśeṣam tat upādāna upalambhakatayā anubhavataḥ sarva-pratyaya-sākṣiṇaḥ ākāśa-śarīrasya sākṣāt para-brahmaṇaḥ paramātmanaḥ kiyān iha vā artha-viśeṣaḥ vijñāpanīyaḥ syāt visphuliṅga-ādibhiḥ iva hiraṇya-retasaḥ
ata eva svayam tat upakalpaya asmākam bhagavataḥ parama-guroḥ tava caraṇa śata-palāśat chāyām vividha vṛjina saṁsāra pariśrama upaśamanīm upasṛtānām vayam yat kāmena upasāditāḥ

śrī-śukaḥ uvāca atha evam īḍitaḥ rājan sa-ādaram tri-daśaiḥ hariḥ svam upasthānam ākarṇya prāha tān abhinanditaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca prītaḥ aham vaḥ sura-śreṣṭhāḥ mat-upasthāna-vidyayā ātma-aiśvarya-smṛtiḥ puṁsām bhaktiḥ ca eva yayā mayi

na veda kṛpaṇaḥ śreyaḥ ātmanaḥ guṇa-vastu-dṛk tasya tān icchataḥ yacchet yadi saḥ api tathā-vidhaḥ
svayam niḥśreyasam vit-vān na vakti ajñāya karma hi na rāti rogiṇaḥ apathyam vāñchataḥ api bhiṣak-tamaḥ
maghavan yāta bhadram vaḥ dadhyañcam ṛṣi-sat-tamam vidyā vrata tapaḥ sāram gātram yācata mā ciram
saḥ vā adhigataḥ dadhyaṅ aśvibhyām brahma niṣkalam yat vā aśvaśiraḥ nāma tayoḥ amaratām vyadhāt
dadhyaṅ ātharvaṇaḥ tvaṣṭre varma abhedyam mat-ātmakam viśvarūpāya yat prādāt tvaṣṭā yat tvam adhāḥ tataḥ
yuṣmabhyam yācitaḥ aśvibhyām dharma-jñaḥ aṅgāni dāsyati tataḥ taiḥ āyudha śreṣṭhaḥ viśvakarma-vinirmitaḥ yena vṛtra-śiraḥ hartā mat-tejaḥ upabṛṁhitaḥ

tathā abhiyācitaḥ devaiḥ ṛṣiḥ ātharvaṇaḥ mahān modamānaḥ uvāca idam prahasan iva bhārata
api vṛndārakāḥ yūyam na jānītha śarīriṇām saṁsthāyām yaḥ tu abhidrohaḥ duḥsahaḥ cetana apahaḥ
jijīviṣūṇām jīvānām ātmā preṣṭhaḥ iha īpsitaḥ kaḥ utsaheta tam dātum bhikṣamāṇāya viṣṇave
śrī-devāḥ ūcuḥ kim nu tat dustyajam brahman puṁsām bhūta-anukampinām bhavat-vidhānām mahatām puṇya-śloka-īḍya-karmaṇām
nūnam sva-artha-paraḥ lokaḥ na veda para-saṅkaṭam yadi veda na yāceta na iti na āha yat īśvaraḥ
śrī-ṛṣiḥ uvāca dharmam vaḥ śrotu-kāmena yūyam me pratyudāhṛtāḥ eṣaḥ vaḥ priyam ātmānam tyajantam santyajāmi aham
yaḥ adhruveṇa ātmanā nāthāḥ na dharmam na yaśaḥ pumān īheta bhūta-dayayā saḥ śocyaḥ sthāvaraiḥ api
etāvān avyayaḥ dharmaḥ puṇya-ślokaiḥ upāsitaḥ yaḥ bhūta śoka harṣābhyām ātmā śocati hṛṣyati
aho dainyam aho kaṣṭam pārakyaiḥ kṣaṇa-bhaṅguraiḥ yat na upakuryāt a-sva-arthaiḥ martyaḥ sva jñāti vigrahaiḥ
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca evam kṛta-vyavasitaḥ dadhyaṅ ātharvaṇaḥ tanum pare bhagavati brahmaṇi ātmānam sannayan jahau
yata akṣa asu manaḥ buddhiḥ tattva-dṛk dhvasta-bandhanaḥ āsthitaḥ paramam yogam na deham bubudhe gatam
atha indraḥ vajram udyamya nirmitam viśvakarmaṇā muneḥ śaktibhiḥ utsiktaḥ bhagavat tejasā anvitaḥ vṛtaḥ deva-gaṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ gajendra upari aśobhata stūyamānaḥ muni-gaṇaiḥ trai-lokyam harṣayan iva

vṛtraḥ asurān tān anugān manasvī pradhāvataḥ prekṣya babhāṣa etat palāyitam prekṣya balam ca bhagnam bhayena tīvreṇa vihasya vīraḥ

na sanna vāhāya viṣaṇṇa-cetase prāyuṅkta bhūyaḥ saḥ gadām mahā-ātmā indraḥ amṛta-syandi-kara abhimarśa vīta vyatha kṣata vāhaḥ avatasthe

śrī-vṛtraḥ uvāca diṣṭyā bhavān me samavasthitaḥ ripuḥ yaḥ brahma-hā guru-hā bhrātṛ-hā ca diṣṭyā anṛṇaḥ adya aham asat-tama tvayā mat-śūla nirbhinna dṛṣat hṛdā acirāt
yaḥ naḥ agra-jasya ātma-vidaḥ dvi-jāteḥ guroḥ apāpasya ca dīkṣitasya viśrabhya khaḍgena śirāṁsi avṛścat paśoḥ iva akaruṇaḥ svarga-kāmaḥ
śrī hrī dayā kīrtibhiḥ ujjhitam tvām sva-karmaṇā puruṣa-adaiḥ ca garhyam kṛcchreṇa mat-śūla vibhinna deham aspṛṣṭa-vahnim samadanti gṛdhrāḥ

vṛtrasya karma ati mahā adbhutam tat sura asurāḥ cāraṇa siddha-saṅghāḥ apūjayan tat puruhūta-saṅkaṭam nirīkṣya hā hā iti vicukruśuḥ bhṛśam

prāṇa-glahaḥ ayam samaraḥ iṣu-akṣaḥ vāhana-āsanaḥ atra na jñāyate amuṣya jayaḥ amuṣya parājayaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca indraḥ vṛtra-vacaḥ śrutvā gata-alīkam apūjayat gṛhīta-vajraḥ prahasan tam āha gata-vismayaḥ
indraḥ uvāca aho dānava siddhaḥ asi yasya te matiḥ īdṛśī bhaktaḥ sarva-ātmanā ātmānam suhṛdam jagat-īśvaram
bhavān atārṣīt māyām vai vaiṣṇavīm jana-mohinīm yat vihāya āsuram bhāvam mahā-puruṣatām gataḥ
khalu idam mahat āścaryam yat rajaḥ prakṛteḥ tava vāsudeve bhagavati sattva-ātmani dṛḍhā matiḥ
yasya bhaktiḥ bhagavati harau niḥśreyasa-īśvare vikrīḍataḥ amṛta-ambhodhau kim kṣudraiḥ khātaka-udakaiḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti bruvāṇau anyonyam dharma-jijñāsayā nṛpa yuyudhāte mahā-vīryau indra vṛtrau yudhām patī
āvidhya parigham vṛtraḥ kārṣṇa-ayasam arim-damaḥ indrāya prāhiṇot ghoram vāma-hastena māriṣa
saḥ tu vṛtrasya parigham karam ca karabha-upamam ciccheda yugapat devaḥ vajreṇa śata-parvaṇā
dorbhyām utkṛtta-mūlābhyām babhau rakta-sravaḥ asuraḥ chinna-pakṣaḥ yathā gotraḥ khāt bhraṣṭaḥ vajriṇā hataḥ
mahā-prāṇaḥ mahā-vīryaḥ mahā-sarpaḥ iva dvipam kṛtvā adharām hanum bhūmau daityaḥ divi uttarām hanum nabhaḥ gambhīra vaktreṇa leliha ulbaṇa jihvayā daṁṣṭrābhiḥ kāla-kalpābhiḥ grasan iva jagat-trayam ati-mātra mahā-kāyaḥ ākṣipan tarasā girīn giri-rāṭ pāda-cārī iva padbhyām nirjarayan mahīm jagrāsa saḥ samāsādya vajriṇam saha-vāhanam
vṛtra-grastam tam ālokya sa-prajāpatayaḥ surāḥ hā kaṣṭam iti nirviṇṇāḥ cukruśuḥ sa-mahā-ṛṣayaḥ
nigīrṇaḥ api asura-indreṇa na mamāra udaram gataḥ mahā-puruṣa sannaddhaḥ yoga-māyā-balena ca
bhittvā vajreṇa tat-kukṣim niṣkramya bala-bhit vibhuḥ uccakarta śiraḥ śatroḥ giri-śṛṅgam iva ojasā
vajraḥ tu tat-kandharam āśu-vegaḥ kṛntan samantāt parivartamānaḥ nyapātayat tāvat ahaḥ-gaṇena yaḥ jyotiṣām ayane vārtra-hatye
tadā ca khe dundubhayaḥ vineduḥ gandharva siddhāḥ sa-maharṣi-saṅghāḥ vārtra-ghna-liṅgaiḥ tam abhiṣṭuvānāḥ mantraiḥ mudā kusumaiḥ abhyavarṣan
vṛtrasya dehāt niṣkrāntam ātma-jyotiḥ arim-dama paśyatām sarva-devānām alokam samapadyata
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca vṛtre hate trayaḥ lokāḥ vinā śakreṇa bhūri-da sa-pālāḥ hi abhavan sadyaḥ vijvarāḥ nirvṛta indriyāḥ
deva ṛṣi pitṛ bhūtāni daityāḥ deva-anugāḥ svayam pratijagmuḥ sva-dhiṣṇyāni brahma īśa indra-ādayaḥ tataḥ
śrī-rājā uvāca indrasya anirvṛteḥ hetum śrotum icchāmi bhoḥ mune yena āsan sukhinaḥ devāḥ hareḥ duḥkham kutaḥ abhavat
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca vṛtra vikrama saṁvignāḥ sarve devāḥ saha ṛṣibhiḥ tat-vadhāya ārthayan indram na aicchat bhītaḥ bṛhat-vadhāt
indraḥ uvāca strī bhū druma jalaiḥ enaḥ viśvarūpa vadha udbhavam vibhaktam anugṛhṇadbhiḥ vṛtra-hatyām kva mārjmi aham
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ṛṣayaḥ tat upākarṇya mahā-indram idam abruvan yājayiṣyāmaḥ bhadram te hayamedhena mā sma bhaiḥ
hayamedhena puruṣam paramātmānam īśvaram iṣṭvā nārāyaṇam devam mokṣyase api jagat-vadhāt
brahma-hā pitṛ-hā go-ghnaḥ mātṛ-hā ācārya-hā agha-vān śva-adaḥ pulkasakaḥ vā api śuddhyeran yasya kīrtanāt tam aśvamedhena mahā-makhena śraddhā-anvitaḥ asmābhiḥ anuṣṭhitena hatvā api sa-brahma-cara-acaram tvam na lipyase kim khala-nigraheṇa
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam sañcoditaḥ vipraiḥ marutvān ahanat ripum brahma-hatyā hate tasmin āsasāda vṛṣākapim
tayā indraḥ sma asahat tāpam nirvṛtiḥ na amum āviśat hrīmantam vācyatām prāptam sukhayanti api no guṇāḥ
tām dadarśa anudhāvantīm cāṇḍālīm iva rūpiṇīm jarayā vepamāna-aṅgīm yakṣma-grastām asṛk-paṭām vikīrya palitān keśān tiṣṭha tiṣṭha iti bhāṣiṇīm mīna-gandhi asu gandhena kurvatīm mārga-dūṣaṇam
nabhaḥ gataḥ diśaḥ sarvāḥ sahasra-akṣaḥ viśāmpate prāk-udīcīm diśam tūrṇam praviṣṭaḥ nṛpa mānasam
saḥ āvasat puṣkara-nāla-tantūn alabdha-bhogaḥ yat iha agni-dūtaḥ varṣāṇi sāhasram alakṣitaḥ antaḥ sañcintayan brahma-vadhāt vimokṣam
tāvat triṇākam nahuṣaḥ śaśāsa vidyā tapaḥ yoga bala anubhāvaḥ saḥ sampat aiśvarya mada andha buddhiḥ nītaḥ tiraścām gatim indra-patnyā
tataḥ gataḥ brahma girā upahūtaḥ ṛtambhara dhyāna nivārita aghaḥ pāpaḥ tu dik-devatayā hata-ojāḥ tam na abhyabhūt avitam viṣṇu-patnyā
tam ca brahma-ṛṣayaḥ abhyetya hayamedhena bhārata yathāvat dīkṣayām cakruḥ puruṣa-ārādhanena ha
atha ijyamāne puruṣe sarva deva-maya-ātmani aśvamedhe mahā-indreṇa vitate brahma-vādibhiḥ saḥ vai tvāṣṭra-vadhaḥ bhūyāt api pāpa-cayaḥ nṛpa nītaḥ tena eva śūnyāya nīhāraḥ iva bhānunā
saḥ vājimedhena yathā uditena vitāyamānena marīci-miśraiḥ iṣṭvā adhiyajñam puruṣam purāṇam indraḥ mahān āsa vidhūta-pāpaḥ
idam mahā-ākhyānam aśeṣa-pāpmanām prakṣālanam tīrthapada-anukīrtanam bhakti ucchrayam bhakta-jana anuvarṇanam mahā-indra-mokṣam vijayam marutvataḥ paṭheyuḥ ākhyānam idam sadā budhāḥ śṛṇvanti atho parvaṇi parvaṇi indriyam dhanyam yaśasyam nikhila agha-mocanam ripum-jayam svasti-ayanam tathā āyuṣam
śrī-parīkṣit uvāca rajaḥ tamaḥ sva-bhāvasya brahman vṛtrasya pāpmanaḥ nārāyaṇe bhagavati katham āsīt dṛḍhā matiḥ
devānām śuddha-sattvānām ṛṣīṇām ca amala-ātmanām bhaktiḥ mukunda-caraṇe na prāyeṇa upajāyate
rajobhiḥ sama-saṅkhyātāḥ pārthivaiḥ iha jantavaḥ teṣām ye kecana īhante śreyaḥ vai manuja-ādayaḥ
prāyaḥ mumukṣavaḥ teṣām kecana eva dvija-uttama mumukṣūṇām sahasreṣu kaścit mucyeta sidhyati
muktānām api siddhānām nārāyaṇa-parāyaṇaḥ su-durlabhaḥ praśānta ātmā koṭiṣu* api mahā-mune
vṛtraḥ tu saḥ katham pāpaḥ sarva-loka upatāpanaḥ ittham dṛḍha-matiḥ kṛṣṇe āsīt saṅgrāme ulbaṇe
atra naḥ saṁśayaḥ bhūyān śrotum kautūhalam prabho yaḥ pauruṣeṇa samare sahasra-akṣam atoṣayat
śrī-sūtaḥ uvāca parīkṣitaḥ atha sampraśnam bhagavān bādarāyaṇiḥ niśamya śraddadhānasya pratinandya vacaḥ abravīt
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca śṛṇuṣva avahitaḥ rājan itihāsam imam yathā śrutam dvaipāyana mukhāt nāradāt devalāt api
āsīt rājā sārva-bhaumaḥ śūraseneṣu vai nṛpa citraketuḥ iti khyātaḥ yasya āsīt kāma-dhuk mahī
tasya bhāryā sahasrāṇām sahasrāṇi daśa abhavan sāntānikaḥ ca api nṛpaḥ na lebhe tāsu santatim
rūpa audārya vayaḥ janma vidyā aiśvarya śriya-ādibhiḥ sampannasya guṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ cintā bandhyā-pateḥ abhūt
na tasya sampadaḥ sarvāḥ mahiṣyaḥ vāma-locanāḥ sārva-bhaumasya bhūḥ ca iyam abhavan prīti-hetavaḥ
tasya ekadā tu bhavanam aṅgirāḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ lokān anucaran etān upāgacchat yadṛcchayā
tam pūjayitvā vidhi-vat pratyutthāna arhaṇa-ādibhiḥ kṛta-atithyam upāsīdat sukha-āsīnam samāhitaḥ
mahā-ṛṣiḥ tam upāsīnam praśraya-avanatam kṣitau pratipūjya mahārāja samābhāṣya idam abravīt
aṅgirāḥ uvāca api te anāmayam svasti prakṛtīnām tathā ātmanaḥ yathā prakṛtibhiḥ guptaḥ pumān rājā ca saptabhiḥ
ātmānam prakṛtiṣu addhā nidhāya śreyaḥ āpnuyāt rājñā tathā prakṛtayaḥ nara-deva āhita-adhayaḥ
api dārāḥ prajā amātyāḥ bhṛtyāḥ śreṇyaḥ atha mantriṇaḥ paurāḥ jānapadāḥ bhūpāḥ ātma-jāḥ vaśa-vartinaḥ
yasya ātmā anuvaśaḥ cet syāt sarve tat-vaśa-gāḥ ime lokāḥ sa-pālāḥ yacchanti sarve balim atandritāḥ
ātmanaḥ prīyate na ātmā parataḥ svataḥ eva vā lakṣaye alabdha-kāmam tvām cintayā śabalam mukham
evam vikalpitaḥ rājan viduṣā muninā api saḥ praśraya-avanataḥ abhyāha prajā-kāmaḥ tataḥ munim
citraketuḥ uvāca bhagavan kim na viditam tapaḥ jñāna samādhibhiḥ yoginām dhvasta-pāpānām bahiḥ antaḥ śarīriṣu
tathāpi pṛcchataḥ brūyām brahman ātmani cintitam bhavataḥ viduṣaḥ ca api coditaḥ tvat anujñayā
loka-pālaiḥ api prārthyāḥ sāmrājya aiśvarya sampadaḥ na nandayanti aprajam mām kṣut tṛṭ kāmam iva apare
tataḥ pāhi mahā-bhāga pūrvaiḥ saha gatam tamaḥ yathā tarema duṣpāram prajayā tat vidhehi naḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti arthitaḥ saḥ bhagavān kṛpāluḥ brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ śrapayitvā carum tvāṣṭram tvaṣṭāram ayajat vibhuḥ
jyeṣṭhā śreṣṭhā ca yā rājñaḥ mahiṣīṇām ca bhārata nāmnā kṛtadyutiḥ tasyai yajña ucchiṣṭam adāt dvijaḥ
atha āha nṛpatim rājan bhavitā ekaḥ tava ātmajaḥ harṣa-śoka pradaḥ tubhyam iti brahma-sutaḥ yayau
sā api tat-prāśanāt eva citraketoḥ adhārayat garbham kṛtadyutiḥ devī kṛttikā agneḥ iva ātma-jam
tasyāḥ anudinam garbhaḥ śukla-pakṣe iva uḍupaḥ vavṛdhe śūrasena-īśa tejasā śanakaiḥ nṛpa
atha kāle upāvṛtte kumāraḥ samajāyata janayan śūrasenānām śṛṇvatām paramām mudam
hṛṣṭaḥ rājā kumārasya snātaḥ śuciḥ alaṅkṛtaḥ vācayitvā āśiṣaḥ vipraiḥ kārayām āsa jātakam
tebhyaḥ hiraṇyam rajatam vāsāṁsi ābharaṇāni ca grāmān hayān gajān prādāt dhenūnām arbudāni ṣaṭ
vavarṣa kāmān anyeṣām parjanyaḥ iva dehinām dhanyam yaśasyam āyuṣyam kumārasya mahā-manāḥ
kṛcchra labdhe atha rāja-ṛṣeḥ tanaye anudinam pituḥ yathā niḥsvasya kṛcchra-āpte dhane snehaḥ anvavardhata
mātuḥ tu atitarām putre snehaḥ moha samudbhavaḥ kṛtadyuteḥ sapatnīnām prajā-kāma jvaraḥ abhavat
citraketoḥ atiprītiḥ yathā dāre prajā-vati na tathā anyeṣu sañjajñe bālam lālayataḥ anvaham
tāḥ paryatapyan ātmānam garhayantyaḥ abhyasūyayā ānapatyena duḥkhena rājñaḥ ca anādareṇa ca
dhik aprajām striyam pāpām patyuḥ ca a-gṛha-sammatām su-prajābhiḥ sapatnībhiḥ dāsīm iva tiraskṛtām
dāsīnām kaḥ nu santāpaḥ svāminaḥ paricaryayā abhīkṣṇam labdha-mānānām dāsyāḥ dāsī iva durbhagāḥ
evam sandahyamānānām sapatnyāḥ putra-sampadā rājñaḥ asammata-vṛttīnām vidveṣaḥ balavān abhūt
vidveṣa-naṣṭa-matayaḥ striyaḥ dāruṇa-cetasaḥ garam daduḥ kumārāya durmarṣāḥ nṛpatim prati
kṛtadyutiḥ ajānantī sapatnīnām agham mahat suptaḥ eva iti sañcintya nirīkṣya vyacarat gṛhe
śayānam su-ciram bālam upadhārya manīṣiṇī putram ānaya me bhadre iti dhātrīm acodayat
sā śayānam upavrajya dṛṣṭvā ca uttāra-locanam prāṇa-indriya-ātmabhiḥ tyaktam hatā asmi iti apatat bhuvi
tasyāḥ tadā ākarṇya bhṛśa-āturam svaram ghnantyāḥ karābhyām uraḥ uccakaiḥ api praviśya rājñī tvarayā ātmaja-antikam dadarśa bālam sahasā mṛtam sutam
papāta bhūmau parivṛddhayā śucā mumoha vibhraṣṭa śiroruha ambarā
tataḥ nṛpa antaḥpura-vartinaḥ janāḥ narāḥ ca nāryaḥ ca niśamya rodanam āgatya tulya-vyasanāḥ su-duḥkhitāḥ tāḥ ca vyalīkam ruruduḥ kṛta-āgasaḥ
śrutvā mṛtam putram alakṣita-antakam vinaṣṭa-dṛṣṭiḥ prapatan skhalan pathi sneha-anubandha edhitayā śucā bhṛśam vimūrcchitaḥ anuprakṛtiḥ dvijaiḥ vṛtaḥ papāta bālasya saḥ pāda-mūle mṛtasya visrasta śiroruha ambaraḥ dīrgham śvasan bāṣpa-kalā-uparodhataḥ niruddha-kaṇṭhaḥ na śaśāka bhāṣitum
patim nirīkṣya uru śuca arpitam tadā mṛtam ca bālam sutam eka-santatim janasya rājñī prakṛteḥ ca hṛt-rujam satī dadhānā vilalāpa citradhā
stana-dvayam kuṅkuma paṅka maṇḍitam niṣiñcatī sa-añjana bāṣpa bindubhiḥ vikīrya keśān vigalat srajaḥ sutam śuśoca citram kurarī iva su-svaram
aho vidhātaḥ tvam atīva bāliśaḥ yaḥ tu ātma-sṛṣṭi apratirūpam īhase pare nu jīvati aparasya yā mṛtiḥ viparyayaḥ cet tvam asi dhruvaḥ paraḥ
na hi kramaḥ cet iha mṛtyu janmanoḥ śarīriṇām astu tat ātma-karmabhiḥ yaḥ sneha-pāśaḥ nija-sarga vṛddhaye svayam kṛtaḥ te tam imam vivṛścasi
tvam tāta na arhasi ca mām kṛpaṇām anāthām tyaktum vicakṣva pitaram tava śoka-taptam añjaḥ tarema bhavatā apraja-dustaram yat dhvāntam na yāhi akaruṇena yamena dūram
uttiṣṭha tāta te ime śiśavaḥ vayasyāḥ tvām āhvayanti nṛpa-nandana saṁvihartum suptaḥ ciram hi aśanayā ca bhavān parītaḥ bhuṅkṣva stanam piba śucaḥ hara naḥ svakānām
na aham tanū-ja dadṛśe hata-maṅgalā te mugdha-smitam mudita-vīkṣaṇam ānana-abjam kiṁ vā gataḥ asi a-punaḥ-anvayam anya-lokam nītaḥ aghṛṇena na śṛṇomi kalāḥ giraḥ te
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca vilapantyā mṛtam putram iti citra-vilāpanaiḥ citraketuḥ bhṛśam taptaḥ mukta-kaṇṭhaḥ ruroda ha
tayoḥ vilapatoḥ sarve dam-patyoḥ tat-anuvratāḥ ruruduḥ sma narāḥ nāryaḥ sarvam āsīt acetanam
evam kaśmalam āpannam naṣṭa saṁjñam anāyakam jñātvā aṅgirāḥ nāma ṛṣiḥ ājagāma sa-nāradaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ūcatuḥ mṛtaka upānte patitam mṛtaka-upamam śoka-abhibhūtam rājānam bodhayantau sat-uktibhiḥ
kaḥ ayam syāt tava rāja-indra bhavān yam anuśocati tvam ca asya katamaḥ sṛṣṭau purā idānīm ataḥ param
yathā prayānti saṁyānti srotaḥ-vegena bālukāḥ saṁyujyante viyujyante tathā kālena dehinaḥ
yathā dhānāsu vai dhānāḥ bhavanti na bhavanti ca evam bhūtāni bhūteṣu coditāni īśa-māyayā
vayam ca tvam ca ye ca ime tulya-kālāḥ cara-acarāḥ janma mṛtyoḥ yathā paścāt prāk na evam adhunā api bhoḥ
bhūtaiḥ bhūtāni bhūta-īśaḥ sṛjati avati hanti ca ātma-sṛṣṭaiḥ asvatantraiḥ anapekṣaḥ api bāla-vat
dehena dehinaḥ rājan dehāt dehaḥ abhijāyate bījāt eva yathā bījam dehī arthaḥ iva śāśvataḥ
deha dehi vibhāgaḥ ayam aviveka kṛtaḥ purā jāti vyakti vibhāgaḥ ayam yathā vastuni kalpitaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam āśvāsitaḥ rājā citraketuḥ dvija-uktibhiḥ vimṛjya pāṇinā vaktram ādhi-mlānam abhāṣata
śrī-rājā uvāca kau yuvām jñāna-sampannau mahiṣṭhau ca mahīyasām avadhūtena veṣeṇa gūḍhau iha samāgatau
caranti hi avanau kāmam brāhmaṇāḥ bhagavat-priyāḥ mā-dṛśām grāmya-buddhīnām bodhāya unmatta-liṅginaḥ
kumāraḥ nāradaḥ ṛbhuḥ aṅgirāḥ devalaḥ asitaḥ apāntaratamāḥ vyāsaḥ mārkaṇḍeyaḥ atha gautamaḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ bhagavān rāmaḥ kapilaḥ bādarāyaṇiḥ durvāsāḥ yājñavalkyaḥ ca jātukarṇaḥ tathā aruṇiḥ romaśaḥ cyavanaḥ dattaḥ āsuriḥ sa-patañjaliḥ ṛṣiḥ veda-śirāḥ dhaumyaḥ muniḥ pañcaśikhaḥ tathā hiraṇyanābhaḥ kauśalyaḥ śrutadevaḥ ṛtadhvajaḥ ete pare ca siddha-īśāḥ caranti jñāna-hetavaḥ
tasmāt yuvām grāmya-paśoḥ mama mūḍha-dhiyaḥ prabhū andhe tamasi magnasya jñāna-dīpaḥ udīryatām
śrī-aṅgirāḥ uvāca aham te putra-kāmasya putra-daḥ asmi aṅgirāḥ nṛpa eṣaḥ brahma-sutaḥ sākṣāt nāradaḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
ittham tvām putra-śokena magnam tamasi dustare a-tat-arham anusmṛtya mahā-puruṣa gocaram anugrahāya bhavataḥ prāptau āvām iha prabho brahmaṇyaḥ bhagavat-bhaktaḥ na avāsāditum arhasi
tadā eva te param jñānam dadāmi gṛham āgataḥ jñātvā anya-abhiniveśam te putram eva dadāmi aham
adhunā putriṇām tāpaḥ bhavatā eva anubhūyate evam dārāḥ gṛhāḥ rāyaḥ vividha aiśvarya sampadaḥ śabda-ādayaḥ ca viṣayāḥ calāḥ rājya vibhūtayaḥ mahī rājyam balam koṣaḥ bhṛtya amātya suhṛt-janāḥ sarve api śūrasena ime śoka moha bhaya arti dāḥ gandharva-nagara-prakhyāḥ svapna māyā manorathāḥ

atha kaśyapa-dāyādān daiteyān kīrtayāmi te yatra bhāgavataḥ śrī-mān prahrādaḥ baliḥ eva ca
diteḥ dvau eva dāyādau daitya-dānava vanditau hiraṇyakaśipuḥ nāma hiraṇyākṣaḥ ca kīrtitau
hiraṇyakaśipoḥ bhāryā kayādhuḥ nāma dānavī jambhasya tanayā sā tu suṣuve caturaḥ sutān saṁhrādam prāk anuhrādam hrādam prahrādam eva ca tat-svasā siṁhikā nāma rāhum vipracitaḥ agrahīt
śiraḥ aharat yasya hariḥ cakreṇa pibataḥ amṛtam saṁhrādasya kṛtiḥ bhāryā asūta pañcajanam tataḥ
hrādasya dhamaniḥ bhāryā asūta vātāpim ilvalam yaḥ agastyāya tu atithaye pece vātāpim ilvalaḥ
anuhrādasya sūryāyām bāṣkalaḥ mahiṣaḥ tathā virocanaḥ tu prāhrādiḥ devyām tasya abhavat baliḥ
bāṇa-jyeṣṭham putra-śatam aśanāyām tataḥ abhavat tasya anubhāvam su-ślokyam paścāt eva abhidhāsyate
bāṇaḥ ārādhya giriśam lebhe tat gaṇa-mukhyatām yat-pārśve bhagavān āste hi adya api pura-pālakaḥ
marutaḥ ca diteḥ putrāḥ catvāriṁśat nava-adhikāḥ te āsan aprajāḥ sarve nītāḥ indreṇa sa-ātmatām
śrī-rājā uvāca katham te āsuram bhāvam apohya autpattikam guro indreṇa prāpitāḥ sa-ātmyam kim tat sādhu kṛtam hi taiḥ
ime śraddadhate brahman ṛṣayaḥ hi mayā saha parijñānāya bhagavan tat naḥ vyākhyātum arhasi
śrī-sūtaḥ uvāca tat viṣṇurātasya saḥ bādarāyaṇiḥ vacaḥ niśamya ādṛtam alpam artha-vat sabhājayan san nibhṛtena cetasā jagāda satrāyaṇa sarva-darśanaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca hata-putrā ditiḥ śakra-pārṣṇi-grāheṇa viṣṇunā manyunā śoka-dīptena jvalantī paryacintayat
kadā nu bhrātṛ-hantāram indriya-ārāmam ulbaṇam aklinna-hṛdayam pāpam ghātayitvā śaye sukham
kṛmi viṭ bhasma saṁjñā āsīt yasya īśa-abhihitasya ca bhūta-dhruk tat-kṛte sva-artham kim veda nirayaḥ yataḥ
āśāsānasya tasya idam dhruvam unnaddha-cetasaḥ mada-śoṣakaḥ indrasya bhūyāt yena sutaḥ hi me
iti bhāvena sā bhartuḥ ācacāra asakṛt priyam śuśrūṣayā anurāgeṇa praśrayeṇa damena ca bhaktyā paramayā rājan manojñaiḥ valgu-bhāṣitaiḥ manaḥ jagrāha bhāva-jñā sa-smita apāṅga-vīkṣaṇaiḥ
evam striyā jaḍībhūtaḥ vidvān api manojñayā bāḍham iti āha vivaśaḥ na tat citram hi yoṣiti
vilokya ekānta-bhūtāni bhūtāni ādau prajāpatiḥ striyam cakre sva-deha ardham yayā puṁsām matiḥ hṛtā
evam śuśrūṣitaḥ tāta bhagavān kaśyapaḥ striyā prahasya parama-prītaḥ ditim āha abhinandya ca
śrī-kaśyapaḥ uvāca varam varaya vāmoru prītaḥ te aham anindite striyāḥ bhartari su-prīte kaḥ kāmaḥ iha ca agamaḥ
patiḥ eva hi nārīṇām daivatam paramam smṛtam mānasaḥ sarva-bhūtānām vāsudevaḥ śriyaḥ patiḥ saḥ eva devatā-liṅgaiḥ nāma rūpa vikalpitaiḥ ijyate bhagavān pumbhiḥ strībhiḥ ca pati-rūpa-dhṛk
tasmāt pati-vratāḥ nāryaḥ śreyaḥ-kāmāḥ su-madhyame yajante ananya-bhāvena patim ātmānam īśvaram
saḥ aham tvayā arcitaḥ bhadre īdṛk-bhāvena bhaktitaḥ tam te sampādaye kāmam asatīnām su-durlabham
ditiḥ uvāca vara-daḥ yadi me brahman putram indra-haṇam vṛṇe amṛtyum mṛta-putrā aham yena me ghātitau sutau
niśamya tat-vacaḥ vipraḥ vimanāḥ paryatapyata aho adharmaḥ su-mahān adya me samupasthitaḥ
aho artha-indriya-ārāmaḥ yoṣit-mayyā iha māyayā gṛhīta-cetāḥ kṛpaṇaḥ patiṣye narake dhruvam
kaḥ atikramaḥ anuvartantyāḥ sva-bhāvam iha yoṣitaḥ dhik mām bata abudham sva-arthe yat aham tu ajita-indriyaḥ
śarat padma utsavam vaktram vacaḥ ca śravaṇa amṛtam hṛdayam kṣura-dhārā ābham strīṇām kaḥ veda ceṣṭitam
na hi kaścit priyaḥ strīṇām añjasā sva-āśiṣā ātmanām patim putram bhrātaram vā ghnanti arthe ghātayanti ca
pratiśrutam dadāmi iti vacaḥ tat na mṛṣā bhavet vadham na arhati ca indraḥ api tatra idam upakalpate
iti sañcintya bhagavān mārīcaḥ kuru-nandana uvāca kiñcit kupitaḥ ātmānam ca vigarhayan
śrī-kaśyapaḥ uvāca putraḥ te bhavitā bhadre indra-hā adeva-bāndhavaḥ saṁvatsaram vratam idam yadi añjaḥ dhārayiṣyasi
ditiḥ uvāca dhārayiṣye vratam brahman brūhi kāryāṇi yāni me yāni ca iha niṣiddhāni na vratam ghnanti yāni uta
śrī-kaśyapaḥ uvāca na hiṁsyāt bhūta-jātāni na śapet na anṛtam vadet na chindyāt nakha-romāṇi na spṛśet yat amaṅgalam
na apsu snāyāt na kupyeta na sambhāṣeta durjanaiḥ na vasīta adhauta-vāsaḥ srajam ca vidhṛtām kvacit
na ucchiṣṭam caṇḍikā-annam ca sa-āmiṣam vṛṣala-āhṛtam bhuñjīta udakyayā dṛṣṭam pibet na añjalinā tu apaḥ
na ucchiṣṭā aspṛṣṭa-salilā sandhyāyām mukta-mūrdhajā anarcitā asaṁyata-vāk na asaṁvītā bahiḥ caret
na adhauta-pādā aprayatā na ardra-pādā udak-śirāḥ śayīta na aparāk na anyaiḥ na nagnā na ca sandhyayoḥ
dhauta-vāsā śuciḥ nityam sarva-maṅgala saṁyutā pūjayet prātaḥ-āśāt prāk go-viprān śriyam acyutam
striyaḥ vīra-vatīḥ ca arcet srak gandha bali maṇḍanaiḥ patim ca ārcya upatiṣṭheta dhyāyet koṣṭha-gatam ca tam
sāṁvatsaram puṁsavanam vratam etat aviplutam dhārayiṣyasi cet tubhyam śakra-hā bhavitā sutaḥ
bāḍham iti abhyupetya atha ditiḥ rājan mahā-manāḥ kaśyapāt garbham ādhatta vratam ca añjaḥ dadhāra sā
mātṛ-svasuḥ abhiprāyam indraḥ ājñāya māna-da śuśrūṣaṇena āśrama-sthām ditim paryacarat kaviḥ
nityam vanāt sumanasaḥ phala mūla samit kuśān patra aṅkura mṛdaḥ apaḥ ca kāle kāle upāharat
evam tasyāḥ vrata-sthāyāḥ vrata-chidram hariḥ nṛpa prepsuḥ paryacarat jihmaḥ mṛga-hā iva mṛga-ākṛtiḥ
na adhyagacchat vrata-chidram tat-paraḥ atha mahī-pate cintām tīvrām gataḥ śakraḥ kena me syāt śivam tu iha
ekadā sā tu sandhyāyām ucchiṣṭā vrata karśitā aspṛṣṭa vāri adhauta aṅghriḥ suṣvāpa vidhi mohitā
labdhvā tat-antaram śakraḥ nidrā apahṛta-cetasaḥ diteḥ praviṣṭaḥ udaram yoga-īśaḥ yoga māyayā
cakarta sapta-dhā garbham vajreṇa kanaka prabham rudantam sapta-dhā eka-ekam mā rodīḥ iti tān punaḥ
tam ūcuḥ pāṭyamānāḥ te sarve prāñjalayaḥ nṛpa kim naḥ indra jighāṁsasi bhrātaraḥ marutaḥ tava
mā bhaiṣṭa bhrātaraḥ mahyam yūyam iti āha kauśikaḥ ananya-bhāvān pārṣadān ātmanaḥ marutām gaṇān
na mamāra diteḥ garbhaḥ śrīnivāsa anukampayā bahu-dhā kuliśa kṣuṇṇaḥ drauṇi astreṇa yathā bhavān
sakṛt iṣṭvā ādi-puruṣam puruṣaḥ yāti sāmyatām saṁvatsaram kiñcit ūnam dityā yat hariḥ arcitaḥ sajūḥ indreṇa pañcāśat devāḥ te marutaḥ abhavan vyapohya mātṛ-doṣam te hariṇā soma-pāḥ kṛtāḥ
ditiḥ utthāya dadṛśe kumārān anala-prabhān indreṇa sahitān devī paryatuṣyat aninditā
atha indram āha tāta aham ādityānām bhaya-āvaham apatyam icchantī acaram vratam etat su-duṣkaram
ekaḥ saṅkalpitaḥ putraḥ sapta sapta abhavan katham yadi te viditam putra satyam kathaya mā mṛṣā
indraḥ uvāca amba te aham vyavasitam upadhārya āgataḥ antikam labdha antaraḥ acchidam garbham artha-buddhiḥ na dharma-dṛk
kṛttaḥ me sapta-dhā garbhaḥ āsan sapta kumārakāḥ te api ca eka-ekaśaḥ vṛkṇāḥ sapta-dhā na api mamrire
tataḥ tat parama-āścaryam vīkṣya vyavasitam mayā mahā-puruṣa pūjāyāḥ siddhiḥ kāpi ānuṣaṅgiṇī
ārādhanam bhagavataḥ īhamānāḥ nirāśiṣaḥ ye tu na icchanti api param te sva-artha kuśalāḥ smṛtāḥ
ārādhya ātma-pradam devam sva-ātmānam jagat-īśvaram kaḥ vṛṇīta guṇa-sparśam budhaḥ syāt narake api yat
tat idam mama daurjanyam bāliśasya mahīyasi kṣantum arhasi mātaḥ tvam diṣṭyā garbhaḥ mṛta utthitaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca indraḥ tayā abhyanujñātaḥ śuddha-bhāvena tuṣṭayā marudbhiḥ saha tām natvā jagāma tri-divam prabhuḥ
evam te sarvam ākhyātam yat mām tvam paripṛcchasi maṅgalam marutām janma kim bhūyaḥ kathayāmi te
śrī-rājā uvāca vratam puṁsavanam brahman bhavatā yat udīritam tasya veditum icchāmi yena viṣṇuḥ prasīdati
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca śukle mārgaśire pakṣe yoṣit bhartuḥ anujñayā ārabheta vratam idam sārva-kāmikam āditaḥ niśamya marutām janma brāhmaṇān anumantrya ca snātvā śukla-datī śukle vasīta alaṅkṛtā ambare pūjayet prātaḥ-āśāt prāk bhagavantam śriyā saha
alam te nirapekṣāya pūrṇa-kāma namaḥ astu te mahā-vibhūti pataye namaḥ sakala-siddhaye
yathā tvam kṛpayā bhūtyā tejasā mahima-ojasā juṣṭaḥ īśa guṇaiḥ sarvaiḥ tataḥ asi bhagavān prabhuḥ
viṣṇu-patni mahā-māye mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇe prīyethāḥ me mahā-bhāge loka-mātaḥ namaḥ astu te
om namaḥ bhagavate mahā-puruṣāya mahā-anubhāvāya mahā-vibhūti pataye saha mahā-vibhūtibhiḥ balim upaharāmi iti anena ahaḥ-ahaḥ mantreṇa viṣṇoḥ āvāhana arghya-pādya-upasparśana snāna vāsa upavīta vibhūṣaṇa gandha puṣpa dhūpa dīpa upahāra ādi upacārān su-samāhitā upāharet
haviḥ-śeṣam ca juhuyāt anale dvādaśa āhutīḥ om namaḥ bhagavate mahā-puruṣāya mahā-vibhūti pataye svāhā iti
śriyam viṣṇum ca vara-dau āśiṣām prabhavau ubhau bhaktyā sampūjayet nityam yadi icchet sarva sampadaḥ
praṇamet daṇḍa-vat bhūmau bhakti prahveṇa cetasā daśa-vāram japet mantram tataḥ stotram udīrayet
yuvām tu viśvasya vibhū jagataḥ kāraṇam param iyam hi prakṛtiḥ sūkṣmā māyā-śaktiḥ duratyayā
tasyāḥ adhīśvaraḥ sākṣāt tvam eva puruṣaḥ paraḥ tvam sarva-yajñaḥ ijyā iyam kriyā iyam phala-bhuk bhavān
guṇa-vyaktiḥ iyam devī vyañjakaḥ guṇa-bhuk bhavān tvam hi sarva-śarīrī ātmā śrīḥ śarīra indriya āśayāḥ nāma rūpe bhagavatī pratyayaḥ tvam apāśrayaḥ
yathā yuvām tri-lokasya vara-dau parame-ṣṭhinau tathā me uttama-śloka santu satyāḥ mahā-āśiṣaḥ
iti abhiṣṭūya vara-dam śrī-nivāsam śriyā saha tat niḥsārya upaharaṇam dattvā ācamanam arcayet
tataḥ stuvīta stotreṇa bhakti prahveṇa cetasā yajña-ucchiṣṭam avaghrāya punaḥ abhyarcayet harim
patim ca parayā bhaktyā mahā-puruṣa-cetasā priyaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ upanamet prema-śīlaḥ svayam patiḥ bibhṛyāt sarva-karmāṇi patnyāḥ ucca-avacāni ca
kṛtam ekatareṇa api dam-patyoḥ ubhayoḥ api patnyām kuryāt anarhāyām patiḥ etat samāhitaḥ
viṣṇoḥ vratam idam bibhrat na vihanyāt kathañcana viprān striyaḥ vīra-vatīḥ srak gandha bali maṇḍanaiḥ arcet ahaḥ-ahaḥ bhaktyā devam niyamam āsthitā udvāsya devam sve dhāmni tat niveditam agrataḥ adyāt ātma-viśuddhi-artham sarva-kāma samṛddhaye
etena pūjā-vidhinā māsān dvādaśa hāyanam nītvā atha uparamet sādhvī kārtike carame ahani
śvaḥ-bhūte apaḥ upaspṛśya kṛṣṇam abhyarcya pūrva-vat payaḥ-śṛtena juhuyāt caruṇā saha sarpiṣā pāka-yajña-vidhānena dvādaśa eva āhutīḥ patiḥ
āśiṣaḥ śirasā ādāya dvijaiḥ prītaiḥ samīritāḥ praṇamya śirasā bhaktyā bhuñjīta tat-anujñayā
ācāryam agrataḥ kṛtvā vāk-yataḥ saha bandhubhiḥ dadyāt patnyai caroḥ śeṣam su-prajāstvam su-saubhagam
etat caritvā vidhi-vat vratam vibhoḥ abhīpsita artham labhate pumān iha strī ca etat āsthāya labheta saubhagam śriyam prajām jīva-patim yaśaḥ gṛham
kanyā ca vindeta samagralakṣaṇam patim tu avīrā hata-kilbiṣām gatim mṛta-prajā jīva-sutā dhana-īśvarī su-durbhagā su-bhagā rūpam agryam vindet virūpā virujā vimucyate yaḥ āmayā-vī indriya-kalya-deham etat paṭhan abhyudaye ca karmaṇi ananta tṛptiḥ pitṛ-devatānām tuṣṭāḥ prayacchanti samasta kāmān homa-avasāne huta-bhuk śrī-hariḥ ca rājan mahat marutām janma puṇyam diteḥ vratam ca abhihitam mahat te
śrī-rājā uvāca samaḥ priyaḥ suhṛt brahman bhūtānām bhagavān svayam indrasya arthe katham daityān avadhīt viṣamaḥ yathā
na hi asya arthaḥ sura-gaṇaiḥ sākṣāt niḥśreyasa ātmanaḥ na eva asurebhyaḥ vidveṣaḥ na udvegaḥ ca aguṇasya hi
iti naḥ su-mahā-bhāga nārāyaṇa-guṇān prati saṁśayaḥ su-mahān jātaḥ tat bhavān chettum arhati
śrī-ṛṣiḥ uvāca sādhu pṛṣṭam mahā-rāja hareḥ caritam adbhutam yat bhāgavata māhātmyam bhagavat-bhakti vardhanam gīyate paramam puṇyam ṛṣibhiḥ nārada-ādibhiḥ natvā kṛṣṇāya munaye kathayiṣye hareḥ kathām
nirguṇaḥ api hi ajaḥ avyaktaḥ bhagavān prakṛteḥ paraḥ sva-māyā guṇam āviśya bādhya bādhakatām gataḥ
sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti prakṛteḥ na ātmanaḥ guṇāḥ na teṣām yugapat rājan hrāsaḥ ullāsaḥ eva vā
jaya-kāle tu sattvasya deva ṛṣīn rajasaḥ asurān tamasaḥ yakṣa-rakṣāṁsi tat-kāla-anuguṇaḥ abhajat
jyotiḥ ādiḥ iva ābhāti saṅghātāt na vivicyate vidanti ātmānam ātma-stham mathitvā kavayaḥ antataḥ
yadā sisṛkṣuḥ puraḥ ātmanaḥ paraḥ rajaḥ sṛjati eṣaḥ pṛthak sva-māyayā sattvam vicitrāsu riraṁsuḥ īśvaraḥ śayiṣyamāṇaḥ tamaḥ īrayati asau
kālam carantam sṛjati īśaḥ āśrayam pradhāna pumbhyām nara-deva satya kṛt
yaḥ eṣaḥ rājan api kālaḥ īśitā sattvam sura-anīkam iva edhayati ataḥ tat-pratyanīkān asurān sura-priyaḥ rajaḥ-tamaskān pramiṇoti uru-śravāḥ
atra eva udāhṛtaḥ pūrvam itihāsaḥ sura-ṛṣiṇā prītyā mahā-kratau rājan pṛcchate ajāta-śatrave
dṛṣṭvā mahā-adbhutam rājā rājasūye mahā-kratau vāsudeve bhagavati sāyujyam cedibhū-bhujaḥ tatra āsīnam sura-ṛṣim rājā pāṇḍu-sutaḥ kratau papraccha vismita-manāḥ munīnām śṛṇvatām idam
śrī-yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca aho ati-adbhutam hi etat durlabha ekāntinām api vāsudeve pare tattve prāptiḥ caidyasya vidviṣaḥ
etat veditum icchāmaḥ sarve eva vayam mune bhagavat-nindayā venaḥ dvijaiḥ tamasi pātitaḥ
damaghoṣa-sutaḥ pāpaḥ ārabhya kala-bhāṣaṇāt samprati amarṣī govinde dantavakraḥ ca durmatiḥ
śapatoḥ asakṛt viṣṇum yat brahma param avyayam śvitraḥ na jātaḥ jihvāyām na andham viviśatuḥ tamaḥ
katham tasmin bhagavati duravagrāhya dhāmani paśyatām sarva-lokānām layam īyatuḥ añjasā
etat bhrāmyati me buddhiḥ dīpa-arciḥ iva vāyunā brūhi etat adbhutatamam bhagavān hi atra kāraṇam
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca rājñaḥ tat vacaḥ ākarṇya nāradaḥ bhagavān ṛṣiḥ tuṣṭaḥ prāha tam ābhāṣya śṛṇvatyāḥ tat-sadaḥ kathāḥ
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca nindana stava satkāra nyakkāra artham kalevaram pradhāna-parayoḥ rājan avivekena kalpitam
hiṁsā tat abhimānena daṇḍa-pāruṣyayoḥ yathā vaiṣamyam iha bhūtānām mama-aham iti pārthiva
yat nibaddhaḥ abhimānaḥ ayam tat vadhāt prāṇinām vadhaḥ tathā na yasya kaivalyāt abhimānaḥ akhila-ātmanaḥ parasya dama-kartuḥ hi hiṁsā kena asya kalpyate
tasmāt vaira-anubandhena nirvaireṇa bhayena vā snehāt kāmena vā yuñjyāt kathañcit na īkṣate pṛthak
yathā vaira-anubandhena martyaḥ tat-mayatām iyāt na tathā bhakti-yogena iti me niścitā matiḥ
kīṭaḥ peśaskṛtā ruddhaḥ kuḍyāyām tam anusmaran saṁrambha-bhaya-yogena vindate tat sva-rūpatām evam kṛṣṇe bhagavati māyā-manuje īśvare vaireṇa pūta-pāpmānaḥ tam āpuḥ anucintayā
kāmāt dveṣāt bhayāt snehāt yathā bhaktyā īśvare manaḥ āveśya tat agham hitvā bahavaḥ tat gatim gatāḥ
gopyaḥ kāmāt bhayāt kaṁsaḥ dveṣāt caidya-ādayaḥ nṛpāḥ sambandhāt vṛṣṇayaḥ snehāt yūyam bhaktyā vayam vibho
katamaḥ api na venaḥ syāt pañcānām puruṣam prati tasmāt kenāpi upāyena manaḥ kṛṣṇe niveśayet
mātṛ-svasreyaḥ vaḥ caidyaḥ dantavakraḥ ca pāṇḍava pārṣada-pravarau viṣṇoḥ vipra śāpāt pada cyutau
śrī-yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca kīdṛśaḥ kasya vā śāpaḥ hari-dāsa abhimarśanaḥ aśraddheyaḥ iva ābhāti hareḥ ekāntinām bhavaḥ
deha indriya asu hīnānām vaikuṇṭha-pura vāsinām deha-sambandha sambaddham etat ākhyātum arhasi
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca ekadā brahmaṇaḥ putrāḥ viṣṇu lokam yadṛcchayā sanandana-ādayaḥ jagmuḥ carantaḥ bhuvana-trayam
pañca-ṣaṭ-dhā āyana arbha-ābhāḥ pūrveṣām api pūrva-jāḥ dik-vāsasaḥ śiśūn matvā dvāḥ-sthau tān pratyaṣedhatām
aśapan kupitāḥ evam yuvām vāsam na ca arhathaḥ rajaḥ-tamobhyām rahite pāda-mūle madhu-dviṣaḥ pāpiṣṭhām āsurīm yonim bāliśau yātam āśu ataḥ
evam śaptau sva-bhavanāt patantau tau kṛpālubhiḥ proktau punaḥ janmabhiḥ vām tribhiḥ lokāya kalpatām
jajñāte tau diteḥ putrau daitya-dānava vanditau hiraṇyakaśipuḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ hiraṇyākṣaḥ anujaḥ tataḥ
hataḥ hiraṇyakaśipuḥ hariṇā siṁha-rūpiṇā hiraṇyākṣaḥ dharā-uddhāre bibhratā śaukaram vapuḥ
hiraṇyakaśipuḥ putram prahlādam keśava-priyam jighāṁsuḥ akarot nānā yātanāḥ mṛtyu hetave
tam sarva-bhūta-ātma-bhūtam praśāntam sama-darśanam bhagavat-tejasā spṛṣṭam na aśaknot hantum udyamaiḥ
tataḥ tau rākṣasau jātau keśinyām viśravaḥ-sutau rāvaṇaḥ kumbhakarṇaḥ ca sarva-loka upatāpanau
tatra api rāghavaḥ bhūtvā nyahanat śāpa-muktaye rāma-vīryam śroṣyasi tvam mārkaṇḍeya-mukhāt prabho
tau atra kṣatriyau jātau mātṛ-svasṛ-ātma-jau tava adhunā śāpa-nirmuktau kṛṣṇa-cakra hata aṁhasau
vaira-anubandha tīvreṇa dhyānena acyuta-sātmatām nītau punaḥ hareḥ pārśvam jagmatuḥ viṣṇu-pārṣadau
śrī-yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca vidveṣaḥ dayite putre katham āsīt mahā-ātmani brūhi me bhagavan yena prahlādasya acyuta ātmatā
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca bhrātari evam vinihate hariṇā kroḍa-mūrtinā hiraṇyakaśipuḥ rājan paryatapyat ruṣā śucā
āha ca idam ruṣā pūrṇaḥ sandaṣṭa daśana-chadaḥ kopa-ujjvaladbhyām cakṣurbhyām nirīkṣan dhūmram ambaram
karāla-daṁṣṭra ugra-dṛṣṭyā duṣprekṣya bhru-kuṭī mukhaḥ śūlam udyamya sadasi dānavān idam abravīt
bhoḥ bhoḥ dānava-daiteyāḥ dvi-mūrdhan tri-akṣa śambara śata-bāho hayagrīva namuce pāka ilvala vipracitte mama vacaḥ puloman śakuna ādayaḥ śṛṇuta anantaram sarve kriyatām āśu mā ciram
sapatnaiḥ ghātitaḥ kṣudraiḥ bhrātā me dayitaḥ suhṛt pārṣṇi-grāheṇa hariṇā samena api upadhāvanaiḥ
tasya tyakta-svabhāvasya ghṛṇeḥ māyā vana-okasaḥ bhajantam bhajamānasya bālasya iva asthira-ātmanaḥ mat śūla bhinna grīvasya bhūriṇā rudhireṇa vai asṛk-priyam tarpayiṣye bhrātaram me gata-vyathaḥ
tasmin kūṭe ahite naṣṭe kṛtta-mūle vanas-patau viṭapāḥ iva śuṣyanti viṣṇu-prāṇāḥ diva-okasaḥ
tāvat yāta bhuvam yūyam brahma-kṣatra samedhitām sūdayadhvam tapaḥ yajña svādhyāya vrata dāninaḥ
viṣṇuḥ dvija kriyā-mūlaḥ yajñaḥ dharma-mayaḥ pumān deva-ṛṣi pitṛ bhūtānām dharmasya ca parāyaṇam
yatra yatra dvijāḥ gāvaḥ vedāḥ varṇa-āśrama kriyāḥ tam tam jana-padam yāta sandīpayata vṛścata
iti te bhartṛ nirdeśam ādāya śirasā ādṛtāḥ tathā prajānām kadanam vidadhuḥ kadana-priyāḥ
pura grāma vraja udyāna kṣetra ārāma āśrama ākarān kheṭa kharvaṭa ghoṣān ca dadahuḥ pattanāni ca
kecit khanitraiḥ bibhiduḥ setu prākāra gopurān ājīvyān cicchiduḥ vṛkṣān kecit paraśu-pāṇayaḥ prādahan śaraṇāni eke prajānām jvalita ulmukaiḥ
evam viprakṛte loke daitya-indra-anucaraiḥ muhuḥ divam devāḥ parityajya bhuvi ceruḥ alakṣitāḥ
hiraṇyakaśipuḥ bhrātuḥ samparetasya duḥkhitaḥ kṛtvā kaṭodaka-ādīni bhrātṛ-putrān asāntvayat
śakunim śambaram dhṛṣṭim bhūtasantāpanam vṛkam kālanābham mahānābham hariśmaśrum atha utkacam tat-mātaram ruṣābhānum ditim ca jananīm girā ślakṣṇayā deśa-kāla-jñaḥ idam āha jana-īśvara
śrī-hiraṇyakaśipuḥ uvāca amba amba he vadhūḥ putrāḥ vīram mā arhatha śocitum ripoḥ abhimukhe ślāghyaḥ śūrāṇām vadhaḥ īpsitaḥ
bhūtānām iha saṁvāsaḥ prapāyām iva su-vrate daivena ekatra nītānām unnītānām sva-karmabhiḥ
nityaḥ ātmā avyayaḥ śuddhaḥ sarva-gaḥ sarva-vit paraḥ dhatte asau ātmanaḥ liṅgam māyayā visṛjan guṇān
yathā ambhasā pracalatā taravaḥ api calāḥ iva cakṣuṣā bhrāmyamāṇena dṛśyate calatī iva bhūḥ
evam guṇaiḥ bhrāmyamāṇe manasi avikalaḥ pumān yāti tat-sāmyatām bhadre hi aliṅgaḥ liṅga-vān iva
eṣaḥ ātma-viparyāsaḥ hi aliṅge liṅga-bhāvanā eṣaḥ priya apriyaiḥ yogaḥ viyogaḥ karma saṁsṛtiḥ sambhavaḥ ca vināśaḥ ca śokaḥ ca vividhaḥ smṛtaḥ avivekaḥ ca cintā ca viveka asmṛtiḥ eva ca
atra api udāharanti imam itihāsam purātanam yamasya preta-bandhūnām saṁvādam tam nibodhata
uśīnareṣu abhūt rājā suyajñaḥ iti viśrutaḥ sapatnaiḥ nihataḥ yuddhe jñātayaḥ tam upāsata
viśīrṇa ratna kavacam vibhraṣṭa ābharaṇa srajam śara-nirbhinna hṛdayam śayānam asṛk-āvilam prakīrṇa-keśam dhvasta-akṣam rabhasā daṣṭa dacchadam rajaḥ-kuṇṭha mukha-ambhojam chinna āyudha-bhujam mṛdhe uśīnara-indram vidhinā tathā kṛtam patim mahiṣyaḥ prasamīkṣya duḥkhitāḥ hatāḥ sma nātha iti karaiḥ uraḥ bhṛśam ghnantyaḥ muhuḥ tat-padayoḥ upāpatan
rudatyaḥ uccaiḥ dayita aṅghri-paṅkajam siñcantyaḥ asraiḥ kuca-kuṅkuma-aruṇaiḥ visrasta keśa ābharaṇāḥ śucam nṛṇām sṛjantyaḥ ākrandanayā vilepire
aho vidhātrā akaruṇena naḥ prabho bhavān praṇītaḥ dṛk agocarām daśām uśīnarāṇām asi vṛtti-daḥ purā kṛtaḥ adhunā yena śucām vivardhanaḥ
tvayā kṛtajñena vayam mahī-pate katham vinā syāma suhṛt-tamena te tatra anuyānam tava vīra pādayoḥ śuśrūṣatīnām diśa yatra yāsyasi
evam vilapatīnām vai parigṛhya mṛtam patim anicchatīnām nirhāram arkaḥ astam sannyavartata
tatra ha preta-bandhūnām āśrutya paridevitam āha tān bālakaḥ bhūtvā yamaḥ svayam upāgataḥ
śrī-yamaḥ uvāca aho amīṣām vayasā adhikānām vipaśyatām loka-vidhim vimohaḥ yatra āgataḥ tatra gatam manuṣyam svayam sa-dharmāḥ api śocanti apārtham
aho vayam dhanya-tamāḥ yat atra tyaktāḥ pitṛbhyām na vicintayāmaḥ abhakṣyamāṇāḥ abalāḥ vṛka-ādibhiḥ saḥ rakṣitā rakṣati yaḥ hi garbhe
yaḥ icchayā īśaḥ sṛjati idam avyayaḥ yaḥ eva rakṣati avalumpate ca yaḥ tasya abalāḥ krīḍanam āhuḥ īśituḥ cara-acaram nigraha saṅgrahe prabhuḥ
pathi cyutam tiṣṭhati diṣṭa-rakṣitam gṛhe sthitam tat-vihatam vinaśyati jīvati anāthaḥ api tat-īkṣitaḥ vane gṛhe abhiguptaḥ asya hataḥ na jīvati
bhūtāni taiḥ taiḥ nija-yoni karmabhiḥ bhavanti kāle na bhavanti sarvaśaḥ na tatra ha ātmā prakṛtau api sthitaḥ tasyāḥ guṇaiḥ anya-tamaḥ hi badhyate
idam śarīram puruṣasya moha-jam yathā pṛthak bhautikam īyate gṛham yathā udakaiḥ pārthiva taijasaiḥ janaḥ kālena jātaḥ vikṛtaḥ vinaśyati
yathā analaḥ dāruṣu bhinnaḥ īyate yathā anilaḥ deha-gataḥ pṛthak sthitaḥ yathā nabhaḥ sarva-gatam na sajjate tathā pumān sarva-guṇa-āśrayaḥ paraḥ
suyajñaḥ nanu ayam śete mūḍhāḥ yam anuśocatha yaḥ śrotā yaḥ anuvaktā iha saḥ na dṛśyeta karhicit
na śrotā na anuvaktā ayam mukhyaḥ api atra mahān asuḥ yaḥ tu iha indriya-vān ātmā saḥ ca anyaḥ prāṇa-dehayoḥ
bhūta indriya manaḥ liṅgān dehān ucca-avacān vibhuḥ bhajati utsṛjati hi anyaḥ tat ca api svena tejasā
yāvat liṅga-anvitaḥ hi ātmā tāvat karma nibandhanam tataḥ viparyayaḥ kleśaḥ māyā-yogaḥ anuvartate
vitatha abhiniveśaḥ ayam yat guṇeṣu artha dṛk-vacaḥ yathā manorathaḥ svapnaḥ sarvam aindriyakam mṛṣā
atha nityam anityam vā na iha śocanti tat-vidaḥ na anyathā śakyate kartum sva-bhāvaḥ śocatām iti
lubdhakaḥ vipine kaścit pakṣiṇām nirmitaḥ antakaḥ vitatya jālam vidadhe tatra tatra pralobhayan
kuliṅga-mithunam tatra vicarat samadṛśyata tayoḥ kuliṅgī sahasā lubdhakena pralobhitā
sā asajjata sicaḥ tantryām mahiṣyaḥ kāla-yantritā kuliṅgaḥ tām tathā āpannām nirīkṣya bhṛśa-duḥkhitaḥ snehāt akalpaḥ kṛpaṇaḥ kṛpaṇām paryadevayat
aho akaruṇaḥ devaḥ striyā ākaruṇayā vibhuḥ kṛpaṇam mām anuśocantyā dīnayā kim kariṣyati
kāmam nayatu mām devaḥ kim ardhena ātmanaḥ hi me dīnena jīvatā duḥkham anena vidhura-āyuṣā
katham tu ajāta-pakṣān tān mātṛ-hīnān bibharmi aham manda-bhāgyāḥ pratīkṣante nīḍe me mātaram prajāḥ
evam kuliṅgam vilapantam ārāt priyā-viyoga āturam aśru-kaṇṭham saḥ eva tam śākunikaḥ śareṇa vivyādha kāla-prahitaḥ vilīnaḥ
evam yūyam apaśyantyaḥ ātma-apāyam abuddhayaḥ na enam prāpsyatha śocantyaḥ patim varṣa-śataiḥ api
śrī-hiraṇyakaśipuḥ uvāca bāle evam pravadati sarve vismita cetasaḥ jñātayaḥ menire sarvam anityam ayathā-utthitam
yamaḥ etat upākhyāya tatra eva antaradhīyata jñātayaḥ hi suyajñasya cakruḥ yat sāmparāyikam
ataḥ śocata mā yūyam param ca ātmānam eva vā kaḥ ātmā kaḥ paraḥ vā atra svīyaḥ pārakyaḥ eva vā sva-para-abhiniveśena vinā ajñānena dehinām
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca iti daitya-pateḥ vākyam ditiḥ ākarṇya sa-snuṣā putra-śokam kṣaṇāt tyaktvā tattve cittam adhārayat
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca hiraṇyakaśipuḥ rājan ajeyam ajara amaram ātmānam apratidvandvam eka-rājam vyadhitsata
saḥ tepe mandara-droṇyām tapaḥ parama dāruṇam ūrdhva bāhuḥ nabhaḥ dṛṣṭiḥ pāda-aṅguṣṭha āśrita avaniḥ
jaṭā-dīdhitibhiḥ reje saṁvarta-arkaḥ iva aṁśubhiḥ tasmin tapaḥ tapyamāne devāḥ sthānāni bhejire
tasya mūrdhnaḥ samudbhūtaḥ sa-dhūmaḥ agniḥ tapaḥ-mayaḥ tīryak ūrdhvam adhaḥ lokān prātapat viṣvak īritaḥ
cukṣubhuḥ nadī-udanvantaḥ sa-dvīpa adriḥ cacāla bhūḥ nipetuḥ sa-grahāḥ tārāḥ jajvaluḥ ca diśaḥ daśa
tena taptāḥ divam tyaktvā brahma-lokam yayuḥ surāḥ dhātre vijñāpayām āsuḥ deva-deva jagat-pate daitya-indra-tapasā taptāḥ divi sthātum na śaknumaḥ
tasya ca upaśamam bhūman vidhehi yadi manyase lokāḥ na yāvat naṅkṣyanti bali-hārāḥ tava abhibhūḥ
tasya ayam kila saṅkalpaḥ carataḥ duścaram tapaḥ śrūyatām kim na viditaḥ tava athāpi niveditam
sṛṣṭvā cara acaram idam tapaḥ yoga samādhinā adhyāste sarva-dhiṣṇyebhyaḥ parameṣṭhī nija-āsanam tat aham vardhamānena tapaḥ yoga samādhinā kāla ātmanoḥ ca nityatvāt sādhayiṣye tathā ātmanaḥ
anyathā idam vidhāsye aham ayathā pūrvam ojasā kim anyaiḥ kāla-nirdhūtaiḥ kalpa-ante vaiṣṇava-ādibhiḥ
iti śuśruma nirbandham tapaḥ paramam āsthitaḥ vidhatsva anantaram yuktam svayam tri-bhuvana-īśvara
tava āsanam dvija gavām pārameṣṭhyam jagat-pate bhavāya śreyase bhūtyai kṣemāya vijayāya ca
iti vijñāpitaḥ devaiḥ bhagavān ātma-bhūḥ nṛpa paritaḥ bhṛgu dakṣa ādyaiḥ yayau daitya-īśvara āśramam
na dadarśa praticchannam valmīka tṛṇa kīcakaiḥ pipīlikābhiḥ ācīrṇam medaḥ tvak māṁsa śoṇitam tapantam tapasā lokān yathā abhra apihitam ravim vilakṣya vismitaḥ prāha hasan tam haṁsa-vāhanaḥ
śrī-brahmā uvāca uttiṣṭha uttiṣṭha bhadram te tapaḥ-siddhaḥ asi kāśyapa vara-daḥ aham anuprāptaḥ vriyatām īpsitaḥ varaḥ
adrākṣam aham etam te hṛt-sāram mahat adbhutam daṁśa-bhakṣita dehasya prāṇāḥ hi asthiṣu śerate
na etat pūrva-ṛṣayaḥ cakruḥ na kariṣyanti ca apare nirambuḥ dhārayet prāṇān kaḥ vai divya-samāḥ śatam
vyavasāyena te anena duṣkareṇa manasvinām tapaḥ-niṣṭhena bhavatā jitaḥ aham diti-nandana
tataḥ te āśiṣaḥ sarvāḥ dadāmi asura-puṅgava martasya te hi amartasya darśanam na aphalam mama
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca iti uktvā ādi-bhavaḥ devaḥ bhakṣita-aṅgam pipīlikaiḥ kamaṇḍalu jalena aukṣat divyena amogha rādhasā
saḥ tat kīcaka-valmīkāt sahaḥ ojaḥ bala anvitaḥ sarva avayava sampannaḥ vajra-saṁhananaḥ yuvā utthitaḥ tapta-hema-ābhaḥ vibhāvasuḥ iva edhasaḥ
saḥ nirīkṣya ambare devam haṁsa-vāham upasthitam nanāma śirasā bhūmau tat-darśana mahā-utsavaḥ
utthāya prāñjaliḥ prahvaḥ īkṣamāṇaḥ dṛśā vibhum harṣa aśru pulaka udbhedaḥ girā gadgadayā agṛṇāt
śrī-hiraṇyakaśipuḥ uvāca kalpa-ante kāla-sṛṣṭena yaḥ andhena tamasā āvṛtam abhivyanak jagat idam svayam-jyotiḥ sva-rociṣā ātmanā tri-vṛtā ca idam sṛjati avati lumpati rajaḥ sattva tamaḥ dhāmne parāya mahate namaḥ
namaḥ ādyāya bījāya jñāna vijñāna mūrtaye prāṇa indriya manaḥ buddhi vikāraiḥ vyaktim īyuṣe
tvam īśiṣe jagataḥ tasthuṣaḥ ca prāṇena mukhyena patiḥ prajānām cittasya cittaiḥ manaḥ indriyāṇām patiḥ mahān bhūta guṇa āśaya īśaḥ
tvam sapta-tantūn vitanoṣi tanvā trayyā catuḥ-hotraka vidyayā ca tvam ekaḥ ātmā ātma-vatām anādiḥ ananta-pāraḥ kaviḥ antaḥ-ātmā
tvam eva kālaḥ animiṣaḥ janānām āyuḥ lava-ādi avayavaiḥ kṣiṇoṣi kūṭa-sthaḥ ātmā parameṣṭhī ajaḥ mahān tvam jīva-lokasya ca jīvaḥ ātmā
tvattaḥ param na aparam api anejat ejat ca kiñcit vyatiriktam asti vidyāḥ kalāḥ te tanavaḥ ca sarvāḥ hiraṇya-garbhaḥ asi bṛhat tri-pṛṣṭhaḥ
vyaktam vibho sthūlam idam śarīram yena indriya prāṇa manaḥ guṇān tvam bhuṅkṣe sthitaḥ dhāmani pārameṣṭhye avyaktaḥ ātmā puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ
ananta-avyakta-rūpeṇa yena idam akhilam tatam cit acit śakti yuktāya tasmai bhagavate namaḥ
yadi dāsyasi abhimatān varān me varada-uttama bhūtebhyaḥ tvat visṛṣṭebhyaḥ mṛtyuḥ mā bhūt mama prabho
na antaḥ bahiḥ divā naktam anyasmāt api ca ayudhaiḥ na bhūmau na ambare mṛtyuḥ na naraiḥ na mṛgaiḥ api
vyasubhiḥ vā asumadbhiḥ vā sura asura mahā-uragaiḥ apratidvandvatām yuddhe aika-patyam ca dehinām sarveṣām loka-pālānām mahimānam yathā ātmanaḥ tapaḥ-yoga-prabhāvāṇām yat na riṣyati karhicit
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca evam vṛtaḥ śata-dhṛtiḥ hiraṇyakaśipoḥ atha prādāt tat tapasā prītaḥ varān tasya su-durlabhān
śrī-brahmā uvāca tāta ime durlabhāḥ puṁsām yān vṛṇīṣe varān mama tathāpi vitarāmi aṅga varān yadyapi durlabhān
tataḥ jagāma bhagavān amogha anugrahaḥ vibhuḥ pūjitaḥ asura-varyeṇa stūyamānaḥ prajā-īśvaraiḥ
evam labdha-varaḥ daityaḥ bibhrat hema-mayam vapuḥ bhagavati akarot dveṣam bhrātuḥ vadham anusmaran
saḥ vijitya diśaḥ sarvāḥ lokān ca trīn mahā-asuraḥ deva asura manuṣya indra gandharva garuḍa uragān siddha cāraṇa vidyādhrān ṛṣīn pitṛ-patīn manūn yakṣa rakṣaḥ piśāca-īśān preta bhūta patīn api sarva-sattva-patīn jitvā vaśam ānīya viśva-jit jahāra loka-pālānām sthānāni saha tejasā
deva-udyāna śriyā juṣṭam adhyāste sma tri-piṣṭapam mahendra-bhavanam sākṣāt nirmitam viśvakarmaṇā trailokya lakṣmī-āyatanam adhyuvāsa akhila-ṛddhi-mat
yatra vidruma-sopānāḥ mahā-mārakatāḥ bhuvaḥ yatra sphāṭika kuḍyāni vaidūrya stambha paṅktayaḥ yatra citra vitānāni padmarāga āsanāni ca payaḥ phena nibhāḥ śayyāḥ muktādāma paricchadāḥ kūjadbhiḥ nūpuraiḥ devyaḥ śabda-yantyaḥ itaḥ tataḥ ratna-sthalīṣu paśyanti su-datīḥ sundaram mukham tasmin mahendra-bhavane mahā-balaḥ mahā-manāḥ nirjita-lokaḥ eka-rāṭ reme abhivandya aṅghri-yugaḥ sura-ādibhiḥ pratāpitaiḥ ūrjita caṇḍa śāsanaḥ
tam aṅga mattam madhunā uru-gandhinā vivṛtta tāmra-akṣam aśeṣa-dhiṣṇya-pāḥ upāsata upāyana pāṇibhiḥ vinā tribhiḥ tapaḥ yoga bala ojasām padam
jaguḥ mahendra-āsanam ojasā sthitam viśvāvasuḥ tumburuḥ asmat-ādayaḥ gandharva siddhāḥ ṛṣayaḥ astuvan muhuḥ vidyādharāḥ ca apsarasaḥ ca pāṇḍava
saḥ eva varṇa-āśramibhiḥ kratubhiḥ bhūri dakṣiṇaiḥ ijyamānaḥ haviḥ-bhāgān agrahīt svena tejasā
akṛṣṭa-pacyā tasya āsīt sapta-dvīpa-vatī mahī tathā kāma-dughāḥ gāvaḥ nānā āścarya-padam nabhaḥ
ratnākarāḥ ca ratna-oghān tat-patnyaḥ ca ūhuḥ ūrmibhiḥ kṣāra sīdhu ghṛta kṣaudra dadhi kṣīra amṛta udakāḥ
śailāḥ droṇībhiḥ ākrīḍam sarva ṛtuṣu guṇān drumāḥ dadhāra loka-pālānām ekaḥ eva pṛthak guṇān
saḥ ittham nirjita kakub eka-rāṭ viṣayān priyān yathā-upajoṣam bhuñjānaḥ na atṛpyat ajita-indriyaḥ
evam aiśvarya-mattasya dṛptasya ut-śāstra-vartinaḥ kālaḥ mahān vyatīyāya brahma-śāpam upeyuṣaḥ
tasya ugra-daṇḍa saṁvignāḥ sarve lokāḥ sa-pālakāḥ anyatra alabdha śaraṇāḥ śaraṇam yayuḥ acyutam
tasyai namaḥ astu kāṣṭhāyai yatra ātmā hariḥ īśvaraḥ yat gatvā na nivartante śāntāḥ sannyāsinaḥ amalāḥ iti te saṁyata-ātmānaḥ samāhita dhiyaḥ amalāḥ upatasthuḥ hṛṣīkeśam vinidrāḥ vāyu-bhojanāḥ
teṣām āvirabhūt vāṇī arūpā megha-niḥsvanā sannādayantī kakubhaḥ sādhūnām abhayaṅkarī
mā bhaiṣṭa vibudha-śreṣṭhāḥ sarveṣām bhadram astu vaḥ mat-darśanam hi bhūtānām sarva-śreya upapattaye jñātam etasya daurātmyam daiteya-apasadasya yat tasya śāntim kariṣyāmi kālam tāvat pratīkṣata
yadā deveṣu vedeṣu goṣu vipreṣu sādhuṣu dharme mayi ca vidveṣaḥ saḥ vai āśu vinaśyati
nirvairāya praśāntāya sva-sutāya mahā-ātmane prahrādāya yadā druhyet haniṣye api vara-ūrjitam
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca iti uktāḥ loka-guruṇā tam praṇamya diva-okasaḥ nyavartanta gata-udvegāḥ menire ca asuram hatam
tasya daitya-pateḥ putrāḥ catvāraḥ parama-adbhutāḥ prahrādaḥ abhūt mahān teṣām guṇaiḥ mahat-upāsakaḥ
brahmaṇyaḥ śīla-sampannaḥ satya-sandhaḥ jita-indriyaḥ ātma-vat sarva-bhūtānām eka-priya suhṛt-tamaḥ dāsa-vat sannata ārya-aṅghriḥ pitṛ-vat dīna-vatsalaḥ bhrātṛ-vat sadṛśe snigdhaḥ guruṣu īśvara-bhāvanaḥ vidyā artha rūpa janma āḍhyaḥ māna stambha vivarjitaḥ
na udvigna cittaḥ vyasaneṣu niḥspṛhaḥ śruteṣu dṛṣṭeṣu guṇeṣu avastu-dṛk dānta indriya prāṇa śarīra dhīḥ sadā praśānta kāmaḥ rahita asuraḥ asuraḥ
yasmin mahat-guṇāḥ rājan gṛhyante kavibhiḥ muhuḥ na te adhunā pidhīyante yathā bhagavati īśvare
yam sādhu-gāthā-sadasi ripavaḥ api surāḥ nṛpa pratimānam prakurvanti kim uta anye bhavādṛśāḥ
guṇaiḥ alam asaṅkhyeyaiḥ māhātmyam tasya sūcyate vāsudeve bhagavati yasya naisargikī ratiḥ
nyasta krīḍanakaḥ bālaḥ jaḍa-vat tat-manastayā kṛṣṇa-graha gṛhīta-ātmā na veda jagat īdṛśam
āsīnaḥ paryaṭan aśnan śayānaḥ prapiban bruvan na anusandhatte etāni govinda parirambhitaḥ
kvacit rudati vaikuṇṭha-cintā śabala-cetanaḥ kvacit hasati tat-cintā āhlādaḥ udgāyati kvacit
nadati kvacit utkaṇṭhaḥ vilajjaḥ nṛtyati kvacit kvacit tat-bhāvanā yuktaḥ tat-mayaḥ anucakāra ha
kvacit utpulakaḥ tūṣṇīm āste saṁsparśa-nirvṛtaḥ aspanda praṇaya-ānanda salila āmīlita īkṣaṇaḥ
saḥ uttama-śloka-pada-aravindayoḥ niṣevayā akiñcana saṅga labdhayā tanvan parām nirvṛtim ātmanaḥ muhuḥ duḥsaṅga-dīnasya manaḥ śamam vyadhāt
tasmin mahā-bhāgavate mahā-bhāge mahā-ātmani hiraṇyakaśipuḥ rājan akarot agham ātma-je
śrī-yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca deva-ṛṣe etat icchāmaḥ veditum tava su-vrata yat ātma-jāya śuddhāya pitā adāt sādhave hi agham
putrān vipratikūlān svān pitaraḥ putra-vatsalāḥ upālabhante śikṣa-artham na eva agham aparaḥ yathā
kim uta anuvaśān sādhūn tādṛśān guru-devatān etat kautūhalam brahman asmākam vidhama prabho pituḥ putrāya yat dveṣaḥ maraṇāya prayojitaḥ
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca paurohityāya bhagavān vṛtaḥ kāvyaḥ kila asuraiḥ ṣaṇḍa-amarkau sutau tasya daitya-rāja gṛha-antike
tau rājñā prāpitam bālam prahlādam naya-kovidam pāṭhayām āsatuḥ pāṭhyān anyān ca asura-bālakān
yat tatra guruṇā proktam śuśruve anupapāṭha ca na sādhu manasā mene sva para asat-graha āśrayam
ekadā asura-rāṭ putram aṅkam āropya pāṇḍava papraccha kathyatām vatsa manyate sādhu yat bhavān
śrī-prahlādaḥ uvāca tat sādhu manye asura-varya dehinām sadā samudvigna dhiyām asat-grahāt hitvā ātma-pātam gṛham andha-kūpam vanam gataḥ yat harim āśrayeta
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca śrutvā putra-giraḥ daityaḥ para-pakṣa samāhitāḥ jahāsa buddhiḥ bālānām bhidyate para-buddhibhiḥ
samyak vidhāryatām bālaḥ guru-gehe dvi-jātibhiḥ viṣṇu-pakṣaiḥ praticchannaiḥ na bhidyeta asya dhīḥ yathā
gṛham ānītam āhūya prahrādam daitya-yājakāḥ praśasya ślakṣṇayā vācā samapṛcchanta sāmabhiḥ
vatsa prahrāda bhadram te satyam kathaya mā mṛṣā bālān ati kutaḥ tubhyam eṣaḥ buddhi viparyayaḥ
buddhi-bhedaḥ para-kṛtaḥ utāho te svataḥ abhavat bhaṇyatām śrotu-kāmānām gurūṇām kula-nandana
śrī-prahrādaḥ uvāca paraḥ svaḥ ca iti asat-grāhaḥ puṁsām yat māyayā kṛtaḥ vimohita dhiyām dṛṣṭaḥ tasmai bhagavate namaḥ
saḥ yadā anuvrataḥ puṁsām paśu-buddhiḥ vibhidyate anyaḥ eṣaḥ tathā anyaḥ aham iti bheda gata asatī
saḥ eṣaḥ ātmā sva-para iti abuddhibhiḥ duratyaya anukramaṇaḥ nirūpyate muhyanti yat vartmani veda-vādinaḥ brahma-ādayaḥ hi eṣaḥ bhinatti me matim
yathā bhrāmyati ayaḥ brahman svayam ākarṣa sannidhau tathā me bhidyate cetaḥ cakra-pāṇeḥ yadṛcchayā
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca etāvat brāhmaṇāya uktvā virarāma mahā-matiḥ tam sannibhartsya kupitaḥ su-dīnaḥ rāja-sevakaḥ
ānīyatām are vetram asmākam ayaśaskaraḥ kula-aṅgārasya durbuddheḥ caturthaḥ asya uditaḥ damaḥ
daiteya candana-vane jātaḥ ayam kaṇṭaka-drumaḥ yat mūla unmūla paraśoḥ viṣṇoḥ nālāyitaḥ arbhakaḥ
iti tam vividha-upāyaiḥ bhīṣayan tarjana-ādibhiḥ prahrādam grāhayām āsa tri-vargasya upapādanam
tataḥ enam guruḥ jñātvā jñāta jñeya catuṣṭayam dāna – the process of giving money in charity bheda, the principle of dividing and daṇḍa, the principle of punishment) daitya-indram darśayām āsa mātṛ-mṛṣṭam alaṅkṛtam
pādayoḥ patitam bālam pratinandya āśiṣā asuraḥ pariṣvajya ciram dorbhyām paramām āpa nirvṛtim
āropya aṅkam avaghrāya mūrdhani aśru kalā-ambubhiḥ āsiñcan vikasat-vaktram idam āha yudhiṣṭhira
hiraṇyakaśipuḥ uvāca prahrāda anūcyatām tāta svadhītam kiñcit uttamam kālena etāvatā āyuṣman yat aśikṣat guroḥ bhavān
śrī-prahrādaḥ uvāca śravaṇam kīrtanam viṣṇoḥ smaraṇam pāda-sevanam arcanam vandanam dāsyam sakhyam ātma-nivedanam iti puṁsā arpitā viṣṇau bhaktiḥ cet nava-lakṣaṇā kriyeta bhagavati addhā tat manye adhītam uttamam
niśamya etat suta-vacaḥ hiraṇyakaśipuḥ tadā guru-putram uvāca idam ruṣā prasphurita adharaḥ
brahma-bandho kim etat te vipakṣam śrayatā asatā asāram grāhitaḥ bālaḥ mām anādṛtya durmate
santi hi asādhavaḥ loke durmaitrāḥ chadma-veṣiṇaḥ teṣām udeti agham kāle rogaḥ pātakinām iva
śrī-guru-putraḥ uvāca na mat-praṇītam na para-praṇītam sutaḥ vadati eṣaḥ tava indra-śatro naisargikī iyam matiḥ asya rājan niyaccha manyum kad adāḥ sma mā naḥ
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca guruṇā evam pratiproktaḥ bhūyaḥ āha asuraḥ sutam na cet guru-mukhī iyam te kutaḥ abhadra asatī matiḥ
śrī-prahrādaḥ uvāca matiḥ na kṛṣṇe parataḥ svataḥ vā mithaḥ abhipadyeta gṛha-vratānām adānta gobhiḥ viśatām tamisram punaḥ punaḥ carvita carvaṇānām
na te viduḥ sva-artha-gatim hi viṣṇum durāśayāḥ ye bahiḥ artha-māninaḥ andhāḥ yathā andhaiḥ upanīyamānāḥ te api īśa-tantryām uru dāmni baddhāḥ
na eṣām matiḥ tāvat urukrama-aṅghrim spṛśati anartha apagamaḥ yat arthaḥ mahīyasām pāda-rajaḥ abhiṣekam niṣkiñcanānām na vṛṇīta yāvat
iti uktvā uparatam putram hiraṇyakaśipuḥ ruṣā andhīkṛta-ātmā sva-utsaṅgāt nirasyata mahī-tale
āha amarṣa ruṣā āviṣṭaḥ kaṣāyī-bhūta locanaḥ vadhyatām āśu ayam vadhyaḥ niḥsārayata nairṛtāḥ
ayam me bhrātṛ-hā saḥ ayam hitvā svān suhṛdaḥ adhamaḥ pitṛvya-hantuḥ pādau yaḥ viṣṇoḥ dāsa-vat arcati
viṣṇoḥ vā sādhu asau kim nu kariṣyati asamañjasaḥ sauhṛdam dustyajam pitroḥ ahāt yaḥ pañca-hāyanaḥ
paraḥ api apatyam hita-kṛt yathā auṣadham sva-deha-jaḥ api āmaya-vat sutaḥ ahitaḥ chindyāt tat aṅgam yat uta ātmanaḥ ahitam śeṣam sukham jīvati yat vivarjanāt
sarvaiḥ upāyaiḥ hantavyaḥ sambhoja śayana āsanaiḥ suhṛt-liṅga-dharaḥ śatruḥ muneḥ duṣṭam iva indriyam
nairṛtāḥ te samādiṣṭāḥ bhartrā vai śūla-pāṇayaḥ tigma daṁṣṭra karāla āsyāḥ tāmra-śmaśru śiroruhāḥ nadantaḥ bhairavam nādam chindhi bhindhi iti vādinaḥ āsīnam ca ahanan śūlaiḥ prahrādam sarva-marmasu
pare brahmaṇi anirdeśye bhagavati akhila-ātmani yukta-ātmani aphalāḥ āsan apuṇyasya iva sat-kriyāḥ
prayāse apahate tasmin daitya-indraḥ pariśaṅkitaḥ cakāra tat-vadha-upāyān nirbandhena yudhiṣṭhira
dik-gajaiḥ danda-śūka-indraiḥ abhicāra avapātanaiḥ māyābhiḥ sannirodhaiḥ ca gara-dānaiḥ abhojanaiḥ hima vāyu agni salilaiḥ parvata-ākramaṇaiḥ api na śaśāka yadā hantum apāpam asuraḥ sutam cintām dīrgha-tamām prāptaḥ tat-kartum na abhyapadyata
eṣaḥ me bahu asādhu-uktaḥ vadha-upāyāḥ ca nirmitāḥ taiḥ taiḥ drohaiḥ asat-dharmaiḥ muktaḥ svena eva tejasā
vartamānaḥ avidūre vai bālaḥ api ajaḍa-dhīḥ ayam na vismarati me anāryam śunaḥ śepaḥ iva prabhuḥ
aprameya anubhāvaḥ ayam akutaścit-bhayaḥ amaraḥ nūnam etat-virodhena mṛtyuḥ me bhavitā na vā
iti tat-cintayā kiñcit mlāna śriyam adhaḥ-mukham śaṇḍa-amarkau auśanasau vivikte iti ha ūcatuḥ
jitam tvayā ekena jagat-trayam bhruvoḥ vijṛmbhaṇa trasta samasta dhiṣṇyapam na tasya cintyam tava nātha cakṣvahe na vai śiśūnām guṇa-doṣayoḥ padam
imam tu pāśaiḥ varuṇasya baddhvā nidhehi bhītaḥ na palāyate yathā buddhiḥ ca puṁsaḥ vayasā ārya sevayā yāvat guruḥ bhārgavaḥ āgamiṣyati
tathā iti guru-putra-uktam anujñāya idam abravīt dharmaḥ hi asya upadeṣṭavyaḥ rājñām yaḥ gṛha-medhinām
dharmam artham ca kāmam ca nitarām ca anupūrvaśaḥ prahrādāya ūcatuḥ rājan praśrita avanatāya ca
yathā tri-vargam gurubhiḥ ātmane upaśikṣitam na sādhu mene tat-śikṣām dvandva-ārāma upavarṇitām
yadā ācāryaḥ parāvṛttaḥ gṛha-medhīya karmasu vayasyaiḥ bālakaiḥ tatra saḥ apahūtaḥ kṛta-kṣaṇaiḥ
atha tān ślakṣṇayā vācā pratyāhūya mahā-budhaḥ uvāca vidvān tat-niṣṭhām kṛpayā prahasan iva
te tu tat-gauravāt sarve tyakta krīḍā-paricchadāḥ bālāḥ adūṣita-dhiyaḥ dvandva ārāma īrita īhitaiḥ paryupāsata rāja-indra tat nyasta hṛdaya-īkṣaṇāḥ tān āha karuṇaḥ maitraḥ mahā-bhāgavataḥ asuraḥ
śrī-prahrādaḥ uvāca kaumāraḥ ācaret prājñaḥ dharmān bhāgavatān iha durlabham mānuṣam janma tat api adhruvam artha-dam
yathā hi puruṣasya iha viṣṇoḥ pāda-upasarpaṇam yat eṣaḥ sarva-bhūtānām priyaḥ ātma-īśvaraḥ suhṛt
sukham aindriyakam daityāḥ deha-yogena dehinām sarvatra labhyate daivāt yathā duḥkham ayatnataḥ
tat prayāsaḥ na kartavyaḥ yataḥ āyuḥ-vyayaḥ param na tathā vindate kṣemam mukunda caraṇa-ambujam
tataḥ yateta kuśalaḥ kṣemāya bhavam āśritaḥ śarīram pauruṣam yāvat na vipadyeta puṣkalam
puṁsaḥ varṣa-śatam hi āyuḥ tat ardham ca ajita-ātmanaḥ niṣphalam yat asau rātryām śete andham prāpitaḥ tamaḥ
mugdhasya bālye kaiśore krīḍataḥ yāti viṁśatiḥ jarayā grasta-dehasya yāti akalpasya viṁśatiḥ
durāpūreṇa kāmena mohena ca balīyasā śeṣam gṛheṣu saktasya pramattasya apayāti hi
kaḥ gṛheṣu pumān saktam ātmānam ajita-indriyaḥ sneha-pāśaiḥ dṛḍhaiḥ baddham utsaheta vimocitum
kaḥ nu artha-tṛṣṇām visṛjet prāṇebhyaḥ api yaḥ īpsitaḥ yam krīṇāti asubhiḥ preṣṭhaiḥ taskaraḥ sevakaḥ vaṇik
katham priyāyāḥ anukampitāyāḥ saṅgam rahasyam rucirān ca mantrān suhṛtsu tat-sneha-sitaḥ śiśūnām kala-akṣarāṇām anurakta-cittaḥ putrān smaran tāḥ duhitṝḥ hṛdayyāḥ bhrātṝn svasṝḥ vā pitarau ca dīnau gṛhān manojña uru paricchadān ca vṛttīḥ ca kulyāḥ paśu bhṛtya vargān tyajeta kośaḥ-kṛt iva īhamānaḥ karmāṇi lobhāt avitṛpta-kāmaḥ aupasthya jaihvam bahu-manyamānaḥ katham virajyeta duranta-mohaḥ
kuṭumba poṣāya viyat nija-āyuḥ na budhyate artham vihatam pramattaḥ sarvatra tāpa-traya duḥkhita ātmā nirvidyate na sva-kuṭumba-rāmaḥ
vitteṣu nitya-abhiniviṣṭa-cetāḥ vidvān ca doṣam para-vitta-hartuḥ pretya iha vā athāpi ajita-indriyaḥ tat aśānta-kāmaḥ harate kuṭumbī
vidvān api ittham danu-jāḥ kuṭumbam puṣṇan sva-lokāya na kalpate vai yaḥ svīya pārakya vibhinna bhāvaḥ tamaḥ prapadyeta yathā vimūḍhaḥ
yataḥ na kaścit kva ca kutracit vā dīnaḥ svam ātmānam alam samarthaḥ vimocitum kāma-dṛśām vihāra krīḍā-mṛgaḥ yat nigaḍaḥ visargaḥ tataḥ vidūrāt parihṛtya daityāḥ daityeṣu saṅgam viṣaya-ātma-keṣu upeta nārāyaṇam ādi-devam saḥ mukta-saṅgaiḥ iṣitaḥ apavargaḥ
na hi acyutam prīṇayataḥ bahu āyāsaḥ asura-ātma-jāḥ ātmatvāt sarva-bhūtānām siddhatvāt iha sarvataḥ
para-avareṣu bhūteṣu brahma-anta sthāvara-ādiṣu bhautikeṣu vikāreṣu bhūteṣu atha mahatsu ca guṇeṣu guṇa-sāmye ca guṇa-vyatikare tathā ekaḥ eva paraḥ hi ātmā bhagavān īśvaraḥ avyayaḥ pratyak ātma-svarūpeṇa dṛśya-rūpeṇa ca svayam vyāpya vyāpaka nirdeśyaḥ hi anirdeśyaḥ avikalpitaḥ kevala anubhava-ānanda-svarūpaḥ parama-īśvaraḥ māyayā antarhita aiśvaryaḥ īyate guṇa-sargayā
tasmāt sarveṣu bhūteṣu dayām kuruta sauhṛdam bhāvam āsuram unmucya yayā tuṣyati adhokṣajaḥ
tuṣṭe ca tatra kim alabhyam anante ādye kim taiḥ guṇa-vyatikarāt iha ye sva-siddhāḥ dharma-ādayaḥ kim aguṇena ca kāṅkṣitena sāram juṣām caraṇayoḥ upagāyatām naḥ
dharma artha kāmaḥ iti yaḥ abhihitaḥ tri-vargaḥ īkṣā trayī naya damau vividhā ca vārtā manye tat etat akhilam nigamasya satyam sva-ātma-arpaṇam sva-suhṛdaḥ paramasya puṁsaḥ
jñānam tat etat amalam duravāpam āha nārāyaṇaḥ nara-sakhaḥ kila nāradāya ekāntinām bhagavataḥ tat akiñcanānām pāda-aravinda rajasā āpluta dehinām syāt
śrutam etat mayā pūrvam jñānam vijñāna-saṁyutam dharmam bhāgavatam śuddham nāradāt deva darśanāt
śrī-daitya-putrāḥ ūcuḥ prahrāda tvam vayam ca api na ṛte anyam vidmahe gurum etābhyām guru-putrābhyām bālānām api hi īśvarau bālasya antaḥpura-sthasya mahat-saṅgaḥ duranvayaḥ chindhi naḥ saṁśayam saumya syāt cet visrambha-kāraṇam
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca evam daitya-sutaiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ mahā-bhāgavataḥ asuraḥ uvāca tān smayamānaḥ smaran mat-anubhāṣitam
śrī-prahrādaḥ uvāca pitari prasthite asmākam tapase mandara-acalam yuddha-udyamam param cakruḥ vibudhāḥ dānavān prati
pipīlikaiḥ ahiḥ iva diṣṭyā loka-upatāpanaḥ pāpena pāpaḥ abhakṣi iti vadantaḥ vāsava-ādayaḥ
teṣām atibala-udyogam niśamya asura-yūthapāḥ vadhyamānāḥ suraiḥ bhītāḥ dudruvuḥ sarvataḥ diśam kalatra putra-vitta āptān gṛhān paśu-paricchadān na avekṣyamāṇāḥ tvaritāḥ sarve prāṇa-parīpsavaḥ
vyalumpan rāja-śibiram amarāḥ jaya-kāṅkṣiṇaḥ indraḥ tu rāja-mahiṣīm mātaram mama ca agrahīt
nīyamānām bhaya-udvignām rudatīm kurarīm iva yadṛcchayā āgataḥ tatra deva-ṛṣiḥ dadṛśe pathi
prāha na enām sura-pate netum arhasi anāgasam muñca muñca mahā-bhāga satīm para-parigraham
śrī-indraḥ uvāca āste asyāḥ jaṭhare vīryam aviṣahyam sura-dviṣaḥ āsyatām yāvat prasavam mokṣye artha-padavīm gataḥ
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca ayam niṣkilbiṣaḥ sākṣāt mahā-bhāgavataḥ mahān tvayā na prāpsyate saṁsthām ananta anucaraḥ balī
iti uktaḥ tām vihāya indraḥ deva-ṛṣeḥ mānayan vacaḥ ananta-priya bhaktyā enām parikramya divam yayau
tataḥ me mātaram ṛṣiḥ samānīya nija-āśrame āśvāsya iha uṣyatām vatse yāvat te bhartuḥ āgamaḥ
tathā iti avātsīt deva-ṛṣeḥ antike sā akuto-bhayā yāvat daitya-patiḥ ghorāt tapasaḥ na nyavartata
ṛṣim paryacarat tatra bhaktyā paramayā satī antarvatnī sva-garbhasya kṣemāya icchā prasūtaye
ṛṣiḥ kāruṇikaḥ tasyāḥ prādāt ubhayam īśvaraḥ dharmasya tattvam jñānam ca mām api uddiśya nirmalam
tat tu kālasya dīrghatvāt strītvāt mātuḥ tirodadhe ṛṣiṇā anugṛhītam mām na adhunā api ajahāt smṛtiḥ
bhavatām api bhūyāt me yadi śraddadhate vacaḥ vaiśāradī dhīḥ śraddhātaḥ strī bālānām ca me yathā
janma-ādyāḥ ṣaṭ ime bhāvāḥ dṛṣṭāḥ dehasya na ātmanaḥ phalānām iva vṛkṣasya kālena īśvara-mūrtinā
ātmā nityaḥ avyayaḥ śuddhaḥ ekaḥ kṣetra-jñaḥ āśrayaḥ avikriyaḥ sva-dṛk hetuḥ vyāpakaḥ asaṅgī anāvṛtaḥ etaiḥ dvādaśabhiḥ vidvān ātmanaḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ paraiḥ aham mama iti asat-bhāvam deha-ādau moha-jam tyajet
svarṇam yathā grāvasu hema-kāraḥ kṣetreṣu yogaiḥ tat-abhijñaḥ āpnuyāt kṣetreṣu deheṣu tathā ātma-yogaiḥ adhyātma-vit brahma-gatim labheta
aṣṭau prakṛtayaḥ proktāḥ trayaḥ eva hi tat-guṇāḥ vikārāḥ ṣoḍaśa ācāryaiḥ pumān ekaḥ samanvayāt
dehaḥ tu sarva-saṅghātaḥ jagat tasthuḥ iti dvidhā atra eva mṛgyaḥ puruṣaḥ na iti na iti iti atat tyajan
anvaya vyatirekeṇa vivekena uśatā ātmanā svarga sthāna samāmnāyaiḥ vimṛśadbhiḥ asat-varaiḥ
buddheḥ jāgaraṇam svapnaḥ suṣuptiḥ iti vṛttayaḥ tāḥ yena eva anubhūyante saḥ adhyakṣaḥ puruṣaḥ paraḥ
ebhiḥ tri-varṇaiḥ paryastaiḥ buddhi bhedaiḥ kriyā-udbhavaiḥ svarūpam ātmanaḥ budhyet gandhaiḥ vāyum iva anvayāt
etat dvāraḥ hi saṁsāraḥ guṇa-karma-nibandhanaḥ ajñāna-mūlaḥ apārthaḥ api puṁsaḥ svapnaḥ iva arpyate
tasmāt bhavadbhiḥ kartavyam karmaṇām tri-guṇa-ātmanām bīja-nirharaṇam yogaḥ pravāha uparamaḥ dhiyaḥ
tatra upāya sahasrāṇām ayam bhagavatā uditaḥ yat īśvare bhagavati yathā yaiḥ añjasā ratiḥ
guru-śuśrūṣayā bhaktyā sarva labdha arpaṇena ca saṅgena sādhu-bhaktānām īśvara ārādhanena ca śraddhayā tat-kathāyām ca kīrtanaiḥ guṇa-karmaṇām tat pāda-amburuha dhyānāt tat liṅga īkṣa arhaṇa-ādibhiḥ
hariḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu bhagavān āste īśvaraḥ iti bhūtāni manasā kāmaiḥ taiḥ sādhu mānayet
evam nirjita ṣaṭ-vargaiḥ kriyate bhaktiḥ īśvare vāsudeve bhagavati yayā saṁlabhyate ratiḥ
niśamya karmāṇi guṇān atulyān vīryāṇi līlā-tanubhiḥ kṛtāni yadā atiharṣa utpulaka aśru gadgadam protkaṇṭhaḥ udgāyati rauti nṛtyati
yadā graha-grastaḥ iva kvacit hasati ākrandate dhyāyati vandate janam muhuḥ śvasan vakti hare jagat-pate nārāyaṇa iti ātma-matiḥ gata-trapaḥ
tadā pumān mukta samasta-bandhanaḥ tat-bhāva bhāva anukṛta āśaya-ākṛtiḥ nirdagdha bīja anuśayaḥ mahīyasā bhakti prayogeṇa sameti adhokṣajam
adhokṣaja ālambham iha aśubha-ātmanaḥ śarīriṇaḥ saṁsṛti cakra śātanam tat brahma-nirvāṇa sukham viduḥ budhāḥ tataḥ bhajadhvam hṛdaye hṛt-īśvaram
kaḥ ati-prayāsaḥ asura-bālakāḥ hareḥ upāsane sve hṛdi chidra-vat sataḥ svasya ātmanaḥ sakhyuḥ aśeṣa dehinām sāmānyataḥ kim viṣaya-upapādanaiḥ
rāyaḥ kalatram paśavaḥ suta-ādayaḥ gṛhāḥ mahī kuñjara kośa bhūtayaḥ sarve artha kāmāḥ kṣaṇa-bhaṅgura āyuṣaḥ kurvanti martyasya kiyat priyam calāḥ
evam hi lokāḥ kratubhiḥ kṛtāḥ amī kṣayiṣṇavaḥ sātiśayāḥ na nirmalāḥ tasmāt adṛṣṭa-śruta dūṣaṇam param bhaktyā uktayā īśam bhajata ātma-labdhaye
yat arthe iha karmāṇi vidvat mānī asakṛt naraḥ karoti ataḥ viparyāsam amogham vindate phalam
sukhāya duḥkha-mokṣāya saṅkalpaḥ iha karmiṇaḥ sadā āpnoti īhayā duḥkham anīhāyāḥ sukha āvṛtaḥ
kāmān kāmayate kāmyaiḥ yat artham iha pūruṣaḥ saḥ vai dehaḥ tu pārakyaḥ bhaṅguraḥ yāti upaiti ca
kim u vyavahita apatya dāra agāra dhana ādayaḥ rājya kośa gaja amātya bhṛtya āptāḥ mamatā-āspadāḥ
kim etaiḥ ātmanaḥ tucchaiḥ saha dehena naśvaraiḥ anarthaiḥ artha-saṅkāśaiḥ nitya-ānanda rasa udadheḥ
nirūpyatām iha sva-arthaḥ kiyān deha-bhṛtaḥ asurāḥ niṣeka-ādiṣu avasthāsu kliśyamānasya karmabhiḥ
karmāṇi ārabhate dehī dehena ātma-anuvartinā karmabhiḥ tanute deham ubhayam tu avivekataḥ
tasmāt arthāḥ ca kāmāḥ ca dharmāḥ ca yat apāśrayāḥ bhajata anīhayā ātmānam anīham harim īśvaram
sarveṣām api bhūtānām hariḥ ātmā īśvaraḥ priyaḥ bhūtaiḥ mahadbhiḥ sva-kṛtaiḥ kṛtānām jīva-saṁjñitaḥ
devaḥ asuraḥ manuṣyaḥ vā yakṣaḥ gandharvaḥ eva vā bhajan mukunda-caraṇam svasti-mān syāt yathā vayam
na alam dvijatvam devatvam ṛṣitvam vā asura-ātma-jāḥ prīṇanāya mukundasya na vṛttam na bahu-jñatā na dānam na tapaḥ na ijyā na śaucam na vratāni ca prīyate amalayā bhaktyā hariḥ anyat viḍambanam
tataḥ harau bhagavati bhaktim kuruta dānavāḥ ātma-aupamyena sarvatra sarva-bhūta-ātmani īśvare
daiteyāḥ yakṣa-rakṣāṁsi striyaḥ śūdrāḥ vraja-okasaḥ khagāḥ mṛgāḥ pāpa-jīvāḥ santi hi acyutatām gatāḥ
etāvān eva loke asmin puṁsaḥ sva-arthaḥ paraḥ smṛtaḥ ekānta-bhaktiḥ govinde yat sarvatra tat-īkṣaṇam
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca atha daitya-sutāḥ sarve śrutvā tat anuvarṇitam jagṛhuḥ niravadyatvāt na eva guru-anuśikṣitam
atha ācārya-sutaḥ teṣām buddhim ekānta-saṁsthitām ālakṣya bhītaḥ tvaritaḥ rājñe āvedayat yathā
kopa-āveśa calat gātraḥ putram hantum manaḥ dadhe kṣiptvā paruṣayā vācā prahrādam a-tat-arhaṇam āha īkṣamāṇaḥ pāpena tiraścīnena cakṣuṣā praśraya-avanatam dāntam baddha-añjalim avasthitam sarpaḥ pada-āhataḥ iva śvasan prakṛti dāruṇaḥ
śrī-hiraṇyakaśipuḥ uvāca he durvinīta manda-ātman kula-bheda-kara adhama stabdham mat-śāsana udvṛttam neṣye tvā adya yama-kṣayam
kruddhasya yasya kampante trayaḥ lokāḥ saha-īśvarāḥ tasya me abhīta-vat mūḍha śāsanam kim balaḥ atyagāḥ
śrī-prahrādaḥ uvāca na kevalam me bhavataḥ ca rājan saḥ vai balam balinām ca apareṣām pare avare amī sthira-jaṅgamāḥ ye brahma-ādayaḥ yena vaśam praṇītāḥ
saḥ īśvaraḥ kālaḥ urukramaḥ asau ojaḥ sahaḥ sattva bala indriya ātmā saḥ eva viśvam paramaḥ sva-śaktibhiḥ sṛjati avati atti guṇa-traya-īśaḥ
jahi āsuram bhāvam imam tvam ātmanaḥ samam manaḥ dhatsva na santi vidviṣaḥ ṛte ajitāt ātmanaḥ utpathe sthitāt tat hi hi anantasya mahat samarhaṇam
dasyūn purā ṣaṭ na vijitya lumpataḥ manyante eke sva-jitāḥ diśaḥ daśa jita-ātmanaḥ jñasya samasya dehinām sādhoḥ sva-moha-prabhavāḥ kutaḥ pare
śrī-hiraṇyakaśipuḥ uvāca vyaktam tvam martu-kāmaḥ asi yaḥ atimātram vikatthase mumūrṣūṇām hi manda-ātman nanu syuḥ viklavāḥ giraḥ
yaḥ tvayā manda-bhāgya uktaḥ mat-anyaḥ jagat-īśvaraḥ kva asau yadi saḥ sarvatra kasmāt stambhe na dṛśyate
saḥ aham vikatthamānasya śiraḥ kāyāt harāmi te gopāyeta hariḥ tvā adya yaḥ te śaraṇam īpsitam
evam duruktaiḥ muhuḥ ardayan ruṣā sutam mahā-bhāgavatam mahā-asuraḥ khaḍgam pragṛhya utpatitaḥ vara-āsanāt stambham tatāḍa ati-balaḥ sva-muṣṭinā
tadā eva tasmin ninadaḥ ati-bhīṣaṇaḥ babhūva yena aṇḍa-kaṭāham asphuṭat yam vai sva-dhiṣṇya-upagatam tu aja-ādayaḥ śrutvā sva-dhāma-atyayam aṅga menire
saḥ vikraman putra-vadha-īpsuḥ ojasā niśamya nirhrādam apūrvam adbhutam antaḥ-sabhāyām na dadarśa tat-padam vitatrasuḥ yena sura-ari-yūtha-pāḥ
satyam vidhātum nija-bhṛtya-bhāṣitam vyāptim ca bhūteṣu akhileṣu ca ātmanaḥ adṛśyata ati adbhuta rūpam udvahan stambhe sabhāyām na mṛgam na mānuṣam
saḥ sattvam enam paritaḥ vipaśyan stambhasya madhyāt anunirjihānam na ayam mṛgaḥ na api naraḥ vicitram aho kim etat nṛ-mṛga-indra-rūpam
mīmāṁsamānasya samutthitaḥ agrataḥ nṛsiṁha-rūpaḥ tat alam bhayānakam pratapta cāmīkara caṇḍa-locanam sphurat saṭā-keśara jṛmbhita-ānanam karāla daṁṣṭram karavāla-cañcala kṣura-anta jihvam bhrukuṭī-mukha ulbaṇam stabdha ūrdhva karṇam giri-kandara adbhuta vyāttāsya nāsam hanu-bheda-bhīṣaṇam divi-spṛśat kāyam adīrgha pīvara grīva uru vakṣaḥ-sthalam alpa madhyamam candra-aṁśu gauraiḥ churitam tanūruhaiḥ viṣvak bhuja anīka-śatam nakha āyudham durāsadam sarva nija itara āyudha praveka vidrāvita daitya dānavam
prāyeṇa me ayam hariṇā uru-māyinā vadhaḥ smṛtaḥ anena samudyatena kim evam bruvan tu abhyapatat gadā-āyudhaḥ nadan nṛ-siṁham prati daitya-kuñjaraḥ
alakṣitaḥ agnau patitaḥ pataṅgamaḥ yathā nṛsiṁha ojasi saḥ asuraḥ tadā na tat vicitram khalu sattva-dhāmani sva-tejasā yaḥ nu purā apibat tamaḥ
tataḥ abhipadya abhyahanat mahā-asuraḥ ruṣā nṛsiṁham gadayā uru-vegayā tam vikramantam sa-gadam gadā-dharaḥ mahā-uragam tārkṣya-sutaḥ yathā agrahīt
saḥ tasya hasta utkalitaḥ tadā asuraḥ vikrīḍataḥ yadvat ahiḥ garutmataḥ asādhu amanyanta hṛta-okasaḥ amarāḥ ghana-cchadāḥ bhārata sarva-dhiṣṇya-pāḥ
tam manyamānaḥ nija-vīrya-śaṅkitam yat hasta-muktaḥ nṛ-harim mahā-asuraḥ punaḥ tam āsajjata khaḍga-carmaṇī pragṛhya vegena gata-śramaḥ mṛdhe
tam śyena-vegam śata-candra-vartmabhiḥ carantam acchidram upari-adhaḥ hariḥ kṛtvā aṭṭa-hāsam kharam utsvana-ulbaṇam nimīlita akṣam jagṛhe mahā-javaḥ
viṣvak sphurantam grahaṇa-āturam hariḥ vyālaḥ yathā ākhum kuliśa-akṣata tvacam dvāri ūrum āpatya dadāra līlayā nakhaiḥ yathā ahim garuḍaḥ mahā-viṣam
saṁrambha duṣprekṣya karāla locanaḥ vyātta ānana-antam vilihan sva-jihvayā asṛk-lava ākta aruṇa keśara ānanaḥ yathā antra-mālī dvipa-hatyayā hariḥ
nakha-aṅkura utpāṭita hṛt-saroruham visṛjya tasya anucarān udāyudhān ahan samastān nakha-śastra-pāṇibhiḥ dordaṇḍa-yūthaḥ anupathān sahasraśaḥ
saṭā avadhūtāḥ jaladāḥ parāpatan grahāḥ ca tat-dṛṣṭi vimuṣṭa rociṣaḥ ambhodhayaḥ śvāsa-hatāḥ vicukṣubhuḥ nirhrāda-bhītāḥ digibhāḥ vicukruśuḥ
dyauḥ tat-saṭā utkṣipta vimāna-saṅkulā protsarpata kṣmā ca pada-abhipīḍitā śailāḥ samutpetuḥ amuṣya raṁhasā tat-tejasā kham kakubhaḥ na rejire
tataḥ sabhāyām upaviṣṭam uttame nṛpa-āsane sambhṛta-tejasam vibhum alakṣita-dvairatham ati amarṣaṇam pracaṇḍa vaktram na babhāja kaścana
niśāmya loka-traya mastaka-jvaram tam ādi daityam hariṇā hatam mṛdhe praharṣa-vega utkalita-ānanāḥ muhuḥ prasūna-varṣaiḥ vavṛṣuḥ sura-striyaḥ
tadā vimāna-āvalibhiḥ nabhastalam didṛkṣatām saṅkulam āsa nākinām sura-ānakāḥ dundubhayaḥ atha jaghnire gandharva-mukhyāḥ nanṛtuḥ jaguḥ striyaḥ
tatra upavrajya vibudhāḥ brahma-indra-giriśa-ādayaḥ ṛṣayaḥ pitaraḥ siddhāḥ vidyādhara mahā-uragāḥ manavaḥ prajānām patayaḥ gandharva apsara cāraṇāḥ yakṣāḥ kimpuruṣāḥ tāta vetālāḥ saha-kinnarāḥ te viṣṇu-pārṣadāḥ sarve sunanda-kumuda-ādayaḥ mūrdhni baddha-añjali-puṭāḥ āsīnam tīvra-tejasam īḍire nara-śārdulam na ati-dūracarāḥ pṛthak
śrī-brahmā uvāca nataḥ asmi anantāya duranta śaktaye vicitra-vīryāya pavitra-karmaṇe viśvasya sarga sthiti saṁyamān guṇaiḥ sva-līlayā sandadhate avyaya-ātmane
śrī-rudraḥ uvāca kopa-kālaḥ yuga-antaḥ te hataḥ ayam asuraḥ alpakaḥ tat-sutam pāhi upasṛtam bhaktam te bhakta-vatsala
śrī-indraḥ uvāca pratyānītāḥ parama bhavatā trāyatā naḥ sva-bhāgāḥ daitya-ākrāntam hṛdaya-kamalam tat-gṛham pratyabodhi kāla-grastam kiyat idam aho nātha śuśrūṣatām te muktiḥ teṣām na hi bahumatā nāra-siṁha aparaiḥ kim
śrī-ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ tvam naḥ tapaḥ paramam āttha yat ātma-tejaḥ yena idam ādi-puruṣa ātma-gatam sasarktha tat vipraluptam amunā adya śaraṇya-pāla rakṣā-gṛhīta-vapuṣā punaḥ anvamaṁsthāḥ
śrī-pitaraḥ ūcuḥ śrāddhāni naḥ adhibubhuje prasabham tanūjaiḥ dattāni tīrtha-samaye api apibat tila-ambu tasya udarāt nakha-vidīrṇa vapāt yaḥ ārcchat tasmai namaḥ nṛ-haraye akhila dharma goptre
śrī-siddhāḥ ūcuḥ yaḥ naḥ gatim yoga-siddhām asādhuḥ ahārṣīt yoga tapaḥ balena nānā darpam tam nakhaiḥ vidadāra tasmai tubhyam praṇatāḥ smaḥ nṛsiṁha
śrī-vidyādharāḥ ūcuḥ vidyām pṛthak dhāraṇayā anurāddhām nyaṣedhat ajñaḥ bala-vīrya-dṛptaḥ saḥ yena saṅkhye paśu-vat hataḥ tam māyā-nṛsiṁham praṇatāḥ sma nityam
śrī-nāgāḥ ūcuḥ yena pāpena ratnāni strī-ratnāni hṛtāni naḥ tat vakṣaḥ-pāṭanena āsām datta-ānanda namaḥ astu te
śrī-manavaḥ ūcuḥ manavaḥ vayam tava nideśa-kāriṇaḥ diti-jena deva paribhūta setavaḥ bhavatā khalaḥ saḥ upasaṁhṛtaḥ prabho karavāma te kim anuśādhi kiṅkarān
śrī-prajāpatayaḥ ūcuḥ prajā-īśāḥ vayam te para-īśa abhisṛṣṭāḥ na yena prajāḥ vai sṛjāmaḥ niṣiddhāḥ saḥ eṣaḥ tvayā bhinna-vakṣāḥ nu śete jagat-maṅgalam sattva-mūrte avatāraḥ
śrī-gandharvāḥ ūcuḥ vayam vibho te naṭa-nāṭya-gāyakāḥ yena ātmasāt vīrya bala ojasā kṛtāḥ saḥ eṣaḥ nītaḥ bhavatā daśām imām kim utpathasthaḥ kuśalāya kalpate
śrī-cāraṇāḥ ūcuḥ hare tava aṅghri-paṅkajam bhava-apavargam āśritāḥ yat eṣaḥ sādhu-hṛt-śayaḥ tvayā asuraḥ samāpitaḥ
śrī-yakṣāḥ ūcuḥ vayam anucara-mukhyāḥ karmabhiḥ te mano-jñaiḥ te iha diti-sutena prāpitāḥ vāhakatvam saḥ tu jana-paritāpam tat-kṛtam jānatā te nara-hara upanītaḥ pañcatām pañca-viṁśa
śrī-kimpuruṣāḥ ūcuḥ vayam kimpuruṣāḥ tvam tu mahā-puruṣaḥ īśvaraḥ ayam ku-puruṣaḥ naṣṭaḥ dhik-kṛtaḥ sādhubhiḥ yadā
śrī-vaitālikāḥ ūcuḥ sabhāsu satreṣu tava amalam yaśaḥ gītvā saparyām mahatīm labhāmahe yaḥ tām anaiṣīt vaśam eṣaḥ durjanaḥ dviṣṭyā hataḥ te bhagavan yathā āmayaḥ
śrī-kinnarāḥ ūcuḥ vayam īśa kinnara-gaṇāḥ tava anugāḥ diti-jena viṣṭim amunā anukāritāḥ bhavatā hare saḥ vṛjinaḥ avasāditaḥ narasiṁha nātha vibhavāya naḥ bhava
śrī-viṣṇu-pārṣadāḥ ūcuḥ adya etat hari-nara rūpam adbhutam te dṛṣṭam naḥ śaraṇa-da sarva-loka-śarma saḥ ayam te vidhikaraḥ īśa vipra-śaptaḥ tasya idam nidhanam anugrahāya vidmaḥ
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca evam sura-ādayaḥ sarve brahma-rudra-puraḥ sarāḥ na upaitum aśakan manyu-saṁrambham su-durāsadam
sākṣāt śrīḥ preṣitā devaiḥ dṛṣṭvā tam mahat adbhutam adṛṣṭa aśruta pūrvatvāt sā na upeyāya śaṅkitā
prahrādam preṣayām āsa brahmā avasthitam antike tāta praśamaya upehi sva-pitre kupitam prabhum
tathā iti śanakaiḥ rājan mahā-bhāgavataḥ arbhakaḥ upetya bhuvi kāyena nanāma vidhṛta-añjaliḥ
sva-pāda-mūle patitam tam arbhakam vilokya devaḥ kṛpayā pariplutaḥ utthāpya tat-śīrṣṇi adadhāt kara-ambujam kāla-ahi vitrasta dhiyām kṛta-abhayam
saḥ tat-kara-sparśa dhuta akhila aśubhaḥ sapadi abhivyakta para-ātma-darśanaḥ tat-pāda-padmam hṛdi nirvṛtaḥ dadhau hṛṣyat-tanuḥ klinna-hṛt aśru-locanaḥ
astauṣīt harim ekāgra-manasā su-samāhitaḥ prema-gadgadayā vācā tat-nyasta hṛdaya-īkṣaṇaḥ
śrī-prahrādaḥ uvāca brahma-ādayaḥ sura-gaṇāḥ munayaḥ atha siddhāḥ sattva ekatāna-gatayaḥ vacasām pravāhaiḥ na ārādhitum puru-guṇaiḥ adhunā api pipruḥ kim toṣṭum arhati saḥ me hariḥ ugra-jāteḥ
manye dhana abhijana rūpa tapaḥ śruta ojaḥ tejaḥ prabhāva bala pauruṣa buddhi yogāḥ na ārādhanāya hi bhavanti parasya puṁsaḥ bhaktyā tutoṣa bhagavān gaja-yūtha-pāya
viprāt dvi-ṣaṭ-guṇa-yutāt aravinda-nābha pāda-aravinda vimukhāt śva-pacam variṣṭham manye tat-arpita manaḥ vacana īhita artha prāṇam punāti saḥ kulam na tu bhūrimānaḥ
na eva ātmanaḥ prabhuḥ ayam nija-lābha-pūrṇaḥ mānam janāt aviduṣaḥ karuṇaḥ vṛṇīte yat yat janaḥ bhagavate vidadhīta mānam tat ca ātmane prati-mukhasya yathā mukha-śrīḥ
tasmāt aham vigata-viklavaḥ īśvarasya sarva-ātmanā mahi gṛṇāmi yathā manīṣam nīcaḥ ajayā guṇa-visargam anupraviṣṭaḥ pūyeta yena hi pumān anuvarṇitena
sarve hi amī vidhi-karāḥ tava sattva-dhāmnaḥ brahma-ādayaḥ vayam iva īśa na ca udvijantaḥ kṣemāya bhūtaye uta ātma-sukhāya ca asya vikrīḍitam bhagavataḥ rucira avatāraiḥ
tat yaccha manyum asuraḥ ca hataḥ tvayā adya modeta sādhuḥ api vṛścika-sarpa-hatyā lokāḥ ca nirvṛtim itāḥ pratiyanti sarve rūpam nṛsiṁha vibhayāya janāḥ smaranti
na aham bibhemi ajita te ati bhayānaka āsya jihvā arka-netra bhrukuṭī rabhasa ugra-daṁṣṭrāt āntra-srajaḥ kṣataja keśara śaṅku-karṇāt nirhrāda bhīta digibhāt ari-bhit nakha-agrāt
trastaḥ asmi aham kṛpaṇa-vatsala duḥsaha ugra saṁsāra-cakra kadanāt grasatām praṇītaḥ baddhaḥ sva-karmabhiḥ uśattama te aṅghri-mūlam prītaḥ apavarga-śaraṇam hvayase kadā nu
yasmāt priya apriya viyoga saṁyoga janma śoka-agninā sakala-yoniṣu dahyamānaḥ duḥkha-auṣadham tat api duḥkham a-tat-dhiyā aham bhūman bhramāmi vada me tava dāsya-yogam
saḥ aham priyasya suhṛdaḥ paradevatāyāḥ līlā-kathāḥ tava nṛsiṁha viriñca-gītāḥ añjaḥ titarmi anugṛṇan guṇa vipramuktaḥ durgāṇi te pada-yuga-ālaya haṁsa-saṅgaḥ
bālasya na iha śaraṇam pitarau nṛsiṁha na ārtasya ca agadam udanvati majjataḥ nauḥ taptasya tat-pratividhiḥ yaḥ iha añjasā iṣṭaḥ tāvat vibho tanu-bhṛtām tvat-upekṣitānām
yasmin yataḥ yarhi yena ca yasya yasmāt yasmai yathā yat uta yaḥ tu aparaḥ paraḥ vā bhāvaḥ karoti vikaroti pṛthak svabhāvaḥ sañcoditaḥ tat akhilam bhavataḥ svarūpam
māyā manaḥ sṛjati karma-mayam balīyaḥ kālena codita-guṇa anumatena puṁsaḥ chandaḥ-mayam yat ajayā arpita ṣoḍaśa aram saṁsāra-cakram aja kaḥ atitaret tvat-anyaḥ
saḥ tvam hi nitya vijita-ātma guṇaḥ sva-dhāmnā kālaḥ vaśī-kṛta visṛjya visarga śaktiḥ cakre visṛṣṭam ajayā īśvara ṣoḍaśa-are niṣpīḍyamānam upakarṣa vibho prapannam
dṛṣṭāḥ mayā divi vibho akhila dhiṣṇya-pānām āyuḥ śriyaḥ vibhavaḥ icchati yān janaḥ ayam ye asmat pituḥ kupita-hāsa vijṛmbhita bhrū visphūrjitena lulitāḥ saḥ tu te nirastaḥ
tasmāt amūḥ tanu-bhṛtām aham āśiṣaḥ ajñaḥ āyuḥ śriyam vibhavam aindriyam āviriñcyāt na icchāmi te vilulitān uru-vikrameṇa kāla-ātmanā upanaya mām nija-bhṛtya-pārśvam
kutra āśiṣaḥ śruti-sukhāḥ mṛgatṛṣṇi-rūpāḥ kva idam kalevaram aśeṣa rujām virohaḥ nirvidyate na tu janaḥ yat api iti vidvān kāma-analam madhu-lavaiḥ śamayan durāpaiḥ
kva aham rajaḥ-prabhavaḥ īśa tamaḥ adhike asmin jātaḥ sura-itara-kule kva tava anukampā na brahmaṇaḥ na tu bhavasya na vai ramāyāḥ yat me arpitaḥ śirasi padma-karaḥ prasādaḥ
na eṣā para-avara matiḥ bhavataḥ nanu syāt jantoḥ yathā ātma-suhṛdaḥ jagataḥ tathāpi saṁsevayā surataroḥ iva te prasādaḥ sevā-anurūpam udayaḥ na para-avaratvam
evam janam nipatitam prabhava ahi-kūpe kāma-abhikāmam anu yaḥ prapatan prasaṅgāt kṛtvā ātmasāt sura-ṛṣiṇā bhagavan gṛhītaḥ saḥ aham katham nu visṛje tava bhṛtya-sevām
mat-prāṇa-rakṣaṇam ananta pituḥ vadhaḥ ca manye sva-bhṛtya ṛṣi-vākyam ṛtam vidhātum khaḍgam pragṛhya yat avocat asat-vidhitsuḥ tvām īśvaraḥ mat-aparaḥ avatu kam harāmi
ekaḥ tvam eva jagat etam amuṣya yat tvam ādi antayoḥ pṛthak avasyasi madhyataḥ ca sṛṣṭvā guṇa-vyatikaram nija-māyayā idam nānā iva taiḥ avasitaḥ tat anupraviṣṭaḥ
tvam vā idam sat-asat īśa bhavān tataḥ anyaḥ māyā yat ātma-para-buddhiḥ iyam hi apārthā yat yasya janma nidhanam sthitiḥ īkṣaṇam ca tat vā etat eva vasukāla-vat aṣṭi-tarvoḥ
nyasya idam ātmani jagat vilaya-ambu-madhye śeṣe ātmanā nija sukha-anubhavaḥ nirīhaḥ yogena mīlita-dṛk ātma nipīta nidraḥ turye sthitaḥ na tu tamaḥ na guṇān ca yuṅkṣe
tasya eva te vapuḥ idam nija-kāla-śaktyā sañcodita prakṛti-dharmaṇaḥ ātma-gūḍham ambhasi ananta-śayanāt viramat-samādheḥ nābheḥ abhūt sva-kaṇikā vaṭa-vat mahā-abjam
tat-sambhavaḥ kaviḥ ataḥ anyat apaśyamānaḥ tvām bījam ātmani tatam saḥ bahiḥ vicintya na avindat abda-śatam apsu nimajjamānaḥ jāte aṅkure katham uha upalabheta bījam
saḥ tu ātma-yoniḥ ati-vismitaḥ āśritaḥ abjam kālena tīvra-tapasā pariśuddha-bhāvaḥ tvām ātmani īśa bhuvi gandham iva ati-sūkṣmam bhūta-indriya āśaya-maye vitatam dadarśa
evam sahasra vadana aṅghri śiraḥ kara uru nāsa-ādya karṇa nayana ābharaṇa āyudha āḍhyam māyā-mayam sat-upalakṣita sanniveśam dṛṣṭvā mahā-puruṣam āpa mudam viriñcaḥ
tasmai bhavān haya-śiraḥ tanuvam hi bibhrat veda-druhau ati-balau madhu-kaiṭabha-ākhyau hatvā anayat śruti-gaṇān ca rajaḥ tamaḥ ca sattvam tava priya-tamām tanum āmananti
ittham nṛ tiryak ṛṣi deva jhaṣa avatāraiḥ lokān vibhāvayasi haṁsi jagat pratīpān dharmam mahā-puruṣa pāsi yuga-anuvṛttam channaḥ kalau yat abhavaḥ tri-yugaḥ atha saḥ tvam
na etat manaḥ tava kathāsu vikuṇṭha-nātha samprīyate durita duṣṭam asādhu tīvram kāma-āturam harṣa-śoka bhaya eṣaṇā ārtam tasmin katham tava gatim vimṛśāmi dīnaḥ
jihvā ekataḥ acyuta vikarṣati mā avitṛptā śiśnaḥ anyataḥ tvak udaram śravaṇam kutaścit ghrāṇaḥ anyataḥ capala-dṛk kva ca karma-śaktiḥ bahvyaḥ sa-patnyaḥ iva geha-patim lunanti
evam sva-karma-patitam bhava vaitaraṇyām anyaḥ anya janma maraṇa āśana bhīta-bhītam paśyan janam sva para vigraha vaira-maitram hanta iti pāracara pīpṛhi mūḍham adya
kaḥ nu atra te akhila-guro bhagavan prayāsaḥ uttāraṇe asya bhava-sambhava lopa hetoḥ mūḍheṣu vai mahat-anugrahaḥ ārta-bandho kim tena te priya-janān anusevatām naḥ
na eva udvije para duratyaya vaitaraṇyāḥ tvat-vīrya gāyana mahā-amṛta magna-cittaḥ śoce tataḥ vimukha-cetasaḥ indriya-artha māyā-sukhāya bharam udvahataḥ vimūḍhān
prāyeṇa deva munayaḥ sva vimukti-kāmāḥ maunam caranti vijane na para-artha-niṣṭhāḥ na etān vihāya kṛpaṇān vimumukṣe ekaḥ na anyam tvat asya śaraṇam bhramataḥ anupaśye
yat maithuna-ādi gṛhamedhi-sukham hi tuccham kaṇḍūyanena karayoḥ iva duḥkha-duḥkham tṛpyanti na iha kṛpaṇāḥ bahu-duḥkha-bhājaḥ kaṇḍūti-vat manasi-jam viṣaheta dhīraḥ
mauna vrata śruta tapaḥ adhyayana sva-dharma vyākhyā rahaḥ japa samādhayaḥ āpavargyāḥ prāyaḥ param puruṣa te tu ajita-indriyāṇām vārtāḥ bhavanti uta na vā atra tu dāmbhikānām
rūpe ime sat-asatī tava veda-sṛṣṭe bīja-aṅkurau iva na ca anyat arūpakasya yuktāḥ samakṣam ubhayatra vicakṣante tvām yogena vahnim iva dāruṣu na anyataḥ syāt
tvam vāyuḥ agniḥ avaniḥ viyat ambu mātrāḥ prāṇa indriyāṇi hṛdayam cit anugrahaḥ ca sarvam tvam eva sa-guṇaḥ viguṇaḥ ca bhūman na anyat tvat asti api manaḥ-vacasā niruktam
na ete guṇāḥ na guṇinaḥ mahat-ādayaḥ ye sarve manaḥ prabhṛtayaḥ saha-deva-martyāḥ ādi-anta-vantaḥ urugāya vidanti hi tvām evam vimṛśya sudhiyaḥ viramanti śabdāt
