tat te arhat-tama namaḥ stuti-karma-pūjāḥ karma smṛtiḥ caraṇayoḥ śravaṇam kathāyām saṁsevayā tvayi vinā iti ṣaṭ-aṅgayā kim bhaktim janaḥ paramahaṁsa-gatau labheta
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca etāvat varṇita guṇaḥ bhaktyā bhaktena nirguṇaḥ prahrādam praṇatam prītaḥ yata-manyuḥ abhāṣata
śrī-bhagavān uvāca prahrāda bhadra bhadram te prītaḥ aham te asura-uttama varam vṛṇīṣva abhimatam kāma-pūraḥ asmi aham nṛṇām
mām aprīṇataḥ āyuṣman darśanam durlabham hi me dṛṣṭvā mām na punaḥ jantuḥ ātmānam taptum arhati
prīṇanti hi atha mām dhīrāḥ sarva-bhāvena sādhavaḥ śreyas-kāmāḥ mahā-bhāga sarvāsām āśiṣām patim
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca evam pralobhyamānaḥ api varaiḥ loka pralobhanaiḥ ekāntitvāt bhagavati na aicchat tān asura-uttamaḥ
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca bhakti-yogasya tat sarvam antarāyatayā arbhakaḥ manyamānaḥ hṛṣīkeśam smayamānaḥ uvāca ha
śrī-prahrādaḥ uvāca mā mām pralobhaya utpattyā saktam kāmeṣu taiḥ varaiḥ tat-saṅga-bhītaḥ nirviṇṇaḥ mumukṣuḥ tvām upāśritaḥ
bhṛtya-lakṣaṇa-jijñāsuḥ bhaktam kāmeṣu acodayat bhavān saṁsāra-bījeṣu hṛdaya-granthiṣu prabho
na anyathā te akhila-guro ghaṭeta karuṇā-ātmanaḥ yaḥ te āśiṣaḥ āśāste na saḥ bhṛtyaḥ saḥ vai vaṇik
āśāsānaḥ na vai bhṛtyaḥ svāmini āśiṣaḥ ātmanaḥ na svāmī bhṛtyataḥ svāmyam icchan yaḥ rāti ca āśiṣaḥ
aham tu akāmaḥ tvat-bhaktaḥ tvam ca svāmī anapāśrayaḥ na anyathā iha āvayoḥ arthaḥ rāja sevakayoḥ iva
yadi dāsyasi me kāmān varān tvam varada-ṛṣabha kāmānām hṛdi asaṁroham bhavataḥ tu vṛṇe varam
indriyāṇi manaḥ prāṇaḥ ātmā dharmaḥ dhṛtiḥ matiḥ hrīḥ śrīḥ tejaḥ smṛtiḥ satyam yasya naśyanti janmanā
vimuñcati yadā kāmān mānavaḥ manasi sthitān tarhi eva puṇḍarīka-akṣa bhagavattvāya kalpate
om namaḥ bhagavate tubhyam puruṣāya mahā-ātmane haraye adbhuta-siṁhāya brahmaṇe parama-ātmane
śrī-bhagavān uvāca na ekāntinaḥ me mayi jātu iha āśiṣaḥ āśāsate amutra ca ye bhavat-vidhāḥ tathāpi manvantaram etat atra daitya-īśvarāṇām anubhuṅkṣva bhogān
kathāḥ madīyāḥ juṣamāṇaḥ priyāḥ tvam āveśya mām ātmani santam ekam sarveṣu bhūteṣu adhiyajñam īśam yajasva yogena ca karma hinvan
bhogena puṇyam kuśalena pāpam kalevaram kāla-javena hitvā kīrtim viśuddhām sura-loka-gītām vitāya mām eṣyasi mukta-bandhaḥ
yaḥ etat kīrtayet mahyam tvayā gītam idam naraḥ tvām ca mām ca smaran kāle karma-bandhāt pramucyate
śrī-prahrādaḥ uvāca varam varaye etat te varada-īśāt mahā-īśvara yat anindat pitā me tvām avidvān tejaḥ aiśvaram viddha amarṣa āśayaḥ sākṣāt sarva-loka-gurum prabhum bhrātṛ-hā iti mṛṣā-dṛṣṭiḥ tvat-bhakte mayi ca agha-vān tasmāt pitā me pūyeta durantāt dustarāt aghāt pūtaḥ te apāṅga saṁdṛṣṭaḥ tadā kṛpaṇa-vatsala
śrī-bhagavān uvāca triḥ-saptabhiḥ pitā pūtaḥ pitṛbhiḥ saha te anagha yat sādho asya kule jātaḥ bhavān vai kula-pāvanaḥ
yatra yatra ca mat-bhaktāḥ praśāntāḥ sama-darśinaḥ sādhavaḥ samudācārāḥ te pūyante api kīkaṭāḥ
sarva-ātmanā na hiṁsanti bhūta-grāmeṣu kiñcana ucca-avaceṣu daitya-indra mat-bhāva vigata spṛhāḥ
bhavanti puruṣāḥ loke mat-bhaktāḥ tvām anuvratāḥ bhavān me khalu bhaktānām sarveṣām pratirūpa-dhṛk
kuru tvam preta-kṛtyāni pituḥ pūtasya sarvaśaḥ mat-aṅga sparśanena aṅga lokān yāsyati su-prajāḥ
pitryam ca sthānam ātiṣṭha yathā-uktam brahmavādibhiḥ mayi āveśya manaḥ tāta kuru karmāṇi mat-paraḥ
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca prahrādaḥ api tathā cakre pituḥ yat sāmparāyikam yathā āha bhagavān rājan abhiṣiktaḥ dvi-jātibhiḥ
prasāda-sumukham dṛṣṭvā brahmā nara-harim harim stutvā vāgbhiḥ pavitrābhiḥ prāha deva-ādibhiḥ vṛtaḥ
śrī-brahmā uvāca deva-deva akhila-adhyakṣa bhūta-bhāvana pūrva-ja diṣṭyā te nihataḥ pāpaḥ loka-santāpanaḥ asuraḥ
yaḥ asau labdha-varaḥ mattaḥ na vadhyaḥ mama sṛṣṭibhiḥ tapaḥ-yoga-bala unnaddhaḥ samasta nigamān ahan
diṣṭyā tat-tanayaḥ sādhuḥ mahā-bhāgavataḥ arbhakaḥ tvayā vimocitaḥ mṛtyoḥ diṣṭyā tvām samitaḥ adhunā
etat vapuḥ te bhagavan dhyāyataḥ parama-ātmanaḥ sarvataḥ goptṛ santrāsāt mṛtyoḥ api jighāṁsataḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca mā evam vibho asurāṇām te pradeyaḥ padma-sambhava varaḥ krūra-nisargāṇām ahīnām amṛtam yathā
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca iti uktvā bhagavān rājan tataḥ ca antardadhe hariḥ adṛśyaḥ sarva-bhūtānām pūjitaḥ parameṣṭhinā
tataḥ sampūjya śirasā vavande parameṣṭhinam bhavam prajāpatīn devān prahrādaḥ bhagavat-kalāḥ
tataḥ kāvya-ādibhiḥ sārdham munibhiḥ kamala-āsanaḥ daityānām dānavānām ca prahrādam akarot patim
pratinandya tataḥ devāḥ prayujya parama-āśiṣaḥ sva-dhāmāni yayuḥ rājan brahma-ādyāḥ pratipūjitāḥ
evam ca pārṣadau viṣṇoḥ putratvam prāpitau diteḥ hṛdi sthitena hariṇā vaira-bhāvena tau hatau
punaḥ ca vipra-śāpena rākṣasau tau babhūvatuḥ kumbhakarṇa-daśa-grīvau hatau tau rāma-vikramaiḥ
śayānau yudhi nirbhinna hṛdayau rāma-śāyakaiḥ tat-cittau jahatuḥ deham yathā prāktana-janmani
tau iha atha punaḥ jātau śiśupāla karūṣa-jau harau vaira-anubandhena paśyataḥ te samīyatuḥ
enaḥ pūrva-kṛtam yat tat rājānaḥ kṛṣṇa-vairiṇaḥ jahuḥ te ante tat-ātmānaḥ kīṭaḥ peśaskṛtaḥ yathā
yathā yathā bhagavataḥ bhaktyā paramayā abhidā nṛpāḥ caidya-ādayaḥ sātmyam hareḥ tat-cintayā yayuḥ
ākhyātam sarvam etat te yat mām tvam paripṛṣṭavān damaghoṣa-suta-ādīnām hareḥ sātmyam api dviṣām
eṣā brahmaṇya-devasya kṛṣṇasya ca mahā-ātmanaḥ avatāra-kathā puṇyā vadhaḥ yatra ādi daityayoḥ
prahrādasya anucaritam mahā-bhāgavatasya ca bhaktiḥ jñānam viraktiḥ ca yāthārthyam ca asya vai hareḥ sarga sthiti apyaya īśasya guṇa karma anuvarṇanam para-avareṣām sthānānām kālena vyatyayaḥ mahān
dharmaḥ bhāgavatānām ca bhagavān yena gamyate ākhyāne asmin samāmnātam ādhyātmikam aśeṣataḥ
yaḥ etat puṇyam ākhyānam viṣṇoḥ vīrya upabṛṁhitam kīrtayet śraddhayā śrutvā karma-pāśaiḥ vimucyate
etat yaḥ ādi-puruṣasya mṛga-indra-līlām daitya-indra yūtha-pa vadham prayataḥ paṭheta daitya-ātma-jasya ca satām pravarasya puṇyam śrutvā anubhāvam akutaḥ-bhayam eti lokam
yūyam nṛ-loke bata bhūri-bhāgāḥ lokam punānāḥ munayaḥ abhiyanti yeṣām gṛhān āvasati iti sākṣāt gūḍham param brahma manuṣya-liṅgam
saḥ vā ayam brahma mahat vimṛgya kaivalya nirvāṇa-sukha anubhūtiḥ priyaḥ suhṛt vaḥ khalu mātuleyaḥ ātmā arhaṇīyaḥ vidhi-kṛt guruḥ ca
na yasya sākṣāt bhava padma-ja ādibhiḥ rūpam dhiyā vastutayā upavarṇitam maunena bhaktyā upaśamena pūjitaḥ prasīdatām eṣaḥ saḥ sātvatām patiḥ
saḥ eṣaḥ bhagavān rājan vyatanot vihatam yaśaḥ purā rudrasya devasya mayena ananta māyinā
rājā uvāca kasmin karmaṇi devasya mayaḥ ahan jagat-īśituḥ yathā ca upacitā kīrtiḥ kṛṣṇena anena kathyatām
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca nirjitāḥ asurāḥ devaiḥ yudhi anena upabṛṁhitaiḥ māyinām parama-ācāryam mayam śaraṇam āyayuḥ
saḥ nirmāya puraḥ tisraḥ haimī raupyā āyasīḥ vibhuḥ durlakṣya apāya-saṁyogāḥ durvitarkya paricchadāḥ tābhiḥ te asura-senā-anyaḥ lokān trīn sa-īśvarān nṛpa smarantaḥ nāśayām cakruḥ pūrva vairam alakṣitāḥ
tataḥ te sa-īśvarāḥ lokāḥ upāsādya īśvaram natāḥ trāhi naḥ tāvakān deva vinaṣṭān tripura-ālayaiḥ
atha anugṛhya bhagavān mā bhaiṣṭa iti surān vibhuḥ śaram dhanuṣi sandhāya pureṣu astram vyamuñcata
tataḥ agni-varṇāḥ iṣavaḥ utpetuḥ sūrya-maṇḍalāt yathā mayūkha-sandohāḥ na adṛśyanta puraḥ yataḥ
taiḥ spṛṣṭāḥ vyasavaḥ sarve nipetuḥ sma pura-okasaḥ tān ānīya mahā-yogī mayaḥ kūpa-rase akṣipat
siddha-amṛta-rasa-spṛṣṭāḥ vajra-sārāḥ mahā-ojasaḥ uttasthuḥ megha-dalanāḥ vaidyutāḥ iva vahnayaḥ
vilokya bhagna-saṅkalpam vimanaskam vṛṣa-dhvajam tadā ayam bhagavān viṣṇuḥ tatra upāyam akalpayat
vatsaḥ ca āsīt tadā brahmā svayam viṣṇuḥ ayam hi gauḥ praviśya tri-puram kāle rasa-kūpa-amṛtam papau
te asurāḥ hi api paśyantaḥ na nyaṣedhan vimohitāḥ tat vijñāya mahā-yogī rasa-pālān idam jagau smayan viśokaḥ śoka-ārtān smaran daiva-gatim ca tām
devaḥ asuraḥ naraḥ anyaḥ vā na īśvaraḥ asti iha kaścana ātmanaḥ anyasya vā diṣṭam daivena apohitum dvayoḥ
atha asau śaktibhiḥ svābhiḥ śambhoḥ prādhānikam vyadhāt dharma jñāna virakti ṛddhi tapaḥ vidyā kriyā ādibhiḥ ratham sūtam dhvajam vāhān dhanuḥ varma śara-ādi yat sannaddhaḥ ratham āsthāya śaram dhanuḥ upādade
śaram dhanuṣi sandhāya muhūrte abhijiti īśvaraḥ dadāha tena durbhedyāḥ haraḥ atha tri-puraḥ nṛpa
divi dundubhayaḥ neduḥ vimāna śata saṅkulāḥ deva-ṛṣi pitṛ siddha īśāḥ jaya iti kusuma-utkaraiḥ avākiran jaguḥ hṛṣṭāḥ nanṛtuḥ ca apsaraḥ-gaṇāḥ
evam dagdhvā puraḥ tisraḥ bhagavān pura-hā nṛpa brahma-ādibhiḥ stūyamānaḥ svam dhāma pratyapadyata
evam vidhāni asya hareḥ sva-māyayā viḍambamānasya nṛ-lokam ātmanaḥ vīryāṇi gītāni ṛṣibhiḥ jagat-guroḥ lokam punānāni aparam vadāmi kim
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca śrutvā īhitam sādhu sabhā-sabhājitam mahat-tama-agraṇyaḥ urukrama-ātmanaḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ daitya-pateḥ mudā-anvitaḥ papraccha bhūyaḥ tanayam svayambhuvaḥ
śrī-yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca bhagavan śrotum icchāmi nṛṇām dharmam sanātanam varṇa-āśrama-ācāra-yutam yat pumān vindate param
bhavān prajāpateḥ sākṣāt ātma-jaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ sutānām sammataḥ brahman tapaḥ yoga samādhibhiḥ
nārāyaṇa-parāḥ viprāḥ dharmam guhyam param viduḥ karuṇāḥ sādhavaḥ śāntāḥ tvat-vidhāḥ na tathā apare
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca natvā bhagavate ajāya lokānām dharma-setave vakṣye sanātanam dharmam nārāyaṇa-mukhāt śrutam
yaḥ avatīrya ātmanaḥ aṁśena dākṣāyaṇyām tu dharmataḥ lokānām svastaye adhyāste tapaḥ badarikāśrame
dharma-mūlam hi bhagavān sarva-veda-mayaḥ hariḥ smṛtam ca tat-vidām rājan yena ca ātmā prasīdati
satyam dayā tapaḥ śaucam titikṣā īkṣā śamaḥ damaḥ ahiṁsā brahmacaryam ca tyāgaḥ svādhyāyaḥ ārjavam santoṣaḥ samadṛk-sevā grāmya-īhā-uparamaḥ śanaiḥ nṛṇām viparyaya-īhā īkṣā maunam ātma vimarśanam anna-ādya-ādeḥ saṁvibhāgaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ ca yathā-arhataḥ teṣu ātma-devatā-buddhiḥ sutarām nṛṣu pāṇḍava śravaṇam kīrtanam ca asya smaraṇam mahatām gateḥ sevā ijyā avanatiḥ dāsyam sakhyam ātma-samarpaṇam nṛṇām ayam paraḥ dharmaḥ sarveṣām samudāhṛtaḥ triṁśat-lakṣaṇa-vān rājan sarva-ātmā yena tuṣyati
saṁskārāḥ yatra avicchinnāḥ saḥ dvi-jaḥ ajaḥ jagāda yam ijyā adhyayana dānāni vihitāni dvi-janmanām janma karma avadātānām kriyāḥ ca āśrama-coditāḥ
viprasya adhyayana-ādīni ṣaṭ anyasya apratigrahaḥ rājñaḥ vṛttiḥ prajā-goptuḥ aviprāt vā kara-ādibhiḥ
vaiśyaḥ tu vārtā-vṛttiḥ syāt nityam brahma-kula-anugaḥ śūdrasya dvija-śuśrūṣā vṛttiḥ ca svāminaḥ bhavet
vārtā vicitrā śālīna yāyāvara śila uñchanam vipra-vṛttiḥ caturdhā iyam śreyasī ca uttara-uttarā
jaghanyaḥ na uttamām vṛttim anāpadi bhajet naraḥ ṛte rājanyam āpatsu sarveṣām api sarvaśaḥ
ṛta-amṛtābhyām jīveta mṛtena pramṛtena vā satyānṛtābhyām api vā na śva-vṛttyā kadācana ṛtam uñchaśilam proktam amṛtam yat ayācitam mṛtam tu nitya-yācñā syāt pramṛtam karṣaṇam smṛtam satyānṛtam ca vāṇijyam śva-vṛttiḥ nīca-sevanam varjayet tām sadā vipraḥ rājanyaḥ ca jugupsitām sarva-veda-mayaḥ vipraḥ sarva-deva-mayaḥ nṛpaḥ
śamaḥ damaḥ tapaḥ śaucam santoṣaḥ kṣāntiḥ ārjavam jñānam dayā acyuta-ātmatvam satyam ca brahma-lakṣaṇam
śauryam vīryam dhṛtiḥ tejaḥ tyāgaḥ ca ātma-jayaḥ kṣamā brahmaṇyatā prasādaḥ ca satyam ca kṣatra-lakṣaṇam
deva-guru-acyute bhaktiḥ tri-varga paripoṣaṇam āstikyam udyamaḥ nityam naipuṇyam vaiśya-lakṣaṇam
śūdrasya sannatiḥ śaucam sevā svāmini amāyayā amantra-yajñaḥ hi asteyam satyam go vipra rakṣaṇam
strīṇām ca pati-devānām tat-śuśrūṣā anukūlatā tat-bandhuṣu anuvṛttiḥ ca nityam tat-vrata-dhāraṇam
sammārjana upalepābhyām gṛha maṇḍana vartanaiḥ svayam ca maṇḍitā nityam parimṛṣṭa paricchadā kāmaiḥ ucca-avacaiḥ sādhvī praśrayeṇa damena ca vākyaiḥ satyaiḥ priyaiḥ premṇā kāle kāle bhajet patim
santuṣṭā alolupā dakṣā dharma-jñā priya satya vāk apramattā śuciḥ snigdhā patim tu apatitam bhajet
yā patim hari-bhāvena bhajet śrīḥ iva tat-parā hari-ātmanā hareḥ loke patyā śrīḥ iva modate
vṛttiḥ saṅkara-jātīnām tat-tat kula-kṛtā bhavet acaurāṇām apāpānām antyaja antevasāyinām
prāyaḥ sva-bhāva-vihitaḥ nṛṇām dharmaḥ yuge yuge veda-dṛgbhiḥ smṛtaḥ rājan pretya ca iha ca śarma-kṛt
vṛttyā sva-bhāva-kṛtayā vartamānaḥ sva-karma-kṛt hitvā sva-bhāva-jam karma śanaiḥ nirguṇatām iyāt
upyamānam muhuḥ kṣetram svayam nirvīryatām iyāt na kalpate punaḥ sūtyai uptam bījam ca naśyati evam kāma-āśayam cittam kāmānām ati-sevayā virajyeta yathā rājan agni-vat kāma-bindubhiḥ
yasya yat lakṣaṇam proktam puṁsaḥ varṇa-abhivyañjakam yat anyatra api dṛśyeta tat tena eva vinirdiśet
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca brahmacārī gurukule vasan dāntaḥ guroḥ hitam ācaran dāsa-vat nīcaḥ gurau su-dṛḍha sauhṛdaḥ
sāyam prātaḥ upāsīta guru agni arka sura-uttamān sandhye ubhe ca yata-vāk japan brahma samāhitaḥ
chandāṁsi adhīyīta guroḥ āhūtaḥ cet su-yantritaḥ upakrame avasāne ca caraṇau śirasā namet
mekhalā ajina-vāsāṁsi jaṭā daṇḍa kamaṇḍalūn bibhṛyāt upavītam ca darbha-pāṇiḥ yathā uditam
sāyam prātaḥ caret bhaikṣyam gurave tat nivedayet bhuñjīta yadi anujñātaḥ no cet upavaset kvacit
su-śīlaḥ mita-bhuk dakṣaḥ śraddadhānaḥ jita-indriyaḥ yāvat-artham vyavaharet strīṣu strī-nirjiteṣu ca
varjayet pramadā-gāthām agṛhasthaḥ bṛhat-vrataḥ indriyāṇi pramāthīni haranti api yateḥ manaḥ
keśa-prasādhana unmarda snapana abhyañjana-ādikam guru-strībhiḥ yuvatibhiḥ kārayet na ātmanaḥ yuvā
nanu agniḥ pramadā nāma ghṛta-kumbha samaḥ pumān sutām api rahaḥ jahyāt anyadā yāvat artha-kṛt
kalpayitvā ātmanā yāvat ābhāsam idam īśvaraḥ dvaitam tāvat na viramet tataḥ hi asya viparyayaḥ
etat sarvam gṛhasthasya samāmnātam yateḥ api guru-vṛttiḥ vikalpena gṛhasthasya ṛtu-gāminaḥ
añjana abhyañjana unmarda strī-avalekha āmiṣam madhu srak gandha-lepa alaṅkārān tyajeyuḥ ye bṛhat-vratāḥ
uṣitvā evam gurukule dvi-jaḥ adhītya avabudhya ca trayīm sa-aṅga upaniṣadam yāvat-artham yathā-balam dattvā varam anujñātaḥ guroḥ kāmam yadi īśvaraḥ gṛham vanam vā praviśet pravrajet tatra vā vaset
agnau gurau ātmani ca sarva-bhūteṣu adhokṣajam bhūtaiḥ sva-dhāmabhiḥ paśyet apraviṣṭam praviṣṭa-vat
evam vidhaḥ brahmacārī vānaprasthaḥ yatiḥ gṛhī caran vidita-vijñānaḥ param brahma adhigacchati
vānaprasthasya vakṣyāmi niyamān muni-sammatān yān āsthāya muniḥ gacchet ṛṣi-lokam uha añjasā
na kṛṣṭa-pacyam aśnīyāt akṛṣṭam ca api akālataḥ agni-pakvam atha āmam vā arka-pakvam uta āharet
vanyaiḥ caru puroḍāśān nirvapet kāla-coditān labdhe nave nave anna-ādye purāṇam ca parityajet
agni artham eva śaraṇam uṭa-jam vā adri-kandaram śrayeta hima vāyu agni varṣa arka ātapa ṣāṭ svayam
keśa roma nakha śmaśru malāni jaṭilaḥ dadhat kamaṇḍalu ajine daṇḍa valkala agni paricchadān
caret vane dvādaśa-abdān aṣṭau vā caturaḥ muniḥ dvau ekam vā yathā buddhiḥ na vipadyeta kṛcchrataḥ
yadā akalpaḥ sva-kriyāyām vyādhibhiḥ jarayā athavā ānvīkṣikyām vā vidyāyām kuryāt anaśana-ādikam
ātmani agnīn samāropya sannyasya aham mama ātmatām kāraṇeṣu nyaset samyak saṅghātam tu yathā-arhataḥ
khe khāni vāyau niśvāsān tejaḥsu uṣmāṇam ātma-vān apsu asṛk śleṣma pūyāni kṣitau śeṣam yathā-udbhavam
vācam agnau sa-vaktavyām indre śilpam karau api padāni gatyā vayasi ratyā upastham prajāpatau mṛtyau pāyum visargam ca yathā-sthānam vinirdiśet dikṣu śrotram sa-nādena sparśena adhyātmani tvacam rūpāṇi cakṣuṣā rājan jyotiṣi abhiniveśayet apsu pracetasā jihvām ghreyaiḥ ghrāṇam kṣitau nyaset
manaḥ manorathaiḥ candre buddhim bodhyaiḥ kavau pare karmāṇi adhyātmanā rudre yat aham mamatā kriyā sattvena cittam kṣetra-jñe guṇaiḥ vaikārikam pare apsu kṣitim apaḥ jyotiṣi adaḥ vāyau nabhasi amum kūṭasthe tat ca mahati tat avyakte akṣare ca tat
iti akṣaratayā ātmānam cit-mātram avaśeṣitam jñātvā advayaḥ atha viramet dagdha-yoniḥ iva analaḥ
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca kalpaḥ tu evam parivrajya deha-mātra avaśeṣitaḥ grāma eka rātra vidhinā nirapekṣaḥ caret mahīm
bibhṛyāt yadi asau vāsaḥ kaupīna ācchādanam param tyaktam na liṅgāt daṇḍa-ādeḥ anyat kiñcit anāpadi
ekaḥ eva caret bhikṣuḥ ātma-ārāmaḥ anapāśrayaḥ sarva-bhūta-suhṛt śāntaḥ nārāyaṇa-parāyaṇaḥ
paśyet ātmani adaḥ viśvam pare sat-asataḥ avyaye ātmānam ca param brahma sarvatra sat-asat maye
supti prabodhayoḥ sandhau ātmanaḥ gatim ātma-dṛk paśyan bandham ca mokṣam ca māyā-mātram na vastutaḥ
na abhinandet dhruvam mṛtyum adhruvam vā asya jīvitam kālam param pratīkṣeta bhūtānām prabhava apyayam
na asat-śāstreṣu sajjeta na upajīveta jīvikām vāda-vādān tyajet tarkān pakṣam kaṁca na saṁśrayet
na śiṣyān anubadhnīta granthān na eva abhyaset bahūn na vyākhyām upayuñjīta na ārambhān ārabhet kvacit
na yateḥ āśramaḥ prāyaḥ dharma-hetuḥ mahā-ātmanaḥ śāntasya sama-cittasya bibhṛyāt uta vā tyajet
avyakta-liṅgaḥ vyakta-arthaḥ manīṣī unmatta bāla-vat kaviḥ mūka-vat ātmānam saḥ dṛṣṭyā darśayet nṛṇām
atra api udāharanti imam itihāsam purātanam prahrādasya ca saṁvādam muneḥ ājagarasya ca
tam śayānam dharā-upasthe kāveryām sahya-sānuni rajaḥ-valaiḥ tanū-deśaiḥ nigūḍha amala tejasam dadarśa lokān vicaran loka-tattva vivitsayā vṛtaḥ amātyaiḥ katipayaiḥ prahrādaḥ bhagavat-priyaḥ
karmaṇā ākṛtibhiḥ vācā liṅgaiḥ varṇa-āśrama ādibhiḥ na vidanti janāḥ yam vai saḥ asau iti na vā iti ca
tam natvā abhyarcya vidhi-vat pādayoḥ śirasā spṛśan vivitsuḥ idam aprākṣīt mahā-bhāgavataḥ asuraḥ
bibharṣi kāyam pīvānam sa-udyamaḥ bhogavān yathā vittam ca eva udyama-vatām bhogaḥ vitta-vatām iha bhoginām khalu dehaḥ ayam pīvā bhavati na anyathā
na te śayānasya nirudyamasya brahman nu ha arthaḥ yataḥ eva bhogaḥ abhoginaḥ ayam tava vipra dehaḥ pīvā yataḥ tat vada naḥ kṣamam cet
kaviḥ kalpaḥ nipuṇa-dṛk citra-priya-kathaḥ samaḥ lokasya kurvataḥ karma śeṣe tat-vīkṣitā api vā
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca saḥ ittham daitya-patinā paripṛṣṭaḥ mahā-muniḥ smayamānaḥ tam abhyāha tat-vāk amṛta-yantritaḥ
śrī-brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca veda idam asura-śreṣṭha bhavān nanu ārya-sammataḥ īhā uparamayoḥ nṝṇām padāni adhyātma-cakṣuṣā
yasya nārāyaṇaḥ devaḥ bhagavān hṛt-gataḥ sadā bhaktyā kevalayā ajñānam dhunoti dhvāntam arka-vat
tathāpi brūmahe praśnān tava rājan yathā-śrutam sambhāṣaṇīyaḥ hi bhavān ātmanaḥ śuddhim icchatā
tṛṣṇayā bhava-vāhinyā yogyaiḥ kāmaiḥ apūryayā karmāṇi kāryamāṇaḥ aham nānā-yoniṣu yojitaḥ
yadṛcchayā lokam imam prāpitaḥ karmabhiḥ bhraman svarga apavargayoḥ dvāram tiraścām punaḥ asya ca
tatra api dam-patīnām ca sukhāya anya-apanuttaye karmāṇi kurvatām dṛṣṭvā nivṛttaḥ asmi viparyayam
sukham asya ātmanaḥ rūpam sarva īha uparatiḥ tanuḥ manaḥ-saṁsparśa-jān dṛṣṭvā bhogān svapsyāmi saṁviśan
iti etat ātmanaḥ sva-artham santam vismṛtya vai pumān vicitrām asati dvaite ghorām āpnoti saṁsṛtim
jalam tat-udbhavaiḥ channam hitvā ajñaḥ jala-kāmyayā mṛgatṛṣṇām upādhāvet tathā anyatra artha-dṛk svataḥ
deha-ādibhiḥ daiva-tantraiḥ ātmanaḥ sukham īhataḥ duḥkha-atyayam ca anīśasya kriyāḥ moghāḥ kṛtāḥ kṛtāḥ
ādhyātmika-ādibhiḥ duḥkhaiḥ avimuktasya karhicit martyasya kṛcchra-upanataiḥ arthaiḥ kāmaiḥ kriyeta kim
paśyāmi dhaninām kleśam lubdhānām ajita-ātmanām bhayāt alabdha-nidrāṇām sarvataḥ abhiviśaṅkinām
rājataḥ caurataḥ śatroḥ sva-janāt paśu-pakṣitaḥ arthibhyaḥ kālataḥ svasmāt nityam prāṇa-artha-vat bhayam
śoka moha bhaya krodha rāga klaibya śrama ādayaḥ yat-mūlāḥ syuḥ nṛṇām jahyāt spṛhām prāṇa arthayoḥ budhaḥ
madhukāra mahā-sarpau loke asmin naḥ guru uttamau vairāgyam paritoṣam ca prāptāḥ yat-śikṣayā vayam
virāgaḥ sarva-kāmebhyaḥ śikṣitaḥ me madhu-vratāt kṛcchra āptam madhu-vat vittam hatvā api anyaḥ haret patim
anīhaḥ parituṣṭa ātmā yadṛcchā upanatāt aham no cet śaye bahu ahāni mahā-ahiḥ iva sattva-vān
kvacit alpam kvacit bhūri bhuñje annam svādu asvādu vā kvacit bhūri guṇa-upetam guṇa-hīnam uta kvacit śraddhayā upahṛtam kvāpi kadācit māna-varjitam bhuñje bhuktvā atha kasmin cit divā naktam yadṛcchayā
kṣaumam dukūlam ajinam cīram valkalam eva vā vase anyat api samprāptam diṣṭa-bhuk tuṣṭa dhīḥ aham
kvacit śaye dhara-upasthe tṛṇa parṇa aśma bhasmasu kvacit prāsāda paryaṅke kaśipau vā para icchayā
kvacit snātaḥ anulipta-aṅgaḥ su-vāsāḥ sragvī alaṅkṛtaḥ ratha ibha aśvaiḥ care kvāpi dik-vāsāḥ graha-vat vibho
na aham ninde na ca staumi sva-bhāva viṣamam janam eteṣām śreyaḥ āśāse uta aikātmyam mahā-ātmani
vikalpam juhuyāt cittau tām manasi artha-vibhrame manaḥ vaikārike hutvā tam māyāyām juhoti anu
ātma-anubhūtau tām māyām juhuyāt satya-dṛk muniḥ tataḥ nirīhaḥ viramet sva-anubhūti-ātmani sthitaḥ
sva-ātma-vṛttam mayā ittham te su-guptam api varṇitam vyapetam loka-śāstrābhyām bhavān hi bhagavat-paraḥ
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca dharmam pāramahaṁsyam vai muneḥ śrutvā asura-īśvaraḥ pūjayitvā tataḥ prītaḥ āmantrya prayayau gṛham
śrī-yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca gṛhasthaḥ etām padavīm vidhinā yena ca añjasā yāyāt deva-ṛṣe brūhi mādṛśaḥ gṛha-mūḍha-dhīḥ
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca gṛheṣu avasthitaḥ rājan kriyāḥ kurvan yathocitāḥ vāsudeva arpaṇam sākṣāt upāsīta mahā-munīn
śṛṇvan bhagavataḥ abhīkṣṇam avatāra kathā amṛtam śraddadhānaḥ yathā-kālam upaśānta jana āvṛtaḥ sat-saṅgāt śanakaiḥ saṅgam ātma jāyā ātma-ja-ādiṣu vimuñcet mucyamāneṣu svayam svapna-vat utthitaḥ
yāvat-artham upāsīnaḥ dehe gehe ca paṇḍitaḥ viraktaḥ rakta-vat tatra nṛ-loke naratām nyaset
jñātayaḥ pitarau putrāḥ bhrātaraḥ suhṛdaḥ apare yat vadanti yat icchanti ca anumodeta nirmamaḥ
divyam bhaumam ca āntarīkṣam vittam acyuta-nirmitam tat sarvam upayuñjāna etat kuryāt svataḥ budhaḥ
yāvat bhriyeta jaṭharam tāvat svatvam hi dehinām adhikam yaḥ abhimanyeta saḥ stenaḥ daṇḍam arhati
mṛga uṣṭra khara marka ākhu sarīsṛp khaga makṣikāḥ ātmanaḥ putra-vat paśyet taiḥ eṣām antaram kiyat
tri-vargam na ati-kṛcchreṇa bhajeta gṛha-medhī api yathā-deśam yathā-kālam yāvat daiva upapāditam
ā śva agha ante avasāyibhyaḥ kāmān saṁvibhajet yathā api ekām ātmanaḥ dārām nṛṇām svatva-grahaḥ yataḥ
jahyāt yat-arthe svān prāṇān hanyāt vā pitaram gurum tasyām svatvam striyām jahyāt yaḥ tena hi ajitaḥ jitaḥ
kṛmi viṭ bhasma niṣṭha antam kva idam tuccham kalevaram kva tadīya-ratiḥ bhāryā kva ayam ātmā nabhaḥ-chadiḥ
siddhaiḥ yajñā-avaśiṣṭa-arthaiḥ kalpayet vṛttim ātmanaḥ śeṣe svatvam tyajan prājñaḥ padavīm mahatām iyāt
devān ṛṣīn nṛ bhūtāni pitṝn ātmānam anvaham sva-vṛttyā āgata-vittena yajeta puruṣam pṛthak
yarhi ātmanaḥ adhikāra-ādyāḥ sarvāḥ syuḥ yajña-sampadaḥ vaitānikena vidhinā agni-hotra-ādinā yajet
na hi agni mukhataḥ ayam vai bhagavān sarva-yajña-bhuk ijyeta haviṣā rājan yathā vipra-mukhe hutaiḥ
tasmāt brāhmaṇa-deveṣu martya-ādiṣu yathā-arhataḥ taiḥ taiḥ kāmaiḥ yajasva enam kṣetra-jñam brāhmaṇān anu
kuryāt apara-pakṣīyam māsi prauṣṭha-pade dvijaḥ śrāddham pitroḥ yathā-vittam tat-bandhūnām ca vitta-vān
ayane viṣuve kuryāt vyatīpāte dina-kṣaye candra-āditya-uparāge ca dvādaśyām śravaṇeṣu ca tṛtīyāyām śukla-pakṣe navamyām atha kārtike catasṛṣu api aṣṭakāsu hemante śiśire tathā māghe ca sita-saptamyām maghā-rākā-samāgame rākayā ca anumatyā ca māsa-ṛkṣāṇi yutāni api dvādaśyām anurādhā syāt śravaṇaḥ tisraḥ uttarāḥ tisṛṣu ekādaśī vā āsu janma-ṛkṣa śroṇa yoga yuk
te ete śreyasaḥ kālāḥ nṝṇām śreyaḥ vivardhanāḥ kuryāt sarva-ātmanā eteṣu śreyaḥ amogham tat āyuṣaḥ
eṣu snānam japaḥ homaḥ vratam deva dvija-arcanam pitṛ deva nṛ bhūtebhyaḥ yat dattam tat hi anaśvaram
saṁskāra-kālaḥ jāyāyāḥ apatyasya ātmanaḥ tathā preta-saṁsthā mṛta-ahaḥ ca karmaṇi abhyudaye nṛpa
atha deśān pravakṣyāmi dharma-ādi śreya āvahān saḥ vai puṇya-tamaḥ deśaḥ sat-pātram yatra labhyate bimbam bhagavataḥ yatra sarvam etat cara-acaram yatra ha brāhmaṇa-kulam tapaḥ vidyā dayā anvitam
yatra yatra hareḥ arcā saḥ deśaḥ śreyasām padam yatra gaṅgā-ādayaḥ nadyaḥ purāṇeṣu ca viśrutāḥ
sarāṁsi puṣkara-ādīni kṣetrāṇi arha āśritāni uta kurukṣetram gaya-śiraḥ prayāgaḥ pulaha-āśramaḥ naimiṣam phālgunam setuḥ prabhāsaḥ atha kuśa-sthalī vārāṇasī madhu-purī pampā bindu-saraḥ tathā nārāyaṇa-āśramaḥ nandā sītā-rāma āśrama-ādayaḥ sarve kulācalāḥ rājan mahendra malaya-ādayaḥ ete puṇya-tamāḥ deśāḥ hareḥ arca-āśritāḥ ca ye etān deśān niṣeveta śreyaḥ-kāmaḥ hi abhīkṣṇaśaḥ dharmaḥ hi atra īhitaḥ puṁsām sahasra-adhi phala-udayaḥ
pātram tu atra niruktam vai kavibhiḥ pātra-vittamaiḥ hariḥ eva ekaḥ urvī-īśa yat-mayam vai cara-acaram
deva-ṛṣi arhatsu vai satsu tatra brahma-ātma-jādiṣu rājan yat agra-pūjāyām mataḥ pātratayā acyutaḥ
jīva-rāśibhiḥ ākīrṇaḥ aṇḍa-kośa aṅghripaḥ mahān tat-mūlatvāt acyuta-ijyā sarva jīva-ātma tarpaṇam
purāṇi anena sṛṣṭāni nṛ tiryak ṛṣi devatāḥ śete jīvena rūpeṇa pureṣu puruṣaḥ hi asau
teṣu eva bhagavān rājan tāratamyena vartate tasmāt pātram hi puruṣaḥ yāvān ātmā yathā īyate
dṛṣṭvā teṣām mithaḥ nṛṇām avajñāna-ātmatām nṛpa tretā-ādiṣu hareḥ arcā kriyāyai kavibhiḥ kṛtā
tataḥ arcāyām harim kecit saṁśraddhāya saparyayā upāsate upāstā api na artha-dā puruṣa-dviṣām
puruṣeṣu api rāja-indra su-pātram brāhmaṇam viduḥ tapasā vidyayā tuṣṭyā dhatte vedam hareḥ tanum
nanu asya brāhmaṇāḥ rājan kṛṣṇasya jagat-ātmanaḥ punantaḥ pāda-rajasā tri-lokīm daivatam mahat
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca karma-niṣṭhāḥ dvi-jāḥ kecit tapaḥ-niṣṭhāḥ nṛpa apare svādhyāye anye pravacane kecana jñāna-yogayoḥ
jñāna-niṣṭhāya deyāni kavyāni ānantyam icchatā daive ca tat-abhāve syāt itarebhyaḥ yathā-arhataḥ
dvau daive pitṛ-kārye trīn eka ekam ubhayatra vā bhojayet su-samṛddhaḥ api śrāddhe kuryāt na vistaram
deśa kāla ucita śraddhā dravya pātra arhaṇāni ca samyak bhavanti na etāni vistarāt sva-jana-arpaṇāt
deśe kāle ca samprāpte muni-annam hari-daivatam śraddhayā vidhi-vat pātre nyastam kāmadhuk akṣayam
deva ṛṣi pitṛ bhūtebhyaḥ ātmane sva-janāya ca annam saṁvibhajan paśyet sarvam tat puruṣa-ātmakam
na dadyāt āmiṣam śrāddhe na ca adyāt dharma-tattva-vit muni-annaiḥ syāt parā prītiḥ yathā na paśu-hiṁsayā
na etādṛśaḥ paraḥ dharmaḥ nṛṇām sat-dharmam icchatām nyāsaḥ daṇḍasya bhūteṣu manaḥ vāk kāya-jasya yaḥ
eke karma-mayān yajñān jñāninaḥ yajña-vit-tamāḥ ātma-saṁyamane anīhāḥ juhvati jñāna-dīpite
dravya-yajñaiḥ yakṣyamāṇam dṛṣṭvā bhūtāni bibhyati eṣaḥ mā akaruṇaḥ hanyāt a-tat-jñaḥ hi asu-tṛp dhruvam
tasmāt daiva-upapannena muni-annena api dharma-vit santuṣṭaḥ ahaḥ ahaḥ kuryāt nitya-naimittikīḥ kriyāḥ
vidharmaḥ para-dharmaḥ ca ābhāsaḥ upamā chalaḥ adharma-śākhāḥ pañca imāḥ dharma-jñaḥ adharma-vat tyajet
dharma-bādhaḥ vidharmaḥ syāt para-dharmaḥ anya-coditaḥ upadharmaḥ tu pākhaṇḍaḥ dambhaḥ vā śabda-bhit chalaḥ
yaḥ tu icchayā kṛtaḥ pumbhiḥ ābhāsaḥ hi āśramāt pṛthak sva-bhāva vihitaḥ dharmaḥ kasya na iṣṭaḥ praśāntaye
dharma-artham api na īheta yātrā-artham vā adhanaḥ dhanam anīhā anīhamānasya mahā-aheḥ iva vṛtti-dā
santuṣṭasya nirīhasya sva ātma-ārāmasya yat sukham kutaḥ tat kāma-lobhena dhāvataḥ artha-īhayā diśaḥ
sadā santuṣṭa-manasaḥ sarvāḥ śiva-mayāḥ diśaḥ śarkarā kaṇṭaka-ādibhyaḥ yathā upānat-padaḥ śivam
santuṣṭaḥ kena vā rājan na varteta api vāriṇā aupasthya jaihvya kārpaṇyāt gṛha-pālāyate janaḥ
asantuṣṭasya viprasya tejaḥ vidyā tapaḥ yaśaḥ sravanti indriya laulyena jñānam ca eva avakīryate
kāmasya antam hi kṣut-tṛḍbhyām krodhasya etat phala-udayāt janaḥ yāti na lobhasya jitvā bhuktvā diśaḥ bhuvaḥ
paṇḍitāḥ bahavaḥ rājan bahu-jñāḥ saṁśaya-cchidaḥ sadasaḥ patayaḥ api eke asantoṣāt patanti adhaḥ
asaṅkalpāt jayet kāmam krodham kāma-vivarjanāt artha anartha īkṣayā lobham bhayam tattva avamarśanāt
ānvīkṣikyā śoka mohau dambham mahat upāsayā yoga-antarāyān maunena hiṁsām kāma-ādi anīhayā
kṛpayā bhūta-jam duḥkham daivam jahyāt samādhinā ātma-jam yoga-vīryeṇa nidrām sattva-niṣevayā
rajaḥ tamaḥ ca sattvena sattvam ca upaśamena ca etat sarvam gurau bhaktyā puruṣaḥ hi añjasā jayet
yasya sākṣāt bhagavati jñāna-dīpa-prade gurau martya-asat-dhīḥ śrutam tasya sarvam kuñjara-śauca-vat
eṣaḥ vai bhagavān sākṣāt pradhāna puruṣa īśvaraḥ yoga-īśvaraiḥ vimṛgya-aṅghriḥ lokaḥ yam manyate naram
ṣaṭ-varga saṁyama-ekāntāḥ sarvāḥ niyama-codanāḥ tat-antāḥ yadi no yogān āvaheyuḥ śrama-āvahāḥ
yathā vārtā-ādayaḥ hi arthāḥ yogasya artham na bibhrati anarthāya bhaveyuḥ sma pūrtam iṣṭam tathā asataḥ
yaḥ citta-vijaye yattaḥ syāt niḥsaṅgaḥ aparigrahaḥ ekaḥ vivikta-śaraṇaḥ bhikṣuḥ bhaikṣya mita-aśanaḥ
deśe śucau same rājan saṁsthāpya āsanam ātmanaḥ sthiram sukham samam tasmin āsīta ṛju-aṅgaḥ om iti
prāṇa apānau sannirundhyāt pūra-kumbhaka-recakaiḥ yāvat manaḥ tyajet kāmān sva nāsa-agra nirīkṣaṇaḥ yataḥ yataḥ niḥsarati manaḥ kāma-hatam bhramat tataḥ tataḥ upāhṛtya hṛdi rundhyāt śanaiḥ budhaḥ
evam abhyasyataḥ cittam kālena alpīyasā yateḥ aniśam tasya nirvāṇam yāti anindhana vahnivat
kāma-ādibhiḥ anāviddham praśānta akhila-vṛtti yat cittam brahma-sukha-spṛṣṭam na eva uttiṣṭheta karhicit
yaḥ pravrajya gṛhāt pūrvam tri-varga āvapanāt punaḥ yadi seveta tān bhikṣuḥ saḥ vai vānta-āśī apatrapaḥ
yaiḥ sva-dehaḥ smṛtaḥ anātmā martyaḥ viṭ kṛmi bhasma-vat te enam ātmasāt kṛtvā ślāghayanti hi asat-tamāḥ
gṛhasthasya kriyā-tyāgaḥ vrata-tyāgaḥ vaṭoḥ api tapasvinaḥ grāma-sevā bhikṣoḥ indriya-lolatā āśrama apasadāḥ hi ete khalu āśrama-viḍambanāḥ deva-māyā-vimūḍhān tān upekṣeta anukampayā
ātmānam cet vijānīyāt param jñāna dhuta-āśayaḥ kim icchan kasya vā hetoḥ deham puṣṇāti lampaṭaḥ
āhuḥ śarīram ratham indriyāṇi hayān abhīṣūn manaḥ indriya īśam vartmāni mātrāḥ dhiṣaṇām ca sūtam sattvam bṛhat bandhuram īśa sṛṣṭam
akṣam daśa prāṇam adharma dharmau cakre abhimānam rathinam ca jīvam dhanuḥ hi tasya praṇavam paṭhanti śaram tu jīvam param eva lakṣyam
rāgaḥ dveṣaḥ ca lobhaḥ ca śoka mohau bhayam madaḥ mānaḥ avamānaḥ asūyā ca māyā hiṁsā ca matsaraḥ rajaḥ pramādaḥ kṣut nidrā śatravaḥ tu evam ādayaḥ rajaḥ-tamaḥ prakṛtayaḥ sattva prakṛtayaḥ kvacit
yāvat nṛ-kāya ratham ātma-vaśa upakalpam dhatte gariṣṭha-caraṇa arcanayā niśātam jñāna-asim acyuta-balaḥ dadhat asta-śatruḥ sva-ānanda-tuṣṭaḥ upaśāntaḥ idam vijahyāt
nocet pramattam asat indriya vāji sūtāḥ nītvā utpatham viṣaya dasyuṣu nikṣipanti te dasyavaḥ sa haya-sūtam amum tamaḥ andhe saṁsāra-kūpe uru mṛtyu-bhaye kṣipanti
pravṛttam ca nivṛttam ca dvi-vidham karma vaidikam āvartate pravṛttena nivṛttena aśnute amṛtam
hiṁsram dravya-mayam kāmyam agni-hotra-ādi aśānti-dam darśaḥ ca pūrṇamāsaḥ ca cāturmāsyam paśuḥ sutaḥ etat iṣṭam pravṛtta-ākhyam hutam prahutam eva ca pūrtam sura-ālaya ārāma kūpa ājīvya-ādi lakṣaṇam
dravya-sūkṣma-vipākaḥ ca dhūmaḥ rātriḥ apakṣayaḥ ayanam dakṣiṇam somaḥ darśaḥ oṣadhi vīrudhaḥ annam retaḥ iti kṣma-īśa pitṛ-yānam punaḥ-bhavaḥ eka-ekaśyena anupūrvam bhūtvā bhūtvā iha jāyate
niṣeka-ādi śmaśāna-antaiḥ saṁskāraiḥ saṁskṛtaḥ dvijaḥ indriyeṣu kriyā-yajñān jñāna-dīpeṣu juhvati
indriyāṇi manasi ūrmau vāci vaikārikam manaḥ vācam varṇa-samāmnāye tam oṁkāre svare nyaset oṁkāram bindau nāde tam tam tu prāṇe mahati amum
agniḥ sūryaḥ divā prāhṇaḥ śuklaḥ rāka uttaram sva-rāṭ viśvaḥ atha taijasaḥ prājñaḥ turyaḥ ātmā samanvayāt
deva-yānam idam prāhuḥ bhūtvā bhūtvā anupūrvaśaḥ ātma-yājī upaśānta-ātmā hi ātma-sthaḥ na nivartate
yaḥ ete pitṛ-devānām ayane veda-nirmite śāstreṇa cakṣuṣā veda jana-sthaḥ api na muhyati
ādau ante janānām sat bahiḥ antaḥ para avaram jñānam jñeyam vacaḥ vācyam tamaḥ jyotiḥ tu ayam svayam
ābādhitaḥ api hi ābhāsaḥ yathā vastutayā smṛtaḥ durghaṭatvāt aindriyakam tadvat artha vikalpitam
kṣiti-ādīnām iha arthānām chāyā na katamā api hi na saṅghātaḥ vikāraḥ api na pṛthak na anvitaḥ mṛṣā
dhātavaḥ avayavitvāt ca tat-mātra avayavaiḥ vinā na syuḥ hi asati avayavini asan avayavaḥ antataḥ
syāt sādṛśya bhramaḥ tāvat vikalpe sati vastunaḥ jāgrat svāpau yathā svapne tathā vidhi-niṣedhatā
bhāva-advaitam kriyā-advaitam dravya-advaitam tathā ātmanaḥ vartayan sva anubhūtyā iha trīn svapnān dhunute muniḥ
kārya kāraṇa vastu aikya darśanam paṭa tantu vat avastutvāt vikalpasya bhāva-advaitam tat ucyate
yat brahmaṇi pare sākṣāt sarva karma samarpaṇam manaḥ vāk tanubhiḥ pārtha kriyā-advaitam tat ucyate
ātma jāyā suta-ādīnām anyeṣām sarva-dehinām yat sva-artha-kāmayoḥ aikyam dravya-advaitam tat ucyate
yat yasya vā aniṣiddham syāt yena yatra yataḥ nṛpa saḥ tena īheta kāryāṇi naraḥ na anyaiḥ anāpadi
etaiḥ anyaiḥ ca veda-uktaiḥ vartamānaḥ sva-karmabhiḥ gṛhe api asya gatim yāyāt rājan tat-bhakti-bhāk naraḥ
yathā hi yūyam nṛpa-deva dustyajāt āpat gaṇāt uttarata ātmanaḥ prabhoḥ yat-pāda-paṅkeruha sevayā bhavān ahāraṣīt nirjita dik-gajaḥ kratūn
aham purā abhavam kaścit gandharvaḥ upabarhaṇaḥ nāmnā atīte mahā-kalpe gandharvāṇām su-sammataḥ
rūpa peśala mādhurya saugandhya priya-darśanaḥ strīṇām priya-tamaḥ nityam mattaḥ sva-pura lampaṭaḥ
ekadā deva-satre tu gandharva apsarasām gaṇāḥ upahūtāḥ viśva-sṛgbhiḥ hari-gātha-upagāyane
aham ca gāyan tat-vidvān strībhiḥ parivṛtaḥ gataḥ jñātvā viśva-sṛjaḥ tat me helanam śepuḥ ojasā yāhi tvam śūdratām āśu naṣṭa śrīḥ kṛta-helanaḥ
tāvat dāsyām aham jajñe tatrāpi brahma-vādinām śuśrūṣayā anuṣaṅgeṇa prāptaḥ aham brahma-putratām
dharmaḥ te gṛha-medhīyaḥ varṇitaḥ pāpa-nāśanaḥ gṛhasthaḥ yena padavīm añjasā nyāsinām iyāt
yūyam nṛ-loke bata bhūri-bhāgāḥ lokam punānāḥ munayaḥ abhiyanti yeṣām gṛhān āvasati iti sākṣāt gūḍham param brahma manuṣya-liṅgam
saḥ vā ayam brahma mahat-vimṛgya kaivalya-nirvāṇa-sukha anubhūtiḥ priyaḥ suhṛt vaḥ khalu mātuleyaḥ ātmā arhaṇīyaḥ vidhi-kṛt guruḥ ca
na yasya sākṣāt bhava padma-ja-ādibhiḥ rūpam dhiyā vastutayā upavarṇitam maunena bhaktyā upaśamena pūjitaḥ prasīdatām eṣaḥ saḥ sātvatām patiḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti deva-ṛṣiṇā proktam niśamya bharata-ṛṣabhaḥ pūjayām āsa su-prītaḥ kṛṣṇam ca prema-vihvalaḥ
kṛṣṇa pārthau upāmantrya pūjitaḥ prayayau muniḥ śrutvā kṛṣṇam param brahma pārthaḥ parama-vismitaḥ
iti dākṣāyaṇīnām te pṛthak vaṁśāḥ prakīrtitāḥ deva asura manuṣya ādyāḥ lokāḥ yatra cara-acarāḥ
śrī-rājā uvāca svāyambhuvasya iha guro vaṁśaḥ ayam vistarāt śrutaḥ yatra viśva-sṛjām sargaḥ manūn anyān vadasva naḥ
manvantare hareḥ janma karmāṇi ca mahīyasaḥ gṛṇanti kavayaḥ brahman tāni naḥ vada śṛṇvatām
yat yasmin antare brahman bhagavān viśva-bhāvanaḥ kṛtavān kurute kartā hi atīte anāgate adya vā
śrī-ṛṣiḥ uvāca manavaḥ asmin vyatītāḥ ṣaṭ kalpe svāyambhuva ādayaḥ ādyaḥ te kathitaḥ yatra deva-ādīnām ca sambhavaḥ
ākūtyām devahūtyām ca duhitroḥ tasya vai manoḥ dharma jñāna upadeśa-artham bhagavān putratām gataḥ
kṛtam purā bhagavataḥ kapilasya anuvarṇitam ākhyāsye bhagavān yajñaḥ yat cakāra kuru-udvaha
viraktaḥ kāma-bhogeṣu śatarūpā-patiḥ prabhuḥ visṛjya rājyam tapase sa-bhāryaḥ vanam āviśat
sunandāyām varṣa-śatam pada-ekena bhuvam spṛśan tapyamānaḥ tapaḥ ghoram idam anvāha bhārata
śrī-manuḥ uvāca yena cetayate viśvam viśvam cetayate na yam yaḥ jāgarti śayāne asmin na ayam tam veda veda saḥ
ātma āvāsyam idam viśvam yat kiñcit jagatyām jagat tena tyaktena bhuñjīthāḥ mā gṛdhaḥ kasya svit dhanam
yam paśyati na paśyantam cakṣuḥ yasya na riṣyati tam bhūta-nilayam devam suparṇam upadhāvata
na yasya ādi antau madhyam ca svaḥ paraḥ na antaram bahiḥ viśvasya amūni yat yasmāt viśvam ca tat ṛtam mahat
saḥ viśva-kāyaḥ puru-hūtaḥ īśaḥ satyaḥ svayam jyotiḥ ajaḥ purāṇaḥ dhatte asya janma-ādi ajayā ātma-śaktyā tām vidyayā udasya nirīhaḥ āste
atha agre ṛṣayaḥ karmāṇi īhante akarma hetave īhamānaḥ hi puruṣaḥ prāyaḥ anīhām prapadyate
īhate bhagavān īśaḥ na hi tatra visajjate ātma-lābhena pūrṇa-arthaḥ na avasīdanti ye anu tam
tam īhamānam nirahaṅkṛtam budham nirāśiṣam pūrṇam ananya coditam nṝn śikṣayantam nija-vartma saṁsthitam prabhum prapadye akhila-dharma-bhāvanam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti mantra-upaniṣadam vyāharantam samāhitam dṛṣṭvā asurāḥ yātudhānāḥ jagdhum abhyadravan kṣudhā
tān tathā avasitān vīkṣya yajñaḥ sarva-gataḥ hariḥ yāmaiḥ parivṛtaḥ devaiḥ hatvā aśāsat tri-viṣṭapam
svārociṣaḥ dvitīyaḥ tu manuḥ agneḥ sutaḥ abhavat dyumat suṣeṇa rociṣmat pramukhāḥ tasya ca ātma-jāḥ
tatra indraḥ rocanaḥ tu āsīt devāḥ ca tuṣita-ādayaḥ ūrja stambha ādayaḥ sapta ṛṣayaḥ brahma-vādinaḥ
ṛṣeḥ tu vedaśirasaḥ tuṣitā nāma patnī abhūt tasyām jajñe tataḥ devaḥ vibhuḥ iti abhiviśrutaḥ
aṣṭāśīti sahasrāṇi munayaḥ ye dhṛta-vratāḥ anvaśikṣan vratam tasya kaumāra brahmacāriṇaḥ
tṛtīyaḥ uttamaḥ nāma priyavrata sutaḥ manuḥ pavanaḥ sṛñjayaḥ yajñahotra-ādyāḥ tat-sutāḥ nṛpa
vasiṣṭha-tanayāḥ sapta ṛṣayaḥ pramada-ādayaḥ satyāḥ vedaśrutāḥ bhadrāḥ devāḥ indraḥ tu satyajit
dharmasya sūnṛtāyām tu bhagavān puruṣa-uttamaḥ satyasenaḥ iti khyātaḥ jātaḥ satyavrataiḥ saha
saḥ anṛta-vrata duḥśīlān asataḥ yakṣa-rākṣasān bhūta-druhaḥ bhūta-gaṇān ca avadhīt satyajit-sakhaḥ
caturtha uttama-bhrātā manuḥ nāmnā ca tāmasaḥ pṛthuḥ khyātiḥ naraḥ ketuḥ iti ādyāḥ daśa tat-sutāḥ
satyakāḥ harayaḥ vīrāḥ devāḥ triśikhaḥ īśvaraḥ jyotirdhāma-ādayaḥ sapta ṛṣayaḥ tāmase antare
devāḥ vaidhṛtayaḥ nāma vidhṛteḥ tanayāḥ nṛpa naṣṭāḥ kālena yaiḥ vedāḥ vidhṛtāḥ svena tejasā
tatrāpi jajñe bhagavān hariṇyām harimedhasaḥ hariḥ iti āhṛtaḥ yena gaja-indraḥ mocitaḥ grahāt
śrī-rājā uvāca bādarāyaṇe etat te śrotum icchāmahe vayam hariḥ yathā gaja-patim grāha-grastam amūmucat
tat-kathāsu mahat puṇyam dhanyam svastyayanam śubham yatra yatra uttamaślokaḥ bhagavān gīyate hariḥ
śrī-sūtaḥ uvāca parīkṣitā evam saḥ tu bādarāyaṇiḥ prāya-upaviṣṭena kathāsu coditaḥ uvāca viprāḥ pratinandya pārthivam mudā munīnām sadasi sma śṛṇvatām
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca āsīt girivaraḥ rājan tri-kūṭaḥ iti viśrutaḥ kṣīra-udena āvṛtaḥ śrīmān yojana ayutam ucchritaḥ
tāvatā vistṛtaḥ paryak tribhiḥ śṛṅgaiḥ payaḥ-nidhim diśaḥ kham rocayan āste raupya ayasa hiraṇmayaiḥ anyaiḥ ca kakubhaḥ sarvāḥ ratna dhātu vicitritaiḥ nānā druma-latā gulmaiḥ nirghoṣaiḥ nirjhara ambhasām
saḥ ca avanijyamāna-aṅghriḥ samantāt payaḥ-ūrmibhiḥ karoti śyāmalām bhūmim harit marakata aśmabhiḥ
siddha cāraṇa gandharvaiḥ vidyādhara mahā-uragaiḥ kinnaraiḥ apsarobhiḥ ca krīḍadbhiḥ juṣṭa kandaraḥ
yatra saṅgīta sannādaiḥ nadat guham amarṣayā abhigarjanti harayaḥ ślāghinaḥ para-śaṅkayā
nānā araṇya-paśu vrāta saṅkula droṇi alaṅkṛtaḥ citra druma sura-udyāna kalakaṇṭha vihaṅgamaḥ
sarit sarobhiḥ acchodaiḥ pulinaiḥ maṇi vālukaiḥ deva-strī majjana āmoda saurabha ambu anilaiḥ yutaḥ
tasya droṇyām bhagavataḥ varuṇasya mahā-ātmanaḥ udyānam ṛtumat nāma ākrīḍam sura-yoṣitām sarvataḥ alaṅkṛtam divyaiḥ nitya puṣpa phala drumaiḥ mandāraiḥ pārijātaiḥ ca pāṭala aśoka campakaiḥ cūtaiḥ piyālaiḥ panasaiḥ āmraiḥ āmrātakaiḥ api kramukaiḥ nārikelaiḥ ca kharjūraiḥ bījapūrakaiḥ madhukaiḥ śāla-tālaiḥ ca tamālaiḥ asana arjunaiḥ ariṣṭa uḍumbara plakṣaiḥ vaṭaiḥ kiṁśuka candanaiḥ picumardaiḥ kovidāraiḥ saralaiḥ sura-dārubhiḥ drākṣā ikṣuḥ rambhā jambubhiḥ badarī akṣa abhaya āmalaiḥ
bilvaiḥ kapitthaiḥ jambīraiḥ vṛtaḥ bhallātaka-ādibhiḥ tasmin saraḥ su-vipulam lasat kāñcana paṅka-jam kumuda utpala kahlāra śatapatra śriyā ūrjitam matta ṣaṭ-pada nirghuṣṭam śakuntaiḥ ca kala-svanaiḥ haṁsa kāraṇḍava ākīrṇam cakrāhvaiḥ sārasaiḥ api jalakukkuṭa koyaṣṭi dātyūha kula kūjitam matsya kacchapa sañcāra calat padma rajaḥ payaḥ kadamba vetasa nala nīpa vañjulakaiḥ vṛtam kundaiḥ kurubaka aśokaiḥ śirīṣaiḥ kūṭaja iṅgudaiḥ kubjakaiḥ svarṇa-yūthībhiḥ nāga punnāga jātibhiḥ mallikā śatapatraiḥ ca mādhavī jālakādibhiḥ śobhitam tīrajaiḥ ca anyaiḥ nitya-ṛtubhiḥ alam drumaiḥ
tatra ekadā tat-giri kānana-āśrayaḥ kareṇubhiḥ vāraṇa-yūtha-paḥ caran sa-kaṇṭakam kīcaka-veṇu-vetra-vat viśāla-gulmam prarujan vanaḥ-patīn
yat-gandha-mātrāt harayaḥ gaja-indrāḥ vyāghra-ādayaḥ vyāla-mṛgāḥ sakhaḍgāḥ mahā-uragāḥ ca api bhayāt dravanti sa gaura-kṛṣṇāḥ sarabhāḥ camaryaḥ
vṛkāḥ varāhāḥ mahiṣa ṛkṣa śalyāḥ gopuccha śālāvṛka markaṭāḥ ca anyatra kṣudrāḥ hariṇāḥ śaśa-ādayaḥ caranti abhītāḥ yat-anugraheṇa
saḥ gharma-taptaḥ karibhiḥ kareṇubhiḥ vṛtaḥ mada-cyut karabhaiḥ anudrutaḥ girim garimṇā paritaḥ prakampayan niṣevyamāṇaḥ alikulaiḥ mada-aśanaiḥ saraḥ anilam paṅkaja-reṇu-rūṣitam jighran vidūrāt mada-vihvala īkṣaṇaḥ vṛtaḥ sva-yūthena tṛṣārditena tat sarovara-abhyāsam atha agamat drutam
vigāhya tasmin amṛta-ambu nirmalam hema aravinda-utpala reṇu rūṣitam papau nikāmam nija puṣkara-uddhṛtam ātmānam adbhiḥ snapayan gata-klamaḥ
saḥ puṣkareṇa uddhṛta śīkara-ambubhiḥ nipāyayan saṁsnapayan yathā gṛhī ghṛṇī kareṇuḥ karabhān ca durmadaḥ na ācaṣṭa kṛcchram kṛpaṇaḥ aja-māyayā
tam tatra kaścit nṛpa daiva-coditaḥ grāhaḥ balīyān caraṇe ruṣā agrahīt yadṛcchayā evam vyasanam gataḥ gajaḥ yathā-balam saḥ ati-balaḥ vicakrame
tathā āturam yūtha-patim kareṇavaḥ vikṛṣyamāṇam tarasā balīyasā vicukruśuḥ dīna-dhiyaḥ apare gajāḥ pārṣṇi-grahāḥ tārayitum na ca aśakan
niyudhyatoḥ evam ibha-indra nakrayoḥ vikarṣatoḥ antarataḥ bahiḥ mithaḥ samāḥ sahasram vyagaman mahī-pate sa-prāṇayoḥ citram amaṁsata amarāḥ
tataḥ gaja-indrasya manaḥ bala ojasām kālena dīrgheṇa mahān abhūt vyayaḥ vikṛṣyamāṇasya jale avasīdataḥ viparyayaḥ abhūt sakalam jala-okasaḥ
ittham gaja-indraḥ saḥ yadā āpa saṅkaṭam prāṇasya dehī vivaśaḥ yadṛcchayā apārayan ātma-vimokṣaṇe ciram dadhyau imām buddhim atha abhyapadyata
na mām ime jñātayaḥ āturam gajāḥ kutaḥ kariṇyaḥ prabhavanti mocitum grāheṇa pāśena vidhātuḥ āvṛtaḥ api aham ca tam yāmi param parāyaṇam
yaḥ kaścana īśaḥ balinaḥ antaka-uragāt pracaṇḍa-vegāt abhidhāvataḥ bhṛśam bhītam prapannam paripāti yat-bhayāt mṛtyuḥ pradhāvati araṇam tam īmahi
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca evam vyavasitaḥ buddhyā samādhāya manaḥ hṛdi jajāpa paramam jāpyam prāk-janmani anuśikṣitam
śrī-gajendraḥ uvāca om namaḥ bhagavate tasmai yataḥ etat cit-ātmakam puruṣāya ādi-bījāya para-īśāya abhidhīmahi
yasmin idam yataḥ ca idam yena idam yaḥ idam svayam yaḥ asmāt parasmāt ca paraḥ tam prapadye svayambhuvam
yaḥ sva-ātmani idam nija-māyayā arpitam kvacit vibhātam kva ca tat tirohitam aviddha-dṛk sākṣī ubhayam tat īkṣate saḥ ātma-mūlaḥ avatu mām parāt-paraḥ
kālena pañcatvam iteṣu kṛtsnaśaḥ lokeṣu pāleṣu ca sarva-hetuṣu tamaḥ tadā āsīt gahanam gabhīram yaḥ tasya pāre abhivirājate vibhuḥ
na yasya devāḥ ṛṣayaḥ padam viduḥ jantuḥ punaḥ kaḥ arhati gantum īritum yathā naṭasya ākṛtibhiḥ viceṣṭataḥ duratyaya anukramaṇaḥ saḥ mā avatu
didṛkṣavaḥ yasya padam su-maṅgalam vimukta-saṅgāḥ munayaḥ su-sādhavaḥ caranti aloka-vratam avraṇam vane bhūta-ātma-bhūtāḥ suhṛdaḥ saḥ me gatiḥ
na vidyate yasya ca janma karma vā na nāma-rūpe guṇa doṣaḥ eva vā tathāpi loka apyaya sambhavāya yaḥ sva-māyayā tāni anukālam ṛcchati tasmai namaḥ para īśāya brahmaṇe ananta-śaktaye arūpāya uru-rūpāya namaḥ āścarya-karmaṇe
namaḥ ātma-pradīpāya sākṣiṇe parama-ātmane namaḥ girām vidūrāya manasaḥ cetasām api
sattvena prati-labhyāya naiṣkarmyeṇa vipaścitā namaḥ kaivalya-nāthāya nirvāṇa sukha saṁvide
namaḥ śāntāya ghorāya mūḍhāya guṇa-dharmiṇe nirviśeṣāya sāmyāya namaḥ jñāna-ghanāya ca
kṣetra-jñāya namaḥ tubhyam sarva adhyakṣāya sākṣiṇe puruṣāya ātma-mūlāya mūla-prakṛtaye namaḥ
sarva-indriya-guṇa-draṣṭre sarva-pratyaya-hetave asatā chāyayā uktāya sat ābhāsāya te namaḥ
namaḥ namaḥ te akhila-kāraṇāya niṣkāraṇāya adbhuta-kāraṇāya sarva āgama-āmnāya mahā-arṇavāya namaḥ apavargāya para-ayaṇāya
guṇa araṇi channa cit uṣmapāya tat-kṣobha visphūrjita mānasāya naiṣkarmya-bhāvena vivarjita āgama svayam prakāśāya namaḥ karomi
mādṛk prapanna paśu pāśa vimokṣaṇāya muktāya bhūri-karuṇāya namaḥ alayāya sva-aṁśena sarva tanu-bhṛt manasi pratīta pratyak-dṛśe bhagavate bṛhate namaḥ te
ātma ātma-ja āpta gṛha vitta janeṣu saktaiḥ duṣprāpaṇāya guṇa-saṅga vivarjitāya mukta-ātmabhiḥ sva-hṛdaye paribhāvitāya jñāna-ātmane bhagavate namaḥ īśvarāya
yam dharma-kāma-artha-vimukti-kāmāḥ bhajantaḥ iṣṭām gatim āpnuvanti kim ca āśiṣaḥ rāti api deham avyayam karotu me adabhra-dayaḥ vimokṣaṇam
ekāntinaḥ yasya na kañcana artham vāñchanti ye vai bhagavat-prapannāḥ ati-adbhutam tat-caritam su-maṅgalam gāyantaḥ ānanda samudra magnāḥ tam akṣaram brahma param para-īśam avyaktam ādhyātmika yoga gamyam ati-indriyam sūkṣmam iva ati-dūram anantam ādyam paripūrṇam īḍe
yasya brahma-ādayaḥ devāḥ vedāḥ lokāḥ cara-acarāḥ nāma-rūpa vibhedena phalgvyā ca kalayā kṛtāḥ yathā arciṣaḥ agneḥ savituḥ gabhastayaḥ niryānti saṁyānti asakṛt sva-rociṣaḥ tathā yataḥ ayam guṇa-sampravāhaḥ buddhiḥ manaḥ khāni śarīra sargāḥ saḥ vai na deva asura martya tiryak na strī na ṣaṇḍhaḥ na pumān na jantuḥ na ayam guṇaḥ karma na sat na ca asat niṣedha śeṣaḥ jayatāt aśeṣaḥ
jijīviṣe na aham iha amuyā kim antaḥ bahiḥ ca āvṛtayā ibha-yonyā icchāmi kālena na yasya viplavaḥ tasya ātma-loka-āvaraṇasya mokṣam
saḥ aham viśva-sṛjam viśvam aviśvam viśva-vedasam viśva-ātmānam ajam brahma praṇataḥ asmi param padam
yoga-randhita-karmāṇaḥ hṛdi yoga-vibhāvite yoginaḥ yam prapaśyanti yoga-īśam tam nataḥ asmi aham
namaḥ namaḥ tubhyam asahya vega śakti-trayāya akhila dhī guṇāya prapanna-pālāya duranta-śaktaye kat-indriyāṇām anavāpya vartmane
na ayam veda svam ātmānam yat-śaktyā aham dhiyā hatam tam duratyaya māhātmyam bhagavantam itaḥ asmi aham
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam gajendram upavarṇita nirviśeṣam brahmā-ādayaḥ vividha liṅga-bhidā abhimānāḥ na ete yadā upasasṛpuḥ nikhila-ātmakatvāt tatra akhila amara-mayaḥ hariḥ āvirāsīt
tam tadvat ārtam upalabhya jagat-nivāsaḥ stotram niśamya divijaiḥ saha saṁstuvadbhiḥ chandomayena garuḍena samuhyamānaḥ cakra āyudhaḥ abhyagamat āśu yataḥ gajendraḥ
saḥ antaḥ-sarasi uru-balena gṛhītaḥ ārtaḥ dṛṣṭvā garutmati harim khe upātta-cakram utkṣipya sa-ambuja-karam giramāha kṛcchrāt nārāyaṇa akhila-guro bhagavan namaḥ te
tam vīkṣya pīḍitam ajaḥ sahasā avatīrya sa-grāham āśu sarasaḥ kṛpayā ujjahāra grāhāt vipāṭita mukhāt ariṇā gajendram sampaśyatām hariḥ amūm ucat ucchriyāṇām
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tadā deva-ṛṣi-gandharvāḥ brahma-īśāna-purogamāḥ mumucuḥ kusuma-āsāram śaṁsantaḥ karma tat hareḥ
neduḥ dundubhayaḥ divyāḥ gandharvāḥ nanṛtuḥ jaguḥ ṛṣayaḥ cāraṇāḥ siddhāḥ tuṣṭuvuḥ puruṣa-uttamam
yaḥ asau grāhaḥ saḥ vai sadyaḥ parama āścarya rūpa-dhṛk muktaḥ devala-śāpena hūhūḥ gandharva-sattamaḥ praṇamya śirasā adhīśam uttama-ślokam avyayam agāyata yaśaḥ-dhāma kīrtanya-guṇa-sat-katham
saḥ anukampitaḥ īśena parikramya praṇamya tam lokasya paśyataḥ lokam svam agāt mukta kilbiṣaḥ
gajendraḥ bhagavat-sparśāt vimuktaḥ ajñāna-bandhanāt prāptaḥ bhagavataḥ rūpam pīta-vāsāḥ catuḥ-bhujaḥ
saḥ vai pūrvam abhūt rājā pāṇḍyaḥ draviḍa-sat-tamaḥ indradyumnaḥ iti khyātaḥ viṣṇu-vrata-parāyaṇaḥ
saḥ ekadā ārādhana-kāle ātmavān gṛhīta mauna-vrataḥ īśvaram harim jaṭā-dharaḥ tāpasaḥ āplutaḥ acyutam samarcayām āsa kulācala-āśramaḥ
yadṛcchayā tatra mahā-yaśāḥ muniḥ samāgamat śiṣya-gaṇaiḥ pariśritaḥ tam vīkṣya tūṣṇīm akṛta-arhaṇa-ādikam rahasi upāsīnam ṛṣiḥ cukopa ha
tasmai imam śāpam adāt asādhuḥ ayam durātmā akṛta buddhiḥ adya vipra avamantā viśatām tamisram yathā gajaḥ stabdha-matiḥ saḥ eva
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam śaptvā gataḥ agastyaḥ bhagavān nṛpa sa-anugaḥ indradyumnaḥ api rājarṣiḥ diṣṭam tat upadhārayan āpannaḥ kauñjarīm yonim ātma-smṛti vināśinīm hari arcana-anubhāvena yat gajatve api anusmṛtiḥ
evam vimokṣya gaja-yūtha-pam abja-nābhaḥ tena api pārṣada-gatim gamitena yuktaḥ gandharva siddha vibudhaiḥ upagīyamāna karma adbhutam sva-bhavanam garuḍa-āsanaḥ agāt
etat mahā-rāja tava īritaḥ mayā kṛṣṇa-anubhāvaḥ gaja-rāja-mokṣaṇam svargyam yaśasyam kali-kalmaṣa-apaham duḥsvapna-nāśam kuru-varya śṛṇvatām
yathā anukīrtayanti etat śreyaḥ-kāmāḥ dvi-jātayaḥ śucayaḥ prātaḥ utthāya duḥsvapna-ādi upaśāntaye
idam āha hariḥ prītaḥ gajendram kuru-sat-tama śṛṇvatām sarva-bhūtānām sarva-bhūta-mayaḥ vibhuḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca ye mām tvām ca saraḥ ca idam giri kandara kānanam vetra kīcaka veṇūnām gulmāni sura-pādapān śṛṅgāṇi imāni dhiṣṇyāni brahmaṇaḥ me śivasya ca kṣīra-udam me priyam dhāma śveta-dvīpam ca bhāsvaram śrīvatsam kaustubham mālām gadām kaumodakīm mama sudarśanam pāñcajanyam suparṇam pataga-īśvaram śeṣam ca mat-kalām sūkṣmām śriyam devīm mat-āśrayām brahmāṇam nāradam ṛṣim bhavam prahrādam eva ca matsya kūrma varāha ādyaiḥ avatāraiḥ kṛtāni me karmāṇi ananta puṇyāni sūryam somam hutāśanam praṇavam satyam avyaktam go-viprān dharmam avyayam dākṣāyaṇīḥ dharma-patnīḥ soma kaśyapayoḥ api gaṅgām sarasvatīm nandām kālindīm sita-vāraṇam dhruvam brahma-ṛṣīn sapta puṇya-ślokān ca mānavān utthāya apara-rātra-ante prayatāḥ su-samāhitāḥ smaranti mama rūpāṇi mucyante te aṁhasaḥ akhilāt
ye mām stuvanti anena aṅga pratibudhya niśa-atyaye teṣām prāṇa-atyaye ca aham dadāmi vipulām gatim
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti ādiśya hṛṣīkeśaḥ prādhmāya jala-ja-uttamam harṣayan vibudha-anīkam āruroha khaga-adhipam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca rājan uditam etat te hareḥ karma agha-nāśanam gajendra-mokṣaṇam puṇyam raivatam tu antaram śṛṇu
pañcamaḥ raivataḥ nāma manuḥ tāmasa-sodaraḥ bali vindhya ādayaḥ tasya sutāḥ ha arjuna pūrvakāḥ
vibhuḥ indraḥ sura-gaṇāḥ rājan bhūtaraya-ādayaḥ hiraṇyaromā vedaśirā ūrdhvabāhu ādayaḥ dvijāḥ
patnī vikuṇṭhā śubhrasya vaikuṇṭhaiḥ sura-sat-tamaiḥ tayoḥ sva-kalayā jajñe vaikuṇṭhaḥ bhagavān svayam
vaikuṇṭhaḥ kalpitaḥ yena lokaḥ loka-namaskṛtaḥ ramayā prārthyamānena devyā tat priya-kāmyayā
tasya anubhāvaḥ kathitaḥ guṇāḥ ca parama-udayāḥ bhaumān reṇūn saḥ vimame yaḥ viṣṇoḥ varṇayet guṇān
ṣaṣṭhaḥ ca cakṣuṣaḥ putraḥ cākṣuṣaḥ nāma vai manuḥ pūru pūruṣa sudyumna pramukhāḥ cākṣuṣa-ātma-jāḥ
indraḥ mantradrumaḥ tatra devāḥ āpya-ādayaḥ gaṇāḥ munayaḥ tatra vai rājan haviṣmat vīraka-ādayaḥ
tatra api devasambhūtyām vairājasya abhavat sutaḥ ajitaḥ nāma bhagavān aṁśena jagataḥ patiḥ
payodhim yena nirmathya surāṇām sādhitā sudhā bhramamāṇaḥ ambhasi dhṛtaḥ kūrma-rūpeṇa mandaraḥ
śrī-rājā uvāca yathā bhagavatā brahman mathitaḥ kṣīra-sāgaraḥ yat-artham vā yataḥ ca adrim dadhāra ambucara-ātmanā yathā amṛtam suraiḥ prāptam kim ca anyat abhavat tataḥ etat bhagavataḥ karma vadasva parama-adbhutam
tvayā saṅkathyamānena mahimnā sātvatām pateḥ na ati-tṛpyati me cittam suciram tāpa tāpitam
śrī-sūtaḥ uvāca sampṛṣṭaḥ bhagavān evam dvaipāyana-sutaḥ dvi-jāḥ abhinandya hareḥ vīryam abhyācaṣṭum pracakrame
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca yadā yuddhe asuraiḥ devāḥ badhyamānāḥ śita-āyudhaiḥ gata-āsavaḥ nipatitāḥ na uttiṣṭheran sma bhūriśaḥ yadā durvāsaḥ śāpena sa-indrāḥ lokāḥ trayaḥ nṛpa niḥśrīkāḥ ca abhavan tatra neśuḥ ijya-ādayaḥ kriyāḥ
niśāmya etat sura-gaṇāḥ mahā-indra varuṇa-ādayaḥ na adhyagacchan svayam mantraiḥ mantrayantaḥ viniścitam tataḥ brahma-sabhām jagmuḥ meroḥ mūrdhani sarvaśaḥ sarvam vijñāpayām cakruḥ praṇatāḥ parameṣṭhine
saḥ vilokya indra-vāyu-ādīn niḥsattvān vigata-prabhān lokān amaṅgala-prāyān asurān ayathāḥ vibhuḥ samāhitena manasā saṁsmaran puruṣam param uvāca utphulla-vadanaḥ devān saḥ bhagavān paraḥ
aham bhavaḥ yūyam atho asura-ādayaḥ manuṣya tiryak druma gharma-jātayaḥ yasya avatāra aṁśa kalā visarjitāḥ vrajāma sarve śaraṇam tam avyayam
na yasya vadhyaḥ na ca rakṣaṇīyaḥ na upekṣaṇīya ādaraṇīya pakṣaḥ tathāpi sarga sthiti saṁyama artham dhatte rajaḥ sattva tamāṁsi kāle
ayam ca tasya sthiti-pālana-kṣaṇaḥ sattvam juṣāṇasya bhavāya dehinām tasmāt vrajāmaḥ śaraṇam jagat-gurum svānām saḥ naḥ dhāsyati śam sura-priyaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti ābhāṣya surān vedhāḥ saha devaiḥ arim-dama ajitasya padam sākṣāt jagāma tamasaḥ param
tatra adṛṣṭa-svarūpāya śruta-pūrvāya vai prabhuḥ stutim abrūta daivībhiḥ gīrbhiḥ tu avahita-indriyaḥ
śrī-brahmā uvāca avikriyam satyam anantam ādyam guhā-śayam niṣkalam apratarkyam manaḥ-agrayānam vacasā aniruktam namāmahe deva-varam vareṇyam
vipaścitam prāṇa manaḥ dhiya ātmanām artha indriya ābhāsam anidram avraṇam chāyā-ātapau yatra na gṛdhra-pakṣau tam akṣaram kham tri-yugam vrajāmahe
ajasya cakram tu ajayā īryamāṇam manaḥ-mayam pañcadaśa aram āśu tri-nābhi vidyut calam aṣṭa-nemi yat akṣam āhuḥ tam ṛtam prapadye
yaḥ eka-varṇam tamasaḥ param tat alokam avyaktam ananta-pāram āsām cakāra upa-suparṇam enam upāsate yoga-rathena dhīrāḥ
na yasya kaśca atititarti māyām yayā janaḥ muhyati veda na artham tam nirjita ātmā ātma-guṇam para-īśam namāma bhūteṣu samam carantam
ime vayam yat priyayā eva tanvā sattvena sṛṣṭāḥ bahiḥ-antaḥ-āviḥ gatim na sūkṣmām ṛṣayaḥ ca vidmahe kutaḥ asura-ādyāḥ itara pradhānāḥ
pādau mahī iyam sva-kṛta eva yasya catuḥ-vidhaḥ yatra hi bhūta-sargaḥ saḥ vai mahā-pūruṣaḥ ātma-tantraḥ prasīdatām brahma mahā-vibhūtiḥ
ambhaḥ tu yat-retaḥ udāra-vīryam sidhyanti jīvanti uta vardhamānāḥ lokāḥ yataḥ atha akhila-loka-pālāḥ prasīdatām naḥ saḥ mahā-vibhūtiḥ
somam manaḥ yasya samāmananti divaukasām yaḥ balam andhaḥ āyuḥ īśaḥ nagānām prajanaḥ prajānām prasīdatām naḥ saḥ mahā-vibhūtiḥ
agniḥ mukham yasya tu jāta-vedāḥ jātaḥ kriyā-kāṇḍa nimitta janmā antaḥ-samudre anupacan sva-dhātūn prasīdatām naḥ saḥ mahā-vibhūtiḥ
yat cakṣuḥ āsīt taraṇiḥ deva-yānam trayī-mayaḥ brahmaṇaḥ eṣaḥ dhiṣṇyam dvāram ca mukteḥ amṛtam ca mṛtyuḥ prasīdatām naḥ saḥ mahā-vibhūtiḥ
prāṇāt abhūt yasya cara-acarāṇām prāṇaḥ sahaḥ balam ojaḥ ca vāyuḥ anvāsma samrājam iva anugāḥ vayam prasīdatām naḥ saḥ mahā-vibhūtiḥ
śrotrāt diśaḥ yasya hṛdaḥ ca khāni prajajñire kham puruṣasya nābhyāḥ prāṇa indriya ātmā asu śarīra ketaḥ prasīdatām naḥ saḥ mahā-vibhūtiḥ
balāt mahā-indraḥ tri-daśāḥ prasādāt manyoḥ giri-īśaḥ dhiṣaṇāt viriñcaḥ khebhyaḥ tu chandāṁsi ṛṣayaḥ meḍhrataḥ kaḥ prasīdatām naḥ saḥ mahā-vibhūtiḥ
śrīḥ vakṣasaḥ pitaraḥ chāyayā āsan dharmaḥ stanāt itaraḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ abhūt dyauḥ yasya śīrṣṇaḥ apsarasaḥ vihārāt prasīdatām naḥ saḥ mahā-vibhūtiḥ
vipraḥ mukhāt brahma ca yasya guhyam rājanyaḥ āsīt bhujayoḥ balam ca ūrvoḥ viṭ ojaḥ aṅghriḥ aveda śūdrau prasīdatām naḥ saḥ mahā-vibhūtiḥ
lobhaḥ adharāt prītiḥ upari abhūt dyutiḥ nastaḥ paśavyaḥ sparśena kāmaḥ bhruvoḥ yamaḥ pakṣma-bhavaḥ tu kālaḥ prasīdatām naḥ saḥ mahā-vibhūtiḥ
dravyam vayaḥ karma guṇān viśeṣam yat yoga-māyā vihitān vadanti yat durvibhāvyam prabudha-apabādham prasīdatām naḥ saḥ mahā-vibhūtiḥ
namaḥ astu tasmai upaśānta-śaktaye svārājya lābha pratipūrita ātmane guṇeṣu māyā-raciteṣu vṛttibhiḥ na sajjamānāya nabhasvat ūtaye
saḥ tvam naḥ darśaya ātmānam asmat-karaṇa-gocaram prapannānām didṛkṣūṇām sasmitam te mukha-ambujam
taiḥ taiḥ sva-icchā-bhūtaiḥ rūpaiḥ kāle kāle svayam vibho karma durviṣaham yat naḥ bhagavān tat karoti hi
kleśa bhūri alpa sārāṇi karmāṇi viphalāni vā dehinām viṣaya-artānām na tathā eva arpitam tvayi
na avamaḥ karma kalpaḥ api viphalāya īśvara-arpitaḥ kalpate puruṣasya eva saḥ hi ātmā dayitaḥ hitaḥ
yathā hi skandha śākhānām taroḥ mūla avasecanam evam ārādhanam viṣṇoḥ sarveṣām ātmanaḥ ca hi
namaḥ tubhyam anantāya durvitarkya-ātma-karmaṇe nirguṇāya guṇa-īśāya sattva-sthāya ca sāmpratam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam stutaḥ sura-gaṇaiḥ bhagavān hariḥ īśvaraḥ teṣām āvirabhūt rājan sahasra arka udaya dyutiḥ
tena eva sahasā sarve devāḥ pratihata-īkṣaṇāḥ na apaśyan kham diśaḥ kṣauṇīm ātmānam ca kutaḥ vibhum
viriñcaḥ bhagavān dṛṣṭvā saha śarveṇa tām tanum svacchām marakata-śyāmām kañja-garbha-aruṇa-īkṣaṇām tapta-hema-avadātena lasat kauśeya-vāsasā prasanna-cāru-sarva-aṅgīm su-mukhīm sundara-bhruvam mahā-maṇi-kirīṭena keyūrābhyām ca bhūṣitām karṇa-ābharaṇa-nirbhāta kapola śrī-mukha-ambujām kāñcī-kalāpa-valaya hāra-nūpura śobhitām kaustubha-ābharaṇām lakṣmīm bibhratīm vana-mālinīm sudarśana-ādibhiḥ sva-astraiḥ mūrtimadbhiḥ upāsitām tuṣṭāva deva-pravaraḥ sa-śarvaḥ puruṣam param sarva-amara-gaṇaiḥ sākam sarva-aṅgaiḥ avanim gataiḥ
śrī-brahmā uvāca ajāta-janma-sthiti-saṁyamāya aguṇāya nirvāṇa-sukha-arṇavāya aṇoḥ aṇimne aparigaṇya-dhāmne mahā-anubhāvāya namaḥ namaḥ te
rūpam tava etat puruṣa-ṛṣabha ijyam śreyaḥ arthibhiḥ vaidika tāntrikeṇa yogena dhātaḥ saha naḥ tri-lokān paśyāmi amuṣmin u ha viśva-mūrtau
tvayi agre āsīt tvayi madhye āsīt tvayi ante āsīt idam ātma-tantre tvam ādiḥ antaḥ jagataḥ asya madhyam ghaṭasya mṛtsnā iva paraḥ parasmāt
tvam māyayā ātma-āśrayayā svayā idam nirmāya viśvam tat anupraviṣṭaḥ paśyanti yuktāḥ manasā manīṣiṇaḥ guṇa vyavāye api aguṇam vipaścitaḥ
yathā agnim edhasi amṛtam ca goṣu bhuvi annam ambu udyamane ca vṛttim yogaiḥ manuṣyāḥ adhiyanti hi tvām guṇeṣu buddhyā kavayaḥ vadanti
tam tvām vayam nātha samujjihānam saroja-nābha ati-cira īpsita artham dṛṣṭvā gatāḥ nirvṛtam adya sarve gajāḥ dava-artāḥ iva gāṅgam ambhaḥ
saḥ tvam vidhatsva akhila-loka-pālāḥ vayam yat arthāḥ tava pāda-mūlam samāgatāḥ te bahiḥ-antaḥ-ātman kim vā anya-vijñāpyam aśeṣa-sākṣiṇaḥ
aham giritraḥ ca sura-ādayaḥ ye dakṣa-ādayaḥ agneḥ iva ketavaḥ te kim vā vidāma īśa pṛthak-vibhātāḥ vidhatsva śam naḥ dvija-deva-mantram
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam viriñca-ādibhiḥ īḍitaḥ tat vijñāya teṣām hṛdayam yathā eva jagāda jīmūta-gabhīrayā girā baddha-añjalīn saṁvṛta sarva kārakān
ekaḥ eva īśvaraḥ tasmin sura-kārye sura-īśvaraḥ vihartu kāmaḥ tān āha samudra-unmathana-ādibhiḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca hanta brahman aho śambho he devāḥ mama bhāṣitam śṛṇuta avahitāḥ sarve śreyaḥ vaḥ syāt yathā surāḥ
yāta dānava daiteyaiḥ tāvat sandhiḥ vidhīyatām kālena anugṛhītaiḥ taiḥ yāvat vaḥ bhavaḥ ātmanaḥ
arayaḥ api hi sandheyāḥ sati kārya-artha-gaurave ahi mūṣika vat devāḥ hi arthasya padavīm gataiḥ
amṛta-utpādane yatnaḥ kriyatām avilambitam yasya pītasya vai jantuḥ mṛtyu-grastaḥ amaraḥ bhavet
kṣiptvā kṣīra-udadhau sarvāḥ vīrut tṛṇa latā auṣadhīḥ manthānam mandaram kṛtvā netram kṛtvā tu vāsukim sahāyena mayā devāḥ nirmanthadhvam atandritāḥ kleśa-bhājaḥ bhaviṣyanti daityāḥ yūyam phala-grahāḥ
yūyam tat anumodadhvam yat icchanti asurāḥ surāḥ na saṁrambheṇa sidhyanti sarva-arthāḥ sāntvayā yathā
na bhetavyam kālakūṭāt viṣāt jaladhi sambhavāt lobhaḥ kāryaḥ na vaḥ jātu roṣaḥ kāmaḥ tu vastuṣu
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti devān samādiśya bhagavān puruṣa-uttamaḥ teṣām antardadhe rājan svacchanda gatiḥ īśvaraḥ
atha tasmai bhagavate namaskṛtya pitā-mahaḥ bhavaḥ ca jagmatuḥ svam svam dhāma upeyuḥ balim surāḥ
dṛṣṭvā arīn api asaṁyattān jāta-kṣobhān sva-nāyakān nyaṣedhat daitya-rāṭ ślokyaḥ sandhi vigraha kāla vit
te vairocanim āsīnam guptam ca asura-yūtha-paiḥ śriyā paramayā juṣṭam jita-aśeṣam upāgaman
mahā-indraḥ ślakṣṇayā vācā sāntvayitvā mahā-matiḥ abhyabhāṣata tat sarvam śikṣitam puruṣa-uttamāt
tat tu arocata daityasya tatra anye ye asura-adhipāḥ śambaraḥ ariṣṭanemiḥ ca ye ca tripura-vāsinaḥ
tataḥ deva-asurāḥ kṛtvā saṁvidam kṛta-sauhṛdāḥ udyamam paramam cakruḥ amṛta-arthe parantapa
tataḥ te mandara-girim ojasā utpāṭya durmadāḥ nadanta udadhim ninyuḥ śaktāḥ parigha-bāhavaḥ
dūra bhāra-udvaha śrāntāḥ śakra vairocana-ādayaḥ apārayantaḥ tam voḍhum vivaśāḥ vijahuḥ pathi
nipatan saḥ giriḥ tatra bahūn amara-dānavān cūrṇayām āsa mahatā bhāreṇa kanaka-acalaḥ
tān tathā bhagna-manasaḥ bhagna-bāhu ūru kandharān vijñāya bhagavān tatra babhūva garuḍa-dhvajaḥ
giri-pāta viniṣpiṣṭān vilokya amara dānavān īkṣayā jīvayām āsa nirjarān nirvraṇān yathā
girim ca āropya garuḍe hastena ekena līlayā āruhya prayayau abdhim sura-asura-gaṇaiḥ vṛtaḥ
avaropya girim skandhāt suparṇaḥ patatām varaḥ yayau jala-ante utsṛjya hariṇā saḥ visarjitaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca te nāga-rājam āmantrya phala-bhāgena vāsukim parivīya girau tasmin netram abdhim mudā anvitāḥ ārebhire surāḥ yattāḥ amṛta-arthe kuru-udvaha
hariḥ purastāt jagṛhe pūrvam devāḥ tataḥ abhavan
tat na aicchan daitya-patayaḥ mahā-puruṣa ceṣṭitam na gṛhṇīmaḥ vayam puccham aheḥ aṅgam amaṅgalam svādhyāya śruta sampannāḥ prakhyātāḥ janma-karmabhiḥ
iti tūṣṇīm sthitān daityān vilokya puruṣa-uttamaḥ smayamānaḥ visṛjya agram puccham jagrāha sa-amaraḥ
kṛta sthāna-vibhāgāḥ te evam kaśyapa-nandanāḥ mamanthuḥ paramam yattāḥ amṛta-artham payaḥ-nidhim
mathyamāne arṇave saḥ adriḥ anādhāraḥ hi apaḥ aviśat dhriyamāṇaḥ api balibhiḥ gauravāt pāṇḍu-nandana
te sunirviṇṇa-manasaḥ parimlāna mukha-śriyaḥ āsan sva-pauruṣe naṣṭe daivena ati-balīyasā
vilokya vighna īśa-vidhim tadā īśvaraḥ duranta-vīryaḥ avitatha abhisandhiḥ kṛtvā vapuḥ kacchapam adbhutam mahat praviśya toyam girim ujjahāra
tam utthitam vīkṣya kulācalam punaḥ samudyatāḥ nirmathitum sura-asurāḥ dadhāra pṛṣṭhena saḥ lakṣa-yojana prastāriṇā dvīpaḥ iva aparaḥ mahān
sura-asura-indraiḥ bhuja-vīrya vepitam paribhramantam girim aṅga pṛṣṭhataḥ bibhrat tat āvartanam ādi-kacchapaḥ mene aṅga-kaṇḍūyanam aprameyaḥ
tathā asurān āviśat āsureṇa rūpeṇa teṣām bala-vīryam īrayan uddīpayan deva-gaṇān ca viṣṇuḥ daivena nāga-indram abodha-rūpaḥ
upari agendram giri-rāṭ iva anyaḥ ākramya hastena sahasra-bāhuḥ tasthau divi brahma bhava indra mukhyaiḥ abhiṣṭuvadbhiḥ sumanaḥ abhivṛṣṭaḥ
upari adhaḥ ca ātmani gotra-netrayoḥ pareṇa te prāviśatā samedhitāḥ mamanthuḥ abdhim tarasā mada-utkaṭāḥ mahā-adriṇā kṣobhita nakra-cakram
ahīndra sāhasra kaṭhora dṛk mukha śvāsa agni dhūma āhata varcasaḥ asurāḥ pauloma kāleya bali ilvala ādayaḥ dava-agni dagdhāḥ saralāḥ iva abhavan
devān ca tat śvāsa śikhā hata prabhān dhūmra ambara srak-vara kañcuka ānanān samabhyavarṣan bhagavat-vaśāḥ ghanāḥ vavuḥ samudra ūrmi upagūḍha vāyavaḥ
mathyamānāt tathā sindhoḥ deva asura varūtha-paiḥ yadā sudhā na jāyeta nirmamantha ajitaḥ svayam
megha-śyāmaḥ kanaka-paridhiḥ karṇa vidyota-vidyut mūrdhni bhrājat vilulita kacaḥ srak-dharaḥ rakta-netraḥ jaitraiḥ dorbhiḥ jagat abhaya-daiḥ dandaśūkam gṛhītvā mathnan mathnā pratigiriḥ iva aśobhata atho dhṛta-adriḥ
nirmathyamānāt udadheḥ abhūt viṣam mahā-ulbaṇam hālahala-āhvam agrataḥ sambhrānta mīna unmakara ahi kacchapāt timi dvipa grāha timiṅgila ākulāt
tat ugra-vegam diśi diśi upari adhaḥ visarpat utsarpat asahyam aprati bhītāḥ prajāḥ dudruvuḥ aṅga sa-īśvarāḥ arakṣyamāṇāḥ śaraṇam sadāśivam
vilokya tam deva-varam tri-lokyāḥ bhavāya devyā abhimatam munīnām āsīnam adrau apavarga-hetoḥ tapaḥ juṣāṇam stutibhiḥ praṇemuḥ
śrī-prajāpatayaḥ ūcuḥ deva-deva mahā-deva bhūta-ātman bhūta-bhāvana trāhi naḥ śaraṇa-āpannān trailokya dahanāt viṣāt
tvam ekaḥ sarva-jagataḥ īśvaraḥ bandha-mokṣayoḥ tam tvām arcanti kuśalāḥ prapanna-ārti-haram gurum
guṇa-mayyā sva-śaktyā asya sarga-sthiti-apyayān vibho dhatse yadā sva-dṛk bhūman brahma-viṣṇu-śiva-abhidhām
tvam brahma paramam guhyam sat-asat-bhāva-bhāvanam nānā-śaktibhiḥ ābhātaḥ tvam ātmā jagat-īśvaraḥ
tvam śabda-yoniḥ jagat-ādiḥ ātmā prāṇa indriya dravya guṇaḥ sva-bhāvaḥ kālaḥ kratuḥ satyam ṛtam ca dharmaḥ tvayi akṣaram yat tri-vṛt āmananti
agniḥ mukham te akhila-devatā-ātmā kṣitim viduḥ loka-bhava aṅghri-paṅkajam kālam gatim te akhila-devatā-ātmanaḥ diśaḥ ca karṇau rasanam jala-īśam
nābhiḥ nabhaḥ te śvasanam nabhasvān sūryaḥ ca cakṣūṁṣi jalam sma retaḥ para-avara-ātma-āśrayaṇam tava ātmā somaḥ manaḥ dyauḥ bhagavan śiraḥ te
kukṣiḥ samudrāḥ girayaḥ asthi saṅghāḥ romāṇi sarva auṣadhi vīrudhaḥ te chandāṁsi sākṣāt tava sapta dhātavaḥ trayī-maya-ātman hṛdayam sarva-dharmaḥ
mukhāni pañca upaniṣadaḥ tava īśa yaiḥ triṁśat-aṣṭa-uttara-mantra-vargaḥ yat tat śiva-ākhyam paramātma-tattvam deva svayam-jyotiḥ avasthitiḥ te
chāyā tu adharma-ūrmiṣu yaiḥ visargaḥ netra-trayam sattva rajaḥ tamāṁsi sāṅkhya-ātmanaḥ śāstra kṛtaḥ tava īkṣā chandaḥ-mayaḥ deva ṛṣiḥ purāṇaḥ
na te giri-tra akhila-loka-pāla viriñca vaikuṇṭha sura-indra gamyam jyotiḥ param yatra rajaḥ tamaḥ ca sattvam na yat brahma nirasta-bhedam
kāma-adhvara tripura kālagara ādi aneka bhūta-druhaḥ kṣapayataḥ stutaye na tat te yaḥ tu anta-kāle idam ātma-kṛtam sva-netra vahni-sphuliṅga-śikhayā bhasitam na veda
ye tu ātma-rāma-gurubhiḥ hṛdi cintita-aṅghri-dvandvam carantam umayā tapasā abhitaptam katthante ugra-paruṣam niratam śmaśāne te nūnam ūtim avidan tava hāta-lajjāḥ
tat tasya te sat-asatoḥ parataḥ parasya na añjaḥ svarūpa-gamane prabhavanti bhūmnaḥ brahma-ādayaḥ kim uta saṁstavane vayam tu tat sarga-sarga-viṣayāḥ api śakti-mātram
etat param prapaśyāmaḥ na param te mahā-īśvara mṛḍanāya hi lokasya vyaktiḥ te avyakta-karmaṇaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tat vīkṣya vyasanam tāsām kṛpayā bhṛśa-pīḍitaḥ sarva-bhūta-suhṛt devaḥ idam āha satīm priyām
śrī-śivaḥ uvāca aho bata bhavāni etat prajānām paśya vaiśasam kṣīra-uda mathana-udbhūtāt kālakūṭāt upasthitam
āsām prāṇa-parīpsūnām vidheyam abhayam hi me etāvān hi prabhoḥ arthaḥ yat dīna-paripālanam
prāṇaiḥ svaiḥ prāṇinaḥ pānti sādhavaḥ kṣaṇa-bhaṅguraiḥ baddha-vaireṣu bhūteṣu mohiteṣu ātma-māyayā
puṁsaḥ kṛpayataḥ bhadre sarva-ātmā prīyate hariḥ prīte harau bhagavati prīye aham sa-cara-acaraḥ tasmāt idam garam bhuñje prajānām svastiḥ astu me
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam āmantrya bhagavān bhavānīm viśva-bhāvanaḥ tat viṣam jagdhum ārebhe prabhāva-jñā anvamodata
tataḥ karatalī-kṛtya vyāpi hālāhalam viṣam abhakṣayat mahā-devaḥ kṛpayā bhūta-bhāvanaḥ
tasya api darśayām āsa sva-vīryam jala-kalmaṣaḥ yat cakāra gale nīlam tat ca sādhoḥ vibhūṣaṇam
tapyante loka-tāpena sādhavaḥ prāyaśaḥ janāḥ parama-ārādhanam tat hi puruṣasya akhila-ātmanaḥ
niśamya karma tat śambhoḥ deva-devasya mīḍhuṣaḥ prajāḥ dākṣāyaṇī brahmā vaikuṇṭhaḥ ca śaśaṁsire
praskannam pibataḥ pāṇeḥ yat kiñcit jagṛhuḥ sma tat vṛścika ahi viṣa-auṣadhyaḥ dandaśūkāḥ ca ye apare
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca pīte gare vṛṣa-aṅkeṇa prītāḥ te amara dānavāḥ mamanthuḥ tarasā sindhum havirdhānī tataḥ abhavat
tām agni-hotrīm ṛṣayaḥ jagṛhuḥ brahma-vādinaḥ yajñasya deva-yānasya medhyāya haviṣe nṛpa
tataḥ uccaiḥśravāḥ nāma hayaḥ abhūt candra-pāṇḍuraḥ tasmin baliḥ spṛhām cakre na indraḥ īśvara-śikṣayā
tataḥ airāvataḥ nāma vāraṇa-indraḥ vinirgataḥ dantaiḥ caturbhiḥ śveta adreḥ haran bhagavataḥ mahim
airāvaṇa-ādayaḥ tu aṣṭau dik-gajāḥ abhavan tataḥ abhramu-prabhṛtayaḥ aṣṭau ca kariṇyaḥ tu abhavan nṛpa
kaustubha-ākhyam abhūt ratnam padmarāgaḥ mahā-udadheḥ tasmin maṇau spṛhām cakre vakṣaḥ-alaṅkaraṇe hariḥ tataḥ abhavat pārijātaḥ sura-loka-vibhūṣaṇam pūrayati arthinaḥ yaḥ arthaiḥ śaśvat bhuvi yathā bhavān
tataḥ ca apsarasaḥ jātāḥ niṣka-kaṇṭhyaḥ su-vāsasaḥ ramaṇyaḥ svargiṇām valgu-gati-līlā-avalokanaiḥ
tataḥ ca āvirabhūt sākṣāt śrī ramā bhagavat-parā rañjayantī diśaḥ kāntyā vidyut saudāmanī yathā
tasyām cakruḥ spṛhām sarve sa-sura-asura-mānavāḥ rūpa-audārya vayaḥ varṇa mahimā ākṣipta cetasaḥ
tasyāḥ āsanam āninye mahā-indraḥ mahat adbhutam mūrti-matyaḥ sarit-śreṣṭhāḥ hema kumbhaiḥ jalam śuci
ābhiṣecanikāḥ bhūmiḥ āharat sakala auṣadhīḥ gāvaḥ pañca pavitrāṇi vasantaḥ madhu-mādhavau
ṛṣayaḥ kalpayām cakruḥ ābhiṣekam yathā-vidhi jaguḥ bhadrāṇi gandharvāḥ naṭyaḥ ca nanṛtuḥ jaguḥ
meghāḥ mṛdaṅga paṇava muraja ānaka gomukhān vyanādayan śaṅkha veṇu vīṇāḥ tumula niḥsvanān
tataḥ abhiṣiṣicuḥ devīm śriyam padma-karām satīm digibhāḥ pūrṇa-kalaśaiḥ sūkta-vākyaiḥ dvi-ja īritaiḥ
samudraḥ pīta-kauśeya vāsasī samupāharat varuṇaḥ srajam vaijayantīm madhunā matta ṣaṭ-padām
bhūṣaṇāni vicitrāṇi viśvakarmā prajāpatiḥ hāram sarasvatī padmam ajaḥ nāgāḥ ca kuṇḍale
tataḥ kṛta-svastyayanā utpala-srajam nadat dvirephām parigṛhya pāṇinā cacāla vaktram su-kapola-kuṇḍalam sa-vrīḍa-hāsam dadhatī su-śobhanam
stana-dvayam ca ati-kṛśa-udarī samam nirantaram candana-kuṅkuma ukṣitam tataḥ tataḥ nūpura valgu śiñjitaiḥ visarpatī hema-latā iva sā babhau
vilokayantī niravadyam ātmanaḥ padam dhruvam ca avyabhicāri-sat-guṇam gandharva siddha asura yakṣa cāraṇa traipiṣṭapeya-ādiṣu na anvavindata
nūnam tapaḥ yasya na manyu nirjayaḥ jñānam kvacit tat ca na saṅga-varjitam kaścit mahān tasya na kāma nirjayaḥ saḥ īśvaraḥ kim parataḥ vyapāśrayaḥ
dharmaḥ kvacit tatra na bhūta-sauhṛdam tyāgaḥ kvacit tatra na mukti-kāraṇam vīryam na puṁsaḥ asti aja-vega-niṣkṛtam na hi dvitīyaḥ guṇa-saṅga-varjitaḥ
kvacit cira-āyuḥ na hi śīla-maṅgalam kvacit tat api asti na vedyam āyuṣaḥ yatra ubhayam kutra ca saḥ api amaṅgalaḥ su-maṅgalaḥ kaśca na kāṅkṣate hi mām
evam vimṛśya avyabhicāri-sat-guṇaiḥ varam nija-eka-āśrayatayā aguṇa-āśrayam vavre varam sarva-guṇaiḥ apekṣitam ramā mukundam nirapekṣam īpsitam
tasya aṁsa-deśe uśatīm nava kañja-mālām mādyat madhuvrata-varūtha girā upaghuṣṭām tasthau nidhāya nikaṭe tat-uraḥ sva-dhāma sa-vrīḍa-hāsa vikasat nayanena yātā
tasyāḥ śriyaḥ tri-jagataḥ janakaḥ jananyāḥ vakṣaḥ nivāsam akarot paramam vibhūteḥ śrīḥ svāḥ prajāḥ sa-karuṇena nirīkṣaṇena yatra sthitā aidhayata sa-adhipatīn tri-lokān
śaṅkha tūrya mṛdaṅgānām vāditrāṇām pṛthuḥ svanaḥ deva-anugānām sa-strīṇām nṛtyatām gāyatām abhūt
brahma rudra aṅgiraḥ mukhyāḥ sarve viśva-sṛjaḥ vibhum īḍire avitathaiḥ mantraiḥ tat-liṅgaiḥ puṣpa-varṣiṇaḥ
śriyā avalokitāḥ devāḥ sa-prajāpatayaḥ prajāḥ śīla-ādi-guṇa-sampannāḥ lebhire nirvṛtim parām
niḥsattvāḥ lolupāḥ rājan nirudyogāḥ gata-trapāḥ yadā ca upekṣitāḥ lakṣmyā babhūvuḥ daitya-dānavāḥ
atha āsīt vāruṇī devī kanyā kamala-locanā asurāḥ jagṛhuḥ tām vai hareḥ anumatena te
atha udadheḥ mathyamānāt kāśyapaiḥ amṛta-arthibhiḥ udatiṣṭhat mahārāja puruṣaḥ parama adbhutaḥ
dīrgha pīvara doḥ-daṇḍaḥ kambu grīvaḥ aruṇa-īkṣaṇaḥ śyāmalaḥ taruṇaḥ sragvī sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitaḥ
pīta-vāsāḥ mahā-uraskaḥ su-mṛṣṭa-maṇi-kuṇḍalaḥ snigdha kuñcita-keśa anta su-bhagaḥ siṁha-vikramaḥ amṛta āpūrṇa kalasam bibhrat valaya bhūṣitaḥ
saḥ vai bhagavataḥ sākṣāt viṣṇoḥ aṁśa-aṁśa-sambhavaḥ dhanvantariḥ iti khyātaḥ āyuḥ-veda-dṛk ijya-bhāk
tam ālokya asurāḥ sarve kalasam ca amṛta-ābhṛtam lipsantaḥ sarva-vastūni kalasam tarasā aharan
nīyamāne asuraiḥ tasmin kalase amṛta-bhājane viṣaṇṇa-manasaḥ devāḥ harim śaraṇam āyayuḥ
iti tat dainyam ālokya bhagavān bhṛtya-kāma-kṛt mā khidyata mithaḥ artham vaḥ sādhayiṣye sva-māyayā
mithaḥ kaliḥ abhūt teṣām tat-arthe tarṣa-cetasām aham pūrvam aham pūrvam na tvam na tvam iti prabho
devāḥ svam bhāgam arhanti ye tulya-āyāsa-hetavaḥ satra-yāge iva etasmin eṣaḥ dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ iti svān pratyaṣedhan vai daiteyāḥ jāta-matsarāḥ durbalāḥ prabalān rājan gṛhīta kalasān muhuḥ
etasmin antare viṣṇuḥ sarva-upāya-vit īśvaraḥ yoṣit-rūpam anirdeśyam dadhāra parama adbhutam prekṣaṇīya utpala-śyāmam sarva avayava sundaram samāna karṇa-ābharaṇam su-kapola unnasa-ānanam nava-yauvana nirvṛtta-stana bhāra kṛśa udaram mukha āmoda anurakta ali jhaṅkāra udvigna locanam bibhrat su-keśa-bhāreṇa mālām utphulla-mallikām su-grīva kaṇṭha-ābharaṇam su-bhuja aṅgada-bhūṣitam viraja-ambara saṁvīta nitamba dvīpa śobhayā kāñcyā pravilasat valgu calat-caraṇa-nūpuram sa-vrīḍa-smita vikṣipta bhrū-vilāsa avalokanaiḥ daitya-yūtha-pa cetaḥsu kāmam uddīpayat muhuḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca te anyonyataḥ asurāḥ pātram harantaḥ tyakta-sauhṛdāḥ kṣipantaḥ dasyu-dharmāṇaḥ āyāntīm dadṛśuḥ striyam
aho rūpam aho dhāma aho asyāḥ navam vayaḥ iti te tām abhidrutya papracchuḥ jāta-hṛt-śayāḥ
kā tvam kañja-palāśa-akṣi kutaḥ vā kim cikīrṣasi kasya asi vada vāma-ūru mathnatī iva manāṁsi naḥ
na vayam tvā amaraiḥ daityaiḥ siddha gandharva cāraṇaiḥ na aspṛṣṭa-pūrvām jānīmaḥ loka-īśaiḥ ca kutaḥ nṛbhiḥ
nūnam tvam vidhinā su-bhrūḥ preṣitā asi śarīriṇām sarva indriya manaḥ prītim vidhātum sa-ghṛṇena kim
sā tvam naḥ spardhamānānām eka-vastuni mānini jñātīnām baddha-vairāṇām śam vidhatsva su-madhyame
vayam kaśyapa-dāyādāḥ bhrātaraḥ kṛta-pauruṣāḥ vibhajasva yathā-nyāyam na eva bhedaḥ yathā bhavet
iti upāmantritaḥ daityaiḥ māyā-yoṣit vapuḥ hariḥ prahasya rucira apāṅgaiḥ nirīkṣan idam abravīt
śrī-bhagavān uvāca katham kaśyapa-dāyādāḥ puṁścalyām mayi saṅgatāḥ viśvāsam paṇḍitaḥ jātu kāminīṣu na yāti hi
sālāvṛkāṇām strīṇām ca svairiṇīnām sura-dviṣaḥ sakhyāni āhuḥ anityāni nūtnam nūtnam vicinvatām
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti te kṣvelitaiḥ tasyāḥ āśvasta manasaḥ asurāḥ jahasuḥ bhāva-gambhīram daduḥ ca amṛta-bhājanam
tataḥ gṛhītvā amṛta-bhājanam hariḥ babhāṣa īṣat smita-śobhayā girā yadi abhyupetam kva ca sādhu asādhu vā kṛtam mayā vaḥ vibhaje sudhām imām
iti abhivyāhṛtam tasyāḥ ākarṇya asura-puṅgavāḥ apramāṇa-vidaḥ tasyāḥ tat tathā iti anvamaṁsata
atha upoṣya kṛta-snānāḥ hutvā ca haviṣā analam dattvā go-vipra-bhūtebhyaḥ kṛta-svastyayanāḥ dvijaiḥ yathā-upajoṣam vāsāṁsi paridhāya āhatāni te kuśeṣu prāviśan sarve prāk-agreṣu abhibhūṣitāḥ
prāk-mukheṣu upaviṣṭeṣu sureṣu diti-jeṣu ca dhūpa-āmodita-śālāyām juṣṭāyām mālya-dīpakaiḥ tasyām nara-indra karabha-ūruḥ uśat-dukūla śroṇī-taṭa alasa-gatiḥ mada-vihvala-akṣī sā kūjatī kanaka-nūpura śiñjitena kumbha-stanī kalasa-pāṇiḥ atha āviveśa
tām śrī-sakhīm kanaka-kuṇḍala cāru karṇa nāsā kapola vadanām para-devatā-ākhyām saṁvīkṣya sammumuhuḥ utsmita vīkṣaṇena deva-asurāḥ vigalita-stana-paṭṭika-antām
asurāṇām sudhā-dānam sarpāṇām iva durnayam matvā jāti-nṛśaṁsānām na tām vyabhajat acyutaḥ
kalpayitvā pṛthak paṅktīḥ ubhayeṣām jagat-patiḥ tān ca upaveśayām āsa sveṣu sveṣu ca paṅktiṣu
daityān gṛhīta-kalasaḥ vañcayan upasañcaraiḥ dūra-sthān pāyayām āsa jarā-mṛtyu-harām sudhām
te pālayantaḥ samayam asurāḥ sva-kṛtam nṛpa tūṣṇīm āsan kṛta-snehāḥ strī-vivāda jugupsayā
tasyām kṛta-ati-praṇayāḥ praṇaya-apāya-kātarāḥ bahu-mānena ca ābaddhāḥ na ūcuḥ kiñcana vipriyam
deva-liṅga-praticchannaḥ svarbhānuḥ deva-saṁsadi praviṣṭaḥ somam apibat candra-arkābhyām ca sūcitaḥ
cakreṇa kṣura-dhāreṇa jahāra pibataḥ śiraḥ hariḥ tasya kabandhaḥ tu sudhayā aplāvitaḥ apatat
śiraḥ tu amaratām nītam ajaḥ graham acīkḷpat yaḥ tu parvaṇi candra-arkau abhidhāvati vaira-dhīḥ
pīta-prāye amṛte devaiḥ bhagavān loka-bhāvanaḥ paśyatām asura-indrāṇām svam rūpam jagṛhe hariḥ
evam sura asura-gaṇāḥ sama deśa kāla hetu artha karma matayaḥ api phale vikalpāḥ tatra amṛtam sura-gaṇāḥ phalam añjasā āpuḥ yat pāda-paṅkaja rajaḥ śrayaṇāt na daityāḥ
yat yujyate asu vasu karma manaḥ vacobhiḥ deha-ātma-ja-ādiṣu nṛbhiḥ tat asat pṛthaktvāt taiḥ eva sat bhavati yat kriyate apṛthaktvāt sarvasya tat bhavati mūla-niṣecanam yat
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti dānava-daiteyāḥ na avindan amṛtam nṛpa yuktāḥ karmaṇi yattāḥ ca vāsudeva parāṅmukhāḥ
sādhayitvā amṛtam rājan pāyayitvā svakān surān paśyatām sarva-bhūtānām yayau garuḍa-vāhanaḥ
sapatnānām parām ṛddhim dṛṣṭvā te diti-nandanāḥ amṛṣyamāṇāḥ utpetuḥ devān pratyudyata-āyudhāḥ
tataḥ sura-gaṇāḥ sarve sudhayā pītayā edhitāḥ pratisaṁyuyudhuḥ śastraiḥ nārāyaṇa-pada-āśrayāḥ
tatra daiva asuraḥ nāma raṇaḥ parama dāruṇaḥ rodhasi udanvataḥ rājan tumulaḥ roma-harṣaṇaḥ
tatra anyonyam sapatnāḥ te saṁrabdha manasaḥ raṇe samāsādya asibhiḥ bāṇaiḥ nijaghnuḥ vividha-āyudhaiḥ
śaṅkha tūrya mṛdaṅgānām bherī ḍamariṇām mahān hasti aśva ratha-pattīnām nadatām nisvanaḥ abhavat
rathinaḥ rathibhiḥ tatra pattibhiḥ saha pattayaḥ hayāḥ hayaiḥ ibhāḥ ca ibhaiḥ samasajjanta saṁyuge
uṣṭraiḥ kecit ibhaiḥ kecit apare yuyudhuḥ kharaiḥ kecit gaura-mukhaiḥ ṛkṣaiḥ dvīpibhiḥ haribhiḥ bhaṭāḥ
gṛdhraiḥ kaṅkaiḥ bakaiḥ anye śyena bhāsaiḥ timiṅgilaiḥ śarabhaiḥ mahiṣaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ go vṛṣaiḥ gavaya-aruṇaiḥ śivābhiḥ ākhubhiḥ kecit kṛkalāsaiḥ śaśaiḥ naraiḥ bastaiḥ eke kṛṣṇa-sāraiḥ haṁsaiḥ anye ca sūkaraiḥ anye jala-sthala-khagaiḥ sattvaiḥ vikṛta vigrahaiḥ senayoḥ ubhayoḥ rājan viviśuḥ te agrataḥ agrataḥ
citra-dhvaja-paṭaiḥ rājan ātapatraiḥ sita-amalaiḥ mahā-dhanaiḥ vajra-daṇḍaiḥ vyajanaiḥ bārha-cāmaraiḥ vāta-uddhūta uttara-uṣṇīṣaiḥ arcirbhiḥ varma-bhūṣaṇaiḥ sphuradbhiḥ viśadaiḥ śastraiḥ sutarām sūrya-raśmibhiḥ deva-dānava-vīrāṇām dhvajinyau pāṇḍu-nandana rejatuḥ vīra-mālābhiḥ yādasām iva sāgarau
vairocanaḥ baliḥ saṅkhye saḥ asurāṇām camū-patiḥ yānam vaihāyasam nāma kāma-gam maya-nirmitam sarva sāṅgrāmika-upetam sarva-āścarya-mayam prabho apratarkyam anirdeśyam dṛśyamānam adarśanam āsthitaḥ tat vimāna-agryam sarva anīka-adhipaiḥ vṛtaḥ bāla-vyajana-chatra-agryaiḥ reje candraḥ iva udaye
tasya āsan sarvataḥ yānaiḥ yūthānām patayaḥ asurāḥ namuciḥ śambaraḥ bāṇaḥ vipracittiḥ ayomukhaḥ dvimūrdhā kālanābhaḥ atha prahetiḥ hetiḥ ilvalaḥ śakuniḥ bhūtasantāpaḥ vajradaṁṣṭraḥ virocanaḥ hayagrīvaḥ śaṅkuśirāḥ kapilaḥ meghadundubhiḥ tārakaḥ cakradṛk śumbhaḥ niśumbhaḥ jambhaḥ utkalaḥ ariṣṭaḥ ariṣṭanemiḥ ca mayaḥ ca tripurādhipaḥ anye pauloma-kāleyāḥ nivātakavaca-ādayaḥ alabdha-bhāgāḥ somasya kevalam kleśa-bhāginaḥ sarve ete raṇa-mukhe bahuśaḥ nirjita-amarāḥ siṁha-nādān vimuñcantaḥ śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ mahā-ravān dṛṣṭvā sapatnān utsiktān balabhit kupitaḥ bhṛśam
airāvatam dik-kariṇam ārūḍhaḥ śuśubhe sva-rāṭ yathā sravat prasravaṇam udaya-adrim ahaḥ-patiḥ
tasya āsan sarvataḥ devāḥ nānā-vāha dhvaja-āyudhāḥ loka-pālāḥ saha gaṇaiḥ vāyu agni varuṇa ādayaḥ
te anyonyam abhisaṁsṛtya kṣipantaḥ marmabhiḥ mithaḥ āhvayantaḥ viśantaḥ agre yuyudhuḥ dvandva-yodhinaḥ
yuyodha baliḥ indreṇa tārakeṇa guhaḥ asyata varuṇaḥ hetinā ayudhyat mitraḥ rājan prahetinā
yamaḥ tu kālanābhena viśvakarmā mayena vai śambaraḥ yuyudhe tvaṣṭrā savitrā tu virocanaḥ
aparājitena namuciḥ aśvinau vṛṣaparvaṇā sūryaḥ bali-sutaiḥ devaḥ bāṇa-jyeṣṭhaiḥ śatena ca rāhuṇā ca tathā somaḥ pulomnā yuyudhe anilaḥ niśumbha śumbhayoḥ devī bhadrakālī tarasvinī
vṛṣākapiḥ tu jambhena mahiṣeṇa vibhāvasuḥ ilvalaḥ saha vātāpiḥ brahma-putraiḥ arim-dama kāmadevena durmarṣaḥ utkalaḥ mātṛbhiḥ saha bṛhaspatiḥ ca uśanasā narakeṇa śanaiścaraḥ marutaḥ nivātakavacaiḥ kāleyaiḥ vasavaḥ amarāḥ viśvedevāḥ tu paulomaiḥ rudrāḥ krodhavaśaiḥ saha
te evam ājau asurāḥ sura-indrāḥ dvandvena saṁhatya ca yudhyamānāḥ anyonyam āsādya nijaghnuḥ ojasā jigīṣavaḥ tīkṣṇa śara asi tomaraiḥ
bhuśuṇḍibhiḥ cakra gadā ṛṣṭi paṭṭiśaiḥ śakti ulmukaiḥ prāsa paraśvadhaiḥ api nistriṁśa bhallaiḥ parighaiḥ sa-mudgaraiḥ sa-bhindipālaiḥ ca śirāṁsi cicchiduḥ
gajāḥ turaṅgāḥ sa-rathāḥ padātayaḥ sāroha-vāhāḥ vividhāḥ vikhaṇḍitāḥ nikṛtta-bāhu ūru śirodhara aṅghrayaḥ chinna dhvaja iṣvāsa tanutra bhūṣaṇāḥ
teṣām padāghāta ratha-aṅga cūrṇitāt āyodhanāt ulbaṇaḥ utthitaḥ tadā reṇuḥ diśaḥ kham dyumaṇim ca chādayan nyavartata asṛk srutibhiḥ pariplutāt
śirobhiḥ uddhūta kirīṭa kuṇḍalaiḥ saṁrambha-dṛgbhiḥ paridaṣṭa dacchadaiḥ mahā-bhujaiḥ sa-ābharaṇaiḥ saha-āyudhaiḥ sā prāstṛtā bhūḥ karabha-ūrubhiḥ babhau
kabandhāḥ tatra ca utpetuḥ patita sva-śiraḥ-akṣibhiḥ udyata āyudha dordaṇḍaiḥ ādhāvantaḥ bhaṭān mṛdhe
baliḥ mahā-indram daśabhiḥ tribhiḥ airāvatam śaraiḥ caturbhiḥ caturaḥ vāhān ekena āroham ārcchayat
saḥ tān āpatataḥ śakraḥ tāvadbhiḥ śīghra-vikramaḥ ciccheda niśitaiḥ bhallaiḥ asamprāptān hasan iva
tasya karma-uttamam vīkṣya durmarṣaḥ śaktim ādade tām jvalantīm mahā-ulkā-ābhām hasta-sthām acchinat hariḥ
tataḥ śūlam tataḥ prāsam tataḥ tomaram ṛṣṭayaḥ yat yat śastram samādadyāt sarvam tat acchinat vibhuḥ
sasarja atha āsurīm māyām antardhāna gataḥ asuraḥ tataḥ prādurabhūt śailaḥ sura-anīka-upari prabho
tataḥ nipetuḥ taravaḥ dahyamānāḥ dava-agninā śilāḥ sa-ṭaṅka-śikharāḥ cūrṇayantyaḥ dviṣat-balam
mahā-uragāḥ samutpetuḥ dandaśūkāḥ sa-vṛścikāḥ siṁha vyāghra varāhāḥ ca mardayantaḥ mahā-gajāḥ
yātudhānyaḥ ca śataśaḥ śūla-hastāḥ vivāsasaḥ chindhi bhindhi iti vādinyaḥ tathā rakṣaḥ-gaṇāḥ prabho
tataḥ mahā-ghanāḥ vyomni gambhīra-paruṣa-svanāḥ aṅgārān mumucuḥ vātaiḥ āhatāḥ stanayitnavaḥ
sṛṣṭaḥ daityena su-mahān vahniḥ śvasana-sārathiḥ sāṁvartakaḥ iva ati ugraḥ vibudha dhvajinīm adhāk
tataḥ samudraḥ udvelaḥ sarvataḥ pratyadṛśyata pracaṇḍa vātaiḥ uddhūta taraṅga āvarta bhīṣaṇaḥ
evam daityaiḥ mahā-māyaiḥ alakṣya-gatibhiḥ raṇe sṛjyamānāsu māyāsu viṣeduḥ sura-sainikāḥ
na tat-pratividhim yatra viduḥ indra-ādayaḥ nṛpa dhyātaḥ prādurabhūt tatra bhagavān viśva-bhāvanaḥ
tataḥ suparṇa-aṁsa-kṛta-aṅghri-pallavaḥ piśaṅga-vāsāḥ nava-kañja-locanaḥ adṛśyata aṣṭa-āyudha bāhuḥ ullasat śrī kaustubha anarghya kirīṭa kuṇḍalaḥ
tasmin praviṣṭe asura kūṭa-karma-jā māyā vineśuḥ mahinā mahīyasaḥ svapnaḥ yathā hi pratibodhe āgate hari-smṛtiḥ sarva-vipat vimokṣaṇam
dṛṣṭvā mṛdhe garuḍa-vāham ibhāri-vāhaḥ āvidhya śūlam ahinot atha kālanemiḥ tat līlayā garuḍa-mūrdhni patat gṛhītvā tena ahanat nṛpa sa-vāham arim tri-adhīśaḥ
mālī sumālī ati-balau yudhi petatuḥ yat-cakreṇa kṛtta-śirasau atha mālyavān tam āhatya tigma-gadayā ahanat aṇḍa-ja-indram tāvat śiraḥ acchinat areḥ nadataḥ ariṇā ādyaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca atho surāḥ pratyupalabdha-cetasaḥ parasya puṁsaḥ parayā anukampayā jaghnuḥ bhṛśam śakra samīraṇa ādayaḥ tān tān raṇe yaiḥ abhisaṁhatāḥ purā
vairocanāya saṁrabdhaḥ bhagavān pāka-śāsanaḥ udayacchat yadā vajram prajāḥ hā hā iti cukruśuḥ
vajra-pāṇiḥ tam āha idam tiraskṛtya puraḥ-sthitam manasvinam su-sampannam vicarantam mahā-mṛdhe
naṭa-vat mūḍha māyābhiḥ māyā-īśān naḥ jigīṣasi jitvā bālān nibaddha-akṣān naṭaḥ harati tat-dhanam
ārurukṣanti māyābhiḥ utsisṛpsanti ye divam tān dasyūn vidhunomi ajñān pūrvasmāt ca padāt adhaḥ
saḥ aham durmāyinaḥ te adya vajreṇa śata-parvaṇā śiraḥ hariṣye manda-ātman ghaṭasva jñātibhiḥ saha
śrī-baliḥ uvāca saṅgrāme vartamānānām kāla-codita karmaṇām kīrtiḥ jayaḥ ajayaḥ mṛtyuḥ sarveṣām syuḥ anukramāt
tat idam kāla-raśanam jagat paśyanti sūrayaḥ na hṛṣyanti na śocanti tatra yūyam apaṇḍitāḥ
na vayam manyamānānām ātmānam tatra sādhanam giraḥ vaḥ sādhu-śocyānām gṛhṇīmaḥ marma-tāḍanāḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti ākṣipya vibhum vīraḥ nārācaiḥ vīra-mardanaḥ ākarṇa-pūrṇaiḥ ahanat ākṣepaiḥ āha tam punaḥ
evam nirākṛtaḥ devaḥ vairiṇā tathya-vādinā na amṛṣyat tat adhikṣepam totra āhataḥ iva dvipaḥ
prāharat kuliśam tasmai amogham para-mardanaḥ sa-yānaḥ nyapatat bhūmau chinna-pakṣaḥ iva acalaḥ
sakhāyam patitam dṛṣṭvā jambhaḥ bali-sakhaḥ suhṛt abhyayāt sauhṛdam sakhyuḥ hatasya api samācaran
saḥ siṁha-vāhaḥ āsādya gadām udyamya raṁhasā jatrau atāḍayat śakram gajam ca su-mahā-balaḥ
gadā-prahāra-vyathitaḥ bhṛśam vihvalitaḥ gajaḥ jānubhyām dharaṇīm spṛṣṭvā kaśmalam paramam yayau
tataḥ rathaḥ mātalinā haribhiḥ daśa-śataiḥ vṛtaḥ ānītaḥ dvipam utsṛjya ratham āruruhe vibhuḥ
tasya tat pūjayan karma yantuḥ dānava-sat-tamaḥ śūlena jvalatā tam tu smayamānaḥ ahanat mṛdhe
sehe rujam su-durmarṣām sattvam ālambya mātaliḥ indraḥ jambhasya saṅkruddhaḥ vajreṇa apāharat śiraḥ
jambham śrutvā hatam tasya jñātayaḥ nāradāt ṛṣeḥ namuciḥ ca balaḥ pākaḥ tatra āpetuḥ tvarā-anvitāḥ
vacobhiḥ paruṣaiḥ indram ardayantaḥ asya marmasu śaraiḥ avākiran meghāḥ dhārābhiḥ iva parvatam
harīn daśa-śatāni ājau haryaśvasya balaḥ śaraiḥ tāvadbhiḥ ardayām āsa yugapat laghu-hastavān
śatābhyām mātalim pākaḥ ratham sa-avayavam pṛthak sakṛt sandhāna mokṣeṇa tat adbhutam abhūt raṇe
namuciḥ pañca-daśabhiḥ svarṇa-puṅkhaiḥ mahā-iṣubhiḥ āhatya vyanadat saṅkhye sa-toyaḥ iva toya-daḥ
sarvataḥ śara-kūṭena śakram sa-ratha sārathim chādayām āsuḥ asurāḥ prāvṛṭ sūryam iva ambu-dāḥ
alakṣayantaḥ tam atīva vihvalāḥ vicukruśuḥ deva-gaṇāḥ saha-anugāḥ anāyakāḥ śatru-balena nirjitāḥ vaṇik-pathāḥ bhinna-navaḥ yathā arṇave
tataḥ turāṣāṭ iṣu-baddha-pañjarāt vinirgataḥ sa aśva ratha dhvaja agraṇīḥ babhau diśaḥ kham pṛthivīm ca rocayan sva-tejasā sūryaḥ iva kṣapā-atyaye
nirīkṣya pṛtanām devaḥ paraiḥ abhyarditām raṇe udayacchat ripum hantum vajram vajra-dharaḥ ruṣā
saḥ tena eva aṣṭa-dhāreṇa śirasī bala-pākayoḥ jñātīnām paśyatām rājan jahāra janayan bhayam
namuciḥ tat vadham dṛṣṭvā śoka-amarṣa ruṣā-anvitaḥ jighāṁsuḥ indram nṛ-pate cakāra parama udyamam
aśmasāra-mayam śūlam ghaṇṭā-vat hema-bhūṣaṇam pragṛhya abhyadravat kruddhaḥ hataḥ asi iti vitarjayan prāhiṇot deva-rājāya ninadan mṛga-rāṭ iva
