yaḥ priya-artham utaṅkasya dhundhu-nāma asuram balī sutānām eka-viṁśatyā sahasraiḥ ahanat vṛtaḥ
dhundhu-māraḥ iti khyātaḥ tat-sutāḥ te ca jajvaluḥ dhundhoḥ mukha-agninā sarve trayaḥ eva avaśeṣitāḥ dṛḍhāśvaḥ kapilāśvaḥ ca bhadrāśvaḥ iti bhārata dṛḍhāśva-putraḥ haryaśvaḥ nikumbhaḥ tat-sutaḥ smṛtaḥ
bahulāśvaḥ nikumbhasya kṛśāśvaḥ atha asya senajit yuvanāśvaḥ abhavat tasya saḥ anapatyaḥ vanam gataḥ
bhāryā-śatena nirviṇṇaḥ ṛṣayaḥ asya kṛpālavaḥ iṣṭim sma vartayām cakruḥ aindrīm te su-samāhitāḥ
rājā tat-yajña-sadanam praviṣṭaḥ niśi tarṣitaḥ dṛṣṭvā śayānān viprān tān papau mantra-jalam svayam
utthitāḥ te niśamya atha vyudakam kalaśam prabho papracchuḥ kasya karma idam pītam puṁsavanam jalam
rājñā pītam viditvā vai īśvara-prahitena te īśvarāya namaḥ cakruḥ aho daiva-balam balam
tataḥ kāle upāvṛtte kukṣim nirbhidya dakṣiṇam yuvanāśvasya tanayaḥ cakravartī jajāna ha
kam dhāsyati kumāraḥ ayam stanye rorūyate bhṛśam mām dhātā vatsa mā rodīḥ iti indraḥ deśinīm adāt
na mamāra pitā tasya vipra-deva-prasādataḥ yuvanāśvaḥ atha tatra eva tapasā siddhim anvagāt
trasat-dasyuḥ iti indraḥ aṅga vidadhe nāma yasya vai yasmāt trasanti hi udvignāḥ dasyavaḥ rāvaṇa-ādayaḥ yauvanāśvaḥ atha māndhātā cakravartī avanīm prabhuḥ sapta-dvīpa-vatīm ekaḥ śaśāsa acyuta-tejasā
īje ca yajñam kratubhiḥ ātma-vit bhūri-dakṣiṇaiḥ sarva-deva-mayam devam sarva-ātmakam ati-indriyam dravyam mantraḥ vidhiḥ yajñaḥ yajamānaḥ tathā ṛtvijaḥ dharmaḥ deśaḥ ca kālaḥ ca sarvam etat yat ātmakam
yāvat sūryaḥ udeti sma yāvat ca pratitiṣṭhati tat sarvam yauvanāśvasya māndhātuḥ kṣetram ucyate
śaśabindoḥ duhitari bindumatyām adhāt nṛpaḥ purukutsam ambarīṣam mucukundam ca yoginam teṣām svasāraḥ pañcāśat saubharim vavrire patim
yamunā-antaḥ-jale magnaḥ tapyamānaḥ param tapaḥ nirvṛtim mīna-rājasya dṛṣṭvā maithuna-dharmiṇaḥ jāta-spṛhaḥ nṛpam vipraḥ kanyām ekām ayācata saḥ api āha gṛhyatām brahman kāmam kanyā svayaṁvare
saḥ vicintya apriyam strīṇām jaraṭhaḥ aham asat-mataḥ valī palitaḥ ejat-kaḥ iti aham pratyudāhṛtaḥ sādhayiṣye tathā ātmānam sura-strīṇām abhīpsitam kim punaḥ manuja-indrāṇām iti vyavasitaḥ prabhuḥ
muniḥ praveśitaḥ kṣatrā kanyā-antaḥpuram ṛddhi-mat vṛtaḥ saḥ rāja-kanyābhiḥ ekam pañcāśatā varaḥ
tāsām kaliḥ abhūt bhūyān tat-arthe apohya sauhṛdam mama anurūpaḥ na ayam vaḥ iti tat-gata-cetasām
saḥ bahu-ṛcaḥ tābhiḥ apāraṇīya tapaḥ śriyā anarghya paricchadeṣu gṛheṣu nānā upavana amala ambhaḥ saraḥsu saugandhika kānaneṣu mahā-arha śayyā āsana vastra bhūṣaṇa snāna anulepa abhyavahāra mālyakaiḥ su-alaṅkṛta strī puruṣeṣu nityadā reme anugāyat dvija bhṛṅga vandiṣu
yat gārhasthyam tu saṁvīkṣya sapta-dvīpa-vatī-patiḥ vismitaḥ stambham ajahāt sārva-bhauma śriyā-anvitam
evam gṛheṣu abhirataḥ viṣayān vividhaiḥ sukhaiḥ sevamānaḥ na ca atuṣyat ājya-stokaiḥ iva analaḥ
saḥ kadācit upāsīnaḥ ātma-apahnavam ātmanaḥ dadarśa bahu-ṛca-ācāryaḥ mīna-saṅga samutthitam
aho imam paśyata me vināśam tapasvinaḥ sat-carita vratasya antaḥ-jale vāri-cara-prasaṅgāt pracyāvitam brahma ciram dhṛtam yat
saṅgam tyajeta mithuna-vratīnām mumukṣuḥ sarva-ātmanā na visṛjet bahiḥ-indriyāṇi ekaḥ caran rahasi cittam anante īśe yuñjīta tat-vratiṣu sādhuṣu cet prasaṅgaḥ
ekaḥ tapasvī aham atha ambhasi matsya-saṅgāt pañcāśat āsam uta pañca-sahasra-sargaḥ na antam vrajāmi ubhaya-kṛtya manorathānām māyā-guṇaiḥ hṛta matiḥ viṣaye artha-bhāvaḥ
evam vasan gṛhe kālam viraktaḥ nyāsam āsthitaḥ vanam jagāma anuyayuḥ tat-patnyaḥ pati-devatāḥ
tatra taptvā tapaḥ tīkṣṇam ātma-darśanam ātmavān saha eva agnibhiḥ ātmānam yuyoja parama-ātmani
tāḥ sva-patyuḥ mahārāja nirīkṣya adhyātmikīm gatim anvīyuḥ tat-prabhāveṇa agnim śāntam iva arciṣaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca māndhātuḥ putra-pravaraḥ yaḥ ambarīṣaḥ prakīrtitaḥ pitāmahena pravṛtaḥ yauvanāśvaḥ tu tat-sutaḥ hārītaḥ tasya putraḥ abhūt māndhātṛ pravarāḥ ime
narmadā bhrātṛbhiḥ dattā purukutsāya yā uragaiḥ tayā rasātalam nītaḥ bhujaga-indra-prayuktayā
gandharvān avadhīt tatra vadhyān vai viṣṇu-śakti-dhṛk nāgāt labdha-varaḥ sarpāt abhayam smaratām idam
trasaddasyuḥ paurukutsaḥ yaḥ anaraṇyasya deha-kṛt haryaśvaḥ tat-sutaḥ tasmāt prāruṇaḥ atha tribandhanaḥ
tasya satyavrataḥ putraḥ triśaṅkuḥ iti viśrutaḥ prāptaḥ cāṇḍālatām śāpāt guroḥ kauśika-tejasā saśarīraḥ gataḥ svargam adya api divi dṛśyate pātitaḥ avāk-śirāḥ devaiḥ tena eva stambhitaḥ balāt
traiśaṅkavaḥ hariścandraḥ viśvāmitra-vasiṣṭhayoḥ yat-nimittam abhūt yuddham pakṣiṇoḥ bahu-vārṣikam
saḥ anapatyaḥ viṣaṇṇa-ātmā nāradasya upadeśataḥ varuṇam śaraṇam yātaḥ putraḥ me jāyatām prabho
yadi vīraḥ mahārāja tena eva tvām yaje iti tathā iti varuṇena asya putraḥ jātaḥ tu rohitaḥ
jātaḥ sutaḥ hi anena aṅga mām yajasva iti saḥ abravīt yadā paśuḥ nirdaśaḥ syāt atha medhyaḥ bhavet iti
nirdaśe ca saḥ āgatya yajasva iti āha saḥ abravīt dantāḥ paśoḥ yat jāyeran atha medhyaḥ bhavet iti
dantāḥ jātāḥ yajasva iti saḥ pratyāha atha saḥ abravīt yadā patanti asya dantāḥ atha medhyaḥ bhavet iti
paśoḥ nipatitāḥ dantāḥ yajasva iti āha saḥ abravīt yadā paśoḥ punaḥ dantāḥ jāyante atha paśuḥ śuciḥ
punaḥ jātāḥ yajasva iti saḥ pratyāha atha saḥ abravīt sānnāhikaḥ yadā rājan rājanyaḥ atha paśuḥ śuciḥ
iti putra-anurāgeṇa sneha-yantrita-cetasā kālam vañcayatā tam tam uktaḥ devaḥ tam aikṣata
rohitaḥ tat abhijñāya pituḥ karma cikīrṣitam prāṇa-prepsuḥ dhanuḥ-pāṇiḥ araṇyam pratyapadyata
pitaram varuṇa-grastam śrutvā jāta mahā-udaram rohitaḥ grāmam eyāya tam indraḥ pratyaṣedhata
bhūmeḥ paryaṭanam puṇyam tīrtha-kṣetra niṣevaṇaiḥ rohitāya ādiśat śakraḥ saḥ api araṇye avasat samām
evam dvitīye tṛtīye caturthe pañcame tathā abhyetya abhyetya sthaviraḥ vipraḥ bhūtvā āha vṛtra-hā
ṣaṣṭham saṁvatsaram tatra caritvā rohitaḥ purīm upavrajan ajīgartāt akrīṇāt madhyamam sutam śunaḥśepham paśum pitre pradāya samavandata
tataḥ puruṣa-medhena hariścandraḥ mahā-yaśāḥ mukta-udaraḥ ayajat devān varuṇa-ādīn mahat-kathaḥ
viśvāmitraḥ abhavat tasmin hotā ca adhvaryuḥ ātmavān jamadagniḥ abhūt brahmā vasiṣṭhaḥ ayāsyaḥ sāma-gaḥ
tasmai tuṣṭaḥ dadau indraḥ śātakaumbha-mayam ratham śunaḥśephasya māhātmyam upariṣṭāt pracakṣyate
satyam sāram dhṛtim dṛṣṭvā sa-bhāryasya ca bhūpateḥ viśvāmitraḥ bhṛśam prītaḥ dadau avihatām gatim
manaḥ pṛthivyām tām adbhiḥ tejasā apaḥ anilena tat khe vāyum dhārayan tat ca bhūta-ādau tam mahā-ātmani tasmin jñāna-kalām dhyātvā tayā ajñānam vinirdahan hitvā tām svena bhāvena nirvāṇa-sukha-saṁvidā anirdeśya apratarkyeṇa tasthau vidhvasta bandhanaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca haritaḥ rohita-sutaḥ campaḥ tasmāt vinirmitā campā-purī sudevaḥ ataḥ vijayaḥ yasya ca ātma-jaḥ
bharukaḥ tat-sutaḥ tasmāt vṛkaḥ tasya api bāhukaḥ saḥ aribhiḥ hṛta-bhūḥ rājā sa-bhāryaḥ vanam āviśat
vṛddham tam pañcatām prāptam mahiṣī anumariṣyatī aurveṇa jānatā ātmānam prajā-vantam nivāritā
ājñāya asyai sapatnībhiḥ garaḥ dattaḥ andhasā saha saha tena eva sañjātaḥ sagara-ākhyaḥ mahā-yaśāḥ sagaraḥ cakravartī āsīt sāgaraḥ yat-sutaiḥ kṛtaḥ
yaḥ tālajaṅghān yavanān śakān haihaya barbarān na avadhīt guru-vākyena cakre vikṛta-veṣiṇaḥ muṇḍān śmaśru-dharān kāṁścit mukta-keśa ardha-muṇḍitān anantaḥ-vāsasaḥ kāṁścit abahiḥ-vāsasaḥ aparān
saḥ aśvamedhaiḥ ayajata sarva-veda sura ātmakam aurva-upadiṣṭa-yogena harim ātmānam īśvaram tasya utsṛṣṭam paśum yajñe jahāra aśvam purandaraḥ
sumatyāḥ tanayāḥ dṛptāḥ pituḥ ādeśa-kāriṇaḥ hayam anveṣamāṇāḥ te samantāt nyakhanan mahīm
prāk-udīcyām diśi hayam dadṛśuḥ kapila-antike eṣaḥ vāji-haraḥ cauraḥ āste mīlita-locanaḥ hanyatām hanyatām pāpaḥ iti ṣaṣṭi-sahasriṇaḥ udāyudhāḥ abhiyayuḥ unmimeṣa tadā muniḥ
sva-śarīra-agninā tāvat mahendra hṛta-cetasaḥ mahat vyatikrama-hatāḥ bhasmasāt abhavan kṣaṇāt
na sādhu-vādaḥ muni-kopa bharjitāḥ nṛpendra-putrāḥ iti sattva-dhāmani katham tamaḥ roṣa-mayam vibhāvyate jagat-pavitra-ātmani khe rajaḥ bhuvaḥ
yasya īritā sāṅkhya-mayī dṛḍhā iha nauḥ yayā mumukṣuḥ tarate duratyayam bhava-arṇavam mṛtyu-patham vipaścitaḥ parātma-bhūtasya katham pṛthak-matiḥ
yaḥ asamañjasaḥ iti uktaḥ saḥ keśinyāḥ nṛpa-ātmajaḥ tasya putraḥ aṁśumān nāma pitāmaha-hite rataḥ
asamañjasaḥ ātmānam darśayan asamañjasam jāti-smaraḥ purā saṅgāt yogī yogāt vicālitaḥ ācaran garhitam loke jñātīnām karma vipriyam sarayvām krīḍataḥ bālān prāsyat udvejayan janam
evam vṛttaḥ parityaktaḥ pitrā sneham apohya vai yoga-aiśvaryeṇa bālān tān darśayitvā tataḥ yayau
ayodhyā-vāsinaḥ sarve bālakān punaḥ āgatān dṛṣṭvā visismire rājan rājā ca api anvatapyata
aṁśumān coditaḥ rājñā turaga anveṣaṇe yayau pitṛvya-khāta anupatham bhasma-anti dadṛśe hayam
tatra āsīnam munim vīkṣya kapila-ākhyam adhokṣajam astaut samāhita-manāḥ prāñjaliḥ praṇataḥ mahān
aṁśumān uvāca na paśyati tvām param ātmanaḥ ajanaḥ na budhyate adya api samādhi yuktibhiḥ kutaḥ apare tasya manaḥ-śarīra-dhī visarga-sṛṣṭāḥ vayam aprakāśāḥ
ye deha-bhājaḥ tri-guṇa-pradhānāḥ guṇān vipaśyanti uta vā tamaḥ ca yat-māyayā mohita cetasaḥ tvām viduḥ sva-saṁstham na bahiḥ-prakāśāḥ
tam tvām aham jñāna-ghanam svabhāva pradhvasta māyā-guṇa bheda-mohaiḥ sanandana-ādyaiḥ munibhiḥ vibhāvyam katham vimūḍhaḥ paribhāvayāmi
praśānta māyā-guṇa karma-liṅgam anāma-rūpam sat-asat-vimuktam jñāna-upadeśāya gṛhīta-deham namāmahe tvām puruṣam purāṇam
tvat-māyā racite loke vastu-buddhyā gṛha-ādiṣu bhramanti kāma lobha īrṣyā moha vibhrānta cetasaḥ
adya naḥ sarva-bhūta-ātman kāma-karma-indriya-āśayaḥ moha-pāśaḥ dṛḍhaḥ chinnaḥ bhagavan tava darśanāt
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ittham gīta-anubhāvaḥ tam bhagavān kapilaḥ muniḥ aṁśumantam uvāca idam anugrāhya dhiyā nṛpa
śrī-bhagavān uvāca aśvaḥ ayam nīyatām vatsa pitāmaha paśuḥ tava ime ca pitaraḥ dagdhāḥ gaṅgā-ambhaḥ arhanti na itarat
tam parikramya śirasā prasādya hayam ānayat sagaraḥ tena paśunā yajña-śeṣam samāpayat
rājyam aṁśumate nyasya niḥspṛhaḥ mukta-bandhanaḥ aurva-upadiṣṭa mārgeṇa lebhe gatim anuttamām
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca aṁśumān ca tapaḥ tepe gaṅgā ānayana-kāmyayā kālam mahāntam na aśaknot tataḥ kālena saṁsthitaḥ
dilīpaḥ tat-sutaḥ tat-vat aśaktaḥ kālam eyivān bhagīrathaḥ tasya sutaḥ tepe saḥ su-mahat tapaḥ
darśayām āsa tam devī prasannā varadā asmi te iti uktaḥ svam abhiprāyam śaśaṁsa avanataḥ nṛpaḥ
kaḥ api dhārayitā vegam patantyāḥ me mahī-tale anyathā bhū-talam bhittvā nṛpa yāsye rasātalam
kim ca aham na bhuvam yāsye narāḥ mayi āmṛjanti agham mṛjāmi tat agham kva aham rājan tatra vicintyatām
śrī-bhagīrathaḥ uvāca sādhavaḥ nyāsinaḥ śāntāḥ brahmiṣṭhāḥ loka-pāvanāḥ haranti agham te aṅga-saṅgāt teṣu āste hi agha-bhit hariḥ
dhārayiṣyati te vegam rudraḥ tu ātmā śarīriṇām yasmin otam idam protam viśvam śāṭī iva tantuṣu
iti uktvā saḥ nṛpaḥ devam tapasā atoṣayat śivam kālena alpīyasā rājan tasya īśaḥ ca āśu atuṣyata
tathā iti rājñā abhihitam sarva-loka-hitaḥ śivaḥ dadhāra avahitaḥ gaṅgām pāda-pūta-jalām hareḥ
bhagīrathaḥ saḥ rāja-ṛṣiḥ ninye bhuvana-pāvanīm yatra sva-pitṝṇām dehāḥ bhasmībhūtāḥ sma śerate
rathena vāyu-vegena prayāntam anudhāvatī deśān punantī nirdagdhān āsiñcat sagara-ātmajān
yat-jala sparśa-mātreṇa brahma-daṇḍa-hatāḥ api sagara-ātmajāḥ divam jagmuḥ kevalam deha-bhasmabhiḥ
bhasmībhūta-aṅga saṅgena svaḥ yātāḥ sagara-ātmajāḥ kim punaḥ śraddhayā devīm sevante ye dhṛta-vratāḥ
na hi etat param āścaryam svardhunyāḥ yat iha uditam ananta caraṇa-ambhoja prasūtāyāḥ bhava-chidaḥ
sanniveśya manaḥ yasmin śraddhayā munayaḥ amalāḥ traiguṇyam dustyajam hitvā sadyaḥ yātāḥ tat-ātmatām
śrutaḥ bhagīrathāt jajñe tasya nābhaḥ aparaḥ abhavat sindhudvīpaḥ tataḥ tasmāt ayutāyuḥ tataḥ abhavat ṛtūparṇaḥ nala-sakhaḥ yaḥ aśva-vidyām ayāt nalāt dattvā akṣa-hṛdayam ca asmai sarvakāmaḥ tu tat-sutam
tataḥ sudāsaḥ tat-putraḥ damayantī-patiḥ nṛpaḥ āhuḥ mitrasaham yam vai kalmāṣāṅghrim uta kvacit vasiṣṭha-śāpāt rakṣaḥ abhūt anapatyaḥ sva-karmaṇā
śrī-rājā uvāca kim nimittaḥ guroḥ śāpaḥ saudāsasya mahā-ātmanaḥ etat veditum icchāmaḥ kathyatām na rahaḥ yadi
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca saudāsaḥ mṛgayām kiñcit caran rakṣaḥ jaghāna ha mumoca bhrātaram saḥ atha gataḥ praticikīrṣayā sañcintayan agham rājñaḥ sūda-rūpa-dharaḥ gṛhe gurave bhoktu-kāmāya paktvā ninye nara-āmiṣam
parivekṣyamāṇam bhagavān vilokya abhakṣyam añjasā rājānam aśapat kruddhaḥ rakṣaḥ hi evam bhaviṣyasi
rakṣaḥ-kṛtam tat viditvā cakre dvādaśa-vārṣikam saḥ api apaḥ-añjalim ādāya gurum śaptum samudyataḥ vāritaḥ madayantyā apaḥ ruśatīḥ pādayoḥ jahau diśaḥ kham avanīm sarvam paśyan jīva-mayam nṛpaḥ
rākṣasam bhāvam āpannaḥ pāde kalmāṣatām gataḥ vyavāya-kāle dadṛśe vana-okaḥ dam-patī dvijau
kṣudhā-ārtaḥ jagṛhe vipram tat-patnī āha akṛta-artha-vat na bhavān rākṣasaḥ sākṣāt ikṣvākūṇām mahā-rathaḥ madayantyāḥ patiḥ vīra na adharmam kartum arhasi dehi me apatya-kāmāyāḥ akṛta-artham patim dvijam
dehaḥ ayam mānuṣaḥ rājan puruṣasya akhila artha-daḥ tasmāt asya vadhaḥ vīra sarva-artha-vadhaḥ ucyate
eṣaḥ hi brāhmaṇaḥ vidvān tapaḥ śīla guṇa-anvitaḥ ārirādhayiṣuḥ brahma mahā-puruṣa saṁjñitam sarva-bhūta ātma-bhāvena bhūteṣu antarhitam guṇaiḥ
saḥ ayam brahma-ṛṣi-varyaḥ te rāja-ṛṣi-pravarāt vibho katham arhati dharma-jña vadham pituḥ iva ātmajaḥ
tasya sādhoḥ apāpasya bhrūṇasya brahma-vādinaḥ katham vadham yathā babhroḥ manyate sat-mataḥ bhavān
yadi ayam kriyate bhakṣyaḥ tarhi mām khāda pūrvataḥ na jīviṣye vinā yena kṣaṇam ca mṛtakam yathā
evam karuṇa-bhāṣiṇyāḥ vilapantyāḥ anātha-vat vyāghraḥ paśum iva akhādat saudāsaḥ śāpa mohitaḥ
brāhmaṇī vīkṣya didhiṣum puruṣa-adena bhakṣitam śocantī ātmānam urvīśam aśapat kupitā satī
yasmāt me bhakṣitaḥ pāpa kāma-ārtāyāḥ patiḥ tvayā tava api mṛtyuḥ ādhānāt akṛta-prajña darśitaḥ
evam mitrasaham śaptvā pati-loka-parāyaṇā tat-asthīni samiddhe agnau prāsya bhartuḥ gatim gatā
viśāpaḥ dvādaśa-abda-ante maithunāya samudyataḥ vijñāpya brāhmaṇī-śāpam mahiṣyā saḥ nivāritaḥ
ataḥ ūrdhvam saḥ tatyāja strī-sukham karmaṇā aprajāḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ tat-anujñātaḥ madayantyām prajām adhāt
sā vai sapta samāḥ garbham abibhrat na vyajāyata jaghne aśmanā udaram tasyāḥ saḥ aśmakaḥ tena kathyate
aśmakāt bālikaḥ jajñe yaḥ strībhiḥ parirakṣitaḥ nārī-kavacaḥ iti uktaḥ niḥkṣatre mūlakaḥ abhavat
tataḥ daśarathaḥ tasmāt putraḥ aiḍaviḍiḥ tataḥ rājā viśvasahaḥ yasya khaṭvāṅgaḥ cakravartī abhūt
yaḥ devaiḥ arthitaḥ daityān avadhīt yudhi durjayaḥ muhūrtam āyuḥ jñātvā etya sva-puram sandadhe manaḥ
na me brahma-kulāt prāṇāḥ kula-daivāt na ca ātmajāḥ na śriyaḥ na mahī rājyam na dārāḥ ca ati-vallabhāḥ
na bālye api matiḥ mahyam adharme ramate kvacit na apaśyam uttamaślokāt anyat kiñcana vastu aham
devaiḥ kāma-varaḥ dattaḥ mahyam tri-bhuvana-īśvaraiḥ na vṛṇe tam aham kāmam bhūtabhāvana-bhāvanaḥ
ye vikṣipta-indriya-dhiyaḥ devāḥ te sva-hṛdi sthitam na vindanti priyam śaśvat ātmānam kim uta apare
atha īśa-māyā raciteṣu saṅgam guṇeṣu gandharva-pura-upameṣu rūḍham prakṛtyā ātmani viśva-kartuḥ bhāvena hitvā tam aham prapadye
iti vyavasitaḥ buddhyā nārāyaṇa-gṛhītayā hitvā anya-bhāvam ajñānam tataḥ svam bhāvam āsthitaḥ
yat tat brahma param sūkṣmam aśūnyam śūnya-kalpitam bhagavān vāsudeva iti yam gṛṇanti hi sātvatāḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca khaṭvāṅgāt dīrghabāhuḥ ca raghuḥ tasmāt pṛthu-śravāḥ ajaḥ tataḥ mahā-rājaḥ tasmāt daśarathaḥ abhavat
tasya api bhagavān eṣaḥ sākṣāt brahma-mayaḥ hariḥ aṁśa-aṁśena caturdhā agāt putratvam prārthitaḥ suraiḥ rāma lakṣmaṇa bharata śatrughnāḥ iti saṁjñayā
tasya anucaritam rājan ṛṣibhiḥ tattva-darśibhiḥ śrutam hi varṇitam bhūri tvayā sītā-pateḥ muhuḥ
guru-arthe tyakta-rājyaḥ vyacarat anuvanam padma-padbhyām priyāyāḥ pāṇi-sparśa-akṣamābhyām mṛjita-patha-rujaḥ yaḥ harīndra-anujābhyām vairūpyāt śūrpaṇakhyāḥ priya-viraha ruṣā āropita-bhrū-vijṛmbha trasta abdhiḥ baddha-setuḥ khala-dava-dahanaḥ kosala-indraḥ avatāt naḥ
viśvāmitra-adhvare yena mārīca-ādyāḥ niśā-carāḥ paśyataḥ lakṣmaṇasya eva hatāḥ nairṛta-puṅgavāḥ
yaḥ loka-vīra-samitau dhanuḥ aiśam ugram sītā-svayaṁvara-gṛhe triśata-upanītam ādāya bāla-gaja-līlaḥ iva ikṣu-yaṣṭim sajjyī-kṛtam nṛpa vikṛṣya babhañja madhye jitvā anurūpa guṇa śīla vayaḥ aṅga rūpām sītā-abhidhām śriyam urasi abhilabdhamānām mārge vrajan bhṛgupateḥ vyanayat prarūḍham darpam mahīm akṛta yaḥ triḥ arāja bījām
yaḥ satya-pāśa-parivīta-pituḥ nideśam straiṇasya ca api śirasā jagṛhe sa-bhāryaḥ rājyam śriyam praṇayinaḥ suhṛdaḥ nivāsam tyaktvā yayau vanam asūn iva mukta-saṅgaḥ
rakṣaḥ-svasuḥ vyakṛta rūpam aśuddha-buddheḥ tasyāḥ khara-triśira-dūṣaṇa-mukhya-bandhūn jaghne caturdaśa-sahasram apāraṇīya kodaṇḍa pāṇiḥ aṭamānaḥ uvāsa kṛcchram
sītā-kathā śravaṇa dīpita hṛt-śayena sṛṣṭam vilokya nṛpate daśa-kandhareṇa jaghne adbhuta-eṇa-vapuṣā āśramataḥ apakṛṣṭaḥ mārīcam āśu viśikhena yathā kam ugraḥ
rakṣaḥ-adhamena vṛka-vat vipine asamakṣam vaideha-rāja-duhitari apayāpitāyām bhrātrā vane kṛpaṇa-vat priyayā viyuktaḥ strī-saṅginām gatim iti prathayan cacāra
dagdhvā ātma-kṛtya-hata-kṛtyam ahan kabandham sakhyam vidhāya kapibhiḥ dayitā-gatim taiḥ buddhvā atha vālini hate plavaga-indra-sainyaiḥ velām agāt saḥ manu-jaḥ aja bhava arcita-aṅghriḥ
yat-roṣa vibhrama vivṛtta kaṭākṣa-pāta sambhrānta nakra makaraḥ bhaya-gīrṇa-ghoṣaḥ sindhuḥ śirasi arhaṇam parigṛhya rūpī pāda-aravindam upagamya babhāṣa etat
na tvām vayam jaḍa-dhiyaḥ nu vidāmaḥ bhūman kūṭa-stham ādi-puruṣam jagatām adhīśam yat sattvataḥ sura-gaṇāḥ rajasaḥ prajā-īśāḥ manyoḥ ca bhūta-patayaḥ saḥ bhavān guṇa-īśaḥ
kāmam prayāhi jahi viśravasaḥ avameham trailokya rāvaṇam avāpnuhi vīra patnīm badhnīhi setum iha te yaśasaḥ vitatyai gāyanti dik-vijayinaḥ yam upetya bhūpāḥ
baddhvā udadhau raghu-patiḥ vividha adri-kūṭaiḥ setum kapi-indra kara-kampita bhūruha-aṅgaiḥ sugrīva nīla hanumat pramukhaiḥ anīkaiḥ laṅkām vibhīṣaṇa-dṛśā āviśat agra-dagdhām
sā vānara-indra bala ruddha vihāra koṣṭha śrī dvāra gopura sadaḥ valabhī viṭaṅkā nirbhajyamāna dhiṣaṇa dhvaja hema-kumbha śṛṅgāṭakā gaja-kulaiḥ hradinī iva ghūrṇā
rakṣaḥ-patiḥ tat avalokya nikumbha kumbha dhūmrākṣa durmukha surāntaka narāntaka ādīn putram prahastam atikāya vikampana ādīn sarva-anugān samahinot atha kumbhakarṇam
tām yātudhāna-pṛtanām asi śūla cāpa prāsa-ṛṣṭi śakti-śara tomara khaḍga durgām sugrīva lakṣmaṇa marut-suta gandhamāda nīla aṅgada ṛkṣa panasa ādibhiḥ anvitaḥ agāt
te anīka-pāḥ raghupateḥ abhipatya sarve dvandvam varūtham ibha patti ratha aśva yodhaiḥ jaghnuḥ drumaiḥ giri gadā iṣubhiḥ aṅgada-ādyāḥ sītā abhimarṣa hata maṅgala rāvaṇa-īśān
rakṣaḥ-patiḥ sva-bala-naṣṭim avekṣya ruṣṭaḥ āruhya yānakam atha abhisasāra rāmam svaḥ-syandane dyumati mātalinā upanīte vibhrājamānam ahanat niśitaiḥ kṣurapraiḥ
rāmaḥ tam āha puruṣa-ada-purīṣa yat naḥ kāntā asamakṣam asatā apahṛtā śva-vat te tyakta-trapasya phalam adya jugupsitasya yacchāmi kālaḥ iva kartuḥ alaṅghya-vīryaḥ
evam kṣipan dhanuṣi sandhitam utsasarja bāṇam saḥ vajram iva tat-hṛdayam bibheda saḥ asṛk vaman daśa-mukhaiḥ nyapatat vimānāt hāhā iti jalpati jane sukṛtī iva riktaḥ
tataḥ niṣkramya laṅkāyāḥ yātudhānyaḥ sahasraśaḥ mandodaryā samam tatra prarudantyaḥ upādravan
svān svān bandhūn pariṣvajya lakṣmaṇa-iṣubhiḥ arditān ruruduḥ su-svaram dīnāḥ ghnantyaḥ ātmānam ātmanā
hā hatāḥ sma vayam nātha loka-rāvaṇa rāvaṇa kam yāyāt śaraṇam laṅkā tvat-vihīnā para-arditā
na vai veda mahā-bhāga bhavān kāma-vaśam gataḥ tejaḥ anubhāvam sītāyāḥ yena nītaḥ daśām imām
kṛtā eṣā vidhavā laṅkā vayam ca kula-nandana dehaḥ kṛtaḥ annam gṛdhrāṇām ātmā naraka-hetave
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca svānām vibhīṣaṇaḥ cakre kosala-indra-anumoditaḥ pitṛ-medha-vidhānena yat uktam sāmparāyikam
tataḥ dadarśa bhagavān aśoka-vanika-āśrame kṣāmām sva-viraha-vyādhim śiṁśapā mūlam āśritām
rāmaḥ priya-tamām bhāryām dīnām vīkṣya anvakampata ātma-sandarśana āhlāda vikasat mukha paṅkajām
āropya āruruhe yānam bhrātṛbhyām hanumat-yutaḥ vibhīṣaṇāya bhagavān dattvā rakṣaḥ-gaṇa-īśatām laṅkām āyuḥ ca kalpa-antam yayau cīrṇa-vrataḥ purīm
avakīryamāṇaḥ su-kusumaiḥ loka-pāla-arpitaiḥ pathi upagīyamāna-caritaḥ śatadhṛti-ādibhiḥ mudā
go-mūtra-yāvakam śrutvā bhrātaram valkala-ambaram mahā-kāruṇikaḥ atapyat jaṭilam sthaṇḍile-śayam
bharataḥ prāptam ākarṇya paura amātya purohitaiḥ pāduke śirasi nyasya rāmam pratyudyataḥ agrajam nandigrāmāt sva-śibirāt gīta-vāditra niḥsvanaiḥ brahma-ghoṣeṇa ca muhuḥ paṭhadbhiḥ brahma-vādibhiḥ svarṇa-kakṣa-patākābhiḥ haimaiḥ citra-dhvajaiḥ rathaiḥ sat-aśvaiḥ rukma sannāhaiḥ bhaṭaiḥ puraṭa-varmabhiḥ śreṇībhiḥ vāra-mukhyābhiḥ bhṛtyaiḥ ca eva pada-anugaiḥ pārameṣṭhyāni upādāya paṇyāni ucca-avacāni ca pādayoḥ nyapatat premṇā praklinna hṛdaya īkṣaṇaḥ
pāduke nyasya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ bāṣpa-locanaḥ tam āśliṣya ciram dorbhyām snāpayan netra-jaiḥ jalaiḥ rāmaḥ lakṣmaṇa-sītābhyām viprebhyaḥ ye arha-sattamāḥ tebhyaḥ svayam namaḥ-cakre prajābhiḥ ca namaḥ-kṛtaḥ
dhunvantaḥ uttara-āsaṅgān patim vīkṣya cira-āgatam uttarāḥ kosalāḥ mālyaiḥ kirantaḥ nanṛtuḥ mudā
pāduke bharataḥ agṛhṇāt cāmara vyajana uttame vibhīṣaṇaḥ sa-sugrīvaḥ śveta-chatram marut-sutaḥ dhanuḥ niṣaṅgān śatrughnaḥ sītā tīrtha-kamaṇḍalum abibhrat aṅgadaḥ khaḍgam haimam carma ṛkṣa-rāṭ nṛpa
puṣpaka-sthaḥ nutaḥ strībhiḥ stūyamānaḥ ca vandibhiḥ vireje bhagavān rājan grahaiḥ candraḥ iva uditaḥ
bhrātrā abhinanditaḥ saḥ atha sa-utsavām prāviśat purīm praviśya rāja-bhavanam guru-patnīḥ sva-mātaram gurūn vayasya avara-jān pūjitaḥ pratyapūjayat vaidehī lakṣmaṇaḥ ca eva yathā-vat samupeyatuḥ
putrān sva-mātaraḥ tāḥ tu prāṇān tanvaḥ iva utthitāḥ āropya aṅke abhiṣiñcantyaḥ bāṣpa oghaiḥ vijahuḥ śucaḥ
jaṭāḥ nirmucya vidhi-vat kula-vṛddhaiḥ samam guruḥ abhyaṣiñcat yathā eva indram catuḥ-sindhu-jala ādibhiḥ
evam kṛta-śiraḥ-snānaḥ su-vāsāḥ sragvi-alaṅkṛtaḥ su-alaṅkṛtaiḥ su-vāsobhiḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ bhāryayā babhau
agrahīt āsanam bhrātrā praṇipatya prasāditaḥ prajāḥ sva-dharma-niratāḥ varṇāśrama guṇa-anvitāḥ jugopa pitṛ-vat rāmaḥ menire pitaram ca tam
tretāyām vartamānāyām kālaḥ kṛta samaḥ abhavat rāme rājani dharma-jñe sarva-bhūta sukha-āvahe
vanāni nadyaḥ girayaḥ varṣāṇi dvīpa sindhavaḥ sarve kāma-dughāḥ āsan prajānām bharata-ṛṣabha
na ādhi vyādhi jarā glāni duḥkha śoka bhaya klamāḥ mṛtyuḥ ca anicchatām na āsīt rāme rājani adhokṣaje
eka-patnī-vrata-dharaḥ rāja-ṛṣi caritaḥ śuciḥ sva-dharmam gṛha-medhīyam śikṣayan svayam ācarat
premṇā anuvṛttyā śīlena praśraya-avanatā satī bhiyā hriyā ca bhāva-jñā bhartuḥ sītā aharat manaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca bhagavān ātmanā ātmānam rāmaḥ uttama-kalpakaiḥ sarva-deva-mayam devam īje atha ācāryavān makhaiḥ
hotre adadāt diśam prācīm brahmaṇe dakṣiṇām prabhuḥ adhvaryave pratīcīm vā uttarām sāma-gāya saḥ
ācāryāya dadau śeṣām yāvatī bhūḥ tat-antarā manyamānaḥ idam kṛtsnam brāhmaṇaḥ arhati niḥspṛhaḥ
iti ayam tat alaṅkāra-vāsobhyām avaśeṣitaḥ tathā rājñī api vaidehī saumaṅgalyā avaśeṣitā
te tu brāhmaṇa-devasya vātsalyam vīkṣya saṁstutam prītāḥ klinna-dhiyaḥ tasmai pratyarpya idam babhāṣire
aprattam naḥ tvayā kim nu bhagavan bhuvana-īśvara yat naḥ antaḥ-hṛdayam viśya tamaḥ haṁsi sva-rociṣā
namaḥ brahmaṇya-devāya rāmāya akuṇṭha-medhase uttamaśloka-dhuryāya nyasta-daṇḍa-arpita-aṅghraye
kadācit loka-jijñāsuḥ gūḍhaḥ rātryām alakṣitaḥ caran vācaḥ aśṛṇot rāmaḥ bhāryām uddiśya kasyacit
na aham bibharmi tvām duṣṭām asatīm para-veśma-gām straiṇaḥ hi bibhṛyāt sītām rāmaḥ na aham bhaje punaḥ
iti lokāt bahu-mukhāt durārādhyāt asaṁvidaḥ patyā bhītena sā tyaktā prāptā prācetasa-āśramam
antarvatnī āgate kāle yamau sā suṣuve sutau kuśaḥ lavaḥ iti khyātau tayoḥ cakre kriyāḥ muniḥ
aṅgadaḥ citraketuḥ ca lakṣmaṇasya ātmajau smṛtau takṣaḥ puṣkalaḥ iti āstām bharatasya mahīpate
subāhuḥ śrutasenaḥ ca śatrughnasya babhūvatuḥ gandharvān koṭiśaḥ jaghne bharataḥ vijaye diśām tadīyam dhanam ānīya sarvam rājñe nyavedayat śatrughnaḥ ca madhoḥ putram lavaṇam nāma rākṣasam hatvā madhuvane cakre mathurām nāma vai purīm
munau nikṣipya tanayau sītā bhartrā vivāsitā dhyāyantī rāma-caraṇau vivaram praviveśa ha
tat śrutvā bhagavān rāmaḥ rundhan api dhiyā śucaḥ smaran tasyāḥ guṇān tān tān na aśaknot roddhum īśvaraḥ
strī-pum-prasaṅgaḥ etādṛk sarvatra trāsam-āvahaḥ api īśvarāṇām kim uta grāmyasya gṛha-cetasaḥ
tataḥ ūrdhvam brahmacaryam dhārayan ajuhot prabhuḥ trayodaśa-abda-sāhasram agnihotram akhaṇḍitam
smaratām hṛdi vinyasya viddham daṇḍaka-kaṇṭakaiḥ sva-pāda-pallavam rāmaḥ ātma-jyotiḥ agāt tataḥ
na idam yaśaḥ raghu-pateḥ sura-yācñayā ātta-līlā-tanoḥ adhika-sāmya-vimukta-dhāmnaḥ rakṣaḥ-vadhaḥ jaladhi-bandhanam astra-pūgaiḥ kim tasya śatru-hanane kapayaḥ sahāyāḥ
yasya amalam nṛpa-sadaḥsu yaśaḥ adhunā api gāyanti agha-ghnam ṛṣayaḥ dik-ibha-indra-paṭṭam tam nāka-pāla vasu-pāla kirīṭa juṣṭa pāda-ambujam raghu-patim śaraṇam prapadye
saḥ yaiḥ spṛṣṭaḥ abhidṛṣṭaḥ vā saṁviṣṭaḥ anugataḥ api vā kosalāḥ te yayuḥ sthānam yatra gacchanti yoginaḥ
puruṣaḥ rāma-caritam śravaṇaiḥ upadhārayan ānṛśaṁsya-paraḥ rājan karma-bandhaiḥ vimucyate
śrī-rājā uvāca katham saḥ bhagavān rāmaḥ bhrātṝn vā svayam ātmanaḥ tasmin vā te anvavartanta prajāḥ paurāḥ ca īśvare
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca atha ādiśat dik-vijaye bhrātṝn tri-bhuvana-īśvaraḥ ātmānam darśayan svānām purīm aikṣata sa-anugaḥ
āsikta-mārgām gandha-udaiḥ kariṇām mada-śīkaraiḥ svāminam prāptam ālokya mattām vā sutarām iva
prāsāda gopura sabhā caitya deva-gṛha ādiṣu vinyasta hema-kalaśaiḥ patākābhiḥ ca maṇḍitām
pūgaiḥ sa-vṛntaiḥ rambhābhiḥ paṭṭikābhiḥ su-vāsasām ādarśaiḥ aṁśukaiḥ sragbhiḥ kṛta-kautuka toraṇām
tam upeyuḥ tatra tatra paurāḥ arhaṇa-pāṇayaḥ āśiṣaḥ yuyujuḥ deva pāhi imām prāk tvayā uddhṛtām
tataḥ prajāḥ vīkṣya patim cira-āgatam didṛkṣayā utsṛṣṭa-gṛhāḥ striyaḥ narāḥ āruhya harmyāṇi aravinda-locanam atṛpta-netrāḥ kusumaiḥ avākiran
atha praviṣṭaḥ sva-gṛham juṣṭam svaiḥ pūrva-rājabhiḥ ananta akhila koṣa āḍhyam anarghya uru paricchadam vidruma udumbara-dvāraiḥ vaidūrya-stambha paṅktibhiḥ sthalaiḥ mārakataiḥ svacchaiḥ bhrājat sphaṭika bhittibhiḥ citra-sragbhiḥ paṭṭikābhiḥ vāsaḥ maṇi-gaṇa-aṁśukaiḥ muktā-phalaiḥ cit-ullāsaiḥ kānta-kāma upapattibhiḥ dhūpa-dīpaiḥ surabhibhiḥ maṇḍitam puṣpa-maṇḍanaiḥ strī-pumbhiḥ sura-saṅkāśaiḥ juṣṭam bhūṣaṇa-bhūṣaṇaiḥ
tasmin saḥ bhagavān rāmaḥ snigdhayā priyayā iṣṭayā reme sva-ārāma dhīrāṇām ṛṣabhaḥ sītayā kila
bubhuje ca yathā-kālam kāmān dharmam apīḍayan varṣa-pūgān bahūn nṝṇām abhidhyāta aṅghri-pallavaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca kuśasya ca atithiḥ tasmāt niṣadhaḥ tat-sutaḥ nabhaḥ puṇḍarīkaḥ atha tat-putraḥ kṣemadhanvā abhavat tataḥ
devānīkaḥ tataḥ anīhaḥ pāriyātraḥ atha tat-sutaḥ tataḥ balasthalaḥ tasmāt vajranābhaḥ arka-sambhavaḥ
sagaṇaḥ tat sutaḥ tasmāt vidhṛtiḥ ca abhavat sutaḥ tataḥ hiraṇyanābhaḥ abhūt yoga-ācāryaḥ tu jaimineḥ śiṣyaḥ kauśalyaḥ ādhyātmam yājñavalkyaḥ adhyagāt yataḥ yogam mahā-udayam ṛṣiḥ hṛdaya-granthi-bhedakam
puṣpaḥ hiraṇyanābhasya dhruvasandhiḥ tataḥ abhavat sudarśanaḥ atha agnivarṇaḥ śīghraḥ tasya maruḥ sutaḥ
saḥ asau āste yoga-siddhaḥ kalāpa-grāmam āsthitaḥ kaleḥ ante sūrya-vaṁśam naṣṭam bhāvayitā punaḥ
tasmāt prasuśrutaḥ tasya sandhiḥ tasya api amarṣaṇaḥ mahasvān tat sutaḥ tasmāt viśvabāhuḥ ajāyata
tataḥ prasenajit tasmāt takṣakaḥ bhavitā punaḥ tataḥ bṛhadbalaḥ yaḥ tu pitrā te samare hataḥ
ete hi ikṣvāku-bhūpālāḥ atītāḥ śṛṇu anāgatān bṛhadbalasya bhavitā putraḥ nāmnā bṛhadraṇaḥ
ūrukriyaḥ sutaḥ tasya vatsavṛddhaḥ bhaviṣyati prativyomaḥ tataḥ bhānuḥ divākaḥ vāhinī-patiḥ
sahadevaḥ tataḥ vīraḥ bṛhadaśvaḥ atha bhānumān pratīkāśvaḥ bhānumataḥ supratīkaḥ atha tat-sutaḥ
bhavitā marudevaḥ atha sunakṣatraḥ atha puṣkaraḥ tasya antarikṣaḥ tat-putraḥ sutapāḥ tat amitrajit
bṛhadrājaḥ tu tasya api barhiḥ tasmāt kṛtañjayaḥ raṇañjayaḥ tasya sutaḥ sañjayaḥ bhavitā tataḥ
tasmāt śākyaḥ atha śuddhodaḥ lāṅgalaḥ tat-sutaḥ smṛtaḥ tataḥ prasenajit tasmāt kṣudrakaḥ bhavitā tataḥ
raṇakaḥ bhavitā tasmāt surathaḥ tanayaḥ tataḥ sumitraḥ nāma niṣṭhā-antaḥ ete bārhadbala-anvayāḥ
ikṣvākūṇām ayam vaṁśaḥ sumitra-antaḥ bhaviṣyati yataḥ tam prāpya rājānam saṁsthām prāpsyati vai kalau
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca nimiḥ ikṣvāku-tanayaḥ vasiṣṭham avṛta ṛtvijam ārabhya satram saḥ api āha śakreṇa prāk vṛtaḥ asmi bhoḥ
tam nirvartya āgamiṣyāmi tāvat mām pratipālaya tūṣṇīm āsīt gṛha-patiḥ saḥ api indrasya akarot makham
nimiḥ calam idam vidvān satram ārabhata ātmavān ṛtvigbhiḥ aparaiḥ tāvat na āgamat yāvatā guruḥ
śiṣya-vyatikramam vīkṣya tam nirvartya āgataḥ guruḥ aśapat patatāt dehaḥ nimeḥ paṇḍita-māninaḥ
nimiḥ pratidadau śāpam gurave adharma-vartine tava api patatāt dehaḥ lobhāt dharmam ajānataḥ
iti utsasarja svam deham nimiḥ adhyātma-kovidaḥ mitrā-varuṇayoḥ jajñe urvaśyām prapitāmahaḥ
gandha-vastuṣu tat-deham nidhāya muni-sattamāḥ samāpte satra-yāge ca devān ūcuḥ samāgatān
rājñaḥ jīvatu dehaḥ ayam prasannāḥ prabhavaḥ yadi tathā iti ukte nimiḥ prāha mā bhūt me deha-bandhanam
yasya yogam na vāñchanti viyoga-bhaya-kātarāḥ bhajanti caraṇa-ambhojam munayaḥ hari-medhasaḥ
deham na avarurutse aham duḥkha-śoka-bhaya-āvaham sarvatra asya yataḥ mṛtyuḥ matsyānām udake yathā
devāḥ ūcuḥ videhaḥ uṣyatām kāmam locaneṣu śarīriṇām unmeṣaṇa-nimeṣābhyām lakṣitaḥ adhyātma-saṁsthitaḥ
arājaka-bhayam nṝṇām manyamānāḥ mahā-ṛṣayaḥ deham mamanthuḥ sma nimeḥ kumāraḥ samajāyata
janmanā janakaḥ saḥ abhūt vaidehaḥ tu videha-jaḥ mithilaḥ mathanāt jātaḥ mithilā yena nirmitā
tasmāt udāvasuḥ tasya putraḥ abhūt nandivardhanaḥ tataḥ suketuḥ tasya api devarātaḥ mahīpate
tasmāt bṛhadrathaḥ tasya mahāvīryaḥ sudhṛt-pitā sudhṛteḥ dhṛṣṭaketuḥ vai haryaśvaḥ atha maruḥ tataḥ
maroḥ pratīpakaḥ tasmāt jātaḥ kṛtarathaḥ yataḥ devamīḍhaḥ tasya putraḥ viśrutaḥ atha mahādhṛtiḥ
kṛtirātaḥ tataḥ tasmāt mahāromā ca tat-sutaḥ svarṇaromā sutaḥ tasya hrasvaromā vyajāyata
tataḥ śīradhvajaḥ jajñe yajña-artham karṣataḥ mahīm sītā śīra-agrataḥ jātā tasmāt śīradhvajaḥ smṛtaḥ
kuśadhvajaḥ tasya putraḥ tataḥ dharmadhvajaḥ nṛpaḥ dharmadhvajasya dvau putrau kṛtadhvaja-mitadhvajau
kṛtadhvajāt keśidhvajaḥ khāṇḍikyaḥ tu mitadhvajāt kṛtadhvaja-sutaḥ rājan ātma-vidyā-viśāradaḥ khāṇḍikyaḥ karma-tattva-jñaḥ bhītaḥ keśidhvajāt drutaḥ bhānumān tasya putraḥ abhūt śatadyumnaḥ tu tat-sutaḥ
śuciḥ tu tanayaḥ tasmāt sanadvājaḥ sutaḥ abhavat ūrjaketuḥ sanadvājāt ajaḥ atha purujit sutaḥ
ariṣṭanemiḥ tasya api śrutāyuḥ tat supārśvakaḥ tataḥ citrarathaḥ yasya kṣemādhiḥ mithilā-adhipaḥ
tasmāt samarathaḥ tasya sutaḥ satyarathaḥ tataḥ āsīt upaguruḥ tasmāt upaguptaḥ agni-sambhavaḥ
vasvanantaḥ atha tat-putraḥ yuyudhaḥ yat subhāṣaṇaḥ śrutaḥ tataḥ jayaḥ tasmāt vijayaḥ asmāt ṛtaḥ sutaḥ
śunakaḥ tat-sutaḥ jajñe vītahavyaḥ dhṛtiḥ tataḥ bahulāśvaḥ dhṛteḥ tasya kṛtiḥ asya mahāvaśī
ete vai maithilāḥ rājan ātma-vidyā-viśāradāḥ yogeśvara-prasādena dvandvaiḥ muktāḥ gṛheṣu api
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca atha ataḥ śrūyatām rājan vaṁśaḥ somasya pāvanaḥ yasmin aila-ādayaḥ bhūpāḥ kīrtyante puṇya-kīrtayaḥ
sahasra-śirasaḥ puṁsaḥ nābhi-hrada-saroruhāt jātasya āsīt sutaḥ dhātuḥ atriḥ pitṛ-samaḥ guṇaiḥ
tasya dṛgbhyaḥ abhavat putraḥ somaḥ amṛta-mayaḥ kila vipra oṣadhi uḍu-gaṇānām brahmaṇā kalpitaḥ patiḥ
saḥ ayajat rājasūyena vijitya bhuvana-trayam patnīm bṛhaspateḥ darpāt tārām nāma aharat balāt
yadā saḥ deva-guruṇā yācitaḥ abhīkṣṇaśaḥ madāt na atyajat tat-kṛte jajñe sura-dānava vigrahaḥ
śukraḥ bṛhaspateḥ dveṣāt agrahīt sa-asura uḍupam haraḥ guru-sutam snehāt sarva-bhūta-gaṇa-āvṛtaḥ
sarva-deva-gaṇa upetaḥ mahendraḥ gurum anvayāt sura asura vināśaḥ abhūt samaraḥ tārakā-mayaḥ
niveditaḥ atha aṅgirasā somam nirbhartsya viśva-kṛt tārām sva-bhartre prāyacchat antarvatnīm avait patiḥ
tyaja tyaja āśu duṣprajñe mat-kṣetrāt āhitam paraiḥ na aham tvām bhasmasāt kuryām striyam sāntānike asati
tatyāja vrīḍitā tārā kumāram kanaka-prabham spṛhām āṅgirasaḥ cakre kumāre somaḥ eva ca
mama ayam na tava iti uccaiḥ tasmin vivadamānayoḥ papracchuḥ ṛṣayaḥ devāḥ na eva uce vrīḍitā tu sā
kumāraḥ mātaram prāha kupitaḥ alīka lajjayā kim na vacasi asat-vṛtte ātma-avadyam vada āśu me
brahmā tām rahaḥ āhūya samaprākṣīt ca sāntvayan somasya iti āha śanakaiḥ somaḥ tam tāvat agrahīt
tasya ātma-yoniḥ akṛta budhaḥ iti abhidhām nṛpa buddhyā gambhīrayā yena putreṇa āpa uḍurāṭ mudam
tataḥ purūravāḥ jajñe ilāyām yaḥ udāhṛtaḥ tasya rūpa guṇa audārya śīla draviṇa vikramān śrutvā urvaśī indra-bhavane gīyamānān sura-ṛṣiṇā tat-antikam upeyāya devī smara-śara arditā
mitrā-varuṇayoḥ śāpāt āpannā nara-lokatām niśamya puruṣa-śreṣṭham kandarpam iva rūpiṇam dhṛtim viṣṭabhya lalanā upatasthe tat-antike saḥ tām vilokya nṛpatiḥ harṣeṇa utphulla-locanaḥ uvāca ślakṣṇayā vācā devīm hṛṣṭa-tanūruhaḥ
śrī-rājā uvāca svāgatam te varārohe āsyatām karavāma kim saṁramasva mayā sākam ratiḥ nau śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
urvaśī uvāca kasyāḥ tvayi na sajjeta manaḥ dṛṣṭiḥ ca sundara yat-aṅgāntaram āsādya cyavate ha riraṁsayā
etau uraṇakau rājan nyāsau rakṣasva māna-da saṁraṁsye bhavatā sākam ślāghyaḥ strīṇām varaḥ smṛtaḥ
ghṛtam me vīra bhakṣyam syāt na īkṣe tvā anyatra maithunāt vivāsasam tat tathā iti pratipede mahāmanāḥ
aho rūpam aho bhāvaḥ nara-loka vimohanam kaḥ na seveta manujaḥ devīm tvām svayam āgatām
tayā saḥ puruṣa-śreṣṭhaḥ ramayantyā yathā-arhataḥ reme sura-vihāreṣu kāmam caitraratha-ādiṣu
ramamāṇaḥ tayā devyā padma kiñjalka gandhayā tat-mukha āmoda muṣitaḥ mumude ahaḥ-gaṇān bahūn
apaśyan urvaśīm indraḥ gandharvān samacodayat urvaśī-rahitam mahyam āsthānam na atiśobhate
te upetya mahā-rātre tamasi pratyupasthite urvaśyā uraṇau jahruḥ nyastau rājani jāyayā
niśamya ākranditam devī putrayoḥ nīyamānayoḥ hatā asmi aham ku-nāthena na-puṁsā vīra-māninā
yat-viśrambhāt aham naṣṭā hṛta-apatyā ca dasyubhiḥ yaḥ śete niśi santrastaḥ yathā nārī divā pumān
iti vāk-sāyakaiḥ biddhaḥ pratottraiḥ iva kuñjaraḥ niśi nistriṁśam ādāya vivastraḥ abhyadravat ruṣā
te visṛjya uraṇau tatra vyadyotanta sma vidyutaḥ ādāya meṣau āyāntam nagnam aikṣata sā patim
ailaḥ api śayane jāyām apaśyan vimanāḥ iva tat-cittaḥ vihvalaḥ śocan babhrāma unmatta-vat mahīm
saḥ tām vīkṣya kurukṣetre sarasvatyām ca tat-sakhīḥ pañca prahṛṣṭa-vadanaḥ prāha sūktam purūravāḥ
aho jāye tiṣṭha tiṣṭha ghore na tyaktum arhasi mām tvam adya api anirvṛtya vacāṁsi kṛṇavāvahai
su-dehaḥ ayam patati atra devi dūram hṛtaḥ tvayā khādanti enam vṛkāḥ gṛdhrāḥ tvat prasādasya na āspadam
urvaśī uvāca mā mṛthāḥ puruṣaḥ asi tvam mā sma tvā adyuḥ vṛkāḥ ime kva api sakhyam na vai strīṇām vṛkāṇām hṛdayam yathā
striyaḥ hi akaruṇāḥ krūrāḥ durmarṣāḥ priya-sāhasāḥ ghnanti alpa-arthe api viśrabdham patim bhrātaram api uta
vidhāya alīka viśrambham ajñeṣu tyakta-sauhṛdāḥ navam navam abhīpsantyaḥ puṁścalyaḥ svaira vṛttayaḥ
saṁvatsara-ante hi bhavān eka-rātram mayā īśvaraḥ raṁsyati apatyāni ca te bhaviṣyanti aparāṇi bhoḥ
antarvatnīm upālakṣya devīm saḥ prayayau purīm punaḥ tatra gataḥ abda-ante urvaśīm vīra-mātaram
upalabhya mudā yuktaḥ samuvāsa tayā niśām atha enam urvaśī prāha kṛpaṇam viraha-āturam
gandharvān upadhāva imān tubhyam dāsyanti mām iti tasya saṁstuvataḥ tuṣṭāḥ agni-sthālīm daduḥ nṛpa urvaśīm manya-mānaḥ tām saḥ abudhyata caran vane
sthālīm nyasya vane gatvā gṛhān ādhyāyataḥ niśi tretāyām sampravṛttāyām manasi trayī avartata
sthālī-sthānam gataḥ aśvattham śamī-garbham vilakṣya saḥ tena dve araṇī kṛtvā urvaśī-loka-kāmyayā urvaśīm mantrataḥ dhyāyan adhara araṇim uttarām ātmānam ubhayoḥ madhye yat tat prajananam prabhuḥ
tasya nirmanthanāt jātaḥ jāta-vedāḥ vibhāvasuḥ trayyā saḥ vidyayā rājñā putratve kalpitaḥ tri-vṛt
tena ayajata yajña-īśam bhagavantam adhokṣajam urvaśī-lokam anvicchan sarva-deva-mayam harim
ekaḥ eva purā vedaḥ praṇavaḥ sarva-vāk-mayaḥ devaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ na anyaḥ ekaḥ agniḥ varṇaḥ eva ca
purūravasaḥ eva āsīt trayī tretā-mukhe nṛpa agninā prajayā rājā lokam gāndharvam eyivān
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca ailasya ca urvaśī-garbhāt ṣaṭ āsan ātmajāḥ nṛpa āyuḥ śrutāyuḥ satyāyuḥ rayaḥ atha vijayaḥ jayaḥ
śrutāyoḥ vasumān putraḥ satyāyoḥ ca śrutañjayaḥ rayasya sutaḥ ekaḥ ca jayasya tanayaḥ amitaḥ bhīmaḥ tu vijayasya atha kāñcanaḥ hotrakaḥ tataḥ tasya jahnuḥ sutaḥ gaṅgām gaṇḍūṣī-kṛtya yaḥ apibat
jahnoḥ tu puruḥ tasya atha balākaḥ ca ātmajaḥ ajakaḥ tataḥ kuśaḥ kuśasya api kuśāmbuḥ tanayaḥ vasuḥ kuśanābhaḥ ca catvāraḥ gādhiḥ āsīt kuśāmbujaḥ
tasya satyavatīm kanyām ṛcīkaḥ ayācata dvijaḥ varam visadṛśam matvā gādhiḥ bhārgavam abravīt ekataḥ śyāma-karṇānām hayānām candra-varcasām sahasram dīyatām śulkam kanyāyāḥ kuśikāḥ vayam
iti uktaḥ tat-matam jñātvā gataḥ saḥ varuṇa-antikam ānīya dattvā tān aśvān upayeme vara-ānanām
saḥ ṛṣiḥ prārthitaḥ patnyā śvaśrvā ca apatya-kāmyayā śrapayitvā ubhayaiḥ mantraiḥ carum snātum gataḥ muniḥ
tāvat satyavatī mātrā sva-carum yācitā satī śreṣṭham matvā tayā ayacchat mātre mātuḥ adat svayam
tat viditvā muniḥ prāha patnīm kaṣṭam akāraṣīḥ ghoraḥ daṇḍa-dharaḥ putraḥ bhrātā te brahma-vittamaḥ
prasāditaḥ satyavatyā mā evam bhūḥ iti bhārgavaḥ atha tarhi bhavet pautraḥ jamadagniḥ tataḥ abhavat
sā ca abhūt sumahat-puṇyā kauśikī loka-pāvanī reṇoḥ sutām reṇukām vai jamadagniḥ uvāha yām tasyām vai bhārgava-ṛṣeḥ sutāḥ vasumat-ādayaḥ yavīyān jajñe eteṣām rāmaḥ iti abhiviśrutaḥ
yam āhuḥ vāsudeva-aṁśam haihayānām kula-antakam triḥ-sapta-kṛtvaḥ yaḥ imām cakre niḥkṣatriyām mahīm
dṛptam kṣatram bhuvaḥ bhāram abrahmaṇyam anīnaśat rajaḥ-tamaḥ vṛtam ahan phalguni api kṛte aṁhasi
śrī-rājā uvāca kim tat aṁhaḥ bhagavataḥ rājanyaiḥ ajita-ātmabhiḥ kṛtam yena kulam naṣṭam kṣatriyāṇām abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca haihayānām adhipatiḥ arjunaḥ kṣatriya-ṛṣabhaḥ dattam nārāyaṇa-aṁśa-aṁśam ārādhya parikarmabhiḥ bāhūn daśa-śatam lebhe durdharṣatvam arātiṣu avyāhata indriya-ojaḥ śrī tejaḥ vīrya yaśaḥ balam yoga-īśvaratvam aiśvaryam guṇāḥ yatra aṇimā-ādayaḥ cacāra avyāhata-gatiḥ lokeṣu pavanaḥ yathā
strī-ratnaiḥ āvṛtaḥ krīḍan revā-ambhasi mada-utkaṭaḥ vaijayantīm srajam bibhrat rurodha saritam bhujaiḥ
viplāvitam sva-śibiram pratisrotaḥ sarit-jalaiḥ na amṛṣyat tasya tat vīryam vīramānī daśa-ānanaḥ
gṛhītaḥ līlayā strīṇām samakṣam kṛta-kilbiṣaḥ māhiṣmatyām sanniruddhaḥ muktaḥ yena kapiḥ yathā
saḥ ekadā tu mṛgayām vicaran vijane vane yadṛcchayā āśrama-padam jamadagneḥ upāviśat
tasmai saḥ naradevāya muniḥ arhaṇam āharat sa-sainya amātya vāhāya haviṣmatyā tapaḥ-dhanaḥ
saḥ vai ratnam tu tat dṛṣṭvā ātma-aiśvarya ati-śāyanam tat na ādriyata agnihotryām sa-abhilāṣaḥ sa-haihayaḥ
haviḥ-dhānīm ṛṣeḥ darpāt narān hartum acodayat te ca māhiṣmatīm ninyuḥ sa-vatsām krandatīm balāt
atha rājani niryāte rāmaḥ āśrame āgataḥ śrutvā tat tasya daurātmyam cukrodha ahiḥ iva āhataḥ
ghoram ādāya paraśum sa-tūṇam varma kārmukam anvadhāvata durmarṣaḥ mṛgendraḥ iva yūthapam
tam āpatantam bhṛgu-varyam ojasā dhanuḥ-dharam bāṇa paraśvadha āyudham aiṇeya-carma ambaram arka-dhāmabhiḥ yutam jaṭābhiḥ dadṛśe purīm viśan
acodayat hasti ratha aśva pattibhiḥ gadā asi bāṇa ṛṣṭi śataghni śaktibhiḥ akṣauhiṇīḥ sapta-daśa ati-bhīṣaṇāḥ tāḥ rāmaḥ ekaḥ bhagavān asūdayat
yataḥ yataḥ asau praharat paraśvadhaḥ manaḥ anila ojāḥ para-cakra sūdanaḥ tataḥ tataḥ chinna bhuja ūru kandharāḥ nipetuḥ urvyām hata sūta vāhanāḥ
dṛṣṭvā sva-sainyam rudhira-ogha-kardame raṇa-ajire rāma-kuṭhāra sāyakaiḥ vivṛkṇa varma dhvaja cāpa vigraham nipātitam haihayaḥ āpatat ruṣā
atha arjunaḥ pañca-śateṣu bāhubhiḥ dhanuḥṣu bāṇān yugapat saḥ sandadhe rāmāya rāmaḥ astra-bhṛtām samagraṇīḥ tāni eka-dhanvā iṣubhiḥ ācchinat samam
punaḥ sva-hastaiḥ acalān mṛdhe aṅghripān utkṣipya vegāt abhidhāvataḥ yudhi bhujān kuṭhāreṇa kaṭhora-neminā ciccheda rāmaḥ prasabham tu aheḥ iva
kṛtta-bāhoḥ śiraḥ tasya gireḥ śṛṅgam iva āharat hate pitari tat-putrāḥ ayutam dudruvuḥ bhayāt agnihotrīm upāvartya sa-vatsām para-vīra-hā samupetya āśramam pitre parikliṣṭām samarpayat
sva-karma tat kṛtam rāmaḥ pitre bhrātṛbhyaḥ eva ca varṇayām āsa tat śrutvā jamadagniḥ abhāṣata
rāma rāma mahābāho bhavān pāpam akāraṣīt avadhīt naradevam yat sarva-deva-mayam vṛthā
vayam hi brāhmaṇāḥ tāta kṣamayā arhaṇatām gatāḥ yayā loka-guruḥ devaḥ pārameṣṭhyam agāt padam
kṣamayā rocate lakṣmīḥ brāhmī saurī yathā prabhā kṣamiṇām āśu bhagavān tuṣyate hariḥ īśvaraḥ
rājñaḥ mūrdha-abhiṣiktasya vadhaḥ brahma-vadhāt guruḥ tīrtha-saṁsevayā ca aṁhaḥ jahi aṅga acyuta-cetanaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca pitrā upaśikṣitaḥ rāmaḥ tathā iti kuru-nandana saṁvatsaram tīrtha-yātrām caritvā āśramam āvrajat
kadācit reṇukā yātā gaṅgāyām padma-mālinam gandharva-rājam krīḍantam apsarobhiḥ apaśyata
vilokayantī krīḍantam udaka-artham nadīm gatā homa-velām na sasmāra kiñcit citraratha spṛhā
kāla-atyayam tam vilokya muneḥ śāpa-viśaṅkitā āgatya kalaśam tasthau purodhāya kṛta-añjaliḥ
vyabhicāram muniḥ jñātvā patnyāḥ prakupitaḥ abravīt ghnata enām putrakāḥ pāpām iti uktāḥ te na cakrire
rāmaḥ sañcoditaḥ pitrā bhrātṝn mātrā saha avadhīt prabhāva-jñaḥ muneḥ samyak samādheḥ tapasaḥ ca saḥ
vareṇa cchandayām āsa prītaḥ satyavatī-sutaḥ vavre hatānām rāmaḥ api jīvitam ca asmṛtim vadhe
uttasthuḥ te kuśalinaḥ nidrā-apāye iva añjasā pituḥ vidvān tapaḥ vīryam rāmaḥ cakre suhṛt-vadham
ye arjunasya sutāḥ rājan smarantaḥ sva-pituḥ vadham rāma-vīrya-parābhūtāḥ lebhire śarma na kvacit
ekadā āśramataḥ rāme sa-bhrātari vanam gate vairam siṣādhayiṣavaḥ labdha-chidrāḥ upāgaman
dṛṣṭvā agni-āgāre āsīnam āveśita dhiyam munim bhagavati uttama-śloke jaghnuḥ te pāpa-niścayāḥ
yācyamānāḥ kṛpaṇayā rāma-mātrā ati-dāruṇāḥ prasahya śiraḥ utkṛtya ninyuḥ te kṣatra-bandhavaḥ
reṇukā duḥkha-śoka-artā nighnantī ātmānam ātmanā rāma rāma iti tāta iti vicukrośa uccakaiḥ satī
tat upaśrutya dūra-sthāḥ hā rāma iti ārta-vat svanam tvarayā āśramam āsādya dadṛśuḥ pitaram hatam
te duḥkha roṣa amarṣa ārti śoka vega vimohitāḥ hā tāta sādho dharmiṣṭha tyaktvā asmān svaḥ-gataḥ bhavān
vilapya evam pituḥ deham nidhāya bhrātṛṣu svayam pragṛhya paraśum rāmaḥ kṣatra-antāya manaḥ dadhe
gatvā māhiṣmatīm rāmaḥ brahma-ghna vihata-śriyam teṣām saḥ śīrṣabhiḥ rājan madhye cakre mahā-girim
tat-raktena nadīm ghorām abrahmaṇya-bhaya-āvahām hetum kṛtvā pitṛ-vadham kṣatre amaṅgala-kāriṇi triḥ-sapta-kṛtvaḥ pṛthivīm kṛtvā niḥkṣatriyām prabhuḥ samanta-pañcake cakre śoṇita-udān hradān nava
pituḥ kāyena sandhāya śiraḥ ādāya barhiṣi sarva-deva-mayam devam ātmānam ayajat makhaiḥ
dadau prācīm diśam hotre brahmaṇe dakṣiṇām diśam adhvaryave pratīcīm vai udgātre uttarām diśam anyebhyaḥ avāntara-diśaḥ kaśyapāya ca madhyataḥ āryāvartam upadraṣṭre sadasyebhyaḥ tataḥ param
tataḥ ca avabhṛtha-snāna vidhūta aśeṣa kilbiṣaḥ sarasvatyām mahā-nadyām reje vyabbhraḥ iva aṁśumān
sva-deham jamadagniḥ tu labdhvā saṁjñāna-lakṣaṇam ṛṣīṇām maṇḍale saḥ abhūt saptamaḥ rāma-pūjitaḥ
jāmadagnyaḥ api bhagavān rāmaḥ kamala-locanaḥ āgāmini antare rājan vartayiṣyati vai bṛhat
āste adya api mahendra-adrau nyasta-daṇḍaḥ praśānta dhīḥ upagīyamāna-caritaḥ siddha-gandharva-cāraṇaiḥ
evam bhṛguṣu viśva-ātmā bhagavān hariḥ īśvaraḥ avatīrya param bhāram bhuvaḥ ahan bahuśaḥ nṛpān
gādheḥ abhūt mahā-tejāḥ samiddhaḥ iva pāvakaḥ tapasā kṣātram utsṛjya yaḥ lebhe brahma-varcasam
viśvāmitrasya ca eva āsan putrāḥ eka-śatam nṛpa madhyamaḥ tu madhucchandāḥ madhucchandasaḥ eva te
putram kṛtvā śunaḥśepham devarātam ca bhārgavam ājīgartam sutān āha jyeṣṭhaḥ eṣaḥ prakalpyatām
yaḥ vai hariścandra-makhe vikrītaḥ puruṣaḥ paśuḥ stutvā devān prajā-īśa-ādīn mumuce pāśa-bandhanāt
yaḥ rātaḥ deva-yajane devaiḥ gādhiṣu tāpasaḥ deva-rātaḥ iti khyātaḥ śunaḥśephaḥ tu bhārgavaḥ
ye madhucchandasaḥ jyeṣṭhāḥ kuśalam menire na tat aśapat tān muniḥ kruddhaḥ mlecchāḥ bhavata durjanāḥ
saḥ ha uvāca madhucchandāḥ sārdham pañcāśatā tataḥ yat naḥ bhavān sañjānīte tasmin tiṣṭhāmahe vayam
jyeṣṭham mantra-dṛśam cakruḥ tvām anvañcaḥ vayam sma hi viśvāmitraḥ sutān āha vīra-vantaḥ bhaviṣyatha ye mānam me anugṛhṇantaḥ vīra-vantam akarta mām
eṣaḥ vaḥ kuśikāḥ vīraḥ devarātaḥ tam anvita anye ca aṣṭaka hārīta jaya kratumat ādayaḥ
evam kauśika-gotram tu viśvāmitraiḥ pṛthak-vidham pravara-antaram āpannam tat hi ca evam prakalpitam
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca yaḥ purūravasaḥ putraḥ āyuḥ tasya abhavan sutāḥ nahuṣaḥ kṣatravṛddhaḥ ca rajī rābhaḥ ca vīryavān anenāḥ iti rāja-indra śṛṇu kṣatravṛdhaḥ anvayam kṣatravṛddha sutasya āsan suhotrasya ātmajāḥ trayaḥ kāśyaḥ kuśaḥ gṛtsamadaḥ iti gṛtsamadāt abhūt śunakaḥ śaunakaḥ yasya bahu-ṛca-pravaraḥ muniḥ
kāśyasya kāśiḥ tat-putraḥ rāṣṭraḥ dīrghatamaḥ-pitā dhanvantariḥ dīrghatamasaḥ āyuḥ-veda-pravartakaḥ yajña-bhuk vāsudeva-aṁśaḥ smṛta-mātra ārti-nāśanaḥ
tat-putraḥ ketumān asya jajñe bhīmarathaḥ tataḥ divodāsaḥ dyumān tasmāt pratardanaḥ iti smṛtaḥ
saḥ eva śatrujit vatsaḥ ṛtadhvajaḥ iti īritaḥ tathā kuvalayāśva iti proktaḥ alarka-ādayaḥ tataḥ
ṣaṣṭim varṣa-sahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭim varṣa-śatāni ca na alarkāt aparaḥ rājan bubhuje medinīm yuvā
alarkāt santatiḥ tasmāt sunīthaḥ atha niketanaḥ dharmaketuḥ sutaḥ tasmāt satyaketuḥ ajāyata
dhṛṣṭaketuḥ tataḥ tasmāt sukumāraḥ kṣiti-īśvaraḥ vītihotraḥ asya bhargaḥ ataḥ bhārgabhūmiḥ abhūt nṛpa
iti ime kāśayaḥ bhūpāḥ kṣatravṛddha-anvaya-āyinaḥ rābhasya rabhasaḥ putraḥ gambhīraḥ ca akriyaḥ tataḥ
tat-gotram brahmavit jajñe śṛṇu vaṁśam anenasaḥ śuddhaḥ tataḥ śuciḥ tasmāt citrakṛt dharma-sārathiḥ
tataḥ śāntarajaḥ jajñe kṛta-kṛtyaḥ saḥ ātmavān rajeḥ pañca-śatāni āsan putrāṇām amita-ojasām
devaiḥ abhyarthitaḥ daityān hatvā indrāya adadāt divam indraḥ tasmai punaḥ dattvā gṛhītvā caraṇau rajeḥ ātmānam arpayām āsa prahrāda-ādi ari-śaṅkitaḥ
pitari uparate putrāḥ yācamānāya no daduḥ triviṣṭapam mahendrāya yajña-bhāgān samādaduḥ
guruṇā hūyamāne agnau balabhit tanayān rajeḥ avadhīt bhraṁśitān mārgāt na kaścit avaśeṣitaḥ
kuśāt pratiḥ kṣātravṛddhāt sañjayaḥ tat-sutaḥ jayaḥ tataḥ kṛtaḥ kṛtasya api jajñe haryabalaḥ nṛpaḥ
sahadevaḥ tataḥ hīnaḥ jayasenaḥ tu tat-sutaḥ saṅkṛtiḥ tasya ca jayaḥ kṣatra-dharmā mahā-rathaḥ kṣatravṛddha-anvayāḥ bhūpāḥ ime śṛṇu atha nāhuṣān
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca yatiḥ yayātiḥ saṁyātiḥ āyatiḥ viyatiḥ kṛtiḥ ṣaṭ ime nahuṣasya āsan indriyāṇi iva dehinaḥ
rājyam na aicchat yatiḥ pitrā dattam tat-pariṇāma-vit yatra praviṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ ātmānam na avabudhyate
pitari bhraṁśite sthānāt indrāṇyāḥ dharṣaṇāt dvijaiḥ prāpite ajagaratvam vai yayātiḥ abhavat nṛpaḥ
catasṛṣu ādiśat dikṣu bhrātṝn bhrātā yavīyasaḥ kṛta-dāraḥ jugopa ūrvīm kāvyasya vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ
śrī-rājā uvāca brahma-ṛṣiḥ bhagavān kāvyaḥ kṣatra-bandhuḥ ca nāhuṣaḥ rājanya-viprayoḥ kasmāt vivāhaḥ pratilomakaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ekadā dānava-indrasya śarmiṣṭhā nāma kanyakā sakhī-sahasra-saṁyuktā guru-putryā ca bhāminī devayānyā pura-udyāne puṣpita druma saṅkule vyacarat kala-gīta ali nalinī puline abalā
tāḥ jala-āśayam āsādya kanyāḥ kamala-locanāḥ tīre nyasya dukūlāni vijahruḥ siñcatīḥ mithaḥ
vīkṣya vrajantam giriśam saha devyā vṛṣa-sthitam sahasā uttīrya vāsāṁsi paryadhuḥ vrīḍitāḥ striyaḥ
śarmiṣṭhā ajānatī vāsaḥ guru-putryāḥ samavyayat svīyam matvā prakupitā devayānī idam abravīt
aho nirīkṣyatām asyāḥ dāsyāḥ karma hi asāmpratam asmat-dhāryam dhṛtavatī śunī iva haviḥ adhvare
yaiḥ idam tapasā sṛṣṭam mukham puṁsaḥ parasya ye dhāryate yaiḥ iha jyotiḥ śivaḥ panthāḥ pradarśitaḥ yān vandanti upatiṣṭhante loka-nāthāḥ sura-īśvarāḥ bhagavān api viśva-ātmā pāvanaḥ śrī-niketanaḥ vayam tatra api bhṛgavaḥ śiṣyaḥ asyāḥ naḥ pitā asuraḥ asmat-dhāryam dhṛtavatī śūdraḥ vedam iva asatī
evam kṣipantīm śarmiṣṭhā guru-putrīm abhāṣata ruṣā śvasantī uraṅgī iva dharṣitā daṣṭa-dat-chadā
ātma-vṛttam avijñāya katthase bahu bhikṣuki kim na pratīkṣase asmākam gṛhān balibhujaḥ yathā
evam-vidhaiḥ su-paruṣaiḥ kṣiptvā ācārya-sutām satīm śarmiṣṭhā prākṣipat kūpe vāsaḥ ca ādāya manyunā
tasyām gatāyām sva-gṛham yayātiḥ mṛgayām caran prāptaḥ yadṛcchayā kūpe jala-arthī tām dadarśa ha
dattvā svam uttaram vāsaḥ tasyai rājā vivāsase gṛhītvā pāṇinā pāṇim ujjahāra dayā-paraḥ
tam vīram āha auśanasī prema-nirbharayā girā rājan tvayā gṛhītaḥ me pāṇiḥ para-purañjaya hasta-grāhaḥ aparaḥ mā bhūt gṛhītāyāḥ tvayā hi me eṣaḥ īśa-kṛtaḥ vīra sambandhaḥ nau na pauruṣaḥ
yat idam kūpa-magnāyāḥ bhavataḥ darśanam mama na brāhmaṇaḥ me bhavitā hasta-grāhaḥ mahā-bhuja kacasya bārhaspatyasya śāpāt yam aśapam purā
yayātiḥ anabhipretam daiva-upahṛtam ātmanaḥ manaḥ tu tat-gatam buddhvā pratijagrāha tat-vacaḥ
gate rājani sā dhīre tatra sma rudatī pituḥ nyavedayat tataḥ sarvam uktam śarmiṣṭhayā kṛtam
durmanāḥ bhagavān kāvyaḥ paurohityam vigarhayan stuvan vṛttim ca kāpotīm duhitrā saḥ yayau purāt
vṛṣaparvā tam ājñāya pratyanīka vivakṣitam gurum prasādayat mūrdhnā pādayoḥ patitaḥ pathi
kṣaṇa-ardha manyuḥ bhagavān śiṣyam vyācaṣṭa bhārgavaḥ kāmaḥ asyāḥ kriyatām rājan na enām tyaktum iha utsahe
tathā iti avasthite prāha devayānī manogatam pitrā dattā yataḥ yāsye sa-anugā yātu mām anu
pitrā dattā devayānyai śarmiṣṭhā sa-anugā tadā svānām tat saṅkaṭam vīkṣya tat arthasya ca gauravam devayānīm paryacarat strī-sahasreṇa dāsa-vat
nāhuṣāya sutām dattvā saha śarmiṣṭhayā uśanā tam āha rājan śarmiṣṭhām ādhāḥ talpe na karhicit
vilokya auśanasīm rājan śarmiṣṭhā su-prajām kvacit tam eva vavre rahasi sakhyāḥ patim ṛtau satī
rāja-putryā arthitaḥ apatye dharmam ca avekṣya dharma-vit smaran śukra-vacaḥ kāle diṣṭam eva abhyapadyata
yadum ca turvasum ca eva devayānī vyajāyata druhyum ca anum ca pūrum ca śarmiṣṭhā vārṣaparvaṇī
garbha-sambhavam āsuryāḥ bhartuḥ vijñāya māninī devayānī pituḥ geham yayau krodha-vimūrchitā
priyām anugataḥ kāmī vacobhiḥ upamantrayan na prasādayitum śeke pāda-saṁvāhana-ādibhiḥ
śukraḥ tam āha kupitaḥ strī-kāma anṛta-pūruṣa tvām jarā viśatām manda virūpa-karaṇī nṛṇām
śrī-yayātiḥ uvāca atṛptaḥ asmi adya kāmānām brahman duhitari sma te vyatyasyatām yathā-kāmam vayasā yaḥ abhidhāsyati
iti labdha-vyavasthānaḥ putram jyeṣṭham avocata yado tāta pratīccha imām jarām dehi nijam vayaḥ
mātāmaha-kṛtām vatsa na tṛptaḥ viṣayeṣu aham vayasā bhavadīyena raṁsye katipayāḥ samāḥ
śrī-yaduḥ uvāca na utsahe jarasā sthātum antarā prāptayā tava aviditvā sukham grāmyam vaitṛṣṇyam na eti pūruṣaḥ
turvasuḥ coditaḥ pitrā druhyuḥ ca anuḥ ca bhārata pratyācakhyuḥ adharma-jñāḥ hi a-nitye nitya-buddhayaḥ
apṛcchat tanayam pūrum vayasā ūnam guṇa-adhikam na tvam agraja-vat vatsa mām pratyākhyātum arhasi
śrī-pūruḥ uvāca kaḥ nu loke manuṣya-indra pituḥ ātma-kṛtaḥ pumān pratikartum kṣamaḥ yasya prasādāt vindate param
uttamaḥ cintitam kuryāt prokta-kārī tu madhyamaḥ adhamaḥ aśraddhayā kuryāt akartā uccaritam pituḥ
iti pramuditaḥ pūruḥ pratyagṛhṇāt jarām pituḥ saḥ api tat-vayasā kāmān yathā-vat jujuṣe nṛpa
sapta-dvīpa-patiḥ saṁyak pitṛ-vat pālayan prajāḥ yathā-upajoṣam viṣayān jujuṣe avyāhata indriyaḥ
devayānī api anudinam manaḥ-vāk deha vastubhiḥ preyasaḥ paramām prītim uvāha preyasī rahaḥ
ayajat yajña-puruṣam kratubhiḥ bhūri-dakṣiṇaiḥ sarva-deva-mayam devam sarva-veda-mayam harim
yasmin idam viracitam vyomni iva jalada-āvaliḥ nānā iva bhāti na ābhāti svapna-māyā manaḥ-rathaḥ
tam eva hṛdi vinyasya vāsudevam guha-āśayam nārāyaṇam aṇīyāṁsam nirāśīḥ ayajat prabhum
evam varṣa-sahasrāṇi manaḥ-ṣaṣṭhaiḥ manaḥ-sukham vidadhānaḥ api na atṛpyat sārva-bhaumaḥ kat-indriyaiḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca saḥ ittham ācaran kāmān straiṇaḥ apahnavam ātmanaḥ buddhvā priyāyai nirviṇṇaḥ gāthām etām agāyata
śṛṇu bhārgavi amūm gāthām mat-vidhā ācaritām bhuvi dhīrāḥ yasya anuśocanti vane grāma-nivāsinaḥ
bastaḥ ekaḥ vane kaścit vicinvan priyam ātmanaḥ dadarśa kūpe patitām sva-karma-vaśa-gām ajām
tasyāḥ uddharaṇa-upāyam bastaḥ kāmī vicintayan vyadhatta tīrtham uddhṛtya viṣāṇa-agreṇa rodhasī
sā uttīrya kūpāt su-śroṇī tam eva cakame kila tayā vṛtam samudvīkṣya bahvyaḥ ajāḥ kānta-kāminīḥ pīvānam śmaśrulam preṣṭham mīḍhvāṁsam yābha-kovidam saḥ ekaḥ aja-vṛṣaḥ tāsām bahvīnām rati-vardhanaḥ reme kāma-graha-grastaḥ ātmānam na avabudhyata
tam eva preṣṭhatamayā ramamāṇam ajā anyayā vilokya kūpa-saṁvignā na amṛṣyat basta-karma tat
tam durhṛdam suhṛt-rūpam kāminam kṣaṇa-sauhṛdam indriya-ārāmam utsṛjya svāminam duḥkhitā yayau
saḥ api ca anugataḥ straiṇaḥ kṛpaṇaḥ tām prasāditum kurvan iḍaviḍā-kāram na aśaknot pathi sandhitum
tasya tatra dvijaḥ kaścit ajā-svāmī acchinat ruṣā lambantam vṛṣaṇam bhūyaḥ sandadhe arthāya yoga-vit
sambaddha-vṛṣaṇaḥ saḥ api hi ajayā kūpa-labdhayā kālam bahu-titham bhadre kāmaiḥ na adya api tuṣyati
tathā aham kṛpaṇaḥ su-bhru bhavatyāḥ prema-yantritaḥ ātmānam na abhijānāmi mohitaḥ tava māyayā
yat pṛthivyām vrīhi yavam hiraṇyam paśavaḥ striyaḥ na duhyanti manaḥ-prītim puṁsaḥ kāma-hatasya te
na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānām upabhogena śāṁyati haviṣā kṛṣṇa-vartmā iva bhūyaḥ eva abhivardhate
yadā na kurute bhāvam sarva-bhūteṣu amaṅgalam sama-dṛṣṭeḥ tadā puṁsaḥ sarvāḥ sukha-mayāḥ diśaḥ
yā dustyajā durmatibhiḥ jīryataḥ yā na jīryate tām tṛṣṇām duḥkha-nivahām śarma-kāmaḥ drutam tyajet
mātrā svasrā duhitrā vā na avivikta-āsanaḥ bhavet balavān indriya-grāmaḥ vidvāṁsam api karṣati
pūrṇam varṣa-sahasram me viṣayān sevataḥ asakṛt tathā api ca anusavanam tṛṣṇā teṣu upajāyate
tasmāt etām aham tyaktvā brahmaṇi adhyāya mānasam nirdvandvaḥ nirahaṅkāraḥ cariṣyāmi mṛgaiḥ saha
dṛṣṭam śrutam asat buddhvā na anudhyāyet na sandiśet saṁsṛtim ca ātma-nāśam ca tatra vidvān saḥ ātma-dṛk
iti uktvā nāhuṣaḥ jāyām tadīyam pūrave vayaḥ dattvā sva-jarasam tasmāt ādade vigata-spṛhaḥ
diśi dakṣiṇa-pūrvasyām druhyum dakṣiṇataḥ yadum pratīcyām turvasum cakre udīcyām anum īśvaram
bhū-maṇḍalasya sarvasya pūrum arhat-tamam viśām abhiṣicya agrajān tasya vaśe sthāpya vanam yayau
āsevitam varṣa-pūgān ṣaṭ-vargam viṣayeṣu saḥ kṣaṇena mumuce nīḍam jāta-pakṣaḥ iva dvijaḥ
saḥ tatra nirmukta samasta-saṅgaḥ ātma-anubhūtyā vidhuta tri-liṅgaḥ pare amale brahmaṇi vāsudeve lebhe gatim bhāgavatīm pratītaḥ
śrutvā gāthām devayānī mene prastobham ātmanaḥ strī-puṁsoḥ sneha-vaiklavyāt parihāsam iva īritam
sā sannivāsam suhṛdām prapāyām iva gacchatām vijñāya īśvara-tantrāṇām māyā-viracitam prabhoḥ sarvatra saṅgam utsṛjya svapna-aupamyena bhārgavī kṛṣṇe manaḥ samāveśya vyadhunot liṅgam ātmanaḥ
namaḥ tubhyam bhagavate vāsudevāya vedhase sarva-bhūta-adhivāsāya śāntāya bṛhate namaḥ
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca pūroḥ vaṁśam pravakṣyāmi yatra jātaḥ asi bhārata yatra rāja-ṛṣayaḥ vaṁśyāḥ brahma-vaṁśyāḥ ca jajñire
janamejayaḥ hi abhūt pūroḥ pracinvān tat sutaḥ tataḥ pravīraḥ atha manusyuḥ vai tasmāt cārupadaḥ abhavat
tasya sudyuḥ abhūt putraḥ tasmāt bahugavaḥ tataḥ saṁyātiḥ tasya ahaṁyātiḥ raudrāśvaḥ tat-sutaḥ smṛtaḥ
ṛteyuḥ tasya kakṣeyuḥ sthaṇḍileyuḥ kṛteyukaḥ jaleyuḥ sannateyuḥ ca dharma satya vrateyavaḥ daśa ete apsarasaḥ putrāḥ vaneyuḥ ca avamaḥ smṛtaḥ ghṛtācyām indriyāṇi iva mukhyasya jagat-ātmanaḥ
ṛteyoḥ rantināvaḥ abhūt trayaḥ tasya ātmajāḥ nṛpa sumatiḥ dhruvaḥ apratirathaḥ kaṇvaḥ apratiratha-ātmajaḥ
tasya medhātithiḥ tasmāt praskanna-ādyāḥ dvijātayaḥ putraḥ abhūt sumateḥ rebhiḥ duṣmantaḥ tat-sutaḥ mataḥ
duṣmantaḥ mṛgayām yātaḥ kaṇva-āśrama-padam gataḥ tatra āsīnām sva-prabhayā maṇḍayantīm ramām iva vilokya sadyaḥ mumuhe deva-māyām iva striyam babhāṣe tām vara-ārohām bhaṭaiḥ katipayaiḥ vṛtaḥ
tat-darśana-pramuditaḥ sannivṛtta-pariśramaḥ papraccha kāma-santaptaḥ prahasan ślakṣṇayā girā
kā tvam kamala-patra-akṣi kasya asi hṛdayam-game kim svit cikīrṣitam tatra bhavatyāḥ nirjane vane
vyaktam rājanya-tanayām vedmi aham tvām su-madhyame na hi cetaḥ pauravāṇām adharme ramate kvacit
śrī-śakuntalā uvāca viśvāmitra-ātmajā eva aham tyaktā menakayā vane veda etat bhagavān kaṇvaḥ vīra kim karavāma te
āsyatām hi aravinda-akṣa gṛhyatām arhaṇam ca naḥ bhujyatām santi nīvārāḥ uṣyatām yadi rocate
śrī-duṣmantaḥ uvāca upapannam idam su-bhru jātāyāḥ kuśika-anvaye svayam hi vṛṇute rājñām kanyakāḥ sadṛśam varam
om iti ukte yathā-dharmam upayeme śakuntalām gāndharva-vidhinā rājā deśa-kāla-vidhāna-vit
amogha-vīryaḥ rāja-ṛṣiḥ mahiṣyām vīryam ādadhe śvaḥ-bhūte sva-puram yātaḥ kālena asūta sā sutam
kaṇvaḥ kumārasya vane cakre samucitāḥ kriyāḥ baddhvā mṛga-indram tarasā krīḍati sma saḥ bālakaḥ
tam duratyaya-vikrāntam ādāya pramadā-uttamā hareḥ aṁśa-aṁśa-sambhūtam bhartuḥ antikam āgamat
yadā na jagṛhe rājā bhāryā-putrau aninditau śṛṇvatām sarva-bhūtānām khe vāk āha aśarīriṇī
mātā bhastrā pituḥ putraḥ yena jātaḥ saḥ eva saḥ bharasva putram duṣmanta mā avamaṁsthāḥ śakuntalām
retaḥ-dhāḥ putraḥ nayati nara-deva yama-kṣayāt tvam ca asya dhātā garbhasya satyam āha śakuntalā
pitari uparate saḥ api cakravartī mahā-yaśāḥ mahimā gīyate tasya hareḥ aṁśa-bhuvaḥ bhuvi
cakram dakṣiṇa-haste asya padma-kośaḥ asya pādayoḥ īje mahā-abhiṣekeṇa saḥ abhiṣiktaḥ adhirāṭ vibhuḥ pañca-pañcāśatā medhyaiḥ gaṅgāyām anu vājibhiḥ māmateyam purodhāya yamunām anu ca prabhuḥ aṣṭa-saptati medhya-aśvān babandha pradadat vasu bharatasya hi dauṣmanteḥ agniḥ sācī-guṇe citaḥ sahasram badvaśaḥ yasmin brāhmaṇāḥ gāḥ vibhejire
trayaḥ triṁśat śatam hi aśvān baddhvā vismāpayan nṛpān dauṣmantiḥ atyagāt māyām devānām gurum āyayau
mṛgān śukla-dataḥ kṛṣṇān hiraṇyena parīvṛtān adāt karmaṇi maṣṇāre niyutāni caturdaśa
bharatasya mahat karma na pūrve na apare nṛpāḥ na eva āpuḥ na eva prāpsyanti bāhubhyām tri-divam yathā
kirāta hūṇān yavanān pauṇḍrān kaṅkān khaśān śakān abrahmaṇya nṛpān ca ahan mlecchān dik-vijaye akhilān
jitvā purā asurāḥ devān ye rasa-okāṁsi bhejire deva-striyaḥ rasām nītāḥ prāṇibhiḥ punaḥ āharat
sarvān kāmān duduhatuḥ prajānām tasya rodasī samāḥ tri-nava-sāhasrīḥ dikṣu cakram avartayat
saḥ saṁrāṭ loka-pāla-ākhyam aiśvaryam adhirāṭ śriyam cakram ca askhalitam prāṇān mṛṣā iti upararāma ha
tasya āsan nṛpa vaidarbhyaḥ patnyaḥ tisraḥ su-sammatāḥ jaghnuḥ tyāga-bhayāt putrān na anurūpāḥ iti īrite
tasya evam vitathe vaṁśe tat-artham yajataḥ sutam marut-stomena marutaḥ bharadvājam upādaduḥ
antaḥ-vatnyām bhrātṛ-patnyām maithunāya bṛhaspatiḥ pravṛttaḥ vāritaḥ garbham śaptvā vīryam upāsṛjat
tam tyaktu-kāmām mamatām bhartuḥ tyāga-viśaṅkitām nāma-nirvācanam tasya ślokam enam surāḥ jaguḥ
mūḍhe bhara dvājam imam bhara dvājam bṛhaspate yātau yat uktvā pitarau bharadvājaḥ tataḥ tu ayam
codyamānā suraiḥ evam matvā vitatham ātmajam vyasṛjat marutaḥ abibhran dattaḥ ayam vitathe anvaye
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca vitathasya sutāt manyoḥ bṛhatkṣatraḥ jayaḥ tataḥ mahāvīryaḥ naraḥ gargaḥ saṅkṛtiḥ tu nara-ātmajaḥ
guruḥ ca rantidevaḥ ca saṅkṛteḥ pāṇḍu-nandana rantidevasya mahimā iha amutra ca gīyate
viyat-vittasya dadataḥ labdham labdham bubhukṣataḥ niṣkiñcanasya dhīrasya sa-kuṭumbasya sīdataḥ vyatīyuḥ aṣṭa-catvāriṁśat ahāni apibataḥ kila ghṛta-pāyasa saṁyāvam toyam prātaḥ upasthitam kṛcchra-prāpta kuṭumbasya kṣut-tṛḍbhyām jāta vepathoḥ atithiḥ brāhmaṇaḥ kāle bhoktu-kāmasya ca āgamat
tasmai saṁvyabhajat saḥ annam ādṛtya śraddhayā anvitaḥ harim sarvatra saṁpaśyan saḥ bhuktvā prayayau dvijaḥ
atha anyaḥ bhokṣyamāṇasya vibhaktasya mahīpateḥ vibhaktam vyabhajat tasmai vṛṣalāya harim smaran
yāte śūdre tam anyaḥ agāt atithiḥ śvabhiḥ āvṛtaḥ rājan me dīyatām annam sa-gaṇāya bubhukṣate
saḥ ādṛtya avaśiṣṭam yat bahu-māna-puraskṛtam tat ca dattvā namaḥ-cakre śvabhyaḥ śva-pataye vibhuḥ
pānīya-mātram uccheṣam tat ca eka paritarpaṇam pāsyataḥ pulkasaḥ abhyāgāt apaḥ dehi aśubhāya me
tasya tām karuṇām vācam niśamya vipula śramām kṛpayā bhṛśa-santaptaḥ idam āha amṛtam vacaḥ
na kāmaye aham gatim īśvarāt parām aṣṭa-ṛddhi-yuktām apunaḥ-bhavam vā ārtim prapadye akhila-deha-bhājām antaḥ-sthitaḥ yena bhavanti aduḥkhāḥ
kṣut tṛṭ śramaḥ gātra-paribhramaḥ ca dainyam klamaḥ śoka viṣāda mohāḥ sarve nivṛttāḥ kṛpaṇasya jantoḥ jijīviṣoḥ jīva jala arpaṇāt me
iti prabhāṣya pānīyam mriyamāṇaḥ pipāsayā pulkasāya adadāt dhīraḥ nisarga-karuṇaḥ nṛpaḥ
tasya tri-bhuvana-adhīśāḥ phaladāḥ phalam icchatām ātmānam darśayām cakruḥ māyāḥ viṣṇu vinirmitāḥ
saḥ vai tebhyaḥ namaḥ-kṛtya niḥsaṅgaḥ vigata-spṛhaḥ vāsudeve bhagavati bhaktyā cakre manaḥ param
īśvara-ālambanam cittam kurvataḥ ananya-rādhasaḥ māyā guṇa-mayī rājan svapna-vat pratyalīyata
tat-prasaṅga-anubhāvena rantideva-anuvartinaḥ abhavan yoginaḥ sarve nārāyaṇa-parāyaṇāḥ
gargāt śiniḥ tataḥ gārgyaḥ kṣatrāt brahma hi avartata duritakṣayaḥ mahāvīryāt tasya trayyāruṇiḥ kaviḥ puṣkarāruṇiḥ iti atra ye brāhmaṇa-gatim gatāḥ bṛhatkṣatrasya putraḥ abhūt hastī yat hastināpuram
ajamīḍhaḥ dvimīḍhaḥ ca purumīḍhaḥ ca hastinaḥ ajamīḍhasya vaṁśyāḥ syuḥ priyamedha-ādayaḥ dvijāḥ
ajamīḍhāt bṛhadiṣuḥ tasya putraḥ bṛhaddhanuḥ bṛhatkāyaḥ tataḥ tasya putraḥ āsīt jayadrathaḥ
tat-sutaḥ viśadaḥ tasya syenajit samajāyata rucirāśvaḥ dṛḍhahanuḥ kāśyaḥ vatsaḥ ca tat-sutāḥ
rucirāśva-sutaḥ pāraḥ pṛthusenaḥ tat ātmajaḥ pārasya tanayaḥ nīpaḥ tasya putra-śatam tu abhūt
saḥ kṛtvyām śuka-kanyāyām brahmadattam ajījanat yogī saḥ gavi bhāryāyām viṣvaksenam adhāt sutam
jaigīṣavya upadeśena yoga-tantram cakāra ha udaksenaḥ tataḥ tasmāt bhallāṭaḥ bārhadīṣavāḥ
yavīnaraḥ dvimīḍhasya kṛtimān tat-sutaḥ smṛtaḥ nāmnā satyadhṛtiḥ tasya dṛḍhanemiḥ supārśva-kṛt
supārśvāt sumatiḥ tasya putraḥ sannatimān tataḥ kṛtī hiraṇyanābhāt yaḥ yogam prāpya jagau sma ṣaṭ saṁhitāḥ prācyasāmnām vai nīpaḥ hi udgrāyudhaḥ tataḥ tasya kṣemyaḥ suvīraḥ atha suvīrasya ripuñjayaḥ
tataḥ bahurathaḥ nāma purumīḍhaḥ aprajaḥ abhavat nalinyām ajamīḍhasya nīlaḥ śāntiḥ tu tat-sutaḥ
śānteḥ suśāntiḥ tat-putraḥ purujaḥ arkaḥ tataḥ abhavat bharmyāśvaḥ tanayaḥ tasya pañca āsan mudgala-ādayaḥ yavīnaraḥ bṛhadviśvaḥ kāmpillaḥ sañjayaḥ sutāḥ bharmyāśvaḥ prāha putrāḥ me pañcānām rakṣaṇāya hi viṣayāṇām alam ime iti pañcāla saṁjñitāḥ mudgalāt brahma-nirvṛttam gotram maudgalya saṁjñitam
mithunam mudgalāt bhārmyāt divodāsaḥ pumān abhūt ahalyā kanyakā yasyām śatānandaḥ tu gautamāt
tasya satyadhṛtiḥ putraḥ dhanuḥ-veda-viśāradaḥ śaradvān tat-sutaḥ yasmāt urvaśī-darśanāt kila śara-stambe apatat retaḥ mithunam tat abhūt śubham
tat dṛṣṭvā kṛpayā agṛhṇāt śāntanuḥ mṛgayām caran kṛpaḥ kumāraḥ kanyā ca droṇa-patnī abhavat kṛpī
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca mitrāyuḥ ca divodāsāt cyavanaḥ tat-sutaḥ nṛpa sudāsaḥ sahadevaḥ atha somakaḥ jantu-janma-kṛt
tasya putra-śatam teṣām yavīyān pṛṣataḥ sutaḥ saḥ tasmāt drupadaḥ jajñe sarva-sampat samanvitaḥ
drupadāt draupadī tasya dhṛṣṭadyumna-ādayaḥ sutāḥ dhṛṣṭadyumnāt dhṛṣṭaketuḥ bhārmyāḥ pāñcālakāḥ ime
yaḥ ajamīḍha-sutaḥ hi anyaḥ ṛkṣaḥ saṁvaraṇaḥ tataḥ tapatyām sūrya-kanyāyām kurukṣetra-patiḥ kuruḥ parīkṣiḥ sudhanuḥ jahnuḥ niṣadhaḥ ca kuroḥ sutāḥ suhotraḥ abhūt sudhanuṣaḥ cyavanaḥ atha tataḥ kṛtī
vasuḥ tasya uparicaraḥ bṛhadratha-mukhāḥ tataḥ kuśāmba matsya pratyagra cedipa-ādyāḥ ca cedi-pāḥ
bṛhadrathāt kuśāgraḥ abhūt ṛṣabhaḥ tasya tat-sutaḥ jajñe satyahitaḥ apatyam puṣpavān tat-sutaḥ jahuḥ
anyasyām api bhāryāyām śakale dve bṛhadrathāt ye mātrā bahiḥ utsṛṣṭe jarayā ca abhisandhite jīva jīva iti krīḍantyā jarāsandhaḥ abhavat sutaḥ
tataḥ ca sahadevaḥ abhūt somāpiḥ yat śrutaśravāḥ parīkṣiḥ anapatyaḥ abhūt surathaḥ nāma jāhnavaḥ
tataḥ vidūrathaḥ tasmāt sārvabhaumaḥ tataḥ abhavat jayasenaḥ tat-tanayaḥ rādhikaḥ ataḥ ayutāyuḥ abhūt
tataḥ ca akrodhanaḥ tasmāt devātithiḥ amuṣya ca ṛkṣaḥ tasya dilīpaḥ abhūt pratīpaḥ tasya ca ātma-jaḥ
devāpiḥ śāntanuḥ tasya bāhlīkaḥ iti ca ātma-jāḥ pitṛ-rājyam parityajya devāpiḥ tu vanam gataḥ abhavat śāntanuḥ rājā prāk mahābhiṣa saṁjñitaḥ yam yam karābhyām spṛśati jīrṇam yauvanam eti saḥ
śāntim āpnoti ca eva agryām karmaṇā tena śāntanuḥ samāḥ dvādaśa tat-rājye na vavarṣa yadā vibhuḥ śāntanuḥ brāhmaṇaiḥ uktaḥ parivettā ayam agra-bhuk rājyam dehi agrajāya āśu pura-rāṣṭra vivṛddhaye
evam uktaḥ dvijaiḥ jyeṣṭham chandayām āsa saḥ abravīt tat-mantri prahitaiḥ vipraiḥ vedāt vibhraṁśitaḥ girā veda-vāda-ativādān vai tadā devaḥ vavarṣa ha devāpiḥ yogam āsthāya kalāpa-grāmam āśritaḥ
soma-vaṁśe kalau naṣṭe kṛta-ādau sthāpayiṣyati bāhlīkāt somadattaḥ abhūt bhūriḥ bhūri-śravāḥ tataḥ śalaḥ ca śāntanoḥ āsīt gaṅgāyām bhīṣmaḥ ātmavān sarva-dharma-vidām śreṣṭhaḥ mahā-bhāgavataḥ kaviḥ
vīra-yūtha-agraṇīḥ yena rāmaḥ api yudhi toṣitaḥ śāntanoḥ dāsa-kanyāyām jajñe citrāṅgadaḥ sutaḥ
vicitravīryaḥ ca avarajaḥ nāmnā citrāṅgadaḥ hataḥ yasyām parāśarāt sākṣāt avatīrṇaḥ hareḥ kalā veda-guptaḥ muniḥ kṛṣṇaḥ yataḥ aham idam adhyagām hitvā sva-śiṣyān paila-ādīn bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ mahyam putrāya śāntāya param guhyam idam jagau vicitravīryaḥ atha uvāha kāśīrāja-sute balāt svayaṁvarāt upānīte ambikā-ambālike ubhe tayoḥ āsakta hṛdayaḥ gṛhītaḥ yakṣmaṇā mṛtaḥ
kṣetre aprajasya vai bhrātuḥ mātrā uktaḥ bādarāyaṇaḥ dhṛtarāṣṭram ca pāṇḍum ca viduram ca api ajījanat
gāndhāryām dhṛtarāṣṭrasya jajñe putra-śatam nṛpa tatra duryodhanaḥ jyeṣṭhaḥ duḥśalā ca api kanyakā
śāpāt maithuna-ruddhasya pāṇḍoḥ kuntyām mahā-rathāḥ jātāḥ dharma anila indrebhyaḥ yudhiṣṭhira mukhāḥ trayaḥ nakulaḥ sahadevaḥ ca mādryām nāsatya-dasrayoḥ draupadyām pañca pañcabhyaḥ putrāḥ te pitaraḥ abhavan
yudhiṣṭhirāt prativindhyaḥ śrutasenaḥ vṛkodarāt arjunāt śrutakīrtiḥ tu śatānīkaḥ tu nākuliḥ
sahadeva-sutaḥ rājan śrutakarmā tathā apare yudhiṣṭhirāt tu pauravyām devakaḥ atha ghaṭotkacaḥ bhīmasenāt hiḍimbāyām kālyām sarvagataḥ tataḥ sahadevāt suhotram tu vijayā asūta pārvatī
kareṇumatyām nakulaḥ naramitram tathā arjunaḥ irāvantam ulupyām vai sutāyām babhruvāhanam maṇipura-pateḥ saḥ api tat-putraḥ putrikā-sutaḥ
tava tātaḥ subhadrāyām abhimanyuḥ ajāyata sarva-atiratha-jit vīraḥ uttarāyām tataḥ bhavān
parikṣīṇeṣu kuruṣu drauṇeḥ brahmāstra-tejasā tvam ca kṛṣṇa-anubhāvena sajīvaḥ mocitaḥ antakāt
tava ime tanayāḥ tāta janamejaya pūrvakāḥ śrutasenaḥ bhīmasenaḥ ugrasenaḥ ca vīryavān
janamejayaḥ tvām viditvā takṣakāt nidhanam gatam sarpān vai sarpa-yāga-agnau saḥ hoṣyati ruṣā-anvitaḥ
kālaṣeyam purodhāya turam turaga-medhaṣāṭ samantāt pṛthivīm sarvām jitvā yakṣyati ca adhvaraiḥ
tasya putraḥ śatānīkaḥ yājñavalkyāt trayīm paṭhan astra-jñānam kriyā-jñānam śaunakāt param eṣyati
sahasrānīkaḥ tat-putraḥ tataḥ ca eva aśvamedhajaḥ asīmakṛṣṇaḥ tasya api nemicakraḥ tu tat-sutaḥ
gajāhvaye hṛte nadyā kauśāmbyām sādhu vatsyati uktaḥ tataḥ citrarathaḥ tasmāt śucirathaḥ sutaḥ
tasmāt ca vṛṣṭimān tasya suṣeṇaḥ atha mahī-patiḥ sunīthaḥ tasya bhavitā nṛcakṣuḥ yat sukhīnalaḥ
pariplavaḥ sutaḥ tasmāt medhāvī sunaya-ātmajaḥ nṛpañjayaḥ tataḥ dūrvaḥ timiḥ tasmāt janiṣyati
timeḥ bṛhadrathaḥ tasmāt śatānīkaḥ sudāsa-jaḥ śatānīkāt durdamanaḥ tasya apatyam mahīnaraḥ
daṇḍapāṇiḥ nimiḥ tasya kṣemakaḥ bhavitā yataḥ brahma-kṣatrasya vai yoniḥ vaṁśaḥ deva-ṛṣi-satkṛtaḥ kṣemakam prāpya rājānam saṁsthām prāpsyati vai kalau atha māgadha-rājānaḥ bhāvinaḥ ye vadāmi te
bhavitā sahadevasya mārjāriḥ yat śrutaśravāḥ tataḥ yutāyuḥ tasya api niramitraḥ atha tat-sutaḥ sunakṣatraḥ sunakṣatrāt bṛhatsenaḥ atha karmajit tataḥ sutañjayāt vipraḥ śuciḥ tasya bhaviṣyati kṣemaḥ atha suvrataḥ tasmāt dharmasūtraḥ samaḥ tataḥ dyumatsenaḥ atha sumatiḥ subalaḥ janitā tataḥ
sunīthaḥ satyajit atha viśvajit yat ripuñjayaḥ bārhadrathāḥ ca bhūpālāḥ bhāvyāḥ sāhasra-vatsaram
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca anoḥ sabhānaraḥ cakṣuḥ pareṣṇuḥ ca trayaḥ sutāḥ sabhānarāt kālanaraḥ sṛñjayaḥ tat-sutaḥ tataḥ
janamejayaḥ tasya putraḥ mahāśālaḥ mahāmanāḥ uśīnaraḥ titikṣuḥ ca mahāmanasaḥ ātmajau
śibiḥ varaḥ kṛmiḥ dakṣaḥ catvāraḥ uśīnara-ātmajāḥ vṛṣādarbhaḥ sudhīraḥ ca madraḥ kekayaḥ ātmavān śibeḥ catvāraḥ eva āsan titikṣoḥ ca ruṣadrathaḥ tataḥ homaḥ atha sutapāḥ baliḥ sutapasaḥ abhavat
aṅga vaṅga kaliṅga ādyāḥ suhma puṇḍra oḍra saṁjñitāḥ jajñire dīrghatamasaḥ baleḥ kṣetre mahī-kṣitaḥ
cakruḥ sva-nāmnā viṣayān ṣaṭ imān prācyakān ca te khalapānaḥ aṅgataḥ jajñe tasmāt divirathaḥ tataḥ
sutaḥ dharmarathaḥ yasya jajñe citrarathaḥ aprajāḥ romapādaḥ iti khyātaḥ tasmai daśarathaḥ sakhā śāntām sva-kanyām prāyacchat ṛṣyaśṛṅgaḥ uvāha yām deve avarṣati yam rāmāḥ āninyuḥ hariṇī-sutam nāṭya-saṅgīta-vāditraiḥ vibhrama āliṅgana arhaṇaiḥ saḥ tu rājñaḥ anapatyasya nirūpya iṣṭim marutvate prajām adāt daśarathaḥ yena lebhe aprajāḥ prajāḥ caturaṅgaḥ romapādāt pṛthulākṣaḥ tu tat-sutaḥ
bṛhadrathaḥ bṛhatkarmā bṛhadbhānuḥ ca tat-sutāḥ ādyāt bṛhanmanāḥ tasmāt jayadrathaḥ udāhṛtaḥ
vijayaḥ tasya sambhūtyām tataḥ dhṛtiḥ ajāyata tataḥ dhṛtavrataḥ tasya satkarmā adhirathaḥ tataḥ
yaḥ asau gaṅgā-taṭe krīḍan mañjūṣa-antaḥgatam śiśum kuntyā apaviddham kānīnam anapatyaḥ akarot sutam
vṛṣasenaḥ sutaḥ tasya karṇasya jagatī pate druhyoḥ ca tanayaḥ babhruḥ setuḥ tasya ātmajaḥ tataḥ
ārabdhaḥ tasya gāndhāraḥ tasya dharmaḥ tataḥ dhṛtaḥ dhṛtasya durmadaḥ tasmāt pracetāḥ prācetasaḥ śatam
mleccha adhipatayaḥ abhūvan udīcīm diśam āśritāḥ turvasoḥ ca sutaḥ vahniḥ vahneḥ bhargaḥ atha bhānumān
tribhānuḥ tat-sutaḥ asya api karandhamaḥ udāra-dhīḥ marutaḥ tat-sutaḥ aputraḥ putram pauravam anvabhūt
duṣmantaḥ saḥ punaḥ bheje sva-vaṁśam rājya-kāmukaḥ yayāteḥ jyeṣṭha-putrasya yadoḥ vaṁśam nara-ṛṣabha varṇayāmi mahā-puṇyam sarva-pāpa-haram nṛṇām yadoḥ vaṁśam naraḥ śrutvā sarva-pāpaiḥ pramucyate
yatra avatīrṇaḥ bhagavān paramātmā nara-ākṛtiḥ yadoḥ sahasrajit kroṣṭā nalaḥ ripuḥ iti śrutāḥ catvāraḥ sūnavaḥ tatra śatajit prathama-ātmajaḥ mahāhayaḥ reṇuhayaḥ haihayaḥ ca iti tat-sutāḥ
dharmaḥ tu haihaya-sutaḥ netraḥ kunteḥ pitā tataḥ sohañjiḥ abhavat kunteḥ mahiṣmān bhadrasenakaḥ
durmadaḥ bhadrasenasya dhanakaḥ kṛtavīrya-sūḥ kṛtāgniḥ kṛtavarmā ca kṛtaujāḥ dhanaka-ātmajāḥ
arjunaḥ kṛtavīryasya sapta-dvīpa īśvaraḥ abhavat dattātreyāt hareḥ aṁśāt prāpta yoga-mahāguṇaḥ
na nūnam kārtavīryasya gatim yāsyanti pārthivāḥ yajña dāna tapaḥ yogaiḥ śruta vīrya dayā ādibhiḥ
pañcāśīti sahasrāṇi hi avyāhata balaḥ samāḥ anaṣṭa vitta smaraṇaḥ bubhuje akṣayya ṣaṭ-vasu
tasya putra-sahasreṣu pañca eva urvaritāḥ mṛdhe jayadhvajaḥ śūrasenaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ madhuḥ ūrjitaḥ
jayadhvajāt tālajaṅghaḥ tasya putra-śatam tu abhūt kṣatram yat tālajaṅgha-ākhyam aurva-tejaḥ upasaṁhṛtam
teṣām jyeṣṭhaḥ vītihotraḥ vṛṣṇiḥ putraḥ madhoḥ smṛtaḥ tasya putra-śatam tu āsīt vṛṣṇi jyeṣṭham yataḥ kulam
mādhavāḥ vṛṣṇayaḥ rājan yādavāḥ ca iti saṁjñitāḥ yadu-putrasya ca kroṣṭoḥ putraḥ vṛjinavān tataḥ svāhitaḥ ataḥ viṣadguḥ vai tasya citrarathaḥ tataḥ śaśabinduḥ mahā-yogī mahā-bhāgaḥ mahān abhūt caturdaśa-mahāratnaḥ cakravartī aparājitaḥ
tasya patnī sahasrāṇām daśānām su-mahā-yaśāḥ daśa lakṣa sahasrāṇi putrāṇām tāsu ajījanat
teṣām tu ṣaṭ pradhānānām pṛthuśravasaḥ ātmajaḥ dharmaḥ nāma uśanā tasya hayamedha-śatasya yāṭ
tat-sutaḥ rucakaḥ tasya pañca āsan ātmajāḥ śṛṇu purujit rukma rukmeṣu pṛthu jyāmagha saṁjñitāḥ
jyāmaghaḥ tu aprajaḥ api anyām bhāryām śaibyā-patiḥ bhayāt na avindat śatru-bhavanāt bhojyām kanyām ahāraṣīt ratha-sthām tām nirīkṣya āha śaibyā patim amarṣitā kā iyam kuhaka mat-sthānam ratham āropitā iti vai snuṣā tava iti abhihite smayantī patim abravīt
aham bandhyā asa-patnī ca snuṣā me yujyate katham janayiṣyasi yam rājñi tasya iyam upayujyate
anvamodanta tat viśvedevāḥ pitaraḥ eva ca śaibyā garbham adhāt kāle kumāram suṣuve śubham saḥ vidarbhaḥ iti proktaḥ upayeme snuṣām satīm
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tasyām vidarbhaḥ ajanayat putrau nāmnā kuśa-krathau tṛtīyam romapādam ca vidarbha-kula-nandanam
romapāda-sutaḥ babhruḥ babhroḥ kṛtiḥ ajāyata uśikaḥ tat-sutaḥ tasmāt cediḥ caidya ādayaḥ nṛpāḥ
krathasya kuntiḥ putraḥ abhūt vṛṣṇiḥ tasya atha nirvṛtiḥ tataḥ daśārhaḥ nāmnā abhūt tasya vyomaḥ sutaḥ tataḥ jīmūtaḥ vikṛtiḥ tasya yasya bhīmarathaḥ sutaḥ tataḥ navarathaḥ putraḥ jātaḥ daśarathaḥ tataḥ
karambhiḥ śakuneḥ putraḥ devarātaḥ tat-ātmajaḥ devakṣatraḥ tataḥ tasya madhuḥ kuruvaśāt anuḥ
puruhotraḥ tu anoḥ putraḥ tasya ayuḥ sātvataḥ tataḥ bhajamānaḥ bhajiḥ divyaḥ vṛṣṇiḥ devāvṛdhaḥ andhakaḥ sātvatasya sutāḥ sapta mahābhojaḥ ca māriṣa bhajamānasya nimlociḥ kiṅkaṇaḥ dhṛṣṭiḥ eva ca ekasyām ātmajāḥ patnyām anyasyām ca trayaḥ sutāḥ śatājit ca sahasrājit ayutājit iti prabho
babhruḥ devāvṛdha sutaḥ tayoḥ ślokau paṭhanti amū yathā eva śṛṇumaḥ dūrāt sampaśyāmaḥ tathā antikāt
babhruḥ śreṣṭhaḥ manuṣyāṇām devaiḥ devāvṛdhaḥ samaḥ puruṣāḥ pañca-ṣaṣṭiḥ ca ṣaṭ-sahasrāṇi ca aṣṭa ca ye amṛtatvam anuprāptāḥ babhroḥ devāvṛdhāt api mahābhojaḥ ati-dharma-ātmā bhojāḥ āsan tat-anvaye
vṛṣṇeḥ sumitraḥ putraḥ abhūt yudhājit ca param-tapa śiniḥ tasya anamitraḥ ca nighnaḥ abhūt anamitrataḥ
satrājitaḥ prasenaḥ ca nighnasya atha asatuḥ sutau anamitra-sutaḥ yaḥ anyaḥ śiniḥ tasya ca satyakaḥ
yuyudhānaḥ sātyakiḥ vai jayaḥ tasya kuṇiḥ tataḥ yugandharaḥ anamitrasya vṛṣṇiḥ putraḥ aparaḥ tataḥ
śvaphalkaḥ citrarathaḥ ca gāndinyām ca śvaphalkataḥ akrūra pramukhāḥ āsan putrāḥ dvādaśa viśrutāḥ
āsaṅgaḥ sārameyaḥ ca mṛduraḥ mṛduvit giriḥ dharmavṛddhaḥ sukarmā ca kṣetropekṣaḥ arimardanaḥ śatrughnaḥ gandhamādaḥ ca pratibāhuḥ ca dvādaśa teṣām svasā sucārā ākhyā dvau akrūra sutau api devavān upadevaḥ ca tathā citraratha-ātmajāḥ pṛthuḥ vidūratha ādyāḥ ca bahavaḥ vṛṣṇi-nandanāḥ
kukuraḥ bhajamānaḥ ca śuciḥ kambalabarhiṣaḥ kukurasya sutaḥ vahniḥ vilomā tanayaḥ tataḥ
kapotaromā tasya anuḥ sakhā yasya ca tumburuḥ andhakāt dundubhiḥ tasmāt avidyotaḥ punarvasuḥ
tasya āhukaḥ ca āhukī ca kanyā ca eva āhuka ātmajau devakaḥ ca ugrasenaḥ ca catvāraḥ devaka-ātmajāḥ devavān upadevaḥ ca sudevaḥ devavardhanaḥ teṣām svasāraḥ sapta āsan dhṛtadevā-ādayaḥ nṛpa śāntidevā upadevā ca śrīdevā devarakṣitā sahadevā devakī ca vasudevaḥ uvāha tāḥ
kaṁsaḥ sunāmā nyagrodhaḥ kaṅkaḥ śaṅkuḥ suhūḥ tathā rāṣṭrapālaḥ atha dhṛṣṭiḥ ca tuṣṭimān augrasenayaḥ
kaṁsā kaṁsavatī kaṅkā śūrabhū rāṣṭrapālikā ugrasena-duhitaraḥ vasudeva-anuja striyaḥ
śūraḥ vidūrathāt āsīt bhajamānaḥ tu tat-sutaḥ śiniḥ tasmāt svayam bhojaḥ hṛdikaḥ tat-sutaḥ mataḥ
devamīḍhaḥ śatadhanuḥ kṛtavarmā iti tat-sutāḥ devamīḍhasya śūrasya māriṣā nāma patnī abhūt
tasyām saḥ janayām āsa daśa putrān akalmaṣān vasudevam devabhāgam devaśravasam ānakam sṛñjayam śyāmakam kaṅkam śamīkam vatsakam vṛkam deva-dundubhayaḥ neduḥ ānakāḥ yasya janmani vasudevam hareḥ sthānam vadanti ānakadundubhim pṛthā ca śrutadevā ca śrutakīrtiḥ śrutaśravāḥ rājādhidevī ca eteṣām bhaginyaḥ pañca kanyakāḥ kunteḥ sakhyuḥ pitā śūraḥ hi aputrasya pṛthām adāt
sā āpa durvāsasaḥ vidyām deva-hūtīm pratoṣitāt tasyāḥ vīrya parīkṣa-artham ājuhāva ravim śuciḥ
tadā eva upāgatam devam vīkṣya vismita-mānasā pratyaya-artham prayuktā me yāhi deva kṣamasva me
amogham deva-sandarśam ādadhe tvayi ca ātmajam yoniḥ yathā na duṣyeta kartā aham te sumadhyame
iti tasyām saḥ ādhāya garbham sūryaḥ divam gataḥ sadyaḥ kumāraḥ sañjajñe dvitīyaḥ iva bhāskaraḥ
tam sā atyajat nadī-toye kṛcchrāt lokasya bibhyatī prapitāmahaḥ tām uvāha pāṇḍuḥ vai satya-vikramaḥ
śrutadevām tu kārūṣaḥ vṛddhaśarmā samagrahīt yasyām abhūt dantavakraḥ ṛṣi-śaptaḥ diteḥ sutaḥ
kaikeyaḥ dhṛṣṭaketuḥ ca śrutakīrtim avindata santardana-ādayaḥ tasyām pañca āsan kaikayāḥ sutāḥ
rājādhidevyām āvantyau jayasenaḥ ajaniṣṭa ha damaghoṣaḥ cedi-rājaḥ śrutaśravasam agrahīt
śiśupālaḥ sutaḥ tasyāḥ kathitaḥ tasya sambhavaḥ devabhāgasya kaṁsāyām citraketu bṛhadbalau
kaṁsavatyām devaśravasaḥ suvīraḥ iṣumān tathā bakaḥ kaṅkāt tu kaṅkāyām satyajit purujit tathā
sṛñjayaḥ rāṣṭrapālyām ca vṛṣa-durmarṣaṇa-ādikān harikeśa hiraṇyākṣau śūrabhūmyām ca śyāmakaḥ
miśrakeśyām apsarasi vṛka-ādīn vatsakaḥ tathā takṣa-puṣkara-śāla-ādīn durvākṣyām vṛkaḥ ādadhe
sumitra arjunapāla ādīn samīkāt tu sudāmanī ānakaḥ karṇikāyām vai ṛtadhāmā jayau api
pauravī rohiṇī bhadrā madirā rocanā ilā devakī pramukhāḥ ca āsan patnyaḥ ānakadundubheḥ
balam gadam sāraṇam ca durmadam vipulam dhruvam vasudevaḥ tu rohiṇyām kṛta-ādīn udapādayat
subhadraḥ bhadrabāhuḥ ca durmadaḥ bhadraḥ eva ca pauravyāḥ tanayāḥ hi ete bhūta-ādyāḥ dvādaśa abhavan nanda-upananda-kṛtaka-śūra-ādyāḥ madirā-ātmajāḥ kauśalyā keśinam tu ekam asūta kula-nandanam
rocanāyām ataḥ jātāḥ hasta hemāṅgada ādayaḥ ilāyām uruvalka-ādīn yadu-mukhyān ajījanat
vipṛṣṭhaḥ dhṛtadevāyām ekaḥ ānakadundubheḥ śāntidevā-ātmajāḥ rājan praśama-prasita-ādayaḥ
rājanya kalpa varṣa-ādyāḥ upadevā-sutāḥ daśa vasu haṁsa suvaṁśa ādyāḥ śrīdevāyāḥ tu ṣaṭ sutāḥ
devarakṣitayā labdhāḥ nava ca atra gadā-ādayaḥ vasudevaḥ sutān aṣṭau ādadhe sahadevayā
pravara śruta mukhyān ca sākṣāt dharmaḥ vasūn iva vasudevaḥ tu devakyām aṣṭa putrān ajījanat kīrtimantam suṣeṇam ca bhadrasenam udāra-dhīḥ ṛjum sammardanam bhadram saṅkarṣaṇam ahi-īśvaram aṣṭamaḥ tu tayoḥ āsīt svayam eva hariḥ kila subhadrā ca mahābhāgā tava rājan pitāmahī
yadā yadā hi dharmasya kṣayaḥ vṛddhiḥ ca pāpmanaḥ tadā tu bhagavān īśaḥ ātmānam sṛjate hariḥ
na hi asya janmanaḥ hetuḥ karmaṇaḥ vā mahīpate ātma-māyām vinā īśasya parasya draṣṭuḥ ātmanaḥ
yat māyā-ceṣṭitam puṁsaḥ sthiti utpatti apyayāya hi anugrahaḥ tat-nivṛtteḥ ātma-lābhāya ca iṣyate
akṣauhiṇīnām patibhiḥ asuraiḥ nṛpa-lāñchanaiḥ bhuvaḥ ākramyamāṇāyāḥ abhārāya kṛta-udyamaḥ
karmāṇi aparimeyāṇi manasā api sura-īśvaraiḥ saha-saṅkarṣaṇaḥ cakre bhagavān madhu-sūdanaḥ
kalau janiṣyamāṇānām duḥkha-śoka-tamaḥ-nudam anugrahāya bhaktānām su-puṇyam vyatanot yaśaḥ
yasmin sat-karṇa-pīyuṣe yaśaḥ-tīrtha-vare sakṛt śrotra-añjaliḥ upaspṛśya dhunute karma-vāsanām
bhoja vṛṣṇi andhaka madhu śūrasena daśārhakaiḥ ślāghanīya īhitaḥ śaśvat kuru-sṛñjaya-pāṇḍubhiḥ snigdha smita īkṣita udāraiḥ vākyaiḥ vikrama-līlayā nṛ-lokam ramayām āsa mūrtyā sarva-aṅga-ramyayā
yasya ānanam makara-kuṇḍala-cāru-karṇa bhrājat kapola subhagam sa-vilāsa-hāsam nitya-utsavam na tatṛpuḥ dṛśibhiḥ pibantyaḥ nāryaḥ narāḥ ca muditāḥ kupitāḥ nimeḥ ca
jātaḥ gataḥ pitṛ-gṛhāt vrajam edhita-arthaḥ hatvā ripūn suta-śatāni kṛta-urudāraḥ utpādya teṣu puruṣaḥ kratubhiḥ samīje ātmānam ātma-nigamam prathayan janeṣu
pṛthvyāḥ saḥ vai guru-bharam kṣapayan kurūṇām antaḥ-samuttha-kalinā yudhi bhūpa-camvaḥ dṛṣṭyā vidhūya vijaye jayam udvighoṣya procya uddhavāya ca param samagāt sva-dhāma
śrī-rājā uvāca kathitaḥ vaṁśa-vistāraḥ bhavatā soma-sūryayoḥ rājñām ca ubhaya vaṁśyānām caritam parama adbhutam
yadoḥ ca dharma-śīlasya nitarām muni-sattama tatra aṁśena avatīrṇasya viṣṇoḥ vīryāṇi śaṁsa naḥ
avatīrya yadoḥ vaṁśe bhagavān bhūta-bhāvanaḥ kṛtavān yāni viśva-ātmā tāni naḥ vada vistarāt
nivṛtta tarṣaiḥ upagīyamānāt bhava-auṣadhāt śrotra manaḥ abhirāmāt kaḥ uttamaśloka guṇa-anuvādāt pumān virajyeta vinā paśu-ghnāt
pitāmahāḥ me samare amaram jayaiḥ devavrata-ādya atirathaiḥ timiṅgilaiḥ duratyayam kaurava-sainya-sāgaram kṛtvā ataran vatsa-padam sma yat-plavāḥ drauṇi astra vipluṣṭam idam mat-aṅgam santāna-bījam kuru-pāṇḍavānām jugopa kukṣim gataḥ ātta-cakraḥ mātuḥ ca me yaḥ śaraṇam gatāyāḥ vīryāṇi tasya akhila-deha-bhājām antaḥ bahiḥ pūruṣa kāla-rūpaiḥ prayacchataḥ mṛtyum uta amṛtam ca māyā-manuṣyasya vadasva vidvan
rohiṇyāḥ tanayaḥ proktaḥ rāmaḥ saṅkarṣaṇaḥ tvayā devakyāḥ garbha-sambandhaḥ kutaḥ deha-antaram vinā
kasmāt mukundaḥ bhagavān pituḥ gehāt vrajam gataḥ kva vāsam jñātibhiḥ sārdham kṛtavān sātvatām patiḥ
vraje vasan kim akarot madhupuryām ca keśavaḥ bhrātaram ca avadhīt kaṁsam mātuḥ addhā a-tat-arhaṇam
deham mānuṣam āśritya kati varṣāṇi vṛṣṇibhiḥ yadu-puryām saha avātsīt patnyaḥ kati abhavan prabhoḥ
etat anyat ca sarvam me mune kṛṣṇa-viceṣṭitam vaktum arhasi sarva-jña śraddadhānāya vistṛtam
na eṣā ati-duḥsahā kṣut mām tyakta-udam api bādhate pibantam tvat-mukha-ambhoja-cyutam hari-kathā-amṛtam
sūtaḥ uvāca evam niśamya bhṛgu-nandana sādhu-vādam vaiyāsakiḥ saḥ bhagavān atha viṣṇu-rātam pratyarcya kṛṣṇa-caritam kali-kalmaṣa-ghnam vyāhartum ārabhata bhāgavata-pradhānaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca samyak vyavasitā buddhiḥ tava rāja-ṛṣi-sattama vāsudeva-kathāyām te yat jātā naiṣṭhikī ratiḥ
vāsudeva-kathā-praśnaḥ puruṣān trīn punāti hi vaktāram pracchakam śrotṝn tat-pāda-salilam yathā
bhūmiḥ dṛpta nṛpa-vyāja daitya anīka śata-ayutaiḥ ākrāntā bhūri-bhāreṇa brahmāṇam śaraṇam yayau
gauḥ bhūtvā aśru-mukhī khinnā krandantī karuṇam vibhoḥ upasthitā antike tasmai vyasanam samavocata
brahmā tat-upadhārya atha saha devaiḥ tayā saha jagāma sa-tri-nayanaḥ tīram kṣīra-payaḥ-nidheḥ
tatra gatvā jagannātham deva-devam vṛṣākapim puruṣam puruṣa-sūktena upatasthe samāhitaḥ
giram samādhau gagane samīritām niśamya vedhāḥ tridaśān uvāca ha gām pauruṣīm me śṛṇuta amarāḥ punaḥ vidhīyatām āśu tathā eva mā ciram
purā eva puṁsā avadhṛtaḥ dharā-jvaraḥ bhavadbhiḥ aṁśaiḥ yaduṣu upajanyatām saḥ yāvat urvyāḥ bharam īśvara-īśvaraḥ sva-kāla-śaktyā kṣapayan caret bhuvi
vasudeva-gṛhe sākṣāt bhagavān puruṣaḥ paraḥ janiṣyate tat-priya-artham sambhavantu sura-striyaḥ
vāsudeva-kalā anantaḥ sahasra-vadanaḥ svarāṭ agrataḥ bhavitā devaḥ hareḥ priya-cikīrṣayā
viṣṇoḥ māyā bhagavatī yayā sammohitam jagat ādiṣṭā prabhuṇā aṁśena kārya-arthe sambhaviṣyati
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti ādiśya amara-gaṇān prajāpati-patiḥ vibhuḥ āśvāsya ca mahīm gīrbhiḥ sva-dhāma paramam yayau
śūrasenaḥ yadu-patiḥ mathurām āvasan purīm māthurān śūrasenān ca viṣayān bubhuje purā
rājadhānī tataḥ sā abhūt sarva-yādava-bhūbhujām mathurā bhagavān yatra nityam sannihitaḥ hariḥ
tasyām tu karhicit śauriḥ vasudevaḥ kṛta-udvahaḥ devakyā sūryayā sārdham prayāṇe ratham āruhat
ugrasena-sutaḥ kaṁsaḥ svasuḥ priya-cikīrṣayā raśmīn hayānām jagrāha raukmaiḥ ratha-śataiḥ vṛtaḥ
catuḥ-śatam pāribarham gajānām hema-mālinām aśvānām ayutam sārdham rathānām ca tri-ṣaṭ-śatam dāsīnām su-kumārīṇām dve śate samalaṅkṛte duhitre devakaḥ prādāt yāne duhitṛ-vatsalaḥ
śaṅkha tūrya mṛdaṅgāḥ ca neduḥ dundubhayaḥ samam prayāṇa-prakrame tāta vara-vadhvoḥ su-maṅgalam
pathi pragrahiṇam kaṁsam ābhāṣya āha a-śarīra-vāk asyāḥ tvām aṣṭamaḥ garbhaḥ hantā yām vahase abudha
iti uktaḥ saḥ khalaḥ pāpaḥ bhojānām kula-pāṁsanaḥ bhaginīm hantum ārabdham khaḍga-pāṇiḥ kace agrahīt
tam jugupsita-karmāṇam nṛśaṁsam nirapatrapam vasudevaḥ mahā-bhāgaḥ uvāca parisāntvayan
śrī-vasudevaḥ uvāca ślāghanīya-guṇaḥ śūraiḥ bhavān bhoja-yaśaḥ-karaḥ saḥ katham bhaginīm hanyāt striyam udvāha-parvaṇi
mṛtyuḥ janma-vatām vīra dehena saha jāyate adya vā abda-śata ante vā mṛtyuḥ vai prāṇinām dhruvaḥ
dehe pañcatvam āpanne dehī karma-anugaḥ avaśaḥ deha-antaram anuprāpya prāktanam tyajate vapuḥ
vrajan tiṣṭhan padā ekena yathā eva ekena gacchati yathā tṛṇa-jalaukā evam dehī karma-gatim gataḥ
svapne yathā paśyati deham īdṛśam manorathena abhiniviṣṭa cetanaḥ dṛṣṭa śrutābhyām manasā anucintayan prapadyate tat kim api hi apasmṛtiḥ
yataḥ yataḥ dhāvati daiva-coditam manaḥ vikāra-ātmakam āpa pañcasu guṇeṣu māyā-raciteṣu dehī asau prapadyamānaḥ saha tena jāyate
