saṁsikta vartma kariṇām mada gandha toyaiḥ citra dhvajaiḥ kanaka toraṇa pūrṇa-kumbhaiḥ mṛṣṭa ātmabhiḥ nava dukūla vibhūṣaṇa srak gandhaiḥ nṛbhiḥ yuvatibhiḥ ca virājamānam uddīpta dīpa balibhiḥ prati sadma jāla niryāta dhūpa ruciram vilasat patākam mūrdhanya hema kalaśaiḥ rajata uru śṛṅgaiḥ juṣṭam dadarśa bhavanaiḥ kuru-rāja dhāma
prāptam niśamya nara locana pāna pātram autsukya viślathita keśa dukūla bandhāḥ sadyaḥ visṛjya gṛha karma patīn ca talpe draṣṭum yayuḥ yuvatayaḥ sma nara-indra mārge
tasmin su saṅkule ibha aśva ratha dvi-padbhiḥ kṛṣṇam sa-bhāryam upalabhya gṛha adhirūḍhāḥ nāryaḥ vikīrya kusumaiḥ manasā upaguhya su-svāgatam vidadhuḥ utsmaya vīkṣitena
ūcuḥ striyaḥ pathi nirīkṣya mukunda patnīḥ tārāḥ yathā uḍu-pa sahāḥ kim akāri amūbhiḥ yat cakṣuṣām puruṣa mauliḥ udāra hāsa līlā avaloka kalayā utsavam ātanoti
tatra tatra upasaṅgamya paurāḥ maṅgala pāṇayaḥ cakruḥ saparyām kṛṣṇāya śreṇī mukhyāḥ hata enasaḥ
antaḥ-pura janaiḥ prītyā mukundaḥ phulla locanaiḥ sa-sambhramaiḥ abhyupetaḥ prāviśat rāja mandiram
pṛthā vilokya bhrātreyam kṛṣṇam tri-bhuvana īśvaram prīta ātmā utthāya paryaṅkāt sa-snuṣā pariṣasvaje
govindam gṛham ānīya deva deva-īśam ādṛtaḥ pūjāyām na avidat kṛtyam pramoda upahataḥ nṛpaḥ
pitṛ svasuḥ guru strīṇām kṛṣṇaḥ cakre abhivādanam svayam ca kṛṣṇayā rājan bhaginyā ca abhivanditaḥ
śvaśrvā sañcoditā kṛṣṇā kṛṣṇa-patnīḥ ca sarvaśaḥ ānarca rukmiṇīm satyām bhadrām jāmbavatīm tathā kālindīm mitravindām ca śaibyām nāgnajitīm satīm anyāḥ ca abhyāgatāḥ yāḥ tu vāsaḥ srak maṇḍana ādibhiḥ
sukham nivāsayām āsa dharma-rājaḥ janārdanam sa-sainyam sa-anuga amatyam sa-bhāryam ca navam navam
tarpayitvā khāṇḍavena vahnim phālguna saṁyutaḥ mocayitvā mayam yena rājñe divyā sabhā kṛtā uvāsa katicit māsān rājñaḥ priya cikīrṣayā viharan ratham āruhya phālgunena bhaṭaiḥ vṛtaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ekadā tu sabhā madhye āsthitaḥ munibhiḥ vṛtaḥ brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatriyaiḥ vaiśyaiḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ ca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ ācāryaiḥ kula vṛddhaiḥ ca jñāti sambandhi bāndhavaiḥ śṛṇvatām eva ca eteṣām ābhāṣya idam uvāca ha
śrī-yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca kratu rājena govinda rājasūyena pāvanīḥ yakṣye vibhūtīḥ bhavataḥ tat sampādaya naḥ prabho
tvat pāduke aviratam pari ye caranti dhyāyanti abhadra naśane śucayaḥ gṛṇanti vindanti te kamala nābha bhava apavargam āśāsate yadi te āśiṣaḥ īśa na anye
tat deva-deva bhavataḥ caraṇa-aravinda sevā anubhāvam iha paśyatu lokaḥ eṣaḥ ye tvām bhajanti na bhajanti uta vā ubhayeṣām niṣṭhām pradarśaya vibho kuru-sṛñjayānām
na brahmaṇaḥ sva para bheda matiḥ tava syāt sarva ātmanaḥ sama dṛśaḥ sva sukha anubhūteḥ saṁsevatām sura-taroḥ iva te prasādaḥ sevā anurūpam udayaḥ na viparyayaḥ atra
śrī-bhagavān uvāca samyak vyavasitam rājan bhavatā śatru karśana kalyāṇī yena te kīrtiḥ lokān anubhaviṣyati
ṛṣīṇām pitṛ devānām suhṛdām api naḥ prabhoḥ sarveṣām api bhūtānām īpsitaḥ kratu rāṭ ayam
vijitya nṛ-patīn sarvān kṛtvā ca jagatīm vaśe sambhṛtya sarva sambhārān āharasva mahā kratum
ete te bhrātaraḥ rājan loka pāla aṁśa sambhavāḥ jitaḥ asmi ātma-vatā te aham durjayaḥ yaḥ akṛta-ātmabhiḥ
na kaścit mat param loke tejasā yaśasā śriyā vibhūtibhiḥ vā abhibhavet devaḥ api kim u pārthivaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca niśamya bhagavat gītam prītaḥ phulla mukha ambujaḥ bhrātṝn dik vijaye ayuṅkta viṣṇu tejaḥ upabṛṁhitān
sahadevam dakṣiṇasyām ādiśat saha sṛñjayaiḥ diśi pratīcyām nakulam udīcyām savyasācinam prācyām vṛkodaram matsyaiḥ kekayaiḥ saha madrakaiḥ
te vijitya nṛpān vīrāḥ ājahruḥ digbhyaḥ ojasā ajāta-śatrave bhūri draviṇam nṛpa yakṣyate
śrutvā ajitam jarāsandham nṛpateḥ dhyāyataḥ hariḥ āha upāyam tam eva ādyaḥ uddhavaḥ yam uvāca ha
bhīmasenaḥ arjunaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ brahma liṅga dharāḥ trayaḥ jagmuḥ girivrajam tāta bṛhadratha-sutaḥ yataḥ
te gatvā ātithya velāyām gṛheṣu gṛha-medhinam brahmaṇyam samayāceran rājanyāḥ brahma-liṅginaḥ
rājan viddhi atithīn prāptān arthinaḥ dūram āgatān tat naḥ prayaccha bhadram te yat vayam kāmayāmahe
kim durmarṣam titikṣūṇām kim akāryam asādhubhiḥ kim na deyam vadānyānām kaḥ paraḥ sama darśinām
yaḥ anityena śarīreṇa satām geyam yaśaḥ dhruvam na ācinoti svayam kalpaḥ saḥ vācyaḥ śocyaḥ eva saḥ
hariścandraḥ rantidevaḥ uñcha-vṛttiḥ śibiḥ baliḥ vyādhaḥ kapotaḥ bahavaḥ hi adhruveṇa dhruvam gatāḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca svaraiḥ ākṛtibhiḥ tān tu prakoṣṭhaiḥ jyā hataiḥ api rājanya bandhūn vijñāya dṛṣṭa pūrvān acintayat
rājanya-bandhavaḥ hi ete brahma liṅgāni bibhrati dadāni bhikṣitam tebhyaḥ ātmānam api dustyajam
baleḥ nu śrūyate kīrtiḥ vitatā dikṣu akalmaṣā aiśvaryāt bhraṁśitasya api vipra vyājena viṣṇunā śrīyam jihīrṣatā indrasya viṣṇave dvija-rūpiṇe jānan api mahīm prādāt vāryamāṇaḥ api daitya rāṭ
jīvatā brāhmaṇa-arthāya kaḥ nu arthaḥ kṣatra-bandhunā dehena patamānena na īhatā vipulam yaśaḥ
iti udāra matiḥ prāha kṛṣṇa-arjuna-vṛkodarān he vipraḥ vriyatām kāmaḥ dadāmi ātma śiraḥ api vaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca yuddham naḥ dehi rāja-indra dvandvaśaḥ yadi manyase yuddha arthinaḥ vayam prāptāḥ rājanyāḥ na anya kāṅkṣiṇaḥ
asau vṛkodaraḥ pārthaḥ tasya bhrātā arjunaḥ hi ayam anayoḥ mātuleyam mām kṛṣṇam jānīhi te ripum
evam āveditaḥ rāja jahāsa uccaiḥ sma māgadhaḥ āha ca amarṣitaḥ mandāḥ yuddham tarhi dadāmi vaḥ
na tvayā bhīruṇā yotsye yudhi viklava tejasā mathurām sva purīm tyaktvā samudram śaraṇam gataḥ
ayam tu vayasā atulyaḥ na ati sattvaḥ na me samaḥ arjunaḥ na bhavet yoddhā bhīmaḥ tulya balaḥ mama
iti uktvā bhīmasenāya prādāya mahatīm gadām dvitīyām svayam ādāya nirjagāma purāt bahiḥ
tataḥ samekhale vīrau saṁyuktau itara-itaram jaghnatuḥ vajra-kalpābhyām gadābhyām raṇa durmadau
maṇḍalāni vicitrāṇi savyam dakṣiṇam eva ca caratoḥ śuśubhe yuddham naṭayoḥ iva raṅgiṇoḥ
tataḥ caṭa-caṭā-śabdaḥ vajra niṣpeṣa sannibhaḥ gadayoḥ kṣiptayoḥ rājan dantayoḥ iva dantinoḥ
te vai gade bhuja javena nipātyamāne anyonyataḥ aṁsa kaṭi pāda kara ūru jatrum cūrṇī babhūvatuḥ upetya yathā arka-śākhe saṁyudhyatoḥ dviradayoḥ iva dīpta manvyoḥ
ittham tayoḥ prahatayoḥ gadayoḥ nr vīrau kruddhau sva muṣṭibhiḥ ayaḥ sparaśaiḥ apiṣṭām śabdaḥ tayoḥ praharatoḥ ibhayoḥ iva āsīt nirghāta vajra paruṣaḥ tala tāḍana utthaḥ
tayoḥ evam praharatoḥ sama śikṣā bala ojasoḥ nirviśeṣam abhūt yuddham akṣīṇa javayoḥ nṛpa
śatroḥ janma mṛtī vidvān jīvitam ca jarā kṛtam pārtham āpyāyayan svena tejasā acintayat hariḥ
sañcintya ari vadha upāyam bhīmasya amogha-darśanaḥ darśayām āsa viṭapam pāṭayan iva saṁjñayā
tat vijñāya mahā sattvaḥ bhīmaḥ praharatām varaḥ gṛhītvā pādayoḥ śatrum pātayām asa bhū-tale
ekam pādam padā ākramya dorbhyām anyam pragṛhya saḥ gudataḥ pāṭayām āsa śākhām iva mahā gajaḥ
eka pāda ūru vṛṣaṇa kati pṛṣṭha stana aṁsake eka bāhu akṣi bhrū karṇe śakale dadṛśuḥ prajāḥ
hāhā-kāraḥ mahān āsīt nihate magadha-īśvare pūjayām āsatuḥ bhīmam parirabhya jaya acyutau
sahadevam tat tanayam bhagavān bhūta bhāvanaḥ abhyaṣiñcat ameya-ātmā magadhānām patim prabhuḥ mocayām āsa rājanyān saṁruddhāḥ māgadhena ye
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ayute dve śatāni aṣṭau niruddhāḥ yudhi nirjitāḥ te nirgatāḥ giridroṇyām malināḥ mala vāsasaḥ kṣut kṣāmāḥ śuṣka vadanāḥ saṁrodha parikarśitāḥ dadṛśuḥ te ghana śyāmam pīta kauśeya vāsasam śrīvatsa aṅkam catuḥ bāhum padma garbha aruṇa īkṣaṇam cāru prasanna vadanam sphurat makara kuṇḍalam padma hastam gadā śaṅkha ratha-aṅgaiḥ upalakṣitam kirīṭa hāra kaṭaka kaṭi-sūtra aṅgada añcitam bhrājat vara maṇi grīvam nivītam vana mālayā pibantaḥ iva cakṣurbhyām lihantaḥ iva jihvayā jighrantaḥ iva nāsābhyām rambhantaḥ iva bāhubhiḥ praṇemuḥ hata pāpmānaḥ mūrdhabhiḥ pādayoḥ hareḥ
kṛṣṇa-sandarśana āhlāda dhvasta saṁrodhana klamāḥ praśaśaṁsuḥ hṛṣīkā-īśam gīrbhiḥ prāñjalayaḥ nṛpāḥ
rājānaḥ ūcuḥ namaḥ te deva deva īśa prapanna ārti hara avyaya prapannān pāhi naḥ kṛṣṇa nirviṇṇān ghora saṁsṛteḥ
na enam nātha anusūyāmaḥ māgadham madhusūdana anugrahaḥ yat bhavataḥ rājñām rājya cyutiḥ vibho
rājya aiśvarya mada unnaddhaḥ na śreyaḥ vindate nṛpaḥ tvat māyā mohitaḥ anityāḥ manyate sampadaḥ acalāḥ
mṛga-tṛṣṇām yathā bālāḥ manyante udaka āśayam evam vaikārikīm māyām ayuktāḥ vastu cakṣate
vayam purā śrī mada naṣṭa dṛṣṭayaḥ jigīṣayā asyāḥ itara-itara spṛdhaḥ ghnantaḥ prajāḥ svāḥ ati nirghṛṇāḥ prabho mṛtyum puraḥ tvā avigaṇayya durmadāḥ te eva kṛṣṇa adya gabhīra raṁhasā duranta vīryeṇa vicālitāḥ śriyaḥ kālena tanvā bhavataḥ anukampayā vinaṣṭa darpāḥ caraṇau smarāma te
atha u na rājyam mṛga-tṛṣṇi rūpitam dehena śaśvat patatā rujām bhuvā upāsitavyam spṛhayāmahe vibho kriyā phalam pretya ca karṇa rocanam
tam naḥ samādiśa upāyam yena te caraṇa abjayoḥ smṛtiḥ yathā na viramet api saṁsaratām iha
kṛṣṇāya vāsudevāya haraye parama-ātmane praṇata kleśa nāśāya govindāya namaḥ namaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca saṁstūyamāṇaḥ bhagavān rājabhiḥ mukta bandhanaiḥ tān āha karuṇaḥ tāta śaraṇyaḥ ślakṣṇayā girā
śrī-bhagavān uvāca adya prabhṛti vaḥ bhū-pāḥ mayi ātmani akhila īśvare su dṛḍhā jāyate bhaktiḥ bāḍham āśaṁsitam tathā
diṣṭyā vyavasitam bhūpāḥ bhavantaḥ ṛta bhāṣiṇaḥ śrī aiśvarya mada unnāham paśye unmādakam nṛṇām
haihayaḥ nahuṣaḥ veṇaḥ rāvaṇaḥ narakaḥ apare śrī madāt bhraṁśitāḥ sthānāt deva daitya nara īśvarāḥ
bhavantaḥ etat vijñāya deha-ādi utpādyam anta-vat mām yajantaḥ adhvaraiḥ yuktāḥ prajāḥ dharmeṇa rakṣyatha
santanvantaḥ prajā tantūn sukham duḥkham bhava abhavau prāptam prāptam ca sevantaḥ mat-cittāḥ vicariṣyatha
udāsīnāḥ ca deha-ādau ātma-ārāmāḥ dhṛta vratāḥ mayi āveśya manaḥ samyak mām ante brahma yāsyatha
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti ādiśya nṛpān kṛṣṇaḥ bhagavān bhuvana īśvaraḥ teṣām nyayuṅkta puruṣān striyaḥ majjana karmaṇi
saparyām kārayām āsa sahadevena bhārata nara-deva ucitaiḥ vastraiḥ bhūṣaṇaiḥ srak vilepanaiḥ
bhojayitvā vara annena su snātān samalaṅkṛtān bhogaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ yuktān tāmbūla ādyaiḥ nṛpa ucitaiḥ
te pūjitāḥ mukundena rājānaḥ mṛṣṭa kuṇḍalāḥ virejuḥ mocitāḥ kleśāt prāvṛṭ ante yathā grahāḥ
rathān sat aśvān āropya maṇi kāñcana bhūṣitān prīṇayya sunṛtaiḥ vākyaiḥ sva deśān pratyayāpayat
te evam mocitāḥ kṛcchrāt kṛṣṇena su-mahā-ātmanā yayuḥ tam eva dhyāyantaḥ kṛtāni ca jagat-pateḥ
jagaduḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ te mahā-puruṣa ceṣṭitam yathā anvaśāsat bhagavān tathā cakruḥ atandritāḥ
jarāsandham ghātayitvā bhīmasenena keśavaḥ pārthābhyam saṁyutaḥ prāyāt sahadevena pūjitaḥ
gatvā te khāṇḍava-prastham śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ jita arayaḥ harṣayantaḥ sva suhṛdaḥ durhṛdām ca asukha āvahāḥ
tat śrutvā prīta manasaḥ indraprastha-nivāsinaḥ menire māgadham śāntam rājā ca āpta manaḥ-rathaḥ
abhivandya atha rājānam bhīma-arjuna-janārdanāḥ sarvam āśrāvayām cakruḥ ātmanā yat anuṣṭhitam
niśamya dharma-rājaḥ tat keśavena anukampitam ānanda aśru-kalām muñcan premṇā na uvāca kiñcana
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam yudhiṣṭhiraḥ rājā jarāsandha-vadham vibhoḥ kṛṣṇasya ca anubhāvam tam śrutvā prītaḥ tam abravīt
śrī-yudhiṣṭhiraḥ uvāca ye syuḥ trai-lokya guravaḥ sarve lokāḥ mahā-īśvarāḥ vahanti durlabham labdhvā śirasā eva anuśāsanam
saḥ bhavān aravinda-akṣaḥ dīnānām īśa māninām dhatte anuśāsanam bhūman tat atyanta viḍambanam
na hi ekasya advitīyasya brahmaṇaḥ parama-ātmanaḥ karmabhiḥ vardhate tejaḥ hrasate ca yathā raveḥ
na vai te ajita bhaktānām mama aham iti mādhava tvam tava iti ca nānā dhīḥ paśūnām iva vaikṛtī
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti uktvā yajñiye kāle vavre yuktān saḥ ṛtvijaḥ kṛṣṇa anumoditaḥ pārthaḥ brāhmaṇān brahma vādinaḥ
dvaipāyanaḥ bharadvājaḥ sumantuḥ gotamaḥ asitaḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ cyavanaḥ kaṇvaḥ maitreyaḥ kavaṣaḥ tritaḥ viśvāmitraḥ vāmadevaḥ sumatiḥ jaiminiḥ kratuḥ pailaḥ parāśaraḥ gargaḥ vaiśampāyanaḥ eva ca atharvā kaśyapaḥ dhaumyaḥ rāmaḥ bhārgavaḥ āsuriḥ vītihotraḥ madhucchandāḥ vīrasenaḥ akṛtavraṇaḥ
upahūtāḥ tathā ca anye droṇa-bhīṣma-kṛpa-ādayaḥ dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ saha-sutaḥ viduraḥ ca mahā-matiḥ brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyāḥ vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ yajña didṛkṣavaḥ tatra īyuḥ sarva rājānaḥ rājñām prakṛtayaḥ nṛpa
tataḥ te deva-yajanam brāhmaṇāḥ svarṇa lāṅgalaiḥ kṛṣṭvā tatra yathā-āmnāyam dīkṣayām cakrire nṛpam
haimāḥ kila upakaraṇāḥ varuṇasya yathā purā indra-ādayaḥ loka-pālāḥ viriñci-bhava-saṁyutāḥ sa-gaṇāḥ siddha-gandharvāḥ vidyādhara mahā-uragāḥ munayaḥ yakṣa-rakṣāṁsi khaga-kinnara-cāraṇāḥ rājānaḥ ca samāhūtāḥ rāja patnyaḥ ca sarvaśaḥ rājasūyam samīyuḥ sma rājñaḥ pāṇḍu-sutasya vai menire kṛṣṇa-bhaktasya su-upapannam avismitāḥ
ayājayan mahā-rājam yājakāḥ deva varcasaḥ rājasūyena vidhi-vat pracetasam iva amarāḥ
sūtye ahani avanī-pālaḥ yājakān sadasaḥ patīn apūjayat mahā-bhāgān yathāvat su-samāhitaḥ
sadasya agrya arhaṇa arham vai vimṛśantaḥ sabhā sadaḥ na adhyagacchan anaika-antyāt sahadevaḥ tadā abravīt
arhati hi acyutaḥ śraiṣṭhyam bhagavān sātvatām patiḥ eṣaḥ vai devatāḥ sarvāḥ deśa kāla dhana ādayaḥ
yat-ātmakam idam viśvam kratavaḥ ca yat-ātmakāḥ agniḥ āhutayaḥ mantrāḥ sāṅkhyam yogaḥ ca yat paraḥ ekaḥ eva advitīyaḥ asau aitat-ātmyam idam jagat ātmanā ātma āśrayaḥ sabhyāḥ sṛjati avati hanti ajaḥ
vividhāni iha karmāṇi janayan yat avekṣayā īhate yat ayam sarvaḥ śreyaḥ dharma-ādi lakṣaṇam
tasmāt kṛṣṇāya mahate dīyatām parama arhaṇam evam cet sarva bhūtānām ātmanaḥ ca arhaṇam bhavet
sarva bhūta ātma bhūtāya kṛṣṇāya ananya darśine deyam śāntāya pūrṇāya dattasya ānantyam icchatā
iti uktvā sahadevaḥ abhūt tūṣṇīm kṛṣṇa anubhāva vit tat śrutvā tuṣṭuvuḥ sarve sādhu sādhu iti sat tamāḥ
śrutvā dvija īritam rājā jñātvā hārdam sabhā-sadām samarhayat hṛṣīkeśam prītaḥ praṇaya vihvalaḥ
tat pādau avanijya āpaḥ śirasā loka pāvanīḥ sa bhāryaḥ sa anuja amātyaḥ sa kuṭumbaḥ vahan mudā vāsobhiḥ pīta kauṣeyaiḥ bhūṣaṇaiḥ ca mahā-dhanaiḥ arhayitvā aśru pūrṇa akṣaḥ na aśakat samavekṣitum
ittham sabhājitam vīkṣya sarve prāñjalayaḥ janāḥ namaḥ jaya iti nemuḥ tam nipetuḥ puṣpa vṛṣṭayaḥ
ittham niśamya damaghoṣa-sutaḥ sva pīṭhāt utthāya kṛṣṇa-guṇa varṇana jāta manyuḥ utkṣipya bāhum idam āha sadasi amarṣī saṁśrāvayan bhagavate paruṣāṇi abhītaḥ
īśaḥ duratyayaḥ kālaḥ iti satya-vatī srutiḥ vṛddhānām api yat buddhiḥ bāla vākyaiḥ vibhidyate
yūyam pātra vidām śreṣṭhāḥ mā mandhvam bāla bhāṣitam sadasaḥ-patayaḥ sarve kṛṣṇaḥ yat sammataḥ arhaṇe
tapaḥ vidyā vrata dharān jñāna vidhvasta kalmaṣān parama ṛṣīn brahma niṣṭhān loka-pālaiḥ ca pūjitān sadaḥ-patīn atikramya gopālaḥ kula pāṁsanaḥ yathā kākaḥ puroḍāśam saparyām katham arhati
varṇa āśrama kula apetaḥ sarva dharma bahiḥ-kṛtaḥ svaira vartī guṇaiḥ hīnaḥ saparyām katham arhati
yayātinā eṣām hi kulam śaptam sadbhiḥ bahiḥ-kṛtam vṛthā pāna ratam śaśvat saparyām katham arhati
brahma-ṛṣi sevitān deśān hitvā ete abrahma-varcasam samudram durgam āśritya bādhante dasyavaḥ prajāḥ
evam ādīni abhadrāṇi babhāṣe naṣṭa maṅgalaḥ na uvāca kiñcit bhagavān yathā siṁhaḥ śivā rutam
bhagavat nindanam śrutvā duḥsaham tat sabhā-sadaḥ karṇau pidhāya nirjagmuḥ śapantaḥ cedi-pam ruṣā
nindām bhagavataḥ śṛṇvan tat parasya janasya vā tataḥ na apaiti yaḥ saḥ api yāti adhaḥ su-kṛtāt cyutaḥ
tataḥ pāṇḍu-sutāḥ kruddhāḥ matsya-kaikaya-sṛñjayāḥ ut-āyudhāḥ samuttasthuḥ śisupāla-jighāṁsavaḥ
tataḥ caidyaḥ tu asambhrāntaḥ jagṛhe khaḍga carmaṇī bhartsayan kṛṣṇa pakṣīyān rājñaḥ sadasi bhārata
tāvat utthāya bhagavān svān nivārya svayam ruṣā śiraḥ kṣura anta cakreṇa jahāra patataḥ ripoḥ
śabdaḥ kolāhalaḥ atha āsīt śiśupāle hate mahān tasya anuyāyinaḥ bhūpāḥ dudruvuḥ jīvita eṣiṇaḥ
caidya deha utthitam jyotiḥ vāsudevam upāviśat paśyatām sarva bhūtānām ulkā iva bhuvi khāt cyutā
janma traya anuguṇita vaira saṁrabdhayā dhiyā dhyāyan tat-mayatām yātaḥ bhāvaḥ hi bhava kāraṇam
ṛtvigbhyaḥ sa-sadasyebhyaḥ dakṣiṇām vipulām adāt sarvān sampūjya vidhi-vat cakre avabhṛtham eka-rāṭ
sādhayitvā kratuḥ rājñaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ yoga-īśvara īśvaraḥ uvāsa katicit māsān su-hṛdbhiḥ abhiyācitaḥ
tataḥ anujñāpya rājānam anicchantam api īśvaraḥ yayau sa-bhāryaḥ sa-amātyaḥ sva puram devakī-sutaḥ
varṇitam tat upākhyānam mayā te bahu vistaram vaikuṇṭha-vāsinoḥ janma vipra śāpāt punaḥ punaḥ
rājasūya avabhṛthyena snātaḥ rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ brahma-kṣatra sabhā madhye śuśubhe sura rāṭ iva
rājñā sabhājitāḥ sarve sura mānava khe-carāḥ kṛṣṇam kratum ca śaṁsantaḥ sva dhāmāni yayuḥ mudā
duryodhanam ṛte pāpam kalim kuru-kula āmayam yaḥ na sehe śrīyam sphītām dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍu-sutasya tām
yaḥ idam kīrtayet viṣṇoḥ karma caidya-vadha ādikam rāja mokṣam vitānam ca sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate
śrī-rājā uvāca ajāta-śatroḥ tam dṛṣṭvā rājasūya mahā udayam sarve mumudire brahman nṛ-devāḥ ye samāgatāḥ duryodhanam varjayitvā rājānaḥ sa ṛṣayaḥ surāḥ iti śrutam naḥ bhagavan tatra kāraṇam ucyatām
śrī-bāḍarāyaniḥ uvāca pitāmahasya te yajñe rājasūye mahā-ātmanaḥ bāndhavāḥ paricaryāyām tasya āsan prema bandhanāḥ
bhīmaḥ mahānasa adhyakṣaḥ dhana adhyakṣaḥ suyodhanaḥ sahadevaḥ tu pūjāyām nakulaḥ dravya sādhane guru śuśrūṣaṇe jiṣṇuḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pāda avanejane pariveṣaṇe drupada-jā karṇaḥ dāne mahāmanāḥ yuyudhānaḥ vikarṇaḥ ca hārdikyaḥ vidura-ādayaḥ bāhlīka-putrāḥ bhūn-ādyāḥ ye ca santardana-ādayaḥ nirūpitāḥ mahā yajñe nānā karmasu te tadā pravartante sma rāja-indra rājñaḥ priya cikīrṣavaḥ
ṛtvik sadasya bahu-vitsu suhṛt-tameṣu su iṣṭeṣu sūnṛta samarhaṇa dakṣiṇābhiḥ caidye ca sātvata-pateḥ caraṇam praviṣṭe cakruḥ tataḥ tu avabhṛtha-snapanam dyu nadyām
mṛdaṅga śaṅkha paṇava dhundhuri ānaka go-mukhāḥ vāditrāṇi vicitrāṇi neduḥ āvabhṛtha utsave
nārtakyaḥ nanṛtuḥ hṛṣṭāḥ gāyakāḥ yūthaśaḥ jaguḥ vīṇā veṇu tala unnādaḥ teṣām saḥ divam aspṛśat
citra dhvaja patāka agraiḥ ibha indra syandana arvabhiḥ su-alaṅkṛtaiḥ bhaṭaiḥ bhū-pāḥ niryayuḥ rukma mālinaḥ
yadu-sṛñjaya-kāmboja kuru-kekaya-kośalāḥ kampayantaḥ bhuvam sainyaiḥ yajamāna puraḥ-sarāḥ
sadasya ṛtvik dvija śreṣṭhāḥ brahma ghoṣeṇa bhūyasā deva ṛṣi pitṛ gandharvāḥ tuṣṭuvuḥ puṣpa varṣiṇaḥ
su-alaṅkṛtāḥ narāḥ nāryaḥ gandha srak bhūṣaṇa ambaraiḥ vilimpantyaḥ abhiṣiñcantyaḥ vijahruḥ vividhaiḥ rasaiḥ
taila go-rasa gandha-uda haridrā sāndra kuṅkumaiḥ pumbhiḥ liptāḥ pralimpantyaḥ vijahruḥ vāra-yoṣitaḥ
guptāḥ nṛbhiḥ niragaman upalabdhum etat devyaḥ yathā divi vimāna varaiḥ nṛ-devyaḥ tāḥ mātuleya sakhibhiḥ pariṣicyamānāḥ sa-vrīḍa hāsa vikasat vadanāḥ virejuḥ
tāḥ devarān uta sakhīn siṣicuḥ dṛtībhiḥ klinna ambarāḥ vivṛta gātra kuca ūru madhyāḥ autsukya mukta kavarāt cyavamāna mālyāḥ kṣobham dadhuḥ mala dhiyam ruciraiḥ vihāraiḥ
saḥ samrāṭ ratham āruḍhaḥ sat aśvam rukma mālinam vyarocata sva-patnībhiḥ kriyābhiḥ kratu rāṭ iva
patnī-saṁyāja avabhṛthyaiḥ caritvā te tam ṛtvijaḥ ācāntam snāpayām cakruḥ gaṅgāyām saha kṛṣṇayā
deva dundubhayaḥ neduḥ nara dundubhibhiḥ samam mumucuḥ puṣpa varṣāṇi deva ṛṣi pitṛ mānavāḥ
sasnuḥ tatra tataḥ sarve varṇa-āśrama yutāḥ narāḥ mahā pātakī api yataḥ sadyaḥ mucyeta kilbiṣāt
atha rājā ahate kṣaume paridhāya su-alaṅkṛtaḥ ṛtvik sadasya vipra ādīn ānarca ābharaṇa ambaraiḥ
bandhūn jñātīn nṛpān mitra suhṛdaḥ anyān ca sarvaśaḥ abhīkṣṇam pūjayām āsa nārāyaṇa-paraḥ nṛpaḥ
sarve janāḥ sura rucaḥ maṇi kuṇḍala srak uṣṇīṣa kañcuka dukūla mahā-arghya hārāḥ nāryaḥ ca kuṇḍala yuga alaka-vṛnda juṣṭa vaktra śriyaḥ kanaka mekhalayā virejuḥ
atha ṛtvijaḥ mahā-śīlāḥ sadasyāḥ brahma vādinaḥ brahma kṣatriya viṭ śūdrāḥ ājānaḥ ye samāgatāḥ deva ṛṣi pitṛ bhūtāni loka pālāḥ saha anugāḥ pūjitāḥ tam anujñāpya sva dhāmāni yayuḥ nṛpa
hari dāsasya rāja-ṛṣeḥ rājasūya mahā-udayam na eva atṛpyan praśaṁsantaḥ piban martyaḥ amṛtam yathā
tataḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ rājā suhṛt sambandhi bāndhavān premṇā nivārayām āsa kṛṣṇam ca tyāga kātaraḥ
bhagavān api tatra aṅga nyāvātsīt tat priyam karaḥ prasthāpya yadu-vīrān ca sāmba-ādīn ca kuśasthalīm
ittham rājā dharma sutaḥ manaḥ-ratha mahā arṇavam su dustaram samuttīrya kṛṣṇena āsīt gata-jvaraḥ
ekadā antaḥ-pure tasya vīkṣya duryodhanaḥ śrīyam atapyat rājasūyasya mahitvam ca acyuta-ātmanaḥ
yasmin nara-indra ditija-indra sura-indra lakṣmīḥ nānā vibhānti kila viśva-sṛjā upakḷptāḥ tābhiḥ patīn drupada-rāja sutā upatasthe yasyām viṣakta hṛdayaḥ kuru-rāṭ atapyat
yasmin tadā madhu pateḥ mahiṣī sahasram śroṇī bhareṇa śanakaiḥ kvaṇat aṅghri śobham madhye su-cāru kuca kuṅkuma śoṇa hāram śrī-mat mukham pracala kuṇḍala kuntala āḍhyam
sabhāyām maya kḷptāyām kva api dharma-sutaḥ adhirāṭ vṛtaḥ anugaiḥ bandhubhiḥ ca kṛṣṇena api sva cakṣuṣā āsīnaḥ kāñcane sākṣāt āsane maghavān iva pārameṣṭhya śriyā juṣṭaḥ stūyamānaḥ ca vandibhiḥ
tatra duryodhanaḥ mānī parītaḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ nṛpa kirīṭa mālī nyaviśat asi hastaḥ kṣipan ruṣā
sthale abhyagṛhṇāt vastra antam jalam matvā sthale apatat jale ca sthala vat bhrāntyā maya māyā vimohitaḥ
jahāsa bhīmaḥ tam dṛṣṭvā striyaḥ nṛ-patayaḥ apare nivāryamāṇāḥ api aṅga rājñā kṛṣṇa anumoditāḥ
saḥ vrīḍitaḥ avāk vadanaḥ ruṣā jvalan niṣkramya tūṣṇīm prayayau gaja-āhvayam hā-hā iti śabdaḥ su-mahān abhūt satām ajāta-śatruḥ vimanāḥ iva abhavat babhūva tūṣṇīm bhagavān bhuvaḥ bharam samujjihīrṣuḥ bhramati sma yat dṛśā
etat te abhihitam rājan yat pṛṣṭaḥ aham iha tvayā suyodhanasya daurātmyam rājasūye mahā-kratau
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca atha anyat api kṛṣṇasya śṛṇu karma adbhutam nṛpa krīḍā nara śarīrasya yathā saubha-patiḥ hataḥ
śiśupāla-sakhaḥ śālvaḥ rukmiṇī-udvāhe āgataḥ yadubhiḥ nirjitaḥ saṅkhye jarāsandha-ādayaḥ tathā
śālvaḥ pratijñām akarot śṛṇvatām sarva bhū-bhujām ayādavām kṣmām kariṣye pauruṣam mama paśyata
iti mūḍhaḥ pratijñāya devam paśu-patim prabhum āradhayām āsa nṛpaḥ pāṁśu muṣṭim sakṛt grasan
saṁvatsara ante bhagavān āśu-toṣaḥ umā-patiḥ vareṇa chandayām āsa śālvam śaraṇam āgatam
deva asura manuṣyāṇām gandharva uraga rakṣasām abhedyam kāma gam vavre saḥ yānam vṛṣṇi bhīṣaṇam
tathā iti giri-śa ādiṣṭaḥ mayaḥ para puram jayaḥ puram nirmāya śālvāya prādāt saubham ayaḥ mayam
saḥ labdhvā kāma-gam yānam tamaḥ dhāma durāsadam yayau dvāravatīm śālvaḥ vairam vṛṣṇi-kṛtam smaran
nirudhya senayā śālvaḥ mahatyā bharata-ṛṣabha purīm babhañja upavanān udyanāni ca sarvaśaḥ sa-gopurāṇi dvārāṇi prāsāda aṭṭāla tolikāḥ vihārān saḥ vimāna agryāt nipetuḥ śastra vṛṣṭayaḥ śilā drumāḥ ca aśanayaḥ sarpāḥ āsāra-śarkarāḥ pracaṇḍaḥ cakravātaḥ abhūt rajasā ācchādditāḥ diśaḥ
iti ardyamānā saubhena kṛṣṇasya nagarī bhṛśam na abhyapadyata śam rājan tri-pureṇa yathā mahī
pradyumnaḥ bhagavān vīkṣya bādhyamānāḥ nijāḥ prajāḥ mā bhaiṣṭa iti abhyadhāt vīraḥ ratha ārūḍhaḥ mahā yaśāḥ
sātyakiḥ cārudeṣṇaḥ ca sāmbaḥ akrūraḥ saha anujaḥ hārdikyaḥ bhānuvindaḥ ca gadaḥ ca śuka-sāraṇau apare ca mahā iṣv-āsāḥ ratha yūtha-pa yūtha-pāḥ niryayuḥ daṁśitāḥ guptāḥ ratha ibha aśva padātibhiḥ
tataḥ pravavṛte yuddham śālvānām yadubhiḥ saha yathā asurāṇām vibudhaiḥ tumulam loma-harṣaṇam
tāḥ ca saubha-pateḥ māyāḥ divya astraiḥ rukmiṇī-sutaḥ kṣaṇena nāśayām āsa naiśam tamaḥ iva uṣṇa guḥ
vivyādha pañca viṁśatyā svarṇa puṅkhaiḥ ayaḥ mukhaiḥ śālvasya dhvajinī-pālam śaraiḥ sannata parvabhiḥ śatena atāḍayat śālvam eka-ekena asya sainikān daśabhiḥ daśabhiḥ netṝn vāhanāni tribhiḥ tribhiḥ
tat adbhutam mahat karma pradyumnasya mahā-ātmanaḥ dṛṣṭvā tam pūjayām āsuḥ sarve sva para sainikāḥ
bahu rūpa eka rūpam tat dṛśyate na ca dṛśyate māyā-mayam maya kṛtam durvibhāvyam paraiḥ abhūt

yatra yatra upalakṣyeta sa-saubhaḥ saha-sainikaḥ śālvaḥ tataḥ tataḥ amuñcan śarān sātvata yūtha-pāḥ
śaraiḥ agni arka saṁsparśaiḥ āśī viṣa durāsadaiḥ pīḍyamāna pura anīkaḥ śālvaḥ amuhyat para īritaiḥ
śālva anīka-pa śastra oghaiḥ vṛṣṇi-vīrāḥ bhṛśa arditāḥ na tatyajuḥ raṇam svam svam loka dvaya jigīṣavaḥ
śālva-amātyaḥ dyumān nāma pradyumnam prāk prapīḍitaḥ āsādya gadayā maurvyā vyāhatya vyanadat balī
pradyumnam gadayā śīrṇa vakṣaḥ-sthalam arim damam apovāha raṇāt sūtaḥ dharma vit dāruka-ātmajaḥ
labdha saṁjñaḥ muhūrtena kārṣṇiḥ sārathim abravīt aho asādhu idam sūta yat raṇāt me apasarpaṇam
na yadūnām kule jātaḥ śrūyate raṇa vicyutaḥ vinā mat klība cittena sūtena prāpta kilbiṣāt
kim nu vakṣye abhisaṅgamya pitarau rāma-keśavau yuddhāt samyak apakrāntaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ tatra ātmanaḥ kṣamam
vyaktam me kathayiṣyanti hasantyaḥ bhrātṛ-jāmayaḥ klaibyam katham katham vīra tava anyaiḥ kathyatām mṛdhe
sārathiḥ uvāca dharmam vijānatā āyuḥ-man kṛtam etat mayā vibho sūtaḥ kṛcchra gatam rakṣet rathinam sārathim rathī
etat viditvā tu bhavān mayā apovāhitaḥ raṇāt upasṛṣṭaḥ pareṇa iti mūrcchitaḥ gadayā hataḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca saḥ upaspṛśya salilam daṁśitaḥ dhṛta kārmukaḥ naya mam dyumataḥ pārśvam vīrasya iti āha sārathim
vidhamantam sva sainyāni dyumantam rukmiṇī-sutaḥ pratihatya pratyavidhyāt nārācaiḥ aṣṭabhiḥ smayan
caturbhiḥ caturaḥ vāhān sūtam ekena ca ahanat dvābhyām dhanuḥ ca ketum ca śareṇa anyena vai śiraḥ
gada-sātyaki-sāmba-ādyāḥ jaghnuḥ saubha-pateḥ balam petuḥ samudre saubheyāḥ sarve sañchinna kandharāḥ
evam yadūnām śālvānām nighnatām itara-itaram yuddham tri nava rātram tat abhūt tumulam ulbaṇam
indraprastham gataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ āhūtaḥ dharma-sūnunā rājasūye atha nivṛtte śiśupāle ca saṁsthite kuru-vṛddhān anujñāpya munīn ca sa sutām pṛthām nimittāni ati ghorāṇi paśyan dvāravatīm yayau
āha ca aham iha āyātaḥ ārya miśra abhisaṅgataḥ rājanyāḥ caidya-pakṣīyāḥ nūnam hanyuḥ purīm mama
vīkṣya tat kadanam svānām nirūpya pura rakṣaṇam saubham ca śālva-rājam ca dārukam prāha keśavaḥ
ratham prāpaya me sūta śālvasya antikam āśu vai sambhramaḥ te na kartavyaḥ māyā-vī saubha-rāṭ ayam
iti uktaḥ codayām āsa ratham āsthāya dārukaḥ viśantam dadṛśuḥ sarve sve pare ca aruṇa-anujam
śālvaḥ ca kṛṣṇam ālokya hata prāya bala īśvaraḥ prāharat kṛṣṇa-sūtāya śaktim bhīma ravām mṛdhe

tam ca ṣoḍaśabhiḥ viddhvā bāṇaiḥ saubham ca khe bhramat avidhyat śara sandohaiḥ kham sūryaḥ iva raśmibhiḥ
śālvaḥ śaureḥ tu doḥ savyam sa śārṅgam śārṅga-dhanvanaḥ bibheda nyapatat hastāt śārṅgam asīt tat adbhutam
hāhā-kāraḥ mahān āsīt bhūtānām tatra paśyatām ninadya saubha-rāṭ uccaiḥ idam āha janārdanam
yat tvayā mūḍha naḥ sakhyuḥ bhrātuḥ bhāryā hṛtā īkṣatām pramattaḥ saḥ sabhā madhye tvayā vyāpāditaḥ sakhā tam tvā adya niśitaiḥ bāṇaiḥ aparājita māninam nayāmi apunaḥ-āvṛttim yadi tiṣṭheḥ mama agrataḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca vṛthā tvam katthase manda na paśyasi antike antakam pauruṣam darśayanti sma śūrāḥ na bahu bhāṣiṇaḥ

kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahā-bāho pitā te pitṛ vatsala baddhvā apanītaḥ śālvena saunikena yathā paśuḥ
niśamya vipriyam kṛṣṇaḥ mānuṣīm prakṛtim gataḥ vimanaskaḥ ghṛṇī snehāt babhāṣe prākṛtaḥ yathā
katham rāmam asambhrāntam jitvā ajeyam sura asuraiḥ śālvena alpīyasā nītaḥ pitā me bala-vān vidhiḥ
iti bruvāṇe govinde saubha-rāṭ pratyupasthitaḥ vasudevam iva ānīya kṛṣṇam ca idam uvāca saḥ
eṣaḥ te janitā tātaḥ yat-artham iha jīvasi vadhiṣye vīkṣataḥ te amum īśaḥ cet pāhi bāliśa
evam nirbhartsya māyā-vī khaḍgena ānakadundubheḥ utkṛtya śiraḥ ādāya kha stham saubham samāviśat
tataḥ muhūrtam prakṛtau upaplutaḥ sva-bodhaḥ āste sva-jana anuṣaṅgataḥ mahā-anubhāvaḥ tat abudhyat āsurīm māyām saḥ śālva prasṛtām maya uditām
na tatra dūtam na pituḥ kalevaram prabuddhaḥ ājau samapaśyat acyutaḥ svāpnam yathā ca ambara cāriṇam ripum saubha-stham ālokya nihantum udyataḥ
evam vadanti rāja-ṛṣe ṛṣayaḥ ke ca na anvitāḥ yat sva vācaḥ virudhyeta nūnam te na smaranti uta
kva śoka mohau snehaḥ vā bhayam vā ye ajñā sambhavāḥ kva ca akhaṇḍita vijñāna jñāna aiśvaryaḥ tu akhaṇḍitaḥ
yat pāda sevā ūrjitayā ātma-vidyayā hinvanti anādi ātma viparyaya-graham labhante ātmīyam anantam aiśvaram kutaḥ nu mohaḥ paramasya sat gateḥ
tam śastra pūgaiḥ praharantam ojasā śālvam śaraiḥ śauriḥ amogha vikramaḥ viddhvā acchinat varma dhanuḥ śiraḥ maṇim saubham ca śatroḥ gadayā ruroja ha
tat kṛṣṇa-hasta īritayā vicūrṇitam papāta toye gadayā sahasradhā visṛjya tat bhū-talam āsthitaḥ gadām udyamya śālvaḥ acyutam abhyagāt drutam
ādhāvataḥ sa-gadam tasya bāhum bhallena chittvā atha ratha-aṅgam adbhutam vadhāya śālvasya laya arka sannibham bibhrat babhau sa-arkaḥ iva udaya acalaḥ
jahāra tena eva śiraḥ sa kuṇḍalam kirīṭa yuktam puru māyinaḥ hariḥ vajreṇa vṛtrasya yathā purandaraḥ babhūva hā-hā iti vacaḥ tadā nṛṇām
tasmin nipatite pāpe saubhe ca gadayā hate neduḥ dundubhayaḥ rājan divi deva-gaṇa īritāḥ sakhīnām apacitim kurvan dantavakraḥ rūṣā abhyagāt
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca śiśupālasya śālvasya pauṇḍrakasya api durmatiḥ para-loka gatānāṁ ca kurvan pārokṣya sauhṛdam ekaḥ padātiḥ saṅkruddhaḥ gadā pāṇiḥ prakampayan padbhyām imam mahā-rāja mahā sattvaḥ vyadṛśyata
tam tathā āyāntam ālokya gadām ādāya satvaraḥ avaplutya rathāt kṛṣṇaḥ sindhum velā iva pratyadhāt
gadām udyamya kārūṣaḥ mukundam prāha durmadaḥ diṣṭyā diṣṭyā bhavān adya mama dṛṣṭi patham gataḥ
tvam mātuleyaḥ naḥ kṛṣṇa mitra dhruk mām jighāṁsasi ataḥ tvām gadayā manda haniṣye vajra-kalpayā
tarhi ānṛṇyam upaimi ajña mitrāṇām mitra-vatsalaḥ bandhu rūpam arim hatvā vyādhim deha-caram yathā
evam rūkṣaiḥ tudan vākyaiḥ kṛṣṇam totraiḥ iva dvipam gadayā atāḍayat mūrdhni siṁha-vat vyanadat ca saḥ
gadayā abhihataḥ api ājau na cacāla yadu-udvahaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ api tam ahan gurvyā kaumodakyā stana-antare
gadā nirbhinna hṛdayaḥ udvaman rudhiram mukhāt prasārya keśa bāhu aṅghrīn dharaṇyām nyapatat vyasuḥ
tataḥ sūkṣma-taram jyotiḥ kṛṣṇam āviśat adbhutam paśyatām sarva bhūtānām yathā caidya-vadhe nṛpa
vidūrathaḥ tu tat bhrātā bhrātṛ śoka pariplutaḥ āgacchat asi carmābhyām ucchvasan tat jighāṁsayā
tasya ca āpatataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ cakreṇa kṣura neminā śiraḥ jahāra rāja-indra sa kirīṭam sa kuṇḍalam
evam saubham ca śālvam ca dantavakram saha anujam hatvā durviṣahān anyaiḥ īḍitaḥ sura mānavaiḥ munibhiḥ siddha gandharvaiḥ vidyādhara mahā-uragaiḥ apsarobhiḥ pitṛ-gaṇaiḥ yakṣaiḥ kinnara-cāraṇaiḥ upagīyamāna vijayaḥ kusumaiḥ abhivarṣitaḥ vṛtaḥ ca vṛṣṇi-pravaraiḥ viveśa alaṅkṛtām purīm
evam yoga īśvaraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ bhagavān jagat īśvaraḥ īyate paśu dṛṣṭīnām nirjitaḥ jayati iti saḥ
śrutvā yuddha udyamam rāmaḥ kurūṇām saha pāṇḍavaiḥ tīrtha abhiṣeka vyājena madhya-sthaḥ prayayau kila
snātvā prabhāse santarpya deva ṛṣi pitṛ mānavān sarasvatīm prati-srotam yayau brāhmaṇa-saṁvṛtaḥ
pṛthu udakam bindu-saraḥ trita-kūpam sudarśanam viśālam brahma-tīrtham ca cakram prācīm sarasvatīm yamunām anu yāni eva gaṅgām anu ca bhārata jagāma naimiṣam yatra ṛṣayaḥ satram āsate
tam āgatam abhipretya munayaḥ dīrgha satriṇaḥ abhinandya yathā nyāyam praṇamya utthāya ca ārcayan
saḥ arcitaḥ sa parīvāraḥ kṛta āsana parigrahaḥ romaharṣaṇam āsīnam mahā-ṛṣeḥ śiṣyam aikṣata
apratyutthāyinam sūtam akṛta prahvaṇa añjalim adhyāsīnam ca tān viprān cukopa udvīkṣya mādhavaḥ
yasmāt asau imān viprān adhyāste pratiloma-jaḥ dharma pālān tathā eva asmān vadham arhati durmatiḥ
ṛṣeḥ bhagavataḥ bhūtvā śiṣyaḥ adhītya bahūni ca sa itihāsa purāṇāni dharma-śāstrāṇi sarvaśaḥ adāntasya avinītasya vṛthā paṇḍita māninaḥ na guṇāya bhavanti sma naṭasya iva ajita ātmanaḥ
etat arthaḥ hi loke asmin avatāraḥ mayā kṛtaḥ vadhyāḥ me dharma-dhvajinaḥ te hi pātakinaḥ adhikāḥ
etāvat uktvā bhagavān nivṛttaḥ asat vadhāt api bhāvitvāt tam kuśa agreṇa kara sthena ahanat prabhuḥ
hā-hā iti vādinaḥ sarve munayaḥ khinna mānasāḥ ūcuḥ saṅkarṣaṇam devam adharmaḥ te kṛtaḥ prabho
asya brahma-āsanam dattam asmābhiḥ yadu-nandana āyuḥ ca ātma aklamam tāvat yāvat satram samāpyate
ajānatā eva ācaritaḥ tvayā brahma vadhaḥ yathā yoga īśvarasya bhavataḥ na āmnāyaḥ api niyāmakaḥ yadi etat brahma hatyāyāḥ pāvanam loka pāvana cariṣyati bhavān loka-saṅgrahaḥ ananya coditaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca cariṣye vadha nirveśam loka anugraha kāmyayā niyamaḥ prathame kalpe yāvān saḥ tu vidhīyatām
dīrgham āyuḥ bata etasya sattvam indriyam eva ca āśāsitam yat tat brūte sādhaye yoga-māyayā
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ astrasya tava vīryasya mṛtyoḥ asmākam eva ca yathā bhavet vacaḥ satyam tathā rāma vidhīyatām
śrī-bhagavān uvāca ātmā vai putraḥ utpannaḥ iti veda-anuśāsanam tasmāt asya bhavet vaktā āyuḥ indriya sattva vān
kim vaḥ kāmaḥ muni śreṣṭhāḥ brūta aham karavāṇi atha ajānataḥ tu apacitim yathā me cintyatām budhāḥ
ṛṣayaḥ ūcuḥ ilvalasya sutaḥ ghoraḥ balvalaḥ nāma dānavaḥ saḥ dūṣayati naḥ satram etya parvaṇi parvaṇi
tam pāpam jahi dāśārha tat naḥ śuśrūṣaṇam param pūya śoṇita vit mūtra surā māṁsa abhivarṣiṇam
tataḥ ca bhāratam varṣam parītya su-samāhitaḥ caritvā dvādaśa māsān tīrtha snāyī viśudhyasi
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tataḥ parvaṇi upāvṛtte pracaṇḍaḥ pāṁśu varṣaṇaḥ bhīmaḥ vāyuḥ abhūt rājan pūya gandhaḥ tu sarvaśaḥ
tataḥ amedhya mayam varṣam balvalena vinirmitam abhavat yajña śālāyām saḥ anvadṛśyata śūla dhṛk
tam vilokya bṛhat kāyam bhinna añjana caya upamam tapta tāmra śikhā śmaśrum daṁṣṭrā ugra bhru kuṭī mukham sasmāra mūṣalam rāmaḥ para sainya vidāraṇam halam ca daitya damanam te tūrṇam upatasthatuḥ
tam ākṛṣya hala agreṇa balvalam gagane caram mūṣalena ahanat kruddhaḥ mūrdhni brahma druham balaḥ
saḥ apatat bhuvi nirbhinna lalāṭaḥ asṛk samutsṛjan muñcan ārta svaram śailaḥ yathā vajra hataḥ aruṇaḥ
saṁstutya munayaḥ rāmam prayujya avitatha āśiṣaḥ abhyaṣiñcan mahā-bhāgāḥ vṛtra ghnam vibudhāḥ yathā
vaijayantīm daduḥ mālām śrī dhāma amlāna paṅkajām rāmāya vāsasī divye divyāni ābharaṇāni ca
atha taiḥ abhyanujñātaḥ kauśikīm etya brāhmaṇaiḥ snātvā sarovaram agāt yataḥ sarayūḥ āsravat
anu srotena sarayūm prayāgam upagamya saḥ snātvā santarpya deva-ādīn jagāma pulaha-āśramam
gomatīm gaṇḍakīm snātvā vipāśām śoṇe āplutaḥ gayām gatvā pitṝn iṣṭvā gaṅgā sāgara saṅgame upaspṛśya mahā-indra-adrau rāmam dṛṣṭvā abhivādya ca sapta-godāvarīm veṇām pampām bhīmarathīm tataḥ skandam dṛṣṭvā yayau rāmaḥ śrī-śailam giri-śa ālayam draviḍeṣu mahā puṇyam dṛṣṭvā adrim veṅkaṭam prabhuḥ kāma-koṣṇīm purīm kāñcīm kāverīm ca sarit varām śrī-raṅga-ākhyam mahā-puṇyam yatra sannihitaḥ hariḥ ṛṣabha-adrim hareḥ kṣetram dakṣiṇām mathurām tathā sāmudram setum agamat mahā pātaka nāśanam
tatra ayutam adāt dhenūḥ brahmaṇebhyaḥ hala-āyudhaḥ kṛtamālām tāmraparṇīm malayam ca kula-acalam tatra agastyam samāsīnam namaskṛtya abhivādya ca yojitaḥ tena ca āśīrbhiḥ anujñātaḥ gataḥ arṇavam dakṣiṇam tatra kanyā-ākhyām durgām devīm dadarśa saḥ
tataḥ phālgunam āsādya pañca-apsarasam uttamam viṣṇuḥ sannihitaḥ yatra snātvā asparśat gava ayutam
tataḥ abhivrajya bhagavān keralān tu trigartakān gokarṇa-ākhyam śiva-kṣetram sānnidhyam yatra dhūrjaṭeḥ āryām dvaipa ayanīm dṛṣṭvā śūrpārakam agāt balaḥ tāpīm payoṣṇīm nirvindhyām upaspṛśya atha daṇḍakam praviśya revām agamat yatra māhiṣmatī purī manu-tīrtham upaspṛśya prabhāsam punaḥ āgamat
śrutvā dvijaiḥ kathyamānam kuru-pāṇḍava saṁyuge sarva rājanya nidhanam bhāram mene hṛtam bhuvaḥ
saḥ bhīma-duryodhanayoḥ gadābhyām yudhyatoḥ mṛdhe vārayiṣyan vinaśanam jagāma yadu nandanaḥ
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ tu tam dṛṣṭvā yamau kṛṣṇa-arjunau api abhivādya abhavan tuṣṇīm kim vivakṣuḥ iha āgataḥ
gadā pāṇī ubhau dṛṣṭvā saṁrabdhau vijaya eṣiṇau maṇḍalāni vicitrāṇi carantau idam abravīt
yuvām tulya balau vīrau he rājan he vṛkodara ekam prāṇa adhikam manye uta ekam śikṣayā adhikam
tasmāt ekatarasya iha yuvayoḥ sama vīryayoḥ na lakṣyate jayaḥ anyaḥ vā viramatu aphalaḥ raṇaḥ
na tat vākyam jagṛhatuḥ baddha vairau nṛpa artha-vat anusmarantau anyonyam duruktam duṣkṛtāni ca
diṣṭam tat anumanvānaḥ rāmaḥ dvāravatīm yayau ugrasena-ādibhiḥ prītaiḥ jñātibhiḥ samupāgataḥ
tam punaḥ naimiṣam prāptam ṛṣayaḥ ayājayan mudā kratu aṅgam kratubhiḥ sarvaiḥ nivṛtta akhila vigraham
tebhyaḥ viśuddham vijñānam bhagavān vyatarat vibhuḥ yena eva ātmani adaḥ viśvam ātmānam viśva-gam viduḥ
sva patyā avabhṛtha snātaḥ jñāti bandhu suhṛt vṛtaḥ reje sva-jyotsnayā iva induḥ su vāsāḥ suṣṭhu alaṅkṛtaḥ
īdṛk-vidhāni asaṅkhyāni balasya bala-śālinaḥ anantasya aprameyasya māyā martyasya santi hi
yaḥ anusmareta rāmasya karmāṇi adbhuta karmaṇaḥ sāyam prātaḥ anantasya viṣṇoḥ saḥ dayitaḥ bhavet
śrī-rājā uvāca bhagavan yāni ca anyāni mukundasya mahā-ātmanaḥ vīryāṇi ananta vīryasya śrotum icchāmi he prabho
kaḥ nu śrutvā asakṛt brahman uttamaḥ-śloka sat kathāḥ virameta viśeṣa jñaḥ viṣaṇṇaḥ kāma mārgaṇaiḥ
sā vāk yayā tasya guṇān gṛṇīte karau ca tat karma karau manaḥ ca smaret vasantam sthira jaṅgameṣu śṛṇoti tat puṇya kathāḥ saḥ karṇaḥ
śiraḥ tu tasya ubhaya liṅgam ānamet tat eva yat paśyati tat hi cakṣuḥ aṅgāni viṣṇoḥ atha tat janānām pāda-udakam yāni bhajanti nityam
sūtaḥ uvāca viṣṇu-rātena sampṛṣṭaḥ bhagavān bādarāyaṇiḥ vāsudeve bhagavati nimagna hṛdayaḥ abravīt
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca kṛṣṇasya āsīt sakhā kaścit brāhmaṇaḥ brahma vit-tamaḥ viraktaḥ indriya-artheṣu praśānta ātmā jita indriyaḥ
yadṛcchayā upapannena vartamānaḥ gṛha-āśramī tasya bhāryā ku-cailasya kṣut kṣāmā ca tathā-vidhā
pati-vratā patim prāha mlāyatā vadanena sā daridram sīdamānā vai vepamānā abhigamya ca
nanu brahman bhagavataḥ sakhā sākṣāt śriyaḥ patiḥ brahmaṇyaḥ ca śaraṇyaḥ ca bhagavān sātvata ṛṣabhaḥ
tam upaihi mahā-bhaga sādhūnām ca para-ayaṇam dāsyati draviṇam bhūri sīdate te kuṭumbine
āste adhunā dvāravatyām bhoja-vṛṣṇi-andhaka īśvaraḥ smarataḥ pāda-kamalam ātmanām api yacchati kim nu artha kāmān bhajataḥ na ati abhīṣṭān jagat guruḥ
saḥ evam bhāryayā vipraḥ bahuśaḥ prārthitaḥ muhuḥ ayam hi paramaḥ lābhaḥ uttamaḥ-śloka darśanam iti sañcintya manasā gamanāya matim dadhe api asti upāyanam kiñcit gṛhe kalyāṇi dīyatām
yācitvā caturaḥ muṣṭīn viprān pṛthuka-taṇḍulān caila khaṇḍena tān baddhvā bhartre prādāt upāyanam
saḥ tān ādāya vipra-agryaḥ prayayau dvārakām kila kṛṣṇa-sandarśanam mahyam katham syāt iti cintayan
trīṇi gulmāni atīyāya tisraḥ kakṣāḥ ca sa-dvijaḥ vipraḥ agamya andhaka-vṛṣṇīnām gṛheṣu acyuta dharmiṇām gṛham dvi aṣṭa sahasrāṇām mahiṣīṇām hareḥ dvijaḥ viveśa ekatamam śrī-mat brahma-ānandam gataḥ yathā
tam vilokya acyutaḥ dūrāt priyā paryaṅkam āsthitaḥ sahasā utthāya ca abhyetya dorbhyām paryagrahīt mudā
sakhyuḥ priyasya vipra-ṛṣeḥ aṅga saṅga ati nirvṛtaḥ prītaḥ vyamuñcat ap bindūn netrābhyām puṣkara-īkṣaṇaḥ
atha upaveśya paryaṅke svayam sakhyuḥ samarhaṇam upahṛtya avanijya asya pādau pāda-avanejanīḥ agrahīt śirasā rājan bhagavān loka pāvanaḥ vyalimpat divya gandhena candana aguru kuṅkumaiḥ dhūpaiḥ surabhibhiḥ mitram pradīpa avalibhiḥ mudā arcitvā āvedya tāmbūlam gām ca su-āgatam abravīt
ku cailam malinam kṣāmam dvijam dhamani-santatam devī paryacarat sākṣāt cāmara vyajanena vai
antaḥ-pura janaḥ dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇena amala kīrtinā vismitaḥ abhūt ati prītyā avadhūtam sabhājitam
kim anena kṛtam puṇyam avadhūtena bhikṣuṇā śriyā hīnena loke asmin garhitena adhamena ca yaḥ asau tri loka guruṇā śrī nivāsena sambhṛtaḥ paryaṅka sthām śrīyam hitvā pariṣvaktaḥ agra-jaḥ yathā
kathayām cakratuḥ gāthāḥ pūrvāḥ gurukule satoḥ ātmanoḥ lalitāḥ rājan karau gṛhya parasparam
śrī-bhagavān uvāca api brahman gurukulāt bhavatā labdha dakṣiṇāt samāvṛttena dharma jña bhāryā ūḍhā sadṛśī na vā
prāyaḥ gṛheṣu te cittam akāma-vihitam tathā na eva ati prīyase vidvan dhaneṣu viditam hi me
kecit kurvanti karmāṇi kāmaiḥ ahata cetasaḥ tyayantaḥ prakṛtīḥ daivīḥ yathā aham loka-saṅgraham
kaccit gurukule vāsam brahman smarasi nau yataḥ dvijaḥ vijñāya vijñeyam tamasaḥ pāram aśnute
saḥ vai sat karmaṇām sākṣāt dvi-jāteḥ iha sambhavaḥ ādyaḥ aṅga yatra āśramiṇām yathā aham jñāna daḥ guruḥ
nanu artha kovidāḥ brahman varṇāśrama-vatām iha ye mayā guruṇā vācā taranti añjaḥ bhava arṇavam
na aham ijyā prajātibhyām tapasā upaśamena vā tuṣyeyam sarva bhūta ātmā guru śuśrūṣayā yathā
api naḥ smaryate brahman vṛttam nivasatām gurau guru dāraiḥ coditānām indhana anayane kvacit praviṣṭānām mahā-araṇyam apa-ṛtau su-mahat dvija vāta varṣam abhūt tīvram niṣṭhurāḥ stanayitnavaḥ
sūryaḥ ca astam gataḥ tāvat tamasā ca āvṛtāḥ diśaḥ nimnam kūlam jala-mayam na prājñāyata kiñcana
vayam bhṛśam tatra mahā anila ambubhiḥ nihanyamānāḥ muhuḥ ambu-samplave diśaḥ avidantaḥ atha parasparam vane gṛhīta hastāḥ paribabhrima āturāḥ
etat viditvā udite ravau sāndīpaniḥ guruḥ anveṣamāṇaḥ naḥ śiṣyān ācāryaḥ apaśyat āturān
aho he putrakaḥ yūyam asmat arthe ati duḥkhitāḥ ātmā vai prāṇinām preṣṭhaḥ tam anādṛtya mat parāḥ
etat eva hi sat śiṣyaiḥ kartavyam guru niṣkṛtam yat vai viśuddha bhāvena sarva artha ātmā arpaṇam gurau
tuṣṭaḥ aham bho dvija śreṣṭhāḥ satyāḥ santu manaḥ-rathāḥ chandāṁsi ayāta-yāmāni bhavantu iha paratra ca
ittham-vidhāni anekāni vasatām guru veśmani guroḥ anugraheṇa eva pumān pūrṇaḥ praśāntaye
śrī-brāhmaṇaḥ uvāca kim asmābhiḥ anirvṛttam deva-deva jagat guro bhavatā satya kāmena yeṣām vāsaḥ guroḥ abhūt
yasya chandaḥ mayam brahma dehe āvapanam vibho śreyasām tasya guruṣu vāsaḥ atyanta viḍambanam
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca saḥ ittham dvija mukhyena saha saṅkathayan hariḥ sarva bhūta manaḥ abhijñaḥ smayamānaḥ uvāca tam brahmaṇyaḥ brāhmaṇam kṛṣṇaḥ bhagavān prahasan priyam premṇā nirīkṣaṇena eva prekṣan khalu satām gatiḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca kim upāyanam ānītam brahman me bhavatā gṛhāt aṇu api upāhṛtam bhaktaiḥ premṇā bhūri eva me bhavet bhūri api abhakta upahṛtam na me toṣāya kalpate
patram puṣpam phalam toyam yaḥ me bhaktyā prayacchati tat aham bhakti-upahṛtam aśnāmi prayata-ātmanaḥ
iti uktaḥ api dvijaḥ tasmai vrīḍitaḥ pataye śriyaḥ pṛthuka prasṛtim rājan na prāyacchat avāk mukhaḥ
sarva bhūta ātma dṛk sākṣāt tasya āgamana kāraṇam vijñāya acintayat na ayam śrī kāmaḥ mā abhajat purā patnyāḥ pati vratāyāḥ tu sakhā priya cikīrṣayā prāptaḥ mām asya dāsyāmi sampadaḥ amartya durlabhāḥ
ittham vicintya vasanāt cīra baddhān dvi-janmanaḥ svayam jahāra kim idam iti pṛthuka-taṇḍulān
nanu etat upanītam me parama prīṇanam sakhe tarpayanti aṅga mām viśvam ete pṛṭhuka-taṇḍulāḥ
iti muṣṭim sakṛt jagdhvā dvitīyam jagdhum ādade tāvat śrīḥ jagṛhe hastam tat parā parame-sthinaḥ
etāvatā alam viśva ātman sarva sampat samṛddhaye asmin loke atha vā amuṣmin puṁsaḥ tvat toṣa kāraṇam
brāhmaṇaḥ tām tu rajanīm uṣitvā acyuta mandire bhuktvā pītvā sukham mene ātmānam svaḥ gatam yathā
śvaḥ-bhūte viśva bhāvena sva sukhena abhivanditaḥ jagāma sva ālayam tāta pathi anuvrajya nanditaḥ
saḥ ca alabdhvā dhanam kṛṣṇāt na tu yācitavān svayam sva gṛhān vrīḍitaḥ agacchat mahat darśana nirvṛtaḥ
aho brahmaṇya devasya dṛṣṭa brahmaṇyatā mayā yat daridra-tamaḥ lakṣmīm āśliṣṭaḥ bibhratā urasi
kva aham daridraḥ pāpīyān kva kṛṣṇaḥ śrī-niketanaḥ brahma-bandhuḥ iti sma aham bāhubhyām parirambhitaḥ
nivāsitaḥ priyā juṣṭe paryaṅke bhrātaraḥ yathā mahiṣyā vījitaḥ śrāntaḥ bāla vyajana hastayā
śuśrūṣayā paramayā pāda saṁvāhana ādibhiḥ pūjitaḥ deva-devena vipra-devena deva vat
svarga apavargayoḥ puṁsām rasāyām bhuvi sampadām sarvāsām api siddhīnām mūlam tat caraṇa arcanam
adhanaḥ ayam dhanam prāpya mādyan uccaiḥ na mām smaret iti kāruṇikaḥ nūnam dhanam me abhūri na ādadāt
iti tat cintayan antaḥ prāptaḥ nija gṛha antikam sūrya anala indu saṅkāśaiḥ vimānaiḥ sarvataḥ vṛtam vicitra upavana udyānaiḥ kūjat dvija kula ākulaiḥ protphulla kumuda ambhoja kahlāra utpala vāribhiḥ juṣṭam su alaṅkṛtaiḥ pumbhiḥ strībhiḥ ca hariṇā akṣibhiḥ kim idam kasya vā sthānam katham tat idam iti abhūt
evam mīmāṁsamānam tam narāḥ nāryaḥ amara prabhāḥ pratyagṛhṇan mahā-bhāgam gīta vādyena bhūyasā
patim āgatam ākarṇya patnī uddharṣā ati sambhramā niścakrāma gṛhāt tūrṇam rūpiṇī śrīḥ iva ālayāt
pati-vratā patim dṛṣṭvā prema utkaṇṭha aśru locanā mīlita akṣī anamat buddhyā manasā pariṣasvaje
patnīm vīkṣya visphurantīm devīm vaimānikīm iva dāsīnām niṣka kaṇṭhīnām madhye bhāntīm saḥ vismitaḥ
prītaḥ svayam tayā yuktaḥ praviṣṭaḥ nija mandiram maṇi stambha śata upetam mahā-indra bhavanam yathā
payaḥ phena nibhāḥ śayyāḥ dāntāḥ rukma paricchadāḥ paryaṅkāḥ hema daṇḍāni cāmara-vyajanāni ca āsanāni ca haimāni mṛdu upastaraṇāni ca muktā-dāma vilambīni vitānāni dyumanti ca svaccha sphaṭika kuḍyeṣu mahā-mārakateṣu ca ratna dīpān bhrājamānān lalanāḥ ratna saṁyutāḥ vilokya brāhmaṇaḥ tatra samṛddhīḥ sarva sampadām tarkayām āsa nirvyagraḥ sva samṛddhim ahaitukīm
nūnam bata etat mama durbhagasya śaśvat daridrasya samṛddhi hetuḥ mahā-vibhūteḥ avalokataḥ anyaḥ na eva upapadyeta yadu-uttamasya
nanu abruvānaḥ diśate samakṣam yāciṣṇave bhūri api bhūri bhojaḥ parjanya-vat tat svayam īkṣamāṇaḥ dāśārhakāṇām ṛṣabhaḥ sakhā me
kiñcit karoti uru api yat sva dattam suhṛt kṛtam phalgu api bhūri kārī mayā upanītam pṛthuka eka muṣṭim pratyagrahīt prīti-yutaḥ mahā-ātmā
tasya eva me sauhṛda sakhya maitrī dāsyam punaḥ janmani janmani syāt mahā-anubhāvena guṇa ālayena viṣajjataḥ tat puruṣa prasaṅgaḥ
bhaktāya citrāḥ bhagavān hi sampadaḥ rājyam vibhūtīḥ na samarthayati ajaḥ adīrgha bodhāya vicakṣanaḥ svayam paśyan nipātam dhaninām mada udbhavam
ittham vyavasitaḥ buddhyā bhaktaḥ atīva janārdane viṣayān jāyayā tyakṣyan bubhuje na ati-lampaṭaḥ
tasya vai deva-devasya hareḥ yajña pateḥ prabhoḥ brāhmaṇāḥ prabhavaḥ daivam na tebhyaḥ vidyate param
evam saḥ vipraḥ bhagavat suhṛt tadā dṛṣṭvā sva bhṛtyaiḥ ajitam parājitam tat dhyāna vega udgrathita ātma bandhanaḥ tat dhāma lebhe acirataḥ satām gatim
etat brahmaṇya-devasya śrutvā brahmaṇyatām naraḥ labdha bhāvaḥ bhagavati karma bandhāt vimucyate
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca atha ekadā dvāravatyām vasatoḥ rāma-kṛṣṇayoḥ sūrya uparāgaḥ su-mahān āsīt kalpa kṣaye yathā
tam jñātvā manujāḥ rājan purastāt eva sarvataḥ samanta-pañcakam kṣetram yayuḥ śreyaḥ vidhitsayā
niḥkṣatriyām mahīm kurvan rāmaḥ śastra bhṛtām varaḥ nṛpāṇām rudhira oghena yatra cakre mahā hradān īje ca bhagavān rāmaḥ yatra aspṛṣṭaḥ api karmaṇā lokam saṅgrāhayan īśaḥ yathā anyaḥ agha apanuttaye mahatyām tīrtha-yātrāyām tatra āgan bhāratīḥ prajāḥ vṛṣṇayaḥ ca tathā akrūra-vasudeva-āhuka-ādayaḥ yayuḥ bhārata tat kṣetram svam agham kṣapayiṣṇavaḥ gada-pradyumna-sāmba-ādayaḥ sucandra-śuka-sāraṇaiḥ āste aniruddhaḥ rakṣāyām kṛtavarmā ca yūtha-paḥ
te rathaiḥ deva dhiṣṇya ābhaiḥ hayaiḥ ca tarala plavaiḥ gajaiḥ nadadbhiḥ abhra ābhaiḥ nṛbhiḥ vidyādhara dyubhiḥ vyarocanta mahā tejāḥ pathi kāñcana mālinaḥ divya srak vastra sannāhāḥ kalatraiḥ khe-carāḥ iva
tatra snātvā mahā-bhāgāḥ upoṣya su-samāhitāḥ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ daduḥ dhenūḥ vāsaḥ srak rukma mālinīḥ
rāma hradeṣu vidhi-vat punaḥ āplutya vṛṣṇayaḥ daduḥ su annam dvija agryebhyaḥ kṛṣṇe naḥ bhaktiḥ astu iti
svayam ca tat anujñātāḥ vṛṣṇayaḥ kṛṣṇa devatāḥ bhuktvā upaviviśuḥ kāmam snigdha chāyā aṅghripa aṅghriṣu
tatra āgatān te dadṛśuḥ suhṛt sambandhinaḥ nṛpān matsya-uśīnara-kauśalya-vidarbha-kuru-sṛñjayān kāmboja-kaikayān madrān kuntīn ānarta-keralān anyān ca eva ātma-pakṣīyān parān ca śataśaḥ nṛpa nanda-ādīn suhṛdaḥ gopān gopīḥ ca utkaṇṭhitāḥ ciram
anyonya sandarśana harṣa raṁhasā protphulla hṛt vaktra saroruha śriyaḥ āśliṣya gāḍham nayanaiḥ sravat jalāḥ hṛṣyat tvacaḥ ruddha giraḥ yayuḥ mudam
striyaḥ ca saṁvīkṣya mithaḥ ati sauhṛda smita amala apāṅga dṛśaḥ abhirebhire stanaiḥ stanān kuṅkuma paṅka rūṣitān nihatya dorbhiḥ praṇaya aśru locanāḥ
tataḥ abhivādya te vṛddhān yaviṣṭhaiḥ abhivāditāḥ su-āgatam kuśalam pṛṣṭvā cakruḥ kṛṣṇa kathāḥ mithaḥ
pṛthā bhrātṝn svasṝḥ vīkṣya tat putrān pitarau api bhrātṛ patnīḥ mukundam ca jahau saṅkathayā śucaḥ
kuntī uvāca ārya bhrātaḥ aham manye ātmānam akṛta āśiṣam yat vai āpatsu mat vārtām na anusmaratha sat-tamāḥ
suhṛdaḥ jñātayaḥ putrāḥ bhrātaraḥ pitarau api na anusmaranti sva-janam yasya daivam adakṣiṇam
śrī-vasudevaḥ uvāca amba mā asmān asūyethāḥ daiva krīḍanakān narān īśasya hi vaśe lokaḥ kurute kāryate atha vā
kaṁsa pratāpitāḥ sarve vayam yātāḥ diśam diśam etarhi eva punaḥ sthānam daivena āsāditāḥ svasaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca vasudeva-ugrasena-ādyaiḥ yadubhiḥ te arcitāḥ nṛpāḥ āsan acyuta sandarśa parama ānanda nirvṛtāḥ
bhīṣmaḥ droṇaḥ ambikā-putraḥ gāndhārī sa sutāḥ tathā sa-dārāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ kuntī sañjayaḥ viduraḥ kṛpaḥ kuntībhojaḥ virāṭaḥ ca bhīṣmakaḥ nagnajit mahān purujit drupadaḥ śalyaḥ dhṛṣṭaketuḥ saḥ kāśi-rāṭ damaghoṣaḥ viśālākṣaḥ maithilaḥ madra-kekayau yudhāmanyuḥ suśarmā ca sa-sutāḥ bāhlika-ādayaḥ rājānaḥ ye ca rāja-indra yudhiṣṭhiram anuvratāḥ śrī niketam vapuḥ śaureḥ sa-stṛīkam vīkṣya vismitāḥ
atha te rāma-kṛṣṇābhyām samyak prāpta samarhaṇāḥ praśaśaṁsuḥ mudā yuktāḥ vṛṣṇīn kṛṣṇa parigrahān
aho bhoja-pate yūyam janma-bhājaḥ nṛṇām iha yat paśyatha asakṛt kṛṣṇam durdarśam api yoginām
yat viśrutiḥ śruti nutā idam alam punāti pāda avanejana payaḥ ca vacaḥ ca śāstram bhūḥ kāla bharjita bhagā api yat aṅghri padma sparśa uttha śaktiḥ abhivarṣati naḥ akhila arthān tat darśana sparśana anupatha prajalpa śayyā āsana aśana sa-yauna sa-piṇḍa bandhaḥ yeṣām gṛhe niraya vartmani vartatām vaḥ svarga apavarga viramaḥ svayam āsa viṣṇuḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca nandaḥ tatra yadūn prāptān jñātvā kṛṣṇa puraḥ-gamān tatra agamat vṛtaḥ gopaiḥ anaḥ stha arthaiḥ didṛkṣayā
tam dṛṣṭvā vṛṣṇayaḥ hṛṣṭāḥ tanvaḥ prāṇam iva utthitāḥ pariṣaśvajire gāḍham cira darśana kātarāḥ
vasudevaḥ pariṣvajya samprītaḥ prema vihvalaḥ smaran kaṁsa-kṛtān kleśān putra nyāsam ca gokule
kṛṣṇa-rāmau pariṣvajya pitarau abhivādya ca na kiñcana ūcatuḥ premṇā sa-aśru kaṇṭhau kuru-udvaha
tau ātma-āsanam āropya bāhubhyām parirabhya ca yaśodā ca mahā-bhāgā sutau vijahatuḥ śucaḥ
rohiṇī devakī ca atha pariṣvajya vraja-īśvarīm smarantyau tat kṛtam maitṛīm bāṣpa kaṇṭhyau samūcatuḥ
kā vismareta vām maitrīm anivṛttām vraja-īśvari avāpya api aindram aiśvaryam yasyāḥ na iha prati-kriyā
etau adṛṣṭa pitarau yuvayoḥ sma pitroḥ samprīṇana abhyudaya poṣaṇa pālanāni prāpya ūṣatuḥ bhavati pakṣma ha yadvat akṣṇoḥ nyastau akutra ca bhayau na satām paraḥ svaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca gopyaḥ ca kṛṣṇam upalabhya cirāt abhīṣṭam yat prekṣaṇe dṛśiṣu pakṣma kṛtam śapanti dṛgbhiḥ hṛdī-kṛtam alam parirabhya sarvāḥ tat bhāvam āpuḥ api nitya yujām durāpam
bhagavān tāḥ tathā-bhūtāḥ vivikte upasaṅgataḥ āśliṣya anāmayam pṛṣṭvā prahasan idam abravīt
api smaratha naḥ sakhyaḥ svānām artha cikīrṣayā gatān cirāyitān śatru pakṣa kṣapaṇa cetasaḥ
api avadhyāyatha asmān svit akṛta-jña āviśaṅkayā nūnam bhūtāni bhagavān yunakti viyunakti ca
vāyuḥ yathā ghana anīkam tṛṇam tūlam rajāṁsi ca saṁyojya ākṣipate bhūyaḥ tathā bhūtāni bhūta kṛt
mayi bhaktiḥ hi bhūtānām amṛtatvāya kalpate diṣṭyā yat āsīt mat snehaḥ bhavatīnām mat āpanaḥ
aham hi sarva bhūtānām ādiḥ antaḥ antaram bahiḥ bhautikānām yathā kham vāḥ bhūḥ vāyuḥ jyotiḥ aṅganāḥ
evam hi etāni bhūtāni bhūteṣu ātmā ātmanā tataḥ ubhayam mayi atha pare paśyata ābhātam akṣare
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca adhyātma śikṣayā gopyaḥ evam kṛṣṇena śikṣitāḥ tat anusmaraṇa dhvasta jīva-kośāḥ tam adhyagan
āhuḥ ca te nalina-nabha pada-aravindam yoga-īśvaraiḥ hṛdi vicintyam agādha-bodhaiḥ saṁsāra-kūpa patita uttaraṇa avalambam geham juṣām api manasi udiyāt sadā naḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tathā anugṛhya bhagavān gopīnām saḥ guruḥ gatiḥ yudhiṣṭhiram atha apṛcchat sarvān ca su-hṛdaḥ avyayam
te evam loka nāthena paripṛṣṭāḥ su sat-kṛtāḥ pratyūcuḥ hṛṣṭa manasaḥ tat pāda īkṣā hata aṁhasaḥ
kutaḥ aśivam tvat caraṇa ambuja āsavam mahat manastaḥ mukha niḥsṛtam kvacit pibanti ye karṇa puṭaiḥ alam prabho deham bhṛtām deha kṛt asmṛti chidam
hi tvā ātma dhāma vidhuta ātma kṛta tri avasthām ānanda samplavam akhaṇḍam akuṇṭha bodham kāla upasṛṣṭa nigama avane ātta yoga-māyā ākṛtim parama-haṁsa gatim natāḥ sma
śrī-ṛṣiḥ uvāca iti uttamaḥ-śloka śikhā-maṇim janeṣu abhiṣṭuvatsu andhaka-kaurava striyaḥ sametya govinda-kathāḥ mithaḥ agṛṇan tri loka gītāḥ śṛṇu varṇayāmi te
śrī-draupadī uvāca he vaidarbhi acyutaḥ bhadre he jāmbavati kauśale he satyabhāme kālindi śaibye rohiṇi lakṣmaṇe he kṛṣṇa-patnyaḥ etat naḥ brūte vaḥ bhagavān svayam upayeme yathā lokam anukurvan sva-māyayā
śrī-rukmiṇī uvāca caidyāya mā arpayitum udyata kārmukeṣu rājasu ajeya bhaṭa śekharita aṅghri reṇuḥ ninye mṛgendraḥ iva bhāgam aja avi yūthāt tat śrī niketa caraṇaḥ astu mama arcanāya
śrī-satyabhāmā uvāca yaḥ me sanābhi vadha tapta hṛdā tatena lipta abhiśāpam apamārṣṭum upājahāra jitvā ṛkṣa-rājam atha ratnam adāt saḥ tena bhītaḥ pitā adiśata mām prabhave api dattām
śrī-jāmbavatī uvāca prājñāya deha kṛt amum nija nātha daivam sītā patim tri nava ahāni amunā abhyayudhyat jñātvā parīkṣitaḥ upāharat arhaṇam mām pādau pragṛhya maṇinā aham amuṣya dāsī
śrī-kālindī uvāca tapaḥ carantīm ājñāya sva pāda sparśana āśayā sakhyā upetya agrahīt pāṇim yaḥ aham tat gṛha mārjanī
śrī-mitravindā uvāca yaḥ mām svayaṁ-vare upetya vijitya bhū-pān ninye śva yūtha gam iva ātma balim dvipa-ariḥ bhrātṝn ca me apakurutaḥ sva puram śrī okaḥ tasya astu me anu-bhavam aṅghri avanejanatvam
śrī-satyā uvāca sapta ukṣaṇaḥ ati bala vīrya su tīkṣṇa śṛṅgān pitrā kṛtān kṣitipa vīrya parīkṣaṇāya tān vīra durmada hanaḥ tarasā nigṛhya krīḍan babandha ha yathā śiśavaḥ aja tokān yaḥ ittham vīrya śulkām mām dāsībhiḥ catuḥ-aṅgiṇīm pathi nirjitya rājanyān ninye tat dāsyam astu me
śrī-bhadrā uvāca pitā me mātuleyāya svayam āhūya dattavān kṛṣṇe kṛṣṇāya tat cittām akṣauhiṇyā sakhī-janaiḥ asya me pāda saṁsparśaḥ bhavet janmani janmani karmabhiḥ bhrāmyamāṇāyāḥ yena tat śreyaḥ ātmanaḥ
śrī-lakṣmaṇā uvāca mama api rājñi acyuta janma karma śrutvā muhuḥ nārada gītam āsa ha cittam mukunde kila padma-hastayā vṛtaḥ su sammṛśya vihāya loka pān
jñātvā mama matam sādhvi pitā duhitṛ vatsalaḥ bṛhatsenaḥ iti khyātaḥ tatra upāyam acīkarat
yathā svayam-vare rājñi matsyaḥ pārtha īpsayā kṛtaḥ ayam tu bahiḥ ācchannaḥ dṛśyate saḥ jale param
śrutvā etat sarvataḥ bhū-pāḥ āyayuḥ mat pituḥ puram sarva astra śastra tattva jñāḥ sa upādhyāyāḥ sahasraśaḥ
pitrā sampūjitāḥ sarve yathā vīryam yathā vayaḥ ādaduḥ sa śaram cāpam veddhum parṣadi mat dhiyaḥ
ādāya vyasṛjan kecit sajyam kartum anīśvarāḥ ā-koṣṭham jyām samutkṛṣya petuḥ eke amunā hatāḥ
sajyam kṛtvā apare vīrāḥ māgadha ambaṣṭha cedi-pāḥ bhīmaḥ duryodhanaḥ karṇaḥ na avidan tad avasthitim
matsya ābhāsam jale vīkṣya jñātvā ca tat avasthitim pārthaḥ yattaḥ asṛjat bāṇam na acchinat paspṛśe param
rājanyeṣu nivṛtteṣu bhagna māneṣu māniṣu bhagavān dhanuḥ ādāya sajyam kṛtvā atha līlayā tasmin sandhāya viśikham matsyam vīkṣya sakṛt jale chittvā iṣuṇā apātayat tam sūrye ca abhijite sthite
divi dundubhayaḥ neduḥ jaya śabda yutāḥ bhuvi devāḥ ca kusuma āsārān mumucuḥ harṣa vihvalāḥ
tat raṅgam āviśam aham kala nūpurābhyām padbhyām pragṛhya kanaka ujjvala ratna mālām nūtne nivīya paridhāya ca kauśika agrye sa-vrīḍa hāsa vadanā kavarī dhṛta srak
unnīya vaktram uru kuntala kuṇḍala tviṭ gaṇḍa-sthalam śiśira hāsa kaṭa-akṣa mokṣaiḥ rājñaḥ nirīkṣya paritaḥ śanakaiḥ murāreḥ aṁse anurakta hṛdayā nidadhe sva mālām
tāvat mṛdaṅga-paṭahāḥ śaṅkha bherī ānaka ādayaḥ nineduḥ naṭa nartakyaḥ nanṛtuḥ gāyakāḥ jaguḥ
evam vṛte bhagavati mayā īśe nṛpa yūtha-pāḥ na sehire yājñaseni spardhantaḥ hṛt-śaya āturāḥ
mām tāvat ratham āropya haya ratna catuṣṭayam śārṅgam udyamya sannaddhaḥ tasthau ājau catuḥ bhujaḥ
dārukaḥ codayām āsa kāñcana upaskaram ratham miṣatām bhū-bhujām rājñi mṛgāṇām mṛga-rāṭ iva
te anvasajjanta rājanyāḥ niṣeddhum pathi kecana saṁyattāḥ uddhṛta iṣu-āsāḥ grāma-siṁhā yathā harim
te śārṅga cyuta bāṇa oghaiḥ kṛtta bāhu aṅghri kandharāḥ nipetuḥ pradhane kecit eke santyajya dudruvuḥ
tataḥ purīm yadu-patiḥ ati alaṅkṛtām ravi chada dhvaja paṭa citra toraṇām kuśasthalīm divi bhuvi ca abhisaṁstutām samāviśat taraṇiḥ iva sva ketanam
pitā me pūjayām āsa suhṛt sambandhi bāndhavān mahā arha vāsaḥ alaṅkāraiḥ śayyā āsana paricchadaiḥ
dāsībhiḥ sarva sampadbhiḥ bhaṭa ibha ratha vājibhiḥ āyudhāni mahā-arhāṇi dadau pūrṇasya bhaktitaḥ
ātma-ārāmasya tasya imāḥ vayam vai gṛha dāsikāḥ sarva saṅga nivṛttyā addhā tapasā ca babhūvima
mahiṣyaḥ ūcuḥ bhaumam nihatya sa gaṇam yudhi tena ruddhāḥ jñātvā atha naḥ kṣiti-jaye jita rāja kanyāḥ nirmucya saṁsṛti vimokṣam anusmarantīḥ pāda-ambujam pariṇināya yaḥ āpta-kāmaḥ
na vayam sādhvi sāmrājyam sva-rājyam bhaujyam api uta vairājyam pārameṣṭhyam ca ānantyam vā hareḥ padam kāmayāmahe etasya śrī-mat pāda rajaḥ śrīyaḥ kuca kuṅkuma gandha āḍhyam mūrdhnā voḍhum gadābhṛtaḥ
vraja striyaḥ yat vāñchanti pulindyaḥ tṛṇa vīrudhaḥ gāvaḥ cārayataḥ gopāḥ pāda sparśam mahā-ātmanaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca śrutvā pṛthā subala-putrī atha yājñasenī mādhavī atha kṣiti-pa patnyaḥ uta sva gopyaḥ kṛṣṇe akhila ātmani harau praṇaya anubandham sarvāḥ visismyuḥ alam aśru-kala ākula akṣyaḥ
iti sambhāṣamāṇāsu strībhiḥ strīṣu nṛbhiḥ nṛṣu āyayuḥ munayaḥ tatra kṛṣṇa-rāma didṛkṣayā dvaipāyanaḥ nāradaḥ ca cyavanaḥ devalaḥ asitaḥ viśvāmitraḥ śatānandaḥ bharadvājaḥ atha gautamaḥ rāmaḥ sa śiṣyaḥ bhagavān vasiṣṭhaḥ gālavaḥ bhṛguḥ pulastyaḥ kaśyapaḥ atriḥ ca mārkaṇḍeyaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ dvitaḥ tritaḥ ca ekataḥ ca brahma-putrāḥ tathā aṅgirāḥ agastyaḥ yājñavalkyaḥ ca vāmadeva-ādayaḥ apare
tān dṛṣṭvā sahasā utthāya prāk āsīnāḥ nṛpa-ādayaḥ pāṇḍavāḥ kṛṣṇa-rāmau ca praṇemuḥ viśva vanditān
tān ānarcuḥ yathā sarve saha-rāma acyutaḥ arcayat sv-āgata āsana pādya arghya mālya dhūpa anulepanaiḥ
uvāca sukham āsīnān bhagavān dharma gup tanuḥ sadasaḥ tasya mahataḥ yata vācaḥ anuśṛṇvataḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca aho vayam janma-bhṛtaḥ labdham kārtsnyena tat phalam devānām api duṣprāpam yat yoga-īśvara darśanam
kim su-alpa tapasām nṝṇām arcāyām deva cakṣuṣām darśana sparśana praśna prahva pāda-arcana ādikam
na hi ap mayāni tīrthāni na devāḥ mṛt śilā mayāḥ te punanti uru-kālena darśanāt eva sādhavaḥ
na agniḥ na sūryaḥ na ca candra tārakāḥ na bhūḥ jalam kham śvasanaḥ atha vāk manaḥ upāsitāḥ bheda kṛtaḥ haranti agham vipaścitaḥ ghnanti muhūrta sevayā
yasya ātma buddhiḥ kuṇape tri-dhātuke sva dhīḥ kalatra-ādiṣu bhaume ijya dhīḥ yat tīrtha buddhiḥ salile na karhicit janeṣu abhijñeṣu saḥ eva gaḥ kharaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca niśamya ittham bhagavataḥ kṛṣṇasya akuṇṭha medhasaḥ vacaḥ duranvayam viprāḥ tūṣṇīm āsan bhramat dhiyaḥ
ciram vimṛśya munayaḥ īśvarasya īśitavyatām jana-saṅgrahaḥ iti ūcuḥ smayantaḥ tam jagat gurum
śrī-munayaḥ ūcuḥ yat māyayā tattva vit uttamāḥ vayam vimohitāḥ viśva sṛjām adhīśvaraḥ yat īśitavyāyati gūḍhaḥ īhayā aho vicitram bhagavat viceṣṭitam
anīhaḥ etat bahudhā ekaḥ ātmanā sṛjati avati atti na badhyate yathā bhaumaiḥ hi bhūmiḥ bahu nāma-rūpiṇī aho vibhūmnaḥ caritam viḍambanam
atha api kāle sva-jana abhiguptaye bibharṣi sattvam khala nigrahāya ca sva līlayā veda-patham sanātanam varṇa-āśrama ātmā puruṣaḥ paraḥ bhavān
brahma te hṛdayam śuklam tapaḥ svādhyāya saṁyamaiḥ yatra upalabdham sat vyaktam avyaktam ca tataḥ param
tasmāt brahma kulam brahman śāstra yoneḥ tvam ātmanaḥ sabhājayasi sat dhāma tat brahmaṇya agranīḥ bhavān
adya naḥ janma sāphalyam vidyāyāḥ tapasaḥ dṛśaḥ tvayā saṅgamya sat gatyā yat antaḥ śreyasām paraḥ
namaḥ tasmai bhagavate kṛṣṇāya akuṇṭha medhase sva yoga-māyayā ācchanna mahimne parama-ātmane
na yam vidanti amī bhū-pāḥ eka ārāmāḥ ca vṛṣṇayaḥ māyā javanikā ācchannam ātmānam kālam īśvaram
yathā śayānaḥ puruṣaḥ ātmānam guṇa tattva dṛk nāma mātra indriya ābhātam na veda rahitam param evam tvā nāma-mātreṣu viṣayeṣu indriya īhayā māyayā vibhramat cittaḥ na veda smṛti upaplavāt
tasya adya te dadṛśima aṅghrim agha ogha marṣa tīrtha āspadam hṛdi kṛtam su vipakva yogaiḥ utsikta bhakti upahata āśaya jīva kośāḥ āpuḥ bhavat gatim atha anugṛhāṇa bhaktān
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti anujñāpya dāśārham dhṛtarāṣṭram yudhiṣṭhiram rāja ṛṣe sva āśramān gantum munayaḥ dadhire manaḥ
tat vīkṣya tān upavrajya vasudevaḥ mahā yaśāḥ praṇamya ca upasaṅgṛhya babhāṣa idam su yantritaḥ
śrī-vasudevaḥ uvāca namaḥ vaḥ sarva devebhyaḥ ṛṣayaḥ śrotum arhatha karmaṇā karma nirhāraḥ yathā syāt naḥ tat ucyatām
śrī-nāradaḥ uvāca na ati citram idam viprāḥ vasudevaḥ bubhutsayā kṛṣṇam matvā arbhakam yat naḥ pṛcchati śreyaḥ ātmanaḥ
sannikarṣaḥ atra martyānām anādaraṇa kāraṇam gāṅgam hitvā yathā anya ambhaḥ tatratyaḥ yāti śuddhaye
yasya anubhūtiḥ kālena laya utpatti ādinā asya vai svataḥ anyasmāt ca guṇataḥ na kutaścana riṣyati tam kleśa karma paripāka guṇa pravāhaiḥ avyāhata anubhavam īśvaram advitīyam prāṇa ādibhiḥ sva vibhavaiḥ upagūḍham anyaḥ manyeta sūryam iva megha hima uparāgaiḥ
atha ūcuḥ munayaḥ rājan ābhāṣya ānaka-dundubhim sarveṣām śṛṇvatām rājñām tathā eva acyuta-rāmayoḥ
karmaṇā karma nirhāraḥ eṣaḥ sādhu nirūpitaḥ yat śraddhayā yajet viṣṇum sarva yajña īśvaram makhaiḥ
cittasya upaśamaḥ ayam vai kavibhiḥ śāstra cakṣuṣā darśitaḥ su-gamaḥ yogaḥ dharmaḥ ca ātma mut āvahaḥ
ayam svasti ayanaḥ panthā dvi-jāteḥ gṛha medhinaḥ yat śraddhayā āpta vittena śuklena ījyeta pūruṣaḥ
vitta eṣaṇām yajña dānaiḥ gṛhaiḥ dāra suta eṣaṇām ātma loka eṣaṇām deva kālena visṛjet budhaḥ grāme tyakta eṣaṇāḥ sarve yayuḥ dhīrāḥ tapaḥ vanam
ṛṇaiḥ tribhiḥ dvi-jaḥ jātaḥ deva ṛṣi pitṝṇām prabho yajña adhyayana putraiḥ tāni anistīrya tyajan patet
tvam tu adya muktaḥ dvābhyām vai ṛṣi pitroḥ mahā-mate yajñaiḥ deva ṛṇam unmucya nirṛṇaḥ aśaraṇaḥ bhava
vasudeva bhavān nūnam bhaktyā paramayā harim jagatām īśvaram prārcaḥ saḥ yat vām putratām gataḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca iti tat vacanam śrutvā vasudevaḥ mahā-manāḥ tān ṛṣīn ṛtvijaḥ vavre mūrdhnā ānamya prasādya ca
te enam ṛṣayaḥ rājan vṛtāḥ dharmeṇa dhārmikam tasmin ayājayan kṣetre makhaiḥ uttama kalpakaiḥ
tat dīkṣāyām pravṛttāyām vṛṣṇayaḥ puṣkara srajaḥ snātāḥ suvāsasaḥ rājan rājānaḥ suṣṭhu alaṅkṛtāḥ tat mahiṣyaḥ ca muditāḥ niṣka kaṇṭhyaḥ su-vāsasaḥ dīkṣā śālām upājagmuḥ āliptāḥ vastu pāṇayaḥ
neduḥ mṛdaṅga-paṭaha śaṅkha bherī-ānaka ādayaḥ nanṛtuḥ naṭa-nartakyaḥ tuṣṭuvuḥ sūta-māgadhāḥ jaguḥ su-kaṇṭhyaḥ gandharvyaḥ saṅgītam saha bhartṛkāḥ
tam abhyaṣiñcan vidhivat aktam abhyaktam ṛtvijaḥ patnībhiḥ aṣṭā-daśabhiḥ soma-rājam iva uḍubhiḥ
tābhiḥ dukūla valayaiḥ hāra nūpura kuṇḍalaiḥ su alaṅkṛtābhiḥ vibabhau dīkṣitaḥ ajina saṁvṛtaḥ
tasya ṛtvijaḥ mahā-rāja ratna kauśeya vāsasaḥ sa sadasyāḥ virejuḥ te yathā vṛtra-haṇaḥ adhvare
tadā rāmaḥ ca kṛṣṇaḥ ca svaiḥ svaiḥ bandhubhiḥ anvitau rejatuḥ sva sutaiḥ dāraiḥ jīva īśau sva-vibhūtibhiḥ
īje anu-yajñam vidhinā agni-hotra ādi lakṣaṇaiḥ prākṛtaiḥ vaikṛtaiḥ yajñaiḥ dravya jñāna kriyā īśvaram
atha ṛtvigbhyaḥ adadāt kāle yathā-āmnātam saḥ dakṣiṇāḥ su-alaṅkṛtebhyaḥ alaṅkṛtya go bhū kanyāḥ mahā dhanāḥ
patnī-saṁyāja avabhṛthyaiḥ caritvā te mahāṛṣayaḥ sasnuḥ rāma hrade viprāḥ yajamāna puraḥ-sarāḥ
snātaḥ alaṅkāra vāsāṁsi vandibhyaḥ adāt tathā striyaḥ tataḥ su-alaṅkṛtaḥ varṇān ā śvabhyaḥ annena pūjayat
bandhūn sa-dārān sa-sutān pāribarheṇa bhūyasā vidarbha-kośala-kurūn kāśi-kekaya-sṛñjayān sadasya ṛtvik sura-gaṇān nṛ bhūta pitṛ cāraṇān śrī-niketam anujñāpya śaṁsantaḥ prayayuḥ kratum
dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ anujaḥ pārthāḥ bhīṣmaḥ droṇaḥ pṛthā yamau nāradaḥ bhagavān vyāsaḥ suhṛt sambandhi bāndhavāḥ bandhūn pariṣvajya yadūn sauhṛda āklinna cetasaḥ yayuḥ viraha kṛcchreṇa sva deśān ca apare janāḥ
nandaḥ tu saha gopālaiḥ bṛhatyā pūjayā arcitaḥ kṛṣṇa-rāma-ugrasena-ādyaiḥ nyavātsīt bandhu vatsalaḥ
vasudevaḥ añjasā uttīrya manaḥ-ratha mahā arṇavam suhṛt vṛtaḥ prīta manāḥ nandam āha kare spṛśan
śrī-vasudevaḥ uvāca bhrātaḥ īśa kṛtaḥ pāśaḥ nṛṇām yaḥ sneha saṁjñitaḥ tam dustyajam aham manye śūrāṇām api yoginām
asmāsu apratikalpā iyam yat kṛta-ajñeṣu sat-tamaiḥ maitrī arpitā aphalā ca api na nivarteta karhicit
prāk akalpāt ca kuśalam bhrātaḥ vaḥ na ācarāma hi adhunā śrī mada andha akṣāḥ na paśyāmaḥ puraḥ sataḥ
mā rājya śrīḥ abhūt puṁsaḥ śreyaḥ kāmasya māna-da sva-janān uta bandhūn vā na paśyati yayā andha dṛk
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam sauhṛda śaithilya cittaḥ ānakadundubhiḥ ruroda tat kṛtām maitrīm smaran aśru vilocanaḥ
nandaḥ tu sakhyuḥ priya kṛt premṇā govinda-rāmayoḥ adya śvaḥ iti māsān trīn yadubhiḥ mānitaḥ avasat
tataḥ kāmaiḥ pūryamāṇaḥ sa-vrajaḥ saha-bāndhavaḥ para ardhya ābharaṇa kṣauma nānā anarghya paricchadaiḥ vasudeva-ugrasenābhyām kṛṣṇa-uddhava-bala-ādibhiḥ dattam ādāya pāribarham yāpitaḥ yadubhiḥ yayau
nandaḥ gopāḥ ca gopyaḥ ca govinda caraṇa-ambuje manaḥ kṣiptam punaḥ hartum anīśāḥ mathurām yayuḥ
bandhuṣu pratiyāteṣu vṛṣṇayaḥ kṛṣṇa-devatāḥ vīkṣya prāvṛṣam āsannāt yayuḥ dvāravatīm punaḥ
janebhyaḥ kathayām cakruḥ yadu-deva mahā-utsavam yat āsīt tīrtha-yātrāyām suhṛt sandarśana ādikam
śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ uvāca atha ekadā ātmajau prāptau kṛta pāda abhivandanau vasudevaḥ abhinandya āha prītyā saṅkarṣaṇa-acyutau
munīnām saḥ vacaḥ śrutvā putrayoḥ dhāma sūcakam tat vīryaiḥ jāta visrambhaḥ paribhāṣya abhyabhāṣata
kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahā-yogin saṅkarṣaṇa sanātana jāne vām asya yat sākṣāt pradhāna puruṣau parau
yatra yena yataḥ yasya yasmai yat yat yathā yadā syāt idam bhagavān sākṣāt pradhāna-puruṣa īśvaraḥ
etat nānā-vidham viśvam ātma sṛṣṭam adhokṣaja ātmanā anupraviśya ātman prāṇaḥ jīvaḥ bibharṣi aja
prāṇa ādīnām viśva sṛjām śaktayaḥ yāḥ parasya tāḥ pāratantryāt vaisādṛśyāt dvayoḥ ceṣṭā eva ceṣṭatām
kāntiḥ tejaḥ prabhā sattā candra agni arka ṛkṣa vidyutām yat sthairyam bhū-bhṛtām bhūmeḥ vṛttiḥ gandhaḥ arthataḥ bhavān
tarpaṇam prāṇanam apām deva tvam tāḥ ca tat rasaḥ ojaḥ sahaḥ balam ceṣṭā gatiḥ vāyoḥ tava īśvara
diśām tvam avakāśaḥ asi diśaḥ kham sphoṭaḥ āśrayaḥ nādaḥ varṇaḥ tvam oṁkāraḥ ākṛtīnām pṛthak-kṛtiḥ
indriyam tu indriyāṇām tvam devāḥ ca tat anugrahaḥ avabodhaḥ bhavān buddheḥ jīvasya anusmṛtiḥ satī
bhūtānām asi bhūta-ādiḥ indriyāṇām ca taijasaḥ vaikārikaḥ vikalpānām pradhānam anuśāyinam
naśvareṣu iha bhāveṣu tat asi tvam anaśvaram yathā dravya vikāreṣu dravya-mātram nirūpitam
sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti guṇāḥ tat vṛttayaḥ ca yāḥ tvayi addhāḥ brahmaṇi pare kalpitāḥ yoga-māyayā
tasmāt na santi amī bhāvāḥ yarhi tvayi vikalpitāḥ tvam ca amīṣu vikāreṣu hi anyadā avyāvahārikaḥ
guṇa pravāhe etasmin abudhāḥ tu akhila ātmanaḥ gatim sūkṣmām abodhena saṁsaranti iha karmabhiḥ
yadṛcchayā nṛtām prāpya su-kalpām iha durlabhām sva arthe pramattasya vayaḥ gatam tvat māyayā īśvara
asau aham mama eva ete dehe ca asya anvaya-ādiṣu sneha pāśaiḥ nibadhnāti bhavān sarvam idam jagat
yuvām na naḥ sutau sākṣāt pradhāna-puruṣa īśvarau bhū bhāra kṣatra kṣapaṇe avatīrṇau tathā āttha ha
tat te gataḥ asmi araṇam adya pāda-aravindam āpanna saṁsṛti bhaya apaham ārta bandho etāvatā alam alam indriya lālasena martya ātma dṛk tvayi pare yat apatya buddhiḥ
sūtī-gṛhe nanu jagāda bhavān ajaḥ nau sañjajñe iti anu-yugam nija dharma guptyai nānā tanūḥ gagana-vat vidadhat jahāsi kaḥ veda bhūmnaḥ uru-gāya vibhūti māyām
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca ākarṇya ittham pituḥ vākyam bhagavān sātvata-ṛṣabhaḥ pratyāha praśraya ānamraḥ prahasan ślakṣṇayā girā
śrī-bhagavān uvāca vacaḥ vaḥ samaveta artham tāta etat upamanmahe yat naḥ putrān samuddiśya tattva grāmaḥ udāhṛtaḥ
aham yūyam asau āryaḥ ime ca dvārakā-okasaḥ sarve api evam yadu-śreṣṭha vimṛgyāḥ sa cara acaram
ātmā hi ekaḥ svayam-jyotiḥ nityaḥ anyaḥ nirguṇaḥ guṇaiḥ ātma sṛṣṭaiḥ tat kṛteṣu bhūteṣu bahudhā īyate
kham vāyuḥ jyotiḥ āpaḥ bhūḥ tat kṛteṣu yathā-āśayam āviḥ tiraḥ alpa bhūri ekaḥ nānātvam yāti asau api
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca evam bhagavatā rājan vasudevaḥ udāhṛtaḥ śrutvā vinaṣṭa nānā dhīḥ tūṣṇīm prīta manāḥ abhūt
atha tatra kuru-śreṣṭha devakī sarva devatā śrutvā nītam guroḥ putram ātmajābhyām su vismitā kṛṣṇa-rāmau samāśrāvya putrān kaṁsa-vihiṁsitān smarantī kṛpaṇam prāha vaiklavyāt aśru locanā
śrī-devakī uvāca rāma rāma aprameya-ātman kṛṣṇa yoga-īśvara īśvara veda aham vām viśva sṛjām īśvarau ādi pūruṣau
kāla vidhvasta sattvānām rājñām ut-śāstra vartinām bhūmeḥ bhārāyamāṇānām avatīrṇau kila adya me
yasya aṁśa aṁśa aṁśa bhāgena viśva utpatti laya udayāḥ bhavanti kila viśva-ātman tat tvā adya aham gatim gatā
cirāt mṛta suta ādāne guruṇā kila coditau āninyathuḥ pitṛ sthānāt gurave guru-dakṣiṇām tathā me kurutam kāmam yuvām yoga-īśvara īśvarau bhoja-rāja hatān putrān kāmaye draṣṭum āhṛtān
ṛṣiḥ uvāca evam sañcoditau mātrā rāmaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ ca bhārata sutalam saṁviviśatuḥ yoga-māyāyam upāśritau
tasmin praviṣṭau upalabhya daitya-rāṭ viśva ātma daivam sutarām tathā ātmanaḥ tat darśana āhlāda paripluta āśayaḥ sadyaḥ samutthāya nanāma sa anvayaḥ
tayoḥ samānīya vara āsanam mudā niviṣṭayoḥ tatra mahā-ātmanoḥ tayoḥ dadhāra pādau avanijya tat jalam sa vṛndaḥ ā-brahma punat yat ambu ha
samarhayām āsa saḥ tau vibhūtibhiḥ mahā-arha vastra ābharaṇa anulepanaiḥ tāmbūla dīpa amṛta bhakṣaṇa ādibhiḥ sva gotra vitta ātma samarpaṇena ca
saḥ indra-senaḥ bhagavat pāda-ambujam bibhrat muhuḥ prema vibhinnayā dhiyā uvāca ha ānanda jala ākula īkṣaṇaḥ prahṛṣṭa romā nṛpa gadgada akṣaram
baliḥ uvāca namaḥ anantāya bṛhate namaḥ kṛṣṇāya vedhase sāṅkhya yoga vitānāya brahmaṇe parama-ātmane
darśanam vām hi bhūtānām duṣprāpam ca api adurlabham rajaḥ tamaḥ svabhāvānām yat naḥ prāptau yadṛcchayā
daitya-dānava gandharvāḥ siddha-vidyādhara-cāraṇāḥ yakṣa rakṣaḥ piśācāḥ ca bhūta pramatha-nāyakāḥ viśuddha sattva dhāmni addhā tvayi śāstra śarīriṇi nityam nibaddha vairāḥ te vayam ca anye ca tādṛśāḥ kecana udbaddha vaireṇa bhaktyā kecana kāmataḥ na tathā sattva saṁrabdhāḥ sannikṛṣṭāḥ sura ādayaḥ
idam ittham iti prāyaḥ tava yoga-īśvara īśvara na vidanti api yoga-īśāḥ yoga-māyām kutaḥ vayam
tat naḥ prasīda nirapekṣa vimṛgya yuṣmat pāda aravinda dhiṣaṇa anya gṛha andha kūpāt niṣkramya viśva śaraṇa aṅghri upalabdha vṛttiḥ śāntaḥ yathā ekaḥ uta sarva sakhaiḥ carāmi
śādhi asmān īśitavya īśa niṣpāpān kuru naḥ prabho pumān yat śraddhayā ātiṣṭhan codanāyāḥ vimucyate
śrī-bhagavān uvāca āsan marīceḥ ṣaṭ putrāḥ ūrṇāyām prathame antare devāḥ kam jahasuḥ vīkṣya sutām yabhitum udyatam
tena āsurīm agan yonim adhunā avadya karmaṇā hiraṇyakaśipoḥ jātāḥ nītāḥ te yoga-māyayā devakyāḥ udare jātāḥ rājan kaṁsa vihiṁsitāḥ sā tān śocati ātma-jān svān te ime adhyāsate antike
itaḥ etān praṇeṣyāmaḥ mātṛ śoka apanuttaye tataḥ śāpāt vinirmuktāḥ lokam yāsyanti vijvarāḥ
smara-udgīthaḥ pariṣvaṅgaḥ pataṅgaḥ kṣudrabhṛt ghṛṇī ṣaṭ ime mat prasādena punaḥ yāsyanti sat gatim
iti uktvā tān samādāya indrasenena pūjitau punaḥ dvāravatīm etya mātuḥ putrān ayacchatām
tān dṛṣṭvā bālakān devī putra sneha snuta stanī pariṣvajya aṅkam āropya mūrdhni ajighrat abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
apāyayat stanam prītā suta sparśa parisnutam mohitā māyayā viṣṇoḥ yayā sṛṣṭiḥ pravartate
pītvā amṛtam payaḥ tasyāḥ pīta śeṣam gadā-bhṛtaḥ nārāyaṇa aṅga saṁsparśa pratilabdha ātma darśanāḥ te namaskṛtya govindam devakīm pitaram balam miṣatām sarva bhūtānām yayuḥ dhāma diva-okasām
tam dṛṣṭvā devakī devī mṛta āgamana nirgamam mene su vismitā māyām kṛṣṇasya racitām nṛpa
evam-vidhāni adbhutāni kṛṣṇasya parama-ātmanaḥ vīryāṇi ananta vīryasya santi anantāni bhārata
śrī-sūtaḥ uvāca yaḥ idam anuśṛṇoti śrāvayet vā murāreḥ caritam amṛta kīrteḥ varṇitam vyāsa-putraiḥ jagat agha bhit alam tat bhakta sat karṇa-pūram bhagavati kṛta cittaḥ yāti tat kṣema dhāma
śrī-rājā uvāca brahman veditum icchāmaḥ svasāram rāma-kṛṣṇayoḥ yathā upayeme vijayaḥ yā mama āsīt pitāmahī
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca arjunaḥ tīrtha yātrāyām paryaṭan avanīm prabhuḥ gataḥ prabhāsam aśṛṇot mātuleyīm saḥ ātmanaḥ duryodhanāya rāmaḥ tām dāsyati iti na ca apare tat lipsuḥ saḥ yatiḥ bhūtvā tri-daṇḍī dvārakām agāt
tatra vai vārṣikān māsān avātsīt sva artha sādhakaḥ pauraiḥ sabhājitaḥ abhīkṣṇam rāmeṇa ajānatā ca saḥ
ekadā gṛham ānīya ātithyena nimantrya tam śraddhayā upahṛtam bhaikṣyam balena bubhuje kila
saḥ apaśyat tatra mahatīm kanyām vīra manaḥ-harām prīti utphulla īkṣanaḥ tasyām bhāva kṣubdham manaḥ dadhe
sā api tam cakame vīkṣya nārīṇām hṛdayam-gamam hasantī vrīḍitā apāṅgī tat nyasta hṛdaya īkṣaṇā
tām param samanudhyāyan antaram prepsuḥ arjunaḥ na lebhe śam bhramat cittaḥ kāmena ati-balīyasā
mahatyām deva yātrāyām ratha sthām durga nirgatām jahāra anumataḥ pitroḥ kṛṣṇasya ca mahā-rathaḥ
ratha sthaḥ dhanuḥ ādāya śūrān ca arundhataḥ bhaṭān vidrāvya krośatām svānām sva bhāgam mṛga-rāṭ iva
tat śrutvā kṣubhitaḥ rāmaḥ parvaṇi iva mahā-arṇavaḥ gṛhīta pādaḥ kṛṣṇena suhṛdbhiḥ ca anusāntvitaḥ
prāhiṇot pāribarhāṇi vara-vadhvoḥ mudā balaḥ mahā-dhana upaskara ibha ratha aśva nara yoṣitaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca kṛṣṇasya āsīt dvija śreṣṭhaḥ śrutadevaḥ iti śrutaḥ kṛṣṇa eka bhaktyā pūrṇa arthaḥ śāntaḥ kaviḥ alampaṭaḥ
saḥ uvāsa videheṣu mithilāyām gṛha-āśramī anīhayā āgata āhārya nirvartita nija kriyaḥ
yātrā-mātram tu ahaḥ ahaḥ daivāt upanamati uta na adhikam tāvatā tuṣṭaḥ kriyāḥ cakre yathā ucitāḥ
tathā tat rāṣṭra pālaḥ aṅga bahulāśvaḥ iti śrutaḥ maithilaḥ niraham-mānaḥ ubhau api acyuta-priyau
tayoḥ prasannaḥ bhagavān dārukeṇa āhṛtam ratham āruhya sākam munibhiḥ videhān prayayau prabhuḥ
nāradaḥ vāmadevaḥ atriḥ kṛṣṇaḥ rāmaḥ asitaḥ aruṇiḥ aham bṛhaspatiḥ kaṇvaḥ maitreyaḥ cyavana ādayaḥ
tatra tatra tam āyāntam paurāḥ jānapadāḥ nṛpa upatasthuḥ sa arghya hastāḥ grahaiḥ sūryam iva uditam
ānarta dhanva kuru-jāṅgala kaṅka matsya pāñcāla kunti madhu kekaya kośala arṇāḥ anye ca tat mukha sarojam udāra hāsa snigdha īkṣaṇam nṛpa papuḥ dṛśibhiḥ nṛ-nāryaḥ
tebhyaḥ sva vīkṣaṇa vinaṣṭa tamisra dṛgbhyaḥ kṣemam tri loka guruḥ artha-dṛśam ca yacchan śṛṇvan dik anta dhavalam sva yaśaḥ aśubha ghnam gītam suraiḥ nṛbhiḥ agāt śanakaiḥ videhān
te acyutam prāptam ākarṇya paurāḥ jānapadāḥ nṛpa abhīyuḥ muditāḥ tasmai gṛhīta arhaṇa pāṇayaḥ
dṛṣṭvā te uttamaḥ-ślokam prīti utphulla ānana āśayāḥ kaiḥ dhṛta añjalibhiḥ nemuḥ śruta pūrvān tathā munīn
sta anugrahāya samprāptam manvānau tam jagat gurum maithilaḥ śrutadevaḥ ca pādayoḥ petatuḥ prabhoḥ
nyamantrayetām dāśārham ātithyena saha dvijaiḥ maithilaḥ śrutadevaḥ ca yugapat saṁhata añjalī
bhagavān tat abhipretya dvayoḥ priya cikīrṣayā ubhayoḥ āviśat geham ubhābhyām tat alakṣitaḥ
śrāntān api atha tān dūrāt janakaḥ sva gṛha āgatān ānīteṣu āsana agryeṣu sukha āsīnān mahā-manāḥ pravṛddha bhaktyā ut-dharṣa hṛdaya asra āvila īkṣaṇaḥ natvā tat aṅghrīn prakṣālya tat apaḥ loka pāvanīḥ sa kuṭumbaḥ vahan mūrdhnā pūjayām cakre īśvarān gandha mālya ambara ākalpa dhūpa dīpa arghya go vṛṣaiḥ
vācā madhurayā prīṇan idam āha anna tarpitān pādau aṅka gatau viṣṇoḥ saṁspṛśan śanakaiḥ mudā
śrī-bahulāśvaḥ uvāca bhavān hi sarva bhūtānām ātmā sākṣī sva-dṛk vibho atha naḥ tvat pada-ambhojam smaratām darśanam gataḥ
sva vacaḥ tat ṛtam kartum asmat dṛk gocaraḥ bhavān yat āttha eka-anta bhaktāt me na anantaḥ śrīḥ ajaḥ priyaḥ
kaḥ nu tvat caraṇa-ambhojam evam vit visṛjet pumān niṣkiñcanānām śāntānām munīnām yaḥ tvam ātma daḥ
yaḥ avatīrya yadoḥ vaṁśe nṛṇām saṁsaratām iha yaśaḥ vitene tat śāntyai trai-lokya vṛjina apaham
namaḥ tubhyam bhagavate kṛṣṇāya akuṇṭha medhase nārāyaṇāya ṛṣaye su-śāntam tapaḥ īyuṣe
dināni katicit bhūman gṛhān naḥ nivasa dvijaiḥ sametaḥ pāda rajasā punīhi idam nimeḥ kulam
iti upāmantritaḥ rajñā bhagavān loka bhāvanaḥ uvāsa kurvan kalyāṇam mithilā nara yoṣitām
śrutadevaḥ acyutam prāptam sva-gṛhān janakaḥ yathā natvā munīn su saṁhṛṣṭaḥ dhunvan vāsaḥ nanarta ha
tṛṇa pīṭha bṛṣīṣu etān ānīteṣu upaveśya saḥ sva-āgatena abhinandya aṅghrīn sa-bhāryaḥ avanije mudā
tat ambhasā mahā-bhāgaḥ ātmānam sa gṛha anvayam snāpayām cakre uddharṣaḥ labdha sarva manaḥ-rathaḥ
phala arhaṇa uśīra śiva amṛta ambubhiḥ mṛdā surabhyā tulasī kuśa ambujaiḥ ārādhayām āsa yathā upapannayā saparyayā sattva vivardhana andhasā
saḥ tarkayām āsa kutaḥ mama anu abhūt gṛha andha kūpe patitasya saṅgamaḥ yaḥ sarva tīrtha āspada pāda reṇubhiḥ kṛṣṇena ca asya ātma niketa bhū-suraiḥ
su-upaviṣṭān kṛta ātithyān śrutadevaḥ upasthitaḥ sa-bhārya sva-jana apatyaḥ uvāca aṅghri abhimarśanaḥ
śrutadevaḥ uvāca na adya naḥ darśanam prāptaḥ param parama pūruṣaḥ yarhi idam śaktibhiḥ sṛṣṭvā praviṣṭaḥ hi ātma sattayā
yathā śayānaḥ puruṣaḥ manasā eva ātma māyayā sṛṣṭvā lokam param svāpnam anuviśya avabhāsate
śṛṇvatām gadatām śaśvat arcatām tvā abhivandatām nṛṇām saṁvadatām antaḥ hṛdi bhāsi amala ātmanām
hṛdi sthaḥ api ati dūra-sthaḥ karma vikṣipta cetasām ātma śaktibhiḥ agrāhyaḥ api anti upeta guṇa ātmanām
namaḥ astu te adhyātma vidām para-ātmane anātmane sva-ātma vibhakta mṛtyave sa-kāraṇa akāraṇa liṅgam īyuṣe sva-māyayā asaṁvṛta ruddha dṛṣṭaye
saḥ tvam śādhi sva bhṛtyān naḥ kim deva karavāma he etat antaḥ nṛṇām kleśaḥ yat bhavān akṣi go-caraḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tat uktam iti upākarṇya bhagavān praṇata ārti hā gṛhītvā pāṇinā pāṇim prahasan tam uvāca ha
śrī-bhagavān uvāca brahman te anugraha arthāya samprāptān viddhi amūn munīn sañcaranti mayā lokān punantaḥ pāda reṇubhiḥ
devāḥ kṣetrāṇi tīrthāni darśana sparśana arcanaiḥ śanaiḥ punanti kālena tat api arhat-tama īkṣayā
brāhmaṇaḥ janmanā śreyān sarveṣām prāṇinām iha tapasā vidyayā tuṣṭyā kim u mat kalayā yutaḥ
na brāhmaṇāt me dayitam rūpam etat catuḥ-bhujam sarva veda mayaḥ vipraḥ sarva deva mayaḥ hi aham
duṣprajñāḥ aviditvā evam avajānanti asūyavaḥ gurum mām vipram ātmānam arcā-ādaū ijya dṛṣṭayaḥ
cara acaram idam viśvam bhāvāḥ ye ca asya hetavaḥ mat rūpāṇi iti cetasi ādhatte vipraḥ mat īkṣayā
tasmāt brahma-ṛṣīn etān brahman mat śraddhayā arcaya evam cet arcitaḥ asmi addhā na anyathā bhūri bhūtibhiḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca saḥ ittham prabhunā ādiṣṭaḥ saha kṛṣṇān dvija uttamān ārādhya eka-ātma bhavena maithilaḥ ca āpa sat gatim
evam sva bhaktayoḥ rājan bhagavān bhakta bhakti-man uṣitvā ādiśya sat mārgam punaḥ dvāravatīm agāt
śrī-parīkṣit uvāca brahman brahmaṇi anirdeśye nirguṇe guṇa vṛttayaḥ katham caranti śrutayaḥ sākṣāt sat asataḥ pare
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca buddhi indriya manaḥ prāṇān janāṇām asṛjat prabhuḥ mātra artham ca bhava artham ca ātmane akalpanāya ca
sā eṣā hi upaniṣat brāhmī pūrveṣām pūrva-jaiḥ dhṛta śraddhayā dhārayet yaḥ tām kṣemam gacchet akiñcanaḥ
atra te varṇayiṣyāmi gāthām nārāyaṇa-anvitām nāradasya ca saṁvādam ṛṣeḥ nārāyaṇasya ca
ekadā nāradaḥ lokān paryaṭan bhagavat priyaḥ sanātanam ṛṣim draṣṭum yayau nārāyaṇa-āśramam
yaḥ vai bhārata-varṣe asmin kṣemāya svastaye nṛṇām dharma jñāna śama upetam ā-kalpāt āsthitaḥ tapaḥ
tatra upaviṣṭam ṛṣibhiḥ kalāpa-grāma vāsibhiḥ parītam praṇataḥ apṛcchat idam eva kuru-udvaha
tasmai hi avocat bhagavān ṛṣīṇām śṛṇvatām idam yaḥ brahma vādaḥ pūrveṣām jana-loka-nivāsinām
śrī-bhagavān uvāca svāyambhuva brahma satram jana-loke abhavat purā tatra sthānām mānasānām munīnām ūrdhva retasām
śvetadvīpam gatavati tvayi draṣṭum tat īśvaram brahma vādaḥ su saṁvṛttaḥ śrutayaḥ yatra śerate tatra ha ayam abhūt praśnaḥ tvam mām yam anupṛcchasi
tulya śruta tapaḥ śīlāḥ tulya svīya ari madhyamāḥ api cakruḥ pravacanam ekam śuśrūṣavaḥ apare
śrī-sanandanaḥ uvāca sva sṛṣṭam idam āpīya śayānam saha śaktibhiḥ tat ante bodhayām cakruḥ tat liṅgaiḥ śrutayaḥ param yathā śayānam saṁrājam vandinaḥ tat parākramaiḥ pratyūṣe abhetya suślokaiḥ bodhayanti anujīvinaḥ
śrī-śrutayaḥ ūcuḥ jayajaya jahi ajām ajita doṣa gṛbhīta guṇām tvam asi yat ātmanā samavaruddha samasta bhagaḥ aga jagat okasām akhila śakti avabodhaka te kvacit ajayā ātmanā ca carataḥ anucaret nigamaḥ
bṛhat upalabdham etat avayanti avaśeṣatayā yataḥ udaya astam-ayau vikṛteḥ mṛdi vā avikṛtāt ataḥ ṛṣayaḥ dadhuḥ tvayi manaḥ vacana ācaritam katham ayathā bhavanti bhuvi datta padāni nṛṇām
iti tava sūrayaḥ tri adhipate akhila loka mala kṣapaṇa kathā amṛta abdhim avagāhya tapāṁsi jahuḥ kim uta punaḥ sva dhāma vidhuta āśaya kāla guṇāḥ parama bhajanti ye padam ajasra sukha anubhavam
dṛtayaḥ iva śvasanti asu-bhṛtaḥ yadi te anuvidhāḥ mahat aham ādayaḥ aṇḍam asṛjan yat anugrahataḥ puruṣa vidhaḥ anvayaḥ atra caramaḥ anna-maya-ādiṣu yaḥ sat-asataḥ param tvam atha yat eṣu avaśeṣam ṛtam
udaram upāsate ye ṛṣi vartmasu kūrpa dṛśaḥ parisara paddhatim hṛdayam āruṇayaḥ daharam tataḥ udagāt ananta tava dhāma śiraḥ paramam punaḥ iha yat sametya na patanti kṛta-anta mukhe
sva kṛta vicitra yoniṣu viśan iva hetutayā taratamataḥ cakāssi anala-vat sva kṛta anukṛtiḥ atha vitathāsu amūṣu avitatham tava dhāma samam viraja dhiyaḥ anuyanti abhivipaṇyavaḥ eka-rasam
sva kṛta pureṣu amīṣu abahiḥ antara saṁvaraṇam tava puruṣam vadanti akhila śakti dhṛtaḥ aṁśa kṛtam iti nṛ gatim vivicya kavayaḥ nigama āvapanam bhavataḥ upāsate aṅghrim abhavam bhuvi viśvasitāḥ
duravagama ātma tattva nigamāya tava ātta tanoḥ carita mahā amṛta abdhi parivarta pariśramaṇāḥ na parilaṣanti kecit apavargam api īśvara te caraṇa saroja haṁsa kula saṅga visṛṣṭa gṛhāḥ
tvat anupatham kulāyam idam ātma suhṛt priya vat carati tathā unmukhe tvayi hite priye ātmani ca na bata ramanti aho asat upāsanayā ātma hanaḥ yat anuśayāḥ bhramanti uru bhaye ku śarīra bhṛtaḥ
nibhṛta marut manaḥ akṣa dṛḍha-yoga yujaḥ hṛdi yat munayaḥ upāsate tat arayaḥ api yayuḥ smaraṇāt striyaḥ uraga-indra bhoga bhuja daṇḍa viṣakta dhiyaḥ vayam api te samāḥ sama dṛśaḥ aṅghri saroja sudhāḥ
kaḥ iha nu veda bata avara janma layaḥ agra-saram yataḥ udagāt ṛṣiḥ yam anu deva-gaṇāḥ ubhaye tarhi na sat na ca asat ubhayam na ca kāla javaḥ kim api na tatra śāstram avakṛṣya śayīta yadā
janim asataḥ sataḥ mṛtim uta ātmani ye ca bhidām vipaṇam ṛtam smaranti upadiśanti te ārupitaiḥ tri guṇa mayaḥ pumān iti bhidā yat abodha kṛtā tvayi na tataḥ paratra saḥ bhavet avabodha rase
sat iva manaḥ tri-vṛt tvayi vibhāti asat ā-manujāt sat abhimṛśanti aśeṣam idam ātmatayā ātma-vidaḥ na hi vikṛtim tyajanti kanakasya tat-ātmatayā sva kṛtam anupraviṣṭam idam ātmatayā avasitam
tava pari ye caranti akhila sattva niketatayā te uta padā ākramanti avigaṇayya śiraḥ nirṛteḥ parivayase paśūn iva girā vibudhān api tān tvayi kṛta sauhṛdāḥ khalu punanti na ye vimukhāḥ
tvam akaraṇaḥ sva-rāṭ akhila kāraka śakti dharaḥ tava balim udvahanti samadanti ajayā animiṣāḥ varṣa bhujaḥ akhila kṣiti pateḥ iva viśva sṛjaḥ vidadhati yatra ye tu adhikṛtā bhavataḥ cakitāḥ
sthira cara jātayaḥ syuḥ ajayā uttha nimitta yujaḥ viharaḥ udīkṣayā yadi parasya vimukta tataḥ na hi paramasya kaścit aparaḥ na paraḥ ca bhavet viyataḥ iva apadasya tava śūnya tulām dadhataḥ
aparimitāḥ dhruvāḥ tanu-bhṛtaḥ yadi sarva-gatāḥ tarhi na śāsyatā iti niyamaḥ dhruva na itarathā ajani ca yat-mayam tat avimucya niyantṛ bhavet samam anujānatām yat amatam mata duṣṭatayā
na ghaṭate udbhavaḥ prakṛti pūruṣayoḥ ajayoḥ ubhaya yujā bhavanti asu-bhṛtaḥ jala budbuda vat tvayi te ime tataḥ vividha nāma guṇaiḥ parame saritaḥ iva arṇave madhuni lilyuḥ aśeṣa rasāḥ
nṛṣu tava māyayā bhramam amīṣu avagatya bhṛśam tvayi su-dhiyaḥ abhave dadhati bhāvam anuprabhavam katham anuvartatām bhava bhayam tava yat bhru kuṭiḥ sṛjati muhuḥ tri-nemiḥ a bhavat śaraṇeṣu bhayam
vijita hṛṣīka vāyubhiḥ adānta manaḥ tura-gam ye iha yatanti yantum ati lolam upāya khidaḥ vyasana śata anvitāḥ samavahāya guroḥ caraṇam vaṇijaḥ iva aja santi akṛta karṇa-dharāḥ jala-dhau
svajana suta ātma dāra dhana dhāma dharā asu rathaiḥ tvayi sati kim nṛṇām śrayataḥ ātmani sarva-rase iti sat ajānatām mithunataḥ rataye caratām sukhayati kaḥ nu iha sva vihate sva nirasta bhage
