anye ca ye vai niśaṭha-ulmaka-ādayaḥ sahasrajit-śatajit-bhānu-mukhyaḥ anyonyam āsādya mada andha-kāritāḥ jaghnuḥ mukundena vimohitāḥ bhṛśam
dāśārha-vṛṣṇi-andhaka-bhoja-sātvatāḥ madhu-arbudāḥ māthura-śūrasenāḥ visarjanāḥ kukurāḥ kuntayaḥ ca mithaḥ tu jaghnuḥ su-visṛjya sauhṛdam
putrāḥ ayudhyan pitṛbhiḥ bhrātṛbhiḥ ca svasrīya dauhitra pitṛvya mātulaiḥ mitrāṇi mitraiḥ suhṛdaḥ suhṛdbhiḥ jñātīn tu ahan jñātayaḥ eva mūḍhāḥ
śareṣu hīyamāneṣu bhajyamāneṣu dhanvasu śastreṣu kṣīyamāneṣu muṣṭibhiḥ jahruḥ erakāḥ
tāḥ vajra-kalpāḥ hi abhavan parighāḥ muṣṭinā bhṛtāḥ jaghnuḥ dviṣaḥ taiḥ kṛṣṇena vāryamāṇāḥ tu tam ca te
pratyanīkam manyamānāḥ balabhadram ca mohitāḥ hantum kṛta-dhiyaḥ rājan āpannāḥ ātatāyinaḥ
atha tau api saṅkruddhau udyamya kuru-nandana erakā-muṣṭi parighau carantau jaghnatuḥ yudhi
brahma-śāpa upasṛṣṭānām kṛṣṇa-māyā āvṛta ātmanām spardhā krodhaḥ kṣayam ninye vaiṇavaḥ agniḥ yathā vanam
evam naṣṭeṣu sarveṣu kuleṣu sveṣu keśavaḥ avatāritaḥ bhuvaḥ bhāraḥ iti mene avaśeṣitaḥ
rāmaḥ samudra velāyām yogam āsthāya pauruṣam tatyāja lokam mānuṣyam saṁyojya ātmānam ātmani
rāma-niryāṇam ālokya bhagavān devakī-sutaḥ niṣasāda dharā-upasthe tuṣṇīm āsādya pippalam
bibhrat catuḥ-bhujam rūpam bhrājiṣṇu prabhayā svayā diśaḥ vitimirāḥ kurvan vidhūmaḥ iva pāvakaḥ śrīvatsa-aṅkam ghana-śyāmam tapta hāṭaka varcasam kauśeya ambara yugmena parivītam su-maṅgalam sundara smita vaktra abjam nīla kuntala maṇḍitam puṇḍarīka abhirāma akṣam sphurat makara kuṇḍalam kaṭi-sūtra brahma-sūtra kirīṭa kaṭaka aṅgadaiḥ hāra nūpura mudrābhiḥ kaustubhena virājitam vana-mālā parīta aṅgam mūrti-madbhiḥ nija āyudhaiḥ kṛtvā urau dakṣiṇe pādam āsīnam paṅkaja aruṇam
muṣala avaśeṣa ayaḥ khaṇḍa kṛta iṣuḥ lubdhakaḥ jarā mṛga āsya ākāram tat caraṇam vivyādha mṛga-śaṅkayā
catuḥ-bhujam tam puruṣam dṛṣṭvā saḥ kṛta-kilbiṣaḥ bhītaḥ papāta śirasā pādayoḥ asura-dviṣaḥ
ajānatā kṛtam idam pāpena madhusūdana kṣantum arhasi pāpasya uttamaḥ-śloka me anagha
yasya anusmaraṇam nṛṇām ajñāna dhvānta nāśanam vadanti tasya te viṣṇo mayā asādhu kṛtam prabho
tat mā āśu jahi vaikuṇṭha pāpmānam mṛga-lubdhakam yathā punaḥ aham tu evam na kuryām sat atikramam
yasya ātma-yoga racitam na viduḥ viriñcaḥ rudra-ādayaḥ asya tanayāḥ patayaḥ girām ye tvat-māyayā pihita dṛṣṭayaḥ etat añjaḥ kim tasya te vayam asat gatayaḥ gṛṇīmaḥ
śrī-bhagavān uvāca mā bhaiḥ jare tvam uttiṣṭha kāmaḥ eṣaḥ kṛtaḥ hi me yāhi tvam mat-anujñātaḥ svargam su-kṛtinām padam
iti ādiṣṭaḥ bhagavatā kṛṣṇena icchā-śarīriṇā triḥ parikramya tam natvā vimānena divam yayau
dārukaḥ kṛṣṇa padavīm anvicchan adhigamya tām vāyum tulasikā-āmodam āghrāya abhimukham yayau
tam tatra tigma dyubhiḥ āyudhaiḥ vṛtam hi aśvattha mūle kṛta-ketanam patim sneha pluta ātmā nipapāta pādayoḥ rathāt avaplutya sa-bāṣpa locanaḥ
apaśyataḥ tvat caraṇa-ambujam prabho dṛṣṭiḥ praṇaṣṭā tamasi praviṣṭā diśaḥ na jāne na labhe ca śāntim yathā niśāyām uḍupe praṇaṣṭe
iti bruvati sūte vai rathaḥ garuḍa-lāñchanaḥ kham utpapāta rāja-indra sa-aśva dhvajaḥ udīkṣataḥ
tam anvagacchan divyāni viṣṇu praharaṇāni ca tena ati-vismita ātmānam sūtam āha janārdanaḥ
gaccha dvāravatīm sūta jñātīnām nidhanam mithaḥ saṅkarṣaṇasya niryāṇam bandhubhyaḥ brūhi mat-daśām
dvārakāyām ca na stheyam bhavadbhiḥ ca sva-bandhubhiḥ mayā tyaktām yadu-purīm samudraḥ plāvayiṣyati
svam svam parigraham sarve ādāya pitarau ca naḥ arjunena avitāḥ sarve indraprastham gamiṣyatha
tvam tu mat-dharmam āsthāya jñāna-niṣṭhaḥ upekṣakaḥ mat-māyā racitām etām vijñāya upaśamam vraja
iti uktaḥ tam parikramya namaḥ-kṛtya punaḥ punaḥ tat-pādau śīrṣṇi upādhāya durmanāḥ prayayau purīm
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca atha tatra āgamat brahmā bhavānyā ca samam bhavaḥ mahā-indra-pramukhāḥ devāḥ munayaḥ sa prajā-īśvarāḥ
pitaraḥ siddha-gandharvāḥ vidyādhara-mahā-uragāḥ cāraṇāḥ yakṣa-rakṣāṁsi kinnara-apsarasaḥ dvijāḥ draṣṭu-kāmāḥ bhagavataḥ niryāṇam parama-utsukāḥ gāyantaḥ ca gṛṇantaḥ ca śaureḥ karmāṇi janma ca
vavṛṣuḥ puṣpa-varṣāṇi vimāna āvalibhiḥ nabhaḥ kurvantaḥ saṅkulam rājan bhaktyā paramayā yutāḥ
bhagavān pitāmaham vīkṣya vibhūtīḥ ātmanaḥ vibhuḥ saṁyojya ātmani ca ātmānam padma-netre nyamīlyat
loka abhirāmām sva-tanum dhāraṇā dhyāna maṅgalam yoga-dhāraṇayā āgneyyā adagdhvā dhāma āviśat svakam
divi dundubhayaḥ neduḥ petuḥ sumanasaḥ ca khāt satyam dharmaḥ dhṛtiḥ bhūmeḥ kīrtiḥ śrīḥ ca anu tam yayuḥ
deva-ādayaḥ brahma-mukhyāḥ na viśantam sva-dhāmani avijñāta gatim kṛṣṇam dadṛśuḥ ca ati-vismitāḥ
saudāmanyāḥ yathā ākāśe yāntyāḥ hitvā abhra-maṇḍalam gatiḥ na lakṣyate martyaiḥ tathā kṛṣṇasya daivataiḥ
brahma-rudra-ādayaḥ te tu dṛṣṭvā yoga-gatim hareḥ vismitāḥ tām praśaṁsantaḥ svam svam lokam yayuḥ tadā
rājan parasya tanu-bhṛt janana apyaya īhāḥ māyā viḍambanam avehi yathā naṭasya sṛṣṭvā ātmanā idam anuviśya vihṛtya ca ante saṁhṛtya ca ātma-mahinā uparataḥ saḥ āste
martyena yaḥ guru-sutam yama-loka nītam tvām ca ānayat śaraṇa-daḥ parama-astra dagdham jigye antaka antakam api īśam asau anīśaḥ kim sva avane svaḥ anayat mṛgayum sa-deham
tathā api aśeṣa sthiti sambhava apyayeṣu ananya-hetuḥ yat aśeṣa śakti dhṛk na aicchat praṇetum vapuḥ atra śeṣitam martyena kim sva-stha gatim pradarśayan
yaḥ etām prātaḥ utthāya kṛṣṇasya padavīm parām prayataḥ kīrtayet bhaktyā tām eva āpnoti anuttamam
dārukaḥ dvārakām etya vasudeva-ugrasenayoḥ patitvā caraṇau asraiḥ nyaṣiñcat kṛṣṇa-vicyutaḥ
kathayām āsa nidhanam vṛṣṇīnām kṛtsnaśaḥ nṛpa tat śrutvā udvigna hṛdayāḥ janāḥ śoka virmūrcchitāḥ tatra sma tvaritāḥ jagmuḥ kṛṣṇa-viśleṣa vihvalāḥ vyasavaḥ śerate yatra jñātayaḥ ghnantaḥ ānanam
devakī rohiṇī ca eva vasudevaḥ tathā sutau kṛṣṇa-rāmau apaśyantaḥ śoka-ārtāḥ vijahuḥ smṛtim
prāṇān ca vijahuḥ tatra bhagavat viraha āturāḥ upagahya patīn tāta citām āruruhuḥ striyaḥ
rāma-patnyaḥ ca tat-deham upaguhya agnim āviśan vasudeva-patnyaḥ tat-gātram pradyumna-ādīn hareḥ snuṣāḥ kṛṣṇa-patnyaḥ aviśan agnim rukmiṇī-ādyāḥ tat-ātmikāḥ
arjunaḥ preyasaḥ sakhyuḥ kṛṣṇasya viraha āturaḥ ātmānam sāntvayām āsa kṛṣṇa-gītaiḥ sat-uktibhiḥ
bandhūnām naṣṭa-gotrāṇām arjunaḥ sāmparāyikam hatānām kārayām āsa yathā-vat anupūrvaśaḥ
dvārakām hariṇā tyaktām samudraḥ aplāvayat kṣaṇāt varjayitvā mahā-rāja śrīmat-bhagavat ālayam
nityam sannihitaḥ tatra bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ smṛtyā aśeṣa-aśubha haram sarva-maṅgala maṅgalam
strī bāla vṛddhān ādāya hata śeṣān dhanañjayaḥ indraprastham samāveśya vajram tatra abhyaṣecayat
śrutvā suhṛt vadham rājan arjunāt te pitāmahāḥ tvām tu vaṁśa-dharam kṛtvā jagmuḥ sarve mahā-patham
yaḥ etat deva-devasya viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi janma ca kīrtayet śraddhayā martyaḥ sarva-pāpaiḥ pramucyate
ittham hareḥ bhagavataḥ rucira avatāra vīryāṇi bāla caritāni ca śam-tamāni anyatra ca iha ca śrutāni gṛṇan manuṣyaḥ bhaktim parām paramahaṁsa gatau labheta
śrī śukaḥ uvāca yaḥ antyaḥ purañjayaḥ nāma bhaviṣyaḥ bārahadrathaḥ tasya amātyaḥ tu śunakaḥ hatvā svāminam ātma-jam pradyota-saṁjñam rājānam kartā yat pālakaḥ sutaḥ viśākhayūpaḥ tat-putraḥ bhavitā rājakaḥ tataḥ
nandivardhanaḥ tat-putraḥ pañca pradyotanāḥ ime aṣṭa-triṁśa uttara śatam bhokṣyanti pṛthivīm nṛpāḥ
śiśunāgaḥ tataḥ bhāvyaḥ kākavarṇaḥ tu tat-sutaḥ kṣemadharmā tasya sutaḥ kṣetrajñaḥ kṣemadharma-jaḥ
vidhisāraḥ sutaḥ tasya ajātaśatruḥ bhaviṣyati darbhakaḥ tat-sutaḥ bhāvī darbhakasya ajayaḥ smṛtaḥ
nandivardhanaḥ ājeyaḥ mahā-nandiḥ sutaḥ tataḥ śiśunāgāḥ daśa eva ete saṣṭi uttara śata-trayam samāḥ bhokṣyanti pṛthivīm kuruśreṣṭha kalau nṛpāḥ mahānandi-sutaḥ rājan śūdrā-garbha udbhavaḥ balī mahā-padma patiḥ kaścit nandaḥ kṣatra vināśa-kṛt tataḥ nṛpāḥ bhaviṣyanti śūdra-prāyāḥ tu adhārmikāḥ
saḥ eka-chatrām pṛthivīm anullaṅghita śāsanaḥ śāsiṣyati mahāpadmaḥ dvitīyaḥ iva bhārgavaḥ
tasya ca aṣṭau bhaviṣyanti sumālya-pramukhāḥ sutāḥ ye imām bhokṣyanti mahīm rājānaḥ ca śatam samāḥ
nava nandān dvijaḥ kaścit prapannān uddhariṣyati teṣām abhāve jagatīm mauryāḥ bhokṣyanti vai kalau
saḥ eva candraguptam vai dvijaḥ rājye abhiṣekṣyati tat sutaḥ vārisāraḥ tu tataḥ ca aśokavardhanaḥ
suyaśāḥ bhavitā tasya saṅgataḥ suyaśaḥ-sutaḥ śāliśūkaḥ tataḥ tasya somaśarmā bhaviṣyati śatadhanvā tataḥ tasya bhavitā tat bṛhadrathaḥ
mauryāḥ hi ete daśa nṛpāḥ sapta-triṁśat śata uttaram samāḥ bhokṣyanti pṛthivīm kalau kuru-kula udvaha
agnimitraḥ tataḥ tasmāt sujyeṣṭhaḥ bhavitā tataḥ vasumitraḥ bhadrakaḥ ca pulindaḥ bhavitā sutaḥ tataḥ ghoṣaḥ sutaḥ tasmāt vajramitraḥ bhaviṣyati tataḥ bhāgavataḥ tasmāt devabhūtiḥ kuru-udvaha śuṅgāḥ daśa ete bhokṣyanti bhūmim varṣa śata adhikam tataḥ kāṇvān iyam bhūmiḥ yāsyati alpa-guṇān nṛpa
śuṅgam hatvā devabhūtim kāṇvaḥ amātyaḥ tu kāminam svayam kariṣyate rājyam vasudevaḥ mahā-matiḥ
tasya putraḥ tu bhūmitraḥ tasya nārāyaṇaḥ sutaḥ kāṇva-ayanāḥ ime bhūmim catvāriṁśat ca pañca ca śatāni trīṇi bhokṣyanti varṣāṇām ca kalau yuge
hatvā kāṇvam suśarmāṇam tat-bhṛtyaḥ vṛṣalaḥ balī gām bhokṣyati andhra-jātīyaḥ kañcit kālam asattamaḥ
kṛṣṇa-nāma atha tat bhrātā bhavitā pṛthivī-patiḥ śrī-śāntakarṇaḥ tat putraḥ paurṇamāsaḥ tu tat-sutaḥ lambodaraḥ tu tat-putraḥ tasmāt cibilakaḥ nṛpaḥ meghasvātiḥ cibilakāt aṭamānaḥ tu tasya ca aniṣṭakarmā hāleyaḥ talakaḥ tasya ca ātma-jaḥ purīṣabhīruḥ tat putraḥ tataḥ rājā sunandanaḥ cakoraḥ bahavaḥ yatra śivasvātiḥ arimdamaḥ tasya api gomatī putraḥ purīmān bhavitā tataḥ medaśirāḥ śivaskandaḥ yajñaśrīḥ tat sutaḥ tataḥ vijayaḥ tat-sutaḥ bhāvyaḥ candravijñaḥ sa-lomadhiḥ ete triṁśat nṛ-patayaḥ catvāri abda-śatāni ca ṣaṭ-pañcāsat ca pṛthivīm bhokṣyanti kuru-nandana
sapta ābhīrāḥ āvabhṛtyāḥ daśa gardabhinaḥ nṛpāḥ kaṅkāḥ ṣoḍaśa bhū-pālāḥ bhaviṣyanti ati-lolupāḥ
tataḥ aṣṭau yavanāḥ bhāvyāḥ catuḥ-daśa turuṣkakāḥ bhūyaḥ daśa guruṇḍāḥ ca maulāḥ ekādaśa eva tu
ete bhokṣyanti pṛthivīm daśa varṣa-śatāni ca nava-adhikām ca navatim maulāḥ ekādaśa kṣitim bhokṣyanti abda-śatāni aṅga trīṇi taiḥ saṁsthite tataḥ kilakilāyām nṛ-patayaḥ bhūtanandaḥ atha vaṅgiriḥ śiśunandiḥ ca tat bhrātā yaśonandiḥ pravīrakaḥ iti ete vai varṣa-śatam bhaviṣyanti adhikāni ṣaṭ
teṣām trayodaśa sutāḥ bhavitāraḥ ca bāhlikāḥ puṣpamitraḥ atha rājanyaḥ durmitraḥ asya tathā eva ca eka-kālāḥ ime bhū-pāḥ sapta andhrāḥ sapta kauśalāḥ vidūra-patayaḥ bhāvyāḥ niṣadhāḥ tataḥ eva hi
māgadhānām tu bhavitā viśvasphūrjiḥ purañjayaḥ kariṣyati aparaḥ varṇān pulinda-yadu-madrakān
prajāḥ ca abrahma bhūyiṣṭhāḥ sthāpayiṣyati durmatiḥ vīrya-vān kṣatram utsādya padmavatyām saḥ vai puri anu-gaṅgam ā-prayāgam guptām bhokṣyati medinīm
śaurāṣṭra avantī ābhīrāḥ ca śūrāḥ arbuda-mālavāḥ vrātyāḥ dvijāḥ bhaviṣyanti śūdra-prāyāḥ jana-adhipāḥ
sindhoḥ taṭam candrabhāgām kauntīm kāśmīra-maṇḍalam bhokṣyanti śūdrāḥ vrātya-ādyāḥ mlecchāḥ ca abrahma-varcasaḥ
tulya-kālāḥ ime rājan mleccha-prāyāḥ ca bhū-bhṛtaḥ ete adharma anṛta parāḥ phalgu-dāḥ tīvra manyavaḥ
strī bāla go dvija ghnāḥ ca para dāra dhana ādṛtāḥ udita-asta-mita prāyāḥ alpa-sattva alpaka-āyuṣaḥ asaṁskṛtāḥ kriyā-hīnāḥ rajasā tamasā āvṛtāḥ prajāḥ te bhakṣayiṣyanti mlecchāḥ rājanya-rūpiṇaḥ
tat-nāthāḥ te jana-padāḥ tat śīla ācāra vādinaḥ anyonyataḥ rājabhiḥ ca kṣayam yāsyanti pīḍitāḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca tataḥ ca anudinam dharmaḥ satyam śaucam kṣamā dayā kālena balinā rājan naṅkṣyati āyuḥ balam smṛtiḥ
vittam eva kalau nṝṇām janma ācāra guṇa udayaḥ dharma nyāya vyavasthāyām kāraṇam balam eva hi
dām-patye abhiruciḥ hetuḥ māyā eva vyāvahārike strītve puṁstve ca hi ratiḥ vipratve sūtram eva hi
liṅgam eva āśrama-khyātau anyonya āpatti kāraṇam avṛttyā nyāya daurbalyam pāṇḍitye cāpalam vacaḥ
anāḍhyatā eva asādhutve sādhutve dambhaḥ eva tu svī-kāraḥ eva ca udvāhe snānam eva prasādhanam
dūre vāri ayanam tīrtham lāvaṇyam keśa dhāraṇam udaram-bharatā sva-arthaḥ satyatve dhārṣṭyam eva hi dākṣyam kuṭumba-bharaṇam yaśaḥ arthe dharma-sevanam
evam prajābhiḥ duṣṭābhiḥ ākīrṇe kṣiti-maṇḍale brahma viṭ kṣatra śūdrāṇām yaḥ balī bhavitā nṛpaḥ
prajāḥ hi lubdhaiḥ rājanyaiḥ nirghṛṇaiḥ dasyu dharmabhiḥ ācchinna dāra draviṇāḥ yāsyanti giri kānanam
śāka mūla āmiṣa kṣaudra phala puṣpa aṣṭi bhojanāḥ anāvṛṣṭyā vinaṅkṣyanti durbhikṣa kara pīḍitāḥ
śīta vāta ātapa prāvṛt himaiḥ anyonyataḥ prajāḥ kṣut tṛḍbhyām vyādhibhiḥ ca eva santapsyante ca cintayā
triṁśat viṁśati varṣāṇi parama-āyuḥ kalau nṛṇām
kṣīyamāṇeṣu deheṣu dehinām kali-doṣataḥ varṇa-āśrama-vatām dharme naṣṭe veda-pathe nṛṇām pāṣaṇḍa-pracure dharme dasyu-prāyeṣu rājasu caurya anṛta vṛthā-hiṁsā nānā vṛttiṣu vai nṛṣu śūdra-prāyeṣu varṇeṣu chāga-prāyāsu dhenuṣu gṛha-prāyeṣu āśrameṣu yauna-prāyeṣu bandhuṣu aṇu-prāyāsu oṣadhīṣu śamī-prāyeṣu sthāsnuṣu vidyut-prāyeṣu megheṣu śūnya-prāyeṣu sadmasu ittham kalau gata-prāye janeṣu khara-dharmiṣu dharma-trāṇāya sattvena bhagavān avatariṣyati
cara-acara guroḥ viṣṇoḥ īśvarasya akhila ātmanaḥ dharma-trāṇāya sādhūnām janma karma apanuttaye
śambhala-grāma mukhyasya brāhmaṇasya mahā-ātmanaḥ bhavane viṣṇuyaśasaḥ kalkiḥ prādurbhaviṣyati
aśvam āśu-gam āruhya devadattam jagat-patiḥ asinā asādhu-damanam aṣṭa aiśvarya guṇa anvitaḥ vicaran āśunā kṣauṇyām hayena apratima dyutiḥ nṛpa-liṅga chadaḥ dasyūn koṭiśaḥ nihaniṣyati
atha teṣām bhaviṣyanti manāṁsi viśadāni vai vāsudeva aṅga rāga ati-puṇya gandha anila spṛśām paura jāna-padānām vai hateṣu akhila dasyuṣu
teṣām prajā visargaḥ ca sthaviṣṭhaḥ sambhaviṣyati vāsudeve bhagavati sattva-mūrtau hṛdi sthite
yadā avatīrṇaḥ bhagavān kalkiḥ dharma-patiḥ hariḥ kṛtam bhaviṣyati tadā prajā-sūtiḥ ca sāttvikī
yadā candraḥ ca sūryaḥ ca tathā tiṣya bṛhaspatī eka-rāśau sameṣyanti bhaviṣyati tadā kṛtam
ye atītāḥ vartamānāḥ ye bhaviṣyanti ca pārthivāḥ te te uddeśataḥ proktāḥ vaṁśīyāḥ soma-sūryayoḥ
ārabhya bhavataḥ janma yāvat nanda abhiṣecanam etat varṣa sahasram tu śatam pañca-daśa-uttaram
sapta-ṛṣīṇām tu yau pūrvau dṛśyete uditau divi tayoḥ tu madhye nakṣatram dṛśyate yat samam niśi tena eva ṛṣayaḥ yuktāḥ tiṣṭhanti abda-śatam nṛṇām te tvadīye dvijāḥ kāle adhunā ca āśritāḥ maghāḥ
viṣṇoḥ bhagavataḥ bhānuḥ kṛṣṇa-ākhyaḥ asau divam gataḥ tadā aviśat kaliḥ lokam pāpe yat ramate janaḥ
yāvat saḥ pāda-padmābhyām spṛśan āste ramā-patiḥ tāvat kaliḥ vai pṛthivīm parākrantum na ca aśakat
yadā deva-ṛṣayaḥ sapta maghāsu vicaranti hi tadā pravṛttaḥ tu kaliḥ dvādaśa abda-śata ātmakaḥ
yadā maghābhyaḥ yāsyanti pūrva-āṣāḍhām mahā-ṛṣayaḥ tadā nandāt prabhṛti eṣaḥ kaliḥ vṛddhim gamiṣyati
yasmin kṛṣṇaḥ divam yātaḥ tasmin eva tadā ahani pratipannam kali-yugam iti prāhuḥ purā vidaḥ
divya abdānām sahasra ante caturthe tu punaḥ kṛtam bhaviṣyati tadā nṝṇām manaḥ ātma-prakāśakam
iti eṣaḥ mānavaḥ vaṁśaḥ yathā saṅkhyāyate bhuvi tathā viṭ śūdra viprāṇām tāḥ tāḥ jñeyāḥ yuge yuge
eteṣām nāma liṅgānām puruṣāṇām mahā-ātmanām kathā mātra avaśiṣṭānām kīrtiḥ eva sthitā bhuvi
devāpiḥ śāntanoḥ bhrātā maruḥ ca ikṣvāku-vaṁśa-jaḥ kalāpa-grāme āsāte mahā yoga-bala anvitau
tau iha etya kaleḥ ante vāsudeva anuśikṣitau varṇa-āśrama yutam dharmam pūrva-vat prathayiṣyataḥ
kṛtam tretā dvāparam ca kaliḥ ca iti catuḥ-yugam anena krama yogena bhuvi prāṇiṣu vartate
rājan ete mayā proktāḥ nara-devāḥ tathā apare bhūmau mamatvam kṛtvā ante hitvā imām nidhanam gatāḥ
kṛmi viṭ bhasma saṁjñā ante rāja-nāmnaḥ api yasya ca bhūta dhruk tat-kṛte sva-artham kim veda nirayaḥ yataḥ
katham sā iyam akhaṇḍā bhūḥ pūrvaiḥ me puruṣaiḥ dhṛtā mat-putrasya ca pautrasya mat-pūrvā vaṁśa-jasya vā
tejaḥ ap anna mayam kāyam gṛhītvā ātmatayā abudhāḥ mahīm mamatayā ca ubhau hitvā ante adarśanam gatāḥ
ye ye bhū-patayaḥ rājan bhuñjate bhuvam ojasā kālena te kṛtāḥ sarve kathā-mātrāḥ kathāsu ca
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca dṛṣṭvā ātmani jaye vyagrān nṛpān hasati bhūḥ iyam aho mā vijigīṣanti mṛtyoḥ krīḍanakāḥ nṛpāḥ
kāmaḥ eṣaḥ nara-indrāṇām moghaḥ syāt viduṣām api yena phena-upame piṇḍe ye ati-viśrambhitāḥ nṛpāḥ
pūrvam nirjitya ṣaṭ-vargam jeṣyāmaḥ rāja-mantriṇaḥ tataḥ saciva paura āpta kari-indrān asya kaṇṭakān evam krameṇa jeṣyāmaḥ pṛthvīm sāgara mekhalām iti āśā baddha hṛdayāḥ na paśyanti antike antakam
samudra-āvaraṇām jitvā mām viśanti abdhim ojasā kiyat ātma-jayasya etat muktiḥ ātma-jaye phalam
yām visṛjya eva manavaḥ tat-sutāḥ ca kuru-udvaha gatāḥ yathā-āgatam yuddhe tām mām jeṣyanti abuddhayaḥ
mat-kṛte pitṛ-putrāṇām bhrātṝṇām ca api vigrahaḥ jāyate hi asatām rājye mamatā baddha cetasām
mama eva iyam mahī kṛtsnā na te mūḍha iti vādinaḥ spardhamānāḥ mithaḥ ghnanti mriyante mat-kṛte nṛpāḥ
pṛthuḥ purūravāḥ gādhiḥ nahuṣaḥ bharataḥ arjunaḥ māndhātā sagaraḥ rāmaḥ khaṭvāṅgaḥ dhundhuhā raghuḥ tṛṇabinduḥ yayātiḥ ca śaryātiḥ śantanuḥ gayaḥ bhagīrathaḥ kuvalayāśvaḥ kakutsthaḥ naiṣadhaḥ nṛgaḥ hiraṇyakaśipuḥ vṛtraḥ rāvaṇaḥ loka-rāvaṇaḥ namuciḥ śambaraḥ bhaumaḥ hiraṇyākṣaḥ atha tārakaḥ anye ca bahavaḥ daityāḥ rājānaḥ ye mahā-īśvarāḥ sarve sarva-vidaḥ śūrāḥ sarve sarva-jitaḥ ajitāḥ mamatām mayi avartanta kṛtvā uccaiḥ martya-dharmiṇaḥ kathā-avaśeṣāḥ kālena hi akṛta-arthāḥ kṛtāḥ vibho
kathāḥ imāḥ te kathitāḥ mahīyasām vitāya lokeṣu yaśaḥ pareyuṣām vijñāna vairāgya vivakṣayā vibho vacaḥ vibhūtīḥ na tu pārama-arthyam
yaḥ tu uttamaḥ-śloka guṇa anuvādaḥ saṅgīyate abhīkṣṇam amaṅgala-ghnaḥ tam eva nityam śṛṇuyāt abhīkṣṇam kṛṣṇe amalām bhaktim abhīpsamānaḥ
śrī-rājā uvāca kena upāyena bhagavan kaleḥ doṣān kalau janāḥ vidhamiṣyanti upacitān tat me brūhi yathā mune
yugāni yuga-dharmān ca mānam pralaya kalpayoḥ kālasya īśvara-rūpasya gatim viṣṇoḥ mahā-ātmanaḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca kṛte pravartate dharmaḥ catuḥ-pāt tat janaiḥ dhṛtaḥ satyam dayā tapaḥ dānam iti pādāḥ vibhoḥ nṛpa
santuṣṭāḥ karuṇāḥ maitrāḥ śāntāḥ dāntāḥ titikṣavaḥ ātma-ārāmāḥ sama-dṛśaḥ prāyaśaḥ śramaṇāḥ janāḥ
tretāyām dharma-pādānām turya aṁśaḥ hīyate śanaiḥ adharma-pādaiḥ anṛta hiṁsā asantoṣa vigrahaiḥ
tadā kriyā tapaḥ niṣṭhāḥ na ati-hiṁsrāḥ na lampaṭāḥ trai-vargikāḥ trayī vṛddhāḥ varṇāḥ brahma-uttarāḥ nṛpa
tapaḥ satya dayā dāneṣu ardham hrasvati dvāpare hiṁsā atuṣṭi anṛta dveṣaiḥ dharmasya adharma-lakṣaṇaiḥ
yaśasvinaḥ mahā-śīlāḥ svādhyāya-adhyayane ratāḥ āḍhyāḥ kuṭumbinaḥ hṛṣṭāḥ varṇāḥ kṣatra-dvija-uttarāḥ
kalau tu dharma-pādānām turya-aṁśaḥ adharma hetubhiḥ edhamānaiḥ kṣīyamāṇaḥ hi ante saḥ api vinaṅkṣyati
tasmin lubdhāḥ durācārāḥ nirdayāḥ śuṣka-vairiṇaḥ durbhagāḥ bhūri-tarṣāḥ ca śūdra-dāsa-uttarāḥ prajāḥ
sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti dṛśyante puruṣe guṇāḥ kāla-sañcoditāḥ te vai parivartante ātmani
prabhavanti yadā sattve manaḥ buddhi indriyāṇi ca tadā kṛta-yugam vidyāt jñāne tapasi yat ruciḥ
yadā karmasu kāmyeṣu bhaktiḥ yaśasi dehinām tadā tretā rajaḥ-vṛttiḥ iti jānīhi buddhi-man
yadā lobhaḥ tu asantoṣaḥ mānaḥ dambhaḥ atha matsaraḥ karmaṇām ca api kāmyānām dvāparam tat rajaḥ-tamaḥ
yadā māyā anṛtam tandrā nidrā hiṁsā viṣādanam śoka mohau bhayam dainyam saḥ kaliḥ tāmasaḥ smṛtaḥ
tasmāt kṣudra-dṛśaḥ martyāḥ kṣudra-bhāgyāḥ mahā-aśanāḥ kāminaḥ vitta-hīnāḥ ca svairiṇyaḥ ca striyaḥ asatīḥ
dasyu-utkṛṣṭāḥ jana-padāḥ vedāḥ pāṣaṇḍa dūṣitāḥ rājānaḥ ca prajā-bhakṣāḥ śiśna-udara parāḥ dvijāḥ
avratāḥ baṭavaḥ aśaucāḥ bhikṣavaḥ ca kuṭumbinaḥ tapasvinaḥ grāma-vāsāḥ nyāsinaḥ atyartha-lolupāḥ
hrasva-kāyāḥ mahā-āhārāḥ bhūri-apatyāḥ gata-hriyaḥ śaśvat kaṭuka bhāṣiṇyaḥ caurya māyā uru-sāhasāḥ
paṇayiṣyanti vai kṣudrāḥ kirāṭāḥ kūṭa-kāriṇaḥ anāpadi api maṁsyante vārtām sādhu jugupsitām
patim tyakṣyanti nirdravyam bhṛtyāḥ api akhila-uttamam bhṛtyam vipannam patayaḥ kaulam gāḥ ca apayasvinīḥ
pitṛ bhrātṛ suhṛt jñātīn hitvā saurata sauhṛdāḥ nanāndṛ śyāla saṁvādāḥ dīnāḥ straiṇāḥ kalau narāḥ
śūdrāḥ pratigrahīṣyanti tapaḥ veṣa upajīvinaḥ dharmam vakṣyanti adharma-jñāḥ adhiruhya uttama-āsanam
nityam udvigna manasaḥ durbhikṣa kara karśitāḥ niranne bhū-tale rājan anāvṛṣṭi bhaya āturāḥ vāsaḥ anna pāna śayana vyavāya snāna bhūṣaṇaiḥ hīnāḥ piśāca-sandarśāḥ bhaviṣyanti kalau prajāḥ
kalau kākiṇike api arthe vigṛhya tyakta sauhṛdāḥ tyakṣyanti ca priyān prāṇān haniṣyanti svakān api
na rakṣiṣyanti manujāḥ sthavirau pitarau api putrān bhāryām ca kula-jām kṣudrāḥ śiśna-udaram bharāḥ
kalau na rājan jagatām param gurum tri-loka nātha ānata pāda-paṅkajam prāyeṇa martyāḥ bhagavantam acyutam yakṣyanti pāṣaṇḍa vibhinna cetasaḥ
yat nāmadheyam mriyamāṇaḥ āturaḥ patan skhalan vā vivaśaḥ gṛṇan pumān vimukta karma argalaḥ uttamām gatim prāpnoti yakṣyanti na tam kalau janāḥ
puṁsām kali-kṛtān doṣān dravya deśa ātma sambhavān sarvān harati citta-sthaḥ bhagavān puruṣa-uttamaḥ
śrutaḥ saṅkīrtitaḥ dhyātaḥ pūjitaḥ ca ādṛtaḥ api vā nṛṇām dhunoti bhagavān hṛt-sthaḥ janma-ayuta aśubham
yathā hemni sthitaḥ vahniḥ durvarṇam hanti dhātu-jam evam ātma-gataḥ viṣṇuḥ yoginām aśubha-āśayam
vidyā tapaḥ prāṇa-nirodha maitrī tīrtha-abhiṣeka vrata dāna japyaiḥ na atyanta śuddhim labhate antaḥ-ātmā yathā hṛdi-sthe bhagavati anante
tasmāt sarva-ātmanā rājan hṛdi-stham kuru keśavam mriyamāṇaḥ hi avahitaḥ tataḥ yāsi parām gatim
mriyamāṇaiḥ abhidhyeyaḥ bhagavān parama-īśvaraḥ ātma-bhāvam nayati aṅga sarva-ātmā sarva-saṁśrayaḥ
kaleḥ doṣa-nidheḥ rājan asti hi ekaḥ mahān guṇaḥ kīrtanāt eva kṛṣṇasya mukta-saṅgaḥ param vrajet
kṛte yat dhyāyataḥ viṣṇum tretāyām yajataḥ makhaiḥ dvāpare paricaryāyām kalau tat hari-kīrtanāt
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca kālaḥ te parama-aṇu ādiḥ dvi-para-ardha avadhiḥ nṛpa kathitaḥ yuga-mānam ca śṛṇu kalpa layau api
catuḥ-yuga sahasram tu brahmaṇaḥ dinam ucyate saḥ kalpaḥ yatra manavaḥ caturdaśa viśām-pate
tat-ante pralayaḥ tāvān brāhmī rātriḥ udāhṛtā trayaḥ lokāḥ ime tatra kalpante pralayāya hi
eṣaḥ naimittikaḥ proktaḥ pralayaḥ yatra viśva-sṛk śete ananta-āsanaḥ viśvam ātma-sāt-kṛtya ca ātma-bhūḥ
dvi-parārdhe tu atikrānte brahmaṇaḥ parame-sthinaḥ tadā prakṛtayaḥ sapta kalpante pralayāya vai
eṣaḥ prākṛtikaḥ rājan pralayaḥ yatra līyate aṇḍa-koṣaḥ tu saṅghātaḥ vighāte upasādite
parjanyaḥ śata-varṣāṇi bhūmau rājan na varṣati tadā niranne hi anyonyam bhakṣyamāṇāḥ kṣudhā arditāḥ kṣayam yāsyanti śanakaiḥ kālena upadrutāḥ prajāḥ
sāmudram daihikam bhaumam rasam sāṁvartakaḥ raviḥ raśmibhiḥ pibate ghoraiḥ sarvam na eva vimuñcati
tataḥ saṁvartakaḥ vahniḥ saṅkarṣaṇa mukha utthitaḥ dahati anila-vega utthaḥ śūnyān bhū vivarān atha
upari adhaḥ samantāt ca śikhābhiḥ vahni sūryayoḥ dahyamānam vibhāti aṇḍam dagdha go-maya piṇḍa-vat
tataḥ pracaṇḍa pavanaḥ varṣāṇām adhikam śatam paraḥ sāmvartakaḥ vāti dhūmram kham rajasā āvṛtam
tataḥ megha-kulāni aṅga citra-varṇāni anekaśaḥ śatam varṣāṇi varṣanti nadanti rabhasa-svanaiḥ
tataḥ eka-udakam viśvam brahma-aṇḍa vivara-antaram
tadā bhūmeḥ gandha-guṇam grasanti āpaḥ uda-plave grasta-gandhā tu pṛthivī pralayatvāya kalpate
apām rasam atha tejaḥ tāḥ līyante atha nīrasāḥ grasate tejasaḥ rūpam vāyuḥ tat-rahitam tadā līyate ca anile tejaḥ vāyoḥ kham grasate guṇam saḥ vai viśati kham rājan tataḥ ca nabhasaḥ guṇam śabdam grasati bhūta-ādiḥ nabhaḥ tam anu līyate taijasaḥ ca indriyāṇi aṅga devān vaikārikaḥ guṇaiḥ mahān grasati ahaṅkāram guṇāḥ sattva-ādayaḥ ca tam grasate avyākṛtam rājan guṇān kālena coditam na tasya kāla avayavaiḥ pariṇāma-ādayaḥ guṇāḥ anādi anantam avyaktam nityam kāraṇam avyayam
na yatra vācaḥ na manaḥ na sattvam tamaḥ rajaḥ vā mahat ādayaḥ amī na prāṇa buddhi indriya devatāḥ vā na sanniveśaḥ khalu loka-kalpaḥ na svapna jāgrat na ca tat suṣuptam na kham jalam bhūḥ anilaḥ agniḥ arkaḥ saṁsupta-vat śūnya-vat apratarkyam tat mūla-bhūtam padam āmananti
layaḥ prākṛtikaḥ hi eṣaḥ puruṣa avyaktayoḥ yadā śaktayaḥ sampralīyante vivaśāḥ kāla vidrutāḥ
buddhi indriya artha rūpeṇa jñānam bhāti tat āśrayam dṛśyatva avyatirekābhyām ādi-anta-vat avastu yat
dīpaḥ cakṣuḥ ca rūpam ca jyotiṣaḥ na pṛthak bhavet evam dhīḥ khāni mātrāḥ ca na syuḥ anyatamāt ṛtāt
buddheḥ jāgaraṇam svapnaḥ suṣuptiḥ iti ca ucyate māyā-mātram idam rājan nānātvam pratyak-ātmani
yathā jala-dharāḥ vyomni bhavanti na bhavanti ca brahmaṇi idam tathā viśvam avayavi udaya apyayāt
satyam hi avayavaḥ proktaḥ sarva-avayavinām iha vinā arthena pratīyeran paṭasya iva aṅga tantavaḥ
yat sāmānya viśeṣābhyām upalabhyeta saḥ bhramaḥ anyonya apāśrayāt sarvam ādi-anta-vat avastu yat
vikāraḥ khyāyamānaḥ api pratyak-ātmānam antarā na nirūpyaḥ asti aṇuḥ api syāt cet cit-samaḥ ātma-vat
na hi satyasya nānātvam avidvān yadi manyate nānātvam chidrayoḥ yadvat jyotiṣoḥ vātayoḥ iva
yathā hiraṇyam bahudhā samīyate nṛbhiḥ kriyābhiḥ vyavahāra-vartmasu evam vacobhiḥ bhagavān adhokṣajaḥ vyākhyāyate laukika vaidikaiḥ janaiḥ
yathā ghanaḥ arka prabhavaḥ arka darśitaḥ hi arka aṁśa-bhūtasya ca cakṣuṣaḥ tamaḥ evam tu aham brahma-guṇaḥ tat-īkṣitaḥ brahma-aṁśakasya ātmanaḥ ātma-bandhanaḥ
ghanaḥ yadā arka-prabhavaḥ vidīryate cakṣuḥ svarūpam ravim īkṣate tadā yadā hi ahaṅkāraḥ upādhiḥ ātmanaḥ jijñāsayā naśyati tarhi anusmaret
yadā evam etena viveka hetinā māyā-maya ahaṅkaraṇa ātma bandhanam chittvā acyuta ātma anubhavaḥ avatiṣṭhate tam āhuḥ ātyantikam aṅga samplavam
nityadā sarva-bhūtānām brahma-ādīnām param-tapa utpatti pralayau eke sūkṣma-jñāḥ sampracakṣate
kāla srotaḥ javena āśu hriyamāṇasya nityadā pariṇāminām avasthāḥ tāḥ janma pralaya hetavaḥ
anādi-anta-vatā anena kālena īśvara mūrtinā avasthāḥ na eva dṛśyante viyati jyotiṣām iva
nityaḥ naimittikaḥ ca eva tathā prākṛtikaḥ layaḥ ātyantikaḥ ca kathitaḥ kālasya gatiḥ īdṛśī
etāḥ kuru-śreṣṭha jagat-vidhātuḥ nārāyaṇasya akhila-sattva-dhāmnaḥ līlā-kathāḥ te kathitāḥ samāsataḥ kārtsnyena na ajaḥ api abhidhātum īśaḥ
saṁsāra sindhum ati-dustaram uttitīrṣoḥ na anyaḥ plavaḥ bhagavataḥ puruṣa-uttamasya līlā-kathā rasa niṣevaṇam antareṇa puṁsaḥ bhavet vividha duḥkha dava arditasya
purāṇa saṁhitām etām ṛṣiḥ nārāyaṇaḥ avyayaḥ nāradāya purā prāha kṛṣṇa-dvaipāyanāya saḥ
saḥ vai mahyam mahārāja bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ imām bhāgavatīm prītaḥ saṁhitām veda-sammitām
imām vakṣyati asau sūtaḥ ṛṣibhyaḥ naimiṣa-ālaye dīrgha-satre kuru-śreṣṭha sampṛṣṭaḥ śaunaka-ādibhiḥ
śrī-śukaḥ uvāca atra anuvarṇyate abhīkṣṇam viśva-ātmā bhagavān hariḥ yasya prasāda jaḥ brahmā rudraḥ krodha samudbhavaḥ
tvam tu rājan mariṣye iti paśu-buddhim imām jahi na jātaḥ prāk abhūtaḥ adya deha-vat tvam na naṅkṣyasi
na bhaviṣyasi bhūtvā tvam putra pautra ādi rūpa-vān bīja aṅkura vat deha-ādeḥ vyatiriktaḥ yathā analaḥ
svapne yathā śiraḥ chedam pañcatva-ādi ātmanaḥ svayam yasmāt paśyati dehasya tataḥ ātmā hi ajaḥ amaraḥ
ghaṭe bhinne ghaṭa-ākāśaḥ ākāśaḥ syāt yathā purā evam dehe mṛte jīvaḥ brahma sampadyate punaḥ
manaḥ sṛjati vai dehān guṇān karmāṇi ca ātmanaḥ tat manaḥ sṛjate māyā tataḥ jīvasya saṁsṛtiḥ
sneha adhiṣṭhāna varti agni saṁyogaḥ yāvat īyate tāvat dīpasya dīpatvam evam deha-kṛtaḥ bhavaḥ rajaḥ-sattva-tamaḥ vṛttyā jāyate atha vinaśyati
na tatra ātmā svayam-jyotiḥ yaḥ vyakta-avyaktayoḥ paraḥ ākāśaḥ iva ca ādhāraḥ dhruvaḥ ananta upamaḥ tataḥ
evam ātmānam ātma-stham ātmanā eva āmṛśa prabho buddhyā anumāna-garbhiṇyā vāsudeva-anucintayā
coditaḥ vipra-vākyena na tvām dhakṣyati takṣakaḥ mṛtyavaḥ na upadhakṣyanti mṛtyūnām mṛtyum īśvaram
aham brahma param dhāma brahma aham paramam padam evam samīkṣya ca ātmānam ātmani ādhāya niṣkale daśantam takṣakam pāde lelihānam viṣa-ānanaiḥ na drakṣyasi śarīram ca viśvam ca pṛthak ātmanaḥ
etat te kathitam tāta yat ātmā pṛṣṭavān nṛpa hareḥ viśva-ātmanaḥ ceṣṭām kim bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
sūtaḥ uvāca etat niśamya muninā abhihitam parīkṣit vyāsa-ātma-jena nikhila ātma dṛśā samena tat pāda-mūlam upasṛtya natena mūrdhnā baddha-añjaliḥ tam idam āha saḥ viṣṇu-rātaḥ
rājā uvāca siddhaḥ asmi anugṛhītaḥ asmi bhavatā karuṇā-ātmanā śrāvitaḥ yat ca me sākṣāt anādi nidhanaḥ hariḥ
na ati-adbhutam aham manye mahatām acyuta-ātmanām ajñeṣu tāpa tapteṣu bhūteṣu yat anugrahaḥ
purāṇa-saṁhitām etām aśrauṣma bhavataḥ vayam yasyām khalu uttamaḥ-ślokaḥ bhagavān anuvarṇyate
bhagavan takṣaka ādibhyaḥ mṛtyubhyaḥ na bibhemi aham praviṣṭaḥ brahma nirvāṇam abhayam darśitam tvayā
anujānīhi mām brahman vācam yacchāmi adhokṣaje mukta kāma-āśayam cetaḥ praveśya visṛjāmi asūn
ajñānam ca nirastam me jñāna vijñāna niṣṭhayā bhavatā darśitam kṣemam param bhagavataḥ padam
sūtaḥ uvāca iti uktaḥ tam anujñāpya bhagavān bādarāyaṇiḥ jagāma bhikṣubhiḥ sākam nara-devena pūjitaḥ
parīkṣit api rāja-ṛṣiḥ ātmani ātmānam ātmanā samādhāya param dadhyau aspanda asuḥ yathā taruḥ prāk-kūle barhiṣi āsīnaḥ gaṅgā-kūle udak-mukhaḥ brahma-bhūtaḥ mahā-yogī niḥsaṅgaḥ chinna saṁśayaḥ
takṣakaḥ prahitaḥ viprāḥ kruddhena dvija sūnunā hantu-kāmaḥ nṛpam gacchan dadarśa pathi kaśyapam
tam tarpayitvā draviṇaiḥ nivartya viṣa-hāriṇam dvija-rūpa praticchannaḥ kāma-rūpaḥ adaśat nṛpam
brahma-bhūtasya rāja-ṛṣeḥ dehaḥ ahi garala agninā babhūva bhasma-sāt sadyaḥ paśyatām sarva-dehinām
hāhā-kāraḥ mahān āsīt bhuvi khe dikṣu sarvataḥ vismitāḥ hi abhavan sarve deva asura nara ādayaḥ
deva dundubhayaḥ neduḥ gandharva-apsarasaḥ jaguḥ vavṛṣuḥ puṣpa-varṣāṇi vibudhāḥ sādhu-vādinaḥ
janmejayaḥ sva-pitaram śrutvā takṣaka bhakṣitam yathā ājuhāva saṅkruddhaḥ nāgān satre saha dvijaiḥ
sarpa-satre samiddha agnau dahyamānān mahā-uragān dṛṣṭvā indram bhaya saṁvignaḥ takṣakaḥ śaraṇam yayau
apaśyan takṣakam tatra rājā pārīkṣitaḥ dvijān uvāca takṣakaḥ kasmāt na dahyeta uraga adhamaḥ
tam gopāyati rāja-indra śakraḥ śaraṇam āgatam tena saṁstambhitaḥ sarpaḥ tasmāt na agnau patati asau
pārīkṣitaḥ iti śrutvā prāha ṛtvijaḥ udāra dhīḥ saha indraḥ takṣakaḥ viprāḥ na agnau kim iti pātyate
tat śrutvā ājuhuvuḥ viprāḥ saha indram takṣakam makhe takṣaka āśu patasva iha saha indreṇa marut-vatā
iti brahma udita ākṣepaiḥ sthānāt indraḥ pracālitaḥ babhūva sambhrānta matiḥ sa-vimānaḥ sa-takṣakaḥ
tam patantam vimānena saha-takṣakam ambarāt vilokya āṅgirasaḥ prāha rājānam tam bṛhaspatiḥ
na eṣaḥ tvayā manuṣya-indra vadham arhati sarpa-rāṭ anena pītam amṛtam atha vai ajara amaraḥ
jīvitam maraṇam jantoḥ gatiḥ svena eva karmaṇā rājan tataḥ anyaḥ na asti asya pradātā sukha-duḥkhayoḥ
sarpa caura agni vidyudbhyaḥ kṣut tṛṭ vyādhi ādibhiḥ nṛpa pañcatvam ṛcchate jantuḥ bhuṅkte ārabdha karma tat
tasmāt satram idam rājan saṁsthīyeta ābhicārikam sarpāḥ anāgasaḥ dagdhāḥ janaiḥ diṣṭam hi bhujyate
sūtaḥ uvāca iti uktaḥ saḥ tathā iti āha mahā-ṛṣeḥ mānayan vacaḥ sarpa-satrāt uparataḥ pūjayām āsa vāk-patim
sā eṣā viṣṇoḥ mahā-māyā abādhyayā alakṣaṇā yayā muhyanti asya eva ātma-bhūtāḥ bhūteṣu guṇa vṛttibhiḥ
na yatra dambhī iti abhayā virājitā māyā ātma-vāde asakṛt ātma-vādibhiḥ na yat vivādaḥ vividhaḥ tat-āśrayaḥ manaḥ ca saṅkalpa vikalpa vṛtti yat na yatra sṛjyam sṛjatā ubhayoḥ param śreyaḥ ca jīvaḥ tribhiḥ anvitaḥ tu aham tat etat utsādita bādhya bādhakam niṣidhya ca ūrmīn virameta tat muniḥ
param padam vaiṣṇavam āmananti tat yat na iti na iti iti atat utsisṛkṣavaḥ visṛjya daurātmyam ananya sauhṛdāḥ hṛdā upaguhya avasitam samāhitaiḥ
te etat adhigacchanti viṣṇoḥ yat paramam padam aham mama iti daurjanyam na yeṣām deha geha jam
ati-vādān titikṣeta na avamanyeta kañcana na ca imam deham āśritya vairam kurvīta kenacit
namaḥ bhagavate tasmai kṛṣṇāya akuṇṭha-medhase yat pāda-ambu-ruha dhyānāt saṁhitām adhyagām imām
śrī-śaunakaḥ uvāca paila-ādibhiḥ vyāsa-śiṣyaiḥ veda-ācāryaiḥ mahā-ātmabhiḥ vedāḥ ca kathitāḥ vyastāḥ etat saumya abhidhehi naḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca samāhita-ātmanaḥ brahman brahmaṇaḥ parame-sthinaḥ hṛdi ākāśāt abhūt nādaḥ vṛtti-rodhāt vibhāvyate
yat upāsanayā brahman yoginaḥ malam ātmanaḥ dravya kriyā kāraka ākhyam dhūtvā yānti apunaḥ-bhavam
tataḥ abhūt tri-vṛt oṁkāraḥ yaḥ avyakta prabhavaḥ sva-rāṭ yat tat liṅgam bhagavataḥ brahmaṇaḥ parama-ātmanaḥ
śṛṇoti yaḥ imam sphoṭam supta-śrotre ca śūnya-dṛk yena vāk vyajyate yasya vyaktiḥ ākāśe ātmanaḥ sva-dhāmnaḥ brahmaṇaḥ sākṣāt vācakaḥ parama-ātmanaḥ saḥ sarva mantra upaniṣat veda bījam sanātanam
tasya hi āsan trayaḥ varṇāḥ a-kāra-ādyāḥ bhṛgu-udvaha dhāryante yaiḥ trayaḥ bhāvāḥ guṇa nāma artha vṛttayaḥ
tataḥ akṣara samāmnāyam asṛjat bhagavān ajaḥ anta-stha uṣma svara sparśa hrasva-dīrgha ādi lakṣaṇam
tena asau caturaḥ vedān caturbhiḥ vadanaiḥ vibhuḥ sa-vyāhṛtikān sa-oṁkārān cātuḥ-hotra vivakṣayā
putrān adhyāpayat tān tu brahma-ṛṣīn brahma kovidān te tu dharma upadeṣṭāraḥ sva-putrebhyaḥ samādiśan
te paramparayā prāptāḥ tat-tat śiṣyaiḥ dhṛta-vrataiḥ catuḥ-yugeṣu atha vyastāḥ dvāpara-ādau mahā-ṛṣibhiḥ
kṣīṇa-āyuṣaḥ kṣīṇa-sattvān durmedhān vīkṣya kālataḥ vedān brahma-ṛṣayaḥ vyasyan hṛdi-stha acyuta coditāḥ
asmin api antare brahman bhagavān loka bhāvanaḥ brahma īśa ādyaiḥ loka-pālaiḥ yācitaḥ dharma-guptaye parāśarāt satyavatyām aṁśa aṁśa kalayā vibhuḥ avatīrṇaḥ mahā-bhāga vedam cakre catuḥ-vidham
ṛk-atharva-yajuḥ-sāmnām rāśīḥ uddhṛtya vargaśaḥ catasraḥ saṁhitāḥ cakre mantraiḥ maṇi-gaṇāḥ iva
tāsām saḥ caturaḥ śiṣyān upāhūya mahā-matiḥ eka-ekām saṁhitām brahman eka-ekasmai dadau vibhuḥ
pailāya saṁhitām ādyām bahu-ṛca-ākhyam uvāca ha vaiśampāyana-saṁjñāya nigada-ākhyam yajuḥ-gaṇam sāmnām jaiminaye prāha tathā chandoga-saṁhitām atharva-aṅgirasīm nāma sva-śiṣyāya sumantave
pailaḥ sva-saṁhitām ūce indrapramitaye muniḥ bāṣkalāya ca saḥ api āha śiṣyebhyaḥ saṁhitām svakām caturdhā vyasya bodhyāya yājñavalkyāya bhārgava parāśarāya agnimitre indrapramitiḥ ātma-vān adhyāpayat saṁhitām svām māṇḍūkeyam ṛṣim kavim tasya śiṣyaḥ devamitraḥ saubhari-ādibhyaḥ ūcivān
śākalyaḥ tat-sutaḥ svām tu pañcadhā vyasya saṁhitām vātsya-mudgala-śālīya gokhalya-śiśireṣu adhāt
jātūkarṇyaḥ ca tat-śiṣyaḥ sa-niruktām sva-saṁhitām balāka-paila-jābāla-virajebhyaḥ dadau muniḥ
bāṣkaliḥ prati-śākhābhyaḥ vālakhilya-ākhya saṁhitām cakre vālāyaniḥ bhajyaḥ kāśāraḥ ca eva tām dadhuḥ
bahu-ṛcāḥ saṁhitāḥ hi etāḥ ebhiḥ brahma-ṛṣibhiḥ dhṛtāḥ śrutvā etat chandasām vyāsam sarva-pāpaiḥ pramucyate
vaiśampāyana-śiṣyāḥ vai caraka adhvaryavaḥ abhavan yat ceruḥ brahma-hatyā aṁhaḥ kṣapaṇam sva-guroḥ vratam
yājñavalkyaḥ ca tat-śiṣyaḥ āha aho bhagavan kiyat caritena alpa-sārāṇām cariṣye aham su-duścaram
iti uktaḥ guruḥ api āha kupitaḥ yāhi alam tvayā vipra-avamantrā śiṣyeṇa mat-adhītam tyaja āśu iti
devarāta-sutaḥ saḥ api charditvā yajuṣām gaṇam tataḥ gataḥ atha munayaḥ dadṛśuḥ tān yajuḥ-gaṇān yajūṁsi tittirāḥ bhūtvā tat lolupatayā ādaduḥ taittirīyāḥ iti yajuḥ-śākhāḥ āsan su-peśalāḥ
yājñavalkyaḥ tataḥ brahman chandāṁsi adhi gaveṣayan guroḥ avidyamānāni su-upatasthe arkam īśvaram
śrī-yājñavalkyaḥ uvāca oṁ namaḥ bhagavate ādityāya akhila-jagatām ātma-svarūpeṇa kāla-svarūpeṇa catuḥ-vidha bhūta-nikāyānām brahma-ādi stamba-paryantānām antaḥ-hṛdayeṣu bahiḥ api ca ākāśaḥ iva upādhinā avyavadhīyamānaḥ bhavān ekaḥ eva kṣaṇa-lava-nimeṣa avayava upacita saṁvatsara-gaṇena apām ādāna visargābhyām imām loka yātrām anuvahati
yat u ha vāva vibudha-ṛṣabha savitaḥ adaḥ tapati anusavanam ahaḥ ahaḥ āmnāya-vidhinā upatiṣṭhamānānām akhila-durita vṛjina bīja avabharjana bhagavataḥ samabhidhīmahi tapana maṇḍalam
yaḥ iha vāva sthira-cara-nikarāṇām nija-niketanānām manaḥ-indriya-asu-gaṇān anātmanaḥ svayam ātma antaḥ-yāmī pracodayati
yaḥ eva imam lokam ati-karāla vadana andhakāra-saṁjña ajagara graha gilitam mṛtakam iva vicetanam avalokya anukampayā parama-kāruṇikaḥ īkṣayā eva utthāpya ahaḥ ahaḥ anu-savanam śreyasi sva-dharma-ākhya ātma-avasthāne pravartayati
avani-patiḥ iva asādhūnām bhayam udīrayan aṭati paritaḥ āśā-pālaiḥ tatra tatra kamala-kośa añjalibhiḥ upahṛta arhaṇaḥ
atha ha bhagavan tava caraṇa-nalina-yugalam tri-bhuvana gurubhiḥ abhivanditam aham ayāta-yāma yajuḥ-kāmaḥ upasarāmi iti
sūtaḥ uvāca evam stutaḥ saḥ bhagavān vāji-rūpa dharaḥ raviḥ yajūṁṣi ayāta-yāmāni munaye adāt prasāditaḥ
yajurbhiḥ akarot śākhāḥ daśa pañca śataiḥ vibhuḥ jagṛhuḥ vāja-sanyaḥ tāḥ kāṇva-mādhyandina-ādayaḥ
jaimineḥ sama-gasya āsīt sumantuḥ tanayaḥ muniḥ sutvān tu tat-sutaḥ tābhyām eka-ekām prāha saṁhitām
sukarmā ca api tat-śiṣyaḥ sāma-veda-taroḥ mahān sahasra-saṁhitā bhedam cakre sāmnām tataḥ dvija hiraṇyanābhaḥ kauśalyaḥ pauṣyañjiḥ ca sukarmaṇaḥ śiṣyau jagṛhatuḥ ca anyaḥ āvantyaḥ brahma-vit-tamaḥ
udīcyāḥ sāma-gāḥ śiṣyāḥ āsan pañca-śatāni vai pauṣyañji-āvantyayoḥ ca api tān ca prācyān pracakṣate
laugākṣiḥ māṅgaliḥ kulyaḥ kuśīdaḥ kukṣiḥ eva ca pauṣyañji-śiṣyāḥ jagṛhuḥ saṁhitāḥ te śatam śatam
kṛtaḥ hiraṇyanābhasya catuḥ-viṁśati saṁhitāḥ śiṣyaḥ ūce sva-śiṣyebhyaḥ śeṣāḥ āvantyaḥ ātma-vān
sūtaḥ uvāca atharva-vit sumantuḥ ca śiṣyam adhyāpayat svakām saṁhitām saḥ api pathyāya vedadarśāya ca uktavān
śauklāyaniḥ brahmabaliḥ modoṣaḥ pippalāyaniḥ vedadarśasya śiṣyāḥ te pathya-śiṣyān atho śṛṇu kumudaḥ śunakaḥ brahman jājaliḥ ca api atharva-vit
babhruḥ śiṣyaḥ atha aṅgirasaḥ saindhavāyanaḥ eva ca adhīyetām saṁhite dve sāvarṇa ādyāḥ tathā apare
nakṣatrakalpaḥ śāntiḥ ca kaśyapa-āṅgirasa-ādayaḥ ete ātharvaṇa-ācāryāḥ śṛṇu paurāṇikān mune
trayyāruṇiḥ kaśyapaḥ ca sāvarṇiḥ akṛta-vraṇaḥ vaiśampāyana-hārītau ṣaṭ vai paurāṇikāḥ ime
adhīyanta vyāsa-śiṣyāt saṁhitām mat-pituḥ mukhāt eka-ekām aham eteṣām śiṣyaḥ sarvāḥ samadhyagām
kaśyapaḥ aham ca sāvarṇiḥ rāma-śiṣyaḥ akṛtavraṇaḥ adhīmahi vyāsa-śiṣyāt catvāraḥ mūla-saṁhitāḥ
purāṇa-lakṣaṇam brahman brahma-ṛṣibhiḥ nirūpitam śṛṇuṣva buddhim āśritya veda-śāstra anusārataḥ
sargaḥ asya atha visargaḥ ca vṛtti rakṣā antarāṇi ca vaṁśaḥ vaṁśa-anucaritam saṁsthā hetuḥ apāśrayaḥ daśabhiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ yuktam purāṇam tat vidaḥ viduḥ kecit pañca-vidham brahman mahat alpa vyavasthayā
avyākṛta guṇa-kṣobhāt mahataḥ tri-vṛtaḥ ahamaḥ bhūta-sūkṣma indriya arthānām sambhavaḥ sargaḥ ucyate
puruṣa anugṛhītānām eteṣām vāsanā-mayaḥ visargaḥ ayam samāhāraḥ bījāt bījam cara acaram
vṛttiḥ bhūtāni bhūtānām carāṇām acarāṇi ca kṛtā svena nṛṇām tatra kāmāt codanayā api vā
rakṣā acyuta-avatāra īhā viśvasya anu yuge yuge tiryak martya ṛṣi deveṣu hanyante yaiḥ trayī-dviṣaḥ
manu-antaram manuḥ devāḥ manu-putrāḥ sura-īśvarāḥ ṛṣayaḥ aṁśa-avatārāḥ ca hareḥ ṣaṭ-vidham ucyate
rājñām brahma-prasūtānām vaṁśaḥ trai-kālikaḥ anvayaḥ vaṁśa-anucaritam teṣām vṛttam vaṁśa-dharāḥ ca ye
naimittikaḥ prākṛtikaḥ nityaḥ ātyantikaḥ layaḥ saṁsthā iti kavibhiḥ proktaḥ caturdhā asya svabhāvataḥ
hetuḥ jīvaḥ asya sarga-ādeḥ avidyā karma-kārakaḥ yam ca anuśāyinam prāhuḥ avyākṛtam uta apare
vyatireka anvayaḥ yasya jāgrat svapna suṣuptiṣu māyā-mayeṣu tat brahma jīva-vṛttiṣu apāśrayaḥ
pada-artheṣu yathā dravyam sat-mātram rūpa-nāmasu bīja-ādi pañcatā-antāsu hi avasthāsu yuta-ayutam
virameta yadā cittam hitvā vṛtti-trayam svayam yogena vā tadā ātmānam veda īhāyāḥ nivartate
evam lakṣaṇa-lakṣyāṇi purāṇāni purā-vidaḥ munayaḥ aṣṭādaśa prāhuḥ kṣullakāni mahānti ca
brāhmam pādmam vaiṣṇavam ca śaivam laiṅgam sa-gāruḍam nāradīyam bhāgavatam āgneyam skānda saṁjñitam bhaviṣyam brahma-vaivartam mārkaṇḍeyam sa-vāmanam vārāham mātsyam kaurmam ca brahmāṇḍa-ākhyam iti tri-ṣaṭ
brahman idam samākhyātam śākhā-praṇayanam muneḥ śiṣya śiṣya-praśiṣyāṇām brahma-tejaḥ vivardhanam
śrī-śaunakaḥ uvāca sūta jīva ciram sādho vada naḥ vadatām vara tamasi apāre bhramatām nṝṇām tvam pāra-darśanaḥ
āhuḥ cira-āyuṣam ṛṣim mṛkaṇḍu-tanayam janāḥ yaḥ kalpa-ante hi urvaritaḥ yena grastam idam jagat saḥ vai asmat-kula utpannaḥ kalpe asmin bhārgava-ṛṣabhaḥ na eva adhunā api bhūtānām samplavaḥ kaḥ api jāyate ekaḥ eta arṇave bhrāmyan dadarśa puruṣam kila vaṭa-patra puṭe tokam śayānam tu ekam adbhutam eṣaḥ naḥ saṁśayaḥ bhūyān sūta kautūhalam yataḥ tam naḥ chindhi mahā-yogin purāneṣu api sammataḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca praśnaḥ tvayā mahā-ṛṣe ayam kṛtaḥ loka bhrama apahaḥ nārāyaṇa-kathā yatra gītā kali-mala apahā
prāpta dvi-jāti saṁskāraḥ mārkaṇḍeyaḥ pituḥ kramāt chandāṁsi adhītya dharmeṇa tapaḥ svādhyāya saṁyutaḥ bṛhat-vrata dharaḥ śāntaḥ jaṭilaḥ valkala-ambaraḥ bibhrat kamaṇḍalum daṇḍam upavītam sa-mekhalam kṛṣṇa-ajinam sa-akṣa-sūtram kuśān ca niyama-ṛddhaye agni arka guru vipra ātmasu arcayan sandhyayoḥ harim sāyam prātaḥ saḥ gurave bhaikṣyam āhṛtya vāk-yataḥ bubhuje guru-anujñātaḥ sakṛt na u cet upoṣitaḥ evam tapaḥ-svādhyāya-paraḥ varṣāṇām ayuta-ayutam ārādhayan hṛṣīka-īśam jigye mṛtyum su-durjayam
brahmā bhṛguḥ bhavaḥ dakṣaḥ brahma-putrāḥ ca ye apare nṛ deva pitṛ bhūtāni tena āsan ati-vismitāḥ
ittham bṛhat-vrata-dharaḥ tapaḥ-svādhyāya-saṁyamaiḥ dadhyau adhokṣajam yogī dhvasta kleśa antaḥ-ātmanā
tasya evam yuñjataḥ cittam mahā-yogena yoginaḥ vyatīyāya mahān kālaḥ manu-antara ṣaṭ ātmakaḥ
etat purandaraḥ jñātvā saptame asmin kila antare tapaḥ viśaṅkitaḥ brahman ārebhe tat vighātanam
gandharva-apsarasaḥ kāmam vasanta malaya-anilau munaye preṣayām āsa rajaḥ-toka madau tathā
te vai tat āśramam jagmuḥ hima-adreḥ pārśve uttare puṣpabhadrā nadī yatra citrā-ākhyā ca śilā vibho
tat āśrama-padam puṇyam puṇya druma latā añcitam puṇya dvija kula ākīrṇam puṇya amala jala-āśayam matta bhramara saṅgītam matta kokila kūjitam matta barhi naṭa-āṭopam matta dvija kula ākulam vāyuḥ praviṣṭaḥ ādāya hima nirjhara śīkarān sumanobhiḥ pariṣvaktaḥ vavau uttambhayan smaram
udyat candra niśā vaktraḥ pravāla stabaka ālibhiḥ gopa druma latā jālaiḥ tatra āsīt kusuma-ākaraḥ
anvīyamānaḥ gandharvaiḥ gīta vāditra yūthakaiḥ adṛśyata ātta cāpa-iṣuḥ svaḥ-strī-yūtha patiḥ smaraḥ
hutvā agnim samupāsīnam dadṛśuḥ śakra kiṅkarāḥ mīlita akṣam durādharṣam mūrti-mantam iva analam
nanṛtuḥ tasya purataḥ striyaḥ atha u gāyakāḥ jaguḥ mṛdaṅga vīṇā paṇavaiḥ vādyam cakruḥ manaḥ-ramam
sandadhe astram sva-dhanuṣi kāmaḥ pañca-mukham tadā madhuḥ manaḥ rajaḥ-tokaḥ indra-bhṛtyāḥ vyakampayan
krīḍantyāḥ puñjikasthalyāḥ kandukaiḥ stana gauravāt bhṛśam udvigna madhyāyāḥ keśa visraṁsita srajaḥ itaḥ tataḥ bhramat dṛṣṭeḥ calantyāḥ anu kandukam vāyuḥ jahāra tat-vāsaḥ sūkṣmam truṭita mekhalam
visasarja tadā bāṇam matvā tam sva jitam smaraḥ sarvam tatra abhavat mogham anīśasya yathā udyamaḥ
te ittham apakurvantaḥ muneḥ tat tejasā mune dahyamānāḥ nivavṛtuḥ prabodhya ahim iva arbhakāḥ
iti indra-anucaraiḥ brahman dharṣitaḥ api mahā-muniḥ yat na agāt ahamaḥ bhāvam na tat citram mahatsu hi
dṛṣṭvā nistejasam kāmam sa-gaṇam bhagavān sva-rāṭ śrutvā anubhāvam brahma-ṛṣeḥ vismayam samagāt param
tasya evam yuñjataḥ cittam tapaḥ svādhyāya saṁyamaiḥ anugrahāya āvirāsīt nara-nārāyaṇaḥ hariḥ
tau śukla-kṛṣṇau nava-kañja locanau catuḥ-bhujau raurava valkala ambarau pavitra pāṇī upavītakam tri-vṛt kamaṇḍalum daṇḍam ṛjum ca vaiṇavam padma-akṣa mālām uta jantu-mārjanam vedam ca sākṣāt tapaḥ eva rūpiṇau tapat taḍit varṇa piśaṅga rociṣā prāṁśū dadhānau vibudha-ṛṣabha arcitau
te vai bhagavataḥ rūpe nara-nārāyaṇau ṛṣī dṛṣṭvā utthāya ādareṇa uccaiḥ nanāma aṅgena daṇḍa-vat
saḥ tat sandarśana ānanda nirvṛta ātma indriya āśayaḥ hṛṣṭa romā aśru pūrṇa akṣaḥ na sehe tau udīkṣitum
utthāya prāñjaliḥ prahvaḥ autsukyāt āśliṣan iva namaḥ namaḥ iti īśānau babhāṣe gadgada akṣaram
tayoḥ āsanam ādāya pādayoḥ avanijya ca arhaṇena anulepena dhūpa mālyaiḥ apūjayat
sukham āsanam āsīnau prasāda abhimukhau munī punaḥ ānamya pādābhyām gariṣṭhau idam abravīt
śrī-mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca kim varṇaye tava vibho yat udīritaḥ asuḥ saṁspandate tam anu vāk manaḥ indriyāṇi spandanti vai tanu-bhṛtām aja-śarvayoḥ ca svasya api atha api bhajatām asi bhāva-bandhuḥ
mūrtī ime bhagavataḥ bhagavan tri-lokyāḥ kṣemāya tāpa viramāya ca mṛtyu jityai nānā bibharṣi avitum anya tanūḥ yathā idam sṛṣṭvā punaḥ grasasi sarvam iva ūrṇa-nābhiḥ
tasya avituḥ sthira-cara īśituḥ aṅghri-mūlam yat-stham na karma-guṇa-kāla rajaḥ spṛśanti yat vai stuvanti ninamanti yajanti abhīkṣṇam dhyāyanti veda-hṛdayāḥ munayaḥ tat-āptyai
na anyam tava aṅghri upanayāt apavarga-mūrteḥ kṣemam janasya paritaḥ bhiyaḥ īśa vidmaḥ brahmā bibheti alam ataḥ dvi-parārdha dhiṣṇyaḥ kālasya te kim uta tat-kṛta bhautikānām
tat vai bhajāmi ṛta-dhiyaḥ tava pāda-mūlam hitvā idam ātma-chadi ca ātma-guroḥ parasya deha-ādi apārtham asat antyam abhijña-mātram vindeta te tarhi sarva manīṣita artham
sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti īśa tava ātma-bandho māyā-mayāḥ sthiti-laya-udaya hetavaḥ asya līlāḥ dhṛtāḥ yat api sattva-mayī praśāntyai na anye nṛṇām vyasana moha bhiyaḥ ca yābhyām
tasmāt tava iha bhagavan atha tāvakānām śuklām tanum sva-dayitām kuśalāḥ bhajanti yat sātvatāḥ puruṣa rūpam uśanti sattvam lokaḥ yataḥ abhayam uta ātma-sukham na ca anyat
tasmai namaḥ bhagavate puruṣāya bhūmne viśvāya viśva-gurave para-daivatāya nārāyaṇāya ṛṣaye ca nara-uttamāya haṁsāya saṁyata-gire nigama-īśvarāya
yam vai na veda vitatha akṣa-pathaiḥ bhramat dhīḥ santam svakeṣu asuṣu hṛdi api dṛk-patheṣu tat-māyayā āvṛta matiḥ saḥ u eva sākṣāt ādyaḥ tava akhila-guroḥ upasādya vedam
yat darśanam nigame ātma rahaḥ prakāśam muhyanti yatra kavayaḥ aja-parāḥ yatantaḥ tam sarva-vāda viṣaya pratirūpa śīlam vande mahā-puruṣam ātma nigūḍha bodham
sūtaḥ uvāca saṁstutaḥ bhagavān ittham mārkaṇḍeyena dhī-matā nārāyaṇaḥ nara-sakhaḥ prītaḥ āha bhṛgu-udvaham
śrī-bhagavān uvāca bhoḥ bhoḥ brahma-ṛṣi varyaḥ asi siddhaḥ ātma-samādhinā mayi bhaktyā anapāyinyā tapaḥ svādhyāya saṁyamaiḥ
vayam te parituṣṭāḥ sma tvat bṛhat-vrata caryayā varam pratīccha bhadram te vara-daḥ asmi tvat-īpsitam
śrī-ṛṣiḥ uvāca jitam te deva-deva-īśa prapanna ārti-hara acyuta vareṇa etāvatā alam naḥ yat bhavān samadṛśyata
gṛhītvā aja-ādayaḥ yasya śrīmat pāda-abja darśanam manasā yoga-pakvena saḥ bhavān me akṣi go-caraḥ
atha api ambuja-patra akṣa puṇya-śloka śikhāmaṇe drakṣye māyām yayā lokaḥ sa-pālaḥ veda sat bhidām
sūtaḥ uvāca iti īḍitaḥ arcitaḥ kāmam ṛṣiṇā bhagavān mune tathā iti saḥ smayan prāgāt badarī-āśramam īśvaraḥ
tam eva cintayan artham ṛṣiḥ sva-āśrame eva saḥ vasan agni arka soma ambu bhū vāyu viyat ātmasu dhyāyan sarvatra ca harim bhāva-dravyaiḥ apūjayat kvacit pūjām visasmāra prema prasara samplutaḥ
tasya ekadā bhṛgu-śreṣṭha puṣpabhadrā-taṭe muneḥ upāsīnasya sandhyāyām brahman vāyuḥ abhūt mahān
tam caṇḍa-śabdam samudīrayantam balāhakāḥ anu abhavan karālāḥ akṣa sthaviṣṭhāḥ mumucuḥ taḍidbhiḥ svanantaḥ uccaiḥ abhi varṣa dhārāḥ
tataḥ vyadṛśyanta catuḥ samudrāḥ samantataḥ kṣmā-talam āgrasantaḥ samīra vega ūrmibhiḥ ugra nakra mahā-bhaya āvarta gabhīra ghoṣāḥ
antaḥ bahiḥ ca adbhiḥ ati-dyubhiḥ kharaiḥ śata-hradābhiḥ upatāpitam jagat catuḥ-vidham vīkṣya saha ātmanā muniḥ jala āplutām kṣmām vimanāḥ samatrasat
tasya evam udvīkṣataḥ ūrmi bhīṣaṇaḥ prabhañjana āghūrṇita vāḥ mahā-arṇavaḥ āpūryamānaḥ varaṣadbhiḥ ambu-daiḥ kṣmām apyadhāt dvīpa varṣa adribhiḥ samam
sa kṣmā antarikṣam sa-divam sa-bhā-gaṇam trai-lokyam āsīt saha digbhiḥ āplutam saḥ ekaḥ eva urvaritaḥ mahā-muniḥ babhrāma vikṣipya jaṭāḥ jaḍa andha vat
kṣut tṛṭ parītaḥ makaraiḥ timiṅgilaiḥ upadrutaḥ vīci nabhasvatā āhataḥ tamasi apāre patitaḥ bhraman diśaḥ na veda kham gām ca pariśrama-iṣitaḥ
kvacit magnaḥ mahā-āvarte taralaiḥ tāḍitaḥ kvacit yādobhiḥ bhakṣyate kva api svayam anyonya ghātibhiḥ kvacit śokam kvacit moham kvacit duḥkham sukham bhayam kvacit mṛtyum avāpnoti vyādhi ādibhiḥ uta arditaḥ
ayuta ayuta varṣāṇām sahasrāṇi śatāni ca vyatīyuḥ bhramataḥ tasmin viṣṇu-māyā āvṛta ātmanaḥ
saḥ kadācit bhraman tasmin pṛthivyāḥ kakudi dvijaḥ nyāgrodha-potam dadṛśe phala pallava śobhitam
prāk-uttarasyām śākhāyām tasya api dadṛśe śiśum śayānam parṇa-puṭake grasantam prabhayā tamaḥ
mahā-marakata śyāmam śrīmat vadana-paṅkajam kambu grīvam mahā uraskam su-nasam sundara-bhruvam śvāsa ejat alaka ābhātam kambu śrī karṇa dāḍimam vidruma adhara bhāsā īṣat śoṇāyita sudhā smitam padma-garbha aruṇa apāṅgam hṛdya hāsa avalokanam śvāsa ejat vali saṁvigna nimna nābhi dala udaram cāru aṅgulibhyām pāṇibhyām unnīya caraṇa-ambujam mukhe nidhāya vipra-indraḥ dhayantam vīkṣya vismitaḥ
tat-darśanāt vīta pariśramaḥ mudā protphulla hṛt-padma vilocana-ambujaḥ prahṛṣṭa romā adbhuta-bhāva śaṅkitaḥ praṣṭum puraḥ tam prasasāra bālakam
tāvat śiśoḥ vai śvasitena bhārgavaḥ saḥ antaḥ śarīram maśakaḥ yathā aviśat tatra api adaḥ nyastam acaṣṭa kṛtsnaśaḥ yathā purā amuhyat atīva vismitaḥ
kham rodasī bhā-gaṇān adri sāgarān dvīpān sa-varṣān kakubhaḥ sura-asurān vanāni deśān saritaḥ pura ākarān kheṭān vrajān āśrama-varṇa vṛttayaḥ mahānti bhūtāni atha bhautikāni asau kālam ca nānā-yuga-kalpa kalpanam yat kiñcit anyat vyavahāra-kāraṇam dadarśa viśvam sat iva avabhāsitam
himālayam puṣpa-vahām ca tām nadīm nija-āśramam yatra ṛṣī apaśyata viśvam vipaśyan śvasitāt śiśoḥ vai bahiḥ nirastaḥ nyapatat laya-abdhau
tasmin pṛthivyāḥ kakudi prarūḍham vaṭam ca tat parṇa-puṭe śayānam tokam ca tat prema sudhā smitena nirīkṣitaḥ apāṅga nirīkṣaṇena atha tam bālakam vīkṣya netrābhyām dhiṣṭhitam hṛdi abhyayāt ati-saṅkliṣṭaḥ pariṣvaktum adhokṣajam
tāvat saḥ bhagavān sākṣāt yoga-adhīśaḥ guhā-śayaḥ antardadhe ṛṣeḥ sadyaḥ yathā īhā anīśa nirmitā
tam anu atha vaṭaḥ brahman salilam loka-samplavaḥ tirodhāyi kṣaṇāt asya sva-āśrame pūrva-vat sthitaḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca saḥ evam anubhūya idam nārāyaṇa-vinirmitam vaibhavam yoga-māyāyāḥ tam eva śaraṇam yayau
śrī-mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca prapannaḥ asmi aṅghri-mūlam te prapanna abhaya-dam hare yat-māyayā api vibudhāḥ muhyanti jñāna-kāśayā
sūtaḥ uvāca tam evam nibhṛta-ātmānam vṛṣeṇa divi paryaṭan rudrāṇyā bhagavān rudraḥ dadarśa sva-gaṇaiḥ vṛtaḥ
atha umā tam ṛṣim vīkṣya giriśam samabhāṣata paśya imam bhagavan vipram nibhṛta ātma-indriya-āśayam
nibhṛta uda jhaṣa-vrātaḥ vāta apāye yathā arṇavaḥ kuru asya tapasaḥ sākṣāt saṁsiddhim siddhi-daḥ bhavān
śrī-bhagavān uvāca na eva icchati āśiṣaḥ kva api brahma-ṛṣiḥ mokṣam api uta bhaktim parām bhagavati labdhavān puruṣe avyaye
atha api saṁvadiṣyāmaḥ bhavāni etena sādhunā ayam hi paramaḥ lābhaḥ nṛṇām sādhu-samāgamaḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca iti uktvā tam upeyāya bhagavān saḥ satām gatiḥ īśānaḥ sarva-vidyānām īśvaraḥ sarva-dehinām
tayoḥ āgamanam sākṣāt īśayoḥ jagat-ātmanoḥ na veda ruddha dhī-vṛttiḥ ātmānam viśvam eva ca
bhagavān tat abhijñāya giriśaḥ yoga-māyayā āviśat tat guhā-ākāśam vāyuḥ chidram iva īśvaraḥ
ātmani api śivam prāptam taḍit piṅga jaṭā dharam tri-akṣam daśa-bhujam prāṁśum udyantam iva bhāskaram vyāghra carma ambaram śūla dhanuḥ iṣu asi carmabhiḥ akṣa-mālā ḍamaruka kapālam paraśum saha bibhrāṇam sahasā bhātam vicakṣya hṛdi vismitaḥ kim idam kutaḥ eva iti samādheḥ virataḥ muniḥ
netre unmīlya dadṛśe sa-gaṇam sa-umayā āgatam rudram tri-loka eka-gurum nanāma śirasā muniḥ
tasmai saparyām vyadadhāt sa-gaṇāya saha umayā su-āgata āsana pādya arghya gandha srak dhūpa dīpakaiḥ
āha tu ātma-anubhāvena pūrṇa-kāmasya te vibho karavāma kim īśāna yena idam nirvṛtam jagat
namaḥ śivāya śāntāya sattvāya pramṛḍāya ca rajaḥ-juṣe atha ghorāya namaḥ tubhyam tamaḥ-juṣe
sūtaḥ uvāca evam stutaḥ saḥ bhagavān ādi-devaḥ satām gatiḥ parituṣṭaḥ prasanna-ātmā prahasan tam abhāṣata
śrī-bhagavān uvāca varam vṛṇīṣva naḥ kāmam vara-da īśāḥ vayam trayaḥ amogham darśanam yeṣām martyaḥ yat vindate amṛtam
brāhmaṇāḥ sādhavaḥ śāntāḥ niḥsaṅgāḥ bhūta-vatsalāḥ eka-anta-bhaktāḥ asmāsu nirvairāḥ sama-darśinaḥ sa-lokāḥ loka-pālāḥ tān vandanti arcanti upāsate aham ca bhagavān brahmā svayam ca hariḥ īśvaraḥ
na te mayi acyute aje ca bhidām aṇu api cakṣate na ātmanaḥ ca janasya api tat yuṣmān vayam īmahi
na hi ap-mayāni tīrthāni na devāḥ cetana-ujjhitāḥ te punanti uru-kālena yūyam darśana-mātrataḥ
brāhmaṇebhyaḥ namasyāmaḥ ye asmat-rūpam trayī-mayam bibhrati ātma-samādhāna tapaḥ svādhyāya saṁyamaiḥ
śravaṇāt darśanāt vā api mahā-pātakinaḥ api vaḥ śudhyeran antya-jāḥ ca api kim u sambhāṣaṇa-ādibhiḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca iti candra-lalāmasya dharma-guhya upabṛṁhitam vacaḥ amṛta-ayanam ṛṣiḥ na atṛpyat karṇayoḥ piban
saḥ ciram māyayā viṣṇoḥ bhrāmitaḥ karśitaḥ bhṛśam śiva vāk-amṛta dhvasta kleśa-puñjaḥ tam abravīt
śrī-mārkaṇḍeyaḥ uvāca aho īśvara līlā iyam durvibhāvyā śarīriṇām yat namanti īśitavyāni stuvanti jagat-īśvarāḥ
dharmam grāhayitum prāyaḥ pravaktāraḥ ca dehinām ācaranti anumodante kriyamāṇam stuvanti ca
na etāvatā bhagavataḥ sva-māyā maya vṛttibhiḥ na duṣyeta anubhāvaḥ taiḥ māyinaḥ kuhakam yathā
sṛṣṭvā idam manasā viśvam ātmanā anupraviśya yaḥ guṇaiḥ kurvadbhiḥ ābhāti kartā iva svapna-dṛk yathā tasmai namaḥ bhagavate tri-guṇāya guṇa-ātmane kevalāya advitīyāya gurave brahma-mūrtaye
kam vṛṇe nu param bhūman varam tvat vara-darśanāt yat darśanāt pūrṇa-kāmaḥ satya-kāmaḥ pumān bhavet
varam ekam vṛṇe atha api pūrṇāt kāma-abhivarṣaṇāt bhagavati acyutām bhaktim tat-pareṣu tathā tvayi
sūtaḥ uvāca iti arcitaḥ abhiṣṭutaḥ ca muninā su-uktayā girā tam āha bhagavān śarvaḥ śarvayā ca abhinanditaḥ
kāmaḥ mahā-ṛṣe sarvaḥ ayam bhakti-mān tvam adhokṣaje ā-kalpa-antāt yaśaḥ puṇyam ajara-amaratā tathā
jñānam trai-kālikam brahman vijñānam ca virakti-mat brahma-varcasvinaḥ bhūyāt purāṇa-ācāryatā astu te
sūtaḥ uvāca evam varān saḥ munaye dattvā agāt tri-akṣaḥ īśvaraḥ devyai tat-karma kathayan anubhūtam purā amunā
saḥ api avāpta mahā-yoga mahimā bhārgava-uttamaḥ vicarati adhunā api addhā harau eka-antatām gataḥ
anuvarṇitam etat te mārkaṇḍeyasya dhī-mataḥ anubhūtam bhagavataḥ māyā-vaibhavam adbhutam
etat kecit avidvāṁsaḥ māyā-saṁsṛtiḥ ātmanaḥ anādi āvartitam nṝṇām kādācitkam pracakṣate
yaḥ evam etat bhṛgu-varya varṇitam ratha-aṅga-pāṇeḥ anubhāva bhāvitam saṁśrāvayet saṁśṛṇuyāt u tau ubhau tayoḥ na karma-āśaya saṁsṛtiḥ bhavet
śrī-śaunakaḥ uvāca atha imam artham pṛcchāmaḥ bhavantam bahu-vit-tamam samasta tantra rāddha-ante bhavān bhāgavata tattva-vit
tāntrikāḥ paricaryāyām kevalasya śriyaḥ pateḥ aṅga upāṅga āyudha ākalpam kalpayanti yathā ca yaiḥ tat naḥ varṇaya bhadram te kriyā-yogam bubhutsatām yena kriyā naipuṇena martyaḥ yāyāt amartyatām
sūtaḥ uvāca namaskṛtya gurūn vakṣye vibhūtīḥ vaiṣṇavīḥ api yāḥ proktāḥ veda-tantrābhyām ācāryaiḥ padmaja-ādibhiḥ
māyā-ādyaiḥ navabhiḥ tattvaiḥ saḥ vikāra-mayaḥ virāṭ nirmitaḥ dṛśyate yatra sa-citke bhuvana-trayam
etat vai pauruṣam rūpam bhūḥ pādau dyauḥ śiraḥ nabhaḥ nābhiḥ sūryaḥ akṣiṇī nāse vāyuḥ karṇau diśaḥ prabhoḥ prajā-patiḥ prajananam apānaḥ mṛtyuḥ īśituḥ tat-bāhavaḥ loka-pālāḥ manaḥ candraḥ bhruvau yamaḥ lajjā uttaraḥ adharaḥ lobhaḥ dantāḥ jyotsnā smayaḥ bhramaḥ romāṇi bhū-ruhāḥ bhūmnaḥ meghāḥ puruṣa mūrdha-jāḥ
yāvān ayam vai puruṣaḥ yāvatyā saṁsthayā mitaḥ tāvān asau api mahā-puruṣaḥ loka-saṁsthayā
kaustubha-vyapadeśena sva-ātma jyotiḥ bibharti ajaḥ tat-prabhā vyāpinī sākṣāt śrīvatsam urasā vibhuḥ
sva-māyām vana-mālā-ākhyām nānā-guṇa mayīm dadhat vāsaḥ chandaḥ-mayam pītam brahma-sūtram tri-vṛt svaram bibharti sāṅkhyam yogam ca devaḥ makara-kuṇḍale maulim padam pārameṣṭhyam sarva-loka abhayam karam
avyākṛtam ananta-ākhyam āsanam yat-adhiṣṭhitaḥ dharma-jñāna-ādibhiḥ yuktam sattvam padmam iha ucyate
ojaḥ-sahaḥ-bala yutam mukhya-tattvam gadām dadhat apām tattvam dara varam tejaḥ-tattvam sudarśanam nabhaḥ-nibham nabhaḥ-tattvam asim carma tamaḥ-mayam kāla-rūpam dhanuḥ śārṅgam tathā karma-maya iṣu-dhim
indriyāṇi śarān āhuḥ ākūtīḥ asya syandanam tat-mātrāṇi asya abhivyaktim mudrayā artha-kriyā-ātmatām
maṇḍalam deva-yajanam dīkṣā saṁskāraḥ ātmanaḥ paricaryā bhagavataḥ ātmanaḥ durita kṣayaḥ
bhagavān bhaga-śabda artham līlā-kamalam udvahan dharmam yaśaḥ ca bhagavān cāmara-vyajane abhajat
ātapatram tu vaikuṇṭham dvijāḥ dhāma akutaḥ-bhayam tri-vṛt vedaḥ suparṇa-ākhyaḥ yajñam vahati pūruṣam
anapāyinī bhagavatī śrīḥ sākṣāt ātmanaḥ hareḥ viṣvaksenaḥ tantra-mūrtiḥ viditaḥ pārṣada-adhipaḥ nanda-ādayaḥ aṣṭau dvāḥ-sthāḥ ca te aṇimā-ādyāḥ hareḥ guṇāḥ
vāsudevaḥ saṅkarṣaṇaḥ pradyumnaḥ puruṣaḥ svayam aniruddhaḥ iti brahman mūrti-vyūhaḥ abhidhīyate
saḥ viśvaḥ taijasaḥ prājñaḥ turīyaḥ iti vṛttibhiḥ artha indriya āśaya jñānaiḥ bhagavān paribhāvyate
aṅga upāṅga āyudha ākalpaiḥ bhagavān tat catuṣṭayam bibharti sma catuḥ-mūrtiḥ bhagavān hariḥ īśvaraḥ
dvija-ṛṣabha saḥ eṣaḥ brahma-yoniḥ svayam-dṛk sva-mahima paripūrṇaḥ māyayā ca svayā etat sṛjati harati pāti iti ākhyayā anāvṛta akṣaḥ vivṛtaḥ iva niruktaḥ tat-paraiḥ ātma labhyaḥ
śrī-kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa-sakha vṛṣṇi ṛṣabha avani dhruk rājanya-vaṁśa dahana anapavarga vīrya govinda gopa vanitā vraja bhṛtya gīta tīrtha śravaḥ śravaṇa maṅgala pāhi bhṛtyān
yaḥ idam kalye utthāya mahā-puruṣa-lakṣaṇam tat-cittaḥ prayataḥ japtvā brahma veda guhā-śayam
śrī-śaunakaḥ uvāca śukaḥ yat āha bhagavān viṣṇu-rātāya śṛṇvate sauraḥ gaṇaḥ māsi māsi nānā vasati saptakaḥ teṣām nāmāni karmāṇi niyuktānām adhīśvaraiḥ brūhi naḥ śraddadhānānām vyūham sūrya-ātmanaḥ hareḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca anādi avidyayā viṣṇoḥ ātmanaḥ sarva-dehinām nirmitaḥ loka-tantraḥ ayam lokeṣu parivartate
ekaḥ eva hi lokānām sūryaḥ ātmā ādi-kṛt hariḥ sarva-veda kriyā mūlam ṛṣibhiḥ bahudhā uditaḥ
kālaḥ deśaḥ kriyā kartā karaṇam kāryam āgamaḥ dravyam phalam iti brahman navadhā uktaḥ ajayā hariḥ
madhu-ādiṣu dvādaśasu bhagavān kāla-rūpa dhṛk loka-tantrāya carati pṛthak dvādaśabhiḥ gaṇaiḥ
dhātā kṛtasthalī hetiḥ vāsukiḥ rathakṛt mune pulastyaḥ tumburuḥ iti madhu-māsam nayanti amī
aryamā pulahaḥ athaujāḥ prahetiḥ puñjikasthalī nāradaḥ kacchanīraḥ ca nayanti ete sma mādhavam
mitraḥ atriḥ pauruṣeyaḥ atha takṣakaḥ menakā hahāḥ rathasvanaḥ iti hi ete śukra-māsam nayanti amī
vasiṣṭhaḥ varuṇaḥ rambhā sahajanyaḥ tathā huhūḥ śukraḥ citrasvanaḥ ca eva śuci-māsam nayanti amī
indraḥ viśvāvasuḥ śrotāḥ elāpatraḥ tathā aṅgirāḥ pramlocā rākṣasaḥ varyaḥ nabhaḥ-māsam nayanti amī
vivasvān ugrasenaḥ ca vyāghraḥ āsāraṇaḥ bhṛguḥ anumlocā śaṅkhapālaḥ nabhasya-ākhyam nayanti amī
pūṣā dhanañjayaḥ vātaḥ suṣeṇaḥ suruciḥ tathā ghṛtācī gautamaḥ ca iti tapaḥ-māsam nayanti amī
ṛtuḥ varcā bharadvājaḥ parjanyaḥ senajit tathā viśvaḥ airāvataḥ ca eva tapasya-ākhyam nayanti amī
atha aṁśuḥ kaśyapaḥ tārkṣyaḥ ṛtasenaḥ tathā urvaśī vidyucchatruḥ mahāśaṅkhaḥ sahaḥ-māsam nayanti amī
bhagaḥ sphūrjaḥ ariṣṭanemiḥ ūrṇaḥ āyuḥ ca pañcamaḥ karkoṭakaḥ pūrvacittiḥ puṣya-māsam nayanti amī
tvaṣṭā ṛcīka-tanayaḥ kambalaḥ ca tilottamā brahmāpetaḥ atha śatajit dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ iṣam-bharāḥ
viṣṇuḥ aśvataraḥ rambhā sūryavarcāḥ ca satyajit viśvāmitraḥ makhāpetaḥ ūrja-māsam nayanti amī
etāḥ bhagavataḥ viṣṇoḥ ādityasya vibhūtayaḥ smaratām sandhyayoḥ nṝṇām haranti aṁhaḥ dine dine
dvādaśasu api māseṣu devaḥ asau ṣaḍbhiḥ asya vai caran samantāt tanute paratra iha ca sat-matim
sāma-ṛk-yajurbhiḥ tat-liṅgaiḥ ṛṣayaḥ saṁstuvanti amum gandharvāḥ tam pragāyanti nṛtyanti apsarasaḥ agrataḥ unnahyanti ratham nāgāḥ grāmaṇyaḥ ratha-yojakāḥ codayanti ratham pṛṣṭhe nairṛtāḥ bala-śālinaḥ
vālakhilyāḥ sahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭiḥ brahma-ṛṣayaḥ amalāḥ purataḥ abhimukham yānti stuvanti stutibhiḥ vibhum
evam hi anādi nidhanaḥ bhagavān hariḥ īśvaraḥ kalpe kalpe svam ātmānam vyūhya lokān avati ajaḥ
sūtaḥ uvāca namaḥ dharmāya mahate namaḥ kṛṣṇāya vedhase brahmaṇebhyaḥ namaskṛtya dharmān vakṣye sanātanān
etat vaḥ kathitam viprāḥ viṣṇoḥ caritam adbhutam bhavadbhiḥ yat aham pṛṣṭaḥ narāṇām puruṣa ucitam
atra saṅkīrtitaḥ sākṣāt sarva-pāpa haraḥ hariḥ nārāyaṇaḥ hṛṣīkeśaḥ bhagavān sātvatām patiḥ
atra brahma param guhyam jagataḥ prabhava apyayam jñānam ca tat-upākhyānam proktam vijñāna saṁyutam
bhakti-yogaḥ samākhyātaḥ vairāgyam ca tat-āśrayam pārīkṣitam upākhyānam nārada ākhyānam eva ca
prāya-upaveśaḥ rāja-ṛṣeḥ vipra-śāpāt parīkṣitaḥ śukasya brahma-ṛṣabhasya saṁvādaḥ ca parīkṣitaḥ
yoga-dhāraṇayā utkrāntiḥ saṁvādaḥ nārada-ajayoḥ avatāra-anugītam ca sargaḥ prādhānikaḥ agrataḥ
vidura-uddhava saṁvādaḥ kṣattṛ-maitreyayoḥ tataḥ purāṇa-saṁhitā praśnaḥ mahā-puruṣa saṁsthitiḥ
tataḥ prākṛtikaḥ sargaḥ sapta vaikṛtikāḥ ca ye tataḥ brahma-aṇḍa sambhūtiḥ vairājaḥ puruṣaḥ yataḥ
kālasya sthūla-sūkṣmasya gatiḥ padma samudbhavaḥ bhuvaḥ uddharaṇe ambhodheḥ hiraṇyākṣa-vadhaḥ yathā
ūrdhva tiryak avāk sargaḥ rudra sargaḥ tathā eva ca ardha-nārī īśvarasya atha yataḥ svāyambhuvaḥ manuḥ
śatarūpā ca yā strīṇām ādyā prakṛtiḥ uttamā santānaḥ dharma-patnīnām kardamasya prajāpateḥ
avatāraḥ bhagavataḥ kapilasya mahā-ātmanaḥ devahūtyāḥ ca saṁvādaḥ kapilena ca dhī-matā
nava-brahma samutpattiḥ dakṣa-yajña vināśanam dhruvasya caritam paścāt pṛthoḥ prācīnabarhiṣaḥ nāradasya ca saṁvādaḥ tataḥ praiyavratam dvijāḥ nābheḥ tataḥ anucaritam ṛṣabhasya bharatasya ca
dvīpa-varṣa-samudrāṇām giri-nadī upavarṇanam jyotiḥ-cakrasya saṁsthānam pātāla naraka sthitiḥ
dakṣa-janma pracetobhyaḥ tat-putrīṇām ca santatiḥ yataḥ deva-asura-narāḥ tiryak-naga-khaga-ādayaḥ
tvāṣṭrasya janma-nidhanam putrayoḥ ca diteḥ dvijāḥ daitya-īśvarasya caritam prahrādasya mahā-ātmanaḥ
manu-antara anukathanam gaja-indrasya vimokṣaṇam manuantara-avatārāḥ ca viṣṇoḥ hayaśirā-ādayaḥ
kaurmam mātsyam nārasiṁham vāmanam ca jagat-pateḥ kṣīra-uda mathanam tadvat amṛta-arthe diva-okasām
deva-asura mahā-yuddham rāja-vaṁśa anukīrtanam ikṣvāku-janma tat-vaṁśaḥ sudyamnasya mahā-ātmanaḥ
ilā-upākhyānam atra uktam tārā-upākhyānam eva ca sūrya-vaṁśa anukathanam śaśāda-ādyāḥ nṛga-ādayaḥ
saukanyam ca atha śaryāteḥ kakutsthasya ca dhī-mataḥ khaṭvāṅgasya ca māndhātuḥ saubhareḥ sagarasya ca
rāmasya kośala-indrasya caritam kilbiṣa-apaham nimeḥ aṅga-parityāgaḥ janakānām ca sambhavaḥ
rāmasya bhārgava-indrasya niḥkṣatrī-karaṇam bhuvaḥ ailasya soma-vaṁśasya yayāteḥ nahuṣasya ca dauṣmanteḥ bharatasya api śāntanoḥ tat sutasya ca yayāteḥ jyeṣṭha-putrasya yadoḥ vaṁśaḥ anu-kīrtitaḥ
yatra avatīrṇaḥ bhagavān kṛṣṇa-ākhyaḥ jagat-īśvaraḥ vasudeva-gṛhe janma tataḥ vṛddhiḥ ca gokule
tasya karmāṇi apārāṇi kīrtitāni asura-dviṣaḥ pūtanā asu payaḥ pānam śakaṭa uccāṭanam śiśoḥ tṛṇāvartasya niṣpeṣaḥ tathā eva baka-vatsayoḥ agha-asura vadhaḥ dhātrā vatsa-pāla avagūhanam
dhenukasya saha-bhrātuḥ pralambasya ca saṅkṣayaḥ gopānām ca paritrāṇam dāva-agneḥ parisarpataḥ
damanam kāliyasya aheḥ mahā-aheḥ nanda-mokṣaṇam vrata-caryā tu kanyānām yatra tuṣṭaḥ acyutaḥ vrataiḥ prasādaḥ yajña-patnībhyaḥ viprāṇām ca anutāpanam govardhana-uddhāraṇam ca śakrasya surabheḥ atha yajña-abhiṣekaḥ kṛṣṇasya strībhiḥ krīḍā ca rātriṣu śaṅkhacūḍasya durbuddheḥ vadhaḥ ariṣṭasya keśinaḥ
akrūra āgamanam paścāt prasthānam rāma-kṛṣṇayoḥ vraja-strīṇām vilāpaḥ ca mathurā-ālokanam tataḥ
gaja muṣṭika-cāṇūra kaṁsa ādīnām tathā vadhaḥ mṛtasya ānayanam sūnoḥ punaḥ sāndīpaneḥ guroḥ
mathurāyām nivasatā yadu-cakrasya yat priyam kṛtam uddhava-rāmābhyām yutena hariṇā dvijāḥ
jarāsandha samānīta sainyasya bahuśaḥ vadhaḥ ghātanam yavana-indrasya kuśasthalyāḥ niveśanam
ādānam pārijātasya sudharmāyāḥ sura-ālayāt rukmiṇyāḥ haraṇam yuddhe pramathya dviṣataḥ hareḥ
harasya jṛmbhaṇam yuddhe bāṇasya bhuja kṛntanam prāgjyotiṣa-patim hatvā kanyānām haraṇam ca yat
caidya pauṇḍraka śālvānām dantavakrasya durmateḥ śambaraḥ dvividaḥ pīṭhaḥ muraḥ pañcajana-ādayaḥ māhātmyam ca vadhaḥ teṣām vārāṇasyāḥ ca dāhanam bhāra avataraṇam bhūmeḥ nimittī-kṛtya pāṇḍavān
vipra-śāpa apadeśena saṁhāraḥ sva-kulasya ca uddhavasya ca saṁvādaḥ vasudevasya ca adbhutaḥ yatra ātma-vidyā hi akhilā proktā dharma-vinirṇayaḥ tataḥ martya parityāgaḥ ātma-yoga anubhāvataḥ
yuga lakṣaṇa vṛttiḥ ca kalau nṝṇām upaplavaḥ catuḥ-vidhaḥ ca pralayaḥ utpattiḥ tri-vidhā tathā
deha-tyāgaḥ ca rāja-ṛṣeḥ viṣṇu-rātasya dhī-mataḥ śākhā praṇayanam ṛṣeḥ mārkaṇḍeyasya sat-kathā mahā-puruṣa vinyāsaḥ sūryasya jagat-ātmanaḥ
iti ca uktam dvija-śreṣṭhāḥ yat pṛṣṭaḥ aham iha asmi vaḥ līlā-avatāra karmāṇi kīrtitāni iha sarvaśaḥ
patitaḥ skhalitaḥ ca ārtaḥ kṣuttvā vā vivaśaḥ gṛṇan haraye namaḥ iti uccaiḥ mucyate sarva-pātakāt
saṅkīrtyamānaḥ bhagavān anantaḥ śruta anubhāvaḥ vyasanam hi puṁsām praviśya cittam vidhunoti aśeṣam yathā tamaḥ arkaḥ abhram iva ati-vātaḥ
mṛṣāḥ giraḥ tāḥ hi asatīḥ asat-kathāḥ na kathyate yat bhagavān adhokṣajaḥ tat eva satyam tat u ha eva maṅgalam tat eva puṇyam bhagavat-guṇa udayam
tat eva ramyam ruciram navam navam tat eva śaśvat manasaḥ mahā-utsavam tat eva śoka-arṇava śoṣaṇam nṛṇām yat uttamaḥśloka yaśaḥ anugīyate
na yat vacaḥ citra-padam hareḥ yaśaḥ jagat pavitram pragṛṇīta karhicit tat dhvāṅkṣa tīrtham na tu haṁsa sevitam yatra acyutaḥ tatra hi sādhavaḥ amalāḥ
tat vāk visargaḥ janatā agha samplavaḥ yasmin prati-ślokam abaddhavati api nāmāni anantasya yaśaḥ aṅkitāni yat śṛṇvanti gāyanti gṛṇanti sādhavaḥ
naiṣkarmyam api acyuta bhāva varjitam na śobhate jñānam alam nirañjanam kutaḥ punaḥ śaśvat abhadram īśvare na hi arpitam karma yat api anuttamam
yaśaḥ śriyām eva pariśramaḥ paraḥ varṇa-āśrama-ācāra tapaḥ śruta ādiṣu avismṛtiḥ śrīdhara pāda-padmayoḥ guṇa-anuvāda śravaṇa ādara ādibhiḥ
avismṛtiḥ kṛṣṇa-pada-aravindayoḥ kṣiṇoti abhadrāṇi ca śam tanoti sattvasya śuddhim parama-ātma bhaktim jñānam ca vijñāna virāga yuktam
yūyam dvija-agryāḥ bata bhūri-bhāgāḥ yat śaśvat ātmani akhila ātma-bhūtam nārāyaṇam devam adevam īśam ajasra bhāvāḥ bhajata āviveśya
aham ca saṁsmāritaḥ ātma-tattvam śrutam purā me parama-ṛṣi vaktrāt prāya-upaveśe nṛpateḥ parīkṣitaḥ sadasi ṛṣīṇām mahatām ca śṛṇvatām
etat vaḥ kathitam viprāḥ kathanīya uru-karmaṇaḥ māhātmyam vāsudevasya sarva-aśubha vināśanam
yaḥ etat śrāvayet nityam yāma-kṣaṇam ananya-dhīḥ ślokam ekam tat-ardham vā pādam pāda-ardham eva vā śraddhā-vān yaḥ anuśṛṇuyāt punāti ātmānam eva saḥ
dvādaśyām ekādaśyām vā śṛṇvan āyuṣya-vān bhavet paṭhati anaśnan prayataḥ pūtaḥ bhavati pātakāt
puṣkare mathurāyām ca dvāravatyām yata-ātma-vān upoṣya saṁhitām etām paṭhitvā mucyate bhayāt
devatāḥ munayaḥ siddhāḥ pitaraḥ manavaḥ nṛpāḥ yacchanti kāmān gṛṇataḥ śṛṇvataḥ yasya kīrtanāt
ṛcaḥ yajūṁṣi sāmāni dvijaḥ adhītya anuvindate madhu-kulyāḥ ghṛta-kulyāḥ payaḥ-kulyāḥ ca tat phalam
purāṇa-saṁhitām etām adhītya prayataḥ dvijaḥ proktam bhagavatā yat tu tat padam paramam vrajet
vipraḥ adhītya āpnuyāt prajñām rājanya udadhi-mekhalām vaiśyaḥ nidhi patitvam ca śūdraḥ śudhyeta pātakāt
kali mala-saṁhati kālanaḥ akhila-īśaḥ hariḥ itaratra na gīyate hi abhīkṣṇam iha tu punaḥ bhagavān aśeṣa-mūrtiḥ paripaṭhitaḥ anu-padam kathā-prasaṅgaiḥ
tam aham ajam anantam ātma-tattvam jagat udaya sthiti saṁyama ātma-śaktim dyu-patibhiḥ aja-śakra-śaṅkara-ādyaiḥ duravasita stavam acyutam nataḥ asmi
upacita nava-śaktibhiḥ sve ātmani uparacita sthira jaṅgama ālayāya bhagavate upalabhdhi-mātra dhāmne sura ṛṣabhāya namaḥ sanātanāya
sva-sukha nibhṛta cetāḥ tat vyudasta anya-bhāvaḥ api ajita rucira līlā ākṛṣṭa sāraḥ tadīyam vyatanuta kṛpayā yaḥ tattva-dīpam purāṇam tam akhila-vṛjina-ghnam vyāsa-sūnum nataḥ asmi
sūtaḥ uvāca yam brahmā varuṇa-indra-rudra-marutaḥ stunvanti divyaiḥ stavaiḥ vedaiḥ sa aṅga pada-krama upaniṣadaiḥ gāyanti yam sāma-gāḥ dhyāna avasthita tat-gatena manasā paśyanti yam yoginaḥ yasya antam na viduḥ sura-asura-gaṇāḥ devāya tasmai namaḥ
pṛṣṭhe bhrāmyat amanda mandara-giri grāva-agra kaṇḍūyanāt nidrāloḥ kamaṭha-ākṛteḥ bhagavataḥ śvāsa anilāḥ pāntu vaḥ yat saṁskāra kalā anuvartana-vaśāt velā-nibhena ambhasām yāta-āyātam atandritam jala-nidheḥ na adya api viśrāmyati
purāṇa saṅkhyā sambhūtim asya vācya prayojane dānam dānasya māhātmyam pāṭha-ādeḥ ca nibodhata
brāhmam daśa sahasrāṇi pādmam pañca-ūna-ṣaṣṭi ca śrī-vaiṣṇavam trayaḥ-viṁśat catuḥ-viṁśati śaivakam daśa-aṣṭau śrī-bhāgavatam nāradam pañca-viṁśati mārkaṇḍam nava vāhnam ca daśa-pañca-catuḥ-śatam catuḥ-daśa bhaviṣyam syāt tathā pañca-śatāni ca daśa-aṣṭau brahma-vaivartam laiṅgam ekādaśa eva tu catuḥ-viṁśati vārāham ekāśīti-sahasrakam skāndam śatam tathā ca ekam vāmanam daśa kīrtitam kaurmam sapta-daśa ākhyātam mātsyam tat tu catuḥ-daśa eka-ūna-viṁśat sauparṇam brahmāṇḍam dvādaśa eva tu evam Purāṇa sandohaḥ catuḥ-lakṣaḥ udāhṛtaḥ tatra aṣṭa-daśa-sāhasram śrī-bhāgavatam iṣyate
idam bhagavatā pūrvam brahmaṇe nābhi-paṅkaje sthitāya bhava bhītāya kāruṇyāt samprakāśitam
ādi madhya avasāneṣu vairāgya ākhyāna saṁyutam hari-līlā kathā-vrāta amṛta ānandita sat-suram sarva-vedānta sāram yat brahma ātma-ekatva lakṣaṇam vastu advitīyam tat-niṣṭham kaivalya eka prayojanam
prauṣṭhapadyām paurṇamāsyām hema-siṁha samanvitam dadāti yaḥ bhāgavatam saḥ yāti paramām gatim
rājante tāvat anyāni purāṇāni satām gaṇe yāvat bhāgavatam na eva śrūyate amṛta-sāgaram
sarva-vedānta sāram hi śrī-bhāgavatam iṣyate tat rasa-amṛta tṛptasya na anyatra syāt ratiḥ kvacit
nimna-gānām yathā gaṅgā devānām acyutaḥ yathā vaiṣṇavānām yathā śambhuḥ purāṇānām idam tathā
kṣetrāṇām ca eva sarveṣām yathā kāśī hi anuttamā tathā purāṇa-vrātānām śrīmat-bhāgavatam dvijāḥ
śrīmat-bhāgavatam purāṇam amalam yat vaiṣṇavānām priyam yasmin pāramahaṁsyam ekam amalam jñānam param gīyate tatra jñāna-virāga-bhakti-sahitam naiṣkarmyam āviṣkṛtam tat śṛṇvan su-paṭhan vicāraṇa-paraḥ bhaktyā vimucyet naraḥ
kasmai yena vibhāsitaḥ ayam atulaḥ jñāna pradīpaḥ purā tat-rūpeṇa ca nāradāya munaye kṛṣṇāya tat-rūpiṇā yogi-indrāya tat-ātmanā atha bhagavat-rātāya kāruṇyataḥ tat śuddham vimalam viśokam amṛtam satyam param dhīmahi
namaḥ tasmai bhagavate vāsudevāya sākṣiṇe yaḥ idam kṛpayā kasmai vyācacakṣe mumukṣave
yogi-indrāya namaḥ tasmai śukaya brahma-rūpiṇe saṁsāra-sarpa daṣṭam yaḥ viṣṇu-rātam amūmucat
bhave bhave yathā bhaktiḥ pādayoḥ tava jāyate tathā kuruṣva deva-īśa nāthaḥ tvam naḥ yataḥ prabho
nāma-saṅkīrtanam yasya sarva-pāpa praṇāśanam praṇāmaḥ duḥkha śamanaḥ tam namāmi harim param
īśvaraḥ paramaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sat cit ānanda vigrahaḥ anādiḥ ādiḥ govindaḥ sarva-kāraṇa-kāraṇam
sahasra-patra kamalam gokula-ākhyam mahat padam tat karṇikāram tat dhāma tat ananta aṁśa sambhavam
karṇikāram mahat yantram ṣaṭ-koṇam vajra kīlakam ṣaṭ-aṅga-ṣaṭ-padī sthānam prakṛtyā puruṣeṇa ca prema-ānanda mahā-ānanda rasena avasthitam hi yat jyotiḥ-rūpeṇa manunā kāma-bījena saṅgatam
tat kiñjalkam tat-aṁśānām tat patrāṇi śriyām api
catuḥ-asraṁ tat paritaḥ śveta-dvīpa ākhyam adbhutam catuḥ-asram catuḥ-mūrteḥ catuḥ-dhāma catuḥ-kṛtam caturbhiḥ puruṣa-arthaiḥ ca caturbhiḥ hetubhiḥ vṛtam śūlaiḥ daśabhiḥ ānaddham ūrdhva-adhaḥ dik vidikṣu api aṣṭabhiḥ nidhibhiḥ juṣṭam aṣṭabhiḥ siddhibhiḥ tathā manu-rūpaiḥ ca daśabhiḥ dik-pālaiḥ paritaḥ vṛtam śyāmaiḥ gauraiḥ ca raktaiḥ ca śuklaiḥ ca pārṣada-ṛṣabhaiḥ śobhitam śaktibhiḥ tābhiḥ adbhutābhiḥ samantataḥ
evam jyotiḥ-mayaḥ devaḥ sat-ānandaḥ parāt paraḥ ātma-ārāmasya tasya asti prakṛtyā na samāgamaḥ
māyayā aramamāṇasya na viyogaḥ tayā saha ātmanā ramayā reme tyakta-kālam sisṛkṣayā
niyatiḥ sā ramā devi tat priyā tat vaśam tadā tat liṅgam bhagavān śambhuḥ jyotiḥ-rūpaḥ sanātanaḥ yā yoniḥ sa aparā śaktiḥ kāmaḥ bījam mahat hareḥ
liṅga yoni ātmikāḥ jātāḥ imāḥ māheśvarī prajāḥ
śaktimān puruṣaḥ saḥ ayam liṅga-rūpī mahā-īśvaraḥ tasmin āvirabhūt liṅge mahā-viṣṇuḥ jagat-patiḥ
sahasra-śīrṣā puruṣaḥ sahasra-akṣaḥ sahasra-pāt sahasra-bāhuḥ viśva-ātmā sahasra-aṁśaḥ sahasra-sūḥ
nārāyaṇaḥ saḥ bhagavān āpaḥ tasmāt sanātanāt āvirāsīt kāraṇa-arṇaḥ nidhiḥ saṅkarṣaṇa-ātmakaḥ yoga-nidrām gataḥ tasmin sahasra-aṁśaḥ svayam mahān
tat roma-bila-jāleṣu bījam saṅkarṣaṇasya ca haimāni aṇḍāni jāta-ni mahā-bhūta āvṛtāni tu
prati aṇḍam evam eka-aṁśāt eka-aṁśāt viśati svayam sahasra-mūrdhā viśva-ātmā mahā-viṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥ
vāma-aṅgāt asṛjat viṣṇum dakṣiṇa-aṅgāt prajāpatim jyotiḥ-liṅga mayam śambhum kūrca-deśāt avāsṛjat
ahaṅkāra ātmakam viśvam tasmāt etat vyajāyata
atha taiḥ tri-vidhaiḥ veśaiḥ līlām udvahataḥ kila yoga-nidrā bhagavatī tasya śrīḥ iva saṅgatā
sisṛkṣāyām tataḥ nābheḥ tasya padmam viniryayau tat-nālam hema-nalīnam brahmaṇaḥ lokam adbhutam
tattvāni pūrva-rūḍhāni kāraṇāni parasparam samavāya aprayogāt ca vibhinnāni pṛthak pṛthak cit-śaktyā sajjamānaḥ atha bhagavān ādi-pūruṣaḥ yojayan māyayā devaḥ yoga-nidrām akalpayat
yojayitvā tu tāni eva praviveśa svayam guhām guhām praviṣṭe tasmin tu jīva-ātmā pratibudhyate
saḥ nityaḥ nitya-sambandhaḥ prakṛtiḥ ca parā eva sā
evam sarva-ātma sambandham nābhyām padmam hareḥ abhūt tatra brahmā abhavat bhūyaḥ catuḥ-vedī catuḥ-mukhaḥ
sañjātaḥ bhagavat-śaktyā tat-kālam kila coditaḥ sisṛkṣāyām matim cakre pūrva-saṁskāra-saṁskṛtaḥ dadarśa kevalam dhvāntam na anyat kim api sarvataḥ
uvāca purataḥ tasmai tasya divyā sarasvatī kāma kṛṣṇāya he gopī-jana iti api vallabhāya priyā vahneḥ mantram te dāsyati priyam
tapaḥ tvam tapa etena tava siddhiḥ bhaviṣyati
atha tepe saḥ suciram prīṇan govindam avyayam śvetadvīpa-patim kṛṣṇam goloka-stham parāt param prakṛtyā guṇa-rūpiṇyā rūpiṇyā paryupāsitam sahasra-dala-sampanne koṭi-kiñjalka bṛṁhite bhūmiḥ cintāmaṇiḥ tatra karṇikāre mahā-āsane samāsīnam cit-ānandam jyotiḥ-rūpam sanātanam śabda-brahma mayam veṇum vādayantam mukha-ambuje vilāsinī-gaṇa vṛtam svaiḥ svaiḥ aṁśaiḥ abhiṣṭutam
atha veṇu-ninādasya trayī-mūrti-mayī gatiḥ sphuranti praviveśa āśu mukha-abjāni svayambhuvaḥ gāyatrīm gāyataḥ tasmāt adhigatya saroja-jaḥ saṁskṛtaḥ ca ādi-guruṇā dvijatām agamat tataḥ
trayyā prabuddhaḥ atha vidhiḥ vijñāta tattva-sāgaraḥ tuṣṭāva veda-sāreṇa stotreṇa anena keśavam
cintāmaṇi prakara sadmasu kalpa-vṛkṣa lakṣa āvṛteṣu surabhīḥ abhipālayantam lakṣmī sahasra śata sambhrama sevyamānam govindam ādi-puruṣam tam aham bhajāmi
veṇum kvaṇantam aravinda-dala āyata akṣam barha avataṁsam asita-ambuda sundara aṅgam kandarpa koṭi kamanīya viśeṣa śobham govindam ādi-puruṣam tam aham bhajāmi
ālola candraka lasat vana-mālya vaṁśī ratna-aṅgadam praṇaya keli-kalā vilāsam śyāmam tri-bhaṅga lalitam niyata prakāśam govindam ādi-puruṣam tam aham bhajāmi
aṅgāni yasya sakala-indriya vṛtti-manti paśyanti pānti kalayanti ciram jaganti ānanda cit maya sat ujjvala vigrahasya govindam ādi-puruṣam tam aham bhajāmi
advaitam acyutam anādim ananta-rūpam ādyam purāṇa-puruṣam nava-yauvanam ca vedeṣu durlabham adurlabham ātma-bhaktau govindam ādi-puruṣam tam aham bhajāmi
panthāḥ tu koṭi-śata vatsara sampragamyaḥ vāyoḥ atha api manasaḥ muni-puṅgavānām saḥ api asti yat prapada sīmni avicintya-tattve govindam ādi-puruṣam tam aham bhajāmi
ekaḥ api asau racayitum jagat-aṇḍa koṭim yat śaktiḥ asti jagat-aṇḍa-cayāḥ yat-antaḥ aṇḍa-antara-stha parama-aṇu-caya antara-stham govindam ādi-puruṣam tam aham bhajāmi
yat bhāva bhāvita dhiyaḥ manujāḥ tathā eva samprāpya rūpa mahima āsana yāna bhūṣāḥ sūktaiḥ yam eva nigama prathitaiḥ stuvanti govindam ādi-puruṣam tam aham bhajāmi
ānanda cit maya rasa prati bhāvitābhiḥ tābhiḥ yaḥ eva nija-rūpatayā kalābhiḥ goloka eva nivasati akhila-ātma bhūtaḥ govindam ādi-puruṣam tam aham bhajāmi
prema añjana churita bhakti vilocanena santaḥ sadā eva hṛdayeṣu vilokayanti yam śyāma sundaram acintya guṇa svarūpam govindam ādi-puruṣam tam aham bhajāmi
rāma-ādi mūrtiṣu kalā-niyamena tiṣṭhan nānā avatāram akarot bhuvaneṣu kintu kṛṣṇaḥ svayam samabhavat paramaḥ pumān yaḥ govindam ādi-puruṣam tam aham bhajāmi
yasya prabhā prabhavataḥ jagat-aṇḍa koṭi-koṭiṣu aśeṣa vasudhā-ādi vibhūti bhinnam tat brahma niṣkalam anantam aśeṣa-bhūtam govindam ādi-puruṣam tam aham bhajāmi
māyā hi yasya jagat-aṇḍa śatāni sūte trai-guṇya tat viṣaya veda vitāyamānā sattva-avalambi para-sattvam viśuddha-sattvam govindam ādi-puruṣam tam aham bhajāmi
ānanda cit-maya rasa ātmatayā manaḥsu yaḥ prāṇinām pratiphalan smaratām upetya līlāyitena bhuvanāni jayati ajasram govindam ādi-puruṣam tam aham bhajāmi
goloka-nāmni nija-dhāmni tale ca tasya devi maheśa hari dhāmasu teṣu teṣu te te prabhāva-nicayāḥ vihitāḥ ca yena govindam ādi-puruṣam tam aham bhajāmi
sṛṣṭi sthiti pralaya sādhana śaktiḥ ekā chāyā iva yasya bhuvanāni bibharti durgā icchā anurūpam api yasya ca ceṣṭate sā govindam ādi-puruṣam tam aham bhajāmi
kṣīram yathā dadhi vikāra-viśeṣa yogāt sañjāyate na hi tataḥ pṛthak asti hetoḥ yaḥ śambhutām api tathā samupaiti kāryāt govindam ādi-puruṣam tam aham bhajāmi
dīpa-arciḥ eva hi daśā-antaram abhyupetya dīpāyate vivṛta-hetu samāna-dharmā yaḥ tādṛk eva hi ca viṣṇutayā vibhāti govindam ādi-puruṣam tam aham bhajāmi
yaḥ kāraṇa-arṇava jale bhajati sma yoga-nidrām ananta jagat-aṇḍa sa roma-kūpaḥ ādhāra-śaktim avalambya parām sva-mūrtim govindam ādi-puruṣam tam aham bhajāmi
yasya eka niśvasita kālam atha avalambya jīvanti loma-vila-jāḥ jagat-aṇḍa-nāthāḥ viṣṇuḥ mahān saḥ iha yasya kalā-viśeṣaḥ govindam ādi-puruṣam tam aham bhajāmi
bhāsvān yathā aśma-śakaleṣu nijeṣu tejaḥ svīyam kiyat prakaṭayati api tadvat atra brahmā yaḥ eṣaḥ jagat-aṇḍa-vidhāna-kartā govindam ādi-puruṣam tam aham bhajāmi
yat pāda-pallava yugam vinidhāya kumbha-dvandve praṇāma-samaye saḥ gaṇa-adhirājaḥ vighnān vihantum alam asya jagat-trayasya govindam ādi-puruṣam tam aham bhajāmi
agniḥ mahi gaganam ambu marut diśaḥ ca kālaḥ tathā ātma manasī iti jagat-trayāṇi yasmāt bhavanti vibhavanti viśanti yam ca govindam ādi-puruṣam tam aham bhajāmi
yat cakṣuḥ eṣaḥ savitā sakala-grahāṇām rājā samasta-sura mūrtiḥ aśeṣa-tejāḥ yasya ājñayā bhramati sambhṛta kāla-cakraḥ govindam ādi-puruṣam tam aham bhajāmi
dharmaḥ atha pāpa-nicayaḥ śrutayaḥ tapāṁsi brahma-ādi kīṭa-pataga avadhayaḥ ca jīvāḥ yat datta mātra vibhava prakaṭa prabhāvāḥ govindam ādi-puruṣam tam aham bhajāmi
yaḥ tu indra-gopam atha vā indram aho sva-karma bandha anurūpa phala bhājanam ātanoti karmāṇi nirdahati kintu ca bhakti-bhājām govindam ādi-puruṣam tam aham bhajāmi
yam krodha kāma sahaja-praṇaya ādi bhīti vātsalya moha guru-gaurava sevya-bhāvaiḥ sañcintya tasya sadṛśīm tanum āpuḥ ete govindam ādi-puruṣam tam aham bhajāmi
śriyaḥ kāntāḥ kāntaḥ parama-puruṣaḥ kalpa-taravaḥ drumāḥ bhūmiḥ cintāmaṇi-gaṇa-mayi toyam amṛtam kathā gānam nāṭyam gamanam api vaṁśī priya-sakhī cit-ānandam jyotiḥ param api tat āsvādyam api ca saḥ yatra kṣīra-abdhiḥ sravati surabhībhyaḥ ca su-mahān nimeṣa-ardha ākhyaḥ vā vrajati na hi yatra api samayaḥ bhaje śveta-dvīpam tam aham iha golokam iti yam vidantaḥ te santaḥ kṣiti virala cārāḥ katipaye
atha uvāca mahā-viṣṇuḥ bhagavantam prajāpatim brahman mahattva vijñāne prajā-sarge ca cet matiḥ pañca-ślokīm imām vidyām vatsa dattām nibodha me
prabuddhe jñāna bhaktibhyām ātmani ānanda-cit-mayi udeti anuttamā bhaktiḥ bhagavat prema lakṣaṇā
pramāṇaiḥ tat sat-ācāraiḥ tat abhyāsaiḥ nirantaram bodhayan ātmanā ātmānam bhaktim api uttamām labhet
yasyāḥ śreyaḥ-karam na asti yayā nirvṛtim āpnuyāt yā sādhayati mām eva bhaktim tām eva sādhayet
dharmān anyān parityajya mām ekam bhaja viśvasan yādṛśī yādṛśī śraddhā siddhiḥ bhavati tādṛśī kurvan nirantaram karma lokaḥ ayam anuvartate tena eva karmaṇā dhyāyan mām parām bhaktim icchati
aham hi viśvasya cara-acarasya bījam pradhānam prakṛtiḥ pumān ca mayā āhitam tejaḥ idam bibharṣi vidhe vidhehi tvam atha u jaganti
